title: Eichinger 2014 Gaisberg Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: This wines arrives on tiptoe, citrus-scented and fresh, but once it expands ...
description: This wines arrives on tiptoe, citrus-scented and fresh, but once it expands on your palate it soon fills the mouth with all manner of stone fruits. As befits this vintage, everything is tempered with grapefruit zestiness but both mirabelle and apricot richness not only lend flavor but also a beautiful texture that insinuates quince and blood orange zest. What a triumph, what a marvel. Irresistible now but with incredible concentration this is built to last. Drink now till 2020 at least.

title: Loimer 2014 Steinmassl Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: The purity of the nose is glacial and utterly clean-cut. There is ...
description: The purity of the nose is glacial and utterly clean-cut. There is an enticing headiness to the lemon and bergamot aromas. This is uncompromisingly citric, with a life force that can revive every single nerve in our body. The citrus spectrum gets its full due in a wine that sparkles and glistens with purity and life itself.

title: Hiedler 2014 Heiligenstein Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: The heady fragrance of pure lemon zest hits home straight away, and ...
description: The heady fragrance of pure lemon zest hits home straight away, and the palate delivers the promised punch. Purity and freshness perform a high-wire act, all the while sending sparks of swirling tangerine and grapefruit in quick-fire flashes across the palate. Who needs fireworks when you can drink this? If you love acidity, you will be hooked.

title: Emmerich Knoll 2014 Loibner Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: A nose of pure lemon zest also has the faintest notions of ...
description: A nose of pure lemon zest also has the faintest notions of juniper and bitter orange peel that seem to assert themselves more on the slender, sylph-like body of this incisive wine. That lemony purity illuminates the taut palate and highlights those spicy reaches that are merely hinted at. A subtle wine of immense charm.

title: Franz Hirtzberger 2014 Hochrain Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: Some earthy spice mingles with the citrus zest that does not want ...
description: Some earthy spice mingles with the citrus zest that does not want to reveal itself quite yet, but there are notions of citron and grapefruit peel. There is a textured intensity at the core of this slender body, something addictive and moreish that you simply want to fathom. Light-bodied but rather seductive with an intensity that slowly creeps up on you.

title: Pichler-Krutzler 2014 Kellerberg Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: A very savory, earthy character appears amid the lemon-zest palate that also ...
description: A very savory, earthy character appears amid the lemon-zest palate that also features a salty, rock-solid statement. This is not for the fainthearted: a compact bundle of pure life with an utterly compelling nature and a lip-smackingly clean finish.

title: Schloss Gobelsburg 2014 Gaisberg Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: A very subtle nose gives a mere glimpse of lemon zest, the ...
description: A very subtle nose gives a mere glimpse of lemon zest, the palate delivers a thrillingly pure and exquisitely honest flavor that suggests clear mountain lakes and clean Alpine air. This is bracing and fresh, delicate and lemon-scented from the first sniff to the last echoing aftertaste. This could be dangerously addictive with its concentrated but ultraslender features.

title: Hiedler 2014 Kogelberg Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Nervy bundles of flavor present themselves on the nose and unfold fully ...
description: Nervy bundles of flavor present themselves on the nose and unfold fully on the palate: a streak of pure lemon, the zest of pink grapefruit, the tanginess of Seville orange rind. They close in with a laser-sharp focus on a slender but concentrated palate that finishes with exquisite purity. This is raciness defined.

title: Weszeli 2014 Steinmassl Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Oh the purity of freshly cut red-cheeked apples illuminated by equally pure ...
description: Oh the purity of freshly cut red-cheeked apples illuminated by equally pure lemon freshness. Yes this is high in the acidity stakes but comes with so much purity of fruit, one simply has to rejoice in all the liveliness. This offeing has a real spring in its step and will enliven any occasion, balanced and concentrated as it is.

title: Franz Hirtzberger 2014 Singerriedl Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: Perfumed hints of mandarin and stone fruit are subtly expressed on the ...
description: Perfumed hints of mandarin and stone fruit are subtly expressed on the nose. The palate is more incisive with fresh lemon zest and a feather-light body which holds fresh sprays of lemony citrus. Light but pleasingly intense, notions of stone mingle with all the lime, lemon and mandarin peel. Beautifully long.

title: Hirsch 2014 Heiligenstein Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: The nose promises clear citrus, the palate delivers wonderfully pure and linear ...
description: The nose promises clear citrus, the palate delivers wonderfully pure and linear lemon flavors, bursting with richer mandarin and firm-fleshed tangerine notes that crunch as you bite into them: this is how fresh, zesty and utterly appetizing this Riesling is. Dangerously delicious and oh so long.

title: Markus Huber 2014 Berg Reserve Riesling (Traisental)
excerpt: Taut grapefruit zest on the nose relaxes into lovely mandarin fruit and ...
description: Taut grapefruit zest on the nose relaxes into lovely mandarin fruit and zest on the palate. This is fresh and fruity, flavorsome and rounded by rich mandarin flavor as only a slender, willowy Riesling can be. Totally refreshing with a pristine finish. This dances and pirouettes like a ballerina.

title: Allram 2014 Heiligenstein Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Scented and fresh, this presents wiry, full-fruited flavors of red and green ...
description: Scented and fresh, this presents wiry, full-fruited flavors of red and green apple with a good dollop of zesty, pervasive freshness. There is quite a bit of concentration on a very streamlined body with lots of drive and a very vivid, lip-smacking finish.

title: Schloss Gobelsburg 2014 Heiligenstein Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: There is a citrus purity on the nose that suggests fresh lemon ...
description: There is a citrus purity on the nose that suggests fresh lemon juice, but it is tempered by some spice, like that of still-green Seville orange rind. The palate is streamlined and equally pure, it has an almost cleansing quality. This is luminous and delicious and slips down far too easily.

title: Standing Stone 2014 Ice Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Layers of sweet orange marmalade, citrus rind and pollen mingle seamlessly into ...
description: Layers of sweet orange marmalade, citrus rind and pollen mingle seamlessly into this deliciously honeyed ice wine. Intensely ripe, almost creamy in texture, its succulent sweetness is balanced neatly by a dazzling spray of tangerine acidity.

title: Hirsch 2014 Gaisberg Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Lovely verve and liveliness are evident in fresh, bright lemon notes and ...
description: Lovely verve and liveliness are evident in fresh, bright lemon notes and a clean-cut, light body of great precision. This has real, lasting focus and emphasises lemon juice and zest. The finish is almost cleansing. This provides great and lasting refreshment and has depth despite its lightness.

title: Nigl 2014 Privat Pellingen Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Lovely pure notes of lemon zest and juice swirl on nose and ...
description: Lovely pure notes of lemon zest and juice swirl on nose and palate. The slender palate bounces them back and shines with clarity and transparency, as smooth as the undisturbed surface of a mountain lake with an impressive and lasting lemon finish.

title: Nigl 2014 Goldberg Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Earth mingles with freshly cut apple peel in an appetizing fashion, while ...
description: Earth mingles with freshly cut apple peel in an appetizing fashion, while both apple and earth remain a constant on the taut palate: It is lit up with fresh acidity and shows a pleasant apple-peel texture and a clean, lasting finish.

title: Boundary Breaks 2014 Ice Wine Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Bitter orange rind and spice notes accent layers of sweet honey, pineapple ...
description: Bitter orange rind and spice notes accent layers of sweet honey, pineapple and mango in this lusciously sweet, silky ice wine. Strikes of lemon-lime acidity add zest and vibrance through a long, lingering finish.

title: Hiedler 2014 Gaisberg Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: A slightly milky note dampens the citrus flavors on the nose, a ...
description: A slightly milky note dampens the citrus flavors on the nose, a similar notion presents itself on the palate. There is lemon freshness and a streak of immense purity at the core, finishing with a slender but definite lemon note. Very clean-cut.

title: Jurtschitsch 2014 Heiligenstein Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Taut lemony freshness brightens nose and slender palate. This is lifted and ...
description: Taut lemony freshness brightens nose and slender palate. This is lifted and pure, bright and sprightly and a celebration of lemon juiciness and zest. The finish is whistle clean and as refreshing as the first strokes in a cold pool of glistening water.

title: Zocker 2013 Paragon Vineyard Riesling (Edna Valley)
excerpt: Baking soda, ripe citrus pith, lime blossoms and a soft petrol touch ...
description: Baking soda, ripe citrus pith, lime blossoms and a soft petrol touch show on the nose of this wine from a vineyard to watch in southern San Luis Obispo County. Tons of sprinkling acidity shows once sipped, with the nervy palate offering orange oil, lemon pith and peel, chamomile, goldenseal root and sunflower-seed flavors.

title: Hajszan Neumann 2014 Steinberg Riesling (Vienna)
excerpt: A wonderful perfume of citrus zest and the subtlest hint of aromatic ...
description: A wonderful perfume of citrus zest and the subtlest hint of aromatic pine. The palate shines with rounded but zesty citrus and shows immense concentration for such a zippy, slender wine. This is like dancing on a high-wire and terribly animating.

title: Steininger 2014 Seeberg Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Aromatic stone fruit swings in those lively citrus notes. There is a ...
description: Aromatic stone fruit swings in those lively citrus notes. There is a creamy apple flavor in the background, softening the bold lemon notes. This is pure and lifted, graceful and slender.

title: Stadt Krems 2014 Ried Grillenparz Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: A faint but enticing notion of pink grapefruit plays on the nose, ...
description: A faint but enticing notion of pink grapefruit plays on the nose, and there are floral nuances too. The palate is fruity and fresh and has an appealing, concentrated core of textured citrus zest, followed by a wonderfully clean finish.

title: V. Sattui 2014 Off-Dry Riesling (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A medium-sweet wine with 2.19% residual sugar, this has a sweetness like ...
description: A medium-sweet wine with 2.19% residual sugar, this has a sweetness like ripe white peach topped by a honeysuckle rose, but it remains light and never cloying. The nutty finish begs for blue cheese.

title: V. Sattui 2014 Dry Riesling (California)
excerpt: This aromatic wine does a great job of combining effusive fruit with ...
description: This aromatic wine does a great job of combining effusive fruit with a lively balance. Beautiful orange blossom and honeysuckle aromas blend into delicious apple flavors while a tangy, lemon-zest sensation lights up the texture.

title: Allram 2014 Gaisberg Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Such breezy freshness, such citric concentration on a slender, very streamlined body. ...
description: Such breezy freshness, such citric concentration on a slender, very streamlined body. Bright, lemony flavors fizz everywhere and create a feeling of lightness, but with a firm backbone. A clean, taut finish.

title: Tegernseerhof 2014 Ried Steinertal Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: A slightly green edge adheres to the zesty yellow grapefruit notes on ...
description: A slightly green edge adheres to the zesty yellow grapefruit notes on the nose, the palate is light-bodied but fizzes with freshness and crunchy acidity. Drink soon.

title: Lamoreaux Landing 2014 Semi-Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Buoyant and blossomy, this semidry Riesling bursts of fresh apple and grapefruit ...
description: Buoyant and blossomy, this semidry Riesling bursts of fresh apple and grapefruit flavors and a distinctly floral perfume. A tart lime edge frames a brisk, clean finish. Drink now to appreciate its freshness and aroma.

title: Tegernseerhof 2014 Ried Kellerberg Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: There is not a lot by way of scent, the palate, however, ...
description: There is not a lot by way of scent, the palate, however, delivers the freshness of sliced lemon and yellow grapefruit. The body is light but wonderfully clean and refreshing.

title: V. Sattui 2014 Dancing Egg Riesling (Anderson Valley)
excerpt: Aromas like melon and almond, then flavors like peach and honey make ...
description: Aromas like melon and almond, then flavors like peach and honey make a sophisticated blend in this dry, light-bodied wine. It has vibrant acidity for good balance and richness in texture that lingers on the finish. The name refers to the egg-shaped concrete vats used for fermentation.

title: Mayer am Pfarrplatz 2014 Alsegg Riesling (Vienna)
excerpt: The flavor of red and green apples dominates the nose. The palate ...
description: The flavor of red and green apples dominates the nose. The palate has a fleshier nature but a huge amount of zesty freshness that pulls everthing taut and straight. Clean and very refreshing.

title: Wieninger 2014 Nussberg Riesling (Vienna)
excerpt: Citric lightness of touch is already suggested on the nose but fully ...
description: Citric lightness of touch is already suggested on the nose but fully manifested on the palate where is centers on a linear, taut and fresh palate with real, soaring freshness.

title: North by Northwest 2014 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas of lime leaf and citrus lead to sleek, dry fruit flavors, ...
description: Aromas of lime leaf and citrus lead to sleek, dry fruit flavors, speckled with lime notes on the finish. Pair it with shrimp ceviche.

title: Elevation Cellars 2014 Imperium Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Bright aromas of freshly rubbed lime leaf, ripe peach and herbs lead ...
description: Bright aromas of freshly rubbed lime leaf, ripe peach and herbs lead to off-dry tangerine and stone-fruit flavors, perked up by tart acidity.

title: Lamoreaux Landing 2014 Ice Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Drizzles of honey coat the bounty of sun-kissed tangerines, apples and pears ...
description: Drizzles of honey coat the bounty of sun-kissed tangerines, apples and pears in this lip smackingly sweet Riesling ice wine. Dusty mineral tones and a welcome bite of astringency frame a long, meandering finish.

title: Frost Bitten 2014 Ice Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Aromas of white flowers, tangerine, honey and ginger are vibrant on this ...
description: Aromas of white flowers, tangerine, honey and ginger are vibrant on this cryo-frozen wine. The flavors are sweet, tapering toward the finish.

title: Steininger 2014 Steinhaus Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: This is fresh, bright and majoring on slightly stony, flinty lemon notes ...
description: This is fresh, bright and majoring on slightly stony, flinty lemon notes on a slender body. Drink soon, it will provide ample refreshment.

title: Pacific Rim 2014 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Mandarin orange, jasmine and honeysuckle aromas leap up. It drinks medium dry ...
description: Mandarin orange, jasmine and honeysuckle aromas leap up. It drinks medium dry with a broad feel and a floral lift on the finish. The palate wants a bit more acid but this wine is appealing.

title: V. Sattui 2012 Select Late Harvest Riesling (Napa Valley)
excerpt: The color of this wine with 11.6% residual sugar is dark gold ...
description: The color of this wine with 11.6% residual sugar is dark gold and the aromas all raisin and dried apricot. Thick and rich, it has a wealth of vanilla and caramel toffee to offer, with a need for cheese.

title: Charles & Charles 2014 Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: A new offering from this partnership, this wine brings aromas of jasmine, ...
description: A new offering from this partnership, this wine brings aromas of jasmine, lime and dried Nestea Ice Tea. It tingles the palate with lightly spritzy, off-dry lemon and peach flavors with a floral finish.

title: Wilridge 2014 Crawford Vineyard Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: This wine is a straightforward, easy sipper with aromas and flavors of ...
description: This wine is a straightforward, easy sipper with aromas and flavors of lilac and citrus. It drinks a hair off dry, with pink-grapefruit flavors throughout.

title: Three Brothers 2014 2nd Degree Medium Sweet Riesling (Seneca Lake)
excerpt: Crisp apple and pear aromas take a richer, riper turn towards melon ...
description: Crisp apple and pear aromas take a richer, riper turn towards melon and peach on the palate of this medium-sweet Riesling. Its juicy, fruity demeanor is straightforward and lush, but a punchy strike of lemon-lime acidity livens up the finish. Drink now.

title: Hogue 2014 Late Harvest Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: The aromas of jasmine, honeysuckle, ripe peach and botrytis are bright. The ...
description: The aromas of jasmine, honeysuckle, ripe peach and botrytis are bright. The mouthwatering stone-fruit flavors are sweet and persist, with white flowers on the finish.

title: Treleaven 2013 Dry Riesling (Cayuga Lake)
excerpt: Lean and spry, this dry Riesling balances fresh apple and tart nectarine ...
description: Lean and spry, this dry Riesling balances fresh apple and tart nectarine notes against a backdrop of crisp lemon-lime acidity. The finish is moderately long but marked by a pleasantly bitter lemon pith note. Drink now.

title: V. Sattui 2014 Riesling (Anderson Valley)
excerpt: This light-bodied, aromatic wine smells like roses and a bowl of fresh ...
description: This light-bodied, aromatic wine smells like roses and a bowl of fresh fruit. Flavors are lightly sweet and peachy, the texture tangy and the finish sugary.

title: Anthony Road 2014 Semi Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Savory notes of nuts and grains stand out against a backdrop of ...
description: Savory notes of nuts and grains stand out against a backdrop of fresh white grapefruit, apple and lemon in this semidry Riesling. Crisp lime acidity lends refreshment to the finish. Drink now.

title: Domaine LeSeurre 2012 Sweet Reserve Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Dried herb and bramble notes cast a savory shadow to crisp apple, ...
description: Dried herb and bramble notes cast a savory shadow to crisp apple, pear and lemon flavors in this sweet-tart Riesling. Brisk acidity enlivens the midpalate.

title: Mercer Canyons 2014 Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Aromas of citrus, grape skin, peach and herbs are light for the ...
description: Aromas of citrus, grape skin, peach and herbs are light for the variety. The tangerine flavors drink medium sweet, lacking clarity and concentration.

title: Villa Huesgen 2014 Enkircher Steffenberg Alte Reben Trocken Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Laser-edged acidity balances ripe luscious yellow peach and grapefruit flavors in this ...
description: Laser-edged acidity balances ripe luscious yellow peach and grapefruit flavors in this sprightly dry Riesling. Lifted apple blossom perfume extends onto the palate, lingering alongside a crush of refreshing mineral tones. Drinks beautifully now but should continue to improve through 2020.

title: Gustafson Family 2013 Heritage Tree Vineyard Estate Riesling (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Light bodied and highly aromatic in petrol, waxy apple and pear, this ...
description: Light bodied and highly aromatic in petrol, waxy apple and pear, this vineyard-designate is crisp and floral, with buoyant acidity. It lists the residual sugar at 9 g/L but tastes more dry than sweet, finishing with a touch of cream.

title: Trefethen 2014 Dry Riesling (Oak Knoll District)
excerpt: Waxy and aromatic in petrol, this stainless-steel-fermented white offers flavors of white ...
description: Waxy and aromatic in petrol, this stainless-steel-fermented white offers flavors of white flowers, green apple and lime around sizzling acidity. From the Main Ranch Vineyard, an estate property, it finishes high-pitched and lean, completely refreshing.

title: Peter Nicolay 2014 Graacher Himmelreich Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: A lacy spray of sweetness extends from start to finish on this ...
description: A lacy spray of sweetness extends from start to finish on this fruity, fresh Kabinett. Fresh apple, pear and tangerine are honeyed and lip smacking, energized by a streak of lemonade acidity on the finish.

title: Dr. Pauly Bergweiler 2014 Graacher Himmelreich Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Saffron, fennel and spice are peppered throughout the nose and palate of ...
description: Saffron, fennel and spice are peppered throughout the nose and palate of this savory nuanced Riesling. Off-dry and zesty, it hits the palate with stacatto movements of acidity and sweetness.

title: Weingut Georg Albrecht Schneider 2014 Niersteiner Paterberg Kabinett Riesling (Rheinhessen)
excerpt: Bramble and herb notes are prominent on the nose, but subside into ...
description: Bramble and herb notes are prominent on the nose, but subside into succulent white grapefruit and tangerine on the palate of this cheerful off-dry Riesling. Sunny acidity adds to its approachable, easygoing feel. Drink now.

title: Peter Nicolay 2014 Erdener Treppchen Off-Dry Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Notes dusty mineral permeate through this zesty, lime-scented Riesling. A touch of ...
description: Notes dusty mineral permeate through this zesty, lime-scented Riesling. A touch of honey and tangerine lends brightness to the off-dry palate. Light-footed and spry, it finishes moderately long with a murmur of tea tannins. Drink now.

title: Von Schleinitz 2014 Estate Dry Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Vivacious notes of yellow plum and pear are shaded in tones of ...
description: Vivacious notes of yellow plum and pear are shaded in tones of savory herb and earth in this dry light-bodied Riesling. Lemon and tart tangerine acidity jolt the midpalate into a brisk finish. Drink now.

title: Heinz Eifel 2013 Estate Dry Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Earth and bramble notes intensify the savory, mineral character of this dry, ...
description: Earth and bramble notes intensify the savory, mineral character of this dry, spry Riesling. Lemon and lime revitalize the midpalate and lead a zesty finish. Drink now.

title: Domaine Zind-Humbrecht 2013 Clos Windsbuhl Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Tender notes of citrus appear at first through a veil of yeast. ...
description: Tender notes of citrus appear at first through a veil of yeast. Their zestiness then fills out with subtle, earthy spice. On the light, dry palate, the true subtlety hits: wafts of lemon, aromatic wild thyme, Seville orange zest, fresh apple peel and wet stone. The delicacy of the concentrated body is astonishing, with a central vein of lemony freshness that provides a focal point. So subtle, so layered and alive: with every new sip new nuances occur.

title: Domaine Ostertag 2013 Fronholz Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Lemon-scented Mirabelle notes hover on the nose and turn into fully fledged, ...
description: Lemon-scented Mirabelle notes hover on the nose and turn into fully fledged, ripe plum on the palate where the seam of fresh, enlivening and brightening acidity sets a lively theme. The body is light, the finish is dry and the overall impression is one of light-footed playfulness and ease. You might almost forget to notice the more textured, structured core which underlies all this and will allow it to age beautifully. Drink now through 2025.

title: Domaine Ostertag 2013 Heissenberg Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Spice-edged, rounded notes of ripe Mirabelle with playful, teasing topnotes of peach ...
description: Spice-edged, rounded notes of ripe Mirabelle with playful, teasing topnotes of peach beckon from the glass. This aromatic, fruitful charm also fills the palate where a bright core of lemon freshness provides verve and structure that also suggests stones and rock. Purity and clarity lets those peachy notes dance all the more. It has an exquisite, joyful, light touch with a dry finish.

title: Boeckel 2014 Brandluft Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Subdued, riper fruit has not yet come to the surface. Notions of ...
description: Subdued, riper fruit has not yet come to the surface. Notions of Bramley apple are evoked on the nose; on the palate they show as the more rounded flavor of baked Bramley. Hovering above it all is grated lemon zest, pulling fruit, texture and freshness tautly together in a dry, fresh yet mellow finish. The more you taste, the more the still-underlying fruit yearns to rise to the surface. Best to give this some time so it can show its true, exciting colours.

title: Maurice Schoech & Fils 2013 Sonnenberg Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: The slightly more evolved nose that effortlessly fuses crushed chamomile leaf and ...
description: The slightly more evolved nose that effortlessly fuses crushed chamomile leaf and lemon zest also hints at dark fir honey. It glides seamlessly into a fast-flowing, straight channel of acidity. There is movement and poise in this virtual journey into freshness and aroma. It is the lemon that lasts longest on the palate, which is dry and of exquisite purity.

title: Scratch 2013 Riesling (Arroyo Seco)
excerpt: Crisp and tight aromas of mandarin orange and lemonade meet with the ...
description: Crisp and tight aromas of mandarin orange and lemonade meet with the intriguing nuance of foamed egg whites on the nose of this refreshing bottling. The mouthfeel is incredibly lively, showing flavors of lemon and lime juice, with a slight petrol touch to the palate.

title: Henri Schoenheitz 2013 Herrenreben Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Tender notes of ripe, juicy pear with more golden inflections of ripe ...
description: Tender notes of ripe, juicy pear with more golden inflections of ripe yellow plum and peach on nose and palate close into a central seam of bright, sprightly and immensely toning acidity. Lightness, concentration and lip-smacking freshness are framed by rounded fruit. Structure and grace signal ageing potential. The finish is wonderfully dry and full of verve.

title: Henri Schoenheitz 2014 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Soft and tenderly fragrant fruit hovers above a palate dominated by Golden ...
description: Soft and tenderly fragrant fruit hovers above a palate dominated by Golden Delicious apple flavors and an almost soy-like, savory edge that makes you want to drink more. A seam of lemony freshness brightens up everything and lasts well after the last sip. This is a truly lovely, understated Riesling.

title: Paul Blanck 2014 Rosenbourg Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Taut and zesty, lip-smacking and dry: this Riesling is a successful combination ...
description: Taut and zesty, lip-smacking and dry: this Riesling is a successful combination of grapefruit and lemon, of zest and flesh. The dry finish makes the lemony qualities of this dry wine even more appealing. Serve this on a hot day.

title: Trimbach 2013 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: While this has a tight corset of freshness and structure, expressive notes ...
description: While this has a tight corset of freshness and structure, expressive notes of peach show their exuberance. The palate again reveals tautness, shot through with lemon purity while the peach delightfully plays around them.

title: Standing Sun 2013 Camp 4 Vineyard Riesling (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: This wine shows a very intriguing nose of iodine, preserved lemons, orange ...
description: This wine shows a very intriguing nose of iodine, preserved lemons, orange marmalade and dried daffodils. The palate is quite distinctive with dried jasmine flowers, dried lemon peels and a sour-orange element shining throughout.

title: Francois Baur 2014 Herrenweg Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Rounded red apple with an edge of peppery spice and a whole ...
description: Rounded red apple with an edge of peppery spice and a whole lot of grapefruit zest makes for a lively, textured and vivid palate. This is fresh, pure and totally appetizing. The finish similarly leaves the impression of peppery red apples.

title: Robert Karcher et Fils 2013 Harth Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Bright, friendly and pure mandarin flavors make for a very appetizing, fruit-forward ...
description: Bright, friendly and pure mandarin flavors make for a very appetizing, fruit-forward wine. The same friendly, sunny mandarin fruit fills the palate with its tension between citrus tartness and luscious sweet freshness. Bruised apple peel makes an attractive appearance on the lasting finish that concludes with lots of freshness.

title: Joseph Cattin 2014 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Clean, taut green apple and zesty lemon are the chief markers of ...
description: Clean, taut green apple and zesty lemon are the chief markers of this slender, dry wine. It holds lots of refreshment and has a racy core. Have this on its own when in need of refreshment, or have it with food when there is light, subtle fare.

title: Two Paddocks 2014 Red Bank Vineyard Riesling (Central Otago)
excerpt: Despite being labeled at 13% alcohol, this comes across as reasonably light ...
description: Despite being labeled at 13% alcohol, this comes across as reasonably light in weight. Pleasantly dry in flavor, it boasts hints of citrus and wet stone. A silky feel marks the long, crisp finish.

title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2014 Cold Creek Vineyard Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Honeysuckle, mineral, honey and botrytis aromas lead the way. This drinks off ...
description: Honeysuckle, mineral, honey and botrytis aromas lead the way. This drinks off dry with exceptionally well-balanced acidity that carries through the lingering finish.

title: Domaine Zind-Humbrecht 2013 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Soft notes of russet pear peel and peach contract into a tight, ...
description: Soft notes of russet pear peel and peach contract into a tight, refreshing, lemony citrus structure. Some residual carbon dioxide underlines the freshness with a tiny bit of spritz. This is pure, clean-cut, fresh Riesling for immediate drinking and total refreshment.

title: Joseph Fritsch 2014 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Fragrant notions of orange peel accompany the red apple freshness. This has ...
description: Fragrant notions of orange peel accompany the red apple freshness. This has ample apple and orange fruit at the core, along with a pure, lemony zestiness that pulls everything taut and into focus. Full of life and tension, the wine makes you want to sip and sip again.

title: Kuentz-Bas 2013 Trois Chateaux Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Aromas of peach and freshly cut apple peel turn into rounder notes ...
description: Aromas of peach and freshly cut apple peel turn into rounder notes of ripe, yellow plum on the palate. Citrus freshness brightens and highlights the fruit that finishes dry. The citric linearity lingers and finishes with layered apple notes.

title: Leon Beyer 2014 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: While taut citrus is at the core of this dry, zesty Riesling, ...
description: While taut citrus is at the core of this dry, zesty Riesling, it has much more going on. Notions of peppery spice play around the edges, with glimpses of red and green apple. This is juicy and moreish, pure and totally refreshing. The dry finish accentuates the citrus zest.

title: Allimant-Laugner 2014 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: The zest of grapefuit, lemon and the crunch of Granny Smith apples ...
description: The zest of grapefuit, lemon and the crunch of Granny Smith apples heralds a bright, fruity and superrefreshing wine. Midpalate texture encloses the fresh acidity beautifully and has ample liveliness and a dry finish.

title: Boeckel 2014 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: The lifted, lemony scent promises purity and poise, while the palate delivers ...
description: The lifted, lemony scent promises purity and poise, while the palate delivers what nature provided: pure, crunchy fruit and the flavor of stone. This is dry and clean-cut in its traditional style, with potential to develop.

title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2014 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This wine is immediate in its appeal with aromas of lime leaf, ...
description: This wine is immediate in its appeal with aromas of lime leaf, flowers and peach. It drinks off dry with a zing of acidity that beautifully frames the full-fruit flavors.

title: Domaine Ehrhart 2014 Herrenweg Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: A subdued nose leads to a very zesty palate, with grapefruit zest ...
description: A subdued nose leads to a very zesty palate, with grapefruit zest and crunchy green apple. The fruit is lively, clean and rather vivacious. Lemony freshness brightens the dry finish and makes you sip more.

title: Vino Kupljen 2013 Renski Rizling Selection Mon Royal Riesling (Slovenia)
excerpt: Dark straw in the glass, this wine has a bouquet of apricot, ...
description: Dark straw in the glass, this wine has a bouquet of apricot, canned peaches, and tropical fruit. Dry on the palate, it offers flavors of peach juice and apricot nectar that linger into the Mediteranean herb-laden finish.

title: Sipp Mack 2013 Vieilles Vignes Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Notes of peach and ripe, yellow plum join a mix of citrus ...
description: Notes of peach and ripe, yellow plum join a mix of citrus flavors that range from spiky lime to fruity clementine, making for a friendly, refreshing and dry Riesling. Its freshness brightens the palate and shows highlights of pineapple

title: Jean-Marc Bernhard 2014 Vieilles Vignes Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Freshly cut apple peel and apple fruit create a very welcoming and ...
description: Freshly cut apple peel and apple fruit create a very welcoming and lively palate. The fruit is clean and very invigorating, while the dry finish provides cool refreshment.

title: Domaine Zinck 2014 Portrait Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Lifted notes of lemon zest and chamomile signal freshness and poise. The ...
description: Lifted notes of lemon zest and chamomile signal freshness and poise. The slender palate also stakes its reputation on lemony verve and achieves it in a light, refreshing way. Drink soon, preferably on a sunny day.

title: Emile Beyer 2014 Saint Jacques Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Hints of unusual citrus capture the attention: is it blood orange or ...
description: Hints of unusual citrus capture the attention: is it blood orange or green tangerine? The palate is more moderate with tart red apple freshness. Ample fruit at the center makes this dryish wine rather appetizing.

title: Kuentz-Bas 2014 Trois Chateaux Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Notes of bruised apple peel make this wine appear older than it ...
description: Notes of bruised apple peel make this wine appear older than it is, but it is not without charm. The apple fruit is tied into a streak of bright, lemony freshness concluding in a just off-dry, invigorating finish.

title: Barnstormer 2014 Semi Dry Riesling (Seneca Lake)
excerpt: A hint of rose petal perfumes white peach and grapefruit on this ...
description: A hint of rose petal perfumes white peach and grapefruit on this elegant off-dry Riesling. The midpalate is softened by a burst of luscious apricot, while a zesty steak of lime balances a long, meandering finish.

title: Domaine Schoffit 2013 Harth Tradition Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: The subdued nose gives way on the palate to earthy apple, reminiscent ...
description: The subdued nose gives way on the palate to earthy apple, reminiscent of Russet, underlined by a vein of lemony acidity that brightens from the inside out. Lemony earthiness lingers on the dry finish.

title: Jean-Baptiste Adam 2013 Les Natures Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Lemon and tart apple with some overtones of riper Golden Delicious are ...
description: Lemon and tart apple with some overtones of riper Golden Delicious are the fruity hallmarks of this easy-drinking but superrefreshing summer wine. The apple taste stays and makes you go back for more easy, pleasant fruit.

title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2014 Harvest Select Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The aromas of lime leaf and peach are bright and appealing. It ...
description: The aromas of lime leaf and peach are bright and appealing. It drinks medium sweet with a finish that lingers.

title: Wolfberger 2014 Signature Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Fruity notions of apple juice and fresh apple peel are signalled on ...
description: Fruity notions of apple juice and fresh apple peel are signalled on the nose. The palate follows more softly than expected and shows a balanced, textured dryness in this very clean, almost taut Riesling.

title: Domaine Gresser 2014 Kritt Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Sultry spice lurks beneath the powdery scent of citrus peel. The palate ...
description: Sultry spice lurks beneath the powdery scent of citrus peel. The palate offers the same intrigue and has welcome freshness, with a touch of oily charm and a dry, clean finish on which the indefinable but undeniable spice still lingers.

title: Margerum 2014 Riesling (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: Very light and slightly sweet in style, this low-alcohol bottling offers stone ...
description: Very light and slightly sweet in style, this low-alcohol bottling offers stone fruit, lemon juice and peels, and the slightest hint of petrol on the honeyed nose. Exceedingly bright and crisp on the palate, the peachy sweetness is cut by a nearly bubbly acidity. It would be great for pool parties.

title: Kuentz-Bas 2013 Collection Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Earthy lemon and tart flavors of freshly cut green apples play on ...
description: Earthy lemon and tart flavors of freshly cut green apples play on nose and palate. With time on the palate, the lemony freshness dominates and lingers texturally, with a suggestion of apple peel. This has lots of freshness and a dry finish.

title: 14 Hands 2014 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This moderately aromatic wine offers notes of pear, citrus and apricot. It ...
description: This moderately aromatic wine offers notes of pear, citrus and apricot. It drinks medium sweet with stone-fruit and citrus flavors along with spritely acidity, bringing a whole lot of appeal.

title: Kuentz-Bas 2014 Collection Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: The mellowness of baked apple envelops all other aromas. While the baked ...
description: The mellowness of baked apple envelops all other aromas. While the baked apple is also apparent on the palate, it is pulled into sharp focus by fresh, lively and bright lemon acidity.

title: Domaine Jean-Luc Mader 2014 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Earthy notes blend with red apple and bright, lemony freshness on the ...
description: Earthy notes blend with red apple and bright, lemony freshness on the palate. The mouthfeel is clean, crunchy and very refreshing, with a pleasantly dry finish.

title: Domaine Robert Klingenfus 2013 Signature Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: A brief notion of buttery toast precedes the citrus-fresh palate. There are ...
description: A brief notion of buttery toast precedes the citrus-fresh palate. There are mere hints of grapefruit,pear and peach on this easy, dry but authentic Riesling.

title: Emile Beyer 2014 Tradition Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Softly ripe notes of pear mingle with earthier elements on nose and ...
description: Softly ripe notes of pear mingle with earthier elements on nose and palate of this dryish Riesling. The spine of acidity provides structure and fills the palate with lemony, bright freshness that lingers pleasantly.

title: Kuentz-Bas 2013 Tradition Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: The nose does not give much away but the dry palate is ...
description: The nose does not give much away but the dry palate is all about bright, luminous lemon zest and tart lemon juice. Have this on a hot summer day for ultimate refreshment.

title: Kuentz-Bas 2014 Tradition Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Earth and lemons dominate the nose. The earthy mellowness is more pronounced. ...
description: Earth and lemons dominate the nose. The earthy mellowness is more pronounced. on the palate, joined by 2014 fresh lemon. The finish is dry but remains earthy.

title: Washington Hills 2014 Riesling (Washington)
excerpt: Lime, lime leaf and stone-fruit aromas are followed by medium-sweet flavors that ...
description: Lime, lime leaf and stone-fruit aromas are followed by medium-sweet flavors that linger. It wants a bit more acidity but is pretty delightful in its own right. Pair it with a spicy Thai dish.

title: Wagner 2013 Select Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Bright lemon, nectarine and pineapple tones are touched with green herbs and ...
description: Bright lemon, nectarine and pineapple tones are touched with green herbs and savory pollen notes in this ephemerally sheer, light-bodied Riesling. Off dry on the palate, it boasts a mouth quenching grapefruit juiciness.

title: Silver Thread 2014 STV Estate Vineyard Riesling (Seneca Lake)
excerpt: Dusty mineral tones accent cutting, crisp peach, apricot and lime notes in ...
description: Dusty mineral tones accent cutting, crisp peach, apricot and lime notes in this dry-style Riesling. The palate is zesty and spry, finishing on a thirst quenching streak of white grapefruit.

title: J. Lohr 2014 Bay Mist Riesling (Monterey County)
excerpt: Lemon-lime soda, chalk and gin-and-tonic cocktail elements power the nose on this ...
description: Lemon-lime soda, chalk and gin-and-tonic cocktail elements power the nose on this zesty, medium-sweet bottling. The mouthfeel is soft, with lime juice and quinine cutting the ripe orange-syrup notes.

title: Convergence Zone 2014 Dewpoint Bacchus Vineyard Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Light aromas of citrus, white peach, soda water and herbs are followed ...
description: Light aromas of citrus, white peach, soda water and herbs are followed by elegant, just off-dry, spritzy fruit flavors backed by a zing of acidity.

title: Red Newt Cellars 2013 Lahoma Vineyard The Knoll Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Saffron and spice pepper fresh lemon and grapefruit aromas on this exceptionally ...
description: Saffron and spice pepper fresh lemon and grapefruit aromas on this exceptionally sheer, savory dry Riesling. A haze of citrus flavors fall like gossamer on the palate, extended by layers of dusty minerals on the finish.

title: Paul Blanck 2014 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: The subtle scent of green and red apples makes for a refreshing ...
description: The subtle scent of green and red apples makes for a refreshing opening. They also play on the rounded, clean palate and finish dry with a lovely, lemony briskness.

title: Convergence Zone 2013 Dewpoint Bacchus Vineyard Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The aromas of mandarin orange and apricot seem to show a touch ...
description: The aromas of mandarin orange and apricot seem to show a touch of oxygen exposure. This drinks just off dry with stone-fruit flavors throughout.

title: Fulkerson 2014 Juicy Sweet Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Juicy sweet is an apt moniker for this fruity, forward Riesling. The ...
description: Juicy sweet is an apt moniker for this fruity, forward Riesling. The grapey, sugary palate is a bit confected in style, but easy and approachable.

title: Vistamar 2014 Reserva Sepia Riesling (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: This Riesling is an odd one. Aromas of yeast and peach blossom ...
description: This Riesling is an odd one. Aromas of yeast and peach blossom come with a note of cured ham, while the palate is sticky and low in acidity. Creamy, honeyed flavors alongside green melon, vanilla and yeast finish waxy and creamy.

title: Vieil Armand 2014 Tradition Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: A rather closed nose yields some earthy notes mixed with citrus. The ...
description: A rather closed nose yields some earthy notes mixed with citrus. The palate comes across as tart but counteracts with a slightly oily texture. This wine is fresh and clean but should be drunk soon.

title: Dopff Au Moulin 2014 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Spiky lemony acidity brightens the earthy palate that does not quite come ...
description: Spiky lemony acidity brightens the earthy palate that does not quite come together and finishes with stewed, slightly bruised apple flavors.

title: Emmerich Knoll 2013 Ried Pfaffenberg Auslese Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: The finely tuned sweetness of this Auslese brings out the muskier notes ...
description: The finely tuned sweetness of this Auslese brings out the muskier notes of apple: a mix of fresh and baked fruit, with peeled skin and compote flesh. Initially, there still is the spectre of yeast but with some time there are hints of burnt sugar and apricot compote, too. A lovely, engulfing apple tartness makes this as suited to baked fruit desserts and fruit tarts as to creamy, ripe cheeses. Full marks for poise and freshness. This is a baby still and will need time to come into its own and unfold even more layers. Drink from 2018.

title: Cave Spring 2013 Riesling Icewine Riesling (Niagara Peninsula)
excerpt: Smooth as silk and deeply concentrated, this outstanding icewine offers pressed apple, ...
description: Smooth as silk and deeply concentrated, this outstanding icewine offers pressed apple, peach, pear, apricot and papaya fruit in a seamless, dense and immensely flavorful core. A streak of butter and honey carries it into a long, splendid finish.

title: Chehalem 2014 Three Vineyard Riesling (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: This is a terrific vintage for this blend, helped by the decision ...
description: This is a terrific vintage for this blend, helped by the decision to bump up the alcohol and reduce the residual sugar, now down to 16g/L. Though off dry, this retains a spine of steely acid, highlighting the bright and spicy lemon curd, orange peel and pink grapefruit flavors. It will be delicious with pork roasts or simply sipped with mild cheeses.

title: Lafond 2013 Lafond Vineyard Late Harvest Riesling (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: Dynamic on the nose, this late-harvest wine, which was subjected to botrytis, ...
description: Dynamic on the nose, this late-harvest wine, which was subjected to botrytis, shows concentrated honey syrup, cement-like minerality, Key lime pith and a petrol character. The palate delivers a lot of energy and tension, with lime zest cutting across concentrated apple flavors.

title: Cave Spring 2013 Cave Spring Vineyard Estate Bottled Riesling (Beamsville Bench)
excerpt: This drinks dry, with a strong mineral component. Mainstream flavors of apple ...
description: This drinks dry, with a strong mineral component. Mainstream flavors of apple and slate lead into a firm, concentrated palate with a long, pure finish.

title: Cave Spring 2013 Riesling (Niagara Peninsula)
excerpt: This is an elegant Riesling, with pleasing, gin-like botanical scents and flavors. ...
description: This is an elegant Riesling, with pleasing, gin-like botanical scents and flavors. Along with the fresh herbs come citrus notes of Meyer lemon and Key lime, finished with a gentle hint of honey.

title: Cave Spring 2012 Select Late Harvest Indian Summer Riesling (Niagara Peninsula)
excerpt: Perhaps a little overripe on the nose, this late harvest is high-toned ...
description: Perhaps a little overripe on the nose, this late harvest is high-toned and rather sharp in its attack. Concentrated peach, apricot, butter brickle and honey flavors carry the midpalate, but the finish turns bitter.

title: Corkscrew 2013 Luma Blanc Riesling (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Billed as a Riesling blend, this white has plenty of petrol on ...
description: Billed as a Riesling blend, this white has plenty of petrol on the nose to give it intrigue, followed by a dry, crisp and sharp sensibility of grapefruit pith and savory lime.

title: Waxwing 2014 Tondre Grapefield Riesling (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: Done in a medium-dry style, this shows petrol, lime pith, lime blossoms ...
description: Done in a medium-dry style, this shows petrol, lime pith, lime blossoms and wet cement on the nose. The palate is rich with squeezed lemon juice, shaved citrus ice, ripe pears and a stony grip that holds it all together.

title: Casa Nuestra 2014 Old Vines Riesling (St. Helena)
excerpt: An off-dry, organically farmed, 100%-varietal wine, this tiny production offering comes from ...
description: An off-dry, organically farmed, 100%-varietal wine, this tiny production offering comes from an appellation better known for other varieties, but that shows finesse here. Fruity and balanced, the sweetness comes mostly in aromatic form, with a bouquet of pungent white flowers. Medium bodied, it shows an abundance of lithe fruit, finishing with a powerful kick of minerality.

title: Firestone 2013 Riesling (Central Coast)
excerpt: A distinct nose of quinine and lime smells like a gin & ...
description: A distinct nose of quinine and lime smells like a gin & tonic cocktail on this dry take on the noble grape. That juniper-powered element also shows on the palate, lifted by lime peels and green peppercorns.

title: Mission Hill 2013 Reserve Riesling (Okanagan Valley)
excerpt: Technically off dry, with 14 g/L residual sugar, this also boasts substantial ...
description: Technically off dry, with 14 g/L residual sugar, this also boasts substantial acidity. The ripe fruits include spicy apple, Meyer lemon and orange marmalade, with a round, food-ready mouthfeel.

title: Santa Barbara Winery 2014 2.3 Lafond Vineyard Riesling (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: Orange blossoms, lemon juice, honeydew melon and a nearly guava element show ...
description: Orange blossoms, lemon juice, honeydew melon and a nearly guava element show on the topical nose of this slightly sweet wine. The palate offers orange and lime juice flavors, with sour and bitter sides to cut the sweetness. Expect this to age well and show even better in the years to come.

title: Roku 2013 Riesling (Monterey County)
excerpt: Sweet on the nose with honeysuckle, golden honey, apple syrup and a ...
description: Sweet on the nose with honeysuckle, golden honey, apple syrup and a touch of cement minerality, this wine is aimed at pairing with Asian food. The palate may be a touch too treacly for that, with rich honey-orange-vanilla elements.

title: Dunham 2014 Lewis Estate Vineyard Late Harvest Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This lightly cloudy wine displays aromas of orange marmalade, candied pear and ...
description: This lightly cloudy wine displays aromas of orange marmalade, candied pear and citrus peel. Honeyed dried apple and pear flavors display exquisite balance and length.

title: Hermann J. Wiemer 2013 Dry Riesling (Seneca Lake)
excerpt: While dry and impeccably elegant, this buoyantly perfumed Riesling balances subtle notes ...
description: While dry and impeccably elegant, this buoyantly perfumed Riesling balances subtle notes of honeysuckle and bees wax against a backdrop of luscious, mango, pineapple and peach flavors. The palate is satisfying and supple yet balanced by a sheen of lemon-lime acidity. Finishes long with a savory flick of pollen.

title: Chateau Ste. Michelle & Dr. Loosen 2013 Eroica Gold Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Vibrant aromas of peach, botrytis, apricot and pear lead to ripe stone-fruit ...
description: Vibrant aromas of peach, botrytis, apricot and pear lead to ripe stone-fruit flavors that linger. Pair it with a yellow curry.

title: Figgins 2014 Riesling (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: This is a vibrantly aromatic wine with notes of green apple, peach, ...
description: This is a vibrantly aromatic wine with notes of green apple, peach, flowers, wet stone and star fruit. It drinks dry with lively acidity and a rich mouthfeel while still retaining its deftness.

title: Poet's Leap 2014 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This warm-vintage wine is more aromatically reticent than recent vintages, with notes ...
description: This warm-vintage wine is more aromatically reticent than recent vintages, with notes of stone fruit, slate and mineral. It drinks a hair off dry, with depth to the lightly spritzy fruit flavors and razor-sharp acidity.

title: Milbrandt 2013 The Estates Ancient Lakes Riesling (Ancient Lakes)
excerpt: This wine is immediately appealing with vibrant aromas of jasmine, honeysuckle, white ...
description: This wine is immediately appealing with vibrant aromas of jasmine, honeysuckle, white peach and wet stone. It drinks off dry, with a fleshy feel and drawn-out fruit flavors that linger.

title: Seven Hills 2013 Old Vines Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The aromas of this jazzy wine disclose lime leaf, white peach and ...
description: The aromas of this jazzy wine disclose lime leaf, white peach and slate. The off-dry flavors of flowers, pear and stone fruit are typical of Washington in their intensity and detail.

title: Sheldrake Point 2013 Reserve Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: A whisper of saffron lends complexity to this dry, crisp, mineral-tinged wine. ...
description: A whisper of saffron lends complexity to this dry, crisp, mineral-tinged wine. Tart green apple, lemon and lime flavors are brisk and cutting, but a touch of honeysuckle nectar softens the finish. Drink now.

title: Waters Crest 2013 Dry Riesling (New York)
excerpt: Steely and polished, this dry, intensely mineral Riesling calibrates savory apple and ...
description: Steely and polished, this dry, intensely mineral Riesling calibrates savory apple and pear flavors against tart lemon, tangerine and pineapple acidity. The moderately long finish reverberates with a zesty bite of bitter lime skin.

title: For a Song 2013 Caliche Lake Vineyard Riesling (Ancient Lakes)
excerpt: Vibrant aromas of honeysuckle, honey-drizzled peach and green apple lead to medium-sweet ...
description: Vibrant aromas of honeysuckle, honey-drizzled peach and green apple lead to medium-sweet stone-fruit flavors. Pair it with a spicy Thai dish.

title: Silver Thread 2014 Doyle Fournier Vineyard Riesling (Seneca Lake)
excerpt: Swathes of evergreen lend elegance to this piercing, steel-toned Riesling. On the ...
description: Swathes of evergreen lend elegance to this piercing, steel-toned Riesling. On the palate, touches of honey lend a sunny sweetness to cutting lemon and lime flavors. A slick of honeycomb extends the finish.

title: Three Rivers 2014 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: All the fruit for this wine comes from Bacchus Vineyard. Aromas of ...
description: All the fruit for this wine comes from Bacchus Vineyard. Aromas of jasmine, honeysuckle and apricot lead to medium-sweet stone-fruit flavors that linger.

title: Lucas Vineyards 2014 Semi Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: A perfumed whiff of citrus blossoms introduces this crisp, light-footed Riesling. Subtly ...
description: A perfumed whiff of citrus blossoms introduces this crisp, light-footed Riesling. Subtly semidry in style, the palate contrasts ripe, rich honey and nectarine flavors against a backdrop of sharp, lemon-lime acidity. Touches of savory nut and earth tones lend contrast to the moderately long finish.

title: Purple Star 2013 Riesling (Ancient Lakes)
excerpt: Though not labeled as such, this is a single-vineyard offering from Two ...
description: Though not labeled as such, this is a single-vineyard offering from Two Gun Vineyard. Moderate aromas of peach, apricot and green apple are followed by medium-sweet flavors that provide easy drinking pleasure.

title: Mercer 2014 Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: This is an aromatic wine, with notes of peach, pear, soda water ...
description: This is an aromatic wine, with notes of peach, pear, soda water and apricot. It drinks off dry, with abundant stone-fruit flavors throughout.

title: Hogue 2014 Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Aromas are surprisingly light for the variety, with notes of lime leaf ...
description: Aromas are surprisingly light for the variety, with notes of lime leaf and pear. It drinks off dry, with a lightly spritzy feel.

title: Washington Hills 2014 Late Harvest Riesling (Washington)
excerpt: This is a straightforward quaffer. Aromas of herbs, jasmine and stone fruit ...
description: This is a straightforward quaffer. Aromas of herbs, jasmine and stone fruit lead to sugary-sweet fruit flavors.

title: Trisaetum 2014 Wichmann Dundee Estate Riesling (Dundee Hills)
excerpt: Details of tea leaf, peach skin and pear introduce a wine with ...
description: Details of tea leaf, peach skin and pear introduce a wine with tremendous texture and length. The off-dry sweetness is counterbalanced by tart acidity, creating perfect tension and continuing into a lingering, satisfying finish. As with all these young wines, this will improve dramatically with ample aeration.

title: Trisaetum 2014 Ribbon Ridge Estate Dry Riesling (Ribbon Ridge)
excerpt: The Ribbon Ridge vineyard, adjacent to the winery, brings exceptional minerality to ...
description: The Ribbon Ridge vineyard, adjacent to the winery, brings exceptional minerality to underscore potent grapefruit and pineapple flavors. The proportion, length and overall balance are outstanding. This wine responds well to decanting, and has the structure to age gracefully for at least a decade. Drink now through 2025.

title: Trisaetum 2014 Coast Range Estate Dry Riesling (Yamhill-Carlton District)
excerpt: Continuing in a tart and juicy vein, as in previous years, this ...
description: Continuing in a tart and juicy vein, as in previous years, this boasts a concentrated and immaculate palate layered with citrus, peach and melon. The abundant fruit is perfectly supported by mouth-puckering (in a good way) natural acidity.

title: Ponzi 2014 Riesling (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: This is a limited-production wine made principally from 45-year-old vines. Dry, textural ...
description: This is a limited-production wine made principally from 45-year-old vines. Dry, textural and complex, it mixes Key lime, tangerine, orange peel and citrus oil with a burnishing hint of Cointreau.

title: Dachshund 2012 Riesling (Rheinhessen)
excerpt: Whether the cute little dachshund on the label appeals or not, this ...
description: Whether the cute little dachshund on the label appeals or not, this fresh, intensely fruity Riesling is quite tasty. Supple, sweet white peach and grapefruit penetrate on the palate, accented by the faintest wisp of petrol. Zesty lemon-lime acidity breaks up the unctuousness, leading a bright, moderately long finish. Drink now.

title: Von Der Leyen 2013 Riesling (Nahe)
excerpt: A touch of petrol lends a slick, mineral sheen to this lusciously ...
description: A touch of petrol lends a slick, mineral sheen to this lusciously peachy, yet zesty dry Riesling. Delicately textured yet mouth-filling, it finishes long on a lingering lime-zest note. Enjoy now for its youthful, primary nature

title: Fess Parker 2013 Riesling (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: Judged as medium-sweet on the international scale, this shows petrol and lime ...
description: Judged as medium-sweet on the international scale, this shows petrol and lime Jell-o on the nose. The palate is not overly sweet but certainly not dry, offering honeyed lemon curds and sugared lime-peel flavors.

title: Twisted River 2014 Bin 169 Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Earthy saffron and fennel notes waft throughout this plush, sun-kissed Riesling, lending ...
description: Earthy saffron and fennel notes waft throughout this plush, sun-kissed Riesling, lending a savory cast to plump yellow peach and mango flavors. Zesty acidity brightens the mid palate, leading to a moderately long finish. Drink now.

title: McFadden 2014 Riesling (Potter Valley)
excerpt: This is a smooth and gently fruity wine. Aromas are subtle, fresh ...
description: This is a smooth and gently fruity wine. Aromas are subtle, fresh and slightly floral, while the more-forward flavors resemble peaches and honeydew melons. The texture is smooth rather than tart, and the wine may have a touch of residual sugar to keep it tasting fruity and feeling rounded.

title: Karl Josef 2013 Piesporter Michelsberg Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Zesty lime and lemon notes lend a high-toned vitality to this dainty, ...
description: Zesty lime and lemon notes lend a high-toned vitality to this dainty, off-dry Riesling. Tart yellow peach and tangerine flavors are thirst-quenching and crisp, finishing brisk and bright. Drink young.

title: Leonard Kreusch 2014 Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Dusty saffron and pollen notes lend earthiness to this otherwise ripe, fruity ...
description: Dusty saffron and pollen notes lend earthiness to this otherwise ripe, fruity Riesling. Yellow peach and apricot flavors are plump and pert, accented by sunny tangerine sweetness. The finish is brisk but clean. Drink now.

title: Dutton-Goldfield 2014 Chileno Valley Vineyards Riesling (Marin County)
excerpt: Here is a friendly, fruity, medium-bodied wine with light apple and pear ...
description: Here is a friendly, fruity, medium-bodied wine with light apple and pear aromas. Off-dry flavors are more melony and floral, and the wine has a relatively soft texture. Made from old vines and fermented in stainless steel, it offers subtle charms.

title: V. Sattui 2013 Dancing Egg Dry Riesling (Anderson Valley)
excerpt: The odd but endearing Riesling trait of petrol stands out in the ...
description: The odd but endearing Riesling trait of petrol stands out in the aroma of this light-bodied and dry wine, while the flavors are more like apple juice with a touch of honey and earthiness. The mouthfeel is smooth, and a little richness lingers on the finish.

title: Fischer 2014 Ried Steiger Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: Flinty notes of reduction are top aromas, then citrus-fuelled pepperiness ensues. This ...
description: Flinty notes of reduction are top aromas, then citrus-fuelled pepperiness ensues. This is lively, lithe and brisk with lip-smacking freshness and a total refreshment factor. It has the tension of a high-wire. These are Riesling acrobatics in a glass. Bravo.

title: Fischer 2014 Ried Kirnberg Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: There are regular, small explosions of citrus on the slender, taut palate ...
description: There are regular, small explosions of citrus on the slender, taut palate of this exciting Wachau Riesling. This is so lively and energetic that you just want to keep sipping. It is slender, brisk and crisp and leaves the mouth feeling totally clean and invigorated. Not for the faint-hearted but thrilling for true acidhounds.

title: Markus Huber 2014 Engelsberg Riesling (Traisental)
excerpt: Flinty highlights join lemon zest freshness on a thrillingly pure and streamlined ...
description: Flinty highlights join lemon zest freshness on a thrillingly pure and streamlined palate bursting with lemon and tangerine zest. This is taut and slender but packs a citrus punch. This is destined for hot days; it is lovely now but will also last. Some spritz enlivens the finish. Drink Now till 2020.

title: Loimer 2014 Langenlois Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Crisp green and ripe Cox apple feature boldly on nose and palate ...
description: Crisp green and ripe Cox apple feature boldly on nose and palate of this slender, lithe and refreshing wine. There is great purity at its core. The finish is clean and lasting with scores of lemon zest and leaves a wonderfully clean and refreshed palate.

title: Sepp Moser 2014 Von den Terrassen Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: This nose is a lovely mix of lemon peel and camphor leaves, ...
description: This nose is a lovely mix of lemon peel and camphor leaves, intriguing and refreshing and just a little heady. The palate is streamlined and slender and of great purity. This is lithe but intense, slender but profound. It shows what Riesling is capable of in a cooler year. Stockpile this since it will last and get ever more delicious. Drink now till 2020.

title: Leth 2014 Felser Weinberge Riesling (Wagram)
excerpt: Slender and pure, lemony and tight, yet fruitful and cushioned. While riper ...
description: Slender and pure, lemony and tight, yet fruitful and cushioned. While riper years often bring heft to Rieslings from Wagram, the rich loess soils here have rounded out a slender year. Notions of cologne via citrus foliage and heady conifer show themselves with time in glass. A slender but perfectly balanced beauty.

title: Nastl 2014 Steinmassl Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: An aromatic hint of quince dances over the various zesty citrus flavors ...
description: An aromatic hint of quince dances over the various zesty citrus flavors on this slender, crisp and light yet expressive Riesling. The palate is governed entirely by lemon zest freshness and lingers beautifully. There are illuminating flashes of quince again on the finish. Savor this so you can capture them.

title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2013 Ethos Reserve Late Harvest Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: At 160g/L residual sugar, this late-harvest wine brings plenty of sweetness with ...
description: At 160g/L residual sugar, this late-harvest wine brings plenty of sweetness with its lightly spritzy marmalade, orange peel and pear aromas and flavors, yet it still retains an appealing sense of lightness and balance as well. The length is impressive.

title: Fritsch 2014 Riesling (Wagram)
excerpt: The subdued yet citric nose needs a little time to reveal softer ...
description: The subdued yet citric nose needs a little time to reveal softer yellow plum flavors which are abundant on the palate as well, countering the grapefruit zest and briskness. This is light-bodied, refreshing, very fruity and wonderfully crisp. Ideal for hot, sunny days.

title: Nigl 2014 Senftenberger Piri Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Spritz and lemony freshness characterize this light-footed offering. It almost fizzes with ...
description: Spritz and lemony freshness characterize this light-footed offering. It almost fizzes with freshness and verve and remains firmly in the greenish-yellow citrus spectrum of refreshing flavors. A perfect, light summer sip.

title: Salomon-Undhof 2014 Steinterrassen Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: The yeasty overtones of fermentation that still cling to this fresh wine ...
description: The yeasty overtones of fermentation that still cling to this fresh wine are pervaded by lemony freshness. The palate is taut and almost austere with the briskness of that citrus freshness always at its core. There is an intriguing, savory fillip on the finish. Save this for a hot day.

title: Markus Huber 2014 Terrassen Riesling (Traisental)
excerpt: A fresh, slender but cushioned Riesling with overtones of herbal tea and ...
description: A fresh, slender but cushioned Riesling with overtones of herbal tea and apple. Zingy on the palate and very gluggable. This is light and zippy and is the answer to a sunny, warm afternoon.

title: Ancestry 2013 Reminiscence Riesling (Columbia Gorge (WA))
excerpt: This wine is all from Underwood Mountain and shows perfumed aromas of ...
description: This wine is all from Underwood Mountain and shows perfumed aromas of grape skins, pear and apricot. It drinks medium sweet with abundant stone-fruit flavors.

title: Lauren Ashton Cellars 2014 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: With all fruit coming from Dineen Vineyard, this wine shows alluring aromas ...
description: With all fruit coming from Dineen Vineyard, this wine shows alluring aromas of honeysuckle, melon, pear and zesty spices. It drinks almost dry, with the flavors tapering slightly toward the finish.

title: Forstreiter 2014 Stoa Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Some fermentation aromas still swing in the nose but lemony freshness soon ...
description: Some fermentation aromas still swing in the nose but lemony freshness soon takes over on the nose and palate. This is light-bodied, slim and very, very fresh. Save this for a really hot day when you need cooling down.

title: Saviah 2014 The Jack Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The aromas of apricot, drizzled honey, lime and pear are followed by ...
description: The aromas of apricot, drizzled honey, lime and pear are followed by off-dry, lightly spritzy stone-fruit flavors that linger.

title: Sleight of Hand 2014 The Magician Evergreen Vineyard Riesling (Ancient Lakes)
excerpt: All Riesling, this aromatic wine conveys notes of jasmine, peach and pear. ...
description: All Riesling, this aromatic wine conveys notes of jasmine, peach and pear. It drinks off dry, with spritzy soda water and stone-fruit flavors and mouthwatering acidity.

title: Rasa 2013 The Composer Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Lees notes take the lead on this unusual wine, followed by aromas ...
description: Lees notes take the lead on this unusual wine, followed by aromas of apricot, almond butter and cream. It drinks a hair off dry with a lightly creamy feel.

title: Weingut Groiss 2014 Riesling (Wagram)
excerpt: A taut, clean Riesling that seems a little subdued in its flavors. ...
description: A taut, clean Riesling that seems a little subdued in its flavors. The palate is clean and fresh and offers the refreshment one expects from dry, Austrian Riesling.

title: Januik 2013 Bacchus Vineyard Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Moderately aromatic for the variety, this wine shows aromas of flowers, pear ...
description: Moderately aromatic for the variety, this wine shows aromas of flowers, pear and mandarin orange. It drinks medium sweet with lightly spritzy flavors that need a bit more acid to hold them all together.

title: Moonbeam 2013 Riesling (Washington)
excerpt: Aromas are light for the variety, with notes of jasmine and poached ...
description: Aromas are light for the variety, with notes of jasmine and poached pear. The medium-sweet flavors deliver notes of mandarin orange and Nestea ice tea, finishing dry.

title: Two Vines 2013 Riesling (Washington)
excerpt: Aromas of ripe apple and poached pear are accented by spice. It ...
description: Aromas of ripe apple and poached pear are accented by spice. It drinks medium sweet with mandarin-orange flavors that linger.

title: Drytown 2014 Estate Riesling (Sierra Foothills)
excerpt: A sweet version of Riesling, this offers fresh apple and strawberry aromas, ...
description: A sweet version of Riesling, this offers fresh apple and strawberry aromas, sweet melon and cucumber flavors, a soft texture and light body.

title: Styring 2013 Afterglow Estate Dessert Riesling (Ribbon Ridge)
excerpt: This is an absolutely stunning wine, thick and dense with an array ...
description: This is an absolutely stunning wine, thick and dense with an array of candied fruits, caramel, marmalade, butterscotch and more. With 189g/L of residual sugar, a little sip or two will go a long way.

title: Domdechant Werner 2013 Hochheimer Domdechaney Trocken GG Erste Lage Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: While dry in style, this effusively blossomy, peach-driven Riesling is chock full ...
description: While dry in style, this effusively blossomy, peach-driven Riesling is chock full of ripe, honeyed fruit flavors. Soft tangerine acidity cuts through the lushness on the midpalate, aided by a sheen of minerals and bristling white-tea tannins.

title: Schloss Vollrads 2013 Kabinett Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Green floral notes and lemon zest perfume this pristine, pretty kabinett. Zesty ...
description: Green floral notes and lemon zest perfume this pristine, pretty kabinett. Zesty lemon-lime acidity lends a breathless elegance, brightened by sweet-tart streaks of mango and tangerine that pucker and delight. Drinks gorgeously now, but will continue to improve through at least 2020.

title: Dr. H. Thanisch (Erben Thanisch) 2013 Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Bracing lemon and lime flavors are offset by streaks of luscious white ...
description: Bracing lemon and lime flavors are offset by streaks of luscious white peach and wildflower honey in this mouthwatering kabinett. While off dry and racy in style, it finishes long, enriched by creamy, lingering touches of hazelnut and cashew. Drinks gorgeously now, but has enough complexity and structure to evolve well through 2020.

title: Cutruzzola 2012 Riven Rock Vineyard Riesling (San Luis Obispo County)
excerpt: Honey-roasted almonds, seared lemon vinaigrette and honeydew melon show on the delicious ...
description: Honey-roasted almonds, seared lemon vinaigrette and honeydew melon show on the delicious nose of this off-dry wine from an extreme coastal vineyard above Cambria. Though slightly sweet, it remains rich and intriguing, with lots of citrus peel, grapefruit pith, squeezed oranges and touches of petrol.

title: Anam Cara 2013 Nicholas Estate Dry Riesling (Chehalem Mountains)
excerpt: This wine is beautifully rendered, with pear and melon backed by hints ...
description: This wine is beautifully rendered, with pear and melon backed by hints of citrus. The length, persistance, balance and tension are superb, and the mouth-puckering finish will have you reaching for another glass.

title: Thanisch 2013 Lieserer Niederberg Helden Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: While the nose is decidedly savory, wafting of herbs and bramble, the ...
description: While the nose is decidedly savory, wafting of herbs and bramble, the palate of this delicately lacy auslese bursts with juicy, peach and apricot nectar. Wax, honey and spice notes meld into a long finish, lifted by a streak of tangerine acidity.

title: St. Urbans-Hof 2012 Nik Weis Schodener Saarfeilser Marienberg Grosse Lage Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Decadent white floral tones persist throughout this dry, gorgeously perfumed Riesling. Concentrated ...
description: Decadent white floral tones persist throughout this dry, gorgeously perfumed Riesling. Concentrated white peach and apricot flavors feel plush and concentrated on the palate but zesty acidity adds a vivacious kick. Drink now through 2017.

title: Lundeen 2013 Juliard Vineyard Old Vine Riesling (Dundee Hills)
excerpt: This has compelling intensity, with the extra dimensions that vines more than ...
description: This has compelling intensity, with the extra dimensions that vines more than four decades old can offer. The concentrated apple and pear fruit is pure, deep and lingering. The wine is finished off dry.

title: Kaena 2013 La Presa Vineyard Riesling (Santa Ynez Valley)
excerpt: Coming from a vineyard near Solvang, this wine by Mikael Sigouin shows ...
description: Coming from a vineyard near Solvang, this wine by Mikael Sigouin shows orange sponge cake, honey and the slightest twist of petrol on the nose. The palate boasts orange blossoms and bright acidity, gaining complexity from chalky white rocks and the slight bitterness of Japanese pear peels.

title: Hyland 2013 Riesling (McMinnville)
excerpt: Sourced from vines planted in the 1980s, this tart and steely wine ...
description: Sourced from vines planted in the 1980s, this tart and steely wine mixes lemongrass and citrus flavors with hints of riper peach. It finishes with suggestions of fresh-brewed tea.

title: Johannes Kunz 2013 Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Refreshingly quaffable, this off-dry Riesling juxtaposes juicy, sweet melon and peach flavors ...
description: Refreshingly quaffable, this off-dry Riesling juxtaposes juicy, sweet melon and peach flavors with fresh tangerine acidity. The finish is brisk, fringed with a delicious bristle of lime pith.

title: Clear Night 2013 Riesling (Pfalz)
excerpt: Bramble notes mingle alongside fresh lemon and pear in this off-dry Riesling, ...
description: Bramble notes mingle alongside fresh lemon and pear in this off-dry Riesling, lending a savory, earthy tone throughout. Bright citrus flavors lead a brisk, clean finish. Drink now.

title: Bollig-Lehnert 2013 Dhroner Hofberger Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Smoke and dried herbs persist from nose to finish on this uniquely ...
description: Smoke and dried herbs persist from nose to finish on this uniquely sweet-savory auslese. The palate is brisk and lemony, but shaded in tones of dust and stone that linger on the finish.

title: Kessler-Haak 2013 Lafond Vineyard Riesling (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: Typical hints of gasoline on the nose of this wine are bolstered ...
description: Typical hints of gasoline on the nose of this wine are bolstered by beeswax, orange blossom water and a steely minerality. The palate is a little flat, with lime pith, lemon juice and very little petrol element.

title: Bota Box 2013 Riesling (California)
excerpt: This is slightly sweet, moderately fruity and smooth in texture. Light aromas ...
description: This is slightly sweet, moderately fruity and smooth in texture. Light aromas of peaches and flowers lead to flavors like sugared honeydew melon. It would match with cheese or spicy Asian food.

title: Cristiari 2013 Riesling (Costers del Segre)
excerpt: This Riesling smells slightly tropical but more like grass and asparagus. A ...
description: This Riesling smells slightly tropical but more like grass and asparagus. A linear body is propped up by lemony acidity, while flavors of lemon peel, tangerine and lees finish citric. Overall, this smells and tastes nothing like the Riesling most people know.

title: Emmerich Knoll 2013 Ried Pfaffenberg Selection Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: The nose is still dominated by funky yeast, signaling that this Riesling ...
description: The nose is still dominated by funky yeast, signaling that this Riesling requires time in bottle. The streamlined palate reveals something that is equally generous and tart, like pink grapefruit or pomelo. There is a lovely phenolic texture, too, with intimations of riper fruit in the background that will still take their time to appear. Best to let this slumber for a while in a cool cellar. Drink as of 2018.

title: F X Pichler 2013 Loibner Burgstall Federspiel Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: Musky, heady notes of ripeness move within the pear scent of this ...
description: Musky, heady notes of ripeness move within the pear scent of this serious Federspiel. Their richness is countered by grapefruit peel that gives verve and nerve to the entire wine, corsetting its ripeness with delicious citric acidity. There is a phenolic dimension, too, but that fizzling citrus freshness is just so much fun. This will stay fresh and exciting for a long time. Drink from 2016.

title: Josef Jamek 2014 Jochinger Pichl Federspiel Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: Seductive perfume suggest fronds of jasmine, ivy, mandarin and perhaps an edge ...
