description: Seductive perfume suggest fronds of jasmine, ivy, mandarin and perhaps an edge of pink grapefruit. The playfulness of this citrus feast fizzes away and excites both nose and palate. It has all the effortlessness that comes with years of practice.

title: Schloss Gobelsburg 2014 Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Beautifully pure apple fruit plays on nose and palate. Citrus juice frames ...
description: Beautifully pure apple fruit plays on nose and palate. Citrus juice frames the fruit and heightens the freshness even more. If you like a slender, supercrisp style of Riesling, the purity of this will have you hooked.

title: Loimer 2014 Langenlois Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Juicy yellow pear, fresh red apple and apple compote make for a ...
description: Juicy yellow pear, fresh red apple and apple compote make for a very appetizing, refreshing nose. On the palate a spritz of lemon juice provides further freshness and zesty spiciness, accentuating the gorgeous apple fruit. Slender but fruity this will be a joy on a sunny day.

title: Wieninger 2014 Wiener Riesling (Vienna)
excerpt: An intriguing nose of Comice pear, menthol and lemon oil creates a ...
description: An intriguing nose of Comice pear, menthol and lemon oil creates a delicious aromatic hit. The palate is supertight and zesty. Citrus is the main focus along the linear palate that is fringed by the same aromatic top-notes as the nose. Beautiful now the wine has the verve and stuffing to mature beautifully. Drink now through 2020.

title: Josef Jamek 2014 Ried Klaus Federspiel Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: Luscious stone fruit streams into the nose, while the palate reins this ...
description: Luscious stone fruit streams into the nose, while the palate reins this richness in with straight-laced citrus. Lime and grapefruit zest make for a linear, refreshing and streamlined Federspiel with the typical freshness of the 2014 vintage. This will age beautifully even through it already provides great enjoyment for lovers of brisk, fresh, dry Rieslings.

title: Hazlitt 1852 Vineyards 2013 Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Touches of menthol and lime zest lend a cool, green feel to ...
description: Touches of menthol and lime zest lend a cool, green feel to this off-dry Riesling. White grapefruit and honeydew rind flavors are crisp yet concentrated on the palate, bolstered by a kick of acidity that lingers on the finish.

title: Tegernseerhof 2014 Terrassen Federspiel Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: Slightly ethereal notes of camphor play ever so slightly above the lemony ...
description: Slightly ethereal notes of camphor play ever so slightly above the lemony nose. The palate is light-bodied, completely citrus-driven and very refreshing. Yellow plums beckon between the lemony zestiness and make for a slightly richer finish on this super-slender wine.

title: Steininger 2014 Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: A very fresh nose of slight citrus leads to an equally light, ...
description: A very fresh nose of slight citrus leads to an equally light, slightly lemon-scented palate of ultralight dimensions. There is a hint of riper fruit on the midpalate, but this is simple, refreshing and clean.

title: Pacific Rim 2013 Solstice Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Intriguing aromas of lime leaf, green apple, mint and apricot rise up. ...
description: Intriguing aromas of lime leaf, green apple, mint and apricot rise up. The stone fruit flavors drink close to dry and are lighter in style but with a pleasing sense of balance.

title: Diversion NV Copper River Estate Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromatically expressive, this offers notes of mandarin orange, lime leaf, green apple ...
description: Aromatically expressive, this offers notes of mandarin orange, lime leaf, green apple and botrytis. It drinks off dry, with plentiful stone fruit and citrus flavors balanced nicely by tart acidity.

title: Saviah 2013 The Jack Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Somewhat aromatically reserved for the variety, this wine has notes of green ...
description: Somewhat aromatically reserved for the variety, this wine has notes of green apple, jasmine and lime. It drinks off dry, with a lightly spritzy feel to the elegant stone fruit flavors.

title: Hazlitt 1852 Vineyards 2013 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Yellow cherry and blossom notes soften the bracing lemon-lime backbone in this ...
description: Yellow cherry and blossom notes soften the bracing lemon-lime backbone in this light-footed dry Riesling. Crisp honeydew and quince flavors are sprightly and bright, finishing brisk and clean.

title: Love & Squalor 2013 Riesling (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: This packs tremendous flavor into a low-alcohol wine with moderate residual sugar. ...
description: This packs tremendous flavor into a low-alcohol wine with moderate residual sugar. Peach pit and juice, green apple and citrusy acids start it off. The flavors keep going through a long, complex finish, adding subtle notes of herb and cut grass.

title: Dr. Loosen 2013 Erdener Treppchen Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Whiffs of lime and lemon zest, lanolin and herbs entice on the ...
description: Whiffs of lime and lemon zest, lanolin and herbs entice on the nose. Off dry in style, this is chock-full of sweet-tart melon and citrus flavors glazed in a slick of honey, which lingers on the finish

title: Thanisch 2013 Brauneberger Juffer Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Layers of honey and white tea alternate accents of silkly tannins throughout ...
description: Layers of honey and white tea alternate accents of silkly tannins throughout this delicate, pertly structured auslese. The palate is ripe and sweet, yet rippling with acidity, and extending through a long, saffron-kissed finish.

title: Pewsey Vale 2009 The Contours Museum Reserve Riesling (Eden Valley)
excerpt: The winery has kindly aged this bottling for you and is charging ...
description: The winery has kindly aged this bottling for you and is charging a relatively small premium for the service, so this is one to snap up if you can find it. Hints of grilled toast, marmalade and honey remain dry on the palate and extend through a long finish. Ready to drink.

title: Schloss Saarstein 2013 Serrig Schloss Saarsteiner Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: White peach, melon and lime flavors are pure and pristine. A kiss ...
description: White peach, melon and lime flavors are pure and pristine. A kiss of honey sweetens the palate, lingering softly alongside a spritz of lemony acidity. Enjoy now through 2016 for its crystalline character.

title: Dr. Loosen 2013 Wehlener Sonnenuhr Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Chalk dust and slate lend a mineral elegance to white blossom, lime ...
description: Chalk dust and slate lend a mineral elegance to white blossom, lime and gooseberry notes. The palate is zesty and spry, marked by concentrated hits of sweet stone fruit and citrus flavor.

title: Schloss Vollrads 2013 Volratz 1573 Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Lavish aromas of honeysuckle, peach and lemon abound in this vivacious, zippy ...
description: Lavish aromas of honeysuckle, peach and lemon abound in this vivacious, zippy Riesling. Dry in style, the palate is a bracing crush of white grapefruit and lime flavors that intensify through the long finish, accented by ripples of slate-like mineral.

title: Domdechant Werner 2013 Hochheimer Domdechaney Trocken Gold Cap Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: While richly textured and boldly perfumed with melons and tangerines, the palate ...
description: While richly textured and boldly perfumed with melons and tangerines, the palate of this dry Riesling is delicate and lithe. Crisp honeydew and white peach flavors are almost ethereal in their subtlety, but elegantly cast against a backdrop of striking lemon and lime.

title: Dr. Fischer 2013 Ockfener Bockstein Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Spine-tingling acidity runs throughout this off-dry Riesling. Swathes of honey and fresh ...
description: Spine-tingling acidity runs throughout this off-dry Riesling. Swathes of honey and fresh apple, saffron and dried berries lend sweetness and warmth, but this striking kabinett does not surrender its sharp edges easily.

title: Dr. Heidemanns-Bergweiler 2013 Mineral Dry Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Mineral and dry are apt words to describe this intensely smoky, granite-toned ...
description: Mineral and dry are apt words to describe this intensely smoky, granite-toned Riesling. Zesty lime and lemon notes are razor-sharp, but softened by a swathe of crisp greengage plum and apple flavors.

title: Hansen-Lauer 2013 Brut Sekt Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Vibrantly effervescent, this is gorgeously perfumed with orange blossoms and tangerine zest. ...
description: Vibrantly effervescent, this is gorgeously perfumed with orange blossoms and tangerine zest. Fresh peach and grapefruit flavors are laced with delicate shards of lime acidity that linger elegantly on a long herbal finish.

title: Peter Nicolay 2013 Dry Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Tart white peach and green apple flavors penetrate through the palate of ...
description: Tart white peach and green apple flavors penetrate through the palate of this intense, focused wine. Steely and dry, it finishes long with a revitalizing streak of lime and green floral notes.

title: D'Arenberg 2013 The Dry Dam Riesling (McLaren Vale)
excerpt: This wavers from the classic Australian recipe of dry Riesling to offer ...
description: This wavers from the classic Australian recipe of dry Riesling to offer something with a touch of residual sugar (13.6 g/L). Notes of crushed stone, pineapple and lime are buttressed by tart acids, while the sugar helps to balance the finish. A strong candidate to pair with spicy-sweet Asian dishes.

title: Dr. Pauly Bergweiler 2013 Graacher Himmelreich Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Notes of pollen and dusty mineral lend an earthy tone to pressed ...
description: Notes of pollen and dusty mineral lend an earthy tone to pressed apple, peach and apricot flavors in this off-dry Riesling. Zesty lemon-lime acidity reverberates with intensity through the finish.

title: C. von Nell-Breuning 2013 Kaseler Dominikaneberg Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Rusticity runs rampant throughout this off-dry kabinett full of savory earth and ...
description: Rusticity runs rampant throughout this off-dry kabinett full of savory earth and dust tones. Its crisp, cutting citrus flavors are remarkably complex, nuanced with hints of pollen, spice, slate and clay.

title: Louis Guntrum 2013 Riesling (Germany)
excerpt: Whiffs of nuts, pollen and earth are savory on the nose, but ...
description: Whiffs of nuts, pollen and earth are savory on the nose, but the palate is full of pristine lemon and tangerine flavors. Zesty and refreshing, it has a touch of honey to soften the finish.

title: La Vis 2013 Simboli Riesling (Trentino)
excerpt: Delicate aromas of honeysuckle and candied citrus waft from the glass. The ...
description: Delicate aromas of honeysuckle and candied citrus waft from the glass. The zesty palate offers apricot, lime and a note of crystalized ginger alongside zesty acidity.

title: Bastgen 2013 Kestener Paulinshofberg Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Aromas of dried oregano and sage, alongside a vein of dusty minerals, ...
description: Aromas of dried oregano and sage, alongside a vein of dusty minerals, lend a dark, savory tone to this refreshing off-dry Riesling. Crisp apple and lemon flavors are cutting and spry on the palate, finishing brisk and clean.

title: Reustle 2013 Engedi & Onyx Bloc Riesling (Umpqua Valley)
excerpt: Stainless-steel fermentation has elevated the aromatics, and this displays a mix of ...
description: Stainless-steel fermentation has elevated the aromatics, and this displays a mix of citrus, notably grapefruit and pineapple. The flavors are light and pleasantly fresh and continue down the citrus trail, with traces of mineral and wintergreen.

title: Smith-Madrone 2013 Estate Bottled Riesling (Spring Mountain)
excerpt: From 41-year-old vines on just over five estate acres, this is resiny ...
description: From 41-year-old vines on just over five estate acres, this is resiny and briny on the nose. A honey-laced creaminess at the core is tensely accentuated by vibrant acidity. Balanced and elegant, with a sunny bite of ripeness, it revels in nuances of fresh and dried apricot while lighter notes of lemon, lime and grapefruit play backup.

title: Efeste 2013 Evergreen Vineyard Riesling (Ancient Lakes)
excerpt: This wine is an aromatic tour de force with notes of apricot, ...
description: This wine is an aromatic tour de force with notes of apricot, pear, honey and slate. The off-dry fruit flavors are ripe, lightly spritzy and layered, with a drawn-out feel that leads to an explosion of fruit on the finish.

title: Sheldrake Point 2014 Wild Ferment Ice Wine Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Fermented unintentionally by ambient, rather than inoculated yeasts, this serendipitous wild-ferment ice ...
description: Fermented unintentionally by ambient, rather than inoculated yeasts, this serendipitous wild-ferment ice wine is a fascinating treat. While the nose is touched with hints of saffron and pressed apples, the fresh melon and pineapple flavors are pure and pristine. Remarkably complex, it balances rich honey tones against elegant streaks of acidity, spice and minerals.

title: Anthony Road 2012 Art Series Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Dusty mineral tones offset plump, sunny apricot and peach flavors in this ...
description: Dusty mineral tones offset plump, sunny apricot and peach flavors in this balanced, refreshingly quaffable wine. Zesty lime acidity jolts through the midpalate, lingering on the finish.

title: Zero One Vintners 2012 Golden Delicious Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This aromatic wine brings notes of white flowers, lime, dried apricot and ...
description: This aromatic wine brings notes of white flowers, lime, dried apricot and botrytis. It drinks medium sweet with a lightly spritzy feel and good concentration and depth to the fruit flavors.

title: Fox Run 2013 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Whiffs of petrol and dried herbs lend complexity to this dry, intensely ...
description: Whiffs of petrol and dried herbs lend complexity to this dry, intensely mineral Riesling. Delicate apple, pear and white melon notes soften the midpalate, but the finish is zesty and fresh.

title: Chateau Ste. Michelle & Dr. Loosen 2013 Eroica Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This wine shows some pleasing aromatic complexity with notes of lime zest, ...
description: This wine shows some pleasing aromatic complexity with notes of lime zest, apricot and flowers. It drinks off dry and is lightly spritzy in feel with good flavor intensity and abundant stone-fruit flavors that linger.

title: Domaine LeSeurre 2013 Barrel Select Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Smoke and dusty mineral tones are offset by fragrant white blossom and ...
description: Smoke and dusty mineral tones are offset by fragrant white blossom and peach in this off-dry Riesling. Extended aging in neutral oak barrels lends depth to the palate despite its briskness. It finishes with a lingering lacy sweetness.

title: Pastoral 2013 The Woodlark Dineen Vineyard Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: A first release from this new winery from long-time winemaker Rob Owen, ...
description: A first release from this new winery from long-time winemaker Rob Owen, this brings an appealing aroma profile of lime, slate and white peach. It drinks off dry (20g/L residual sugar) with abundant stone-fruit flavors that show good depth and intensity.

title: Kennedy Shah 2012 Reserve DuBrul Vineyard Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: This aromatic wine suggests green apple, tangerine and flowers. It drinks dry ...
description: This aromatic wine suggests green apple, tangerine and flowers. It drinks dry with stone fruit and citrus flavors that have a fleshy feel.

title: Koenig Vineyards 2012 Sunny Slope Cuvee Riesling
excerpt: A blend of equal parts Williamson and Bitner vineyards, this wine is ...
description: A blend of equal parts Williamson and Bitner vineyards, this wine is brightly aromatic with notes of lychee, lime and white peach. The palate drinks almost completely dry with a mixture of stone fruit and citrus flavors bringing a lightly tannic feel.

title: Fox Run 2013 Semi-Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Intense notes of crushed stone and slate permeate this stately off-dry Riesling. ...
description: Intense notes of crushed stone and slate permeate this stately off-dry Riesling. Pert lemon and tangerine flavors are zippy and fresh, but the wine is more a showcase for its brisk, stony style.

title: Heron Hill 2013 Semi-Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Smoke and violet perfume are seductive on this elegant off-dry Riesling. Fresh ...
description: Smoke and violet perfume are seductive on this elegant off-dry Riesling. Fresh green apple and pear flavors are tart but concentrated, wrapping up tightly with a squeaky-clean, lemon-lime finish.

title: Coiled 2012 Dry Riesling
excerpt: All coming from Block 17 of Skyline Vineyard, this is aromatic with ...
description: All coming from Block 17 of Skyline Vineyard, this is aromatic with lime, mineral and stone fruit. It drinks just off dry (7g/L residual sugar), with a phenolic, almost creamy feel.

title: Balo 2013 Riesling (Anderson Valley)
excerpt: With aromas and flavors reminiscent of apple skin, peach skin, white pepper ...
description: With aromas and flavors reminiscent of apple skin, peach skin, white pepper and pomegranate seed, this tastes crisp, tangy, slightly bitter, and has great bright acidity. It is light to medium bodied and made from 100% whole-cluster-pressed Riesling that was fermented in a combination of older oak barrels and stainless steel vessels.

title: Heron Hill 2013 Hobbit Hollow Farm Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: While spry and dry in style, fragrant apricot and orange blossom notes ...
description: While spry and dry in style, fragrant apricot and orange blossom notes lend flair to this light-bodied wine. Tangerine acidity is bright and concentrated on the palate, leading to a swift, pert finish.

title: Hat Ranch 2012 Riesling
excerpt: Moderately aromatic, this recalls lime leaf and mineral. It drinks off dry ...
description: Moderately aromatic, this recalls lime leaf and mineral. It drinks off dry with tangerine and other citrus flavors.

title: Original House Wine 2012 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This aromatic wine offers notes of jasmine, quinine, flowers and peach. It ...
description: This aromatic wine offers notes of jasmine, quinine, flowers and peach. It drinks medium sweet with lightly spritzy stone-fruit flavors.

title: Sawtooth 2012 Riesling
excerpt: This brightly aromatic wine suggests lime leaf, clover, wet stone and orange ...
description: This brightly aromatic wine suggests lime leaf, clover, wet stone and orange blossom. It drinks off dry (24 g/L residual sugar) with a broad feel and a narrowing finish.

title: Standing Stone 2013 Old West Block Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Waxy white florals and lifted apple aromas add freshness to slightly cider-like ...
description: Waxy white florals and lifted apple aromas add freshness to slightly cider-like flavors of pressed apple and mulling spice in this dry Riesling. Delicately light bodied it has a brisk, refreshing finish.

title: Heron Hill 2013 Ingle Vineyard Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: While sun-ripened apricot and wildflowers aromas abound on the nose of this ...
description: While sun-ripened apricot and wildflowers aromas abound on the nose of this dry Riesling, the palate is more mineral and restrained. Lemon-lime acidity is zesty and fresh, leading to a brisk, biting finish.

title: Heron Hill 2013 Morris Vineyard Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: While the nose on this dry Riesling is vivacious with lifted floral ...
description: While the nose on this dry Riesling is vivacious with lifted floral and apple aromas, the the palate is subdued with fresh, but straightforward apple and pear flavors, along with savory hints of reeds and stems. Lemony acidity is refreshing, leading to a swift finish.

title: Sagelands 2012 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas recall jasmine, botrytis and tangerine. It drinks medium sweet with honeyed ...
description: Aromas recall jasmine, botrytis and tangerine. It drinks medium sweet with honeyed fruit flavors and a clipped finish.

title: Black Box 2013 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Moderately aromatic, this offers notes of red apple, jasmine, and peach. It ...
description: Moderately aromatic, this offers notes of red apple, jasmine, and peach. It drinks off dry leaning toward medium sweet, with abundant peach flavors with a creamy feel. It needs a bit more acidity to hold it all together.

title: Serenity 2012 Semi-Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Smoke, dried reed and herb tones persist throughout this earthy, semidry Riesling. ...
description: Smoke, dried reed and herb tones persist throughout this earthy, semidry Riesling. Pressed apple and pear flavors are savory as well, but brightened by a shower of tart tangerine acidity on the finish.

title: Dr. H. Thanisch (Erben Thanisch) 2012 Berncasteler Doctor GG Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Honeysuckle and orange blossom aromas are pristine on this dry, luxuriously textured ...
description: Honeysuckle and orange blossom aromas are pristine on this dry, luxuriously textured Riesling. Ripe melon and stone fruit flavors drench the palate in lush waves, accented by cool tones of steel and acid. Enjoy now for its lavish perfume and fruit, but even more from 2020 for intense textural complexity.

title: Philipp Kuhn 2012 Laumersheimer Alte Reben Trocken Riesling (Pfalz)
excerpt: This voluptuously textured wine balances a dry, elegant palate with plush peach ...
description: This voluptuously textured wine balances a dry, elegant palate with plush peach and preserved quince flavors. Silken and supple, it clings lovingly on the palate, but finishes bold with a steely, mineral touch.

title: C. von Nell-Breuning 1999 Kaseler Dominikanerberg Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: At almost 16 years old, this auslese exhibits the delicate transition Riesling ...
description: At almost 16 years old, this auslese exhibits the delicate transition Riesling makes from fruit to earth. Smoke, dusty minerals, saffron and caramel dominate the palate. Texturally, it seems layered with silk and astringency. On the finish, racy acidity lifts and revitalizes.

title: Penner-Ash 2013 Riesling (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: This tastes dry, though the 12.5 g/L residual sugar does round off ...
description: This tastes dry, though the 12.5 g/L residual sugar does round off the mouthfeel. Powerful, juicy fruit flavors of lemon pith, orange peel, pink grapefruit and white peach abound, with a touch of honey in the finish. Two-thirds was sourced from the excellent Hyland Vineyard.

title: Yamhill Valley 2013 Riesling (McMinnville)
excerpt: Sourced from 30-year-old vines, this off-dry wine is finished at 30 g/L ...
description: Sourced from 30-year-old vines, this off-dry wine is finished at 30 g/L residual sugar. The layered, textural, dense tropical fruit, dry extract and tart, tangy acidity all work in concert to fill the palate with a vibrant, fresh and long-lasting cascade of bright flavors.

title: Penner-Ash 2012 Hyland Vineyard Old Vine Riesling (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Tart with melon, peach and lemon fruits, this was crafted in a ...
description: Tart with melon, peach and lemon fruits, this was crafted in a mix of stainless and new French oak. Low alcohol notwithstanding, it drinks dry despite some residual sugar.

title: Robert Weil 2013 Kiedrich Turmberg Trocken Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: A whiff of anise lends exotic spice to powerful white peach and ...
description: A whiff of anise lends exotic spice to powerful white peach and melon flavors in this dry, richly textured wine. Despite a cool, wet vintage, this displays an intensity of ripeness, enhanced by mineral complexity and a brisk, revitalizing acid structure.

title: Reichsgraf von Kesselstatt 2013 RK Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Whiffs of wet stone and lime zest are delicate on the nose, ...
description: Whiffs of wet stone and lime zest are delicate on the nose, but intensify on the palate, melding with concentrated flavors of yellow plum and tangerine. Off dry in style, this brisk, bracing Riesling makes for elegant, yet approachably juicy drinking.

title: Karl Josef 2012 Piesporter Michelsberg Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: While effortlessly quaffable, this pretty, intensely floral off-dry Riesling also has a ...
description: While effortlessly quaffable, this pretty, intensely floral off-dry Riesling also has a polished mineral tone throughout. Plush honeydew and yellow cherry notes are delicately sweet, offset by a revitalizing lime finish.

title: Bastgen 2013 Blauschiefer Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Delicate melon and white-peach aromas lend softness to this bristling off-dry Riesling. ...
description: Delicate melon and white-peach aromas lend softness to this bristling off-dry Riesling. Laser-sharp in style, it balances lime acidity with bright stone-fruit flavor and long, mineral streaks.

title: Friedrich-Wilhelm-Gymnasium 2013 Schiefer Feinherb Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Ripe, yellow peach and apricot flavors are accompanied by shock of spine-tingling ...
description: Ripe, yellow peach and apricot flavors are accompanied by shock of spine-tingling acidity on this off-dry Riesling. Intensely focused and penetrating, it offers a lingering crush of minerals on the finish.

title: Schloss Saarstein 2013 Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Earthy mineral and forest tones meld seductively in this off-dry Riesling. The ...
description: Earthy mineral and forest tones meld seductively in this off-dry Riesling. The palate feels juicy and revitalizing, marked by tangerine sweetness and racy acidity. It finishes lean on a cool, evergreen note.

title: Bowers Harbor 2013 Langley Late Harvest Riesling (Old Mission Peninsula)
excerpt: There is a sense of restrained purity on the nose, showing unripe ...
description: There is a sense of restrained purity on the nose, showing unripe pear, apple skin, lemon zest and crushed stone. The palate is more evoking, offering notes of juicy apple and candied citrus that are balanced by lemon-lime acidity.

title: St. Julian 2013 Reserve Riesling (Lake Michigan Shore)
excerpt: Dusty peach, orange spice and lemony black tea show brightly on the ...
description: Dusty peach, orange spice and lemony black tea show brightly on the nose of this exotic Riesling. A palate housing soft but driving acidity brings notes of ripe stone fruits that lead into a white tea finish.

title: Wunsch & Mann 2012 Hengst Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: This is a perfumed wine, spicy and textured. It is off-dry which ...
description: This is a perfumed wine, spicy and textured. It is off-dry which gives it a warm character, apples and white fruits over a rounded texture. It could age another few months and will be more balanced from 2016.

title: Sweet Cheeks 2013 Riesling (Oregon)
excerpt: This fruit-powered Riesling emphasizes flavors and scents of orange peel and orange ...
description: This fruit-powered Riesling emphasizes flavors and scents of orange peel and orange candy, along with citrus, pineapple and tangerine. That bright, textural and fresh flavor set carries it through a clean and lingering, off-dry finish.

title: Schloss Vollrads 2013 Kabinett Medium-Dry Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: An intense perfume of tropical fruit, flowers and spice extends from nose ...
description: An intense perfume of tropical fruit, flowers and spice extends from nose to finish throughout this extravagant, yet small-footed Riesling. The palate is touched with honey and a bristling lemon-lime acidity that adds elegance and brace.

title: St. Julian 2013 Reserve Late Harvest Riesling (Lake Michigan Shore)
excerpt: Pineapple rind, lemon pith and orange blossom start off the aromas. The ...
description: Pineapple rind, lemon pith and orange blossom start off the aromas. The palate is a bit more opulent, with notes of honey-drizzled guava and mango giving way to a slightly astringent, semidry finish.

title: Bowers Harbor 2013 Smokey Hollow Riesling (Old Mission Peninsula)
excerpt: Fresh lemon and crushed mineral tones ride over restrained aromas of tart ...
description: Fresh lemon and crushed mineral tones ride over restrained aromas of tart peach and apple skin. The palate shows underripe pear and sour lemon, with a finish reminiscent of Pixy Stix.

title: Carmel 2012 Single Vineyard Kayoumi Vineyard White Riesling (Galilee)
excerpt: This medium-straw colored wine has a nose of lemon and tomato leaf. ...
description: This medium-straw colored wine has a nose of lemon and tomato leaf. Flavors of lemon, orange, baking bread and a light cottony feel are ultimately brightened by a final wash of acidity.

title: St. Julian 2013 Braganini Reserve Riesling (Michigan)
excerpt: Ripe on the nose, with aromas of fruit cocktail and sweet tea, ...
description: Ripe on the nose, with aromas of fruit cocktail and sweet tea, this is a straightforward Riesling bound to please most. The round and peach-driven palate is enlivened by a citrus backdrop, providing just enough lift to carry the short finish.

title: Wunsch & Mann 2012 Roi Clovis Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: A lightly fruity wine that has a soft texture, gentle acidity and ...
description: A lightly fruity wine that has a soft texture, gentle acidity and a perfumed aftertaste. It is ready to drink with its steely backbone well enmeshed in the fruitiness.

title: Domaine Specht 2013 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This is a soft wine. It has just the lightest hints of ...
description: This is a soft wine. It has just the lightest hints of aromatic white flowers that show on the palate as white fruits with a more steely backbone. It's already a wine to drink, although it will be better, with a chance to bring out more fruitiness, from 2016.

title: Domaine Charles Frey 2013 Vieilles Vignes Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Young and fruity, this is a soft, citrus and apple flavored wine. ...
description: Young and fruity, this is a soft, citrus and apple flavored wine. Attractive acidity is enhanced by the light minerality and tangy aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Good Harbor 2011 Dry Riesling (Leelanau Peninsula)
excerpt: Grilled peach and almond notes show on the nose, while the palate ...
description: Grilled peach and almond notes show on the nose, while the palate is tighter in profile, offering apple pomace and lemon rind.

title: Good Harbor 2011 Riesling (Leelanau Peninsula)
excerpt: While the nose has a persistent apple cider quality, the palate brings ...
description: While the nose has a persistent apple cider quality, the palate brings a bit more nuance, with unripe peach and sweet-and-sour lemon flavors.

title: Mackinaw Trail 2013 Late Harvest Riesling (Michigan)
excerpt: Tangerine and orange zest aromas are overcome by a peppery and stemmy ...
description: Tangerine and orange zest aromas are overcome by a peppery and stemmy quality. The palate feels underripe, offering tart citrus flavors and soapy floral tones.

title: Franz Hirtzberger 2013 Singerriedl Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: A zesty nose promises refreshment and poise. The palate not only keeps ...
description: A zesty nose promises refreshment and poise. The palate not only keeps this promise but tops it. Orange, mandarin and lemon frame riper peach and Mirabelle plum explode like a firework of fruit on the palate. This is fruit-framed, citrus-focused joy, combining immense concentration with immense elegance. There is a long and exciting life ahead of this.

title: Lagler 2013 Spitzer 1000 Eimerberg Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: An appetizing combination of ripe, red-cheeked apple, pink grapefruit and Amalfi lemon ...
description: An appetizing combination of ripe, red-cheeked apple, pink grapefruit and Amalfi lemon promise exuberant but expertly expressed fruit. This is joined by the spiciness of white pepper that is resonant, concentrated and ethereally aromatic. Citrus and fruit flavors linger long and convincingly.

title: Franz Hirtzberger 2013 Hochrain Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: Yellow plum and Amalfi lemon lead a merry dance on nose and ...
description: Yellow plum and Amalfi lemon lead a merry dance on nose and palate. A yeasty edge pulls them down to earth, but their exuberance is evident, swirling and barely contained. This is lively, refreshing and totally invigorating. A celebration of ripe citrus draws a dynamic and dizzying fault line across the palate. Currently, minerality lurks in the background while the fruit dances. This will change intriguingly with time.

title: Pichler-Krutzler 2013 Loibenberg Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: The scent of ripe Mirabelle plums engulfs the nose and unfolds even ...
description: The scent of ripe Mirabelle plums engulfs the nose and unfolds even further on the palate. The plump fruit is tempered by sprightly, fresh lemon. It is purity of fruit with a wholesome edge of earthiness that distinguishes this streamlined, poised wine. The length is astonishing.

title: Salomon-Undhof 2013 Pfaffenberg Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Very ripe, juicy yellow Comice pear seems to drip from this lip-smacking, ...
description: Very ripe, juicy yellow Comice pear seems to drip from this lip-smacking, charming wine. At the core a vein of wonderful, lively acidity gives acidity and lots of drive. For now this concentrated wine shows zesty fruit but it also has stores of minerality.

title: Eichinger 2013 Gaisberg Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Voluptuous notions of orange oil segue into a more earthy notion of ...
description: Voluptuous notions of orange oil segue into a more earthy notion of lemon-anointed autumn leaves. Lots goes on here: the fresh peel of rosy apples, grated lemon zest and wet earth, all combined on a very smooth palate. This is highly drinkable and full of moreish allure.

title: Geyerhof 2013 Kirchensteig Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Amid the pear and apple fruit plays a more exotic note of ...
description: Amid the pear and apple fruit plays a more exotic note of something alluring and spicy, perhaps passion fruit. This intense fruitiness plays on, supported equally by bouncy citrus freshness and deep concentration.

title: Malat 2013 Silberbichl Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Sleek, citric freshness is coupled with a more generous, diffuse nature. The ...
description: Sleek, citric freshness is coupled with a more generous, diffuse nature. The picture that results is focused and rich, with glints of ripe Bosc pear, honeycomb and earth, all shot through with exciting and zesty lemon rind. The finish is exquisitely clean.

title: Loimer 2013 Heiligenstein Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Despite its evident, very palpable youth, this wine can barely keep check ...
description: Despite its evident, very palpable youth, this wine can barely keep check on the exuberant fruit that lurks beneath its surface. Ripe pear with shimmering notes of lemon and tangerine are bound in an earthy, still yeasty body that lends midpalate texture. Despite the concentration there is a lightness of touch.

title: Pichler-Krutzler 2013 Kellerberg Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: Ripe Bosc pear with its textured peel sets the tone. An underlying ...
description: Ripe Bosc pear with its textured peel sets the tone. An underlying base of luscious ripeness, is cut through with lively, zesty lemon freshness. It resonates with fruit at the very height of its expression: a pleasant edge of bitterness, ample texture, concentration and authenticity.

title: Malat 2013 Das Beste vom Riesling Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: An herbal edge of lemon balm plays amidst the citrus and pineapple-scented ...
description: An herbal edge of lemon balm plays amidst the citrus and pineapple-scented nose of this immensely concentrated Riesling. Pleasantly bitter notes of apple and pear peel add an earthy quality and a firm structure that allows citrus aromas of lemon zest, pink grapefruit and tangerine peel to soar.

title: Alzinger 2013 Loibenberg Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: A beautiful encounter of spice, citrus and earthy freshness. On the palate, ...
description: A beautiful encounter of spice, citrus and earthy freshness. On the palate, citrus dominates but ripe, red apple and peach lie at the core. A lively slick of zesty freshness provides direction and flow. This is still subdued and takes time to blossom. Drink as of 2017.

title: Eichinger 2013 Heiligenstein Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Ripe Mirabelle and purple plums dominate the nose, with a notion of ...
description: Ripe Mirabelle and purple plums dominate the nose, with a notion of intense plum compote. The palate reveals that all of this ripeness is streaked with lively lemon zest, pulling the sumptuous fruit into clearer focus. The finish remains ripe and opulent.

title: Fischer 2013 Ried Kirnberg Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: Restrained but earthy notes of lemon zest play against slight, flinty smoke. ...
description: Restrained but earthy notes of lemon zest play against slight, flinty smoke. This is still rather closed but the still-dormant expanse of ripe fruit is evident on the palate. The zesty lemon core takes turns with yeasty richness to dazzle. Wonderfully long.

title: Allram 2013 Heiligenstein Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Ripe mandarin with tender touches of white blossom beckons invitingly on the ...
description: Ripe mandarin with tender touches of white blossom beckons invitingly on the nose. The palate is precise, toned and sprightly. This wine dances nimbly on the palate, touching here with tangerine, there with lemon. Spicy zestiness lasts and lasts.

title: Hirsch 2013 Heiligenstein Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Sipping this recalls biting into a ripe, sharp and crisp Cox Orange ...
description: Sipping this recalls biting into a ripe, sharp and crisp Cox Orange Pippin apple: juiciness, freshness and crunchy texture. With time, fresh orange peel joins the aromatic fray, while the palate stays exquisitely fresh and totally balanced. This is utterly appetizing and moreish with lots of verve and bouncy joy. A super-clean finish.

title: Winzer Krems 2013 Pfaffenberg Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Lovely spiciness creeps into the lemon and tangerine zest that is on ...
description: Lovely spiciness creeps into the lemon and tangerine zest that is on display here. Sprays of freshness and verve continue on the tight, linear palate that leaves a lasting impression of lip-smacking joy.

title: Tegernseerhof 2013 Kellerberg Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: The faintest gleams of flint, smoke and mango try to escape from ...
description: The faintest gleams of flint, smoke and mango try to escape from this still tightly closed wine. A bouncy, toned, totally ripe core displays pineapple, mandarin and hints of mango, all framed by zesty lemon with satisfying length.

title: Jurtschitsch 2013 Heiligenstein Alte Reben Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Yeasty, almost umami-like spice slowly yields to ripe, delicious apricot flavors. The ...
description: Yeasty, almost umami-like spice slowly yields to ripe, delicious apricot flavors. The generosity is toned by bright lemon freshness that runs right through this concentrated wine and provides satisfying length. There is a delicious aftertaste of crunchy apple.

title: Nigl 2013 Privat Pellingen Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Juicy, luscious Comice pears and floral overtones are brought into tighter focus ...
description: Juicy, luscious Comice pears and floral overtones are brought into tighter focus by the zesty freshness on the concentrated palate that shows intensity and warmth. This finishes with a long impression of pure lemon oil.

title: Allram 2013 Gaisberg Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Ripe apple fruit is tempered by citrus freshness tinged with herbal spice ...
description: Ripe apple fruit is tempered by citrus freshness tinged with herbal spice suggesting sage and fennel seed. In the end, citric purity wins and carries this streamlined, concentrated wine into a long, spicy finish.

title: Tantalus Vineyards 2013 Riesling (Okanagan Valley)
excerpt: Tart and textural, the 2013 has the same zippy acids and concentration ...
description: Tart and textural, the 2013 has the same zippy acids and concentration as the previous vintage, here with fruit flavors of lime, grapefruit and pineapple. The two wines are siblings that reflect the different vintages perfectly. Give the 2013 a slight edge for extra ripeness and minerality.

title: Stadt Krems 2013 Grillenparz Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Intriguing notes of orange flower make for a delicate opening that segues ...
description: Intriguing notes of orange flower make for a delicate opening that segues into soft apricot notes. This is elegant and delicate, yet not without direction or concentration. There is warmth, too, and the vivacious Riesling acidity is cushioned by ripeness. The finish is earthy and long.

title: Markus Huber 2013 Berg Reserve Riesling (Traisental)
excerpt: Fragrant citrus zest sets the tone: lemon and grapefruit govern nose and ...
description: Fragrant citrus zest sets the tone: lemon and grapefruit govern nose and delicious, refreshing and zippy palate. Exquisite freshness and very ripe lemon make for streamlined lightness that leaves a very mineral and long impression. Riper fruit, like Mirabelle plum, hides underneath and is poised to come to the fore any moment.

title: Hiedler 2013 Gaisberg Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: This wine is reminiscent of ripe, plump pears and yellow plums fallen ...
description: This wine is reminiscent of ripe, plump pears and yellow plums fallen onto wet, cool autumn leaves on moss and grass. Those ripe notions are totally evident on the smooth, rounded palate that has a lick of vivacious lemon acidity. The long finish majors on citrus and clove-like spice.

title: Proidl 2013 Ehrenfels Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Freshly turned earth, red apples and lemon rind characterize the nose, but ...
description: Freshly turned earth, red apples and lemon rind characterize the nose, but then the palate is given linear shape by both juice and rind of ripe lemon. A concentrated lemon core emanates freshness, warmth and concentration. Tightly closed now, this will still open up.

title: Forstreiter 2013 Schiefer Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Green Conference pear makes a quick appearance on the nose before yielding ...
description: Green Conference pear makes a quick appearance on the nose before yielding completely to grapefruit and lemon zestiness. The palate is streamlined, linear and very refreshing. This is mouthwatering and and totally clean-cut.

title: Tantalus Vineyards 2012 Riesling (Okanagan Valley)
excerpt: This Riesling specialist strikes a unique chord, with precise yet individualistic wines. ...
description: This Riesling specialist strikes a unique chord, with precise yet individualistic wines. Crisp, tart, tongue-tickling flavors of green apple, grapefruit and orange peel are among the penetrating highlights. Concentrated and high in acid, this rocks on through a long finish.

title: Mantlerhof 2013 Steingraben Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Yeast and earth can be smelled as much as tart apple, ripe ...
description: Yeast and earth can be smelled as much as tart apple, ripe yellow plum and fresh lemon. In the mouth there is concentration and more of that expansive, savory yeastiness. A summoning streak of fresh lemon acidity provides a whistle-clean finish.

title: Anthony Road 2013 Semi-Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Hints of waxy white florals and lemon zest persist from nose to ...
description: Hints of waxy white florals and lemon zest persist from nose to finish on this intensely revitalizing semidry Riesling. Tart stone-fruit flavors penetrate the palate, highlighted by a stream of spine-tingling acidity.

title: Tegernseerhof 2013 Steinertal Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: Still closed, this emanates earthy notes at first while the palate shows ...
description: Still closed, this emanates earthy notes at first while the palate shows pink grapefruit zest hugged by very ripe, lemon-toned peach with tropical overtones of fresh and canned pineapple. A textural, structure-giving phenolic element on the midpalate leads to an earth- and lemon-tinged pineapple finish.

title: Anthony Road 2013 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Pristine grapefruit and apple blossom notes lend perfume and elegance to this ...
description: Pristine grapefruit and apple blossom notes lend perfume and elegance to this dry, intensely mineral Riesling. Bracing lemon-lime acidity shocks the palate to attention, intensifying a lean, lingering finish.

title: For a Song 2012 Caliche Lake Vineyard Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Though not labeled as such, this thrilling Riesling comes from the Ancient ...
description: Though not labeled as such, this thrilling Riesling comes from the Ancient Lakes appellation and brings aromatic notes of peach, orange blossom and pear. It drinks medium-sweet with abundant stone fruit flavors.

title: Sepp Moser 2013 Gelbling Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Soft, cushioned, apricot-scented ripeness plays on the palate, with edges of yeastiness, ...
description: Soft, cushioned, apricot-scented ripeness plays on the palate, with edges of yeastiness, spritz and fresh citrus buffered by plump apricots. This is gentle, fresh and pleasingly long, always with the scent of apricot.

title: Standing Stone 2013 Ice Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Lavish floral notes perfume this lusciously sweet ice-style Riesling. Honeyed apples and ...
description: Lavish floral notes perfume this lusciously sweet ice-style Riesling. Honeyed apples and fresh figs burst on the palate, their flavors intensified on the finish with a hit of zesty lemon acidity.

title: Hirsch 2013 Gaisberg Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Hints of wet earth marry lemony flavors with ripe and generous overtones ...
description: Hints of wet earth marry lemony flavors with ripe and generous overtones of peach. The lemony center lends structure to the entire wine and makes for a bracing but ripe and earthy mouthful.

title: Wakefield Estate 2012 Jaraman Riesling (Clare Valley-Eden Valley)
excerpt: This Riesling shows a bit of honeyed development already, hinting at orange ...
description: This Riesling shows a bit of honeyed development already, hinting at orange or tangerine marmalade on the slightly abbreviated finish. Enjoy it over the next few years.

title: Carmel Road 2013 Unoaked Riesling (Monterey)
excerpt: This has a subdued nose for a Riesling, with elements of squeezed ...
description: This has a subdued nose for a Riesling, with elements of squeezed lime, orange cake and stone fruit. There is decent tension on the palate, hovering between ripe nectarine and bitter grapefruit peel.

title: Pacific Rim 2013 Made from Organic Grapes Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This wine brings a lot of appeal, with notes of mandarin orange, ...
description: This wine brings a lot of appeal, with notes of mandarin orange, Bosc pear and jasmine. It leans toward medium-sweet with ripe peach flavors but without the acid to hold them entirely together.

title: Trust 2013 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This directly appealing wine features subtle notes of mineral, lime leaf, flowers ...
description: This directly appealing wine features subtle notes of mineral, lime leaf, flowers and white peach. It drinks off dry (10.49g/L residual sugar) with mouthwatering stone fruit flavors.

title: J & J 2013 Les Collines Vineyard Riesling (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: This aromatic wine offers notes of apricot, flowers and jasmine. It drinks ...
description: This aromatic wine offers notes of apricot, flowers and jasmine. It drinks off dry with abundant stone fruit flavors.

title: Brooklyn Winery 2012 Skin Fermented Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Extended maceration on the skins combined with two years of oak aging ...
description: Extended maceration on the skins combined with two years of oak aging lends layers of savory spice and smoke to this unusual dry Riesling. Pops of fresh apple and pear brighten the palate, but are accompanied by twists of bitter herbs and grass. Finishes briskly.

title: St. Hubertus 2012 Dry Riesling (Okanagan Valley)
excerpt: A whiff of petrol introduces this bone-dry effort, continuing with flavors of ...
description: A whiff of petrol introduces this bone-dry effort, continuing with flavors of citrus rind and tangerine. The piercing acidity will cut through any number of noodle dishes, white fish, or poultry, though on its own the wine seems to fade into a somewhat dilute finish.

title: Heron Hill 2010 Ingle Vineyard Icewine Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Laser-focused acidity adds polish to luscious sweet pear and tangerine flavors in ...
description: Laser-focused acidity adds polish to luscious sweet pear and tangerine flavors in this decadently sweet bottling. Delicately lacy in mouthfeel, it finishes with a savory dusting of pollen and crushed stones.

title: Pacific Rim 2013 Dry Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Appealing notes include pear, jasmine and orange blossom. It drinks a hair ...
description: Appealing notes include pear, jasmine and orange blossom. It drinks a hair off dry with stone fruit flavors that seem a bit dilute.

title: Suhru 2012 Dry Riesling (New York)
excerpt: Waxy lemon peel accents savory apple and quince notes in this dry, ...
description: Waxy lemon peel accents savory apple and quince notes in this dry, zesty Riesling. While expansive on the palate with bold, voluminous body, it finishes brisk and tart.

title: Jamesport 2010 Late Harvest Riesling (North Fork of Long Island)
excerpt: Notes of caramel apple are juxtaposed with touches of saltwater and dusty ...
description: Notes of caramel apple are juxtaposed with touches of saltwater and dusty mineral in this unusually savory-yet-sweet wine. Lithe and lean on the palate, it finishes briskly.

title: Fritz Haag 2013 Brauneberger Juffer Auslese Goldkapsel Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Gorgeously aromatic, this racy, light-footed wine wafts of lavender, peach and honeycomb. ...
description: Gorgeously aromatic, this racy, light-footed wine wafts of lavender, peach and honeycomb. The palate is juicy with sweet, ripe grapefruit and apricot, yet zesty with acidity and minerality. Enamel-stripping acidity feels jagged on the finish now, but should meld out beautifully from 2019 on.

title: Wittmann 2012 Westhofener Trocken Riesling (Rheinhessen)
excerpt: Tart green melon, lemon and lime scent this sleek, dry wine. While ...
description: Tart green melon, lemon and lime scent this sleek, dry wine. While full bodied in style, its rich, mineral palate is steely and honed. Finishes long with a murmur of lime-zest astringency.

title: Claiborne & Churchill 2013 Riesling (Central Coast)
excerpt: This regional blend conveys elegant aromas of tangerine blossom, seared lime, green ...
description: This regional blend conveys elegant aromas of tangerine blossom, seared lime, green apples and passionfruit sorbet. The tropicality rules the palate, with guava and more passionfruit, but the ripe fruit is used judiciously, with tension thanks to minerality and bitter citrus pith.

title: Dr. H. Thanisch (Erben Thanisch) 2013 Berncasteler Doctor Kabinett Gold Cap Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Ripe, rich yellow-cherry and peach tones are surprisingly plump on this dancing, ...
description: Ripe, rich yellow-cherry and peach tones are surprisingly plump on this dancing, delicate wine. A strike of razor-edged acidity on the midpalate cuts through all the luscious fruit, leading a steely, mineral finish.

title: Lafond 2012 SRH Riesling (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: Extremely sharp scents of petrol and gasoline exhaust are cut with bright ...
description: Extremely sharp scents of petrol and gasoline exhaust are cut with bright citrus on this very cool climate Riesling, which was once planted widely in the Sta. Rita Hills. Lemongrass, lime zest and toasted coconut flake combine for an interesting palate, and this wine should age quite well.

title: Bollig-Lehnert 2013 Flagfish Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Delicate and racy, yet intensely penetrating with peach and lemon flavors, this ...
description: Delicate and racy, yet intensely penetrating with peach and lemon flavors, this off-dry Riesling achieves satisfying balance. The palate is smooth and finishes long on a sultry smoke tone.

title: Peter Nicolay 2013 Wehlener Klosterberg Off-Dry Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Brighter and sunnier than many of its peers from this cool, difficult ...
description: Brighter and sunnier than many of its peers from this cool, difficult vintage, this off-dry Riesling boasts an easy tangerine acidity. The palate is still zesty and spry, while saffron-scented apples and pears linger on the finish.

title: Standing Sun 2012 Riesling (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: A bit more oxidized style of Riesling from Buellton-based winemaker John Wright, ...
description: A bit more oxidized style of Riesling from Buellton-based winemaker John Wright, this delivers aromas of baking bread, roasted almonds and toast with marmalade. The rich yet lively wine relies more on tannins than tart acidity, with flavors of honey-laced brioche and seared marshmallow.

title: Dr. Pauly Bergweiler 2013 Noble House Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: While the nose on this off-dry Riesling is lean and mineral, the ...
description: While the nose on this off-dry Riesling is lean and mineral, the palate is lusciously ripe, brimming with peach and mango flavors. A streak of high-pitched acidity shakes up the midpalate and lingers through the finish.

title: Prinz Salm 2013 Two Princes Riesling (Rheinhessen)
excerpt: Intense citrus notes perfume this bright, sunny off-dry Riesling. Yellow peach and ...
description: Intense citrus notes perfume this bright, sunny off-dry Riesling. Yellow peach and pear flavors are rich and ripe on the palate, but balanced by a firm strike of lemon acidity. Finishes moderately long.

title: Dr. Loosen 2013 Bernkasteler Lay Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: A touch of caramel adds ripeness to sweet honeydew and tangerine flavors ...
description: A touch of caramel adds ripeness to sweet honeydew and tangerine flavors in this taut, tight wine. Off dry in style, yet searing with high-octane acidity, it bestows a kiss of sweet stone-fruit to brighten the moderately long finish.

title: Firesteed 2010 Riesling (Oregon)
excerpt: Done in a ripe and fleshy style, this vintage is in its ...
description: Done in a ripe and fleshy style, this vintage is in its prime drinking window. Mixed peach, lemon, stone and citrus fruit, along with a slice of honeydew melon, make this a mouth-filling, all-purpose Riesling, with barely perceptible sweetness.

title: Nebel 2013 Riesling (Rheinhessen)
excerpt: A spray of floral perfume accents delicate notes of lemon, lime and ...
description: A spray of floral perfume accents delicate notes of lemon, lime and dusty mineral on this sprightly off-dry Riesling. Citrus flavors punch through the palate, highlighted by a stream of tongue-tingling acidity. The finish is crisp and cutting.

title: Chehalem 2013 Corral Creek Vineyards Riesling (Chehalem Mountains)
excerpt: Though generally done in a dry style, the Corral Creek is rarely ...
description: Though generally done in a dry style, the Corral Creek is rarely if ever this tart, especially with alcohol so low. Acidic and bright, the fruit centers on green apples, lightly spiced.

title: Leonard Kreusch 2012 Estate Bottled Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Smoky mineral tones add complexity to this pert, off-dry Riesling. White grapefruit ...
description: Smoky mineral tones add complexity to this pert, off-dry Riesling. White grapefruit and quince flavors are piercingly tart on the palate, highlighted by a stream of high-toned lime acidity on the finish.

title: Chehalem 2013 Ridegcrest Vineyards Wind Ridge Block Riesling (Ribbon Ridge)
excerpt: Tart apple and citrus flavors abound, with suggestions of both flesh and ...
description: Tart apple and citrus flavors abound, with suggestions of both flesh and skin. The residual sugar is 11 g/L but does not show as detectable sweetness. Refreshing, tangy and finishing with a clear minerality, this is Riesling on the green side of ripeness.

title: Contempo NV Riesling (Rheinhessen)
excerpt: Intense grapefruit and pineapple aromas mingle with saffron and spice in this ...
description: Intense grapefruit and pineapple aromas mingle with saffron and spice in this punchy off-dry Riesling. The palate is satisfying and concentrated with juicy citrus flavor, while hints of crushed stone lend elegance to the finish.

title: Dr. H. Thanisch (Erben Thanisch) 2013 Bernkasteler Badstube Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Wisps of smoke and crushed stones lend complexity to fresh apple and ...
description: Wisps of smoke and crushed stones lend complexity to fresh apple and pear notes on this delicate, lace-textured wine. Electric lemon-line acid strikes a mean chord on the palate, but hints of sweet peach and apricot even out the finish.

title: Landshut 2013 Riesling (Rheinhessen)
excerpt: Accented with faint hints of lime and lemon, the nose on this ...
description: Accented with faint hints of lime and lemon, the nose on this off-dry Riesling is largely neutral. The palate, by contrast, is surprisingly luscious in sunny Meyer lemon and nectarine flavors. It finishes moderately long, with a streak of spine-tingling acidity.

title: Heinz Eifel 2013 Shine Riesling (Rheinhessen)
excerpt: Delicate scents of lemon and lime touched with bramble and earth waft ...
description: Delicate scents of lemon and lime touched with bramble and earth waft from this off-dry Riesling. The palate is succulent and juicy with yellow peach and tangerine flavors, but marked by a tough edge of acidity that lingers through the finish.

title: Gustav Adolf Schmitt 2012 Fisherman Riesling (Rheinhessen)
excerpt: Brisk and elegant, this wine has an alpine feel that accentuates its ...
description: Brisk and elegant, this wine has an alpine feel that accentuates its lean, cutting profile. The palate is a tad austere, highlighting minerality and acidity over fruit, but a touch of white grapefruit peeks through nicely on the finish.

title: P.J. Valckenberg 2012 Riesling (Rheinhessen)
excerpt: Stone and steel linger throughout this biting, citrus-tinged Riesling. Off dry in ...
description: Stone and steel linger throughout this biting, citrus-tinged Riesling. Off dry in style, juicy white grapefruit flavor penetrates on the palate, finishing crisp and clean.

title: Weingut Georg Albrecht Schneider 2013 Vom Rotliegenden Red Soil Trocken Riesling (Rheinhessen)
excerpt: Spine-tingling lime and lemon notes dominate this light-footed dry Riesling. Refreshingly mineral ...
description: Spine-tingling lime and lemon notes dominate this light-footed dry Riesling. Refreshingly mineral on the palate, it finishes brisk and clean.

title: Dr. Fischer 2013 Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Brisk and puckery with tart green-apple and lime notes, this is an ...
description: Brisk and puckery with tart green-apple and lime notes, this is an invigorating, slightly bracing, off-dry Riesling. Enjoy now for its brash, brisk style.

title: Binz 2013 Nackenheimer Kabinett Trocken Riesling (Rheinhessen)
excerpt: Ripe honeydew and peach notes lend a welcome touch of richness to ...
description: Ripe honeydew and peach notes lend a welcome touch of richness to this dry, slightly stark Riesling. The midpalate bristles with acidity, finishing tart and citrusy.

title: Dr. Pauly Bergweiler 2013 Bernkasteler Badstube Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Smoke and earth tones add funk to the nose of this delicate ...
description: Smoke and earth tones add funk to the nose of this delicate off-dry wine. The palate is pristine with crisp white peach and apricot flavors, but biting acidity and a bitter lemon-pith note leave the finish taut.

title: Domaine Zind-Humbrecht 2012 Brand Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: One of the great vineyard sites of Turckheim, Brand has produced this ...
description: One of the great vineyard sites of Turckheim, Brand has produced this exquisitely balanced wine. Its fruits showcase intense acidity with citrus, pink grapefruit followed by pineapple crispness. Overall, the tight texture is still in charge, giving a mineral, textured character. So it does need to age; drink from 2019.

title: Domaine Ostertag 2012 Muenchberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: Intense and rich, this is impressive, ripe and full-bodied. It has a ...
description: Intense and rich, this is impressive, ripe and full-bodied. It has a great texture with the steeliness of Riesling embedded in the richly fruity, concentrated floral and white fruit flavors. Now at the stage where it is good to drink for its fruitiness, it has much more to come. Best to wait until 2018.

title: Domaines Schlumberger 2010 Kessler Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: With its few years bottle aging, this is developing into a fabulous ...
description: With its few years bottle aging, this is developing into a fabulous wine. From one of the top Grand Cru vineyards in southern Alsace, it has richness while still preserving a light touch that brings out acidity and tight fruitiness. To contrast, the mineral texture adds a tense factor, very crisp and allowing the wine to age further. Drink until 2025.

title: Domaine Zind-Humbrecht 2012 Herrenweg de Turckheim Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Tight and nervy, this is a steely, mineral, dry and complex wine. ...
description: Tight and nervy, this is a steely, mineral, dry and complex wine. It is packed with crisp citrus, lemon juice squeezed over apple, and has a steely texture to match. It looks to the long term for aging. Drink from 2018.

title: Boeckel 2012 Wiebelsberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: While it is dry, this wine is so rich that it has ...
description: While it is dry, this wine is so rich that it has a honeyed, sweet character. It is very full, ripe, full of grapefruit, white stone fruits and tight Meyer lemon. It is still in its youthful fruity phase and needs to age. Drink from 2018.

title: Josmeyer 2012 Le Dragon Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Named for the dragon that supposedly fought against the sun in the ...
description: Named for the dragon that supposedly fought against the sun in the Brand Grand Cru vineyard, this ripe wine is full of fruit and has a dense, tense structure that will need time to reach potential. It is driven by its mineral texture as much as the fruit, Drink from 2017.

title: Boeckel 2012 Zotzenberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: Mineral, closed and very tight, this is currently the epitome of young, ...
description: Mineral, closed and very tight, this is currently the epitome of young, potentially very fine Riesling. Citrus, pineapple and apricots are just hints among the steely, tense acidity and tangy structure. Drink from 2018.

title: Domaine Schoffit 2011 Sommerberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: The wine is rich, full in the mouth but finely balanced. It ...
description: The wine is rich, full in the mouth but finely balanced. It has retained plenty of freshness, the white fruits aromatic, mineral and stylish. The ripeness gives an opulent style that leaves a powerful aftertaste. Drink from 2018.

title: Domaine Zinck 2010 Eichberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: With the first hints of maturity on the nose, this is already ...
description: With the first hints of maturity on the nose, this is already a rounded and steely wine. The fruit shows as spiced apples and black currants, cut with intense citrus. But the fruit is giving way to a very precise, crisp and nervy wine that could still age further. For its best, drink from 2018.

title: Gustave Lorentz 2008 Altenberg de Bergheim Grand Cru Vieilles Vignes Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: This late release, aging for five years, has produced a majestic wine. ...
description: This late release, aging for five years, has produced a majestic wine. Its breadth of flavor, with ripe fruits as well as intense structure, are gently transitioning from the first flush of youth to a more mature character. Intensely textured, tight, ready to spring, it shows the beauty of maturing Riesling. Drink now, although it will age many more years.

title: Domaine Ostertag 2012 Heissenberg Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Rounded, rich and full in the mouth, this offers swathes of flowery, ...
description: Rounded, rich and full in the mouth, this offers swathes of flowery, aromatic fruit that is still young, still in its primary stage. With just a hint of steely texture, the wine does have structure and aging potential. For now, it is generous and delicious.

title: Boeckel 2012 Brandluft Vieilles Vignes Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: A parcel of old vines in the Brandluft vineyard gives the typical ...
description: A parcel of old vines in the Brandluft vineyard gives the typical concentration and intense minerality to be expected from low yields. The wine is perfumed, with a bone-dry texture and melon and orange fruitiness. It needs to age, so drink from 2017.

title: Domaine Zinck 2011 Pfersigberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: Floral aromas lead into a rich, not quite dry wine that is ...
description: Floral aromas lead into a rich, not quite dry wine that is beautifully ripe and perfumed. It is rounded and opulent while preserving the steely, mineral texture. Still young, it demands aging. Drink from 2017.

title: Jean-Marc Bernhard 2012 Wineck-Schlossberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: Still young, the wine is very mineral, smoky and tight, with considerable ...
description: Still young, the wine is very mineral, smoky and tight, with considerable structure and concentration. The apple and citrus fruits are attractive, although almost a sideshow compared with the texture of the wine. Drink from 2017.

title: Joseph Fritsch 2013 Schlossberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: The wine is crisp, packed with grapefruit flavors and with a tight ...
description: The wine is crisp, packed with grapefruit flavors and with a tight texture that suggests it could age. A tang and a steely acidity comes in behind the fruit and offers an austere aftertaste. Drink from 2017.

title: Savage Grace 2013 Underwood Mountain Riesling (Columbia Gorge (WA))
excerpt: An aromatically vibrant wine with notes of slate, peach, apricot and citrus. ...
description: An aromatically vibrant wine with notes of slate, peach, apricot and citrus. It drinks off dry, with exquisitely balanced acidity and a lot of depth and richness to the fruit flavors. Impressive stuff.

title: Domaine Pfister 2010 Engelberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: This is still young, a tight wine with nervy acidity and very ...
description: This is still young, a tight wine with nervy acidity and very fresh fruitiness. A strongly mineral character from the chalk soil adds to the sense of dry, steeliness. It still needs to age, so drink from 2017.

title: Domaine Allimant-Laugner 2012 Praelatenberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: Soft and rich, this warm, rounded wine has concentrated fruitiness along with ...
description: Soft and rich, this warm, rounded wine has concentrated fruitiness along with a more tense mineral structure. Its pink grapefruit, ripe melon and zesty lemon flavors combine to give a wine that is only just setting out. Drink from 2018.

title: Domaine Zind-Humbrecht 2012 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This concentrated wine has weight and richness while also showing a firm, ...
description: This concentrated wine has weight and richness while also showing a firm, very mineral and tight texture. The green fruits, aromatic red currants and tangy zest are partnered by young and exuberant freshness. It needs a few years to show its paces, so drink from 2018.

title: Domaine Jean Sipp 2011 Vieilles Vignes Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: The wine is intense, full in the mouth and rich. The warm, ...
description: The wine is intense, full in the mouth and rich. The warm, concentrated character brings out both ripe fruits and minerality. The result is a textured wine, tangy and citrus-driven, that also has broad yellow fruits along with the final acidity. Drink from 2016.

title: Jean Becker 2012 Froehn Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: A steely, crisp and mineral Riesling from the Froehn vineyard in Zellenberg. ...
description: A steely, crisp and mineral Riesling from the Froehn vineyard in Zellenberg. Great potential awaits in its tight aromatic fruits and zesty acidity. It offers structure, flavors of citrus and white currants from the organic grapes and a texture that demands aging. Drink from 2017.

title: Cave de Kientzheim-Kaysersberg 2012 Anne de K Schlossberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: With its firm structure and strongly steely tendencies, this wine will repay ...
description: With its firm structure and strongly steely tendencies, this wine will repay aging. Orange citrus is woven into the texture of the wine, showing acidity and a taut, tangy aftertaste. It will need time to come together, so drink from 2018.

title: Dutton-Goldfield 2013 Chileno Valley Riesling (Marin County)
excerpt: This dry, subtle and elegant Riesling is an exception to the rule ...
description: This dry, subtle and elegant Riesling is an exception to the rule of semisweet and obviously fruity California versions. It smells like crisp apples and white peaches, tastes quietly rich but with spicy, earthy accents, and has a pleasantly thick texture.

title: Domaines Schlumberger 2011 Saering Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: The wine has a golden character, warm and ripe. Its rich fruits ...
description: The wine has a golden character, warm and ripe. Its rich fruits bring out honeydew melon and pineapple as well as crisper orange zest. The structure and the rich texture are already all there, although it will develop well until 2020.

title: Keuka Spring 2013 Semi Sweet Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Rich, ripe yellow cherries and honeysuckle waft from this luxuriously honeyed off-dry ...
description: Rich, ripe yellow cherries and honeysuckle waft from this luxuriously honeyed off-dry Riesling. A sweet tangerine flavor is densely concentrated on the palate, yet the wine is sprightly and zesty in mouthfeel. An elegant floral spray extends the long, lingering finish.

title: Cave Spring 2012 VQA Riesling (Niagara Peninsula)
excerpt: This is an aromatic dazzler, with notes of herb, apricot, orange peel ...
description: This is an aromatic dazzler, with notes of herb, apricot, orange peel and dried flowers. It drinks off dry, with rich, mineral stone-fruit flavors and balanced acidity. Pair with curried shrimp.

title: Jean-Marc Bernhard 2012 Vieilles Vignes Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: The fruit from 40-year-old vines is reticent about showing its character at ...
description: The fruit from 40-year-old vines is reticent about showing its character at this young stage. However, in two to three years, the rich and concentrated citrus flavors and steely structure will take over and reveal a dense wine that is aromatic as well as serious. Drink from 2016.

title: Henri Schoenheitz 2010 Holder Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Naturally low yields in a parcel within the Holder vineyard give concentration ...
description: Naturally low yields in a parcel within the Holder vineyard give concentration and great depth of flavor. The wine is still dominated by acidity, tense texture and a strongly steely character. Dry, nervy, needing to age, the wine has potential. Drink from 2017.

title: Cave Spring 2011 Cave Spring Vineyard Estate Bottled VQA Riesling (Beamsville Bench)
excerpt: A detailed wine, with notes of wet slate, apricot and pear alongside ...
description: A detailed wine, with notes of wet slate, apricot and pear alongside high toned spices. It drinks off dry, with ripe stone-fruit flavors balanced by crisp acidity, leading to a lingering finish.

title: Henri Schoenheitz 2012 Lindenberg Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: The granite soil of the Lindenberg vineyard produces a wine that is ...
description: The granite soil of the Lindenberg vineyard produces a wine that is steely, tight, packed with as much acidity and mineral texture as fruit. It has layers of acidity and fruit over this firm, young structure. This complex wine needs to age, so drink from 2017.

title: Lamoreaux Landing 2013 Semi-Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Tangerine peel and citrus blossom are fragrant and fresh on this flirtatious ...
description: Tangerine peel and citrus blossom are fragrant and fresh on this flirtatious off-dry Riesling. Straightforward and juicy in style, the palate is saturated with peach and apricot nectar. Zesty lime and touches of mineral add lift to the finish.

title: Biecher & Schaal 2013 Schlossberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: This complex wine has a touch of sweetness allowing the fruit to ...
description: This complex wine has a touch of sweetness allowing the fruit to be ready to drink sooner. At the same time, it has structure, strong minerality and a floral, fragrant character. Drink from 2015 or wait for the full effect until 2018.

title: Domaine Zind-Humbrecht 2012 Heimbourg Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: There is a golden, honeyed feel to this ripe and full wine. ...
description: There is a golden, honeyed feel to this ripe and full wine. It has spice, rich tropical fruits and a toasty character. An opulent texture gives the wine a powerful style, an embodiment of ripe Alsace Riesling.

title: Hubert Meyer 2013 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This is crisp, tight, still young. Hedgerow flower aromas are sustained in ...
description: This is crisp, tight, still young. Hedgerow flower aromas are sustained in the fresh character of the wine. Zesty lemon shines while the steely, tight texture is still closed and waiting to blossom. Drink from 2015.

title: La Cave des Vignerons de Pfaffenheim 2012 Steingold Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: A blend from different Grand Cru vineyards has resulted in this fresh ...
description: A blend from different Grand Cru vineyards has resulted in this fresh and still-young wine. It has perfumed acidity, crisp acidity and a bone-dry character. Needing to age, it is packed with white fruits and flavored with summer flowers. Drink from 2016.

title: Swiftwater Cellars 2013 No. 9 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Quince, starfruit and white melon share the spotlight here, with acidity and ...
description: Quince, starfruit and white melon share the spotlight here, with acidity and sugar in balance, yielding a slightly off-dry wine. Forward and fresh, it brings in highlights of lemon tea as it sails across the palate, and could do nicely for a lunch of cold whitefish or trout.

title: Helfrich 2012 Steinklotz Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: Already showing signs of the kerosene aromas that comes from aging Riesling, ...
description: Already showing signs of the kerosene aromas that comes from aging Riesling, this is a tangy, aromatic and not quite dry wine with white peach flavors and a zesty aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Henri Schoenheitz 2012 Herrenreben Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This is a single-vineyard wine, one of a range of three Rieslings ...
description: This is a single-vineyard wine, one of a range of three Rieslings from Schoenheitz. It is attractively perfumed with white flowers and fruit blossom. The acidity and zesty texture balance the off-dry flavors. Crisp apples add to the fresh-while-structured character. Drink now, although it will be better from 2016.

title: Keuka Lake Vineyards 2012 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Whiffs of pine forest lend a pristine alpine feel to this bold ...
description: Whiffs of pine forest lend a pristine alpine feel to this bold dry Riesling. The palate is concentrated, with sun-streaked tones of pineapple and peach balanced by bristling lemon-lime acidity. The finish is moderately long with a lingering honeycomb note.

title: Biecher & Schaal 2013 Rangen de Thann Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: A fragrant, fruity wine from the southernmost of the Alsace Grand Crus. ...
description: A fragrant, fruity wine from the southernmost of the Alsace Grand Crus. While it misses some of the grandeur of other wines from this vineyard, it has attractive citrus and apple fruits and a hint of minerality. The wine will age, so wait until 2016.

title: Biecher & Schaal 2013 Sommerberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: Surprisingly rounded for a young wine from a Grand Cru, this is ...
description: Surprisingly rounded for a young wine from a Grand Cru, this is fruity, fresh and ripe. It offers white fruits and a tang of marmalade orange peel, and displays the minerality of the vineyard. Drink from 2015.

title: Domaine Zinck 2013 Portrait Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: While the wine is bone-dry, its soft character keeps it from being ...
description: While the wine is bone-dry, its soft character keeps it from being too steely and tight. Aromatic and fresh, it has delicious, juicy apple and green plum flavors. Drink from 2015.

title: Lakewood 2013 3Generations Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Candlewax and honeycomb melt into notes of lemon rind, orange blossom and ...
description: Candlewax and honeycomb melt into notes of lemon rind, orange blossom and potpourri on this aromatic dry Riesling. Lemon-lime acidity is bracing on the palate, but layers of honey, tangerine and black tea give the finish length and complexity.

title: La Cave des Vignerons de Pfaffenheim 2012 Pfaff Tradition Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: With immediately attractive white flower aromas, this is a delicate, fruity and ...
description: With immediately attractive white flower aromas, this is a delicate, fruity and lightly textured wine. The trio of flavors includes citrus, lime zest and squeezed pink grapefruit, with fresh juicy acidity that gives a clean, bright aftertaste.

title: Waterbrook 2013 Reserve Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: A vibrantly aromatic wine with notes of apricot, tangerine and white flower. ...
description: A vibrantly aromatic wine with notes of apricot, tangerine and white flower. It drinks medium sweet with abundant jasmine and stone fruit notes that linger on the finish.

title: Benmarl 2012 Semi-Dry Riesling (Seneca Lake)
excerpt: While the nose is a bit muted, with faint hints of pressed ...
description: While the nose is a bit muted, with faint hints of pressed apple and honey, the palate of this bristling semi-dry Riesling is bright in Meyer lemon, tangerine and fresh apple flavors. Finishes crisp and mineral.
