title: Cave de Beblenheim 2012 Heimberger Vieilles Vignes Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: A perfumed wine that is spicy as well as crisp. It is ...
description: A perfumed wine that is spicy as well as crisp. It is full of ripe apples and hedgerow fruits, with a spring in its texture and a bright acidity at the end. The aftertaste shows more of the spiciness as well as a touch of typical Riesling steeliness.

title: Domaine Jean-Luc Mader 2013 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Totally refreshing as well as structured, this offers great acidity, lime and ...
description: Totally refreshing as well as structured, this offers great acidity, lime and grapefruit flavors, crisp and bright texture and a lively aftertaste. Clean and fruity, this will be good to drink from 2015.

title: Swedish Hill 2013 Blue Waters Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Dusty crushed stone notes accent fresh lemon, white peach and blossom on ...
description: Dusty crushed stone notes accent fresh lemon, white peach and blossom on this delicate semi-dry Riesling. The palate is forward and fruity, supporting ripe tangerine and mango flavors, but a touch of saffron and pollen lends earthiness to the finish.

title: Biecher & Schaal 2013 Kastelberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: Still young, this is a fruity, soft wine. It has some floral ...
description: Still young, this is a fruity, soft wine. It has some floral character, layers of lemon juice and aromatic acidity. It seems to miss the power of a Grand Cru, instead being an easy, fresh wine to drink from 2015.

title: Keuka Lake Vineyards 2012 Falling Man Vineyard Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Mint and fresh, leafy notes lend a cool, green tone to pressed ...
description: Mint and fresh, leafy notes lend a cool, green tone to pressed apple and pear flavors in this dry, medium-bodied Riesling. Fruit flavors are demure in concentration, but piercing lemon acidity makes it refreshing and crisp.

title: Swedish Hill 2013 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: While the nose is exuberant and tropical with swirls of mango and ...
description: While the nose is exuberant and tropical with swirls of mango and pineapple, the palate of this dry Riesling is surprisingly dainty. Crisp pear and tangerine flavors are refreshing and easy drinking through a brisk finish.

title: Fox Run 2013 Silvan Riesling (Seneca Lake)
excerpt: Whiffs of smoke and dried dill lend a savory, earthy feel to ...
description: Whiffs of smoke and dried dill lend a savory, earthy feel to this Frenck oak fermented Riesling. The oak treatment lends broadness to pressed apple and pear flavors, but the finish is brisk.

title: Joseph Fritsch 2013 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Joseph Fritsch produces wines in a modern, crisp and clean style. This ...
description: Joseph Fritsch produces wines in a modern, crisp and clean style. This Riesling with its bright fruits and lively acidity fits that pattern. It has the freshest acidity, sliced green apple flavors and a tight, tangy aftertaste.

title: Kuentz-Bas 2012 Tradition Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This is a delicate, fruity and very fragrant wine. It is ready ...
description: This is a delicate, fruity and very fragrant wine. It is ready to drink, with its light and crisp acidity and shot of steel in the texture. The wine is fresh and refreshing.

title: Keuka Lake Vineyards 2012 Eastside Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Wisps of smoke and nuts add savoriness to bright lemon and peach ...
description: Wisps of smoke and nuts add savoriness to bright lemon and peach flavors in this dry, full-bodied Riesling. The palate lacks robust flavor concentration, but balances voluminous body with striking lemon-lime acidity. Finishes moderately long.

title: Wolfberger 2013 Signature Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Not quite dry, this wine is all about fruit. The fresh citrus ...
description: Not quite dry, this wine is all about fruit. The fresh citrus character cuts through the mineral texture and gives a tangy, zesty feel. Wait until mid-2015 before drinking.

title: Helfrich 2013 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: The wine is crisp, lightly fruity with good acidity and a bright, ...
description: The wine is crisp, lightly fruity with good acidity and a bright, tight texture. Apple and lime juice fruit flavors give a fresh, crisp aftertaste. Drink from 2015.

title: Heron Hill 2013 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Delicate notes of bramble and stem waft from nose to finish on ...
description: Delicate notes of bramble and stem waft from nose to finish on this dry, medium-bodied Riesling. Tart lemon and crunchy pear keep the palate quaffable and crisp.

title: Tousey 2012 Dry Riesling (Hudson River Region)
excerpt: Hints of pine frond lend a foresty feel to this dry, zesty ...
description: Hints of pine frond lend a foresty feel to this dry, zesty Riesling. Light on its feet and delicately concentrated in flavors of fresh apple and pear, it finishes briskly on a dusty, stony mineral note.

title: Jean Becker 2013 Hagenschlauf Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Soft and off-dry in character, this is a fruity, light-hearted Riesling. Bright ...
description: Soft and off-dry in character, this is a fruity, light-hearted Riesling. Bright creamed apple and pear flavors are cut with refreshing acidity. The wine is young, although ready to drink.

title: Cave de Kientzheim-Kaysersberg 2012 Anne de K Patergarten Old Vines Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This is a soft and rounded wine. Just off dry, it has ...
description: This is a soft and rounded wine. Just off dry, it has apple and pear fruits with balancing acidity. Everything is in moderation, giving a wine that is drinkable now with a bright aftertaste.

title: Vieil Armand 2013 Tradition Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Lemon and summer flower aromas set the scene for this fresh and ...
description: Lemon and summer flower aromas set the scene for this fresh and attractive wine. It is light and bright, dry while also fruity. Acidity and a crisp texture give it a lively aftertaste.

title: Louis Guntrum 2012 Oppenheim Herrenberg Auslese Riesling (Rheinhessen)
excerpt: Dusty, earthy, soil and mineral notes lend complexity to sprightly lemon and ...
description: Dusty, earthy, soil and mineral notes lend complexity to sprightly lemon and honey aromas on this sweet, concentrated Riesling. The palate reverberates with tangy citrus flavors that cap off on a lingering kiss of honeysuckle.

title: Dr. H. Thanisch (Erben Thanisch) 2012 Berncasteler Doctor Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Scents of honey and freshly pressed apples waft from this delicate sweet ...
description: Scents of honey and freshly pressed apples waft from this delicate sweet Riesling. Bright, sunny peach flavor dominates the palate, but is pierced with a startling vein of lemon acidity. Finishes a savory with lingering notes of pollen and spice.

title: Dr. H. Thanisch (Erben Thanisch) 2012 Berncasteler Doctor Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Dusty mineral notes accent aromas of fresh lemon and pear on this ...
description: Dusty mineral notes accent aromas of fresh lemon and pear on this racy, light-footed Riesling. The palate is sweet with ripe grapefruit and Meyer lemon flavors, but touched with earthy hints of pollen and saffron that linger on the finish.

title: Dr. Heidemanns-Bergweiler 2013 Bernkasteler Badstube Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Zesty tangerine and lemon peels accent citrus-blossom aromas on this pert, light-bodied ...
description: Zesty tangerine and lemon peels accent citrus-blossom aromas on this pert, light-bodied Riesling. Off dry in style, the palate showcases layers of sweet yellow peach and apricot dusted with earthy pollen and saffron. A shock of pineapple acidity extends the finish.

title: Dr. H. Thanisch (Erben Thanisch) 2012 Bernkasteler Badstube Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Pristine apple and lemon aromas are glazed with honey on this sprightly, ...
description: Pristine apple and lemon aromas are glazed with honey on this sprightly, fresh sweet Riesling. The palate gushes with juicy nectarine and peach flavors, but maintains brisk composure from start to finish.

title: Dr. Hermann 2012 From the Slate Off Dry Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Delicate whiffs of orange blossom and honeycomb scent this slightly off-dry Riesling. ...
description: Delicate whiffs of orange blossom and honeycomb scent this slightly off-dry Riesling. The palate is ripe with honey and peach, but elegantly balanced with lime acidity and a lingering touch of crushed-stone minerality.

title: Friedrich-Wilhelm-Gymnasium 2012 Fritz Willi Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Earthy aromas of soil and petrol blow off to reveal prettier notes ...
description: Earthy aromas of soil and petrol blow off to reveal prettier notes of yellow cherry and honeycomb on this elegant, delicately nuanced Riesling. Dry in style yet delicate in body, it balances lush stone-fruit flavor with elegant streaks of lime and crushed minerals.

title: Dr. Heidemanns-Bergweiler 2013 Bernkasteler alte Badstube am Doctorberg Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Wild, tropical fruit aromas are marked with saffron and pollen on the ...
description: Wild, tropical fruit aromas are marked with saffron and pollen on the nose of this zingy, extroverted Riesling. Off dry in style, the palate is thirst quenching with sunny tangerine and peach flavors lifted by a vein of lemon acidity. Finishes moderately long on a sweet, honeyed note

title: Bollig-Lehnert 2012 Trittenheimer Apotheke Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: A deep vein of smoke and mineral tones lend a stately, savory ...
description: A deep vein of smoke and mineral tones lend a stately, savory tone to this semi-sweet Riesling full of juicy pink grapefruit and honey flavors. Spicy, exotic saffron notes linger warmly on the finish.

title: Dr. Loosen 2012 Blue Slate Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Smoke and exotic spice notes accent ripe peach and apple aromas on ...
description: Smoke and exotic spice notes accent ripe peach and apple aromas on this sprightly off-dry Riesling. The palate reverberates with zesty white-grapefruit and lime flavor, augmented by a sunny streak of honey on the finish.

title: Lucashof 2012 Riesling (Pfalz)
excerpt: Supperripe peaches seemed to be dipped in honey on the nose of ...
description: Supperripe peaches seemed to be dipped in honey on the nose of this dry, voluptuous Riesling. Yellow cherry and plum flavors are plump and fleshy, swirled together on the palate in a viscous, almost oily, slick. Finishes elegantly with a streak of lime and minerals.

title: Dr. Loosen 2012 Erdener Treppchen Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Hints of nuts and pressed apple lend a savory tone to the ...
description: Hints of nuts and pressed apple lend a savory tone to the nose of this off-dry Riesling, but the palate is fresh and fruity with crisp peach and apricot flavors. Tingly lemon-lime acidity jolts the palate towards a long, mineral-kissed finish.

title: St. Urbans-Hof 2012 Ockfener Bockstein Erste Lage Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Whiffs of pollen, saffron and spring ramps lend a savory tone to ...
description: Whiffs of pollen, saffron and spring ramps lend a savory tone to this semi-sweet Riesling. Waxy orange-peel and tangerine flavors brighten the palate, along with a nervy streak of lemon-lime acidity on the finish.

title: Blue Fish 2012 Original Riesling (Pfalz)
excerpt: Fresh apple and pear aromas are touched with honey and saffron on ...
description: Fresh apple and pear aromas are touched with honey and saffron on this dry, easy drinking Riesling. Juicy peach and apple flavors are ripe on the palate, but fringed with a bristle of lemon zest and acid that reverberate on the finish.

title: Dr. Loosen 2012 Red Slate Dry Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Whiffs of lanolin and honey lend warmth to zesty lime aromas on ...
description: Whiffs of lanolin and honey lend warmth to zesty lime aromas on this dry, briskly structured Riesling. The palate is fresh like an alpine forest, showing delicate notes of pine frond and grass. It finishes briskly with cutting lemon and apple flavors.

title: Dr. Pauly Bergweiler 2012 Noble House Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Dusty tones of crushed rock and soil lend a savory impression to ...
description: Dusty tones of crushed rock and soil lend a savory impression to this off-dry Riesling. The palate, by contrast, is unctuously fruity, accented with sweet peach and apricot flavors. Sunny and bright, it finishes with a shower of soft Meyer-lemon acidity.

title: Leonard Kreusch 2012 Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Smoke and mineral tones lend a savoriness to flavors of pressed apples ...
description: Smoke and mineral tones lend a savoriness to flavors of pressed apples and pears on this slightly rustic Riesling. The palate is sweet and sunny with brisk apple cider flavor touched with dried sage and spice.

title: Dr. Hermann 2012 Erdener Treppchen Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Smoke and savory spice notes waft from this semi-sweet Riesling. Ripe peach ...
description: Smoke and savory spice notes waft from this semi-sweet Riesling. Ripe peach and grapefruit notes are juicy on the palate, accented by zesty lime acidity and a delicate mineral finish.

title: Reichsgraf von Kesselstatt 2012 Wiltinger Trocken Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Intense aromas of savory spice and smoke lend a mysterious tone to ...
description: Intense aromas of savory spice and smoke lend a mysterious tone to flavors of pressed apple and pear in this dry, medium-bodied Riesling. The palate is bright with lemon-lime acidity, but finishes on a dusty mineral note.

title: Poet's Leap 2013 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: One of the consistently finest Rieslings from the state, this is technically ...
description: One of the consistently finest Rieslings from the state, this is technically off dry, but feels dry given its exceptional acidity. Elegant citrus and floral aromas introduce a dense, textural midpalate. A showcase of style and panache, its layered citrus and stone fruits bring both skin and flesh flavors into focus.

title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2013 Cold Creek Vineyard Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Production has zoomed to almost 11,000 cases, but the quality remains. Deep, ...
description: Production has zoomed to almost 11,000 cases, but the quality remains. Deep, delicious flavors of melon, grapefruit and kiwi anchor the wine. The sensation of wet rocks and bracing minerality runs alongside the lip-smacking fruit. Perfectly ripe, dense and wonderfully sappy, this is a real gem.

title: Finn Hill 2013 The Gnome Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Expressively aromatic, this is sourced from the Lawrence Vineyards on the Royal ...
description: Expressively aromatic, this is sourced from the Lawrence Vineyards on the Royal Slope. It bursts from the glass with scents of body powder, lilacs and lemon oil. It gracefully weaves those accents into a rich body with floral, citrus and tree fruit flavors, rounded off with just a hint of residual sugar. Still medium dry, this is a versatile wine to sip and enjoy solo or with light picnic foods.

title: Milbrandt 2013 Traditions Evergreen Vineyard Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Sourced from an outstanding vineyard, this juicy, spicy, zesty Riesling shows terrific ...
description: Sourced from an outstanding vineyard, this juicy, spicy, zesty Riesling shows terrific balance and lively acidity. A mix of peach, green apple and Key lime fruit anchors a thoroughly refreshing wine, with just a touch of residual sugar.

title: Red Tail Ridge 2013 RTR Estate Vineyard Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Fresh and citrusy in notes of lime zest and tangerine, this is ...
description: Fresh and citrusy in notes of lime zest and tangerine, this is a juicy, concentrated off-dry Riesling. On the palate, apples and pears are tinged with honey, spice and a bracing lemon-lime acidity. Luscious in mouthfeel yet irresistibly quaffable.

title: Knapp 2013 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Lemony fresh on the nose with hints of wildflower and berry, this ...
description: Lemony fresh on the nose with hints of wildflower and berry, this juicy, off-dry Riesling is full of floral, fruity opulence. Lush with peach nectar, it finishes moderately long with a shock of lime juice and lime zest flavors.

title: 14 Hands 2013 Riesling (Washington)
excerpt: In just a few years 14 Hands Riesling production has jumped from ...
description: In just a few years 14 Hands Riesling production has jumped from around 15,000 to more than 700,000 cases. Clearly the brand is doing something that consumers love. This is a fairly dry style, with forward, fruity flavors of ripe orange, apple and apricot. The length and concentration are spot on.

title: Six Mile Creek 2012 Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Whiffs of lemon and honey brighten notes of savory pressed apples on ...
description: Whiffs of lemon and honey brighten notes of savory pressed apples on this tart, zesty Riesling. The palate is fruity with elegant tones of fresh peach and apricot, and finishes long with hints of lime and herb on the finish.

title: Glenora 2013 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Heady orange blossom and lemon zest perfume this dry yet lusciously fruity ...
description: Heady orange blossom and lemon zest perfume this dry yet lusciously fruity Riesling. The palate is richly concentrated with peach and apricot flavors, but kept on edge with cutting lime acidity. The finish lingers, with a waxy honeycomb note.

title: Maryhill 2013 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Sourced entirely from the Milbrandt vineyards, this is a riot of honey, ...
description: Sourced entirely from the Milbrandt vineyards, this is a riot of honey, tea and mint highlights, with excellent acidity and ripe tree fruits. The length and density are outstanding for this price point.

title: Alexandria Nicole 2012 Destiny Ridge Vineyard Riesling (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: One would like to see more aromatics, considering the variety, but it ...
description: One would like to see more aromatics, considering the variety, but it remains enjoyable with a lightly spritzy palate with off-dry red-apple and stone-fruit flavors. A straightforward, easy drinker.

title: Influence 2012 Riesling (New York)
excerpt: Dusty mineral tones accent bright peach and apricot flavors on this slightly ...
description: Dusty mineral tones accent bright peach and apricot flavors on this slightly off-dry Riesling. Tart lemon-lime acidity lends brightness to the palate, extending a finish flecked with dried, savory herbs.

title: Lamoreaux Landing 2013 Round Rock Vineyard Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: This pretty, aromatic Riesling is lush with cherry-blossom and berry scents that ...
description: This pretty, aromatic Riesling is lush with cherry-blossom and berry scents that mingle lusciously into layers of wax and lanolin. By contrast, the palate is crisp and bracing with tones of lemon and lime acidity.

title: Obelisco Estate 2013 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Sourced from the Dineen vineyard, this is unusually tart, almost sour, and ...
description: Sourced from the Dineen vineyard, this is unusually tart, almost sour, and feels thin on the palate. Some citrus flavors combine with a light touch of body powder, but overall it comes through as a very racy, light white wine.

title: Fulkerson 2012 Semi-Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Smoke and herb waft from this savory, apple-tinged Riesling. The palate is ...
description: Smoke and herb waft from this savory, apple-tinged Riesling. The palate is straightforward in style, with pleasant apple and pear flavors highlighted by bright, lemony acidity.

title: Seneca Shore NV Amulet Semi-Dry Riesling (Seneca Lake)
excerpt: Initial hints of earth and dust blow off with aeration, revealing rustic ...
description: Initial hints of earth and dust blow off with aeration, revealing rustic apple and pear aromas on this semi-dry Riesling. Ruddy pressed-apple flavors get a jolt of freshness on the palate with a squirt of lemon-lime acidity.

title: Trisaetum 2013 Coast Range Estate Dry Riesling (Yamhill-Carlton District)
excerpt: This offers a hint of honey in the nose, then moves into ...
description: This offers a hint of honey in the nose, then moves into a fresh palate loaded with a full range of yellow fruits. The acidity is spot on, and a suggestion of wet cement adds a hint of mineral to the lengthy finish. Drink now through 2024.

title: Kramer 2012 Yamhill Vineyard Riesling (Yamhill-Carlton District)
excerpt: Sourced from vines approaching 30 years of age, this is quite dry ...
description: Sourced from vines approaching 30 years of age, this is quite dry and complex, with plenty of dry extract. Scented with citrus and stone fruits, flavors run more toward apple and pear. The length is impressive.

title: Enjingi 2006 Rajnski Rizling Kasna Berba Suho Riesling (Kutjevo)
excerpt: This white is medium straw colored, with aromas of dried apricot and ...
description: This white is medium straw colored, with aromas of dried apricot and canned peaches. In the mouth, there are lush flavors of fresh and dried stone fruits, followed by a clean, balanced finish.

title: Sutcliffe 2012 Riesling (Colorado)
excerpt: Aromas of quince, piecrust and apricot transfer onto the palate, which feels ...
description: Aromas of quince, piecrust and apricot transfer onto the palate, which feels soft, round and intense. Notes of apricot and white strawberry cobbler mark the slightly off-dry finish.

title: Carlson Creek 2012 Sweet Adeline Riesling (Arizona)
excerpt: Silky and easygoing on the palate, this comes with slightly sweet flavors ...
description: Silky and easygoing on the palate, this comes with slightly sweet flavors of shaved apples, pears and tropical fruits.

title: Solminer 2013 Riesling (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: Chalk, apricot honey and wisps of gasoline lead the aroma profile on ...
description: Chalk, apricot honey and wisps of gasoline lead the aroma profile on this wine from electronic music DJ David deLaski and his wife, Anna. The couple have been making wine since 2012 with the help of Steve Clifton (of Brewer-Clifton & Palmina wines). On the palate, there is strong mandarin orange-driven acidity and remnants of the chalkiness, which together should give the wine aging potential. Drink today or buy a case and try every year to track what will be an insightful evolution.

title: Tempus Cellars 2013 Evergreen Vineyard Riesling (Ancient Lakes)
excerpt: An aromatic wine with abundant notes of ripe white peach, apricot, mineral ...
description: An aromatic wine with abundant notes of ripe white peach, apricot, mineral and flowers. It drinks off dry (10.7 g/L residual sugar) with a pleasing sense of tension between the acid and stone fruit flavors leading to a long, persistent finish.

title: Sheldrake Point 2013 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: While buoyantly fruity with notes of ripe peach, apricot and melon, this ...
description: While buoyantly fruity with notes of ripe peach, apricot and melon, this dry, delicately framed Riesling also has an intensely mineral character. On the palate, a shower of crushed stone and lime  acidity pierces through a long, lingering finish.

title: Samson 2012 Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Although slightly off dry, it retains excellent tension and minerality. Pear, peach ...
description: Although slightly off dry, it retains excellent tension and minerality. Pear, peach and pineapple fruit flavors combine in an elegant and long-lasting wine.

title: Hazlitt 1852 Vineyards 2012 Homestead Reserve Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Intensely mineral on the nose with aromas of wet granite and steel, ...
description: Intensely mineral on the nose with aromas of wet granite and steel, this delicate dry Riesling builds in floral, fruity exuberance on the palate. Fleshy and ripe with white peach and honeydew flavors, it finishes long with hints of zesty lime pith.

title: Sheldrake Point 2012 Reserve Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: While demure on the nose with just hints of yellow peach and ...
description: While demure on the nose with just hints of yellow peach and spice, this dry, medium-bodied Riesling builds in intensity on the palate with concentrated flavors of tangerine and yellow cherry. A streak of lemon-lime acidity stretches out the finish.

title: Nine Hats 2012 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Solidly built, with a thick, heavy mouthfeel, it offers juicy citrus, pineapple ...
description: Solidly built, with a thick, heavy mouthfeel, it offers juicy citrus, pineapple and red apple fruit flavors. A nice trace of minerality comes up in the finish.

title: Silver Thread 2013 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Ripe, rich peach, pineapple and mango aromas lend a plump, opulent feel ...
description: Ripe, rich peach, pineapple and mango aromas lend a plump, opulent feel to this dry-style Riesling. The palate balances mineral intensity with streaks of peach and honeydew flavor and bristling lime acidity. Finishes long with a kiss of white blossoms.

title: Chateau Lafayette Reneau 2012 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: White blossom and honey notes perfume this intensely aromatic dry Riesling. The ...
description: White blossom and honey notes perfume this intensely aromatic dry Riesling. The medium-bodied palate is concentrated, with flavors of zesty white grapefruit, nectarine and just a shade of wet-stone minerality on the finish. An elegant quaffer.

title: Three Rivers 2013 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This off-dry Riesling brings in its residual sugar at 23 g/L, offset ...
description: This off-dry Riesling brings in its residual sugar at 23 g/L, offset with juicy acidity. Peach and papaya fruit rule the day in this forward, fruit-driven, enjoyable quaffer.

title: Treleaven 2012 Semi-Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Minerality and fruit take turns hogging the spotlight in this elegant off-dry ...
description: Minerality and fruit take turns hogging the spotlight in this elegant off-dry Riesling. While brisk and breezy on the palate, it calibrates concentrated white grapefruit and peach flavors with deep tones of wax, wet stone and steel. Finishes long with an airy wisp of blossom.

title: Hazlitt 1852 Vineyards 2012 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Fresh, zesty lime notes mingle with aromas of ripe peach and honeysuckle ...
description: Fresh, zesty lime notes mingle with aromas of ripe peach and honeysuckle on this lean, revitalizing dry Riesling. Steely, rather than overtly fruity, the palate has a honed minerality accentuated by streaks of lemon-lime acidity.

title: Cave B 2013 Riesling (Ancient Lakes)
excerpt: An aromatic wine, it has notes of tangerine and mineral. It drinks ...
description: An aromatic wine, it has notes of tangerine and mineral. It drinks medium sweet (10 g/L residual sugar), with the sugar getting just a bit out in front of the acids.

title: Fox Run 2012 Semi-Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Wisps of smoke and earth lend a dark, mysterious tone to flavors ...
description: Wisps of smoke and earth lend a dark, mysterious tone to flavors of fresh apple, melon and pineapple on this delicate off-dry Riesling. Lemon-lime acidity pierces the palate, driving a long, honey-kissed finish.

title: StoneCap 2012 Estate Grown Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Bright, tart and scented with citrus candle and peach skin, this is ...
description: Bright, tart and scented with citrus candle and peach skin, this is quite dry and feels a bit compressed. But the flavors linger and the extended finish is generous with lime-infused acidity.

title: Keuka Spring 2012 Semi Sweet Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Freshly pressed apples and pears are touched with honey on this juicy ...
description: Freshly pressed apples and pears are touched with honey on this juicy medium-sweet Riesling. Brisk, brash lemony acidity jolts the midpalate, extending to a sweet kiss of peach on the finish. Refreshing and quaffable.

title: Lucas Vineyards 2012 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Scents of freshly-pressed apple waft from this crisp, easy-drinking Riesling. Refreshingly light ...
description: Scents of freshly-pressed apple waft from this crisp, easy-drinking Riesling. Refreshingly light on its feet, with sprightly lemon and lime acidity, it finishes moderately long with delicate apple and pear flavors.

title: Swedish Hill 2012 Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Puckery lemon-lime acidity is a bright contrast to sweet honey tones on ...
description: Puckery lemon-lime acidity is a bright contrast to sweet honey tones on this medium-dry Riesling. Shades of dusty minerals lend a savory tone to ruddy apple and pear flavors on the palate.

title: McGregor 2012 Semi-Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Ripe peach and floral aromas waft from this sprightly off-dry Riesling. A ...
description: Ripe peach and floral aromas waft from this sprightly off-dry Riesling. A hint of pressed apple lends a savory feel to the mid palate, but it finishes briskly with a squirt of lemon and lime.

title: Four Degrees of Riesling 2012 2nd Degree Medium Sweet Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Lush and tropical with rich, ripe streaks of pineapple and mango, this ...
description: Lush and tropical with rich, ripe streaks of pineapple and mango, this medium-sweet Riesling is unabashedly forward and fruity, but hints of earth and dust on the midpalate lend a dark tone. Light on its feet, with a lemony finish.

title: Four Degrees of Riesling 2012 1st Degree Medium Dry Riesling (Seneca Lake)
excerpt: This off-dry Riesling boasts pretty fresh apple and floral notes on the ...
description: This off-dry Riesling boasts pretty fresh apple and floral notes on the palate, but persisting notes of dried herbs and spring ramps distract. Sprightly on the palate with delicate lemon acidity.

title: McGregor 2012 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Dusty mineral notes lend an earthy tone to this light-bodied, dry Riesling. ...
description: Dusty mineral notes lend an earthy tone to this light-bodied, dry Riesling. On the palate, flavors of savory pressed apples are accented a bristling lemon-zest astringency. Finishes briskly.

title: Hosmer 2012 Single Wheel Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Savory notes of spring ramp and clay mingle with fresh apple and ...
description: Savory notes of spring ramp and clay mingle with fresh apple and blossom on this dry, light-bodied Riesling. Earthy, savory tones extend on the palate as well, but finish briskly with a streak of lemony acidity.

title: Charles Fournier 2012 Gold Seal Vineyards Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Hints of earth and spice accent savory apple aromas on this slightly ...
description: Hints of earth and spice accent savory apple aromas on this slightly off-dry Riesling. Brisk lemon and lime acidity make it a refreshing, if straightforward, Riesling.

title: Fulkerson 2010 Reserve Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Smoke wafts amidst savory notes of apple on this dry, slightly bitter ...
description: Smoke wafts amidst savory notes of apple on this dry, slightly bitter Riesling. Crisp lemony acidity lends refreshment on the palate.

title: Fritz Haag 2012 Brauneberger Juffer Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Fresh apple and lemon aromas are subtly accented with hints of saffron ...
description: Fresh apple and lemon aromas are subtly accented with hints of saffron on this spicy-sweet Riesling full of ripe yellow-cherry and nectarine flavors. Piercing lemon-lime acidity lends a nervous, dancing quality to the palate. It finishes with a murmur of jasmine-tea astringency.

title: Salomon-Undhof 2013 Steinterrassen Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Lemony lightness, coupled with zesty spritz on the palate make this a ...
description: Lemony lightness, coupled with zesty spritz on the palate make this a refreshing white with lots of focus, linearity and whistle-clean length. Floral notes around the edges add to the intrigue.

title: Cantina Produttori San Michele Appiano 2012 Montiggl Riesling (Alto Adige)
excerpt: This dry Riesling boasts intense apricot, yellow peach, citrus and smoky mineral ...
description: This dry Riesling boasts intense apricot, yellow peach, citrus and smoky mineral sensations. The rich but polished palate is restrained by crisp acidity that leaves the mouth feeling fresh and clean.

title: St. Urbans-Hof 2012 Nik Weis Wiltinger Alte Reben Ortswein Kabinett Feinherb Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Zesty lemon and lime aromas add elegance to unctuous white peach and ...
description: Zesty lemon and lime aromas add elegance to unctuous white peach and apricot flavors on this delicate, yet remarkably complex wine. Off-dry in style, it balances a youthful fruit profile with nuanced shades of smoke and earth. Nervy citrus acidity drives a long, focused finish.

title: Steininger 2013 Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Pure, poised citrus lift combines pink and yellow grapefruit peel on the ...
description: Pure, poised citrus lift combines pink and yellow grapefruit peel on the nose, with more cushioning on the textured, concentrated palate. A stony, mineral background plays against the lively, bright acid that leaves you wanting more.

title: Fritz Haag 2012 Brauneberger Juffer Sonnenuhr Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: A whiff of pine frond lends a cool alpine touch to unctuously ...
description: A whiff of pine frond lends a cool alpine touch to unctuously ripe yellow-cherry and peach flavors on this sweet, sunny Riesling. Sprightly on the palate with shimmering touches of acidity and minerals, it finishes elegantly with a hint of lemon zest astringency.

title: Dr. Pauly Bergweiler 2012 Wehlener Sonnenuhr Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Initial impressions are smoky and savory, but the nose opens to reveal ...
description: Initial impressions are smoky and savory, but the nose opens to reveal aromas of freshly pressed apple, lemon and crushed minerals. The palate is ripe with sunny tangerine and yellow peach flavors, but moderated with piercingly tart lemon-lime acidity. Finishes moderately long on a sumptuous honey-tangerine note.

title: Johannishof 2012 Charta Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Streaks of lanolin and honeycomb lend a waxy richness to stark lime ...
description: Streaks of lanolin and honeycomb lend a waxy richness to stark lime and lemon flavors in this dry, medium-bodied wine. While slightly austere in style, intense minerality and sharp acidity create stately elegance.

title: St. Pauls 2013 Riesling (Alto Adige)
excerpt: Crisp and refreshing, it delivers honeysuckle, ripe yellow peach, pink grapefruit and ...
description: Crisp and refreshing, it delivers honeysuckle, ripe yellow peach, pink grapefruit and lemon-lime sensations. Energizing minerality and crisp acidity give a pristine finish.

title: Eichinger 2013 Vom Berg Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Restrained but concentrated fruit rules. Grapefruit peel draws you in only to ...
description: Restrained but concentrated fruit rules. Grapefruit peel draws you in only to reveal almost candied, rich orange and citron on the streamlined, linear palate.

title: Josef Jamek 2013 Ried Klaus Federspiel Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: This is reminiscent of a very well-done fruit cocktail. Grape. melon and ...
description: This is reminiscent of a very well-done fruit cocktail. Grape. melon and pear mingle amongst citrus freshness with some tropical hints of lychee mixed in. Wonderfully fruity, rounded and fresh with a zesty seam of acidity.

title: Sepp Moser 2013 Von den Terrassen Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Lifted lemon purity, cushioned by riper stone fruit, especially yellow plum and ...
description: Lifted lemon purity, cushioned by riper stone fruit, especially yellow plum and greengage, makes this a complete and super-refreshing, fruity number.

title: Schloss Vollrads 2012 Kabinett Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: The nose on this invigorating medium-sweet Riesling is fresh and green, with ...
description: The nose on this invigorating medium-sweet Riesling is fresh and green, with notes of lime zest, herbs and pine fronds. On the palate, juicy white grapefruit and orange blossom flavors are sunny and bright, finishing on a long, penetrating mineral tone. Beautifully balanced and irresistibly tasty.

title: Fritz Haag 2012 Brauneberger Trocken Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: While a tad savory on the nose with a fine dusting of ...
description: While a tad savory on the nose with a fine dusting of minerals, this medium-bodied wine is juicy with white grapefruit and nectarine flavors. Just a shade off dry in style, it boasts a soft, sunny limeade acidity that lingers on the finish.

title: Unger 2013 Stein Terrassen Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: This opens with a breezy fragrance of citrus zest and mandarin leaf, ...
description: This opens with a breezy fragrance of citrus zest and mandarin leaf, hinting at deeper, riper peach within. The palate is soft but defined; while slender, it still abounds with citrus-framed peach.

title: Buchegger 2013 Tiefenthal Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Ripe Meyer lemon hovers just beneath the surface of this wine, filling ...
description: Ripe Meyer lemon hovers just beneath the surface of this wine, filling its core with generous, refreshing but never sharp acidity. It fizzes ever so slightly, following through with appetizing zestiness and fruity freshness only to leave a long, citrus-scented aftertaste.

title: Dr. Fischer 2012 Steinbock Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: While extremely mineral from nose to finish, this dry, medium-bodied wine packs ...
description: While extremely mineral from nose to finish, this dry, medium-bodied wine packs a punch on the palate with lip-smacking peach, lime and lemon flavors. Vibrant tangerine acidity bristles long on the finish. Refreshingly and quaffable, yet satisfyingly complex.

title: Dr. Heidemanns-Bergweiler 2012 Graacher Himmelreich Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: While the nose has savory hints of walnut and dried herb amid ...
description: While the nose has savory hints of walnut and dried herb amid pressed apple and mineral tones, the palate is lavishly floral and peachy. Intense streaks of honey are offset by bracing lemon-lime acidity and a long mineral finish. Refreshing and lively.

title: Dr. Pauly Bergweiler 2012 Dry Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Whiffs of spice accent aromas of orange blossom and fresh pears on ...
description: Whiffs of spice accent aromas of orange blossom and fresh pears on this dry, richly textured wine. Ripe pineapple and tangerine flavors are unabashedly mouthwatering, but elevated by a piercing mineral focus that drives the finish. Effortless yet elegant in style.

title: Josef Schmid 2013 Vom Urgestein Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: A touch of flint, some spritz and the zesty tang of both ...
description: A touch of flint, some spritz and the zesty tang of both lemon and grapefruit peel make this racy and sleek . An addictive seam of bright acid puls through to a long, lingering and clean finish.

title: Mantlerhof 2013 Zehetnerin Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Textured richness with the flavor of juicy, yellow pears makes this a ...
description: Textured richness with the flavor of juicy, yellow pears makes this a rounded but zesty Riesling with great, lemony focus.

title: Brandl 2013 Terrassen Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Lifted lemon purity surrounded by white summer blossom make for a fresh ...
description: Lifted lemon purity surrounded by white summer blossom make for a fresh Riesling with wonderful balance, concentration and poise. It offers that quintessential acid streamline that Riesling-lovers always look for.

title: Reichsgraf von Kesselstatt 2012 Scharzofberger GL Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: While fairly neutral on the nose with aromas of lemon and pressed ...
description: While fairly neutral on the nose with aromas of lemon and pressed apple, this off-dry wine is chock full of concentrated yellow-cherry, peach and nectarine flavors. Piercing citrus acidity jolts the palate, driving a long, honey-touched finish. Refreshing and invigorating.

title: Schloss Saarstein 2012 Serrig Schloss Saarsteiner Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Softly perfumed blossoms waft amidst fresh apple and pear on this fruity, ...
description: Softly perfumed blossoms waft amidst fresh apple and pear on this fruity, floral wine. Medium-sweet in style, it balances rich nectarine and peach flavors with sprightly lemon lime acidity. Lingering mineral tones lend complexity to the finish.

title: Stadt Krems 2013 Steinterrassen Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Lifted bergamot is the almost singular, striking citrus feature here, marrying fragrant, ...
description: Lifted bergamot is the almost singular, striking citrus feature here, marrying fragrant, leafy peel with riper hints of pineapple. It finishes with triumphant, tropical ripeness.

title: Baron Knyphausen 2012 Kiedrich Ortslage Kabinett Feinherb Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Whiffs of blossom accent fresh apple aromas on this just off-dry Riesling. ...
description: Whiffs of blossom accent fresh apple aromas on this just off-dry Riesling. The palate is intensely fruity with ripe, rich apricot and white peach flavors yet cut with bristling lime acidity. Refreshing yet deeply satisfying.

title: Dr. Heidemanns-Bergweiler 2012 Dry Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Scents of fresh apple and pear are accented with touches of wax ...
description: Scents of fresh apple and pear are accented with touches of wax and mineral on this nuanced, dry Riesling. The palate feels lush and fruity with ripe peach and pear flavors, but zesty lime acidity and a shower of minerality lend stately elegance. A surprisingly bold wine for a diminutive price. Drink now.

title: Dr. Fischer 2012 Ockfener Bockstein Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Fresh green herbs and tart stone-fruit aromas waft delicately from this dry, ...
description: Fresh green herbs and tart stone-fruit aromas waft delicately from this dry, remarkably juicy wine. The palate bursts with ripe white peach and nectarine flavor accented with bright, zesty lime acidity.

title: Fritz Haag 2012 Trocken Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Delicate on the nose with hints of lemon, lime and orange blossom, ...
description: Delicate on the nose with hints of lemon, lime and orange blossom, this slightly off-dry Riesling is succulent with white grapefruit and tangerine flavors. Brisk and steely with a fine, focused acidity, it finishes moderately long with a spray of lime zest and dusty minerals.

title: Prinz von Hessen 2012 Royal Kabinett Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Whiffs of lanolin, lime and mineral accent the steely, stony flavors in ...
description: Whiffs of lanolin, lime and mineral accent the steely, stony flavors in this dry, medium-bodied wine. Concentrated flavors of lime and lemon lend an invigorating briskness to the palate. An ideal summer dinner wine to pair with seafood or fowl.

title: Abbazia di Novacella 2011 Praepositus Riesling (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)
excerpt: Aromas that recall hay, stone fruit, herbs, nectarine and mineral carry over ...
description: Aromas that recall hay, stone fruit, herbs, nectarine and mineral carry over to the palate. The rich flavors are restrained by bracing acidity that gives a clean, succulent finish.

title: Fritz Haag 2012 Brauneberger Juffer Sonnenuhr Auslese #10 Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Savory spice and earth tones on the nose fade into superripe flavors ...
description: Savory spice and earth tones on the nose fade into superripe flavors of mango, peach and orange on this fleshy, sweet Riesling. Piercing lemon acidity lends levity and verve to the palate before wrapping up the tart-sweet finish nicely.

title: Markus Huber 2013 Engelsberg Riesling (Traisental)
excerpt: Funky flowers and dandelion fringe the citrus core of this rounded but ...
description: Funky flowers and dandelion fringe the citrus core of this rounded but precise Riesling. They hint at a ripe core of stone fruit that vies for attention with zesty acidity.

title: Loimer 2013 Langenlois Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Restraint and yeastiness mingle with the zesty lemon peel nose. The palate ...
description: Restraint and yeastiness mingle with the zesty lemon peel nose. The palate is concentrated and still has some spritz with a featherweight body.

title: Escher Haus 2012 Riesling (Rheinhessen)
excerpt: Lavender and violet notes are lavishly floral against a backdrop of ripe, ...
description: Lavender and violet notes are lavishly floral against a backdrop of ripe, juicy peaches on this sunny off-dry wine. Zingy citrus acidity gives the palate backbone and a bracing finish. A great value wine to enjoy throughout the summer season.

title: Markus Huber 2013 Terrassen Riesling (Traisental)
excerpt: Freshly cut lemon and an earthy dimension make for an interesting nose. ...
description: Freshly cut lemon and an earthy dimension make for an interesting nose. They lead to a poised, lemony-pure palate with an almost gentle touch, despite all the lemony freshness. Intriguing in its concentrated lightness.

title: Nigl 2013 Dornleiten Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Straitlaced and fresh, this is a simple but effective wine with zesty ...
description: Straitlaced and fresh, this is a simple but effective wine with zesty acidity cushioned by a fuller body. This one is a real all-rounder with a lovely clean lemon peel finish.

title: Dr. Heidemanns-Bergweiler 2012 Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Subtle spice notes lend exotic flair throughout this dry yet light-bodied wine. ...
description: Subtle spice notes lend exotic flair throughout this dry yet light-bodied wine. Bright apple and Meyer lemon flavors build in intensity on the palate, accented by hints of savory herbs and minerals. Excellent value for a such a quaffable yet nuanced wine.

title: Tegernseerhof 2013 Terrassen Federspiel Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: Notions of very ripe peaches lead onto a tight, fresh and zesty ...
description: Notions of very ripe peaches lead onto a tight, fresh and zesty palate where you can still catch glimpses of that peach. A rounded and fruity number, not without precision.

title: Weszeli 2013 Loiserberg Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Restrained Meyer lemon and slender zestiness characterize this featherlight wine that nonetheless ...
description: Restrained Meyer lemon and slender zestiness characterize this featherlight wine that nonetheless has a concentrated, melting core and convinces with simple purity.

title: Robert Weil 2012 Tradition Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Earthy, savory aromas subside to reveal fresh lemon and lime on this ...
description: Earthy, savory aromas subside to reveal fresh lemon and lime on this elegant, steely wine. Off-dry in style, it balances ripe pear and apple flavors with a sturdy backbone of acidity. Finishes moderately long.

title: Weingut Christ 2013 Wiesthalen Riesling (Vienna)
excerpt: The zesty juiciness of grapefruit peel and some spritz provide refreshment with ...
description: The zesty juiciness of grapefruit peel and some spritz provide refreshment with lots of lemony purity thrown in for good measure. A light but concentrated summer wine.

title: Villa Huesgen 2012 Nine Generations Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Fragrant orange blossom and peach aromas are brightened with hints of lime ...
description: Fragrant orange blossom and peach aromas are brightened with hints of lime and lemon on this dry, medium-bodied wine. Yellow peach and tangerine flavors are tart yet juicy on the palate, lifted by a streak of lime acidity and a murmur of tea-leaf astringency on the finish.

title: Peter Nicolay 2012 Dry Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Spice and honeycomb waft exotically from this dry, medium-bodied wine. The palate ...
description: Spice and honeycomb waft exotically from this dry, medium-bodied wine. The palate is tart with lemon and lime flavors, but rounded with delicate streaks of apricot and honey. Finishes moderately long with a hint of fresh herbs.

title: McFadden 2013 Estate Grown Made With Organically Grown Grapes Riesling (Potter Valley)
excerpt: Slightly sweet, this light, smooth and juicy wine has mild aromatics of ...
description: Slightly sweet, this light, smooth and juicy wine has mild aromatics of citrus fruit and floral notes, and pretty melon and pippin apple flavors.

title: Fritsch 2013 Riesling (Wagram-Donauland)
excerpt: Rounded acidity recalls the freshness of green apple and pear rather than ...
description: Rounded acidity recalls the freshness of green apple and pear rather than that of citrus. Very clean and streamlined but with pleasant substance and just a little enticing spritz. Simple but very pleasant.

title: Robert Weil 2012 Tradition Kabinett Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Spice and herb notes accent smoke and earth on this bristling off-dry ...
description: Spice and herb notes accent smoke and earth on this bristling off-dry Riesling. The palate boasts pretty floral tones against ripe white-grapefruit and peach flavors, along with an acidic backbone that drives the finish long and steely.

title: Villa Huesgen 2012 Enkircher Steffensberg Kabinett Feinherb Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Streaks of lanolin and petrol lend a savory, mineral intensity to this ...
description: Streaks of lanolin and petrol lend a savory, mineral intensity to this off-dry wine. Concentrated yellow peach and nectarine flavors penetrate deeply on the palate, but the moderately long finish reflects its earthier, spicier side.

title: Xavier Flouret 2011 Kavalier Kabinett Trocken Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Elegant on the nose with hints of smoke, stone and tangerine, this ...
description: Elegant on the nose with hints of smoke, stone and tangerine, this dry Riesling is intensely mineral in focus. The palate is brisk with tart pineapple and grapefruit flavors marked by searing lime acidity.

title: Baron Knyphausen 2012 Feinherb Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Fresh sage and tarragon notes lend a lovely green, herbal tone to ...
description: Fresh sage and tarragon notes lend a lovely green, herbal tone to this just off-dry wine. The palate is refreshing with lemony acidity and straightforward apple and pear flavors.

title: La Vis 2013 Simboli Riesling (Trentino)
excerpt: Aromas suggest honeysuckle and ripe pear. The linear palate offers juicy nectarine, ...
description: Aromas suggest honeysuckle and ripe pear. The linear palate offers juicy nectarine, lemon drop and ripe tropical fruit alongside crisp acidity.

title: Louis Guntrum 2012 Riesling (Germany)
excerpt: Pretty violet aromas elevate this off-dry wine, accenting sunny flavors of quince ...
description: Pretty violet aromas elevate this off-dry wine, accenting sunny flavors of quince and tangerine on the palate. Brisk lime acidity lends a brash, nervy feel that extends through the finish. A touch of savory herb lingers.

title: Concha y Toro 2013 Terrunyo Costa Los Boldes Vineyard Block 6 Riesling (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Like German or Alsace Rieslings, this Chilean version hints at petrol but ...
description: Like German or Alsace Rieslings, this Chilean version hints at petrol but falls short, thus the nose is wayward and perfumed. In the mouth, this is peachy in feel, with sweet but uncommitted flavors of nectarine and apricot. A chunky finish comes up short on acidity and structure.

title: Schmidt 2012 Schmidt Family Vineyards Estate Riesling (Southern Oregon)
excerpt: The aromas are light and elusive with notes of mineral and pear. ...
description: The aromas are light and elusive with notes of mineral and pear. It drinks dry with a wash of alcoholic bitterness that runs throughout.

title: Pacific Rim 2012 Solstice Vineyard Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Just under 10 g/L residual sugar, this Riesling, sourced from vines planted ...
description: Just under 10 g/L residual sugar, this Riesling, sourced from vines planted in 1972, opens with a juicy mix of grapefruit, orange and tangerine fruit. Textural and dense, it carries across and through the palate into a lingering, mineral-drenched finish. Superb already, it could be cellared through 2024 or longer.

title: Boundary Breaks 2012 Single Vineyard Single Clone No. 90 Late Harvest Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Intensely tropical on the nose with notes of honey-glazed mango and peach, ...
description: Intensely tropical on the nose with notes of honey-glazed mango and peach, this silky sweet wine is stunningly complex yet unabashedly tasty. The palate is unctuous with layers of rich marmalade cut with bright acidity and sprays of blossom and tea leaf that linger endlessly on the finish.

title: Boundary Breaks 2012 Single Clone No. 239 Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Boundary Breaks has proven to be the break-out producer of the Finger ...
description: Boundary Breaks has proven to be the break-out producer of the Finger Lakes this year with an excellent line up of wines, and this off-dry wine is amongst its best. Elegantly perfumed with notes of fresh green florals and herbs, it builds in power and expression on the palate with pristine white peach flavors pierced with lime acidity and a reverberating mineral finish.

title: Red Newt Cellars 2012 Sawmill Creek Vineyards North Block Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Flighty and delicate on the palate, this refreshingly mineral semi-sweet wine is ...
description: Flighty and delicate on the palate, this refreshingly mineral semi-sweet wine is juicy with sweet apple flavor accented with brisk lime acidity. Hints of honey  and white flowers linger softly on the finish.

title: Domaine Charles Frey 2011 Vieilles Vignes Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Straw gold in color, this is a fragrant, delicately aromatic wine. Made ...
description: Straw gold in color, this is a fragrant, delicately aromatic wine. Made from organic fruit, it has pure white fruit and mineral flavors that are cut with intense youthful acidity. It needs to develop, so wait to drink until 2016.

title: Jamesport 2010 Riesling (North Fork of Long Island)
excerpt: Heady yellow flower and honey aromas waft from this sunny, off-dry wine. ...
description: Heady yellow flower and honey aromas waft from this sunny, off-dry wine. The palate is concentrated with fresh apple flavors, but pierced with a streak of lime and lemon acidity. Finishes moderately long with a touch of lemon-zest astringency.

title: Keuka Spring 2012 Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Aromatic of ripe, lush summer peaches, this dry-style wine is deeply concentrated ...
description: Aromatic of ripe, lush summer peaches, this dry-style wine is deeply concentrated with preserved peach and apricot flavors accented with streaks of Ceylon tea and lemony acidity. A bracing hint of bitter almond marks the finish.

title: Lamoreaux Landing 2012 Yellow Dog Vineyard Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Dusty mineral notes add subtle complexity to refreshing apple, lemon and lime ...
description: Dusty mineral notes add subtle complexity to refreshing apple, lemon and lime notes on this off-dry wine. Brisk and zesty on the palate, it finishes moderately long with a streak of lime-toned acidity.

title: Lamoreaux Landing 2012 Red Oak Vineyard Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Dusty, chalky tones accent fresh apple and pear flavors throughout this minerally ...
description: Dusty, chalky tones accent fresh apple and pear flavors throughout this minerally off-dry wine. Honed and steely on the palate, it finishes briskly on a tart, lemony note. Refreshing and quaffable in style.

title: Latah Creek 2012 Riesling (Ancient Lakes)
excerpt: An aromatically appealing wine with notes of Granny Smith apples, peach and ...
description: An aromatically appealing wine with notes of Granny Smith apples, peach and herbs. It drinks medium sweet with jasmine and stone fruit flavors.

title: Standing Stone 2012 Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Exuberant floral notes lend a perfumy touch to fresh apple and pear ...
description: Exuberant floral notes lend a perfumy touch to fresh apple and pear aromas on this dry, medium-bodied wine. The palate is ripe with concentrated yellow cherry and plum flavors anchored with a puckering line of lime acidity.

title: Heron Hill 2012 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: While dry in style, this Riesling entices on the nose with rich, ...
description: While dry in style, this Riesling entices on the nose with rich, ripe aromas of honeyed tangerines and pears. The palate is brisk and refreshing with flavors of tart green apples kissed with blossoms and a piercing lime acidity. It finishes moderately long.

title: Inspire Moore 2012 Timothy Moore Doyle Seneca Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: A fresh, blossomy flair accompanies aromas of apple and pear on this ...
description: A fresh, blossomy flair accompanies aromas of apple and pear on this just slightly off-dry Riesling. Crisp on the palate with tart white peach and lime flavors, it finishes with a hint of honey.

title: Bloomer Creek 2012 Tanzen Dame Auten Vineyard 1st Harvest Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Aromas of crisp green apples, herbs and lemon waft on this rustic ...
description: Aromas of crisp green apples, herbs and lemon waft on this rustic off-dry wine. Apple-like and mineral in tone, the palate recalls French apple cider, but with a kick with lemon-lime acidity. It finishes brisk and refreshing.

title: Bellwether 2012 Sawmill Creek Vineyard Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Hints of earth and mushrooms lend a savory tone to aromas of ...
description: Hints of earth and mushrooms lend a savory tone to aromas of pressed apples and pears in this off-dry wine. The palate is bright and cheery with sweet apple and lemon flavors but finishes with a lingering spray of savory dried herbs and stems.

title: Lakewood 2012 Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Smoke, saffron and spice notes add savory notes to flavors of freshly ...
description: Smoke, saffron and spice notes add savory notes to flavors of freshly pressed apples and pears on this bristling off-dry wine. The palate is piercing with lime-tinged acidity, but finishes with a comforting touch of honey.

title: Jones of Washington 2013 Riesling (Ancient Lakes)
excerpt: Still settling into its skin, this wine shows a light effervescence when ...
description: Still settling into its skin, this wine shows a light effervescence when first poured that lifts the notes of freshly cut pear, mandarin orange and wild flowers. It drinks off dry, with the concentration of the stone fruit flavors somewhat wanting.

title: Standing Stone 2012 Old West Block Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Waxy white floral notes accent fresh apple and pear aromas on this ...
description: Waxy white floral notes accent fresh apple and pear aromas on this dry, medium-bodied wine. The palate is crisp with a refreshingly alpine coolness. Lime acidity pierces the finish.

title: Red Newt Cellars 2012 Sawmill Creek Vineyards South Block Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Hints of floral perfume accent aromas of pressed apples and pears on ...
description: Hints of floral perfume accent aromas of pressed apples and pears on this off-dry wine. The palate is concentrated with apple flavor but has a jolting lime acidity that puckers the finish.

title: Inspire Moore 2012 Timothy Moore Simmons Keuka Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Savory, smoky notes lend an earthy feel to this off-dry wine. The ...
description: Savory, smoky notes lend an earthy feel to this off-dry wine. The palate is moderately concentrated with fresh apple flavor, but tart lime-skin notes and steely, piercing acidity take center stage.

title: Bellwether 2012 A&D Vineyard Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Whiffs of smoke lend a savory feel to pressed apple notes on ...
description: Whiffs of smoke lend a savory feel to pressed apple notes on this dry, delicately framed wine. The palate bristles with lemon-lime acidity and finishes long and lean with a hint of wet stones.

title: Shenandoah Vineyards 2012 Johannisberg Riesling (Shenandoah Valley)
excerpt: Scents of white flowers and tropical fruits lead onto the concentrated palate; ...
description: Scents of white flowers and tropical fruits lead onto the concentrated palate; and the fresh, tangy acids keep the mouthfeel perky.

title: Hosmer 2012 Dry Riesling (Cayuga Lake)
excerpt: Mineral and steely, this dry, delicately framed wine reverberates on the palate ...
description: Mineral and steely, this dry, delicately framed wine reverberates on the palate with a nervous lemon-lime acidity. Fresh apple and pear flavors are moderately concentrated but bristle with citrus zest, making it an apt pairing with rich, creamy cheeses or nuts.

title: Heron Hill 2012 Semi-Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Warm spice notes accent savory pressed apple and pear notes on this ...
description: Warm spice notes accent savory pressed apple and pear notes on this straightforward yet easy quaffer.Off-dry in style with sweet touches of clover honey, it finishes briskly with bright, lemony acidity.

title: Paradise Peak 2012 Sweet Riesling (Washington)
excerpt: A perfumed wine with notes of candied orange, peach and lavender. The ...
description: A perfumed wine with notes of candied orange, peach and lavender. The palate is sweet and easy drinking. Chill down and enjoy.

title: Pearmund 2012 Vineyard Kilaurwen Riesling (Virginia)
excerpt: Fruit-juice-like aromas of quince, pear and apricot lead onto the weighty palate. ...
description: Fruit-juice-like aromas of quince, pear and apricot lead onto the weighty palate. It tastes slightly off dry and succulent, and it deals bold flavors and juicy acids.

title: Bridgman 2012 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The aromas of peach and mandarin orange are surprisingly light for the ...
description: The aromas of peach and mandarin orange are surprisingly light for the variety. It drinks medium sweet with the concentration of the stone fruit flavors a bit light.

title: August Kesseler 2012 Lorcher Schlossberg Kabinett Erste Lage Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: A musky, floral perfume melds with ripe white peach and a crush ...
description: A musky, floral perfume melds with ripe white peach and a crush of stony mineral on this beautifully composed off-dry Riesling. The palate is lush, with juicy melon, peach and mango flavors, but balanced by a long, flinty finish. Drink now to maximize its ripe, perfumed exuberance.

title: Domdechant Werner 2012 Hochheimer Domdechaney Trocken Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Whiffs of spice, honeycomb and lanolin meld curiously on the nose of ...
description: Whiffs of spice, honeycomb and lanolin meld curiously on the nose of this intensely mineral Riesling. Dry in style, with pretty yellow-cherry flavor, it builds in concentration and complexity as shades of spice, rock and fruit amass against a backdrop of sunny tangerine acidity. Drink now.

title: Dr. Heidemanns-Bergweiler 2012 Bernkasteler Badstube Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Smoke accents ripe yellow peaches on the nose of this intensely penetrating ...
description: Smoke accents ripe yellow peaches on the nose of this intensely penetrating kabinett. The palate shocks with luscious mango and melon flavors, layered with bristling mineral accents. It finishes long, with a reverberating astringency.

title: Elk Cove 2012 Estate Riesling (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Bone dry, this succulent, citrus-soaked Riesling is a textural marvel. Mixing grapefruit, ...
description: Bone dry, this succulent, citrus-soaked Riesling is a textural marvel. Mixing grapefruit, lime and pear fruit flavors, its racy acidity underscores its complexity.

title: Prinz Salm 2012 Trocken Riesling (Rheinhessen)
excerpt: Whiffs of freshly pressed apples are accented by pretty peach and honeysuckle ...
description: Whiffs of freshly pressed apples are accented by pretty peach and honeysuckle notes on this dry, refreshing Riesling. The palate is lean in style, with subtle stone-fruit flavors that feel brisk and vivacious against a backdrop of pineapple acidity.

title: Prinz Salm 2011 Felseneck Wallhausen  Trocken GG Riesling (Nahe)
excerpt: Dry, bold and intensely mineral, this powerful Riesling is lifted by whiffs ...
description: Dry, bold and intensely mineral, this powerful Riesling is lifted by whiffs of lemongrass and mint, along with a shining streak of lemon acidity. It finishes with a bristle of lime zest astringency and a hint of white flower.

title: Dr. Heidemanns-Bergweiler 2012 Bernkasteler alte Badstube am Doctorberg Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Waxy lanolin and spice notes add complexity to tart stone-fruit aromas on ...
description: Waxy lanolin and spice notes add complexity to tart stone-fruit aromas on this sprightly Riesling. Semidry in style, the palate drips with peach nectar flavor, balanced by bracing tangerine acidity. It finishes long, with a refreshing spray of herb notes.

title: Geh. Rat Dr. von Bassermann-Jordan 2011 Deidesheimer Hohenmorgen Trocken Erste Lage Riesling (Pfalz)
excerpt: While lush and ripe on the nose, with aromas of stone fruit ...
description: While lush and ripe on the nose, with aromas of stone fruit and citrus, this dry Riesling is remarkably lean and steely on the palate. The lemon-lime acidity is searing, but highlights an intense minerality that lingers through the finish.

title: Bollig-Lehnert 2012 Dhroner Hofberger Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Smoke, spice and earth notes mark this deeply mineral auslese, adding depth ...
description: Smoke, spice and earth notes mark this deeply mineral auslese, adding depth and complexity to the sunny palate and peach and apricot flavors. A beautifully executed calibration of savory and sweet, it finishes with a twang of struck steel and lime.

title: Peter Nicolay 2012 Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Whiffs of musk and violet perfume offset ripe peach and tangerine notes ...
description: Whiffs of musk and violet perfume offset ripe peach and tangerine notes on this off-dry, yet intensely fruity Riesling. Bracing lime-tinged acidity and fresh herbal tones lend grace and vitality through the finish. Balanced and elegant in style.

title: August Kesseler 2012 R Kabinett Riesling (Pfalz)
excerpt: Deeply concentrated, with honeyed yellow-peach and tangerine flavors, this is a gorgeously ...
description: Deeply concentrated, with honeyed yellow-peach and tangerine flavors, this is a gorgeously composed wine, with just a hint of sweetness for balance. Notes of cherry blossom and crushed minerals add complexity and depth. It finishes long, with a delicate, lacy sweetness.

title: Peter Nicolay 2012 Blue Slate Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Preserved quince and honeyed apple flavors are accented by streaks of mineral ...
description: Preserved quince and honeyed apple flavors are accented by streaks of mineral and lime zest on this elegant off-dry Riesling. Tart green apple and fresh herb notes lift the midpalate. It finishes long, but crisp and refreshing.

title: Anam Cara 2012 Nicholas Estate Riesling (Chehalem Mountains)
excerpt: A modest 22g/L residual sugar and a pH down below 3 keeps ...
description: A modest 22g/L residual sugar and a pH down below 3 keeps this tasting fairly dry. Apples and satsuma oranges are the key fruit flavors, with a whiff of jasmine carrying into the palate as well. The finish has grip and balance.

title: Erste Neue 2012 Rifall Riesling (Alto Adige)
excerpt: This opens with intense floral aromas that recall white roses, lemon zest ...
description: This opens with intense floral aromas that recall white roses, lemon zest and apricot. The linear, vibrant palate offers pink grapefruit, white peach and a flint note alongside crisp acidity that leaves a refreshing finish. Oliver McCrum, T. Edward Wines.

title: Fritz Haag 2012 Brauneberger Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Smoky, herbal aromas add complexity to pretty floral notes on this elegantly ...
description: Smoky, herbal aromas add complexity to pretty floral notes on this elegantly composed semisweet Riesling. The palate is rich with peach and nectarine flavors, along with a shock of citrus acidity, but maintains a subtle line of smoky, dusty earthiness through the finish.

title: Clear Night 2012 Riesling (Pfalz)
excerpt: Initial notes of earth and dust blow off with aeration to reveal ...
description: Initial notes of earth and dust blow off with aeration to reveal pretty white floral and peach aromas. Off dry in style, the palate is concentrated with ripe honeydew flavor against a backdrop of steely, linear acidity.

title: Jurtschitsch 2012 Heiligenstein Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: What to remark on first: those hints of mellow, luscious ripeness of ...
description: What to remark on first: those hints of mellow, luscious ripeness of plum, peach and apple, or that zesty, breezy lemon acidity? Together they make a complete and contrasting picture that focuses on full fruit expression and slender but concentrated linearity.

title: Loimer 2012 Steinmassl Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: This is definitely on the plumper, richer side of Riesling. Almost overwhelming ...
description: This is definitely on the plumper, richer side of Riesling. Almost overwhelming peach fruit beckons on the nose. The palate is rounded but dry and tempered by freshness. It is rich and has intimations of dried sultana but remains dry and versatile. With all its spicy allure and long-lasting finish, the impression is almost exotic.

title: Arndorfer 2012 Strasser Winberge Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Hints of lemon peel rise shyly from the glass, becoming more intense ...
description: Hints of lemon peel rise shyly from the glass, becoming more intense with air. The palate is dry, buffered and has a savory undertow of wild thyme that interplays beautifully with sumptuous peach notes and that almost textured, zesty acidity that unites everything and brings extended, refreshing length.

title: Eichinger 2012 Gaisberg Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Lime-zesty purity couples with an earthy, almost spicy edge. Pleasantly grippy phenolics ...
description: Lime-zesty purity couples with an earthy, almost spicy edge. Pleasantly grippy phenolics speak of ripeness and plentitude while remaining streamlined, straight and long. This has yet to blossom but will be lovely. Drink as of 2017.

title: Eder 2012 Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: Initially restrained, this opens into whirls of lemon, lime and pink grapefruit ...
description: Initially restrained, this opens into whirls of lemon, lime and pink grapefruit peel with an almost fizzy zestiness. Refreshment travels along the palate in total precision and linearity, with a rush of citrusy excitement.

title: Pichler-Krutzler 2012 Loibenberg Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: A soft impression of ripe peach mellows the zesty concentration. The wine ...
description: A soft impression of ripe peach mellows the zesty concentration. The wine is still enigmatic at this point, but will open and reveal more fruit, more ripeness and even more citrus flavors. Enjoy as of 2017.

title: Allram 2012 Gaisberg Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Rounded, plump little apricots are suggested in this clean-cut but ripe and ...
description: Rounded, plump little apricots are suggested in this clean-cut but ripe and dry Riesling with its straight, mineral backbone and impressive balance. A deep and rich core of fruit will unveil layers of fruit and complexity over years to come. Drink as of 2017.

title: Lagler 2012 1000 Eimerberg Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: Flinty smoke and a faint streak of grapefruit peel constitute the scant ...
description: Flinty smoke and a faint streak of grapefruit peel constitute the scant aromatics of this tightly closed wine. Concentration, streamlined acidic structure and extended length assure quality but bid us to be patient. It will also last the distance, probably with more candied angelica and citrus peel. Enjoy as of 2017.

title: Proidl 2006 Senftenberger Ehrenfels Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: The wine begins with an ethereal lift of dried thyme coupled with ...
description: The wine begins with an ethereal lift of dried thyme coupled with candied orange and lemon peels. The palate is dry and intense, as though it were about to reveal the secrets of time held in the rocky slopes where it grew. As a late release, this is a prime example of the rewards of delayed gratification. The palate has taken on an almost oily texture but the tight acidity keeps it elixier-like.

title: Hiedler 2012 Gaisberg Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Sassy and refreshing, this Riesling bursts with lime, mandarin, Seville orange and ...
description: Sassy and refreshing, this Riesling bursts with lime, mandarin, Seville orange and Amalfi lemon on a clean-cut but concentrated palate.

title: Hirsch 2012 Heiligenstein Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Clean-cut and zesty with the tang of grapefruit peel, a concentrated midpalate ...
description: Clean-cut and zesty with the tang of grapefruit peel, a concentrated midpalate and a refreshing dryness, this Riesling shows elegance, power and lip-smacking lemon finish. Shy now, it will reveal more power with bottle age. Drink as of 2017.

title: Hiedler 2012 Heiligenstein Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Golden and restrained, this wine does not give too much away on ...
description: Golden and restrained, this wine does not give too much away on the nose. But the spicily soft palate delivers with a brilliant, lemon-zesty acidity well couched in mineral midpalate concentration with an enduring finish.

title: Hermann Moser 2012 Kellerterassen Reserve Gelbling Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Concentrated but still closed, this will need time to develop. For now ...
description: Concentrated but still closed, this will need time to develop. For now there is zesty, layered promise of orange and lime peel and a streamlined dryness with an upright backbone of fine and pure acidity. Drink as of 2016.

title: Loimer 2012 Seeberg Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Juicy yellow peaches are invitingly soft on nose and palate, where the ...
description: Juicy yellow peaches are invitingly soft on nose and palate, where the zesty acidity of lime and lemon rind lightens the fruit, leading to a lifted and refreshing finish.

title: Proidl 2012 Senftenberger Ehrenfels Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Ripe pear, peach and a wild-thyme-scented edge play on nose. They continue ...
description: Ripe pear, peach and a wild-thyme-scented edge play on nose. They continue on the slender, focused palate into a long trajectory of flavor that remains dry and refreshing throughout.

title: Red Tail Ridge 2012 RTR Estate Vineyard Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Intensely floral on the nose, this slightly off-dry Riesling is concentrated, with ...
description: Intensely floral on the nose, this slightly off-dry Riesling is concentrated, with juicy citrus and stone fruit flavors. Hints of wax and fresh herb add complexity to the midpalate, along  with a honed, steely minerality that carries through the long and dry finish.

title: Nigl 2012 Privat Senftenberger Pellingen Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Perfumed and seductive, it leads with floral and peach notes. The citrus-like ...
description: Perfumed and seductive, it leads with floral and peach notes. The citrus-like acidity is cushioned by lots of body, but freshness and linearity shine through beautifully.

title: Schloss Gobelsburg 2012 Gaisberg Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Still restrained on the nose, this wine takes time to develop, but ...
description: Still restrained on the nose, this wine takes time to develop, but the underlying purity is most promising. There are stores of citrus, mandarin, orange and lemons together with juicy yellow pear and a clean vein of acidity. Drink as of 2016.

title: Felsner 2012 Gelbling Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Pale and interesting, it carries that arresting scent of Seville orange peel ...
description: Pale and interesting, it carries that arresting scent of Seville orange peel that somehow is herbal and citrusy at the same time. This generates energy and refreshment, tempered by a rich, dry and concentrated body with a super-clean and intensely lemony finish.

title: Josef Schmid 2012 Sunogeln Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: The charged scent of candied peach promises pleasure that the dry but ...
description: The charged scent of candied peach promises pleasure that the dry but deeply peachy palate keeps. The wine also conveys the pleasant bitterness of orange peel and refreshing crispness.

title: Stadt Krems 2012 Grillenparz Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: The enticing touch of Seville orange gets you at the very first ...
description: The enticing touch of Seville orange gets you at the very first whiff, combining sweet citrus with herb-scented ocean breeze. On the palate, notions of ripe peach join in, presenting a softer picture with a pliable, pleasing acidity.

title: Steininger 2012 Novemberlese Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Ripe, sun-warmed peaches and a flash of lime zest frame the rich ...
description: Ripe, sun-warmed peaches and a flash of lime zest frame the rich but wonderfully dry palate of this clean-cut, grown-up Riesling, which has enough concentration to balance that linear acid.

title: Hermann J. Wiemer 2009 Noble Select Josef Vineyard Riesling (Seneca Lake)
excerpt: Dusty mineral notes lend complexity to unctuously sweet flavors of preserved peach ...
description: Dusty mineral notes lend complexity to unctuously sweet flavors of preserved peach and marmalade in this late harvest, botrytized Riesling. Delicate on the palate, it balances tight citrus acidity with long streaks of honey and saffron that linger on the finish.

title: Pacific Rim 2012 Dry Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Penetrating aromas suggest lemon oil and citrus blossom, with a hint of ...
description: Penetrating aromas suggest lemon oil and citrus blossom, with a hint of terpene. This is the driest version of this wine to date, with residual sugar down around 0.5%. Pear skin, pear flesh and citrus carry it through a lengthy finish.

title: Anton Bauer 2012 Alte Reben Riesling (Wagram-Donauland)
excerpt: ipe red apples and an appealing, tangy grapefruit touch make this a ...
description: ipe red apples and an appealing, tangy grapefruit touch make this a delicious proposition for pairing with meals.

title: Lamoreaux Landing 2012 Estate Bottled Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Perfumed on the nose with intense aromas of flowers, tropical fruit and ...
description: Perfumed on the nose with intense aromas of flowers, tropical fruit and even vanilla, this heady wine might come off a bit cloying. The palate is dry and cut with acidity, making it refreshingly quaffable.

title: Milbrandt 2012 The Estates Ancient Lakes Riesling (Ancient Lakes)
excerpt: An intriguing wine with notes of lime leaf, green apple and wet ...
description: An intriguing wine with notes of lime leaf, green apple and wet slate. It drinks dry with tart, racy acidity and abundant mineral notes.

title: Silver Thread 2012 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: The faintest waft of marshmallow lends a pleasantly confectionery note to stone-fruit ...
