description: The faintest waft of marshmallow lends a pleasantly confectionery note to stone-fruit and blossom aromas on this dry, medium-bodied Riesling. The palate is elegant with brisk herbal tones and zesty lime acidity.

title: Pindar Vineyards 2012 Estate Bottled Riesling (North Fork of Long Island)
excerpt: This intensely aromatic, off-dry Riesling jumps from the glass with a heady ...
description: This intensely aromatic, off-dry Riesling jumps from the glass with a heady bouquet of flowers and tropical fruit. On the palate, flavors of peach and blossom are highlighted with brisk lemon-lime acidity. Pretty and pleasing, it finishes with a lacy sweetness and just a hint of fresh herbs.

title: Keuka Spring 2012 Humphreys Vineyard Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: A bit smoky and savory in style, this slightly off-dry wine balances ...
description: A bit smoky and savory in style, this slightly off-dry wine balances earthy mineral tones with flavors of pressed pear and apple. Sprightly acidity gives it a refreshing, easy-drinking quality.

title: Naches Heights 2012 Naches Heights Vineyard Riesling (Naches Heights)
excerpt: Displays a cooler climate profile with notes of lime leaf, quinine, white ...
description: Displays a cooler climate profile with notes of lime leaf, quinine, white peach and flowers. The palate drinks off dry, with well balanced acidity and a stone-fruit-filled finish.

title: Lenikus 2012 Der Reisenberg Halbtrocken Riesling (Vienna)
excerpt: Plump and aromatically subdued with a touch of residual sweetness (halbtrocken), this ...
description: Plump and aromatically subdued with a touch of residual sweetness (halbtrocken), this shows some midpalate concentration and provides some citrusy refreshment.

title: Pugliese 2011 Riesling (North Fork of Long Island)
excerpt: Smoke and spice meld into scents of custard and pressed apple on ...
description: Smoke and spice meld into scents of custard and pressed apple on this dry, medium-bodied Riesling. The palate is a bit monotone with savory apple notes, but brightened by a streak of lemon on the finish.

title: Baron Knyphausen 2011 Hattenheimer Wisselbrunnen Grosse Lage Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Bold in alcohol, with a dry, intensely textured palate, this Riesling is ...
description: Bold in alcohol, with a dry, intensely textured palate, this Riesling is rich and ripe, with notes of honeysuckle, peach and even a hint of berry. It carries its girth well, with a zippy streak of lemon acidity that cuts through all the ripeness, leading to a long, subtly mineral finish.

title: Fritz Haag 2012 Brauneberger Juffer Feinherb Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Dry styles of Riesling often feel dense and expansive, but this beautifully ...
description: Dry styles of Riesling often feel dense and expansive, but this beautifully rose-scented wine is elegant and light on its feet, with a bristling minerality. Lean apple and white peach flavors are peppered with delicate spice notes that  linger on the finish.

title: Baron Knyphausen 2011 Erbacher Michelmark Erste Lage Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Hints of honey lend warmth to zesty aromas of lemon, lime and ...
description: Hints of honey lend warmth to zesty aromas of lemon, lime and tangerine on this dry, steely wine. The palate is delicate, with tart notes of yellow peach and quince, but textured with streaks of mineral. Honed lemon-lime acidity leads a long, bracing finish.

title: Baron Knyphausen 2010 Erbacher Siegelsberg Grosse Lage Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Sunny and ripe on the nose, with whiffs of honey, orange rind ...
description: Sunny and ripe on the nose, with whiffs of honey, orange rind and yellow raisin, this dry, full-bodied wine is textured and broad. The palate is rich, as if streaked with mineral oil, but cut with searing lemon and tangerine acidity. It finishes moderately long, with a hint of floral flair.

title: Schloss Johannisberger 2011 Gelblack Feinherb Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Smoke and dried herb notes accent sunny citrus and peach aromas on ...
description: Smoke and dried herb notes accent sunny citrus and peach aromas on this refreshingly off-dry Riesling. Flavors of tart stone fruit and tangerine bristle on the palate, finishing crisply, with a hint of floral perfume.

title: Morgan 2012 Double L Vineyard Riesling (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: Crisp in acidity and clean, the grapes are from the colder, northwestern ...
description: Crisp in acidity and clean, the grapes are from the colder, northwestern part of the appellation. The flavors are strong in apricots, citrus fruits and peaches, with that famous petrol note of Riesling. The finish is off dry.

title: Schloss Vollrads 2011 Dry Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Fresh scents of orange zest and tangerine are tinged with smoke on ...
description: Fresh scents of orange zest and tangerine are tinged with smoke on this dry, piercingly lemony Riesling. The palate feels lean and steely, but is brightened by tart green apple and citrus notes on the midpalate. Finishes nervy and brisk.

title: Lujon 2012 White Riesling (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Stainless steel fermented, off dry (35 g/L residual sugar) and low alcohol, ...
description: Stainless steel fermented, off dry (35 g/L residual sugar) and low alcohol, this is a perfect spring/summer quaffing wine. Crisp apple fruit and a refreshing texture keep it light and interesting.

title: Maddalena 2011 Riesling (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Paso Robles fruit brings soft, jammy pineapple and peach fruit to this ...
description: Paso Robles fruit brings soft, jammy pineapple and peach fruit to this Riesling, while Monterey grapes add needed acidity and savory lemon and lime tartness. The finish is decidedly sweet, making it a dessert wine.

title: Oak Knoll 2011 Semi-Sweet Riesling (Oregon)
excerpt: Semisweet it is, with 12.2% alcohol and 30 g/L residual sugar. Lightly ...
description: Semisweet it is, with 12.2% alcohol and 30 g/L residual sugar. Lightly scented with bath powder, lavender and rose petal aromas, this brings on citrus and peach fruit, with a bit of phenolic bite carrying the finish.

title: St. Christopher 2011 Piesporter Michelsberg Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: While honeyed peach and quince flavors are juicy and sweet on this ...
description: While honeyed peach and quince flavors are juicy and sweet on this delicately framed auslese, distinctly earthy notes of herb and smoke lend a mysteriously savory tone. It bristles on the palate, with sunny lemon acidity.

title: Wente 2012 Riverbank Riesling (Arroyo Seco)
excerpt: The acidity and fruit are the stars of this well-made Riesling. The ...
description: The acidity and fruit are the stars of this well-made Riesling. The wine is rich in citrus, honeysuckle, apricot and honey flavors that finish dry and clean.

title: Foris 2012 Estate Grown Riesling (Rogue Valley)
excerpt: An aromatic wine with notes of freshly cut red apple, overripe pear ...
description: An aromatic wine with notes of freshly cut red apple, overripe pear and jasmine. The palate drinks closer to dry than the aromas might suggest, with a phenolic feel.

title: Leonard Kreusch 2009 Estate Bottled Beerenauslese Riesling (Rheinhessen)
excerpt: At less than $30, this entry-level beerenauslese is an exceptional value. Savory ...
description: At less than $30, this entry-level beerenauslese is an exceptional value. Savory and sweet play hand-in-hand on the nose and palate, balancing notes of dried herb and with unctuously sweet orange and pear. Dusty saffron and herb tones are quite pronounced on the palate, but the finish is vibrant, with hints of lemon and tangerine zest.

title: Domaine Ostertag 2010 Clos Mathis Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Full in the mouth, this is a warm style of wine. It ...
description: Full in the mouth, this is a warm style of wine. It has weight, ripeness and fruitiness with abundant apricot and pear flavors. It is enjoyable now although it will certainly age well. Drink until 2022.

title: Domaine Albert Mann 2011 Furstentum Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: While still young and fruity, this has the potential to be a ...
description: While still young and fruity, this has the potential to be a complex, long-lived wine. It boasts stone fruit and white flower aromas, a tight structure and a hint of sweetness. Drink from 2018.

title: Domaine Ostertag 2010 Heissenberg Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This is a rich and round wine, full in the mouth with ...
description: This is a rich and round wine, full in the mouth with a youthful palate. There is a ripe, creamy texture full of apple and orange flavors that are balanced with an edgy, steely character. This promises good aging so drink until 2022.

title: Domaine Pfister 2009 Engelberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: Round, rich and maturing well, this is a complex, perfumed, honeyed wine. ...
description: Round, rich and maturing well, this is a complex, perfumed, honeyed wine. The apple and quince fruits are now gaining secondary notes of almonds and green herbs, lending elegance and grace. This is a wine that will improve further,so drink until 2020. Glass stopper

title: Dunham 2012 Lewis Estate Vineyard Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: At a medium alcohol percentage, this is a sweeter-than-usual vintage for this ...
description: At a medium alcohol percentage, this is a sweeter-than-usual vintage for this Lewis Estate bottling. Rich and full-bodied, with fleshy peach, banana and papaya fruit, its sugar is buoyed by refreshing acidity, and the flavors persist generously through a long, satisfying finish.

title: Sipp Mack 2010 Rosacker Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: Developing well already, this is a textured, steely, very mineral wine that ...
description: Developing well already, this is a textured, steely, very mineral wine that has also has rich stone fruits that give the wine weight and flavor density. Apples and fennel lend freshness and spice. It should age longer, so wait to drink until 2015.

title: Charles Smith 2012 Kungfu Girl Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Kungfu Girl has become an iconic Riesling on the strength of its ...
description: Kungfu Girl has become an iconic Riesling on the strength of its instantly recognizable label, and surpassing quality. At 11% alcohol and 18 g/L residual sugar, it rests comfortably on the fence between dry and off-dry, and is a bulls-eye rendition of Washington Riesling. A dense mix of citrus, apple and tree fruits, enhanced with skin textures and finishing with highlights of honey and tea, this is flat out delicious.

title: Cave de Kientzheim-Kaysersberg 2010 Schlossberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: This is a rich and full-flavored wine that still has plenty of ...
description: This is a rich and full-flavored wine that still has plenty of aging ahead of it. It has a very floral character that is followed by green fruit and spice, and sustained by a tight, steely texture. Drink from 2016.

title: Joseph Cattin 2011 Hatschbourg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: Perfumed, and still quite youthful, this is a wine with potential both ...
description: Perfumed, and still quite youthful, this is a wine with potential both from its texture and its acidity. There is a strongly chalky, mineral element that lends structure to the aromatic, crisp white fruits. On the finish, the wine has a cool, elegant character.

title: Domaine Pfister 2011 Tradition Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This is a delicate, deliciously fragrant Riesling with just the freshest of ...
description: This is a delicate, deliciously fragrant Riesling with just the freshest of fruits. Lemon and bright zest notes leave the palate totally refreshed.

title: Domaine Allimant-Laugner 2011 Praelatenberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: A serious wine that needs aging, this is full and ripe while ...
description: A serious wine that needs aging, this is full and ripe while also having a steely edge to it. Very perfumed, floral and strongly textured, this is an impressive wine that does need extended aging. Drink from 2016.

title: Hermann J. Wiemer 2011 HJW Vineyard Dry Estate Bottled and Grown Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Fragrant of tangerines, yellow peaches and a hint of wet stone, this ...
description: Fragrant of tangerines, yellow peaches and a hint of wet stone, this delicate dry Riesling balances stonefruit and honey flavors against an intensely mineral backdrop. Bright, with lemon-lime acidity, it finishes long showing a blossomy flair.

title: Hubert Meyer 2011 Winzenberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: Not quite dry, this is an impressively rich wine. It has a ...
description: Not quite dry, this is an impressively rich wine. It has a strong mineral element that brings out the currant flavors and intense acidity. This is a wine that is still developing, offering an impressive array of flavors while still needing time. Drink from 2015.

title: Domaine Ostertag 2010 Fronholz Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This single vineyard wine has a fine and fruity character that also ...
description: This single vineyard wine has a fine and fruity character that also has great intensity and fragrance. With a tight and taut texture, the wine is very straight, hinting at some toastiness. Drink until 2020.

title: Boundary Breaks 2011 No. 110 Semi-Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: The No. 110 is another compelling introduction to the Boundary Breaks collection ...
description: The No. 110 is another compelling introduction to the Boundary Breaks collection of wines. Smoky mineral and spice tones lend an exotic flair to freshly pressed apple and tea notes in this nervy semi-sweet Riesling. It finishes long with sweet touches of spice and honey struck with lemony acidity.

title: Grace Lane 2012 Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Grace Lane, from Terlato Wines, makes a grand entry into Washington Riesling ...
description: Grace Lane, from Terlato Wines, makes a grand entry into Washington Riesling with this stylish, medium dry effort from the excellent 2012 vintage. Lemon tea, hibiscus, blood orange and apricot notes swirl up from the glass, round, fruity and delicious. Drink now through the next few years.

title: Trimbach 2010 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This is a fully mature wine with an attractive mix of fresh ...
description: This is a fully mature wine with an attractive mix of fresh acidity and intense perfumes. Bright and crisp on the palate, this textured wine finishes with white currant flavor. This is ready to drink now.

title: Bellangelo 2011 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Ebullient on the nose with scents of fresh white peach and tart ...
description: Ebullient on the nose with scents of fresh white peach and tart Meyer-lemon. This dry Riesling is deliciously peachy on the palate, as well. Juicy and brisk with soft citrus acidity, it finishes with a hint of waxy lime-skin on the finish.

title: Red Newt Cellars 2011 Lahoma Vineyards Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Whiffs of fresh lemongrass and ramps lend an herbaceous, savory character to ...
description: Whiffs of fresh lemongrass and ramps lend an herbaceous, savory character to this off-dry Riesling. The palate is surprisingly fruity with rich peach and melon flavors accented with hints of honey and blossoms. Finishes long with a lingering mineral tone.

title: Hermann J. Wiemer 2011 Magdalena Vineyard Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Floral and honey aromas are touched with earthy hints of saffron and ...
description: Floral and honey aromas are touched with earthy hints of saffron and pollen on this bold, lushly textured Riesling. The palate is quite full bodied, with intense flavors of stone fruits, poached pears and spice, but finishes long and elegant.

title: Hubert Meyer 2010 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Already showing some maturity, this is a finely perfumed wine, its fruitiness ...
description: Already showing some maturity, this is a finely perfumed wine, its fruitiness tempered by secondary aromas and flavors that bring out herbs and an edge of steel. The aftertaste with its juicy acidity, is totally refreshing.

title: Wunsch & Mann 2008 Hengst Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace Grand Cru)
excerpt: A wine that is mature already, this Grand Cru has some weight ...
description: A wine that is mature already, this Grand Cru has some weight and richness. There is a perfumed character and flavors of white fruits. The wine has intense acidity that gives it a steely, tight character on the finish. Drink now.

title: Cave de Kientzheim-Kaysersberg 2010 Exception Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This is a ripe, delicately tropical and fruity wine with rich texture. ...
description: This is a ripe, delicately tropical and fruity wine with rich texture. It is smooth, rounded on the palate, but accompanied by a shot of acidity. The lemon aftertaste hints at a more steely character.

title: Sheldrake Point 2011 Reserve Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Fresh and bright, with notes of orange peel and lemon, this dry, ...
description: Fresh and bright, with notes of orange peel and lemon, this dry, intensely mineral Riesling is effortlessly quaffable. While delicate in body, the palate is concentrated with apple and lime flavors, and finishes with a slick of beeswax and honey.

title: Fox Run 2011 Riesling 10 Hanging Delta Vineyard Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Beautifully floral on the nose with hints of fresh apple, lemon and ...
description: Beautifully floral on the nose with hints of fresh apple, lemon and peach, this dry, delicately textured Riesling fills the mouth with ripe grapefruit and lemon flavors. Its sprightly and crisp in character but finishes long with a hint of white-tea astringency.

title: Atwater 2011 Dry Estate Vineyards Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Rich and juicy with aromas of preserved peach, fresh apple and even ...
description: Rich and juicy with aromas of preserved peach, fresh apple and even a hint of berries, this Riesling is dry in style, yet remarkably forward with fruit. The palate is bright, with zesty lemon-lime acidity that lingers on a medium-long finish.

title: North by Northwest 2012 The Benches Riesling (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: An aromatic offering with notes of peach, honeysuckle and a whiff of ...
description: An aromatic offering with notes of peach, honeysuckle and a whiff of lime leaf. It drinks almost dry, with tart fruit flavors that seem a bit diluted.

title: Sipp Mack 2011 Tradition Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This is a wine that is lightly touched with a mineral texture ...
description: This is a wine that is lightly touched with a mineral texture while also having rich layers of acidity and green herbs. It is fragrant, perfumed and, on the finish, deliciously light and fruity.

title: Cave de Kientzheim-Kaysersberg 2011 Anne de K Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: There is a warm, honeyed edge to this otherwise steely, very crisp ...
description: There is a warm, honeyed edge to this otherwise steely, very crisp wine. It gives richness, counterpointing the delicate citrus and fennel flavors. The wine can age, but is ready to drink now and until 2020.

title: Three Rivers 2012 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This off-dry Riesling hits 32 g/L residual sugar, though it is not ...
description: This off-dry Riesling hits 32 g/L residual sugar, though it is not especially sweet. Some skin flavors add a bit of bitterness to the fruit, and the orange pekoe tea and brown sugar blandishments are not entirely integrated. A bit more bottle age should help.

title: Cave de Kientzheim-Kaysersberg 2010 Patergarten Old Vines Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This is a wine in development. It has lost its primary fruit ...
description: This is a wine in development. It has lost its primary fruit and not yet found its way to maturity. While there are citrus and green herb flavors, they are overshadowed by a closed, steely edge. Wait a few years, and drink from 2016.

title: Heron Hill 2011 Ingle Vineyard Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Spice notes accent pressed-apple aromas on this semidry Riesling. The palate is ...
description: Spice notes accent pressed-apple aromas on this semidry Riesling. The palate is juicy and penetrating with flavors of quince jelly and elegant notes of peach and blossom. Finishes vibrantly, with a zippy lemon-honey note.

title: Wolfberger 2012 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This is an attractive wine that maintains the steely texture of Riesling ...
description: This is an attractive wine that maintains the steely texture of Riesling while also bringing out fragrant white flowers and refreshing fruitiness. It has a light touch of acidity, making it exceptionally adept with food.

title: Jean-Baptiste Adam 2012 Tradition Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: An aromatic wine, this is crisp with lively acidity and a tight ...
description: An aromatic wine, this is crisp with lively acidity and a tight texture. White currants and apple skin flavors are supplemented by lime and grapefruit. Drink now and until 2018.

title: Willow Crest 2012 Estate Grown Willow Crest Estate Vineyard Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: An uber aromatic wine with notes of flowers, orange peel, jasmine and ...
description: An uber aromatic wine with notes of flowers, orange peel, jasmine and canned peaches. At 27.2 g/L residual sugar, it drinks medium sweet but overall, the acid keeps it in check.

title: Lakewood 2011 Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: While quite earthy and smoky on the nose, this off-dry Riesling is ...
description: While quite earthy and smoky on the nose, this off-dry Riesling is pleasantly fruity on the palate showing fresh apple and lemon flavors accented with vibrant lime acidity. The finish is brisk with some astringency.

title: Columbia Crest 2012 Two Vines Riesling (Washington)
excerpt: This off-dry wine falls on the sweet side, with pleasant honey/lemon tea ...
description: This off-dry wine falls on the sweet side, with pleasant honey/lemon tea flavors up front. The fruit is followed with some earthier notes, and a quickly fading finish.

title: Washington Hills 2012 Late Harvest Riesling (Washington)
excerpt: With 70 g/L residual sugar, this 100% varietal wine drinks quite sweet, ...
description: With 70 g/L residual sugar, this 100% varietal wine drinks quite sweet, with notes of peach, sage and dried Nestea Iced Tea.

title: Dopff Au Moulin 2012 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: A wine that is fruity and aromatic, this is made to drink ...
description: A wine that is fruity and aromatic, this is made to drink now. It has a crisp texture, like biting into a green apple, and acidity that shoots through the fruity palate. Screwcap.

title: Wunsch & Mann 2011 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: A bitter wine with tart apple and pear flavors, this has a ...
description: A bitter wine with tart apple and pear flavors, this has a hard edge. Drink now.

title: Prinz Salm 2011 Berg Roxheim Erste Lage Trockenbeerenauslese Riesling (Nahe)
excerpt: Scents of sweet spice and orange marmalade waft exuberantly from this honey-kissed ...
description: Scents of sweet spice and orange marmalade waft exuberantly from this honey-kissed TBA. Lusciously sweet, the palate undulates with waves of mango, melon and pineapple flavor, accented with notes of potpourri and saffron. Lingers long with a shower of delicate acidity.

title: F X Pichler 2012 Loibner Loibenberg Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: This is a wine that is so young. It is aromatic, fruity ...
description: This is a wine that is so young. It is aromatic, fruity and still settling together in its potential concentration and structure. Look forward to a wine that has pear fruits, a tight, mineral character, and structure. Look forward to an impressive and serious future. Drink from 2016.

title: Gritsch Mauritiushof 2012 1000-Eimerberg Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: The Burg mountain above Spitz is the site of the steep and ...
description: The Burg mountain above Spitz is the site of the steep and stony 1000-Eimerberg vineyard. This rich wine contrasts ripe stone fruits with a tight acidity and crisp freshness. It gives a wonderful tension that will be resolved with aging. Drink from 2017.

title: Metternich-Salomon 2011 Pfaffenberg Erste Lage Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: A partnership between the Metternich and Salomon families has produced this rich, ...
description: A partnership between the Metternich and Salomon families has produced this rich, elegant wine. It has such an aromatic, perfumed character and is so ripe and full. At the same time, it has a tight mineral edge, a fine streak of acidity and immense aging potential. Drink from 2016.

title: Josef Schmid 2010 Sunogeln Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Just hinting at more mature flavors, this is an intense wine, its ...
description: Just hinting at more mature flavors, this is an intense wine, its acidity almost overwhelming. Red currant, spice and concentrated juiciness are all elements in this dense wine. The acidity does suggest longer aging, so drink now and until 2022. Screwcap.

title: Josef Schmid 2007 Sunogeln Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: This is a bone dry, while rich wine that is now mature. ...
description: This is a bone dry, while rich wine that is now mature. It has weight, secondary almond and spice flavors, as well as tight acidity and a very mineral character. It has crispness rather than freshness, bringing a taut structure into play along with the concentration. Drink now.

title: Schloss Reinhartshausen 2009 Erbacher Marcobrunn Trockenbeerenauslese Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Enticing scents of grapefruit zest and bees wax are fitting openers to ...
description: Enticing scents of grapefruit zest and bees wax are fitting openers to this creamy, rich TBA full of luscious orange-marmalade flavor. Bright, brisk tangerine acidity adds freshness and levity to the palate, leading to a long, honeyed finish.

title: Loimer 2011 Terrassen Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: A gorgeous wine that has ripe, full perfume and wonderful fruitiness. White ...
description: A gorgeous wine that has ripe, full perfume and wonderful fruitiness. White currants are touched with spice, intense acidity, and a bright, crisp aftertaste. This is a wine for long-term aging, drink from 2017.

title: Forstreiter 2012 Schiefer Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: This perfumed reserve wine has considerable concentration, richness and a full, flowery ...
description: This perfumed reserve wine has considerable concentration, richness and a full, flowery character. Acidity cuts through the ripe fruit and brings out the spice in the texture. Screwcap.

title: V. Sattui 2012 Riesling (Anderson Valley)
excerpt: This Riesling has just the right amount of minerality balanced against apple ...
description: This Riesling has just the right amount of minerality balanced against apple and peach flavors, and an underlying core of lime. Fermented in stainless steel, it is bright and joyful to drink, boasting a long finish. Pour alongside all the classic pairings from Asian takeout to a proper curry.

title: Dr. H. Thanisch (Erben Thanisch) 2011 Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Herbaceous, lemony tones reverberate from start to finish on this elegant off-dry ...
description: Herbaceous, lemony tones reverberate from start to finish on this elegant off-dry Riesling, accenting sweet, juicy peach and tangerine flavors. Hints of smoke and tea leaf add some complexity, along with a lime-pith astringency on the finish.

title: Schloss Saarstein 2011 Saarstein Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Whiffs of white pepper and smoke add shades of spice and earth ...
description: Whiffs of white pepper and smoke add shades of spice and earth to this delicate off-dry Riesling. Tangy lime acidity brightens fresh peach and melon flavors that linger on the finish alongside a puckering touch of lemon pith.

title: Schmitges 2011 Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Whiffs of smoke dissipate with aeration on this delicately off-dry Riesling, revealing ...
description: Whiffs of smoke dissipate with aeration on this delicately off-dry Riesling, revealing a lush wine, with yellow peach and nectarine flavors. Roundness on the midpalate is tightened by a shock of citrusy acidity that lingers long on the finish.

title: Georg Breuer 2011 Terra Montosa Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Earthy tones of mineral oil and smoke mingle with pretty white floral ...
description: Earthy tones of mineral oil and smoke mingle with pretty white floral and fruit aromas on this expressive, full-bodied Riesling. The palate is dry in style, but bold and penetrating, with flavors of yellow plum and quince jam, along with a textured, minerally finish.

title: Tegernseerhof 2011 Kellerberg Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: Light, fruity and fresh, this Riesling dances deliciously on the palate. Aromatic ...
description: Light, fruity and fresh, this Riesling dances deliciously on the palate. Aromatic white flowers, crisp apples and currants blend into a mineral texture with a direct, tight line of acidity. Fresh and bright, it is worth holding until 2015. Screwcap.

title: Dr. H. Thanisch (Erben Thanisch) 2011 Berncasteler Doctor Kabinett Gold Cap Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Brimming with aromas of nectarine and wildflower honey, this penetrates the palate ...
description: Brimming with aromas of nectarine and wildflower honey, this penetrates the palate with luscious orchard fruit. Citrusy acidity makes it sprightly and brisk on the palate, finishing long on a bittersweet orange-pith note.

title: Mesh 2012 Riesling (Eden Valley)
excerpt: Mesh is a partnership between famed Clare Valley Riesling producer Jeffrey Grosset ...
description: Mesh is a partnership between famed Clare Valley Riesling producer Jeffrey Grosset and the Hill Smith family of Yalumba. The 2012 is a solid effort, relatively light in weight but concentrated in flavor, featuring potent notes of lemon and lime sherbet. Very tart and dry on the finish, it needs either oysters or plenty of time in the cellar.

title: Friedrich-Wilhelm-Gymnasium 2011 Schiefer Off-Dry Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Delicate smoke and spice notes permeate this off-dry Riesling, accenting ripe, juicy ...
description: Delicate smoke and spice notes permeate this off-dry Riesling, accenting ripe, juicy flavors of grapefruit and peach. Tart, tangerine acidity stretches the palate, adding zip to a delicately honeyed finish.

title: Tegernseerhof 2011 Loibenberg Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: Pure in its fruitiness, this wine has a crisp character and light ...
description: Pure in its fruitiness, this wine has a crisp character and light texture, making it very accessible now. Quince, grapefruit and blood orange flavors combine seamlessly, accumulating in weight on the palate. Drink now. Screwcap.

title: Von Buhl 2011 Brut Riesling (Pfalz)
excerpt: Hints of honeycomb and lavender florals permeate this aromatic sparkling Riesling from ...
description: Hints of honeycomb and lavender florals permeate this aromatic sparkling Riesling from start to finish. Softly foamy and delicately effervescent, the palate is brightened by tart white grapefruit and yuzu flavors. Dry and focused in style, it finishes quite long.

title: Franzen 2011 Calmont Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Brisk and clean on the palate, this dry, easy-drinking Riesling is chock ...
description: Brisk and clean on the palate, this dry, easy-drinking Riesling is chock full of freshly squeezed grapefruit and lemon flavors. Delicate minerality adds depth to the palate, extending a pleasantly bitter lemon-pith finish.

title: Geh. Rat Dr. von Bassermann-Jordan 2011 Trocken Riesling (Pfalz)
excerpt: Zesty and brisk, with notes of white grapefruit and fresh herbs, this ...
description: Zesty and brisk, with notes of white grapefruit and fresh herbs, this dry, full-bodied Riesling is almost bracingly tart, with flavors of lime and lime-skin. A vibrant pairing with soft, creamy cheese or fatty pork dishes.

title: Fritsch 2011 Riesling (Wagram-Donauland)
excerpt: This is a delicately perfumed wine, balanced between minerality and fruitiness. It ...
description: This is a delicately perfumed wine, balanced between minerality and fruitiness. It has a great, tight texture as well as green fruit flavors, along with a touch of honey and spice. It is ready to drink. Screwcap.

title: Jana 2012 Riesling (Mendocino County)
excerpt: Austere in style, this crisp, taut Riesling is bright with lemon and ...
description: Austere in style, this crisp, taut Riesling is bright with lemon and lime acidity. Very dry, it is layered on the palate with stonefruit and minerals throughout a long finish. Made by winemaker Scott Harvey, it is blended with a small percentage of Napa Valley Pinot Gris.

title: Loimer 2012 Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: This very fragrant, perfumed wine shows white fruits with lovely summer-hedgerow aromas. ...
description: This very fragrant, perfumed wine shows white fruits with lovely summer-hedgerow aromas. It has fresh acidity as well, but does need some time in the bottle. Drink from 2016.

title: Fenestra 2012 Riesling (Arroyo Seco)
excerpt: Imparting a hint of petrol and wax on the nose, this Riesling ...
description: Imparting a hint of petrol and wax on the nose, this Riesling is thickly textured with flavors of ripe apple, peach and pear. With nice acidity, it finishes dry.

title: Josef Schmid 2012 Urgestein Bergterrassen Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Delicate and fresh, this tastes like a pure-blooded Riesling. It has lively ...
description: Delicate and fresh, this tastes like a pure-blooded Riesling. It has lively acidity, crisp apple flavor, a light perfume, and a refreshing character. Drink now. Screwcap.

title: Dr. Pauly Bergweiler 2011 Bernkasteler Badstube Beerenauslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Intense smoke and crushed-stone notes linger from start to finish on this ...
description: Intense smoke and crushed-stone notes linger from start to finish on this distinctly mineral beerenauslese, adding a savory tone to luscious honey and lemon flavors. Zesty lime and lemon notes offset sweetness on the palate, finishing with a touch of puckering astringency.

title: Villa Wolf 2011 Dry Riesling (Pfalz)
excerpt: Whiffs of smoke and crushed stone lend a mineral edge to this ...
description: Whiffs of smoke and crushed stone lend a mineral edge to this dry, full-bodied Riesling. The palate is fairly straightforward, but crisp and bright, with grapefruit acidity and a swathe of savory herbs that would match well with herb-accented Thai and Vietnamese cuisine.

title: Fulkerson 2011 William Vigne Juicy Sweet Riesling (Seneca Lake)
excerpt: Ripe, juicy honeydew and tangerine flavors are abound on this delicately sweet ...
description: Ripe, juicy honeydew and tangerine flavors are abound on this delicately sweet Riesling. Bright and light-footed with bursts of sweet grapefruit acidity, it would be a fantastic accompaniment to soft-rind cheeses and herbaceous Southeast Asian fare.

title: Ancestry 2012 Reminiscence Riesling (Columbia Gorge (WA))
excerpt: Hailing from Underwood Mountain, this is cool climate Riesling made in a ...
description: Hailing from Underwood Mountain, this is cool climate Riesling made in a warm vintage with notes of lime, guava and mineral. It has a healthy amount of residual sugar (37 g/L) but the acid (8.4g/L) creates a pleasing sense of tension and makes it seemingly drier.

title: Garofalo 2012 Les Collines Vineyard White Riesling (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: This off-dry Riesling has sufficient acidity to partially mask the sweetness. Lemon/lime ...
description: This off-dry Riesling has sufficient acidity to partially mask the sweetness. Lemon/lime fruit flavors thin out quickly, leaving some bitterness in the finish, along with a hint of bubble gum.

title: Washington Hills 2011 Pink Label Late Harvest Riesling (Washington)
excerpt: An aromatic wine with notes of dried apricot and flowers. At 70 ...
description: An aromatic wine with notes of dried apricot and flowers. At 70 g/L residual sugar, it drinks sweet and is a quaffable crowd pleaser.

title: Lechthaler 2012 Drago Riesling (Trentino)
excerpt: From Trentino in northern Italy, this Riesling has delicate aromas of acacia ...
description: From Trentino in northern Italy, this Riesling has delicate aromas of acacia flower, honey and pear. The lean palate shows hints of beeswax, honey and tropical fruit flavors that finish abruptly.

title: Dr. Loosen 2011 Wehlener Sonnenuhr Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Lanolin and honeycomb notes lend a minerally feel to rich, lusciously concentrated ...
description: Lanolin and honeycomb notes lend a minerally feel to rich, lusciously concentrated peach and tangerine flavors in this powerful yet finely structured kabinett. A hint of spritz and shocking lemon-lime acidity lead the way to a long, elegant finish.

title: Trisaetum 2012 Coast Range Estate Dry Riesling (Yamhill-Carlton District)
excerpt: Yet another fruit-powered, lip-smacking Riesling from Trisaetum, this brings a basket of ...
description: Yet another fruit-powered, lip-smacking Riesling from Trisaetum, this brings a basket of yellow apples, tart limes, pears and a slice of pink grapefruit into perfect harmony. Leesy, textural, long and utterly refreshing, it finishes with a nice kick of bracing acidity.

title: Trisaetum 2012 Coast Range Estate Riesling (Yamhill-Carlton District)
excerpt: This is the medium-dry Riesling from this estate vineyard, a notch lower ...
description: This is the medium-dry Riesling from this estate vineyard, a notch lower in alcohol than the Dry bottling, and overall a bit rounder. It carries the same excellent texture, length and mix of ripe fruits, with pears and nectarines taking center stage.

title: Rheingraf 2011 Scharlachberg Bingen GG Erste Lage Trocken Riesling (Rheinhessen)
excerpt: Smoke and crushed-stone notes lend dramatic minerality to this dry, full-bodied Riesling. ...
description: Smoke and crushed-stone notes lend dramatic minerality to this dry, full-bodied Riesling. The palate is juicy with grapefruit flavor, but elegantly balanced with dried savory herbs and fine, focused acidity that reverberates from start to finish.

title: Rheingraf 2011 Kirchberg Bingen GG Erste Lage Trocken Riesling (Rheinhessen)
excerpt: Smoke and savory nut aromas dissipate to reveal a dramatic backdrop of ...
description: Smoke and savory nut aromas dissipate to reveal a dramatic backdrop of rose petal and peach on the nose of this dry, full-bodied Riesling. The palate is generously textured, with a rich, creamy mouthfeel, but finishes elegantly, with a murmur of lime-pith astringency.

title: Wittmann 2011 Westhofen Morstein GG Trocken Riesling (Rheinhessen)
excerpt: Richly textured and unabashedly full in body, this dry Riesling is intensely ...
description: Richly textured and unabashedly full in body, this dry Riesling is intensely ripe. Pineapple and peach flavor is accented by zesty lime peel and earthy tones of wet stone and lanolin. The midpalate is lifted by a whiff of violet perfume and bold, lemon-lime acidity envigorates the finish.

title: Chehalem 2012 Ridegcrest Vineyards Wind Ridge Block Riesling (Ribbon Ridge)
excerpt: This block selection shows a delicate, elegant touch in this vintage, opening ...
description: This block selection shows a delicate, elegant touch in this vintage, opening with pretty floral accents and continuing with light but compelling flavors of citrus and honeysuckle. There is a well-tuned bitter streak, presumably from some skin contact, and a refreshing minerality throughout.

title: Dr. Loosen 2011 Wehlener Sonnenuhr Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Hints of candle wax and lemon peel add dimension to dark floral ...
description: Hints of candle wax and lemon peel add dimension to dark floral aromas on the nose of this sultry auslese. The palate is rich with sweet tangerine and nectarine flavors, yet delightfully light on the palate, with a tang of steely minerality that extends the finish.

title: Robert Weil 2011 Dry Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Savory herb and lemon aromas lend elegance to lusciously ripe peach and ...
description: Savory herb and lemon aromas lend elegance to lusciously ripe peach and apricot flavors in this fruity, yet remarkably dry Riesling. Soft Meyer-lemon acidity mingles on the palate with a flurry of blossomy notes, finishing with a hint of lime-skin astringency.

title: Robert Weil 2011 Kiedrich Turmberg Trocken Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Exotic spice notes accent ripe yellow-peach and apricot aromas on the nose ...
description: Exotic spice notes accent ripe yellow-peach and apricot aromas on the nose of this briskly composed, dry Riesling. The palate is intensely mineral, with layers of wet stones and crushed earth that lend a savoriness to delicate fruit and floral flavors. Finishes long, with a note of lime zest.

title: Schloss Vollrads 2010 Eiswein Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Amber in color, this eiswein boasts a rich, caramelized palate full of ...
description: Amber in color, this eiswein boasts a rich, caramelized palate full of sweet pastry, honey and baked-apple flavors. Hints of pollen and wax, along with a burst of intense orange-like acidity, add complexity to this intensely ripe, yet delicately textured wine.

title: Concha y Toro 2012 Terrunyo Costa Los Boldos Vineyard Block 6 Riesling (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Pear, apple and a drop of petrol work the nose on this ...
description: Pear, apple and a drop of petrol work the nose on this German-style Riesling from Chile. A touch of spritz offers bubbly zest to the palate feel, while acid-driven flavors of lemon-lime, mango, pineapple and white peach finish chalky and a touch sweet.

title: Chehalem 2012 Three Vineyard Riesling (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: A blend of three estate vineyards, this is all-stainless fermented, tart and ...
description: A blend of three estate vineyards, this is all-stainless fermented, tart and tasting more of skin than flesh. Citrus flavors of lemon and grapefruit, firm acidity and a wash of minerality keep it clean and refreshing.

title: Henry of Pelham 2012 Icewine Riesling (Short Hills Bench)
excerpt: A youthful and appealing wine with notes of orange peel, citrus and ...
description: A youthful and appealing wine with notes of orange peel, citrus and crushed flowers. The palate brings abundant stone fruit flavors that taper off toward the finish.

title: Chehalem 2012 Sext Riesling (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: This delicately spritzy Riesling carries a whiff of orange rind, along with ...
description: This delicately spritzy Riesling carries a whiff of orange rind, along with fresh flavors of lightly sweet tree fruits. Tasty on its own, or use it as a mixer for cocktails or punches.

title: Kudos 2012 Riesling (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Light citrus fruit flavors, notably lemon and lime, carry a whiff of ...
description: Light citrus fruit flavors, notably lemon and lime, carry a whiff of white flower as well. Forward, fruity and ready to drink, this affordable wine has a bit of extra complexity from skin contact as well. The finish brings in a hint of tea.

title: Ca' del Baio 2011 Riesling (Langhe)
excerpt: This Riesling from Piedmont has a fragrance of white spring flowers accented ...
description: This Riesling from Piedmont has a fragrance of white spring flowers accented by a hint of honey and beeswax. The palate is nervy and fresh, showing ripe pear, white pepper, clove and honey notes.

title: Wagner 2012 Ice Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Bright lemon, tangerine and white-floral notes are countered by whiffs of spice ...
description: Bright lemon, tangerine and white-floral notes are countered by whiffs of spice and earth on this robust, yet structured, ice wine. The mouthfeel is rich and lush, but brightened by clean, focused acidity and a hint of bitter grape tannin on the finish.

title: Meli 2012 Riesling (Maule Valley)
excerpt: Varietally familiar aromas of petrol and white fruits set up a tight, ...
description: Varietally familiar aromas of petrol and white fruits set up a tight, acidic palate with lemon-lime and nectarine flavors. On the finish, this tastes pithy and loses clarity and zest as it winds down.

title: Ste. Chapelle 2012 Special Harvest Riesling
excerpt: Made in a sweet style (75 g/L residual sugar) and needing a ...
description: Made in a sweet style (75 g/L residual sugar) and needing a bit more acid to make it work, it hits only a few notes but hits them hard with violets, peach and soda water.

title: Ste. Chapelle NV Chateau Series Riesling (Idaho)
excerpt: This medium sweet, easy drinker brings aromatic and flavorful notes of pear, ...
description: This medium sweet, easy drinker brings aromatic and flavorful notes of pear, jasmine and white flowers.

title: Jean-Marc Bernhard 2011 Wineck- Schlossberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: A full wine, bringing out great richness to sustain the intense acidity. ...
description: A full wine, bringing out great richness to sustain the intense acidity. The granite soil of the vineyard shows in the hard-edge of this still-young wine. To contrast, there is the lively lime fruit and great final freshness. Drink from 2017.

title: Pierre and Charles Sparr 2010 Schoenenbourg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: An intensely perfumed, beautifully rich wine. It has tense and mineral acidity, ...
description: An intensely perfumed, beautifully rich wine. It has tense and mineral acidity, citrus juice contrasted with pineapple freshness. Very full, rounded and ripe, this will age beautifully; drink from 2016 on.

title: Scarborough 2010 The Legend of... Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Travis Scarborough has produced an outstanding Riesling, with a light coating of ...
description: Travis Scarborough has produced an outstanding Riesling, with a light coating of honey over rich and tart lemon and pineapple fruit. The concentration and length are admirable; this wine is delicious now but could be cellared for a decade or longer.

title: Pierre and Charles Sparr 2011 Altenbourg Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Off-dry Riesling, rich, ripely textured and with great depth. This is a ...
description: Off-dry Riesling, rich, ripely textured and with great depth. This is a slightly spicy wine, full in the mouth and perfumed. Acidity gives shape and freshness to this apple and lime flavored wine. Drink after 2015.

title: Kuentz-Bas 2011 Tradition Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: A delicate, crisp, very pure wine. It has perfumes of white flowers, ...
description: A delicate, crisp, very pure wine. It has perfumes of white flowers, which continue with the addition of ripe pear and lime. Crisp at the end, for drinking now, but also keep until 2017.

title: Jean-Marc Bernhard 2011 Vieilles Vignes Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Fresh and very crisp, this is a distinctive, fragrant wine. It has ...
description: Fresh and very crisp, this is a distinctive, fragrant wine. It has concentration, tight acidity, with apples and minerality. At the end, the wine is more floral, open and ripe. Drink after 2016.

title: Leon Beyer 2011 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This is a soft and fruity wine, showing bright currant fruits in ...
description: This is a soft and fruity wine, showing bright currant fruits in a perfumed context. Tangy, nervy, showing plenty of minerality to boost the acidity and fruitiness.

title: Sparkman 2012 Birdie Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Sourced entirely from the Bacchus vineyard, this was whole-cluster pressed and 20% ...
description: Sourced entirely from the Bacchus vineyard, this was whole-cluster pressed and 20% was fermented in neutral oak. Just a hint of sweetness remains, but what comes across strongly is a mineral-driven, wet stone base, under snappy fruit flavors of citrus, apple and orange peel.

title: Finn Hill 2012 The Gnome Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This fruity, off-dry Riesling is sourced from the Lawrence Vineyards on the ...
description: This fruity, off-dry Riesling is sourced from the Lawrence Vineyards on the Royal Slope. Despite the relatively cool climate site, it has a ton of very ripe fruit, peaches and apricots. There is a slight bitterness, perhaps from skin contact, in the finish.

title: Boeckel 2012 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: A bone dry, tightly crisp wine, fragrant and floral. This is a ...
description: A bone dry, tightly crisp wine, fragrant and floral. This is a classic Alsace Riesling with its tight acidity, white fruits and taut, nervy texture. Drink after 2015.

title: Jean Becker 2009 Lerchenberg Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: A single vineyard wine, with light soil producing a fruity style of ...
description: A single vineyard wine, with light soil producing a fruity style of Riesling, fragrant and fresh. It has currant and spiced pear flavors, with a bright texture. It is ready to drink.

title: Mercer 2012 Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Off-dry and minty, with a strong streak of wintergreen, this simple, fruity ...
description: Off-dry and minty, with a strong streak of wintergreen, this simple, fruity Riesling offers fruit flavors of green apple and a bit of waxy lemon.

title: San Juan Vineyards 2012 Les Vignes De Marcoux Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: The residual sugar is a hefty 54g/L. Soft flavors of canned peaches ...
description: The residual sugar is a hefty 54g/L. Soft flavors of canned peaches and apricots fill the mouth immediately, then turn watery as the wine quickly slides into a lighter finish.

title: Kana 2012 Katie Mae Zillah Ranch Vineyard Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: This fruity wine is a sugary mix of bubble gum, mint and ...
description: This fruity wine is a sugary mix of bubble gum, mint and syrupy peaches. It consists of bold flavors, but lacks the delicacy that Riesling can show in many vintages.

title: Cave de Cleebourg 2011 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Soft, fresh, just off dry, a fruity wine that is light and ...
description: Soft, fresh, just off dry, a fruity wine that is light and fragrant. Crisp acidity cuts through the wine, giving a tight, nervy edge along with bright fruitiness.

title: Fess Parker 2012 Riesling (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: This is off-dry to sweet, with honey, orange and vanilla flavors with ...
description: This is off-dry to sweet, with honey, orange and vanilla flavors with a touch of petrol.

title: Mirassou 2012 Riesling (California)
excerpt: his off-dry wine has a sugary touch with flavors of ripe apricots, ...
description: his off-dry wine has a sugary touch with flavors of ripe apricots, oranges and peaches, along with the acidity and petrol notes that Riesling is famous for.

title: Bread & Butter 2012 Riesling (California)
excerpt: Made without oak, this Riesling is slightly sweet with sugary orange and ...
description: Made without oak, this Riesling is slightly sweet with sugary orange and peach flavors. It lacks the acidity to balance the sweetness, which makes the finish cloying.

title: Alexana 2012 Revana Vineyard Riesling (Dundee Hills)
excerpt: Rich, medium dry, and loaded with lemon, orange and citrus scents and ...
description: Rich, medium dry, and loaded with lemon, orange and citrus scents and flavors, this is a marvelous wine graced with a lush, textural, mineral-drenched mouthfeel. Despite the low alcohol there is just the gentlest touch of sweetness from 8 g/L residual sugar.

title: Zusslin 2010 Bollenberg Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Pale gold in color, the wine is already hinting at maturity. It ...
description: Pale gold in color, the wine is already hinting at maturity. It is deliciously ripe, perfumed with layers of green herbs and a finely textured character. Great acidity gives a tight, bright aftertaste.

title: Josmeyer 2011 Le Kottabe Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Very perfumed white flowers and fragrant lemon blossom lead on the nose. ...
description: Very perfumed white flowers and fragrant lemon blossom lead on the nose. It is so crisp, textured and nervy, as well as very attractive now. There is a fine shot of orange zest to give further fragrance at the end.

title: Domaine Zinck 2011 Terroir Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: A deliciously balanced wine, bringing perfumed white fruits, almonds and a lively ...
description: A deliciously balanced wine, bringing perfumed white fruits, almonds and a lively acidity easily together in harmony. There is just a touch of spice and minerality to add piquancy to this fruity wine.

title: Coquelicot 2011 Riesling (Santa Ynez Valley)
excerpt: A slight touch of residual sugar positions this Riesling between dry and ...
description: A slight touch of residual sugar positions this Riesling between dry and off-dry. It has rich apricot, orange and lime flavors, with a great burst of acidity.

title: Stoller 2012 Estate Exclusive Riesling (Dundee Hills)
excerpt: Despite the low alcohol, this is quite dry and tart, with a ...
description: Despite the low alcohol, this is quite dry and tart, with a lemony base and some orange-pekoe flavors also. Not a complex Riesling, but light and pleasantly sippable.

title: Emile Beyer 2012 Tradition Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Very crisp, tight wine with intense acidity and a nervy, taut character. ...
description: Very crisp, tight wine with intense acidity and a nervy, taut character. The wine is full of lemon fruit with a touch of zestiness as well, giving a tense, very fresh aftertaste.

title: Blue Moon 2011 Riesling (Oregon)
excerpt: This is the off-dry Blue Moon Riesling, with residual sugar listed at ...
description: This is the off-dry Blue Moon Riesling, with residual sugar listed at 18 g/L. Flavors are simple and lightly sugary, and the familiar blue bottle is a consumer favorite.

title: Blue Moon NV Semi-Sparkling Riesling (Oregon)
excerpt: The sweetest of the Blue Moon Riesling trio, this is also lowest ...
description: The sweetest of the Blue Moon Riesling trio, this is also lowest in alcohol, and has a semi-sparkling (frizzante) level of bubbles. In terms of flavor, it could be a dead ringer for an inexpensive Italian Moscato.

title: Robert Weil 2010 Kiedrich Turmberg Trockenbeerenauslese Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Rich, sweet honey mingles with spicy dried orange-peel and wax notes on ...
description: Rich, sweet honey mingles with spicy dried orange-peel and wax notes on this delectably creamy, marmalade-laden TBA. The palate brims with lusciously sweet preserved-peach flavors balanced by piercing citrus acidity and a long honey-kissed finish. Stunning now, but what a joy to keep for the next decade or two.

title: F X Pichler 2012 Loibner Oberhauser Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: This is an impressively rich, ripe wine that maintains great swathes of ...
description: This is an impressively rich, ripe wine that maintains great swathes of fresh pear and apple flavors. It is dense on the palate, with a powerful mineral and steel expression to pair with the opulent texture and rounded aftertaste. Should develop well over at least five years.

title: Dunham 2011 Lewis Estate Vineyard Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: As consistent as ever, this is sleek and stylish, with complex, layered ...
description: As consistent as ever, this is sleek and stylish, with complex, layered flavors of citrus rind, citrus flesh and delicate tropical fruits. There are further highlights of honeycomb and dried apricot, and mouth-pleasing, underlying minerality.

title: Dr. Pauly Bergweiler 2010 Bernkasteler Badstube Beerenauslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: The faintest whiff of petrol adds a seductive mineral tone to bright, ...
description: The faintest whiff of petrol adds a seductive mineral tone to bright, sweet honeyed peach and candied orange-peel notes on this penetrating Riesling. The palate bristles with acidity, intensifying juicy citrus flavors on the finish.

title: Dr. Hermann 2010 Erdener Treppchen Beerenauslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Aromas of honeycomb and lanolin lend a savory tone to this mineral-laden ...
description: Aromas of honeycomb and lanolin lend a savory tone to this mineral-laden Beerenauslese, but the palate is all deep, rich peach and quince preserves, with an endlessly rippling tangerine acidity.

title: Robert Weil 2010 Kiedrich Turmberg Beerenauslese Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: While a bit subdued on the nose, the tiniest sip reveals the ...
description: While a bit subdued on the nose, the tiniest sip reveals the power and intensity of this rich, decadent Beerenauslese. Delicate in frame, yet gorgeously concentrated, the palate is packed with wildflower honey and tangerine sweetness, countered by earthier notes of nuts, smoke and a wet-stone minerality.

title: Dutton-Goldfield 2011 Sticky Finish Riesling (Marin County)
excerpt: An incredible, complex honeyed-almond burst of a sweet wine, just 12% alcohol ...
description: An incredible, complex honeyed-almond burst of a sweet wine, just 12% alcohol with 19% residual sugar. With a taste of graham cracker shortbread, toffee and honeycomb, this is a seductive treat, easy going on its own, and with just the right level of acidity to pair with sharp cheeses.

title: Markus Huber 2012 Engelberg Riesling (Traisental)
excerpt: An intensely crisp and aromatic wine, this boasts great acidity along with ...
description: An intensely crisp and aromatic wine, this boasts great acidity along with bright fruitiness and a tight, mineral texture.  A bright wine with a good depth of flavor, packed with lemon and gooseberry notes. Screwcap.

title: Dr. Heidemanns-Bergweiler 2011 Bernkasteler Badstube Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: A burst of tropical mango and melon aromas introduce this juicy, delicately ...
description: A burst of tropical mango and melon aromas introduce this juicy, delicately structured Auslese. The palate is sweet with fresh stone-fruit flavors, but keenly balanced with layers of dusty earth and dried herbs that add complexity and depth. Bristling and crisp on the finish.

title: Markus Molitor 2010 Haus Klosterberg Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Hints of lanolin, fennel and beeswax add savory touches to elegant peach-preserve ...
description: Hints of lanolin, fennel and beeswax add savory touches to elegant peach-preserve and tangerine flavors on this delicate, almost lacy, Kabinett. Zippy lemon-lime acidity reverberates on the palate, carrying to a curiously spice-kissed finish.

title: Petaluma 2012 Hanlin Hill Riesling (Clare Valley)
excerpt: This is floral on the nose, offering up hints of talcum powder ...
description: This is floral on the nose, offering up hints of talcum powder and restrained fruit. Yet the apple, cinnamon and lime flavors bust out on the palate before ending in a long, potent, citrusy finish. Drink now or hold up to 10 years.

title: Peter Nicolay 2011 Bernkasteler Badstube Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Whiffs of crushed slate and smoke add earthy complexity to sweet yellow-peach ...
description: Whiffs of crushed slate and smoke add earthy complexity to sweet yellow-peach and pink-grapefruit flavors in this delicate but composed Auslese. Intensely minerally on the palate, it finishes with a fresh, green, floral flair and piercing citrus acidity.

title: Barnard Griffin 2012 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Gorgeous aromas of peach, pear, flower and spice highlight this wine right ...
description: Gorgeous aromas of peach, pear, flower and spice highlight this wine right from the start. There is an exotic, floral flavor running alongside the tree fruits, and suggestions of mint and rosewater. Excellent length and balance, with just a hint of sweetness.

title: Frankland Estate 2012 Smith Cullam Riesling (Frankland River)
excerpt: The Smith Cullam Riesling is made in a large French oak cask ...
description: The Smith Cullam Riesling is made in a large French oak cask in an off-dry style. The 2012 is higher in alcohol than the 2011, yet also seems sweeter. White peach, petrol and kerosene notes mark the nose and palate, while the finish is simultaneously sweet and tart.

title: Rheingraf 2011 Trocken Riesling (Rheinhessen)
excerpt: Whiffs of slate and petrol add nuance to white flower and pineapple ...
description: Whiffs of slate and petrol add nuance to white flower and pineapple aromas on this intensely minerally, dry Riesling. The palate is lush and full with ripe nectarine flavor, freshened with a swathe of fresh green herbs on the finish.

title: Dr. Pauly Bergweiler 2011 Bernkasteler alte Badstube am Doctorberg Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: While sprightly and sweet on the attack, this deeply fruity Riesling deepens ...
description: While sprightly and sweet on the attack, this deeply fruity Riesling deepens on the palate with layers of earth and smoky mineral tones. Juicy apricot and pink-grapefruit notes linger on the finish with an astringent touch of lemon rind.

title: A. Christmann 2010 Gimmeldinger Biengarten Trocken Riesling (Pfalz)
excerpt: Exquisitely smoky and savory dried herb tones calibrate rich, tropical fruit aromas ...
description: Exquisitely smoky and savory dried herb tones calibrate rich, tropical fruit aromas on this dry yet voluptuously textured Riesling. The palate is penetrating with minerality and a soft, elegant lemon-lime acidity. Finishes long and rich.

title: Schloss Gobelsburg 2010 Tradition Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: A smooth and just off-dry wine, this is spicy and aromatic. It ...
description: A smooth and just off-dry wine, this is spicy and aromatic. It has a line of steeliness that cuts right through the attractive fruitiness. There is also a sense of structure, with a depth of flavor as well as more attractive surface fruits.

title: Hermann Moser 2012 Gebling Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Intensely crisp and mineral, this wine puts forth bright citrus flavors for ...
description: Intensely crisp and mineral, this wine puts forth bright citrus flavors for its refreshing fruitiness. It is a light, lively and immediately drinkable wine, with brisk texture and acidity. Worth aging, but very drinkable now. Screwcap.

title: Carmel 2011 Single Vineyard Kayoumi White Riesling (Galilee)
excerpt: Fragrant and floral, this Riesling shines with lively notes of honeydew melon, ...
description: Fragrant and floral, this Riesling shines with lively notes of honeydew melon, peach flesh, clementine oil and a hint of petrol. Light weight and well balanced, with brisk acidity that lends a juicy, mouthwatering nature to the close.

title: Frankland Estate 2012 Rocky Gully Riesling (Frankland River)
excerpt: As a straightahead Aussie Riesling for drinking young alongside raw oysters, this ...
description: As a straightahead Aussie Riesling for drinking young alongside raw oysters, this has few equals. Scents of petrichor and fresh flower-shop greenery mingle easily on the nose, while the crispness of the high-acid backbone resounds on the palate, ending on a talc-like note.

title: Stadt Krems 2012 Steinterrassen Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Fresh, fragrant and aromatic, this is a clean, clear, limpid wine. Its ...
description: Fresh, fragrant and aromatic, this is a clean, clear, limpid wine. Its white fruit flavors are refreshingly crisp, offering delicious acidity. Finishes with a lively citrus aftertaste. Screwcap.

title: Wieninger 2012 Vienna Hills Riesling (Vienna)
excerpt: This wine comes from the Nussberg vineyards close to the Vienna woods. ...
description: This wine comes from the Nussberg vineyards close to the Vienna woods. It is aromatic, spicy and richly textured. The wine has warmth as well as crisp acidity and green-fruit flavors. Give it a year to mature. Screwcap.

title: Peter Mertes 2010 Bernkastel Kueser Gold Edition Kabinett Trocken Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Zesty lemon and yellow-peach notes are touched with lanolin on this dry, ...
description: Zesty lemon and yellow-peach notes are touched with lanolin on this dry, yet deeply fruity Riesling. Stone fruit flavors are intensely ripe, almost pulpy, on the palate, but accented with sharp lime acidity.

title: AntoLin Cellars 2011 Estate Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: There is a creamy, leesy mouthfeel to this estate-grown Riesling, whose residual ...
description: There is a creamy, leesy mouthfeel to this estate-grown Riesling, whose residual sugar is masked with acidity. Tart apple and pear fruit flavors finish with lighter notes of candied orange and citrus.

title: Jekel 2011 Riesling (Monterey)
excerpt: Made in a sweeter style, with white sugar-infused oranges, apples, limes and ...
description: Made in a sweeter style, with white sugar-infused oranges, apples, limes and peaches marking the flavors. That wonderful Monterey acidity keeps it all sharp and focused.

title: David Hill 2012 Estate Riesling (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: A rich and varied Riesling from vines planted in 1965, this mingles ...
description: A rich and varied Riesling from vines planted in 1965, this mingles luscious, almost candied citrus fruits with tangerine, pekoe tea, spices and hints of tropical fruit. A terrific value.

title: Sineann 2012 Riesling (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: A sweet, slightly sugary Oregon Riesling that gives a gentle nod to ...
description: A sweet, slightly sugary Oregon Riesling that gives a gentle nod to the German Kabinett style. The low (8%) alcohol is the tip-off. The delicate, floral aromas and light stone-fruit flavors make this an ideal summer sipping wine.

title: Coeur de Terre 2010 Riesling (McMinnville)
excerpt: This searingly tart take on Oregon Riesling will strike some tasters as ...
description: This searingly tart take on Oregon Riesling will strike some tasters as sucking on a lemon, while others will reach for the oyster knife and start shucking. Despite the high acidity, it is multidimensional and carries its sharply-defined flavors through a textural, bone-dry and complex finish.

title: Firestone 2011 Riesling (Central Coast)
excerpt: A polished Riesling, oily and soft, with off-dry flavors of citrus fruits, ...
description: A polished Riesling, oily and soft, with off-dry flavors of citrus fruits, nectarines, apples and vanilla. Nice for drinking on a summer afternoon.

title: Fox Meadow 2011 Riesling (Virginia)
excerpt: On the nose, aromas of wax, white orchard fruit and lemon are ...
description: On the nose, aromas of wax, white orchard fruit and lemon are offset by a note of wet stone. This is a medium-bodied wine that has an open-feeling, pliant midpalate. The finish bears zesty acidity, and it comes with a sweet-tasting flavor of lemon Italian ice.

title: Williamson Vineyard 2011 Dry Riesling
excerpt: This is an aromatic, sweet smelling Riesling with notes of ripe peach ...
description: This is an aromatic, sweet smelling Riesling with notes of ripe peach and honeysuckle. Though labeled as dry, at 1.86% residual sugar it drinks almost medium-sweet. Misdirection aside, it provides good value.

title: Jefferson Vineyards 2011 Johannisberg Riesling (Monticello)
excerpt: A note of graham cracker hits the nose first, followed by touches ...
description: A note of graham cracker hits the nose first, followed by touches of apple, lemon and granite. The palate is mineral driven, yet despite the bright acidity, the flavors taste a little dull.

title: Baron Knyphausen 2010 Hattenheimer Wisselbrunnen Auslese Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Delicate orange blossom and honey flavors meld with fresh, green herbal notes ...
description: Delicate orange blossom and honey flavors meld with fresh, green herbal notes on this elegant, yet lushly textured, Riesling. The palate is off-dry with concentrated white peach flavors, but finishes dry on a lingering chalky note.

title: Emmerich Knoll 2011 Ried Loibenberg Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
excerpt: Tight, bright acidity leads off this elegant, perfumed wine. With its white ...
description: Tight, bright acidity leads off this elegant, perfumed wine. With its white fruit and citrus flavors it is both rich and refreshing. A fine mineral streak runs right through this complex, certainly ageworthy wine.

title: Figgins 2012 Estate Riesling (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: Sold through the wine club. Excellent concentration in this ripe, full-bodied Riesling. ...
description: Sold through the wine club. Excellent concentration in this ripe, full-bodied Riesling. It delivers a boat-load of fruit flavors, explosive aromatics and marvelous length. Citrus, peach and pear fruit is underscored with delicate minerality. Juicy, sappy and long.

title: Prinz Salm 2010 Wallhausen Johannisberg GG Trocken Riesling (Nahe)
excerpt: Everything about this dry, voluptuous Riesling is intense and penetrating. The palate ...
description: Everything about this dry, voluptuous Riesling is intense and penetrating. The palate is concentrated with stonefruit and yellow flower notes, and bristling with lemon-lime acidity. Rich layers of crushed stone and mineral oil linger deliciously on the finish.

title: Baron Knyphausen 2010 Erbacher Michelmark Auslese Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Spice and lanolin notes are curious and enticing on the nose and ...
description: Spice and lanolin notes are curious and enticing on the nose and palate of this sunny and sweet, but impeccably balanced Riesling. Juicy, supple, apple jelly and quince flavors are offset by striking acidity and steely minerality that reverberate on the finish.

title: Dr. Loosen 2010 Wehlener Sonnenuhr Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Dark, smoky earth notes and savory dried herbs add fascinating complexity to ...
description: Dark, smoky earth notes and savory dried herbs add fascinating complexity to intensely floral, sweet stonefruit and citrus flavors on this flavorful, yet delicately structured Riesling. Lime and tangerine acidity reverberate on the palate,  leading a long, minerally finish.

title: Von Schleinitz 2009 Koberner Weissenberg Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Lanolin and waxy lemon-peel notes add an enticingly savory element to sweet, ...
description: Lanolin and waxy lemon-peel notes add an enticingly savory element to sweet, intensely concentrated citrus and honey flavors on this crisp Auslese-style Riesling. Shrieking acidity offsets all the juicy sweetness, leaving the finish remarkably dry.

title: Markus Molitor 2010 Wehlener Sonnenuhr Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: This intensely fruity, delicately structured Riesling showcases layers and layers of sweet ...
description: This intensely fruity, delicately structured Riesling showcases layers and layers of sweet stonefruit and qince jelly flavors. The attack is honeyed and rich, but balanced with a shower of citrus acidity and a steely minerality that lingers long on the finish.

title: Reichsgraf von Kesselstatt 2010 Brauneberger Juffer-Sonnenuhr GG Trocken Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: While elegantly fruity with hints of fresh peach and apple, this dry, ...
description: While elegantly fruity with hints of fresh peach and apple, this dry, mineral-focused Riesling showcases a lean, intensely linear profile. Brisk and revitalizing,it gains texture and astringency on the finish with hints of lanolin and lime pith.

title: Loosen Bros. 2011 Dr. L Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Intense lemon and lime-skin aromas add sheen to ripe, juicy citrus, peach ...
description: Intense lemon and lime-skin aromas add sheen to ripe, juicy citrus, peach and honey flavors in this off-dry Riesling. Racy and crisp on the palate, it finishes vibrant and dry with lingering crushed-slate minerality. A fantastic bargain for such a solid wine.

title: Scratch 2011 Riesling (Arroyo Seco)
excerpt: Unmistakably Riesling from the petrol notes that dominates. The winemaker calls it ...
description: Unmistakably Riesling from the petrol notes that dominates. The winemaker calls it off-dry, but it tastes dry in citrus, white flower and mineral notes, probably due  to the high acidity. Refreshingly low in alcohol.

title: Zero One Vintners 2011 Golden Delicious Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: In 2011, the fifth vintage of this Riesling, the alcohol is down ...
description: In 2011, the fifth vintage of this Riesling, the alcohol is down a bit, as is the price. It remains quintessentially fruity, done in a tangy/tart sweet and sour style. Juicy apple, kiwi, peach and pear flavors fill the mouth in a most satisfying style, perfect for front porch sipping.

title: Matetic 2012 Corralillo Riesling (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Wayward aromas of tropical fruits and diesel fumes are warm and mild. ...
description: Wayward aromas of tropical fruits and diesel fumes are warm and mild. The palate is plump and slightly citrusy, while flavors of white grapefruit, orange and pineapple end with pithy bitterness. On the finish, this is citrusy in flavor and pulpy in texture.

title: Peter Mertes 2011 Platinum Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Juicy and ripe with flavors of peach, tangerine and apple, this is ...
description: Juicy and ripe with flavors of peach, tangerine and apple, this is an easy-drinking, off-dry Riesling. Delicately structured, it finishes moderately long with a pleasantly bitter lime pith note.

title: Dr. Pauly Bergweiler 2011 Fritz Fisk Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Green, herbal notes are prominent on this brisk, savory Riesling. Lemony acidity ...
description: Green, herbal notes are prominent on this brisk, savory Riesling. Lemony acidity and hints of bitter lime pith add a stark, refreshing quality that would accompany rich goat cheese or cured meats quite well.

title: Kings Ridge 2011 Riesling (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: The best Kings Ridge Riesling since the 2007, this is a lickable, ...
description: The best Kings Ridge Riesling since the 2007, this is a lickable, lipsmacking, sweet-tart bottle of lemon-lime fruits with a perfect blend of sugar and acid. It captures the refined elegance of the best Willamette Valley Rieslings, and the crisp minerality underscores the mouthwatering fruit.

title: Peter Zemmer 2011 Riesling (Alto Adige)
excerpt: Peter Zemmer produces a fine and fragrant expression of Riesling with layers ...
description: Peter Zemmer produces a fine and fragrant expression of Riesling with layers of exotic fruit, citrus and white flower. The wine shows very nice heft and consistency in the mouth where it delivers length and a creamy, almost waxy feel.

title: Lechthaler 2011 Drago Riesling (Trentino)
excerpt: Drago is a cheerful line of wines from the Lechthaler estate in ...
description: Drago is a cheerful line of wines from the Lechthaler estate in northern Italy that delivers decent quality at accessible prices. This Riesling is thin and compact in the mouth but it does offer hints of flower and exotic fruit that recall the natural fragrances of the variety.

title: Lazy River 2011 Riesling (Yamhill-Carlton District)
excerpt: Here is a Riesling with a stated alcohol level of 8.7% abv, ...
description: Here is a Riesling with a stated alcohol level of 8.7% abv, and yet the acidity is so strong that the residual sugar barely registers. Lemony and showing some pretty honeysuckle flavors, this is a decent quaffing wine.

title: Dr. Konstantin Frank 2011 Reserve Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Intensely aromatic with scents of ripe stone fruit and exotic mango, this ...
description: Intensely aromatic with scents of ripe stone fruit and exotic mango, this delicately structured Riesling reverberates with acidity and fine, focused minerality. Semidry in style, it finishes long with lip-smacking fruitiness.

title: Sawtooth 2011 Riesling
excerpt: Spicy and substantial, this authoritative Riesling snaps into tight focus around apple ...
description: Spicy and substantial, this authoritative Riesling snaps into tight focus around apple and melon flavors. Hints of clove and ginger add complexity.

title: Red Newt Cellars 2011 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: While dainty in style, this refreshing Riesling is chock full of white-grapefruit ...
description: While dainty in style, this refreshing Riesling is chock full of white-grapefruit flavor accented by a flurry of white florals, lime and lanolin. Concentrated but fresh, the palate bristles with striking acidity and minerality.

title: Anthony Road 2010 Art Series Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Whiffs of blossom and ripe stone fruit lift savory apple aromas on ...
description: Whiffs of blossom and ripe stone fruit lift savory apple aromas on this brisk, refreshingly dry Riesling. Lean and steely in style, it penetrates the palate with intense lime and lime-skin flavors that ripple long on the finish.

title: Sheldrake Point 2011 Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Honeysuckle and violet notes add a lavish touch to nervy pineapple and ...
description: Honeysuckle and violet notes add a lavish touch to nervy pineapple and stone-fruit flavors in this light-bodied, but lushly textured, Riesling. Dry in style and intensely minerally.

title: McFadden 2011 Late Harvest Riesling (Potter Valley)
excerpt: A botrytis-blessed Riesling with 10.2 residual sugar, this dessert wine is decadent ...
description: A botrytis-blessed Riesling with 10.2 residual sugar, this dessert wine is decadent in stone fruit and sweet honey, with balanced acidity and a long finish.

title: Heron Hill 2011 Semi-Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Hints of nut oil and smoke lend a savory tone to bright ...
description: Hints of nut oil and smoke lend a savory tone to bright stone-fruit and floral notes on this delicate semidry Riesling. Brisk with lemon-lime acidity, it finishes long with a murmur of lanolin and honey comb.

title: Pacific Rim 2010 Wallula Vineyard Biodynamic Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Made from grapes sourced from a biodynamically farmed vineyard, this wine puts ...
description: Made from grapes sourced from a biodynamically farmed vineyard, this wine puts on an almost-magical display of flower and citrus scents. Deep and concentrated, this has harmonious and potent flavors, and it is amazing how the delicate floral aspect cuts across the juicy, citrusy taste.

title: Smith-Madrone 2011 Riesling (Spring Mountain)
excerpt: Classic Smith-Madrone Riesling, this is dryish and clean, with mouthwatering acidity and ...
description: Classic Smith-Madrone Riesling, this is dryish and clean, with mouthwatering acidity and hints of citrus, Asian pear, green apple and honey. It shows balance and elegance that is rare in California Riesling. Enjoyable now, and it should slowly develop nuances over the next eight years.

title: Pacific Rim 2010 Solstice Vineyard Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The four-decade-old vines have lent this wine unusual flavors of forest mushroom, ...
description: The four-decade-old vines have lent this wine unusual flavors of forest mushroom, lemon rind and verbena. It tastes completely dry, and it has a tartness that carries through the palate. Drink this with herb-roasted chicken or pasta primavera.

title: Fox Run 2010 Riesling 11 Lake Dana Vineyard Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Although it has a delicate structure, that feels almost lace-like on the ...
description: Although it has a delicate structure, that feels almost lace-like on the palate, this light-bodied Riesling bursts with concentrated ripe peach and apricot flavors. Semisweet in style, this has vibrant acidity and an oyster-shell- and stone-like minerality that lingers on the long finish.

title: Fox Run 2010 Riesling 12 Lake Dana Vineyard Riesling (Finger Lakes)
