excerpt: Crushed chalk and wax notes add a striking minerality to this delicately ...
description: Crushed chalk and wax notes add a striking minerality to this delicately framed, semisweet Riesling. A juicy wine, it offers an abundance of ripe stone-fruit and citrus flavors, with an earthen, waxy slick that lingers on the finish.

title: Navarro 2011 Riesling (Anderson Valley)
excerpt: A dry, light-bodied, easy-drinking Riesling, this has zesty lemon and grapefruit flavors, ...
description: A dry, light-bodied, easy-drinking Riesling, this has zesty lemon and grapefruit flavors, plus undertones of flower and spiced tangerine. The palate shows depth, and the finish is intense.

title: Fox Run 2010 Riesling 10 Lake Dana Vineyard Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Vibrant lemon- and lime-zest notes make this off-dry Riesling brisk and bright. ...
description: Vibrant lemon- and lime-zest notes make this off-dry Riesling brisk and bright. Chalky minerality and a saline tone add depth, and there is a pleasantly bitter lemon-peel note that lingers on the finish.

title: Wagner 2010 Semi Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Exuberant and floral on the nose, this Riesling is intense and fruity ...
description: Exuberant and floral on the nose, this Riesling is intense and fruity on the palate, with concentrated apple-jelly and peach flavors. Brightened by lime-inflected acidity, the long finish extends with a delicious waxy streak.

title: Lucas Vineyards 2010 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Waxy lemon peel and white blossom notes penetrate the nose and palate ...
description: Waxy lemon peel and white blossom notes penetrate the nose and palate of this concentrated and structured Riesling. Bold acidity adds a cutting edge to the midpalate before finishing on a zesty lime note.

title: Fulkerson 2010 William Vigne Dry Riesling (Seneca Lake)
excerpt: Fresh and floral on the nose and palate, this has loads of ...
description: Fresh and floral on the nose and palate, this has loads of white flower and Meyer lemon tones. Dry in style, it builds in intensity on the palate, with hints of honey, wax and saline-like minerality that linger on the finish.

title: Keuka Spring 2010 Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: While dainty in structure, this light-footed Riesling is intense and concentrated, with ...
description: While dainty in structure, this light-footed Riesling is intense and concentrated, with ripe stone-fruit and tangerine flavors. Nervy lemon-lime--like acidity and shades of slate and steel add depth and balance.

title: Wagner 2010 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: White pepper and smoke notes highlight the intense minerality in this steely ...
description: White pepper and smoke notes highlight the intense minerality in this steely Riesling. Lemony on the palate, this is crisp and brisk, and it comes with notes of wet slate and steel on the finish.

title: Atwater 2010 Estate Vineyards Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Yeasty, sweet pastry notes are enticing on the nose of this intense, ...
description: Yeasty, sweet pastry notes are enticing on the nose of this intense, juicy, off-dry Riesling. It has a delicate structure and a creamy texture, and it balances brisk, lemony acids with ripe yellow-peach and grapefruit flavors.

title: Heron Hill 2010 Ingle Vineyard Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: The nose and palate are smoky and waxy, with a shimmer of ...
description: The nose and palate are smoky and waxy, with a shimmer of petrol. The palate is brisk and lemony, with hints of citrus peel, nut oil and nut skin that linger on the long finish. This dry, savory Riesling is already showing signs of bottle age. Drink now.

title: Keuka Spring 2010 Semi Sweet Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Ripe yellow-peach and delicate red-berry hints lend a juicy, easygoing fruitiness to ...
description: Ripe yellow-peach and delicate red-berry hints lend a juicy, easygoing fruitiness to this concentrated Riesling. Soft, pink-grapefruit-like acidity and a flash of green herb add freshness to the finish.

title: Mercer 2011 Estate Grown Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Broad and a bit flat on the palate, this wine has flavors ...
description: Broad and a bit flat on the palate, this wine has flavors of lemon and grapefruit rind, light stone fruit and a dash of mineral.

title: Six Mile Creek 2010 Semi Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Exuberant and floral, this Riesling is lush and rich on the palate, ...
description: Exuberant and floral, this Riesling is lush and rich on the palate, and it offers sweet pink-grapefruit and white-peach flavors that are offset by a shower of lemony acids. A hint of crushed-stone-like minerality adds depth and complexity to the midpalate.

title: Lucas Vineyards 2010 Semi-Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: While initially a bit musky and waxy on the nose, this Riesling ...
description: While initially a bit musky and waxy on the nose, this Riesling gains strength on the palate as it offers rich honey and red apple flavors. The lemon-lime-like acidity lingers on the finish.

title: Casa Larga 2010 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Fresh mint and menthol notes lend a herbaceous tone to this dry, ...
description: Fresh mint and menthol notes lend a herbaceous tone to this dry, slightly grassy Riesling. Lemon and lime flavors are brisk and clean on the palate.

title: Chehalem 2011 Corral Creek Riesling (Chehalem Mountains)
excerpt: Due to extraordinarily sharp acidity in 2011, this tastes quite dry despite ...
description: Due to extraordinarily sharp acidity in 2011, this tastes quite dry despite residual sugar of 1.9%. A green berry flavor is matched to elements of mineral and fruit skin, lending length and texture to the wine.

title: Anam Cara 2011 Nicholas Estate Riesling (Chehalem Mountains)
excerpt: The alcohol is just 9.1%, with residual sugar of 3.6%, yet the ...
description: The alcohol is just 9.1%, with residual sugar of 3.6%, yet the wine does not taste that sweet. This is a wine that snaps back and forth from tart and tangy to fruity and sweet, with a juicy kick to the finish. It maintains good concentration and acidity throughout.

title: Chehalem 2011 Three Vineyard Riesling (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Using grapes from all three estate vineyards, this slightly sweet (2.5% residual ...
description: Using grapes from all three estate vineyards, this slightly sweet (2.5% residual sugar) Riesling is textural and complex. Flavors of fruit skin and rind dominate, notably grapefruit and peach pit.

title: Foris 2011 Riesling (Rogue Valley)
excerpt: Tart and fruity, this Riesling bears flavors of apple and white peach, ...
description: Tart and fruity, this Riesling bears flavors of apple and white peach, with an extra dimension of citrus rind. Balanced and lively, the fruit rules the day.

title: Morgan 2011 Double L Vineyard Riesling (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: This is fairly sweet, with flavors of honey, apricots, oranges, nectarines, white ...
description: This is fairly sweet, with flavors of honey, apricots, oranges, nectarines, white flowers, vanilla and minerals. Brisk acidity provides the perfect balance to the sweetness. Lovely now with Asian fusion fare.

title: Chehalem 2011 Ridgecrest Vineyards Wind Ridge Block Riesling (Ribbon Ridge)
excerpt: Tart and tightly focused, this single-block expression is pure green-apple fruit and ...
description: Tart and tightly focused, this single-block expression is pure green-apple fruit and acid.

title: Anam Cara 2011 Nicholas Estate Dry Riesling (Chehalem Mountains)
excerpt: Seemingly as tart as a Riesling can get despite having residual sugar ...
description: Seemingly as tart as a Riesling can get despite having residual sugar of 1.2%, this lemony lip-smacker shows good concentration. It would be a gem with the right foods, but on its own, the searingly tart acids may be too much for most tasters.

title: The White Knight 2011 Riesling (Lake County)
excerpt: This is a sweet wine with flavors of white sugar, orange, honey ...
description: This is a sweet wine with flavors of white sugar, orange, honey and vanilla, all brightened by crisp acidity.

title: Wittmann 2010 Westhofen Morstein GG Trocken Riesling (Rheinhessen)
excerpt: Ripe on the attack, with flavors of fleshy, yellow stone fruit and ...
description: Ripe on the attack, with flavors of fleshy, yellow stone fruit and marmalade, this voluptuous yet dry Riesling is balanced, with layers of crushed stone and slate-driven minerality. Tart, citrusy acidity sends a sunny shockwave to your senses.

title: Wittmann 2010 Westhofen Aulerde Trocken Riesling (Rheinhessen)
excerpt: Everything about this Riesling is elegant and balanced: Sweet-tasting, honeyed fruit and ...
description: Everything about this Riesling is elegant and balanced: Sweet-tasting, honeyed fruit and flower elements are countered by smoke and savory fennel notes. Rich, creamy textures are enlivened by a shock of lemon-lime acidity. Juicy yet refined, it lingers long with a kiss of sweet nectarine flavor.

title: Robert Weil 2010 Kiedrich Turmberg Trocken Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: There are dashes of exotic spice and ash that permeate into the ...
description: There are dashes of exotic spice and ash that permeate into the lavish stonefruit and waxy flower notes on the nose and palate. This is complex and intensely juicy; the brisk acidity and crushed gravel notes add a clean, minerally edge.

title: Baron Knyphausen 2010 Erbacher Marcobrunn Grosse Lage Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Lush and richly textured, this dry, full-bodied Riesling counterplays savory elements of ...
description: Lush and richly textured, this dry, full-bodied Riesling counterplays savory elements of smoke, fennel and sweat with bright notes of juicy tangerine, honey and lavender. Lemony acidity extends the finish, ending on an elegant, waxy flower note.

title: Reichsgraf von Kesselstatt 2010 Scharzhofberger #10 Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Slick with lanolin and honeycomb sheens, yet delicately textured, this is a ...
description: Slick with lanolin and honeycomb sheens, yet delicately textured, this is a symphonic harmony. Flavors of juicy, sweet, pink grapefruit and yellow peach are ripe and tangy, but shadings of jasmine tea and potpourri add edge on the finish.

title: Rheingraf 2010 Scharlachberg Bingen GG Trocken Riesling (Rheinhessen)
excerpt: This is intensely ripe and almost tropical, with yellow fruit and flower ...
description: This is intensely ripe and almost tropical, with yellow fruit and flower notes that are balanced with layers of smoke, wet stone and brisk, steely acidity. This is a dry yet lavishly textured wine, with flavors that meander long on the finish.

title: Dr. H. Thanisch (Erben Thanisch) 2010 Berncasteler Doctor Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Hints of smoke, caramel and lemon custard are curious and enticing on ...
description: Hints of smoke, caramel and lemon custard are curious and enticing on the nose and palate of this nuanced Riesling. Intense, ripe peach and apricot flavors are sweet but tangy with acidity. It finishes exceptionally long and remarkably dry.

title: Peter Nicolay 2010 Bernkasteler Badstube Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: This tastes delicately sugared, with a lacy, almost frilly mouthfeel. Soft white ...
description: This tastes delicately sugared, with a lacy, almost frilly mouthfeel. Soft white peach and flower blossom on the nose and palate make this an unabashedly lady-like Riesling, with a delicate crushed-stone minerality that reverberates on the finish.

title: Dr. Pauly Bergweiler 2010 Wehlener Sonnenuhr Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Savory tones of fennel, dried herb and petrol on the nose make ...
description: Savory tones of fennel, dried herb and petrol on the nose make the intensely fruity, almost tropical fruit flavors on the palate a bit surprising. This is semisweet, with sharp, focused acidity that lingers on the finish.

title: Peter Jakob Kuhn 2009 Oestrich Doosberg Trocken Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: Deeply smoky, as if enrobed in a layer of campfire ash, this ...
description: Deeply smoky, as if enrobed in a layer of campfire ash, this curiously aromatic Riesling pairs a dark, minerally element with notes of sweet, ripe melon and stone fruit. Dry and full bodied, with an herbaceous, fresh midpalate.

title: Dr. Heidemanns-Bergweiler 2010 Graacher Himmelreich Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Smoke and mineral oil tones add layers of depth to the pretty ...
description: Smoke and mineral oil tones add layers of depth to the pretty white blossom, peach and tangerine notes on this crisp, nervy Riesling. Mouthwateringly tangy with a delicious note of Sour Patch candy on the finish.

title: Schloss Reinhartshausen 2009 Erbach Marcobrunn Dry Riesling (Rheingau)
excerpt: While this is aromatic with scents of ripe apples, nectarines, honey and ...
description: While this is aromatic with scents of ripe apples, nectarines, honey and lanolin, it has a subdued elegance. The dry, medum-bodied palate is crisp and clean, with hints of green herbs and honeycomb that linger.

title: Three Rivers 2011 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This off-dry Riesling has enough acid to balance the 2.7% residual sugar. ...
description: This off-dry Riesling has enough acid to balance the 2.7% residual sugar. Aromas of flower and citrus blossom lead into lemon-driven fruit. There is just a bit of a granular, sugar-like feeling on the tongue.

title: Copper River Estate NV Diversion Riesling (Washington)
excerpt: This is an ordinary Riesling made in a dry style. Peach pit ...
description: This is an ordinary Riesling made in a dry style. Peach pit and citrus rind scents lead into similar flavors.

title: Elevation Cellars 2011 Imperium Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Big for a Riesling, this has concentrated, sappy, rich tropical-fruit flavors. The ...
description: Big for a Riesling, this has concentrated, sappy, rich tropical-fruit flavors. The grapes used were sourced from the Lawrence Vineyard on the Royal Slope. It has a fair amount of residual sugar, adding extra richness. Succulent peach, apricot and papaya notes sends lip-licking flavors deep into the finish.

title: Red Tail Ridge 2011 RTR Vineyard Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Scents of waxy lemon peel, lanolin, fresh herb and fennel entice on ...
description: Scents of waxy lemon peel, lanolin, fresh herb and fennel entice on this wonderfully dry Riesling, with penetrating lemon and white peach flavors. Brisk and vibrant, it has a refreshing crushed-stone minerality.

title: Domaine Zinck 2011 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: There is some steeliness here, with a great burst of white currant, ...
description: There is some steeliness here, with a great burst of white currant, fragrant apple and a twist of lemon. This is crisp and fruity. Screwcap.

title: Heart & Hands 2011 Hobbit Hollow Vineyard Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: A faint yeastiness subsides to expose luxurious aromas of violet, white peach ...
description: A faint yeastiness subsides to expose luxurious aromas of violet, white peach and green herb on this single-vineyard Riesling. Lushly textured with flavors of yellow cherry and stone fruit, it has a steely, minerally tone that persists through the long finish.

title: Erste Neue 2011 Rifall Riesling (Alto Adige)
excerpt: From the cool-climate north of Italy, this fresh Riesling offers fragrant tones ...
description: From the cool-climate north of Italy, this fresh Riesling offers fragrant tones of lemon zest, kiwi, exotic fruit and a touch of dried basil. The mouth is silky, smooth and crisp on the finish.

title: Swedish Hill 2011 Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Gorgeously aromatic with scents of honeysuckle, yellow stone fruit and waxy lanolin, ...
description: Gorgeously aromatic with scents of honeysuckle, yellow stone fruit and waxy lanolin, this balances serious fruit flavor with a layer of stony minerality and a dainty, almost lacy, layer of sugar that lingers on the palate.

title: Heart & Hands 2011 Patrician Verona Vineyard Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Fleshy stone fruit and waxy orange rind aromas introduce a dry, intensely ...
description: Fleshy stone fruit and waxy orange rind aromas introduce a dry, intensely minerally palate that rippples with lemon-lime acidity. Flavors of tart pineapple, citrus and fennel frond linger on the finish.

title: Heart & Hands 2011 Nutt Road Vineyard Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: An initial yeastiness on the nose blows off to reveal aromas of ...
description: An initial yeastiness on the nose blows off to reveal aromas of sweet, ripe apple, white blossom and savory smoke. Lushly concentrated, with sweet tangerine and apple flavors, it finishes with hints of lime zest and fennel.

title: Hugel 2011 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This crisp, fresh wine is perfumed and fragrant, tasting of apples. It ...
description: This crisp, fresh wine is perfumed and fragrant, tasting of apples. It is light and already accessible, with a bright lemon-zest flavor, followed by a white fruit note and a delicious citrus character on the finish.

title: Pierre Sparr 2011 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This is a softly floral wine, with citrus and fresh pear notes ...
description: This is a softly floral wine, with citrus and fresh pear notes that accompany green apple. It is ripe and fruity, with a light tang of orange on the finish. Screwcap.

title: Swedish Hill 2011 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Pretty floral aromas accent notes of fennel and savory apple on this ...
description: Pretty floral aromas accent notes of fennel and savory apple on this dry, crisp Riesling. Bright and bold on the palate, this has lemony acidity and an abundance of fresh apple flavor.

title: Wunsch & Mann 2007 Hengst Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: With a dominant aroma of petrol, this mature Riesling has some sweetness ...
description: With a dominant aroma of petrol, this mature Riesling has some sweetness and a very perfumed character. It is obviously very ready to drink.

title: Gainey 2010 Riesling (Santa Ynez Valley)
excerpt: Somewhere between off-dry and sweet, this Riesling features orange, tropical fruit and ...
description: Somewhere between off-dry and sweet, this Riesling features orange, tropical fruit and honey flavors, with a refreshing cut of acidity. It saw no oak.

title: San Juan Vineyards 2011 Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: This is a pleasant, ripe and roundly fruity Riesling. Its medium sweet ...
description: This is a pleasant, ripe and roundly fruity Riesling. Its medium sweet with a slightly sugary mouthfeel, bearing flavors that are upfront and well balanced acidity.

title: Cave B 2010 Estate Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: With close to 2% residual sugar, this seems as if it would ...
description: With close to 2% residual sugar, this seems as if it would show some sweetness. But it has an edgy sharpness, matching primary tastes of peach and apricot to a fruit skin flavor and a hint of diesel. Give it another year or two to round out a bit.

title: Trisaetum 2011 Ribbon Ridge Estate Dry Riesling (Ribbon Ridge)
excerpt: Gorgeous minerality is the underpinning of this estate bottling. Heaps of dry ...
description: Gorgeous minerality is the underpinning of this estate bottling. Heaps of dry extract amplify racy lemon and lime flavors. Despite its low alcohol, this wine has exceptional concentration and power.

title: Hyland 2011 Riesling (McMinnville)
excerpt: There seems to be a bit of residual sugar in this wine, ...
description: There seems to be a bit of residual sugar in this wine, just enough to offset the searing acidity. Some nice flower notes highlight the aromas, with flavors of tart peach and citrus filling in the rest.

title: Hyland 2010 Riesling (McMinnville)
excerpt: This is crisp and refreshing, although it shows little of the complex ...
description: This is crisp and refreshing, although it shows little of the complex aromatics that some Rieslings obtain. Scents and flavors of green apples and white peaches carry through onto the modest finish.

title: Meli 2011 Riesling (Maule Valley)
excerpt: The bouquet here is crisp, dry and minerally, with a petrol scent. ...
description: The bouquet here is crisp, dry and minerally, with a petrol scent. In the mouth, it feels snappy, cutting and citrusy, with orange and peach flavors. This is fruity and solid, with juicy acidity and a citrus-dominant character. Made using grapes from old vines planted in the 1950s.

title: Sheldrake Point 2010 Ice Wine Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: While buoyantly aromatic with aromas of superripe tropical fruit, honeysuckle and waxy ...
description: While buoyantly aromatic with aromas of superripe tropical fruit, honeysuckle and waxy honeycomb, this top-notch ice wine is remarkably elegant in profile. On the palate, concentrated honey and tangerine flavors are matched with steely acidity that reigns the palate in toward a dry, crisp finish.

title: Equifera 2009 Icewine Riesling (Niagara Peninsula)
excerpt: While Equifera, produced by Inniskillin co-founder, Donald Ziraldo, may still be an ...
description: While Equifera, produced by Inniskillin co-founder, Donald Ziraldo, may still be an unfamiliar name, one sip of this Riesling ice wine is proof of its impeccable pedigree. Intensely aromatic with loads of fresh apple, honey and white blossom aromas, it balances luscious sweetness with bracing acidity and a long, undulating floral finish.

title: Inniskillin 2008 Ice Wine Riesling (Niagara Peninsula)
excerpt: Gorgeously aromatic with notes of freshly pressed apple, wildflower honey and tangerine ...
description: Gorgeously aromatic with notes of freshly pressed apple, wildflower honey and tangerine peel, this is a richly textured, almost creamy, ice wine. Intense flavors of honey and fresh apple ripple on the palate, with striking lemon acidity that lends a squeaky clean finish.

title: Cave Spring 2009 Indian Summer Riesling (Niagara Peninsula)
excerpt: Just a touch of dried herb adds a surprising element to the ...
description: Just a touch of dried herb adds a surprising element to the intense honey, white flower and sweet tangerine flavors on this beautiful late-harvest Riesling. Striking lemon-lime acidity and a shower of crushed stones on the finish add elegance and balance.

title: Lamoreaux Landing 2011 Red Oak Vineyard Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: This is intoxicating on the nose with scents of white flowers, fresh ...
description: This is intoxicating on the nose with scents of white flowers, fresh herbs and honey, layered with hints of smoke and pine needles. Just a shade off-dry, the palate boasts ample peach and pear flavors that are tinged with a bitter lime-skin note and bristling minerality.

title: Hazlitt 1852 Vineyards 2011 Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Intensely tropical on the nose and palate, this off-dry Riesling shines with ...
description: Intensely tropical on the nose and palate, this off-dry Riesling shines with notes of juicy melon, papaya and peach candy, with a hint of white, waxy flower for extra flair. Brisk acidity keeps all that fruity sweetness in check, leading to a sleek, steely finish.

title: Glenora 2011 Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Fragrant yellow and purple flowers on the nose and palate of this ...
description: Fragrant yellow and purple flowers on the nose and palate of this medium-sweet Riesling add a subtle perfume to all of the ripe, luscious white-peach and nectarine flavors. Hints of wet stone and lime-like acidity lend a crisp, tonic tone to the midpalate, extending onto the long, lingering finish.

title: Glenora 2011 Select Harvest Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Fresh and floral, this has scents of green herb, honeysuckle and apple ...
description: Fresh and floral, this has scents of green herb, honeysuckle and apple blossom. On the palate, this medium-sweet late-harvest offering is rich and fruity, with concentrated notes of sweet pear and lemon. The finish is long but wraps up elegantly and dry with a kiss of lime peel and pith.

title: Red Newt Cellars 2010 Tango Oaks Vineyard Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: A hint of exotic spice adds dimension to the freshly pressed apple ...
description: A hint of exotic spice adds dimension to the freshly pressed apple and tangerine skin notes on the nose and palate of this off-dry Riesling. Intense, ripe fruit is balanced by bracing lime-juice acidity that lingers long on the finish.

title: Knapp 2011 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Abundantly floral and fruity, with loads of lavender, peony and sweet grapefruit ...
description: Abundantly floral and fruity, with loads of lavender, peony and sweet grapefruit notes, this is a dry yet remarkably lush and concentrated Riesling. Vivid acidity and lingering hints of lime skin, wax and lanolin add structure and complexity.

title: Heron Hill 2009 Reserve Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Bone dry, with bristling notes of wet stone, slate and petrol, this ...
description: Bone dry, with bristling notes of wet stone, slate and petrol, this boasts striking minerality, with undertones of white blossoms, limes and sugar cookie that linger delicately on the finish. Brisk with acidity, it would pair fabulously with goat cheese or fatty salmon.

title: Rooster Hill 2010 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Savory notes of fennel and exotic spice add a dose of complexity ...
description: Savory notes of fennel and exotic spice add a dose of complexity to the sweet apple and pear flavors of this dry Riesling. Crisp, clean and refreshing, it finishes with a delicate green-floral note.

title: Waterbrook 2011 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Off-dry and loaded with flavors of lemon, honey and tea, this is ...
description: Off-dry and loaded with flavors of lemon, honey and tea, this is a rather fleshy Riesling. The almost 2% residual sugar leads into a slightly sweet finish.

title: Treleaven 2010 Dry Riesling (Cayuga Lake)
excerpt: Hints of wet stone add a minerally sheen to the fresh apple ...
description: Hints of wet stone add a minerally sheen to the fresh apple and heady white-flower notes on this refreshing wine. Lemon-lime acidity leads to a long, lean and steely finish.

title: Hosmer 2011 Riesling (Cayuga Lake)
excerpt: Hints of fennel add a splash of green to the intense yellow ...
description: Hints of fennel add a splash of green to the intense yellow peach, pineapple and honeysuckle flavors of this penetrating, off-dry Riesling. The palate is lush with sweet fruit flavors, but spirited lemon-lime acidity carries it to a dry, elegantly floral finish.

title: Rooster Hill 2010 Medium Sweet Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Luscious tropical fruit and jasmine notes are framed by hints of fresh ...
description: Luscious tropical fruit and jasmine notes are framed by hints of fresh green herb and grass. A spray of lemony acidity and smoky white-tea notes add delicate flair to the finish.

title: Sleight of Hand 2011 The Magician Evergreen Vineyard White Wine Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Despite its 2.4% residual sugar, this is a tart, lemony wine that ...
description: Despite its 2.4% residual sugar, this is a tart, lemony wine that seems made to enjoy with raw oysters. The searing acidity is not for everyone, but if you like lip-smacking tartness, this has the depth and flavor to match it.

title: Hosmer 2011 Dry Riesling (Cayuga Lake)
excerpt: A hint of white flower brightens the savory notes of fennel, sea ...
description: A hint of white flower brightens the savory notes of fennel, sea breeze and pressed apple on this richly concentrated Riesling. The palate is fresh, dry and zippy, with loads of juicy tangerine, green apple and slightly underripe stone-fruit flavors. It finishes on a note of steely slate and struck flint.

title: Silver Thread 2011 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Restrained, rather savory aromas of dill, fennel, apple and saline are some ...
description: Restrained, rather savory aromas of dill, fennel, apple and saline are some of the many nuances of this dry yet surprisingly supple Riesling. The palate boasts notes of bright apple, lime juice and lime skin, highlighted by a rich, minerally sheen.

title: Dr. Konstantin Frank 2011 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Shades of smoke, dried herbs and nut skins add savory tones to ...
description: Shades of smoke, dried herbs and nut skins add savory tones to this dry Riesling. The palate builds intensity on the midpalate with layers of fresh apple, lime skin and underripe stone fruit, bolstered by sprightly tangerine-laced acidity.

title: Maestral 2011 Wein der Eisbox Tondre Vineyard Riesling (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: This is very sweet in honey flavor, with fruity notes of apricot ...
description: This is very sweet in honey flavor, with fruity notes of apricot and orange. It could benefit from greater acidity to balance the sweetness, but it sure is a decadent dessert sipper.

title: Claiborne & Churchill 2010 Dry Riesling (Edna Valley)
excerpt: Dryish and tart in acidity, this has flavors of citrus, tropical fruit, ...
description: Dryish and tart in acidity, this has flavors of citrus, tropical fruit, Asian pear and green apple, marked by that distinctly Riesling note of diesel fuel.

title: Airfield Estates 2011 Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: The 2011 vintage created wines with underripeness and low alcohol, and this ...
description: The 2011 vintage created wines with underripeness and low alcohol, and this Riesling attempts to cut the sourness with its 2.4% residual sugar. It comes across as a mix of lemon juice, orange juice, and simple sweetness.

title: Pine & Post NV Riesling (Washington)
excerpt: This nonvintage Riesling offers light apple flavors and a hint of spice.
description: This nonvintage Riesling offers light apple flavors and a hint of spice.

title: Wente 2010 Riverbank Riesling (Arroyo Seco)
excerpt: Off-dry to sweet, this is firmed up with crisp acidity. The citrus, ...
description: Off-dry to sweet, this is firmed up with crisp acidity. The citrus, honeysuckle and vanilla flavors are easy to like, with a flowery, sweet finish. This delightful Riesling calls to mind gardens on summer evenings.

title: ForestVille 2010 Riesling (California)
excerpt: Sweet, soft and simple, this has candied lemon and pineapple flavors.
description: Sweet, soft and simple, this has candied lemon and pineapple flavors.

title: Gamache 2010 Estate Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: A leesy, textural, racy and refreshing Riesling, this is loaded with lime, ...
description: A leesy, textural, racy and refreshing Riesling, this is loaded with lime, grapefruit and melon flavors. There is a streak of gin-like botanicals as well, and a rich, resonant finish.

title: Mercer 2010 Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: It would be interesting to slip this marvelous Riesling into a blind ...
description: It would be interesting to slip this marvelous Riesling into a blind tasting of Mosel wines. Superb balance and finesse underscore the delicately rendered flavors of peach, apricot and lemon tea. A scent of powdered sugar is the only suggestion of the 1% residual sugar.

title: Tempus Cellars 2011 Evergreen Vineyard Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Another successful vintage for this wine, it maintains a clean, well-defined mouthfeel ...
description: Another successful vintage for this wine, it maintains a clean, well-defined mouthfeel that barely registers the 1.3% residual sugar. The aromas of pear, melon and citrus rind introduce similar flavors, along with a suggestion of sweet orange candy.

title: J. Bookwalter 2011 Notebook Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This is a big-style, full-bodied Riesling, with fleshy citrus notes of grapefruit ...
description: This is a big-style, full-bodied Riesling, with fleshy citrus notes of grapefruit and orange. As is often true in Washington, the residual sugar (1.6%) is entirely masked by the acidity.

title: Jones of Washington 2011 Estate Vineyards Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: A pleasing, well-crafted Riesling in a lighter, elegant mode, this brings a ...
description: A pleasing, well-crafted Riesling in a lighter, elegant mode, this brings a delicate stone-fruit flavor into a mix of mineral and breakfast tea highlights. The moderate alcohol makes it an ideal summer sipper.

title: Francis Coppola 2010 Sofia Riesling (Monterey County)
excerpt: This is off-dry, with flavors of oranges, peaches, honey and white flowers. ...
description: This is off-dry, with flavors of oranges, peaches, honey and white flowers. The sweetness is balanced by crisp Monterey acidity.

title: Domaines Schlumberger 2008 Kessler Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Beautifully balanced and racy, this is packed with spice and juicy fruit ...
description: Beautifully balanced and racy, this is packed with spice and juicy fruit flavors. It layers currants and fresh fruits with a mature hint of toast. This finishes with a fine swathe of delicious fruit.

title: Domaine Gresser 2008 Kastelberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Full bodied and ripe, this also has a dry, taut intensity. The ...
description: Full bodied and ripe, this also has a dry, taut intensity. The flavors of white fruit, spice and nut are beginning to mature. This is a rich effort, and it could age longer.

title: Martin Schaetzel 2010 Kaefferkopf Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Fresh and juicy initially, it then develops a fuller, more complex character. ...
description: Fresh and juicy initially, it then develops a fuller, more complex character. It has weight and richness, with flavors of spice and yellow fruit and a streak of a citrus. There is good concentration in this intense, full-bodied and ageworthy wine.

title: Domaine Vincent Stoeffler 2010 Kirchberg de Barr Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This is a really fruity wine, with a mineral depth that lends ...
description: This is a really fruity wine, with a mineral depth that lends a crisp feel. The wine is taut, balancing its steely character with citrus flavors.

title: Trimbach 2009 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This is a finely balanced wine, showing ripe fruit along with tangy ...
description: This is a finely balanced wine, showing ripe fruit along with tangy citrus and pineapple flavors. It has weight and richness, with a full, concentrated character. Although this is ready to drink now, it is also worth aging for another year to bring out even more fruit.

title: Domaine Bott-Geyl 2010 Schlossberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Warm and rich, this has flavors of spices and apricots, with a ...
description: Warm and rich, this has flavors of spices and apricots, with a good concentrated character. Rich and powerful, it is full on the palate and needs more time to develop.

title: Domaine Viticole de la Ville de Colmar 2009 Hengst Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This is a well-balanced wine that attracts immediately with its generous fruit ...
description: This is a well-balanced wine that attracts immediately with its generous fruit balanced with tangy acidity and fine citrus flavors. Crisp and concentrated, this is meant for aging over several years.

title: Domaine Albert Mann 2010 Furstentum Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: A big, full bodied wine, this has power and some concentration. The ...
description: A big, full bodied wine, this has power and some concentration. The weight comes from the intensity of rich fruit. Hints of spice, white currant and stewed pear are absorbed by the taut structure. This is a wine with aging potential.

title: Jean Becker 2009 Froehn Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Balanced and showing some maturity, this is a toasty, ripe wine. It ...
description: Balanced and showing some maturity, this is a toasty, ripe wine. It is fruity, with some weight, while keeping remaining poised and crisp. Packed with just the right tang of acidity, it is already delicious, but should age over several years.

title: Martin Schaetzel 2010 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Taut, tight and tangy, this has a great zing of citrus and ...
description: Taut, tight and tangy, this has a great zing of citrus and spice. The texture is still young, with a lime flavor, hinting at the creamy character to come. Give this wine two more years.

title: Cave de Kientzheim-Kaysersberg 2009 The Furst Grand Cru Schlossberg Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: A full-bodied wine, this is packed with flavors of white fruit and ...
description: A full-bodied wine, this is packed with flavors of white fruit and citrus. The texture is soft, hinting at some sweetness. It feels weighty, packed with a fine concentration of fruit and toast. Give this rich wine at least three years.

title: Domaine Bernhard & Reibel 2008 Weingarten Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This full-bodied wine shows maturity and weight. Its flavors of currants and ...
description: This full-bodied wine shows maturity and weight. Its flavors of currants and dried plums are balanced by notes of toast and yeast. Not for aging, this offers fine drinking pleasure now.

title: Domaine Ernest Burn 2009 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This has sweetness, with flavors of ripe currants and plums and a ...
description: This has sweetness, with flavors of ripe currants and plums and a touch of orange marmalade. It is warm, ripe and already opulent. Drink this over the next two years.

title: Ruhlmann 2007 Frankstein Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Rich, round and full bodied, this is ready to drink. It has ...
description: Rich, round and full bodied, this is ready to drink. It has weight, with flavors of ripe fruit, toast and piles of spice. Drink now.

title: Marc Kreydenweiss 2010 Andlau Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This is an apple- and grapefruit-flavored wine, with fine acidity and a ...
description: This is an apple- and grapefruit-flavored wine, with fine acidity and a lively texture of spices and almonds. The finish bears a flower character. Ready to drink.

title: Domaine Vincent Stoeffler 2009 Muhlforst Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: While the first signs of maturity are showing, the wine also retains ...
description: While the first signs of maturity are showing, the wine also retains fresh currant and pear flavors. It is warm, rounded and ripe, with some yeast and toast notes as well as touches of spiced pear and baked apples.

title: Cave de Beblenheim 2010 Baron de Hoen Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Full and fruity, this is already a delicious wine. A note of ...
description: Full and fruity, this is already a delicious wine. A note of tangy citrus enlivens the apple and pear flavors. This has weight and an intense texture, with warm acidity and a touch of spice on the finish.

title: Willm 2009 Kirchberg de Barr Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This is already mature. It has weight and demonstrates a delicious balance ...
description: This is already mature. It has weight and demonstrates a delicious balance between a ripe white-fruit flavor and fresh acidity, with a fine note of tangy citrus. Ready to drink.

title: Wolfberger 2011 Signature Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Closed and mineral at this stage, this is will develop well into ...
description: Closed and mineral at this stage, this is will develop well into a crisp, ripe, lemon-scented wine, with a hint of yellow fruit and attractive acidity. Give it at least a year.

title: Leon Beyer 2010 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This is a tight, tangy wine, and its fruit is still developing. ...
description: This is a tight, tangy wine, and its fruit is still developing. In the future, it will have a steely, nervy character, with its fruit showing more citrus.

title: Ojai 2010 Kick On Ranch Riesling (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: What a surprise to find that this Riesling is bone dry. It ...
description: What a surprise to find that this Riesling is bone dry. It boasts complex flavors of mineral, lime, Meyer lemon and orange zest, with fantastic acidity that awakens the palate and prepares it for food.

title: Cave de Hunawihr 2011 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Round and full-bodied, this has a spice note and a perfumed, floral ...
description: Round and full-bodied, this has a spice note and a perfumed, floral character. The wine is bright, still rather tight, needing a few months to develop.

title: Domaine Michel Fonne 2010 Tradition Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Creamed pear- and apple-skin flavors give a wine that has warm acidity, ...
description: Creamed pear- and apple-skin flavors give a wine that has warm acidity, with touches of vanilla and almond. This is warm, rounded and full bodied, with a tang of citrusy acidity that hints at its aging potential.

title: Domaine Robert Klingenfus 2011 Signature Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Showing fine acidity, this has a creamy texture and a rich, rounded ...
description: Showing fine acidity, this has a creamy texture and a rich, rounded feel. Full of pear and creamed-apple flavors, it has some weight and a full-bodied character without losing the crisp acidity.

title: Cave de Kientzheim-Kaysersberg 2009 The Furst Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This is a ripe, rich wine, with an open yellow-fruit flavor. It ...
description: This is a ripe, rich wine, with an open yellow-fruit flavor. It has weight that lends a full-bodied character. While missing a more nervy character, it gives warm pleasure.

title: Henri Schoenheitz 2009 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Apple and peach flavors are mixed with a tangy character, leavened with ...
description: Apple and peach flavors are mixed with a tangy character, leavened with notes of almond and toast. With its attractive maturity, it is ready to drink.

title: Hugel 2010 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: While it does not have strong intensity, this is a wine that ...
description: While it does not have strong intensity, this is a wine that packs pleasure. It is fruity and rounded, with plenty of green apple and white fruit flavors. There is an attractive tang of citrus that adds lift to the finish. Enjoy soon.

title: Dopff Au Moulin 2011 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Perfumed and rounded, this has fine acidity and a warm, sunny feel. ...
description: Perfumed and rounded, this has fine acidity and a warm, sunny feel. Flavors of apples and pears are cut through with a lime juice note, yielding a balanced wine that will develop quickly.

title: Jean Becker 2009 Kronenbourg Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Medium sweet, this wine has warm currant and stewed-pear flavors. It has ...
description: Medium sweet, this wine has warm currant and stewed-pear flavors. It has weight to go with its sweet character. Soft and gentle, this is ready to drink.

title: Domaine Bernhard & Reibel 2009 Vieilles Vignes Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Round and full-bodied, this has warm apricot and ripe pineapple flavors. It ...
description: Round and full-bodied, this has warm apricot and ripe pineapple flavors. It has weight and richness, with a touch of toast and a smoky finish.

title: Arthur Metz 2008 Steinklotz Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This shows intense flavors of spice, orange marmalade and lime. It is ...
description: This shows intense flavors of spice, orange marmalade and lime. It is developing quickly.

title: Mezzacorona 2011 Riesling (Trentino)
excerpt: This is lightly fragrant, with a bright floral bouquet. It offers the ...
description: This is lightly fragrant, with a bright floral bouquet. It offers the natural personality of this varietal without being overdone or too heavy. Bright, crisp and lean, it is the perfect companion to spicy Thai food.

title: Santa Barbara Winery 2010 Lafond Vineyard 8.3 Riesling (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: The 8.3 designation refers to the residual sugar by weight. It is ...
description: The 8.3 designation refers to the residual sugar by weight. It is indeed a very sweet wine, rich in simple honey, orange and apricot flavors.

title: Foris 2010 Riesling (Rogue Valley)
excerpt: Blocky and tart, this shows little of the flower or delicate citrus ...
description: Blocky and tart, this shows little of the flower or delicate citrus notes that many Oregon Rieslings convey. The clean apple flavor makes it good for summer picnics.

title: Jean Becker 2011 Hagenschlauf Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: This is rich both on the nose and on the palate. Full ...
description: This is rich both on the nose and on the palate. Full and rounded, it has spice and currant flavors. There is a burnt-almond bitterness that marks the finish.

title: Frey-Sohler 2011 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: A very perfumed wine, with a thin texture. It has pure apple-juice ...
description: A very perfumed wine, with a thin texture. It has pure apple-juice flavors that lend a creamy feel, with a soft, rounded finish.

title: Louis Sipp 2010 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Rather thin on the palate, the wine feels slightly unfocussed. Drink soon.
description: Rather thin on the palate, the wine feels slightly unfocussed. Drink soon.

title: Domaine Bott-Geyl 2010 Schoenenbourg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: The perfumes are slightly unbalanced, tasting confected. The fruit seems to be ...
description: The perfumes are slightly unbalanced, tasting confected. The fruit seems to be missing.

title: Eichinger 2010 Gaisberg Erste Lage Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: This has great concentration of fruit, texture and acidity. It has white ...
description: This has great concentration of fruit, texture and acidity. It has white and green fruits layered upon the mineral and zesty texture. The wine is ripe and yet so crisp and fresh. It is ready to age for many years.

title: Geyerhof 2010 Kirchensteig Erste Lage Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: One of a series of great single-vineyard wines from Geyerhof, this is ...
description: One of a series of great single-vineyard wines from Geyerhof, this is as impressive as the rest. It has weight, complexity and richness. Its perfumed fruits provide a delicate counterpoint to the acidity, taut minerality and herbal edge. For aging over at least five years.

title: AntoLin Cellars 2010 Glacier Estate Vineyard Riesling (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: This cool-climate Riesling, technically off-dry with 2% residual sugar, has very tart, ...
description: This cool-climate Riesling, technically off-dry with 2% residual sugar, has very tart, highly extracted flavors, with flavors including tangy citrus, peach, apricot and papaya. The length, acidity, texture, mouthfeel, depth and surpassing freshness are exceptional.

title: Salomon-Undhof 2011 Pfaffenberg Erste Lage Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: This is a taut, terroir-driven Riesling. It is textured with both minerality ...
description: This is a taut, terroir-driven Riesling. It is textured with both minerality and tense, racy fruitiness. With its perfumed background, this is a wine for aging. Screwcap.

title: Kirchmayr 1992 Solist Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: This has memorable aromas of warm hat, green herbs and perfumed fruit ...
description: This has memorable aromas of warm hat, green herbs and perfumed fruit candy. It is a delicious wine that has been aged in cask before bottling.

title: Forstreiter 2010 Schiefer Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: This is an intriguing wine, with its perfumed aromas of wild flower ...
description: This is an intriguing wine, with its perfumed aromas of wild flower and cinnamon. The acidity cuts through the delicious apple flavor, and the finish has a great crisp feel. Screwcap.

title: Nigl 2010 Senftenberger Pellingen Erste Lage Privat Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: While this is rich, it is also balanced and elegant. This is ...
description: While this is rich, it is also balanced and elegant. This is an impressive, ageworthy wine, with a perfumed, spicy character. It has white fruit and peach flavors and taut acidity. Screwcap.

title: Hirsch 2010 Gaisberg Erste Lage Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: Smooth and beautifully perfumed, this has pure fruit flavors, with hints of ...
description: Smooth and beautifully perfumed, this has pure fruit flavors, with hints of walnut, spice and intense minerality. The wine is crisp, promising a future that will be richer and impressive. Screwcap.

title: Hogue 2010 Genesis Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Irresistible from the get-go, this fragrant wine offers up inviting aromas of ...
description: Irresistible from the get-go, this fragrant wine offers up inviting aromas of citrus, stone and exotic tropical fruits. Flavors of ripe peaches, brightened with vivid acidity, keep it in perfect balance. The 1.4% residual sugar is barely noticeable; the finish lingers gracefully and refreshes the palate, inviting the next sip.

title: Stadt Krems 2010 Grillenparz Erste Lage Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: This is a powerful Riesling that concentrates more on the weight, richness ...
description: This is a powerful Riesling that concentrates more on the weight, richness and spice than on the fruit. It has a structured, intense character that offers long-term aging. The finish is full bodied and powerful.

title: Brandl 2011 Kogelberg Erste Lage Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: This is a very closed, terroir-driven wine with a mineral character. With ...
description: This is a very closed, terroir-driven wine with a mineral character. With its tight structure and flavors of green fruit and spice, it is a wine for aging. Screwcap.

title: Loimer 2011 Lenz Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: This is a rich Riesling, with soft apple and creamed-pear flavor as ...
description: This is a rich Riesling, with soft apple and creamed-pear flavor as well as perfumed notes of white flower and white currant. The wine has a dense texture, giving both concentration and a mineral core. Screwcap.

title: Allram 2010 Heiligenstein Erste Lage Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: An excellent wine from the great Heiligenstein Vineyard. Its perfumed character is ...
description: An excellent wine from the great Heiligenstein Vineyard. Its perfumed character is full of rich pear and peach flavors, with the cut of intense citrus. The tense mineral texture promises good aging. Screwcap.

title: Hermann Moser 2011 Gebling Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Pure in character, this has a taut line of perfumed white fruits, ...
description: Pure in character, this has a taut line of perfumed white fruits, with a nervy, tight character. It is young, needing several years of aging to bring out its complex flavors.

title: Buchegger 2010 Moosburgerin Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: This is an intense expression of steely Riesling, with a complex structure ...
description: This is an intense expression of steely Riesling, with a complex structure and excellent aging potential. It is full of citrus, pear and crisp pineapple flavors that are laced with concentrated acidity. Age for at least five years. Screwcap.

title: Hermann Moser 2011 Kellerterrassen Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: An intense pepper and spice-influenced wine from the Gebling Vineyard above Krems. ...
description: An intense pepper and spice-influenced wine from the Gebling Vineyard above Krems. It is rich, weighty and intense, with the spirited acidity lending a refreshing edge. For aging over several years. Screwcap.

title: Markus Huber 2011 Terrassen Riesling (Traisental)
excerpt: This is a perfumed wine, with intense flavors of spring blossom, grapefruit ...
description: This is a perfumed wine, with intense flavors of spring blossom, grapefruit and white peach. It has a tight line of acidity that cuts through to the finish. Screwcap.

title: Wieninger 2011 Vienna Hills Riesling (Vienna)
excerpt: Impressively rich and food-friendly, this has green apple and peach flavors along ...
description: Impressively rich and food-friendly, this has green apple and peach flavors along with intense acidity. The mouthfeel has a pepper edge to contrast with the fine crisp finish. Glass stopper.

title: Bonterra 2010 Riesling (Lake County-Mendocino County)
excerpt: A delightful Riesling, sweetly aromatic, and balanced with some residual sugar. It ...
description: A delightful Riesling, sweetly aromatic, and balanced with some residual sugar. It has well-crafted flavors of pear and vanilla.

title: Hogue 2010 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This is a delightful, off-dry style with the clean, natural, bracing acidity ...
description: This is a delightful, off-dry style with the clean, natural, bracing acidity to perfectly balance out the 2.3% residual sugar. About 3% Muscat was blended in, adding a pretty orange note to a fruit-laden mix of melon, citrus and cotton candy.

title: Kirchmayr 1988 Solist Altenberg Riesling (Weinviertel)
excerpt: Almost sweet in its old age, this ethereal wine has crisp acidity ...
description: Almost sweet in its old age, this ethereal wine has crisp acidity to go with its almond and mushroom flavors.

title: Eichinger 2011 Vom Berg Riesling (Kamptal)
excerpt: With its perfumed fruit and bright acidity, this dances across the palate. ...
description: With its perfumed fruit and bright acidity, this dances across the palate. Flavors include spice, peach, grapefruit and lemon zest, which all meld into a light, refreshing whole. Screwcap.

title: Winzer Krems 2011 Kellermeister Privat Kremsleiten Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: This is a perfumed wine, with white fruit flavors and and citrus ...
description: This is a perfumed wine, with white fruit flavors and and citrus zest acidity. It is still young, tense and tangy, needing several months to balance out.

title: Unger 2010 Stein Terrassen Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: Ripe and opulent, this shows great swathes of white fruit, pineapple and ...
description: Ripe and opulent, this shows great swathes of white fruit, pineapple and a shaft of acidity cutting through the palate. It is approachable now. Screwcap.

title: Forstreiter 2011 Donau Riesling Riesling (Kremstal)
excerpt: A perfumed wine from the Krems Vineyards, with flavors of white fruits, ...
description: A perfumed wine from the Krems Vineyards, with flavors of white fruits, currants and tangy kiwis. It is poised and elegant, with an exquisite fresh aftertaste. Screwcap.

title: Girardet 2011 Estate Grown Riesling (Umpqua Valley)
excerpt: Off-dry, this succulent wine has you smacking your lips rather than puckering ...
description: Off-dry, this succulent wine has you smacking your lips rather than puckering them. The natural acidity buoys up the sweet fruit, a mix of peach and apricot principally, and the wine has an excellent focused core that trails off into suggestions of honeycomb and lemon custard.

title: Hyland 2009 Riesling (McMinnville)
excerpt: From 40-year-old vines, this is quite tart and puckery, but ultrafresh and ...
description: From 40-year-old vines, this is quite tart and puckery, but ultrafresh and clean. A lemony Riesling that seems like a match made in heaven for Pacific coast oysters.

title: Snake River 2010 Arena Valley Vineyard Riesling
excerpt: Off-dry, with initial flavors of orange candy and a slight medicinal graininess. ...
description: Off-dry, with initial flavors of orange candy and a slight medicinal graininess. It develops some honeyed lemon in the midpalate, and smoothes into a pleasant-drinking, low alcohol and high acid Riesling.

title: Clean Slate 2010 Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: A wine that shows it is possible to make a good Riesling ...
description: A wine that shows it is possible to make a good Riesling at a reasonable price, the 2010 from Clean Slate offers up basic apple and citrus flavors. Hints of crushed stone and spring flowers elevate it above the ordinary, as does the mouthwatering finish of this off-dry wine. Drink now.

title: Amity 2010 Wedding Dance Riesling (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Spritzy and off-dry, this low-alcohol Riesling has a beery, just-out-of-the-vat aftertaste. The ...
description: Spritzy and off-dry, this low-alcohol Riesling has a beery, just-out-of-the-vat aftertaste. The fruit flavors are of light citrus, with a hint of honey.

title: Blakeslee 2009 Estate Riesling (Eola-Amity Hills)
excerpt: Slightly spritzy and low in alcohol, this dry Riesling has light peach ...
description: Slightly spritzy and low in alcohol, this dry Riesling has light peach and apricot fruit, spread broadly across the palate. It would be prudent to drink it sooner rather than later.

title: Meli 2010 Riesling (Central Valley)
excerpt: A heavy dose of petrol is the aromatic greeting, and it comes ...
description: A heavy dose of petrol is the aromatic greeting, and it comes with hints of rubber, latex and waxy white fruits. Feels tangy and fresh due to blazing acidity, while it tastes both of tropical fruits and diesel. Long and chiseled on the finish.

title: Kudos 2010 Riesling (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Quite tart, with dominant lemony tea and green-apple flavors. This recalls the ...
description: Quite tart, with dominant lemony tea and green-apple flavors. This recalls the Rieslings of Western Australia, though without their bracing minerality. Definitely for those who love high acid wines.

title: Redbreast 2010 Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Musky, spicy and reasonably complex on the nose, this recent entrant into ...
description: Musky, spicy and reasonably complex on the nose, this recent entrant into the ranks of realistically priced Riesling is a bit chunky in the mouth, but offers satisfying apple, melon and citrus flavors.

title: Melsheimer 2010 Reiler Mullay-Hofberg Molun Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: The little-known Mosel village of Reil is the source of this perplexing ...
description: The little-known Mosel village of Reil is the source of this perplexing wine. It possesses attractive and slightly stony, citrus aromas, and starts off on the sweet side, with bright pineapple fruit. But somewhere on the palate it shifts gears, turning dry and tart almost to the point of being sour.

title: Mozelle 2010 Riesling (Mosel)
excerpt: Starts off with aromas of struck flint, heating oil and even some ...
description: Starts off with aromas of struck flint, heating oil and even some sweaty-sock notes before delivering melon and apple flavors on the palate. Offers decent complexity, but lacks focus and length. Drink now.

title: Hugel 2006 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Approaching maturity, here is a Riesling that still has a refreshing citric ...
description: Approaching maturity, here is a Riesling that still has a refreshing citric character, intensely tangy perfumed fruit as well as green herbs, spice and yeast.

title: Trimbach 2008 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Beautifully perfumed wine, its white fruits transformed into a mature, almond and ...
description: Beautifully perfumed wine, its white fruits transformed into a mature, almond and herbal wine, tight and dry while showing delicious, appetite-enhancing freshness. Ready to drink now.

title: Pierre Sparr 2010 Riesling (Alsace)
excerpt: Tight grapefruit flavors, very perfumed and totally dry and crisp, this is ...
description: Tight grapefruit flavors, very perfumed and totally dry and crisp, this is a pure-fruited wine, packed with acidity, flavors of white currants and a final zesty minerality. Screwcap.

title: Cramele Recas 2010 Heavenly Retreat Semi-sweet Riesling (Recas)
excerpt: White floral aromas are pure and fresh in this apple-inflected Romanian Riesling. ...
description: White floral aromas are pure and fresh in this apple-inflected Romanian Riesling. Soft on the palate, with restrained acidity and a delicate, almost lacy structure, it finishes with a hint of powdered sugar sweetness.

title: Pewsey Vale 2005 The Contours Museum Reserve Riesling (Eden Valley)
excerpt: Thank the folks at Pewsey Vale for aging this stellar wine five ...
description: Thank the folks at Pewsey Vale for aging this stellar wine five years before its release. The result is what Australian Rieslings aspire to become, a medium-bodied wine of uncommon elegance. Orange marmalade, honey and toast characters mingle easily yet finish crisp, long and completely dry. Drink now or hold through 2015, possibly longer.

title: Columbia Crest 2010 Grand Estates Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This exceptional effort is packed with sweet and tart fruits, beginning with ...
description: This exceptional effort is packed with sweet and tart fruits, beginning with lemon-lime, then moving through peaches and apricots and on into hints of papaya. Good length and splendid acidity.

title: Bloomer Creek 2010 Tanzen Dame Auten Vineyard 1st Harvest Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Buoyantly aromatic with notes of fresh wildflowers, preserved apricots and honey, this ...
description: Buoyantly aromatic with notes of fresh wildflowers, preserved apricots and honey, this dry Riesling made from a tiny single-vineyard crop balances elegant crushed stone and stonefruit flavors with a focused acidity and stark orange peel astringency. Balanced and elegantly structured, it finishes on a long, meandering orange inflected note.

title: Seifried 2011 Riesling (Nelson)
excerpt: Light in weight, delicate in style, this is just barely off dry. ...
description: Light in weight, delicate in style, this is just barely off dry. Crisp apple fruit carries hints of riper stone fruit (nectarine?) but is underlain by a distinctly stony note. The lingering finish ably balances tart and sweet.

title: Yalumba 2010 The Y Series Riesling (South Australia)
excerpt: Very floral and citrusy, with lime and orange sherbet notes and hints ...
description: Very floral and citrusy, with lime and orange sherbet notes and hints of green apple and white pepper. It also shows good length for such an inexpensive drop. Drink now.

title: Bloomer Creek 2010 Tanzen Dame Auten Vineyard 1st Harvest VS Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Intoxicating on the nose, with super-sized fruit and floral aromatics, this slightly ...
description: Intoxicating on the nose, with super-sized fruit and floral aromatics, this slightly off-dry Riesling from Bloomer Creek is proof positive of just how ripe the 2010 Finger Lakes vintage was. Surprisingly complex on the palate, it reveals itself in layers of tea leaves and potpourri, crushed stones, and bracing orange-tinged acidity.

title: Carmel 2010 Kayoumi Vineyard Single Vineyard White Riesling (Galilee)
excerpt: Light and easy but attractive, with aromas of green plum, lime, green ...
description: Light and easy but attractive, with aromas of green plum, lime, green apple and a hint of petrol. Lightweight but flavorful in the mouth, with lifting acidity to the ripe fruit flavors on the palate. Faint hints of orange rind and clove appear on the finish.

title: Fess Parker 2010 Riesling (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: With some residual sugar, this lovely Riesling is off-dry, but the sweetness ...
description: With some residual sugar, this lovely Riesling is off-dry, but the sweetness is balanced by refreshing acidity. The citrus, tropical fruit, honeysuckle and spice flavors are delightful.

title: Sheldrake Point 2010 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Scents of tea leaves and honeysuckle add a layer of dimension to ...
description: Scents of tea leaves and honeysuckle add a layer of dimension to ripe, rich yellow peach and apricot notes in this densely concentrated Riesling from Sheldrake Point. Surprisingly dry on the palate despite so much sweet fruit flavor, the palate is framed with a shower of lime juice and pith that carries through to a long, minerally finish.

title: Milton Park 2010 Riesling (South Australia)
excerpt: Milton Park is a lower-priced offshoot of Thorn-Clarke, whose wines often represent ...
description: Milton Park is a lower-priced offshoot of Thorn-Clarke, whose wines often represent excellent values. This Riesling might be a bit broad for aging, but it offers ample green apple and lime fruit and a hint of petrol for near-term consumption.

title: Red Newt Cellars 2010 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Verdant fennel and herb notes add freshness to concentrated honeysuckle and tangerine ...
description: Verdant fennel and herb notes add freshness to concentrated honeysuckle and tangerine flavors in this fairly dry but fruity Riesling from Red Newt. Vibrant orange-inflected acidity penetrates on the palate, leading to a dry, lingering finish.

title: Eleven Eleven 2013 Dutton Ranch Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Lemon meringue and custard provide decadence to this vineyard-designated wine, the site ...
description: Lemon meringue and custard provide decadence to this vineyard-designated wine, the site planted to decades-old vines. It becomes sublime as it opens, spicy and soft in quince and Asian pear. The finish returns to the opening theme, delivering a punch of caramel.

title: Anaba 2013 Denmark Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Components of salty toffee and honey provide a luxurious texture to this ...
description: Components of salty toffee and honey provide a luxurious texture to this otherwise floral, nicely balanced wine, a subtle cradling of oak never in the way of its tense minerality. Green apple and Meyer lemon make appearances along the way.

title: Arista 2013 Ritchie Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: An opulent nose surges from the bottle in this lush, exuberant wine ...
description: An opulent nose surges from the bottle in this lush, exuberant wine from the legendary vineyard site. Pronounced flavors of baked apple, caramel, honey and peach combine in memorable, full-bodied ways. Textured and layered, this brooder is drinking great now but should do well with more time in the cellar, through 2023.

title: Arista 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: A lighthearted, refined and distinctive wine made from vineyards including Ritchie and ...
description: A lighthearted, refined and distinctive wine made from vineyards including Ritchie and Banfield, this white gets less time in oak than the single-vineyard designates, but sings in waxy apple, lemon, nutmeg and brioche. This is a pretty wine with a lot of soul.

title: Miner 2012 Hyde Vineyard Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: From the mighty Hyde in Carneros, this medium-bodied white blossoms with tropical ...
description: From the mighty Hyde in Carneros, this medium-bodied white blossoms with tropical fruit and briny minerality, a forceful combination that gives this wine both power and elegance. Textured in candied Meyer lemon, it finishes crisply and the right kind of sour.

title: Lusso Della Terra 2014 Clone 809 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: This tiny-production wine shows an attention to detail in the vineyard and ...
description: This tiny-production wine shows an attention to detail in the vineyard and cellar. The clonal selection shines, given partial barrel-fermentation, partial stainless steel, all aged in mostly neutral French oak. Honeysuckle aromas jump from the glass, followed by viscous, juicy tropical elements of mango and lychee. It finishes dry and lemony.

title: Ruby Hill Winery 2013 Reserve Collection Chardonnay (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: An unusually vivid gold color is the first indication that this medium-bodied ...
description: An unusually vivid gold color is the first indication that this medium-bodied wine will turn up the dials on flavor. Aromas resemble wood smoke, nutmeg, sandalwood and vanilla, while flavors are subtly fruity but largely oaky in the form of marzipan, toasted bread and other savory nuances. It is gorgeous in a voluptuous way.

title: Papapietro Perry 2013 Peters Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Succulent in white peach, pear and apple, this is a nicely balanced, ...
description: Succulent in white peach, pear and apple, this is a nicely balanced, pretty wine. It offers just the right amount of richness on the palate, with a swirl of vanilla caramel suggested in the background amid an intriguingly unexpected salty, pretzel-like finish.

title: Sinclair Estate Vineyards 2013 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The aromas of lees, citrus, almond, melon, apple, spice and butter draw ...
description: The aromas of lees, citrus, almond, melon, apple, spice and butter draw you into the glass. This wine brings a dazzling sense of texture, with fruit and spice flavors dappled throughout.

title: Della 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: A big, burly, hedonistic wine, this offers layers of pronounced baked apple, ...
description: A big, burly, hedonistic wine, this offers layers of pronounced baked apple, pear and caramel. The oak wraps itself around in cinnamon-toast waves, with sizable power on the palate. The joy ride ends with a balanced sense of wet stone, fresh and refined.

title: FEL 2013 Savoy Vineyard Chardonnay (Anderson Valley)
excerpt: A tasty blend of ripe fruit and baking spice aromas and flavors ...
description: A tasty blend of ripe fruit and baking spice aromas and flavors ride on a smooth texture in this medium-bodied, well-balanced and well-rounded wine. Subtle spiciness glides through the finish of this bottling, which should please most anyone.

title: FEL 2013 Chardonnay (Anderson Valley)
excerpt: For a change of pace, this almost electric wine instantly energizes the ...
description: For a change of pace, this almost electric wine instantly energizes the taste buds. Aromas recall kiwi fruit and fresh-cut pears. The texture is lively, fresh and pure, with good acid balance and a lingering, tangy finish. Pair it with simple preparations of fish and shellfish.

title: Lusso Della Terra 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: This wine is lean on the nose and perfumed in honeysuckle and ...
description: This wine is lean on the nose and perfumed in honeysuckle and apple blossom. With its power in balance, the fruit can shine. Lemon and Gravenstein apple exude from the entry while a medium-toned structure buoys the subtle spicy notes of the oak, never letting them overtake the finish.

title: Starmont 2013 Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Light-bodied and modestly priced, this is a wine for a wide circle ...
description: Light-bodied and modestly priced, this is a wine for a wide circle of friends, great for midweek meals and larger weekend gatherings. Hazelnut and caramel-honey confront the senses, while the palate offers balance and zesty acidity. The finish is soft and subtle.

title: Duckhorn 2013 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: From a selection of vineyards across the Napa Valley, including Brown Ranch ...
description: From a selection of vineyards across the Napa Valley, including Brown Ranch in Carneros, this is a woody, herbal wine, full bodied on the midpalate, with flavors of peach and vanilla. It has aged in both French oak and stainless steel to keep the oak in check, and finishes with fresh Meyer lemon.

title: Rodney Strong 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Rich in sweet oak and almond paste, this is a concentrated, fulsome ...
description: Rich in sweet oak and almond paste, this is a concentrated, fulsome and big wine, creamy in mouthfeel and approach. It gets fruitier in the glass, sharing flavors of baked apple pie with brioche.

title: Spring Mountain Vineyard 2013 Estate Bottled Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: With delicate aromas of orange blossom and lime, this wine takes on ...
description: With delicate aromas of orange blossom and lime, this wine takes on a viscosity of texture on the palate, offering plump flavors of peach and guava. Refined and well made, the finish is a combination of vanilla and caramel.

title: Balletto 2013 Cider Ridge Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This is a lovely, lighthearted vineyard-designated wine. Soft, layered and decadent on ...
description: This is a lovely, lighthearted vineyard-designated wine. Soft, layered and decadent on the palate, it offers a mix of green apple, Meyer lemon, ginger and marshmallow. Intense on the finish in savory, briny fennel, it sees only 20% new oak and is structured enough to hang out in bottle a few years more.

title: L'Ecole No. 41 2014 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This wine is a blend of Evergreen, Schmitt and Oasis vineyards. It ...
description: This wine is a blend of Evergreen, Schmitt and Oasis vineyards. It displays a mixture of butter, tropical fruit and red-apple aromas that lead to creamy feeling flavors and a drawn-out finish that impresses.

title: Stolo 2013 Estate Chardonnay (San Luis Obispo County)
excerpt: Salted nuts, dried white flowers, orange rinds, a touch of smoke and ...
description: Salted nuts, dried white flowers, orange rinds, a touch of smoke and a dollop of just enough buttercream show on the nose of this bottling from an extreme coastal vineyard just outside of Cambria. There is a lemon rind tightness to the palate that unleashes Marcona almond warmth, with lots of zing that persists for days after opening.

title: Milbrandt 2014 The Estates Evergreen Vineyard Chardonnay (Ancient Lakes)
excerpt: This vineyard has already established itself as a premier Riesling site, but ...
description: This vineyard has already established itself as a premier Riesling site, but Chardonnay is increasingly gaining attention. Aromas of lees, mineral, toast and spice lead to an elegant but well-balanced palate, with flavors that linger.

title: Surf Swim 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: Tasty touches of toasted oak, butter and almonds in the aroma and ...
description: Tasty touches of toasted oak, butter and almonds in the aroma and again in the flavor add depth to the ripe Anjou pear notes in this full-bodied, posh-textured wine. With all that flavor, it keeps its balance and has a lingering finish, too.

title: Eberle 2014 Eberle Estate VIneyard Chardonnay (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Cut lime and nectarine flesh meet with orange oil on a lean ...
description: Cut lime and nectarine flesh meet with orange oil on a lean and focused nose in this wine by Paso pioneer Gary Eberle. The palate is framed by racy acidity, with clean, crisp flavors of lime juice and green pear. The salty finish is mouthwatering.

title: Barnard Griffin 2014 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas of tangerine and melon are light but display nuance. It tingles ...
description: Aromas of tangerine and melon are light but display nuance. It tingles the palate with a broad, textured feel and a finish that sails.

title: Balletto 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: A blend of three vineyards, all estate, this is a sublime, viscous ...
description: A blend of three vineyards, all estate, this is a sublime, viscous and somewhat briny wine that exhibits some oak on the nose. With a balance of weight and creaminess, it starts in ginger and nutmeg spiciness on the nose, building on the palate into fresh-cut apple and pear.

title: Barra of Mendocino 2014 Estate Grown Chardonnay (Mendocino)
excerpt: Vanilla, pear and cream aromas, gentle pear and pastry flavors, and a ...
description: Vanilla, pear and cream aromas, gentle pear and pastry flavors, and a silky-smooth texture add up to a lovable, soft and easy wine. It is medium bodied and light in acidity.

title: Girasole 2014 Estate Grown Chardonnay (Mendocino)
excerpt: With an aroma like buttered toast and mouth-filling flavors like pear juice, ...
description: With an aroma like buttered toast and mouth-filling flavors like pear juice, this medium-bodied wine is generous and satisfying. The texture is soft and smooth, coating the mouth in a good way after each sip.

title: Goldschmidt 2014 Singing Tree Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Ripe in tropical fervor, this is a dry, rich white with well-integrated ...
description: Ripe in tropical fervor, this is a dry, rich white with well-integrated oak and tinges of caramel. It finishes thick and knotted in a bite of apple crumble.

title: Mercer 2014 Reserve Zephyr Ridge Vineyard Chardonnay (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: Tropical and stone-fruit aromas mix with notes of vanilla, cinnamon and other ...
description: Tropical and stone-fruit aromas mix with notes of vanilla, cinnamon and other barrel spices. The palate is full bodied, with a rounded feel and a finish that carries. It shows some pleasing nuances.

title: Davis Family 2014 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Golden Delicious apple is the star in this wine, accented with a ...
description: Golden Delicious apple is the star in this wine, accented with a touch of honey. Despite the appearance of rocky minerality on the back of the palate, it exudes a robust, full-figured personality, lush and plush with a persistence of ginger on the finish.

title: Belden Barns 2013 Estate Grown Chardonnay (Sonoma Mountain)
excerpt: Movie popcorn is the first thing suggested by the nose of this ...
description: Movie popcorn is the first thing suggested by the nose of this wine, followed by firm, terse oak. Given time to unwind in the glass, the more delicate aspects of its personality start to appear, from crisp Asian pear to ginger spice.

title: C'est Bon 2013 Reserve Selection Chardonnay (Oakville)
excerpt: Waxy apple and lemon pith open this wine, followed by crisp, candied ...
description: Waxy apple and lemon pith open this wine, followed by crisp, candied grapefruit. Robust, it finishes dry and balanced. The whole sums up into a full-bodied, rich and lush experience.

title: Domaine Anderson 2013 Walraven Vineyard Chardonnay (Anderson Valley)
excerpt: Pure butterscotch aromas seem to leap from the glass, yet the flavors ...
description: Pure butterscotch aromas seem to leap from the glass, yet the flavors are dry and rather reserved, not nearly as obvious as the smell. The balance leans toward tartness, the flavors are lean and the finish lemony.

title: Foley 2013 JA Ranch Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: Aromas of browned apples and vanilla bean contrast with a steely backdrop ...
description: Aromas of browned apples and vanilla bean contrast with a steely backdrop on the nose of this wine. Seared pears, lemon juice and jasmine decorate the palate, which is relatively light in body, with a strong acidity and hints of fresh mint toward the finish.

title: Noviello 2014 French Creek Vineyard Chardonnay (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Aromas of banana, melon and lemon curd are bright and effusive. The ...
description: Aromas of banana, melon and lemon curd are bright and effusive. The tropical aromas carry on to the sleekly styled flavors that narrow toward the finish.

title: Tousey 2013 Chardonnay (Hudson River Region)
excerpt: Woodsy cedar and spice tones swirl into layers of vanilla cream in ...
description: Woodsy cedar and spice tones swirl into layers of vanilla cream in this intensely oaky, yet enticing Chardonnay. Brisk lemon-lime acidity and fresh apple and pear notes freshen the midpalate.

title: Avalon 2014 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: Aromas of lemon juice and green apple lead to delicious ripe fruit ...
description: Aromas of lemon juice and green apple lead to delicious ripe fruit flavors and hints of butter and vanilla on the palate. The texture is round and soft on the medium body, making it easy to enjoy now.

title: Broken Clouds 2014 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: This has value written all over it, offering fleshy, ripe tropical aromas ...
description: This has value written all over it, offering fleshy, ripe tropical aromas and flavors. The personality is large and in charge, yet the wine itself remains reasonably balanced and firm in structure.
