title: Browne Family Vineyards 2014 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Vanilla, coconut and toast aromas are vibrant and out-front, followed by tropical ...
description: Vanilla, coconut and toast aromas are vibrant and out-front, followed by tropical fruit. This wine is full bodied with a viscous, almost oily feel that persists through the finish. It offers some good things, but the variety gets lost in the style.

title: Danza del Sol 2012 Reserve Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: A bit oxidative in its aromatics, this wine shows crushed Marcona almonds, ...
description: A bit oxidative in its aromatics, this wine shows crushed Marcona almonds, seared lemon peels and walnut oil on the nose. The palate is tight down the middle, with a racy lime skin character as well as kumquat skin tension and a grippy texture.

title: Midnight 2014 Estate Chardonnay (Paso Robles Willow Creek District)
excerpt: Reserved aromas of lemon zest, shaved butter and wet stone greet the ...
description: Reserved aromas of lemon zest, shaved butter and wet stone greet the nose on this ready-to-drink bottling from West Paso. The palate shows poached apple and cooked pear tones, with a slightly sour tang keeping it lively.

title: Cono Sur 2014 20 Barrels Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Heavy oak aromas lay on top of tropical fruit and apple scents ...
description: Heavy oak aromas lay on top of tropical fruit and apple scents on this chunky Chardonnay that hints at sophistication. A round, resiny palate with textural oak grain and malic acidity leads to a woody, spicy flavor profile with apple and oak as the dominant players.

title: Ironstone 2013 Reserve Estate Grown Chardonnay (Sierra Foothills)
excerpt: This is not a showy wine, but the sense of reserve, good ...
description: This is not a showy wine, but the sense of reserve, good acidity, fresh flavors and good balance form an enjoyable picture that will be versatile with food.

title: Montes 2014 Alpha Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Nutty, honeyed apple and melon aromas come with plenty of raw wood ...
description: Nutty, honeyed apple and melon aromas come with plenty of raw wood grain. This is an oaky, resiny Chardonnay with just enough core acidity to maintain balance. Creamy apple and melon flavors finish on barrel-driven resin and cinnamon accents.

title: Castoro Cellars 2014 Chardonnay (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Quite grassy in aromas for a Chardonnay, this wine shows lemongrass, fennel, ...
description: Quite grassy in aromas for a Chardonnay, this wine shows lemongrass, fennel, Gala apple and light honeydew melon on the nose. The palate is light and tight, with flavors of grapefruit and apples.

title: Charles & Charles 2014 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The pear and almond-butter aromas are quite light. The palate reveals more, ...
description: The pear and almond-butter aromas are quite light. The palate reveals more, with an elegant, textured feel and a finish that lingers.

title: Maryhill 2014 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas of toast and corn on the cob are followed by stone-fruit ...
description: Aromas of toast and corn on the cob are followed by stone-fruit flavors that show equal parts fruit and barrel. The concentration at times seems a bit wanting and tied-up in the middle.

title: Byington 2013 Wrights Station Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: Quite reserved in aromas at first, this starts to show bruised lemon ...
description: Quite reserved in aromas at first, this starts to show bruised lemon skins, ripe stonefruit and a touch of cream on the nose. A preserved lemon element and sour orange character mark the nose, with touches of marzipan yet lacking the usually associated creaminess.

title: Husch 2014 Estate Bottled Chardonnay (Mendocino)
excerpt: With aromas and flavors like a pear tart, this wine has plenty ...
description: With aromas and flavors like a pear tart, this wine has plenty of fruit character accented by vanilla and custard. The balance is slightly soft, the body not too full and the texture relaxed.

title: Leto 2013 The Hidden One Old Vine Estate Grown Chardonnay (St. Helena)
excerpt: From vines planted in the 1960s, and given time in 100% French ...
description: From vines planted in the 1960s, and given time in 100% French oak, this dry, unctuous wine is tropical in character. A mix of pineapple and nutmeg teases its way into notes of canned corn.

title: The Grifter 2014 Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Perfumy on the nose, this is a lavishly oaked, full-bodied mix of ...
description: Perfumy on the nose, this is a lavishly oaked, full-bodied mix of caramel and vanilla atop baked apple pie and grilled mango. More tropical than crisp, it speaks to a warm vintage and a stylistic approach to go for the gusto.

title: Luis Felipe Edwards 2014 Marea Chardonnay (Leyda Valley)
excerpt: Oily, harsh aromas of almond skins and stone-fruit pits lead to a ...
description: Oily, harsh aromas of almond skins and stone-fruit pits lead to a weighty, slick, citric palate with apple and nectarine flavors. This ends pulpy and big, with white-fruit flavors bolstered by fresh acidity.

title: Pace 2014 Huber Vineyard Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: An almost overpowering fragrance greets the nose on this bottling, with scents ...
description: An almost overpowering fragrance greets the nose on this bottling, with scents of lime and pear blossoms, honeysuckle, jasmine and peach sorbet. The palate is very citrus-driven, with oranges and tangerine skin, proving quite sour and tart for such a ripe introduction.

title: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi 2014 Lightly Oaked Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: Green apple and honeydew melon aromas carry right through to the fresh, ...
description: Green apple and honeydew melon aromas carry right through to the fresh, fruity flavors in this light-bodied and round-textured wine. It has touches of butter and vanilla as well as all that fruit, plus a good balance between crispness and ripeness.

title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2014 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Pear, butter and spice aromas lead to tingly, broad-feeling flavors that are ...
description: Pear, butter and spice aromas lead to tingly, broad-feeling flavors that are straight down the fairway.

title: Cono Sur 2014 Single Vineyard Block no.5 Quebrada Alta Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Pithy aromas of melon and apple are low in oak and emphasize ...
description: Pithy aromas of melon and apple are low in oak and emphasize minerality. This feels full and chunky, but also acidic. Briny flavors of stone fruits lean toward sour, while an oily, briny tasting finish is short on elegance.

title: Vigilance 2014 Chardonnay (Red Hills Lake County)
excerpt: Well made, well balanced and rich in flavor, this medium-bodied wine has ...
description: Well made, well balanced and rich in flavor, this medium-bodied wine has fruit flavors that are almost sweet but countered by crisp acidity. It tastes spicy like vanilla and nutmeg on the finish.

title: Rubus 2014 Chardonnay (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Peach pit, matchstick and almond skin aromas come across a bit harsh. ...
description: Peach pit, matchstick and almond skin aromas come across a bit harsh. This is chunky on the palate, with pulpy, pithy melon and lees flavors that take on a briny characteristic on the finish.

title: Chilensis 2014 Reserva Estate Bottled Chardonnay (Maule Valley)
excerpt: Straightforward apple and peach aromas announce your basic everyday quaffing Chardonnay: this ...
description: Straightforward apple and peach aromas announce your basic everyday quaffing Chardonnay: this is low on minerality and acidity, and thus it tastes of banana, melon and vanilla. A flat, melony finish lacks acidic framework.

title: Seven Falls 2014 Chardonnay (Wahluke Slope)
excerpt: Barrel aromas of vanilla and woodspice are out front and lead to ...
description: Barrel aromas of vanilla and woodspice are out front and lead to light, elegant fruit and barrel flavors that vie for attention through the finish.

title: Ritual 2014 Supertuga Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Stalky aromas of creamed corn hide notions of fruit on the nose. ...
description: Stalky aromas of creamed corn hide notions of fruit on the nose. Flavors of peach and melon are leesy and oaky, while the finish tastes yeasty.

title: Santa Rita 2014 Medalla Real Gran Reserva Chardonnay (Leyda Valley)
excerpt: Aromas of corn and melon are waxy and oily. This feels pinched ...
description: Aromas of corn and melon are waxy and oily. This feels pinched and juicy, but not crisp or minerally. Stalky flavors of corn, citrus and apple lean towards bitter, as does the finish.

title: Amici 2012 Charles Heintz Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Something is amiss in this wine from a great vineyard site. It ...
description: Something is amiss in this wine from a great vineyard site. It opens in a mix of pear, pineapple and candied lemon, but takes on an astringency on the finish.

title: Concha y Toro 2015 Reserva Casillero del Diablo Chardonnay (Chile)
excerpt: A neutral nose offers mild notes of minerally rich vitamin but almost ...
description: A neutral nose offers mild notes of minerally rich vitamin but almost no discernible fruit. Lightly oaked pear flavors are distant and turn bitter in front of a finish that stands still.

title: Alto Los Romeros 2015 Chardonnay (Central Valley)
excerpt: Generic from head to toe, this opens with a hint of wood ...
description: Generic from head to toe, this opens with a hint of wood and aromas that suggest cinnamon-spiced applesauce. The palate is plump but flat, while flavors of wood grain and mixed white fruits finish with a vanilla note and then lasting bitterness.

title: Aguirre 2014 Gaucho Andino Chardonnay (Maule Valley)
excerpt: This has overripe tropical-fruit aromas on the nose. Wheaty, oxidized flavors finish ...
description: This has overripe tropical-fruit aromas on the nose. Wheaty, oxidized flavors finish with a note of mushy fruit.

title: The Eyrie Vineyards 2014 Estate Chardonnay (Dundee Hills)
excerpt: Even if winemaker Jason Lett tripled the price of this wine, it ...
description: Even if winemaker Jason Lett tripled the price of this wine, it would still be a standout among its peers. This opens with intense aromatics of pineapple fruit, bracing acidity, and compelling length. On the second and third day after opening it remained quite fresh and expressive, with further details of fruit and mineral beginning to emerge. Drink now through 2035.

title: The Eyrie Vineyards 2013 Original Vines Reserve Chardonnay (Dundee Hills)
excerpt: The oldest Chardonnay vines in the Willamette Valley, planted in 1965, create ...
description: The oldest Chardonnay vines in the Willamette Valley, planted in 1965, create a spicy, textural, refined wine with tremendous length and detail. All the wine was aged in neutral wood, which shines a light on the beautiful fruit, with green apple, almonds, and hints of butter and vanilla.

title: Ponzi 2013 Avellana Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: This Ponzi-owned vineyard is in the Chehalem Mountains AVA, yet is listed ...
description: This Ponzi-owned vineyard is in the Chehalem Mountains AVA, yet is listed simply as Willamette Valley. Aromatically intense and intriguing, it opens quickly with scents of chamomile, plum, peach and apricot, leading to hints of honey and tea. Aged entirely in neutral oak, this wine fully engages the palate through a lingering, beautifully proportioned and optimally ripe finish.

title: Domaine Laroche 2013 Les Clos Grand Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: Tight and still very young, this wine has great aging potential. The ...
description: Tight and still very young, this wine has great aging potential. The fruits show apricot and green plum balanced by a tense, steely minerality that cuts through like a razor. Ready to age for several years, this wine will be best from 2020.

title: Gary Farrell 2013 Olivet Lane Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Almond and anise open what evolves into a concentrated expression of a ...
description: Almond and anise open what evolves into a concentrated expression of a stellar vineyard site in a great vintage in good winemaking hands. Honey and baked peach initially fool the palate into anticipating that this wine might head into full-blown hedonism, but subtle layers of lemon, grapefruit and pear keep it crisp, fresh and ultimately complex. Creamy, it retains plenty of acidity for balance.

title: Ponzi 2013 Aurora Vineyard Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: One of a pair of single-vineyard, reserve-level Chardonnays, this seamlessly pulls together ...
description: One of a pair of single-vineyard, reserve-level Chardonnays, this seamlessly pulls together yellow apple, lemon panna cotta, white pepper and a suggestion of wet rock. Located in the Chehalem Mountains AVA, Aurora fruit is fermented with wild yeast all the way through malolactic, and aged in one-third new and two-thirds neutral French oak. The wild yeast adds detail and texture, and the wine makes a soft, buttery, graceful, prolonged exit.

title: Croix 2013 Starling Morelli Roost Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: From a Dutton family-farmed site in the Green Valley of Russian River ...
description: From a Dutton family-farmed site in the Green Valley of Russian River Valley, this wine is seductively rich on the nose in honey and cinnamon toast, complemented by an exotic fruit profile in taste, a mixture of peach, pear and baked pineapple. Complex and layered, this will benefit from further aging. Drink now through 2021.

title: Testarossa 2013 La Rinconada Vineyard Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: The fantastic nose pitches French toast together with Meyer lemon pith, crushed ...
description: The fantastic nose pitches French toast together with Meyer lemon pith, crushed rock, struck match and a slight sour-cream element. This wine is immediately lively on the tongue, with lots of but not overdone acidity. Yeasty toast flavors are cut by lemon and poached pear on a racy and focused palate.

title: Domaine Laroche 2013 Les Blanchots Grand Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: Ripe and toasty, this rich wine is full of generous fruits as ...
description: Ripe and toasty, this rich wine is full of generous fruits as well a wood flavors. It shows the honeyed character that appears in this vintage while still keeping tight minerality. It certainly needs to age, so drink from 2018.

title: Parallel 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Fresh lemon and orange blossom aromas make for an inviting entry to ...
description: Fresh lemon and orange blossom aromas make for an inviting entry to this impressively fragrant wine. Surprisingly light on the palate, despite the concentration and power, this is a focused, subtle expression of the variety, with layers of ripe apple, pear and peach, unimpeded by the supportive oak.

title: Ponzi 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Although 2013 may have been a difficult vintage, for some winemakers it ...
description: Although 2013 may have been a difficult vintage, for some winemakers it resulted in immaculate wines with impeccable precision and focus. In this wine, the medium-bodied fruit runs from apple to pineapple. Twenty months in 10% new French oak has left an indelible impression of buttered nuts and a pleasantly oily mouthfeel.

title: Sequoia Grove 2013 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A classically rich, generous version of the variety from the appellation, this ...
description: A classically rich, generous version of the variety from the appellation, this wine holds a ripeness of baked apple, pear and vanilla toffee at its heart. A depth of oak influence is consistently kept in check by a balance of minerality.

title: City Winery of New York 2014 Scopus Vineyard Reserve Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
excerpt: This is a lovely vineyard-designate, floral and crisp in tangy grapefruit and ...
description: This is a lovely vineyard-designate, floral and crisp in tangy grapefruit and tangerine. With plenty of complexity to its breadth and depth, it maintains effortless acidity throughout, finishing with just the right twist of lemon peel.

title: Gary Farrell 2013 Rochioli-Allen Vineyards Oak Puncheon Fermented Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: With the goal of adding subtle aromatics and structure, this wine was ...
description: With the goal of adding subtle aromatics and structure, this wine was given eight months in 50% new French oak puncheons, with the other 50% in neutral. The wine intrigues as much as refreshes, with crisp acidity and bright sparks of citrus prominent. Medium bodied, it has a complexity of baked apple and pear lurking in the background.

title: Jean-Luc and Paul Aegerter 2013 Creux de la Net Premier Cru  (Pernand-Vergelesses)
excerpt: The cool, crisp nature of Pernand is well expressed in this tight, ...
description: The cool, crisp nature of Pernand is well expressed in this tight, mineral and tangy wine. It has fine acidity along with fresh apple and citrus fruits. The good texture will allow the wine to age. Drink from 2018.

title: Lynmar 2013 Old Wente Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: An exuberance of decadent oak combines with a full-bodied figure of apple ...
description: An exuberance of decadent oak combines with a full-bodied figure of apple crumble and baked peach to make this wine mouthcoating and deliriously spicy in ginger and nutmeg. Given 83% new oak, with power and concentration integrated, it finds a streak of elegance on the finish.

title: Moniker 2013 Chardonnay (Mendocino County)
excerpt: A beautiful and lightly spicy nutmeg character lights up this full-bodied wine ...
description: A beautiful and lightly spicy nutmeg character lights up this full-bodied wine from the first sniff to the lingering finish. The texture feels very rich, the pear-tart flavors are generous and the spiciness is intriguing. Hints of tannin and tartness firm up the mouthfeel nicely.

title: Jean-Luc and Paul Aegerter 2013 Les Morgeots Premier Cru  (Chassagne-Montrachet)
excerpt: At the south end of Chassagne-Montrachet, Morgeots Premier Cru is close to ...
description: At the south end of Chassagne-Montrachet, Morgeots Premier Cru is close to abbey ruins. This young, toasty wine is ripe, smooth and creamy. Rich apple and green plum flavors are balanced by acidity and touched by honey. The wood aging is still prominent and needs to tone down, so drink from 2018.

title: Small Vines 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: From an estate vineyard and given very little oak, this white sings ...
description: From an estate vineyard and given very little oak, this white sings in Key-lime pie and orange blossom, a heady, floral liquid invitation that gives way to unctuous texture and medium weight. Chalky somewhat on the finish, it should continue to integrate over time.

title: Carneros Hills 2012 Chardenet Durell Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: This is an inaugural release for the winery, established in 2013 where ...
description: This is an inaugural release for the winery, established in 2013 where a former part of Buena Vista Winery stood. The grapes come from rocky Durell nearby, and take on its signature concentration and celebration of fruit. Golden in color, this is a ripe mingling of pear, baked apple and caramel that is entirely full bodied.

title: Domaine Laroche 2013 Les Vaillons Vieilles Vignes Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: From old vines, this rich and concentrated wine is dominated by ripe ...
description: From old vines, this rich and concentrated wine is dominated by ripe apple and pear flavors. They combine with the well-judged toastiness from wood aging to give a full, dense wine will age well. Drink from 2018.

title: King Estate 2014 Chardonnay (Oregon)
excerpt: Succulent, juicy fruit flavors combine lemon drop and butterscotch hard candy, buttressed ...
description: Succulent, juicy fruit flavors combine lemon drop and butterscotch hard candy, buttressed with vivid acidity. This irresistible wine is drinking beautifully already.

title: Zaca Mesa 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Ynez Valley)
excerpt: Tart aromas of sour cream, yogurt, candied lime and pressed quince show ...
description: Tart aromas of sour cream, yogurt, candied lime and pressed quince show on the nose of this stylishly structured Chardonnay. The palate carries the theme forward, with pithy pink grapefruit notes, lime ade and brie rinds, showing firm tension on the tongue and bound-up energy that will keep this bottle alive for years.

title: La Chertosa 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Waxy pear and white plum provide the fruit-forward flavors of this wine, ...
description: Waxy pear and white plum provide the fruit-forward flavors of this wine, which exhibits plenty of minerality on the midpalate before offering a wave of richness and vanilla cream. The finish finds a focus and balance between these two ends, ending light and bright.

title: Lynmar 2013 Quail Hill Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Briny, with a taste of salted kettle corn, this offers a nice ...
description: Briny, with a taste of salted kettle corn, this offers a nice balance between an edgier, more savory character and the fine-tuned minerality that extends into the finish as bristles of Meyer lemon and wet stone. The aromatics reveal an inviting touch of orange peel and lemon custard.

title: Louis Max 2014 Fourchaume Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: The steely character of a young Chablis is very apparent in this ...
description: The steely character of a young Chablis is very apparent in this wine. It is crisp, lemon flavored and with a mineral edge. The wine has a juicy freshness, still young at heart and needing to age. Drink from 2018.

title: Testarossa 2013 Lone Oak Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: Warm vanilla notes are laid across ripe nectarine, apple skin and a ...
description: Warm vanilla notes are laid across ripe nectarine, apple skin and a twist of lemon rind on this single-vineyard study by the Los Gatos-based winery. Pencil lead kicks off the palate, which then opens into poached apples and lemon oil, laid across a sizzling acidity that lasts long.

title: Wedell Cellars 2011 Sierra Madre Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
excerpt: Caramelized white peach, salted lemon, pear skin, red apple and the hint ...
description: Caramelized white peach, salted lemon, pear skin, red apple and the hint of white flowers show on the nose of this wine by these longtime but under-the-radar producers. The palate blends orange skins and grapefruit pith with buttered toast, sea salt and a dill-like herb character.

title: Jean-Luc and Paul Aegerter 2013 Les Champgains Premier Cru  (Puligny-Montrachet)
excerpt: Situated in the center of the premier crus of Puligny, Champgains produces ...
description: Situated in the center of the premier crus of Puligny, Champgains produces an elegant, textured wine. This bottling, with the warmth of 2013 behind it, is fragrant with white fruits and has a soft aftertaste. It needs to age to bring it out its more complex character, so wait until 2018.

title: Jean-Luc and Paul Aegerter 2013  Meursault
excerpt: With its appealing toast and fruit aromas, this is a rich wine. ...
description: With its appealing toast and fruit aromas, this is a rich wine. It does keep plenty of steely texture while allowing the yellow fruits, ripe pear and toast to shine. In style it hovers halfway between the ripe, buttery Meursault of the past and the crisper style of today, a fine compromise and ready to drink now.

title: Dry Creek Vineyard 2013 DCV Estate Block 10 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Waxy apple stars in this brisk, approachable white from a single estate-farmed ...
description: Waxy apple stars in this brisk, approachable white from a single estate-farmed block, the oak briny and salty in toast and honey. Textured and elegantly light bodied, it finishes with a satisfying note of lemon candy.

title: Domaine du Castel 2013 C Chardonnay (Judean Hills)
excerpt: This wine offers a bouquet of baking bread with a touch of ...
description: This wine offers a bouquet of baking bread with a touch of lemon curd. It presents a sophisticated palate of lemon, lime, orange blossom, piecrust, and eucalyptus. It has pleasing acidity that overcomes cooling herb flavors on the finish, and while it is light in the mouth, soft tannins persist on the gum line for a short while after swallowing.

title: Parmeson 2013 Josephine Hill Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Muted on the nose, this offers shy notes of anise and fennel ...
description: Muted on the nose, this offers shy notes of anise and fennel that arises out of the glass over time, buoyed by a generous proportion of golden apple and honey. It veers briny around the full-bodied finish.

title: Louis Max 2014 Les Rochelles  (Mercurey)
excerpt: This wine is dense, ripe and full of rich apricot and peach ...
description: This wine is dense, ripe and full of rich apricot and peach flavors, with a line of crisp lemon and a background of toast. Full in the mouth, this generous wine will be ready to drink from 2017. It comes Louis Max domaine vineyards in and around Mercurey.

title: Jean-Luc and Paul Aegerter 2013  Pernand-Vergelesses
excerpt: Soft and round, this ripe wine offers both fruit and acidity. It ...
description: Soft and round, this ripe wine offers both fruit and acidity. It is young and full of green plum and pear flavors, still textured with a young, crisp character. It needs to fill out for a few years, and will be best from 2017.

title: Segal's 2013 Special Reserve Chardonnay (Galilee)
excerpt: This wine has a nose of pineapple and roasted fennel bulb. There ...
description: This wine has a nose of pineapple and roasted fennel bulb. There is a nice balance of fruit and cool herb flavors, in particular guava, lemon, roasted fennel and a touch of mint. It is slightly waxy in the mouth and cooling herbs remain on the palate until the bright finish.

title: Acacia 2013 Winery Lake Vineyard Chardonnay (Carneros-Napa Valley)
excerpt: Tropical with notes of gingerbread and vanilla, this wine tastes full bodied ...
description: Tropical with notes of gingerbread and vanilla, this wine tastes full bodied despite its medium level of alcohol. It offers a reduced note on the finish, anchored otherwise in sweet toffee.

title: Domaine Laroche 2013 Les Vaudevey Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: While the texture is light, the fruit and the wood flavors give ...
description: While the texture is light, the fruit and the wood flavors give this wine richness and a ripe, toast and apricot character. It has balanced acidity that allows a fresher edge to develop. The aftertaste, hinting at a steely edge, suggests the wine will age. Drink from 2017.

title: Bernardus 2013 Soberanes Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: Toasted nuts, seared marshmallows, roasted corn and dried apple play on the ...
description: Toasted nuts, seared marshmallows, roasted corn and dried apple play on the nose of this richly layered wine. The palate shows plenty of lively sea salt from front to back, along with concentrated citrus character and an apple-syrup ripeness.

title: Pierre Gimonnet et Fils NV Cuis Premier Cru Blanc de Blancs Brut Chardonnay (Champagne)
excerpt: Based on the premier cru Chardonnay vineyards of Cuis, this soft and ...
description: Based on the premier cru Chardonnay vineyards of Cuis, this soft and fresh wine is beautifully balanced. It has apple freshness, a tangy texture from minerality, and a bright and fruity aftertaste.

title: David Hill 2013 Estate Reserve Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Soft and buttery, this drink-now style is as smooth as a polished ...
description: Soft and buttery, this drink-now style is as smooth as a polished stone. The fruit is fairly generic and light, but the penetrating punch of popcorn and nut oil carries it along nicely.

title: Mahonia 2013 Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: The fruit is the star here, ripe and round. Flavors are a ...
description: The fruit is the star here, ripe and round. Flavors are a nice mix of orange, apple and pear, with a light dusting of baking spices. This is drinking at its freshest peak.

title: Thomas George 2014 Sons and Daughters Ranch Estate Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Unoaked, and instead fermented for 10 months in both stainless steel and ...
description: Unoaked, and instead fermented for 10 months in both stainless steel and concrete egg, this white remains light-bodied and crisp, touched by aromas of honeysuckle and refreshing flavors of pear and quince.

title: 1848 Winery 2012 Fifth Generation Chardonnay (Judean Hills)
excerpt: This easy-drinking wine has a bouquet of honeydew melon and lime juice. ...
description: This easy-drinking wine has a bouquet of honeydew melon and lime juice. Flavors of lemon, tangerine, guava and white peach with a soft hint of baking spice continue into the finish, which is marked by flavors of stone fruits and nutmeg.

title: Barkan 2014 Classic Chardonnay (Dan)
excerpt: Light straw in the glass, this wine has aromas of pineapple and ...
description: Light straw in the glass, this wine has aromas of pineapple and lemon zest. Refreshing on the palate, it offers flavors of clementine, lemon, orange rind, and honeysuckle. The finish features a lasting sense of brightness.

title: San Simeon 2014 Estate Reserve Chardonnay (Monterey)
excerpt: Crisp and fresh aromas of lime sorbet and iced apple flesh greet ...
description: Crisp and fresh aromas of lime sorbet and iced apple flesh greet the nose on this Riboli family bottling. The palate is steely and bright, with Anjou pear flesh, a bit of smoke and some red-apple ripeness.

title: Carneros Hills 2012 Chardenet Coteau Blanc Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: From a particular block with limestone soils, this is indeed a light, ...
description: From a particular block with limestone soils, this is indeed a light, steely and minerally white wine, given nine months in French oak, only 17% of it new. It takes on that oak with subtle concentration, offering a touch of baked pineapple, peach and vanilla, ending in a bittersweet bite of Meyer lemon.

title: Louis Max 2013 Les Plantenays  (Rully)
excerpt: This is a steely wine, tight with acidity and lemon fruits. It ...
description: This is a steely wine, tight with acidity and lemon fruits. It has a mineral, tangy texture that is still calming down, which suggests a young wine that needs time. Certainly the fruit is all there, if with a nervy character. Drink the wine from 2018.

title: Testarossa 2013 Cuvee Los Gatos Chardonnay (Monterey County)
excerpt: Broad aromas of seared lemons, white peach and nectarine are given nuance ...
description: Broad aromas of seared lemons, white peach and nectarine are given nuance with a bit of quinine on this entry-level bottling. Stewed lemons and apple-custard flavors show on the plush and pillowy palate, cut with an acidic sizzle.

title: Comartin 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: This appellation blend shows buttered toast with lemon marmalade on the nose, ...
description: This appellation blend shows buttered toast with lemon marmalade on the nose, with a growing sense of tropicality. The palate is plush and smoky, with vanilla and cream flavors cut by just enough citrusy tang to keep it serious.

title: Bianchi 2013 El Camino Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: Ripe yellow apples and yellow pears meet with a tropical sense of ...
description: Ripe yellow apples and yellow pears meet with a tropical sense of guava and tuberose on this bottling from a vineyard near the intersection of Highways 101 and 154. The flavors are more tart, with green-apple flesh, light pear and a much more reserved touch of tropical fruit and flower.

title: Vinum 2014 V Series Chardonnay (Monterey)
excerpt: One of the more reliable, big-production brands in the market right now, ...
description: One of the more reliable, big-production brands in the market right now, this wine shows fresh white flowers, with just a dollop of vanilla butter and a touch of wet stone on the nose. There is decent verve to the evenly presented and light palate, with flavors of cooked apples and sea salt.

title: Thomas George 2012 Baker Ridge Vineyard Estate Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Richly intense, this wine wraps thick textures of caramel and toffee around ...
description: Richly intense, this wine wraps thick textures of caramel and toffee around tropical mango. The full body celebrates ripeness while finding enough restraint.

title: Louis Max 2013 Vignes du Domaine  (Mercurey)
excerpt: With a touch of wood aging, this ripe and creamy wine has ...
description: With a touch of wood aging, this ripe and creamy wine has a light edge of toast. Crisp with lemon and ripe with apricots, it has a fresh character that is filled out and given richness with a touch of honey at the end. Drink from 2016.

title: Big Table Farm 2013 Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Solidly built, almost chunky, the accent flavors suggest time spent in a ...
description: Solidly built, almost chunky, the accent flavors suggest time spent in a percentage of new wood. Citrus and apple are cloaked in oaky spices and barrel flavors of toast, vanilla and butter.

title: Materra 2013 Chardonnay (Oak Knoll District)
excerpt: Well integrated in terms of barrel use (listed as 60% used French ...
description: Well integrated in terms of barrel use (listed as 60% used French oak and 40% new), this features a robust exuberance of fruit, from Asian pear to Meyer lemon. Spicy with a touch of nutmeg and ginger, it hones a fine line of minerality throughout.

title: White Hart Wine 2014 Chardonnay (Arroyo Seco)
excerpt: Plush, showy aromas of candied apples, caramelized pears, condensed honeysuckle, yellow peach, ...
description: Plush, showy aromas of candied apples, caramelized pears, condensed honeysuckle, yellow peach, quinine and cinnamon spice show on the nose of this wine. The palate takes a sour turn, with lemon peels, pear skins and a touch of chamomile.

title: Domaine Vrignaud 2014  Chablis
excerpt: This is a soft, rounded wine full of yellow fruits, pears and ...
description: This is a soft, rounded wine full of yellow fruits, pears and red apples. It is textured with minerality and tangy lemon zest. The acidity at the end is still fresh and the wine could do with some more time before drinking. Wait until late 2016.

title: Tabor 2014 Mt. Tabor Chardonnay (Galilee)
excerpt: This wine has aromas of lemongrass and apricot with a touch of ...
description: This wine has aromas of lemongrass and apricot with a touch of petrol. It offers flavors of peach, apricot, vanilla and jasmine. It is very soft in the mouth, and the bright finish is marked by floral notes.

title: Bernardus 2014 Precis Unoaked Chardonnay (Monterey County)
excerpt: This stainless bottling shows fresh-squeezed lemons, yellow melon and canned pear on ...
description: This stainless bottling shows fresh-squeezed lemons, yellow melon and canned pear on the fresh, clean and not overly tropical nose. The palate is smooth and plush down the middle, but sharply tight on the edges, with flavors of pear, lime and apple that prove a bit sour and tart toward the finish.

title: Myka 2014 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This white is a mix of tropical pineapple, tangerine and marshmallow, offering ...
description: This white is a mix of tropical pineapple, tangerine and marshmallow, offering a creamy, doughy and yeasty texture on the palate. Chalky, it is medium bodied with a hint of richness, finishing more steely than stuffy.

title: Rutini 2015 Trumpeter Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Pleasant apple and woodspice aromas are basic and limited but good. This ...
description: Pleasant apple and woodspice aromas are basic and limited but good. This feels balanced, with friendly melon, banana and tropical-fruit flavors. Light oak and related vanilla flavors drive the finish on this easygoing Chardonnay.

title: Keller 2013 La Cruz Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Ripe butterscotch and a notable flank of big vanilla and oak greet ...
description: Ripe butterscotch and a notable flank of big vanilla and oak greet the entry of this vineyard-designate. It makes for a luxurious wine reflective of a warm vintage and approach.

title: Orogeny 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: The barrel speaks loudly here, fortressing deep, full-bodied layers of vanilla, tropical ...
description: The barrel speaks loudly here, fortressing deep, full-bodied layers of vanilla, tropical guava and pineapple. Creamy and textured, it finishes in more vanilla.

title: Domaine Laroche 2014 Saint-Martin  (Chablis)
excerpt: This simple, fruity and rounded wine has light acidity, apricot and pear ...
description: This simple, fruity and rounded wine has light acidity, apricot and pear flavors and a tang of orange zest. It is full, fruity and ready to drink.

title: Omero 2013 Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Bright gold in color, this has nutty, buttery aromatics that lead to ...
description: Bright gold in color, this has nutty, buttery aromatics that lead to a low-alcohol palate built upon a sturdy base of crisp apples. Skin flavors add complexity and weight to what might otherwise feel a bit too thin.

title: Inception 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: A dense vanilla-bean character coats a nose of seared white peach and ...
description: A dense vanilla-bean character coats a nose of seared white peach and toasted nuts. The palate features thick, ripe fruits, preserved lemon, a touch of walnut and a rocky grip.

title: Oak Knoll 2014 Unoaked Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Light green-apple fruit and gentle highlights of cinnamon are in place, though ...
description: Light green-apple fruit and gentle highlights of cinnamon are in place, though this wine feels a little flat on the palate. A quick finish brings a hint of plastic.

title: Louis Max 2014 Beaucharme  (Bourgogne)
excerpt: This is a refreshing, lemon-flavored wine. Attractive crispness comes out of the ...
description: This is a refreshing, lemon-flavored wine. Attractive crispness comes out of the mineral texture and perfumed acidity. Light and still young, this will age to be ready to drink from late 2016.

title: Bouchaine 2013 Estate Chardonnay (Carneros-Napa Valley)
excerpt: Floral and inviting in vanilla and caramel, this wine tastes bigger and ...
description: Floral and inviting in vanilla and caramel, this wine tastes bigger and richer than it is, offering more in the way of ripeness and texture than acidity. It finishes full bodied.

title: Bellacana 2013 Bellacana Vineyard Chardonnay (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Coconut-laden oak kicks off the entry of this wine, a crisp version ...
description: Coconut-laden oak kicks off the entry of this wine, a crisp version of the variety that nonetheless exhibits plenty of oak characteristics and a rich ripeness of baked apple, pear and pineapple.

title: Michael Mondavi Family Estate 2013 Isabel Mondavi Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Sharply etched in pineapple and Meyer lemon, this wine retains a brightness ...
description: Sharply etched in pineapple and Meyer lemon, this wine retains a brightness of fruit and acidity throughout, never overly impeded by oak. A subtle, earthy herbal streak plays in the background.

title: Pelter 2013 Matar Chardonnay (Galilee)
excerpt: Tropical fruit aromas of mango and guava prepare the palate for flavors ...
description: Tropical fruit aromas of mango and guava prepare the palate for flavors of lemon-lime sorbet with notes of freesia. There is a nice vein of minerality that offers a faint sensation of chalkiness on the gums. Softly lingering tannins recede into a crisp finish.

title: Louis Max 2014  Chablis
excerpt: Fresh, light and fruity this is attractive young Chablis. It is soft, ...
description: Fresh, light and fruity this is attractive young Chablis. It is soft, dwelling on the fruit rather than any texture. Crisp and with citrus and green apple flavors, it will be ready to drink easily by mid-2016.

title: Red Car 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: High in acidity and low in oak, this is a white that ...
description: High in acidity and low in oak, this is a white that pushes the limits, reflective of the extreme, cool-climate vineyards from which it sources. Fresh-squeezed lemon is the star, the wet-stone minerality razor sharp.

title: Otazu 2014 Chardonnay (Navarra)
excerpt: A simple bouquet offers light apple and melon aromas, while the palate ...
description: A simple bouquet offers light apple and melon aromas, while the palate shows some malic acidity before it softens. Melon, apple and a touch of butter work together to create a mild flavor profile, while this is mellow and short on the finish.

title: MooBuzz 2014 Chardonnay (Monterey)
excerpt: The nose of this widely available wine jumps from condensed apples and ...
description: The nose of this widely available wine jumps from condensed apples and honey to cut pear on the more broad whiffs. The flavors are light and a tad ripe, with red apples, citrus and orange juice flavors.

title: Mandolin 2014 Chardonnay (Monterey)
excerpt: Canned pears and plumeria show on the nose of this bargain-priced offering, ...
description: Canned pears and plumeria show on the nose of this bargain-priced offering, worthy of a weeknight dinner or later in the evening. The palate shows lots of ripe stone fruit, apple syrup and tangy citrus, the finish delivering a lasting acidity.

title: Acacia 2013 Thornton Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: This is an intense, somewhat unformed vineyard-designate, ripe with sweet tannins that ...
description: This is an intense, somewhat unformed vineyard-designate, ripe with sweet tannins that takes on considerable barrel flavors of vanilla and caramel.

title: Jean-Luc and Paul Aegerter 2013 Colette  (Coteaux Bourguignons)
excerpt: With fruit drawn from all over Burgundy, this is a light, bright ...
description: With fruit drawn from all over Burgundy, this is a light, bright and refreshing wine. It has light acidity, spice and apple flavors and a bright, tight aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Bernier 2014 Chardonnay (Val de Loire)
excerpt: This soft, tank-aged wine has attractive apple fruits, a touch of citrus ...
description: This soft, tank-aged wine has attractive apple fruits, a touch of citrus and crisp acidity. Light and fruity, it is ready to drink.

title: Jean-Luc and Paul Aegerter 2013  Bourgogne
excerpt: Crisp with an edge of honey, this is a ripe and fruity ...
description: Crisp with an edge of honey, this is a ripe and fruity wine. Along with apple and cantaloupe melon flavors it has a nutty character and some light acidity, both of which add to its simple attraction. Drink now.

title: Mossback 2014 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This wine is somewhat diluted and one-dimensional. It makes a straightforward attempt ...
description: This wine is somewhat diluted and one-dimensional. It makes a straightforward attempt at bringing a richness of apple and anise to the fore around neutral oak dynamics before finishing ripe and full.

title: Bodega Zafado 2015 Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Resiny oak sticks out, while the palate is grabby and sticky in ...
description: Resiny oak sticks out, while the palate is grabby and sticky in feel. This tastes like lemony pushcart hotdogs and the briny water they sit in, followed by a woody, low-fruit finish.

title: Luis Segundo Correas 2015 Valle Las Acequias Clase A Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Odd aromas of bath soap and tropical fruits are not convincing for ...
description: Odd aromas of bath soap and tropical fruits are not convincing for Chardonnay. A narrow diluted palate offers low-level lemon and tropical-fruit flavors in front of a sour underwhelming finish.

title: Andeluna 2015 1300 Chardonnay (Valle de Uco)
excerpt: Cidery, citric and jumbled on the nose and palate, this is barely ...
description: Cidery, citric and jumbled on the nose and palate, this is barely cutting it. Briny, limited flavors of mealy citrus fruits finish flat.

title: Wayfarer 2013 Wayfarer Vineyard Chardonnay (Fort Ross-Seaview)
excerpt: A high-acid, weighty and complex white, this vintage is even better than ...
description: A high-acid, weighty and complex white, this vintage is even better than the last, gorgeous in a golden tannish color. Tropical guava and white flowers weave seamlessly through a web of minerality and freshness, without compromising body and texture. This is a delicious wine.

title: Frostwatch 2013 Ophira Chardonnay (Bennett Valley)
excerpt: This reserve-level wine is sublime in stone fruit and lime as well ...
description: This reserve-level wine is sublime in stone fruit and lime as well as pear. The oak used for aging this wine was all neutral, and the taste and impact of it is unobtrusive. While vibrant in fruit, it also offers richer hints of caramel and graham cracker in complex and balanced ways, ending with persistence.

title: Hyde de Villaine 2012 Hyde Vineyard Chardonnay (Carneros-Napa Valley)
excerpt: In this lively, delicately balanced wine from an exceptional vineyard, an exuberance ...
description: In this lively, delicately balanced wine from an exceptional vineyard, an exuberance of pear and tangerine plays on the palate, buoyed by focused minerality. With just the right touch of ripeness and richness, it ends with a suggestion of lemon custard.

title: Lynmar 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This is a tremendous blend of various vineyard sites, coaxed together into ...
description: This is a tremendous blend of various vineyard sites, coaxed together into a stunning combination of beautiful floral aromas, ginger and baked lemon. Given time in half new oak, it takes on flavors of apple and vanilla, never venturing out of range and remaining balanced and textured.

title: Cenay 2012 Bald Mountain Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: A unique nose of chives, dill and more fresh-cut herbs mixes with ...
description: A unique nose of chives, dill and more fresh-cut herbs mixes with wet river stones and tangerine peel on this wine from a Napa-based producer. The energetic palate starts with pencil lead before diving into washes of lemon-lime citrus and settling on a cashew-nut frame, presented with tremendous length and depth.

title: Three Sticks 2013 Durell Vineyard Origin Chardonnay (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Aged for a year in stainless-steel barrels, this wine is a combination ...
description: Aged for a year in stainless-steel barrels, this wine is a combination of two vineyard blocks. The area planted to Old Wente 5 clone contributes zesty acidity and crisp apple; the V9 vineyard block is known for minerality. Acidity is balanced and the bouquet quite floral, with the palate devoted to brioche and golden honey.

title: Barden 2014 Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: There are light and airy elements of nectarine flesh and lemon blossoms ...
description: There are light and airy elements of nectarine flesh and lemon blossoms on the nose of this first Chardonnay ever made by veteran Doug Margerum, who also imparts warmer scents of toast and clarified butter. The palate is tightly coiled, simultaneously soft with stone fruit and sharp with chalky texturality.

title: Donkey & Goat 2014 Linda Vista Vineyard Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: After making wine in Berkeley for just over a decade, the producer ...
description: After making wine in Berkeley for just over a decade, the producer is working for the first time with Napa Valley fruit, grapes in fact farmed by grape-grower extraordinaire Steve Matthiasson. Pear, quince and grapefruit combine for a svelte sensibility, subtle in oak and sharp in acidity, with a tangy, herbal finish.

title: Pellegrini 2013 Olivet Lane Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Rich and creamy, this beguiling wine offers a counterweight of lightness and ...
description: Rich and creamy, this beguiling wine offers a counterweight of lightness and balance, finding as much lemon and lime zest as baked apple and pear within its layers of flavor. Lifted in minerality, it offers accents of vanilla and honey on the finish, making the wine both complex and completely delicious.

title: Pellet Estate 2013 Sunchase Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: A heady mixture of lemon custard and baked pear marks the entry ...
description: A heady mixture of lemon custard and baked pear marks the entry to this full-bodied, deliciously decadent wine, from a high-elevation site above the Petaluma Gap. Honeyed aromas maintain themselves in the glass, accented in floral honeysuckle and ginger. Lovely and generous, it softens as it goes.

title: Pali 2013 Huber VIneyard Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: Just enough white peach and pineapple ripeness on the nose plays to ...
description: Just enough white peach and pineapple ripeness on the nose plays to the hedonistic side of the grape, but gracious notes of chalk dust and mandarin orange pith keep it intellectual. The palate is lively and citrus-driven, showing green apple, Bosc pear, salted lemons and more peach.

title: Landmark 2013 Charles Heintz Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: From a fantastic vineyard much influenced by the coast, this wine begins ...
description: From a fantastic vineyard much influenced by the coast, this wine begins ripe and voluptuous but finds its balance as it goes, providing layers of pear pie and fennel, the oak well integrated and defined. It offers intense power and minerality on the finish.

title: Morgan 2013 Double L Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: A tightened-up nose on this top-end bottling by Dan Lee shows Key ...
description: A tightened-up nose on this top-end bottling by Dan Lee shows Key lime blossoms, tangerine pith, scratched Meyer lemon skin, sour cream and a flinty minerality. The palate is also quite flinty and mineral-driven, but a citrus-blossom ripeness makes it dynamic, bolstered by Key lime pith and tangerine spritz.

title: Landmark 2013 Damaris Reserve Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Reminiscent of baked apple tart, opulent fruit provides richness and concentration equally ...
description: Reminiscent of baked apple tart, opulent fruit provides richness and concentration equally buoyed by lemony acidity. Vanilla and honey make appearances on the palate before structured crispness forms on the finish. The wine is a blend from the Sangiacomo and Rodgers Creek vineyards.

title: J. Lohr 2013 Arroyo Vista Chardonnay (Arroyo Seco)
excerpt: A faint smoky character wafts through warm, inviting aromas of lemon peels, ...
description: A faint smoky character wafts through warm, inviting aromas of lemon peels, nectarine and sea salt on the nose of this wine from Monterey County. There is a lot of energetic acidity on the palate, where even flavors of apple and pear are cut by lemon-lime briskness and a briny character.

title: Three Sticks 2013 One Sky Chardonnay (Sonoma Mountain)
excerpt: Candied ginger and nougat wrap themselves around toasted oak and fierce acidity ...
description: Candied ginger and nougat wrap themselves around toasted oak and fierce acidity in this full-bodied, voluptuous white that veers confidently into measured decadence. Intense in ripe apple, pear and vanilla oak, it finishes fresh and vibrant on the palate.

title: Kimmel 2013 Chardonnay (Potter Valley)
excerpt: For a full-bodied wine, this one has subtle flavors, but an appealing ...
description: For a full-bodied wine, this one has subtle flavors, but an appealing and generous mouthfeel and good supportive acidity keeps it balanced. Sophisticated almond and fig flavors emerge on second and third sips while the wine keeps its attractive dryness and sense of reserve.

title: Testarossa 2013 Fogstone Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: From a vineyard full of gravelly loam soils, the nose on this ...
description: From a vineyard full of gravelly loam soils, the nose on this wine shows a mix of citrus freshness and more complex qualities of dried apples, quinine, pencil lead and nuts. A slight yogurt element shows on the palate, along with grapefruit pith and a nectarine warmth, leaving the mouth quite energized into the finish.

title: Cholame 2012 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: This wine, from a new collaboration between San Miguel vintner David DuBois ...
description: This wine, from a new collaboration between San Miguel vintner David DuBois and Santa Ynez winemaker Andres Ibarra, shows excellently on the nose, with apple blossoms, white peach flesh, cold butter, seared lemons and garden herbs. The dynamic, engaging palate is framed by pencil shavings and browned butter, with lemon peels, nectarine flesh and hints of salted pineapple.

title: Benovia 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: From two vineyard sites, Martaella and Martinelli Frei Road, this lovely wine ...
description: From two vineyard sites, Martaella and Martinelli Frei Road, this lovely wine is built from the ground up, with elements of rich vanilla, toasted oak and baked pear. Big in style on the nose, it finishes crisp and focused, a mixture of complexity and lightness of being.

title: La Follette 2013 Chardonnay (North Coast)
excerpt: Complex fruit flavors that are focused and intricate bring a lot of ...
description: Complex fruit flavors that are focused and intricate bring a lot of life to this medium-bodied, lively and intriguing wine. There are touches of ripe apple, honey, mango and an underlying light layer of vanilla and cream, all supported by fresh acidity and a smooth but slightly tangy texture.

title: Ashan 2014 Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This wine offers a pleasing mixture of aromas and flavors of baking ...
description: This wine offers a pleasing mixture of aromas and flavors of baking spices, pear and apple. Viscosity and weight gives it a sense of gravitas but never gets bogged down.

title: Cuvaison 2013 Estate Grown Chardonnay (Carneros-Napa Valley)
excerpt: Crisp, yet fuller bodied, with a creamy voluptuousness to the mouthfeel, this ...
description: Crisp, yet fuller bodied, with a creamy voluptuousness to the mouthfeel, this wine offers a taste of lemon pith and peach, accented by a floral bouquet of orange blossom. Measured acidity keeps it ebullient in the glass, ending in a hit of Tahitian vanilla.

title: Sanford 2013 Flor de Campo Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: Very high-toned for a relatively affordable wine, this shows Key lime pith, ...
description: Very high-toned for a relatively affordable wine, this shows Key lime pith, Greek yogurt, scratched pink grapefruit skin and a fresh 7-Up soda liveliness on the nose. Anjou peas, seared green apples, lime zest and nectarine power the pleasant energy on the palate, which wipes up clean with a vanilla finish.

title: MacRostie 2013 Sangiacomo Vineyard Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: From two blocks of the vineyard, this light, crisp, medium-weighted wine stays ...
description: From two blocks of the vineyard, this light, crisp, medium-weighted wine stays refreshing on the palate and remains complex in acidity. Nutmeg dances throughout its soft layers, while the finish burnishes in rich vanilla brioche.

title: Testarossa 2013 Soberanes Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: Warm butter and white peach aromas are cut by sea salt and ...
description: Warm butter and white peach aromas are cut by sea salt and brisk lemon-peel sharpness on this single-vineyard study by winemaker Bill Brousseau. Ripe apple, juicy lime, more salt and a crisp minerality mark the palate.

title: Chamisal Vineyards 2013 Califa Estate Grown Chardonnay (Edna Valley)
excerpt: Quite buttery and rich, this bottling shows lemon custard, ripe yellow melon, ...
description: Quite buttery and rich, this bottling shows lemon custard, ripe yellow melon, white peach and buttermilk on the lavish nose. The palate is lush and attention-grabbing, with poached and grilled peach flavors lifted by citrus energy and a vanilla-laced finish.

title: Gorman 2014 Big Sissy Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Fermented and aged in new French oak, this wine shows pleasing pear ...
description: Fermented and aged in new French oak, this wine shows pleasing pear and apple aromas along with toast and baking spices. The medium-bodied flavors show refinement, depth and balance.

title: Glasshaus 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: A reductive element of petrol and oak blows off over time bouquet-wise, ...
description: A reductive element of petrol and oak blows off over time bouquet-wise, but in taste and weight, the wine retains a sultry sense of oak and baked apple. Full bodied in style, it manages to stay balanced throughout, finishing in a buoyant twist of citrus.

title: Grgich Hills 2012 Paris Tasting Commemorative Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Heavy wafts of petrol and oak dominate at first in this wine, ...
description: Heavy wafts of petrol and oak dominate at first in this wine, before some air and some swirling in the glass reveal more lifted aromas and flavors of lemon candy, green apple and apple tart. A tale of two wines in some ways, it zigzags between crisp and luxurious, finding its balance in the glass.

title: The Tribe 2014 Chardonnay (Lodi)
excerpt: Luscious melon aromas, creamy fruit-tart flavors and a silky texture make a ...
description: Luscious melon aromas, creamy fruit-tart flavors and a silky texture make a pleasing combination in this wonderfully soothing wine. A crisp core of lemon and apple flavors are surrounded by a layer of vanilla and hazelnut. The plus texture carries the flavors through a long finish.

title: Pellegrini 2013 Unoaked Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Despite its unoaked nature, this wine reveals elements of baked and dried ...
description: Despite its unoaked nature, this wine reveals elements of baked and dried fruit, and an unexpected voluptuousness of full-bodied richness. Pear, apple and lemon interplay on the palate, while tangy acidity provides a satisfying end note.

title: Chamisal Vineyards 2013 Estate Grown Chardonnay (Edna Valley)
excerpt: This is a rich wine, with notes of buttermilk, toasted macadamia nut, ...
description: This is a rich wine, with notes of buttermilk, toasted macadamia nut, bright Meyer lemon and orange blossom, all delivered in a measured manner. The palate shows walnut oil, orange bitters, coconut, pineapple and Gala apples, proving quite ripe but balanced by ample acidity.

title: Clos du Val 2013 Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: A combination of licorice and fennel mark the bouquet of this estate ...
description: A combination of licorice and fennel mark the bouquet of this estate wine that is light and low in oak. Medium in build and classically elegant, it dances in crisp apple and pineapple, with traces of vanilla and toasty oak.

title: Napa Cellars 2013 V Collection Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Fennel and spicy ginger account for much ado on the nose, before ...
description: Fennel and spicy ginger account for much ado on the nose, before this medium-bodied wine exhibits well-integrated oak, baked apple and a hit of lemongrass on the palate. It finishes with a burst of spice.

title: Perry Creek 2013 Altitude 2401 Chardonnay (El Dorado)
excerpt: A classic style of barrel-fermented wine, this shows lots of buttery, oaky ...
description: A classic style of barrel-fermented wine, this shows lots of buttery, oaky and vanillin aromas and flavors, with a rich texture and an almost-sweet balance. Delicious ripe pear, marzipan, butter and baking spice notes keep the taste buds busy.

title: Poiema 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: Buttery warmth shows on the nose of this wine by vintner Travis ...
description: Buttery warmth shows on the nose of this wine by vintner Travis Proctor, alongside poached pear fruit and an iodine edge. Featuring original artwork by James Caprell on the label, the wine offers pan-seared golden apples, tart pear skin and more of the iodine edge once sipped.

title: Sextant 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: The Paso producer heads a bit north to produce this wine. Aromas ...
description: The Paso producer heads a bit north to produce this wine. Aromas suggest browned butter, lemon slices, pan-seared peach and a bit of smoke, with some steely aromatic backbone. The palate is consumed by lemon blossoms and buttered toast.

title: Arboleda 2014 Chardonnay (Aconcagua Costa)
excerpt: Nutty aromas of popcorn, buttered toast, peach and apple create a solid ...
description: Nutty aromas of popcorn, buttered toast, peach and apple create a solid nose. This feels lively but also a bit oily. A mix of roasted nut, wood resin and pineapple flavors finish toasty, with racy acidity working as a preservative.

title: Robert Young 2012 Chardonnay (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Crisp apple and lemon mark this wine, from a legend of Alexander ...
description: Crisp apple and lemon mark this wine, from a legend of Alexander Valley and California Chardonnay. Oaky caramel and toast dominate on the midpalate, before a significant amount of fennel comes into play on the finish.

title: Myka 2014 Mitzi Chardonnay (Monterey County)
excerpt: A strong note of grapefruit skin and juice, from ruby red to ...
description: A strong note of grapefruit skin and juice, from ruby red to yellow, melds with crushed chalk and cider on the nose of this bottling. The citrus zest is prominent on the palate, as is more apple cider and a solid pithy grip, proving quite intriguing texturally.

title: Joullian 2013 Highland Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: This wine shows more age than it should, but is quite good ...
description: This wine shows more age than it should, but is quite good now, with aromas of vanilla, honeysuckle, molasses, white-flower extract and liquid marshmallow ice-cream topping. The palate brings apple extract and roasted nut flavors.

title: Jason-Stephens 2012 Estate Reserve Chardonnay (Santa Clara Valley)
excerpt: Lime pith, sharp gray slate, steel and a warmer lemon-curd aroma show ...
description: Lime pith, sharp gray slate, steel and a warmer lemon-curd aroma show on the nose of this wine from a region between Morgan Hill and Gilroy. Apples and pear-skin bitterness mark the palate that grows riper through the sip.

title: Covenant 2013 Lavan Chardonnay (Sonoma Mountain)
excerpt: From a 10-acre site called Scopus farmed by Ulises Valdez, this wine ...
description: From a 10-acre site called Scopus farmed by Ulises Valdez, this wine is rich and golden in color, given time to barrel-ferment and develop layers of fulsome complexity. Oaky, it has weight and depth, veering into ripe tropical notes and vanilla as it develops in the glass.

title: Hidden Jewel 2014 Unoaked Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: The Nashville-based R.S. Lipman Company, formerly just a Tennessee distributor, comes west ...
description: The Nashville-based R.S. Lipman Company, formerly just a Tennessee distributor, comes west for this deal of a wine, with lime blossoms, pink grapefruit and Gala apple slices on the nose. The palate is clean, crisp and rounded with lime spritzer and green-apple flavors.

title: Black Stallion 2013 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: An opening of toasty caramel gives this wine a full-bodied weightiness and ...
description: An opening of toasty caramel gives this wine a full-bodied weightiness and inviting richness on the nose and palate, offering a roundness of vanilla and peach along the way. Full and ripe, it finishes in a lift of balanced acidity.

title: Milbrandt 2014 Traditions Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas of pear and toast are followed by apple pie and spice ...
description: Aromas of pear and toast are followed by apple pie and spice flavors that show a pleasing mixture of fruit and barrel. It delivers a lot of wine for the money.

title: Lone Birch 2013 Chardonnay (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Pear, white flower and cantaloupe aromas lead to a rounded, creamy-feeling palate. ...
description: Pear, white flower and cantaloupe aromas lead to a rounded, creamy-feeling palate. It brings a lot of appeal and the balance is spot-on.

title: Airfield Estates 2014 Reserve Chardonnay (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Barrel aromas of vanilla, toast and woodspice are at the fore. The ...
description: Barrel aromas of vanilla, toast and woodspice are at the fore. The palate brings a full feel, with the wood taking over.

title: Clos du Bois 2013 Calcaire Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Tahitian vanilla and white flowers mark the opening bouquet of this wine, ...
description: Tahitian vanilla and white flowers mark the opening bouquet of this wine, followed by rich, full-bodied flavors of apple tart, pear and caramelized minerality. A tart, ripe finish caps things off.

title: Concha y Toro 2014 Casillero del Diablo Reserva Chardonnay (Central Valley)
excerpt: Clean aromas of banana and apple get this Chardonnay off to a ...
description: Clean aromas of banana and apple get this Chardonnay off to a solid start. The palate is alert and upright, with a note of resiny oak. Flavors of melon and peach are supported by snappy acidity.

title: Paris Valley Road Cellars 2013 Chardonnay (Monterey County)
excerpt: Salted grapefruit skins, browned butter and a toasted-nut element arise on the ...
description: Salted grapefruit skins, browned butter and a toasted-nut element arise on the nose of this wine from a vineyard near the tiny Salinas Valley town of San Ardo. It offers acidic energy and tight minerality on the palate, with ripe aromatic apples showing midway through the sip.

title: Montevina 2013 Omira Hills Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: Pleasant floral aromas and sunny fruit-bowl flavors meet light buttery, earthy touches ...
description: Pleasant floral aromas and sunny fruit-bowl flavors meet light buttery, earthy touches in this rather light-bodied wine. This shows nice complexity on the palate, with pear, peach and apple flavors.

title: Vintager 2012 The Californian Limited Edition Chardonnay (Knights Valley)
excerpt: Soft and round, this is a ripe wine accented in toasted oak, ...
description: Soft and round, this is a ripe wine accented in toasted oak, vanilla and Good-n-Plenty-type licorice, made in a likable style.

title: Hess Collection 2014 Shirtail Creek Vineyard Chardonnay (Monterey)
excerpt: This stainless-steel bottling shows overwhelming white-flower elements on the nose, from tuberose ...
description: This stainless-steel bottling shows overwhelming white-flower elements on the nose, from tuberose to honeysuckle to jasmine, cut by a bit of baking soda. The palate is so floral and aromatic that it almost tastes like a different grape, with sharp apples, more tuberose and a steely frame.

title: Poseidon 2013 Estate Chardonnay (Los Carneros)
excerpt: Caramel and white-chocolate aromas lead to very ripe, buttery flavors, a sense ...
description: Caramel and white-chocolate aromas lead to very ripe, buttery flavors, a sense of sweetness and an almost thick texture in this full-bodied wine. Practically as rich and creamy as a milkshake, it will delight some drinkers for its unctuousness.

title: Santa Ema 2014 Reserva Chardonnay (Leyda Valley)
excerpt: Aromas of saline solution and sawdust accent generic citrus and apple aromas. ...
description: Aromas of saline solution and sawdust accent generic citrus and apple aromas. On the palate, this is fresh and citrusy. A blast of sharp lemon, apple and quince flavors come before a lightweight but oaky finish.

title: Line 39 2014 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: This is a very attractive, fruity and smooth wine in a plush ...
description: This is a very attractive, fruity and smooth wine in a plush style. Aromas of pear and pineapple turn to full flavors lightly spiced with vanilla. The texture is easy-going, mouthfilling and helps the flavors linger on the finish.

title: Quintay 2014 Q Grand Reserve Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Toasty, briny citrus aromas lead to a pinched and strained palate. The ...
description: Toasty, briny citrus aromas lead to a pinched and strained palate. The flavors are a touch bitter, with oily apple and stone-fruit flavors. The nutty finish is solid but low on fruit character.

title: Treleaven 2013 Reserve Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (Cayuga Lake)
excerpt: Dusty minerals and dried orange peels accentuate the savoriness of apple and ...
description: Dusty minerals and dried orange peels accentuate the savoriness of apple and pear flavors in this full-bodied, slightly rustic Chardonnay. Fresh acidity juxtaposes a supple, approachable mouthfeel. The finish is short and simple.

title: Dusk to Dawn 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Full bodied and quite ripe, this wine has a taste of Good ...
description: Full bodied and quite ripe, this wine has a taste of Good & Plenty licorice around a core of vanilla custard and toasty oak. It is 100% varietal.

title: Jason-Stephens 2013 Select Chardonnay (Central Coast)
excerpt: The nose of this light-colored wine offers showy apple blossom and pineapple ...
description: The nose of this light-colored wine offers showy apple blossom and pineapple aromas, leaning into the ripe and tropical side of the grape spectrum. it delivers crisp energy once sipped, with very fruit-forward apple flavors and even a touch of guava.

title: Gruet NV Blanc de Blancs Sauvage Chardonnay (America)
excerpt: Citron, lemon rind and pastry crust aromas travel to a vigorous palate ...
description: Citron, lemon rind and pastry crust aromas travel to a vigorous palate of foaming bubbles and racing acidity. A sweet plastic note meets a squeeze of lemon on the finish.

title: Bowers Harbor 2013 Unwooded Chardonnay (Old Mission Peninsula)
excerpt: Green apple with a squeeze of fresh lemon makes for a basic ...
description: Green apple with a squeeze of fresh lemon makes for a basic and easy unoaked Chardonnay. While standard and simple, this is a perfectly enjoyable wine to pair with lighter fare.

title: Earth's Harvest 2014 Organic Grapes Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: This wine has a deep-gold color, attractive baking-spice and buttered popcorn aromas, ...
description: This wine has a deep-gold color, attractive baking-spice and buttered popcorn aromas, appealing apple and pear flavors and medium body. The texture is soft and easy and the acidity tastes low.

title: Silver Palm 2013 Chardonnay (Mendocino County)
excerpt: Crisp and firm-textured, this wine has savory, lightly herbal aromas, flavors like ...
description: Crisp and firm-textured, this wine has savory, lightly herbal aromas, flavors like pear juice and mineral water, and an engaging, rather thick mouthfeel that helps the flavors seems layered and complex.

title: Domaines Barons de Rothschild (Lafite) 2015 Los Vascos Chardonnay (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Crisp aromas of citrus are feline and snappy. This smells more like ...
description: Crisp aromas of citrus are feline and snappy. This smells more like Sauvignon Blanc than Chardonnay, and the palate is racy and citric as well. Lime, nettle and tangerine flavors finish green, tart and long, with acidic push.

title: Sagelands 2014 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas of pear and tropical fruit precede lighter-styled flavors that taper toward ...
description: Aromas of pear and tropical fruit precede lighter-styled flavors that taper toward the finish.

title: Chilcas 2013 Single Vineyard Chardonnay (Itata Valley)
excerpt: Sticky-resin aromas are derived directly from the barrel. This is cloying in ...
description: Sticky-resin aromas are derived directly from the barrel. This is cloying in feel, with heavy oak flavors and oily tropical-fruit notes.

title: Echeverria NV Espumante Brut Blanc de Blancs Chardonnay (Central Valley)
excerpt: Flat, disparate aromas of bread and white fruits are mild. On the ...
description: Flat, disparate aromas of bread and white fruits are mild. On the palate, this is plump but lacks edge and structure. Briny flavors of tropical fruits finish foamy and with a pickled flavor.

title: Pearmund 2013 Old Vine Meriwether Vineyard Chardonnay (Virginia)
excerpt: Muddled citrus and a drizzle of artificial butter initially marks the nose ...
description: Muddled citrus and a drizzle of artificial butter initially marks the nose and palate. Additional notes of bitter lemon peel and roasted pear carry the flavors to a slightly astringent finish.

title: The Winery SF 2013 Chardonnay (North Coast)
excerpt: This medium-bodied Chardonnay smells sweet like marshmallows but tastes dry. It shows ...
description: This medium-bodied Chardonnay smells sweet like marshmallows but tastes dry. It shows mild peach and lean apple flavors, a slight earthy touch and crisp-enough balance.

title: Naughty Boy 2013 Thornton Ranch Chardonnay (Potter Valley)
excerpt: A straightforward and light-bodied wine, this has buttery, earthy aromas, and butter ...
description: A straightforward and light-bodied wine, this has buttery, earthy aromas, and butter and apple flavors on a rather crisp texture. It turns dry and a bit sharp on the finish.

title: Chono 2015 Single Vineyard Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Tropical aromas of melon and papaya are clean and youthful, but rudimentary. ...
description: Tropical aromas of melon and papaya are clean and youthful, but rudimentary. This is pulpy in feel, with moderate acidity. Simple apple and peach flavors finish mild, with mild complexity.

title: Paradise Springs 2013 Chardonnay (Virginia)
excerpt: A faint nose of lemon starts things off. Simple and clean on ...
description: A faint nose of lemon starts things off. Simple and clean on the palate, that same citrus character pervades, keeping things short and snappy.

title: Caliterra 2015 Reserva Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Quince, citrus and match stick aromas lead to an acidic, one-note palate. ...
description: Quince, citrus and match stick aromas lead to an acidic, one-note palate. Flavors of lemon-lime and sauerkraut are sharp and briny, while lemon and lime flavors push a limited, racy, acidic finish.

title: Cucao 2015 Reserva Chardonnay (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Mild, melony aromas are tropical in nature and show an oily note ...
description: Mild, melony aromas are tropical in nature and show an oily note of lanolin. This feels heavy, while pithy flavors of melon are full of skin-based pyrazines. Green, bitter flavors taste more of grape skins than fruit.

title: L.A. Cetto 2013 Chardonnay (Valle de Guadalupe)
excerpt: Yeasty aromas are suggestive of vanilla wafer and corn cakes, with apple ...
description: Yeasty aromas are suggestive of vanilla wafer and corn cakes, with apple and melon scents lurking. A plump, low-acid palate delivers pithy, lightly bitter citrus and stone-fruit flavors, while notes of melon and honey fail to make much noise on the finish.

title: Fall Creek Vineyard 2014 Chardonnay (Texas)
excerpt: Faint citrus and wilted floral aromas carry through to the one-note lemon ...
description: Faint citrus and wilted floral aromas carry through to the one-note lemon palate. Crisp and simple is the name of the game for this unoaked Chardonnay.

title: Intipalka 2014 Valle del Sol Chardonnay (Ica)
excerpt: Stone-fruit and yellow apple aromas come with a hint of ham. Flat ...
description: Stone-fruit and yellow apple aromas come with a hint of ham. Flat and creamy in feel, this tastes almost entirely of leesy vanilla and pithy bitterness. In the folds are bland banana and melon notes.

title: Brick House 2013 Essence Chardonnay (Ribbon Ridge)
excerpt: One large (500 liter) barrel was set aside with wine from a ...
description: One large (500 liter) barrel was set aside with wine from a single acre of four interplanted and ungrafted Chardonnay clones. This is truly a natural wine, fermented with no additives, aged on the lees for 18 months, and bottled unfined and unfiltered. Deeply rich flavors of apple pastry, buttery barrel and sweet spice are ineffably long and seductive. This rare and exceptional wine should be consumed in its youth.

title: Ferrari 2004 Giulio Ferrari Riserva del Fondatore Chardonnay (Trento)
excerpt: Boasting lovely depth and great complexity, this iconic bottling opens with scents ...
description: Boasting lovely depth and great complexity, this iconic bottling opens with scents of toasted hazelnut, exotic fruit, baking spice and a balsamic note. The creamy, elegantly structured palate offers nectarine zest, ripe golden apple, pastry cream, roasted nut and a honey note alongside an ultrafine perlage.

title: Domaine Eden 2012 Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: This more affordable cousin to the Mount Eden brand is just as ...
description: This more affordable cousin to the Mount Eden brand is just as good, though different. It presents dairy aromas of brie cheese rind and yogurt but in a deliciously approachable way, with diced chives, caramelized pear and citronella elements. The palate shows tremendous energy, with lots of lime and lemon pith, but also a sour-cream richness.

title: Mount Eden 2012 Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: Seared yellow grapefruit, white flowers and a hint of almonds make for ...
description: Seared yellow grapefruit, white flowers and a hint of almonds make for a fresh but simultaneously nutty nose on this classic bottling from the historic producer, whose grapes come from the top of the high-elevation appellation. The extremely energized palate is enlivened by flavors of salted lemons, a buttery warmth and racy yet rich minerality, from chalk and slate to graphite and flint.

title: Paul Hobbs 2012 Ulises Valdez Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Voluptuously tropical in shaved coconut and silky layers of peach and pear, ...
description: Voluptuously tropical in shaved coconut and silky layers of peach and pear, this is a complex, age-worthy white from a stellar vineyard site, a knockout version of the variety. Smooth and round, it maintains a core of acidity that buoys the experience, finishing with a flourish. Drink now through 2022.

title: Thomas Fogarty 2012 Damiana Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: Mandarin orange Creamsicle, Cool Whip with vanilla bean and lemon-butter aromas show ...
description: Mandarin orange Creamsicle, Cool Whip with vanilla bean and lemon-butter aromas show on the nose of this richer bottling from a winery that overlooks both Silicon Valley and the Pacific Ocean. Vanilla and butter also entertain the palate, but not in an overpowering way, boosted by cotton candy and a touch of dill-like herbs.

title: Kynsi 2013 Bien Nacido Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
excerpt: This wine from the historic vineyard is light in color but not ...
description: This wine from the historic vineyard is light in color but not shy on the nose at all: lime blossoms, lemon curds, honeysuckle and lemon-lime soda all leap from the glass.
