The palate combines chopped dill and dewy herbs with green fruits, from pears to kiwi to lime peels, all presented with a lot of briskness.

title: Ruinart 2004 Dom Ruinart Blanc de Blancs Brut Chardonnay (Champagne)
excerpt: The wine has a toasty character showing that it has considerable bottle ...
description: The wine has a toasty character showing that it has considerable bottle age. The fruit has moved into the realm of secondary flavors with almonds, fresh bread and spice flavors. It is a delicious wine for those who like more mature Champagnes.

title: Black Cordon 2012 Reserve Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Round and lush, this offers soft layers of vanilla, French toast and ...
description: Round and lush, this offers soft layers of vanilla, French toast and tarte Tatin. Expansive on the palate, it maintains acidity and a freshness that keeps it inviting in the glass, concocting appealing aromas of lemon chiffon.

title: Domaine Anderson 2013 Chardonnay (Anderson Valley)
excerpt: A vivid gold color distinguishes this grand wine at the first glance, ...
description: A vivid gold color distinguishes this grand wine at the first glance, and then lightly spicy aromas and a gorgeous combo of buttery and fruity flavors come forward. Generous flavors make it very compelling, while the texture that is at once lightly acidic and smooth completes the package.

title: Brick House 2012 Cascadia Chardonnay (Ribbon Ridge)
excerpt: Certified Biodynamic and all estate grown, this five-clone blend is barrel fermented ...
description: Certified Biodynamic and all estate grown, this five-clone blend is barrel fermented with indigenous yeasts, and bottled unfiltered and unfined. It offers a mouthwatering mix of apple butter, caramel and toast. The length and subtle details argue for further aging, but go ahead and drink it now.

title: Patz & Hall 2013 Hudson Vineyard Chardonnay (Carneros-Napa Valley)
excerpt: From a three-acre block of a fantastic vineyard known for powerful finesse, ...
description: From a three-acre block of a fantastic vineyard known for powerful finesse, this offers characteristic intensity, a fleshy, tropical pineapple and guava sensibility that makes the wine rich and thick. A buoyant acidity maintains freshness and focus, and a well-built structure should provide ageability. Cellar through 2021.

title: Sixteen by Twenty 2013 16x20 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Barrel-fermented in 40% new French oak, this wine opens in billowy clouds ...
description: Barrel-fermented in 40% new French oak, this wine opens in billowy clouds of lemon zest and brioche, with pungent aromas of orange blossom that immediately intoxicate. Viscous and fuller-bodied in style, it remains balanced and high in minerality, peaking in acidity on the finish.

title: Kendall-Jackson 2013 Jackson Estate Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
excerpt: Whatever the Jackson family does in Santa Maria works quite well, including ...
description: Whatever the Jackson family does in Santa Maria works quite well, including this wine. The wondrous nose shows chives, exotic pears, mandarin pith, sesame seeds, a touch of smoke and chalky grip. On the palate, flavors recall fried green apple peels, lemon juice, quince, star fruit and lemon pith.

title: Merryvale 2013 Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: This is rich and oaky in honey and graham cracker yet completely ...
description: This is rich and oaky in honey and graham cracker yet completely well integrated in terms of tannin and power. Silky smooth, it invites with compelling layers of apple, pear and fresh-squeezed blood orange, finishing roundly satisfying.

title: Gosset NV Grand Blanc de Blancs Brut Chardonnay (Champagne)
excerpt: This is a dry, mineral wine with a tight texture of lemon ...
description: This is a dry, mineral wine with a tight texture of lemon zest, white stone fruits and crispness. It is dry while keeping fresh fruitiness. The texture and the structure are just coming together as the wine moves towards a more mature future. A light toastiness adds complexity.

title: Tolosa 2013 Estate Chardonnay (Edna Valley)
excerpt: Salted pineapple, lime-laced vanilla ice cream, a slight nuttiness and the warmth ...
description: Salted pineapple, lime-laced vanilla ice cream, a slight nuttiness and the warmth of beach sand show on the nose of this wine by veteran Larry Brooks. It zings with lively acidity on the palate, offering brisk apple slices, popcorn and sea salt, with the promise of a long shelf life.

title: Mount Eden 2013 Wolff Vineyard Old Vines Chardonnay (Edna Valley)
excerpt: This offers good quality for the price from this historic producer, which ...
description: This offers good quality for the price from this historic producer, which heads south to this dry-farmed vineyard planted in 1976. The wine shows lots of lemon scents, from blossoms to peels, along with browned butter, sea salt and smoke. The palate offers singed lime peels, red grapefruit skin, iodine and sour yellow apple peels, proving quite complex.

title: St. Innocent 2013 Freedom Hill Vineyard Dijon Clone Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Dijon-clone Chardonnays from Oregon are distinctive and appealing, with excellent acidity behind ...
description: Dijon-clone Chardonnays from Oregon are distinctive and appealing, with excellent acidity behind fruit that stays on the lean side of tropical. Here are lightly buttery flavors of apple and peach pie, with a spicy kick to the finish.

title: Metz Road 2012 Riverview Vineyard Estate Grown Chardonnay (Monterey)
excerpt: Extremely intriguing on the nose, this shows aromas of Meyer lemon, green ...
description: Extremely intriguing on the nose, this shows aromas of Meyer lemon, green banana and tangerines. Generous yellow fruits like melon and Gala apples show on the palate, which is soft with lemon-bar elements at first but then tightens around green apple skins and a peppery, herbal character.

title: Soutiran NV Brut Grand Cru Blanc de Blancs Chardonnay (Champagne)
excerpt: Chardonnay grown on land traditionally used for Pinot Noir gives a particularly ...
description: Chardonnay grown on land traditionally used for Pinot Noir gives a particularly rich and textured wine. This has ripe apple and pear fruit flavors that are lifted by the fresh lime juice and a light textured character. The wine is full, ripe and ready to drink.

title: Ferrari 2007 Riserva Lunelli Chardonnay (Trento)
excerpt: Elegantly structured, this opens with aromas of tropical fruit, bread crust, nut ...
description: Elegantly structured, this opens with aromas of tropical fruit, bread crust, nut and a whisper of oak. The round palate delivers lemon zest, pastry cream, pineapple and walnut alongside an elegant perlage. A touch of honey signals the close.

title: Lafond 2012 Lafond Vineyard Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: Creamy aromas of buttermilk are cut by the spritz of squeezed lemon ...
description: Creamy aromas of buttermilk are cut by the spritz of squeezed lemon on the edges of this higher-end brand from Santa Barbara Winery founder Pierre Lafond. The warmth of browned butter on the palate of this estate wine is cut by pear-peel bitterness, pan-seared apples, reduced lemon juice and a touch of iodine.

title: Navarro 2013 Premiere Reserve Chardonnay (Anderson Valley)
excerpt: Light apple and Anjou pear aromas, tangy fruit flavors shaded by butter ...
description: Light apple and Anjou pear aromas, tangy fruit flavors shaded by butter and almond, and a supple texture add up to a sleek and flavorful wine. This is balanced, medium bodied and reflects the house style of Navarro that ensures a svelte mouthfeel with no rough edges.

title: Vollereaux NV Blanc de Blancs Brut Chardonnay (Champagne)
excerpt: This ripe Chardonnay has a significant amount of reserve wine from older ...
description: This ripe Chardonnay has a significant amount of reserve wine from older vintages in the blend. It is on the dry side of Brut, with a mineral, steely texture. That is balanced by the maturity of this bottling, giving hints of toast and ripe, sliced apple flavors.

title: Rotari 2007 Flavio Chardonnay (Trento)
excerpt: Fragrant and refined, this offers scents of white spring flowers, citrus peel, ...
description: Fragrant and refined, this offers scents of white spring flowers, citrus peel, yellow orchard fruit and a whiff of bread crust. The creamy palate doles out candied lemon drop, ripe golden apple and toasted almond alongside an elegant perlage.

title: Babcock 2013 Top Cream Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: Butter, sea salt, hard caramel candy, pan-seared white peach and poached apple ...
description: Butter, sea salt, hard caramel candy, pan-seared white peach and poached apple aromas show on the nose on this wine by veteran Bryan Babcock. Once sipped, the wine tightens around a citrus pith, showing yogurt, iodine and lots of acidic energy, as well as more seared pome fruit on the finish.

title: Talley 2013 Rincon Vineyard Chardonnay (Arroyo Grande Valley)
excerpt: Lots of dynamics play on the nose of this wine, from chamomile ...
description: Lots of dynamics play on the nose of this wine, from chamomile flowers and daffodils to chalk, pink lemonade, cotton candy and tropical fruits. The palate is framed by a tense minerality, seasoned with flavors of lemonade, browned butter and guava.

title: Sarah's Vineyard 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: Fresh dill, dewy herbs and a seared lemon-syrup scent makes for a ...
description: Fresh dill, dewy herbs and a seared lemon-syrup scent makes for a dense but not treacly nose on this wine by a producer on the fringes of Gilroy. A chive accent holds attention once sipped, with a chalky minerality and a white-pepper finish, altogether proving brisk and elegant.

title: Santa Barbara Winery 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: Sea salt and dried honey dust season the cement and chalky minerality ...
description: Sea salt and dried honey dust season the cement and chalky minerality on the nose of this always-reliable bottling from the longtime downtown Santa Barbara producer. A nice zestiness of lime peels marks the tip of the palate, followed by a lemon-candy warmth in the midpalate, with the saltiness prevalent throughout.

title: Lancelot-Pienne NV Blanc de Blancs Brut Chardonnay (Champagne)
excerpt: A blend that includes Grand Cru vineyards gives a ripe, full-throated Chardonnay. ...
description: A blend that includes Grand Cru vineyards gives a ripe, full-throated Chardonnay. While there is crispness and the freshest apple juiciness, this wine is also rounded, generous and with a hint of maturity in its toasty edge. It is ready to drink.

title: Marion-Bosser NV Extra Brut Premier Cru Blanc de Blancs Chardonnay (Champagne)
excerpt: With tight, crisp acidity, this is a dry wine. However with bottle ...
description: With tight, crisp acidity, this is a dry wine. However with bottle aging, it has become a well-integrated Champagne that is both fresh and balanced with toast and fresh bread flavors. The aftertaste is crisp and perfumed.

title: J. M. Gobillard et Fils NV Blanc de Blancs Brut Chardonnay (Champagne)
excerpt: The Gobillard style is for crisp wines with a good texture. That ...
description: The Gobillard style is for crisp wines with a good texture. That style is easy to achieve with a Blanc de Blancs, with the Chardonnay giving a tight, mineral character while leaving room for attractive fruitiness. Packed with citrus and apple flavors with refreshing acidity, this is ready to drink.

title: Silver Stag 2013 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This delicate wine exudes swathes of lemon chiffon and white flowers, offering ...
description: This delicate wine exudes swathes of lemon chiffon and white flowers, offering similar experiences on the palate. Staying light in oak, it has texture and body to spare, without ever overpowering, making for a food-friendly, versatile wine.

title: Chardonnais 2013 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A lightly textured wine that suggests lemon chiffon, this has plenty of ...
description: A lightly textured wine that suggests lemon chiffon, this has plenty of body to make it feel rich on the palate, along with ample acidity to keep it refreshingly crisp. Apple and pear rise to the fore, maintaining the fruitiness from start to finish.

title: Andretti 2013 Montona Reserve Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Deceptively shy about its use of oak, this white exudes rich aromas ...
description: Deceptively shy about its use of oak, this white exudes rich aromas of baked pear and vanilla yet delivers a refreshing amount of acidity on the palate, remaining crisp yet softly layered around a medium build. The finish lingers on a ginger snap accent.

title: Lallier NV Blanc de Blancs Brut Chardonnay (Champagne)
excerpt: With 60% of the Chardonnay in this wine coming from the vineyards ...
description: With 60% of the Chardonnay in this wine coming from the vineyards of the Montagne de Reims, it is no surprise that it is rich and full in the mouth. The wine has weight along with a crisp minerality. Taut and tense, the aftertaste suggests that the wine will improve in bottle for a few months.

title: Voirin-Jumel NV Grand Cru Blanc de Blancs Brut Chardonnay (Champagne)
excerpt: Based in the village of Cramant, Voirin-Jumel has access to Grand Cru ...
description: Based in the village of Cramant, Voirin-Jumel has access to Grand Cru Chardonnay vineyards. This crisp and tight wine is packed with acidity, fresh citrus and a taut, steely texture. It is still young and fruity, and could do with some bottle age.

title: Talbott 2013 Sleepy Hollow Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: Green melon, lime peels and lime blossoms show on the nose of ...
description: Green melon, lime peels and lime blossoms show on the nose of this racy wine from the historic regional producer. The green fruit flavors carry to the palate, where Granny Smith apples, green Anjou pear and lime juice mix with lemon peel and white rocks.

title: Inman Family 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This faint, elusive wine takes lightness and low alcohol to pronounced levels, ...
description: This faint, elusive wine takes lightness and low alcohol to pronounced levels, offering intense lemon and Asian pear around a tight core of acidity. From the Pratt Vineyard, it spent time aging in both new air-dried Vosges oak barrels and small stainless steel.

title: Charles Ellner NV Blanc de Blancs Brut Chardonnay (Champagne)
excerpt: This is a tight, mineral-textured wine with fresh citrus and lemon-zest flavors ...
description: This is a tight, mineral-textured wine with fresh citrus and lemon-zest flavors and a steely character. It is crisp, almost cool in style and could do with some aging in bottle.

title: Carol Shelton 2014 Wild Thing Chardonnay Chardonnay (Mendocino)
excerpt: A distinctive aroma like ripe peaches and fennel and full, almost sweet ...
description: A distinctive aroma like ripe peaches and fennel and full, almost sweet fruit and spice flavors give this medium-bodied wine personality. The texture is soft and luscious rather than lively, and practically coats the mouth from sip to sip.

title: Gainey 2013 Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: Fresh, clean aromas of lime chiffon, just-sliced nectarine, light jasmine and honeysuckle ...
description: Fresh, clean aromas of lime chiffon, just-sliced nectarine, light jasmine and honeysuckle greet the nose on this bottling from the longtime producer. Limestone and chalky minerality mark the palate, with slightly sour green pear peels and more white flowers.

title: Henriet-Bazin NV Premier Cru Blanc de Blancs Brut Chardonnay (Champagne)
excerpt: From Chardonnay grown on the Montagne de Reims, this is a rich ...
description: From Chardonnay grown on the Montagne de Reims, this is a rich and full-bodied wine. Red apple and sweet grapefruit flavors are balanced against the steely texture and zingy minerality.

title: Mercy 2012 Griva Vineyard Chardonnay (Arroyo Seco)
excerpt: The honey side of honeydew melon shines on this single-vineyard bottling, as ...
description: The honey side of honeydew melon shines on this single-vineyard bottling, as does sharp lemon juice, Japanese pear and a flinty gunmetal minerality. Apple cider, lime juice and steely flavors arise on the palate.

title: Sarah's Vineyard 2013 Chardonnay (Central Coast)
excerpt: Honey butter, vanilla bean and dried banana aromas emerge on the nose ...
description: Honey butter, vanilla bean and dried banana aromas emerge on the nose of this Chard. The palate shows seared apple slices cut with lemon juice, boosted by minerally tension and a peppery energy.

title: A. D. Coutelas NV Eloge Blanc de Blancs Brut Chardonnay (Champagne)
excerpt: Smoothly textured, this wine has light minerality along with a perfumed, ripe ...
description: Smoothly textured, this wine has light minerality along with a perfumed, ripe character. It is soft and generous in the mouth, poised and attractively fruity. White fruits dominate, followed by hints of almonds. The wine is ready to drink.

title: Altemasi NV Brut Chardonnay (Trento)
excerpt: Made with 100% Chardonnay, this opens with aromas of acacia flower, ripe ...
description: Made with 100% Chardonnay, this opens with aromas of acacia flower, ripe yellow apple skin, citrus peel and a hint of honey. These notes follow through to the palate, which additionally carries a toasted walnut note. Bright acidity and persistent bubbles provide the framework.

title: Esser 2013 Chardonnay (Monterey County)
excerpt: This is an ambitiously lean style for a widely available brand, showing ...
description: This is an ambitiously lean style for a widely available brand, showing reserved tension. Aromas of yogurt and freshly-cut apple and nectarine give way to a steely palate of lime pith, flavors much more common on pricier bottlings.

title: Kagan 2011 Split Rock Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Soft and creamy, this full-bodied wine is a mix of apple, pear ...
description: Soft and creamy, this full-bodied wine is a mix of apple, pear and mango around swirls of vanilla. Round and smooth, it finishes in a burst of fresh-squeezed citrus.

title: Bravium 2013 Abbassi Vineyard Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: From 40-plus-year-old vines in the heart of Carneros, this white was aged ...
description: From 40-plus-year-old vines in the heart of Carneros, this white was aged entirely in Hungarian oak by a producer based on Treasure Island in San Francisco. Fresh-squeezed lemon and tangerine illuminate the palate, along with a salty austerity.

title: Domaine du Vissoux 2014  Beaujolais Blanc
excerpt: This is a rich wine, ripe with yellow fruits. It is full ...
description: This is a rich wine, ripe with yellow fruits. It is full bodied, peaches and pears giving a smooth, rounded character. Almonds and apple skins give texture to the wine that is ready to drink.

title: Murphy-Goode 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: This effusively fragrant, medium-bodied wine is compelling for its freshness, fruity complexity ...
description: This effusively fragrant, medium-bodied wine is compelling for its freshness, fruity complexity and subtle spicy, buttery accents. It feels lively and crisp on the palate while still carrying enough depth and richness.

title: Vincent Couche NV Perle de Nacre Extra Brut Chardonnay (Champagne)
excerpt: Crisp, textured and fresh, this is a tight, nervy and mineral wine. ...
description: Crisp, textured and fresh, this is a tight, nervy and mineral wine. Bright apple flavors are lifted with intense acidity. This bottling is still young, very dry and taut and needs to age.

title: Borgo Maragliano 2011 Giuseppe Galliano Blanc de Blancs Chardonnay (Vino Spumante)
excerpt: Aromas of ripe yellow fruit, toasted nut and a whiff of brioche ...
description: Aromas of ripe yellow fruit, toasted nut and a whiff of brioche lead the way. The bracing palate offers yellow apple skin, lemon zest and a walnut note alongside vigorous, brisk bubbles.

title: Burrowing Owl 2012 Chardonnay (Okanagan Valley)
excerpt: Notes of oak, butter, nuts and popcorn jump from the glass. The ...
description: Notes of oak, butter, nuts and popcorn jump from the glass. The combination of barrel fermentation and cellaring in half new, half once-used oak makes this a wine for those who love the barrel more than the grape. Drink up.

title: Chloe 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
excerpt: With a large dose of Russian River Valley grapes, this delirious and ...
description: With a large dose of Russian River Valley grapes, this delirious and delicious white is dark gold in color, medium to almost full bodied, with a richness overridden by bright floral notes of apple blossom and pear. It finishes in a flurry of oak and vanilla, and was aged in new and used French and American oak.

title: Kuleto Estate 2012 Estate Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Dark golden in color, this wine was given a small amount of ...
description: Dark golden in color, this wine was given a small amount of skin contact prior to fermentation and then 11 months in a small percentage of new French oak. The aromatics are muted and a tad austere, with a subtle hint of white flowers and Meyer lemon. It finishes dry in a coat of oak.

title: J Wilkes 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
excerpt: Apple custard, green apple peels and a bit of barrel warmth entertain ...
description: Apple custard, green apple peels and a bit of barrel warmth entertain the nose on this reasonably priced wine from a highly reliable appellation. Flavors are straightforward, with ripe golden pears and lemon peels.

title: Domaine des Marrans 2014  Beaujolais Blanc
excerpt: While this Chardonnay is rich, it is also well balanced. It offers ...
description: While this Chardonnay is rich, it is also well balanced. It offers light spice, rounded yellow fruits and just a touch of minerality to give texture, plus toastiness to add interest. The end brings out the acidity.

title: Lucien Lardy 2014  Beaujolais-Villages
excerpt: This is a ripe, fragrant, floral wine. A smooth texture is lifted ...
description: This is a ripe, fragrant, floral wine. A smooth texture is lifted by apple and peach flavors. Rich and full in the mouth, this creamy wine is ready to drink.

title: Domaine de Thulon 2014  Beaujolais-Villages
excerpt: Ripe and spicy, this wine has delicious white fruit, nutmeg and fresh ...
description: Ripe and spicy, this wine has delicious white fruit, nutmeg and fresh lemon flavors. It is light in character, with the fruit and acidity giving delicious lift. Refreshing and with great fruitiness, the wine is ready to drink.

title: Acacia 2013 Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: This is a delightfully straightforward wine, supple and smooth in floral honeysuckle ...
description: This is a delightfully straightforward wine, supple and smooth in floral honeysuckle and orange blossom behind ripe apple flavors and crispness.

title: Domaine Loubejac 2014 Willamette Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: The faux French name and labeling notwithstanding, this is a no-frills Oregon ...
description: The faux French name and labeling notwithstanding, this is a no-frills Oregon Chardonnay, fruity and clean. Simple flavors of melon and apple carry the palate, with no suggestion of oak.

title: Slow Press 2013 Chardonnay (Monterey County)
excerpt: Lemon and apple blossoms plus a tiny bit of honeydew meld for ...
description: Lemon and apple blossoms plus a tiny bit of honeydew meld for a pleasant nose on this widely available wine. The energetic palate offers fresh green apple and lemon salt flavors that make you salivate, though it packs almost too much punch.

title: Magnolia Court 2013 Chardonnay (Central Coast)
excerpt: Lots of stone fruit ripeness marks the nose of this wine, with ...
description: Lots of stone fruit ripeness marks the nose of this wine, with aomas of nectarine and peach cut by the sharpness of apple skins. The palate is all green apples and lime juice.

title: Wrath 2014 Ex Anima Chardonnay (Monterey)
excerpt: A Chardonnay for those who love pungent florality, this stainless-steel study offers ...
description: A Chardonnay for those who love pungent florality, this stainless-steel study offers showy apple and pear blossoms aromas along with extreme jasmine and tuberose. Those flavors are reflected on the sip, which also offers fruity pear cider yet retains crispness.

title: Jean-Marc Burgaud 2014  Beaujolais-Villages
excerpt: This light, fresh Chardonnay has lively pear and apple flavors. A crisp ...
description: This light, fresh Chardonnay has lively pear and apple flavors. A crisp texture gives zing to the brightly fruity wine. Drink now.

title: Cairdean Estate 2011 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This wine offers appealing aromatics of caramel apple before delving into viscous ...
description: This wine offers appealing aromatics of caramel apple before delving into viscous territory on the palate. Flavors fall somewhat flat and the finish is muddled.

title: Domaine des Mouilles 2014  Beaujolais Blanc
excerpt: This is a soft, gentle and ripe Chardonnay by Laurent Perrachon, current ...
description: This is a soft, gentle and ripe Chardonnay by Laurent Perrachon, current winemaker from a Beaujolais family making wine since 1877. Lemon acidity is submerged by the warm apricot and white peach flavors. It is ready to drink.

title: Chateau de Pizay 2014  Beaujolais Blanc
excerpt: This is a soft wine, light and fresh. It has a citrus ...
description: This is a soft wine, light and fresh. It has a citrus character, lemon squeezed over apples that give crispness. Some minerality to the texture adds interest and puts the wine in the food-friendly category. Drink now.

title: Loft 2013 Chardonnay (Monterey)
excerpt: Tight, clean and fresh but reluctant aromas of apple greet the nose ...
description: Tight, clean and fresh but reluctant aromas of apple greet the nose on this boxed wine. The palate lacks discernible flavors, with just a touch of steely apple flesh.

title: Bien Nacido 2012 Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
excerpt: A vivid bouquet of white flowers is cut by a pungent, pithy ...
description: A vivid bouquet of white flowers is cut by a pungent, pithy funkiness of crushed ants and iodine on this classic bottling by the Miller family and winemaker Trey Fletcher. The intriguing palate is tensely layered, with grapefruit pith, lime-sprayed limestone and a bit of almond oil on the finish, proving uniquely spicy and incredibly long-lasting.

title: Chamisal Vineyards 2012 Chamise Chardonnay (Edna Valley)
excerpt: This wine by winemaker Fintan du Fresne shows sea salt, apple blossom, ...
description: This wine by winemaker Fintan du Fresne shows sea salt, apple blossom, cherimoya and tangerine rinds on the nose. Flavors are clean and pure, with dried apple, more sea salt, a bit of nectarine and orange spritz, offering a profile that could comfortably rest on the tongue all day long.

title: Bolney Wine Estate 2009 Blanc de Blancs Chardonnay (England)
excerpt: This has the crunchy, enticing freshness of the very first, pale, almost ...
description: This has the crunchy, enticing freshness of the very first, pale, almost translucent apples of the year. Underneath it brings earth, chalk, stone and yeast. The autolysis is distinct but expresses itself as a restrained, chalky background that imbues the entire wine with a soft, gentle and very fine creaminess. This is elegant, serious and lasting.

title: Shafer 2013 Red Shoulder Ranch Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: A perennial standout, this is an exuberantly rich, classic expression of the ...
description: A perennial standout, this is an exuberantly rich, classic expression of the variety, with the heady, unmistakable imprint of the producer and vineyard. Expansive and generous in style, it offers baked honeycrisp apple and a jolt of lemon pith, with aromas of honeysuckle and vanilla. The finish is lengthy and substantial, with memorable minerality.

title: Sinor-LaVallee 2013 Chardonnay (San Luis Obispo County)
excerpt: Using fruit mostly from the Bassi Ranch property he recently acquired, Mike ...
description: Using fruit mostly from the Bassi Ranch property he recently acquired, Mike Sinor delivers a bright, minerally wine, with aromas of scratched grapefruit skin, orange and peach juice, burned lemons, sea salt, ripe apples and nectarines and fresh-cut herbs. Flavors of salty, lime-juice nectarines emerge once sipped, with hints of butter and white flowers.

title: Bargetto 2013 Regan Vineyards Reserve Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: Ripe apples and pears meet with daffodils, honeysuckle and dried peaches on ...
description: Ripe apples and pears meet with daffodils, honeysuckle and dried peaches on the nose of this wine from the Corralitos area. Flavors of lemon-lime soda, chamomile tea and pressed white flowers show on the floral and uplifting palate, which is warmed by a touch of popcorn.

title: Jarvis 2013 Estate Grown Cave Fermented Finch Hollow Unfiltered Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Salty and savory, this unfiltered wine conveys a lot of wet stone ...
description: Salty and savory, this unfiltered wine conveys a lot of wet stone and petrol character. The dark golden color reveals its time in oak. Concentrated and full-bodied, with rich layers of baked apple and pear, it shows a complexity on the palate and a depth of lingering fruit and ginger on the finish.

title: Jarvis 2013 Estate Grown Cave Fermented Finch Hollow Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Dark gold in color, this decadent wine is robust in toasted chestnut ...
description: Dark gold in color, this decadent wine is robust in toasted chestnut and hazelnut layers which are rich and powerful on the seamless palate. The oak shows prominently on the nose and palate but finds its balance on the finish, allowing the wine to end with polish and reserve.

title: Rasa 2013 Dream Deferred Chardonnay (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: A light golden color, this wine offers aromas of honeycomb, white peach ...
description: A light golden color, this wine offers aromas of honeycomb, white peach and prickly pear. The tropical flavors are ripe yet elegant, with a creamy, rich feel that leads to an extended finish.

title: Von Holt 2013 Heintz Family Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Dark in color, this is a big, juicy, tantalizing wine from a ...
description: Dark in color, this is a big, juicy, tantalizing wine from a beautifully farmed vineyard on the edge of the Sonoma Coast, a cool region where grapes ripen slowly. The wine, too, takes its time to come around, gradually revealing layers of golden apple tart and honey, with a lurking floral element and gentle ginger spice.

title: Domaine J. Meuret 2013 Le Pacte Jewett Creek Vineyard Chardonnay (Columbia Gorge (WA))
excerpt: This mesmerizing offering has aromas of lemon curd, mineral, almond, flowers, nectarine ...
description: This mesmerizing offering has aromas of lemon curd, mineral, almond, flowers, nectarine and apple. The palate is rounded, with a lightly creamy feel while retaining a sense of vibrancy and lightness.

title: Vine Cliff 2013 Proprietress Reserve Chardonnay (Los Carneros)
excerpt: The initial entry to this wine is reminiscent of cheesecake, with a ...
description: The initial entry to this wine is reminiscent of cheesecake, with a decadence to the bouquet. From there, ripe pear and toasted oak combine around a tropical edge of guava and papaya, giving complexity and lushness on the palate, before a zesty, slightly tart finish confounds and invites one in for more. Cellar through 2018.

title: Buty 2013 Conner Lee Vineyard Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This wine brings aromas of pineapple, lemon drop, chamomile tea and custard ...
description: This wine brings aromas of pineapple, lemon drop, chamomile tea and custard to the bouquet. The flavors are ripe and full, showing a sense of texture and weight followed by a persistent finish.

title: Co Dinn 2013 Roskamp Vineyard Chardonnay (Snipes Mountain)
excerpt: The inaugural release from this winery, this wine was barrel fermented and ...
description: The inaugural release from this winery, this wine was barrel fermented and aged sur lie for 17 months. Unfiltered and lightly cloudy, it offers appealing aromas of peach, butter and spice that lead to textured but deft flavors and a persistent finish.

title: Jordan 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Tightly structured and quiet in oak, this wine instead exudes bright notes ...
description: Tightly structured and quiet in oak, this wine instead exudes bright notes of lemon peel and orange blossom, offering plenty of well-traced minerality on the palate. It finishes lean and crisp, refreshing enough to enjoy all night long.

title: Chalone Vineyard 2012 Chardonnay (Chalone)
excerpt: Done in a more oxidized style, this wine shows marzipan, dried apricot, ...
description: Done in a more oxidized style, this wine shows marzipan, dried apricot, browned butter, dried pineapple and a gunmetal flint character on the nose. The palate is very focused, with flavors of preserved lemon, lime rind, sage-roasted chicken and a faint minty element.

title: Parducci 2013 True Grit Reserve Chardonnay (Mendocino County)
excerpt: Enticing aromas like baking spices and a vivid mix of fruit and ...
description: Enticing aromas like baking spices and a vivid mix of fruit and spice flavors are carried along beautifully by lively acidity matched with luxurious body. This tastes subtly and attractively oaky and has considerable complexity and length.

title: D.R. Stephens 2013 Star Vineyard Chardonnay (Rutherford)
excerpt: Offering deep complexity, this bold, brazen wine is decadent in caramel and ...
description: Offering deep complexity, this bold, brazen wine is decadent in caramel and toffee aromas and flavors, with a foundation of ripe Gravenstein apple and hazelnuts. The oak is pronounced but it adds more than it subtracts. Cellar through 2018.

title: Saddleback 2013 Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A creamy, unctuous white with a tease of waxy apple, cheese rind ...
description: A creamy, unctuous white with a tease of waxy apple, cheese rind and tropical pear, this fuller-bodied expression of the grape takes on generous layers of caramel and ginger as it goes. It finishes in a long, lingering celebration of brioche and allspice.

title: Senses 2013 B.A Theiriot Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: A vivid yellow-gold color grabs the attention and creamy, tropical fruit flavors ...
description: A vivid yellow-gold color grabs the attention and creamy, tropical fruit flavors deliver the goods in this medium-bodied but full-blown wine. Pineapple, grapefruit, fig and almond are layered in an almost unctuous texture, but supported by vibrant acidity that keeps everything in great balance.

title: Talley 2013 Estate Bottled Chardonnay (Arroyo Grande Valley)
excerpt: White peach cooked in browned butter, sea salt and apple slice aromas ...
description: White peach cooked in browned butter, sea salt and apple slice aromas make for a delicious entry into this bottling from one of the few estate wineries in the appellation. Spiced apple and lemon salt flavors combine for a solid and ever-reliable palate, while a fresh-rain-on-cement accent adds interest and depth.

title: Cooper-Garrod 2012 Gravel Ridge Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: Straw-yellow in the glass, this wine from organically grown, nearly 35-year-old vines ...
description: Straw-yellow in the glass, this wine from organically grown, nearly 35-year-old vines shows iodine, citrus pith, yogurt and seared lemon peels in the restrained, minerally nose. The even-keeled, focused palate seamlessly integrates dairy elements with tangerine rinds and a mellow acidity.

title: Ridgeview Estate 2011 Blanc de Blancs Chardonnay (England)
excerpt: A mix of fruity notes immediately hit: white currant, gooseberry, apple and ...
description: A mix of fruity notes immediately hit: white currant, gooseberry, apple and citrus. The palate is slender and fizzes with those primary fruit flavors that have overtones of meadow flowers. This is frothy, refreshing and fun on the surface, but there is serious backbone and intent.

title: Longevity 2013 Chardonnay (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: A deep gold color says that something will be different about this ...
description: A deep gold color says that something will be different about this wine. And yes, it shows ripeness and an almost dessert-wine quality in the honeylike aromas, rather unctuous texture and late-harvest flavors. The full body and soft, thick mouthfeel make it luxurious. Blue cheese might be a magnificent match for it.

title: Bucher 2014 Unoaked Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Austere and elegant, this wine opens in the glass to deliver fresh-cut ...
description: Austere and elegant, this wine opens in the glass to deliver fresh-cut apple, matchstick and graham cracker, balancing fruit-forwardness with complexity. From an estate property with only two acres planted to the variety, the rest to Pinot Noir, it exudes its Middle Reach roots, ripe and fresh, and entirely aged in stainless steel.

title: E16 2013 Bacigalupi Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: From a great vineyard and vintage, this wine opens with complex aromas ...
description: From a great vineyard and vintage, this wine opens with complex aromas of concentrated, savory fruit and candied ginger. Oaky vanilla sits atop a medium body, while plenty of sizzling acidity keeps the palate buoyant and enlightened. Cellar through 2018.

title: Kathryn Kennedy 2004 Twenty-Seven Blanc de Blanc Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: Just-cracked, yeasty sourdough bread and dried lemon-skin aromas float off of this ...
description: Just-cracked, yeasty sourdough bread and dried lemon-skin aromas float off of this bottle-aged sparkler from an esteemed, longtime producer. Her winemaker son named this wine in honor of her birth year. An oxidative warmth gives bready depth to the palate, which shows lots of toast and lemon marmalade flavors.

title: Array 2012 Dijon Clone Chardonnay (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Otis Harlan Vineyard in the Rattlesnake Hills provides the fruit for this ...
description: Otis Harlan Vineyard in the Rattlesnake Hills provides the fruit for this wine. Distinctive aromas of lees, almond, toast and grass lead to creamy stone-fruit flavors that show persistence on the finish.

title: Unfiltered Blonde 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
excerpt: This is that rare combination of outstanding quality, low price and low ...
description: This is that rare combination of outstanding quality, low price and low production, which is rare for Sonoma. The wine opens with an intensity of lemon, orange and grapefruit, especially on the nose, that delves into both a taste of wet stone and creamy texture. Soft, it takes on richer elements of vanilla on the bittersweet finish.

title: Artesa 2013 Estate Reserve Chardonnay (Carneros-Napa Valley)
excerpt: Medium- to full-bodied in weight, this estate-grown white has a bite of ...
description: Medium- to full-bodied in weight, this estate-grown white has a bite of crisp apple, with meatier, more substantial undertones of honey and vanilla. The merest suggestion of ginger gives it a complex personality.

title: Kirkland Signature 2013 Signature Series Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Crisp in citrus, with noticeable tension that softens in the glass, this ...
description: Crisp in citrus, with noticeable tension that softens in the glass, this wine offers tremendous value and elegance. Medium bodied and well integrated in terms of oak and power, it has a lovely note of preserved lemon on the finish.

title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2014 Indian Wells Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Barrel spice, pineapple, butterscotch and candlewax aromas are followed by full-bodied tropical-fruit ...
description: Barrel spice, pineapple, butterscotch and candlewax aromas are followed by full-bodied tropical-fruit flavors. It displays a lot of richness but retains its sense of balance.

title: Hendry 2014 Unoaked Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Given not one second in anything other than stainless steel, this is ...
description: Given not one second in anything other than stainless steel, this is indeed a crisp, clear wine, with lychee and apricot-like aromas. Intense minerality buoys the wine, which is tense at first but softens over time, with a wave of vanilla on the rounded finish.

title: Stopham Estate 2011 Brut Prestige Chardonnay (England)
excerpt: Wood sorrel and crunchy green apple are met with boiled lemon sweets ...
description: Wood sorrel and crunchy green apple are met with boiled lemon sweets on the nose. Lively, frothy fizz fills the mouth with exuberant, refreshing flavors and leaves behind that notion of sorrel and lemon candy.

title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2013 Canoe Ridge Vineyard Chardonnay (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: Aromas of toast, yellow apple, corn silk and whiffs of tropical fruit ...
description: Aromas of toast, yellow apple, corn silk and whiffs of tropical fruit lead to a restrained, elegant palate with a lightly creamy feel.

title: Comartin 2013 R-Bar-R Vineyards Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: Lemon butter, shreds of nectarine and a dash of sea salt make ...
description: Lemon butter, shreds of nectarine and a dash of sea salt make appearances on the fairly faint nose of this wine from San Jose-based winemaker Adam Comartin. The wine comes alive once sipped, with white peach flesh, lemony acidity and chalky grip, all culminating in a zing that goes on for minutes, finishing with a touch of marzipan.

title: Manifesto! 2013 Chardonnay (North Coast)
excerpt: The honey and orange aromas, rich texture, full body and late-harvest flavors ...
description: The honey and orange aromas, rich texture, full body and late-harvest flavors add up to a bold and fruity wine. With each sip, more complexity and depth comes out, making a lasting impression.

title: Bedell 2013 Chardonnay (North Fork of Long Island)
excerpt: Chalky oyster shell and saline notes accentuate the brisk, brash feel of ...
description: Chalky oyster shell and saline notes accentuate the brisk, brash feel of this light-footed Chardonnay. On the palate, fresh apple and lemon flavors are accented by whispers of vanilla and spice. The finish is cutting and crisp.

title: Cosentino 2013 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Lemon curd, papaya and vanilla custard combine on the nose and palate ...
description: Lemon curd, papaya and vanilla custard combine on the nose and palate for a fragrantly rich experience, full-bodied and generous in fruit. The wine lightens up midway, minerality shining on the finish.

title: Seven Falls 2013 Chardonnay (Wahluke Slope)
excerpt: This wine is direct in its appeal with aromas of butterscotch, peach ...
description: This wine is direct in its appeal with aromas of butterscotch, peach and pineapple. The flavors are full but retain some sleekness in styling.

title: Kendall-Jackson 2013 Grand Reserve Chardonnay (Central Coast)
excerpt: This blend of Monterey and Santa Barbara county vineyards offers fresh aromas ...
description: This blend of Monterey and Santa Barbara county vineyards offers fresh aromas of lemon-lime soda, chives and a hint of smoke. The palate is framed around sour-sweet green apple, with more bitterness and tension coming from green pear flesh and citrus pith.

title: Artesa 2013 Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Vibrant swatches of lemon peel dominate on the nose and palate in ...
description: Vibrant swatches of lemon peel dominate on the nose and palate in this wine, offering a near-tingling mouthfeel of acidity, inching toward the extreme. Pear and apple otherwise figure into the mix, before the seamless finish smoothes things out.

title: Sandhi 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: White flowers, nectarine, red apple and a steely minerality greet the nose ...
description: White flowers, nectarine, red apple and a steely minerality greet the nose on this entry-level wine from Rajat Parr. A bright and racy acidity frames the energetic palate that shows delicate flavors of yellow apples, lemon juice and honeysuckle.

title: Swanson 2013 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Briny with a flurry of waxy apple and peach, this smooth white ...
description: Briny with a flurry of waxy apple and peach, this smooth white wine was whole-cluster pressed and exhibits a smooth, fuller-styled body as a result. Subtle oak encases high-toned citrus and a teeming, lengthy finish that takes on seductive tones of honey.

title: Ivory and Burt 2013 Chardonnay (Lodi)
excerpt: All the essential elements of a mainstream California Chardonnay come together in ...
description: All the essential elements of a mainstream California Chardonnay come together in this medium-bodied wine, from a buttery and vanilla-like aroma to ripe pear flavors and accents of nutmeg. The texture is smooth and lingering, with an almost sweet finish.

title: Hosmer 2012 Limited Release Chardonnay (Cayuga Lake)
excerpt: Plush, fruity and densely mouth filling, this full-bodied Chardonnay juxtaposes ripe apricot ...
description: Plush, fruity and densely mouth filling, this full-bodied Chardonnay juxtaposes ripe apricot and peach flavors against streaks of cream and butter. Hints of cinnamon and toast warm the finish.

title: McManis 2014 Chardonnay (River Junction)
excerpt: Generous and very flavorful, this full-bodied wine resembles honey and pear in ...
description: Generous and very flavorful, this full-bodied wine resembles honey and pear in the aroma, and pear syrup in the flavor. While sweet-seeming, it has a dash of apple-like acidity to keep it lively.

title: Cosentino 2013 The Chard Chardonnay (Lodi)
excerpt: Ripe fruit flavors advance from apple to pear to honey as you ...
description: Ripe fruit flavors advance from apple to pear to honey as you sniff and sip this wine. It tastes clean and fruity, with a medium body and a smooth texture that allows the fruitiness to linger on the finish.

title: Bargetto 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: Ripe but rather light aromas of pear cider, honeydew melon and cherimoya ...
description: Ripe but rather light aromas of pear cider, honeydew melon and cherimoya make for an approachable, familiar nose on this appellation blend wine. Lots of soft nectarine and melon elements define the palate, with a pinch of sweet herbs, proving light, pleasant and playful.

title: Senses 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: This dry wine has a nice sense of reserve along with subtle ...
description: This dry wine has a nice sense of reserve along with subtle lemony, earthy and milky flavors that linger on the finish. The texture has a nip of acidity and the body is light to medium.

title: Apaltagua 2014 Reserva Unoaked Chardonnay (San Antonio)
excerpt: With no oak for makeup, this smells natural and a touch stalky, ...
description: With no oak for makeup, this smells natural and a touch stalky, with melony fruit scents. The full, healthy palate is naturally creamy but also braced by bold acidity. Fresh flavors of citrus, apple and melon finish a bit salty.

title: Eagle Canyon 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: Ripe and delicious, this offers vanilla, milk chocolate and dried fig aromas ...
description: Ripe and delicious, this offers vanilla, milk chocolate and dried fig aromas that continue in the flavors and last on the finish. Medium bodied, slightly sweet and definitely rich in texture, it is easy to like.

title: Gravelly Ford 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: A nicely balanced, light-bodied dinner wine, this is not overly fruity, but ...
description: A nicely balanced, light-bodied dinner wine, this is not overly fruity, but shows some welcome restraint. It has straightforward apple and subtle butter aromas, tangy citrus flavors and crisp acidity.

title: Boomtown 2014 Chardonnay (Washington)
excerpt: Appealing aromas of yellow apple, pear and spice lead to a deftly ...
description: Appealing aromas of yellow apple, pear and spice lead to a deftly styled palate with lightly creamy fruit flavors.

title: Ancestry 2014 Reunion Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The pear, apple, toast and cinnamon aromas are light and elusive. The ...
description: The pear, apple, toast and cinnamon aromas are light and elusive. The flavors are elegant, with the concentration trailing toward the finish.

title: Dalliance 2013 Chardonnay (Lake County)
excerpt: This is a very good, crowd-pleasing Chardonnay with lots of ripe, fresh ...
description: This is a very good, crowd-pleasing Chardonnay with lots of ripe, fresh fruit flavors and tasty accents of vanilla and butter. It is medium-bodied, soft and smooth in texture, leans toward sweetness and has a lingering, fruity finish.

title: Firestone 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Santa Ynez Valley)
excerpt: Nearing greenish-yellow in the glass, this wine offers lemon curd, a touch ...
description: Nearing greenish-yellow in the glass, this wine offers lemon curd, a touch of oak and a flash of white peach on the nose. Golden apple and iodine flavors show on the palate, which proves more bitter and sour than ripe.

title: White Oak 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Deep yellow in color, this wine is into oak, with elements of ...
description: Deep yellow in color, this wine is into oak, with elements of caramelized vanilla and baked pear. Medium bodied and unctuous, it will fulfill the needs of fans of a bigger, voluptuous style.

title: Highland Cellars 2013 Oughterson Family Estates Chardonnay (Seneca Lake)
excerpt: Whiffs of orange peel and floral potpourri lend perfume to this unabashedly ...
description: Whiffs of orange peel and floral potpourri lend perfume to this unabashedly oaky, full-bodied Chardonnay. Tangerine and peach flavors are enveloped in sweet cream and butter, lingering thickly through the finish.

title: MontGras 2014 Reserva Chardonnay (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Pear and apple aromas are light and oaky but nothing out of ...
description: Pear and apple aromas are light and oaky but nothing out of the ordinary. A creamy palate is just vital enough, while woody flavors of barrel spice run side by side with peach and melon notes. A clean, mild finish provides for a good ending.

title: Rebusity 2012 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: A generous, smooth texture and nicely bright flavors of lemon, lime and ...
description: A generous, smooth texture and nicely bright flavors of lemon, lime and apple make this a satisfying wine. It is medium to full bodied, soft in acidity, but fresh in flavor. It should be a winner for large groups.

title: Sandhi 2013 Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: A very reluctant nose offers weak aromas of wet cement and a ...
description: A very reluctant nose offers weak aromas of wet cement and a basketful of lemons. The palate is more about texture and energy than flavors, which include pear skins and orange rinds.

title: Caliterra 2014 Reserva Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Apple, melon, spice and briny aromas are more mellow than loud. This ...
description: Apple, melon, spice and briny aromas are more mellow than loud. This feels fresh and focused, but simple. Flavors of white peach, melon and nuts carry onto the finish, with a hint of popcorn flavor.

title: 14 Hands 2013 Chardonnay (Washington)
excerpt: Butter, pear and baking spice aromas are followed by a rounded palate ...
description: Butter, pear and baking spice aromas are followed by a rounded palate with sweet fruit flavors. Pair it with baked chicken.

title: Millbrook 2013 Block 2 West Chardonnay (Hudson River Region)
excerpt: Cinnamon and cedar notes pepper this rich, full-bodied Chardonnay aged 18 months ...
description: Cinnamon and cedar notes pepper this rich, full-bodied Chardonnay aged 18 months in French oak. Fresh apple and pear flavors are bright, but enveloped in a midpalate of butter and cream. Drink now.

title: Vistamar 2014 Reserva Sepia Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Oaky, resiny, briny aromas of apple and popcorn set up a high-acid ...
description: Oaky, resiny, briny aromas of apple and popcorn set up a high-acid palate with fragmented resiny notes. Flavors of briny apple, lemon and oak but also fresh and citrusy.

title: Victor Vineyards 2013 Lawson Ranch Chardonnay (Lodi)
excerpt: Lively in aromas and with vivid flavors like grapefruit and apricot, this ...
description: Lively in aromas and with vivid flavors like grapefruit and apricot, this wine tastes lightly herbal and appetizing. It has light oaky, buttery notes in the aroma and fairly vivid fruit flavors. The texture that gets richer with each sip, revealing a rather full body.

title: McFadden 2014 Chardonnay (Potter Valley)
excerpt: Fresh peach and light floral aromas lead to ripe, grapey flavors and ...
description: Fresh peach and light floral aromas lead to ripe, grapey flavors and a soft, soothing texture in this medium-bodied wine. It is smooth and low in acid, with a charming flowery element that helps it stand out.

title: Claro 2014 Justo Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Fleshy aromas of papaya are more oaky than fruity. This is plump ...
description: Fleshy aromas of papaya are more oaky than fruity. This is plump and mild in feel, with moderate acidity. Flavors of barrel spice and resin match wits with papaya and melony notes, while the finish tastes briny and nutty.

title: Koz 2012 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: A soft-textured, rather light-bodied and fruit-forward offering, this smells and tastes like ...
description: A soft-textured, rather light-bodied and fruit-forward offering, this smells and tastes like pear, apple and grape juices with a touch of sweetness and low acidity.

title: Ministry of the Vinterior 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Low in oak and high in acidity, this wine skews tart and ...
description: Low in oak and high in acidity, this wine skews tart and high-strung in terms of citrus and wet stone-like notions, offering a bouquet of lemon chiffon. A nice entry and finish surround a less-intriguing middle.

title: City Winery Chicago 2013 Elevated Chardonnay Chardonnay (North Coast)
excerpt: Flavors are restrained in this medium-bodied wine, so there are not a ...
description: Flavors are restrained in this medium-bodied wine, so there are not a lot of fruits or herbs to shout out. However, it has a straightforward appeal and will make an unobtrusive pairing with many foods because it has a good, crisp mouth feel.

title: Angel's Cup 2013 Vineyard Selection Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: This airy confection has aromas of lemon and vanilla, then almost sweet ...
description: This airy confection has aromas of lemon and vanilla, then almost sweet flavors of butterscotch and lemon cream on a fairly soft texture. It is light to medium bodied.

title: Sand Point 2013 Chardonnay (Lodi)
excerpt: While not very full bodied, this tastes rich and heavy like fruit ...
description: While not very full bodied, this tastes rich and heavy like fruit syrup. Pear, apple and banana flavors coat the mouth with a touch of sweetness and a rounded texture.

title: Oak and Vine 2012 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: Nothing in this modest and medium-bodied wine is a turnoff, so it ...
description: Nothing in this modest and medium-bodied wine is a turnoff, so it will be fine for an outdoor occasion or a big party where the wine is not really the focus. The flavors do include some subtle vanilla and butter notes and the texture is rich and soothing.

title: Louis Jadot 2013 Les Demoiselles  (Chevalier-Montrachet)
excerpt: This is a beautiful wine with elegant fruits that reflect a strong ...
description: This is a beautiful wine with elegant fruits that reflect a strong sense of minerality. It is crisp, although that is just a surface quality to a wine that has such depth. Toast flavors round out the intense fruits, giving a light spice and butter to this powerful wine. Drink from 2020.

title: Domaine Laroche 2012 Les Blanchots Grand Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: This is a textured, steely wine with considerable acidity as much as ...
description: This is a textured, steely wine with considerable acidity as much as fruit. Tight and with green apple and green plum characters, this structured wine has a salty, chalky texture. Tasting of the soil, it needs to age. Drink from 2018.

title: Sandhi 2013 Mt. Carmel Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: Lime and apple blossoms, gray slate, wet chalk, a touch of struck ...
description: Lime and apple blossoms, gray slate, wet chalk, a touch of struck match and an ever-so-slight lemon-butter element converge on a wondrous nose in this Rajat Parr-Sashi Moorman winner. Once sipped, the tight citrus hits first, but then come approachable white flowers, golden pears and a touch of ghee and vanilla on the back end.

title: Joseph Drouhin 2013 Marquis de Laguiche Morgeot Premier Cru  (Chassagne-Montrachet)
excerpt: Perfumed and floral, this is a wine with weight and richness. There ...
description: Perfumed and floral, this is a wine with weight and richness. There is a lot of structure here, concentrated rich yellow and white fruits giving a textured and mineral wine. It comes from a property vinified by Drouhin for 70 years. The wine is for aging; drink from 2019.

title: Domaine Laroche 2012 Les Bougerots Grand Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: The wine comes from a parcel within the Bougros Grand Cru. It ...
description: The wine comes from a parcel within the Bougros Grand Cru. It is tight, still very young although with weight and ripe apricot flavors. The density of the wine marks it out, its flavors running right through the texture. It finishes with fragrant, intense acidity. Drink from 2018.

title: Joseph Drouhin 2013 Clos de la Garenne Premier Cru  (Puligny-Montrachet)
excerpt: This offers toast and spice aromas, with opulent apricots and white peaches ...
description: This offers toast and spice aromas, with opulent apricots and white peaches along with intense freshness from the acidity and linear structure. The wood aging just shows through in the roundness of the wine, while leaving room for a fresh, crisp, mineral aftertaste. Drink from 2018.

title: Joseph Drouhin 2013 Drouhin-Vaudon Les Clos Grand Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: A very mineral, flinty character comes through the powerful texture of this ...
description: A very mineral, flinty character comes through the powerful texture of this rich, dense wine. The ripest, almost honeyed fruit is cut by lime, lemon and orange peel. It is a complex wine for aging; drink from 2019.

title: Domaine Pinson 2013 Fourchaume Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: From ripe fruits, in the Pinson style, this is a rich, generous ...
description: From ripe fruits, in the Pinson style, this is a rich, generous and concentrated wine. There is great fruitiness from the ripe apricot and pear flavors, cut with acidity to give an edge of freshness. Spice and fragrant acidity mark the finish.

title: Albert Bichot 2011 Domaine Long-Depaquit La Moutonne Grand Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: This 2011 is an aristocratic wine, with a mineral character that is ...
description: This 2011 is an aristocratic wine, with a mineral character that is now rounding out. Yellow and green fruits mingle with some tannins and a steely core. It will age for several years more, so drink from 2018.

title: Domaine Pinson 2013 Mont de Milieu Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: Rich and open, this is a generous, full-throated wine. There is a ...
description: Rich and open, this is a generous, full-throated wine. There is a good contrast between the ripeness and a line of acidity that gives a steely, textured backbone. The end combines the two characters, a ripe, full aftertaste cut with a touch of steel. Drink from 2017.

title: Venge 2013 Maldonado Vineyard Dijon Clones Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Layered and medium in weight, this is a well-crafted, concentrated wine from ...
description: Layered and medium in weight, this is a well-crafted, concentrated wine from an exceptional vineyard site in the cool, southeastern reaches of Napa Valley. The rich pineapple and coconut is tempered by crisp acidity, finishing in caramel-accented oak.

title: Domaine Laroche 2012 Les Fourchaumes Vieilles Vignes Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: This wine is textured, fresh and with beautiful acidity, along with an ...
description: This wine is textured, fresh and with beautiful acidity, along with an edge of tannin and a sense of structure. The freshness is palpable, leaving a steely, crisp aftertaste. Drink from 2018.

title: Jean-Marc Brocard 2013 Les Clos Grand Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: This is a tightly wound wine with acidity that brings out a ...
description: This is a tightly wound wine with acidity that brings out a fine structure and a strongly mineral, textured, almost chewy character. It is still fruity although, more importantly, with great tension and aging potential. Drink from 2019.

title: Louis Jadot 2013 Le Clos de la Garenne Duc de Magenta Premier Cru  (Puligny-Montrachet)
excerpt: Rich and rounded in character, this is already a beautiful wine, from ...
description: Rich and rounded in character, this is already a beautiful wine, from 80-year-old vines. A line of acidity shoots through the wine, giving a long lift to the green fruits and orange zest flavors. It does have weight and a generous texture that reveals itself slowly. Ripe apricots mingle with acidity and toast at the end. Drink from 2019.

title: Domaine Vincent Dauvissat 2010 Vaillons Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: There are plenty of toasty aromas to this rich, generous and structured ...
description: There are plenty of toasty aromas to this rich, generous and structured wine. It is now almost mature although the fresh apples, spice and vanilla are still offset by the tightest, refreshing acidity. The wood flavors are well balanced by the fine fruit. Drink now.

title: Domaine Laroche 2012 Mont de Milieu Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: From a mix of purchased grapes and the Laroche domaine, here is ...
description: From a mix of purchased grapes and the Laroche domaine, here is a ripe wine with swathes of yellow fruit, very approachable and warm. Rich and full in the mouth, it has a dense texture that supports the generous fruits. Drink from 2017.

title: Louis Latour 2013 Cailleret Premier Cru  (Chassagne-Montrachet)
excerpt: This wine is rich and soft with acidity rounded out by ripe ...
description: This wine is rich and soft with acidity rounded out by ripe melon and apple fruit flavors. The background is more structured, tense with apple skins and minerality. Packed with acidity at the end, the wine is crisp, tight and demands aging. Drink from 2019.

title: Domaine Pinson 2013 Montmains Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: Structured and with a strongly crisp and textured character, this wine also ...
description: Structured and with a strongly crisp and textured character, this wine also has a touch of toast from wood aging. Ripe green and yellow fruits are part of the concentration and dense flavors. It is still young, so wait until 2018.

title: Alex Gambal 2013 Maltroie Premier Cru  (Chassagne-Montrachet)
excerpt: The premier cru is right in the heart of the appellation, close ...
description: The premier cru is right in the heart of the appellation, close to the village. This wine, with its intense fruits and strongly textured character, is still trying out its structure and density. The potential is there with apricot and apple fruits waiting to come thorough the tight structure. Drink this fine wine from 2018.

title: La Chablisienne 2012 Mont de Milieu Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: In the Middle Ages, this vineyard was on the boundary between Burgundy ...
description: In the Middle Ages, this vineyard was on the boundary between Burgundy and Champagne. This is a plush , rich wine with a broad, full character. It offers ripeness, yellow fruits and crisp, fresh acidity at the end. Drink from 2017.

title: Jean-Marc Brocard 2014 Vaulorent Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: This tight and crisp wine is produced from a parcel that is ...
description: This tight and crisp wine is produced from a parcel that is run biodynamically. It is nervy, edgy, packed with fruitiness and intense acidity. That makes the wine still very young, lean and needing time to fill out. Drink from 2017.

title: Louis Latour 2013 La Garenne Premier Cru  (Puligny-Montrachet)
excerpt: This is a delicious wine with fresh fruits that are crisply embedded ...
description: This is a delicious wine with fresh fruits that are crisply embedded in balanced acidity, melon and orange zest flavors. The wine has structure, minerality and a tight texture that contrasts with all this fruitiness. The finish is intense with acidity. Although the wine could be drunk now, it will be better from 2018.

title: Louis Latour 2013 Morgeot Premier Cru  (Chassagne-Montrachet)
excerpt: Conveying a sense of richness, this is a smooth and creamy wine ...
description: Conveying a sense of richness, this is a smooth and creamy wine with a tannic structure that emerges out of the ripe apple and pear flavors. Acidity at the end is already well integrated into the crisp texture with its touch of orange zest and minerality. Drink from 2018.

title: Louis Latour 2013 Sous le Puits Premier Cru  (Puligny-Montrachet)
excerpt: This structured wine offers rich fruit cut with acidity and a mineral ...
description: This structured wine offers rich fruit cut with acidity and a mineral texture. It is both fruity and strongly mineral. At the back, hints of wood show through to give richness and a toasty character. This balanced wine should be drunk from 2018.

title: Domaine J. Meuret 2013 Clos Pierre Chardonnay (Columbia Gorge (OR))
excerpt: This wine is aromatically arresting, with notes of honeycomb, candle wax, corn ...
description: This wine is aromatically arresting, with notes of honeycomb, candle wax, corn husk, chamomile, almond and stone fruit. The palate has an outrageously textured, detailed, layered feel leading to an extended finish that displays both elegance and richness.

title: Albert Bichot 2013 Domaine Long-Depaquit Vaucoupin Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: A tight and closed wine from the southernmost premier cru, this is ...
description: A tight and closed wine from the southernmost premier cru, this is still developing. As it fills out, it will bring in the apple ripeness and fresh character that are just a hint at the moment. It will certainly remain structured and nervy with a strongly steely aftertaste. Drink from 2018.

title: Joseph Drouhin 2013 Drouhin-Vaudon Mont-de-Milieu Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: Ripe and rounded, this has rich acidity balanced by a touch of ...
description: Ripe and rounded, this has rich acidity balanced by a touch of yellow fruit. Still young, it has a flinty character that will soften and fill out. Intense, pure and with great fruitiness, it will be best from 2017.

title: Jean-Marc Brocard 2013 Bougros Grand Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: This rich, rounded wine shows ripe yellow fruits, pineapple flavors and a ...
description: This rich, rounded wine shows ripe yellow fruits, pineapple flavors and a texture that just hints at minerality. All this rich fruit is so generously balanced with acidity and a juicy, fruity and fresh aftertaste. At the same time, the wine has weight, depth of flavor and a background structure that will allow it to age. Drink from 2018.

title: Louis Jadot 2013 Les Combettes Premier Cru  (Puligny-Montrachet)
excerpt: This wine is ripe, very complete in its combination of acidity and ...
description: This wine is ripe, very complete in its combination of acidity and ripe yellow and white fruits. A touch of spice from wood aging gives richness as well as freshness. There is weight and great depth of flavor, the acidity welling up from right inside the wine. Drink from 2018.

title: Joseph Drouhin 2013 Drouhin-Vaudon Vaillons Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: This is a balanced wine with touches of honey and toast, along ...
description: This is a balanced wine with touches of honey and toast, along with ripe yellow and white fruits that are cut by a salty structure. Great acidity runs through the wine, giving a tight, steely, very pure aftertaste. Drink from 2017.

title: Louis Jadot 2013 Referts Premier Cru  (Puligny-Montrachet)
excerpt: While there is plenty of toastiness here, this wine also has a ...
description: While there is plenty of toastiness here, this wine also has a pure and fruity character. It is aromatic, full of white flowers and garden perfumes. Complex with acidity, it also offers lemongrass and spice against a background that is textured, nervy and mineral. Drink from 2018.

title: Beauregard 2013 Bald Mountain Vineyard Chardonnay (Ben Lomond Mountain)
excerpt: From a small appellation near Bonny Doon that this family has farmed ...
description: From a small appellation near Bonny Doon that this family has farmed for half a century comes this zesty wine, with aromas of seared lemons, caramelized nectarine, browned butter and hard apple candy. The palate shows warm apples, roasted almonds and a shred of iodine, finishing with dried apricot and pressed white flowers.

title: Albert Bichot 2013 Domaine Long-Depaquit Vaillons Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: From one of the largets premier crus from the left bank of ...
description: From one of the largets premier crus from the left bank of Chablis, this is ripe and full in the mouth, although with a cooler nervy texture that gives attractive fresh acidity. It has a bright and fruity character, just hinting at a touch of toast from the 10% wood aging. Drink from 2016.

title: Domaine Laroche 2012 Les Vaillons Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: This wine has a vegetal aroma, with hints of asparagus, while the ...
description: This wine has a vegetal aroma, with hints of asparagus, while the palate is riper, showing the concentration of old vines. It offers lemon and orange zest as well as a fresh, tight texture. The wine needs time to reset itself and balance out. Drink from 2017.

title: Domaine Pinson 2013 Vauguiraut Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: Light, fragrant and aromatic, this wine has beautiful acidity and a bright ...
description: Light, fragrant and aromatic, this wine has beautiful acidity and a bright lemon and yellow fruit that combine richness and freshness at the same time. Its touch of honey fills the palate, while the crisp aftertaste leave a refreshing feeling in the mouth.

title: La Chablisienne 2012 Vaulorent Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: From a parcel of the Fourchaume premier cru vineyard that is on ...
description: From a parcel of the Fourchaume premier cru vineyard that is on the same slope as the Grand Crus, this is a ripe, full-bodied wine, packed with fruit while still firmly structured. Tropical and yellow fruits, hints of pineapple and apricots give richness, set against a mineral, textured aftertaste. Drink from 2017.

title: Pence Ranch 2013 Estate Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: Balanced nicely between the citrus pith and buttercream-vanilla side of the grape, ...
description: Balanced nicely between the citrus pith and buttercream-vanilla side of the grape, the nose of this wine also shows a touch of honeysuckle, gray slate and freshly picked limes. The palate is energetic, albeit still wound-up tight, showing wet cement, lime juice, kiwi and pear flavors, plus a slight brush of butter on the finish.

title: Jean-Marc Brocard 2014 Butteaux Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: This is the southern portion of the Montmains premier cru and is ...
description: This is the southern portion of the Montmains premier cru and is not often bottled separately. It is rich with yellow fruits while also having a totally crisp and mineral character. The touch of honey gives further ripeness while the aftertaste is all fresh, energetic fruit.

title: Brophy Clark 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
excerpt: This is a very tastefully done take on a more traditional, rather ...
description: This is a very tastefully done take on a more traditional, rather ripe California style of the grape, with peach-driven tropicality, buttered vanilla and a salted-lemon element on the nose. The palate shows ripe nectarine, lemon curds, lime sorbet, a pinch of dill and a tiny bit of vanilla on the finish, proving lively throughout.

title: Henri de Villamont 2013 Les Caillerets Premier Cru  (Meursault)
excerpt: A ripe wine from vines close to Volnay, this is dense and ...
description: A ripe wine from vines close to Volnay, this is dense and very textured. It shows wood, although not too much, and a creamy character. Minerality gives a good sense of structure to this concentrated, balanced wine. Drink from 2017.

title: Alex Gambal 2013  Meursault
excerpt: The mineral texture that marks out a fine Meursault is very present ...
description: The mineral texture that marks out a fine Meursault is very present here. Yellow fruits balance with this perfumed and intense wine. Still young and crisp, the acidity gives a tight, nervy edge. The wine obviously needs to age, so drink from 2017.

title: Louis Jadot 2013  Puligny-Montrachet
excerpt: With spice and wood right up front, this wine is toasty and ...
description: With spice and wood right up front, this wine is toasty and rich. It has a creamy texture along with bright acidity and a generous body. The wine, with its smooth, ripe aftertaste, is of course young. Drink from 2017.

title: Ulises Valdez 2012 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: A voluptuous white wine with a bite of acidity to keep it ...
description: A voluptuous white wine with a bite of acidity to keep it buoyant and vibrant on the palate, this sings in lemon zest, orange blossom and ripe yellow apple. Lushly layered, it threads a needle of stony, salty complexity, finishing with full-flavored flair.

title: Chateau Burgozone 2012 Collection Chardonnay (Danube River Plains)
excerpt: Pale straw in the glass, this wine has a nose of pineapple ...
description: Pale straw in the glass, this wine has a nose of pineapple and lemon blossom with a strong dose of vanilla. It is round and full in the mouth, with rich flavors of green apple, guava and tropical fruits with a slight hint of toast that carry on through the long-lasting finish.

title: Domaine Laroche 2012 Les Beauroys Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: This ripe and spicy wine is full-bodied and structured. Apples and yellow ...
description: This ripe and spicy wine is full-bodied and structured. Apples and yellow fruits push the wine forward with balanced acidity and a more tense background. It can be drunk now, although it will be better from 2016.

title: Domaine Clos Salomon 2013 Le Clou  (Montagny)
excerpt: Touched by wood, this is a warm and ripe wine. It has ...
description: Touched by wood, this is a warm and ripe wine. It has spice and toast along with almost sweet acidity that gives a full character. Peaches and apricots are generous, just leaving room for more citrus acidity at the end. Drink from 2016.

title: Jean-Marc Brocard 2013 Vau de Vey Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: A ripe and rounded wine, this is touched by honey as well ...
description: A ripe and rounded wine, this is touched by honey as well as rich yellow fruits, and is generous and full in the mouth. Apples and peaches shine here. As the wine opens up, it develops a fresher side, bringing in a touch of minerality and giving a really crisp aftertaste. Drink from 2016.

title: Domaine Laroche 2013 Premier Cru La Chantrerie  (Chablis)
excerpt: This blend from small parcels in different premier cru vineyards has a ...
description: This blend from small parcels in different premier cru vineyards has a touch of wood with an almost chalky texture. Ripe yellow fruits give it a rich, rounded character. Delicious, refreshing acidity adds the balance the wine needs. Still textured, it needs to age, so drink from 2017.

title: Bodega Catena Zapata 2013 Catena Alta Historic Rows Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: A full blast of oak and related aromas open this creamy, ripe ...
description: A full blast of oak and related aromas open this creamy, ripe wine. Plump on the palate but with just enough acidity to preserve balance, this rich, friendly wine features walnut, papaya and citrus flavors that finish woody, smooth and long. Drink now.

title: Henri de Villamont 2013 Premier Cru  (Montagny)
excerpt: Smooth, creamy and round, this ripe wine features appealing spice, toast and ...
description: Smooth, creamy and round, this ripe wine features appealing spice, toast and delicious fruitiness. It has an attractive layer of tannin along with firm minerality, adding structure, hints of wood and a finely textured character. Bright and fruity at the end, it will be ready from 2016.

title: Hunnicutt 2013 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: With a buoyant percentage of Sonoma Coast fruit added to that of ...
description: With a buoyant percentage of Sonoma Coast fruit added to that of Napa Valley, this is a minerality-driven wine, vibrant in the glass from start to finish, softly layered and generously expressive. Amid the suggestion of ocean salt, it offers a mix of lemon citrus and chiffon, teetering between bright and ripe.

title: Saracina 2014 Chardonnay (Mendocino County)
excerpt: Fresh apple and lemon aromas and fruity but not showy flavors create ...
description: Fresh apple and lemon aromas and fruity but not showy flavors create a very tasty, crisp-textured and well-balanced wine. More nuances come out with each sip, like bits of apricot and lime, and the mouthfeel stays bright and nicely acidic through the finish. An unoaked wine, this includes 4% Viognier.

title: Saxon Brown 2012 Etre Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Imagine a liquid Key-lime pie but not so sweet. Light yellow in ...
description: Imagine a liquid Key-lime pie but not so sweet. Light yellow in color with a faint green hue, this smells like lime juice and tastes bright and citrus-like. It turns richer on the midpalate and finish, as lime and cream flavors come to the front and stay through the aftertaste.

title: ZD 2013 45th Anniversary Reserve Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Rounded in baked and dried fruit aromas, this is a soft, gentle ...
description: Rounded in baked and dried fruit aromas, this is a soft, gentle wine with tangy acidity and swathes of ripe apple and orange citrus. A backbone of subtle oak gives it structure and complexity, finishing lean and bright, with a darker, richer twist of vanilla and clove in the mix.

title: Henri de Villamont 2013 Clos du Cromin  (Meursault)
excerpt: Round and ripe, full of yellow fruits as well as crisp pear ...
description: Round and ripe, full of yellow fruits as well as crisp pear flavors, this wine has density as well as lively acidity. A strong line of minerality keeps the wine on a straight line of fragrant acidity and great freshness. Drink from 2016.

title: Chateau Burgozone 2014 Chardonnay (Danube River Plains)
excerpt: A clean nose of lemon curd sets the scene for flavors of ...
