description: A clean nose of lemon curd sets the scene for flavors of kumquat, green apple, ripe mango and lemon zest. Medium bodied on the palate, this wine offers a bright, crisp finish.

title: Domaine Laroche 2013 Saint-Martin  (Chablis)
excerpt: With a touch of caramel and honey, typical of the vintage, this ...
description: With a touch of caramel and honey, typical of the vintage, this wine is ripe, generous and ready to drink. It has a light texture, with orange zest and apricot fruit flavors. The aftertaste is fresh, crisply acidic while remaining ripe and full.

title: Raymond 2013 Estate Collection Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Crisp and high in acidity, this wine mixes cinnamon, vanilla and pear ...
description: Crisp and high in acidity, this wine mixes cinnamon, vanilla and pear flavors, accented by a note of exotic orange blossom on the nose. With a low presence of oak and medium body, it remains fresh and vibrant in the glass, offering a hit of toast and vanilla on the finish.

title: V. Sattui 2013 Carsi Vineyard Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A density of honey and caramel washes over this vineyard-designate, a concentrated ...
description: A density of honey and caramel washes over this vineyard-designate, a concentrated and viscous expression of the variety. Layered in light waves of lemon, it finishes with a bite of ripe yellow apple and more of that caramel.

title: Bodega Catena Zapata 2012 White Stones Adrianna Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Stony, minerally aromas show a pinch of toast on top of white ...
description: Stony, minerally aromas show a pinch of toast on top of white peach and apple cider scents. On the palate, this stays on the straight and narrow, with high acidity. Clementine and tangerine flavors finish as stony as the name implies; drink this shellfish-friendly, unique Argentinean Chardonnay through 2022.

title: Gloria Ferrer 2013 Estate Grown Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: High-toned citrus stars in this mineral-driven wine that harmonizes acidity and fruit. ...
description: High-toned citrus stars in this mineral-driven wine that harmonizes acidity and fruit. Lime and grapefruit lean into richer elements of vanilla and caramel on the finish, balancing each other out.

title: Lincourt 2013 Steel Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: This stainless-steel take shows lime juice, golden apples and white pepper on ...
description: This stainless-steel take shows lime juice, golden apples and white pepper on the lean but ever-so-slightly warm nose. The palate is driven by a citrusy bitterness, showing tangerine peels and more squeezed lime throughout.

title: Domaine Laroche 2012 Le Vaudevey Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: The domaine owns 12 acres in this premier cru. This wine has ...
description: The domaine owns 12 acres in this premier cru. This wine has a touch of honey and toast, as well as a tight texture. The fruit dominates, along with the freshest acidity, while the aftertaste shows a crunchy apple character. Drink from 2016.

title: Bodega Catena Zapata 2012 White Bones Adrianna Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Barrel-related aromas of caramel, popcorn and baked pear dominate the nose, while ...
description: Barrel-related aromas of caramel, popcorn and baked pear dominate the nose, while the palate brings notes of citrus zest, with lively minerality and cutting acidity. This chiseled Chardonnay tastes like tart nectarine, green apple and lime, while the finish is tight as a drum. Drink through 2022.

title: Bulgariana 2013 Chardonnay (Thracian Valley)
excerpt: The color of light straw, this wine has fragrances of white flowers ...
description: The color of light straw, this wine has fragrances of white flowers and citrus blossoms. Quite linear in the mouth, it offers pure flavors of green apple and ripe summer peach with a touch of lemon zest that makes its presence known on the zippy finish.

title: Lange 2014 Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Here is a solid, medium weight wine that captures the lighter, more ...
description: Here is a solid, medium weight wine that captures the lighter, more elegant style characteristic of this region. All Dijon-clone fruit, it puts a hint of butterscotch around crisp apple. Half stainless, half neutral French oak was used.

title: Peter Paul Wines 2012 Bacigalupi Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: From the historic vineyard site planted to old Wente, this wine offers ...
description: From the historic vineyard site planted to old Wente, this wine offers a silky-smooth character on the palate, which is generous in its aromatics of apple blossom and peach, with just the right sizzle of tangy lemon-driven acidity. The full-bodied finish features waxy apple, vanilla and toasted oak.

title: Raymond 2013 Reserve Selection Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Medium in weight and body, this is a delightful, straightforward wine with ...
description: Medium in weight and body, this is a delightful, straightforward wine with highlights of apple, pear and fennel. A weightier backbone builds momentum toward the finish; expect a satisfying twist of caramel and vanilla as it ends.

title: V. Sattui 2013 Chardonnay (Los Carneros)
excerpt: Full bodied and richly textured, this is a generous wine, resplendent in ...
description: Full bodied and richly textured, this is a generous wine, resplendent in tangy caramel apple and wild vanilla. Soft on the palate, it leans tropical, with a taste of pineapple, guava and even coconut, plus a slight suggestion of nutmeg-like spice at the end.

title: Louis Latour 2013  Meursault
excerpt: Rounded and ripe, this has yellow fruits along with a fresher, sliced ...
description: Rounded and ripe, this has yellow fruits along with a fresher, sliced apple character. The wine is fruity, perfumed and just touched by a more mineral texture, with crisp acidity that gives a ripe fruitiness. Drink from 2017.

title: El Enemigo 2014 Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: In the past we said the enemy of El Enemigo was too ...
description: In the past we said the enemy of El Enemigo was too much oak; that heavy oak character persists, but it is more integrated than in prior bottlings. Along with woody aromas, look for cidery apple scents in front of a soft, chunky palate. Flavors of popcorn, caramel and baked apple finish weighty and woody. Drink now.

title: Vincent 2014 JJ Bourgogne Blanc  (Bourgogne)
excerpt: This attractive, fruity wine has refreshing acidity and clean lemon and orange ...
description: This attractive, fruity wine has refreshing acidity and clean lemon and orange zest flavors. It has a creamy side as well, giving a smooth, soft aftertaste that balances with the fresh acidity. Drink from 2016.

title: V. Sattui 2013 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Floral streaks of orange blossom open this wine, followed by vibrant bursts ...
description: Floral streaks of orange blossom open this wine, followed by vibrant bursts of lemon. Estate grown, produced and bottled, this fresh, balanced wine picks up weight on the finish, ending with a ripeness of voluptuous apple and oak.

title: Louis Latour 2013  Chassagne-Montrachet
excerpt: This wine has structure and tannins. With ripe apples and quince flavors, ...
description: This wine has structure and tannins. With ripe apples and quince flavors, it is tight, tense while also full in the mouth. A strong background of acidity gives concentration and considerable freshness at the end. Drink from 2017.

title: La Crema 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: High-toned Meyer lemon and edgy minerality give this coastal wine a freshness ...
description: High-toned Meyer lemon and edgy minerality give this coastal wine a freshness on the palate, along with a complexity of fennel and apple. Juicy and medium bodied, it picks up a fullness on the texture as it goes, while remaining balanced and pleasing.

title: Buehler 2013 Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Pineapple and peach rise to the fore in this wine, a suggestion ...
description: Pineapple and peach rise to the fore in this wine, a suggestion of waxy caramel apple lurking. High-toned acidity keeps it structured and clean on the palate, a zesty mix of orange and lemon weaving throughout the soft layers. A richer bite of graham cracker finishes things off.

title: Domaine Dominique Gruhier 2013 Tonnerre  (Bourgogne)
excerpt: Ripe and impressively rich for a wine from so far north in ...
description: Ripe and impressively rich for a wine from so far north in Burgundy, this has yellow fruits, crisp acidity and a textured edge of acidity. There is a mineral element to this otherwise creamy, fruity wine. Drink now.

title: Domaine Pinson 2013  Chablis
excerpt: This wine is ripe, textured with an attractive touch of oxidation giving ...
description: This wine is ripe, textured with an attractive touch of oxidation giving richness and concentration. Good acidity at the same time is balanced with quince and a touch of spice.

title: Albert Bichot 2013 Domaine Long-Depaquit  (Chablis)
excerpt: Attractive, ripe and fruity, this has a light citrus texture and full-throated ...
description: Attractive, ripe and fruity, this has a light citrus texture and full-throated acidity. Apples, bright fruit and a ripe mouthfeel give it a ready-to-drink character.

title: Alex Gambal 2013  Bourgogne
excerpt: The fruit in this soft wine is ripe and creamy. Green and ...
description: The fruit in this soft wine is ripe and creamy. Green and white fruits give a balanced blend of fresh acidity and smooth texture. It is rich, generous and will be ready to drink from 2016.

title: Domaine Laroche 2014  Chablis
excerpt: The fruit and acidity of the vintage show strongly with a lively, ...
description: The fruit and acidity of the vintage show strongly with a lively, fresh character that brings out the citrus crispness of this wine. At the back, the wine becomes richer with yellow fruits and a rounded, ripe aftertaste.

title: Chatom Vineyards 2013 Chardonnay (Calaveras County)
excerpt: This is a pretty taut wine that combines a rich style with ...
description: This is a pretty taut wine that combines a rich style with good, vibrant acidity. Yet it is described as 100% fermented in stainless steel rather than oak barrels. The aromas resemble toasted baguette, butter and toasted walnut, while the flavors are like ripe apple and almonds.

title: Cannonball 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Creamy vanilla complements a medium use of oak in this weighty, tropical ...
description: Creamy vanilla complements a medium use of oak in this weighty, tropical wine, given to pineapple, peach and Meyer lemon flavor. Straightforward, inexpensive and intended to be a crowd pleaser, it hits those marks, finishing ripe and layered.

title: Kunde 2013 C.S. Ridge Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: This vineyard-designate has a richness of baked and dried fruit on the ...
description: This vineyard-designate has a richness of baked and dried fruit on the nose and palate, making it reminiscent of an apple and almond tart, laced in honey. The minerality and bite of ripe apple keep it grounded and complete, finishing with a touch of oak.

title: WildStock 2014 Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: This unoaked, tank-fermented, straightforward Chardonnay has a certain steely precision that underscores ...
description: This unoaked, tank-fermented, straightforward Chardonnay has a certain steely precision that underscores crisp flavors of apple flesh and skin. Botanical highlights continue through a short, sharp finish.

title: Louis Jadot 2012  Bourgogne
excerpt: This soft, smooth and creamy wine has attractive spice and vanilla from ...
description: This soft, smooth and creamy wine has attractive spice and vanilla from the wood aging, along with light citrus and peach flavors. Ripe and full in the mouth, it has a touch of minerality at the end to give a fine texture. It is ready to drink.

title: Louis Latour 2013 En Paradis  (Pouilly-Vinzelles)
excerpt: This is an attractive fruity wine, with a good touch of steely ...
description: This is an attractive fruity wine, with a good touch of steely acidity as well as ripe yellow and white fruits. Sliced apples and fresh grapefruit give freshness. Crisp and clean, it is refreshingly ready to drink.

title: Mascota 2014 ROD Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Fleshy peach and dusty apple aromas with a touch oak make for ...
description: Fleshy peach and dusty apple aromas with a touch oak make for a good nose. This is pulpy and full in the mouth, with citrusy acidity creating cut. Apple, pineapple and brined flavors finish salty, with an echo of tropical fruit.

title: Olema 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
excerpt: A well-crafted wine made in relatively large quantity, this has a tropical ...
description: A well-crafted wine made in relatively large quantity, this has a tropical edge, sidelining stone fruit and apple. It also offers a lightness of pear skin, atop light, ripe layers of vanilla and oak. The finish puts memorable touches to a generous, expressive palate.

title: Tucumen 2013 Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Buttercup, apple and pear aromas are fragrant and floral. The palate on ...
description: Buttercup, apple and pear aromas are fragrant and floral. The palate on this Chardonnay is chunky and pulpy, while flavors of pineapple, melon, citrus and mango finish with subdued honey notes.

title: Argento 2014 Reserva Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Saline and oak aromas are dominant, with tropical fruit scents and apple ...
description: Saline and oak aromas are dominant, with tropical fruit scents and apple also registering. This is medium in body, with cutting citric acidity. Flavors of briny oak, popcorn and banana finish salty.

title: La Chablisienne 2013 Dame Nature  (Chablis)
excerpt: The second of the two wines made from organic grapes by La ...
description: The second of the two wines made from organic grapes by La Chablisienne (the first is a Petit Chablis), this is soft, very clean and clear in its flavors, with a streak of minerality to give it texture. The aftertaste is full of fresh, crisp apples. Drink now.

title: Bodega Norton 2013 Reserva Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Waxy apple aromas are chunky, dusty and a bit choppy. Ditto the ...
description: Waxy apple aromas are chunky, dusty and a bit choppy. Ditto the palate, which is thick and on the full side, with moderate acidity. Apple, savory oak and spice flavors finish with a briny, saline note.

title: Tilia 2014 Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Generic pear and apple aromas are simple but good. This wine runs ...
description: Generic pear and apple aromas are simple but good. This wine runs light on oak and feels juicy and correct. Flavors of apple, pear and vanilla turn more briny and salty on the finish, which circles back with sweetness as it fades away.

title: Budeguer 2013 Cuatro Mil Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Toasty aromas fold in baked apple notes. Sharp, sizzling and high in ...
description: Toasty aromas fold in baked apple notes. Sharp, sizzling and high in acid, the palate is citric and tough to navigate. Flavors of orange, lemon and sour apple are no shock given the palate.

title: One Hope 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: Rich fruit and cream flavors and a smooth, almost sweet impression in ...
description: Rich fruit and cream flavors and a smooth, almost sweet impression in the mouth add up to a palate-pleasing taste. This smells like lime, honeydew and cream, feels rounded on the palate, tastes like poached pears and has a soft finish.

title: La Chablisienne 2013 Dame Nature  (Petit Chablis)
excerpt: Made from organically grown grapes, this wine has great purity, with a ...
description: Made from organically grown grapes, this wine has great purity, with a line of lemon and sliced apple fruitiness. It is very fresh, just given another fuller character with a hint of honey. Drink now.

title: McFadden 2014 Blue Quail Chardonnay (Potter Valley)
excerpt: This has attractive peach and floral aromas and flavors, medium to full ...
description: This has attractive peach and floral aromas and flavors, medium to full body, and a soft texture that is bolstered slightly by appley acidity.

title: Salvatore Principe 2014 Family Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Simple apple and apricot aromas prevail on the nose. This feels lean, ...
description: Simple apple and apricot aromas prevail on the nose. This feels lean, shallow and hollow, while flavors of peach pit and melon are somewhat bitter and finish abruptly.

title: Haywood 2013 Los Chamizal Chardonnay (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Butter and petroleum mix on the nose before an extreme splash of ...
description: Butter and petroleum mix on the nose before an extreme splash of tartness overwhelms the tongue. Pineapple and peach vie for attention amidst a fuller-styled body and abbreviated finish.

title: Sojourn 2013 Durell Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Sizzling lemon and Asian pear-tinged acidity give this wine an electricity on ...
description: Sizzling lemon and Asian pear-tinged acidity give this wine an electricity on the palate that finds its companion in the richer overtones of racy cardamom and nutmeg. The 40% new French oak imparts structure and spice rather than an overt influence, letting the complex stone minerality and depth of fruit linger on the finish.

title: Sojourn 2013 Campbell Ranch Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: From a high-elevation site near the outpost of Annapolis, close to the ...
description: From a high-elevation site near the outpost of Annapolis, close to the Mendocino border, this is a briny, salty and soft wine, complex and bristling in acidity, yet possessed of subtle power and finesse. Enjoy now or over time, cellaring through 2018.

title: Saxon Brown 2012 Sangiacomo Vineyard Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Concentrated, silky smooth and subtly complex, this is almost like a dessert ...
description: Concentrated, silky smooth and subtly complex, this is almost like a dessert wine, yet technically dry. Aromas of pear tart and toasted walnut grab the attention, followed by deep, layered flavors reminiscent of lemon, cream and frangipane. The texture is seductively smooth and the finish lasts for at least 30 seconds. This wine provides a great example of posh indulgence.

title: Saxon Brown 2012 Hyde Vineyard Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Subtle fruit and baking spice aromas lead to expansive peach, pear and ...
description: Subtle fruit and baking spice aromas lead to expansive peach, pear and fig flavors riding on a wave of fresh, crisp acidity that keeps this lively through the finish, even though the texture is quite lush and creamy. The wine is almost a meal in itself, but will make a grand pairing with rich seafood dishes or even a cheese course. Delicious now through at least 2018.

title: Concannon 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: This gorgeous, bold, almost thick-textured wine also brings finesse and a lingering ...
description: This gorgeous, bold, almost thick-textured wine also brings finesse and a lingering finish. The aroma is smoky, toasty and earthy, then the desirably decadent flavors and creamy texture hit the mark, immediately filling the mouth with ripe pear, fig, toasted almond and grilled baguette impressions.

title: Gundlach Bundschu 2013 Estate Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Asian pear and Meyer lemon curd form a viscous, sensual core of ...
description: Asian pear and Meyer lemon curd form a viscous, sensual core of balanced richness and acidity in this lovely wine, from a set of vineyard blocks planted partly to 40-plus-year-old heritage vines. A stony quality permeates throughout the fruit, combining for a sense of refreshing complexity.

title: Tenor 2013 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas of barrel spices, nougat and pear lead to a full-bodied palate, ...
description: Aromas of barrel spices, nougat and pear lead to a full-bodied palate, with tart, lemony acidity drawing out the flavors.

title: Villa Oneiro 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: Grown in a vineyard atop the Palos Verdes peninsula on the Los ...
description: Grown in a vineyard atop the Palos Verdes peninsula on the Los Angeles coastline, this wine offers intriguing and focused aromas of lemon pith, hard apple candies and lime drizzled on white peach. The high-acid palate shows lots more fresh and bright lime elements, with a touch of honey rounding it out. The finishing zing goes on and on.

title: Sojourn 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: From a selection of vineyard-designated sites, including Durell, Campbell Ranch and several ...
description: From a selection of vineyard-designated sites, including Durell, Campbell Ranch and several Sangiacomo sites, this well-crafted blend is buzzing in minerality, a wet-stone character that overlays a depth of silky richness. Approachable now and yet structured for aging, its medium-level weight is awash in ripe apple and pear, finishing lean.

title: Woodward Canyon 2013 Estate Chardonnay (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: This wine comes from some of the oldest vines in the valley, ...
description: This wine comes from some of the oldest vines in the valley, planted in 1977. Aromas of pear, hay and hazelnut lead to stone-fruit and butterscotch flavors that are light and elegant in style with a very pretty sense of balance.

title: Abeja 2013 Chardonnay (Washington)
excerpt: A blend of top sites Celilo and Conner Lee, this appealing wine ...
description: A blend of top sites Celilo and Conner Lee, this appealing wine displays aromas of candy corn, corn silk and chamomile. The stone-fruit flavors are elegantly styled, showing a sense of restraint and balance that carries through the lingering finish.

title: Archival 2013 Farina Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Mountain)
excerpt: Voluptuously exotic in Asian pear and honeyed hazelnut on the nose, this ...
description: Voluptuously exotic in Asian pear and honeyed hazelnut on the nose, this savory and ultimately lean wine is balanced and elegant, with a richness of texture and juicy mouthfeel on the midpalate and finish. Made in small quantities, it has a lovely label and is well worth looking out for.

title: Sea Monster 2013 Los Alamos Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: This stylishly labeled wine by Adam Lazarre and Christian Tietje shows salted ...
description: This stylishly labeled wine by Adam Lazarre and Christian Tietje shows salted apples, lime blossoms and white flowers on the nose. The energetic palate offers just-cut green pears at first, then opens into a touch of vanilla. It tightens back down on green apple peels before ending with vanilla cream. The wine delivers a full experience.

title: Alleromb 2012 La Reyna Blanca Vineyard Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Pleasing aromas of toast, nut oil and citrus are followed by textured, ...
description: Pleasing aromas of toast, nut oil and citrus are followed by textured, well-balanced stone-fruit flavors and a long, drawn-out finish. This is a thoroughly delicious, nuanced wine that keeps you coming back for more.

title: Dalton 2013 D Series Chardonnay (Galilee)
excerpt: Medium straw-colored in the glass, this wine offers aromas of orange blossom, ...
description: Medium straw-colored in the glass, this wine offers aromas of orange blossom, white tea and seawater. There is a nice balance of smooth fruit and brightness, with flavors of ripe peach and pear that will cause a bit of a pucker on the side palate right into the lingering peach finish.

title: Les Voleurs 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: White flowers and wild anise give this a crisp, tangy quality, the ...
description: White flowers and wild anise give this a crisp, tangy quality, the fruit balanced and refined, showing up as Asian pear and Meyer lemon. The voluptuous finish adds depth without overbearing power.

title: Waterbrook 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The aromas of toast, pear, pineapple and spice are nuanced and reserved. ...
description: The aromas of toast, pear, pineapple and spice are nuanced and reserved. Flavors are light, focused and textured, displaying both varietal and winemaker intent.

title: Lamoreaux Landing 2013 Unoaked Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Pretty white floral and peach notes perfume this fresh, fruity unoaked Chardonnay. ...
description: Pretty white floral and peach notes perfume this fresh, fruity unoaked Chardonnay. While lush and rounded on the palate, it balances bright honeydew and yellow cherry flavors against a backdrop of crisp acidity.

title: Tranche 2012 Celilo Vineyard Chardonnay (Columbia Gorge (WA))
excerpt: Mesmerizing aromas of toast, roasted pumpkin and spice are followed by medium-bodied, ...
description: Mesmerizing aromas of toast, roasted pumpkin and spice are followed by medium-bodied, lightly spritzy feeling flavors and a citrus-filled finish. This drinks young now and will benefit from some additional time in the cellar.

title: Parducci 2013 Small Lot Blend Chardonnay (Mendocino County)
excerpt: This nicely balanced wine was made partly in barrels and partly in ...
description: This nicely balanced wine was made partly in barrels and partly in stainless steel. It smells like vanilla, cream and chamomile, and tastes as crisp and juicy as fresh-cut apples. Layers of flavor unfold with each successive sip, resembling nutmeg, pear and fig. The texture stays smooth and rich but with lively acidity underneath.

title: Saviah 2013 Stillwater Creek Vineyard Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Lees aromas mix with notes of custard, poached pear, cinnamon and well-integrated ...
description: Lees aromas mix with notes of custard, poached pear, cinnamon and well-integrated barrel accents. The palate shows a sense of finesse and grace that carries through the finish.

title: Foundry Vineyards 2013 Chardonnay (Columbia Gorge (WA))
excerpt: Aromas of mineral, burnt toast, talc and spice are lighter in style. ...
description: Aromas of mineral, burnt toast, talc and spice are lighter in style. Flavors show elegance and delicacy, with citrus notes lingering on the finish.

title: Dave Koz 2012 Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
excerpt: The smooth jazz saxophonist produces a dynamic wine with the help of ...
description: The smooth jazz saxophonist produces a dynamic wine with the help of the Terravant facility in Buellton. Aromas suggest kumquat peel, just-cut pineapple, nectarine, brie cheese rind and steel. The palate entertains with lots of chalky grip, lime zest and pink grapefruit pith flavors.

title: Recanati 2013 Chardonnay (Galilee)
excerpt: Aromas of apricot and cantaloupe pave the way for flavors of apricot, ...
description: Aromas of apricot and cantaloupe pave the way for flavors of apricot, apple and smoked meat with a touch of river rocks. This wine feels a little stiff at first sip, but as it opens up to a pleasing combination of fruit and savory flavors that lead to a soft guava finish.

title: Chateau St. Jean 2013 Sonoma Estates Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: A caramelized apple nose gives way to toasty oak and spicy lemon. ...
description: A caramelized apple nose gives way to toasty oak and spicy lemon. This wine is balanced yet made in a style highlighting ripeness and richness. A touch of fresh peach leads the generous finish.

title: Frank Family 2013 Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Tropical in personality, with a leanness of pineapple and guava, this wine ...
description: Tropical in personality, with a leanness of pineapple and guava, this wine holds a concentration of oak-influenced flavor and texture at its heart. It ends generously sultry in sweet Tahitian vanilla.

title: Baileyana 2013 Firepeak Chardonnay (Edna Valley)
excerpt: Very tight and shy aromas of lime zest, gray slate and white ...
description: Very tight and shy aromas of lime zest, gray slate and white rocks show on the nose of this wine from the pioneering Niven Family and their winemaker Christian Roguenant. The palate shows some grassiness, Mexican lime and an interesting warmth on the back end, proving quite lean and sharp.

title: Kunde 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: This is a well-crafted, well-distributed wine, from sustainably farmed and estate-grown grapes. ...
description: This is a well-crafted, well-distributed wine, from sustainably farmed and estate-grown grapes. It offers a scent of jasmine and anise around flavors of Meyer lemon and grapefruit. Well rounded and medium bodied, it stays lively and refreshing in the glass.

title: Goutorbe-Bouillot NV Brut Blanc de Blancs Chardonnay (Champagne)
excerpt: This pure Chardonnay has a tight, nervy mineral texture that gives great ...
description: This pure Chardonnay has a tight, nervy mineral texture that gives great freshness as well as a crisp apple skin and lemon zest character. It is fruity, full of lively acidity that goes with the perfumed, refreshing aftertaste.

title: Columbia Winery 2013 Limited Release Chardonnay (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Barrel fermented and aged in French oak (16% new), this wine has ...
description: Barrel fermented and aged in French oak (16% new), this wine has a creamy, textured feel that plays well with its aromas of melted butter, pear and spice. Pair it with seafood risotto.

title: Pezzi King 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Sizzling in high-toned citrus and a helping of freshly squeezed pineapple, this ...
description: Sizzling in high-toned citrus and a helping of freshly squeezed pineapple, this wine combines delicate floral aromas and refreshment with a more weighty complexity of caramelized oak, finding a sense of leanness on the finish.

title: Mazzocco 2013 Chardonnay (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Honeysuckle and Good & Plenty combine on the entry of this fruity, ...
description: Honeysuckle and Good & Plenty combine on the entry of this fruity, floral wine, full-bodied and intriguing on the palate in ripe apple and vanilla. A funkiness on the finish gives it an earthy ending.

title: The Forager 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: From a variety of coastal vineyard locations, this wine, an inaugural offering ...
description: From a variety of coastal vineyard locations, this wine, an inaugural offering from the producer, opens in zesty lemon and tangerine, before developing into a fuller-bodied, unctuous experience on the palate. It offers tamped-down acidity and briny back note on the finish.

title: Columbia Crest 2013 Grand Estates Unoaked Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Freshness and elegance are at the fore on this appealing wine, with ...
description: Freshness and elegance are at the fore on this appealing wine, with aromas and spritzy flavors of pear, spice, stone fruit and melted butter. Pair it with broiled fish.

title: Guardian Cellars 2013 Entrapment Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Hailing from Conner Lee Vineyard, this barrel-fermented wine was aged in two-thirds ...
description: Hailing from Conner Lee Vineyard, this barrel-fermented wine was aged in two-thirds new French oak. It has aromas of toast, char, nut oil and lemon. The flavors seem faint by comparison, with the concentration not all there.

title: Sonoma-Cutrer 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Toasted oak and vanilla are noticeably present on the palate and nose ...
description: Toasted oak and vanilla are noticeably present on the palate and nose of this wine, which evolves in the glass to take on a more tropical feel and tastes of ripe pineapple and guava. Medium to light in texture, it finishes smoothly and flat.

title: The Federalist 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Golden in color, this wine has a light presence on the palate, ...
description: Golden in color, this wine has a light presence on the palate, offering both floral and herbal highlights of jasmine and cinnamon. A faint squeeze of citrus is perceptible throughout, before the wine finishes in a flash.

title: Gravel Bar 2013 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The aromas of pear, chrysanthemum and star fruit are followed by lighter-styled ...
description: The aromas of pear, chrysanthemum and star fruit are followed by lighter-styled flavors that display a sense of elegance.

title: Cima Collina 2013 Tondre Grapefield Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: A unique blend of fermenting orange, aging white flowers, dried apples and ...
description: A unique blend of fermenting orange, aging white flowers, dried apples and a musky sandalwood show on the nose of this wine. The palate is simultaneously rich, sour and creamy, with tangerine and banana flavors.

title: JCB 2012 N 76 Chardonnay (Marin County)
excerpt: This shows a bright yellow-gold color and light lemon and butter aromas. ...
description: This shows a bright yellow-gold color and light lemon and butter aromas. Pronounced butter, lemon and almond flavors almost overwhelm the lean texture. Tart in taste and light in texture, it refreshes the mouth.

title: Gen5 2013 Chardonnay (Lodi)
excerpt: Softly sweet, this brings bright Fuji apple and Anjou pear aromas and ...
description: Softly sweet, this brings bright Fuji apple and Anjou pear aromas and flavors. It charms with fresh fruit character and stays away from the dry balance of more serious wines.

title: Lockwood 2013 San Lucas Unoaked Pure Chardonnay (San Lucas)
excerpt: Slightly sour elements of lemon and lime meet with a riper nectarine ...
description: Slightly sour elements of lemon and lime meet with a riper nectarine tone on the nose of this wine. There is good citrus-driven acidity on the palate with limeade flavors, though it trends a bit sour and wipes up with not much finish.

title: Leese-Fitch 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: This shows fresh, crisp apple and lemon-cream aromas, with clean appley flavors ...
description: This shows fresh, crisp apple and lemon-cream aromas, with clean appley flavors and buttery accents. Medium bodied, it tends toward the soft, rather than crisp, side. Lively fruit flavors make it refreshing.

title: Acre Twenty-one 2013 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: It would seem like other varieties must be in the mix on ...
description: It would seem like other varieties must be in the mix on this perfumed wine with its notes of apricot, grapefruit and flowers. The flavors are lighter in style with a fresh feel.

title: Two Vines 2013 Chardonnay (Washington)
excerpt: A straightforward wine, this has aromas of light spices and stone fruit. ...
description: A straightforward wine, this has aromas of light spices and stone fruit. The flavors are lighter in style with the concentration a bit wanting but it still provides easy drinking pleasure.

title: Stephen Vincent 2012 Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Baked pear and ripe tropical guava and papaya muddle their way between ...
description: Baked pear and ripe tropical guava and papaya muddle their way between high-toned aspects of lemon and sheer acidity, which veers into sour territory on the finish. The dueling personalities give this wine a sense of imbalance.

title: 401K 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: An extremely rich texture, like pear juice, and sweet flavors of ripe ...
description: An extremely rich texture, like pear juice, and sweet flavors of ripe pear, peach and pineapple give this wine a big personality. It has no apparent crispness to balance it out and keep it lively. All that sweetness and richness suggest a good pairing with salty cheeses.

title: Brittan Vineyards 2013 Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: A thrilling wine, this impresses instantly with its detail and definition. Vividly ...
description: A thrilling wine, this impresses instantly with its detail and definition. Vividly fruity with a mix of melon, apple and stone fruits, this tangy, toasty effort has nuanced notes of herb and mineral as well. Drink now through 2030.

title: Irvine Family Vineyards 2013 Chardonnay (Oregon)
excerpt: This wine explodes with a glorious mix of buttered nuts, toast, ripe ...
description: This wine explodes with a glorious mix of buttered nuts, toast, ripe yellow fruits and supporting acidity. The exceptional length proposes at least a decade of development ahead. Drink now through 2025.

title: Durant 2013 Raven Chardonnay (Dundee Hills)
excerpt: Peach pit, apple and pear fruit flavors combine in this crisp, somewhat ...
description: Peach pit, apple and pear fruit flavors combine in this crisp, somewhat steely wine that has a classic elegance. Depth, length and finishing minerality make this a wine worth extra attention.

title: Riverbench 2012 Cork Jumper Blanc de Blancs Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
excerpt: Very light in color, this bubbly shows ripe apples, caramelized pears, nectarine ...
description: Very light in color, this bubbly shows ripe apples, caramelized pears, nectarine flesh, yellow cake and the slightest hint of roasted nuts, marzipan and yeast on the dynamic nose. Nuttiness and yeastiness also touch the tightly wound and tart palate, flavored further with seared pineapple, apricot and apple flesh elements.

title: Rex Hill 2012 Roserock Vineyard Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Flint and flower aromatics introduce this wine, which follows with delicate (for ...
description: Flint and flower aromatics introduce this wine, which follows with delicate (for the vintage) flavors of apple and mineral. It was aged 12 months in a concrete egg, and finished in stainless steel.

title: Monte Ferro 2013 Dion Vineyard Unoaked Chardonnay (Chehalem Mountains)
excerpt: This all-stainless Chardonnay does not sacrifice flavor complexity, with a mix of ...
description: This all-stainless Chardonnay does not sacrifice flavor complexity, with a mix of apple, pear and peach fruit flavors that is seamless and fresh. The wine finishes as clean and crisp as it begins. Drink up during the next couple of years.

title: Knudsen 2013 Chardonnay (Dundee Hills)
excerpt: Young and tight, this new release from a founding Oregon viticulture family ...
description: Young and tight, this new release from a founding Oregon viticulture family already shows good balance in a smooth, buttery, somewhat oaky style. The fruit flavors coat the tongue and roll into the seductive barrel notes. Let this bottle age until early 2016 and it will really shine.

title: Krupp Brothers 2013 Stagecoach Vineyard Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Dark gold in color, this is a viscous, ripe and creamy white, ...
description: Dark gold in color, this is a viscous, ripe and creamy white, layered in minerality and fresh-cut stone fruit. From a mighty mountainous vineyard, it offers bold, full-bodied flavor and texture, a testament to its site, and finishes big in juicy Golden Delicious apple and pear.

title: ZD 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: Balanced, with a lovely floral bouquet, this offers a richness of tropical ...
description: Balanced, with a lovely floral bouquet, this offers a richness of tropical fruit on the front palate, founded upon soft and subtle vanilla, tropical mango and oak. The medium-bodied style of the wine remains in check with cooler-climate aspects of wet stone and classic minerality, finishing crisp and lingering in ginger snap.

title: Joyce 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: Hot, salty popcorn, pan-fried apples and melting butter show the oak but ...
description: Hot, salty popcorn, pan-fried apples and melting butter show the oak but in a judicious manner. Flavors of lemon are layered over poached apples, all presented with a mouth-enlivening acidity, and culminating with a touch of vanilla bean on the finish.

title: Blakeslee 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Chehalem Mountains)
excerpt: Rich and fruity, this reserve adds layers of spice and citrus to ...
description: Rich and fruity, this reserve adds layers of spice and citrus to the peachy core of the regular bottling. Details of rind put a frame on the fruit, while a lightly toasty finish brings a lingering note of banana along for the ride.

title: Blakeslee 2013 Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Truth be told, both the regular and reserve Chardonnays from Blakeslee are ...
description: Truth be told, both the regular and reserve Chardonnays from Blakeslee are very close in quality, cost and flavor. This selection is loaded with thick fruit flavors of peach and apple, along with barrel notes of buttered popcorn and coconut.

title: Sokol Blosser 2013 Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: This light, elegant, precisely crafted wine is a blend of both stainless ...
description: This light, elegant, precisely crafted wine is a blend of both stainless and barrel-aged juice. Note the low alcohol, and yet how much texture and detail the wine displays. Green berry, apple and pear flavors are highlighted with cinnamon and brioche. This is the style of elegant Chardonnay that Oregon does so well.

title: Drytown 2014 Estate Chardonnay (Sierra Foothills)
excerpt: Although this medium-bodied wine does not show much in the way of ...
description: Although this medium-bodied wine does not show much in the way of aromas, its subtle flavors and expanding mouthfeel are special. This style does not emphasize oak character, so it lets the rather neutral flavors of the grape stay on stage. It will make a good pairing with flavorful seafood.

title: Gnarly Head 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: This offers that tempting aroma of toasted baguette with a dab of ...
description: This offers that tempting aroma of toasted baguette with a dab of butter, then the flavors flow fresh and peachy, while the texture feels smooth and the body not too full. Well balanced between flavors, acidity and body, it brings refreshment to sip after another.

title: Occasio 2013 Del Arroyo Vineyard Chardonnay (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: This has a light yellow color with a touch of green and ...
description: This has a light yellow color with a touch of green and a subtle smell of crisp green apples. Flavors that are richer than expected, like poached pears, butter and fig. The texture is rich, the body full and the ripe flavors linger on the finish.

title: Aubichon Cellars 2013 Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: This is full bodied and forward, bringing a generous mouthful of apple, ...
description: This is full bodied and forward, bringing a generous mouthful of apple, pear and pineapple fruit along with a streak of vanilla wafer. The flavors hit quickly and right up front, then suspend themselves through a lingering finish.

title: Conn Creek 2013 Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Minerally on the start, this white progresses into oaky vanilla and brioche ...
description: Minerally on the start, this white progresses into oaky vanilla and brioche notes with a heightened viscosity midway through, before re-finding its vibrancy at the end. In between expect a full-bodied, fruity expression of the variety highlighted by plenty of ripe apple and apricot.

title: Feliz Noche 2012 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: Sea salt and buttered popcorn hit the nose first on this wine ...
description: Sea salt and buttered popcorn hit the nose first on this wine by Felipe Hernandez, who rose through his storied career from a field hand to winemaker. Next comes a leaner sense of chalk and Key lime rind. The palate shows buttered apple richness alongside lime and lemon acidity throughout the sip, with a touch of baking soda and more salt on the finish.

title: Hoopla 2013 Chardonnay (Yountville)
excerpt: With fresh green-apple aromas, and juicy apple and citrus flavors, this is ...
description: With fresh green-apple aromas, and juicy apple and citrus flavors, this is a lively, crisp and well-balanced wine. Instead of going for overt oaky, buttery flavors and a fat mouthfeel, it stays nicely lean and refreshing, even with relatively full body.

title: St. Francis 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
excerpt: A tremendous value, this white is light and floral, soft in honeyed ...
description: A tremendous value, this white is light and floral, soft in honeyed stone fruit and pineapple. A nice minerality buoys the proceedings, a medium-body taking on new strength midway through before letting the wine finish crisp and clean.

title: Wrights Station 2012 Reserve Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: Bruised apricot, lemonade and citrus rind-laden marzipan notes hit the nose on ...
description: Bruised apricot, lemonade and citrus rind-laden marzipan notes hit the nose on this wine, which is showing just a touch of nutty, honeyed oxidization. The macadamia nut element arises on the palate too, alongside intriguingly peaty flavors reminiscent of Scotch, with almond liqueur on the outro. It presents decent acidity throughout.

title: Anam Cara 2013 Nicholas Estate Chardonnay (Chehalem Mountains)
excerpt: This unoaked, Dijon-clone wine is lively and lush, with tongue-coating fruit. Melon, ...
description: This unoaked, Dijon-clone wine is lively and lush, with tongue-coating fruit. Melon, banana and papaya flavors steer it in a tropical direction, with a lick of mineral and phenolic bite giving further support.

title: Matchbook 2013 Old Head Chardonnay (Dunnigan Hills)
excerpt: With a vivid golden color, bold and buttery aromas, and rich, almost ...
description: With a vivid golden color, bold and buttery aromas, and rich, almost nutty flavors, this is a full-bore rendering. It is full bodied and brings out the most flavorful aspects of the grape. The texture is rich and almost thick, and the buttery nuances linger on the finish.

title: La Crema 2013 Chardonnay (Eola-Amity Hills)
excerpt: This well-known California brand is gently dipping its toe into Oregon. This ...
description: This well-known California brand is gently dipping its toe into Oregon. This is a sturdy, well-crafted effort with an interesting mix of kiwi, lime and pear fruit, wrapped in biscuity barrel flavors. Seamlessly smooth, it offers enough acidity to keep everything balanced.

title: Belle Ambiance 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: This has pleasant oak aromas suggesting buttered toast, and fairly rich, ripe ...
description: This has pleasant oak aromas suggesting buttered toast, and fairly rich, ripe fruit flavors that resemble peach, pear and a touch of fig. The texture is smooth, almost creamy, the body is medium and the flavors stay fresh through the finish.

title: Concannon 2013 Chardonnay (Monterey County)
excerpt: This historic winery delivers a very tropical wine, with aromas of kiwi, ...
description: This historic winery delivers a very tropical wine, with aromas of kiwi, tuberose and even caramelized banana. It tightens up on the palate, still showing guava and pineapple tropicality, with a bit of citrus to even everything out.

title: Fetzer 2013 Sundial Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: As tasty as a pear tart, this combines mild pear, vanilla and ...
description: As tasty as a pear tart, this combines mild pear, vanilla and almond flavors on a smooth texture. Medium bodied, balanced slightly to the soft side, and quite fruity, it will make a satisfying glass at cocktail time or with dinner.

title: Fire and Oak 2012 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: Roasted apples, toasted peanuts and just a touch of buttercream combine for ...
description: Roasted apples, toasted peanuts and just a touch of buttercream combine for an inviting nose on this wine from the Terravant facility in Buellton. Oak is quite noticeable on the palate, where flavors of buttered toast, white peach jam, orange marmalade and marzipan shine.

title: Hawley 2013 Hoot Owl Creek Vineyard Chardonnay (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Intensely concentrated, this wine offers minerally petrol and hazelnut, particularly on the ...
description: Intensely concentrated, this wine offers minerally petrol and hazelnut, particularly on the nose. A salinity marks it on the medium-bodied palate, giving it an intriguing edge before finishing in a squeeze of lemon.

title: Hearst Ranch 2013 Glacier Ridge Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: Ripe aromas of apple flesh and apple blossoms trend toward guava on ...
description: Ripe aromas of apple flesh and apple blossoms trend toward guava on the nose of this wine from the legendary California family. There is a chalk-driven energy on the palate, though ripe fruits are prominent, with more apples and guava as well as steamed peaches.

title: Prime 2013 Chardonnay (Coombsville)
excerpt: Slightly sour and funky in earth, this is a restrained white aged ...
description: Slightly sour and funky in earth, this is a restrained white aged in a majority of stainless steel, in addition to smaller percentages of oak and acacia. Crisp and minerally, marked by stone fruit as well as citrus, it finishes rich in caramel and vanilla.

title: La Merika 2013 Chardonnay (Central Coast)
excerpt: Very light in the glass, this offers lime juice, lemon peel and ...
description: Very light in the glass, this offers lime juice, lemon peel and tuberose on the nose. There is decent acidity and minerality on the palate, with apples, white flowers and melon.

title: Estancia 2013 Chardonnay (Monterey County)
excerpt: Aromas of struck match, seared lemon, roasted apples and a touch of ...
description: Aromas of struck match, seared lemon, roasted apples and a touch of butterscotch prove clean and not overpowering. This is a very straight-ahead Chardonnay, with lemon fruit, chalk and noticeable oak influence.

title: Irony 2013 Small Lot Reserve Chardonnay (Monterey County)
excerpt: Very light in color, this wine has a pungent nose that features ...
description: Very light in color, this wine has a pungent nose that features white flowers, cold steel and lime juice. The palate is bright with racy acidity, showing lots of honeysuckle, some ripe green apples and hints of honeydew and kiwi.

title: Aviary 2012 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A jasmine bouquet introduces layers of bright lemon and lime in this ...
description: A jasmine bouquet introduces layers of bright lemon and lime in this sharply etched white, low in oak but high in acidity. Straightforward and medium bodied, it has a pronounced tartness on the finish.

title: Airlie 2012 Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Barrel fermented and pushed right on through secondary malolactic fermentation, this estate-grown ...
description: Barrel fermented and pushed right on through secondary malolactic fermentation, this estate-grown and bottled effort mixes light, green apple and celery stalk flavors with a touch of barrel toast.

title: Concha y Toro 2013 Amelia Limited Release Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Popcorn, mustard, pickle brine and a heavy blast of oak create a ...
description: Popcorn, mustard, pickle brine and a heavy blast of oak create a barrel-driven bouquet. This is acidic and juicy on the palate, but also resiny. Flavors of briny citrus, nectarine and raw oak finish long and woody, with a cidery aftertaste.

title: Spindrift Cellars 2013 OSU Woodhall III Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Light and pleasant, this offers some punchy phenolics but rather limpid fruit. ...
description: Light and pleasant, this offers some punchy phenolics but rather limpid fruit. It spent eight months in one-third new French oak.

title: Eberle 2013 Eberle Estate Vineyard Chardonnay (Paso Robles)
excerpt: The nose on this wine from regional pioneer Gary Eberle is reserved ...
description: The nose on this wine from regional pioneer Gary Eberle is reserved at first, then releases seared lemon, tightly wound stone fruit, soft butter and caramel nibs. There is a pleasant weight on the medium-density palate, with sour-leaning flavors of Granny Smith apple peels, lime rinds and some riper honeydew melon.

title: Matetic 2013 Corralillo Chardonnay (San Antonio)
excerpt: Apple, melon, saline and buttered popcorn aromas set up a lively palate ...
description: Apple, melon, saline and buttered popcorn aromas set up a lively palate with snappy acidity. Apple and melon flavors turn a bit stalky and bitter on the finish.

title: Bota Box 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: This is fresh, fruity and medium bodied. Aromas recall mild peach and ...
description: This is fresh, fruity and medium bodied. Aromas recall mild peach and pineapple, and flavors convey ripe apple with a dash of vanilla, plus a smooth texture. The wine is appealing and shows no rough edges.

title: Peltier Station 2013 Hybrid Chardonnay (Lodi)
excerpt: With aromas like butter and custard, and flavors that suggest ripe apple ...
description: With aromas like butter and custard, and flavors that suggest ripe apple and crisp lemon, this is both refreshing and multifaceted. It feels light bodied and has a bit of a sweet-tart balance going for it.

title: Insatiable 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: This bright, light wine shows floral aromas, lightly herbal flavors, crisp acidity ...
description: This bright, light wine shows floral aromas, lightly herbal flavors, crisp acidity and a lively mouthfeel. It will make a good, refreshing pour at lunch or before dinner.

title: Matetic 2013 EQ Chardonnay (San Antonio)
excerpt: Aromas of corn and melon are decent but hardly the stuff of ...
description: Aromas of corn and melon are decent but hardly the stuff of legend. This feels full and round, with flavors of melon and peach, with a candied honey finish.

title: Santa Carolina 2014 Reserva Chardonnay (Leyda Valley)
excerpt: Aromas of bath soap and apple come in front of a creamy, ...
description: Aromas of bath soap and apple come in front of a creamy, round, oily palate. Honeydew, date and vanilla flavors make for a ripe set of flavors, while toast and caramel notes come up on the finish.

title: Fossil Point 2012 Chardonnay (Edna Valley)
excerpt: Drunken peach, green apple, gray slate and rounded butter notes hit the ...
description: Drunken peach, green apple, gray slate and rounded butter notes hit the nose. There is a baking soda minerality on the palate, some sea salt and a tongue-tingling acidity.

title: Scratchpad 2013 Chardonnay (Central Coast)
excerpt: Offering one of the more creative gimmicks yet, this bottle comes with ...
description: Offering one of the more creative gimmicks yet, this bottle comes with a small pencil to decorate the mostly blank front label. The wine inside conveys aromas of lemon rinds, light peach and salt that give way to flavors of pineapple, apple blossom, yellow pears, sea salt and appropriate tanginess.

title: Pennywise 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: Rather lean in flavors, it shows a bit of herbal, savory aromas ...
description: Rather lean in flavors, it shows a bit of herbal, savory aromas and tastes slightly earthy and vegetal like fennel or celery. But those aspects are subtle enough that it still makes a good sturdy white wine that is neither too rich nor too soft.

title: Windrun 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: Vanilla salt-water taffy and melted butter are undercut with lime juice on ...
description: Vanilla salt-water taffy and melted butter are undercut with lime juice on the nose of this wine. Once sipped, it has a slightly waxy mouthfeel along with flavors of dried apples and underripe lime rinds, giving a slightly sour character.

title: Casas del Bosque 2013 Reserva Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Briny, sea foam aromas sit on top of papaya and corn on ...
description: Briny, sea foam aromas sit on top of papaya and corn on this oaky, resiny Chardonnay. Woody flavors are up front and immediate, with secondary flavors of clove and peach that end with sawdust.

title: Mill Creek 2013 Unoaked Chardonnay (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Entirely stainless-steel fermented, this wine offers lemon and lime in abundance, along ...
description: Entirely stainless-steel fermented, this wine offers lemon and lime in abundance, along with kiwi and sour apple. A tad disjointed, it tastes big and fuller bodied even without the oak.

title: Jarvis 2013 Estate Grown Cave Fermented Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Crisp apple and lemon are lurking within creamy wallops of oak, making ...
description: Crisp apple and lemon are lurking within creamy wallops of oak, making this a pleasant-enough wine. The ripeness and butter make for curious companions given the bitterly tart, sour finish.

title: Casas del Bosque 2013 Gran Reserva Estate Bottled Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Sweaty, briny aromas are borderline offputting. This is plump on the palate, ...
description: Sweaty, briny aromas are borderline offputting. This is plump on the palate, with flavors of pickled citrus fruits. The same can be said for the finish, which is also bitter, resiny and overoaked.

title: Edna Valley Vineyard 2013 Paragon Chardonnay (Central Coast)
excerpt: Lemon-lime soda and limestone aromas emerge on the nose, which is slightly ...
description: Lemon-lime soda and limestone aromas emerge on the nose, which is slightly sweet in ripeness but also a bit shy. The palate shows apples and pears, but is quite flat.

title: Santa Alba 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Maule Valley)
excerpt: Bland peach and melon aromas come in front of a flabby, creamy ...
description: Bland peach and melon aromas come in front of a flabby, creamy palate. Basic melon and papaya flavors are limited, with a slight bitterness lingering on a soft, fleshy finish.

title: Buffalo Grove 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: Quite floral smelling and fruity tasting, this is not your usual Chardonnay. ...
description: Quite floral smelling and fruity tasting, this is not your usual Chardonnay. It smells like rose petals, tastes like Anjou pears and has a soft mouthfeel and medium body.

title: Cambridge California 2013 Cold Creek Vineyard Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Thick and sour, this wine has a waxy fruit component to it ...
description: Thick and sour, this wine has a waxy fruit component to it that is off-putting and out of sync with the crisp fruit that is trying to compete on the palate.

title: Cambridge California 2013 Limited Chardonnay (Monterey)
excerpt: Green pears, hints of cut grass and a lemongrass element make for ...
description: Green pears, hints of cut grass and a lemongrass element make for a bright nose on this wine. Apple cider flavors are cut by a steely minerality on the palate.

title: Santa Alba 2012 Grand Reserve Chardonnay (Maule Valley)
excerpt: The aromas are driven by freshly cut wood tones, while the palate ...
description: The aromas are driven by freshly cut wood tones, while the palate is full, creamy and oaky. Raw wood and resin flavors are like licking a plank, and the only flavors in this wine besides oak are lanolin and cinnamon.

title: Acumen 2011 Chardonnay (Central Coast)
excerpt: Salted apples and white rocks are marred by metallic aromas. Rounded flavors ...
description: Salted apples and white rocks are marred by metallic aromas. Rounded flavors of ripe lemon curds are also hit with metallic flavors throughout.

title: Ramey 2012 Ritchie Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This wine is deliciously elegant yet decadently rich in all the right ...
description: This wine is deliciously elegant yet decadently rich in all the right ways, from a prime, longtime vineyard source planted to vines over 40 years old. Honeyed apple comes to the fore amid lush, formidable layers of complexity and high-minded pursuit, never getting bogged down, the minerality perfectly pitched and the oak fully integrated.

title: Ramey 2012 Hyde Vineyard Chardonnay (Carneros-Napa Valley)
excerpt: This longstanding collaboration between vintner and grower reflects years of mutual understanding ...
description: This longstanding collaboration between vintner and grower reflects years of mutual understanding and respect. The wine offers pretty orange blossom and lemon verbena aromas that wrap around a composed, well-integrated and mineral-laden body. Voluptuous, the wine is also well-balanced, finishing in bright acidity. It is deliciously good.

title: Clendenen 2009 Le Bon Climat Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
excerpt: Suave aromas of browned butter, preserved lemons and seared nectarine surround alkalinity ...
description: Suave aromas of browned butter, preserved lemons and seared nectarine surround alkalinity on this purely-for-the-love side project of Jim Clendenen. The edges of the palate are lush and rich with vanilla cream, roasted nuts and butter, but the center holds laser-tight to singed lemon acidity before a finish that shows some marshmallow and nutmeg spice. The wine seems to be peaking now.

title: Failla 2013 Hudson Vineyard Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Well-integrated minerality and a combination of exotic fig and guava make this ...
description: Well-integrated minerality and a combination of exotic fig and guava make this an inviting wine, supported by floral wafts of orange blossom. Finely made from a stellar vineyard site in Carneros, it has creamy lemon and tangerine layered throughout, finished by a spicy, herbal accent.

title: Joseph Drouhin 2012 Marquis de Laguiche Premier Cru Morgeot  (Chassagne-Montrachet)
excerpt: The Marquis de Laguiche vineyards, with a great stock of premier and ...
description: The Marquis de Laguiche vineyards, with a great stock of premier and grand crus, have long been managed by Drouhin. This wood-aged, generous and opulent wine is already smooth and rich. Yellow fruits have a tight, tense texture to go with their open character. The wine is just beginning to develop its intense complexity. Drink from 2019.

title: Domaine Vrignaud 2013 Les Vaupulans Fourchaume Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: The fruit here is pure, fresh with the merest hints of its ...
description: The fruit here is pure, fresh with the merest hints of its future richness. The green fruits, citrus and acidity are prominent, with a hint of toast and a finishing line of minerality. It needs to age, so drink from 2017.

title: Failla 2013 Estate Vineyard Chardonnay (Fort Ross-Seaview)
excerpt: Caramelized apple and honey remain subtle enough to keep this wine balanced ...
description: Caramelized apple and honey remain subtle enough to keep this wine balanced and restrained, a graceful representation of the true Sonoma Coast. From an estate vineyard, the wine shines in acidity with a mineral touch, offering a medium body with layers of crisp texture and a lingering, ripe pear-like finish.

title: Reuling Vineyard 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Farmhouse just-churned butter is most prominent on the nose, opening up a ...
description: Farmhouse just-churned butter is most prominent on the nose, opening up a world that then flowers into layers of ripe, rich apple and pear. Balanced and textured, the wine reflects its near-ideal vintage, marked by a pronouncement of structure and power. Finishing with a zing, it will stand up to time in the cellar, through 2020.

title: Ramey 2012 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Decadent aromas of golden pear and Tahitian vanilla rise to the top ...
description: Decadent aromas of golden pear and Tahitian vanilla rise to the top of this incredibly well-crafted wine, a blend of multiple vineyard sources, most of them single-vineyard designated in other wines. Steely minerality buoys the overall experience, with a touch of vanilla custard. The wine is rich on the aroma yet balanced in taste, with a finishing accent of orange blossom.

title: Dutton-Goldfield 2013 Dutton Ranch Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This golden wine confounds in a mix of wet stone and caramel ...
description: This golden wine confounds in a mix of wet stone and caramel on the nose, the body creamy in vanilla. Fuller in style and body than some, it remains balanced in acidity and tangy citrus, maintaining a freshness and brightness throughout. The finish is intense with more of that citrus, plus an accent of ginger and lemongrass.

title: Loring Wine Company 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: The nose on this well-priced appellation blend by Brian Loring has it ...
description: The nose on this well-priced appellation blend by Brian Loring has it all: golden honey, caramel apple, supple peach flesh, pressed white flowers, fresh yellow flowers and even quinine. The apple-flesh flavors show oak influence in hints of butterscotch and pineapple, yet the mouthwatering acidity keeps it all in balance.

title: Failla 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: In this crisp, tangy white from a cool-climate home, tangerine and pineapple ...
description: In this crisp, tangy white from a cool-climate home, tangerine and pineapple play off each other around a fluffy backbone and structured minerality. More of that tang comes to the fore on the finish, this being a bang-for-your-buck kind of wine that will delight at the dinner table or in the kitchen while cooking.

title: CedarCreek 2012 Block 5 Platinum Chardonnay (Okanagan Valley)
excerpt: Fragrant, with a floral lift in the nose, this is loaded with ...
description: Fragrant, with a floral lift in the nose, this is loaded with rich fruit flavors of pineapple, peach and citrus. A whiff of toast and just-sawn wood leads into a lengthy, beautifully balanced, tongue-coating finish.

title: Domaine Vrignaud 2012 Fourchaume Premier Cru Vieilles Vignes  (Chablis)
excerpt: From vines planted in 1955, this is a ripe, fruit-packed and mineral-driven ...
description: From vines planted in 1955, this is a ripe, fruit-packed and mineral-driven wine. It has succulent green fruits, laced with lemon zest and firmly textured. It needs to age for several years to reveal its full potential. Drink from 2018.

title: Williams Selyem 2013 Olivet Lane Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Textured vanilla-cream and green apple appear initially in this wine, which offers ...
description: Textured vanilla-cream and green apple appear initially in this wine, which offers plenty of weight and structure around a core of balanced acidity and fresh lemon zest. Cardamom and vanilla play at the edges alongside elements of savory brine and white flowers. The oak presence is subtle.

title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2012 Cold Creek Vineyard Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This wine displays all of the intensity of expression of Cold Creek. ...
description: This wine displays all of the intensity of expression of Cold Creek. Aromas of toasty spices and pear are light but lead to a full, rich-feeling palate, with the acids providing a perfect counterbalance.

title: Blair 2013 Roger Rose Vineyard Chardonnay (Arroyo Seco)
excerpt: The nose on this single-vineyard wine from a strong, often overlooked appellation ...
description: The nose on this single-vineyard wine from a strong, often overlooked appellation is tight and minerally before showing a slightly tropical kiwi element. Brightly acidic on the lively palate, flavors range from Key lime and Meyer lemon to pear skins and apple flesh.

title: Tamber Bey 2012 Deux Chevaux Vineyard Chardonnay (Yountville)
excerpt: Lemon and grapefruit rind provide a brightness to the nose and palate ...
description: Lemon and grapefruit rind provide a brightness to the nose and palate here, along a creamier outpouring of butterscotch and savory dried stone fruit. A lacing of minerality is pronounced throughout, with the finish complete in sharp edges complemented by a sense of soft brioche.

title: Roche de Bellene 2012 Vieilles Vignes  (Meursault)
excerpt: This is a rich, generous and rounded wine. The opulent feel is ...
description: This is a rich, generous and rounded wine. The opulent feel is balanced by a strongly mineral texture. Old vines give concentration while also allowing for great freshness. It needs to age further. Drink from 2017.

title: Jean-Marc Brocard 2012 Vaulorent Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: Vaulorent is often grouped with others as Fourchaume Premier Cru. Here Brocard ...
description: Vaulorent is often grouped with others as Fourchaume Premier Cru. Here Brocard has bottled it separately to bring out its ripe fruits and warm character. The wine is toasty, smooth although not losing its more mineral texture. It offers a delicious, rounded vanilla aftertaste.

title: Domaine Vrignaud 2013 Fourchaume Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: This is a beautiful, bright wine, still very young although already hinting ...
description: This is a beautiful, bright wine, still very young although already hinting at the warmth of Fourchaume. The steely texture is right up front, along with crisp apple and citrus fruits. Underneath, a vanilla, toasty character shows promise for aging. Drink from 2017.

title: Canoe Ridge 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: With fruit from The Benches (71%) and Canoe Ridge vineyards, this wine ...
description: With fruit from The Benches (71%) and Canoe Ridge vineyards, this wine offers aromas of toast, pineapple, peach and pear, with barrel notes (100% American) providing accents. Flavors are creamy in feel with a finish that lingers.

title: Failla 2013 Haynes Vineyard Chardonnay (Coombsville)
excerpt: Floral, this crisp white starts out in quiet contemplation, offering an abundance ...
description: Floral, this crisp white starts out in quiet contemplation, offering an abundance of fresh-squeezed citrus and minerality. It remains light and complex on the palate, teeter-tottering between fruit and acidity, with a solid backbone of structure and girth on the finish.

title: Friedeman 2013 UV Lancel Creek Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This white has a bit more meat on its bones than its ...
description: This white has a bit more meat on its bones than its non-vineyard designated companion, the grapes from a Ulises Valdez-farmed site, always a good sign. Structured and substantial, it shows oak and even a whiff of petroleum darting in between the crisper elements of apple and stone fruit, the finish entirely steely.

title: Patz & Hall 2012 Zio Tony Ranch Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Zesty, full-bodied and expansive on the palate, this is a wine that ...
description: Zesty, full-bodied and expansive on the palate, this is a wine that comes around in time, in the glass and in the bottle or decanter. Briny and dancing a fine line between brawn and beauty, it paints a picture of classic green and yellow apple and subtle vanilla spice, with a tropical flirtation happening in the background. Structured, it should cellar well, through 2020.

title: Sonoma-Loeb 2013 Envoy Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: From a ripe and picture-perfect growing season, this wine has luscious and ...
description: From a ripe and picture-perfect growing season, this wine has luscious and concentrated waves of fig, melon and vanilla, rounded out by an inviting, floral edge of orange blossom. Oaky toast and nutmeg highlight the midpalate, before the wine finishes in a sea of minerality.

title: Chateau St. Jean 2012 Robert Young Vineyard Chardonnay (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Creamy in brioche and lemon, this full-bodied wine from a hallmark vineyard ...
description: Creamy in brioche and lemon, this full-bodied wine from a hallmark vineyard offers a floral nose of jasmine on the opening, alongside ripe peach and apricot. Complex and surreptitiously vibrant, it finishes with more of that creaminess and a taste of vanilla oak.

title: Donkey & Goat 2013 Untended Chardonnay (Anderson Valley)
excerpt: An impression of this light-bodied wine starts with a vivid golden-yellow color ...
description: An impression of this light-bodied wine starts with a vivid golden-yellow color and enticing aromas of fresh bread dough and marzipan. The taste itself is more lean than the aromas, showing crisp lemon and apricot notes, noticeable acidity and a tart finish. It has a taut, dry character that is not typical in California, but the wine is fascinating and keeps improving for a day or two after opening.

title: Chateau St. Jean 2013 Belle Terre Vineyard Chardonnay (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: A vineyard-designate for the producer since 1975, the fruit shows well in ...
description: A vineyard-designate for the producer since 1975, the fruit shows well in this wine, an exotic tribute to tropical elements and stone fruit like peach, supported by a medium-weighted amount of vanilla oak. The ripeness of the fruit is complemented by endnotes of minerality and herbs.

title: William Hill Estate 2013 Chardonnay (North Coast)
excerpt: A bowl full of complex aromas and flavors are bundled together in ...
description: A bowl full of complex aromas and flavors are bundled together in this full-bodied, lush-textured wine. The aroma resembles wet earth for a moment, then transitions to buttery, bakery spices. Ripe and honeyed pear flavors come out on the palate and the mouthfeel is nicely viscous.

title: Forgeron 2013 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Blended from eight different vineyards across the Columbia Valley, this wine displays ...
description: Blended from eight different vineyards across the Columbia Valley, this wine displays aromatic nuances of toast and spice along with pear and peach. The restrained, medium-bodied flavors offer a mixture of citrus and stone fruit, with citrus winning out on the warm finish.

title: Sanford 2012 Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: Pears, white rocks, gray slate and lime juice show on the nose ...
description: Pears, white rocks, gray slate and lime juice show on the nose of this appellation blend from the iconic Santa Rosa Road winery. Similar flavors also show on the palate, primarily a grippy chalk, more lime and a Meyer lemon pith element, with the faintest hint of struck match in the background.

title: Bonterra 2013 Made with Organic Grapes Chardonnay (Mendocino County)
excerpt: Aromas and flavors of fresh, crisp, green apples and golden cherries seem ...
description: Aromas and flavors of fresh, crisp, green apples and golden cherries seem to light up this medium-bodied and well-balanced wine. It has firm acidity, a refreshing texture, and just enough heft in the body to serve with appetizers and cheese, but will also stand up to rich seafood preparations.

title: Brooklyn Winery 2013 Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Delicate whiffs of toast, butterscotch and smoke meander from nose to palate ...
description: Delicate whiffs of toast, butterscotch and smoke meander from nose to palate in this remarkably focused, elegant wine. Lime and pear flavors are vivacious and bright, meandering long on the finish.

title: Ashan 2013 Celilo Vineyard Chardonnay (Columbia Gorge (WA))
excerpt: All aged in single-use French oak, this offers pleasing nuances of corn ...
description: All aged in single-use French oak, this offers pleasing nuances of corn on the cob, spice, mineral and chamomile. The prickly pear flavors are both elegantly styled and well balanced.

title: Marchesi de' Frescobaldi 2012 Benefizio Riserva Chardonnay (Pomino)
excerpt: This barrique-aged Chardonnay opens with delicate aromas of beeswax, acacia flower and ...
description: This barrique-aged Chardonnay opens with delicate aromas of beeswax, acacia flower and toast. The refined palate offers toasted oak, citrus, vanilla and mature Golden Delicious apple alongside bright acidity.

title: Rock View 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Mendocino)
excerpt: This is made in a rich style, so the aroma is handsomely ...
description: This is made in a rich style, so the aroma is handsomely oaky, like buttered toast, the flavors are as rich as pear syrup and vanilla bean, the texture and body are full and the finish lingers. Fans of unoaked Chardonnay need not apply.

title: Victor Vineyards 2012 Lawson Ranch Chardonnay (Lodi)
excerpt: Slightly nutty aromas and flavors add a different twist to this full-bodied ...
description: Slightly nutty aromas and flavors add a different twist to this full-bodied Chardonnay. There is a whiff of toasted walnut in the aroma, followed by bold, ripe fruit flavors and vibrant acidity. It conveys appealing personality and good texture/structure.

title: Apex 2013 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This appealing wine offers aromas of apricot, pineapple and vanilla. The flavors ...
description: This appealing wine offers aromas of apricot, pineapple and vanilla. The flavors are lighter in style with vanilla, caramel and straw notes that linger, showing a pleasing mixture of fruit and barrel.

title: Domaine Feuillat-Juillot 2013 Les Jardins Premier Cru  (Montagny)
excerpt: This rich, deliciously fruity wine combines structure and ripe layers of yellow ...
description: This rich, deliciously fruity wine combines structure and ripe layers of yellow fruits. Full in the mouth, it has a textured, spicy edge over the juicy acidity and fruitiness. It is ready to drink, but with its tight texture is likely to age well, so better to wait until 2017.

title: Sutcliffe 2013 Signature Castillo Vineyard Chardonnay (Colorado)
excerpt: This is a lifted and elegant vineyard-designate Chardonnay, hailing from the southwest ...
description: This is a lifted and elegant vineyard-designate Chardonnay, hailing from the southwest corner of the state. A bouquet of underripe peach, green apple and citrus curd carries the nose. Seven months in French oak gives ample weight to the palate, yet tart tropical fruits shine through, giving way to a slightly creamy, but not lazy, finish.

title: Linden 2012 Hardscrabble Chardonnay (Virginia)
excerpt: Refined and delicate on the nose, this offers aromas of white flowers ...
description: Refined and delicate on the nose, this offers aromas of white flowers and wet stone. Medium-bodied, with a silky palate, it presents flavors of tart pineapple, lemon rind and struck flint. A playfully textured lemon-custard note adds length to the finish. Drink through 2018.

title: Ashan 2013 Kestrel Vineyard Chardonnay (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Barrel fermented and aged in 60% new French oak, this wine shows ...
description: Barrel fermented and aged in 60% new French oak, this wine shows a pleasing mixture of fruit and barrel, intermingling aromas of toast, stone and tropical fruit, spice and butter. Flavors are light and elegant, but show a pleasing sense of balance.

title: Browne Family Vineyards 2013 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Hailing from Sagemoor, Oasis and Canyon Vineyard Ranch, this wine has aromas ...
description: Hailing from Sagemoor, Oasis and Canyon Vineyard Ranch, this wine has aromas of toasty spices, peach, butter and corn on the cob. The flavors are lighter in style with a creamy feel and a pleasing sense of balance.

title: Cold Water Creek 2013 Chardonnay (North Coast)
excerpt: This smells and tastes rich and abundant, yet it is not overtly ...
description: This smells and tastes rich and abundant, yet it is not overtly fruity or full bodied. The nuances are more like fig and toasted almond with a subtle buttery note. A slight brassy effect in the golden color seems to agree with the mature, complex flavor components.

title: Friedeman 2013 Dichotomy Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This is a rocking price for the quality of the wine, a ...
description: This is a rocking price for the quality of the wine, a small-production crafting of well-grown grapes in a great year. Light on the oak imprint, it shines instead in sweet and sour stone fruit, most vibrantly apricot, with a soft and layered silkiness to the texture.

title: Paul Mathew 2013 Weeks Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
