excerpt: Made from a cool, steep site near the tiny town of Occidental, ...
description: Made from a cool, steep site near the tiny town of Occidental, this white is lemony crisp and quite austere. A food-friendly wine suggestive of star fruit and just-ripe pineapple, it finishes somewhat spicy.

title: J Vineyards & Winery 2013 Estate Grown Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Full-bodied ripeness and creamy oak combine for a forceful white wine, rich ...
description: Full-bodied ripeness and creamy oak combine for a forceful white wine, rich and textured, made from a selection of two vineyard sites, including Bow Tie, a vineyard-designate. Toasty spice adds complexity before the wine finishes in caramel.

title: Sutcliffe 2012 Signature Castillo Vineyard Chardonnay (Colorado)
excerpt: The nose is rich with aromas of butterscotch and vanilla, with a ...
description: The nose is rich with aromas of butterscotch and vanilla, with a vein of melon and lemon adding levity. Rich and weighty, the palate follows suit, yet clean citrus brings brightness that shines through the finish.

title: Michael Shaps 2013 Wild Meadow Vineyard Chardonnay (Virginia)
excerpt: Roasted hazelnut with grilled pineapple and peach carry the aromas and palate ...
description: Roasted hazelnut with grilled pineapple and peach carry the aromas and palate of this vineyard-designate Chardonnay. Having spent 11 months in French oak (33% new), the wine shows barrel tones, however a bright acidity helps keep things alive and fresh.

title: Shannon Ridge 2013 Single Vineyard Collection Chardonnay (Red Hills Lake County)
excerpt: This has a bright, light-gold color, substantial aromas and flavors of oak ...
description: This has a bright, light-gold color, substantial aromas and flavors of oak and baking spices. The texture is smooth, with a sense of softness in the balance, and the wine leans toward richness rather than crispness. Impressions like hazelnut, vanilla, sweet pear and nutmeg provide a mouthful of flavor.

title: Oliver 2013 Chardonnay (America)
excerpt: Ripe peach and melon notes are forward and attractive on the nose. ...
description: Ripe peach and melon notes are forward and attractive on the nose. The round and balanced palate carries similar flavors, with nectarine and citrus cream adding verve and weight.

title: Swiftwater Cellars 2013 Zephyr Ridge Chardonnay (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: Aromas of melted caramel, barrel spices, kiwi and pineapple rise up from ...
description: Aromas of melted caramel, barrel spices, kiwi and pineapple rise up from this wine. The fruit flavors are lighter in style and lead to a warm finish with abundant fig notes that linger.

title: Cline 2013 Estate Grown Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Pretty notes of orange blossom and lime complement the subtle pineapple found ...
description: Pretty notes of orange blossom and lime complement the subtle pineapple found in this smooth, lush and conservatively creamy white, an outrageous value for the quality, a stock-up-now kind of wine. Balanced, it offers just a tiny suggestion of oak and vanilla on the finish.

title: JM Cellars 2013 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This blend of Stillwater Creek and Conner Lee vineyards conveys aromas of ...
description: This blend of Stillwater Creek and Conner Lee vineyards conveys aromas of pear, yellow apple, pineapple and butter. The concentration is light yet creamy with a warm finish.

title: DaMa 2013 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: A blend of revered Sagemoor and Conner Lee vineyards, this barrel-fermented wine ...
description: A blend of revered Sagemoor and Conner Lee vineyards, this barrel-fermented wine has aromas of caramel, poached pear, lees and peach. The stone fruit flavors are light yet creamy in feel, trailing toward the finish.

title: Jean-Marc Brocard 2013 Domaine Sainte-Claire  (Chablis)
excerpt: Crisp and light, this is tangy, chalky textured and with bright acidity. ...
description: Crisp and light, this is tangy, chalky textured and with bright acidity. Citrus and green plum flavors proliferate in this attractive, ready-to-drink wine.

title: Joseph Drouhin 2012 Domaine Drouhin-Vaudon  (Chablis)
excerpt: This is a fresh while also rich wine. Yellow fruits are laced ...
description: This is a fresh while also rich wine. Yellow fruits are laced with appealing acidity and a crisp lemon zest texture. Lively, fruity and mineral, it is ready to drink.

title: Michel-Schlumberger 2013 La Brume Chardonnay (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Lemony and high-strung, this is a light, bright and low-in-oak wine from ...
description: Lemony and high-strung, this is a light, bright and low-in-oak wine from an appellation better known for varieties like Zinfandel and Sauvignon Blanc. It works though, providing a tension of acidity with citrusy concentration.

title: Vignerons de Buxy 2012 Les Chaniots Premier Cru  (Montagny)
excerpt: An attractive touch of toast emerges on this ripe, full-bodied wine. It ...
description: An attractive touch of toast emerges on this ripe, full-bodied wine. It has spice, apple and apricot flavors along with an edge of minerality. Drink now, although it will be better from 2016.

title: Graham Beck 2013 The Game Reserve Chardonnay (Robertson)
excerpt: This is quite toasty and woody upfront, with rich sweet spice, grilled ...
description: This is quite toasty and woody upfront, with rich sweet spice, grilled peach and lemon custard aromas that lead the bouquet. The oaky tones continue through on the medium-weight palate, but with ample acidic lift to keep it from feeling overdone. Notes of peach pit and clove-spiked orange fuel the finish.

title: :Nota Bene 2013 Conner Lee Vineyard Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Starting quite reductive, this wine opens to reveal aromas of straw, toast, ...
description: Starting quite reductive, this wine opens to reveal aromas of straw, toast, cream and spice. The flavors are lighter in style yet creamy in feel with lees notes running throughout.

title: Peju 2013 Persephone Vineyard Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Buttery cream is on the nose of this vineyard-designate, a relatively affordable ...
description: Buttery cream is on the nose of this vineyard-designate, a relatively affordable offering from an esteemed producer in the heart of the Napa Valley. Oaky on the palate, the medium-weighted wine is nicely offset by a searingly crisp bite of lemon that peaks on the finish.

title: Martin Ranch 2013 J.D. Hurley Griva Vineyard Chardonnay (Arroyo Seco)
excerpt: The nose on this wine mixes up apricots, peaches and lime granita ...
description: The nose on this wine mixes up apricots, peaches and lime granita with a charred dill element. The palate shows almonds, Meyer lemon and freshly-cut nectarine, altogether refreshing if not wildly memorable.

title: Pollak 2012 Reserve Chardonnay (Monticello)
excerpt: Peach and steely lemon aromas carry to a citrus-diven palate offering a ...
description: Peach and steely lemon aromas carry to a citrus-diven palate offering a slight impression of oak. Medium bodied, this Chardonnay shows a nice balance of fruit and oak tones, leading to a toasty finish.

title: Matrix 2012 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Rich and ripe, this intense wine is verging into tropical land with ...
description: Rich and ripe, this intense wine is verging into tropical land with pineapple and mango, plus an overreaching expression of oak and vanilla. It offers medium- to full-bodied weight and a big finish.

title: The Boneyard 2014 Chardonnay (Virginia)
excerpt: Bosc pear and tangy peach are brought to life with a squirt ...
description: Bosc pear and tangy peach are brought to life with a squirt of lemon juice. Enjoy this unoaked Chardonnay with citrus-marinated grilled chicken.

title: Excelsior 2014 Chardonnay (Robertson)
excerpt: This is a bright and lively selection, with inviting aromas and flavors ...
description: This is a bright and lively selection, with inviting aromas and flavors of Anjou pear, green apple and orange that finish fresh and clean. Drink now.

title: Coyote Creek 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: This opens with a lightly fruity aroma that carries a hint of ...
description: This opens with a lightly fruity aroma that carries a hint of fresh bread, butter and vanilla. These lead to fresh, straightforward fruit flavors like canteloupe and apple, again with a bit of vanilla kicking in on the finish. The texture is smooth, rather lush and the wine is light to medium bodied.

title: Frei Brothers 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Waxy apple and pear give this juicy wine a satisfying aroma and ...
description: Waxy apple and pear give this juicy wine a satisfying aroma and flavor profile, the fruit just ripe and unfettered by oak. The finish is direct and awash in vanilla. This is a decent value for the quality.

title: Stinson 2013 Chardonnay (Monticello)
excerpt: The nose of this Chardonnay shows delicate aromas of citrus and white ...
description: The nose of this Chardonnay shows delicate aromas of citrus and white blossoms. Green apple flavors streaked by a lively lemon verve drives the medium-bodied palate, with a caramel kiss on the finish.

title: Sutcliffe 2012 Chardonnay (Colorado)
excerpt: Underripe melon meets butterscotch on the nose. The round palate shows banana-lemon ...
description: Underripe melon meets butterscotch on the nose. The round palate shows banana-lemon yogurt with streaks of caramel, leading to a toasted vanilla finish.

title: Pollak 2012 Estate Grown Chardonnay (Monticello)
excerpt: Lemon- and pineapple-rind aromas lead to a green apple-driven palate. Medium-bodied yet ...
description: Lemon- and pineapple-rind aromas lead to a green apple-driven palate. Medium-bodied yet crisp, this would pair well with citrus-marinated chicken kabobs.

title: Canoe Ridge 2013 The Expedition Chardonnay (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: Simple and straightforward, this provides aromas of pear, pineapple and spice. The ...
description: Simple and straightforward, this provides aromas of pear, pineapple and spice. The flavors are lightly sweet and unctuous in feel with a clipped finish.

title: Domaine Philippe Goulley 2012  Petit Chablis
excerpt: From organically grown fruit, this is a soft, lemon- and pear-flavored wine. ...
description: From organically grown fruit, this is a soft, lemon- and pear-flavored wine. It has plenty of fresh acidity as well as a warm, full-in-the-mouth character. The aftertaste brings out touches of vanilla as well as the acidity.

title: Camelot NV Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: Buttery aromas, ripe fruit flavors, a soft, plush texture and a seemingly ...
description: Buttery aromas, ripe fruit flavors, a soft, plush texture and a seemingly sweet finish characterize this medium-bodied wine. It tastes like golden delicious apples, lemon cream and vanilla.

title: Kamiak 2014 Unoaked Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This straightforward wine has notes of fresh apple and pear. The flavors ...
description: This straightforward wine has notes of fresh apple and pear. The flavors are light in style, seeming a bit dilute.

title: Luke Donald 2012 Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: This medium-bodied white features balanced oak that manages to play off flavors ...
description: This medium-bodied white features balanced oak that manages to play off flavors of baked apple and butterscotch with compelling swathes of saltiness. This wine will work well with seafood as a result, and make for a decent match with midweek meals.

title: Monticello Vineyards 2013 Estate Grown Chardonnay (Oak Knoll District)
excerpt: Exotic guava and pineapple form a profile of tartness that evolves into ...
description: Exotic guava and pineapple form a profile of tartness that evolves into intriguing layers of dried herb and lemongrass in this white from a slightly cooler section of the Napa Valley. Medium in body and length, it is tight in minerality.

title: Sutcliffe 2013 Chardonnay (Colorado)
excerpt: Citrus zest and toast aromas carry through to a palate of underripe ...
description: Citrus zest and toast aromas carry through to a palate of underripe melon and lemon custard. This is appealing and enjoyable, although it lacks weight and structure.

title: Beaucanon 2012 Ehlers Lane Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This juicy middleweight is well-integrated in terms of oak and ripeness. Salty ...
description: This juicy middleweight is well-integrated in terms of oak and ripeness. Salty lime and pear interplay on the palate, finishing crisp and clean.

title: Dry Mill 2012 Barrel Chardonnay (Virginia)
excerpt: Lemon rind and pressed apple on the nose carry through to a ...
description: Lemon rind and pressed apple on the nose carry through to a citron and melon palate. Medium bodied, this is a straightforward, easy-drinking Chardonnay.

title: Three Thieves 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: Floral and butter-candy aromas and flavors make this not exactly sweet but ...
description: Floral and butter-candy aromas and flavors make this not exactly sweet but rather light, soft and airy. A dreamy confection, it feels light to medium bodied and smooth in texture.

title: Baron Cooper 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: With aromas like Bartlett pears and butter cookies, and rich flavors that ...
description: With aromas like Bartlett pears and butter cookies, and rich flavors that almost turn sweet, this is a full-bodied, soft-textured confection. The crispness factor is rather low to support that richness fully.

title: Domaine Michel-Andreotti 2013 Premier Cru  (Montagny)
excerpt: This wine is so light, it is almost insubstantial. Hints of white ...
description: This wine is so light, it is almost insubstantial. Hints of white fruit float across the surface, backed up by acidity and a gentle, fresh character. It is ready to drink.

title: Ingleside 2013 Chardonnay (Virginia)
excerpt: Citrus-driven on the nose, this stainless Chard brings green apple and tangy ...
description: Citrus-driven on the nose, this stainless Chard brings green apple and tangy peach to the palate. A cheese-rind character lingers on the finish.

title: Louis Jadot 2013  Chablis
excerpt: This is a basic Chablis, soft and fruity. Apples and pear skin ...
description: This is a basic Chablis, soft and fruity. Apples and pear skin flavors have a burst of acidity, a light mineral texture and a juicy aftertaste. It is ready to drink.

title: Vignerons de Buxy 2013 Buissonier  (Montagny)
excerpt: Soft and fruity, this is a gentle, creamy wine. Almond and quince ...
description: Soft and fruity, this is a gentle, creamy wine. Almond and quince flavors are spread generously over the ripe texture. Drink now.

title: Chateau Morrisette 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Virginia)
excerpt: A veritable fruit bomb of a Chardonnay, this shows candied aromas of ...
description: A veritable fruit bomb of a Chardonnay, this shows candied aromas of Juicy Fruit gum and artificial banana on the nose and palate. Sharp acids lead to a lightly lactic finish.

title: Tarara 2013 Chardonnay (Monticello)
excerpt: Pressed apples meld with coconut on the nose. The medium-bodied palate brings ...
description: Pressed apples meld with coconut on the nose. The medium-bodied palate brings notes of banana, melon and an oddly floral note.

title: Shenandoah Vineyards 2014 Chardonnay (Shenandoah Valley)
excerpt: This is a lithe, unoaked Chardonnay, citrus-driven in nature, with a slightly ...
description: This is a lithe, unoaked Chardonnay, citrus-driven in nature, with a slightly savory, almost broth-like finish. Drink now.

title: Washington Hills 2012 Chardonnay (Washington)
excerpt: This offers aromatic notes of toasted grapenuts, pineapple and apricot. It drinks ...
description: This offers aromatic notes of toasted grapenuts, pineapple and apricot. It drinks off dry, with a creamy feel to the light fruit flavors.

title: Diversion 2013 Chardonnay (Washington)
excerpt: Faint aromas of yellow apple and pear lead to lightly creamy but ...
description: Faint aromas of yellow apple and pear lead to lightly creamy but dilute stone and tropical fruit flavors.

title: Ingleside 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Virginia)
excerpt: Pressed apples meld with notes of hay and cheese rind on the ...
description: Pressed apples meld with notes of hay and cheese rind on the nose. The mellow palate brings similar elements, brightened by a squirt of citrus on the finish.

title: Ramey 2012 Platt Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Not many producers get fruit from this magical vineyard, sought after for ...
description: Not many producers get fruit from this magical vineyard, sought after for being cool, coastal and meticulously farmed. This wine speaks to all that, offering sublime Meyer lemon, pear and golden honey around a balanced soul and wild ginger-infused intensity.

title: Flowers 2012 Camp Meeting Ridge Estate Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: From an extreme, cool-climate estate vineyard, this Chardonnay is remarkably complex, golden ...
description: From an extreme, cool-climate estate vineyard, this Chardonnay is remarkably complex, golden in color and semi-rich in lemon chiffon and intense caramel. Yet it holds back ever so slightly on the lusciousness by offering crisp, tingling acidity. Orange blossom delights in terms of aroma and flavor, with an accent of fennel, too.

title: Jamie Slone Wines 2013 Aloysius Sierra Madre Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
excerpt: The former race car driver hired Doug Margerum to make his wine. ...
description: The former race car driver hired Doug Margerum to make his wine. Though quite pale in color, this offers fragrant aromas of sea salt, rounded nectarine fruit, wisps of white flowers and the slightest show of almond macarons. Stone fruit pops out on the salty palate, but the bright acidity and chalky minerality slice deeply, ending on a dollop of vanilla cream.

title: Foxen 2013 Tinaquaic Vineyard Estate Grown Dry Farmed Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
excerpt: This dry-farmed vineyard is often challenging for Winemaker Billy Wathen, but it ...
description: This dry-farmed vineyard is often challenging for Winemaker Billy Wathen, but it worked this vintage, showing bright and ripe aromas of apple blossom, pear, honey and sweet lemon, all underlined by white-rock minerality. The lively palate shows lime soda and chalk flavors, with a pear-skin bitterness and ample acidity, which keeps the mouth tingling deep into the finish.

title: Ramey 2012 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: From a quartet of cool, coastal vineyard sites, including Platt, a single-vineyard ...
description: From a quartet of cool, coastal vineyard sites, including Platt, a single-vineyard designate for the producer, this is a crisp expression of honeycomb and green apple that bristles in acidity and nuanced oak. Fresh and alive, it has plenty of celebratory fruit flavor while remaining savory and elegant.

title: Lujon 2013 Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: This fresh, enticing wine is crisp and well-structured, with lemon, grapefruit and ...
description: This fresh, enticing wine is crisp and well-structured, with lemon, grapefruit and tangerine rind and flesh. The expansive palate has resonant minerality and excellent length, with ripe apple and pear fruit, plus highlights of toasted cashews and butter brickle from limited exposure in wood and partial malolactic.

title: Amalie Robert 2011 Heirloom Cameo Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: The estate-grown, Dijon clone fruit is bursting with flavors of grapefruit, pineapple ...
description: The estate-grown, Dijon clone fruit is bursting with flavors of grapefruit, pineapple and Meyer lemon. Barrel fermentation rounds it out a bit and adds suggestions of nut oil to the finish. The relatively low alcohol keeps the acids up and suggests that this is one that could age well up to 2025.

title: Foxen 2013 Block UU Bien Nacido Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
excerpt: This wine, from a prime block of a famous vineyard, shows nectarine ...
description: This wine, from a prime block of a famous vineyard, shows nectarine flesh, lime and lemon peel, salted butter and green herbs on the nose. The palate is still wound a little tight, but reveals green pear, citrus pith, lime juice, cheese rind and a touch of sour grass. Hold until 2016.

title: Flowers 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Young and light, with a nutty coating around flavorful layers of pear ...
description: Young and light, with a nutty coating around flavorful layers of pear and yellow apple, this wine has a crispness that remains balanced throughout. A good food wine, with enough acidity to stay refreshing, this is a fine, fairly larger-production white built to impress.

title: Talbott 2012 Diamond T Vineyard Chardonnay (Monterey)
excerpt: From a vineyard planted in 1982 at 1,200 feet above the Carmel ...
description: From a vineyard planted in 1982 at 1,200 feet above the Carmel Valley, this wine offers a nose that is nothing short of fascinating. Oak smoke, yellow cake and cinnamon stick are followed by sharper, dill-like herbs, then the scents of the shoreline. The palate sprinkles toasted wood atop lemon peels and apple skins, proving sour, bitter and elegantly restrained yet flavorful.

title: Argyle 2012 Nuthouse Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: This strikes a resonant chord with notes of mineral-driven cool climate Chardonnay, ...
description: This strikes a resonant chord with notes of mineral-driven cool climate Chardonnay, matched to a well-oaked, toasty frame. Somehow it straddles the line, delivering forward, open fruit flavors of apple and pear, with generous streaks of buttery toast. Drink now through 2020.

title: Amalie Robert 2011 Her Silhouette Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: If your tastes run to fruit-driven, all-stainless, crisp and steely Chardonnays, this ...
description: If your tastes run to fruit-driven, all-stainless, crisp and steely Chardonnays, this is a great choice. Bright pineapple and citrus fruit flavors abound, and the acids, though substantial, are juicy and natural. The balance, freshness and overall value put this among best of class.

title: Vie di Romans 2012 Ciampagnis Chardonnay (Friuli Isonzo)
excerpt: Stone fruit, mature yellow apple, toasted oak and honey aromas come together ...
description: Stone fruit, mature yellow apple, toasted oak and honey aromas come together in the glass. The round palate offers juicy pineapple, baked peach, lemon pastry and a mineral note alongside fresh acidity. It closes on a note of toasted almond.

title: Giant Steps 2013 Tarraford Vineyard Chardonnay (Yarra Valley)
excerpt: This reasonably full-bodied Chardonnay manages to retain a sense of freshness and ...
description: This reasonably full-bodied Chardonnay manages to retain a sense of freshness and crispness throughout. Subtle oak and vanilla notes frame peach and pineapple fruit, while the finish is long and citrusy clean.

title: Lundeen 2012 Dennison Vineyard Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Barrel-fermented in neutral oak, this is a ripe, creamy wine with mix ...
description: Barrel-fermented in neutral oak, this is a ripe, creamy wine with mix of pineapple and buttered nuts. The secondary fermentation was stopped at 50%, leaving generous acidity and balancing out the intensity of the fruit. This wine punches above its price weight, and will drink well now through 2020.

title: Amalie Robert 2012 Her Silhouette Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: An interesting comparison to the previous vintage, this wine has a point ...
description: An interesting comparison to the previous vintage, this wine has a point and a half more alcohol, with a rich, substantial mouthfeel. Ripe citrus fruit, light tropical fruit and full, open flavors are found on the palate. Drink this while in its youth, and let the previous vintage age another couple of years.

title: Renteria 2013 Chardonnay (Los Carneros)
excerpt: This is a beautifully floral, high in acidity white made in small ...
description: This is a beautifully floral, high in acidity white made in small quantities that offers classically lean layers of wet stone and lemon. With a low imprint of oak, it remains structured on the palate and entirely pleasing from start to finish, its honeysuckle aromas singularly inviting.

title: Walnut City WineWorks 2012 Reserve Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Plenty of acid underscores rich flavors of pineapple, Meyer lemon and lemon ...
description: Plenty of acid underscores rich flavors of pineapple, Meyer lemon and lemon curd. The wine dives deeply into the palate and lingers, with crisp highlights of citrus rind and a long, smooth finish.

title: Demetria 2012 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: This is a successful straight-ahead Chardonnay, with aromas of buttercream, vanilla and ...
description: This is a successful straight-ahead Chardonnay, with aromas of buttercream, vanilla and orange cake developing complexity thanks to alkaline, pithy notes. For such a rich nose, it proves quite clean and crisp on the palate, with lemon-lime soda, wet slate and just a touch of buttered apples.

title: Foris 2013 Chardonnay (Rogue Valley)
excerpt: Fresh and fruit forward, this is a fine value in a most ...
description: Fresh and fruit forward, this is a fine value in a most enjoyable style. Bananas, pears, apples and more are in play, with a mouthfilling, generous midpalate.

title: Giant Steps 2013 Sexton Vineyard Chardonnay (Yarra Valley)
excerpt: Aromas of baking spices and pears lead the way, followed by flavors ...
description: Aromas of baking spices and pears lead the way, followed by flavors of pear and pineapple. This medium-bodied wine has a pleasantly toasty-grainy note as well, then finishes crisp and citrusy.

title: Keenan 2013 Chardonnay (Spring Mountain)
excerpt: Soft layers of faint lemon, fig and yellow apple stand out in ...
description: Soft layers of faint lemon, fig and yellow apple stand out in this pretty, straightforward and slightly tart white, the whole of the palate lingering in long-lasting minerality. A versatile food wine, it offers a lot of elegance.

title: Westerly 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: Though quite light in color, this is a very ripe-smelling wine, with ...
description: Though quite light in color, this is a very ripe-smelling wine, with aromas of honeysuckle, peach, pineapple and guava. It proves light on the sleek palate, with subtle tropicality emerging via tuberose flower flavors that are cut with a green apple skin bitterness.

title: Lis Neris 2012 Jurosa Chardonnay (Friuli Isonzo)
excerpt: Aromas of butter, toast, oak and dried citrus lead the nose. The ...
description: Aromas of butter, toast, oak and dried citrus lead the nose. The round, structured palate offers baked Golden Delicious apple, nectarine zest, vanilla and butterscotch. Enjoy soon before the fruit fades.

title: Summers 2013 Stuhlmuller Vineyards Reserve Chardonnay (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Floral, this medium-bodied white is creamy and touched by richer notions of ...
description: Floral, this medium-bodied white is creamy and touched by richer notions of pear, pineapple and vanilla, reflective of its warmer appellation in a warm year. French oak (40% of it new) aged the wine for under a year. With a touch of honeysuckle and nutmeg, the minerality is subtle.

title: Masut da Rive 2012 Maurus Chardonnay (Isonzo del Friuli)
excerpt: This medium-bodied wine has aromas of white flower, apple and toast. The ...
description: This medium-bodied wine has aromas of white flower, apple and toast. The palate offers dried apple, vanilla, lemon drop and oak-driven spice. Drink soon to capture the remaining fruit.

title: Stuhlmuller Vineyards 2013 Estate Chardonnay (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Spicy Asian pear dominates in this low-to-no-oak white, medium-bodied and jumping in ...
description: Spicy Asian pear dominates in this low-to-no-oak white, medium-bodied and jumping in savory thyme. Aromas of peaches also come into play, before this wine finishes crisp and clean.

title: Alta Alella 2014 Parvus Chardonnay (Alella)
excerpt: Melon and peach aromas are fresh and come with a touch of ...
description: Melon and peach aromas are fresh and come with a touch of vanilla. This is a well-made, solid Chardonnay with good body and fresh acidity. Flavors of apple, melon and spice finish with a touch of oaky cinnamon and a somewhat waxy texture.

title: Chalk Hill 2012 Clone 17 Chardonnay (Chalk Hill)
excerpt: This wine aims to call attention to the tendency of Clone 17 ...
description: This wine aims to call attention to the tendency of Clone 17 (also known as the Robert Young clone) to provide baked apple and ripe, almond flavors and aromas, which this bottling does, in spades. Caramel, oak and vanilla round out the rest of the experience, which is balanced, but big in ripeness and wood.

title: Kopriva 2013 Unoaked Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: This stellar unoaked version of the variety, nicely priced, opens with sweet ...
description: This stellar unoaked version of the variety, nicely priced, opens with sweet aromas of honeysuckle and jasmine. From there, bristling acidity leads down a road of stone fruit, apple and quince, with a savory twist of ginger on the finish.

title: Yeringberg 2013 Chardonnay (Yarra Valley)
excerpt: Made in a lighter, more delicate style than many of its brethren, ...
description: Made in a lighter, more delicate style than many of its brethren, this is nevertheless fresh and flavorful. Pear, melon and white peach notes are framed by hints of toasted brioche, which takes on a slightly mocha-like character on the finish.

title: Stag's Leap Wine Cellars 2013 Karia Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Tart apple and lemon provide a zesty brightness and elegance in this ...
description: Tart apple and lemon provide a zesty brightness and elegance in this straightforward wine, a celebration of minerality on the palate. Midway through, a taste of more developed stone fruit adds complexity and creaminess, with the wine finishing lean.

title: La Vis 2013 Ritratti Del Diaol Chardonnay (Trentino)
excerpt: Aromas recall yellow pear and tropical fruit together with a touch of ...
description: Aromas recall yellow pear and tropical fruit together with a touch of vanilla. The palate offers pineapple, citrus zest and Golden Delicious apple alongside bright acidity.

title: Otazu 2013 Chardonnay (Navarra)
excerpt: Concise and basic on the nose, with aromas of melon and minerals, ...
description: Concise and basic on the nose, with aromas of melon and minerals, this crisp, stony wine is pleasant and clean, with malic acidity. Lime, green apple and tangerine flavors finish dry and pithy, with cleansing acidity.

title: Masut da Rive 2013 Chardonnay (Isonzo del Friuli)
excerpt: This crisp white opens with a delicate floral fragrance of white spring ...
description: This crisp white opens with a delicate floral fragrance of white spring flower and touch of stone fruit. The refreshing palate offers crunchy yellow apple and tangy lemon zest balanced by bright acidity. It finishes clean and fresh.

title: Markham 2013 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Baked pear and honeysuckle combine around a floral, perfumy vibe, the wine ...
description: Baked pear and honeysuckle combine around a floral, perfumy vibe, the wine medium in weight, texture and body. A crisp and lemony finish rounds it out, the wine structured and soft.

title: Cinnabar 2013 Central Avenue Vineyard Chardonnay (Monterey)
excerpt: Freshly squeezed lime, tangelos and mandarin orange elements power the nose on ...
description: Freshly squeezed lime, tangelos and mandarin orange elements power the nose on this wine sourced from near Greenfield. The palate shows a wide array of citrus as well as nectarine flesh and a nearly sweet honeysuckle.

title: Balduzzi 2013 Late Harvest Chardonnay (Maule Valley)
excerpt: Orange peel is the most distinct aroma on an otherwise neutral nose. ...
description: Orange peel is the most distinct aroma on an otherwise neutral nose. Soft and simple on the palate, flavors of mango, sweet lime, burnt brown sugar and caramel lead to a chunky, sugary finish.

title: Lindemans 2013 Bin 65 Chardonnay (South Eastern Australia)
excerpt: Is Bin 65 back? Folks who remember what a screaming buy this ...
description: Is Bin 65 back? Folks who remember what a screaming buy this was in the early 1990s will be encouraged by this bottling, which features bright tropical-fruit flavors and a weighty texture.

title: Newton 2012 Unfiltered Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Ripe in honey, butterscotch and oak, this wine was 100% barrel-fermented and ...
description: Ripe in honey, butterscotch and oak, this wine was 100% barrel-fermented and it shows, an old-school tale of hedonistic richness and power over subtlety. It makes for a difficult food pairing, but aiming for something as treacly as the wine might be the best bet.

title: Indomita 2014 Duette Premium Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: An oaky bouquet is led by vanilla and sawdust aromas. This is ...
description: An oaky bouquet is led by vanilla and sawdust aromas. This is chunky and round on the palate, with woody flavors of green-leaning stone fruits. The finish is oaky and creamy in feel, with moderate flavors of peach and nectarine.

title: Lapostolle 2013 Casa Grand Selection Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Creamed corn, popcorn, banana and creamy peach are the key aromas on ...
description: Creamed corn, popcorn, banana and creamy peach are the key aromas on this fleshy Chardonnay. Creamy flavors of melon, banana and vanilla are basic, while the finish registers as simple and flat.

title: Oxford Landing 2013 Chardonnay (South Australia)
excerpt: This pleasant, medium-bodied white wine features hints of smoke and baking spices ...
description: This pleasant, medium-bodied white wine features hints of smoke and baking spices layered over refreshing citrusy fruit.

title: Yalumba 2013 Made With Organic Grapes Chardonnay (South Australia)
excerpt: This is fairly full-bodied given the recent trend in Australian Chardonnay, boasting ...
description: This is fairly full-bodied given the recent trend in Australian Chardonnay, boasting plenty of heft and a slightly oily texture. A hint of nuttiness frames tropical fruit flavors that finish on a tangy note.

title: Santa Rita 2014 120 Chardonnay (Central Valley)
excerpt: Apple, peach and melon aromas are basic, fruity and clean. This is ...
description: Apple, peach and melon aromas are basic, fruity and clean. This is plump and fruity on the palate, with enough acidity to maintain a sense of balance. Melon, peach and pear flavors finish fairly but a touch bitter.

title: Piera Martellozzo 2014 Terre Magre Chardonnay (Friuli Grave)
excerpt: Made in a crisp style, this presents subdued aromas of spring flower ...
description: Made in a crisp style, this presents subdued aromas of spring flower and orchard fruit. The simple palate offers notes of yellow apple and citrus alongside bright acidity.

title: Caves de la Loire 2014 Les Anges Chardonnay (Val de Loire)
excerpt: This wine is simple, fruity and crisp. It has a lightly honeyed ...
description: This wine is simple, fruity and crisp. It has a lightly honeyed character that gives some more richness. With yellow fruit flavors and fresh acidity, it is ready to drink.

title: Villa Montefiori 2013 Chardonnay (Valle de Guadalupe)
excerpt: Grassy, wheaty, oxidized aromas of melon and apple lead to a dilute ...
description: Grassy, wheaty, oxidized aromas of melon and apple lead to a dilute palate. A mix of oxidized, bitter, minerally flavors suggest white peach along with the pit, while the finish is much like fino Sherry.

title: Paul Hobbs 2012 Edward James Estate Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Creamy and intoxicating, this barrel-cradled Chardonnay is deeply complex, edgy and mineral-laden. ...
description: Creamy and intoxicating, this barrel-cradled Chardonnay is deeply complex, edgy and mineral-laden. Gravenstein apple and pear headline, with lemon meringue and spicy nutmeg in supporting roles. Although voluptuous and mind-bendingly intense, it finishes lean and crisp, stamping its imprint on the mind and palate.

title: Zepaltas 2012 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Creamy compartments of fig and walnut greet the palate on the entry ...
description: Creamy compartments of fig and walnut greet the palate on the entry of this crisp, well-composed Chardonnay, light in oak and bright in minerality. Preserved lemon rises to the fore midway through the glass, befriended by just-sliced pear. The grapes were sourced from Keefer Ranch and Heintz Vineyard, a beautiful expression of the two exceptional sites.

title: Three Sticks 2012 Durell Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Consistency of richness and caramel toastiness characterizes this wine year in and ...
description: Consistency of richness and caramel toastiness characterizes this wine year in and year out. This vintage exudes both the full-bodied style embraced by the producer as well as the voluptuously ripe and wholesome fruit that comes off of the vineyard in a year like 2012. Dark gold in color, it offers salty, savory accents around a core of lemon-specked minerality. Surreal and effete, it finishes with flair.

title: Acacia 2012 Yellow Rock Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Tropically layered in glazed pineapple and generously vibrant Asian pear, this wine ...
description: Tropically layered in glazed pineapple and generously vibrant Asian pear, this wine offers heartiness at the beginning that evolves in the glass into a compellingly balanced wine. The oak is there, but well-integrated.

title: Rochioli 2013 Estate Grown Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Richly caramelized on the nose, the seductive quality of this wine continues ...
description: Richly caramelized on the nose, the seductive quality of this wine continues on the palate, pushing the boundaries of baked apple and voluptuous body without ever careening over the edge. A classic California Chardonnay from a structured, balanced vintage, it finishes with intriguing minerality.

title: Darcie Kent Vineyards 2012 De Mayo Block Chardonnay (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: This barrel-fermented wine has opulent aromas of nougat, butterscotch and pear tart. ...
description: This barrel-fermented wine has opulent aromas of nougat, butterscotch and pear tart. Equally interesting flavors stress the spice and pastry notes rather than straightforward fruitiness. It is attractively rich in mouth feel, dry, full-bodied and grand in style.

title: Sante Arcangeli 2013 Split Rail Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: From a vineyard 1,700 feet above the small town of Corralitos comes ...
description: From a vineyard 1,700 feet above the small town of Corralitos comes this tasty wine that begins with aromas of smoked apple, lemon zest, honeysuckle and sea salt, as well as a struck-match element. The palate shows flavors of fresh apple, chamomile and a dusting of crushed vanilla, all set against a chalky grip.

title: Daou 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Nutty barrel smoke emerges first, then the fruits trend toward tropical, with ...
description: Nutty barrel smoke emerges first, then the fruits trend toward tropical, with pineapple and guava tones. Buttercream and salted caramel are laced throughout the palate, where vanilla ash flavors on the midpalate are balanced by bitter apple skins and Meyer lemon pith on the backend.

title: Page Mill Winery 2013 Chandler Vineyard Chardonnay (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: Enjoyable, drinkable and well balanced, this combines ripe peach and Bosc pear ...
description: Enjoyable, drinkable and well balanced, this combines ripe peach and Bosc pear aromas with similar juicy, fruity flavors without being extreme about it. Nuances of vanilla, honey and butter weave into the palate and linger on the finish.

title: Columbia Crest 2012 Reserve Chardonnay (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: Despite the wine being fermented and aged in 100% new French oak, ...
description: Despite the wine being fermented and aged in 100% new French oak, the fruit shines through, with notes of corn silk, peach and tropical fruit accented by barrel spices. Texture and richness to the sweet fruit flavors keeps interest high.

title: Glenwood Cellars 2012 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: A floral sensibility makes a fine first impression in this elegant, mid-weight, ...
description: A floral sensibility makes a fine first impression in this elegant, mid-weight, finely textured Chardonnay. Apple skin and dried apple underline the fruit components, accented by herb and a subtle hint of spice. A small amount of Viognier is blended in.

title: Acacia 2012 Farina Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Mountain)
excerpt: Sour lemon and savory thyme mark this intriguing wine, followed by medium-bodied ...
description: Sour lemon and savory thyme mark this intriguing wine, followed by medium-bodied swirls of lemon verbena. On the finish, ripe apple, pear and toasty, piquant oak combine to give weight and depth.

title: William Hill Estate 2013 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Aromas of orange blossom and jasmine intoxicate on the entry of this ...
description: Aromas of orange blossom and jasmine intoxicate on the entry of this delightful wine, which combines in complex ways to offer savory fennel with a creaminess to the texture. That complexity continues through the finish, which ends long and lean.

title: VML 2012 Knowlton Farms Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: From a vineyard near the town of Sebastopol, known for cool temperatures, ...
description: From a vineyard near the town of Sebastopol, known for cool temperatures, this offers a taste of spiced apple cider with a cinnamon stick around a core of butterscotch and honey-vanilla. Creamy and spicy, the finish is bristling with acidity.

title: Wente 2013 Morning Fog Chardonnay (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: Robust in mouth feel, this offers subtlety in flavor and an appetizingly ...
description: Robust in mouth feel, this offers subtlety in flavor and an appetizingly tangy texture. It seems to develop more with each sip. Look for light aromas of apple and fig, flavors that gain a touch of butter and almond, and medium body.

title: Bellangelo 2013 Chardonnay (Seneca Lake)
excerpt: While the nose suggests a hint of pressed apple, the palate on ...
description: While the nose suggests a hint of pressed apple, the palate on this richly textured Chardonnay is bright with yellow plum and apple flavors touched with spice, smoke and cream. Revitalizing acidity freshens the midpalate, leaving the finish brisk and clean.

title: Dolin 2012 Malibu Estate Chardonnay
excerpt: This wine comes from the recently awarded Malibu appellation, and shows promise ...
description: This wine comes from the recently awarded Malibu appellation, and shows promise for the future with perfumey white flowers, toasted marcona almond and a hint of oak smoke on the nose. On the palate, the acidity is present but not overpowering, the ripe apple flesh flavors offset by a grapefruit pith bitterness

title: Hosmer 2013 Chardonnay (Cayuga Lake)
excerpt: A zesty vein of grapefruit and lemon flavors lends freshness to this ...
description: A zesty vein of grapefruit and lemon flavors lends freshness to this robust, full-bodied Chardonnay. Citrus and pear are concentrated and juicy on the palate, accented by a cool, mineral finish.

title: Clif Family 2013 Chardonnay (Oak Knoll District)
excerpt: Nicely textured and balanced, this white from a cooler subsection of the ...
description: Nicely textured and balanced, this white from a cooler subsection of the larger Napa Valley is more austere than not, a taste of lemon and licorice combining in a medium-bodied package of refreshment. The mouthfeel works consistently from start to finish, the end note smooth and swift.

title: Bogle 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: Nicely balanced and complex in flavor, this blends bright apple and pear ...
description: Nicely balanced and complex in flavor, this blends bright apple and pear aromas with more subtle and spicy flavors like nutmeg, cinnamon and vanilla. The texture is smooth and sleek, livened up by good acidity, and the finish is long and lively.

title: Cameron Hughes 2013 Chardonnay (Monterey County)
excerpt: This wine blends competing elements of steely minerality and ripe, nearly sweet ...
description: This wine blends competing elements of steely minerality and ripe, nearly sweet elements of red apple and squeezed tangerine on the nose. The flavors are also well-rounded, with apple fruit and Asian pear balanced by lemon juice acidity.

title: Wrath 2012 San Saba Vineyard Chardonnay (Monterey)
excerpt: Brilliantly golden in color, this wine offers a dynamic nose of seared ...
description: Brilliantly golden in color, this wine offers a dynamic nose of seared lemons, crushed white rocks and roasted butternut squash. The flavors are similarly board and welcoming, with caramelized apples and pears, yet show a yellow grapefruit acidity and a finish that lingers with vanilla and butter.

title: Bridlewood 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: A fresh-smelling nose of apple and pear cider also offers white flowers ...
description: A fresh-smelling nose of apple and pear cider also offers white flowers of honeysuckle and tuberose. This wine balances ripe pear flesh with tart lemon-lime skins, also showing a bit of white rock minerality, altogether clean and bright.

title: Murphy-Goode 2013 Single Deck Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Ethereal and light, this is an understated Chardonnay for the producer, who ...
description: Ethereal and light, this is an understated Chardonnay for the producer, who offers several variations on the grape this vintage, this one sourced from an Eastside Road estate vineyard. Beeswax, tropical papaya and pear are the highlights, with a finish dusted in vanilla.

title: Zepaltas 2012 Babushka Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: A true push of the Chardonnay envelope, this wine is crazy in ...
description: A true push of the Chardonnay envelope, this wine is crazy in acidity at first, a crispness that softens over time into toasted hazelnut. Grapes are sourced from lots separated by the producer from Keefer Ranch, a tremendous site,. Wet stone and lemon dominate on the palate, begging to be matched with food.

title: Damiani 2013 Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: While creamy and voluminous, this full-bodied Chardonnay boasts fresh green plum and ...
description: While creamy and voluminous, this full-bodied Chardonnay boasts fresh green plum and apple flavors brightened by sunny lemon acidity. Streaks of vanilla, toast and spice are bold yet well integrated. It finishes moderately long with notes of dried herbs.

title: Scott Family 2013 Dijon Clone Chardonnay (Arroyo Seco)
excerpt: Seared pineapple and warm brioche aromas show strongly on this examination of ...
description: Seared pineapple and warm brioche aromas show strongly on this examination of one clone from the small but solid Monterey County appellation. Tropical elements of guava skin mix with sea salt and bright acidity on the refreshing palate.

title: Red Tail Ridge 2013 Barrel Fermented RTR Estate Vineyard Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: A combination of American and Hungarian oak lends sultry spice, smoke and ...
description: A combination of American and Hungarian oak lends sultry spice, smoke and herb tones to this elegant wine. Freshly pressed apple and pear flavors are a touch savory on the palate, but the wine finishes brisk and bright.

title: Luca 2013 G Lot Chardonnay (Tupungato)
excerpt: Butter, toffee, oak and sawdust aromas make up the bouquet. In the ...
description: Butter, toffee, oak and sawdust aromas make up the bouquet. In the mouth, white-grape tannins are firm and grabby. Flavors of citrus, pineapple, melon, banana and oak are tropical and end soft, with buttery weight. Drink now.

title: Rodney Strong 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Focused streaks of high-acidity lemon and a low oak profile combine for ...
description: Focused streaks of high-acidity lemon and a low oak profile combine for a refreshing take on Chardonnay, the other components coming together in swathes of fennel and brine. The wine finishes with a hit of power.

title: Grand Pacific 2012 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: A creamy, buttery texture wraps around a core of bright lemon and ...
description: A creamy, buttery texture wraps around a core of bright lemon and apple flavors. This is balanced slightly toward sweetness as the luxurious viscosity carries the vivid flavors into the finish.

title: McGrail 2013 Chandler Vineyard Chardonnay (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: This presents a big, buttery, bold style, with no apologies for the ...
description: This presents a big, buttery, bold style, with no apologies for the full body and ripe fruit surrounded by toasty, oaky aromas and flavors. This is dry, rich in texture, and more savory or smoky rather than fruity.

title: Rooster Hill 2013 Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: While the nose is delicate with faint hints of yellow plum and ...
description: While the nose is delicate with faint hints of yellow plum and pear, the palate is surprisingly brawny and bold. Rich, buttery and voluminous, this wine showcases ripe citrus and apple flavors, but falls a bit short on the finish.

title: Twisted 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: Fresh apple flavors and a crisp vein of acidity make this medium-bodied ...
description: Fresh apple flavors and a crisp vein of acidity make this medium-bodied wine lively and refreshing, while still delivering delicious Pippin apple and white peach flavors. It feels balanced, clean and easy to enjoy.

title: Taft Street 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Crisp lemon, fennel and Bosc pear come into play in this medium-bodied ...
description: Crisp lemon, fennel and Bosc pear come into play in this medium-bodied Chardonnay, accented by a taste of fig. Taking on depth and breadth as it develops in the glass and on the palate, the wine finishes long and lean.

title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2013 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Coming from the warm 2013 vintage, this easy-drinking wine offers notes of ...
description: Coming from the warm 2013 vintage, this easy-drinking wine offers notes of sweet corn, pear and peach with light barrel accents. The fruit flavors are elegant with a lightly creamy feel.

title: Murphy-Goode 2013 Island Block Chardonnay (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: This warm-climate wine is fulsome and hearty in baked Asian pear and ...
description: This warm-climate wine is fulsome and hearty in baked Asian pear and candied ginger. A dried-fruit quality stands out on the buxom palate, a buttery taste of dried apricot drizzled in honey and brioche.

title: Sarah's Vineyard 2012 Estate Chardonnay (Santa Clara Valley)
excerpt: The nose is broad and welcoming, with apple and pear flesh aromas ...
description: The nose is broad and welcoming, with apple and pear flesh aromas touched with vanilla and struck match. The palate shows good tension between lemon pith and roasted apple, proving quite focused and grippy with tannins, although a tad hot.

title: Domaine LeSeurre 2013 Barrel Select Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Pressed apple and pear notes are brightened by a kiss of yellow ...
description: Pressed apple and pear notes are brightened by a kiss of yellow cherries and lemon in this delicate wine. The palate has a pleasant roundness despite its light-bodied frame. The finish is brisk.

title: Billsboro 2013 Atwater Vineyards Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: A whiff of hay and bramble lends an earthy tone to this ...
description: A whiff of hay and bramble lends an earthy tone to this otherwise bright, easy-drinking wine. On the palate, fresh tangerine, white peach and lemon flavors are refreshing and pristine. Medium bodied and a bit racy, the finish is quite brisk.

title: Silver Thread 2013 Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Layers of smoke, dark toast and nuts lend a distinctly savory feel. ...
description: Layers of smoke, dark toast and nuts lend a distinctly savory feel. This wine is refreshingly brisk on the palate, marked by delicate touches of pressed apple and pear that linger through the finish.

title: Four Vines 2013 Naked Unoaked Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: This stainless study shows crisp and ripe yellow apple flesh, with white ...
description: This stainless study shows crisp and ripe yellow apple flesh, with white rock and slate minerality. Apples, from Golden Delicious to red, also dominate the flavor profile, which is straightforward and accessible, though not complex.

title: Redtree 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: This value-minded selection blends plenty of bright citrus and apple flavors with ...
description: This value-minded selection blends plenty of bright citrus and apple flavors with good acidity and a hint of sweetness for a complete and pleasing package. It is medium bodied, light on its feet and refreshing. Enjoy now.

title: Jeriko 2012 Upper Russian River Chardonnay (Mendocino County)
excerpt: This bright, fresh and fruity wine presents an appealing mix of apricot ...
description: This bright, fresh and fruity wine presents an appealing mix of apricot and peach aromas, ripe and round peach flavors and a smooth texture. Rather full bodied, it is lifted by a good amount of tangy acidity.

title: Drytown 2013 Estate Chardonnay (Sierra Foothills)
excerpt: A serious personality comes from oaky, earthy aromas and flavors, a bit ...
description: A serious personality comes from oaky, earthy aromas and flavors, a bit of welcome astringency and good acidity. It seems full bodied, dry and rich enough in texture to be appealing without losing the tanginess underneath.

title: Graton Ridge 2012 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: A plush ripeness pushes on the palate, with a taste of baked ...
description: A plush ripeness pushes on the palate, with a taste of baked apple and tropical fruit that falls flat somewhat on the finish, its layers of oaky vanilla disappearing in a mist.

title: Sarah's Vineyard 2012 Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: Caramelized apples and toasted squash-seed aromas arise from this wine, which offers ...
description: Caramelized apples and toasted squash-seed aromas arise from this wine, which offers good zing but a more oxidized style on the palate. Flavors of nut-based syrups, dried citrus and slightly sour orange juice arise once sipped.

title: Vale 2011 Chardonnay
excerpt: Half fermented in oak with the rest in stainless steel, this wine ...
description: Half fermented in oak with the rest in stainless steel, this wine offers lees, butter and vanilla, with a dry, medium-bodied feel.

title: Keuka Spring 2013 Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Pressed apple and pear notes are accented with penetrating layers of smoke, ...
description: Pressed apple and pear notes are accented with penetrating layers of smoke, nuts and clove on this full-bodied Chardonnay. Tart lemon acidity lends freshness to the midpalate and into a spry finish.

title: Clos La Chance 2013 The Vegan Vine Chardonnay (Central Coast)
excerpt: Basketball star John Salley is the spokesman for this eco-minded project by ...
description: Basketball star John Salley is the spokesman for this eco-minded project by Clos La Chance. The wine offers aromas of wet granite and fermenting apples. The flavors are similar, showing pear, slate and green-apple skins.

title: Corvidae 2013 Mirth Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This lightly aromatic wine conveys ripe red apple, pear, and star fruit. ...
description: This lightly aromatic wine conveys ripe red apple, pear, and star fruit. The fruit flavors are centered in a ball in the middle, offering plenty of appeal if not much complexity.

title: Sagelands 2013 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas are light with whiffs of apricot and pineapple. On the palate, ...
description: Aromas are light with whiffs of apricot and pineapple. On the palate, the concentration of the stone and tropical fruit flavors is wanting but the wine still brings some appeal.

title: Uptick Vineyards 2011 Estate Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: The tartness in this wine veers slightly sour, with the acidity dialed ...
description: The tartness in this wine veers slightly sour, with the acidity dialed perhaps a notch too high. Herb and salt intermix to give a more savory character, with a freshness to the finish.

title: Manzoni 2013 North Highlands Cuvee Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: Aromas arise slowly, though toasted oak, struck match and slightly sour fruits ...
description: Aromas arise slowly, though toasted oak, struck match and slightly sour fruits do emerge eventually. Flavors are straightforward, with scorched lemon and apple sauce.

title: Peirano 2013 The Heritage Collection Chardonnay (Lodi)
excerpt: This soft creampuff of a wine smells and tastes like pears, butter ...
description: This soft creampuff of a wine smells and tastes like pears, butter and vanilla, with a hint of lemon. This has a smooth, rich texture, a bit of sweetness, medium body and a buttery-tasting finish.

title: Two Mountain 2013 Copeland Vineayard Chardonnay (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: This aromatically unusual wine offers notes of lees, peach and latex paint. ...
description: This aromatically unusual wine offers notes of lees, peach and latex paint. The palate has sweet peach flavors and a creamy feel but the concentration is wanting.

title: Serenity 2013 Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Intensely smoky aromas seep through the palate of this unusual Chardonnay. Fresh ...
description: Intensely smoky aromas seep through the palate of this unusual Chardonnay. Fresh apple and lemon flavors are pleasant, but overwhelmed by savory nut and smoke tones.

title: Buehler 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: The producer takes a hands-off approach to its wines. In this case ...
description: The producer takes a hands-off approach to its wines. In this case the tactic may not have paid off, the wine muted, dull and slightly sour. The acidity veers in the wrong direction vis-a-vis the fruit, which suggests tart green apple and lemon.

title: Cascade Ridge 2013 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas on this wine are faint with notes of soda water, vanilla ...
description: Aromas on this wine are faint with notes of soda water, vanilla and peach. The stone-fruit flavors seem washed out and dilute.

title: Two Mountain 2011 Brothers Reserve Chardonnay Copeland Vineyard Chardonnay (Rattlesnake Hills)
excerpt: Barrel notes of burnt popcorn and char overtake any varietal aromas on ...
description: Barrel notes of burnt popcorn and char overtake any varietal aromas on this wine. Flavors seem quite light accented by a lightly creamy feel.

title: Alias 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: This is a basic white wine with a few quirks. It smells ...
description: This is a basic white wine with a few quirks. It smells floral and appley, and tastes quite dry and a bit sharp while carrying a candylike marshmallow note.

title: Williams Selyem 2012 Drake Estate Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Those who think they prefer anything but Chardonnay may be convinced otherwise ...
description: Those who think they prefer anything but Chardonnay may be convinced otherwise with this wine. It is so powerfully evocative in crisply rendered Meyer lemon and tangerine notes, with aromas of fresh white flowers teasing provocatively on the nose. Seamless and seductively bright in acidity, it glides down the palate, hinting at a richness that never becomes overdone.

title: Williams Selyem 2012 Allen Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This classic Chardonnay brims in lemon chiffon, stony minerality and luscious pear. ...
description: This classic Chardonnay brims in lemon chiffon, stony minerality and luscious pear. The complex, soft, supple layers continue to surprise in the glass, teasing the palate with unexpected notes of nutmeg and Tahitian vanilla.

title: Domaine Drouhin Oregon 2013 Arthur Chardonnay (Dundee Hills)
excerpt: From 20-year-old, Dijon clone estate vines, this substantial, tongue-gripping Chardonnay has intense ...
description: From 20-year-old, Dijon clone estate vines, this substantial, tongue-gripping Chardonnay has intense depth of flavor. A luscious mix of grapefruit, apple, melon, spice and mineral elements, it drives down through the palate and never quits.

title: Kumeu River 2012 Hunting Hill Chardonnay (Kumeu)
excerpt: In 2012, my favorite of the Kumeu River Chardonnays is the medium- ...
description: In 2012, my favorite of the Kumeu River Chardonnays is the medium- to full-bodied, creamy-textured offering from Hunting Hill. Think streusel-topped citrus, but dry, with a long, harmonious finish.

title: Acacia 2012 Sangiacomo Vineyard Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Toasted oak and caramel apple mark the entry of this wine, from ...
description: Toasted oak and caramel apple mark the entry of this wine, from a coveted and steady source of Carneros fruit. Lush and hedonistic in Golden Delicious apple and pear, it retains a core of minerality throughout, finishing clean and bright.

title: Kumeu River 2011 Hunting Hill Chardonnay (Kumeu)
excerpt: The 2011 Hunting Hill is an immediately seductive Chardonnay. Toasted nuts, grilled ...
description: The 2011 Hunting Hill is an immediately seductive Chardonnay. Toasted nuts, grilled white peaches and hints of pineapple all come together on a sumptuous midpalate, then finish bright, citrusy and long.

title: Alloro 2012 Estate Chardonnay (Chehalem Mountains)
excerpt: Balanced and graceful, this barrel-fermented gem runs the gamut from apple to ...
description: Balanced and graceful, this barrel-fermented gem runs the gamut from apple to pear to peach, all framed with lively acids tasting of citrus and stone. It goes long and deep, with toast and spice beautifully proportioned.

title: Rusack 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
excerpt: Santa Barbara-raised Steve Gerbac makes a winning white wine with aromas of ...
description: Santa Barbara-raised Steve Gerbac makes a winning white wine with aromas of scorched lemons, browned butter and vanilla, sliced down the middle with white rock minerality. Broad, oak-driven flavors at the tip of the palate quickly tighten into a line of lime zest acidity that lingers, with white pepper and chamomile spices emerging in the midpalate.

title: Kumeu River 2012 Coddington Chardonnay (Kumeu)
excerpt: Smoke and custard notes accent scents of wet stone and citrus, while ...
description: Smoke and custard notes accent scents of wet stone and citrus, while the palate delivers white peach, lime and vanilla flavors. This is plump and full in the mouth, yet still finishes with mouthwatering precision.

title: Willamette Valley Vineyards 2012 Elton Chardonnay (Eola-Amity Hills)
excerpt: Sweet and extra ripe, this pushes the peach and apricot fruit to ...
description: Sweet and extra ripe, this pushes the peach and apricot fruit to a rich and focused center, and keeps the impact of new French oak at just 20%. Which is plenty, adding just enough sweet and toasty vanilla to the extended, rich finish.

title: Lumen 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: Rich aromas of butterscotch, candied apples and hot buttered toast are presented ...
description: Rich aromas of butterscotch, candied apples and hot buttered toast are presented in an appealing, judicious way on the nose of this wine. Meyer lemon and lychee give focus to the palate, which also delivers warm pear and almond flavors.

title: Barnett 2013 Sangiacomo Vineyard Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: This is by no means a shy wine and yet it is ...
description: This is by no means a shy wine and yet it is deceptively subtle at first, offering fresh lemon and tangerine aromas behind a first whiff of jasmine. With a complexity of briny sea breeze subtlety, it ventures into caramel and oaky nutmeg, remaining balanced and layered all the while. Enjoyable now, this wine will blossom further through 2018.

title: Fog Crest 2012 Estate Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: The producer continues to impress with this estate Russian River white, an ...
description: The producer continues to impress with this estate Russian River white, an impressive ambassador for the region in its exuberant layers of apricot, honey and vanilla. The substantial texture and concentration stand out and add complexity. A lift of lemon meringue and spice complete the finish.

title: Shea 2012 Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: This stylish, tightly wound, concentrated effort features yellow fruits adorned with layers ...
description: This stylish, tightly wound, concentrated effort features yellow fruits adorned with layers of toast, butter and caramel. It will continue to open gracefully over a 48-hour window, suggesting that it may be cellared successfully. But if you have the patience to decant/aerate properly, it is immensely enjoyable right now, and a very fine value.

title: Lemelson 2012 Reserve Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Made with native yeast (no inoculation), this is a ripe and buttery ...
description: Made with native yeast (no inoculation), this is a ripe and buttery wine loaded with peach and Asian pear fruit flavors. Just 28% of the barrels were new, bringing toasty goodness throughout. A flavor of buttered, roasted nuts finishes it nicely.

title: Kumeu River 2011 Estate Chardonnay (Kumeu)
excerpt: This blend is a solid value in the world of New World ...
description: This blend is a solid value in the world of New World Chardonnay, offering faintly toasty, custardy nuances layered over a plump base of lemon and pineapple. Some intriguing nutty notes emerging on the tight, citrusy finish.

title: Gallo Signature Series 2012 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: From a prime spot in the heart of the Russian River Valley, ...
description: From a prime spot in the heart of the Russian River Valley, tended to by the producer, this is a seamless, impressive wine. It has a healthy sense of self, offering luxurious layers of creamy texture and body, supported by a crunchy apple-skin flavor and light minerality.

title: Willamette Valley Vineyards 2012 Bernau Block Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Made with Dijon clones planted 20 years ago, this offers juicy, fruity ...
description: Made with Dijon clones planted 20 years ago, this offers juicy, fruity and full-bodied flavors of limeade and apple cider. The aging in 45% new French oak puts a finish of toasted walnuts around the ripe fruit.

title: Ram's Gate 2012 Hudson Vineyard Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: This is ripe, age-worthy Chardonnay at its most generous, from a premiere ...
description: This is ripe, age-worthy Chardonnay at its most generous, from a premiere vineyard site in the rolling hills of Carneros. Aged on the lees in all French oak, half of the barrels new, it oozes with caramel apple and toasted spice notes, the aromas providing a counterbalance of white flowers. Enjoy now or through 2020.

title: Willamette Valley Vineyards 2012 Dijon Clone Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Soft and spicy, this exhibits the extra richness of the landmark vintage. ...
description: Soft and spicy, this exhibits the extra richness of the landmark vintage. Broad flavors of peach, apricot and banana are accented with lime-tinged acids and set in a lightly toasty frame.

title: Jack Creek 2013 Kruse Vineyard Chardonnay (Central Coast)
excerpt: This winery is striving to show that Burgundian varietals can work in ...
description: This winery is striving to show that Burgundian varietals can work in the cooler Willow Creek region of Paso Robles, where sea breeze comes through the Templeton Gap. This bottling provides good evidence, with aromas of crushed rocks, vanilla toast, roasted apple and peach. Brisk apple cider dominates the palate, picking up roasted almonds in the midpalate and possessing quite a bit of pear skin grip.

title: Ram's Gate 2012 Sangiacomo Vineyards Green Acres Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Dried apricot and fig stand out among the toasty, ripe layers of ...
description: Dried apricot and fig stand out among the toasty, ripe layers of caramel and generous oak in this wine sourced from a prime Carneros location. Soft and supple on the palate, it has ripeness that peaks on the finish, a full-bodied expression of Californian abundance.

title: Tzuba 2012 Chardonnay (Judean Hills)
excerpt: Deep straw to the eye, this wine offers a clean nose of ...
description: Deep straw to the eye, this wine offers a clean nose of ripe seckel pear. There is a nice interplay between fruit and floral notes, with flavors of pear, butterscotch and white flowers. The lengthy finish features a mix of smooth tannins and bright fruit and floral notes.

title: Ron Rubin 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Savory in licorice and herb, this wine is elegantly structured and beautifully ...
description: Savory in licorice and herb, this wine is elegantly structured and beautifully layered in flavors of peeled apple skin, pear and beeswax. Enjoyably restrained, it finishes crisp, with a refreshing reminder of apple.

title: Freemark Abbey 2013 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: From three vineyard sites, this wine benefits from the skill of its ...
description: From three vineyard sites, this wine benefits from the skill of its blender, who composed lemon and lime fruit crispness with more sultry full-bodied creaminess to the texture. Apple skin and herb complete the picture, finished off by a lovely accent of subtle spice.

title: Terlato 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Briny minerality comes to the fore on this earthy, herbal Chardonnay, which ...
description: Briny minerality comes to the fore on this earthy, herbal Chardonnay, which is full and creamy at first sip. Smooth and easily enjoyable, it finishes with polished notes of oak and caramel.

title: Shiloh Winery 2012 Chardonnay (Judean Hills)
excerpt: A bouquet of golden apple and honeydew melon sets the scene for ...
description: A bouquet of golden apple and honeydew melon sets the scene for flavors of melon, lilac, and barely ripe golden apple. It is smooth on the palate, with fruit and floral notes playing off each other. The lengthy, sophisticated finish wraps up on a nice bright note.

title: Falcone 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: John and Helen Falcone use Sierra Madre Vineyard fruit from the Santa ...
description: John and Helen Falcone use Sierra Madre Vineyard fruit from the Santa Maria Valley for this wine, which offers straight-ahead aromas of sweet apple, oak and pineapple. A chalkiness emerges on the palate, with pear flesh providing fruit and red grapefruit pith providing a nicely bitter counterpoint.

title: A to Z 2013 Chardonnay (Oregon)
excerpt: Lively and loaded with citrus fruits, notably juicy orange, this is totally ...
description: Lively and loaded with citrus fruits, notably juicy orange, this is totally refreshing. Clean, crisp fruit dominates, along with zippy acidity. Drink now.

title: Cima Collina 2013 Chula Vina Chardonnay (Monterey County)
excerpt: Annette Hoff Danzer is only the second female winemaker in Monterey County, ...
description: Annette Hoff Danzer is only the second female winemaker in Monterey County, and her wine from Chualar Canyon on the east side of the Salinas Valley offers aromas of fragrant white flowers, lemon-lime soda and lychee. The racy acidity is a bit strong on the palate, but will unwind nicely in months to come, with flavors of ripe lemon and crushed rocks.

title: Ventana 2013 Chardonnay (Arroyo Seco)
excerpt: Sea salt, Bosc pear, apple cider, squeezed lemon and shreds of vanilla ...
description: Sea salt, Bosc pear, apple cider, squeezed lemon and shreds of vanilla frame a leaner nose on this wine from mid-Monterey County. The cider element carries to the rather pungent palate, proving quite high-toned and acidic with some minerality, grapefruit peel grip and long-lasting vibrancy on the finish.

title: Schug 2013 Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Barrel-fermented, this is medium-sized all the way around, offering medium acidity, texture, ...
description: Barrel-fermented, this is medium-sized all the way around, offering medium acidity, texture, body and finish. Flavors are autumnal in juicy lemon-lime, Golden Delicious apple and creamy pear.

title: Terrazas de Los Andes 2013 Reserva Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: This is oaky and resiny on the nose, but not overly so, ...
description: This is oaky and resiny on the nose, but not overly so, with pear and apple aromas as well as a streak of saline. On the palate, this offers a good mix of oak resin, fruit pulp and acidity. Flavors of oak spice, white pepper, peach and apple finish fresh but with an oaky aftertaste.

title: Veramar 2013 Estate Club Chardonnay (Virginia)
excerpt: Underripe peach, candied lemon and white flower aromas are lifted and bright ...
description: Underripe peach, candied lemon and white flower aromas are lifted and bright on the nose. The palate is zesty and crisp, with ripe red-apple flavors leading to a slightly chalky finish.

title: Yamhill Valley 2013 Chardonnay (McMinnville)
excerpt: Young vines and low brix equal a very light, pleasant quaffer. Mineral ...
description: Young vines and low brix equal a very light, pleasant quaffer. Mineral and melon elements are in play, with a clean, bracing, leesy mouthfeel.

title: Austerity 2013 Chardonnay (Arroyo Seco)
excerpt: The oaky smoke is quite powerful on the nose, which also shows ...
description: The oaky smoke is quite powerful on the nose, which also shows vanilla dust and lime juice. The palate is anything but austere, full of toast, caramelized apples and smoked fruits. A line of citrus acidity stops it from becoming flabby, but this is definitely for the oak lovers crowd.

title: The Boneyard 2013 Chardonnay (Monticello)
excerpt: Aromas of smoky peach, citrus blossom and crushed stone are enticing and ...
description: Aromas of smoky peach, citrus blossom and crushed stone are enticing and inviting. The palate of this unoaked Chardonnay is restrained and green apple focused, with a refreshing lemon-lime vein running down the backbone.

title: Jefferson Vineyards 2013 Rsv. Chardonnay (Virginia)
excerpt: Lemon zest and orchard fruit aromas are accented by notes of toasted ...
description: Lemon zest and orchard fruit aromas are accented by notes of toasted popcorn. The medium-bodied palate shows fresh lemon juice and underripe peach tones, with crisp acidity balancing the toasted vanilla finish.

title: Gloria Ferrer 2012 Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Dried fruit and salt are featured prominently in this estate-grown wine, perfumed ...
description: Dried fruit and salt are featured prominently in this estate-grown wine, perfumed in aromas that make it seem as though it has more age on it than it does. Herbaceous and robust in hearty oak, it finishes creamy and crisp in tart apple.

title: Krutz 2012 Martinelli Road Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Made entirely from one vineyard source and one variety, this was barrel-fermented ...
description: Made entirely from one vineyard source and one variety, this was barrel-fermented in half new French oak. Nonetheless it is marked most by its lightness and crisp, clean flavor of lemon, apple and passionfruit, the oak providing structure in the background only.

title: Wairau River 2012 Chardonnay (Marlborough)
excerpt: Tropical in style, with exotic notes of apricot and banana framing bright ...
description: Tropical in style, with exotic notes of apricot and banana framing bright citrus elements. This is round and immediately drinkable, probably not one to keep past the end of 2015.

title: Mirassou 2012 Chardonnay (Central Coast)
excerpt: Building on 150 years and six generations of winemaking tradition, the winery ...
description: Building on 150 years and six generations of winemaking tradition, the winery trends toward a leaner style, with the classic California buttercream aroma cut by tart green apple. In this good everyday sipping wine, flavors that range from pear to barely ripe pineapple prove approachable but not distinctive.

title: DiamAndes 2013 Perlita Chardonnay (Uco Valley)
excerpt: Tropical-fruit aromas are balanced by crisper apple and pear scents, while the ...
description: Tropical-fruit aromas are balanced by crisper apple and pear scents, while the palate is plump, round and easygoing. Flavors of pear, melon, green banana and wood spice end creamy but with adequate acidic cut.

title: ZD 2012 Reserve Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Made from organically farmed grapes grown in an estate vineyard, then cradled ...
description: Made from organically farmed grapes grown in an estate vineyard, then cradled in American oak, this delivers subdued aromas of ripe, lusty lemon and big oak. Lurching toward the finish are flavors of caramel and bittersweet dried fruit.

title: McIlroy 2012 Signature Edition Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Tropical fruit drips from this barrel-fermented Chardonnay, accented in golden honey and ...
description: Tropical fruit drips from this barrel-fermented Chardonnay, accented in golden honey and toasted oak. Crisp at first, then oaky, it feels a bit disjointed but manages to resolve its issues on the finish, a nice combination of the two.

title: Highway 12 2013 Nueva Carneros Highway Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Caramel and vanilla wrap around generously ripe flavors of apple, pear and ...
description: Caramel and vanilla wrap around generously ripe flavors of apple, pear and tropical papaya. Entirely fermented in oak, its wood provides a medium-bodied mouthfeel and ample accents of sweetness and spice.

title: King Estate 2013 Signature Collection Chardonnay (Oregon)
excerpt: Simple and fruity, this has a mix of pineapple, citrus and apple, ...
description: Simple and fruity, this has a mix of pineapple, citrus and apple, high-toned and slightly bitter. The toasty component from some sort of barrel/oak treatment is not yet integrated into the fruit. This will need decanting or aging in bottle until 2016.

title: Domaine Loubejac 2013 Chardonnay (Oregon)
excerpt: This all-stainless Chardonnay is soft, round and easily approached. The apple and ...
description: This all-stainless Chardonnay is soft, round and easily approached. The apple and pear fruit shows a bit of residual sugar. The wine is simple and pleasant for every day enjoyment.

title: Chatham 2013 Church Creek Steel Chardonnay (Virginia's Eastern Shore)
excerpt: Bright lemon, underripe peach and crushed stone are tight and restrained on ...
description: Bright lemon, underripe peach and crushed stone are tight and restrained on the nose. The palate is more expressive, offering notes of candied lemon rind and apple, ending on a sour note.
