title: Argento 2013 Reserva Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Pine needle, orange peel and vanilla aromas are scattershot but pure. The ...
description: Pine needle, orange peel and vanilla aromas are scattershot but pure. The palate is lean, tight and juicy due to pronounced citric acidity, while flavors of orange, tangerine and mango finish fresh but with a smear of resiny oak.

title: Psagot 2012 Chardonnay (Judean Hills)
excerpt: A nose of lemon and petrol opens into flavors of lemon, pears, ...
description: A nose of lemon and petrol opens into flavors of lemon, pears, petrol and white flowers, with slightly overpowering toast notes. Tannins are a bit stiff for an otherwise bright white that has a slightly tart finish.

title: Wildewood 2013 Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: This is serviceable but rather bland, with a dusting of cinnamon spice ...
description: This is serviceable but rather bland, with a dusting of cinnamon spice and simple, tart fruit.

title: Trump 2013 Chardonnay (Monticello)
excerpt: Red apple aromas are slightly overripe in nature, with citrus zest adding ...
description: Red apple aromas are slightly overripe in nature, with citrus zest adding verve. The light-bodied palate is zippy and brisk, offering a fresh-pressed apple flavor.

title: Veramar 2013 Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (Virginia)
excerpt: Oak-driven aromas are strong on the nose, with buttered popcorn dominating. Full ...
description: Oak-driven aromas are strong on the nose, with buttered popcorn dominating. Full and rich, notes of cedar and toast pervade over a hint of green apple. A bit lazy on the palate, this oaked style is for those who enjoy rich and creamy Chardonnay.

title: McIlroy 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This full-throttle, oaky Chardonnay features an intriguingly curious mix of corn nuts, ...
description: This full-throttle, oaky Chardonnay features an intriguingly curious mix of corn nuts, diesel and marijuana on the nose. The corresponding layers of flavor are straightforward and simple.

title: Chatham 2012 Church Creek Oak Chardonnay (Virginia's Eastern Shore)
excerpt: Lemon curd and artificial butter show on the nose and palate, with ...
description: Lemon curd and artificial butter show on the nose and palate, with underripe peach adding verve to a creamy body.

title: Cuboid 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: In an economy version of a big California Chardonnay, this emerges from ...
description: In an economy version of a big California Chardonnay, this emerges from the spout of a 3-liter box smelling like buttered popcorn and feeliing a bit syrupy. Tasting like ripe pears tempered by toasted bread notes, it leaves an almost-sweet marshmallow finish.

title: Marco Zunino 2014 Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Aromas of banana, peach and citrus fruits are clean. This is round ...
description: Aromas of banana, peach and citrus fruits are clean. This is round and simple in feel, with flavors of apple and peach that are slightly briny. On the finish, tropical fruit flavors fade to melony and nutty.

title: Fabre Montmayou 2014 Phebus Un-Oaked Estate Bottled Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Floral aromas of wisteria and lychee are tropical and musky. In the ...
description: Floral aromas of wisteria and lychee are tropical and musky. In the mouth, this unoaked Chardonnay feels oily but also citrusy. Flavors of lychee and lime finish similarly, conveying tropical overtones.

title: Heritage 2013 Estate Reserve Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (Outer Coastal Plain)
excerpt: Toasted sourdough bread and briny lemon show on the nose and palate, ...
description: Toasted sourdough bread and briny lemon show on the nose and palate, with dusty oak and slightly burnt toast on the finish.

title: Talaria 2012 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Pungent in ripe mango, this offers apple skin and funky overtones and ...
description: Pungent in ripe mango, this offers apple skin and funky overtones and is a tad oxidized on the palate. On the finish, a sweet layering of vanilla pushes its way through.

title: Duval-Leroy 2006 Blanc de Blancs Grand Cru Brut Chardonnay (Champagne)
excerpt: This has all the mineral qualities associated with pure Chardonnay. It is ...
description: This has all the mineral qualities associated with pure Chardonnay. It is crisp, tightly textured and bright. It also has more serious depths of structure, white fruits and richness. This is still ready to age further. Drink now, although it will be better from 2016.

title: Jardin 2012 Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (Stellenbosch)
excerpt: Despite being barrel fermented, this attractive white manages to maintain a vivid ...
description: Despite being barrel fermented, this attractive white manages to maintain a vivid vibrancy and freshness, with notes of fresh red apple, firm peach, pineapple core, green mango and clementine that are all infused with delicate hints of toasted oak and baking spice. Ample acidity lifts the medium-weight palate and rich melon, apple and toasted brioche flavors, leading into the long, lingering wood-spiced finish.

title: Roblar 2013 Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: This is a great example of what most would consider a straight-ahead ...
description: This is a great example of what most would consider a straight-ahead and delicious California Chardonnay. The nose offers aromas of seared pineapple cake, vanilla soda and Meyer lemon, and the palate blends all of the typical elements: lemon juice acidity down the middle, minerality driven by slate and white rocks, apple and a bit of brown spice on the edges.

title: Calera 2013 Chardonnay (Central Coast)
excerpt: The nose on this wine from nine vineyards ranging from Santa Clara ...
description: The nose on this wine from nine vineyards ranging from Santa Clara to Santa Barbara reflects much of what the large appellation offers, but in subtle ways: touches of Golden Delicious apples, grilled pineapple, toasted coconut and chalk. The flavors surround a Meyer lemon zest tension, with apple flesh fruits and a zesty acidity that holds throughout without biting.

title: Summerland 2013 Bien Nacido Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
excerpt: This wine from the historic vineyard offers classic oaky aromas of smoke, ...
description: This wine from the historic vineyard offers classic oaky aromas of smoke, butterscotch and salty roasted nuts. Smokiness lingers throughout the soft, excellently weighted palate that surrounds rich apple, nectarine and white peach flesh, with a citrus pith tension holding it together.

title: Jordan 2012 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: The winery is making new strides by finding the best sites for ...
description: The winery is making new strides by finding the best sites for its wines rather than trying to grow everything on its estate. This Chardonnay is a case in point. High in acidity and low in oak influence, it offers restrained layers of tropical mango, lemon and ginger snap.

title: Summerland 2013 Sierra Madre Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
excerpt: This iconic regional vineyard is widely sourced, and this bottling presents it ...
description: This iconic regional vineyard is widely sourced, and this bottling presents it well. Fresh aromas of Meyer lemon and graphite shavings get layered with oak-related scents of toasted coconut flake and ground vanilla. The palate surrounds a core of lemon-lime-laced apple and fleshy ripe pear, with guava skin on the finish. Very easy to drink.

title: Neil Ellis 2011 Chardonnay (Elgin)
excerpt: This is lush and toasty upfront, with supporting aromas of honeydew, peach ...
description: This is lush and toasty upfront, with supporting aromas of honeydew, peach marmalade and yellow apple. The palate offers ample acidity to lift the rich fruit flavors, while hints of sweet spice, apple skin and toasted brioche unfold on the finish. Attractive and well balanced; enjoy now.

title: Keller Estate 2012 Oro de Plata Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: This wine offers an aged quality to its accompanying freshness. A taste ...
description: This wine offers an aged quality to its accompanying freshness. A taste of honey and dried apple surround soft layers of citrus and a toasted oak finish.

title: Gremillet NV Blanc de Blancs Brut Chardonnay (Champagne)
excerpt: A Blanc de Blancs, just with Chardonnay, often brings out the minerality ...
description: A Blanc de Blancs, just with Chardonnay, often brings out the minerality and the chalk soil of the vineyard. This is a great success, fresh and crisp with bright acidity, apples and a good line of citrus. Drink now.

title: Robert Oatley 2013 Finisterre Chardonnay (Margaret River)
excerpt: Made in an elegant, filigreed style, this wine delivers understated hints of ...
description: Made in an elegant, filigreed style, this wine delivers understated hints of smoke, pear and melon. Given time in the glass, some peach notes emerge. Pleasantly plump on the midpalate, the flavors and textures tighten on the crisp finish.

title: Krutz 2013 Magnolia Inspiration Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This wine gets neutral French oak and it shows in its zesty ...
description: This wine gets neutral French oak and it shows in its zesty profile of orange and tangerine over apple and pear. The fruit is hearty and juicy, the texture light and refreshing.

title: Black Hills 2013 Chardonnay (Okanagan Valley)
excerpt: Fresh and toasty, spicy and focused, this matches crisp fruit flavors of ...
description: Fresh and toasty, spicy and focused, this matches crisp fruit flavors of apple, citrus and pineapple to barrel-fermented grace notes. The overall length and definition are excellent, and the wine should drink well now through 2020.

title: Trione 2012 River Road Ranch Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Waxy lemon and the crisp bite of an apple open this wine ...
description: Waxy lemon and the crisp bite of an apple open this wine that builds power as it goes, becoming a full-bodied expression of Russian River apple-kissed fruit. Toasty oak and silky tannins buoy the midpalate, ending with a lift of orange citrus.

title: Franklin Tate 2013 Tate Chardonnay (Margaret River)
excerpt: This is a pretty lean, tightly focused wine. Grilled pineapple and citrus ...
description: This is a pretty lean, tightly focused wine. Grilled pineapple and citrus notes broaden slightly on the midpalate, then come together again on the crisp, lemony finish. Drink now through the end of 2015.

title: Rock Wall 2012 Estate Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Barrel-fermented, this is dripping in honey and caramel surrounded by ripe golden ...
description: Barrel-fermented, this is dripping in honey and caramel surrounded by ripe golden apple and passionfruit. Accentuating the richness is a balance of acidity and texture, making for a beautifully complex wine.

title: Neil Ellis 2012 Chardonnay (Stellenbosch)
excerpt: Subtle scents of buttered toast and candied citrus peel add interest to ...
description: Subtle scents of buttered toast and candied citrus peel add interest to the fresh tropical-fruit core of peach, guava, fig and mango. Medium acidity gives the palate good lift, while the lime-zest finish is clean and mouthwatering. Enjoy now.

title: Glen Carlou 2011 Quartz Stone Single Vineyard Chardonnay (Paarl)
excerpt: This rich, oaky selection leads with aromas of roasted almonds, honeycomb, yellow ...
description: This rich, oaky selection leads with aromas of roasted almonds, honeycomb, yellow apple and apricot preserves. Those notes carry through to the bold, round palate, partnered with assertive flavors of oak spice, toasted challah and buttered popcorn. Drink now.

title: RouteStock Cellars 2012 Route 121 Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Apple and fig are layered throughout this elegant, medium-bodied wine that offers ...
description: Apple and fig are layered throughout this elegant, medium-bodied wine that offers the ripeness of a warm vintage without veering into sweetness. The barrel impact is managed well, adding to the impact of honey and dried nuts on the finish.

title: Radford Dale 2011 Chardonnay (Stellenbosch)
excerpt: A subtle smokiness lends an intriguing streak to the nose of this ...
description: A subtle smokiness lends an intriguing streak to the nose of this wine, partnering harmoniously with scents of crisp red apple, melon rind, green fig and orange zest. Well balanced and approachable, the medium-weight palate offers clean flavors of apple, lime and softly toasted brioche. Enjoy now.

title: Springfield Estate 2011 Wild Yeast Chardonnay (Robertson)
excerpt: This opens with tropical fruit aromas of pineapple, mango and melon that ...
description: This opens with tropical fruit aromas of pineapple, mango and melon that are framed by hints of honeysuckle and sweet spice. The medium-weight palate boasts similar tropical fruit tones, but with an assertive mineral and lime-zest lift on the close, ending fresh and lively. Drink up.

title: Meyer Family Vineyards 2012 Meyer Chardonnay (Okanagan Valley)
excerpt: This has an edge, a frame of herb and skin flavors that ...
description: This has an edge, a frame of herb and skin flavors that tightens the mouthfeel. Green pineapple, cilantro, cucumber and lemon verbena are in play, with a penetrating attack and a pleasantly soft finish. The wine has a density that somehow recalls extra-virgin olive oil.

title: Kingston Family 2013 Sabino Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Dusty, oaky aromas of papaya, corn and green banana precede a full, ...
description: Dusty, oaky aromas of papaya, corn and green banana precede a full, buttery palate with matching flavors of buttery oak, papaya, creamy vanilla and green banana. Brine and popcorn notes protrude from an otherwise mild finish.

title: Kalfu 2013 Kuda Unoaked Chardonnay (Leyda Valley)
excerpt: This new brand from Ventisquero has chosen the unoaked route for this ...
description: This new brand from Ventisquero has chosen the unoaked route for this fleshy, stone-fruit driven Chardonnay that also manages to fold in tropical-fruit overtones and undertones. Nectarine, yeasty vanilla and orange flavors finish fleshy and pulpy, but generally quite fresh.

title: Armida 2013 Stuhlmuller Vineyard Chardonnay (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: This balanced wine comes from an Alexander Valley vineyard not far from ...
description: This balanced wine comes from an Alexander Valley vineyard not far from the Chalk Hill and Russian River appellations. The site is cool enough at night to help the grapes retain  acidity and a juicy, lemon-lime complexion.

title: Hill Family Estate 2012 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A majority of new French oak nestled this wine, contributing to its ...
description: A majority of new French oak nestled this wine, contributing to its dark golden color and oak intensity on the nose and palate. Slightly sweet in ripe apple and vanilla, it will benefit greatly from the enjoyment of food alongside.

title: Church & State 2012 Coyote Bowl Series Chardonnay (Okanagan Valley)
excerpt: This straight-on wine powers through with clean apple and peach fruit, wrapped ...
description: This straight-on wine powers through with clean apple and peach fruit, wrapped in a blanket of barrel toast. Full-flavored and crisp, it does not show much complexity, but plenty of toasty goodness.

title: Kobler 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Sweetly exotic in fresh-squeezed pineapple aromas, this wine might be trying too ...
description: Sweetly exotic in fresh-squeezed pineapple aromas, this wine might be trying too hard to be light and restrained, employing very little oak in the process. Pear and lemon stay on the palate the longest, the finish brisk in acidity.

title: Buena Vista 2012 Private Reserve Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
excerpt: This is an earthy and somewhat savory wine, buoyed by level acidity. ...
description: This is an earthy and somewhat savory wine, buoyed by level acidity. It offers stewed lemon and fennel around a feral nose.

title: Tokara 2012 Chardonnay (Western Cape)
excerpt: Yellow melon, apple and pear flesh all abound on the nose of ...
description: Yellow melon, apple and pear flesh all abound on the nose of this fruit-forward wine. The palate is clean and direct, with a tart, white melon-rind flavor that unfolds on the back, keeping the finish bright and lively. Drink now.

title: Loma Larga 2012 Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Peach and other stone-fruit aromas show a note of chlorinated pool water. ...
description: Peach and other stone-fruit aromas show a note of chlorinated pool water. This is fairly full in body and creamy in feel. Flavors of melon, honey and creamy oak lean toward sweet, while the finish offers tropical fruit flavors and some excess weight. Drink immediately.

title: Hungry Blonde 2012 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Light, balanced and elegant, this lilting wine offers flavors of yellow apple, ...
description: Light, balanced and elegant, this lilting wine offers flavors of yellow apple, pear and lemon custard, the acidity holding up through the finish.

title: Shoofly 2011 Chardonnay (Adelaide Hills)
excerpt: This plump, medium-weight Chardonnay features bright, fleshy pineapple flavors that finish clean ...
description: This plump, medium-weight Chardonnay features bright, fleshy pineapple flavors that finish clean and crisp. At this price, you could do a lot worse.

title: Blacksmith 2012 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Coming from an assortment of warm and cool climate vineyards and blended ...
description: Coming from an assortment of warm and cool climate vineyards and blended with 6% Roussanne, this pleasing wine offers notes of grilled corn on the cob, white peach, pepper and hay. Abundant stone fruit flavors are supported by a creamy feel, finishing just a touch bitter.

title: Cantele 2013 Chardonnay (Salento)
excerpt: This crisp Chardonnay conveys aromas of lemon blossom and mature pear. The ...
description: This crisp Chardonnay conveys aromas of lemon blossom and mature pear. The refreshing palate offers juicy yellow apple, citrus and a hint of mineral brightened by zesty acidity.

title: Hill-Smith Estate 2011 Chardonnay (Eden Valley)
excerpt: This is a rather custardy Chardonnay, with a fleshy texture and scents ...
description: This is a rather custardy Chardonnay, with a fleshy texture and scents and flavors of lemon curd and orange cream. Melon and peach flavors end on a citrusy note. Drink up.

title: Ministry of the Vinterior 2012 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This budget-minded white veers toward overripe fruit and a layering of vanilla ...
description: This budget-minded white veers toward overripe fruit and a layering of vanilla sugar yet retains enough minerality on the back end to remain vibrant and juicy.

title: MacMurray Ranch 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Elusive aromas mask an easygoing, straightforward white from the heart of the ...
description: Elusive aromas mask an easygoing, straightforward white from the heart of the Russian River Valley. Characterized by matchstick and melon, it offers layering the back palate with additional flavors of apple and pear.

title: Santa Ema 2014 Select Terroir Unoaked Chardonnay (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Dusty white-fruit and vanilla aromas are leesy and sweet smelling. The palate ...
description: Dusty white-fruit and vanilla aromas are leesy and sweet smelling. The palate on this unoaked Chardonnay is light, with modest acidity. Ripe honeydew melon and apple flavors finish soft and simple.

title: Worthy 2013 Kalaris Family Vineyard Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Crisp and flowery upon entry, this wine falls flat midpalate, offering a ...
description: Crisp and flowery upon entry, this wine falls flat midpalate, offering a lopsided amount of ripe apple, pear and lemon curd that overpowers the more subtle aspects of minerality lurking in the background.

title: River Road 2013 Un-Oaked Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Another attempt at a low-impact Chardonnay unfettered by oak, this result is ...
description: Another attempt at a low-impact Chardonnay unfettered by oak, this result is curiously confectionary and sweet. Apple flavors veer into candy territory and the wine is slightly fat instead of crisp, despite the low alcohol and stainless-steel fermentation.

title: Santa Carolina 2013 Reserva Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Harsh, resiny oak aromas are devoid of fruit. This is flat, creamy ...
description: Harsh, resiny oak aromas are devoid of fruit. This is flat, creamy and mushy in feel, with flavors of melon, powdered sugar and raw wood. The finish is resiny and candied.

title: Siegel 2014 Crucero Collection Chardonnay (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Dilute, tropical aromas of banana and salami are not inviting. This has ...
description: Dilute, tropical aromas of banana and salami are not inviting. This has a creamy, yeasty mouthfeel and bland flavors of papaya and hot dog, with a yeasty theme on the finish.

title: Domaines Barons de Rothschild (Lafite) 2014 Los Vascos Chardonnay (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Sweaty, raw, sour aromas are harsh. The palate is flat and chunky ...
description: Sweaty, raw, sour aromas are harsh. The palate is flat and chunky in feel, with pithy grapefruit, nettle and bitter green flavors. Pyrazines and bitterness ride roughshod on the finish.

title: William Cole 2014 Albamar Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Strained and oily on the nose, this lacks freshness and fruitiness. Briny ...
description: Strained and oily on the nose, this lacks freshness and fruitiness. Briny flavors are extreme and sweaty, while the finish tastes a lot like sauerkraut.

title: The Eyrie Vineyards 2012 Original Vines Reserve Chardonnay (Dundee Hills)
excerpt: Sourced from the original 1965 planting, this wine demands your patience and ...
description: Sourced from the original 1965 planting, this wine demands your patience and full attention. Displaying a deep straw, slightly tawny hue, it opens with lightly spicy, nuanced threads of mint, hay, olive oil, green banana and almond. It seems almost ephemeral, but with some hours of breathing time it opens into a full-bodied, dense and compelling wine, with the extra dimensions that old vines can provide. Drink now through 2030.

title: Babcock 2012 Top Cream Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: This appropriately named wine hits the nose with appealing aromas of vanilla ...
description: This appropriately named wine hits the nose with appealing aromas of vanilla buttercream and honeyed cashews, evened out with a limeade spritz. The palate is luscious at first, then moves into an exotic spice rack laden with seasoning salts, chopped oregano and green garlic stalks. A truly delicious, thoroughly intriguing wine.

title: Alma Rosa 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: Ripe aromas of passionfruit, kiwi and nectarine rise alongside greener elements of ...
description: Ripe aromas of passionfruit, kiwi and nectarine rise alongside greener elements of celery stalk, wet thyme and Granny Smith apple on this promising early look at the vintage. The tongue tingles throughout the sip, with flavors of crisp apple, yellow melon and crushed chalk. Buttercream appears on the finish.

title: Domaine Serene 2012 Clos du Soleil Vineyard Chardonnay (Dundee Hills)
excerpt: Scents of buttered popcorn and oiled nuts ride over a rich midpalate ...
description: Scents of buttered popcorn and oiled nuts ride over a rich midpalate with ripe kiwi, melon and apple fruits. The barrel fermentation brings a wealth of toast and butter flavors, and the length of the finish is superb.

title: Gary Farrell 2012 Rochioli Vineyard Old River Block Single Oak Puncheon Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Bright, beautiful and balanced, this tiny production wine is aflutter in high-toned ...
description: Bright, beautiful and balanced, this tiny production wine is aflutter in high-toned citrus notes, melon and peach. A well-crafted marriage of power and sophistication, the aromatics of wild jasmine shine, while texturally the wine is round and softly layered.

title: Boekenoogen 2012 Estate Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: This family-run vineyard and winery continues to excite, delivering delicious, broadly appealing ...
description: This family-run vineyard and winery continues to excite, delivering delicious, broadly appealing aromas of caramelized yellow pears with a cinnamon-butter glaze, honey-laced pineapple and lemon soda. The creamy mouthfeel carries flavors of yellow cake, lemon custard and warm peach, yet candied grapefruit peel carves a sharp line down the middle.

title: De Loach 2012 Hawk Hill Vineyard Chardonnay (Green Valley)
excerpt: Expertly balanced between crisp acidity and concentrated, creamy textures, this is fresh ...
description: Expertly balanced between crisp acidity and concentrated, creamy textures, this is fresh in orange blossom and just-picked Gravenstein apple, a wisp of orange peel and other citrus bringing the wine to life. This Chardonnay has enough stuffing to age but is immensely enjoyable now.

title: Ram's Gate 2012 Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Crisp, clean, light and bright, this is an easy-to-love Chardonnay, with a ...
description: Crisp, clean, light and bright, this is an easy-to-love Chardonnay, with a soft texture and ample concentration. Notes of citrus and fresh pear dominate, with lovely streaks of subtle spice adding depth and interest to the finish.

title: The Eyrie Vineyards 2013 Estate Chardonnay (Dundee Hills)
excerpt: Spicy pear and apple fruit is at the core, with suggestions of ...
description: Spicy pear and apple fruit is at the core, with suggestions of green pineapple, mint and lemon verbena. The subtle herbs and citrus components are layered throughout, and the structure favors long term cellaring.

title: Cebada 2012 Estate Chardonnay (Santa Ynez Valley)
excerpt: Charred oak characterizes the nose of this wine from an estate just ...
description: Charred oak characterizes the nose of this wine from an estate just 12 miles from the Pacific Ocean, but chopped dill takes the place of overpowering butter aromas. The herbs show up on the palate, hovering on pine needles, sandalwood and oak toothpicks, with lime pith keeping it fresh.

title: De Loach 2012 Heintz Vineyard Chardonnay (Green Valley)
excerpt: Citrus and apple tart mark this wine that evolves to offer barrel-rich ...
description: Citrus and apple tart mark this wine that evolves to offer barrel-rich caramel on the nose. Dark golden in color, the wine is concentrated and alive, a taste of wild Tahitian vanilla accenting it from midpalate through to the finish.

title: Joseph Phelps 2012 Pastorale Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: With a rich, caramel-teased nose, this is a full-bodied and voluptuous Chardonnay ...
description: With a rich, caramel-teased nose, this is a full-bodied and voluptuous Chardonnay that evolves in the glass to display much greater sophistication and concentration. It finishes light and lemony, rounded out by juicy stone fruit.

title: Omero 2012 Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Ripe flavors suggest vanilla banana custard, along with sweet apple and smooth ...
description: Ripe flavors suggest vanilla banana custard, along with sweet apple and smooth caramel. Some time spent in French oak brings up a finish with highlights of toasted nuts.

title: Riverbench 2013 Estate Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
excerpt: The nose is still emerging on this bottling by the historic estate, ...
description: The nose is still emerging on this bottling by the historic estate, but nectarine, white and yellow flowers and a touch of cantaloupe are starting to peek out. The flavors dance between acidity and ripeness, with green apple flesh, lemon-lime peels and brisk minerality that build into a juicy finish.

title: Carabella 2012 Dijon 76 Estate Chardonnay (Chehalem Mountains)
excerpt: Tightly wound and sculpted fruit anchors an appealing Chardonnay with ample influence ...
description: Tightly wound and sculpted fruit anchors an appealing Chardonnay with ample influence from barrel aging. In this excellent, fruit-forward vintage, plenty of weight characterizes the core apple flavors, which are wrapped in a lush coating of toast, butter pecan and nougat.

title: Martin Ray 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Golden color and tight, bright acidity characterize this wine that tingles in ...
description: Golden color and tight, bright acidity characterize this wine that tingles in balanced flavors of pear and lemon. It also offers a touch of orange blossom on the nose and caramel on the finish.

title: Gary Farrell 2012 Bacigalupi Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This is bright in notes of apple blossom, lemon and lime, with ...
description: This is bright in notes of apple blossom, lemon and lime, with additional hints of mineral and oak. Developing in the glass, it offers flavors of grapefruit and lemongrass from middle to end, while the finish is lightly marked by a honey accent.

title: La Valle 2008 Regium Brut Chardonnay (Franciacorta)
excerpt: An intense fragrance that recalls peach blossom, lemon blossom and hints of ...
description: An intense fragrance that recalls peach blossom, lemon blossom and hints of green apple lead the nose on this sparkling Chardonnay. The creamy palate delivers white peach, Golden Delicious apple, almond and lemon pastry brightened by crisp acidity and a steely mineral note. Fine bubbles add a touch of softness on the finish.

title: Sextant 2013 Chardonnay (Central Coast)
excerpt: A very smooth-smelling wine, this presents pear and lychee aromas up front ...
description: A very smooth-smelling wine, this presents pear and lychee aromas up front against a high note background of lemon syrup and lime candies. A vibrant citrus peel acidity powers the palate, but manages to be creamy too, with flavors of cooked apples and wonton skins.

title: Alta 2012 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A deep gold color combines with ripe fruit aromas and assertive, seductive ...
description: A deep gold color combines with ripe fruit aromas and assertive, seductive oak flavors like vanilla and nutmeg in this full-bodied, lush-textured, unapologetic California Chardonnay. A layer of the tasty oak flavors stays strong on the finish.

title: Wildhurst 2012 Reserve Chardonnay (Lake County)
excerpt: Abundant flavors and fresh-tasting acidity come together in this full-bodied wine to ...
description: Abundant flavors and fresh-tasting acidity come together in this full-bodied wine to form a complete, complex package. Yes, there is a vivid streak of vanilla and nutmeg from aging in all American oak barrels but the ripe apple flavors and underlying crispness keep those from overwhelming.

title: De Loach 2012 Estate Vineyard Olivet Bench Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Dark golden in hue, this is richly pungent in Gravenstein apple before ...
description: Dark golden in hue, this is richly pungent in Gravenstein apple before delving into brisk clove-tinged acidity on the palate. Softly textured and refined, the wine offers a touch of wild vanilla and honey on the mouthwatering finish.

title: B.R. Cohn 2011 Sangiacomo Vineyard Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: A barrel-fermented Chardonnay with creamy texture, this opens with bright, prominent Meyer ...
description: A barrel-fermented Chardonnay with creamy texture, this opens with bright, prominent Meyer lemon notes before delving into softer flavors of pear and vanilla on the midpalate. The acidity holds through to the finish, accented by a touch of honey.

title: Pine Ridge 2013 Dijon Clones Chardonnay (Carneros-Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is a pretty wine in terms of floral aromatics, resplendent shocks ...
description: This is a pretty wine in terms of floral aromatics, resplendent shocks of orange blossom and orange peel inviting in their exotic freshness. Lime and orange follow on the palate, which is bristling in acidity, the finish light and bright.

title: Ser 2013 Coastview Vineyard Chardonnay (Monterey County)
excerpt: This new winery from 14-year Bonny Doon assistant Nicole Walsh presents an ...
description: This new winery from 14-year Bonny Doon assistant Nicole Walsh presents an interesting nose, with elements of butter brickle candy, caramel apple and crushed macadamia nuts. There is some sandy minerality and golden apple skin grip on the palate, set against a subdued, guava cake-like tropicality that releases into the finish.

title: Greystone 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: This very versatile Chardonnay finds a nice balance between fresh fruit flavors, ...
description: This very versatile Chardonnay finds a nice balance between fresh fruit flavors, crisp acidity and relatively light body. No obvious oak influence or overripe fruit flavors cloud its appetizing, appealing and sunny personality.

title: Bodega Catena Zapata 2011 White Stones Adrianna Vineyard Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Tropical fruit aromas combine with the scents of apricot and dust to ...
description: Tropical fruit aromas combine with the scents of apricot and dust to create an almost Moscato-like bouquet. The juicy, citrusy palate carries orange and spiced-apple flavors. A hint of toast and residual resiny oak drive a juicy, pulpy finish.

title: Lo Sparviere 2007 Extra Brut Chardonnay (Franciacorta)
excerpt: Made entirely with Chardonnay, this pretty sparkler opens with aromas of white ...
description: Made entirely with Chardonnay, this pretty sparkler opens with aromas of white flower, peach and citrus backed up by a whiff of bread crust. The vibrant palate delivers Bartlett pear, mature apple, lemon zest and toasted almond alongside a soft perlage.

title: Omero 2012 Extended Tirage Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: The first impression of this low abv bottling is that it is ...
description: The first impression of this low abv bottling is that it is a bit dilute, with tart apple and lemon flavors dominating. With additional airing, it does expand and soften up the sharp edges, pulling the oak frame into focus and laying in notes of vanilla wafer and toasted grain.

title: Hendry 2013 Unoaked Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This 100% stainless-steel-fermented Chardonnay is on the money in terms of crispness ...
description: This 100% stainless-steel-fermented Chardonnay is on the money in terms of crispness and acidity. Sour lemon and sharp wet stone mark it most, the finish quick and clean. This is a great food wine.

title: Robert Mondavi 2012 Reserve Chardonnay (Carneros-Napa Valley)
excerpt: Juicy in tropical mango, coconut flake and guava, this sophisticated Chardonnay is ...
description: Juicy in tropical mango, coconut flake and guava, this sophisticated Chardonnay is measured in texture and weight, the body lean with a touch of vanilla richness on the finish.

title: Iris Vineyards 2013 After Dinner Chardonnay (Oregon)
excerpt: The residual sugar is not indicated, but this is not a super-sweet ...
description: The residual sugar is not indicated, but this is not a super-sweet dessert wine; it falls more into the off-dry camp. A mix of orange, peach and apricot fruit, slightly candied, it has buoyant acidity and a toasty finish from nine months in all new French oak. Foie gras anyone?

title: Lost Canyon 2012 Ruxton Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Kaffir lime and ripe apple skin open aromatically before soft layers of ...
description: Kaffir lime and ripe apple skin open aromatically before soft layers of sweet and sour interplay on the palate. Measured in terms of oak, the finish lingers ever so slightly with a taste of toasted caramel.

title: Madonna Estate 2012 Chardonnay (Carneros-Napa Valley)
excerpt: From organically grown grapes, this wine is barrel-fermented in French oak. On ...
description: From organically grown grapes, this wine is barrel-fermented in French oak. On the palate, it reflects that time in barrel, conveying a mix of spicy oak, exotic Asian pear and nutmeg. Well-integrated and light, it offers lilting minerality.

title: McManis 2013 Chardonnay (River Junction)
excerpt: This light-bodied Chardonnay makes a nice break from rich, heavy, oaky versions. ...
description: This light-bodied Chardonnay makes a nice break from rich, heavy, oaky versions. Aromas of dried thyme and parsley lead to pleasing fruit flavors of pear and peach. It has enough texture to fill the mouth and enough crispness to stay clean on the finish.

title: Garnet 2013 Chardonnay (Monterey County)
excerpt: This quality but affordable brand by winemaker Alison Crowe delivers smoked apple, ...
description: This quality but affordable brand by winemaker Alison Crowe delivers smoked apple, ripe lemon and wood fire on the nose. The wine is very evenly layered on the palate, with apple custard as the dominant flavor, and a fairly quick finish.

title: Perry Creek 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: Bracing acidity, bright apple flavors and a slightly buttery texture and finish ...
description: Bracing acidity, bright apple flavors and a slightly buttery texture and finish make this full-bodied, unoaked Chardonnay interesting and refreshing. Some Chardonnays are too fruity and oaky, but this one hangs back a bit, and this relative austerity encourages another sip.

title: A Blooming Hill Vineyard 2013 Chardonnay (Chehalem Mountains)
excerpt: A whiff of vitamin pill, vanilla and citrus rind leads to a ...
description: A whiff of vitamin pill, vanilla and citrus rind leads to a fresh, light wine with crisp apple fruit and a nice touch of honeycomb.

title: Vinum 2013 Chardonnay (Monterey)
excerpt: Light in color, this good-deal wine presents lime sorbet and chalk on ...
description: Light in color, this good-deal wine presents lime sorbet and chalk on the nose. That green citrus persists on the palate alongside salt, sea shell and barrel smoke.

title: Cherry Pie 2013 Cherry Tart Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: This presents a balanced nose of seared pineapple and marzipan. The palate ...
description: This presents a balanced nose of seared pineapple and marzipan. The palate shows off a judicious use of oak, with a clean line of acidity cutting through brushes of stone fruit and citrus.

title: Midnight 2012 Estate Chardonnay (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Grown on the Teresa Angela block of the estate, this riper-style Chardonnay ...
description: Grown on the Teresa Angela block of the estate, this riper-style Chardonnay offers peach custard and saffron spice on the nose. Crushed nuts and browner, aged flavors emerge once sipped, with a yeast and orange rind sour element providing complexity.

title: Jon Nathaniel 2012 Lavender Hill Chardonnay (Carneros-Napa Valley)
excerpt: Exotic tropical highlights of guava and mango lead to a slick finish ...
description: Exotic tropical highlights of guava and mango lead to a slick finish of vanilla and oak.

title: MooBuzz 2013 Chardonnay (Monterey County)
excerpt: Freshly skinned pink Gala apples, honeysuckle and barrel smoke describe the nose ...
description: Freshly skinned pink Gala apples, honeysuckle and barrel smoke describe the nose on this well-priced, slickly packaged bottling. Apples, guava and citrus combine for a reliable, even-flavored palate, good for everyday sipping.

title: Roots 2012 Fairsing Vineyard Chardonnay (Yamhill-Carlton District)
excerpt: A subtle wine, with delicate, lightly buttery flavors of apple and peach. ...
description: A subtle wine, with delicate, lightly buttery flavors of apple and peach. It gains complexity as it breathes, and rewards your attention with a medium-long finish.

title: Hoopes 2012 Hoopla Unoaked Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A clear, ripe pear note rings through this medium-bodied Chardonnay from the ...
description: A clear, ripe pear note rings through this medium-bodied Chardonnay from the aroma to the palate to the finish. Even the texture is a bit thick like pear juice, though there is some subtlety in the light vanilla and pastry cream accents.

title: Matchbook 2012 Old Head Chardonnay (Dunnigan Hills)
excerpt: Here is a solid, dry, rather full-bodied Chardonnay with a subtle floral ...
description: Here is a solid, dry, rather full-bodied Chardonnay with a subtle floral aroma. It offers savory rather than fruity flavors, rich mouthfeel and lingering finish of baking spices. Not a light pre-dinner drink but more of a match with rich sauces on pasta, poultry or pork.

title: HandCraft 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: This ioffers ripe fruit flavors, full body, rounded texture, and a rich ...
description: This ioffers ripe fruit flavors, full body, rounded texture, and a rich frosting of vanilla and butter notes from seasoning with oak.

title: Carmel Road 2013 Unoaked Chardonnay (Monterey)
excerpt: This stainless-steel-fermented wine offers a curiously herbal aroma of lemon verbena, with ...
description: This stainless-steel-fermented wine offers a curiously herbal aroma of lemon verbena, with a bit of wet slate and fresh-cut honeydew. As expected, the flavors are steely at first, with fruit flavors of ripe pear and lemon emerging in the midpalate, winding up on a distinctly tart apple-skin finish.

title: Le Vigne 2013 Kiara Barrel Select Chardonnay (Paso Robles)
excerpt: The nose is a bit astringent, with barrel smoke and pineapple as ...
description: The nose is a bit astringent, with barrel smoke and pineapple as the most appealing elements. The palate is dominated by apple, lemon custard and peach chiffon, with a bit of oak toast.

title: Tuck Beckstoffer 2011 Semper Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Muted and sour, this lemony Chardonnay from a cool vintage offers puckeringly ...
description: Muted and sour, this lemony Chardonnay from a cool vintage offers puckeringly high acidity and relatively low alcohol.

title: Lander-Jenkins 2012 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: On the lean side of the flavor spectrum, this nonetheless has an ...
description: On the lean side of the flavor spectrum, this nonetheless has an appetizing lemon and butter character. It smells like green apples and mandarin oranges with an earthy edge, tastes like a light lemon-custard and has texture just rich enough to stay interesting.

title: Schweiger 2012 Estate Bottled Chardonnay (Spring Mountain)
excerpt: Muted aromatically this wine is oaky and verging on sweet, a tad ...
description: Muted aromatically this wine is oaky and verging on sweet, a tad out of balance in terms of alcohol and power. The finish is quick.

title: Ferllen 2013 Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Oily white-fruit and oaky, resiny aromas of spearmint are severe. This is ...
description: Oily white-fruit and oaky, resiny aromas of spearmint are severe. This is a round, waxy feeling wine with a pulpy palate. Flavors of citrus and orange peel run long and woody.

title: Flying Horse 2012 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Golden in color, this full-bodied, oaky Chardonnay adds in 4% Sauvignon Blanc. ...
description: Golden in color, this full-bodied, oaky Chardonnay adds in 4% Sauvignon Blanc. Aged 16 months in French oak, it offers ripe fruit ripe that borders on confectionary.

title: Andeluna 2013 1300 Chardonnay (Uco Valley)
excerpt: Oily and pungent on the nose, this has a sweaty element to ...
description: Oily and pungent on the nose, this has a sweaty element to go with citrus aromas and flavors. As it opens, grapefruit and licorice gumdrop flavors emerge, with a toasty oak note coming up late.

title: Finca Don Carlos 2013 Calathus Roble Chardonnay (Uco Valley)
excerpt: Heavy oak aromas of vanilla and toast are dominant. Resiny oak and ...
description: Heavy oak aromas of vanilla and toast are dominant. Resiny oak and pulpy citrus characteristics drive the palate, which tastes of vanilla and salty orange. It offers a pickled, woody, almost sour finish.

title: Domiciano de Barrancas 2014 Cosecha Nocturna Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Damp and sweaty, this offers mealy citrus aromas, a heavy palate and ...
description: Damp and sweaty, this offers mealy citrus aromas, a heavy palate and a mix of bitter-finishing citrus and nuttiness.

title: Small Vines 2012 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: From an organically farmed coastal vineyard above Sebastopol comes this structured and ...
description: From an organically farmed coastal vineyard above Sebastopol comes this structured and elegant Chardonnay, rich in minerality and nuanced citrus tones. The meticulous farming guides every sip, the wine balanced and exquisite.

title: Della 2012 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Pretty in floral aromatics of orange blossom and lemon verbena, this balanced, ...
description: Pretty in floral aromatics of orange blossom and lemon verbena, this balanced, lush, delicious wine comes from a relatively new, small producer. Grapes were sourced from the Charles Ranch, which is planted to Wente Chardonnay. Apple and citrus intermingle in nice balance, as do minerality and creaminess on the texture. Though the wine spent over a year in French oak, 40% of it new, the oak is unobtrusive, detectable mostly on the finish.

title: La Follette 2012 Sangiacomo Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Crisp and balanced in bright acidity and apple skin, this also offers ...
description: Crisp and balanced in bright acidity and apple skin, this also offers subtle toasted oak and caramel, the best of both worlds, exuberant and elegant at the same time. Enjoy now or cellar until 2020.

title: Lynmar 2012 Quail Hill Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Honeysuckle and jasmine pique interest aromatically before luscious, linear waves of vanilla, ...
description: Honeysuckle and jasmine pique interest aromatically before luscious, linear waves of vanilla, caramel and lemon custard graciously interject, buoyed by ample acidity and a lush texture. This Chardonnay offers generous richness alongside high-toned minerality, and is a delicious go-to for buttery lobster dishes.

title: Talley 2012 Estate Bottled Chardonnay (Arroyo Grande Valley)
excerpt: Buttered sourdough toast and a slight nuttiness kick off another excellent Chardonnay ...
description: Buttered sourdough toast and a slight nuttiness kick off another excellent Chardonnay from the ever-reliable Talley. The palate is greeted with minerality that fades into an apple butter flavor alongside a pinch of cinnamon, culminating in a graceful vanilla finish.

title: Transcendence 2012 Rancho Santa Rosa Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: Pineapple, candied apple and a touch of guava jelly on toast achieve ...
description: Pineapple, candied apple and a touch of guava jelly on toast achieve great aromatic balance on a rare Rancho Santa Rosa Chardonnay. The flavors are lush, not racy, and evolve in a mellow fashion, from apple to nectarine and then papaya.

title: Castoro Cellars 2012 Estate Chardonnay (Paso Robles)
excerpt: A solid wine for the price, this begins with honeydew and lime ...
description: A solid wine for the price, this begins with honeydew and lime aromas. Flavors start with a spicy cinnamon apple before diving into buttered squash, melon and fresh lime, with a dash of salt.

title: Talley 2012 Chardonnay (Edna Valley)
excerpt: A sharp brine character gets warmer boosts from underlying pear, nectarine and ...
description: A sharp brine character gets warmer boosts from underlying pear, nectarine and buttered sourdough aromas. Flavors are light and bright at first, with sandy clay, vanilla cookie and custard strudel emerging on the midpalate and a line of acidity down through the finish.

title: Lombardi 2012 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Crafted from Wente clone grapes from Charles Ranch, this label is the ...
description: Crafted from Wente clone grapes from Charles Ranch, this label is the passion project of longtime wine industry player Tony Lombardi, who manages the much larger Kosta Browne brand. Barrel-fermented in neutral oak this wine offers heady Tahitian vanilla and lemon curd around green apple skin and lemon. The palate is both creamy and crisp, the finish reasonably powerful.

title: Array 2010 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This was the first release from this new, Chardonnay-only project. With its ...
description: This was the first release from this new, Chardonnay-only project. With its mix of Columbia Gorge, Ancient Lakes and Columbia Valley fruit, it immediately set a high standard. Scents of orange blossom, mineral oil and toasted pecan mingle gracefully, and in the mouth there is a steely edge that provides structural support. Drink now through 2018.

title: FEL 2012 Savoy Vineyard Chardonnay (Anderson Valley)
excerpt: Like a bouquet made of different types of flowers, this polished wine ...
description: Like a bouquet made of different types of flowers, this polished wine brings diverse elements into a pleasing whole. There are ripe tropical fruit, vanilla and butter aromas, rich apple and pear flavors, a soothing smooth texture and lingering finish.

title: Evening Land 2012 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Lean and crisp, this light, ethereal Chardonnay develops in the glass into ...
description: Lean and crisp, this light, ethereal Chardonnay develops in the glass into something more substantial and complex. Herbal and slightly savory, it intrigues and will be a nice companion to fresh green salads in a light vinaigrette.

title: Santa Barbara Winery 2012 Reserve Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: Warmed croissant yeastiness matches up with sea salt and lemon butter on ...
description: Warmed croissant yeastiness matches up with sea salt and lemon butter on the nose of this bottling from the pioneering Santa Barbara Winery. The salinity carries on the palate, with apple pie and butterscotch presenting a nicely oaked but not overdone palate.

title: Clos La Chance 2012 Harman Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: Expertly integrated butter elements mix with peach and lime spritz on the ...
description: Expertly integrated butter elements mix with peach and lime spritz on the nose. This single-vineyard Chardonnay offers stone fruit flavors, slight sea saltiness and a long vanilla finish for very easy drinking.

title: Crossbarn by Paul Hobbs 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: A tremendously well-made Chardonnay at the price and production levels, this is ...
description: A tremendously well-made Chardonnay at the price and production levels, this is lean in high-toned acidity but offers tropical goodness, a swath of lime throughout. Balanced and tense, the twist of lime comes back on the finish. This is a great wine to stock up on for larger gatherings.

title: Inman Family 2012 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Inman has not offered much Chardonnay before, but this one is highly ...
description: Inman has not offered much Chardonnay before, but this one is highly distinctive, light as a feather, floral, crisp and citrusy, basking in Chablis-like, wet stone minerality. Those looking for butter and oak should travel elsewhere; at a preposterously unheard of 11.6% alcohol, this wine offers silky, subtle intrigue.

title: Lynmar 2012 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: From a myriad of wonderful vineyards, this vibrant wine offers an incredible ...
description: From a myriad of wonderful vineyards, this vibrant wine offers an incredible deal at the price, with a lively bouquet of fennel, apple and pear. Chalky in texture with delicious acidity, it has baking spices popping up on balanced finish.

title: Chateau Burgozone 2012 Chardonnay (Danube River Plains)
excerpt: This Chardonnay breaks away from the typical varietal profile, with aromas of ...
description: This Chardonnay breaks away from the typical varietal profile, with aromas of freshly cut grass and lemongrass. Delightful tropical fruit flavors of mango, lychee and guava dominate the palate. The zesty, clean and crisp finish is characterized by flavors of lemon pith and lime juice.

title: Brown Estate 2012 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: From the well-known Zinfandel producer, this floral Chardonnay is high in balanced ...
description: From the well-known Zinfandel producer, this floral Chardonnay is high in balanced minerality and marked by darker, riper pear and apple fruit. The finish is swathed in vanilla bean and toast.

title: Lynmar 2013 Laguna Ridge Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
excerpt: This highly accessible, reasonably priced Chardonnay sees no new oak. It offers ...
description: This highly accessible, reasonably priced Chardonnay sees no new oak. It offers aromatics of orange blossom and fresh-squeezed lemon followed by a lean texture of more lemon, honeysuckle and melon. Stock up.

title: B Cellars 2012 Barrel Select Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: With fruit predominantly from the Mill Station Vineyard in cool Green Valley, ...
description: With fruit predominantly from the Mill Station Vineyard in cool Green Valley, warm baking spices and coconut macaroon embody this wine aromatically. A full body of ripe apple and vibrant minerality peaks on the finish.

title: Boomtown 2013 Chardonnay (Washington)
excerpt: This well-built wine shows just the barest hint of barrel from fermentation ...
description: This well-built wine shows just the barest hint of barrel from fermentation and aging in neutral oak which seems to have rounded out the fruit and put some polish on the mouthfeel. Flavors are a tasty mix of lemon curd, honeysuckle, apple and peach, lightly spiced.

title: Blackjack 2012 Black Cap Reserve Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: The inviting scents of melting butter on hot dinner rolls and vanilla-lemon ...
description: The inviting scents of melting butter on hot dinner rolls and vanilla-lemon custard ensure a rich wine, and the palate delivers with caramelized apples, dominant oak and more vanilla on the finish. It is balanced out with mustardy tartness and lemon rind acidity.

title: Santa Ema 2013 Amplus Chardonnay (Leyda Valley)
excerpt: Leesy, toasty opening aromas accent melon, flower blossom and stone fruit scents. ...
description: Leesy, toasty opening aromas accent melon, flower blossom and stone fruit scents. This is woody but healthy in feel, with acidic lift. Flavors of resiny, briny melon and peach finish with a wave of barrel-driven vanilla, but overall this shows coastal freshness and proper balance.

title: Trefethen 2012 Estate Chardonnay (Oak Knoll District)
excerpt: Barrel-fermented , this nonetheless offers clean, crisp flavors of pear and pineapple ...
description: Barrel-fermented , this nonetheless offers clean, crisp flavors of pear and pineapple on the palate. The fruit lingers through a medium-sized body that picks up steam on the finish, delving into richer notes of fig and lemon curd. The fruit is 100% estate.

title: Arrowood 2012 Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Lemony and toasty, this approachable wine is rich and balanced, its texture ...
description: Lemony and toasty, this approachable wine is rich and balanced, its texture soft and the flavors long-lasting, highlighted by a taste of lemon meringue.

title: Ideology 2012 Blondie Gone Wild Red Hen Vineyard Chardonnay (Oak Knoll District)
excerpt: Light in oak and mid-weight all in all, this Chardonnay from a ...
description: Light in oak and mid-weight all in all, this Chardonnay from a cooler sub-section of the Napa Valley is replete with baked apple veering into dried fruit character and a touch of vanilla.

title: Landmark 2012 Damaris Reserve Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: A pretty, floral, old-world intensity of aroma characterizes this wine. Soft and ...
description: A pretty, floral, old-world intensity of aroma characterizes this wine. Soft and supple on the palate, it offers fruit zesty in grapefruit peel and lime, before developing into richer notes of caramel and oak.

title: Summerland 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: Quite light in color, this is a lighter style of Chardonnay, kicking ...
description: Quite light in color, this is a lighter style of Chardonnay, kicking off with crispy green apple aromas mixed with a bit of barrel smoke. Lime and apple lead the lean palate, which shines with granite minerality.

title: Santa Alicia 2014 Gran Reserva de Los Andes Chardonnay (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Straightforward apple and melon aromas are lightly oaky, but mostly clean and ...
description: Straightforward apple and melon aromas are lightly oaky, but mostly clean and elegant. This Chardonnay delivers a fresh, clean palate, with a mix of oak, vanilla, banana and melon flavors. A round, properly sized and balanced finish is the final piece of framework.

title: Vini 2013 Veni Vidi Vici Chardonnay (Thracian Valley)
excerpt: Aromas of lemon zest and freshly cut grass abound on the nose. ...
description: Aromas of lemon zest and freshly cut grass abound on the nose. Flavors of lemon curd and lemon pith bring nuance to the palate.

title: VML 2012 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Lemon-lime and lemon curd mark this wine. The lemon theme continues throughout ...
description: Lemon-lime and lemon curd mark this wine. The lemon theme continues throughout the layers of apple, vanilla and oak, the oak not perceptible until near the round, voluptuous finish.

title: Arboleda 2013 Chardonnay (Aconcagua Costa)
excerpt: Dusty apple, mild citrus and vanilla aromas come in front of a ...
description: Dusty apple, mild citrus and vanilla aromas come in front of a round, slightly oily feeling palate with bright acidity. Flavors of orange, green apple, lemon and nectarine finish on a popcorn note imparted by oak.

title: J. Lohr 2012 Arroyo Vista Chardonnay (Arroyo Seco)
excerpt: A rich golden yellow in color, this offers warm vanilla aromas that ...
description: A rich golden yellow in color, this offers warm vanilla aromas that tighten into pineapple, lemon-lime soda and roasted nuts. Rounded fruit flavors are coated in buttercream, with a slightly hot finish. Great option for the oaked Chard crowd.

title: Bread & Butter 2012 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: A hearty bottle of Chardonnay with the simplest label you could imagine, ...
description: A hearty bottle of Chardonnay with the simplest label you could imagine, it emphasizes earthy, oaky, buttery flavors over fruit components. This is medium-bodied, dry, rich in texture and moderately tannic.

title: Columbia Crest 2013 Reserve Estate Unoaked Chardonnay (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: Fermented in concrete and aged sur lie for five months, it brings ...
description: Fermented in concrete and aged sur lie for five months, it brings notes of pear and pineapple with mineral accents. The palate is lighter in style with a supple feel, finishing a bit short.

title: Cramele Halewood 2013 La Umbra Chardonnay (Terasele Dunarii)
excerpt: This wine is medium straw in color, with aromas of perfumed talcum ...
description: This wine is medium straw in color, with aromas of perfumed talcum powder and green apple on the nose. It is smooth on the palate, with white stone fruit flavors and a soft finish.

title: Gibbs 2012 Terroir NV Block Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: There is dialed-high acidity on the front palate of this wine, followed ...
description: There is dialed-high acidity on the front palate of this wine, followed by lean layers of pineapple and fig. Aged in 40% new French oak, the toast notes are subtle and the finish satisfyingly soft.

title: Cramele Recas 2012 Dreamfish Chardonnay (Recas)
excerpt: Tropical from nose to palate, this wine shows lemon and caramelized banana ...
description: Tropical from nose to palate, this wine shows lemon and caramelized banana on the bouquet, with guava and mango driving the flavors. The finish is smooth and rounded.

title: Santa Ema 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Leyda Valley)
excerpt: Pear and melon aromas get a boost from the barrel, but ultimately ...
description: Pear and melon aromas get a boost from the barrel, but ultimately the nose on this Chardonnay is simple. In the mouth, things run smooth. Barrel-related flavors of spice, hickory and toast dominate white-fruit notes, while the finish is oaky but balanced in feel.

title: Materra 2012 Estate Grown Chardonnay (Oak Knoll District)
excerpt: Aged in a majority of neutral French oak, the wine has opening ...
description: Aged in a majority of neutral French oak, the wine has opening aromas that impart generous toasty characteristics before mellowing into nutty, vanilla swirls and a lingering taste of green apple.

title: Naughty Boy 2012 Thornton Ranch Chardonnay (Potter Valley)
excerpt: The sunny personality shows ripe pear, vanilla and melted butter flavors, medium ...
description: The sunny personality shows ripe pear, vanilla and melted butter flavors, medium body, a nicely smooth texture and some fresh acidity. The typical California fruitiness seems well complemented by oak.

title: Migration 2012 Searby Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: A site planted to the Rued clone of Chardonnay in classic Russian ...
description: A site planted to the Rued clone of Chardonnay in classic Russian River Valley Goldridge soils, Searby is expressive in honeysuckle and orange blossom floral tones. This balanced wine is soft and round, its time in oak reaching an apex on the finish.

title: Black Box 2013 Platinum Chardonnay (Central Coast)
excerpt: A strong showing for wine that comes in a box, this begins ...
description: A strong showing for wine that comes in a box, this begins with aromas of nectarine and peach before delivering stone fruit flavors on the palate as well. A touch of bitter tension on the end makes for a solid value wine, great for camping and parties.

title: Migration 2012 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Fruity and robust in apple and tropical citrus, this is well-defined and ...
description: Fruity and robust in apple and tropical citrus, this is well-defined and balanced in terms of oak and richness, the aromatics a tad muted. Fermentation occurred in both stainless steel and French oak.

title: La Chertosa 2012 Reserve Chardonnay (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: From Sam Sebastiani comes this Chardonnay made in a classic California manner. ...
description: From Sam Sebastiani comes this Chardonnay made in a classic California manner. Rich in buttery oak and sweet vanilla, the grapes are a mix of Wente and older clones, fermented and aged in a combination of French oak, a third of it new.

title: Caliterra 2013 Tributo Single Vineyard Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Due to heafty oak treament, the aroma of popcorn dominates the nose, ...
description: Due to heafty oak treament, the aroma of popcorn dominates the nose, and the palate is broad and creamy. Flavors of apple, pear, melon and raw oak show a dusting of powdered sugar, with a long, toasty, vanilla-laden finish.

title: Three Sticks 2012 One Sky Chardonnay (Sonoma Mountain)
excerpt: From a vineyard on the southeastern side of Sonoma Mountain this spent ...
description: From a vineyard on the southeastern side of Sonoma Mountain this spent more than a year in French oak, half of it new. Golden in color, it features quiet aromatics of coconut and tropical pineapple around light minerality and a citrus-tinged finish.

title: McFadden 2013 Blue Quail Chardonnay (Potter Valley)
excerpt: Fresh and apparently unoaked, this offers an appealing floral aroma, with a ...
description: Fresh and apparently unoaked, this offers an appealing floral aroma, with a slight buttery accent over the crisp apple flavors. It is light to medium-bodied, soft in texture, showing no apparent oak flavors but instead straightforward fruit character.

title: Leyda 2014 Chardonnay (Leyda Valley)
excerpt: Apple and citrus aromas carry the simplistic nose. A narrow, acidic palate ...
description: Apple and citrus aromas carry the simplistic nose. A narrow, acidic palate is pure and juicy, with lean, slightly green, citrus flavors that finish tangy, with notes of orange and lime.

title: Montes 2013 Alpha Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: The nose hints at green aromas of cool-climate fruits underneath heavy oak. ...
description: The nose hints at green aromas of cool-climate fruits underneath heavy oak. This feels linear on the palate, while flavors of clove, pyrazine and tart apple lead to a slightly oaky finish.

title: Entwine 2012 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: Subtle flavors and a rather lush texture make this medium-bodied Chardonnay very ...
description: Subtle flavors and a rather lush texture make this medium-bodied Chardonnay very pleasant to taste. The aromas are like melon and apple, the flavors are modestly fruity and minerally, and the finish is clean. It was produced by the Food Network and Wente Vineyards.

title: Leyda 2013 Single Vineyard Falaris Hill Chardonnay (Leyda Valley)
excerpt: Dusty apple, oak and waxy aromas precede a juicy, ocean-influenced palate. Flavors ...
description: Dusty apple, oak and waxy aromas precede a juicy, ocean-influenced palate. Flavors of pineapple and mango cover the tropical side of the fence, while grassy notes and a touch of bell pepper bring vegetal hints. On the finish, citrus and apple flavors skid along on a wave of cutting acidity.

title: Chloe 2012 Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Made by winemaker Georgetta Dane, this white is awash in kumquat and ...
description: Made by winemaker Georgetta Dane, this white is awash in kumquat and vanilla, the medium-bodied layers of texture soft and round and accessible to a broad range of palates.

title: Santa Rita 2013 Medalla Real Gran Reserva Chardonnay (Leyda Valley)
excerpt: Pear and vanilla aromas are modest on the nose. The palate is ...
description: Pear and vanilla aromas are modest on the nose. The palate is round, boasting melon and apple notes that finish rather abruptly.

title: Ironstone 2013 Chardonnay (Lodi)
excerpt: Light and charming, this offers floral aromas, tropical fruit flavors, perhaps a ...
description: Light and charming, this offers floral aromas, tropical fruit flavors, perhaps a touch of sweetness, a smooth texture, medium body and appley finish. It should be refreshing when well chilled.

title: Lomas del Valle 2013 Coastal Cool Climate Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Pleasant melon and pear aromas show sea-spray notes as the wine breathes. ...
description: Pleasant melon and pear aromas show sea-spray notes as the wine breathes. The palate is fresh and coastal in feel, with green melon and tropical fruit flavors that finish a touch salty.

title: Truett Hurst 2012 Swallowtail Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Aromas are wintery in baking spices and cinnamon stick. Flavors follow suit, ...
description: Aromas are wintery in baking spices and cinnamon stick. Flavors follow suit, awash in rich vanilla and butterscotch with a layering of ripe tropical fruit and apple.

title: Dante Robere 2012 Chardonnay (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: The deep gold-brown color hints that this will be something unusual. Made ...
description: The deep gold-brown color hints that this will be something unusual. Made in an overtly oaky style, this smells toasty and buttery and tastes like that too. Some will love it but more fruit flavor would balance out the apparently heavy winemaking inputs.

title: Six Mile Creek 2012 Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Intense aromas of smoke, nuts and dried hay lend a savory note ...
description: Intense aromas of smoke, nuts and dried hay lend a savory note to this, woody Chardonnay. Fresh apple and lemon flavors are bright and brisk on the palate, but compete for spotlight amidst unyielding tones of American oak.

title: La Merika 2012 Chardonnay (Central Coast)
excerpt: Sparse on the nose at first with some emergent minerality and ripe ...
description: Sparse on the nose at first with some emergent minerality and ripe green apple, this relies on a tension between chalky, grapefruit skin bitterness and ripe green pears.

title: Santa Alicia 2014 Reserva Espiritu de Los Andes Estate Bottled Chardonnay (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: This simple Chardonnay is tropical fruit driven, with a floral aroma and ...
description: This simple Chardonnay is tropical fruit driven, with a floral aroma and a twang of resiny oak. The palate seems slightly disjointed in feel, briny in flavor and citric on the finish.

title: Rayun 2014 Chardonnay (Central Valley)
excerpt: This has a plump, yeasty, leesy feel, with tropical fruit and lychee ...
description: This has a plump, yeasty, leesy feel, with tropical fruit and lychee aromas. Flavors of bread and white fruit unfold on the palate, with notes of banana and papaya on the finish.

title: Santa Rita 2012 Reserva Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: A tropical fruit aroma drives the nose while the round palate brings ...
description: A tropical fruit aroma drives the nose while the round palate brings flavors of lemon and melon pith.

title: Salon 2002 Le Mesnil Blanc de Blancs Brut Chardonnay (Champagne)
excerpt: The 35th and most recent vintage of Salon since the house was ...
description: The 35th and most recent vintage of Salon since the house was founded in 1905 is memorable and magnificent. Made only from Chardonnay grown in the Grand Cru village of Le Mesnil-sur-Oger, it combines intense minerality, a crisp textured core and the beginnings of maturity. The depths of this wine, with its layers of fruit and steeliness, are superb. Even after 12 years, it still needs to age further. Drink from 2018.

title: Olivier Leflaive 2012  Montrachet
excerpt: The true glory of white Burgundy should always be revealed by Montrachet. ...
description: The true glory of white Burgundy should always be revealed by Montrachet. This wine, with its wonderful combination of ripe fruits and dense, intense structure, does just that. It has power, a serious intent for aging and a range of delicious fruits. Still young, it is not for early drinking, so wait until 2019.

title: Olivier Leflaive 2012 Clos Saint-Marc Premier Cru  (Chassagne-Montrachet)
excerpt: Combining richness and structure, this is a beautifully ripe wine. The wood ...
description: Combining richness and structure, this is a beautifully ripe wine. The wood aging is still showing strongly, although there is already opulent competition with the apricot and peach fruits that are cut with orange zest acidity. A strongly textured charactergives the wine an impressive shape and long-term aging. Drink from 2019.

title: Olivier Leflaive 2012 Les Pucelles Premier Cru  (Puligny-Montrachet)
excerpt: Intense fruit shines through the toast and youthful acidity of this opulent ...
description: Intense fruit shines through the toast and youthful acidity of this opulent wine. A generous structure will develop in concentration, bringing out the rich apricot and pear flavors. This is a grand wine, waiting to age. Drink from 2018.

title: La Chablisienne 2011 Les Clos Grand Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: The most serious of the Chablis Grand Crus has produced here a ...
description: The most serious of the Chablis Grand Crus has produced here a wine that combines that firmer nature with generous yellow fruits, toast and tender acidity. A strong sense of structure partners with a steely core and mineral texture that firms up the fruit and promises aging. Drink from 2017.

title: La Chablisienne 2011 Blanchot Grand Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: Still tight and closed, this has the potential to be a very ...
description: Still tight and closed, this has the potential to be a very fine Grand Cru. It has a tight, steely character, a texture that brings out nervy minerality and the beginnings of rich citrus and white fruits. With the light touch of wood aging, this will age well. Drink from 2017.

title: Olivier Leflaive 2012 Abbaye de Morgeot Premier Cru  (Chassagne-Montrachet)
excerpt: The wine has so much structure and tension. It is wound up ...
description: The wine has so much structure and tension. It is wound up and tight, full of acidity as well as the potential for rich fruits. A steely texture powers up the concentration of this wine, which has a strongly toasty component at this stage. Drink from 2018.

title: Olivier Leflaive 2012 Charmes Premier Cru  (Meursault)
excerpt: This is full of steely acidity as well as complex fruit. It ...
description: This is full of steely acidity as well as complex fruit. It is rich, full of toast and spice that show up the generous swathes of yellow fruits that are just beginning to show their glory. It will develop over many years. Drink from 2017.

title: La Chablisienne 2012 Mont de Milieu Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: From one of the best known of the Chablis Premier Crus, this ...
description: From one of the best known of the Chablis Premier Crus, this generous, rounded wine delivers ripe yellow fruitiness and a full mouth feel. White peaches give the wine warmth, crispened with sliced apple freshness and a touch of citrus. Drink from 2017.

title: Jean-Luc and Paul Aegerter 2012 Corton Charlemagne Grand Cru  (Corton-Charlemagne)
excerpt: The power and structure of a Corton-Charlemagne are very evident in this ...
description: The power and structure of a Corton-Charlemagne are very evident in this firm and closed wine. At this young stage, it is all about the concentrated texture and weight. The acidity and the rich fruits will come later. Drink from 2018.

title: Stoller 2012 Reserve Chardonnay (Dundee Hills)
excerpt: Well-crafted and bright, with restrained (15% new) use of oak barrels, this ...
description: Well-crafted and bright, with restrained (15% new) use of oak barrels, this estate-grown reserve brings a luscious mix of lemon, lime and tangerine fruit flavors into focus. The mouthfeel is just puckery enough, without being at all sour, and the complexity builds through a lingering finish.

title: La Chablisienne 2012 Fourchaume Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: While the wine has all the steely crispness you expect in a ...
description: While the wine has all the steely crispness you expect in a Chablis, it also offers ripe fruitiness that gives a full-bodied, round character. Acidity cuts through to give a lift to the fruit and to the tight texture of this young wine. It should age until 2015.

title: Simonnet-Febvre 2012 Mont de Milieu Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: The wine is fresh, its baked apple and green plum fruit cut ...
description: The wine is fresh, its baked apple and green plum fruit cut with intense citrus. The vineyard, with its pure chalk soil, shows strongly in the minerality and steely texture of the wine, promising aging. Drink this complex wine from 2016.

title: La Chablisienne 2012 Vaulorent Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: The wine is soft, fruity and opulent, with apples and a touch ...
description: The wine is soft, fruity and opulent, with apples and a touch of melon. It also has the fine Chablis steeliness that gives a crisp edge to the warm, ripe and rounded fruit. It still needs time to bring out the full fruitiness. Drink from 2017.

title: Delamotte 2004 Blanc de Blancs Brut Chardonnay (Champagne)
excerpt: This is the best Delamotte vintage since 1996, a ripe and rich ...
description: This is the best Delamotte vintage since 1996, a ripe and rich wine that brings out the chalky soil character with a strong mineral content. It has weight along with a relatively high dosage that gives softness. It is balanced, fruity and ready to drink.

title: Olivier Leflaive 2012 Poruzots Premier Cru  (Meursault)
excerpt: At this stage, this is a wood-dominated wine. Its potential is considerable ...
description: At this stage, this is a wood-dominated wine. Its potential is considerable because beneath this wood and toast awaits a wonderful range of ripe apples, apricots and mango that promise to develop into a full, generous wine. Keep until 2018.

title: Ferrari 2006 Riserva Lunelli Chardonnay (Trento)
excerpt: Freshly baked bread, toasted hazelnut, yellow apple, ginger, subtle oak and vanilla ...
description: Freshly baked bread, toasted hazelnut, yellow apple, ginger, subtle oak and vanilla are some of the sensations conveyed by this sophisticated sparkler. Made from 100% Chardonnay, it boasts a remarkably refined mousse and bright acidity. It also has great length and a crisp, dry finish.

title: Rotari 2006 Flavio Riserva Brut Chardonnay (Trento)
excerpt: Citrus, peach and toasted aromas lead the nose on this creamy sparkler. ...
description: Citrus, peach and toasted aromas lead the nose on this creamy sparkler. Made entirely with Chardonnay, the palate delivers candied lemon zest, mature Golden Delicious apple and apricot brightened by fresh acidity. It finishes on a ginger note.

title: La Chablisienne 2012 Vaillons Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: Soft and full-bodied, this offers bright apple and citrus fruits layered with ...
description: Soft and full-bodied, this offers bright apple and citrus fruits layered with toast from wood aging. Under the broad exterior, the wine is developing more tangy, zesty fruits and a tight texture. It needs to age to bring everything together. Drink from 2017.

title: Simonnet-Febvre 2012 Montmains Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: The wine is tight and closed, hiding its natural fruitiness. For the ...
description: The wine is tight and closed, hiding its natural fruitiness. For the moment, what is showing is acidity and a strongly mineral texture. This complex wine needs aging to fill out the structure. Drink from 2017.

title: Evening Land 2012 Seven Springs Vineyard Chardonnay (Eola-Amity Hills)
excerpt: Already drinking nicely, this offers generously ripened peach, candied lemon and pineapple ...
description: Already drinking nicely, this offers generously ripened peach, candied lemon and pineapple fruits. The lush flavors are balanced against fresh, natural acidity, with little or no time in new oak apparent.

title: Brewer-Clifton 2011 3D Sparkling Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: Sta. Rita Hills stars Greg Brewer and Steve Clifton deliver a golden-hued ...
description: Sta. Rita Hills stars Greg Brewer and Steve Clifton deliver a golden-hued sparkler with aromas of yellow flowers, fresh picked pears and pressed apples. It explodes on the palate with lemon zest followed by a cooked apple soda, with a touch of tannic tartness on the end.

title: Pascal Bouchard 2013 Montmains Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: Totally fresh, this is crisp and packed with citrus. A complex, tight ...
description: Totally fresh, this is crisp and packed with citrus. A complex, tight texture brings out nervy acidity, a strongly mineral character and a firm structure. Age this youthful wine and drink from 2018.

title: Enrico Gatti 2007 Millesimo Brut Chardonnay (Franciacorta)
excerpt: Made with 100% Chardonnay, this creamy wine delivers golden apple, Bartlett pear, ...
description: Made with 100% Chardonnay, this creamy wine delivers golden apple, Bartlett pear, bread crust and pastry cream sensations. Vibrant acidity brightens the juicy palate while the fine perlage adds elegance.

title: Gloria Ferrer 2010 Late Disgorged Blanc de Blancs Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Intoxicating in vanilla and peach, the aromas telegraphing honeysuckle and anise, this ...
