description: Intoxicating in vanilla and peach, the aromas telegraphing honeysuckle and anise, this balanced, dry vintage Brut from 100% Chardonnay grapes is soft, food-friendly and easy to drink.

title: Albert Morot 2012 Aigrots Premier Cru  (Beaune)
excerpt: Aigrots is one of the Beaune premier crus that produces white as ...
description: Aigrots is one of the Beaune premier crus that produces white as well red wines. In its white manifestation, it is full and dense with structure and ripe fruitiness. A rich wine, it has textured white fruits that are underlined by toastiness. Drink from 2017.

title: Olivier Leflaive 2012  Chassagne-Montrachet
excerpt: The wine is structured and concentrated, showing a strong sense of minerality. ...
description: The wine is structured and concentrated, showing a strong sense of minerality. Citrus and ripe apple fruits are complemented by richer apricot, always cut through with acidity and a tense texture. It needs to age, drink from 2016.

title: Domaine Ellevin 2012 Vaucoupin Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: The wine is still young, with a dense and full-bodied series of ...
description: The wine is still young, with a dense and full-bodied series of flavors that are still developing. As it matures the ripe yellow fruits will come through strongly, assisted by the citrus zest and contrasting with the tight, nervy texture. Expect the wine to be ready in 2016.

title: Montenisa NV Saten Chardonnay (Franciacorta)
excerpt: Made with 100% Chardonnay, this opens with a delicate fragrance that recalls ...
description: Made with 100% Chardonnay, this opens with a delicate fragrance that recalls white flower, ripe apple and a whiff of breadcrust. The creamy palate offers white peach, candied citrus and white almond alongside a soft, persistent mousse.

title: Adelsheim 2012 Stoller Vineyard Chardonnay (Dundee Hills)
excerpt: A tiny production wine, this is rich, tart and vividly fruity. The ...
description: A tiny production wine, this is rich, tart and vividly fruity. The generous mix of citrus, apple and peach fruit is augmented by barrel fermentation flavors of toasted hazelnuts, caramel and baking spices. Though made with traditional Burgundian techniques, the flavors are New Worldly, bright and fruit-driven.

title: Tendil & Lombardi NV Blanc de Blancs Brut Chardonnay (Champagne)
excerpt: The wine has all the right crispness and steeliness of a Blanc ...
description: The wine has all the right crispness and steeliness of a Blanc de Blancs Chardonnay. It also has warmth, yellow fruits along with a touch of apple. That makes a wine that is full-bodied while not missing out on a tight, very fresh aftertaste.

title: Il Mosnel 2009 EBB Extra Brut Chardonnay (Franciacorta)
excerpt: Aromas suggest pastry crust, almonds, spice, and lemon zest. The vibrant palate ...
description: Aromas suggest pastry crust, almonds, spice, and lemon zest. The vibrant palate doles out Golden Delicious apple, white grapefruit, clove and toasted walnut alongside smooth, persistent bubbles.

title: Bellavista 2009 Saten Chardonnay (Franciacorta)
excerpt: Displaying its Chardonnay pedigree, this creamy sparkler opens with a floral fragrance ...
description: Displaying its Chardonnay pedigree, this creamy sparkler opens with a floral fragrance of peach blossom, acacia, honey and walnut. Golden Delicious apple and citrus dominate the palate, balanced by bright acidity. It finishes on a hazelnut note.

title: Equinox NV Blanc de Blanc Chardonnay (Monterey)
excerpt: Aromas of toast, green apple and underripe pear waft from this straight-ahead ...
description: Aromas of toast, green apple and underripe pear waft from this straight-ahead bubbly from a sparkling-focused winery on the Westside of Santa Cruz. Golden apple, lemon-lime and yeastiness carry the palate, with a touch of lemon cream.

title: Olivier Leflaive 2012  Meursault
excerpt: This full-bodied wine has swathes of ripe yellow fruits and juicy wood ...
description: This full-bodied wine has swathes of ripe yellow fruits and juicy wood and acidity. Under this opulent surface, a more steely character gives the wine structure that will allow it to age. It will be ready to drink by 2016.

title: Manuel Olivier 2012 Premier Cru  (Meursault)
excerpt: This is a blend of grapes from a number of Premier Cru ...
description: This is a blend of grapes from a number of Premier Cru parcels. It gives a rich, ripe and fruity wine with a good depth of flavor and strong signs of the wood aging. At this stage, the wood is leaving some bitterness and toast, but this will round out. Drink from 2017.

title: Barone Pizzini 2010 Saten Chardonnay (Franciacorta)
excerpt: Made with organically grown Chardonnay, this opens with aromas of chamomile, acacia ...
description: Made with organically grown Chardonnay, this opens with aromas of chamomile, acacia and exotic fruit. The soft, round palate offers ripe yellow apple, vanilla and a hint of baking spices alongside a subtle mousse.

title: Lantieri de Paratico NV Saten Chardonnay (Franciacorta)
excerpt: Made with 100% Chardonnay, this creamy sparkler opens with aromas of hawthorn, ...
description: Made with 100% Chardonnay, this creamy sparkler opens with aromas of hawthorn, peach and a whiff of bread crust. The palate reveals candied nectarine zest and golden apple alongside a soft perlage. It ends on a note of white almond.

title: Rotari NV Brut Chardonnay (Trento)
excerpt: This well-priced sparkler opens with aromas of toast, yellow apple, nut butter ...
description: This well-priced sparkler opens with aromas of toast, yellow apple, nut butter and a hint of honey. On the palate, fine bubbles and crisp acidity balance the pear, citrus zest and roasted walnut flavors.

title: Villa Crespia NV Novalia Chardonnay (Franciacorta)
excerpt: Fragrances suggest white and yellow flowers, stone fruit, pear and a whiff ...
description: Fragrances suggest white and yellow flowers, stone fruit, pear and a whiff of brioche. Displaying its 100% Chardonnay pedigree, the palate delivers Golden Delicious apple, white pear, citrus peel and notes of Mediterranean herb alongside bright acidity and a soft mousse.

title: Olivier Leflaive 2012 En Remilly Premier Cru  (Saint-Aubin)
excerpt: With strong wood flavors giving structure to this otherwise fruity wine, this ...
description: With strong wood flavors giving structure to this otherwise fruity wine, this is a work in progress. It has delicious juicy peach and melon fruit, a full and rounded character and tight, refreshing final acidity. But wait until 2016 for the wine to be ready.

title: Boizel NV Brut Chardonnay (Champagne)
excerpt: This steely, almost bone-dry Chardonnay is very fresh and still young in ...
description: This steely, almost bone-dry Chardonnay is very fresh and still young in bottle. It is bright, full of citrus and apple flavors, with a touch of quince and layers of youthful acidity. Age until at least mid-2015 before drinking.

title: Ricci Curbastro 2009 Brut Saten Chardonnay (Franciacorta)
excerpt: Made entirely with Chardonnay, this delivers delicate aromas of stone fruit, citrus ...
description: Made entirely with Chardonnay, this delivers delicate aromas of stone fruit, citrus and white almond. The bright palate offers up mature yellow apple, vanilla and a hint of lemon pastry alongside a persistent perlage.

title: Tasca d'Almerita 2010 Almerita Brut Chardonnay (Contea di Sclafani)
excerpt: Made with 100% Chardonnay, this Sicilian sparkler opens with yeasty aromas of ...
description: Made with 100% Chardonnay, this Sicilian sparkler opens with yeasty aromas of toasted bread crust and whiffs of fragrant flowers. The vibrant palate delivers citrus and yellow apple alongside a polished mousse.

title: Bodega Catena Zapata 2012 Catena Alta Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Right off the bat this is one woody Chardonnay. Aromas of toasted ...
description: Right off the bat this is one woody Chardonnay. Aromas of toasted nuts, minerality and baked white fruits feed into a low-acid, chunky palate. Flavors of melon, papaya and oak finish creamy, smooth and resiny.

title: Jean-Luc and Paul Aegerter 2011 Les Morgeots Premier Cru  (Chassagne-Montrachet)
excerpt: This rich and full-bodied wine brings out the structure of a Chassagne ...
description: This rich and full-bodied wine brings out the structure of a Chassagne premier cru. It has generous fruits and a toasty structure. Drink from 2017.

title: Domaine Jean Monnier et Fils 2012 Mersault-Charmes Premier Cru  (Meursault)
excerpt: Wood and ripe fruitiness are the hallmarks of this open, rounded wine.Attractive ...
description: Wood and ripe fruitiness are the hallmarks of this open, rounded wine.Attractive apple and citrus flavors give a lemon zest character. At the end, the acidity comes in strongly.

title: Manuel Olivier 2012  Meursault
excerpt: A ripe wine, this is full in the mouth and full of ...
description: A ripe wine, this is full in the mouth and full of fruit. Apricots and lemons go well together for a rich while crisp mouthful. The wood aging over 18 months only shows fleetingly, leaving fruit as the main thrust. It finishes with plenty of fresh acidity. Drink from 2016.

title: Rotari 2008 Alpe Regis Extra Brut Chardonnay (Trento)
excerpt: Made solely with Chardonnay, this delivers a delicate floral fragrance of white ...
description: Made solely with Chardonnay, this delivers a delicate floral fragrance of white wild flowers while the palate offers up yellow apple, peach and citrus. Fresh and vibrant, it has an easygoing but refined character that makes it perfect for any occasion.

title: Vignerons de Buxy 2011 Les Chaniots Premier Cru  (Montagny)
excerpt: A full, fruity wine, this is softly textured and creamily ready to ...
description: A full, fruity wine, this is softly textured and creamily ready to drink. Lime juice and crisp apples are underlined by the faint flavor of oak from wood aging. The acidity gives wonderfully drinkable freshness.

title: Cave des Grands Crus Blancs 2013 Vieilles Vignes  (Pouilly-Vinzelles)
excerpt: From vines that are up to 70 years old, this is a ...
description: From vines that are up to 70 years old, this is a single-parcel wine. It is rich, with some good concentration and a mineral edge. Ripe apricot and apple fruits are combined with a tight acidity that suggests the need to age. Drink from late 2015.

title: Irvine Family Vineyards 2012 Ashland Chardonnay (Oregon)
excerpt: A whiff of volatility distracts a bit from an otherwise enjoyable wine ...
description: A whiff of volatility distracts a bit from an otherwise enjoyable wine that has notes of butterscotch, tapioca and spice. The palate is medium bodied with sweet tropical fruit flavors. Tasted twice with consistent notes.

title: Romain Bouchard 2012 Le Grand Bois  (Chablis)
excerpt: Soft and creamy, this has a smooth texture with vanilla and baked ...
description: Soft and creamy, this has a smooth texture with vanilla and baked apple flavors cut through with full acidity. It feels rich, full in the mouth, fresh and ripe at the same time. Drink from 2015.

title: Domaine Chanzy 2012 En Rosey  (Rully)
excerpt: Smooth and soft wine, this is filled with apricot and green plum ...
description: Smooth and soft wine, this is filled with apricot and green plum fruits. A clean cut of acidity brings out fresh acidity as well as a steely texture at the end. It is ready to drink.

title: Mascota 2013 La Mascota Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Baked apple and butterscotch aromas convey a sense of ripeness and oak. ...
description: Baked apple and butterscotch aromas convey a sense of ripeness and oak. The palate feels round and creamy, but not flabby. Melon, apple, vanilla and caramel flavors are ripe and end with just enough acidity to maintain balance.

title: Simonnet-Febvre 2012  Chablis
excerpt: This is a crisp style of Chablis, bringing out a steely side ...
description: This is a crisp style of Chablis, bringing out a steely side while keeping fruitiness to the fore. Apple and freshly sliced melon are given texture by the citrus zest and bright acidity. Drink now.

title: Antica Fratta 2010 Essence Saten Chardonnay (Franciacorta)
excerpt: Aromas of white flower, herb and apricot lead the nose. Made solely ...
description: Aromas of white flower, herb and apricot lead the nose. Made solely with Chardonnay, the palate delivers yellow apple, citrus and roasted nut paste alongside a soft mousse. Bitter walnut marks the finish.

title: Altemasi 2010 Brut Chardonnay (Trento)
excerpt: Aromas of peach blossom, citrus and a yeasty note of fresh biscuits ...
description: Aromas of peach blossom, citrus and a yeasty note of fresh biscuits lead the nose on this 100% Chardonnay. The palate offers walnut husk, lemon zest and a confectionary note alongside sharp acidity.

title: Luretta NV Principessa Brut Chardonnay (Vino Spumante)
excerpt: Aromas of green apple, dill, bread crust and almond continue on to ...
description: Aromas of green apple, dill, bread crust and almond continue on to the palate along with a hint of thyme. It has medium-sized, persistent bubbles that carry through to the off-dry finish.

title: Lo Sparviere 2008 Brut Chardonnay (Franciacorta)
excerpt: An almost neutral nose eventually reveals subdued aromas of white flower and ...
description: An almost neutral nose eventually reveals subdued aromas of white flower and a whiff of citrus. The shy palate offers hints of apple, peach and white almond alongside brisk acidity.

title: Jean-Luc and Paul Aegerter 2011 Colette  (Coteaux Bourguignons)
excerpt: The wine is fresh and crisp with a tangy texture that suggests ...
description: The wine is fresh and crisp with a tangy texture that suggests a strongly mineral character. Slowly, a more creamy feel comes through, bringing out melon and pear flavors. Drink this attractive wine now.

title: Domaine Louis Moreau 2013  Petit Chablis
excerpt: The outer fringes of Chablis produce Petit Chablis, a light style of ...
description: The outer fringes of Chablis produce Petit Chablis, a light style of wine that, like this, can be fruity and drinkable young. Fresh acidity and a light, crisp aftertaste offer refreshment.

title: Domaine Chatelain 2013  Petit Chablis
excerpt: A simple, fruity wine, this offers attractive citrus flavors and a ripe ...
description: A simple, fruity wine, this offers attractive citrus flavors and a ripe texture. Yellow fruits add richness while the acidity shoots through at the end.

title: Santa Ana 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Melon and tropical-fruit aromas precede a juice-like palate that struggles with mouthfeel. ...
description: Melon and tropical-fruit aromas precede a juice-like palate that struggles with mouthfeel. Flavors of mealy apple and peach finish with melon and green banana notes. Overall this is just good enough to enjoy as a quaffer.

title: Pascal Bouchard 2013 Le Classique  (Chablis)
excerpt: With flavors of vanilla and caramel, this is rounded and full in ...
description: With flavors of vanilla and caramel, this is rounded and full in the mouth. It passes up on a steely, edgy texture in favor of a warm and rich character. The result is a wine that is soft and needs to be drunk now.

title: Trapiche 2013 Oak Cask Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Apple, straw and oily aromas are bland. This smacks down with malic ...
description: Apple, straw and oily aromas are bland. This smacks down with malic acid but then hollows out as mild citrus, melon and honey flavors take hold. The finish is static and mellow.

title: Jaffelin 2013 Les Chapitres de Jaffelin  (Bourgogne)
excerpt: This is a soft, gently fruity and very lightly textured wine. It ...
description: This is a soft, gently fruity and very lightly textured wine. It is perfumed with creamed apple flavors and some fresh acidity at the end. Drink now.

title: Bodega Catena Zapata 2013 Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Popcorn, paint thinner and other oak-driven aromas control the nose on this ...
description: Popcorn, paint thinner and other oak-driven aromas control the nose on this resiny, woody wine. Like the nose, the flavor profile is barrel dominated. It finishes with resin, sawdust and bitter flavors.

title: Tilia 2013 Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Nectarine aromas are bland and slightly rubbery. This is creamy, round and ...
description: Nectarine aromas are bland and slightly rubbery. This is creamy, round and pulpy feeling, with papaya, banana and briny citrus flavors. A flabby, wheaty tasting finish is just lively enough.

title: O. Fournier 2013 Urban Uco Chardonnay (Uco Valley)
excerpt: Oily, gritty stone-fruit aromas announce a plump, soft palate with papaya and ...
description: Oily, gritty stone-fruit aromas announce a plump, soft palate with papaya and banana flavors. A mealy quality and bitterness rise up on the finish.

title: Trapiche 2013 Broquel Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Grassy, green aromas are dull and fruitless. The palate is citric at ...
description: Grassy, green aromas are dull and fruitless. The palate is citric at first but then it collapses. Flavors of citrus and tarragon finish bland and with vegetal leanings.

title: Dutton-Goldfield 2012 Dutton Ranch Walker Hill Vineyard Chardonnay (Green Valley)
excerpt: Perfumey in lemon curd, this is a focused and fairly lean Chardonnay, ...
description: Perfumey in lemon curd, this is a focused and fairly lean Chardonnay, crisp in lemony acidity and classic wet stone. Mango and lime surround a core of refreshing, intriguing ginger, and the palate offers creamy softness. A bite of fresh pear lingers on the finish.

title: Presqu'ile 2012 Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
excerpt: This begins with round, lush scents of honey butter on hot toast ...
description: This begins with round, lush scents of honey butter on hot toast and roasted almond. The initial flavors are light and fresh, with peach and slight guava. That tropicality emerges even more thoughout the long, lingering finish.

title: Mount Eden 2012 Wolff Vineyard Chardonnay (Edna Valley)
excerpt: Buttered toast, oaky smoke and a slight mango tropicality converge for an ...
description: Buttered toast, oaky smoke and a slight mango tropicality converge for an epic nose on this Chardonnay from a vineyard that was planted in 1976. There are layers of flavor too, lime citrus at first evolving toward brioche with a butterscotch finish, and some salt and cracked pepper throughout.

title: Red Car 2012 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Blended from several amazing vineyard sites, including Ritchie and Hawk Hill, this ...
description: Blended from several amazing vineyard sites, including Ritchie and Hawk Hill, this Chardonnay from Old Wente clones has spent time aging in a modest 10% new oak. It shines in exotic florals and a creamy mouthfeel followed by a dry, bright finish of fresh-squeezed grapefruit and tangerine. This is one to enjoy entirely on its own or with a myriad of appetizers.

title: Pride Mountain 2012 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Aged in 25% new French oak, the rest of it neutral, this ...
description: Aged in 25% new French oak, the rest of it neutral, this age-worthy Chardonnay shows refreshing restraint, though it retains plenty of fruit. The aromas tend toward faint caramel and a complex web of acidity and brightness accompanies notes of apple and pear, a long finish capping things off.

title: Windstream 2012 Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: On the nose, layers range from fragrant and floral jasmine to mango ...
description: On the nose, layers range from fragrant and floral jasmine to mango sorbet, and ripe nectarine to oven-fresh croissants. The mouthfeel is creamy, with stone fruit and banana flavors. Zingy acidity powers a long finish.

title: Walt 2012 Dutton Ranch Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This is an elegant, heady Chardonnay beaming in floral jasmine aromas, honey ...
description: This is an elegant, heady Chardonnay beaming in floral jasmine aromas, honey and oak. Bright on the palate, it offers lively acidity and an abundance of pineapple and mango, tropical in all the right ways.

title: Alta Alella 2012 Privat Chardonnay (Cava)
excerpt: The to-the-point bouquet includes lightly toasted apple aromas and white-fruit scents. A ...
description: The to-the-point bouquet includes lightly toasted apple aromas and white-fruit scents. A chiseled, tight palate with crisp acidity supports stone-fruit and citrus flavors. Dry, crisp orange and tangerine flavors characterize the finish.

title: J. Lohr 2012 October Night Chardonnay (Arroyo Seco)
excerpt: Rich and fruity scents of honey, sweet lemon, vanilla, apricot and pineapple, ...
description: Rich and fruity scents of honey, sweet lemon, vanilla, apricot and pineapple, with just a touch of green herb, kick off this tasty wine. Butter-infused lemon-lime soda and pineapple spritzer dominate the even-bodied palate.

title: Joullian 2012 RogerRose Vineyard Chardonnay (Arroyo Seco)
excerpt: The aromas from this Dijon clone-planted vineyard start with sweet ripe peach ...
description: The aromas from this Dijon clone-planted vineyard start with sweet ripe peach until a touch of flint and sage emerge. The plush, creamy palate leans toward tropicality, also with peach and lime, plus a slight mustard bitterness.

title: Gary Farrell 2012 Durell Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Brisk in wet stone and gravel, this wine brims with measurable acidity ...
description: Brisk in wet stone and gravel, this wine brims with measurable acidity and high-toned citrus. Asian pear and lemon play perfectly along the palate, followed by a denseness of herbs and spicy accent of cardamom to the finish.

title: Black Stallion 2012 Limited Release Chardonnay (Los Carneros)
excerpt: Bright and alive in crisp pear and fresh citrus, this is a ...
description: Bright and alive in crisp pear and fresh citrus, this is a lovely, spicy Chardonnay, integrated and pleasing on the palate. The juicy fruit flavors delve into a creamy texture that lingers through to the finish.

title: Esser 2012 Chardonnay (Monterey County)
excerpt: This fresh-smelling wine blends aromas of caramel apple and light grapefruit juice. ...
description: This fresh-smelling wine blends aromas of caramel apple and light grapefruit juice. The palate is racy in acidity, like a glass of fresh orange juice splashed with squeezes of lemon and grapefruit, and a vanilla warmth toward the finish.

title: Errazuriz 2013 Aconcagua Costa Chardonnay (Aconcagua Valley)
excerpt: Popcorn and white-fruit aromas are toasty, nutty and appropriate. This is zesty ...
description: Popcorn and white-fruit aromas are toasty, nutty and appropriate. This is zesty and well-cut across the palate. Flavors of apple, peach, papaya and buttered movie popcorn finish oaky, briny and elegant, with a chiseled, acid-driven feel.

title: Gary Farrell 2012 Russian River Selection Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: A mix of fruit spanning across the Russian River Valley, this complex ...
description: A mix of fruit spanning across the Russian River Valley, this complex Chardonnay is so inviting and approachable. Brimming in ripe Gravenstein apple and baking spices, it conveys alluring and lush crispness as well as balanced fruit and floral aromas.

title: Rutherford Ranch 2013 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Creamy and well-integrated, this offers personality and style. The crisp bite of ...
description: Creamy and well-integrated, this offers personality and style. The crisp bite of green apple and lemon curd are textured and long-lasting. With its overall balance, it is a fantastically versatile pairing option.

title: R2 2011 Big Bend Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Dark golden-yellow in color, this offers tart apple and honey flavors and ...
description: Dark golden-yellow in color, this offers tart apple and honey flavors and is light on the palate, not overdone in oak. It will pair well with seafood or bacon and eggs.

title: Pascal Granger 2013  Beaujolais-Villages
excerpt: The wine is full of ripe yellow fruits that give a rounded, ...
description: The wine is full of ripe yellow fruits that give a rounded, full character. Its texture is rounded, generous with a light touch of a more mineral, nervy character. The aftertaste keeps up the rich, full theme.

title: Errazuriz 2013 Max Reserva Chardonnay (Aconcagua Valley)
excerpt: Popcorn and baked apple aromas are oaky but not overly woody. This ...
description: Popcorn and baked apple aromas are oaky but not overly woody. This feels fresh but with substance. Flavors of baked apple, woodspice and toast finish healthy, long and with acidic kick.

title: Cooper-Garrod 2011 Gravel Ridge Vineyard Estate Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: This Chardonnay already shows quite a bit of age. Hazelnut and chestnut ...
description: This Chardonnay already shows quite a bit of age. Hazelnut and chestnut dominate the nose with burnt lemon peel acidity at the edges. The palate picks up roasted marshmallow and roasted nut flavors, followed by a toffee finish. Drink now.

title: Fess Parker 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: This early-release Chardonnay from the 2013 vintage is lighter in color, likely ...
description: This early-release Chardonnay from the 2013 vintage is lighter in color, likely from less barrel age, and is a lean take on the grape, with pear, lime and limestone aromas. The youth shows nicely on the palate, with sea spray and fresh limeade flavors, making for a brisk, refreshing sipper.

title: Leto 2010 Old Vine Chardonnay (St. Helena)
excerpt: The vines behind this wine were planted in the 1960s and 1970s, ...
description: The vines behind this wine were planted in the 1960s and 1970s, qualifying them as old in the Napa Valley. Winemaker Lisa Warner uses native yeast as well as one from Montrachet to craft this muted, nutty Chardonnay. Richly textured it is otherwise awash in high-toned citrus, both lemon and pineapple.

title: Y Rousseau 2012 Milady Chardonnay (Mount Veeder)
excerpt: A Chardonnay that did not go through malolactic fermentation and was aged ...
description: A Chardonnay that did not go through malolactic fermentation and was aged in 20% new French oak, this is bristling in acidity and crispness, with a suggestion of lemon and vanilla wafer on the palate. The finish remains crisp though abbreviated.

title: Conarium 2012 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: From a Lompoc-based producer comes this Sonoma Coast Chardonnay, pungent in rich, ...
description: From a Lompoc-based producer comes this Sonoma Coast Chardonnay, pungent in rich, ripe pear puree. Softly textured it goes down easy and is a nice, small-production find.

title: Concha y Toro 2012 Amelia Limited Release Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Toasty oak, wood smoke and baked white-fruit aromas carry the nose. Juicy, ...
description: Toasty oak, wood smoke and baked white-fruit aromas carry the nose. Juicy, cidery acidity bolsters flavors of hickory and bitter peach pit, while apple and woodspice flavors dominate the finish on what amounts to a woody but tangy wine.

title: Bucher 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Light golden in color, this is exotic in ginger and lemongrass, with ...
description: Light golden in color, this is exotic in ginger and lemongrass, with a midpalate of fresh-cut pear and wet stone. Gearing up to the finish, expect deeper tones of caramel and tropical oak.

title: Iron Horse 2012 Unoaked Chardonnay (Green Valley)
excerpt: Midweight in texture and on the palate, this evokes tropical pineapple and ...
description: Midweight in texture and on the palate, this evokes tropical pineapple and stone fruit amid a suggestion of anise. Delightful on its own, it would also be a good companion to light summer salads and seafood, especially dressed in citrus.

title: Sparkling Pointe 2009 Blanc de Blancs Chardonnay (North Fork of Long Island)
excerpt: Autolytic notes of nuts and earth lend complexity to this striking, citrus-scented ...
description: Autolytic notes of nuts and earth lend complexity to this striking, citrus-scented sparkling. The blossomy palate is touched with sweetness extended by a rich, foamy mousse that blankets the mouth.

title: Roth 2012 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Crisp and high in acidity, this is bright and lean. A taste ...
description: Crisp and high in acidity, this is bright and lean. A taste of apple is complemented by an herbal component that almost suggests cured meat, with which it would pair nicely.

title: Isabel Mondavi 2012 Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Lushly textured, this weaves sophisticated flavors of pear and apple around a ...
description: Lushly textured, this weaves sophisticated flavors of pear and apple around a creamy center. The finish is light in oak and tropical vanilla, a nice complement to the crisp fruitiness.

title: Red Tail Ridge 2013 Sans Oak Chardonnay (Seneca Lake)
excerpt: Bursting with aromas of peach and mango, this bright, sunny Chardonnay balances ...
description: Bursting with aromas of peach and mango, this bright, sunny Chardonnay balances fresh, primary fruit with a cutting, laser-focused acidity. Refreshing and irresistibly quaffable.

title: Thirsty Owl Wine Company 2013 Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Delicate toast and smoke accent pretty apple blossom and pear notes on ...
description: Delicate toast and smoke accent pretty apple blossom and pear notes on this delicate, supple Chardonnay. Judiciously oaked, the palate showcases sweet-cream butter and fresh yellow-cherry flavors that linger long on the finish.

title: Standing Stone 2013 Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Touches of spice highlight ripe yellow-plum and pear notes on the nose ...
description: Touches of spice highlight ripe yellow-plum and pear notes on the nose of this delicately framed Chardonnay. The palate is surprisingly mineral in character, with shades of wet stone against a backbone of tart peach. Finishes moderately long.

title: Fox Run 2012 Doyle Family Vineyard Unoaked Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Dusty mineral and saline notes lend interest to aromatic peach and apricot ...
description: Dusty mineral and saline notes lend interest to aromatic peach and apricot on this pretty, perfumed Chardonnay. The palate is refreshingly mineral, while the finish is brisk and nervy.

title: Santa Alicia 2013 Gran Reserva de Los Andes Estate Bottled Chardonnay (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: With a gold-meets-tan color, this is showing cidery aromas as well as ...
description: With a gold-meets-tan color, this is showing cidery aromas as well as toasty oak. The palate is good but chunky, while flavors of green fruits and light vegetal notes finish briny, with a pinch of sea salt.

title: Douglas Green 2013 The Beachhouse Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: Fresh and tangy, with little or no oak influence, this refreshing, crisp ...
description: Fresh and tangy, with little or no oak influence, this refreshing, crisp white wine will be very versatile with or without food. It has citrus aromas, green apple flavors and a nicely tart finish.

title: Domaine de Thulon 2013  Beaujolais-Villages
excerpt: Crisp while also fruity, it has bright acidity, lively citrus and apple ...
description: Crisp while also fruity, it has bright acidity, lively citrus and apple flavors and a refreshing aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Balduzzi 2013 Reserva Chardonnay (Maule Valley)
excerpt: Apple and pear aromas set up a lively, somewhat chunky feeling palate. ...
description: Apple and pear aromas set up a lively, somewhat chunky feeling palate. Flavors of green citrus fruits and brine finish similarly, with briny notes sitting side by side with citrus flavors.

title: Dealy Lane 2012 Unoaked Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
excerpt: This unoaked Chardonnay is awash in green apple, tart lemon and tropical ...
description: This unoaked Chardonnay is awash in green apple, tart lemon and tropical pineapple, light and lifted on the palate. It goes down easily, and will track well at the table. Salads, seafood and brunch-type fare are all good bets.

title: Tsillan 2013 Nudo Chardonnay (Lake Chelan)
excerpt: This is an aromatic offering of the variety with notes of cantaloupe ...
description: This is an aromatic offering of the variety with notes of cantaloupe and pear. It dips in the middle and seems to lose its rhythm, finishing on a slightly bitter note.

title: Sherwood House Vineyards 2011 Estate Grown Chardonnay (North Fork of Long Island)
excerpt: While a tad savory on the nose with aromas of pressed apples ...
description: While a tad savory on the nose with aromas of pressed apples and pears, this full-bodied Chardonnay boasts brisk lemony acidity and a straightforward, fresh apple appeal. It finishes briskly, with a hint of honeyed tea.

title: Fox Run 2010 Blanc de Blancs Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Savory notes of pressed apple and golden toast accent this bristling, bright ...
description: Savory notes of pressed apple and golden toast accent this bristling, bright sparkling Chardonnay. On the palate, thick, dense mouth-filling foam carries flavors of zesty lemon and pear speckled with savory herbs.

title: Domaines Barons de Rothschild (Lafite) 2013 Los Vascos Chardonnay (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Dusty aromas of orange blossom and rind are snappy. So is the ...
description: Dusty aromas of orange blossom and rind are snappy. So is the palate, which is citrusy and skids along on a tight beam of acidity. Apple and melon flavors are green in nature, while lime and green-apple flavors dominate a pointy finish.

title: J. Lohr 2012 Highlands Bench Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: A bit thin on the nose, this has buttery apple juice aromas. ...
description: A bit thin on the nose, this has buttery apple juice aromas. The acidity is a bit off, both tart and mixed with vanilla creaminess, and the flavors are slight with apple candy and tart lemon.

title: Concha y Toro 2013 Serie Riberas Gran Reserva Ribera del Rapel Chardonnay (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Ripe aromas of melon are flabby. This is both chunky yet citrusy ...
description: Ripe aromas of melon are flabby. This is both chunky yet citrusy in feel, while flavors of orange and lemon are basic. The finish is soft but shows just enough citric acidity to keep things going.

title: Benmarl 2012 Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (North Fork of Long Island)
excerpt: Pronounced wood and toast notes open this rich, oaky Chardonnay. The palate ...
description: Pronounced wood and toast notes open this rich, oaky Chardonnay. The palate boasts bright lemon and caramel-apple flavors, but hints of unripe stems and leaves distract.

title: Quintay 2013 Clava Reserve Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Citrus and sweaty aromas require patience. This is juicy and citrusy in ...
description: Citrus and sweaty aromas require patience. This is juicy and citrusy in feel, with flavors of green fruits, lime in particular. A lightly vegetal finish offset by candied sweet notes makes this unfocused.

title: Six Mile Creek 2012 Reserve Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: While savory on the nose with pungent whiffs of smoke and dried ...
description: While savory on the nose with pungent whiffs of smoke and dried herb, this full-bodied Chardonnay is surprisingly forward with ripe, sunny peach and apricot flavors. Straightforward in style yet juicy and enjoyable.

title: Treleaven NV Silver Lining Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Delicate peach and mango aromas are layered in earth and smoke on ...
description: Delicate peach and mango aromas are layered in earth and smoke on this dry, yet plush and easy Chardonnay. The palate is pulpy in ripe, rich tropical fruit notes, but balanced by brisk, lemony acidity. Drink now.

title: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi 2013 Lightly Oaked Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: This slightly sweet but not oaky Chardonnay shows fresh floral aromas, pear ...
description: This slightly sweet but not oaky Chardonnay shows fresh floral aromas, pear and bread-dough flavors. Softly textured and with tangy finish, 24% of it is a blend of aromatic varietals like Malvasia and Muscat.

title: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: This tastes like a good weekday wine or an affordable purchase for ...
description: This tastes like a good weekday wine or an affordable purchase for a big party. A nice core of fruit flavor is complemented by subtle hints of bread dough and vanilla, soft texture and medium body.

title: Leyda 2013 Chardonnay (Leyda Valley)
excerpt: Honey, melon and cider aromas precede a juicy palate with no real ...
description: Honey, melon and cider aromas precede a juicy palate with no real texture or body. This is citrusy, tart and green tasting, with briny saltiness to the finish.

title: Chateau Lafayette Reneau 2012 Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Smoke and charred wood accent fresh lemon and apple on this slightly ...
description: Smoke and charred wood accent fresh lemon and apple on this slightly off-dry Chardonnay. Buttery and slick with glycerine, it finishes moderately long with a reedy, herbaceous tone.

title: Emiliana 2013 Natura Un-Oaked Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Dusty white-fruit, saline and sulfur aromas lack appeal. This is flabby, while ...
description: Dusty white-fruit, saline and sulfur aromas lack appeal. This is flabby, while flavors of sweet green fruits finish bland, with a hint of celery and green rhubarb.

title: G7 2012 Reserva Estate Bottled Chardonnay (Loncomilla Valley)
excerpt: This is resiny smelling and tan in color. It has mealy white-fruit ...
description: This is resiny smelling and tan in color. It has mealy white-fruit flavors, heavy oak and a plodding finish.

title: Paul Hobbs 2012 Ellen Lane Estate Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Sunflower-gold in color, this heady, hedonistic Chardonnay brims with aromas of toasted ...
description: Sunflower-gold in color, this heady, hedonistic Chardonnay brims with aromas of toasted brioche, lemon and herb. Bright and completely balanced, it invites sip after sip until there simply is no more. Concentrated and complex it finishes dry, lingering in beautiful layers on the tongue.

title: Gary Farrell 2012 Rochioli Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This flinty Chardonnay shares a full oak expression with a whiff of ...
description: This flinty Chardonnay shares a full oak expression with a whiff of petrol, suggesting a decant or cellaring until 2016 to fully soften. It offers sublime lemon curd and minerally peach flavor amid tangy acidity and a bright finish. It displays a ying-yang between polish and power.

title: Cattleya 2012 Pratt Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: An all-out California Chardonnay in a creamy, plush and fruity style. Brilliant ...
description: An all-out California Chardonnay in a creamy, plush and fruity style. Brilliant yellow gold color foreshadows the ripe pear, apple, vanilla and butter aromas. Flavors are complex and layered with almond, fig and cream. Very full and soft in texture, it has just enough fresh acidity to keep it lively on the finish.

title: Gary Farrell 2012 Rochioli-Allen Vineyards Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Concentrated with touches of oak, this wine offers bright layers of citrus ...
description: Concentrated with touches of oak, this wine offers bright layers of citrus and wet stone, striking a tense bargain between delicacy and power. The two vineyards are well-known for meticulous farming and vibrant clones. Together they compose a structured wine of spicy beauty, nuanced in classic Russian River Valley apple, lime zest and honeysuckle flavor.

title: Testarossa 2012 Fogstone Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: With a nose approaching butterscotch but expertly cut with acidity and cinnamon ...
description: With a nose approaching butterscotch but expertly cut with acidity and cinnamon spice, this is the best Testarossa single-vineyard Chardonnay of 2012. On the palate, there are lovely flavors of salted caramel and yellow peach, and the wine manages to be simultaneously spicy, sharp and smooth. The finish lingers extra long.

title: Testarossa 2012 Soberanes Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: Another single-vineyard wonder from Testarossa, this offers scents of Meyer lemon curd ...
description: Another single-vineyard wonder from Testarossa, this offers scents of Meyer lemon curd and sea spray. Well rounded with a soft mouthfeel, it has flavors that hover between ripe fruit and sharp tang, like white peaches drizzled with white balsamic vinegar.

title: La Rochelle 2012 Dutton Ranch Morelli Lane Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Dark golden straw in color, this concentrated wine is a mix of ...
description: Dark golden straw in color, this concentrated wine is a mix of brioche and lemon custard, balanced in acidity and texture with a layering of oak. In aroma and flavor, swirls of butterscotch and vanilla stand out, sweetly inviting without over-influencing the wine, which finishes lean.

title: Saracina 2013 Unoaked Chardonnay (Mendocino County)
excerpt: This tantalizing, unoaked Chardonnay offers relatively reserved fruit flavors and abundant, appetizing ...
description: This tantalizing, unoaked Chardonnay offers relatively reserved fruit flavors and abundant, appetizing acidity. With its crisp apple aromas and tastes, it would pair well with a cheese plate or skewers of grilled shrimp.

title: Anaba 2011 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Aromatically muted at first, the bouquet opens up with time to reveal ...
description: Aromatically muted at first, the bouquet opens up with time to reveal steely, finessed notes of pear and fresh citrus that continue through to the palate. The oak is subtle and well-managed, and the minerality alive and fresh.

title: Fog Crest 2010 Elevage Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This crisp, mid-weight Chardonnay reveals classic Russian River Valley layers of Gravenstein ...
description: This crisp, mid-weight Chardonnay reveals classic Russian River Valley layers of Gravenstein apple and lemon custard. It derives keen minerality from its estate-farmed vineyard rooted in Goldridge soils. Pair with Dungeness crab dipped in butter.

title: La Montagne 2013 Huber Vineyard Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: It conveys Asian influences, with lemongrass leading the nose alongside chalkiness, lemon ...
description: It conveys Asian influences, with lemongrass leading the nose alongside chalkiness, lemon curd and soft peach. Those elements power the palate too, with lemongrass, Thai basil and coconut milk framed by yellow grapefruit acidity and Chinese spice. Serve with pho.

title: Charles Heintz 2012 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: From the esteemed grower behind many a famous Sonoma Coast Chardonnay, this ...
description: From the esteemed grower behind many a famous Sonoma Coast Chardonnay, this estate wine is golden colored and intoxicatingly inviting in layers of baked apple, lemon verbena and orange blossom. A toasty subnote gives the impression of voluptuousness in this otherwise lean and lovely wine.

title: Comartin 2012 Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: White flower perfume and rain-soaked concrete scents make an interesting and appealing ...
description: White flower perfume and rain-soaked concrete scents make an interesting and appealing nose on this wine from the summits of the Santa Cruz Mountains. There is tight, barely ripe nectarine on the palate and a bright freshness, making it a perfect partner for shellfish or counterpoint to aged cheese.

title: Trione 2011 River Road Ranch Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Sultry pear and baked apple are the stars. Lemony and creamy on ...
description: Sultry pear and baked apple are the stars. Lemony and creamy on the palate, this offers slight hints of honey and tropical fruit. It boasts a long finish and robust yet restrained oak that should relax in time.

title: Stoller 2013 Chardonnay (Dundee Hills)
excerpt: Here is a fine, fruity, expressive example of all-stainless Oregon Chardonnay. A ...
description: Here is a fine, fruity, expressive example of all-stainless Oregon Chardonnay. A generous mix of apple, pear, lime and lemon zest combines with perfect balance to yield a wine with real flavor and depth that is not derived from barrel aging. The low alcohol is an added bonus.

title: Joullian 2012 Chardonnay (Monterey)
excerpt: Very classic Chardonnay aromas of toasted hazelnut and pineapple come off of ...
description: Very classic Chardonnay aromas of toasted hazelnut and pineapple come off of this wine, which is from the Highlands, Sleep Hollow, and RogerRose vineyards. On the palate, which has nicely balanced acidity, there are flavors of lemon meringue and and warmer guava troplicality as well.

title: Yeringberg 2011 Chardonnay (Yarra Valley)
excerpt: Restrained aromas of roasted sweet corn and citrus lead into mild flavors ...
description: Restrained aromas of roasted sweet corn and citrus lead into mild flavors of sweet corn, citrus and melon. This plump, medium-bodied wine finishes fully dry and a bit chalky in texture, and as good as it is, one wonders what if the grapes had gotten just a bit riper.

title: Clos du Val 2012 Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Full-bodied and resplendent in ripe apple and brioche, this well-crafted wine is ...
description: Full-bodied and resplendent in ripe apple and brioche, this well-crafted wine is layered and smooth. It would pair well with grilled salmon or herb-roasted chicken.

title: Daniel Gehrs 2012 Limited Selection Chardonnay (Central Coast)
excerpt: Bright orange juice, dill herbs and a slight whiff of vanilla bean ...
description: Bright orange juice, dill herbs and a slight whiff of vanilla bean lead the aromas on this un-oaked Chard. On the palate, flavors of apple cider come with a wash of fresh lime juice on the back end.

title: Kendall-Jackson 2013 Avant Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: This unoaked Chardonnay represents its genera beautifully. It has fresh apple aromas ...
description: This unoaked Chardonnay represents its genera beautifully. It has fresh apple aromas with a hint of honey, just-ripe pear flavors, good acidity and a relaxed texture. Very refreshing, bright and easy to enjoy.

title: Chamisal Vineyards 2013 Stainless Chardonnay (Central Coast)
excerpt: Light, bright and refreshing, it offers pear spritzer, lime zest and a ...
description: Light, bright and refreshing, it offers pear spritzer, lime zest and a hint of guava on the nose, followed by citrus rind, light papaya and apple juice on the palate. It makes a nice bridge between the richness of Chardonnay and crispness of Sauvignon Blanc.

title: Fog Crest 2011 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Fuller in style, it boasts layers of coconut cream pie, fig and ...
description: Fuller in style, it boasts layers of coconut cream pie, fig and honey, with a swirl of vanilla lurking in there too. Mineral-rich, the finish revisits the creamy, baked fruit theme, lush and generous.

title: Testarossa 2012 Dos Rubios Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: Wet slate minerality leads the brisk, tightly wound nose. On the palate, ...
description: Wet slate minerality leads the brisk, tightly wound nose. On the palate, the wine is a bit perfumed, at least for how tight the nose is, with elements of crisp apple, pear and a touch of nectarine.

title: Stinson 2012 Chardonnay (Monticello)
excerpt: Toasted pastry-crust and macadamia nut notes frame core aromas of white orchard ...
description: Toasted pastry-crust and macadamia nut notes frame core aromas of white orchard fruits. The palate tastes concentrated and feels round, and snappy acids invigorate the finish.

title: Foppiano 2012 Estate Bottled Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This wine has overlapping personalities. One drips richly in vanilla and honey, ...
description: This wine has overlapping personalities. One drips richly in vanilla and honey, while the other is lemony tart and electric in acidity. They commingle on the finish, and will clearly decide whether to get along or part over time. Give the wine a good swirl.

title: Girard 2012 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Steely yet somewhat sweet, it offers a richness of baked apple and ...
description: Steely yet somewhat sweet, it offers a richness of baked apple and pear amid midweight layers of softened tannins.

title: Arizona Stronghold 2011 Bonita Springs Vineyard Site Archive Chardonnay (America)
excerpt: Aromatic and intense, it deals stewed-peach and spring flower aromas. The medium-bodied ...
description: Aromatic and intense, it deals stewed-peach and spring flower aromas. The medium-bodied palate packs plenty of flavor, and lively acids keep the wine feeling chiseled.

title: Tarara 2012 Chardonnay (Virginia)
excerpt: Medium in body, this has pretty lemon-blossom and white peach flavors that ...
description: Medium in body, this has pretty lemon-blossom and white peach flavors that are boosted by fresh acids, and that linger on the open-textured finish.

title: Tapiz 2013 Alta Collection Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Popcorn and butter are the lead aromas, and they give way to ...
description: Popcorn and butter are the lead aromas, and they give way to dusty baked apple over time. This wine feels round, but with just enough acidity. Flavors of candy corn, vanilla, spun sugar and ripe stone fruits finish sweet and fleshy.

title: Jefferson Vineyards 2012 Rsv. Chardonnay (Virginia)
excerpt: Agile and glossy, this has toasty apple, pear and tropical fruit flavors ...
description: Agile and glossy, this has toasty apple, pear and tropical fruit flavors that continue to a light, fresh-tasting finish.

title: Still Waters 2013 Chardonnay (Paso Robles)
excerpt: This young Chardonnay packs an overpowering array of scents and flavors, and ...
description: This young Chardonnay packs an overpowering array of scents and flavors, and it may get better if they mellow over time. The nose offers grapefruit, guava and vanilla, while the palate is dominated by canned pears.

title: Pillsbury 2011 Chardonnay (Cochise County)
excerpt: Broad tropical fruit and nut aromas gain more focus on the medium- ...
description: Broad tropical fruit and nut aromas gain more focus on the medium- to full-bodied palate. The wine feels lush and plump, but solid acidity gives it some buoyancy.

title: Alfredo Roca 2013 Fincas Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Apple and peach aromas are slightly waxy and show a spot of ...
description: Apple and peach aromas are slightly waxy and show a spot of petrol. This is citrusy but full in body, with flavors of apple, pear, melon and citrus. A plump, basic finish is monotone, but clean and fruity.

title: Santa Julia 2013 Made with Organic Grapes Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Waxy, floral white-fruit aromas are tropical in style. This feels citrusy, with ...
description: Waxy, floral white-fruit aromas are tropical in style. This feels citrusy, with some pulpiness to the texture. Tangerine, orange and nectarine flavors finish tangy and citric, with one-dimensional juiciness.

title: Carlson Creek 2010 Chardonnay (Arizona)
excerpt: A mix of peach and lychee aromas give an exotic edge. Full ...
description: A mix of peach and lychee aromas give an exotic edge. Full in body and fleshy, this is endowed with concentrated flavors and tense acids.

title: Page Springs 2010 Arizona Stronghold Vineyard Chardonnay (Cochise County)
excerpt: High-toned lemon and toasted nut notes mark the nose. Medium in body, ...
description: High-toned lemon and toasted nut notes mark the nose. Medium in body, this has cutting acids, which kick the salivary glands into overdrive.

title: Region 1 2013 Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Tropical fruit and melon aromas are basic but friendly. This has a ...
description: Tropical fruit and melon aromas are basic but friendly. This has a punch-like mouthfeel as well as open-knit flavors of orange, nectarine, white grapefruit and apple. What it lacks in finesse is made up for in fruit.

title: Fox Meadow 2012 Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (Virginia)
excerpt: Toasty, pomaceous scents lead onto the lithe, medium-bodied palate. The acidity gains ...
description: Toasty, pomaceous scents lead onto the lithe, medium-bodied palate. The acidity gains steam on the finish, making the wine feel zesty and tense.

title: Alamos 2012 Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Apple and tropical fruit aromas are mild. This feels round, creamy and ...
description: Apple and tropical fruit aromas are mild. This feels round, creamy and soft, with moderate acidity. Flavors of walnut, banana, melon and vanilla finish creamy, without much follow through.

title: Pascual Toso 2013 Estate Bottled Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Heavy oak scents create a popcorn nose that leads to flabby flavors ...
description: Heavy oak scents create a popcorn nose that leads to flabby flavors of peach and melon. The wine is woody and simple.

title: Septima 2013 Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Resiny oak aromas drown out peanut brittle and apple notes. This is ...
description: Resiny oak aromas drown out peanut brittle and apple notes. This is acidic and briny in the mouth, with a cidery complex. Oak and sour apple flavors finish chunky, woody and briny.

title: The Williamsburg Winery 2011 Acte 12 of Sixteen Nineteen Chardonnay (Virginia)
excerpt: Lithe and slick, this has broad apple flavors and loose acids.
description: Lithe and slick, this has broad apple flavors and loose acids.

title: Tres Exilios 2013 Chardonnay (Mendoza)
excerpt: Tropical, soapy aromas are yeasty and flat. Flavors of lychee and melon ...
description: Tropical, soapy aromas are yeasty and flat. Flavors of lychee and melon have no follow-through and finish mealy.

title: Joseph Phelps 2012 Freestone Vineyards Estate Grown Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Made from estate-grown fruit near the chilly Sonoma Coast town of Freestone, ...
description: Made from estate-grown fruit near the chilly Sonoma Coast town of Freestone, this is a fully layered wine, expertly balanced in acidity yet offering plenty of full-figured mouthfeel and viscous pleasure. It delivers an electric mix of Meyer lemon, minerals and brioche, and will please a diverse range of palates.

title: Louis Latour 2011  Corton-Charlemagne
excerpt: One of the flagship wines of Louis Latour, this has great weight, ...
description: One of the flagship wines of Louis Latour, this has great weight, richness and ripe yellow fruits, all surrounded by wood and citrus flavors. A sense of mineral in the texture adds complexity, while the firm structure needs to age. Drink from 2018.

title: Domaine Chanson 2011 Les Chenevottes Premier Cru  (Chassagne-Montrachet)
excerpt: Chanson owns four acres, a quarter of this premier cru. This 2011 ...
description: Chanson owns four acres, a quarter of this premier cru. This 2011 is smooth, rich and very elegant. Fruitiness is striated by a mineral, tight texture that gives a touch of steeliness. Drink from 2017.

title: Domaine Faiveley 2011  Corton-Charlemagne
excerpt: Ripe and full-bodied, this immense wine has rich layers of tropical fruits. ...
description: Ripe and full-bodied, this immense wine has rich layers of tropical fruits. The wine, like so often in Corton-Charlemagne, is a powerful, huge expression of Chardonnay. It does have balance from acidity. Drink from 2018.

title: Domaine Chanson 2011 Clos des Mouches Premier Cru  (Beaune)
excerpt: Ripe and rich, this full-bodied wine retains minerality as well as attractive ...
description: Ripe and rich, this full-bodied wine retains minerality as well as attractive acidity. Crisp lemon flavor is rounded out with peach and apple skin fruits. The wood, already integrated, gives richness and smoothness. Drink from 2016.

title: Testarossa 2012 Bien Nacido Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
excerpt: A nose of baked apple and saline minerality introduce this wine from ...
description: A nose of baked apple and saline minerality introduce this wine from this single-vineyard superstar winery. The palate picks up with zing, offering apple candy, lemon lime soda and a bit of bitter tension as well. The wine evolves steadily while on the tongue and is never boring.

title: Riverbench 2012 Estate Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
excerpt: This bottling slips in many corners of the flavor experience at once. ...
description: This bottling slips in many corners of the flavor experience at once. On the nose, a bit of tropical fruit mixes with evenly spread buttercream, followed by precursor hints of bright acidity on the palate. That citrus-led vibrancy does come, as does a mix of creaminess and limestone-inflected tang, as if the rocks themselves delivered the acidity.

title: Morgan 2012 Double L Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: In 1996, Dan and Donna Lee planted the Double L Vineyard, believing ...
description: In 1996, Dan and Donna Lee planted the Double L Vineyard, believing it to be the best place to produce a great wine in the appellation. The 2012 rendition continues the legacy, offering melted butter, caramel, vanilla and Parmesan cheese aromas, followed by a palate of lemon curd, toasted marshmallow and more butter, but in a lifting way.

title: Jean-Luc and Paul Aegerter 2012 Les Champgains Premier Cru  (Puligny-Montrachet)
excerpt: Still closed up, this is potentially a ripe and delicious wine. As ...
description: Still closed up, this is potentially a ripe and delicious wine. As it develops, apple, citrus and apricot fruits will come out, backed up by the steely, mineral texture. The wine is already juicy, concentrated and shows a toasty side as well as rich fruitiness. Drink from 2017.

title: Foundry Vineyards 2012 Chardonnay (Columbia Gorge (WA))
excerpt: This oak-tank-fermented Chardonnay is light and nuanced with notes of toast, pear ...
description: This oak-tank-fermented Chardonnay is light and nuanced with notes of toast, pear and green apple. The palate is densely flavored, creamy in feel, speckled with mineral notes and a streak of tart acidity throughout.

title: Benjamin Leroux 2011  Auxey-Duresses
excerpt: Rounded, rich and warm, it has excellent acidity along with touches of ...
description: Rounded, rich and warm, it has excellent acidity along with touches of wood and very pure citrus flavors. Peach fruits give a riper feel. Drink now, but better to wait until 2015.

title: Ironstone 2012 Reserve Estate Grown Chardonnay (Sierra Foothills)
excerpt: Big, bold and concentrated, this full-bodied wine was given the complete new-barrel, ...
description: Big, bold and concentrated, this full-bodied wine was given the complete new-barrel, lees-stirring treatment. It has a deep gold color, with ripe pear and buttered toast aromas that transition to waves of pear and apple on the palate and lingering finish.

title: Joseph Faiveley 2011 Champ Gain Premier Cru  (Puligny-Montrachet)
excerpt: Although this wine has a strong toasty character, it offers enough fruit, ...
description: Although this wine has a strong toasty character, it offers enough fruit, acidity and ripe tropical flavors to make it work. Attractive acidity gives a delicious, fresh aftertaste. Drink from 2017.

title: Louis Latour 2011 Morgeot Premier Cru  (Chassagne-Montrachet)
excerpt: Ripe and structured, it has the weight and broad feel of a ...
description: Ripe and structured, it has the weight and broad feel of a Chassagne-Montrachet. Firmly textured and concentrated, it also shows soft fruitiness. The power will keep it aging well, so drink from 2017.

title: Alex Gambal 2011 Clos Saint-Jean Premier Cru  (Chassagne-Montrachet)
excerpt: A ripe wine with vanilla and intense structure, it is very rich ...
description: A ripe wine with vanilla and intense structure, it is very rich and almost heavy in character. Generous yellow fruits are ripe and full of juicy acidity. The wood aging just shows along with spice at the end. Drink from 2017.

title: Kendall-Jackson 2012 Jackson Estate Camelot Highlands Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
excerpt: Lemon butter, apple pie crust and hazelnut are first to the aroma ...
description: Lemon butter, apple pie crust and hazelnut are first to the aroma party on this carefully crafted Jackson family offering from a vineyard about 400 feet up in limestone-dotted soils. On the palate, strong but integrated acidity carries the myriad citrus, apple and spice flavors to completion.

title: Jean-Luc and Paul Aegerter 2012 Creux de la Net Premier Cru  (Pernand-Vergelesses)
excerpt: Crisp acidity and citrus fruitiness combine with a riper, textured character. The ...
description: Crisp acidity and citrus fruitiness combine with a riper, textured character. The wine shows the strong minerality inherent in whites from Pernand-Vergelesses, as well as a richer streak. Because of its structure, it should age. Drink from 2016.

title: Louis Latour 2011 Caradeux Premier Cru  (Pernand-Vergelesses)
excerpt: While this wine demonstrates the telltale cool element of the appellation, it ...
description: While this wine demonstrates the telltale cool element of the appellation, it also offers ripe fruit, pear and peach flavors lightly layered with wood. The wine is crisp at the end, with a mineral aftertaste. Drink from 2016.

title: Simonnet-Febvre 2011 Fourchaume Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: Closed in character, it has power and density as well as the ...
description: Closed in character, it has power and density as well as the potential of great fruitiness. A creamy texture with a rich feel offers suggestions of yellow fruits as well as apple. Drink from 2016.

title: McFadden 2013 Estate Grown Made With Organically Grown Grapes Chardonnay (Potter Valley)
excerpt: Fresh, vivid fruit flavors pop from this light-colored, well-balanced, mouthwatering wine. Ripe ...
description: Fresh, vivid fruit flavors pop from this light-colored, well-balanced, mouthwatering wine. Ripe pear, crisp apple and a touch of baking spices mingle on the palate and linger on the finish.

title: Guenoc 2012 Chardonnay (Lake County)
excerpt: A sophisticated Chardonnay from a winery known for good values. Buttery in ...
description: A sophisticated Chardonnay from a winery known for good values. Buttery in aroma, it has a rich texture without being full-bodied, and is appetizingly dry and subtle in fruit flavor. Notes of toasted almond and baking spices come out on the palate and linger on the finish.

title: Testarossa 2012 Sierra Madre Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
excerpt: Vanilla-soaked French toast and caramelized apples promise a butter bomb in this ...
description: Vanilla-soaked French toast and caramelized apples promise a butter bomb in this Testarossa take on the historic Sierra Madre Vineyard in the Santa Maria Valley. Once sipped, there is a surprising level of soda-like acidity, and a steadily emerging flavor profile that ranges from cream soda to squeezed lime.

title: Ryan Patrick 2012 Reserve Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Sourced from Sagemoor Farms and the Homestead estate vineyard, this detailed and ...
description: Sourced from Sagemoor Farms and the Homestead estate vineyard, this detailed and complex wine opens with pear and pineapple scents and flavors, then layers in pretty spices and toasty highlights.

title: Tabor 2012 Mt. Tabor Chardonnay (Galilee)
excerpt: The nose of this wine recalls chilled fruit salad, with aromas of ...
description: The nose of this wine recalls chilled fruit salad, with aromas of melon, pineapple and Delicious apple. Engaging flavors of pineapple, passion fruit, vanilla and clove fill the softly textured mouth and persist into the cooling finish.

title: Tolosa 2012 No Oak Chardonnay (Central Coast)
excerpt: Though quite pale in color due to no barrel aging, there is ...
description: Though quite pale in color due to no barrel aging, there is a nicely rounded candy nose of bright green apple and vanilla, alongside some sharper spice. On the palate, more green apple dominates, along with lemon-lime, slight guava and an acidity that causes the wine to dance across the tongue.

title: Byron 2012 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: Butter, salt, pear and fresh-squeezed orange comprise the leading aromas. Bright orange ...
description: Butter, salt, pear and fresh-squeezed orange comprise the leading aromas. Bright orange flavors persist on the palate, as do green apple, hints of papaya and the near-chalky sensation of white rock.

title: Domaine Faiveley 2011 Clos Rochette  (Mercurey)
excerpt: The chalky soil yields a crisp, textured wine with yellow fruits to ...
description: The chalky soil yields a crisp, textured wine with yellow fruits to round it out. There is a steely edge and just a touch of wood, while the aftertaste is packed with acidity.

title: Domaine Chantal Lescure 2011  Meursault
excerpt: With an opulent texture, this is ripe and packed with yellow fruits. ...
description: With an opulent texture, this is ripe and packed with yellow fruits. There is just a hint of the wood aging along with great acidity and citrus flavors. Although full-bodied, the wine finishes crisply fresh.

title: Joseph Faiveley 2011 Fourchaume Premier Cru  (Chablis)
excerpt: A soft wine with attractive fruitiness and lemon and lime flavors. Fresh ...
description: A soft wine with attractive fruitiness and lemon and lime flavors. Fresh and rounded, it shows its northern French origins with the tight acidity at the end.

title: Hovey 2013 Duende Chardonnay (Calaveras County)
excerpt: A bold Chardonnay that embraces new oak barrels and has the flavor ...
description: A bold Chardonnay that embraces new oak barrels and has the flavor profile to show for it. Hovey fermented it in 50% new oak barrels, matured it on the lees and bottled it a few months after harvest. The scent and flavor of toasted oak comes through from the first sniff to the finish. But enough fruit, butter and almond flavors lie beneath the toasty overlay to make us come back for another sip.

title: Suvla 2012 Chardonnay (Thrace)
excerpt: Pleasing aromas of guava, watermelon rind and a hint of lemon zest ...
description: Pleasing aromas of guava, watermelon rind and a hint of lemon zest set the stage for flavors of Cavaillon melon, peach, marzipan and orange rind. Smooth in the mouth, this wine features a nice interplay of bright and savory notes. A cool finish washes across the side palate, punctuated by a burst of acidity.

title: Laetitia 2012 Estate Chardonnay (Arroyo Grande Valley)
excerpt: This is a very pale Chardonnay from Laetitia Winery, which sits just ...
description: This is a very pale Chardonnay from Laetitia Winery, which sits just three miles from the ocean amidst vineyards planted on rocky clay loam, and yet possesses an appealing, complex mix of creaminess and crispiness on the nose. There is a slight bitterness on the palate as well as brioche and citrus zest on the finish. This tightly focused wine would perfectly cut the richness of shrimp scampi or other buttery dish.

title: Starmont 2012 Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: This Napa-side-of-Carneros Chardonnay is resplendent in crisp yet hearty aromas of apple, ...
description: This Napa-side-of-Carneros Chardonnay is resplendent in crisp yet hearty aromas of apple, pear and flowery jasmine. Well put-together, it offers electric acidity and enough rounded texture to pair magnificently with food. On the finish is a hint of tarte Tatin, a tiny seasoning of cinnamon and nutmeg on top.

title: Buty 2012 Conner Lee Vineyard Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This single-vineyard Chardonnay remains detailed and aromatic, though not quite as ripe ...
description: This single-vineyard Chardonnay remains detailed and aromatic, though not quite as ripe as one might wish. Scents and flavors of herb, grain and green fruits mix and mingle, with plenty of underlying acidity.

title: Louis Latour 2011  Puligny-Montrachet
excerpt: This attractive village wine has ripe fruits as well as a more ...
description: This attractive village wine has ripe fruits as well as a more steely texture. Wood flavors give smoothness that rounds out the wine and enhances the yellow fruit flavors. Drink now.

title: Lamoreaux Landing 2010 Estate Bottled Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Fresh, crisp apple and pear are touched with delicate swathes of cream ...
description: Fresh, crisp apple and pear are touched with delicate swathes of cream and oyster shell on this elegant, impeccably balanced Chardonnay. The palate is brisk with lemon and lime acidity, but builds in richness and texture on the finish. A remarkable value at $13.

title: Roblar 2012 Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
excerpt: A citrus-inflected, vanilla-leaning nuttiness consumes the aromas of this offering, which makes ...
description: A citrus-inflected, vanilla-leaning nuttiness consumes the aromas of this offering, which makes for a very pleasant sipping experience. There is good acidity, with apple, lemon and a bit of tropically, including nicely rounded fruit in the midpalate. A dazzling zest continues to the finish as well.

title: Dry Creek Vineyard 2011 Foggy Oaks Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Light and crisp, it offers layers of lemon chiffon and spicy pear. ...
description: Light and crisp, it offers layers of lemon chiffon and spicy pear. The at-first luxurious mouthfeel evolves smoothly into crisper, citrus-wrapped acidity. This is a sippable, ideal summer wine.

title: Lamoreaux Landing 2012 Estate Bottled Unoaked Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Scents of blossom and ripe white peach are touched with smoke and ...
description: Scents of blossom and ripe white peach are touched with smoke and earth on this dry, full-bodied Chardonnay. Fermented and aged in stainless steel, the palate is chock full of juicy white grapefruit flavor. A touch of crushed-stone minerality adds elegance. Refreshing yet satisfying, this is a wine with wide appeal.

title: Gifft 2012 Estate Grown Chardonnay (Monterey)
excerpt: Kathie Lee Gifford is just the latest celebrity to enter the winemaking ...
description: Kathie Lee Gifford is just the latest celebrity to enter the winemaking game, but she made a solid partner in Scheid, one of the biggest vineyard owners in Monterey County. Their Gifft smells fresh and lively, with tangerine and sour grass aromas, followed by a sipping experience full of smoke, oak, lanolin and tan flavors, approaching leather and sandalwood.

title: Laird 2011 Cold Creek Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Full-bodied and swathed in oak, this shows the bigger side of Chardonnay, ...
description: Full-bodied and swathed in oak, this shows the bigger side of Chardonnay, piquant and luxe with lemon and grapefruit swirls within larger casings of vanilla and caramelized oak.

title: Michel-Schlumberger 2012 La Brume Chardonnay (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Flowery and balanced in crisp, dry flavors of lemon and pear, this ...
description: Flowery and balanced in crisp, dry flavors of lemon and pear, this wine takes its designation from the French word for fog, a nod to its cool-climate environs. Supple tannins and refined acidity round out the deal.

title: Ledson 2012 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This full and heady wine offers marshmallow oak around a core of ...
description: This full and heady wine offers marshmallow oak around a core of grapefruit and honeyed fruit. With soft acidity, it veers into darker fig and toasted oak characteristics before lifting again towards the finish, which swirls in lemon and grapefruit.

title: Domaine Faiveley 2011 Les Villeranges  (Rully)
excerpt: Fresh and fruity, it offers a touch of citrus as well as ...
description: Fresh and fruity, it offers a touch of citrus as well as acidity with pear and red apple flavors. The lightest hint of wood rounds the wine out. Drink now.

title: Louis Latour 2011 La Grande Roche Premier Cru  (Montagny)
excerpt: A well-structured wine, it offers ripe, creamy fruits and attractive acidity. With ...
description: A well-structured wine, it offers ripe, creamy fruits and attractive acidity. With mouth-watering citrus flavors, yellow fruits and smooth aftertaste, it represents great value from a lesser-known appellation.

title: Ryan Patrick 2012 Naked Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This stainless-steel fermented and aged wine is loaded with ripe fruit flavors ...
description: This stainless-steel fermented and aged wine is loaded with ripe fruit flavors of apple, melon, pineapple and apricot. Great acidity underscores the clean and fresh midpalate. Excellent concentration and refreshing minerality makes this one to buy by the case.

title: St. Francis 2012 Wild Oak Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: A delicate study in Golden Delicious apple and ginger undertones, this wine ...
description: A delicate study in Golden Delicious apple and ginger undertones, this wine is also hearty in toast and oak, concentrated and rich with a clean finish of vanilla and hazelnut. A good call with buttery seafood like fresh-caught lobster.

title: Testarossa 2012 Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: Lifting aromas of orange blossom, night jasmine and pear lead the way. ...
description: Lifting aromas of orange blossom, night jasmine and pear lead the way. On the palate, there is a salty character along with freshly cut kiwi, exotic spice and a tad of bitter greens on the finish.

title: Valle dell'Acate 2012 Bidis Chardonnay (Sicilia)
excerpt: Fermented and aged in barriques, this structured Chardonnay opens with aromas of ...
description: Fermented and aged in barriques, this structured Chardonnay opens with aromas of subtle oak, citrus and lemon drop. The palate delivers fresh acidity and flavors of toast, apple, butterscotch and nut.

title: Ironstone 2012 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: This medium-bodied wine climbs several notches up the quality scale from a ...
description: This medium-bodied wine climbs several notches up the quality scale from a typical California AVA Chardonnay. It blends ripe pear and butter aromas, pleasing peach and pear flavors, a texture that is soft and easy, and a slightly buttery finish.

title: Riverbench 2013 Bedrock Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
excerpt: An early look at the Chardonnay potential of 2013, the nose on ...
description: An early look at the Chardonnay potential of 2013, the nose on this bottling takes off like a perfumed jet plane. Sweet scents of white flowers make for a very beautiful, lifting and refreshing bouquet. You expect cloying flavors, but the wine delivers with a powerful zing of acidity, bolstered by slight flavors of Gala apple peel and sour banana gum, ending with a pear finish.

title: McIntyre Vineyards 2012 McIntrye Estate Vineyard 25th Anniversary Edition Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
excerpt: Longtime Santa Lucia Highlands winemaker Steve McIntrye celebrates his 25th year of ...
description: Longtime Santa Lucia Highlands winemaker Steve McIntrye celebrates his 25th year of his own vineyard with this 2012, which starts with buttercream and lime aromas. Once sipped, flavors of marcona almond, roasted pear, coconut and roasted chicken take hold, making for a savory but nicely restrained experience.

title: Crushed 2012 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: This fruity and full-bodied wine offers much to like. The opposite of ...
description: This fruity and full-bodied wine offers much to like. The opposite of crisp and lively, it was made in an unabashedly ripe and rich style. Pear and butter aromas lead to ripe peach and vanilla flavors. The texture is rich in the mouth and the finish is soft.

title: Karma NV Side View Chardonnay (North Coast)
excerpt: Like a liquid lemon meringue pie, this Chardonnay has bright fruit flavors, ...
description: Like a liquid lemon meringue pie, this Chardonnay has bright fruit flavors, lemony acidity and a creamy finish. It smells like ripe apple and pineapple, and tastes crisp but but not lean. Altogether delicious and mouthwatering, and not nearly as sweet as the pie.

title: Edna Valley Vineyard 2012 Paragon Chardonnay (Central Coast)
excerpt: A zesty honeydew and tropical, nearly pineapple soda nose starts this wine. ...
description: A zesty honeydew and tropical, nearly pineapple soda nose starts this wine. On the palate, there is apple pie and brisk, fleeting pineapple, but not much lasting acidity. A very easy-drinking deal, especially for the price, that will pair well with everything from seared scallops to roasted chicken.

title: Louis Latour 2011  Marsannay
excerpt: Good fruit, acidity and great freshness all come together in this delicious, ...
description: Good fruit, acidity and great freshness all come together in this delicious, accessible wine. Fruity and fragrant, it has a light touch of acidity at the end. Drink now.

title: Leaping Horse 2011 Chardonnay (Lodi)
excerpt: For people who like wines that speak a little softly, try this ...
description: For people who like wines that speak a little softly, try this very moderately priced Chardonnay. Subtle aromas and flavors of green apple, honey and almond build slowly as you enjoy the light to medium body, smooth texture and a finish that hints of sweetness.

title: Atwater 2012 Cecil Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Whiffs of smoke and earth meld into pretty aromas of white flower, ...
description: Whiffs of smoke and earth meld into pretty aromas of white flower, apple and lemon on this ripe, richly bodied Chardonnay. Layers of cream and stone fruit build on the palate, but are balanced by a brisk lemon-toned acidity. Drink now while young.

title: Firestone 2012 Chardonnay (Santa Ynez Valley)
excerpt: This wine begins with a clean and cool nose featuring green banana ...
description: This wine begins with a clean and cool nose featuring green banana and other subdued tropical notes as well as salty seaspray. Once sipped, the tropical side emerges more, with papaya and guava, as well as overripe peach. Altogether, the alcohol feels a bit high.

title: Heron Hill 2012 Unoaked Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Crisp apple and pear flavors are touched with white floral notes on ...
description: Crisp apple and pear flavors are touched with white floral notes on this nervy, light-footed Chardonnay. A juicy, ripe apple flavor makes it a widely appealing, easy quaffer.

title: Domaine Faiveley 2011  Montagny
excerpt: Mineral in texture, this wine is steely and firm. LIvely acidity comes ...
description: Mineral in texture, this wine is steely and firm. LIvely acidity comes from the citrus flavors and crisp apples. The wine is totally fresh and crisp. Drink now.

title: Educated Guess 2012 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: The grapes for hail from both Carneros and Oak Knoll and have ...
description: The grapes for hail from both Carneros and Oak Knoll and have undergone both barrel and stainless steel fermentation. The result is a medium-weight to fuller-style of clean, crisp lemon and pear flavors, a swirl of tropical vanilla on the finish.

title: Gloria Ferrer 2011 Estate Grown and Bottled Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Intense in lemon and silky, it shows a touch of effervescence from ...
