description: Intense in lemon and silky, it shows a touch of effervescence from the bright acidity and is textured from the time spent in barrel. The finish and lingering aftertaste steer sweet, into the land of butterscotch and caramel.

title: Heron Hill 2012 Ingle Vineyard Unoaked Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Fresh lemon, tangerine and apricot notes abound in this juicy, easy-going Chardonnay. ...
description: Fresh lemon, tangerine and apricot notes abound in this juicy, easy-going Chardonnay. Lack of oak aging highlights its youthful, primary character. Racy lemon acidity and zesty lemon-skin reverberate on the finish.

title: Cinnabar 2012 Central Avenue Vineyard Chardonnay (Monterey)
excerpt: This wine from longtime Santa Cruz Mountains producer Cinnabar offers a very ...
description: This wine from longtime Santa Cruz Mountains producer Cinnabar offers a very subtle nose with slight, brisk minerality. Once sipped, the flavors remain subtle, though are nicely rounded with a bit of guava-based tropicalitythat emerges toward the finish.

title: Jean-Luc and Paul Aegerter 2012 Marissou Premier Cru  (Rully)
excerpt: Rich and soft, it offers a ripe cushion of Chardonnay and a ...
description: Rich and soft, it offers a ripe cushion of Chardonnay and a warm, rounded personality. While it misses out on a more structured character, the yellow fruits and light spice from wood aging give immediate drinkability.

title: Silver Thread 2012 Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: A wisp of smoke lends nuance to aromas of apple and white ...
description: A wisp of smoke lends nuance to aromas of apple and white peach on this dry, refreshingly citric Chardonnay. The palate builds in bulk and body with concentrated flavors of savory apples layered in smoke and earth. Drink now.

title: Spin the Bottle 2012 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: Mellow, luscious Chardonnay from a new brand. Butterscotch aromas and flavors and ...
description: Mellow, luscious Chardonnay from a new brand. Butterscotch aromas and flavors and a rich, soft texture make this flavorful and easy to swallow. Warning: Your head may spin looking at the holographic label.

title: Girly Girl 2011 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Thin and simple, this is a direct and straightforward wine, with green ...
description: Thin and simple, this is a direct and straightforward wine, with green apple fruit flavors and a very light dusting of cinnamon. Drink now.

title: Samson 2012 Chardonnay (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Done entirely in stainless steel, it offers grape skin flavors and green ...
description: Done entirely in stainless steel, it offers grape skin flavors and green apple fruit. It was.

title: Michel-Schlumberger 2012 Gold Collection Chardonnay (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Aromas of tropical pineapple and lemon are buried somewhat in this mid-weight ...
description: Aromas of tropical pineapple and lemon are buried somewhat in this mid-weight wine. Nimble in acidity and straightforward in flavor, it finishes a tad abruptly.

title: Wattle Creek 2012 Chardonnay (Yorkville Highlands)
excerpt: A full-bodied wine with a style that incorporates richness in the aromas ...
description: A full-bodied wine with a style that incorporates richness in the aromas and restraint in the flavors. It smells sweet and candylike, but tastes dry and oaky. A touch of walnut on the palate adds an austerity that is smoothed over on the finish with a dash of sweet oak.

title: Coto de Hayas 2013 Chardonnay (Campo de Borja)
excerpt: Mild aromas of apple and generic white fruits are friendly enough. This ...
description: Mild aromas of apple and generic white fruits are friendly enough. This has a monotone citrusy mouthfeel and flavors of tangerine and grapefruit. A bit of stalky corn and hay flavor rises up on the finish.

title: Stomping Ground 2012 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: Pleasant and fruity to sip, soft in texture, light- to medium bodied, ...
description: Pleasant and fruity to sip, soft in texture, light- to medium bodied, it has a rich yellow-gold color, butter-candy aromas, ripe apple flavors and a slightly sweet finish.

title: Waterstone 2012 Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Concentrated in pleasing pear and stone fruit, the toasty oak and oily ...
description: Concentrated in pleasing pear and stone fruit, the toasty oak and oily richness of this wine detracts from the fruit. It comes into its own with some air, the texture showing more acidity and balance.

title: Louis Latour 2012 En Paradis  (Pouilly-Vinzelles)
excerpt: Very soft and dull, it offers white fruits and some acidity. Drink ...
description: Very soft and dull, it offers white fruits and some acidity. Drink now.

title: Vega Sindoa 2013 Chardonnay (Navarra)
excerpt: On the nose, this is gaseous and mealy smelling, and the palate ...
description: On the nose, this is gaseous and mealy smelling, and the palate is flat, with flavors of pithy, bitter white fruits.

title: Castillo de Monjardin 2013 El Cerezo Unoaked Chardonnay (Navarra)
excerpt: Saline and nettle aromas are a lot like underripe Sauvignon Blanc. This ...
description: Saline and nettle aromas are a lot like underripe Sauvignon Blanc. This is a sour, cutting wine with flavors of lime, grapefruit and underripe passion fruit. The finish is overly acidic and citric.

title: Campus Oaks 2012 Chardonnay (Lodi)
excerpt: A barrel fermented Chardonnay that is uncharacteristically soft and fruity. Aromas of ...
description: A barrel fermented Chardonnay that is uncharacteristically soft and fruity. Aromas of bananas and bubble gum lead to slightly sweet, uncomplicated flavors. The texture and body are light.

title: Enate 2013 234 Chardonnay (Somontano)
excerpt: Sweet melon and peach aromas are candied. In the mouth, this is ...
description: Sweet melon and peach aromas are candied. In the mouth, this is awkward, fizzy and cloying. The flavor profile has little positive to offer, while the finish turns bitter and grassy tasting.

title: Sokol Blosser 2012 Chardonnay (Dundee Hills)
excerpt: Whole cluster-pressed, then settled and racked to barrels, this is a garden ...
description: Whole cluster-pressed, then settled and racked to barrels, this is a garden of sensual delights. Apple, marzipan, buttered nuts, a full range of citrus and tree fruits, caramel, honey... it just keeps on going. The seamless, seemingly endless finish brings in a finishing swish of buttery toast.

title: The Eyrie Vineyards 2011 Original Vines Reserve Chardonnay (Dundee Hills)
excerpt: Exceptionally fragrant, it sends up scents of white peaches and hazelnuts. Savory ...
description: Exceptionally fragrant, it sends up scents of white peaches and hazelnuts. Savory highlights adorn the crisp, detailed fruit flavors of peach, pear and yellow apples.

title: Thomas Fogarty 2011 Estate Damiana Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: A luscious and elegant nose promises richness, and the flavors deliver even ...
description: A luscious and elegant nose promises richness, and the flavors deliver even more than expected. The backbone of zingy acidity finds a perfect match with flavors of white peach, lime, and poached pear. Coming from a 35-year-old, 2,000-foot-high vineyard at the northeast of the Santa Cruz Mountains, this memorable wine that can tackle herb-crusted pork chops as easily as salmon, shellfish or soft cheeses.

title: Lucas & Lewellen 2012 Estate Vineyards Chardonnay (Santa Barbara)
excerpt: Taking off with a bright tangerine and lime nose, the citrus carries ...
description: Taking off with a bright tangerine and lime nose, the citrus carries through to the palate, where grapefruit flavors take the varietal into curious yet compelling places. Acidity is at the forefront, thanks to the all-stainless-steel processing, but it feels strategically integrated.

title: Nittnaus Hans und Christine 2013 Heideboden Chardonnay (Burgenland)
excerpt: It offers ripe but restrained yellow plums and a citrusy and textured ...
description: It offers ripe but restrained yellow plums and a citrusy and textured midpalate focused on lees and acidity. With just the right amount of weight and lightness, it manages that tightrope walk between rounded body and tingling acidity.

title: Hannes Reeh 2013 Chardonnay (Burgenland)
excerpt: The faintest touch of vanilla and cream barely manages to contain the ...
description: The faintest touch of vanilla and cream barely manages to contain the fragrance of white summer blossom. The palate offers a return to classically restrained, creamy but well-integrated oaked Chardonnay with light-footed balance.

title: Fossil Point 2011 Chardonnay (Edna Valley)
excerpt: A rewarding deal from the ocean-influenced vineyards of Edna Valley, this project ...
description: A rewarding deal from the ocean-influenced vineyards of Edna Valley, this project by Nathan Carlson (general manager of the much higher-priced Center of Effort winery) delivers honey, salted nuts, tangerine zest and crushed limestone on the nose. Salinity is present on the palate, along with a lemon zing that lingers.

title: Netzl 2013 Chardonnay (Carnuntum)
excerpt: Creamy yellow plum fruit and a flinty edge lead onto a full-fruited, ...
description: Creamy yellow plum fruit and a flinty edge lead onto a full-fruited, brightly lit palate where all the fruit is pulled into zesty orange and lemon focus. Concentration and friendliness prove great assets here.

title: Strauss 2013 Classic Chardonnay (Steiermark)
excerpt: Faint lemon zest and a touch of green pear hardly give anything ...
description: Faint lemon zest and a touch of green pear hardly give anything away on the nose, while the palate is balanced and light. Variety speaks louder than origin here, but with poise and honesty.

title: Alphart 2013 Vom Berg Chardonnay (Thermenregion)
excerpt: Restrained Mirabelle fruit is contained on a focused and streamlined palate that ...
description: Restrained Mirabelle fruit is contained on a focused and streamlined palate that provides as much refreshment as it does texture. It manages to refresh and has lots of backbone.

title: Boedecker Cellars 2012 Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: A light floral nose carries inviting scents of honeysuckle and clover, with ...
description: A light floral nose carries inviting scents of honeysuckle and clover, with just a hint of cut grass. The fruit is clean and apple-flavored, and carries a touch of cinnamon, perhaps from the neutral barrel fermentation.

title: Thomas Fogarty 2011 Langley Hill Vineyard Estate Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: The largest Chardonnay parcel in the Thomas Fogarty estate portfolio at slightly ...
description: The largest Chardonnay parcel in the Thomas Fogarty estate portfolio at slightly more than four acres, this slice still only amounts to four barrels of wine. The 2011 starts with a candied, chalky smell, reminiscent of white Smarties, and the flavors lean toward cooked stone fruit, such as caramelized pluot, and charred daffodil.

title: Great American Wine Company 2012 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: This new, patriotic Rosenblum Cellars project kicked off with a $100,000 gift ...
description: This new, patriotic Rosenblum Cellars project kicked off with a $100,000 gift to the USO. This affordable but well-manicured wine begins with aromas of caramelized lemon peel and faint peach that carry through to the palate, alongside a lingering note of toasted vanilla. Seeming to evolve steadily as it sits in the glass, it would wash down an even more affordable bucket of fried chicken.

title: Silver Spoon 2011 Chardonnay (Central Coast)
excerpt: On the paler side of the the Chardonnay scale, the nose is ...
description: On the paler side of the the Chardonnay scale, the nose is subtle, with light touches of cream, butterscotch and smoke. There is a decent tension between ripe, lemongrass-like fruit and a bitter, grapefruit rind acidity in this wine from the team at Terravant Wine Company in Buellton.

title: Left Coast Cellars 2012 Truffle Hill Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Half of this wine was barrel fermented in mostly new French oak; ...
description: Half of this wine was barrel fermented in mostly new French oak; the other half done in stainless. Peaches and butter are the main flavors, with a soft, pretty finish that brings a streak of caramel.

title: Dorigo 2012 Chardonnay (Colli Orientali del Friuli)
excerpt: Fermented and aged in barriques, it opens with aromas of oak, toast, ...
description: Fermented and aged in barriques, it opens with aromas of oak, toast, butterscotch and apple. Oak dominates the palate, while butter, lemon drop and vanilla mingle in the background.

title: Peirano 2012 The Heritage Collection Chardonnay (Lodi)
excerpt: Generous in lemon custard and pear aromas and flavors, this is a ...
description: Generous in lemon custard and pear aromas and flavors, this is a fairly full-bodied style of Chardonnay. It offers roundness balanced by a minerally finish.

title: Colutta 2013 Chardonnay (Colli Orientali del Friuli)
excerpt: Structured but straightforward, it opens with a pretty fragrance of white flowers, ...
description: Structured but straightforward, it opens with a pretty fragrance of white flowers, yellow apples and a whiff of bread crust, all of which carry over to the ripe, round palate.

title: Quintay 2012 Q Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Peach, apple, vanilla and dusty aromas lead to a zesty palate with ...
description: Peach, apple, vanilla and dusty aromas lead to a zesty palate with guts and nice acidity. This tastes like a mash-up of apple, citrus and nectarine, while the finish is largely bright and forward, with just a touch of mealiness at the tail end.

title: Red Pony Ranch 2012 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: Tan spice, like sandalwood, plays a leading role, along with a touch ...
description: Tan spice, like sandalwood, plays a leading role, along with a touch of Meyer lemon and marshmallow. Stone fruit notes are currently in the background, but may emerge more with time.

title: Villa Russiz 2011 Graf de La Tour Chardonnay (Collio)
excerpt: Oak, toast, butter, nectarine, vanilla and butterscotch sensations take center stage in ...
description: Oak, toast, butter, nectarine, vanilla and butterscotch sensations take center stage in this high-octane Chardonnay from Friuli. The palate is dominated by scorching alcohol that throws the wine out of balance.

title: Veramonte 2012 Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: For a $12 Chardonnay, one can do far worse than this juicy, ...
description: For a $12 Chardonnay, one can do far worse than this juicy, fruity number. Opening aromas of vanilla, melon and saline water transition to flavors of tropical fruits and green table grapes. The finish is simple but full and ripe, with a touch of heat and burn.

title: Gradis'ciutta 2013 Chardonnay (Collio)
excerpt: This straightforward wine opens with delicate aromas of apples, mowed grass and ...
description: This straightforward wine opens with delicate aromas of apples, mowed grass and dried hay. The palate offers Golden Delicous apples and lemon zest alongside a light mineral note and firm acidity.

title: Walnut City WineWorks 2012 Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Light fruit flavors of apple and pear have been softened a bit ...
description: Light fruit flavors of apple and pear have been softened a bit with aging on the lees in neutral oak. This is a pleasant, simple, quaffable wine for every day enjoyment.

title: Cookies & Cream 2012 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: This rich and buttery Chardonnay is made in a classic California style. ...
description: This rich and buttery Chardonnay is made in a classic California style. Its smooth texture coats the palate and helps the generous pear and pineapple flavors linger on a slightly sweet finish.

title: Lagaria 2012 Chardonnay (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)
excerpt: This simple but well-made wine from northern Italy opens with delicate floral ...
description: This simple but well-made wine from northern Italy opens with delicate floral and peach aromas. The palate offers golden apple and lemon zest alongside bright acidity.

title: Vega Sindoa 2012 Chardonnay (Navarra)
excerpt: This oaky Chardonnay is tan and maderized but still mostly vital and ...
description: This oaky Chardonnay is tan and maderized but still mostly vital and fresh on the nose and palate. Aromas of resiny oak, toast and smoke outmuscle subtle fruit notes, while the palate is plump, melony and offers creamy, oaky flavors that finish toasty and resiny.

title: Cottonwood Winery of Oregon 2012 Estate Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
excerpt: Fruity and round, with apple and banana flavors, this simple, easy-drinking wine ...
description: Fruity and round, with apple and banana flavors, this simple, easy-drinking wine enters and leaves softly all the way.

title: Carabella 2011 Dijon 76 Estate Chardonnay (Chehalem Mountains)
excerpt: Quite light, in both mouthfeel and flavor, this has simple, rather generic ...
description: Quite light, in both mouthfeel and flavor, this has simple, rather generic fruit and a bit of butter.

title: Tololo 2012 Chardonnay (Maule Valley)
excerpt: This is a basic but nice Chardonnay with lightly oaked aromas of ...
description: This is a basic but nice Chardonnay with lightly oaked aromas of pear, apple and tropical fruits. The palate is fresh and healthy, while apple, mango and peach flavors settle with a hint of bitter matchstick and leftover tropical notes.

title: Villa Oneiro 2012 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: Within an immensely heavy bottle lies a Chardonnay dark-golden in color and ...
description: Within an immensely heavy bottle lies a Chardonnay dark-golden in color and with barrel-fermentation written all over its body, which is hearty and nonlinear. The flavors tend toward coconut, pineapple and dried apple, concentrated and extracted in a big California way.

title: Santa Ema 2013 Select Terroir Unoaked Chardonnay (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Mild vanilla cookie and dusty, yeasty aromas get this unoaked Chardonnay going. ...
description: Mild vanilla cookie and dusty, yeasty aromas get this unoaked Chardonnay going. An innocuous-feeling palate carries melony flavors of honey, sweet apple and banana, while a touch of brine rises up on the finish.

title: Yamhill Valley 2012 Chardonnay (McMinnville)
excerpt: This has a soapy mouthfeel, often an indicator for a high pH ...
description: This has a soapy mouthfeel, often an indicator for a high pH wine. The apple and pear fruit flavors are mild but thin.

title: Raimat 2012 Castell de Raimat Chardonnay (Costers del Segre)
excerpt: Aromas of warm radiator dust and lightly toasted peach and apple come ...
description: Aromas of warm radiator dust and lightly toasted peach and apple come in front of a plump, peachy palate with candied orange and nectarine flavors. The finish is blocky in feel and short in length, with creamy sweetness.

title: Apaltagua 2013 Reserva Unoaked Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
excerpt: Mealy white-fruit aromas are lacking in clarity and freshness, while the flavor ...
description: Mealy white-fruit aromas are lacking in clarity and freshness, while the flavor profile is based on pineapple. The finish is broad and heavy.

title: Idrias 2011 Chardonnay (Somontano)
excerpt: Stalky and oxidized on the nose, this becomes cidery, high in acid ...
description: Stalky and oxidized on the nose, this becomes cidery, high in acid in the mouth, with sour-lemon flavors.

title: Abeja 2012 Chardonnay (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: This is the estate bottling, barrel-fermented in French oak and put through ...
description: This is the estate bottling, barrel-fermented in French oak and put through full malolactic. Spice and toast frame perfectly ripened tree fruit flavors of apple, pear and orange peel. The concentration and length suggest that this Chardonnay can be cellared for up to a decade.

title: Abeja 2012 Chardonnay (Washington)
excerpt: Though not at all unsung (in fact, mailing list is closed), Abeja ...
description: Though not at all unsung (in fact, mailing list is closed), Abeja wines offer exceptional quality for the price across the entire lineup. Case in point: this super-long, ultradelicious Chardonnay, a generous wine with green apple, lime and white peach; add in notes of butter, brioche and baking spices. The length and balance, along with the pure pleasure, far exceed the price.

title: JM Cellars 2012 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: A number of different fermentation regimens puts these grapes through their paces, ...
description: A number of different fermentation regimens puts these grapes through their paces, and leads to skillful blending. The result is a wine of exceptional complexity, depth and texture. Lively citrus, Meyer lemon, tangerine, peach and caramel flavors abound.

title: Williams Selyem 2012 Heintz Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This is a classic Russian River and Williams Selyem Chardonnay, so bright ...
description: This is a classic Russian River and Williams Selyem Chardonnay, so bright in acidity and rich in fruit, you hardly notice the oak. Papayas, tangerines, peaches, pears, Meyer lemons and minerals mingle perfectly with vanilla, buttered toast and acidity, producing a wine of elegance and creamy flair. Drink it now, but not too cold.

title: Jeff Gordon 2012 Collection Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: This wine shows plenty of Chardonnay and oak character, with a creamy ...
description: This wine shows plenty of Chardonnay and oak character, with a creamy core of honey, peaches and toast. It will go with a wide variety of fare, from halibut and grilled tuna to broiled chicken and mushroom risotto.

title: Barnard Griffin 2012 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Opening scents of cracker and Asian pear roll into a concentrated, sophisticated ...
description: Opening scents of cracker and Asian pear roll into a concentrated, sophisticated effort that was half barrel-fermented. Tart citrus, apple and pear fruit is touched lightly with pretty spice.

title: Browne Family Vineyards 2012 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aged 11 months in French oak, the roasty-toasty barrel notes are at ...
description: Aged 11 months in French oak, the roasty-toasty barrel notes are at the fore followed by peach and tropical fruit. What it lacks in subtlety it makes up for with a rich, creamy mouthfeel that draws out to a lingering finish.

title: Ken Wright 2011 Celilo Chardonnay (Washington)
excerpt: On the Washington side of the Columbia Gorge, the Celilo Vineyard is ...
description: On the Washington side of the Columbia Gorge, the Celilo Vineyard is an exceptional site for Chardonnay. This was sourced from the 1983 planting, and the relatively old vines and cool vintage deliver a wine with excellent minerality, lift, drive and focus. The fruit is tangy and yellow/green, but perfectly ripe; the acid underpinning is fresh and lively. This has every chance of cellaring until 2024 or later.

title: Nickel & Nickel 2012 Stiling Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: From a vineyard in the Green Valley, it has ripe flavors of ...
description: From a vineyard in the Green Valley, it has ripe flavors of apricots, tangerines, peaches, pears and Meyer lemons, with lots of smoky, honeyed notes of new French oak. Not very subtle, it will appeal to fans of oaky, ripe Chardonnay.

title: Mattebella 2010 Famiglia Chardonnay (North Fork of Long Island)
excerpt: Fresh apple and pear aromas are lifted with hints of white flowers ...
description: Fresh apple and pear aromas are lifted with hints of white flowers and honeydew on this full-bodied, elegantly balanced wine. The palate is slick with a drizzle of cream adding richness to flavors of apple and lemon, but balanced with bright acidity and a brisk saline finish.

title: Bridgman 2012 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: A directly appealing wine with little obvious new oak influence to get ...
description: A directly appealing wine with little obvious new oak influence to get in the way of the clean pear and pineapple flavors that are stitched together by just a touch of sweetness.

title: Jamesport 2011 Chardonnay (North Fork of Long Island)
excerpt: The scent of apple blossoms perfume this round, richly structured wine, accentuating ...
description: The scent of apple blossoms perfume this round, richly structured wine, accentuating flavors of apple and pear on the palate. Touches of vanilla and cream add weight and mouthfeel, but the wine finishes crisp with lemony acidity and saline minerality.

title: Mattebella 2009 Famiglia Chardonnay (North Fork of Long Island)
excerpt: A whiff of floral potpourri that persists from start to finish adds ...
description: A whiff of floral potpourri that persists from start to finish adds elegance to this full-bodied wine. The palate is expansive and rich, but finishes refreshingly tart with flavors of crisp green apple and lemon.

title: St. Francis 2012 Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
excerpt: It delivers just what many consumers want, a creamy wine with flavors ...
description: It delivers just what many consumers want, a creamy wine with flavors of citrus fruits, honey and buttered toast. With a production of 67,000 cases, it will be easy to find.

title: Rutherford Hill 2012 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This wine is soft, herbal and earthy. It has a lovely smoky ...
description: This wine is soft, herbal and earthy. It has a lovely smoky creaminess, as well as hints of white stone and tropical fruits, but lacks a certain vibrancy.

title: The Williamsburg Winery 2011 John Adlum Limited Chardonnay (Virginia)
excerpt: White currant and orchard fruit tones lead onto the silky, open-textured palate. ...
description: White currant and orchard fruit tones lead onto the silky, open-textured palate. It finishes with a welcome minerally tang.

title: Feudi del Pisciotto 2011 Alberta Ferretti Chardonnay (Sicilia)
excerpt: Dominated by wood, it offers heavy oak and toasted sensations with a ...
description: Dominated by wood, it offers heavy oak and toasted sensations with a hint of butterscotch alongside fresh acidity, but it lacks fruit richness.

title: Friedeman 2012 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Rich in tropical fruits, apricots and pears, it shows lots of oak ...
description: Rich in tropical fruits, apricots and pears, it shows lots of oak and lees complications. It aspires to importance, but falls short in overall balance. Drink up.

title: Sherwood House Vineyards 2012 Sherwood House Oregon Road Chardonnay (North Fork of Long Island)
excerpt: The scent of freshly pressed apples lends a comforting familiarity to this ...
description: The scent of freshly pressed apples lends a comforting familiarity to this easy-going Chardonnay. Zesty lemon acidity highlights concentrated apple and pear flavors. The finish doesn't linger, but it's elegant with hints of tea leaves and potpourri.

title: One Woman 2010 Chardonnay (North Fork of Long Island)
excerpt: Touches of vanilla accent flavors of freshly pressed apples and pears in ...
description: Touches of vanilla accent flavors of freshly pressed apples and pears in this bold, full-bodied wine. Piercing lemon acidity adds freshness to the palate, but the finish is a bit warming overall.

title: Red Theory 2012 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: An innocuous, easy drinking wine with notes of apple and pear pairing ...
description: An innocuous, easy drinking wine with notes of apple and pear pairing with a medium bodied, textured feel. Some sugar sweetens the finish.

title: Pfendler 2012 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Apricot, tangerine, peach and papaya flavors give this wine magnificent ripeness, accompanied ...
description: Apricot, tangerine, peach and papaya flavors give this wine magnificent ripeness, accompanied by plenty of smoky, caramelized oak.

title: Schug 2012 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: It conveys lots of ripe, forward citrus, pear and green apple flavors. ...
description: It conveys lots of ripe, forward citrus, pear and green apple flavors. Oak plays only a supporting role, with crisp acidity and creamy lees co-starring with the fruit.

title: Cooper Vineyards 2012 Chardonnay (Virginia)
excerpt: High-toned aromas of beeswax and ginger carry onto the medium-full, lissome palate, ...
description: High-toned aromas of beeswax and ginger carry onto the medium-full, lissome palate, which picks up notes of glazed pear and flower.

title: Cedar Creek 2011 Estate Bottled Chardonnay (Shenandoah Valley)
excerpt: Taciturn aromas of apricot, papaya seed and pie crust hit the nose ...
description: Taciturn aromas of apricot, papaya seed and pie crust hit the nose first, leading to a medium-bodied palate that has a wide-open texture. Zesty acidity lends the finish some spark.

title: Geyser Peak 2012 Water Bend Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Simple and oaky, but it is also classic California, with ripe, forward ...
description: Simple and oaky, but it is also classic California, with ripe, forward apricot, orange and buttered cinnamon toast flavors, wrapped into a creamy texture.

title: Lost Angel 2013 Chardonnay (California)
excerpt: It conveys brisk acidity, vanilla, buttered toast and apricot, tangerine and honey ...
description: It conveys brisk acidity, vanilla, buttered toast and apricot, tangerine and honey flavors, as well as ripeness.

title: Olabisi 2011 Ceja Vineyard Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: The oak overpowers the limes and mangoes. Despite mouthwatering acidity, the wine ...
description: The oak overpowers the limes and mangoes. Despite mouthwatering acidity, the wine is dominated by butterscotch and buttered cinnamon toast.

title: Duck Pond 2012 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This feels a bit awkward in the mouth, with light buttery fruit ...
description: This feels a bit awkward in the mouth, with light buttery fruit and a somewhat metallic aftertaste. Still young, so it could very well knit itself together with a bit more time.

title: Sojourn 2012 Durell Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Oak dominates this wine, which is all about smoky buttered toast, butterscotch ...
description: Oak dominates this wine, which is all about smoky buttered toast, butterscotch and caramel. Somewhere underneath all that is a pretty good Chardonnay, dry and crisp, with tropical fruit, peach and citrus flavors.

title: Original House Wine 2012 House Wine Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The notes of vanilla, melon and pear are rounded and creamy in ...
description: The notes of vanilla, melon and pear are rounded and creamy in feel with a touch of residual sugar (7.5 g/L) helping it go down easy.

title: Clos La Chance 2012 Chardonnay (Monterey County)
excerpt: With crisp, mouthwatering acidity, this simple wine has a creamy texture housing ...
description: With crisp, mouthwatering acidity, this simple wine has a creamy texture housing mango, tangerine and apricot fruit flavors.

title: Sojourn 2012 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: This oaky Chardonnay conveys rich, simple buttered toast and caramel flavors. It ...
description: This oaky Chardonnay conveys rich, simple buttered toast and caramel flavors. It has good acidity and some nice tropical fruit and peach ripeness, but the oak overwhelms.

title: Jones of Washington 2013 Chardonnay (Wahluke Slope)
excerpt: A straightforward, easy drinker with notes of pear and melon supported by ...
description: A straightforward, easy drinker with notes of pear and melon supported by a rounded feel and little overt new oak influence.

title: Bluestone 2011 Estate Grown Chardonnay (Shenandoah Valley)
excerpt: Diminished white-apricot and apple-like aromas lead to a yielding, medium-weight palate, which ...
description: Diminished white-apricot and apple-like aromas lead to a yielding, medium-weight palate, which comes with a sense of flesh and a hint of pastry shell.

title: Niner 2012 Chardonnay (Edna Valley)
excerpt: A bit thin, but it shows tropical fruit, citrus, peach, vanilla and ...
description: A bit thin, but it shows tropical fruit, citrus, peach, vanilla and buttered toast flavors.

title: Schug 2012 Heritage Reserve Chardonnay (Carneros)
excerpt: Fermented and aged in new French wood barrels as well as two- ...
description: Fermented and aged in new French wood barrels as well as two- and three-year old ones , this Chardonnay is too oaky. Caramel, butterscotch and vanilla dominate the underlying lime and pear fruit flavors.

title: Trump 2012 Chardonnay (Monticello)
excerpt: The aromas of Gala apple and hazelnut seem a bit wooly, but ...
description: The aromas of Gala apple and hazelnut seem a bit wooly, but they gain in concentration on the medium-bodied palate. Energetic acids drive the hazelnut-tinged finish.

title: Radius 2012 Chardonnay (Washington)
excerpt: The aromas are quite faint here but the apricot flavors are in ...
description: The aromas are quite faint here but the apricot flavors are in abundance on this off-dry, medium-bodied easy drinker.

title: Tarara 2012 Almost Unoaked Chardonnay (Virginia)
excerpt: Broad notes of white orchard fruit lead onto the light- to medium-bodied ...
description: Broad notes of white orchard fruit lead onto the light- to medium-bodied palate, which feels easygoing and pliable.

title: Naked Mountain 2011 Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (Virginia)
excerpt: Muted, broad orchard fruit and lemon flavors are etched with acids that ...
description: Muted, broad orchard fruit and lemon flavors are etched with acids that become more lifted on the finish. An easy-drinking wine to pair with mild white fish, like tilapia.

title: Chateau Morrisette 2011 Chardonnay (Virginia)
excerpt: Toasted popcorn kernel is the chief note. Medium in body, it bears ...
description: Toasted popcorn kernel is the chief note. Medium in body, it bears simple pomaceous flavors and even-keeled acids.

title: Spell 2012 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: The wine underneath the oak is weak and watery in citrus and ...
description: The wine underneath the oak is weak and watery in citrus and tropical fruit flavors. The barrel influence is heavy in buttered toast. The bottom line is easy and drinkable now, but not very complex.

title: North Gate 2012 Chardonnay (Virginia)
excerpt: Muddled white-orchard fruit aromas carry onto the soft palate, which carries a ...
description: Muddled white-orchard fruit aromas carry onto the soft palate, which carries a trace of sweetness.

title: Klinker Brick 2013 Marisa Vineyard Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Just plain delicious, this full-bodied wine starts with ripe blueberry and dark ...
description: Just plain delicious, this full-bodied wine starts with ripe blueberry and dark chocolate aromas. Next, generous, ripe, saturated fruit flavors flood the mouth, seeming to deepen with each sip. The mouthfeel stays smooth but is enhanced by moderate tannins and ample acidity for good balance.

title: 1000 Stories 2013 Bourbon Barrel Aged Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: This approachable wine from the Fetzer organization was aged in Bourbon barrels. ...
description: This approachable wine from the Fetzer organization was aged in Bourbon barrels. It has good balance, wonderful fruit flavors, a polished texture and lingering finish. Dark in color, the aromas suggest ripe berries and cherries, and the flavors flow similarly rich and deep.

title: Naggiar 2013 Della Casa Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: The first Zin reviewed from Naggiar, this is a beauty. Power and ...
description: The first Zin reviewed from Naggiar, this is a beauty. Power and grace combine in this concentrated and well-structured wine. It smells and tastes like black cherries and blackberries with hints of cocoa and black pepper. The velvety texture delivers smoothness with a nice grip from tannins, and conveys a wonderful sense of depth.

title: Brooklyn West 2012 Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: With a dry and full-bodied approach, this wine combines good fruit flavors, ...
description: With a dry and full-bodied approach, this wine combines good fruit flavors, intriguing oak spiciness and appetizing acidity. The crisp character and high alcohol combine with fine-grained tannins for a liveliness that keeps the cherry and raspberry flavors dancing through the finish.

title: Seven Falls 2013 GPS Jones Vineyard Zinfandel (Wahluke Slope)
excerpt: Barrel notes of sweet spices, vanilla and coconut are up front on ...
description: Barrel notes of sweet spices, vanilla and coconut are up front on this wine followed by lush, full-bodied cherry and raspberry flavors. Fruit and barrel flavors linger in harmony on the finish.

title: Brazin 2012 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This spicy-smelling, dry wine is well balanced, generous in flavor and a ...
description: This spicy-smelling, dry wine is well balanced, generous in flavor and a pleasure to drink. Aromas of black pepper, clove and black cherries carry the nose, while on the palate, ripe and delicious flavors spread across the smooth and lightly tannic texture.

title: Klinker Brick 2013 Old Ghost Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This wine certainly packs in the flavor. It has lots of jammy, ...
description: This wine certainly packs in the flavor. It has lots of jammy, grapy aromas, and flavors that drip boysenberry and blackberry, followed by baking-spice accents. It has a full body, an almost thick texture and mild acidity and tannins.

title: Langetwins 2011 Centennial Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Strong oaky, smoky, peppery aromas and flavors define this robust, assertive, high-alcohol ...
description: Strong oaky, smoky, peppery aromas and flavors define this robust, assertive, high-alcohol wine. It will appeal to some consumers more than others, and those who like lots of seasoning on their steak will love it.

title: Cambridge & Sunset 2013 California Series Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: An especially tasty fruit character sets this full-bodied wine apart from the ...
description: An especially tasty fruit character sets this full-bodied wine apart from the pack. It smells like black currants and tastes like raspberries and blueberries. Moderate tannins and acidity give it good texture and help the finish last.

title: Imagination Wines 2013 Zinderella Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This wine demands attention for its deep, dark color, distinct smoke, bacon ...
description: This wine demands attention for its deep, dark color, distinct smoke, bacon and maple syrup aromas, rich fruit flavors and a texture saturated with fine tannins. It will appeal to those who love boldness, lots of oak flavor and full body.

title: Carol Shelton 2013 Pizazz Zin Old Vine Piazza Ranch Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Complex but mellow aromas, and ripe fruit, dark spice and earthy flavors ...
description: Complex but mellow aromas, and ripe fruit, dark spice and earthy flavors ride a sleek texture in this full-bodied, ready-to-drink wine.

title: Ripken 2012 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Concentrated aromas, generous fruit flavors and full body make this wine engaging ...
description: Concentrated aromas, generous fruit flavors and full body make this wine engaging and appealing. It has ripe fig and raspberry aromas, lush plum and berry flavors and a velvety texture that leads to to a long finish.

title: Produttori Vini Manduria 2011 Madrigale Dolce Naturale  (Primitivo di Manduria)
excerpt: Aromas of dried Marasca cherry and raspberry jam lead the nose on ...
description: Aromas of dried Marasca cherry and raspberry jam lead the nose on this smooth dessert wine. The soft, polished palate delivers fig, candied date and carob while a cocoa note backs up the lingering finish.

title: Gen5 2012 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This polished and well-behaved wine has light spicy, oaky aromas, plenty of ...
description: This polished and well-behaved wine has light spicy, oaky aromas, plenty of good blackberry and cherry flavors and an easygoing texture. It will be a crowd pleaser as well as a host pleaser, with an affordable price.

title: Ironstone 2014 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Bright berry flavors and rich, chocolaty accents make an indulgent combination in ...
description: Bright berry flavors and rich, chocolaty accents make an indulgent combination in this full-bodied and suave-textured wine. It tastes as if a good dose of new oak was used in the aging process, lending vanilla and nutmeg aromas and a sensation of sweetness. Fully ripe grapes give strawberry and blackberry notes.

title: Oak Grove 2013 Family Reserve Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: This lively, medium-bodied and well-balanced wine smells of raspberries and dried herbs. ...
description: This lively, medium-bodied and well-balanced wine smells of raspberries and dried herbs. It tastes invitingly fresh, combining bright fruit with earthy and savory accents. The color is relatively light, matching the overall tangy personality.

title: Plungerhead 2013 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Fresh and lively like a cherry soda, this medium-bodied wine has light, ...
description: Fresh and lively like a cherry soda, this medium-bodied wine has light, spicy, oaky aromas, lots of cherry and strawberry flavors and an easy-drinking texture.

title: Steiner Family Vineyards 2012 Free Bird Zinfandel (El Dorado)
excerpt: Smooth and well balanced, this medium-bodied wine combines light cinnamon and cherry ...
description: Smooth and well balanced, this medium-bodied wine combines light cinnamon and cherry aromas with rich plum flavors. It has a good harmony between bright acidity and ripe fruitiness.

title: McManis 2014 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Spicy, smoky oak aromas dominate this dark-colored and full-bodied wine. Cherry and ...
description: Spicy, smoky oak aromas dominate this dark-colored and full-bodied wine. Cherry and raspberry emerge as the flavors. The texture is plush but not quite soft, as firm tannins and moderate acidity give it good structure.

title: Klinker Brick 2013 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Candylike oak aromas and flavors dominate this full-bodied and rather tannic wine. ...
description: Candylike oak aromas and flavors dominate this full-bodied and rather tannic wine. It smells and tastes like vanilla, fresh-sawn oak and maple syrup. Some ripe plum flavors in the background are nearly sweet.

title: Campus Oaks 2012 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Although it tastes a bit on the sweet side, there is no ...
description: Although it tastes a bit on the sweet side, there is no denying the simple freshness and drinkability of this supple, medium-bodied wine. It has light maple-syrup aromas and fresh strawberry flavors.

title: Grayson Cellars 2014 Lot 12 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Deep fruit flavors and a soft texture make this wine easy to ...
description: Deep fruit flavors and a soft texture make this wine easy to sip. Plenty of blackberry and boysenberry flavors blend with light acidity and very few tannins for a smooth mouthfeel.

title: La Chertosa 2013 Reserve Fra Paolo Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: This is a well-balanced wine. Peppery and earthy aromas lead to cherry ...
description: This is a well-balanced wine. Peppery and earthy aromas lead to cherry and raspberry flavors, a smooth texture and medium body. Owner Sam Sebastiani uses 65% Zinfandel, 30% Primitivo (legally the same as Zinfandel) and 5% Barbera.

title: Montevina 2014 Summit Ridge White Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: A bright pinkish-orange color makes this light-bodied wine stand out from the ...
description: A bright pinkish-orange color makes this light-bodied wine stand out from the beginning, Fresh watermelon and cherry flavors carry on the rounded palate, with a slight sweetness giving softness.

title: Shannon Ridge 2013 High Elevation Collection Zinfandel (Lake County)
excerpt: Easygoing and medium bodied by Zin standards, this wine is pleasantly fruity ...
description: Easygoing and medium bodied by Zin standards, this wine is pleasantly fruity in aroma and flavor. The mild texture is not tannic but does have some refreshing acidity.

title: Leese-Fitch 2013 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: A sense of sweetness from aging with oak combines with bursting ripe ...
description: A sense of sweetness from aging with oak combines with bursting ripe fruit flavors to give a jammy, candied character to this medium-bodied wine. The texture is soft and easy, showing very little tannin.

title: Zin 91 2013 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This mellow, moderately fruity wine has berry and wet-earth aromas, mild strawberry ...
description: This mellow, moderately fruity wine has berry and wet-earth aromas, mild strawberry and spice flavors and a soft texture.

title: Nanna's Short Cake 2013 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Cedar and oak aromas lead to ripe blackberry and plum on the ...
description: Cedar and oak aromas lead to ripe blackberry and plum on the palate. A sweet-seeming layer of maple syrup and brown sugar flavors make this wine jammy in personality.

title: Baron Cooper 2012 Old Vine Tamura Vineyard Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Very ripe and full bodied, this wine has seemingly sweet flavors like ...
description: Very ripe and full bodied, this wine has seemingly sweet flavors like cherry and strawberry jam. Low acidity and light tannins give it a soft, almost syrupy texture.

title: Oso Libre 2012 Nativo Primitivo (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Blackberry fruit makes friends with black earth, coffee syrup, dill and dried ...
description: Blackberry fruit makes friends with black earth, coffee syrup, dill and dried garden herbs on this nuanced bottling. The palate blends cherry cola with milk chocolate, and boisterous acidity with black rock minerality, finishing on a cream-soda spritz.

title: Oso Libre 2012 Osezno Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: From La Vista Vineyard in the Adelaida District, this strong bottling features ...
description: From La Vista Vineyard in the Adelaida District, this strong bottling features cherry candy, anise seed and mace on the nose. The palate is wildly complex, blending vanilla, lavender and violet with boysenberry, blackberry and a kirsch character.

title: Carol Shelton 2012 Florence Vineyard Rocky Reserve Zinfandel (Rockpile)
excerpt: From a 1,400-foot-high site, this wine combines 86% Zinfandel with 14% Petite ...
description: From a 1,400-foot-high site, this wine combines 86% Zinfandel with 14% Petite Sirah, which deliciously exude blackberry, blueberry, kirsch and leather. Smooth, soft and juicy, it adds nutmeg, chocolate and oak as it goes, finishing with structure and length. Drink now through 2021.

title: Papapietro Perry 2011 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Blackberry and leather pouch jump from the glass from this full-bodied wine ...
description: Blackberry and leather pouch jump from the glass from this full-bodied wine that stays light on its feet despite the generous ripeness. Cinnamon, black pepper and black licorice round out the flavors, finishing soft and with length.

title: Carol Shelton 2011 Bastoni Vineyard Karma Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: A field blend of 85% Zinfandel, 11% Alicante Bouschet and 4% Petite ...
description: A field blend of 85% Zinfandel, 11% Alicante Bouschet and 4% Petite Sirah, this juicy, spicy wine is robust and full bodied. Blackberry syrup and black cherry combine around cinnamon and black pepper, finishing in a wave of power.

title: Decoy 2013 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Made in a relatively restrained style, this is a dark, juicy and ...
description: Made in a relatively restrained style, this is a dark, juicy and smoky wine from Dry Creek and Alexander Valley area vineyard sites. Lengthy and smooth, it takes a decidedly medium-bodied route, with traces of leather pouch on the nose and a soft layering of milk chocolate on the finish.

title: Ironstone 2013 Rous Vineyard Reserve Ancient Vines Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: So easy to enjoy, this mild-tasting but full-bodied wine is fruity in ...
description: So easy to enjoy, this mild-tasting but full-bodied wine is fruity in flavor and soft in texture. It has an earthy, savory aroma, generous plum and berry flavors, a mineral influence, light tannins and a lingering finish.

title: Graziano 2012 Old Vine Kazmet Vineyard Zinfandel (Redwood Valley)
excerpt: Well made, well rounded and well balanced, this medium-bodied wine has tasty ...
description: Well made, well rounded and well balanced, this medium-bodied wine has tasty fruit aromas and flavors. Spicy accents accompany a firm, layered texture and lasting finish.

title: Peachy Canyon 2013 Westside Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Quite a solid deal from an expert Zin house, this wine shows ...
description: Quite a solid deal from an expert Zin house, this wine shows aromas of candied cherry and pomegranate, with cinnamon, a hint of tar and a little crushed espresso bean. Dried blueberries enliven the palate, along with mineral tones and more cinnamon-based baking spice.

title: Balletto 2012 Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: A bright and relatively light expression of the variety, this wine imparts ...
description: A bright and relatively light expression of the variety, this wine imparts more red berry than black, with seasonings of cinnamon and nutmeg. Soft, smooth and unfussy, it retains solid acidity from start to finish, with a taste of vanilla custard on the finish.

title: Proulx 2012 Willow Creek Farm Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Stewed plums and strawberries partner with lilacs, sagebrush and hard cinnamon candy ...
description: Stewed plums and strawberries partner with lilacs, sagebrush and hard cinnamon candy on the nose of this bottling, which is boosted by 12% Grenache, 7% Syrah and 6% Petite Sirah. Juicy, rich cherry and blueberry flavors meet with a rocky, black-slate character on the palate.

title: Brophy Clark 2013 Whale Rock VIneyard Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Cherry blossoms, strawberries and wet asphalt elements show on the nose of ...
description: Cherry blossoms, strawberries and wet asphalt elements show on the nose of this wine from a property along Vineyard Drive in West Paso. A nice cola zest starts the palate, which lands on cherries and ripe cranberries before fading away.

title: Ascension Cellars 2012 Rapture-Frankel Vineyard Primitivo (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Strong in alcohol aromas on the nose, this shows tobacco, cigar, pipe ...
description: Strong in alcohol aromas on the nose, this shows tobacco, cigar, pipe smoke and brandy-like notes. The palate is extremely sweet and treacly, with fig and prune flavors.

title: Bella 2012 Big River Ranch Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Quite full bodied and obviously powerful in flavor, this wine is piled ...
description: Quite full bodied and obviously powerful in flavor, this wine is piled deep and rich with fruit aromas and flavors like ripe blackberries and blueberries plus chocolate and espresso. An impressive, astringent texture adds structure and makes it appetizing to drink, while the tannins seem to help the opulent flavors linger during the aftertaste.

title: Chacewater 2013 Made with Organically Grown Grapes Zinfandel (Sierra Foothills)
excerpt: Simply delicious, this Zin is well mannered and not too full bodied. ...
description: Simply delicious, this Zin is well mannered and not too full bodied. Aromas of this dry and elegant wine are like cinnamon and cardamom, and flavors are a little smoky and full of cherries. The mouthfeel is good and gripping due to fine tannins and supportive acidity.

title: Rotta 2013 Osso Balenda Vineyard Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Intoxicating aromas of plum jelly, violets, blueberry, chocolate and cinnamon are cut ...
description: Intoxicating aromas of plum jelly, violets, blueberry, chocolate and cinnamon are cut with a pencil-lead focus on this bottling by a family in the Paso wine game since 1908. Flavors of blackberry jelly are lifted by lavender and anise spice.

title: Bella 2012 Lily Hill Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Bright, distinctive fruit impressions pop through a layer of smoke and bacon ...
description: Bright, distinctive fruit impressions pop through a layer of smoke and bacon aromas as this full-bodied but balanced wine opens up. Jazzy flavors like raspberry and cranberry meld with bass notes like blackberry as firm tannins and good acidity give it great structure, too.

title: Midnight 2012 Estate Zinfandel (Paso Robles Willow Creek District)
excerpt: This offers a classic Zin nose, with dried strawberries, plums, white sage, ...
description: This offers a classic Zin nose, with dried strawberries, plums, white sage, black loam and a minty lift. The palate is juicy but restrained, with ripe olallieberries cut by licorice and tobacco, bound together with considerable grip.

title: Manifesto! 2013 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This delicious Zin has almost everything one could ask for. It offers ...
description: This delicious Zin has almost everything one could ask for. It offers aromas of spicy oak and enticing ripe fruit. Flavors of black cherry and blackberry layer over subtle baking spices and smoke, while a great texture combines fine-grained tannins and firm acidity. A velvety viscosity helps flavors linger on the finish.

title: Terra d'Oro 2013 Home Vineyard Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: This wine is polished in texture, sophisticated in flavor and a pleasure ...
description: This wine is polished in texture, sophisticated in flavor and a pleasure to sip. It exudes plum and blackberry aromas, adds rich plummy flavors and almost coats the mouth with richness. While full bodied, it has enough complexity and finesse for special occasions.

title: Robert Biale 2013 Old Kraft Vineyard Zinfandel (St. Helena)
excerpt: From an historic site replanted and restored to new heights, this wine ...
description: From an historic site replanted and restored to new heights, this wine has good grip and high-octane fruit that plays on the palate, veering from jammy to juicy and back again. Anise and black pepper linger on the lengthy finish, with a touch of smoky oak and toffee.

title: Rusack 2013 Estate Zinfandel (Ballard Canyon)
excerpt: From century-old grapevines found on Santa Cruz Island, this bottling offers concentrated ...
description: From century-old grapevines found on Santa Cruz Island, this bottling offers concentrated raspberry and a touch of strawberry, lifted by eucalyptus and lavender notes. The palate is enlivening, with tight cranberry fruit, elderflower and pencil-lead flavors.

title: Cedarville Vineyard 2012 Estate Zinfandel (El Dorado)
excerpt: A very well-built and elegant dinner wine, this smells like boysenberry and ...
description: A very well-built and elegant dinner wine, this smells like boysenberry and black pepper. It tastes nicely reserved and almost meaty, with moderate tannins to add grip to the texture. It should pair nicely with a roast or braise.

title: Carol Shelton 2013 Wild Thing Old Vine Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: This serious and concentrated wine has plenty of ripe fruit aromas and ...
description: This serious and concentrated wine has plenty of ripe fruit aromas and flavors, with a smooth texture, and lingering fruitiness on the finish. It resembles black plums and cloves in flavor, and has excellent balance and depth.

title: Gracianna 2013 Bacigalupi Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: From the marquee vineyard just down the road, known better for Pinot ...
description: From the marquee vineyard just down the road, known better for Pinot Noir and Chardonnay, this ZInfandel has 5% Petite Sirah blended in. Combined, they offer earthy and floral elements on the nose before a juicy palate of red fruit enters. A touch of olive plays off the bittersweet finish.

title: Pellegrini 2012 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Made with just 10% new oak and in both American and Hungarian ...
description: Made with just 10% new oak and in both American and Hungarian barrels, this wine celebrates both juicy red plum and raspberry, offering sizable power in an elegant package. Soft tannins and measured acidity maintain a freshness in the glass, with a nuanced, easygoing finish.

title: Ironstone 2013 Reserve Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This wine has full aromas and flavors of rich, ripe strawberries and ...
description: This wine has full aromas and flavors of rich, ripe strawberries and blackberries. The texture is both smooth and slightly gripping at the same time, with a medium to full body and a dry, lingering finish lingers.

title: Beauregard 2012 Beauregard Ranch Zinfandel (Ben Lomond Mountain)
excerpt: From an extremely coastal 13-acre vineyard in Bonny Doon that was replanted ...
description: From an extremely coastal 13-acre vineyard in Bonny Doon that was replanted in 2005, this wine shows black-cherry jelly candies on the nose alongside wild mint, white sage and black olive. The palate is more asphalt and tar-laden, but with blueberry, violet and uncrushed peppercorn flavors that make it quite tasty.

title: Shannon Ridge 2012 High Elevation Collection Zinfandel (Lake County)
excerpt: Aromas like spiced apple and brown sugar lead to luscious fruit and ...
description: Aromas like spiced apple and brown sugar lead to luscious fruit and spice flavors and a plush texture in this medium-bodied wine. It has the richness and near-sweetness that can pair well with slowly cooked meats and mildly spicy dishes, but sips well on its own as well.

title: Parducci 2012 Small Lot Blend Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: This wine has more than the typical backbone and texture. Fresh raspberry ...
description: This wine has more than the typical backbone and texture. Fresh raspberry and red cherry flavors get support from good acidity and a hefty layer of almost chewy tannins. It is dry, firm and well balanced, and is made to accompany food.

title: Rusack 2013 Santa Catalina Island Vineyard Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: This ambitious, against-all-odds island project with ancient grapevines is showing promising results, ...
description: This ambitious, against-all-odds island project with ancient grapevines is showing promising results, in this case offering smoked meats, hard spice and very tight purple fruit on the nose. The palate is tart with cranberries and raspberries, with a pencil lead and earth character, proving quite interesting if not entirely Zin-like.

title: Montevina 2013 Skyland Ridge Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Meaty, spicy accents enliven this full-bodied and ripe-tasting wine, adding a layer ...
description: Meaty, spicy accents enliven this full-bodied and ripe-tasting wine, adding a layer of interest and depth. The aromas and flavors show blackberries and black pepper, while the texture is smooth and a sense of richness on the lingering the finish.

title: Michael David 2013 Earthquake Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This showy wine has maple syrup aromas, extremely ripe and almost unctuous ...
description: This showy wine has maple syrup aromas, extremely ripe and almost unctuous flavors, lots of spicy oak influence and full body. While it offers a lot of flash, it also has lots of substance underneath. A velvety, grippy texture owes a lot to layered tannins, and a base note of ripe berries carries through the finish.

title: Murphy-Goode 2012 Snake Eyes Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Cherry-vanilla and boysenberry jam combine around a ripe, lush and full-bodied wine, ...
description: Cherry-vanilla and boysenberry jam combine around a ripe, lush and full-bodied wine, ideal for smoky, grilled foods. Smooth tannins make it enjoyable now and accessible to many palates, though be mindful of its power and intensity.

title: Lusso Della Terra 2013 Zinfandel (Paso Robles Willow Creek District)
excerpt: Black plums and Mission figs stewed with cinnamon, cloves and vanilla make ...
description: Black plums and Mission figs stewed with cinnamon, cloves and vanilla make for an intriguing nose on this bottling from a longtime Italian winemaking family. The palate shows cola, black cherry, coffee bean and dark chocolate, though proves quite grippy with a structure that will let down its guard with patience.

title: Sol Rouge 2012 Zinfandel (Red Hills Lake County)
excerpt: Full bodied, yet polished and rather complex in flavor, this wine has ...
description: Full bodied, yet polished and rather complex in flavor, this wine has a ight color with an auburn rim, with aromas like wild berries and underbrush. Flavors blend plum and prune with savory touches like tomato and herbs.

title: Tin Barn 2013 Gilsson Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: From a vineyard planted in 1950, this wine is rich in ripe ...
description: From a vineyard planted in 1950, this wine is rich in ripe cherry and vanilla, with a full-bodied, jammy smoothness that makes it pleasant to drink. From the warmer side of the appellation, it is concentrated and structured through the meaty, peppery finish.

title: Gravelly Ford 2012 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: A very fruity, very well-behaved wine, this gushes raspberry and cherry flavors, ...
description: A very fruity, very well-behaved wine, this gushes raspberry and cherry flavors, has a fresh, clean and just slightly tangy texture and moderate tannins. It will be a crowd-pleaser and a good match with different dishes.

title: Peju 2012 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is a big, oaky, brawny and tannic version of the variety, ...
description: This is a big, oaky, brawny and tannic version of the variety, generous in brown sugar and blackberry and plum jam. A piquant seasoning of peppercorn dots the midpalate and finish.

title: EOS 2012 Algunas Dias Single Vineyard Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Red fruits, barrel smoke and chipped slate make for an intriguing although ...
description: Red fruits, barrel smoke and chipped slate make for an intriguing although not entirely integrated nose on this single-vineyard bottling. The palate shows red berries, wet clay and hints of anise.

title: Oak Farm Vineyards 2012 Wegat Vineyard Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Ripe fruit aromas and flavors ooze from this full-bodied but silky-textured wine. ...
description: Ripe fruit aromas and flavors ooze from this full-bodied but silky-textured wine. It tastes like a late-harvest style, with cherry and blood orange flavors, and seems well-suited for kicking back by the fire after a meal, eating chunks of cheese.

title: Charles B. Mitchell 2013 Reserve Harde Vineyard Zinfandel (El Dorado)
excerpt: An earthy, aged aroma, very dark color and flavors like raisins and ...
description: An earthy, aged aroma, very dark color and flavors like raisins and Port add up to a good after-dinner wine to try with chocolate, cheese or a cigar. Sweetness is evident, concentration, too, and full body is a given in a late-harvest style like this.

title: Whiplash 2013 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This wine tastes like a superripe, late-harvest and lavishly oaked version, so ...
description: This wine tastes like a superripe, late-harvest and lavishly oaked version, so that all the aromas and flavors seem to be in overdrive. It smells like cinnamon and vanilla, tastes like strawberry jam, and has a little white pepper in the finish.

title: Charles B. Mitchell 2013 Reserve Goltz Vineyard Zinfandel (El Dorado)
excerpt: Full bodied and completely mature, this is saturated with ripe flavors. It ...
description: Full bodied and completely mature, this is saturated with ripe flavors. It has enough firm tannin for a gripping texture and brings a sense of completeness for something this bold. It tastes like sweet blackberries and boysenberries, yet is dry.

title: Cosentino 2013 The Zin Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This is a full-bodied and intensely fruity wine with jammy aromas and ...
description: This is a full-bodied and intensely fruity wine with jammy aromas and ripe cherry and raspberry flavors. It is smooth textured and has soft tannins, so the effect is easygoing in spite of high alcohol.

title: Wood Family Vineyards 2012 Muy Bueno Zinfandel (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: Very fruity, ripe and extremely full bodied in terms of alcohol, this ...
description: Very fruity, ripe and extremely full bodied in terms of alcohol, this exuberant wine has abundant cherry and herbal flavors and a smooth, juicy texture. With very little tannin and all that fruitiness, it should be a crowd-pleaser.

title: Messina Hof 2012 Paulo Limited Edition Primitivo (Texas)
excerpt: Dark berries and sweet baking-spice tones carry the nose. The medium-bodied palate ...
description: Dark berries and sweet baking-spice tones carry the nose. The medium-bodied palate brings juicy blackberry flavors showing mild concentration, supported by soft tannins.

title: Truscott 2012 Weibel Family Vineyards Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: The aromas and flavors of this wine are ripe to overripe, like ...
description: The aromas and flavors of this wine are ripe to overripe, like dried plums and raisins. An earthy vein runs through them, too. It is full bodied and rather soft in texture.

title: Robert Biale 2013 Stagecoach Vineyard The Biale Block Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Planted in 1999 specifically for the producer, this vineyard block provides power ...
description: Planted in 1999 specifically for the producer, this vineyard block provides power and structure, revealing shocks of blackberry jam, mocha and gunpowder amidst a streak of wild anise and black pepper. Robust and bold, it begs for another 10 to 15 years in the cellar before finding its complete composure.

title: Terra d'Oro 2013 Deaver Vineyard Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: A multidimensional wine, this delicious example made from 130-year-old vines combines depth, ...
description: A multidimensional wine, this delicious example made from 130-year-old vines combines depth, breadth and length. It smells like ripe blackberries, tastes fruity and layered, feels luxurious and supple but at the same time firm in fine tannins and balanced by lively acidity. Medium to full bodied, it tastes great now and will improve through 2020.

title: DeLorimier 2012 Harris Kratka Vineyard Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: A tightly wound ball of lush red fruit, this wine has some ...
description: A tightly wound ball of lush red fruit, this wine has some grip to it. The leathery tannins are smooth but need time to develop, a swath of black pepper running through. Cellar through 2020.

title: Troon 2013 Estate Zinfandel (Applegate Valley)
excerpt: Complex and inviting, this artfully blends tart berry fruit with streaks of ...
description: Complex and inviting, this artfully blends tart berry fruit with streaks of clove, pepper, sandalwood and hibiscus tea. Balanced and lingering, it shows the sexy, seductive side of the grape.

title: Sobon Estate 2013 Old Vines Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Gobs of fruit flavor are supported by firm acidity and fine-grained tannins ...
description: Gobs of fruit flavor are supported by firm acidity and fine-grained tannins in this full-bodied but well-balanced wine. It has classic raspberry and blackberry flavors, attractive floral nuances and a high degree of likeability.

title: Carlisle 2013 Monte Rosso Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: This substantial wine will age beautifully through 2023, so structured and elegant ...
description: This substantial wine will age beautifully through 2023, so structured and elegant it is behind its layers and layers of coconut fritter, vanilla and strawberry-raspberry jam. Beguiling in floral violets and lavender, it has streaks of black pepper too, ending in a dream-like trance of earthy dust.

title: Boeger 2013 Walker Vineyard Zinfandel (El Dorado)
excerpt: Purely delicious, this has stunning and distinctive aromas and flavors that recall ...
description: Purely delicious, this has stunning and distinctive aromas and flavors that recall pomegranate juice and blueberries, plus a velvety-smooth texture. While very full bodied, this wine does not win with power but with grace. It has excellent balance and harmony, and stands above the crowd.

title: Easton 2012 Old Vine Rinaldi Vineyard Zinfandel (Fiddletown)
excerpt: Gorgeous fruit aromas, generous and deep fruit flavors and soft, chocolate accents ...
description: Gorgeous fruit aromas, generous and deep fruit flavors and soft, chocolate accents add up to a very flavorful but relaxed wine. Touches of clove and cedar pop up with the second sip, while some welcome tannins clean the palate. The fruit flavors come back on the finish. It is full-bodied but very smooth.

title: Felten Cellars 2013 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Quite light in color, especially for the alcohol level, this wine offers ...
description: Quite light in color, especially for the alcohol level, this wine offers dried red cherries, hibiscus, rose petals, pencil shavings and a touch of hot asphalt on the spicy and fun nose. Lots of lively red fruit energy comes forth once sipped, with nutmeg, clove spice, ginger snaps and molasses flavors rounding out a memorable pour.

title: Carlisle 2013 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Ripe and juicy in red and black berries, this wine has a ...
description: Ripe and juicy in red and black berries, this wine has a big presence and plenty of bold flavor, retaining all the elements so beloved in the variety, from black pepper to leather and cigar, while displaying a deftness of winemaking skill in the cellar. Mouthfilling, it has zinging acidity on the finish, making for a memorable wine.

title: Sequum 2012 Riverwash Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A tiny-production wine that is exuberantly brambly and wild, this has a ...
description: A tiny-production wine that is exuberantly brambly and wild, this has a bouquet of juicy black and red berries at its core. Balanced and elegant despite the generous palate, it has softened tannins and a thickness toward the finish. offering accents of black pepper and brown sugar.

title: Carlisle 2013 DuPratt Vineyard Zinfandel (Mendocino Ridge)
excerpt: Smooth in tannins, this vineyard-designate is also sharp in crisp red cherry ...
description: Smooth in tannins, this vineyard-designate is also sharp in crisp red cherry and strawberry, leaning into brighter, vibrant flavors that temper the underlying power. Visions of homemade berry cobbler with a side of bacon flit through its bouquet, ending velvety and alive.

title: Seven Angels 2012 St. Peter of Alcantara Vineyard Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Coming from a vineyard named after the patron saint of night watchmen, ...
description: Coming from a vineyard named after the patron saint of night watchmen, this wine offers luxurious purple aromas of blackberry-vanilla sauce and dark chocolate. The palate is sticky and singing with coffee, milk chocolate and dried cherries, showing plenty of deep tannins and boisterous acidity that will make this bottling last a while.

title: Saxon Brown 2011 Stonewall Block Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: This wine has ripe black cherry flavors, great acidity and firm tannins ...
description: This wine has ripe black cherry flavors, great acidity and firm tannins that keep it lively enough to balance the fruity richness. Full bodied, broad in mouthfeel, but with a background tanginess, it is well balanced and keeps encouraging another sip.

title: Artezin 2012 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Classy in cherry-berry crumble and vanilla, this wine then expands into sophisticated ...
description: Classy in cherry-berry crumble and vanilla, this wine then expands into sophisticated bursts of white pepper, cinnamon and violets. Elegant and intriguing, it offers balance amidst bold flavor, finishing smooth and velvety.

title: Elyse 2012 Korte Ranch Vineyard Zinfandel (St. Helena)
excerpt: The third release from this vineyard, this wine is juicy in fruit, ...
description: The third release from this vineyard, this wine is juicy in fruit, tar and leathery tannins, a mix of raspberry, cassis and dark chocolate. From a dry-farmed site, with a small percentage of Petite Sirah, it was given less than a year in American oak and offers a taste of sweet tobacco on the finish. Drink now through 2020.

title: Armida 2013 Maple Vineyards Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: From a beloved vineyard source in the heart of the appellation, this ...
description: From a beloved vineyard source in the heart of the appellation, this classic Zin-Petite Sirah is perfumed from the start, aromatically memorable in dried cranberry and ripe plum. Elegant in style, it offers soft, integrated tannins around a juicy core of brambly blackberry and brown sugar.

title: Frank Family 2012 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A nicely structured wine with a sizable component of Petite Sirah and ...
description: A nicely structured wine with a sizable component of Petite Sirah and 3% Cabernet Sauvignon, this offers a density of oak and tannin on the entry, offset by a juicy backbone of blackberry and cherry. Full bodied, it has the elements to last, being completely drinkable now through 2020.

title: Kokomo 2013 Timber Crest Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Smoky red and black berry wrap themselves around a full-bodied expression of ...
description: Smoky red and black berry wrap themselves around a full-bodied expression of fruit and introverted oak, managing to provide texture and body through a foundation of well-managed acidity. With a grippiness on the finish, the wine offers velvety power and finesse.

title: WCP 2013 The Zin Cripple Creek Vineyard Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: A touch of smoked pork meets with red cherries, cola and black ...
description: A touch of smoked pork meets with red cherries, cola and black licorice on the nose of this small-batch wine out of Templeton by Will Persall. Bacon fat and blackberry-maple syrup flavors make for a delicious palate, with lots of lively acidity that gives balance and keeps the tongue tingling.

title: Easton 2012 Zinfandel (Fiddletown)
excerpt: This beautifully balanced wine is poised, a bit reserved, but has a ...
description: This beautifully balanced wine is poised, a bit reserved, but has a distinctive personality. Aromas of red cherry, cedar and cinnamon precede tangy raspberry flavors that ride on a firm but light texture and linger on through the finish.

title: Boeger 2013 Estate Zinfandel (El Dorado)
excerpt: A deep, dark color, ripe blackberry aromas and berry and spice flavors ...
description: A deep, dark color, ripe blackberry aromas and berry and spice flavors add up to a full-bodied, impressive wine from one of the oldest wineries in the Sierra Foothills. Smoky, oaky accents help shape the opulent fruit flavors, and enough firm tannins and lively acidity provide good balance.

title: Black Stallion 2012 Limited Release Monte Rosso Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: From a powerful vineyard comes this powerful wine, beautifully aromatic and succulent ...
description: From a powerful vineyard comes this powerful wine, beautifully aromatic and succulent in coconut flakes and raspberry liqueur. With a crispness from the acidity, it remains balanced on the palate despite its size, finishing in spicy black pepper and leathery tobacco.

title: Brooklyn Winery 2012 Old Vine Zinfandel (Mokelumne River)
excerpt: Balanced for dinner time, and sophisticated in aromas and flavors, this wine ...
description: Balanced for dinner time, and sophisticated in aromas and flavors, this wine stands apart from the pack. The boysenberry and cedar aromas are tempting, and the vivid cherry and berry flavors are satisfying. Enough tannins and acid are woven in to keep the wine refreshing.

title: Cairdean Estate 2011 Dessert Wine Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Thick in chocolate and blackberry jam-like goodness, this is a smooth, lush ...
description: Thick in chocolate and blackberry jam-like goodness, this is a smooth, lush dessert wine that just begs to be poured over vanilla ice cream, its mocha-like finish akin to having a flat white cup of coffee. Cabernet Sauvignon Brandy was added to up the alcohol to a Port-like wine.

title: Saracina 2012 Pick and Shovel Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: A Port-like aroma, full body and rich, ripe fruit flavors create a ...
description: A Port-like aroma, full body and rich, ripe fruit flavors create a big, hearty and delicious wine. Full of plump berry character from the aroma to the flavor to the finish, this is also backed by firm, lip-smacking tannins to counter all that richness.

title: Kokomo 2013 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Spicy and refined in black and white pepper, this memorable red traffics ...
description: Spicy and refined in black and white pepper, this memorable red traffics in all the classic characteristics of leather and tobacco with dark, brooding red and black fruit. Medium in body and length, it finishes with a refreshing element of black cherry and cola, calling out for barbecued meat treated with the same care.

title: The Federalist 2013 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This medium-bodied wine has a vivid, fresh raspberry aroma and deep blackberry ...
description: This medium-bodied wine has a vivid, fresh raspberry aroma and deep blackberry flavors supported by firm tannins. It tastes like a cool-climate example because of the vivid fruit, layered tannins and good acidity, which make it well balanced in the style of classic dry reds.

title: Tortoise Creek 2012 The Chelonian Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This full-bodied wine is fruit yumminess all the way through. It has ...
description: This full-bodied wine is fruit yumminess all the way through. It has wild berry aromas and flavors that feel pure and focused, and is soft and almost sweet in terms of mouthfeel. An essence of blackberry lingers on the finish.

title: Carlisle 2013 Montafi Ranch Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Thick and rich, with a menthol-like streak in the background, this 89% ...
description: Thick and rich, with a menthol-like streak in the background, this 89% Zin is complemented by a wealth of mixed blacks, from Alicante Bouschet to Trousseau Noir. It opens with a bouquet of fresh, brambly blackberry, raspberry and sage, reaching a powerful conclusion of brown sugar and spice, staying structured atop soft, sizable tannins. Drink now through 2020.

title: Elyse 2012 Morisoli Vineyard Zinfandel (Rutherford)
excerpt: Thick in cherry-vanilla, big oak and tannin, this vineyard-designate contains handfuls of ...
description: Thick in cherry-vanilla, big oak and tannin, this vineyard-designate contains handfuls of Petite Sirah and mixed blacks that are, as the producer puts it, too long to list. Given 10 months in American oak, it offers a balance of fruit and leathery power, from raspberry and blackberry to Sunday morning bacon. Drink now through 2020.

title: Elyse 2012 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: This Zin also has 7% Petite Sirah and 6% Carignane, from both ...
description: This Zin also has 7% Petite Sirah and 6% Carignane, from both the Teldeschi and York Creek vineyards. The berry fruit is elegantly entangled with violet perfume and dusty tannins, a suggestion of brick on the nose. Succulent, it shows its strong tannins on the finish.

title: Howell Mountain Vineyards 2012 Old Vine Zinfandel (Howell Mountain)
