excerpt: Sourced from vines that date back more than 100 years on the ...
description: Sourced from vines that date back more than 100 years on the Beatty Ranch, this wine is appropriately robust, a big, syrupy concentration of baked blackberry and plum. Soft in tannins and structured, it finishes with a complexity of vanilla and black cherry.

title: August Briggs 2012 Old Vines Zinfandel (Calistoga)
excerpt: Faint aromatics hide an effusiveness on the palate of thick, dense blackberry ...
description: Faint aromatics hide an effusiveness on the palate of thick, dense blackberry jam and brown sugar, the ripe power of the wine kept in check by a balance of acidity. Fuller bodied in style, it remains dry and vibrant on the finish.

title: Portalupi 2013 Dolinsek Ranch Old Vine Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This high-toned wine, bright in acidity and red fruit, also offers textured ...
description: This high-toned wine, bright in acidity and red fruit, also offers textured notions of baked bread and brown sugar. Rich without becoming overbearing, it finishes in a spicy concoction of cinnamon and black pepper.

title: Concrete 2012 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Chocolate and dark cherry aromas lead to ripe plum, boysenberry and blackberry ...
description: Chocolate and dark cherry aromas lead to ripe plum, boysenberry and blackberry flavors that are almost sweet, very rich and full bodied. The thick texture melts in your mouth, having soft tannins. This drinks almost like a Port and should be great with chocolate or cheese.

title: Easton 2012 Estate Zinfandel (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
excerpt: Bold and ripe in taste, this full-bodied wine packs in plump blackberry ...
description: Bold and ripe in taste, this full-bodied wine packs in plump blackberry and boysenberry flavors, a rich texture from firm tannins and lip-smacking acidity that keeps it lively. Slow-cooked ribs, anyone?

title: Langetwins 2012 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This wine has aromas of currants and strawberries and tastes fruity but ...
description: This wine has aromas of currants and strawberries and tastes fruity but dry, with supportive tannins and acidity that make it appetizing. Full bodied but not overpowering, it is very versatile with food.

title: Lone Madrone 2012 Sheep Camp Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Bing cherry, blackberry and hot black lava rock aromas arise on the ...
description: Bing cherry, blackberry and hot black lava rock aromas arise on the nose of this expression of a dry-farmed vineyard. The palate is light compared to similar Zins, showing plum skins, tomato leaf and a heightened sense of minerality along with cherry-candy flavors.

title: Zin-Phomaniac 2013 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: If a wine can caress the taste buds, this absolutely fresh and ...
description: If a wine can caress the taste buds, this absolutely fresh and fruity one does. It smells like blackberry jam, feels soft and silky while still having full body, and gives up delicious, ripe, full fruit flavors that linger on the finish.

title: Criss Cross 2013 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Sweet, delicious aromas of boysenberry and maple syrup, flavors like blackberry jam ...
description: Sweet, delicious aromas of boysenberry and maple syrup, flavors like blackberry jam and a broad, generous texture turn this into a blockbuster wine. A touch of sweetness would make it great with something spicy and sweet like pork ribs.

title: Pech Merle 2012 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Tart cherry and high-toned acidity give this wine a tanginess around structured, ...
description: Tart cherry and high-toned acidity give this wine a tanginess around structured, well-heeled tannins. On the palate dense red and blue fruits combine to juicy effect, offering flavor without an overabundance of power.

title: Ivory and Burt 2012 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Smoky, meaty aromas and lush berry flavors combine for a showy, full-bodied ...
description: Smoky, meaty aromas and lush berry flavors combine for a showy, full-bodied wine. It smells like charred oak, minerals and blackberry, then tastes like chocolate and dark cherry, with soft tannins for texture and a lingering, almost sweet finish.

title: Lorenzi Estate 2011 Lopez Ranch Old VIne Zinfandel (Cucamonga Valley)
excerpt: Coming from 100-year-old vines, this fascinating wine shows black cherry, spearmint, graphite ...
description: Coming from 100-year-old vines, this fascinating wine shows black cherry, spearmint, graphite and pencil lead on the restrained nose. The palate is all about dried cherries and the tart skins of plum and other red-purple fruits, keeping a nice sour tension throughout the sip.

title: Twisted 2013 Old Vine Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Pure, focused fruit flavors like raspberry and red cherry light up this ...
description: Pure, focused fruit flavors like raspberry and red cherry light up this medium-bodied wine. A lively texture of crisp acidity and light tannins adds great balance to the effusive fruitiness. For such a friendly price, what else could one ask for?

title: Wilson 2012 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Thick in black peppery cinnamon, this wine offers a zig-zag of fruit ...
description: Thick in black peppery cinnamon, this wine offers a zig-zag of fruit and power without falling over the edge of extremity. The mix includes 5% Petite Sirah. Full bodied and big, it finishes in a taste of sweet vanilla.

title: Ruby Hill Winery 2012 Peacock Patch Reserve Zinfandel (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: This full-bodied blockbuster strikes a good balance between very ripe, lavish fruit ...
description: This full-bodied blockbuster strikes a good balance between very ripe, lavish fruit aromas and spicy oak and berry flavors and a sense of good structure. It has gobs of strawberry and mulberry, a light and lively texture despite the high alcohol, and lingering, almost sweet finish.

title: Frank Family 2012 Reserve Zinfandel (Chiles Valley)
excerpt: This thick, rich and dense wine may need time to overcome its ...
description: This thick, rich and dense wine may need time to overcome its wealth of leathery sinew and black pepper. The fruit is elusive, allowing the savory elements to dominate all around. This may need cellaring to come around, through 2020.

title: Victor Vineyards 2013 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This full-bore wine smells like strawberries and cherries, and tastes jammy and ...
description: This full-bore wine smells like strawberries and cherries, and tastes jammy and chocolaty. The rich, almost thick texture hangs on to all that ripeness on the finish. This should pair well with salty cheeses or a chocolate dessert.

title: One Hope 2013 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Spicy aromas like cinnamon and vanilla light up the aromas, and fresh ...
description: Spicy aromas like cinnamon and vanilla light up the aromas, and fresh strawberry and plum flavors gush forth on the palate. Medium bodied, this wine has a good balance of ripe fruit and appetizing texture.

title: Gamba 2013 Starr Road Ranch Old Vine Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Campfire smoke appears to be the signature of this producer and the ...
description: Campfire smoke appears to be the signature of this producer and the old vines planted in 1920 from which it sources. The wine is thick, ripe and soft. Black plum is the star on the palate, taking on a baked, jammy quality on the finish, accented in vanilla.

title: Peirano 2012 The Immortal Zin Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: With aromas like sweet strawberries and red cherries, and flavors as ripe ...
description: With aromas like sweet strawberries and red cherries, and flavors as ripe as the aromas, this medium- to full-bodied wine is tempting, smooth and polished. It tastes refined but still lets loose a lot of fruit power. The balance is on the soft side, with mild tannins and subdued acidity.

title: Gamba 2013 Gamba Estate Vineyard Old Vine Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Campfire smoke punctuates the opening of this intensely dense wine. It veers ...
description: Campfire smoke punctuates the opening of this intensely dense wine. It veers into jammy, syrupy territory, red and black berry fruit exploding at its juicy core.

title: Shannon Ridge 2012 Home Ranch Two Bud Block Single Vineyard Collection Zinfandel (High Valley)
excerpt: Subdued aromas and rather tight fruit flavors make a modest impression, while ...
description: Subdued aromas and rather tight fruit flavors make a modest impression, while full body and very firm tannins due to 15% Petite Sirah give a lot of structure. With astringent grip in the texture, this will taste best with juicy meat dishes and other rich proteins.

title: Caricature 2012 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: The fresh, jammy and spicy aromas and ripe, maple syrupy, almost sweet ...
description: The fresh, jammy and spicy aromas and ripe, maple syrupy, almost sweet fruit flavors are tasty and easy to swallow. A soft texture, full body and little tannin add to the smoothness and sweetness of its taste.

title: Brazin 2013 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: A sweet, syrupy aroma and candied fruit flavors, sprinkled with baking-spice notes ...
description: A sweet, syrupy aroma and candied fruit flavors, sprinkled with baking-spice notes from oak aging, make this wine attractive in a bubble-gum way. It is fruity, medium bodied, fresh and frothy.

title: Summit Lake 2010 Estate Bottled Zinfandel (Howell Mountain)
excerpt: Pretty long in the bottle, this rich, soft, thick Zin offers a ...
description: Pretty long in the bottle, this rich, soft, thick Zin offers a stewy taste of plums that veers sweet into molasses and jam. On the finish is an additional thickness of black pepper and leather.

title: Amador Foothill Winery 2011 Esola Vineyard Zinfandel (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
excerpt: This intriguing wine shows aromas of tart fruits like rhubarb and tart ...
description: This intriguing wine shows aromas of tart fruits like rhubarb and tart cherry. The flavors add layers of richness to that impression, almost coating the tongue with black cherry and blackberry backed up with good, firm acidity and a welcome nip of tannin in the texture.

title: Artezin 2013 Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: A well-made and full-bodied wine, this has generous helpings of succulent blackberry ...
description: A well-made and full-bodied wine, this has generous helpings of succulent blackberry and boysenberry flavors, with a firm texture of tannins and acidity to balance out all that richness. It smells fresh and fruity, tastes juicy and crisp, and seems to gain depth and interest with repeated sips. The blend includes 10% Petite Sirah and 5% Carignan.

title: Amador Foothill Winery 2012 Clockspring Vineyard Zinfandel (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
excerpt: Tart cherry, ripe plum and black cherry flavors and barely a trace ...
description: Tart cherry, ripe plum and black cherry flavors and barely a trace of detectable oak character make this a lively, fruit-driven wine. The aroma has touches of clove and black pepper, the texture is not too rich but braced with firm acidity and tannins that keep the fruit flavors zooming along through the finish.

title: Dry Creek Vineyard 2013 Heritage Vines Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: A layered and spicy offering, this is mostly Zinfandel, with smaller amounts ...
description: A layered and spicy offering, this is mostly Zinfandel, with smaller amounts of Petite Sirah, Primitivo and Carignan. Soft and inviting, it opens with smoky notes of blackberry cobbler and black cherry. Elegant on the palate, with a balance of power, it finishes in black licorice and cardamom.

title: Pedroncelli 2012 Bushnell Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Dark plum and cinnamon intermix on the nose and on the palate ...
description: Dark plum and cinnamon intermix on the nose and on the palate in this high-toned version of the variety from an appellation in which it grows well. Black licorice and mocha chocolate play off one another before a dusty finish.

title: Seghesio 2012 Estate Home Ranch Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Dry and refined in fine-grained tannin, this long-standing vineyard-designate dances in black ...
description: Dry and refined in fine-grained tannin, this long-standing vineyard-designate dances in black leather and brambly blackberry, which expand gradually on the palate, peppered by baking spices. Soft and velvety, the finish lingers in spice.

title: Scott Harvey 2012 Mountain Selection Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: A relatively light color and a cinnamon-sugar aroma might indicate a simply ...
description: A relatively light color and a cinnamon-sugar aroma might indicate a simply fruity wine, but this turns more serious and lean in flavor and texture, suggesting tart cherry and cranberry. It brings firm acidity and tannins to the mouthfeel, for a refreshing, dry and restrained character that will be very food-friendly.

title: Mettler Family Vineyards 2012 Epicenter Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This is rich and generously spiced, smelling and tasting like chocolate, vanilla, ...
description: This is rich and generously spiced, smelling and tasting like chocolate, vanilla, smoke and blackberries. Aging for 19 months in American and French oak certainly boosted the spices. It tastes full-bodied, very deep and almost sweet in flavor, with moderate tannins to lend some support.

title: St. Francis 2012 Old Vines Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Dense, juicy and spicy, this easygoing and easy-to-like wine will please a ...
description: Dense, juicy and spicy, this easygoing and easy-to-like wine will please a range of palates. Blackberry and black cherry dominate on the palate, softened by fine tannins and integrated oak.

title: Kunde 2012 Reserve Century Vines Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Raspberry and vanilla introduce this wine, made from a selection of vines ...
description: Raspberry and vanilla introduce this wine, made from a selection of vines 21 to 130 years old, with some planted in 1882. Lusty and lush layers of cinnamon and cola accent the fruit and provide complexity, the tannins resolved and thick.

title: Oakville Winery 2013 Estate Grown and Produced Zinfandel (Oakville)
excerpt: Robust and brawny, this substantial offering features concentrated layers of smoke, leather ...
description: Robust and brawny, this substantial offering features concentrated layers of smoke, leather and sage-inflected tannins. It finishes in a wrapping of bittersweet chocolate.

title: Angel Vine 2012 Les Collines Vineyard Zinfandel (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas of tire rubber mix with herbs, red fruit, plum and allspice. ...
description: Aromas of tire rubber mix with herbs, red fruit, plum and allspice. Candied red fruit flavors are plump in feel, trailing on the finish.

title: High Valley 2012 Zinfandel (High Valley)
excerpt: A tasty blend of almost-sweet fruit flavors and a supple texture makes ...
description: A tasty blend of almost-sweet fruit flavors and a supple texture makes this very user-friendly. It smells like raspberry syrup, tastes like some chocolate has been added to the syrup and it glides over the tongue like warm butter on pancakes. Some might like more tannin or acidity but others will love it.

title: Rosenblum 2012 Winemaker Selection Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Flavors of berry, vanilla and tar form around thick, rich tannins, giving ...
description: Flavors of berry, vanilla and tar form around thick, rich tannins, giving this wine a puckering quality that may benefit from opening before enjoying. The finish is sturdy and robust in leathery black pepper.

title: Truett Hurst 2012 Rattler Rock Old Vine Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Syrupy and dense, this is a burly wine, soft but powerful, that ...
description: Syrupy and dense, this is a burly wine, soft but powerful, that keeps coming back to the theme of blackberry syrup. Velvety tannins buoy the midpoint, before it finishes in a burst of intense ripeness.

title: Frey 2013 Estate Grown Biodynamic Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: This has a deep, dense red-black color and quite smoky aromas. Herbal, ...
description: This has a deep, dense red-black color and quite smoky aromas. Herbal, almost thick flavors resemble plum juice, black pepper and roasted mild chipotle chilies. Plenty of tannin adds grip to the texture. Despite the bold flavors, this is light in body.

title: Sterling 2013 Cellar Club Zinfandel (Calistoga)
excerpt: A burnt, reduced quality mars the fruit in this wine, made in ...
description: A burnt, reduced quality mars the fruit in this wine, made in a big style with full-bodied power and density.

title: Renwood 2012 Grand Wren Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: This superripe and supersmooth wine packs in extra layers of flavor of ...
description: This superripe and supersmooth wine packs in extra layers of flavor of boysenberry and anise between stacks of blackberry and ripe strawberry, all while staying supported by fine but firm tannins and vibrant acidity. Very full in body, it is still appetizingly dry, balanced for serving at a special meal, and very rewarding to drink now through 2022.

title: Scott Harvey 2012 Vineyard 1869 Old Vine Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: While slightly reserved in aroma, this serious, special-occasion wine comes on steady ...
description: While slightly reserved in aroma, this serious, special-occasion wine comes on steady and strong in flavor. Blueberry and black cherry notes pick up more raspberry and red cherry with each sip. In addition to fruit complexity, it has a full body, sleek texture and lingering finish. Best now through 2020.

title: Renwood 2012 Flutist Sea of Grapes Vineyard Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: This sleek wine carries ripe, complex fruit aromas and delicious cherry and ...
description: This sleek wine carries ripe, complex fruit aromas and delicious cherry and blackberry flavors on a silky-smooth texture, despite high alcohol. There is definitely an exotic touch to the fruit character, and it seems perfectly supported by fine-grained tannins, lip-smacking acidity and good length on the finish. Drink now through 2020.

title: Renwood 2012 Merida Del Part Vineyard Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: This big red offers opulent fruit aromas, like ripe blackberries and strawberries, ...
description: This big red offers opulent fruit aromas, like ripe blackberries and strawberries, followed by concentrated fruit flavors interwoven with slightly herbal, meaty accents. Full bodied but not at all coarse, it has a very smooth texture, moderate tannins and mouth-filling richness.

title: Renwood 2012 Grandpere Special Reserve Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: This has lots of fresh berry aromas, blending raspberry, strawberry and deeper ...
description: This has lots of fresh berry aromas, blending raspberry, strawberry and deeper blackberry. Full bodied, it features ripe flavors, velvety mouthfeel and firm tannins. Dry and well balanced, it will make a great dinner wine because of all the palate-cleansing texture. Drink now through 2022.

title: Renwood 2012 Fiddletown Special Reserve Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: In this high-octane, full-bodied and firmly tannic wine, flavors have a lot ...
description: In this high-octane, full-bodied and firmly tannic wine, flavors have a lot of berry notes, but also range towards roasted almonds, black pepper and meaty accents. This distinctive bottling stands a bit apart from most of the Renwood line, perhaps more ripe in style. Best now through 2020.

title: Paul Dolan 2013 Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: Packed with juicy berry flavors, this outgoing wine blends great freshness and ...
description: Packed with juicy berry flavors, this outgoing wine blends great freshness and pure grape flavors with a lip-smacking texture of tannins and acidity that keep it well balanced. It resembles black berry, raspberry and boysenberry juices, has a tangy mouthfeel and lingering, tingly finish.

title: Ravenswood 2013 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This sophisticated, dry and affordable wine will shine at mealtime due to ...
description: This sophisticated, dry and affordable wine will shine at mealtime due to its balance between generous fruit flavors and an appetizing, moderately tannic texture. Aromas resemble raspberries and red cherries, while flavors are a bit riper than that. The acidity is lively and the finish lingers.

title: Seven Deadly Zins 2012 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This has an unusually dark color. Aromas of blackberry jam and maple ...
description: This has an unusually dark color. Aromas of blackberry jam and maple syrup are followed by equally rich, deep and expressive flavors. The remarkable concentration of ripe berry flavors layered densely with fine tannins is at least partly due to blending in Petite Sirah. It adds up to a full bodied and delicious wine.

title: Four Vines 2012 Maverick Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: This is tasty in a ripe, extravagantly fruity way. Raspberry and strawberry ...
description: This is tasty in a ripe, extravagantly fruity way. Raspberry and strawberry aromas seem as sweet as syrup. The full body and alcoholic strength give it a strong texture, but without too much tannic grip. Barbecued ribs or a cheese plate could be great matches.

title: Straight Line 2013 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Attractive and easy-drinking, this smells like pomegranate juice and vanilla, and tastes ...
description: Attractive and easy-drinking, this smells like pomegranate juice and vanilla, and tastes like raspberry jam but without the sweetness. Soft and soothing on the palate, it finishes with a dash of spicy-sweet oak flavor that lingers.

title: Lorenzi Estate 2009 Series Zinfandel (Temecula)
excerpt: This patiently aged wine delivers a dynamic and rich nose with aromas ...
description: This patiently aged wine delivers a dynamic and rich nose with aromas of plums, cassis, cola, Dr Pepper, chocolate syrup and well-spiced German chocolate cake. Those ripe elements are tamed on the tart and lively palate that shows sour plum skins alongside star anise, beef blood and dank herbs.

title: Jamieson Ranch 2012 Whiplash Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This grabs attention quickly, with a dark color and potent jam and ...
description: This grabs attention quickly, with a dark color and potent jam and brown sugar aromas. Next come dazzling strawberry syrup flavors backed by thick tannins and good acidity. The texture is astringent and tight, but the flavors are so full that they meet the tannins half way. Best now through 2019.

title: Mikami Vineyards 2012 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This is a full-bodied but easy-drinking wine with ample ripe fruit flavors ...
description: This is a full-bodied but easy-drinking wine with ample ripe fruit flavors and attractive accents from oak aging, like vanilla, nutmeg and a touch of brown sugar. It coats the mouth with rich fruitiness and lingers on the finish in a compelling manner.

title: Greenwood Ridge 2013 Scherrer Vineyards Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: This pure, focused, fruity wine practically dances on the tongue. Fresh strawberry ...
description: This pure, focused, fruity wine practically dances on the tongue. Fresh strawberry and ripe raspberry aromas lead to similar lively, fruity flavors that wake up the tastebuds. Brisk acidity and moderate tannins add lift for a balanced, refreshing taste experience.

title: Lone Madrone 2012 Martinelli Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Remarkably strong cinnamon characterizes the nose of this old-vine wine, which also ...
description: Remarkably strong cinnamon characterizes the nose of this old-vine wine, which also shows red and black cherries, potpourri and gingerbread on the nose. Black raspberries, cranberry-pomegranate juice, dark chocolate, purple flowers, black pepper and cardamom entertain the palate, which also offers decent acidity and grip, but finishes quickly.

title: Eberle 2012 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: The grapes for this wine from regional pioneer Gary Eberle are nearly ...
description: The grapes for this wine from regional pioneer Gary Eberle are nearly equally sourced from three vineyards: Steinbeck, Wine-Bush and CoCaVin. The nose is herbal with sagebrush, oregano and thyme, offering just a bit of black plum fruit. The palate is also full of crushed, dried herbs, proving a touch sour and tarry, with cooked strawberry and dried raspberry fruit.

title: Rubus 2013 Old Vines Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Fresh blackberry and cherry character is packed into this concentrated but rather ...
description: Fresh blackberry and cherry character is packed into this concentrated but rather soft and sweet wine. It has that signature wild berry aroma of the variety, then flavors are rich, the texture broad and the body full.

title: Ravenswood 2013 Vintners Blend Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Expressive, not expensive, this has an appetizing mixture of spice, herb and ...
description: Expressive, not expensive, this has an appetizing mixture of spice, herb and smoke aromas, plenty of blackberry and raspberry flavors, and a soothing texture. It smells like black pepper, dried thyme and wood smoke, then turns more fruity in the mouth. It is medium bodied and slightly soft in balance.

title: Philo Ridge 2012 Firebrick Vineyard Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: Full flavored and full bodied, this big, expansive wine oozes ripe and ...
description: Full flavored and full bodied, this big, expansive wine oozes ripe and dried fruit character from the aroma to the flavors and finish. It suggests blackberry and strawberry flavors, feels tannic on the palate rather than soft, and carries a bit of warmth.

title: Peachy Canyon 2012 Incredible Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Dried cherries, black slate, brown spice and leather greet the nose on ...
description: Dried cherries, black slate, brown spice and leather greet the nose on this affordable red from the esteemed regional producer that makes many Zinfandels each vintage. The palate shows black cherries and a plum skin acidity, with some rocky elements providing further intrigue.

title: Zinsane 2013 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Ripeness and richness reign over this full-bodied, almost-sweet wine. Oaky, maple-syrup aromas ...
description: Ripeness and richness reign over this full-bodied, almost-sweet wine. Oaky, maple-syrup aromas and lots of black cherry and boysenberry flavors partner with a smooth, posh texture. Think of it almost like a Port, but drier and not quite so high in alcohol.

title: Frey 2013 Organic Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: Touches of menthol and pine flavors set this wine apart from the ...
description: Touches of menthol and pine flavors set this wine apart from the crowd, dominating the fruit flavors from the aroma to the finish. It is medium to full bodied, tastes a little earthy and smoky, and is relatively lean in texture.

title: Ripken 2011 Under the Sea Primitivo (Lodi)
excerpt: Earthy, vegetal aromas and equally earthy, peppery flavors make this wine unusually ...
description: Earthy, vegetal aromas and equally earthy, peppery flavors make this wine unusually rustic. It does have traces of good aged character, like leather and tea.

title: Williams Selyem 2013 Papera Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Continuing to preserve this historic vineyard, a rare planting of the variety ...
description: Continuing to preserve this historic vineyard, a rare planting of the variety within the appellation, this is an elegant yet explosive bottling. Blackberry and stone fruit tones are framed by soft, gentle tannins, sprinkled liberally with cardamom. A floral aroma permeates gently refreshing acidity and a finish of dark chocolate.

title: Dry Creek Vineyard 2012 Beeson Ranch Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A Zin with 23% Petite Sirah, this wine is seamless. Full bodied ...
description: A Zin with 23% Petite Sirah, this wine is seamless. Full bodied and dark, it is complexly layered in tobacco, meaty bacon and game, with a touch of brown sugar. A floral bouquet lurks underneath. Sourced from a vineyard with 100-plus-year-old vines, it finishes dusty and dramatic.

title: Dry Creek Vineyard 2012 DCV2 Estate Four Clones Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Only the second vintage of this vineyard-designate wine from an estate property, ...
description: Only the second vintage of this vineyard-designate wine from an estate property, this bottling offers spicy cherry, black tea and dried herb, backed by oaky backbone and structure. Dark chocolate and leather play on the palate in subtle waves, hitting their strides on the finish. Cellar through 2020.

title: Dry Creek Vineyard 2012 Somers Ranch Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: At the cooler end of the Dry Creek Valley, this vineyard site ...
description: At the cooler end of the Dry Creek Valley, this vineyard site provides juicy blackberry fruit accented in leather, tobacco and even black tea, giving it a savory edge. Juicy with soft tannins and mellowed oak, it finishes with a brightness of anise and nutmeg.

title: Matrix 2012 Reserve Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: A generously ripe wine with 8% Petite Sirah, this has a softly ...
description: A generously ripe wine with 8% Petite Sirah, this has a softly layered entry that reveals strong aromas of black olive and plum, before delving headfirst into spicy blackberry cobbler. Complex and smooth, it offers heightened acidity and a richly chocolate finish.

title: Cellars 33 2013 Bacigalupi Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Piquant in allspice, this soft, single-vineyard designate from a property known for ...
description: Piquant in allspice, this soft, single-vineyard designate from a property known for Pinot Noir conveys a sense of elegance and subdued tannins, offering plum and red cherry atop shy waves of cedar and sage. A smoky component on the robust finish makes it memorable.

title: Dry Creek Vineyard 2012 DCV 7 Estate Wallace Ranch Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: From a 25-year-old vineyard planted to pre-Prohibition heritage budwood, this wine also ...
description: From a 25-year-old vineyard planted to pre-Prohibition heritage budwood, this wine also holds less than a handful of Petite Sirah. Toasted, smoky and leathery, it offers bright raspberry and blackberry along a thoroughfare of structured, firm tannins and cardamom.

title: Kunde 2012 Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Juicy in dusty berry cobbler flavor, layered with a touch of spicy ...
description: Juicy in dusty berry cobbler flavor, layered with a touch of spicy dark chocolate, this is a medium-bodied, approachable wine with well-integrated oak and supple tannin. Blackberry and coffee mingle on the finish.

title: Armida 2012 Gold Mine Ranch Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: From a three-acre vineyard once home to two gold mines, this wine ...
description: From a three-acre vineyard once home to two gold mines, this wine is spicy and brawny in tannin weight, yet also soft and refined. Bright raspberry plays off juicy flavors of brown sugar and vanilla, finishing in a hint of black pepper. The substantive nature of the wine suggests further time in bottle, through 2020.

title: The Federalist 2013 Visionary Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Juicy ripe blackberry and raspberry form the basis of this brambly, fruit-forward ...
description: Juicy ripe blackberry and raspberry form the basis of this brambly, fruit-forward Zin that offers a low output of tannin and oak presence. Refined on the palate, it finishes with a swat of wild licorice and dried herb.

title: Frei Brothers 2013 Reserve Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Rich, tannic and brambly, a juiciness of blackberry jam forms the substantive ...
description: Rich, tannic and brambly, a juiciness of blackberry jam forms the substantive core of this wine, made in larger quantities for larger distribution. The finish is leathery and well integrated in oak.

title: Kunde 2012 Kinneybrook Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: A bit dull on the nose, this wine offers smoky, toasty blackberry ...
description: A bit dull on the nose, this wine offers smoky, toasty blackberry and bacon around a soft body and short finish, making it fine for casual gatherings and barbecues.

title: HammerSky 2010 Estate Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: This powerful, rich and complex wine comes from a low-yielding vineyard that ...
description: This powerful, rich and complex wine comes from a low-yielding vineyard that produced just 2.5 tons per acre, and the meticulous label even shows the amount of fog days. Deep and jammy aromas of strawberry preserves, cherry pie, brown sugar, hot licorice and smoked meats give way to a sultry palate that shows nuanced layers of berries, black pepper, mace and baking spice.

title: Ravenswood 2012 Belloni Single Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This wine is tannic and leathery and yet at the same time ...
description: This wine is tannic and leathery and yet at the same time austere, revealing its historic vineyard roots. A blend of 75% Zinfandel and 25% Mixed Blacks, the property is thought to have been planted around 1900. Blueberry, earth and cinnamon-cardamom spice combine to beautiful, layered effect, flavors that will meld nicely through 2020.

title: Rosenblum 2011 Rockpile Road Vineyard Zinfandel (Rockpile)
excerpt: Blended with 13% Petite Sirah, this wine offers smoky leather and brambly ...
description: Blended with 13% Petite Sirah, this wine offers smoky leather and brambly black and red berry around soft, dusty tannins and plenty of structure. Rich and concentrated, it finishes in a blaze of dark chocolate and black pepper.

title: Stuhlmuller Vineyards 2012 Estate Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Muted on the nose, this soft wine co-fermented with 9% Petite Sirah ...
description: Muted on the nose, this soft wine co-fermented with 9% Petite Sirah offers rich red cherry, blackberry and layers of clove and lavender. Lush, it finishes in firm tannins and oak.

title: Seghesio 2013 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Made in large quantities, this is juicy and complex, offering soft, leathery ...
description: Made in large quantities, this is juicy and complex, offering soft, leathery layers of mocha and blackberry, with plenty of oomph and body to please a variety of palates. Approachable and easy to enjoy, the tannins are firm and the finish brief.

title: Sebastiani 2012 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: A well-priced, higher production Zin with smaller amounts of Petite Sirah, Syrah, ...
description: A well-priced, higher production Zin with smaller amounts of Petite Sirah, Syrah, Malbec and Alicante Bouschet, this features plenty of ripe black and red berry fruit leveled by restrained, dusty tannins. Smooth and well crafted, it makes for a good house wine.

title: Keating 2012 Montecillo Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Muted on the nose, this is a spicy, somewhat austere wine, shy ...
description: Muted on the nose, this is a spicy, somewhat austere wine, shy in red berry fruit and soft tannins. From a 1,500-foot elevation vineyard, it lacks the power of some of its competitors, yet offers a balanced, less in-your-face take on the variety.

title: Ca' Momi 2013 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: American oak stands out on the nose, before this wine offers bright ...
description: American oak stands out on the nose, before this wine offers bright red raspberry, blackberry and an unexpected crispness. A follow-up of orange peel and clove confuses in pleasant ways, before the finish repeats the oak. Still young, this wine will benefit from airing.

title: Truett Hurst 2012 Red Rooster Old Vine Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Jammy and ripe, this is a concentrated, extracted wine rich in blackberry ...
description: Jammy and ripe, this is a concentrated, extracted wine rich in blackberry and plum. Approachable, it offers a kick of heat and black pepper on the finish.

title: Deering 2011 Maus Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Juicy in a slightly overripe way, this sweet, plummy and jammy wine ...
description: Juicy in a slightly overripe way, this sweet, plummy and jammy wine is soft and supple in broad tannins. On the finish, a combination of smoke and vanilla make their point.

title: Madrigal 2012 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Medium in weight, acidity and tannin, this conveys juicy blackberry and plum, ...
description: Medium in weight, acidity and tannin, this conveys juicy blackberry and plum, but not much else to mark it as varietal. Muddled, it ends bittersweet.

title: DeLorimier 2012 River Lane Primitivo (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: A rare, 100% Primitivo, this offers savory leather, cherry-berry cobbler and vanilla, ...
description: A rare, 100% Primitivo, this offers savory leather, cherry-berry cobbler and vanilla, with a yeasty nose of baked bread and graham cracker. Midway through, the wine falls apart, revealing the unmistakable heat of high alcohol.

title: Napa Cellars 2012 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Vanilla and marshmallow cream announced themselves on the nose before continuing their ...
description: Vanilla and marshmallow cream announced themselves on the nose before continuing their assault on the palate, along with a sweetness of blackberry jam. An addition of mint further upsets balance.

title: Carlisle 2012 Saitone Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Interplanted to Carignane, Alicante Bouschet and Grand Noir, this Zin vineyard hails ...
description: Interplanted to Carignane, Alicante Bouschet and Grand Noir, this Zin vineyard hails back to 1895, a grande dame in the region, and is farmed by Ulises Valdez. The meticulous farming and winemaking are in full view, the wine velvety in blueberry and boysenberry fruit, while well-honed tannins and a full body announce its presence. On the finish is a satisfying streak of black licorice and pepper. Cellar through 2022.

title: Bella 2012 Trot and Follow Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Big and robust, it is full bodied but also has lots of ...
description: Big and robust, it is full bodied but also has lots of personality. It smells like blackberries and ripe plums, and tastes rich, ripe and and a bit hot. Memorable wild sage and wood smoke notes linger on the finish. Firm tannins and acidity shape all the elements in an appetizing way.

title: Bella 2012 Barrel 32 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Elegant and firm-textured, this tastes like it comes from a cool climate, ...
description: Elegant and firm-textured, this tastes like it comes from a cool climate, bringing a nervy structure of acidity and tannins to support the dark fruit flavors, clove and black pepper. This will be great at dinner due to its balance and grip.

title: Sextant 2012 Wheelhouse Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: This is a widely available and excellent wine for the price, with ...
description: This is a widely available and excellent wine for the price, with aromas of fresh strawberries, black rocks and gamy meats showing on the wondrously blended nose. Flavors are deep yet balanced, with black cherries, plum skins and licorice culminating in a spearmint, pine and eucalyptus finish.

title: Armida 2012 Parmelee-Hill Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma Coast)
excerpt: Velvety on the palate, this wine initially conveys a sense of restraint. ...
description: Velvety on the palate, this wine initially conveys a sense of restraint. A shy line of cool-climate raspberry and strawberry are made brighter on the palate by zesty acidity. Begging for grilled meats, it becomes more substantial over time, offering leather and savory spice.

title: Fiddletown Cellars 2012 Jack Rabbit Flat Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: This is a sophisticated and ultrasmooth wine. A spicy, almost sweet aroma ...
description: This is a sophisticated and ultrasmooth wine. A spicy, almost sweet aroma of classy oak leads to rich strawberry and plum flavors that glide lightly on the supple texture, which has just enough tannin and acidity to keep the wine well balanced.

title: Carlisle 2012 Limerick Lane Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: A new vineyard source for the producer, this was planted in 1910 ...
description: A new vineyard source for the producer, this was planted in 1910 to a mix of Zinfandel, Petite Sirah, Peloursin and Trousseau. The wine shows a zestiness to the palate and fruit, a mix of pomegranate, raspberry and plum, side-kicked by dusty mocha. Bright in acidity with a chalky finish, the wine can be enjoyed now with a decant or cellared through 2022.

title: Opaque 2013 Quarry Heights Vineyard Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: A rich sense of earth emerges on this Riboli family wine, with ...
description: A rich sense of earth emerges on this Riboli family wine, with blueberry fruit, leather and roasted beef complementing the loamy character. The palate walks a balanced line between ripe olallieberry fruit and graphite minerality.

title: Ravenswood 2012 Old Hill Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: From a famed old site planted to 75% Zinfandel and 25% mixed ...
description: From a famed old site planted to 75% Zinfandel and 25% mixed black-skinned varieties, this wine conveys a minty-eucalyptus quality that tunes the acidity high against a medium-weight body. Austere at first on the palate, it expands as it goes, offering robust, dry tannins and layers of cardamom and coffee with time and air.

title: Ironstone 2012 Rous Vineyards Reserve Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This is quietly concentrated, complex, sleek in texture and inviting to drink. ...
description: This is quietly concentrated, complex, sleek in texture and inviting to drink. It smells like ripe boysenberries and cherries, and tastes generous and broad without being too full bodied. It finishes with more fruit notes and a hint of sunbaked earth.

title: Drytown 2011 Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: A spicy character suggesting white and black pepper ties in with a ...
description: A spicy character suggesting white and black pepper ties in with a firm texture and gripping tannins that add welcome astringency to this medium-bodied, distinctive red. Dry and well balanced, it tastes like blackberries, black olives and a touch of sage.

title: Thurston Wolfe 2012 Howling Wolfe Reserve Zinfandel (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: Lighter in color, this wine offers aromas of vanilla, cocoa, tobacco leaf, ...
description: Lighter in color, this wine offers aromas of vanilla, cocoa, tobacco leaf, spice and red fruit. On the palate, it shows a pleasing mixture of fruit and barrel flavors.

title: Peachy Canyon 2012 Mustard Creek Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Deep red fruit aromas lay across nicely rounded cedar, applewood and milk ...
description: Deep red fruit aromas lay across nicely rounded cedar, applewood and milk chocolate notes. The fairly tannic palate is more about texture than flavor, with tension linking blueberry ripeness to plum-skin tartness. Still very firm in structure, this will open up in 2017 or so.

title: Cameron Hughes 2012 Lot 464 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Temptingly ripe aromas and flavors make this a very generous wine. It ...
description: Temptingly ripe aromas and flavors make this a very generous wine. It also has some complexity due to a slight earthy, savory accent in the aroma that returns on the finish. Medium to full bodied, it will pair well with robust, meaty dishes and will be perfect for sipping after a meal.

title: The Dancing Fox 2012 Rumpelstiltzin Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Smooth, ripe and almost sweet, this is medium to full bodied, packed ...
description: Smooth, ripe and almost sweet, this is medium to full bodied, packed full of fruit flavors and other complexity that makes it interesting. It balances toward softness as the berry and cherry character seems to swell on the palate and linger on the finish.

title: Bridlewood 2012 Zinfandel (Santa Ynez Valley)
excerpt: Boosted with 4% Tempranillo, 3% Petite Sirah and 3% Tannat, this Zin ...
description: Boosted with 4% Tempranillo, 3% Petite Sirah and 3% Tannat, this Zin comes from a 100-year-old Mendocino clone, and shows ripe strawberry syrup, campfire smoke and anise on the nose. The palate is dominated by smoke, with just touch of red fruits, tannins and tartness keeping it lively.

title: Tobin James 2011 French Camp Vineyard Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: This is a lush and powerful wine from a vineyard in the ...
description: This is a lush and powerful wine from a vineyard in the recently designated Paso Highlands district. Aromas suggest gingerbread topped with kirsch-soaked, chocolate-covered cherries. The palate is thick and heavy, with mocha, stewed plums, mashed cherries and black earth, which gain complexity from tannins and pencil lead.

title: League of Rogues 2012 Rapscallion Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Lighter in color than many other bottlings, this shows cherry and pepper ...
description: Lighter in color than many other bottlings, this shows cherry and pepper spice on a somewhat reserved nose. But that light color unleashes a lush and ripe palate, with red berries, nutmeg and game flavors showing most prominently.

title: Drytown 2012 Primitivo (Amador County)
excerpt: Oodles of black cherry and boysenberry fill the aromas and flavors of ...
description: Oodles of black cherry and boysenberry fill the aromas and flavors of this bold but not-too-big wine. The rich, ripe fruit shows right away in the nose, and continues on the palate but gets reined in a bit (in a good way) by a firm texture created by good acidity and tannins.

title: Chacewater 2012 Organically Grown Grapes Zinfandel (Sierra Foothills)
excerpt: Big in flavor and ripeness, this full-bodied wine tastes concentrated and feels ...
description: Big in flavor and ripeness, this full-bodied wine tastes concentrated and feels lush, almost soft. It smells like boysenberry jam, tastes like dried cherries and dried plums and has a streak of raspberry that lifts it a bit.

title: Boneshaker 2012 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This rich, thick, concentrated wine offers big aromas, a velvety, tannic texture ...
description: This rich, thick, concentrated wine offers big aromas, a velvety, tannic texture and ripe fruit flavors reminiscent of dried plums and blackberries. Full bodied, it shows a lot of oak influence in the strong vanilla and maple syrup aromas, as well as in the flavors.

title: Manifesto! 2012 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: This smells oaky and tastes ripe and pure, like crushed blackberries and ...
description: This smells oaky and tastes ripe and pure, like crushed blackberries and raspberries. It feels plush and smooth in the mouth, finishing on the soft side. While medium bodied, it has just a touch of tannin to balance the ripeness and make it appetizing to drink.

title: Klinker Brick 2012 Marisa Vineyard Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: IFragrant with sweet vanilla and nutmeg from new oak, this has a ...
description: IFragrant with sweet vanilla and nutmeg from new oak, this has a very full body and velvety texture. All that oak somewhat masks the fruit aromas and flavors, so this may be too extreme for purists.

title: Coastline 2013 Zinfandel (Central Coast)
excerpt: The nose on this well-priced wine of mostly Paso Robles fruit is ...
description: The nose on this well-priced wine of mostly Paso Robles fruit is initially hidden, but patience reveals mossy forest-floor notes alongside charred, crushed herbs. The palate also leans more toward savory than ripe fruit, with oregano and thyme most prevalent, although quite restrained altogether.

title: Alma Sol 2012 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Aromas jump between ripe plum and a dark earthy character, from graphite ...
description: Aromas jump between ripe plum and a dark earthy character, from graphite to wet slate. There is a quite a lot of zing on the palate, perhaps even a touch of carbonation, with flavors of cola and sassafras settling on a blackberry-juice backbone.

title: Lone Madrone 2011 Sheep Camp Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Sourced from a dry-farmed, 40-year-old vineyard, this Zin offers aromas of red ...
description: Sourced from a dry-farmed, 40-year-old vineyard, this Zin offers aromas of red brick, cherry syrup, licorice, black sage, shaved nutmeg and nose-tickling baking spices. The grippy palate is driven by sagebrush and chemise, with ample amounts of pepper and spice giving nuance to the ripe blackberry fruit.

title: Gary Farrell 2012 Maffei Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: From a vineyard holding in the midst of prime Pinot Noir country, ...
description: From a vineyard holding in the midst of prime Pinot Noir country, Maffei intrigues in ripe, hearty plum, black cherry and kir aromas and flavors. The tannins are soft and nicely managed, accented by notes of nutmeg and black pepper.

title: Quivira 2012 Reserve Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Dusty tannins surround a lovely rendering of savory leather in this reserve ...
description: Dusty tannins surround a lovely rendering of savory leather in this reserve Zin, a balanced, fruity expression of blackberry and cinnamon. The structure and weight suggest further aging, through 2018.

title: De Loach 2012 Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This full-bodied, balanced wine opens elegantly in the glass, revealing red berry ...
description: This full-bodied, balanced wine opens elegantly in the glass, revealing red berry and spice around a core of soft, layered tannins and restrained oak. On the finish a remarkable sprinkling of black pepper lingers playfully on the tongue.

title: Easton 2013 Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: With opulent ripe fruit flavors and plenty of tannin and acidity to ...
description: With opulent ripe fruit flavors and plenty of tannin and acidity to back them, this is a complete, balanced and appetizing wine. It smells like blackberry with smoky, meaty accents, tastes rich and full of berries, and feels firm and tangy on the palate. It should improve through 2017.

title: Hendry 2012 Block 24 Primitivo (Napa Valley)
excerpt: The producer does nice things with this 100% Primitivo, coaxing attractive, chewy ...
description: The producer does nice things with this 100% Primitivo, coaxing attractive, chewy liqueur-like red fruit from the grapes before aging them in French oak, just a third of the barrels new. The woody tones are well integrated, and the wine boasts a smooth texture and subtle power.

title: J. Rickards 2011 1908 Brignole Vineyard Old Vine Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: A classic, old-style field blend best identified as Zinfandel, this heady red ...
description: A classic, old-style field blend best identified as Zinfandel, this heady red opens with perfumed baking spice and a tinge of black licorice. Soft, integrated tannins make it juicy and approachable in red and black berry, with robust but not distracting oaky tones.

title: Terra d'Oro 2012 Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: A bright character comes through in this full-bodied wine. A distinctive fruit ...
description: A bright character comes through in this full-bodied wine. A distinctive fruit component reminiscent of strawberry and rhubarb comes with savory herbal accents that unfold on the palate and on the finish. Firm tannins and good acidity keep it balanced.

title: Fields Family 2012 Sherman Family Vineyards Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This is full of personality, with a vivid herbaceous aroma, and savory, ...
description: This is full of personality, with a vivid herbaceous aroma, and savory, herbal accents surrounding the raspberry and cranberry flavors. The balance is great, with firm tannins and fresh acidity. Flavors are tasty, unconventional and memorable.

title: Benessere 2012 Collins Holystone Vineyard Zinfandel (St. Helena)
excerpt: From a vineyard originally planted in 1922 to what is thought to ...
description: From a vineyard originally planted in 1922 to what is thought to be 100% Zinfandel, this wine brims with notes of yeasty baked bread, leather and high-toned raspberry and boysenberry. Layered and supported by oak, the medium-bodied weight supports a long finish.

title: Rock Wall 2012 Florence Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A smidgen of Petite Sirah is added to 98% Zinfandel from a ...
description: A smidgen of Petite Sirah is added to 98% Zinfandel from a coveted vineyard in the heart of Dry Creek Valley. It takes on perfumed red cherry and is finely hewn on the palate, soft and yet tense. Cinnamon and pepper swirl throughout, becoming more pronounced and integrated in the glass.

title: Wellington 2009 Meeks Hilltop Ranch Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: This older wine displays an intriguing mix of baking spices, chocolate-covered cola ...
description: This older wine displays an intriguing mix of baking spices, chocolate-covered cola cherry and menthol, combining nicely on the palate in juicy, fruit-forward waves. With a small amount of winery-identified Durif, it holds together through the peppery finish.

title: Houdini 2011 Zinfandel (Chiles Valley)
excerpt: This Zinfandel from the eastern section of Napa Valley is unexpectedly structured ...
description: This Zinfandel from the eastern section of Napa Valley is unexpectedly structured and bright in acidity, offering notes of strawberry and cinnamon. The acidity provides a kick to the finish, awash in memorable sprinkles of white pepper.

title: B.R. Cohn 2011 Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Most of the grapes were sourced from the southwest-facing side of the ...
description: Most of the grapes were sourced from the southwest-facing side of the Mayacamas, not far from Monte Rosso, where the variety has found a powerful, historic home. Bacon and maple syrup hit the nose and palate immediately, with a juicy undercurrent of blackberry and blueberry adorned in clove.  Full-bodied, the finish is smoky in espresso.

title: Bonterra 2012 Made With Organic Grapes Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: This combines freshness with concentration and great structure. With a deep, dark ...
description: This combines freshness with concentration and great structure. With a deep, dark color and aromas like cranberry and red cherry accented by hints of rosemary and thyme, it tastes deep, juicy and ripe, and feels vibrant and handsomely tannic.

title: Edmeades 2012 Shamrock Vineyard Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: This full-bodied, strongly flavored and firmly structured wine can tackle the juiciest ...
description: This full-bodied, strongly flavored and firmly structured wine can tackle the juiciest cuts of meat. It smells like blackberries, black pepper and a little wood smoke, tastes rich with ripe fruit and feels somewhat astringent, in a good way.

title: Bridges 2012 Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: From two wonderful Zin vineyards in the Sonoma Valley, Bedrock and Casa ...
description: From two wonderful Zin vineyards in the Sonoma Valley, Bedrock and Casa Santinamaria, this producer coaxes out spicy, dusty cinnamon and structured blackberry, the oak subtle yet present. With  tannins managed and a firm structure holding things up, the finish shows a subtle hint of herb.

title: Cline 2012 Meadowbrook Ranch Zinfandel (Tehama County)
excerpt: Brawny and tasty at the same time, this combines oak, vanilla and ...
description: Brawny and tasty at the same time, this combines oak, vanilla and cherry aromas with very full body, ripe and broad boysenberry flavors and firm tannins. A slightly hot finish echoes the spicy oak notes. The texture is firm and tannic, making it a good counterpoint to rich food.

title: Edmeades 2012 Perli Vineyards Zinfandel (Mendocino Ridge)
excerpt: With a touch of maple syrup in the fruity aromas, and rich, ...
description: With a touch of maple syrup in the fruity aromas, and rich, generous flavors, this full-bodied wine is lush, drenched with blackberry and boysenberry notes. Mild, oaky accents from the aroma linger on the finish.

title: Fields Family 2012 Old Vine The Century Block Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This lively, medium-bodied red feels light on its feet due to deft ...
description: This lively, medium-bodied red feels light on its feet due to deft oaky, smoky aromas, fresh acidity and vibrant tannins. Flavors recall raspberry and red cherry, and the texture is tangy and firm. Made like the Lodi Native wines but with 20% new oak.

title: Paul Dolan 2012 Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: Balanced for dinner-time drinking, this lively and concentrated wine has fresh fruit ...
description: Balanced for dinner-time drinking, this lively and concentrated wine has fresh fruit flavors, moderate tannins and good acidity. Raspberry and blackberry notes blend with hints of smoke and black pepper to keep it interesting on the lingering finish.

title: Andis 2011 Original Grandpere Vineyard Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: A soulful wine, this has an attractive leesy, earthy aroma that complements ...
description: A soulful wine, this has an attractive leesy, earthy aroma that complements the mellow plum and raspberry flavors. It feels rounded and velvety, showing moderate tannins and good acidity. It makes a nice change from the all-fruit-all-the-time school of winemaking.

title: Edmeades 2012 Piffero Vineyard Zinfandel (Redwood Valley)
excerpt: With a light red color, tantalizing oak and raspberry aromas, bright cherry ...
description: With a light red color, tantalizing oak and raspberry aromas, bright cherry flavors and a firm texture, this wine discloses a lighter, leaner style than many. It could match with salmon as well as meat, pasta and poultry.

title: Grgich Hills 2011 Estate Grown Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Red dusty berry cobbler marks the entry to this estate wine co-fermented ...
description: Red dusty berry cobbler marks the entry to this estate wine co-fermented with 2% Petite Sirah. Milk chocolate, nutmeg and clove play supporting roles in this otherwise bright, food-friendly wine with measured oak impact.

title: St. Francis 2012 Three Valleys Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: The size of this wine distracts slightly from its thick, concentrated dark ...
description: The size of this wine distracts slightly from its thick, concentrated dark plum and blackberry brambly quality, the tannins soft and the oak able to stand behind the fruit. A syrupy, leathery and mocha finish seals the deal.

title: Edmeades 2012 Gianoli Vineyard Zinfandel (Mendocino Ridge)
excerpt: Bold and ripe, this tastes almost sweet due to the aroma and ...
description: Bold and ripe, this tastes almost sweet due to the aroma and flavor of cherries and vanilla. It is full-bodied, fat in texture and carries heat on the finish. It matured in 40% new oak barrels.

title: St. Francis 2012 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: In need of a heaping plate of smokey, grilled meat, this Zin ...
description: In need of a heaping plate of smokey, grilled meat, this Zin is generous in terms of ripeness, with 14% Petite Sirah adding color and depth. Stewy plum and a taste of raisin bread come to the fore amidst a background of leather and soft, robust blackberry.

title: Louis M. Martini 2012 Gnarly Vine Monte Rosso Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Powerfully brambly this gigantic wine hails from a monumental vineyard that consistently ...
description: Powerfully brambly this gigantic wine hails from a monumental vineyard that consistently delivers fine-tuned tension between structure and intensity. Sizable tannins surround a soft mouthfeel of plum, leather and black pepper, the concentration suggesting aging through 2020.

title: Buena Vista 2012 Private Reserve Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Herbaceous and earthy, this playfully ponders the juicy delights of soft, red ...
description: Herbaceous and earthy, this playfully ponders the juicy delights of soft, red raspberry and black cherry, the wine somewhat silky on the tongue. It finishes consistently and bright in acidity.

title: Navarro 2012 Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: Uncomplicated yet tasty, this medium-bodied, mild-textured wine has a pure raspberry/strawberry character ...
description: Uncomplicated yet tasty, this medium-bodied, mild-textured wine has a pure raspberry/strawberry character from the bright aroma to the ripe flavors to the lingering finish. The balance is on the soft side due to low acidity and little astringency from tannins.

title: Cline 2012 Live Oak Vineyards Zinfandel (Contra Costa County)
excerpt: This has bright raspberry and almost-sweet blackberry flavors, full body, moderate tannins ...
description: This has bright raspberry and almost-sweet blackberry flavors, full body, moderate tannins and a long warm finish. It tastes polished, soft and satiny smooth.

title: Hendry 2012 Block 28 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is huge, brawny Zin, given some parameters through its 15 months ...
description: This is huge, brawny Zin, given some parameters through its 15 months in oak, the vast majority of which was French and new. Behind the power lies a slight elegance, with a taste of tar and bittersweet chocolate that lingers on.

title: Wild Coyote 2013 Little Fawn Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Coming in an odd tear-drop-shaped bottle with a removable cork cap sealed ...
description: Coming in an odd tear-drop-shaped bottle with a removable cork cap sealed in wax, this smells a bit hot, with blackberry and dark spice aromas. The palate is framed by big tannins and very strong acidity, offering elderberry flavors.

title: Klinker Brick 2012 Old Ghost Old Vine Zinfandel Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: A deep, deep color, lots of spicy, smoky oak aromas and rich, ...
description: A deep, deep color, lots of spicy, smoky oak aromas and rich, almost sweet flavors add up to a bold barbecue sauce of a wine. Those who love lots of spice, loads of smooth tannins and very full body will be happy.

title: Sebastiani 2012 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A healthy dose of Petite Sirah toughens this Zin, sourced from a ...
description: A healthy dose of Petite Sirah toughens this Zin, sourced from a benchland vineyard in the heart of the Dry Creek Valley. The wine opens with aromas of cinnamon bark and cranberry, a tugging mushroomy element standing by. Subtle notes of black pepper come into play on the finish.

title: Andis 2012 Amador Zinfandel Zinfandel (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
excerpt: An assertive if not aggressive wine, it smells like smoke and charred ...
description: An assertive if not aggressive wine, it smells like smoke and charred wood, tastes like espresso dosed with raspberry syrup, and feels tannic, oaky and astringent. Full bodied and ripe at its core, the oak characteristics effectively take over.

title: Amastuola 2011 Centosassi Primitivo (Puglia)
excerpt: Bold and full bodied, this offers aromas of steeped plum, prune, clove ...
description: Bold and full bodied, this offers aromas of steeped plum, prune, clove and blue flower. The concentrated, savory palate doles out mature blackberry, raisin, clove and licorice. Big but velvety tannins and just enough freshness give this a surprisingly drinkable quality that belies its heft.

title: Ognissole 2012 Essentia Loci  (Primitivo di Manduria)
excerpt: Aromas of underbrush, leather, black-skinned fruit and tobacco lead the nose. The ...
description: Aromas of underbrush, leather, black-skinned fruit and tobacco lead the nose. The firm, structured palate offers mature blackberry, black cherry, coffee bean and licorice alongside a tannic backbone. It closes on a mineral note.

title: Cantine Paolo Leo 2012  Primitivo di Manduria
excerpt: Made from 40-year-old, bush-trained vines, this opens with earthy aromas of charred ...
description: Made from 40-year-old, bush-trained vines, this opens with earthy aromas of charred earth, smoke, grilled sage and black spice. The concentrated but elegant palate delivers mature blackberry, dried black cherry, allspice and pipe tobacco alongside velvety tannins.

title: Alberto Longo 2013 Primitivo (Puglia)
excerpt: Spicy, and medium bodied, this has a smoky, spicy nose that recalls ...
description: Spicy, and medium bodied, this has a smoky, spicy nose that recalls charred earth, graphite, black currant and cedar. The smoky quality carries to the palate, along with mature blackberry, allspice, licorice and clove. Firm but fine-grained tannins and fresh acidity provide an uplifting framework.

title: Torrevento 2011 Ghenos  (Primitivo di Manduria)
excerpt: This robust wine opens with aromas of spiced plum, clove and a ...
description: This robust wine opens with aromas of spiced plum, clove and a balsamic note. The spicy palate offers prune, dried blackberry, red currant and ground pepper alongside hearty tannins. A marked licorice note signals the close.

title: Masseria Altemura 2012 Altemura  (Primitivo di Manduria)
excerpt: Aromas of blue flower, ripe berry and allspice jump out of the ...
description: Aromas of blue flower, ripe berry and allspice jump out of the glass of this full-bodied but elegant red. The fresh, juicy palate offers blueberry, blackberry, graphite and a hint of mocha. Firm, fine-grained tannins offer support and give it a smooth texture.

title: Ognissole 2013  Primitivo di Manduria
excerpt: An elegant expression of this grape, this smooth, full-bodied wine delivers layers ...
description: An elegant expression of this grape, this smooth, full-bodied wine delivers layers of spicy plum, juicy blackberry, graphite, clove and licorice. Firm but velvety tannins provide ample texture and support.

title: Gianfranco Fino 2012 ES  (Primitivo di Manduria)
excerpt: Concentrated and dense, this has aromas of spicy black plum, game and ...
description: Concentrated and dense, this has aromas of spicy black plum, game and a whiff of clove. The massive, monolithic palate delivers prune, dried black cherry, coffee, licorice and hints of grilled herb alongside velvety tannins. Searing alcohol dominates the finish.

title: Amastuola 2011 Primitivo (Puglia)
excerpt: Aromas of mature black berries, prune toast and tilled earth lead the ...
description: Aromas of mature black berries, prune toast and tilled earth lead the nose on this savory wine. The succulent, easygoing palate doles out crushed blackberry, Morello cherry, dried plum and clove alongside supple tannins. It closes on a note of bitter almond.

title: Jorche 2012 Soltema  (Primitivo del Salento)
excerpt: Aromas of underbrush, tobacco leaf and spiced plum come together in the ...
description: Aromas of underbrush, tobacco leaf and spiced plum come together in the glass. The hearty palate delivers dried blackberry, crushed raspberry, coffee, tobacco and licorice alongside robust but velvety tannins.

title: Tenute Rubino 2012 Visellio Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Aromas of underbrush, toast, black plum and cooking spice lead the nose. ...
description: Aromas of underbrush, toast, black plum and cooking spice lead the nose. The dense, extracted palate offers blackberry, prune, licorice, mocha and grilled sage alongside velvety but rather fleeting tannins.

title: Castello Monaci 2012 Artas Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: This full-bodied red conveys aromas of tilled soil, underbrush, plum cake and ...
description: This full-bodied red conveys aromas of tilled soil, underbrush, plum cake and pencil shaving. The ripe, dense palate offers prune, dried blackberry, clove, ground black pepper and graphite alongside velvety tannins.

title: Cantine Menhir 2011 Quota 31 Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Aromas of ripe black fruit, spicy plum, graphite and a whiff of ...
description: Aromas of ripe black fruit, spicy plum, graphite and a whiff of brine lead the nose of this robust wine. The round, savory palate doles out juicy blackberry, blueberry, licorice and ground black pepper alongside brawny tannins. It ends on a bitter prune note.

title: Futura 14 2013 Il Rosso di Vespa Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: This warm, brawny wine opens with aromas of tilled soil, underbrush, plum ...
description: This warm, brawny wine opens with aromas of tilled soil, underbrush, plum and ripe, dark berry. The dense, spicy palate delivers prune, raisin, licorice and ground black pepper alongside velvety tannins. The heat of evident alcohol dominates the finish.

title: Castel di Salve 2012 Cento su Cento Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Aromas of crushed blue flower, plum cake and ripe wild berry lead ...
description: Aromas of crushed blue flower, plum cake and ripe wild berry lead the nose. The palate offers prune, mature blackberry, vanilla, clove and a confectionary note alongside bracing tannins. It ends on a note of bitter cocoa.

title: Produttori Vini Manduria 2010 Sonetto Riserva  (Primitivo di Manduria)
excerpt: Aromas of coconut, plum and a balsamic note open this densely concentrated ...
description: Aromas of coconut, plum and a balsamic note open this densely concentrated wine. The compacted palate offers blackberry, prune, nutmeg and graphite alongside robust, velvety tannins and the warmth of alcohol. A licorice note marks the close.

title: Tormaresca 2012 Torcicoda Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Aromas of blackberry, blueberry and blue flower come together in the glass. ...
description: Aromas of blackberry, blueberry and blue flower come together in the glass. The straightforward palate offers black currant, dried plum, licorice and a tobacco note alongside firm tannins.

title: Tenute Rubino 2012 Punta Aquila Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Full-bodied, this conveys aromas of toast, scorched earth, espresso, plum and allspice. ...
description: Full-bodied, this conveys aromas of toast, scorched earth, espresso, plum and allspice. The hearty palate offers prune, blackberry extract and licorice alongside firm tannins.

title: Castello Monaci 2013 Piluna Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: This starts off with aromas of mature black fruit, allspice and toast. ...
description: This starts off with aromas of mature black fruit, allspice and toast. The full-bodied palate offers prune, mature blackberry, toasted oak and ground black pepper alongside hearty tannins.

title: Rivera 2012 Triusco Primitivo (Puglia)
excerpt: Aromas recall ripe, black-skinned fruit, clove, thyme and a whiff of barnyard. ...
description: Aromas recall ripe, black-skinned fruit, clove, thyme and a whiff of barnyard. The palate offers mature black currant, black pepper and savory herb alongside firm tannins.

title: Cantele 2012 Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: This accessible wine features aromas of spiced plum, leather and a whiff ...
description: This accessible wine features aromas of spiced plum, leather and a whiff of violet. The easy-drinking palate offers juicy black cherry and a note of ground pepper alongside sleek tannins.

title: Varvaglione Vigne & Vini 2013 12 e Mezzo  (Primitivo del Salento)
excerpt: Aromas of ripe plum, espresso, sawdust, cocoa and allspice lead the nose. ...
description: Aromas of ripe plum, espresso, sawdust, cocoa and allspice lead the nose. The palate offers mature blackberry, black pepper, oak extract and roasted coffee bean alongside raspy, astringent tannins.

title: Tommasi 2012 Masseria Surani Heracles Primitivo (Puglia)
excerpt: Aromas suggest pencil shavings, resin and mature black fruit. The palate offers ...
description: Aromas suggest pencil shavings, resin and mature black fruit. The palate offers prune, dried blackberry and black pepper alongside grippy tannins.

title: Mocavero 2011 Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: This earthy wine opens with aromas of ripe plum, tilled earth, game ...
description: This earthy wine opens with aromas of ripe plum, tilled earth, game and a whiff of barnyard. The rustic but juicy palate doles out black cherry, spicy blueberry and ground pepper framed by hearty tannins.

title: Jorche 2011  Primitivo di Manduria
excerpt: Earthy aromas of leather, game, meat juices and mature black-skinned fruit lead ...
description: Earthy aromas of leather, game, meat juices and mature black-skinned fruit lead the nose on this hefty wine. The palate offers sawdust, licorice, prune and espresso but not enough fruit richness to support the oak. Fleeting but astringent tannins leave a bitter finish.

title: Apollonio 2011 Terragnolo Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Aromas of coconut, spicy plum cake, mocha and vanilla waft out of ...
description: Aromas of coconut, spicy plum cake, mocha and vanilla waft out of the glass. The warm palate doles out stewed plum, blackberry, espresso, licorice and a confectionary note alongside bracing, astringent tannins that dry the mouth. The intense oak sensations throw this off balance.

title: Cantine Due Palme 2012 San Gaetano  (Primitivo di Manduria)
excerpt: Aromas of wild flower, black fruit and toast lead the nose on ...
description: Aromas of wild flower, black fruit and toast lead the nose on this dense wine. The one-dimensional palate offers mature black cherry, dried plum, coffee and a hint of licorice alongside chewy but fleeting tannins.

title: Ironstone 2013 Old Vines Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This smells like toasted bread and hickory smoke and tastes even more ...
description: This smells like toasted bread and hickory smoke and tastes even more charred and smoky. Like a good barbecue sauce it has a sweet touch to balance the smoky, jammy fruit flavors. This is an extreme taste experience that will be a big hit with some.

title: Mocavero 2013 Sjre Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Hearty and rustic, this opens with a nose of crushed blue flower, ...
description: Hearty and rustic, this opens with a nose of crushed blue flower, ripe blackberry, mature plum, allspice and a whiff of barnyard. The aromas carry over to the palate along with ripe, chewy tannins.

title: Villa Mottura 2012  Primitivo di Manduria
excerpt: This funky wine opens with rustic aromas of animal fur, game, tilled ...
description: This funky wine opens with rustic aromas of animal fur, game, tilled earth and a whiff of barnyard. These carry over to the palate along with mature blackberry and robust tannins.

title: Torrevento 2012 Matervitae Primitivo (Puglia)
excerpt: Aromas recall cellar floor, dried black fruit and a hint of black ...
description: Aromas recall cellar floor, dried black fruit and a hint of black pepper. The palate tastes old, offering prune and clove alongside angular tannins but without much fruit richness.

title: Mocavero 2008 Santufili Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Aromas of charred earth, tire rubber, allspice and oak lead the nose. ...
description: Aromas of charred earth, tire rubber, allspice and oak lead the nose. The palate seems older than it is, showing toasted oak and tertiary flavors of flint, mineral and black pepper along with steeped prune. The fruit is already dried up leaving only evident alcohol and oak sensations.

title: Tenute Mater Domini 2013 Marangi Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Funky aromas of game, leather, mature black fruit and a whiff of ...
description: Funky aromas of game, leather, mature black fruit and a whiff of barnyard carry over to the rustic palate. Raspy, astringent tannins and prune sensations give it a bitter, mouth-puckering finish. Tried twice with consistent results.

title: Dashe Cellars 2012 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A blend of five vineyards, some of which go into single-vineyard designates, ...
description: A blend of five vineyards, some of which go into single-vineyard designates, this is a well made, structured wine, offering layers of black cherry and subtle earth around soft, velvety tannins. The finish highlights black pepper spice with dark chocolate chaser.

title: Rancho Zabaco 2012 Sonoma Heritage Vines Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: This wine delivers on richness of flavor without being overwhelming or overdone. ...
description: This wine delivers on richness of flavor without being overwhelming or overdone. Refined in soft tannins and a core of expressive, juicy blue and black berry fruit, it is seductive and smoky on the finish, sourced mainly from vineyards in the Dry Creek Valley.

title: Ridge 2012 Three Valleys Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: What a treat to find a truly dry, balanced table wine among ...
description: What a treat to find a truly dry, balanced table wine among a sea of sweet and overoaked Zins. Plenty of blackberry, clove, sage and cherry flavors are supported by just firm-enough tannins and medium body. The blend is 79% Zinfandel, 12% Carignane, 8% Petite Sirah and 1% Alicante Bouschet.

title: Ironstone 2012 Reserve Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: A smooth, supple version of Zinfandel, this is full-bodied and rich but ...
description: A smooth, supple version of Zinfandel, this is full-bodied and rich but not overly showy or oaky. Blended from 90% Zinfandel plus Petite Sirah and Malbec, it has enticing wild blackberry aromas and flavors, touches of cinnamon and cedar and a lingering finish.

title: Pomar Junction 2012 Estate Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: The nose is both luscious with cherry pie and melting vanilla ice ...
description: The nose is both luscious with cherry pie and melting vanilla ice cream yet herbally enhanced with roasting pine wood. Similar flavors carry the easily likable yet through-provoking palate, which is ripe and well oaked.

title: McCay Cellars 2011 Trulux Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This is a monster Zin, and a very good one. It has ...
description: This is a monster Zin, and a very good one. It has an inky black color tinged with red, strong dried-fruit flavors like fig, prune and dried cherry. Along with a smoky, roasted quality on the palate, it has sandy tannins with lots of grip. Powerful and almost sweet.

title: Woodenhead 2011 Guido Venturi Vineyard Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: Very bright fruit aromas like fresh strawberries make this hearty wine especially ...
description: Very bright fruit aromas like fresh strawberries make this hearty wine especially appetizing. Firm, almost chewy tannins and vibrant acidity are strong enough to support the rich fruit flavors and bring the wine a great balance.

title: Uphill Vineyards 2010 Primitivo (Amador County)
excerpt: This is the strong, silent type, not a showy wine but one ...
description: This is the strong, silent type, not a showy wine but one that will drink well with a dinner full of grilled and roasted meats and vegetables. It feels well structured with tannins and acidity, and tastes restrained in flavor, with subtle cassis and blueberry notes.

title: Rodney Strong 2012 Knotty Vines Zinfandel (Northern Sonoma)
excerpt: From estate vineyards in Russian River, Alexander and Dry Creek valleys, this ...
description: From estate vineyards in Russian River, Alexander and Dry Creek valleys, this Zin is fruity and smoky in equal measure. The fruit is slightly jammy in blackberry fruit, followed by toasty oak and pepper spice.

title: Criss Cross 2012 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Tasty, generous and easy to enjoy, this full-bodied Zin smells like blackberries ...
description: Tasty, generous and easy to enjoy, this full-bodied Zin smells like blackberries and tastes like strawberry jam. It gains a little sweet spiciness from oak and glides through the finish.

title: Ancient Peaks 2012 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
