excerpt: Tobacco and boysenberry scents make for a pleasing if not complex nose ...
description: Tobacco and boysenberry scents make for a pleasing if not complex nose on this wine from the Santa Margarita Ranch area on the southern part of the appellation. There are a lot of tannins, with expected flavors of blackberry and cedar.

title: Ironstone 2010 Reserve Rous Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: A distinct late-harvest character pervades this full-bodied Zin, which has very ripe ...
description: A distinct late-harvest character pervades this full-bodied Zin, which has very ripe aromas of raisins and prunes, and bold, dried-fruit flavors, too. The texture is smooth and the wine is soft and not very tannic.

title: David Clinton 2011 Unti Vineyard Old Vine Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: From a new, small producer devoted to 100% Zinfandel, this soft, grippy ...
description: From a new, small producer devoted to 100% Zinfandel, this soft, grippy wine offers a hint of menthol on the nose and muted aromatics. The finish is ripe though tempered by good acidity.

title: Perry Creek 2012 ZinMan Zinfandel (El Dorado)
excerpt: This tastes full-bore, full-bodied and extra ripe: one of those monster Zins ...
description: This tastes full-bore, full-bodied and extra ripe: one of those monster Zins that needs plenty of animal protein, preferably cooked over a wood fire, to match the intensity. The aromas and flavors are raisiny, the high alcohol and tannins are powerful, and the finish carries heat.

title: McCay Cellars 2011 Jupiter Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This big and brawny wine is definitely different, smelling sun-baked and tasting ...
description: This big and brawny wine is definitely different, smelling sun-baked and tasting of cherry and menthol.There is a sawdust quality in the nose, and a rowdy texture full of tannin and alcohol.

title: McCay Cellars 2011 Faith Lot 13 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: A dense, rich, chocolaty flavor and smooth, thick texture make this old-school ...
description: A dense, rich, chocolaty flavor and smooth, thick texture make this old-school Zinfandel very tempting despite an earthy, leathery vein of flavor that lasts on the finish.

title: McCay Cellars 2011 Equity Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Not your average Zinfandel, this one could almost be a Syrah with ...
description: Not your average Zinfandel, this one could almost be a Syrah with all its peppery, meaty and smoky aromas and flavors. They are wild and different but puzzling. The wine is full-bodied, tannic and almost thick in texture.

title: Bruliam 2012 Zinfandel (Rockpile)
excerpt: Light and linear, this Zin offers muted red fruit and spice, with ...
description: Light and linear, this Zin offers muted red fruit and spice, with a modest finish.

title: Robert Biale 2012 Varozza Vineyard Zinfandel (St. Helena)
excerpt: Varozza is planted to 50-year-old Zin vines, an unexpected patch of refined ...
description: Varozza is planted to 50-year-old Zin vines, an unexpected patch of refined goodness in the middle of valley floor land near the Napa River in St. Helena. It expresses waves of complexity and spicy red berry fruit, the different components of which evolve in the glass and should evolve even more in the bottle.

title: Dutton-Goldfield 2012 Dutton Ranch Morelli Lane Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Smoky in dark clove and black pepper, this is a smooth, bright ...
description: Smoky in dark clove and black pepper, this is a smooth, bright Zinfandel from head-trained, dry-farmed vines planted in the 19th century. After skipping the 2011 vintage, the winery returns with this stunner, brambly in succulent blackberry with plenty of intriguing spice.

title: Robert Biale 2012 Rocky Ridge Vineyard Zinfandel (Rockpile)
excerpt: There is earthy darkness and a hint of the forest in this ...
description: There is earthy darkness and a hint of the forest in this Zin, grown at high elevation in the rocky soils of the Rockpile appellation, these vines planted in 2001. The wine is magnificently structured with complex, ripe blackberry and cherry compote coming to the fore slowly and seductively.

title: Robert Biale 2012 Bedrock Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: A brand new vineyard designation for the winery, Bedrock dates to the ...
description: A brand new vineyard designation for the winery, Bedrock dates to the 1800s and is being made famous by proprietor Joel Peterson of Ravenswood and his son, Morgan Twain Peterson. This wine does the site justice, a smooth concoction of cherry pit and allspice, elegant and yet plenty generous in fruit and structure, measured by natural acidity.

title: Summerwood 2011 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: A smoky oak fire meets cooked meats and plum sauce on the ...
description: A smoky oak fire meets cooked meats and plum sauce on the nose of this wine, which retains great balance even at 16% alcohol. The mouthfeel is luxurious, complementing the cherry, red currant, licorice and black pepper flavors, wrapped around orange peel bitterness and well-integrated oak.

title: Dry Creek Vineyard 2012 Old Vine Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Zesty in black pepper and luscious in blackberry, blueberry and raspberry, the ...
description: Zesty in black pepper and luscious in blackberry, blueberry and raspberry, the grapes are from 90-plus-year-old hillside vines. Complex and structured, it offers a balanced point of view and plenty of intrigue, simultaneously fresh and brooding.

title: Quivira 2012 Flight Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: The grapes are Demeter-certified Biodynamic in this 100% Zin, grown on a ...
description: The grapes are Demeter-certified Biodynamic in this 100% Zin, grown on a ridge-top vineyard overlooking the Dry Creek Valley. A fully realized, satisfying wine, it offers cherry vanilla, tar and toasty bacon among warm tones of complementary spicy cinnamon.

title: Robert Biale 2012 Founding Farmers Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Made from a mix of vineyards across the Napa Valley, this pays ...
description: Made from a mix of vineyards across the Napa Valley, this pays tribute to the early days of grape growing in the region and is a wine equally worthy of recognition. Exhibiting dark cherry stone and wild strawberry aromas, the palate is complex, tannic and round, a subtle suggestion of smoke on the finish balanced by bright acidity.

title: Portalupi 2012 Old Vine Dolinsek Ranch Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Lush in brambly blackberry, this classic Zinfandel comes from a cooler area ...
description: Lush in brambly blackberry, this classic Zinfandel comes from a cooler area than usual, the Russian River Valley, which manages to retain small plantings of the variety amid the larger seas of Pinot Noir and Chardonnay. Spicy, the wine is balanced and fairly elegant, medium in body and weight while still packing a punch.

title: Bartholomew Park 2011 Estate Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Made from head-trained vines planted where California winemaking pioneer Agoston Haraszthy first ...
description: Made from head-trained vines planted where California winemaking pioneer Agoston Haraszthy first grew the variety 150 years ago, this lush wine offers intense aromatics of tar, brick and smoke, with briary blackberry secondary on the nose. The finish is topped by flavors of cocoa and a sprinkling of black pepper.

title: Dry Creek Vineyard 2012 Heritage Vines Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: This approachable Zinfandel comes from a modern-day vineyard planted with cuttings from ...
description: This approachable Zinfandel comes from a modern-day vineyard planted with cuttings from pre-Prohibition-era vines and exhibits the complexity these heritage grapes can offer. Smoky and exuberant in cherry and blackberry fruit, the wine has soft tannins and a rounded feel to the palate, its long finish smooth and meaty.

title: Eight Sides 2012 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Cherry juice, wet clay, nutmeg and chamise make for an intriguing nose ...
description: Cherry juice, wet clay, nutmeg and chamise make for an intriguing nose on this well-priced Zinfandel. The easy-drinking palate leans toward fruit punch, making for good summer drinking at a barbecue or the beach.

title: Portalupi 2012 Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: A curious streak of sarsaparilla marks this wine aromatically, followed by sparse, ...
description: A curious streak of sarsaparilla marks this wine aromatically, followed by sparse, soft layers of black fruit and hidden black pepper.

title: Earthquake 2012 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This is Zinfandel at its richest. Boysenberry, vanilla and maple syrup aromas ...
description: This is Zinfandel at its richest. Boysenberry, vanilla and maple syrup aromas meet up with jammy fruit flavors that coat the mouth and linger on the finish. For all its fullness, it stays balanced and dry. It does not feel heavy in texture nor heavily oaked.

title: Sextant 2011 Wheelhouse Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Lush and tasty, this is strikingly affordable for the alluring layers of ...
description: Lush and tasty, this is strikingly affordable for the alluring layers of aromas and flavors present. It begins with cherry pie on the nose alongside black licorice, bay leaf, roasting meats and mushrooms, and continues on the palate with soft and jammy berries. Yet it has a serious side too, with flavors of menthol and stewed tomatoes delivering the umami factor.

title: Charles B. Mitchell 2012 Hawk Creek Zinfandel (Fair Play)
excerpt: Full of delicious dark-fruit flavors, this is smooth and deep, comforting but ...
description: Full of delicious dark-fruit flavors, this is smooth and deep, comforting but sophisticated. The fruit flavors are ripe and satisfying, the texture is velvety and broad, the body is full but not heavy.

title: Howell Mountain Vineyards 2011 Old Vine Zinfandel (Howell Mountain)
excerpt: Fruity and juicy in blackberry and black cherry, this mountain-grown Zin has ...
description: Fruity and juicy in blackberry and black cherry, this mountain-grown Zin has soft, integrated tannins and a backbone of spiciness, white pepper mostly, and dark black licorice, that winds its way through the finish.

title: Dashe Cellars 2011 Todd Brothers Ranch Old Vines Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: From 50-year-old vines planted on a rocky hillside, this is leathery and ...
description: From 50-year-old vines planted on a rocky hillside, this is leathery and zesty in cedar and black pepper. Balanced and structured it builds as it goes, finishing with a heavier presence of tannins and black olive.

title: Berryessa Gap 2011 California Series Zinfandel (Yolo County)
excerpt: Fresh, gushing fruit flavors such as raspberry, red cherry and boysenberry fill ...
description: Fresh, gushing fruit flavors such as raspberry, red cherry and boysenberry fill out this expressive and well-balanced wine. It is sweetly fruity in aroma, full-flavored, full-bodied, firm and dry in texture but not heavy. It craves ribs or wood-fired pizza.

title: Perry Creek 2010 Altitude 2401 Reserve Fair Play Farms Zinfandel (El Dorado)
excerpt: Tasty and traditional, it has that brambly aroma and raspberry flavor profile ...
description: Tasty and traditional, it has that brambly aroma and raspberry flavor profile typical of Foothills Zin, making it appetizing and delicious. It tastes full-bodied, firm with tannins but not rough, well-balanced and mouthwatering.

title: La Chertosa 2012 Reserve Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: From Sam Sebastiani comes a satisfying and rich Zinfandel that smells like ...
description: From Sam Sebastiani comes a satisfying and rich Zinfandel that smells like chocolate, nutmeg, grilled bread and blackberries. It tastes full and fruity, is smooth textured and not very tannic. The spicy oak influence complements the  grape flavors and makes a complete package.

title: Longevity 2011 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This tastes like a cool-climate Zin because of the deep plum and ...
description: This tastes like a cool-climate Zin because of the deep plum and black cherry flavors and light earthy, herbal accents, with touches of cedar and toast in the bouquet. It has moderate tannins and medium-to-full body.

title: Muscardini 2011 Monte Rosso Vineyards Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Sanguine and leathery, this is a full-bodied Zin from a sought-after, historic ...
description: Sanguine and leathery, this is a full-bodied Zin from a sought-after, historic vineyard high atop Sonoma Valley. Juicy in brambly blackberry and tar, it offers coffee and chocolate on the finish, both dark roasted.

title: Ancient Oak Cellars 2011 Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This offers a pleasing intermix of fruit and spice, from blackberry and ...
description: This offers a pleasing intermix of fruit and spice, from blackberry and plum to Cab-like cassis. Juicy, mouthfilling and structured, it has a finish all about cinnamon and peppercorns.

title: Sol Rouge 2011 Estate Zinfandel (Red Hills Lake County)
excerpt: Mostly rich and broad in mouthfeel, this offers light, savory aromas of ...
description: Mostly rich and broad in mouthfeel, this offers light, savory aromas of dried herb and sunbaked earth plus solid plum and red berry flavors. It features a full body, firm texture and flavor complexity.

title: St. Francis 2011 Tres Viejos Old Vine Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: A blockbuster style of Zin from three vineyard sites, all relatively old ...
description: A blockbuster style of Zin from three vineyard sites, all relatively old vine, this is zesty on the palate, a mix of berry compote and cinnamon and black pepper spice. Not too dense, it is hearty and big-shouldered.

title: Oak Grove 2012 Family Reserve Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Here is a tasty, light-bodied Zin with its own style and a ...
description: Here is a tasty, light-bodied Zin with its own style and a great price. It has a minty, eucalyptus aroma and vivid raspberry flavors, almost sweet in balance. Medium-bodied, it delivers a lingering fruity finish.

title: Taj 2009 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Having spent considerable time in bottle, this 2009 Zin is midweight and ...
description: Having spent considerable time in bottle, this 2009 Zin is midweight and full of sweet plum, raspberry and strawberry tones, accented by a smoky finish.

title: Noceto 2010 OGP Original Grandpere Vineyard Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: This full-bodied and apparently sweet Zinfandel drinks more like a Port than ...
description: This full-bodied and apparently sweet Zinfandel drinks more like a Port than a dry wine. It smells like boysenberry syrup on waffles, has a juicy, soft texture, and raisin and prune flavors.

title: Maley Brothers Vineyards 2012 Lodi Native Wegat Vineyards Zinfandel (Mokelumne River)
excerpt: One of six Lodi Native wines from 2012, this Zin is very ...
description: One of six Lodi Native wines from 2012, this Zin is very dark and deep in color and has attractively smoky, spicy aromas. It packs in tremendously rich fruit flavors, full body and a generous, broad texture.  Concentrated boysenberry, blueberry and blackberry essences seem bursting to get out as you sip. Delicious but not over the top.

title: Macchia 2012 Lodi Native Noma Ranch Zinfandel (Mokelumne River)
excerpt: Very full-bodied it carries a gorgeous ripe blackberry character from the first ...
description: Very full-bodied it carries a gorgeous ripe blackberry character from the first whiff to the long, lingering finish. Deep, dark ruby in color, it discloses aromas of berries with hints of cedar. The pure fruit essence in the flavor makes it delicious, compelling and memorable.

title: Perry Creek 2011 Zinman Zinfandel (El Dorado)
excerpt: It captures the Sierra Foothills balance of power and seems to have ...
description: It captures the Sierra Foothills balance of power and seems to have everything in the right proportions, including the price. Deep, nearly opaque garnet in color, it offers cedar and clove aromas that lead to rich fruit flavors like blackberry and boysenberry, firm tannins and full body.

title: Lange Twins 2010 Centennial Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Lots of fruit character, tannin and oak sensations all blend together in ...
description: Lots of fruit character, tannin and oak sensations all blend together in this layered, balanced and yet full-bodied wine. It smells like dark cherries and cinnamon, while flavors suggest ripe raspberries with a dash of maple syrup. Very rich and velvety in texture, it has ample tannin and a lingering finish.

title: Sobon Estate 2012 Lubenko Zinfandel (Fiddletown)
excerpt: This full-bodied but nicely balanced and dry Zin has cedar and nutmeg ...
description: This full-bodied but nicely balanced and dry Zin has cedar and nutmeg aromas that waft over earthy, wild blackberry and cedar flavors. The texture is smooth and slightly tannic, and the finish lingers.

title: Charles B. Mitchell 2012 Indian Hills Vineyard Zinfandel (Fair Play)
excerpt: An attractive, dry, lighter style of Zinfandel, it has fresh raspberry aromas ...
description: An attractive, dry, lighter style of Zinfandel, it has fresh raspberry aromas and a rich enough texture to make it appetizing. Medium-bodied, it offers lively fruit flavors that linger on the finish.

title: M2 2012 Lodi Native Soucie Vineyard Zinfandel (Mokelumne River)
excerpt: This wine is smooth and complete, from the jammy fruit aromas to ...
description: This wine is smooth and complete, from the jammy fruit aromas to the slightly oak-accented flavors to the lingering, seemingly sweet finish. This limited bottling fermented with native yeast picks up attractive toast, vanilla and nutmeg flavors that enhance the ripe, pure raspberry and blackberry notes that fill out the full body.

title: Castle Rock 2012 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: The somewhat light red-purple color does not mean that this medium-bodied wine ...
description: The somewhat light red-purple color does not mean that this medium-bodied wine lacks flavor. Toasty, smoky, caramel aromas from oak carry over to the bold and almost sweet flavors, powering over moderate raspberry and plum undertones.

title: Winery by the Creek 2012 Lyman Vineyard Reserve Zinfandel (Fiddletown)
excerpt: Well-balanced, this medium- to full-bodied Zin offers spice and berry aromas and ...
description: Well-balanced, this medium- to full-bodied Zin offers spice and berry aromas and plummy flavors. The noticeable, firm tannins are a good thing in Zinfandel, which can sometimes be too soft.

title: Sobon Estate 2012 Rezerve Primitivo (Amador County)
excerpt: A sense of sweetness from oak smooths out this medium- to full-bodied ...
description: A sense of sweetness from oak smooths out this medium- to full-bodied wine and complements the moderate tannins and smooth texture. A pleasant plummy thread winds through the aromas and flavors, lingering on the finish.

title: Proulx 2011 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Elegant on the nose, it offers aromas settling between violet, white pepper ...
description: Elegant on the nose, it offers aromas settling between violet, white pepper and chai tea. The 5% Petite Sirah adds a nice touch of viscosity to the palate. The flavors range from cinnamon to licorice with nice bitterness and acidity, making the fruits of plum and prune almost an afterthought.

title: Ironstone 2010 Old Vine Reserve Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: The wildness and heat of Zinfandel are restrained to good effect in ...
description: The wildness and heat of Zinfandel are restrained to good effect in this elegant, supple but concentrated version. Aromas and flavors of raspberry and black cherry lead to cinnamon and clove on the tasty finish, which lasts a long time. Should pair well with most meats and with tomato-based sauces.

title: Renwood 2011 Premier Old Vine Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: A ripe and tasty style of Zinfandel from a grand old name ...
description: A ripe and tasty style of Zinfandel from a grand old name in the Sierra Foothills. The maple and brown sugar tones from new oak integrate well with ripe but not overripe fruit flavors. Touches of clove and black pepper come out as you sip, adding welcome nuances.

title: Zinhead 2011 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: At first, all you sense is a heavy, operatic costume of chocolaty, ...
description: At first, all you sense is a heavy, operatic costume of chocolaty, smoky, coffee-like oak flavors. Underneath these, a ripe and slightly sweet boysenberry soul keeps the drama going. Like a sturdy stage set, the richly laced tannins support the fruit and oak until the curtain falls.

title: Navarro 2011 Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: Very fruity and nearly dry, this full-bodied red wine expresses pure Zinfandel ...
description: Very fruity and nearly dry, this full-bodied red wine expresses pure Zinfandel character in a memorable way without intrusive oak. An aroma of just-crushed grapes leads to a fresh raspberry-like flavor that is just wild enough to transcend the ordinary and just tannic enough to clean your taste buds and bring you back for more sips.

title: Ironstone 2012 Old Vines Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Lots of fun to sip this showy, overt, no-holds-barred Zin. Lavish use ...
description: Lots of fun to sip this showy, overt, no-holds-barred Zin. Lavish use of new oak gives aromas of toasted bread, maple syrup and smoked bacon. The flavors say ripe strawberries and sweet blackberry jam, and the finish is sweet and spicy at the same time.

title: Harney Lane 2011 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Imagine coffee ice cream drizzled with boysenberry syrup and you get the ...
description: Imagine coffee ice cream drizzled with boysenberry syrup and you get the gist of the flavors of this full-bodied, rather sweet Zinfandel. Aromas of toasted oak barrels and fresh roasted coffee beans leap out of the glass as you sniff, then rich cherry and boysenberry flavors coat your tongue.  The alcohol is noticeable, but it carries so much flavor along with it that it comes off as decently balanced.

title: Helwig 2011 Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Tasty from start to finish, this medium- to full-bodied Zinfandel offers a ...
description: Tasty from start to finish, this medium- to full-bodied Zinfandel offers a velvety texture, finely integrated tannins that give grip but not bitterness, and ripe cherry and strawberry flavors. A moderate dose of maple and cinnamon flavor come from aging with oak.

title: Girasole 2010 Made With Organic Grapes Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: This medium-bodied Zinfandel has a lighter color than many, but plenty of ...
description: This medium-bodied Zinfandel has a lighter color than many, but plenty of aroma and flavor. It smells like a wild blackberry patch in summer, tastes like strawberry jam and goes down smooth due to its light tannins and a touch of sweetness.

title: Mettler Family Vineyards 2011 Epicenter Old Vines Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Here is a generous, full-throttle, high-octane Zin, with lots of rich oak ...
description: Here is a generous, full-throttle, high-octane Zin, with lots of rich oak accents and a touch of sweetness. Aromas of strawberry jam, maple syrup and hickory-smoked bacon are followed by rich fruit flavors, full body, light tannins and a jammy finish.

title: Seven Deadly Zins 2011 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This all-out Zin makes no bones about its sweetness, heavy oak spiciness ...
description: This all-out Zin makes no bones about its sweetness, heavy oak spiciness and full body. Maple syrup, brown sugar and cherry jam are the dominant notes that crowd the aromas and flavors and linger on the finish. Very rich and full-bodied, it has prominent caramelized oak notes that keep the tannins from biting.

title: Armida 2012 Maple Vineyards Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Silky in black and red berry fruit, this young Zin from a ...
description: Silky in black and red berry fruit, this young Zin from a great, dry-farmed eastside Dry Creek vineyard offers notable acidity amidst a still-grippy mouthfeel. Layered, it would make a luxurious pairing for grilled ribs in an Asian-spiced glaze.

title: Campus Oaks 2011 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: It tastes lush, slightly sweet and full-on fruity, but has a lavish ...
description: It tastes lush, slightly sweet and full-on fruity, but has a lavish oak overlay. The aromas are sweet cherries and maple syrup, the fruit flavors come out as just-crushed grapes and cherries sprinkled with the brown sugar of new oak. Not heavy in texture and not as full-bodied as the flavors would make you think.

title: Wilson 2011 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Dark in color, this soft, leathery Zin offers tangents of blackberry, chocolate ...
description: Dark in color, this soft, leathery Zin offers tangents of blackberry, chocolate and espresso within a heavy-handed package of serious fruit and weight.

title: Matrix 2011 Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Looming in huge black fruit, this is a dark, heavy Zin intense ...
description: Looming in huge black fruit, this is a dark, heavy Zin intense in toasty oak and brambly, dusty amounts of ripe blackberry and strawberry jam. Dark chocolate hammers in hard on the finish, with black pepper and raisins.

title: Jacob Williams 2010 Gunkel Vineyard Reserve Zinfandel (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Rusticity goes a smidge too far here, without fruit that can handle ...
description: Rusticity goes a smidge too far here, without fruit that can handle the harsh tannins. It opens nicely, with pretty berry and cherry highlights, but in the mouth it gets chewy and finishes rough.

title: Pezzi King 2011 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Grippy, it has power and loads of chocolaty pepper, jammy blackberry and ...
description: Grippy, it has power and loads of chocolaty pepper, jammy blackberry and strawberry fruit, and a dull, toasty finish.

title: Mazzocco 2011 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: This intense, slightly sour Zinfandel combines herbal/menthol aromas with a taste of ...
description: This intense, slightly sour Zinfandel combines herbal/menthol aromas with a taste of vanilla-toasted marshmallow, the fruit jammy and minty.

title: Newsome-Harlow 2011 Big John Zinfandel (Calaveras County)
excerpt: With 4% Petite Sirah blended in, the Big John Zin is bright ...
description: With 4% Petite Sirah blended in, the Big John Zin is bright in dusty red fruit, briary and brambly, with a hint of spice and nutty almond. Focused and textured, the finish is fully satisfying, the spice piquing interest again.

title: Easton 2011 Old Vine Rinaldi Vineyard Zinfandel (Fiddletown)
excerpt: A beautiful bottling that will prosper with time, easily until 2024, this ...
description: A beautiful bottling that will prosper with time, easily until 2024, this grippy, earthy Zin offers soft plum and brambly blackberry amid a pretty, floral nose and plenty of peppery anise and earth. Aged in French oak from low-yielding vines originally planted in 1865, this is a premier example of Fiddletown Zin made with precision and care.

title: Easton 2011 E Zinfandel (Fiddletown)
excerpt: Another Fiddletown beauty, this one is pungent in blackberry and exhilarating pepper ...
description: Another Fiddletown beauty, this one is pungent in blackberry and exhilarating pepper and clove. Aromatic, structured and electric with equal parts acidity and stony minerality, this wine has a long-lingering finish of gorgeous brambly fruit.

title: Stellina 2011 Selvaggio Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Juicy in blueberry and explosive blackberry fruit, this offers the right succulent ...
description: Juicy in blueberry and explosive blackberry fruit, this offers the right succulent mix of dusty spice and well-mannered fruitiness. For pairings, aim for the usual barbecue but perhaps also a risotto or finely made pizza.

title: Artezin 2012 Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: Juicy and soft, this Zin is all about exuberant red fruit and ...
description: Juicy and soft, this Zin is all about exuberant red fruit and restrained tannins. Full-bodied it also offers elegance with complex highlights of leather, cedar and peppery spice. Enjoy with plenty of pizza and pasta on hand.

title: Harney Lane 2011 Lizzy James Vineyard Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This is a Captain America-sized Zin, muscular and strong in walls of ...
description: This is a Captain America-sized Zin, muscular and strong in walls of huge, dusty dark fruit. Firm in tannins, juicy and swirling in vanilla and cinnamon toast flavors, it spent 22 months swaddled in French oak, an imprint that lets itself be known in the wine. Lay this baby down until 2015 or so, or let it breathe before enjoying with racks of ribs.

title: Leoness 2011 Lopez Ranch Vineyard Selection Zinfandel (South Coast)
excerpt: Boysenberry, cherry and a touch of minerality take over the nose on ...
description: Boysenberry, cherry and a touch of minerality take over the nose on this wine from Mike Rennie and Gary Winder, who are pioneering grape growers of the Temecula Valley. Tar and tobacco pair up with bright acidity and smooth oakiness on the palate, making for easy drinking.

title: Brazin 2011 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Aromatically rich in red cherry and black currant fruit, this is a ...
description: Aromatically rich in red cherry and black currant fruit, this is a lean Zin despite its 15% alcohol. Tar, cedar and chocolate dominate the palate.

title: Sobon Estate 2010 ReZerve Zinfandel (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
excerpt: A Zin with notes of cedar, leather and sour red fruit, this ...
description: A Zin with notes of cedar, leather and sour red fruit, this offers tannic grip from start to finish. Slightly savory, it shows hints of toasty vanilla on the finish.

title: Moss Roxx 2011 Ancient Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This offers allspice aromas around a thin core of hard-to-decipher fruit and ...
description: This offers allspice aromas around a thin core of hard-to-decipher fruit and a finish that veers into burnt-rubber territory.

title: CK Mondavi 2013 Willow Springs White Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: A pop style of pink wine that the Peter Mondavi family makes ...
description: A pop style of pink wine that the Peter Mondavi family makes from Zinfandel with minor portions of Chenin Blanc and Muscat. It has a light coral color, mild fruit aromas and semisweet red Popsicle flavors.

title: St. Francis 2011 Old Vines Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: It shows the briary, brambly quality that marks so many Sonoma Zins, ...
description: It shows the briary, brambly quality that marks so many Sonoma Zins, especially old vine ones. Peppery flavors of dried currants, black licorice and blackberry jam are wrapped into firm, smooth tannins. What a great wine to drink with barbecue.

title: Forgeron 2011 Zinfandel (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The Zinfandel is sourced from Alder Ridge; the 22% Primitivo component from ...
description: The Zinfandel is sourced from Alder Ridge; the 22% Primitivo component from Stonetree. Fresh and lightly spicy, it features bright berry fruit with good focus and medium depth. Despite the relatively high alcohol, it seems sleek and moderate.

title: XYZin 2011 Reserve Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A fructose and oaky richness gives jamminess to the raspberries, cherries and ...
description: A fructose and oaky richness gives jamminess to the raspberries, cherries and cola. The Dry Creek Valley origin shows up in a certain elegance of structure, especially the acid-tannin balance. Drink now.

title: Barnard Griffin 2008 Hells Gate Canyon Vineyard Zinfandel (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Single vineyard Zinfandel from a young vineyard on the Columbia River, this ...
description: Single vineyard Zinfandel from a young vineyard on the Columbia River, this is pretty rather than powerful, smooth and chocolaty, with bright, tight raspberry fruit.

title: Von Strasser 2011 Zinfandel (Diamond Mountain District)
excerpt: An amazing Zin that dazzles for the sheer wealth and depth of ...
description: An amazing Zin that dazzles for the sheer wealth and depth of fruits and spices. Intensely concentrated black currants, cured tobacco, grilled bacon, black pepper and mu shu plum sauce flavors flood the mouth, leading to a long, distinguished finish. The alcohol is refreshingly modest, lending the wine a delicacy rare in California Zinfandel. It will age until at least 2024 but is fine to drink right away.

title: Greenwood Ridge 2012 Scherrer Vineyards Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Restrained and tannic, this Zin needs time to resolve and mellow its ...
description: Restrained and tannic, this Zin needs time to resolve and mellow its fine layers of blackberry and tar. Complex and structured, from 95-year-old vines, it should do that with aplomb, the wine more savory than sweet, a refreshing alternative to super-sized Zins.

title: Macchia 2012 Mischievous Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Velvety smooth and structured, with layers of blackberry and raspberry fruit, this ...
description: Velvety smooth and structured, with layers of blackberry and raspberry fruit, this Zin is made from old Lodi vines and encased in a coating of soft vanilla oak, its voluptuousness tempered by spice.

title: Lava Cap 2010 Rocky Draw Zinfandel (El Dorado)
excerpt: Dull and dusty on the nose, this burly Zin opens up in ...
description: Dull and dusty on the nose, this burly Zin opens up in the glass, offering a slight sweetness of blackberry and vanilla amid its soft texture and structure.

title: Longevity 2010 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This Livermore Valley producer travels to Lodi to make this Zin, a ...
description: This Livermore Valley producer travels to Lodi to make this Zin, a smattering of 4% Petite Sirah blended in. Intense in cherry-watermelon candy aromas, its flavors develop into tart cherry, blueberry and spice. With soft tannins this wine is straightforward, with the finish all about dusty cigars.

title: Zin-Phomaniac 2012 Old Vines Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Beneath the come-hither packaging and name, this Zin offers velvety tannins and ...
description: Beneath the come-hither packaging and name, this Zin offers velvety tannins and smoky fruit and spice, finishing with a powerful hit of alcohol and leathery cedar.

title: Bonterra 2011 Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: This Zin contains percentages of Petite Sirah, Sangiovese and Grenache, offering powerfully ...
description: This Zin contains percentages of Petite Sirah, Sangiovese and Grenache, offering powerfully dusty tannins and layers of blackberry. Chewy, the finish is all leathery saddle.

title: Hanna 2012 Bismark Mountain Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Extraordinarily high alcohol is the defining reality of this wine. It gives ...
description: Extraordinarily high alcohol is the defining reality of this wine. It gives it a burn in the mouth, like cognac, only without the richness. The currant and spice flavors are nicely dry, but that high alcohol accentuates the tannins.

title: Assembly 2012 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Plush and perfumed in smoky leather, this Zin offers more savory flavors ...
description: Plush and perfumed in smoky leather, this Zin offers more savory flavors and aromas than sweet. A bit of cedar with just the suggestion of crushed blackberry plays most prominently. Given the robust nature of the wine, the finish is surprisingly quick.

title: DeRose 2010 Cedolino Vineyard Dryfarmed Old Vine Zinfandel (Cienega Valley)
excerpt: Along with ultra-ripe blackberry jam, brown sugar, and toasty wood flavors, it ...
description: Along with ultra-ripe blackberry jam, brown sugar, and toasty wood flavors, it has high, glyceriny alcohol. Big and thick in tannins, it will pair well with richly sauced barbecue.

title: Jason-Stephens 2009 Estate Zinfandel (Santa Clara Valley)
excerpt: Earthy and dusty, this 16.2% Zin tastes every bit of that heat, ...
description: Earthy and dusty, this 16.2% Zin tastes every bit of that heat, marked by a vanilla-cola sweetness and ripe blackberry jam.

title: Mad Duck 2011 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This wine offers rich red fruit, oak and smoke around a soft ...
description: This wine offers rich red fruit, oak and smoke around a soft texture and fading finish. A pronounced sweetness hits mid-palate after the smoky oak that makes it seem higher in alcohol than is stated.

title: Rock Lobster 2011 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Planky and a bit tart, this Zin hails from 45-year-old vines and ...
description: Planky and a bit tart, this Zin hails from 45-year-old vines and is soft and suggestively herbal.

title: Peltier Station 2010 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This Zin tastes of smoke, oak and grilled meats, but has an ...
description: This Zin tastes of smoke, oak and grilled meats, but has an odd acidity to it. It would be good paired with something off the barbecue.

title: Cedar Mountain 2009 Zealous Girls Two Girl Zin Zinfandel (San Francisco Bay)
excerpt: Brownish in color and texturally soft, this Zin starts with a thread ...
description: Brownish in color and texturally soft, this Zin starts with a thread of plum that slowly devolves to prune and perhaps spent too long in the bottle.

title: Masterpiece 2012 Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: With sugary blackberry and prune flavors, this tannic Zinfandel is pretty simple. ...
description: With sugary blackberry and prune flavors, this tannic Zinfandel is pretty simple. It will pair well with burgers, tacos and barbecue.

title: Castle Rock 2011 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This wine opens with a stemmy aromas and remains basic in the ...
description: This wine opens with a stemmy aromas and remains basic in the glass, with a sweet ending.

title: Sequum 2011 Kidd Ranch Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: The vineyard is on the St. Helena floor, a warm area that ...
description: The vineyard is on the St. Helena floor, a warm area that helped the grapes ripen even in this cold vintage. The wine itself is dry, full-bodied, tannic and exceptionally pure in black currants, black licorice and black pepper, with great acidity and a lingering finish.

title: Krutz 2012 Magnolia Series Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This terrific Zin brings classic varietal character to the table, with a ...
description: This terrific Zin brings classic varietal character to the table, with a full body, robust alcohol, dryness and intensely concentrated flavors of blackberry, black currant, dark chocolate, Chinese plum sauce and black pepper. Showing a mastery of the art of blending, its grapes come from north to south in the valley, Calistoga to Atlas Peak and multiple appellations in between. This is one of the greatest Zinfandel values in recent memory.

title: Angel Vine 2011 Alder Ridge Vineyard Zinfandel (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: As the vines grow older, the Alder Ridge Zins gain complexity and ...
description: As the vines grow older, the Alder Ridge Zins gain complexity and gravitas with each new vintage. Tart and brambly, this is a berry-fest, with racy flavors of cranberry, strawberry, raspberry and hints of baking spice. The acidity and overall balance suggest that this can prosper through 2020.

title: Stella Monsi 2009 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Robust, tannic, spicy, the wine is also rich in wild berry, raisin ...
description: Robust, tannic, spicy, the wine is also rich in wild berry, raisin and prune fruit. In other words, a rustic Zin to drink with barbecue. The official alcohol is 14.5% by volume, but it tastes hotter than that.

title: Dunning Vineyards 2011 Private Reserve Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: High alcohol, to the tune of 15.5% by volume, is the defining ...
description: High alcohol, to the tune of 15.5% by volume, is the defining element of this Zin. It gives heat and the sweet, glyceriney finish of a minor Port. The flavors are also too ripe for comfort, with raisins, prunes and brown sugar.

title: Minassian-Young 2011 Estate Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: This wine smells and tastes overripe and oaky. It starts out with ...
description: This wine smells and tastes overripe and oaky. It starts out with the aroma of raisins, and then tastes like caramel, chocolate and blackberry jam. The finish is hot and porty. Still, it does define this big, baked style of Zinfandel.

title: Bogle 2011 Old Vine Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Your basic everyday Zinfandel, with candied raspberry and cherry fruit, toast and ...
description: Your basic everyday Zinfandel, with candied raspberry and cherry fruit, toast and pepper flavors, as well as a streak of green unripeness.

title: Hartford Court 2011 Old Vine Highwire Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: They say the vineyard is over 100 years old. It shows intensely ...
description: They say the vineyard is over 100 years old. It shows intensely concentrated flavors of wild raspberries, with vanilla, white pepper, sandalwood and exotic baking spice notes. A hint of blueberry marks the finish. Drink this heady, delicious Zin now and until 2019.

title: J. Scott Cellars 2012 Zinfandel (Columbia Valley (OR))
excerpt: This excellent, fruity young red is smooth and ripe, with brambly flavors ...
description: This excellent, fruity young red is smooth and ripe, with brambly flavors of red currant and cherry. There are no obvious signs of new oak, just pure, delicious fruit and focused, proportionate tannins.

title: Fogline Vineyards 2011 Grist Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: What a beautiful Zinfandel this is. It has punchy, ripe raspberry and ...
description: What a beautiful Zinfandel this is. It has punchy, ripe raspberry and black cherry, red currant, red licorice, white pepper and vanilla oak flavors that are dry, smoothly tannic and brisk in acidity. Despite the brown sugar richness the finish is totally dry. Great with barbecue.

title: Neal Family 2011 Rutherford Dust Vineyards Zinfandel (Rutherford)
excerpt: A drop of Petite Sirah gives this wine a color and tannin ...
description: A drop of Petite Sirah gives this wine a color and tannin boost. The flavors are enormously ripe, brimming with blackberries, cassis, grilled beef and oak notes that go on into a long, spicy finish. The wine shows the classy structure of Napa Zin, and is ready to drink now.

title: Witching Stick 2010 Fashauer Vineyard Zinfandel (Anderson Valley)
excerpt: This relatively low-alcohol Zinfandel offers dusty blue fruit and piles of earthiness ...
description: This relatively low-alcohol Zinfandel offers dusty blue fruit and piles of earthiness around a core of juicy texture. Straightforward on the finish, with a hit of herb and fresh farm.

title: De Loach 2011 Riebli Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: The grapes are from an old vineyard on the warmer eastern side ...
description: The grapes are from an old vineyard on the warmer eastern side of Russian River Valley, in the Mayacamas foothills. The wine is exceptionally ripe, with blackberries veering into prunes and raisins. The tannins are wonderfully smooth and complex. Drink it now with barbecue.

title: Tin Barn 2011 Los Chamizal Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Between the caramelized new oak and the glycerine from high alcohol, this ...
description: Between the caramelized new oak and the glycerine from high alcohol, this Zin tastes distinctly sweet, an impression furthered by the ripe raspberry and mulberry fruit flavors. It needs proteinaceous foods, such as charred, oily meats and cheeses, to balance it.

title: Plan B 2011 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: High alcohol gives this Zin a distinct heat, with flavors of black ...
description: High alcohol gives this Zin a distinct heat, with flavors of black pepper and blackberries so ripe, they veer into prunes. Richly sauced barbecue dishes will rise to the occasion.

title: Bella Piazza 2010 Rio Volpe Vineyard Old Vine Zinfandel (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
excerpt: Dusty in cocoa powder and leather, this is a dusty mountain of ...
description: Dusty in cocoa powder and leather, this is a dusty mountain of a Zin, from old Foothills vines. Soft and racy, enjoy with pizza or creamy lasagna.

title: Peachy Canyon 2011 Snow Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: High alcohol gives this Zin a glyceriney sweetness, and the raspberry, cherry ...
description: High alcohol gives this Zin a glyceriney sweetness, and the raspberry, cherry and blackberry flavors veer into overripe raisins and prunes. A rustic wine, it will stand up to barbecue. Drink it now.

title: Seven Deadly Zins 2011 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Rich in leather and oak, with swirls of ripe red raspberry and ...
description: Rich in leather and oak, with swirls of ripe red raspberry and blackberry cobbler, this is a big-boy Zinfandel with hair on its chest, a taste of vanilla on the finish.

title: V. Sattui 2011 Crow Ridge Vineyard Old Vine Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Some unripe flavors suggest green mint and asparagus. They limit the score, ...
description: Some unripe flavors suggest green mint and asparagus. They limit the score, despite some good blackberry tea, currant and white-pepper flavors. Drink up.

title: Alexander Valley Vineyards 2011 Sin Zin Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: This simple wine gets the basic Zin concept across, offering briary cherry, ...
description: This simple wine gets the basic Zin concept across, offering briary cherry, red currant, spice and oak flavors. It offers good value in a dry, medium-bodied wine that will drink well with a vast array of food.

title: Thacher 2011 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: With soft acidity, gentle tannins and candied raspberry fruit, this is an ...
description: With soft acidity, gentle tannins and candied raspberry fruit, this is an easy-drinking Zinfandel. The alcohol is high, giving it a glyceriney sweetness.

title: Zinsane 2012 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Thin and smoky, this Zin has a pronounced barrel presence amid layers ...
description: Thin and smoky, this Zin has a pronounced barrel presence amid layers of black licorice, leather and blackberry.

title: Villa Toscano 2010 Old Vine Zinfandel (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
excerpt: Restrained in aromatics, this is a ripe, round and soft ZIn with ...
description: Restrained in aromatics, this is a ripe, round and soft ZIn with a Port-like personality, streaks of cedar through the mid-palate and a touch of heat on the finish.

title: Milliaire 2010 Ghirardelli Heritage Old Vine Zinfandel (Calaveras County)
excerpt: This old-vine Zin has washed-out aromas and a savory, leathery character, tannic ...
description: This old-vine Zin has washed-out aromas and a savory, leathery character, tannic grip and a hit of smoke on the finish.

title: Milliaire 2010 Old Vine Zinfandel (Calaveras County)
excerpt: The aromatics are faint on this wine, and the taste puckeringly tannic ...
description: The aromatics are faint on this wine, and the taste puckeringly tannic and raisiny with a strong taste of toffee on the finish.

title: Predator 2012 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: A curious combination of smoky and herbaceous, Predator is from old vines ...
description: A curious combination of smoky and herbaceous, Predator is from old vines but tastes slightly thin and nondescript.

title: McManis 2012 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: With a touch of red currant and cedar, this straightforward, inexpensive Zin ...
description: With a touch of red currant and cedar, this straightforward, inexpensive Zin otherwise offers smoke, especially on the finish.

title: Peju 2011 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This Zin is luxurious in texture, with rich, intricate tannins and balance. ...
description: This Zin is luxurious in texture, with rich, intricate tannins and balance. The flavors suggest black and red currants, red plums, Dr. Pepper cola and exotic spices. Great with highly spiced beef, chicken and game dishes.

title: Elyse 2009 Morisoli Vineyard Zinfandel (Rutherford)
excerpt: Decant this Zin for an hour or so to bring out its ...
description: Decant this Zin for an hour or so to bring out its robust and spicy nature. The palate is complex with flavors of wild, briary summer blackberries, plums, cola, dark chocolate, black pepper and oak. Great with beef and tomato dishes.

title: Wind Rose 2011 StoneTree Vineyard Primitivo (Wahluke Slope)
excerpt: Blended with 10% Barbera and aged in a mixture of French and ...
description: Blended with 10% Barbera and aged in a mixture of French and American oak (45% new), it brings notes of garden herbs, vanilla, jammy red fruit and chocolate. The feel is pillowy soft with tart, cranberry-like acidity brightening it up.

title: Hullabaloo 2012 Old Vines Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This wine plays tricks on the palate, tasting much lighter in body ...
description: This wine plays tricks on the palate, tasting much lighter in body than its alcohol suggests. Layered with red fruit along with a lift of herb, it is structured and composed, with a long, lingering finish. This is a good one to stock up on if you love big Zin with a smaller footprint.

title: Edmeades 2011 Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: A dusty, brambly Zinfandel nuanced in blueberries and plums, this is smooth ...
description: A dusty, brambly Zinfandel nuanced in blueberries and plums, this is smooth and soft on the palate with an earthy quality throughout. On the finish this medium-bodied wine offers leathery tobacco and smoke.

title: Ascension Cellars 2012 Frankel Vineyard Rapture Primitivo (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Exceptionally ripe with fruit, this wine is super sweet with cherry jam, ...
description: Exceptionally ripe with fruit, this wine is super sweet with cherry jam, red currant, vanilla fudge, caramel and smoky, buttery toast flavors. A brisk hit of acidity adds balance. The alcohol is high, but the heat is in keeping with the overall structure.

title: Hendry 2011 Blocks 7 & 22 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: High alcohol gives this wine peppery heat and a mouthwatering savoriness. The ...
description: High alcohol gives this wine peppery heat and a mouthwatering savoriness. The flavors, though, are all Zinfandel, suggesting ripe wild blackberries, currants and dark chocolate. It will pair well with smoky, sweetly-sauced barbecued ribs and chicken.

title: Pedroncelli 2011 Bushnell Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A textbook example of a super-ripe Dry Creek Valley Zin, this has ...
description: A textbook example of a super-ripe Dry Creek Valley Zin, this has flavors of wild blackberries, cherries and prunes, sprinkled with black pepper and cinnamon. The tannins are thick, and the alcohol is high, giving the wine a glycerine, Port-like finish.

title: Sobon Estate 2011 Rocky Top Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: The Rocky Top Zin has a backbone of cinnamon and ripe plum ...
description: The Rocky Top Zin has a backbone of cinnamon and ripe plum amidst puckering tannins and a hint of barnyard.

title: Black Sheep 2010 Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: This dusty Zinfandel has ripe tannins and ripe fruit, along with a ...
description: This dusty Zinfandel has ripe tannins and ripe fruit, along with a puckering sourness on the finish.

title: Lapis Luna 2012 Romanza Moon Shoup Vineyard Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: While juicy and ripe with red fruit, this Zin lays a little ...
description: While juicy and ripe with red fruit, this Zin lays a little flat on the palate. A handful of Sangiovese is blended in.

title: Renwood 2010 Merida Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Brick red in color, this wine is pungent with scents of blackberry, ...
description: Brick red in color, this wine is pungent with scents of blackberry, blueberry and leather. The palate is thick and concentrated with a Port-like finish. Layers of acidity streak through the midpalate, adding balance and making the wine quite enjoyable with food.

title: Fiddletown Cellars 2011 Jack Rabbit Flat Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: A medley of black fruit and black tea dominate here, with dusty ...
description: A medley of black fruit and black tea dominate here, with dusty tannins and smooth, concentrated red currants playing second bench. This 100% Zin is marked by its high acidity and a purity of fruit from stainless steel fermentation. Enjoy it on pizza or pasta night.

title: Lamborn Family Vineyards 2011 The Pupil Zinfandel (Howell Mountain)
excerpt: Lamborn has a knack for Zinfandel grown on Howell Mountain. The 2011 ...
description: Lamborn has a knack for Zinfandel grown on Howell Mountain. The 2011 is dry, tannic and high in alcohol, but also concentrated with flavors of currants, blackstrap molasses, licorice and cedar. It could benefit from some time in the bottle so hold until 2016.

title: Ballentine 2011 Pocai Vineyard Old Vine Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Exceptionally high alcohol gives this Zin a Port-like heat. Yet it shows ...
description: Exceptionally high alcohol gives this Zin a Port-like heat. Yet it shows classic varietal flavors of wild cherries and blackberries, cola and spice. With firm tannins and a dry finish, it would pair well with barbecue.

title: Ridge 2011 Pagani Ranch Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Soft, sweet and high in alcohol, this Zin-based blend contains proportions of ...
description: Soft, sweet and high in alcohol, this Zin-based blend contains proportions of Alicante Bouschet, Petite Sirah and Mataro. The flavors are complex with berries, cherries, mocha and cola, along with some raisiny notes. Drink up.

title: Fenestra 2010 Zinfandel (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: Spicy with cola and black tea, this Livermore Zin has an earthy ...
description: Spicy with cola and black tea, this Livermore Zin has an earthy touch amid its ripe raspberry and oak. It would pair well with the usual suspects of barbecue and other grilled meats.

title: Mellowood 2009 Zinfandel (Fair Play)
excerpt: Spicy with leather undertones, this softly textured wine is dusty on the ...
description: Spicy with leather undertones, this softly textured wine is dusty on the palate and laced with red fruit.

title: The Mission 2012 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: This is a good Zinfandel with robust flavors of wild raspberry, pomegranate ...
description: This is a good Zinfandel with robust flavors of wild raspberry, pomegranate and persimmon, along with a hint of oak. The tannins are smooth and fine.

title: Frank Family 2011 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is a good Zin, with raspberry, red currant and licorice flavors. ...
description: This is a good Zin, with raspberry, red currant and licorice flavors. Minty green notes alongside bright fruit lend a slightly unripe or uneven feel. Drink up.

title: Seghesio 2012 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: A soft, melted mouthfeel and sweet flavors of raspberries and brown sugar ...
description: A soft, melted mouthfeel and sweet flavors of raspberries and brown sugar mark this Zin. High alcohol gives it some heat, as well as a glycerine feel. The finish is dry.

title: Vinemark 2009 Primitivo (Paso Robles)
excerpt: This wine is medium bodied with spicy, brambly wild berry and tobacco ...
description: This wine is medium bodied with spicy, brambly wild berry and tobacco flavors, as well as heady alcohol. It shows some unbalanced green notes. Drink now.

title: Lone Madrone 2010 Bailey Ranch Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Overripe grapes show in the form of raisin and prune flavors with ...
description: Overripe grapes show in the form of raisin and prune flavors with a slightly bitter tinge. High alcohol lends unbalanced heat to this Zinfandel.

title: Gary Farrell 2011 Bradford Mountain Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: The winery brings precision control to Zinfandel, a wine that badly needs ...
description: The winery brings precision control to Zinfandel, a wine that badly needs some taming but in most cases is allowed to run wild. Here, it has an almost Cabernet-like clarity, with focused tannins and acids and a balance that makes it elegant. But the wild blackberry, blueberry and spice flavors, with a briary, brambly edge of pepper and green stems, are pure Zin.

title: Charter Oak 2010 Monte Rosso Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: High alcohol and exceptionally ripe fruit are the hallmarks of this mountain ...
description: High alcohol and exceptionally ripe fruit are the hallmarks of this mountain vineyard. In this Zinfandel, they express themselves as blackberries, cherries and mocha that have a roasted edge, and a Port-like heat that is by no means unpleasant. But you do want to drink this Zin with dishes rich in beef, cheese and olive oil.

title: Wilson 2011 Nolan Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Soft and blood-warming in high alcohol, this Zin has a particular lusciousness. ...
description: Soft and blood-warming in high alcohol, this Zin has a particular lusciousness. It offers raspberry, vanilla cream, roasted almond, cinnamon and honey granola bar flavors, yet finishes dry and clean.

title: Avenel 2010 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: This Zin has candied flavors of raspberries, cherries, mocha, roasted almonds and ...
description: This Zin has candied flavors of raspberries, cherries, mocha, roasted almonds and caramel, like a granola bar. The alcohol is fairly hefty, giving it Zinny headiness.

title: Peachy Canyon 2011 Old Bailey Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: High in alcohol and exceptionally ripe, in the Peachy Canyon style, with ...
description: High in alcohol and exceptionally ripe, in the Peachy Canyon style, with raisin, blackberry jam, pomegranate, crushed pepper and dark chocolate flavors. This porty Zin defines its triumphant style, in a flashy, impressive way.

title: Rosa d'Oro 2011 Estate Bottled Primitivo (Clear Lake)
excerpt: A zesty, warm dark plum Primitivo rich in leathery coffee and jam ...
description: A zesty, warm dark plum Primitivo rich in leathery coffee and jam and nestled in a wall of finely structured tannins. This is the kind of wine one can describe as having nice legs.

title: Brutocao 2010 Contento Vineyard Primitivo (Mendocino)
excerpt: This Primitivo opens with inviting peppery aromas, followed by bright fruit and ...
description: This Primitivo opens with inviting peppery aromas, followed by bright fruit and spice overtones, along with a nice bead of acidity throughout. A good pizza and lasagna wine.

title: Fiddletown Cellars 2011 Primitivo (Amador County)
excerpt: With a core of vanilla-black fruit, this is a soft and approachable ...
description: With a core of vanilla-black fruit, this is a soft and approachable Primitivo with drying tannins and a lengthy leathery finish.

title: Narrow Gate 2009 Estate Reserve Primitivo (El Dorado)
excerpt: A fragrantly floral Primitivo laced with pepper and a depth of wild ...
description: A fragrantly floral Primitivo laced with pepper and a depth of wild raspberry flavor, this is plenty structured and easy to like. Pair with standard Italian fare and most definitely, pizza.

title: Wattle Creek 2010 Primitivo (Yorkville Highlands)
excerpt: Juicy in blackberry and dark plum, this is a fruity Primitivo with ...
description: Juicy in blackberry and dark plum, this is a fruity Primitivo with a backbone of leather, coffee and spice. The finish veers into overripe flavors.

title: Keating 2011 Buchignani Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: The official alcohol is only 14.3% by volume, but the wine feels ...
description: The official alcohol is only 14.3% by volume, but the wine feels hot and tastes sweet in glycerine, which gives the raspberries and cherries a candied note. Barbecue, slathered with sauce, will easily tackle it.

title: Keating 2011 Montecillo Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: This is a sugary, candied Zinfandel, simply constructed and soft, with raspberry, ...
description: This is a sugary, candied Zinfandel, simply constructed and soft, with raspberry, brown sugar, cinnamon and sweet new oak flavors.

title: Roadhouse Winery 2011 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Like your Zins on the lush, ripe side? This one has sugary ...
description: Like your Zins on the lush, ripe side? This one has sugary flavors of raspberries, vanilla, cinnamon and toasted almonds, like a granola candy bar.

title: Thurston Wolfe 2010 Port Zinfandel (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This is a broad, leafy, late harvest Zinfandel, augmented with a splash ...
description: This is a broad, leafy, late harvest Zinfandel, augmented with a splash of brandy. Mellow cherry tobacco flavors saturate the palate, smooth and lingering, with a lick of vanilla and butterscotch as they weave through the finish.

title: Cline 2012 Ancient Vine Zinfandel (Contra Costa County)
excerpt: Perfumed in cinnamon-flowery aromatics, this well-valued Zin is softly spiced, lush and ...
description: Perfumed in cinnamon-flowery aromatics, this well-valued Zin is softly spiced, lush and smooth, drinkable with black cherry flavor and plenty of personality.

title: Brutocao 2010 Hopland Ranches Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: A mid-weight Zin, with a tannic backbone and a soft mouthfeel plus, ...
description: A mid-weight Zin, with a tannic backbone and a soft mouthfeel plus, rich and interesting blackberry and coffee. Encrust some ribs, chops or tenderloin in coffee grounds to pair with this wine for explosive results.

title: Maddalena 2011 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: A bit on the light-bodied side, but nice and dry, with plenty ...
description: A bit on the light-bodied side, but nice and dry, with plenty of personality. The flavors are of briary, brambly wild blackberries, raspberries and blueberries, dusted with black pepper and cinnamon.

title: Cline 2012 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Cline makes a lot of this wine and they do a good ...
description: Cline makes a lot of this wine and they do a good job with it. Soft and leathery in spicy baked plum and blackberry, this is a perfet wine to pair with a myriad of midweek meals and outdoor parties.

title: Bianchi 2010 Heritage Selection Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Shows classic Zinfandel flavors of exotic spices, ripe cherries and cola, red ...
description: Shows classic Zinfandel flavors of exotic spices, ripe cherries and cola, red currants and an umami touch of bacon. The alcohol tastes high, the acidity feels low, and the finish is a little sweet with flavors of white sugar.

title: Rail2Rail 2011 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: A Zin of high-toned red raspberry and blackberry fruit and dark plum ...
description: A Zin of high-toned red raspberry and blackberry fruit and dark plum that segues quickly into oaky toast tastes.

title: Courtney Benham 2011 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A lean Zin, with lots of minty acidity and not much fruit. ...
description: A lean Zin, with lots of minty acidity and not much fruit. There are traces of blackberries, bitter espresso and plums.

title: Midnight 2010 Estate Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Old-school Zinfandel, with enormously high alcohol. It tastes heavy in brown sugar, ...
description: Old-school Zinfandel, with enormously high alcohol. It tastes heavy in brown sugar, blackberries and blackstrap molasses.

title: McConnell Estates Winery 2008 Wackman Ranch Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: A mouthful of ripe, fruity jam and baking spice from a vineyard ...
description: A mouthful of ripe, fruity jam and baking spice from a vineyard also sourced by the producer for Cabernet Sauvignon.

title: Damas 2010 Zinfandel (Fiddletown)
excerpt: Inexpensive, this Zin is quite ripe and quite oaky, a big mouthful ...
description: Inexpensive, this Zin is quite ripe and quite oaky, a big mouthful of wine ready to enjoy now.

title: Tin Barn 2011 Gilsson Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: High alcohol gives this wine some porty heat, as well as glyceriney ...
description: High alcohol gives this wine some porty heat, as well as glyceriney sweetness. Combined with the superripe red currant, raisin and chocolate flavors, it makes this Zin taste almost like a dessert sipper.

title: Novy 2011 Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Jammy raspberry, currant and caramel flavors are countered with acidic sharpness and ...
description: Jammy raspberry, currant and caramel flavors are countered with acidic sharpness and high alcohol in this Zinfandel. It tastes a bit unbalanced, but a juicy cheeseburger will handle it well.

title: Pheasant Valley Winery 2010 Primitivo (Columbia Valley (OR))
excerpt: This rustic red has some high-toned berry and cherry fruit, cloaked in ...
description: This rustic red has some high-toned berry and cherry fruit, cloaked in dusty tannins and brown spices. It falls apart quickly, as if heading over the hill. Drink up.

title: Stephen & Walker 2011 Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: The chilly vintage in the cool Russian River Valley conspired to make ...
description: The chilly vintage in the cool Russian River Valley conspired to make this wine unripe. It has green mint and asparagus flavors, only partially relieved by some blackberry Lifesaver candy fruit.

title: Cellars 33 2010 Buck Hill Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Overripe, with raisin and prune flavors that finish sweet, hot and bitter ...
description: Overripe, with raisin and prune flavors that finish sweet, hot and bitter in tannins.

title: Sobon Estate 2010 Lubenko Vineyard Zinfandel (Fiddletown)
excerpt: Opening with aromas of baked blackberry compote, this Fiddletown Zin is thick ...
description: Opening with aromas of baked blackberry compote, this Fiddletown Zin is thick in tannin and savory leather, oak and smoke, but delivers fully on its Zinfully hedonistic promise. On the finish, a bite of licorice.

title: B.R. Cohn 2010 Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Classic Sonoma Valley Zin, rich and ripe in berries, currants and raisins, ...
description: Classic Sonoma Valley Zin, rich and ripe in berries, currants and raisins, warming in alcohol, and with savory spices. The finish is nice and dry. A great, upscale partner for barbecue.

title: Paul Dolan 2010 Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: Paul Dolan Zin remains big with savory flavors beef jerky, roast meat ...
description: Paul Dolan Zin remains big with savory flavors beef jerky, roast meat and black pepper. Not overdone in alcohol or tannin, its a perfect go-to for nights around the grill and will please a crowd.

title: Collier Falls 2010 Hillside Estate Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Made in a richer, riper style, this Zin brims with flavors of ...
description: Made in a richer, riper style, this Zin brims with flavors of raspberries, cherries, red currants and brown sugar, like a Christmas fruitcake. The alcohol is quite high. Drink soon.

title: Three 2010 Old Vines Zinfandel (Contra Costa County)
excerpt: From old Contra Costa County vines, the Three wines are made by ...
description: From old Contra Costa County vines, the Three wines are made by Matthew Cline of Cline Cellars, whose family has long plowed these dry-farmed fields (and where he was the winemaker for almost two decades). This wine is chock a block in dense black cherry, coffee and cinnamon spice. Though its tannins are reserved, its overall presence is not. This peppery wine is big.

title: C.G. di Arie 2007 Southern Exposure Zinfandel (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
excerpt: The Southern Exposure wines come from the original Grandpere Vineyard planted well ...
description: The Southern Exposure wines come from the original Grandpere Vineyard planted well over a hundred years ago. In this expression the wine shows olive, tar brick and leather qualities and is juicy if not a touch disheveled, with a long spicy finish.

title: Sobon Estate 2010 ReZerve Primitivo (Amador County)
excerpt: A burly Primitivo with spicy blackberry fruit, this is an intense wine ...
description: A burly Primitivo with spicy blackberry fruit, this is an intense wine with layers of smoke and oak to offer those who like a wine that not only pairs with a slab of meat but almost tastes like one.

title: Three 2011 Zinfandel (Contra Costa County)
excerpt: From the old fields of Oakley, this Zinfandel, made by Matt Cline, ...
description: From the old fields of Oakley, this Zinfandel, made by Matt Cline, is big in black fruit and a touch of smoke, particularly vibrant on the finish.

title: Delta Landing 2011 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This is a big, smoky Lodi Zinfandel, explosively jammy and thick with ...
description: This is a big, smoky Lodi Zinfandel, explosively jammy and thick with bacon flavor.

title: Dogwood 2010 Sargentini Vineyard Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: This old-vine Zinfandel also has Carignane and Petite Sirah and is full ...
description: This old-vine Zinfandel also has Carignane and Petite Sirah and is full of red fruit and decent spice but it falls flat under the weight of alcohol on the finish.

title: Sorelle Winery 2011 Sorriso Primitivo (Lodi)
excerpt: This Primitivo gives off both ripe and green characteristics with a finish ...
description: This Primitivo gives off both ripe and green characteristics with a finish of vanilla, but it also comes off as slightly burnt.

title: Edmeades 2010 Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: With a heady bouquet of berry and peppery spice, new Edmeades winemaker ...
description: With a heady bouquet of berry and peppery spice, new Edmeades winemaker Ben Salazar is showing great talent with Mendocino Zinfandel, producing a fairly large-scale bottling full of intense spice and soft tannins. Graham crackers and oak play gingerly in the background. This is a wonderful wine and a new beginning for Edmeades.

title: Woodenhead 2009 Guido Venturi Vineyard Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: Woodenhead does Pinot Noir well, too, but here it shows its skill ...
description: Woodenhead does Pinot Noir well, too, but here it shows its skill with Zinfandel, producing a structured, peppery and leathery version bright in briary blackberry and plum. With fierce minerality at its core, this is a distinctive Zin for those who prefer their wines savory and earthy.

title: Loken Cellars 2010 Reserve Lot 13 Tecklenberg Ranch Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Tastes unevenly ripened, with vegetal notes alongside the berries. Also feels overly ...
description: Tastes unevenly ripened, with vegetal notes alongside the berries. Also feels overly soft and hot in alcohol.

title: Opolo 2011 Summit Creek Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Overripe, with raisiny flavors, and hot in alcohol. Tart acidity gives it ...
description: Overripe, with raisiny flavors, and hot in alcohol. Tart acidity gives it cut.

title: Opolo 2011 Reserve Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Way too high in alcohol, giving it the ripe, hot, raisiny taste ...
description: Way too high in alcohol, giving it the ripe, hot, raisiny taste of a simple Port.

title: Gary Farrell 2010 Bradford Mountain Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: This 100% Zin erupts in briary, peppery wild raspberry, blueberry and cherry ...
description: This 100% Zin erupts in briary, peppery wild raspberry, blueberry and cherry flavors. The tannins are firm, and the acids crisp and savory. What a lovely Zinfandel, made in the soft, velvety style of Merlot, but with Bradford Mountain power.

title: Andis 2011 Indian Creek Vineyard Primitivo (Amador County)
excerpt: A solid Amador County Primitivo from a consistently good producer that is ...
description: A solid Amador County Primitivo from a consistently good producer that is subtle with bright red and blue fruit with a layer of mint and earthy cedar. Well crafted, it tastes light and soft from start to finish.

title: Rancho Zabaco 2011 Reserve Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A very nice interpretation of Dry Creek Zin, this is full bodied, ...
description: A very nice interpretation of Dry Creek Zin, this is full bodied, rich in alcohol and briary. It shows ripe flavors of berries, currants, anise and spices, wrapped into firm tannins, and finishing with hints of caramel.

title: Wood Family Vineyards 2010 Big Wood Zinfandel (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: For its bold footprint (and the amount of wood aging it went ...
description: For its bold footprint (and the amount of wood aging it went through) this rich Zinfandel offers a depth of pleasant berry flavor and a measured texture, with a savory edge on the finish.

title: Dane Cellars 2009 Los Chamizal Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: A big, exuberant Zinfandel, this is full bodied and soft, with ripe, ...
description: A big, exuberant Zinfandel, this is full bodied and soft, with ripe, briary blackberry, currant, dark chocolate, grilled meat and spice flavors. Ready to drink now.

title: Trinitas 2010 Old Vine Zinfandel (El Dorado)
excerpt: Made from old vines, this Zin is still super tight with mouth-drying ...
description: Made from old vines, this Zin is still super tight with mouth-drying tannins, and peppery with a base of black fruit and leather.

title: Wood Family Vineyards 2010 Muy Bueno Zinfandel (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: Tasting quite sweet and soft, like a raspberry liqueur, this high-alcohol Zinfandel ...
description: Tasting quite sweet and soft, like a raspberry liqueur, this high-alcohol Zinfandel is wrapped in vanilla and cinnamon tones and would be difficult to pair with anything beyond barbecue.

title: Brochelle Vineyards 2010 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Way too ripe, with the flavors veering into raisins. The alcohol, which ...
description: Way too ripe, with the flavors veering into raisins. The alcohol, which is 15.6% abv, really sticks out.

title: Gauthier 2011 Los Chamizal Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Expensive, but aims for a Zinfandel touchdown and largely succeeds. With firm ...
description: Expensive, but aims for a Zinfandel touchdown and largely succeeds. With firm tannins and acids, it has explosive flavors of wild forest berries, currants, spices and oak that are complex enough to warrant a second, maybe even a third glass.

title: Mikami Vineyards 2010 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: A smooth and silky Zinfandel with a great nose of subtle spice, ...
description: A smooth and silky Zinfandel with a great nose of subtle spice, its fruit hiding in the background, Oakland-based Mikami coaxes good things out of its Lodi grapes, from structure and jam to a vanilla-laced finish.

title: Quivira 2010 Grist Vineyard / Katz-Absher Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Tastes overtly decadent, with brown sugar and glycerine richness riding over the ...
description: Tastes overtly decadent, with brown sugar and glycerine richness riding over the wild cherry, currant, licorice and bacon flavors. The tannic structure is very pure and refined. The sweetness suggests pairing with richly-sauced barbecue.

title: V. Sattui 2010 Quaglia Vineyard Old Vine Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: With massively high alcohol, this is a big, heady, full-bodied Zin. It ...
description: With massively high alcohol, this is a big, heady, full-bodied Zin. It has powerful raisin, currant, licorice and spice flavors. Drink up and enjoy, but bring a designated driver.

title: Seghesio 2011 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: This large-production Zin has lots to like, beginning with the smooth, dry ...
description: This large-production Zin has lots to like, beginning with the smooth, dry tannins and continuing through the classic flavors of black currants, briary forest berries and exotic spices. It contains some Petite Sirah, which gives it added body and depth. Drink now with barbecue, beef tacos and pepperoni pizza.

title: Stuhlmuller Vineyards 2010 Estate Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Shows the headiness of this warm part of Sonoma County, with enormously ...
description: Shows the headiness of this warm part of Sonoma County, with enormously rich blackberry, cherry, chocolate and Cognac flavors that finish deep and long, with a burn of alcohol. Drink now.

title: Two Vintners 2010 Stone Tree Vineyard Zinfandel (Wahluke Slope)
excerpt: Though quite young this wine seems a bit desiccated with notes of ...
description: Though quite young this wine seems a bit desiccated with notes of dried cranberries and raspberries followed by orange peel and Twizzlers. The palate is ripe and sweet with the alcohol showing on the finish.

title: Campus Oaks 2010 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Juicy, jammy, tasting of red licorice and bright blackberry fruit, with dusty ...
description: Juicy, jammy, tasting of red licorice and bright blackberry fruit, with dusty undertones and a bite of coffee on the finish, this is a good-value Zinfandel from old Lodi vines.

title: Earthquake 2011 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: A wine called Earthquake is never going to be shy and retiring, ...
description: A wine called Earthquake is never going to be shy and retiring, especially from Lodi-grown fruit, so consider this truth in advertising. Big and unquestionably bold, this is a smoky, oaky, huge hit-you-in-the-face-with-fruit wine, full of blackberry and tobacco flavor.

title: Galvan 2010 Zinfandel (Howell Mountain)
excerpt: Tastes fresh and fruity with jammy raspberry and cherry flavors. Wants slightly ...
description: Tastes fresh and fruity with jammy raspberry and cherry flavors. Wants slightly sweet, spicy foods to accompany, like a sausage-based pasta.

title: Bella 2010 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: You could use this wine as a textbook Dry Creek Zin. Ripe ...
description: You could use this wine as a textbook Dry Creek Zin. Ripe and delicious with briary blackberry, cherry, cola and currant flavors that persist through a long, spicy finish. The tannins are furry, giving it instant likeability.

title: Meadowcroft 2010 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: A good, dry Zinfandel whose youthfulness shows in fresh flavors of wild ...
description: A good, dry Zinfandel whose youthfulness shows in fresh flavors of wild berries and brisk, citrusy acidity. Notes of black pepper, leather, orange zest and anise provide a lusty complexity. Drink over the next two years.

title: De Paola Vineyard 2008 Emilio Zinfandel (Arroyo Grande Valley)
excerpt: The alcohol on this Zin is enormous, giving it a Port-style headiness. ...
description: The alcohol on this Zin is enormous, giving it a Port-style headiness. But it sure is delicious, offering tiers of black currants, chocolate, sweet licorice and cedar. Defines this robust style of California Zin in a rich, barbecue-friendly way.

title: Sierra Starr 2009 Old Clone Zinfandel (Nevada County)
excerpt: Tight, savory and austere, this mountain-grown Zin needs time to show its ...
description: Tight, savory and austere, this mountain-grown Zin needs time to show its very peppery nature and sly red fruit, but will pair expertly with pizza or other pasta.

title: Ravenswood 2010 Dickerson Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A big, in your face Zin, with concentrated blackberry jam, currant and ...
description: A big, in your face Zin, with concentrated blackberry jam, currant and espresso flavors along with some overripe raisin and prune notes. High alcohol gives a burn to the palate and the tannins are bitter. Drink now.

title: Elyse 2009 Korte Ranch Zinfandel (St. Helena)
excerpt: Elyse has emerged as one of the most dependable producers of Zinfandel ...
