description: Elyse has emerged as one of the most dependable producers of Zinfandel in California. This wine shows some overripeness in the raisin flavor, but there are plenty of blueberry jam, chocolate, baking spice and sandalwood notes. The tannins are firm yet supple.

title: Zynthesis 2011 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Loaded with vibrant jammy fruit, this is a bright Zinfandel that has ...
description: Loaded with vibrant jammy fruit, this is a bright Zinfandel that has a smoky grilled-meat note on the finish. Pair this with meaty dishes.

title: Twisted 2011 Old Vine Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: The strong aroma and flavor of black pepper suggests that this Zinfandel ...
description: The strong aroma and flavor of black pepper suggests that this Zinfandel will pair well with peppered   steak. It has firm tannins that will chew through fat, and the note of blackberry jam will meld nicely with the sweet flavor of charred beef.

title: Dry Creek Vineyard 2010 Heritage Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Robust and spicy, this is a Zinfandel to pair with barbecued ribs, ...
description: Robust and spicy, this is a Zinfandel to pair with barbecued ribs, burgers and beef tacos. It has flavors of blackberries, green peppercorns and toast. Drink this over the next two years for maximum freshness.

title: Brazin 2009 Monte Rosso Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: High alcohol gives this dry, tannic wine some heat, and the overripe ...
description: High alcohol gives this dry, tannic wine some heat, and the overripe fruit lends a raisiny, pruny tinge to the blackberry flavor.

title: Kokomo 2010 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: This Zinfandel is a bit rustic, with a jagged mouthfeel. It offers ...
description: This Zinfandel is a bit rustic, with a jagged mouthfeel. It offers sweet-tasting varietal flavors of wild berry, spice and tobacco, plus a touch of prune.

title: Girasole 2009 Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: A fairly tannic Zinfandel, this is made from organic grapes. Enjoy with ...
description: A fairly tannic Zinfandel, this is made from organic grapes. Enjoy with pizza or hamburgers.

title: Mazzocco 2010 Briar Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: This Zinfandel tastes and feels hot and Port-like. While some people enjoy ...
description: This Zinfandel tastes and feels hot and Port-like. While some people enjoy this style, it feels a bit clumsy and overripe. Nonetheless, the blackberry, raisin and chocolate flavors are tasty.

title: Tin Barn 2010 Gilsson Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This tastes sweet and hot, which gives the flavors of blackberry and ...
description: This tastes sweet and hot, which gives the flavors of blackberry and raisin a Port-like character.

title: Williams Selyem 2010 Bacigalupi Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Rich, balanced and full bodied, this shows exuberantly ripe, sweet flavors of ...
description: Rich, balanced and full bodied, this shows exuberantly ripe, sweet flavors of blackberries, mulberries, dark chocolate and raisins, with notes of exotic spices. It will last for 20 years, gradually losing fruit and growing earthy and mushroomy.

title: Sineann 2011 Old Vine Zinfandel (Columbia Valley (OR))
excerpt: In this cool year, the Old Vine Zinfandel from Sineann demonstrates considerable ...
description: In this cool year, the Old Vine Zinfandel from Sineann demonstrates considerable elegance. Nicely balanced, it offers pretty raspberry and cherry fruit, with old vine touches of spice and a certain brambly character. Tangy, tart and long lasting, this would be a good one to cellar.

title: Louis M. Martini 2010 Monte Rosso Vineyard Gnarly Vine Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Distinctive as always, this is another powerful Zinfandel from Martini, which has ...
description: Distinctive as always, this is another powerful Zinfandel from Martini, which has a long history with this mountain vineyard. The cool 2010 vintage was kind, bringing the wine to its usual high-alcohol superripeness, yet maintaining vital acidity. Notes of raisins, blackberry jam and chocolate are all found in this heady, Porty wine. Drink now with rich barbecue and stews.

title: Envolve 2010 Old Vine Primitivo (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Rich, interesting flavors of chocolate, blackberry jam, grilled bacon, ground black pepper ...
description: Rich, interesting flavors of chocolate, blackberry jam, grilled bacon, ground black pepper and sandalwood mark this wine. The pepper really sticks out, suggesting pairing this with spicy meats and stews.

title: Feudi di San Marzano 2010 Sud  (Primitivo di Manduria)
excerpt: Fleshy, bold and well concentrated, this Primitivo di Manduria delivers sweet fruit ...
description: Fleshy, bold and well concentrated, this Primitivo di Manduria delivers sweet fruit flavors of blackberry pie, prune and raspberry jelly. The wine is soft and chewy, with a bright note of fruity sweetness on the finish.

title: Plungerhead 2011 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Direct and easygoing, this Zinfandel tastes of blackberry, bacon, clove and pepper. ...
description: Direct and easygoing, this Zinfandel tastes of blackberry, bacon, clove and pepper. The oak is tame, and the wine is ready to drink.

title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2010  Primitivo di Manduria
excerpt: Sweet spice, rum cake and dark plum open the nose of this ...
description: Sweet spice, rum cake and dark plum open the nose of this dark and savory Primitivo. It is chewy and dense, with loads of ripe black-cherry flavor on the finish.

title: Leone de Castris 2011 Villa Santera  (Primitivo di Manduria)
excerpt: Villa Santera opens with jammy aromas of blackberry preserves and raspberry tart, ...
description: Villa Santera opens with jammy aromas of blackberry preserves and raspberry tart, followed by slightly smoked tones of roasted almond and pipe tobacco. This is fleshy, extremely rich and sweet on the close.

title: Feudi di San Marzano 2011 I Tratturi Primitivo (Puglia)
excerpt: Inky in color, this wine has plump aromas of ripe fruit, blackberry ...
description: Inky in color, this wine has plump aromas of ripe fruit, blackberry jam and rum cake. On the palate, it is soft and smooth.

title: Antica Enotria 2011 Vriccio Primitivo (Puglia)
excerpt: Notes of cherry and raspberry open the nose of this organic wine. ...
description: Notes of cherry and raspberry open the nose of this organic wine. It is easy on the palate, with a lean, fruit-filled finish.

title: Rancho Zabaco 2011 Sonoma Heritage Vines Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Even after an hour of airing, this wine is tart and sweet ...
description: Even after an hour of airing, this wine is tart and sweet in primary blackberry, boysenberry and cherry fruit, which gives it a rustic, jammy taste. The sweetness suggests drinking this wine with rich meats slathered in sugary barbecue sauce.

title: Seven Deadly Zins 2010 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This bottling is classic in its ample, smoky marshmallow, campfire and jam ...
description: This bottling is classic in its ample, smoky marshmallow, campfire and jam sandwich flavors. The palate is laced with notes of red licorice and vanilla.

title: Lapis Luna 2011 Romanzo Moon, Shoup Vineyard Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Soft, round and textured, this is a minty Zinfandel with a pronounced ...
description: Soft, round and textured, this is a minty Zinfandel with a pronounced jolt of smoke on the long finish.

title: Mondo del Vino 2009 Codici Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Some leather, teriyaki and cured meat notes give this wine a dark ...
description: Some leather, teriyaki and cured meat notes give this wine a dark first impression. Ripe cherry and raspberry jam flavors appear on the soft finish.

title: Dancing Bull 2011 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: This has a white pepper flavor, plus acids and green tannins that ...
description: This has a white pepper flavor, plus acids and green tannins that join forces to make the palate feel jagged. With its berry and currant flavors, this needs to be paired with rich meats and cheeses for balance.

title: Cambridge & Sunset 2010 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Simple and slightly sweet, this has flavors of raspberry, sour cherry candy ...
description: Simple and slightly sweet, this has flavors of raspberry, sour cherry candy and mint.

title: Newsome-Harlow 2010 Big John Zinfandel (Calaveras County)
excerpt: Deep and delicious with inviting layers of raspberry and berry cobbler, Big ...
description: Deep and delicious with inviting layers of raspberry and berry cobbler, Big John is a brambly, structured Zin, with bright zaps of black pepper and clove, plus a long, satisfying finish. This is perhaps the best Zin in all of Calaveras County right now.

title: Tenute Rubino 2010 Visellio Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Vintner Luigi Rubino represents a new generation of young and dynamic winemakers ...
description: Vintner Luigi Rubino represents a new generation of young and dynamic winemakers in Puglia. This is a dark and decadent red wine, with sweet oak tones that sit behind the cherry, chocolate fudge, cinnamon and tobacco. The mouthfeel is supple, rich and long-lasting.

title: Newsome-Harlow 2010 The Donner Party The Dalton Ranch Zinfandel (Calaveras County)
excerpt: Dripping with notes of juicy black fruit, sweet tobacco and clove, this ...
description: Dripping with notes of juicy black fruit, sweet tobacco and clove, this is layered and full-bodied, with soft tannins and an intensity that should grow more intriguing with age. From the gorgeous Calaveras County Dalton Vineyard, this is blended with 11% Petite Sirah, also from Dalton.

title: Fiddletown Cellars 2010 Old Vine Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: This is a dense, chewy Zin with lush berry flavors. It has ...
description: This is a dense, chewy Zin with lush berry flavors. It has notes of blackberry juice and tar, with hints of tobacco and vanilla on the back palate. Made from old vines and blended with 6% Barbera and 4% Alicante Bouschet.

title: Torrevento 2009 Ghenos  (Primitivo di Manduria)
excerpt: This is a pure expression of Primitivo that shows superbold and rich ...
description: This is a pure expression of Primitivo that shows superbold and rich aromas of blackberry and blueberry, folded within a plump, chewy texture. The finish is round and soft.

title: Vigneti Reale 2010 Rudiae Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Natural characteristics of the Primitivo grape include bold fruit tones of blackberry ...
description: Natural characteristics of the Primitivo grape include bold fruit tones of blackberry and blueberry, backed by plush sweetness and dark richness. Rudiae offers all of those qualities with added spice notes from oak aging in large wooden casks.

title: Miali 2008 Mater Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: A pure expression of Primitivo, this is aged in large oak casks ...
description: A pure expression of Primitivo, this is aged in large oak casks for 24 months to produce a cherry aroma that is in balance with the notes of toasted almond and spice. The mouthfeel is chewy, rich and bold.

title: Luccarelli 2009 Pazzia  (Primitivo di Manduria)
excerpt: Bold and delicious, this shows a dark, inky color, with ripe notes ...
description: Bold and delicious, this shows a dark, inky color, with ripe notes of blackberry, rum cake, cinnamon and nutmeg. The palate is sweet, plush and jammy.

title: Villa Mottura 2010 Le Pitre Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Smoky, ripe fruit and dark spice notes are enhanced by bright tones ...
description: Smoky, ripe fruit and dark spice notes are enhanced by bright tones of blackberry and blueberry. Pair this with potato gnocchi in meat sauce or orecchiette with smoked ricotta cheese.

title: Terra Jovia 2007 Primitivo (Gioia del Colle)
excerpt: A pure expression of Primitivo, this shows slightly muddled aromas at first ...
description: A pure expression of Primitivo, this shows slightly muddled aromas at first that slowly open to show clear portraits of Indian spice, cherry, ripe blackberry, prune and candied fruit. The finish is round, soft and chewy.

title: Mineo Family Vineyards 2008 Ormus Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: This shows a note of bright fruit, followed by leather, tobacco, rum ...
description: This shows a note of bright fruit, followed by leather, tobacco, rum cake, crushed black pepper and cured meat. The wine is simple, clean and driven by ripe fruit flavors.

title: Luccarelli 2010 Ampelo  (Primitivo di Manduria)
excerpt: Extremely ripe, chewy and soft, this lush Primitivo offers aromas of sweet ...
description: Extremely ripe, chewy and soft, this lush Primitivo offers aromas of sweet tobacco, rum cake, cinnamon and blackberry preserves. There are touches of sweet-tasting fruit and raisin in the mouth.

title: Renwood 2010 Premier Old Vine Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Renwood is slowly coming back to life in Amador after having been ...
description: Renwood is slowly coming back to life in Amador after having been bought by a group of international investors with interests in Argentina and Uruguay. Premier is a good first step, undoubtedly a powerhouse, bearing smoky, tannic mountain fruit and layers of toffee, blackberry and dark raspberry, with a bass line of spice.

title: Klinker Brick 2010 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: A classically bombastic Lodi Zin, this is sweet and soft, direct in ...
description: A classically bombastic Lodi Zin, this is sweet and soft, direct in its embrace of American oak. A note of vanilla marks the finish, plus a healthy dollop of alcohol.

title: Miali 2009 Campirossi Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Campirossi opens with slightly muddled aromas of candied fruit, leather and almond. ...
description: Campirossi opens with slightly muddled aromas of candied fruit, leather and almond. It shows a touch of bitterness on the finish, with lingering notes of crushed white pepper.

title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2009  Primitivo di Manduria
excerpt: Aged only in stainless steel, this is a food-friendly offering that shows ...
description: Aged only in stainless steel, this is a food-friendly offering that shows a bright ruby color, bearing sweet aromas of cherry and raspberry candy. The mouthfeel is clean, crisp and easy.

title: Torre Quarto 2009 Tarabuso Primitivo (Puglia)
excerpt: This is a bold and masculine expression of Primitivo, with aromas of ...
description: This is a bold and masculine expression of Primitivo, with aromas of earth, tobacco, ripe fruit and leather. The wine seems to show some age and offers a slightly gritty texture on the palate.

title: Mounts 2009 Estate Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A sound, everyday Zinfandel, this may be a little green and underripe, ...
description: A sound, everyday Zinfandel, this may be a little green and underripe, but it does show some berry-cherry flavor. The alcohol is very high.

title: Cielo e Terra 2011 Primi Soli Primitivo (Puglia)
excerpt: A certified organic wine, this offers easy berry aromas of cherry and ...
description: A certified organic wine, this offers easy berry aromas of cherry and raspberry that would pair with informal foods like pizza. The mouthfeel is lean and bright.

title: One Hope 2011 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: While this Zin is pretty standard fare, it features plenty of ripe, ...
description: While this Zin is pretty standard fare, it features plenty of ripe, upfront raspberry and cherry notes, with the spiciness that makes Zinfandel so savory. The apparent sweetness is nicely balanced by acidity.

title: Maryhill 2010 Zinfandel (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: According to its bottle, this has 15.5% alcohol, and yet the raspberry ...
description: According to its bottle, this has 15.5% alcohol, and yet the raspberry flavor lacks weight and depth. Instead, flavors of stem and earth seem to dominate.

title: St. Francis 2010 Old Vines Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: High alcohol gives this wine distinct heat, as well as a sweet, ...
description: High alcohol gives this wine distinct heat, as well as a sweet, glycerine-driven edge. The wild blackberry, prune and pepper flavors are characteristic of ripe Zinfandel.

title: Cortenova 2010 Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Packaged in a fun screwcap bottle, this easy Primitivo opens with bitter ...
description: Packaged in a fun screwcap bottle, this easy Primitivo opens with bitter almond and cherry flavors, followed by crisp fruit and citrus freshness. It would pair with grilled pork chops.

title: St. Francis 2010 Amann Vineyard Old Vines Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: This tastes almost like a fortified wine, with strong alcohol heat boosting ...
description: This tastes almost like a fortified wine, with strong alcohol heat boosting very dry wild-blackberry, pepper and prune flavors.

title: Maryhill 2010 Northridge Vineyard Primitivo (Wahluke Slope)
excerpt: Tart to the point of being flat-out sour, this might appeal to ...
description: Tart to the point of being flat-out sour, this might appeal to lovers of rhubarb pie. Rhubarb and sour plum flavors are matched with sharp acidity. The fruit seems underripe.

title: Bargetto 2010 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This is a simple Lodi Zinfandel made using fruit from old vines. ...
description: This is a simple Lodi Zinfandel made using fruit from old vines. It tastes of juicy, brambly blackberry.

title: Pasqua 2011 Lapaccio Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Lapaccio is an easy and informal expression of Primitivo, with simple cherry ...
description: Lapaccio is an easy and informal expression of Primitivo, with simple cherry and cola aromas. In the mouth, it shows a sweet-tasting red-fruit flavor.

title: Miali 2010 Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: This offers bright cherry and forest berry aromas, with a tangy touch ...
description: This offers bright cherry and forest berry aromas, with a tangy touch of sourness that would work with cheesy pasta dishes.

title: Peirano 2011 The Immortal Zin Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: At first, this smells unexpectedly of almonds. But overall, this is a ...
description: At first, this smells unexpectedly of almonds. But overall, this is a viscous bottle of raisin, blackberry and tar flavors.

title: Kenwood 2010 Jack London Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma Mountain)
excerpt: Smooth and spicy, this has lots of raspberry, cherry and smoky wood ...
description: Smooth and spicy, this has lots of raspberry, cherry and smoky wood flavors that taste sweet and savory, but turn nicely dry and complex on the finish. It shows real class. Best over the next few years.

title: Bruliam 2010 Rocky Ridge Vineyard Zinfandel (Rockpile)
excerpt: This shows the Rockpile personality with its intensely jammy raspberry, cherry and ...
description: This shows the Rockpile personality with its intensely jammy raspberry, cherry and chocolate flavors that are accented by a bit of Port-like heat and set off by good acidity. The pleasure is in the power.

title: Occidental Road Cellars 2009 Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Although this Zin has a touch of overripeness in the form of ...
description: Although this Zin has a touch of overripeness in the form of raisins covered in chocolate, followed by a lot of blackberry and foxy mulberry. The wine is dry, smooth and balanced, with plenty of complexity.

title: Renwood 2010 Old Vine Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: This tastes juicy, sweet and vibrant, with candied raspberry, pink bubblegum, vanilla, ...
description: This tastes juicy, sweet and vibrant, with candied raspberry, pink bubblegum, vanilla, cinnamon and white pepper flavors. A nice Zin to drink now.

title: Sextant 2010 Wheelhouse Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Rich and chocolaty, with blueberry and blackberry jam flavor, this is high ...
description: Rich and chocolaty, with blueberry and blackberry jam flavor, this is high in alcohol, but it is delicious nonetheless.

title: Michael Florentino 2010 Primitivo (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The blackberry and cassis flavors, which are accented by a red licorice ...
description: The blackberry and cassis flavors, which are accented by a red licorice candy note, turn slightly bitter as the tannins kick in, leaving the impression of an artificial, chemical aftertaste.

title: Turley 2010 Ueberroth Vineyard Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Touches of unripe vegetal aromas and flavors compromise this wine, despite some ...
description: Touches of unripe vegetal aromas and flavors compromise this wine, despite some jammy blackberry and cherry flavors. Because of its thinness, its high alcohol content makes it feel hot. Drink now.

title: Sextant 2010 Zinfandel (Central Coast)
excerpt: This seems candy-sweet with flavors of raspberry, red licorice and spice. Simple, ...
description: This seems candy-sweet with flavors of raspberry, red licorice and spice. Simple, it is fine for everyday drinking.

title: Martin Family Vineyards 2010 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Showing the briary, brambly side of Zinfandel, this features wild berry, tobacco ...
description: Showing the briary, brambly side of Zinfandel, this features wild berry, tobacco and spice flavors. Its thinness and impression of sweetness give it a rustic mouthfeel.

title: Bella 2009 Maple Vineyards Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: This is rich and ripe in blackberry, currant, mocha, tobacco, cola and ...
description: This is rich and ripe in blackberry, currant, mocha, tobacco, cola and spice. It has a beautiful texture, feeling softly tannic and velvety, seemingly frictionless on the palate yet with fine grip. The head-trained vines are at least 50 years old.

title: Macauley 2009 Old Vines Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Extraordinarily rich and heady, this has gigantic cherry and raspberry jam flavors. ...
description: Extraordinarily rich and heady, this has gigantic cherry and raspberry jam flavors. So sweet and pure, it tastes like the essence of Zinfandel, but at the last moment acidity and tannins emerge, bringing necessary structure. Drink now.

title: Hunnicutt 2010 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Blended with a drop of Petite Sirah, this powerful Zin offers blasts ...
description: Blended with a drop of Petite Sirah, this powerful Zin offers blasts of ripe, freshly picked summer blackberries. With notes of pie spice, sweet oak and liqueur-like alcohol, this calls for ribs and chicken in a slightly sweet barbeque sauce.

title: McCay Cellars 2009 Jupiter Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Deliciously round and spicy, this has attractive berry flavors wrapped around a ...
description: Deliciously round and spicy, this has attractive berry flavors wrapped around a hint of roasted coffee bean. A masculine, intense and layered wine, it has balanced acidity that makes its flavors pop.

title: Ravenswood 2009 Teldeschi Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: This is a big, strong Zinfandel, packing a real punch in terms ...
description: This is a big, strong Zinfandel, packing a real punch in terms of flavor. It brings blasts of ripe summer blackberry and cherry, with notes of anise, nettle, chamomile, white pepper and briar. Carignane and Petite Sirah round out this complex, delicious blend, which is fully ready to drink now with game, rich stews or easy backyard barbecue.

title: Ravenswood 2009 Dickerson Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is a strong Zinfandel. It takes over the mouth with a ...
description: This is a strong Zinfandel. It takes over the mouth with a blast of ripe blackberry, cherry, anise, chocolate and spice. What it lacks in subtlety it more than makes up for in sheer power.

title: Tyler Florence 2008 TF Zin Hoodoo Creek VIneyard Zinfandel (Lake County)
excerpt: Decadently jammed with aromas and flavors of dark plum, blackberry and chocolate, ...
description: Decadently jammed with aromas and flavors of dark plum, blackberry and chocolate, this has subtle layers of black licorice and brawny leather. With small amounts of Syrah and Petit Verdot, this powerhouse gets better in the glass. Chef-turned-vintner Tyler Florence suggests pairing it with osso bucco.

title: Andis 2010 Primitivo (Amador County)
excerpt: This robust and classically rustic Primitivo tastes of dark cherry and just-picked ...
description: This robust and classically rustic Primitivo tastes of dark cherry and just-picked brambly blackberry. A balanced mountain-grown wine, it has a wall of spice around its core, with elements of cinnamon and pepper, finished off by a refreshing twist of mint.

title: Graziano 2009 Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: This is a Claret-like Zinfandel, mellow and simply rendered, with layers of ...
description: This is a Claret-like Zinfandel, mellow and simply rendered, with layers of dark cherry, blackberry and lilting spiciness. This would be spectacular with lighter fare like barbecued chicken or grilled turkey burgers.

title: Botter 2010 Caleo Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: This easy-drinking Primitivo opens with dark, inky concentration and sweet aromas of ...
description: This easy-drinking Primitivo opens with dark, inky concentration and sweet aromas of ripe fruit, cinnamon and nutmeg. The mouthfeel is plush, rich and velvety soft.

title: Produttori Vini Manduria 2007 Madrigale  (Primitivo di Manduria)
excerpt: This naturally sweet red opens with a neutral nose that recalls a ...
description: This naturally sweet red opens with a neutral nose that recalls a dry Primitivo wine. Dark fruit, cherry and black pepper notes are present, with a tangy sweetness on the palate. Pair this with chocolate brownies or chocolate chip cookies.

title: Pheasant Valley Winery 2009 Primitivo (Columbia Valley (OR))
excerpt: Rustic and full bodied, this Oregon Primitivo is plenty ripe, yet it ...
description: Rustic and full bodied, this Oregon Primitivo is plenty ripe, yet it retains nuances of olive and herb, along with thick red fruit. A whisper of smoke weaves through the finish.

title: Zinfandelic 2009 Old Vine Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: This Zinfandel takes time to unlayer, but once it does, the combination ...
description: This Zinfandel takes time to unlayer, but once it does, the combination of leather and blackberry is tasty, and the finish is pleasantly spicy.

title: Grgich Hills 2009 Estate Grown Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: From a winery better known for Cabernet Sauvignon, this is a fairly ...
description: From a winery better known for Cabernet Sauvignon, this is a fairly standard Zinfandel, with generous berry, tobacco, sandalwood and spice flavors. It does have lovely balance and the precision typical of Napa Valley.

title: Bella Piazza 2008 Esola Vineyard Old Vine Zinfandel (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
excerpt: Super dusty, leathery and big shouldered, this is also quite bright and ...
description: Super dusty, leathery and big shouldered, this is also quite bright and drinkable. Made using grapes sourced from old vines planted within the Esola Vineyard.

title: Lava Cap 2009 Reserve Zinfandel (El Dorado)
excerpt: This intoxicatingly interesting wine is full of rich dark-berry flavors, with streaks ...
description: This intoxicatingly interesting wine is full of rich dark-berry flavors, with streaks of leather and roasted coffee.

title: Jason-Stephens 2008 Estate Zinfandel (Santa Clara Valley)
excerpt: Rich and ripe, this is an intense and decadent Zinfandel, with highlights ...
description: Rich and ripe, this is an intense and decadent Zinfandel, with highlights of blackberry jam and milk chocolate.

title: Fatalone 2004 Riserva Primitivo (Gioia del Colle)
excerpt: This is an organic wine that offers tertiary aromas of candied fruit, ...
description: This is an organic wine that offers tertiary aromas of candied fruit, crushed stone and licorice. The mouthfeel is impressively chiseled, bright and pristine.

title: Bella Piazza 2009 Sleeper Vineyard, Old Vine Zinfandel (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
excerpt: This thick, dusty and leathery Foothills Zinfandel is ready to drink now ...
description: This thick, dusty and leathery Foothills Zinfandel is ready to drink now with bold, meaty foods.

title: Fatalone 2006 Primitivo (Gioia del Colle)
excerpt: Made using organically-farmed Primitivo grapes, this features aromas of licorice, crushed granite ...
description: Made using organically-farmed Primitivo grapes, this features aromas of licorice, crushed granite and candied fruit. The acidity is bright and lively.

title: Sorelle Winery 2010 Sorriso Primitivo (Lodi)
excerpt: Austere and tannic, this savory Primitivo tastes of black cherry and blackberry, ...
description: Austere and tannic, this savory Primitivo tastes of black cherry and blackberry, with leather overtones.

title: Four Vines 2010 Biker Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: This is soft, syrupy and seemingly sweet, with blackberry and dark chocolate ...
description: This is soft, syrupy and seemingly sweet, with blackberry and dark chocolate notes. Its high alcohol gives it a headiness, but it represents the Paso Robles style.

title: Dashe Cellars 2009 Late Harvest Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: This dessert wine is quite sweet, with a taste of caramelized brown ...
description: This dessert wine is quite sweet, with a taste of caramelized brown sugar, but the raspberry and cherry flavors are disappointingly thin.

title: Domenico 2007 Primitivo (Amador County)
excerpt: Thick and heavy, this is Port-like in its toffee and raisin aromas, ...
description: Thick and heavy, this is Port-like in its toffee and raisin aromas, with a trace of licorice in the background. Its syrupy consistency almost expresses an air of oxidation.

title: Gen5 2010 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This old-vine Zinfandel with a dusting of Petite Sirah and Tannat in ...
description: This old-vine Zinfandel with a dusting of Petite Sirah and Tannat in the blend is stewy, soft and fairly simple.

title: Baron Herzog 2009 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: The berry flavors in this wine are fighting to emerge, but they ...
description: The berry flavors in this wine are fighting to emerge, but they are overwhelmed by dusty tannins and a lack of texture.

title: Thurston Wolfe 2010 Reserve Zinfandel (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: American oak is the barrel choice, 100% new, and it shows strongly ...
description: American oak is the barrel choice, 100% new, and it shows strongly in the nose of this young Zinfandel. The citrusy acids help to balance out the alcohol, and with additional bottle age the score could certainly rise. If you plan to drink this soon, give it plenty of breathing time.

title: Amelle 2008 Buck Hill Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Fruity, simple and lusty, this is made for barbecue. High alcohol gives ...
description: Fruity, simple and lusty, this is made for barbecue. High alcohol gives sweet heat to the jammy cherry and currant flavors. It really wants to accompany charred meats slathered in sweet sauces.

title: Armida 2010 Maple Vineyards Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Dry and tannic, this has deep blackberry-pie and spice flavors. A touch ...
description: Dry and tannic, this has deep blackberry-pie and spice flavors. A touch of unripeness, suggesting green peppercorns, detracts from the pleasure. Drink now.

title: V. Sattui 2009 Ramazzotti Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: This lusty Zin shows the briary, brambly character of Dry Creek Valley ...
description: This lusty Zin shows the briary, brambly character of Dry Creek Valley that always makes its Zins taste a little rustic, which in no way detracts from its deliciousness. Dry and rich in tannins, it has long, deep flavors of spices, perfectly ripe summer berries and an herbal bitterness suggestive of chamomile tea and wild nettles. A better pizza wine cannot be imagined.

title: Lake Sonoma 2009 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Dry and spicy, this has lots of upfront fruit in the form ...
description: Dry and spicy, this has lots of upfront fruit in the form of wild raspberries and cherries, and rich tannins that make it great for pairing with grilled steaks and chops.

title: Miro 2010 Piccetti Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: With its tangy acidity, touches of green peppercorns and edgy tannins, this ...
description: With its tangy acidity, touches of green peppercorns and edgy tannins, this is a rustic wine. Fortunately, it has a lot of blackberry and dark chocolate flavors, with that distinctive briary character of Dry Creek Zins. Drink now with roasted or grilled meats or a vegetarian lasagna.

title: XYZin 2010 10 Year Old Vines Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Robust and lusty, spicy and fruity, this has sweet berry and cola ...
description: Robust and lusty, spicy and fruity, this has sweet berry and cola flavors. Drink it with savory fare, like pizza and barbecue.

title: Decoy 2010 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Simple, fruity and sweet tasting, this has chocolate-covered raisin and blueberry jam ...
description: Simple, fruity and sweet tasting, this has chocolate-covered raisin and blueberry jam flavors.

title: Napa Cellars 2010 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is a vigorous Zinfandel, fruity and soft, with berry, cola and ...
description: This is a vigorous Zinfandel, fruity and soft, with berry, cola and spice flavors. Drink now with barbecue, burgers or beef burritos.

title: Minassian-Young 2010 1000 Vines Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: This seems sweet like a Port. It tastes like raspberry and cherry ...
description: This seems sweet like a Port. It tastes like raspberry and cherry jam, with lots of heat from the alcohol.

title: Zinopolis 2011 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: This is nowhere near ripe, with chlorophyll, white pepper and tobacco flavors. ...
description: This is nowhere near ripe, with chlorophyll, white pepper and tobacco flavors. But the tannins are rich and fine, and the finish is dry. Drink with sausages to coax out the cherry flavor.

title: Peju NV Delicias Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Despite lots of sugary sweetness and a fine burst of acidity, this ...
description: Despite lots of sugary sweetness and a fine burst of acidity, this dessert-style wine is watery thin in flavor. The raspberries and cherries taste diluted, leaving behind the impression of hot, high alcohol.

title: Fields Family 2010 Sherman Family Vineyards Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This is a complex Lodi old-vine Zinfandel with boysenberry and blackberry notes ...
description: This is a complex Lodi old-vine Zinfandel with boysenberry and blackberry notes poking through layers of complexity and a touch of dusty plum. It has a strata of black licorice throughout the midpalate, with a peppery, wild herb flavor keeping it interesting. Notes of espresso and leather mark the finish, and a controlled amount of acidity keeps in balance.

title: Two Vintners 2009 Stone Tree Vineyard Zinfandel (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: This potent wine brings the snap and vivid acidity of Washington-grown grapes ...
description: This potent wine brings the snap and vivid acidity of Washington-grown grapes to the spicy red- and black-berry flavors of this fully ripened Zinfandel. It has cut and verve along with dense fruit, and a finish with smoke, espresso, anise and mineral streaks.

title: Red Table Cellars 2009 Corvino Bosco Vineyard Zinfandel (San Francisco Bay)
excerpt: A Zin brimming with berry deliciousness, this is lushly fruit forward with ...
description: A Zin brimming with berry deliciousness, this is lushly fruit forward with a dusty coat and hints of cracked black pepper for good measure. It has a great, long, cocoa-kissed finish.

title: Scott Harvey 2009 Old Vine Reserve Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: This is an austere, very structured, leathery Zin, with notes of briary ...
description: This is an austere, very structured, leathery Zin, with notes of briary black pepper and dark, ripe fruit from start to finish.

title: Pech Merle 2010 Treborce Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: This has a powerful, briary character, with a spicy, high-alcohol kick. It ...
description: This has a powerful, briary character, with a spicy, high-alcohol kick. It erupts in the mouth, with flavors of wild berry, tobacco, cola, anise and white pepper that should pair well with equally spicy fare, preferably fatty meats and cheeses.

title: Precedent 2010 Evangelho Vineyard Zinfandel (Contra Costa County)
excerpt: A full-bodied, full-flavored Zin, this is packed with baking spice, classic blackberry ...
description: A full-bodied, full-flavored Zin, this is packed with baking spice, classic blackberry and leather notes. It has great length and a spicy finish, and it should please many California Zin fans.

title: Sobon Estate 2009 Fiddletown Zinfandel (Fiddletown)
excerpt: This is a toasty Zinfandel bursting with aromas and flavors of smoked ...
description: This is a toasty Zinfandel bursting with aromas and flavors of smoked meat and blackberry jam. Soft, round and easy to drink, this should pair well with barbecue or similarly smoked meats.

title: 3 Steves Winery 2009 Zinfandel (Cienega Valley)
excerpt: This opens with an aroma of cola syrup, and it seems devoid ...
description: This opens with an aroma of cola syrup, and it seems devoid of a tannic structure and a finish.

title: Windmill 2010 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Soft, round and very ripe, this is simple and straightforward, with big, ...
description: Soft, round and very ripe, this is simple and straightforward, with big, chewy tannins and flavors of cola and cinnamon. Bright on the nose, it is full-bodied and heavy in the mouth, and it screams out for hearty heaps of grilled food.

title: Armida 2010 Poizin Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: This is rude and rustic, with sharply acidic, jammy berry flavors that ...
description: This is rude and rustic, with sharply acidic, jammy berry flavors that veer into plumped raisin territory. Drink it with a pizza or a burger.

title: Clos La Chance 2010 Estate Zinfandel (Central Coast)
excerpt: Harsh in the mouth, with sharp acidity and uneven tannins, this has ...
description: Harsh in the mouth, with sharp acidity and uneven tannins, this has a candied-berry flavor.

title: Dutcher Crossing 2010 Bernier-Sibary Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: The winery has an excellent track record over the years with this ...
description: The winery has an excellent track record over the years with this single-vineyard bottling. It boasts flavors of berry jam, milk chocolate, anise and peppery spice, wrapped into rich, soft tannins. Delicious with beef stew, barbecue, or just a classic burger.

title: Storybook Mountain 2009 Estate Reserve Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is classic Zinfandel, bearing ripe, briary, brambly flavors of wild berries, ...
description: This is classic Zinfandel, bearing ripe, briary, brambly flavors of wild berries, with notes of Dr. Pepper, tobacco, bacon, sandalwood and exotic spices. Absolutely delicious, this is a wine to enjoy with a wide variety of spicy meats, cheeses and vegetarian dishes.

title: Scott Harvey 2008 1869 Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: A pleasing, complex Zin from the oldest documented Zin vineyard in California, ...
description: A pleasing, complex Zin from the oldest documented Zin vineyard in California, which has belonged to Scott Harvey since 1984. Dusty, with a hint of mint, this structured, berry-flavored wine is medium in weight, with a licorice undertone.

title: Dutton-Goldfield 2010 Dutton Ranch Morelli Lane Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: The cool vintage has given this wine lots of perky acidity and ...
description: The cool vintage has given this wine lots of perky acidity and dry tannins as well as an earthy, mushroomy quality to the blackberry and cherry flavors. Probably best enjoyed soon, but give it a decant before serving.

title: Shannon Ridge 2009 Ranch Collection Zinfandel (Lake County)
excerpt: A full, fruity Zinfandel, with dusty tannins and structure. Its lingering finish ...
description: A full, fruity Zinfandel, with dusty tannins and structure. Its lingering finish is laced with notes of chocolate and vanilla. With 7% Petite Sirah mixed in, this would pair nicely with barbecue and other meaty dishes.

title: Claudia Springs 2009 Valenti Ranch Zinfandel (Mendocino Ridge)
excerpt: This smells of subdued strawberry and raspberry, with a twist of violet. ...
description: This smells of subdued strawberry and raspberry, with a twist of violet. It is tightly structured, tasting of brick and tar, and its finish is ripe, brambly and bittersweet.

title: Hobo 2010 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: This has flavors of briary and wild berry, with spiciness and rich ...
description: This has flavors of briary and wild berry, with spiciness and rich tannins that need a steak to play against. The wine is soft, which accentuates the alcohol and makes the finish seem to taste a bit sweet.

title: Hobo 2010 Branham Vineyard Zinfandel (Rockpile)
excerpt: Noticeable alcohol gives this Zin both heat and apparent sweetness. Combined with ...
description: Noticeable alcohol gives this Zin both heat and apparent sweetness. Combined with a superripe fruit flavor that veers into raisin territory, it turns rustic. Drink it with barbecue.

title: Optima 2009 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: This is overripe, with a pruny flavor along with notes of blackberry, ...
description: This is overripe, with a pruny flavor along with notes of blackberry, mocha and spice. The alcohol is high, giving the wine some heat, but the finish is thoroughly dry.

title: Mosby 2009 Primitivo (California)
excerpt: Excessively soft, this is a simple, rustic sipper. Pair this with fare ...
description: Excessively soft, this is a simple, rustic sipper. Pair this with fare like spaghetti with sausage.

title: Beaulieu Vineyard 2010 Coastal Estates Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Dry, acidic and simple, this has a vegetal along with flavors of ...
description: Dry, acidic and simple, this has a vegetal along with flavors of cherry and blackberry.

title: Trentadue 2009 La Storia Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: A simple Zinfandel, this is lacking in structure and balance, with overripe ...
description: A simple Zinfandel, this is lacking in structure and balance, with overripe and underripe flavors. The basic taste is of spicy, oaky blackberries, with a Porty heat from the high alcohol.

title: Big House 2010 Cardinal Zin Beastly Old Vines Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Dry and tannic, this has less-than-ripe flavors of green peppercorns, tobacco and ...
description: Dry and tannic, this has less-than-ripe flavors of green peppercorns, tobacco and cherries.

title: Puccioni 2009 Old Vine Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: With the alcohol clocking in at 16%, the wine has a taste ...
description: With the alcohol clocking in at 16%, the wine has a taste chili pepper, with raisin and plum notes.

title: Easton 2009 Late-Harvest Obscura Zinfandel (Fiddletown)
excerpt: Made from Sierra Foothills Zinfandel, this smells of grapes dried in the ...
description: Made from Sierra Foothills Zinfandel, this smells of grapes dried in the sun. This is delicately balanced, with just the right level of thickness and sweetness. Enjoy with plummy desserts or dark chocolate.

title: Manifesto! 2009 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This approachable, easy-drinking wine will please a range of different palates. Made ...
description: This approachable, easy-drinking wine will please a range of different palates. Made by Napa-based winemaker Jamey Whetstone, it has soft red-fruit flavor and a big finish.

title: Maryhill 2009 Zinfandel (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This sleek and herbal Zinfandel shows good balance, matching tart red fruits ...
description: This sleek and herbal Zinfandel shows good balance, matching tart red fruits against suggestions of dried leaves and spices. There is a smooth, chocolate and vanilla coating that masks the bitter edge on the finish.

title: Chatom Vineyards 2008 Zinfandel (Calaveras County)
excerpt: A hit-you-upside-the-head, floral Zin, with mountain tannins, and big blackberry and savory ...
description: A hit-you-upside-the-head, floral Zin, with mountain tannins, and big blackberry and savory leather flavors. Over time, the alcohol takes over.

title: De Loach 2009 OFS Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: If only more Zins were this good! De Loach hits this one ...
description: If only more Zins were this good! De Loach hits this one out of the park, with its fabulous wealth of wild berry, mocha, anise, spice, grilled meat and mushroom flavors. The high alcohol adds a wonderful varietal heat to the peppery finish.

title: Tormaresca 2007 Torcicoda Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: This lavish wine boats fine winemaking. Its beautiful flavors of plump cherry, ...
description: This lavish wine boats fine winemaking. Its beautiful flavors of plump cherry, leather, chocolate and tobacco are backed by soft tannins and a rich, round mouthfeel. This should pair with meat or pasta.

title: Tormaresca 2009 Torcicoda Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Soft, plush and bold, this is a modern and elegant wine. It ...
description: Soft, plush and bold, this is a modern and elegant wine. It opens with bright notes of cherry and blackberry, but also offers loads of toasted almond and dark chocolate on the close.

title: Tenute Rubino 2007 Visellio  (Primitivo del Salento)
excerpt: Visellio is a pretty wine from one of the most promising wineries ...
description: Visellio is a pretty wine from one of the most promising wineries in Puglia. It opens with an inky dark color and shows balance and harmony, with aromas of ripe blackberry and exotic spice. The mouthfeel is smooth and velvety.

title: Castello Monaci 2008 Artas Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Artas shows a ripe and pulpy quality, with bold aromas of blackberry, ...
description: Artas shows a ripe and pulpy quality, with bold aromas of blackberry, plum, savory spice and cured meat. The high alcohol is palpable, and the wine shows a strong, southern Italian personality that should pair well with aged cheese or grilled lamb sausage.

title: Vigne & Vini 2008 Papale  (Primitivo di Manduria)
excerpt: A wine that delivers a ripe, toasted expression, with flavors of blackberry, ...
description: A wine that delivers a ripe, toasted expression, with flavors of blackberry, plum, hazelnut and savory spice. It delivers a smooth, thick feeling on the finish.

title: Li Veli 2008 Orion Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: This is clean and subdued wine, without the overtly jammy and cooked ...
description: This is clean and subdued wine, without the overtly jammy and cooked aromas you sometimes find in southern Italian reds. The alcohol feels warm in the mouth; and the finish is marked by polished tannins and dark fruit.

title: Uvaggio 2010 Primitivo (Lodi)
excerpt: If only more California Primitivo could be made in this style - ...
description: If only more California Primitivo could be made in this style - soft, lower in alcohol, modestly showing its fruit - there would be more converts among Zin fanatics, who would be wowed by the subtle black cherry and licorice flavors and dry finish, minimally aged in oak.

title: Sebastiani 2009 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A rich, flashy Zinfandel, packed with spicy cherry, blackberry, cocoa and pepper ...
description: A rich, flashy Zinfandel, packed with spicy cherry, blackberry, cocoa and pepper flavors. Shows plenty of Dry Creek character in the firm tannins and briary, brambly mouthfeel. A sweet finish suggests pairing it with slightly sweet dishes, like ribs or chicken slathered in barbeque sauce.

title: Quackenbush 2009 Estate Zinfandel (Lake County)
excerpt: A good, everyday Zinfandel, robust in blackberry, raisin and chocolate flavors, wrapped ...
description: A good, everyday Zinfandel, robust in blackberry, raisin and chocolate flavors, wrapped into firm tannins. With its sweet finish, it will be a good companion to tomato-based barbecue.

title: Peachy Canyon 2010 Old Bailey Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Too sweet by far, this is almost a dessert wine, with overripe ...
description: Too sweet by far, this is almost a dessert wine, with overripe raisin and prune flavors alongside the blackberries. Sugar reprises on the finish, making it a little cloying.

title: XYZin 2009 Vine Age Series Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: A simple, rustic Zinfandel, sweet and fruity in cherry jam, red licorice, ...
description: A simple, rustic Zinfandel, sweet and fruity in cherry jam, red licorice, bacon and spice flavors, wrapped into robust tannins. The grapes were sourced from Sonoma, Mendocino and Lodi.

title: Peterson 2009 Bernier Zinyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Unbalanced, with lots of acidity, hard tannins and raisiny flavors alongside green ...
description: Unbalanced, with lots of acidity, hard tannins and raisiny flavors alongside green ones.

title: Peterson 2009 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Vegetal and a little unclean, with deficient acidity that makes the fruit ...
description: Vegetal and a little unclean, with deficient acidity that makes the fruit tastes insipid and sweet. Meanwhile, high alcohol makes it all hot.

title: Dry Creek Vineyard 2008 Old Vine Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Few Zins are this ripe and extravagant in flavor. It delivers an ...
description: Few Zins are this ripe and extravagant in flavor. It delivers an explosion of blackberry and cherry preserves, mint, olive tapenade, black pepper and sandalwood flavors, plus a bunch of other things too complex to list. A terrific example of the variety, at a fair price.

title: Daou 2009 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Rich and ripe in fruit, in the way of many Paso Robles ...
description: Rich and ripe in fruit, in the way of many Paso Robles reds. Offers forward blackberry, blueberry and cocoa flavors, sprinkled with pepper, and a few overripe notes of raisin. The alcohol is quite high, but balanced. One minor quibble is excessive softness.

title: Trio Vintners 2009 Far Away Vineyard Zinfandel (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Spicy cranberry fruit leads, sharp-edged and tight. This remains a tightly-focused Zinfandel, ...
description: Spicy cranberry fruit leads, sharp-edged and tight. This remains a tightly-focused Zinfandel, clearly Washington in style rather than California, with bright acidity and hints of herb and stem in the finish.

title: Animale 2009 Zinfandel (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Bright and concentrated raspberry fruit is the hallmark of this Washington Zinfandel, ...
description: Bright and concentrated raspberry fruit is the hallmark of this Washington Zinfandel, with the acidity it needs to support almost 16% alcohol. High-toned and juicy, the fruit shines, though the finish turns chalky.

title: Tierra Caliente 2008 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A soft, savory and fruity Zinfandel, with flavors of raspberries, cherries, cloves, ...
description: A soft, savory and fruity Zinfandel, with flavors of raspberries, cherries, cloves, black pepper and sandalwood. Drink now.

title: Goats Trail 2010 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: A difficult Zinfandel, harsh and scoury in the mouth, with mint, raspberry ...
description: A difficult Zinfandel, harsh and scoury in the mouth, with mint, raspberry jelly and black pepper flavors.

title: Ministry of the Vinterior 2009 The Messenger Old Vine Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Surprisingly unripe for an Amador County Zinfandel. Smells like dried twigs, turns ...
description: Surprisingly unripe for an Amador County Zinfandel. Smells like dried twigs, turns obscure and heavy in the mouth, with sweet cherry pie and prune flavors, framed in hard, green tannins.

title: Ancient Oak Cellars 2010 Pagnano Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: A superspicy Zin, marked by a blast of black pepper, clove and ...
description: A superspicy Zin, marked by a blast of black pepper, clove and anise. The flavors are extracted and sweet to the point of appearing overripe, with blackberries and prunes leading to a tannic, bitter finish. Drink now.

title: Seghesio 2009 Old Vine Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: As chewy and umami, salty delicious as a mouthful of crunchy bacon. ...
description: As chewy and umami, salty delicious as a mouthful of crunchy bacon. Throw in dried blackberries and blueberries, with a touch of smoky new oak, and that describes this fantastically pure, addictively good Zinfandel. The grape sourcing is from old vineyards in the Alexander and Dry Creek Valleys. Truly a great Zin, and relatively easy to find, with 9,000 cases produced.

title: Decoy 2009 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: For the second year in a row, Decoy has released one of ...
description: For the second year in a row, Decoy has released one of the best values in Zinfandel of the vintage. This year, Sonoma County is source to the grapes, and the wine shows classic wild berry, cola, anise, pepper and sandalwood flavors. Most remarkable is the tannic structure, which is smooth and distinguished. Easy to find, with 15,000 cases produced.

title: McCay Cellars 2008 Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: That this small-lot Lodi producer has ventured out to the Russian River ...
description: That this small-lot Lodi producer has ventured out to the Russian River Valley for Zinfandel says something here and it says it with finesse, this being austere for Zin, not jammy, with enviable structure and a nice lift of black cherry, spicy cola and earth at the end.

title: Deaver 2008 Old Vine 1867 Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Why yes this is mountain Zin with a lot of Dr. Pepper, ...
description: Why yes this is mountain Zin with a lot of Dr. Pepper, sarsaparilla happening aromatically and then a mouthful of thick, savory, herbal, raspberry jam with soft tannins and a just-right note of earthiness too.

title: St. Francis 2009 Montecillo Vineyard Kaarin's Terrace Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: A huge Zinfandel, with ultraripe, powerful berry, cocoa, bacon and spice flavors. ...
description: A huge Zinfandel, with ultraripe, powerful berry, cocoa, bacon and spice flavors. That tremendous power comes at the cost of exceptionally high alcohol, which gives the wine a chili pepper burn. Forewarned is forearmed.

title: Beaver Creek 2008 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: The Lake County producer travels to Dry Creek for this Zin with ...
description: The Lake County producer travels to Dry Creek for this Zin with good results. The wine has a lot of cherry cola and a hint of oaky smoke, its tannins well integrated into flavors of nuts and mint and an herbal finish.

title: Michael David 2009 Sloth Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: Michael David is going outside of Lodi to make this, for them, ...
description: Michael David is going outside of Lodi to make this, for them, small-production wine, sourced from vineyards near Hopland owned and run by the Nelson family. It remains true to the MD style having spent 15 months in American oak with blackberry pie, a handful of earth and spicy cinnamon on the finish. Fleshy and full and thick as syrup.

title: Michael David 2009 Lust Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Nothing small about this wine. A super-dark, ripe, juicy Zin full of ...
description: Nothing small about this wine. A super-dark, ripe, juicy Zin full of oak and bacon flavors, lusty in every imaginable way, but not for everyone. Aged 18 months in American oak and edging into Port territory, drink this in moderation or have a nap spot picked out nearby.

title: Zinfandelic 2008 Old Vine Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: The label will appeal to anyone interested in peace, love and understanding. ...
description: The label will appeal to anyone interested in peace, love and understanding. The wine, with its bright fruit notes of raspberry and cherry, medium in weight, could have used a little more magic.

title: Hannah Nicole Vineyards 2009 Zinfandel (Contra Costa County)
excerpt: An okay, light- to medium-weight Zinfandel that veers into stewy flavors and ...
description: An okay, light- to medium-weight Zinfandel that veers into stewy flavors and aromas before falling a tad flat on the finish.

title: McFadden 2009 Old Vine Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: A very minty old vine Zin from organically farmed grapes that tastes ...
description: A very minty old vine Zin from organically farmed grapes that tastes of not-quite-ripe strawberry jam and is otherwise smooth and peppery.

title: Deaver 2008 Ten Zin Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: This high-alcohol mountain Zin seems to have already lost its zip, dominated ...
description: This high-alcohol mountain Zin seems to have already lost its zip, dominated by a raisiny overripeness that skirts dangerously into syrup land.

title: Deaver 2008 Nana's Vineyard Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Nana was probably a wonderful woman but this Zin is a little ...
description: Nana was probably a wonderful woman but this Zin is a little musky, closed off and chewy with a taste of cherry cordial and baked plum jam.

title: Zina Hyde Cunningham 2006 Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: A rustic, tannic Zin, with sweet flavors of red berries, oranges and ...
description: A rustic, tannic Zin, with sweet flavors of red berries, oranges and pepper that finish with a scour of acidity.

title: Zin 91 2010 Old Vine Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: This Zin is too sweet and simple. Tastes like raspberry tea with ...
description: This Zin is too sweet and simple. Tastes like raspberry tea with a couple spoons of white sugar.

title: Donovan-Parke 2010 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: A hard wine, tough and tannic, and overripe, with raisiny flavors, including ...
description: A hard wine, tough and tannic, and overripe, with raisiny flavors, including some bitterness from shriveled grape skins.

title: Maddalena 2009 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Way too sweet for comfort, with sugary berry flavors. High alcohol gives ...
description: Way too sweet for comfort, with sugary berry flavors. High alcohol gives it a burn.

title: Forbidden Zin 2009 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Hard to like, with vegetal and sugared raspberry flavors.
description: Hard to like, with vegetal and sugared raspberry flavors.

title: Ledson 2007 Reserve Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A very great success, although it is expensive. Shows perfect Dry Creek ...
description: A very great success, although it is expensive. Shows perfect Dry Creek Zinny character, with briary, brambly wild forest berry fruit, cola and spices, and a savory note of grilled meat. The finish is dry and balanced. More than half the oak barrels were new French, giving the wine a rich coat of toast. Drink this beauty now and over the next eight years.

title: Angel Vine 2009 Zinfandel (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Angel Vine sources excellent fruit, and makes what is arguably the most ...
description: Angel Vine sources excellent fruit, and makes what is arguably the most hedonistic, California-style Zinfandel in the Northwest. Here blended with 13% Primitivo, the sweet and liquorous berry fruit flavors are deep and luxurious. Buttressed with juicy natural acidity, this wine does not show its 14.8% alcohol.

title: Angel Vine 2009 Les Collines Vineyard Zinfandel (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: Significantly lighter than its companion Zins, this stylish effort shows the strawberry ...
description: Significantly lighter than its companion Zins, this stylish effort shows the strawberry side of the versatile grape. Textural and nicely balanced, it is substantial enough to still be drinking quite well a full 24 hours after first being opened.

title: Andis 2009 Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: No doubt this is mountain grown Zin, still tight but revealing nice ...
description: No doubt this is mountain grown Zin, still tight but revealing nice aromatics of cherry and spicy licorice on the finish, accompanied by a healthy helping of espresso, wrapped in smooth tannins all around. Should only get better over the next year or two.

title: McCay Cellars 2008 Equity Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Soft and dense with dark fruit, almost baked fruit flavors, that veer ...
description: Soft and dense with dark fruit, almost baked fruit flavors, that veer into nuts and vanilla, an easy-drinking Zin blended with a smidge of Zin from the 2009 and 2010 vintages as well as 7% Petite Sirah crafted by a Lodi producer to watch.

title: Dashe Cellars 2009 Florence Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A big, strong, spicy Zinfandel, packed with wild berry, currant, licorice, cola, ...
description: A big, strong, spicy Zinfandel, packed with wild berry, currant, licorice, cola, clove and white pepper flavors that finish dry and tannic. Drink this potent wine with barbecued pork, chicken and beef, slathered in spicy sauce.

title: Kenneth Volk 2009 Enz Vineyard Zinfandel (Lime Kiln Valley)
excerpt: A big, bold Zin, with a kick of peppery spices. Really front-loaded ...
description: A big, bold Zin, with a kick of peppery spices. Really front-loaded with wild berry, currant, cherry pie and sweet tobacco flavors. Nothing subtle about this barbecue-friendly powerhouse.

title: Kokomo 2009 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A solid Zinfandel, a little sweet but not too much, with softly ...
description: A solid Zinfandel, a little sweet but not too much, with softly drinkable tannins. The flavors are ripe, suggesting raspberries, cherries, mocha, brown sugar, cinnamon and cloves.

title: Thurston Wolfe 2009 Howling Wolfe Zinfandel (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: A rough-and-tumble style, full throttle, with throat-burning cherry fruit, chocolate and plenty ...
description: A rough-and-tumble style, full throttle, with throat-burning cherry fruit, chocolate and plenty of alcohol.

title: Bargetto 2004 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Basic country-style Zin, dry and on the harsh side tannin-wise, with some ...
description: Basic country-style Zin, dry and on the harsh side tannin-wise, with some green, mint and dried herb flavors to the brambly wild berry fruit. This is a gulping wine for backyard barbecues.

title: Moss Roxx 2006 Ancient Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: In a giant-sized 750 ml bottle, this Zin is flat and tastes ...
description: In a giant-sized 750 ml bottle, this Zin is flat and tastes higher in alcohol than it is.

title: Elyse 2008 Black-Sears Vineyard Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: The grapes for this Zin come from high up on Howell Mountain, ...
description: The grapes for this Zin come from high up on Howell Mountain, which accounts for their concentration. Massive in blackberries, mushu plum, mocha and spices, its initial taste is as sweet as jam. But it turns dry and minerally on the finish. A delicious, softly tannic wine to drink now and for the next six years.

title: Gary Farrell 2009 Sonoma County Selection Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: This is a soft and easy-to-drink Zinfandel. A blend of Dry Creek ...
description: This is a soft and easy-to-drink Zinfandel. A blend of Dry Creek and Russian River fruit, it has ripe wild berry, mocha, licorice and pepper flavors, with a touch of sweet oak.

title: Schola Sarmenti di Terrulenta 2008 Corimei Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: The concept of a dessert wine made with hearty red Primitivo grapes ...
description: The concept of a dessert wine made with hearty red Primitivo grapes is very rare indeed, but this producer pulls it off with style and confidence. Smoky barbecue tones and jammy aromas of blackberry preserves set the stage. Bitter tannins mark the close.

title: Sobon Estate 2008 ReZerve Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: A gigantic, tannic monster of a Zin with full fruit flavors of ...
description: A gigantic, tannic monster of a Zin with full fruit flavors of cranberry, ripe plum and plenty of oak. Well-made for certain, with cigar and licorice.

title: XYZin 2009 100 Year Old Vines Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A big, full-bodied, rich Zinfandel, bone dry and spicy, with impressive flavors ...
description: A big, full-bodied, rich Zinfandel, bone dry and spicy, with impressive flavors of wild berries, herbs, balsam and smoke. Needs equally big fare to stand up to, like barbecue slathered in sauce.

title: Calicaro 2009 Zig Zag Alley Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A good Zinfandel, rich and spicy in wild berry, tobacco, anise and ...
description: A good Zinfandel, rich and spicy in wild berry, tobacco, anise and sweet cedar flavors that are just a little sweet in alcohol. Easy to drink with barbecue, or try Vietnamese or Mexican beef dishes.

title: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi 2010 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: A solid Zinfandel, dry and stylish. Not a blockbuster, just a well-crafted ...
description: A solid Zinfandel, dry and stylish. Not a blockbuster, just a well-crafted wine that offers nice berry, cherry, tobacco and spice flavors.

title: Saini 2009 Olive Block Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A heavy, sweet Zin, with very ripe blackberry jam, licorice and cola ...
description: A heavy, sweet Zin, with very ripe blackberry jam, licorice and cola flavors, liberally spiced with pepper and cloves. Big and high in alcohol, in the way of rustic Dry Creek Valley Zins.

title: XYZin 2009 50 Year Old Vines Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Robust and deeply flavored in wild berry, tobacco, smoked meat and spice ...
description: Robust and deeply flavored in wild berry, tobacco, smoked meat and spice flavors. A somewhat rustic wine that needs big, rich roasts and barbecue.

title: Shenandoah 2010 Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: An attractive price for a straightforward, Amador County Zin, full-bodied and tasting ...
description: An attractive price for a straightforward, Amador County Zin, full-bodied and tasting of ripe blackberries and cocoa.

title: Francis Coppola 2009 Red Label Diamond Collection Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Smooth, lusty and sweet in fruit, this Zin brims with jammy flavors ...
description: Smooth, lusty and sweet in fruit, this Zin brims with jammy flavors of cherries, blackberries and currants. The cinnamon and pepper spices suggest drinking with spicy meat and poultry dishes.

title: Klinker Brick 2009 Old Ghost Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: At 15.9% alcohol, aged 14 months in American oak, this Zin is ...
description: At 15.9% alcohol, aged 14 months in American oak, this Zin is for those who like a mouthful of hardcore meaty, gamy, oaky intensity. From old vines grown near the Mokelumne River.

title: Saini 2008 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A good Zinfandel, dry and spicy, if a little rustic. Feels gritty ...
description: A good Zinfandel, dry and spicy, if a little rustic. Feels gritty and chewy in the mouth, with wild berry, red licorice, prune and cola flavors that finish a bit hot in alcohol.

title: Saini 2009 Apple Block Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A good Zinfandel, nice to drink with sweet, salty meat foods, like ...
description: A good Zinfandel, nice to drink with sweet, salty meat foods, like sausage-based tomato sauce with pasta. It shows tannin-infused, sugary flavors of cherries, blackberries and buttered cinnamon toast.

title: Rock Wall 2009 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Thin and uninteresting, with vague cherry, berry and spice flavors that taste ...
description: Thin and uninteresting, with vague cherry, berry and spice flavors that taste a little sweet. Gets the basic Zinfandel job done.

title: Del Carlo Winery 2008 Old Vine Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A nasty wine, dirty, hot and harsh. Almost undrinkable, except for some ...
description: A nasty wine, dirty, hot and harsh. Almost undrinkable, except for some decent berry flavors.

title: Truett Hurst 2009 Rattler Rock Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Classic Dry Creek Zinfandel, dry and brawny and high in alcohol. Pair ...
description: Classic Dry Creek Zinfandel, dry and brawny and high in alcohol. Pair the wild blackberry, nettle, anise and pepper flavors with a spice-rubbed, smoky grilled steak.

title: Rock Wall 2009 Live Oak Vineyard Zinfandel (Contra Costa County)
excerpt: A very herbal Zin from a five-acre Oakley plot, funky and stewy ...
description: A very herbal Zin from a five-acre Oakley plot, funky and stewy at first, then rich, full-bodied with a lot of caramel and toffee going on. A great deal at $16 for big Zin lovers.

title: Ridge 2009 Pagani Ranch Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Tastes too sweet by far, with sugared black cherry, currant, prune and ...
description: Tastes too sweet by far, with sugared black cherry, currant, prune and tobacco flavors. The sweetness may be partially attributed to high alcohol. With thick tannins, this Zin is just too rustic to merit a higher score.

title: Ravenswood 2008 Big River Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Pretty good, but marred by some vegetal flavors, like asparagus. The tannins ...
description: Pretty good, but marred by some vegetal flavors, like asparagus. The tannins are rich and smooth, and the finish is dry and a little hot.

title: Trentadue 2009 Estate Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: With some heat from alcohol, this is a fruity, peppery Zin, brawny ...
description: With some heat from alcohol, this is a fruity, peppery Zin, brawny and bold. All it wants is simple fare, like cheeseburgers, lasagna, spaghetti with meatballs or a beef tamale.

title: Trione 2009 Home Ranch Primitivo (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Blended with 18% Zinfandel, this is a toughly acidic, tannic wine, rather ...
description: Blended with 18% Zinfandel, this is a toughly acidic, tannic wine, rather rustic in its way. Strong acidity perks up cherry and berry flavors that are hot on the finish, giving the wine a sweet and sour fruit sauce taste.

title: Four Vines 2009 OVC Old Vine Cuvee Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Frankly sweet and sugary, with raspberry and cherry jam flavors sprinkled with ...
description: Frankly sweet and sugary, with raspberry and cherry jam flavors sprinkled with cinnamon and pepper. An easy, everyday Zin, at a fair price.

title: Cameron Hughes 2009 Lot 219 Monte Rosso Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: A bit of a disappointment from this famed vineyard. The wine is ...
description: A bit of a disappointment from this famed vineyard. The wine is uneven, with sweetly candied cherry flavors alongside unripe vegetal notes.

title: Carmenet 2009 Vintner's Collection Reserve Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Weirdly acidic and sweet, with cloying raspberry Lifesaver candy flavors.
description: Weirdly acidic and sweet, with cloying raspberry Lifesaver candy flavors.

title: Jigar 2009 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Too high in alcohol and too overtly sweet in sugar. Tastes like ...
description: Too high in alcohol and too overtly sweet in sugar. Tastes like an inexpensive Port.

title: Newsome-Harlow 2009 Herbert Vineyard, Old Vine Zinfandel (El Dorado County)
excerpt: A new vineyard source for Newsome-Harlow and arguably its best single-vineyard designated ...
description: A new vineyard source for Newsome-Harlow and arguably its best single-vineyard designated Zin out of a lineup of superbly delicious Zins. With a heady raspberry and blackberry nose, this Zin is classically lush and intense yet silky smooth in the mouth, tinged by hints of black pepper and licorice. Altogether so, so good.

title: Newsome-Harlow 2009 The Donner Party, Dalton Vineyard Zinfandel (Calaveras County)
excerpt: The Dalton Vineyard is a beloved and prized source for winemaker Scott ...
description: The Dalton Vineyard is a beloved and prized source for winemaker Scott Klann. A cellar-worthy Zin with a floral nose of violets and earthy, blue fruit that segues slowly into structured tannins, bleedingly ripe plum notes and a spicy, almost leathery finish. The enological equivalent of Kurt Cobain acoustic in a thrift-store sweater, its raw power just waiting for a chance to surge.

title: Newsome-Harlow 2009 Big John, Big John's Vineyard Zin Zinfandel (Calaveras County)
excerpt: Big John is as big and strong as its name, with bacony, ...
description: Big John is as big and strong as its name, with bacony, briary flavors and yet magically very refined and subtle in a way, like Nina Simone singing a sultry ballad full of melancholy and mirth. A pleasantly pronounced kiss of vanilla finishes things off. Pair with spicy sausage and other meats.

title: Newsome-Harlow 2009 Zinfandel (Calaveras County)
excerpt: Winemaker Scott Klann does Calaveras County proud with this Zin from several ...
description: Winemaker Scott Klann does Calaveras County proud with this Zin from several area vineyards, its fruit slightly more subdued at first than in his single-vineyard efforts but still buzzing with raspberry and blueberry goodness, plenty of Zinny spice and a rocking, savory finish.

title: Sextant 2009 Wheelhouse Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: A little high in alcohol, as is the Paso Robles way, but ...
description: A little high in alcohol, as is the Paso Robles way, but really a very lush and pleasurable Zinfandel. Softly tannic and slightly sweet, it floods the mouth with ripe flavors of raspberries, black cherries, mocha, cinnamon and pepper.

title: Salvatore Principe 2009 Take Flight, Artists Collection Limited Edition Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: For $9 a nice wine in a nice package, made from old-vine ...
description: For $9 a nice wine in a nice package, made from old-vine Zinfandel from Lodi. The red fruit on the nose pops out pleasantly followed by smooth tannins and a fruity, chocolaty mix of flavors.

title: Sausal 2008 Private Reserve Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: A soft, simple Zinfandel, front-loaded with raspberry, cherry, cola, spice and sweet ...
description: A soft, simple Zinfandel, front-loaded with raspberry, cherry, cola, spice and sweet oak and vanilla flavors. Drink now with barbecue.

title: Dunning Vineyards 2009 Ridge Top Westside Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: High alcohol gives this Zin heat and also a glycerine sweetness. Residual ...
description: High alcohol gives this Zin heat and also a glycerine sweetness. Residual sugar may contribute to the sweet taste. The flavors are of raspberries, cherries and caramelized oak.

title: Dancing Bull 2009 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: A big, rich, thick Zinfandel, jammy in raspberries, blackberries and cherries, with ...
description: A big, rich, thick Zinfandel, jammy in raspberries, blackberries and cherries, with a bubblegum gassiness. Drink now with burgers, ribs, pasta marinara.

title: Prospero 2009 Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Smells and tastes gassy and bubblegummy, like a simple Beaujolais, with strawberry ...
description: Smells and tastes gassy and bubblegummy, like a simple Beaujolais, with strawberry and raspberry flavors, brightened with acidity. Okay for picnics and such.

title: Troon 2009 Kubli Bench Zinfandel (Applegate Valley)
excerpt: Although the blend includes 20% Primitivo and 5% Petite Sirah, which might ...
description: Although the blend includes 20% Primitivo and 5% Petite Sirah, which might be expected to add some tannic muscle to the wine, this is a simple red quaffer, with light raspberry fruit and a hint of milk chocolate.

title: VJB 2007 Primitivo (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: A soft, semisweet, candied wine, lacking complexity. Shows raspberry, cherry, dark chocolate ...
description: A soft, semisweet, candied wine, lacking complexity. Shows raspberry, cherry, dark chocolate and spice flavors.

title: Zinopolis 2010 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: A rugged, sweet Zinfandel for drinking now with easy fare. Shows blackberry, ...
description: A rugged, sweet Zinfandel for drinking now with easy fare. Shows blackberry, cherry and raspberry flavors, liberally spiced.

title: Sextant 2008 Holystone Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: High in alcohol, this is a hot, sweet Zinfandel, with simple, Porty ...
description: High in alcohol, this is a hot, sweet Zinfandel, with simple, Porty flavors of raspberries, cherries and chocolate. If this is your style, enjoy.

title: Parkers Estate 2010 Dillon Springs Road Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: A tough, tannic wine, bitter and dry, with thin berry and tobacco ...
description: A tough, tannic wine, bitter and dry, with thin berry and tobacco flavors.

title: Sausal 2008 Family Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Soft and dull, with unripe vegetal notes alongside the sweet cola and ...
description: Soft and dull, with unripe vegetal notes alongside the sweet cola and blackberries.

title: Glen Ellen 2009 Proprietor's Reserve Old Vine Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: A big bottle of uber-sweet strawberry pie and blackberries right before they ...
description: A big bottle of uber-sweet strawberry pie and blackberries right before they get mushy. The aromas are not terribly inviting from the outset. Fairly neutral in taste, then veers sweet.

title: Sharabella Wines 2009 Artistica Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: This old-vine Zin tastes of tar and overripe fruit and is blandly ...
description: This old-vine Zin tastes of tar and overripe fruit and is blandly sweet.

title: Philo Ridge 2007 Bliss Ranch Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: This wine from the hills above Anderson Valley needed time to open ...
description: This wine from the hills above Anderson Valley needed time to open but once it did it revealed itself to be a very good, cool-climate version of the variety. This is full of blackberry and peppery spice, its high acidity perfect for a range of food.

title: C.G. di Arie 2008 Estate Grown, Block 4 Primitivo (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
excerpt: This Sierra Foothills Primitivo smells good, lively and of dark, berries, which ...
description: This Sierra Foothills Primitivo smells good, lively and of dark, berries, which carry into the taste of the wine. Well-integrated and the alcohol reined in, this effort finishes with a lasting note of cocoa.

title: Noceto 2007 OGP - The Original Grandpere Vineyard Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Noceto is a Sangiovese specialist in the Sierra Foothills but does a ...
description: Noceto is a Sangiovese specialist in the Sierra Foothills but does a nice job with Zinfandel here, sourcing from the "original" Grandpere Vineyard, which dates back to the 1860s and which the winery says may be the oldest producing Zin vineyard in the world. The wine is classic old-vine, good and juicy with blackberry predominant, but also tannic and brambly, dusty even, with a hint of mint.

title: Amador Foothill Winery 2007 Esola Vineyard Zinfandel (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
excerpt: A very nicely priced Zin from 66-year-old, dry-farmed Sierra Foothills vines that ...
description: A very nicely priced Zin from 66-year-old, dry-farmed Sierra Foothills vines that has an intense spiciness right from the get-go and is appropriately tannic and meaty, big and classic for its historical roots. Plum, blackberry and tobacco predominate and already with four years of age, this one could age more.

title: J. Keverson 2008 Buck Hill Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: This Zin is very rich and elaborate in chocolate, raspberry jam and ...
description: This Zin is very rich and elaborate in chocolate, raspberry jam and white pepper spice, and high alcohol gives it a glycerine sweetness. But a crisp streak of acidity provides needed balance. Drink now with barbecue, Chinese mushu pork, Mexican beef dishes.
