title: Madrigal 2008 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Lots of sweet fruit in this Zin. Floods the mouth with red, ...
description: Lots of sweet fruit in this Zin. Floods the mouth with red, blue and black berries, sprinkled with dusty Indian spices and finished with a dash of cocoa. Nice tannins give it a fine structure.

title: De Loach 2009 Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: A solid Zin for everyday drinking. A little rough and thin, but ...
description: A solid Zin for everyday drinking. A little rough and thin, but dry and spicy, with berry, currant and teriaki flavors.

title: Cedar Mountain 2009 Reserve Zinfandel (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: A big and intense Zin with a pucker that holds on, this ...
description: A big and intense Zin with a pucker that holds on, this Livermore red is heavy and a bit dull aromatically, opening up to show spice, black fruit and cedar but overall it finishes short.

title: Nelson Family Vineyards 2007 Estate Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: This estate-grown inland Mendocino Zin has an inviting spiciness and is plenty ...
description: This estate-grown inland Mendocino Zin has an inviting spiciness and is plenty briary with a full body of flavor but its high-alcohol level masks any other nuances.

title: J. Keverson 2008 Thurow Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: The alcohol on this wine is 16.2%, so high that it makes ...
description: The alcohol on this wine is 16.2%, so high that it makes the wine taste as sweet as Port. There may even be residual sugar, giving it the taste of blackberry jam and chocolate.

title: Clos La Chance 2009 Estate Zinfandel (Central Coast)
excerpt: Loaded with raspberry, cherry, cola, raisin and spice flavors, this Zinfandel is ...
description: Loaded with raspberry, cherry, cola, raisin and spice flavors, this Zinfandel is useful for pairing with barbecue. A nice Reuben sandwich will also star. The wine is rustically likeable.

title: Rock Wall 2009 Westphall Ridge Vineyard Rockpile Road Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: A somewhat rustic wine, edgy in tannins and not quite ripe yet ...
description: A somewhat rustic wine, edgy in tannins and not quite ripe yet jammy at the same time, with olive, herb, blackberry and oak flavors. The spices are the nicest part.

title: Adelaida 2008 Michael's Vineyard Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Soft and sweet, like a melted fruit tart dessert in wine form. ...
description: Soft and sweet, like a melted fruit tart dessert in wine form. High alcohol gives a burn to the Porty raisin, blackberry and chocolate flavors.

title: Sorelle Winery 2009 Sorriso Primitivo (Lodi)
excerpt: Tight and tannic, like red brick, bread and caramel, this Lodi Primitivo ...
description: Tight and tannic, like red brick, bread and caramel, this Lodi Primitivo has 5% Barbera mixed in but the entire effort tastes of not-quite-ripe blackberries.

title: Cedar Mountain 2007 Hansen Vineyard Reserve Zinfandel (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: Funky with prune and tobacco overwhelming any fresher fruit, this Livermore Zin ...
description: Funky with prune and tobacco overwhelming any fresher fruit, this Livermore Zin is high in alcohol (15.8%), which coats the tongue for a long time after the wine goes down.

title: Glen Ellen 2009 Old Vine Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Pretty good for the price, with jammy cherry, berry, cocoa and spice ...
description: Pretty good for the price, with jammy cherry, berry, cocoa and spice flavors. An easy Zin to drink with BBQ or pasta with tomato sauce.

title: Manzanita Creek 2005 Carreras Ranch Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A heavy, sweet Zin. With 16% alcohol, it tastes like a simple ...
description: A heavy, sweet Zin. With 16% alcohol, it tastes like a simple Port, with raisin, blackberry and chocolate flavors.

title: Wellington 2007 Meeks Hilltop Ranch Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Thin and simple, with ripe wild berry, cherry, currant, tobacco and pepper ...
description: Thin and simple, with ripe wild berry, cherry, currant, tobacco and pepper spice flavors that finish dry and watery.

title: Manzanita Creek 2008 Three Vines Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Sweet and Porty, an overripe wine with lots of ripe, jammy fruit ...
description: Sweet and Porty, an overripe wine with lots of ripe, jammy fruit and a hot finish.

title: Glen Ellen 2010 White Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: A little on the sweet, soft side. The flavors are of orange ...
description: A little on the sweet, soft side. The flavors are of orange tea, honey and cinnamon.

title: Scott Harvey 2008 Mountain Selection Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: This mountain Zin is aromatically akin to flat cola and alcohol, its ...
description: This mountain Zin is aromatically akin to flat cola and alcohol, its tannins towering over the fruit like fortress bullies.

title: Renwood 2008 Fiddletown Zinfandel (Fiddletown)
excerpt: This Fiddletown Zin, a yearly offering from Renwood, has a slight burnt ...
description: This Fiddletown Zin, a yearly offering from Renwood, has a slight burnt smell of strong coffee and a burn on its finish, perhaps due to the high alcohol.

title: Ottimino Vineyards 2007 Von Weidlich Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Shows a delicate texture, almost Pinot Noir-like in lightness, yet offers a ...
description: Shows a delicate texture, almost Pinot Noir-like in lightness, yet offers a blast of berry, spice, tobacco, cola and bacon flavors that are lusty and ripe. The grapes come from the Green Valley, and the alcohol is low while acidity is high. Beautiful and classy, a Zin to drink with everything from salmon and steak to tuna and short ribs.

title: Bonterra 2009 Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: Bonterra continues to make great wines at affordable prices, all from organically ...
description: Bonterra continues to make great wines at affordable prices, all from organically grown grapes. With blueberry pie and clove predominating, the wine is tannic, super-structured, with a spicy finish. A good deal for sure.

title: Saracina 2009 Pick and Shovel Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: Plenty of dark plum and blackberry going on here, from a Zin ...
description: Plenty of dark plum and blackberry going on here, from a Zin sourced from two organically farmed vineyards. Low berry weights from the dry vintage have contributed to a concentrated wine here, with soft tannins and some spiciness, an overall balanced wine.

title: Armida 2009 Tina's Block Maple Vineyards Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Lusty, rich and tannic, this rustic-chic Zin trades elegance and subtlety for ...
description: Lusty, rich and tannic, this rustic-chic Zin trades elegance and subtlety for sheer dynamic power. Its wild blackberry, cola and mulberry flavors tread the fine line between dry and off-dry, exploding in the mouth, then finishing in a scour of astringency.

title: Artezin 2009 Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: Classic in style with raspberry and spice dominating, the wine overall is ...
description: Classic in style with raspberry and spice dominating, the wine overall is supple and lush.

title: Armida 2009 Poizin Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Fairly simple in appeal, with candied, sweet and sour cherry flavors, like ...
description: Fairly simple in appeal, with candied, sweet and sour cherry flavors, like a cough drop. Tannic, too, hitting the palate with sandpapery astringency. But earns extra credit for dryness and a rich smoked meat note that makes it a partner for barbecue.

title: Gracianna 2009 Bacigalupi Vneyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This is a strongly flavored Zinfandel, not particularly graceful or subtle. It ...
description: This is a strongly flavored Zinfandel, not particularly graceful or subtle. It kicks you in the head with ripe, jammy raspberry, cherry and blackberry fruit, with sweet overtones of chocolate and anise. The alcohol is very high and makes the wine feel hot.

title: Armida 2009 Maple Vineyards Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Ripe to the point of overripe, with dried blackberry, cherry and raisin ...
description: Ripe to the point of overripe, with dried blackberry, cherry and raisin flavors, this Zin also is hot in alcohol. Drink now with rich, fatty barbecue to soften its tough tannins.

title: Hearst Ranch 2007 Enchantment Late Harvest Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Sweet enough, but thin and simple, with a hint of black cherries ...
description: Sweet enough, but thin and simple, with a hint of black cherries and chocolate. The alcohol shows through as heat.

title: The Industrial 2009 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Soft, hot in alcohol and sweet, this simple wine tastes like melted ...
description: Soft, hot in alcohol and sweet, this simple wine tastes like melted raspberry and cherry jam.

title: Grands Amis Winery 2008 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: A sweet Lodi Zin with much chocolate and mint from beginning to ...
description: A sweet Lodi Zin with much chocolate and mint from beginning to end.

title: Seven Deadly Zins 2008 Old Vine Zinfandel Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Yes, there are notes of sweet plum and pepper, but otherwise the ...
description: Yes, there are notes of sweet plum and pepper, but otherwise the wine is soft, with wafts of bacon and meat, the smooth tannins a tad dull.

title: Saucelito Canyon 2009 Estate Zinfandel (Arroyo Grande Valley)
excerpt: Dry, sharp and raisiny, a tough wine to like. Shows all kinds ...
description: Dry, sharp and raisiny, a tough wine to like. Shows all kinds of imbalances, from too much acidity to an absence of fruit.

title: Big House 2009 Cardinal Zin Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: A thin, dull wine, with simple berry jam flavors that finish sweet. ...
description: A thin, dull wine, with simple berry jam flavors that finish sweet. Okay for big parties.

title: Villa San Juliette 2009 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: This is a simple, overripe Zin. It has flavors of raisins and ...
description: This is a simple, overripe Zin. It has flavors of raisins and chocolate, with excessively high alcohol, officially 16% but tastes even higher. More like Port than a table wine.

title: Miraflores 2008 Herbert Vineyard Zinfandel (El Dorado)
excerpt: A bigger, chewier, deliciously made version of Miraflores estate bottling, the Herbert ...
description: A bigger, chewier, deliciously made version of Miraflores estate bottling, the Herbert Vineyard is dry and smooth, a Zin of blackberry and pepper notes throughout with a finish that could go on for days. Made by Marco Cappelli, who bought the Frank Herbert Vineyard in the town of Fair Play in 2002.

title: Main & Geary 2009 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: An ambitious wine, obviously grown from low yielding vines whose fruity flavors ...
description: An ambitious wine, obviously grown from low yielding vines whose fruity flavors have been concentrated into wild blackberries and cherries, finished with the exotic spices that characterize Dry Creek Zinfandel. A very good Zin for the price.

title: Novy 2009 Papera Ranch Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Shows plenty of Zinfandel flavors, on steroids, with amazingly ripe, powerful wild ...
description: Shows plenty of Zinfandel flavors, on steroids, with amazingly ripe, powerful wild red berry, cola, mocha, sweet sandalwood and baking spice flavors, wrapped into smooth, sweet tannins. This lusty Zinfandel is best now with a beautifully grilled steak.

title: Chatom Vineyards 2007 Zinfandel (Calaveras County)
excerpt: Deep purple in color with a yeasty nose, this Zin from the ...
description: Deep purple in color with a yeasty nose, this Zin from the southern end of the Sierra Foothills is structured and intense, dry and more spicy than fruity, with plenty of savory pepper and chocolate throughout. Its 15.5% alcohol level adds a whole other layer of size. Pair with some serious barbecue.

title: Dutton-Goldfield 2009 Dutton Ranch - Morelli Lane Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Sweet in wild raspberry, cherry and milk chocolate flavors, with pretty tannins. ...
description: Sweet in wild raspberry, cherry and milk chocolate flavors, with pretty tannins. A bit on the soft, direct side, but really delicious, with loads of exotic spices. Drink now.

title: Claudia Springs 2007 Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: Muted at first, this wine opens up nicely with time. Sweet, ripe ...
description: Muted at first, this wine opens up nicely with time. Sweet, ripe and easy on the finish, its core is full of black pepper and clove. The grapes are sourced from several distinctive vineyards in Mendocino County. Drink it with a steak.

title: Mauritson 2009 Jack's Cabin Zinfandel (Rockpile)
excerpt: Sugary sweet, while very high alcohol adds even sweeter tastes of glycerine. ...
description: Sugary sweet, while very high alcohol adds even sweeter tastes of glycerine. The wine itself is jammy in raspberries and blackberries. A big, lusty, tannic wine whose power will be balanced with rich barbecue.

title: Brazin 2008 Old Vines Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: A mighty big Zin from Lodi, 15% alcohol, full of sweet berries ...
description: A mighty big Zin from Lodi, 15% alcohol, full of sweet berries and vanilla flavor. Should be easy to find and a good match for backyard barbecue.

title: 6 North 2009 The Big Cat Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A rugged, fierce wine, brusque in tannins, that needs big, rich meats ...
description: A rugged, fierce wine, brusque in tannins, that needs big, rich meats and oils to balance it out. Short ribs and similar fare will play well against the blackberry and raisin flavors of this high-alcohol Zin.

title: Zucca 2009 Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: A very small production Amador Zinfandel that starts off stewy and muted, ...
description: A very small production Amador Zinfandel that starts off stewy and muted, reminiscent of Dr. Pepper, but smoothes itself out into a balanced, jammy and satisfactory wine.

title: Andretti 2009 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A dull wine, lacking zest, with extracted, soft flavors of berries, currants, ...
description: A dull wine, lacking zest, with extracted, soft flavors of berries, currants, anise, milk chocolate and spices that turn overripe on the finish. Pretty expensive for what you get.

title: Mettler Family Vineyards 2008 Epicenter Old Vine Zinfandel Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: So incredibly big and meaty, this old-vine Zinfandel lists itself at 15.8% ...
description: So incredibly big and meaty, this old-vine Zinfandel lists itself at 15.8% alcohol and is indeed sweet but not jammy.

title: Perry Creek 2008 Altitude: 2401 Zinfandel (El Dorado)
excerpt: Not a lot of aromas in this 14.9% old-vine Zin, though a ...
description: Not a lot of aromas in this 14.9% old-vine Zin, though a touch of fruit shows up mid-palate. Pretty so-so.

title: Bargetto 2008 Old Vine Zinfandel Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: The Santa Cruz producer Bargetto ventures into Lodi to make this old-vine ...
description: The Santa Cruz producer Bargetto ventures into Lodi to make this old-vine Zin and unfortunately something gets lost in translation. The wine comes off a little bitter, like blackberries picked too soon.

title: Bella Luna 2009 Fighter Pilot Red Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Tastes hot and enormously high in alcohol, with simple, sweet Porty flavors ...
description: Tastes hot and enormously high in alcohol, with simple, sweet Porty flavors that are overripe, and veer into raisins and prunes.

title: Puccioni 2007 Old Vine Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: The definitive Dry Creek Zinfandel. It has tons of spices, wild berries ...
description: The definitive Dry Creek Zinfandel. It has tons of spices, wild berries and cherries and sweetly smoked sandalwood. Handles its high alcohol well, with the heat accenting the peppers. A lusty, complex Zin to drink now.

title: Ottimino Vineyards 2007 Biglieri Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A classic Dry Creek Zinfandel, dry, medium-bodied and spicy, with wild berry ...
description: A classic Dry Creek Zinfandel, dry, medium-bodied and spicy, with wild berry fruit and that inimitable briary note to the mouthfeel. Really pleasant, with rich, ripe berry, licorice and cedar flavors. Ideal with barbecue.

title: Ottimino Vineyards 2007 Windsor Oaks Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Lots of fresh, ripe fruit and spices in this dry, lusty Zinfandel. ...
description: Lots of fresh, ripe fruit and spices in this dry, lusty Zinfandel. Flatters with wild raspberry, cherry, mulberry, pepper and baking spice flavors, wrapped into firm tannins. Great for BBQ. Drink now.

title: Hendry 2008 Block 24 Primitivo (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Tastes like Zinfandel, a tannic, dry, spicy wine with blackberry, cherry, currant ...
description: Tastes like Zinfandel, a tannic, dry, spicy wine with blackberry, cherry, currant tobacco and leather flavors. Lots of richness here, and it wears its high alcohol well. Enjoy with barbecue.

title: Oakville Winery 2009 Estate Zinfandel (Oakville)
excerpt: This is a candied, jammy Zinfandel. It has that bubblegummy gassiness you ...
description: This is a candied, jammy Zinfandel. It has that bubblegummy gassiness you sometimes get in Beaujolais, with rich, ripe flavors of raspberries. Give it until late 2011 or early 2012 to calm down.

title: Ottimino Vineyards 2007 Ottimino Vineyard Little 8 Primitivo (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Primitivo seldom has the elegance of true Zinfandel, and so it is ...
description: Primitivo seldom has the elegance of true Zinfandel, and so it is here. Despite a resemblance to wild berry and spice flavors, the mouthfeel is rustic, and the finish is sweet.

title: XYZin 2008 Vine Age Series 10 Year Old Vines Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: A friendly, robust Zinfandel, rich in peppery spices, with raspberry and cherry ...
description: A friendly, robust Zinfandel, rich in peppery spices, with raspberry and cherry flavors that have a touch of briary nettles and sugared chamomile tea. A delightful Zin to drink now.

title: Keating 2009 Buchignani Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: An awkward Zin, very high in alcohol (15.4%), yet a bit thin ...
description: An awkward Zin, very high in alcohol (15.4%), yet a bit thin in berry-cherry fruit. It shows some unevenly ripened flavors.

title: Ballentine 2008 Old Vines Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A disappointment after the fine 2006 and 2007. Shows some unripe notes ...
description: A disappointment after the fine 2006 and 2007. Shows some unripe notes alongside overripe flavors, resulting in imbalance. The tannins will probably never age out.

title: Project Paso 2009 Old Vine Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: A pleasant, easy-drinking Zin. Has rich flavors of cherries, raspberries, figs and ...
description: A pleasant, easy-drinking Zin. Has rich flavors of cherries, raspberries, figs and spices. Pretty good barbecue wine for the price.

title: Villa Mt. Eden 2007 Grand Reserve Antique Vines Zinfandel (Amador-Napa)
excerpt: A bit too soft and sweet for Zinfandel, but it sure is ...
description: A bit too soft and sweet for Zinfandel, but it sure is delicious in berry fruit, chocolate, pepper and herb flavors. Drink now with barbecue.

title: Hendry 2007 Block 28 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A soft, hot, funky wine. Despite a wealth of berry, chocolate and ...
description: A soft, hot, funky wine. Despite a wealth of berry, chocolate and spice flavors, high alcohol gives it a chile pepper burn.

title: Buehler 2009 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A simple, sugary wine, with candied berry, anise and cocoa flavors, wrapped ...
description: A simple, sugary wine, with candied berry, anise and cocoa flavors, wrapped into soft tannins.

title: Rancho Arroyo Grande 2008 Zinfandel (Arroyo Grande Valley)
excerpt: Sugary sweet and hot, this Zin has 16.2% alcohol by volume, making ...
description: Sugary sweet and hot, this Zin has 16.2% alcohol by volume, making it more like Port than a dry table wine. Tasted twice.

title: Cline 2009 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: An awkward, unbalanced wine. Has green, vegetal flavors alongside sweet candied raspberries.
description: An awkward, unbalanced wine. Has green, vegetal flavors alongside sweet candied raspberries.

title: Hobo 2009 Treborce Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Classic Dry Creek Zin, dry, tannic and spicy. Shows ripe, jammy flavors ...
description: Classic Dry Creek Zin, dry, tannic and spicy. Shows ripe, jammy flavors of cherries, raspberries and blackberries that finish a little sweet. Drink now with barbecue, Mexican beef dishes or just a great cheeseburger.

title: Vigneti Reale 2008 Rudiae Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Rudiae is a soft and velvety expression of Primitivo (a grape that ...
description: Rudiae is a soft and velvety expression of Primitivo (a grape that is genetically linked to Californian Zinfandel) with jammy aromas of black cherry, currant and sweet cinnamon or vanilla. The wine tastes plump and round and would pair with pasta al forno.

title: De Loach 2008 Forgotten Vines Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: An easy-to-like Zinfandel notable for its soft, velvety texture and upfront flavors. ...
description: An easy-to-like Zinfandel notable for its soft, velvety texture and upfront flavors. The raspberry jam and cocoa finish is almost sweet. Sausages are an ideal accompaniment.

title: Frank Family 2008 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Shows classic Zinfandel character in the dusty Indian spices and array of ...
description: Shows classic Zinfandel character in the dusty Indian spices and array of ripe, sweet summer berry flavors. The addition of a little Petite Sirah gives it weight and tannins. Easy to like for its soft approachability.

title: Bump Wine Cellars 2007 HB Family Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: The dryness and earthiness of this wine are especially attractive. It shows ...
description: The dryness and earthiness of this wine are especially attractive. It shows tobacco, wild cherry, red currant, pepper and sandalwood flavors that are rich and complex. The alcohol is nearly 16%, but the wine wears it well.

title: Lava Cap 2008 Reserve Zinfandel (El Dorado)
excerpt: Pleasant in the glass, this small-production offering from Lava Cap is a ...
description: Pleasant in the glass, this small-production offering from Lava Cap is a decent introduction to their wines though it takes time for any aromas to develop and the finish tastes a little green.

title: Hobo 2009 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A good Zinfandel, dry and a little rustic. With edgy tannins, it ...
description: A good Zinfandel, dry and a little rustic. With edgy tannins, it has berry, cherry, spice, tobacco and sandalwood flavors, with a long, sweet finish.

title: La Corte 2009 Old Vines Primitivo (Puglia)
excerpt: This interesting Primitivo shows some jammy fruit elements of strawberry and blackberry ...
description: This interesting Primitivo shows some jammy fruit elements of strawberry and blackberry followed by more delicate tones of spice or green pepper corn. The wine is soft and smooth with a raw, chewy finish.

title: The Federalist 2008 Visionary Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Shows lots of Dry Creek Zinfandel character in the spiciness and wild, ...
description: Shows lots of Dry Creek Zinfandel character in the spiciness and wild, briary, brambly berries. Nice and dry, if a bit direct and overripe.

title: Rued 2008 Estate Grown Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: On the hot, sweet side, with high alcohol, caramelized oak and residual ...
description: On the hot, sweet side, with high alcohol, caramelized oak and residual sugar combining to make the cherry and raspberry flavors taste like jam.

title: Mounts 2008 Cypress Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Good varietal flavors of wild berries and spices in this dry Zinfandel, ...
description: Good varietal flavors of wild berries and spices in this dry Zinfandel, but it feels rustic, and the alcohol level of 16.2% is out of balance.

title: Oso Libre 2008 Nativo Primitivo (Paso Robles)
excerpt: This soft, sweet wine has Zinfandel-like flavors of raspberries and cherries, sprinkled ...
description: This soft, sweet wine has Zinfandel-like flavors of raspberries and cherries, sprinkled with cocoa, pepper and cinnamon. The alcohol is high and the wine feels hot and prickly in the mouth.

title: Mounts 2008 La Loma Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Not quite ripe, with some green, vegetal flavors alongside the blackberries and ...
description: Not quite ripe, with some green, vegetal flavors alongside the blackberries and black cherries. The lack of richness accentuates the hard tannins.

title: Calcareous 2008 Kates Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Dull and hot in alcohol, with semi-sweet, candied cherry flavors.
description: Dull and hot in alcohol, with semi-sweet, candied cherry flavors.

title: Sobon Estate 2008 Rezerve Primitivo (Amador County)
excerpt: Deep dark in color with more tannins than fruit, this Amador Primitivo ...
description: Deep dark in color with more tannins than fruit, this Amador Primitivo is also a tad sweet.

title: Chiarello Family Vineyards 2009 Giana Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A clumsy Zinfandel, hot and high in alcohol, and yet strangely showing ...
description: A clumsy Zinfandel, hot and high in alcohol, and yet strangely showing unripe, vegetal flavors. Zinfandel clusters are infamous for uneven ripening. The problem seems to have been at the sorting table.

title: Predator 2009 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Strangely smoky, simple with a very displeasing hint of bologna, this old ...
description: Strangely smoky, simple with a very displeasing hint of bologna, this old vine Zinfandel from Lodi is high in alcohol (15%) and low in fruit and complexity. Named for the great predatory work done by ladybugs in the vineyard, this wine shows no such finesse and feels more like a T-Rex about to eat its prey.

title: Pezzi King 2008 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Classic Dry Creek Zin, dry, spicy and briary. Has those rustic tannins ...
description: Classic Dry Creek Zin, dry, spicy and briary. Has those rustic tannins that just love cheese, tomato sauce, spice-rubbed barbecue or a great beef taco. Perfect ripeness, too, brimming with raspberries, blackberries and blueberries.

title: Greenwood Ridge 2008 Scherrer Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Tastes jammy and sharp, like a barrel sample, with acidic flavors of ...
description: Tastes jammy and sharp, like a barrel sample, with acidic flavors of raspberries, black cherries and spices. The tannins are rich and smooth. A very good wine, but bristly and tough in youth. Give it a few years to mellow.

title: Masseria del Fauno 2010 Primitivo (Puglia)
excerpt: This darkly colored Primitivo opens with sweet notes of Christmas spice, cinnamon, ...
description: This darkly colored Primitivo opens with sweet notes of Christmas spice, cinnamon, nutmeg, blackberry jam and plum cake. The wine is sticky and chewy on the close with sweet, succulent tannins.

title: Zahtila 2007 Oat Hill Estate Zinfandel (Calistoga)
excerpt: Rich and jammy in blackberry, black cherry and blueberry fruit, with a ...
description: Rich and jammy in blackberry, black cherry and blueberry fruit, with a smoky overlay from oak. Some overripe notes show up in the finish. Drink this polished, spicy Zin now.

title: Terra d'Oro 2007 Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: A dry, tannic Zinfandel from Amador, fairly large production at 14,000 cases ...
description: A dry, tannic Zinfandel from Amador, fairly large production at 14,000 cases a year, with enough blueberry, sweet black olive and spice on the finish to make the whole package a nicely made bottling from a Sierra Foothills Zin specialist.

title: Novy 2009 Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: A good, everyday Zinfandel, spicy and fruity. It has lots of raspberry ...
description: A good, everyday Zinfandel, spicy and fruity. It has lots of raspberry and cherry jam, chocolate and pepper flavors that finish a little sweet.

title: Carol Shelton 2008 Monga Zin, Lopez Vineyard Zinfandel (Cucamonga Valley)
excerpt: Not a ton of fruit on the nose but a respectable single-vineyard ...
description: Not a ton of fruit on the nose but a respectable single-vineyard from Zin master Carol Shelton made from organically grown, dry-farmed 92-year-old vines, coaxed into a spicy, brambly wine from a very unusual appellation.

title: Zahtila 2006 Oat Hill Estate Zinfandel (Calistoga)
excerpt: Smells a little unripe, with some green notes and a sweet funkiness. ...
description: Smells a little unripe, with some green notes and a sweet funkiness. Tastes curiously sweet and soft, like melted raspberry and cherry candy. Not likely to age.

title: Maddalena 2008 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: This is a simple, easy- drinking Zinfandel, soft and gentle and slightly ...
description: This is a simple, easy- drinking Zinfandel, soft and gentle and slightly sweet. The raspberry, licorice, raisin and cocoa flavors are rich and spicy.

title: Taj 2008 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Tough and gritty, with uneven tannins and some minty green flavors alongside ...
description: Tough and gritty, with uneven tannins and some minty green flavors alongside the cherries, mulberries and red currants. Not going anywhere, so drink up.

title: Gravity Hills 2009 The Sherpa Zinfandel (Central Coast)
excerpt: This is a simple wine, sharp in acidity and dry, with spicy ...
description: This is a simple wine, sharp in acidity and dry, with spicy Zin flavors of berries. Okay with pizza, burgers, barbecue.

title: Mazzocco 2008 Pony Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Soft, melted and sweet, like a cherry, blueberry and chocolate dessert in ...
description: Soft, melted and sweet, like a cherry, blueberry and chocolate dessert in liquid form. Overripe, too. The official alcohol is 15.5%.

title: Redtree 2009 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Soft, simple and a little vegetal, with a green, asparagus taste alongside ...
description: Soft, simple and a little vegetal, with a green, asparagus taste alongside the blackberries. A decent party wine where no one really cares, as long as the wine is red.

title: Mazzocco 2008 Stone Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Tastes overly soft, too sweet and hot, with berry, chocolate-covered raisin and ...
description: Tastes overly soft, too sweet and hot, with berry, chocolate-covered raisin and Port flavors. Not for everyone.

title: Stephen Ross 2007 Dante Dusi Vineyard Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: A good, dry Zinfandel marked by flavors of freshly crushed black pepper ...
description: A good, dry Zinfandel marked by flavors of freshly crushed black pepper sprinkled over ripe crushed blackberry liqueur. The all-important tannins give the richness a firm structure. The wine is a little hot in alcohol, but barbecue and richly sauced beef and chicken dishes will stand up well.

title: Columbia Crest 2008 Stone Tree Vineyard Reserve Primitivo (Wahluke Slope)
excerpt: Smoky and toasty, with spicy blackberry and dark chocolate scents and flavors. ...
description: Smoky and toasty, with spicy blackberry and dark chocolate scents and flavors. The inviting nose leads into a moderately full-bodied wine with good persistence. Spice and berry suggest its kinship to Zinfandel, but there is something also of the southern Italian wines in the coffee and licorice accents.

title: Latah Creek 2008 Monarch Zinfandel (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: The Monarch line is a new venture for Latah Creek. The Zin, ...
description: The Monarch line is a new venture for Latah Creek. The Zin, from the Coyote Canyon vineyard, offers tart berry fruit, lightly spiced, and a hint of fresh herb. Clean and modest in scope.

title: Kangarilla Road 2008 Black St. Peters Zinfandel (McLaren Vale)
excerpt: Fairly full-bodied and lush, with berry fruit flavors balanced by darker notes ...
description: Fairly full-bodied and lush, with berry fruit flavors balanced by darker notes of chocolate and coffee. The tannins are soft, making this wine immediately accessible.

title: Lake Sonoma 2008 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Good price for a Zin that offers plenty of pleasure. Grown in ...
description: Good price for a Zin that offers plenty of pleasure. Grown in Zin-friendly Dry Creek Valley, the wine is softly tannic in cherry, blueberry, blackberry, currant, dark chocolate and black pepper flavors.

title: Muscardini 2009 Monte Rosso Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Fruity and easy to drink, but not a good representation of this ...
description: Fruity and easy to drink, but not a good representation of this famous mountain vineyard, at this price. The wine is sweet and simple in candied raspberries, blackberries, licorice and milk chocolate. Maybe it was released too early. Try cellaring for a couple years.

title: Haraszthy 2008 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: A good, rugged Zinfandel, tannic and spicy, with a rustic mouthfeel framing ...
description: A good, rugged Zinfandel, tannic and spicy, with a rustic mouthfeel framing wild berry, currant, licorice, beef jerky and spice flavors. Drink now with spicy pork, beef and chicken dishes.

title: Hyatt 2008 Zinfandel (Rattlesnake Hills)
excerpt: Well along the maturity curve, this has a butterscotch base and a ...
description: Well along the maturity curve, this has a butterscotch base and a very soft midpalate, with hints of strawberry fruit and pepper. The finish rolls into a seamless caramel fog, tasty but diffuse.

title: R & B Cellars 2008 Zydeco Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A little light-bodied for a Zinfandel, with the silky texture of Pinot ...
description: A little light-bodied for a Zinfandel, with the silky texture of Pinot Noir, but the flavors are strong and ripe. The raspberries and cherries have a roasted edge, like pie filling, while the finish is somewhat sweet.

title: Pomar Junction 2008 Pomar Junction Vineyard Zinfandel (Monterey)
excerpt: Simple and sweet, with raspberry, cherry and mint candy flavors. Drink now.
description: Simple and sweet, with raspberry, cherry and mint candy flavors. Drink now.

title: Dashe Cellars 2008 Todd Brothers Ranch Old Vines Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Soft and gentle and fruity-sweet, this easy-drinking Zin has upfront flavors of ...
description: Soft and gentle and fruity-sweet, this easy-drinking Zin has upfront flavors of pie-filling cherries and raspberries, sprinkled with cocoa, cinnamon, pepper and vanilla. Delicious now; production was only 511 cases.

title: Two Vintners 2008 Stone Tree Vineyard Zinfandel (Wahluke Slope)
excerpt: Zinfandel is still looking for a clear identity in Washington, but this ...
description: Zinfandel is still looking for a clear identity in Washington, but this Wahluke Slope vineyard is one of the bright spots for the grape. Very spicy, with a strong herbal tilt, this has peppery and lifted flavors of tart berry and red currant fruit. Just a little heat in the finish.

title: Binyamina 2007 Reserve Kosher Zinfandel (Galilee)
excerpt: This Zin just needed a bit more spice to shake things up, ...
description: This Zin just needed a bit more spice to shake things up, but the dark concentrated fruit aromas and flavors are definitely there by way of rich berry preserves and black plum guts. Accents of foliage add interest to the bouquet, and fine tannins coupled with a mouthwatering finish make it very easy to drink.

title: Musetta 2007 St. Peter's Church Selection Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A sound, pleasant Zinfandel with a good array of wild berry, cherry, ...
description: A sound, pleasant Zinfandel with a good array of wild berry, cherry, anise, herb and white pepper flavors. The flavors are quite complex, but the wine is a little sharp and edgy in tannins, with some green notes.

title: Collier Falls 2009 Late Harvest Primitivo (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Sweet, but not very, and lacks the rich opulence you want in ...
description: Sweet, but not very, and lacks the rich opulence you want in a dessert red wine. Shows plenty of raspberry and cherry flavor, but would benefit from greater intensity and sweetness.

title: Kokomo 2008 Mounts Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Feels hot and tastes sweet, putting it at the rustic end of ...
description: Feels hot and tastes sweet, putting it at the rustic end of the Zinfandel spectrum. The official alcohol is 15.3%. At that level, of course, you also get enormously ripe berry flavors. Drink it with barbecue or meat stews.

title: Ben Hogan 2008 Tribute Series Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: A simple, jammy Zinfandel, with gentle raspberry, cherry, cola and spice flavors ...
description: A simple, jammy Zinfandel, with gentle raspberry, cherry, cola and spice flavors that finish sweet and hot in high alcohol.

title: Carol Shelton 2007 Karma Zin Rue Vineyard Old Vine Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Lusty, full-bodied, powerful, classic Sonoma Zinfandel. Swamps the palate with complex flavors ...
description: Lusty, full-bodied, powerful, classic Sonoma Zinfandel. Swamps the palate with complex flavors of wild forest berries, red currants, licorice, beef jerky, cola, dusty Indian spice and cedar flavors, wrapped into firm tannins. Really textbook Zin, dry, lively and distinctive. Drink now-2013.

title: Del Carlo Winery 2007 Old Vine Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A rich, complex Zinfandel, showing the rustic mouthfeel sometimes found in Dry ...
description: A rich, complex Zinfandel, showing the rustic mouthfeel sometimes found in Dry Creek reds. The tannins are strong and jagged, and the berry and cherry flavors have a wild, briary taste. But the finish is bone dry, and the wine grows more interesting as it breathes in the glass.

title: Old World 2005 Laughlin Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Starting to lose its fruit and show a rich, dried berry and ...
description: Starting to lose its fruit and show a rich, dried berry and chocolate note. But the high alcohol is coming through. Feels soft and generous, with Porty flavors of black currants that finish a little sweet. Good with short ribs, beef stews and barbecue.

title: Peachy Canyon 2008 Mustang Springs Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: A bit hot in high alcohol, with a chili pepper bite behind ...
description: A bit hot in high alcohol, with a chili pepper bite behind the enormously ripe raspberry and cherry jam, chocolate, beef jerky and pepper spice flavors. Drink now.

title: Peter Franus 2008 Brandlin Vineyard Zinfandel (Mount Veeder)
excerpt: Shows a mountain toughness of tannins with unevenly ripened fruit that gives ...
description: Shows a mountain toughness of tannins with unevenly ripened fruit that gives the wine a sweet and sour taste. Intense blackberries and cherries coexist with greener flavors of mint, along with heat from high alcohol. Drink now.

title: Tin Barn 2008 Gilsson Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Oak gives this wine a caramel-like richness, while the underlying fruit is ...
description: Oak gives this wine a caramel-like richness, while the underlying fruit is jammy and spicy in cherries and raspberries. The result is a somewhat candied Zin. Drink it now.

title: Mueller 2007 Old Vine Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: A robust, muscular Zinfandel with bigtime jammy blackberries, cherries and raspberries that ...
description: A robust, muscular Zinfandel with bigtime jammy blackberries, cherries and raspberries that have a freshly picked briary taste, and plenty of brisk, fruity acidity. Good for drinking now.

title: Rodney Strong 2008 Knotty Vines Zinfandel (Northern Sonoma)
excerpt: Dry and earthy, with somewhat thin blackberry, currant, raisin, tobacco and black ...
description: Dry and earthy, with somewhat thin blackberry, currant, raisin, tobacco and black pepper flavors. A sound everyday Zin.

title: Peachy Canyon 2008 Incredible Red Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Tastes overtly sweet and simple, like a raspberry and cherry honey granola ...
description: Tastes overtly sweet and simple, like a raspberry and cherry honey granola bar, with roasted almonds and spices. Production was 31,000 cases.

title: Newsome-Harlow 2008 Donner Party Zin, Dalton Vineyard, Vineyard Select Series Zinfandel (Calaveras County)
excerpt: Everything one could want in a Zin: dark, rich color and very ...
description: Everything one could want in a Zin: dark, rich color and very pleasing dark fruit aromas followed by a mouthful of juicy blackberry and clove flavors and rich, dusty tannins. The whole package, 89% zin with 11% Petite Sirah all from the Dalton Vineyard, is nicely balanced, seriously rich and ends with a proper earthy kick on the finish. Really, really good.

title: Miro 2008 Old Vines Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: A terrific Zinfandel, beautiful to drink now for its soft richness. Flatters ...
description: A terrific Zinfandel, beautiful to drink now for its soft richness. Flatters the palate with deep, lingering black cherry and raspberry pie filling, vanilla, Indian spice and sandalwood flavors, but is completely dry, with rich, intricate tannins. Only 190 cases were produced, but worth the search.

title: Frog's Leap 2008 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A first rate Zinfandel. It shows the classic structure, dryness and tannins ...
description: A first rate Zinfandel. It shows the classic structure, dryness and tannins of a fine Napa Valley Cabernet, yet the pepper, baking spice and wild berry fruit and currant flavors are uniquely Zin. And look at that alcohol, under 14%. Drink this robust, complex wine with steaks, beef stew, tamales.

title: Newsome-Harlow 2008 Big John Zin - Vineyard Select Series Zinfandel (Calaveras County)
excerpt: A pure, all-out Zinfandel with enticing black and red fruit on the ...
description: A pure, all-out Zinfandel with enticing black and red fruit on the nose followed by spicy, black peppery undertones and rich berry and plum. Tannins are nicely integrated yet still pronounced yet the finish is long and incredibly smooth.

title: Ridge 2008 York Creek Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: A bit thin and acidic, but charming for its dryness and firm ...
description: A bit thin and acidic, but charming for its dryness and firm tannins, which call for rich, marbled beef. The pepper-inspired blackberry and cassis flavors are fine. Not an ager, but will benefit from a few hours of decanting.

title: Thurston Wolfe 2008 Howling Wolfe Zinfandel (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: The Howling Wolfe Zinfandel is a bowl of berries and chocolate, soft ...
description: The Howling Wolfe Zinfandel is a bowl of berries and chocolate, soft in the mouth, full across the palate, and ready for near-term drinking.

title: Dry Creek Vineyard 2008 Heritage Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: A bit rustic and heavy, with extracted jammy fruit but lacking a ...
description: A bit rustic and heavy, with extracted jammy fruit but lacking a certain vivacity and sharpness in the mouth. Good enough for the price. Production was 12,500 cases.

title: St. Francis 2007 Old Vines Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: A strong Zinfandel, tannic, high in alcohol and fruity, and brimming with ...
description: A strong Zinfandel, tannic, high in alcohol and fruity, and brimming with wild forest cherry and raspberry liqueur, exotic spices and sweet sandalwood. Drink it with a juicy cheeseburger, a spicy beef burrito and just a nice roast chicken.

title: Ancient Peaks 2008 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: A soft, gentle Zinfandel, a little sweet, like a raspberry and cherry ...
description: A soft, gentle Zinfandel, a little sweet, like a raspberry and cherry mocha drink sprinkled with cocoa and cinnamon. Easy to drink with spicy meats, soft cheeses, everyday fare.

title: Murphy-Goode 2008 Liar's Dice Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: A soft, simple but pretty wine, with slightly sweet, pie-filling cherry, raspberry, ...
description: A soft, simple but pretty wine, with slightly sweet, pie-filling cherry, raspberry, Dr. Pepper cola and baking spice flavors. Drink now.

title: Seghesio 2008 Home Ranch Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: An awesome Zinfandel that shows how delicious the variety can be in ...
description: An awesome Zinfandel that shows how delicious the variety can be in the right hands. The wine is unusually complex for Zin, showing not only its briary wild berry flavors but deeper, terroir-driven notes of minerals. The tannins are strong but very fine, while crisp acidity provides balance. Definitely hot in the finish, but fiery barbecue will be a perfect pairing.

title: Quivira 2008 Flight Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Bone-dry and robust, this Zin has a bright, lemony acidity that seems ...
description: Bone-dry and robust, this Zin has a bright, lemony acidity that seems odd at first, along with the wild raspberries and white pepper. The winemaker took the unusual step of adding Viognier grape skins to the Zinfandel juice; The result is a unique wine.

title: Mauritson 2009 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A little sweet with the glycerine of high alcohol, and there may ...
description: A little sweet with the glycerine of high alcohol, and there may be some residual sugar. That gives the raspberry, cherry and blackberry fruit a jelly-jam richness, with nuances of chocolate, anise liqueur and toast. Drink now.

title: Hauck 2008 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A little overripe and hot, with some raisins and prunes alongside the ...
description: A little overripe and hot, with some raisins and prunes alongside the blackberries, but dry and finely tannic, with a soft, spicy mouthfeel. This rustic Zinfandel drinks well with barbecue.

title: Windsor Sonoma 2008 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Soft and rather jammy sweet, this Zin has fruit-forward flavors of cherries ...
description: Soft and rather jammy sweet, this Zin has fruit-forward flavors of cherries and raspberries, with plenty of white pepper and baking spices. Drink now.

title: Mosby 2006 Primitivo (Central Coast)
excerpt: A tartly acidic, jammy wine. Shows Zin-like flavors of raspberries, cherries and ...
description: A tartly acidic, jammy wine. Shows Zin-like flavors of raspberries, cherries and black pepper, with a sweet coat of sandalwood.

title: Bin 36 2006 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: A simple wine. The underlying Zin is rather thin and jammy, while ...
description: A simple wine. The underlying Zin is rather thin and jammy, while a clumsy overlay of oak adds unnatural vanilla and woodsap flavors.

title: Signorello 2008 Luvisi Vineyard Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is a soft, lush, almost sweet Zinfandel. It has ripe, pie-filling ...
description: This is a soft, lush, almost sweet Zinfandel. It has ripe, pie-filling flavors of raspberries and cherries, with a chocolate and spice finish. Feels a bit too soft, but the tannins are complex and refined. Drink now.

title: Cardinal Zin 2007 Beastly Old Vines Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Grown in the Oakley area from (mostly) old vines, this Zin is ...
description: Grown in the Oakley area from (mostly) old vines, this Zin is dry, lush in texture and complex in flavors. It has lovely floral and mineral notes to the spicy raspberries, cherries, currants and cola. Great job at a good price.

title: Pheasant Valley Winery 2008 Primitivo (Columbia Valley (OR))
excerpt: Hearty, rustic and full throttle (at 15% alcohol), this is a bottle ...
description: Hearty, rustic and full throttle (at 15% alcohol), this is a bottle full of Sicilian fruits and flavors. Figs and dates, raisins and allspice, coffee and dark chocolate whirl through the palate, with the alcohol leaving a distinct trail through the finish. You might consider this in place of a dessert liqueur, served up with stuffed figs, walnuts and the bitterest of chocolate.

title: Dutton-Goldfield 2008 Morelli Lane Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: A softly tannic and dry Zin. Offers wild berry, cherry, currant and ...
description: A softly tannic and dry Zin. Offers wild berry, cherry, currant and spice flavors, with a meaty edge, like beef teriyaki. Easy to drink with a perfectly grilled steak.

title: McManis 2009 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: This is a soft, simple and sweet wine, with cola and sugared ...
description: This is a soft, simple and sweet wine, with cola and sugared raspberry-juice flavors.

title: Parkers Estate 2008 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: A sharply bitter wine with sweet and sour flavors whose mouthfeel leaves ...
description: A sharply bitter wine with sweet and sour flavors whose mouthfeel leaves plenty to be desired.

title: Headbanger 2007 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Syrupy and tired. Not much going on with this raspberry-flavored Zin.
description: Syrupy and tired. Not much going on with this raspberry-flavored Zin.

title: Kunde 2006 Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Held back for four years before release, this Zin has achieved a ...
description: Held back for four years before release, this Zin has achieved a creamy softness. The flavors offer a blast of peppery, briary wild red, black and blue berries and currants, with vibrant hints of bacon, cola and sandalwood. Great value in a Zinfandel this likeable.

title: Sera Fina 2008 Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Simple, soft and a little dull, with red licorice, cherry pie and ...
description: Simple, soft and a little dull, with red licorice, cherry pie and bacon flavors. The taste is fine, but the wine needs better structure.

title: Bradford Mountain 2007 Grist Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Tastes exaggerated in overripe fruit character, with currant and shriveled raisin flavors. ...
description: Tastes exaggerated in overripe fruit character, with currant and shriveled raisin flavors. Although the wine is totally dry, its dessicated taste leaves much to be desired.

title: Castle Rock 2007 Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: Soft and simple, with candied raspberry, cherry and spice flavors. Okay for ...
description: Soft and simple, with candied raspberry, cherry and spice flavors. Okay for drinking at big parties.

title: Zinopolis 2009 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Tastes harshly acidic and dry, lacking richness, with overripe raisin flavors.
description: Tastes harshly acidic and dry, lacking richness, with overripe raisin flavors.

title: Forgeron 2006 Zinfandel (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: A candidate for the best Zinfandel in Washington, this firm, claret-like offering ...
description: A candidate for the best Zinfandel in Washington, this firm, claret-like offering is loaded with sweet berries and spicy, pine needle penetration. Supple and smoky, it threads a dark streak of iron ore into the polished tannins. Very fine winemaking.

title: Pezzi King 2007 Old Vines Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A vigorous, deeply flavored Zinfandel, made from old vines. Impressive for the ...
description: A vigorous, deeply flavored Zinfandel, made from old vines. Impressive for the depth of its black and red wild berry fruit, with nuances of anise, cocoa and a touch of raisins. And lots of spice, which suggests pepper steak. But be warned, the alcohol is very high.

title: Dashe Cellars 2007 Louvau Vineyard Old Vines Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: This is a very rich, extracted Zinfandel, massive in fruit and spice. ...
description: This is a very rich, extracted Zinfandel, massive in fruit and spice. Waves of raspberries, cherries and blackberries wash over the palate, edged in chocolate and pepper. Saved from being a fruit bomb by some pretty tannins and a cut of acidity. Drink now.

title: Dashe Cellars 2008 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A pace off the 2007, but a pretty good Zin. Despite being ...
description: A pace off the 2007, but a pretty good Zin. Despite being a little too soft and candy-sweet, it sure is tasty, offering an array of ripe wild red berry, currant, licorice, cocoa, spice and sandalwood flavors.

title: XYZin 2008 50 Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: A tasty Zin, rich and elaborately layered, with wild red berry, chocolate, ...
description: A tasty Zin, rich and elaborately layered, with wild red berry, chocolate, spice, gingerbread cookie, brown sugar and sandalwood flavors. A bit too sweet and soft, though.

title: Clos du Lac 2007 Reserve Blend Zinfandel (Sierra Foothills)
excerpt: Lusty and zesty are two words that describe this Zinfandel. Rustic is ...
description: Lusty and zesty are two words that describe this Zinfandel. Rustic is another, because of the uneven tannins, and the way the soft texture turns jammy-sweet in raspberries. It is, in other words, a sound, country-style Zinfandel for easy drinking.

title: Whalebone 2007 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Hard to get excited about this exceptionally high-alcohol wine. Just shy of ...
description: Hard to get excited about this exceptionally high-alcohol wine. Just shy of 17%, it tastes glyceriney sweet and soft, and even seems to have residual sugar. Will thrill fans of red dessert wines.

title: Sculpterra 2007 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Basically a fruit bomb. Explodes in the mouth with cherries and raspberries ...
description: Basically a fruit bomb. Explodes in the mouth with cherries and raspberries and a Fruit Loops cereal sugariness.

title: Dark Horse 2007 Treborce Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Feels gritty and common in the mouth, with uneven tannins and fruit. ...
description: Feels gritty and common in the mouth, with uneven tannins and fruit. The spicy berry flavors exist alongside superripe raisins and wintergreen mint, and the finish is hot. Drink now.

title: Rail2Rail 2008 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Simple, soft and sugary sweet, with candied raspberry, vanilla and cinnamon spice ...
description: Simple, soft and sugary sweet, with candied raspberry, vanilla and cinnamon spice flavors.

title: Christian Lazo 2008 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Porty and candied, with raisin and chocolate flavors. Defines this overripe style ...
description: Porty and candied, with raisin and chocolate flavors. Defines this overripe style of Zinfandel.

title: Rock Wall 2008 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: As sweet as a candy bar, with cherry and chocolate flavors. Excessively ...
description: As sweet as a candy bar, with cherry and chocolate flavors. Excessively high alcohol gives it a burning hot mouthfeel.

title: Turning Leaf 2008 White Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Sugary sweet and simple, with candied flavors of raspberries, spices and vanilla.
description: Sugary sweet and simple, with candied flavors of raspberries, spices and vanilla.

title: Predator 2008 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Sugary sweet in candied cherry flavor. Just barely drinkable.
description: Sugary sweet in candied cherry flavor. Just barely drinkable.

title: Magistrate 2007 Limited Production Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Great Zinfandel, showing Dry Creek Valley at its best. The wine is ...
description: Great Zinfandel, showing Dry Creek Valley at its best. The wine is dry and super-spicy, with complex, succulent wild berry, currant, licorice, bacon and pepper flavors, and just a touch of superripe raisins on the finish. Really notable for the quality of its fine tannins.

title: Side Job 2008 C5 Stefani Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: This very dry wine shows the spicy, briary flavors of Dry Creek ...
description: This very dry wine shows the spicy, briary flavors of Dry Creek Valley Zinfandel. The flavors are of wild black and red berries, currants, brambly nettles, pepper, Chinese 5 spice, espresso and a hint of earthy dark chocolate. Quite a fine, complex drink that wants smoky, charred meats, like barbecued ribs, pork, or a rich grilled steak.

title: Mounts 2007 Estate Grown Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A very good wine, dry and super-spicy, with the brambly fruit you ...
description: A very good wine, dry and super-spicy, with the brambly fruit you want in a Dry Creek Zin. It shows robust, complex flavors of cherries and raspberries along with an exotic coating of sandalwood. Drink now.

title: Perry Creek 2007 Zinman Zinfandel (El Dorado)
excerpt: A lovely Zinfandel, soft and dry, with luscious cherry, raspberry and sandalwood ...
description: A lovely Zinfandel, soft and dry, with luscious cherry, raspberry and sandalwood flavors, dusted with pepper and cocoa. Easy to drink and versatile with everything from pizza to a grilled steak.

title: Darcie Kent Vineyards 2007 DeMayo Vineyard Zinfandel (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: Lots of briary wild blackberry, cherry and exotic spice flavors in this ...
description: Lots of briary wild blackberry, cherry and exotic spice flavors in this Zin, with cola, tobacco and mushu plum sauce complexities, and the finish is dry. Compromised by a hit of sharp acidity, but rich barbecue will help.

title: J. Rickards 2006 Voigt Family Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Shows some ultraripe Porty flavors and bitterness that come from the tannins ...
description: Shows some ultraripe Porty flavors and bitterness that come from the tannins of raisin skins. That accentuates the dryness, and compromises what otherwise is a pleasant Dry Creek Valley Zinfandel.

title: Stuart Cellars 2006 Lopez Ranch Vintners Special Select Reserve Zinfandel (Cucamonga Valley)
excerpt: Very, very dry, but bitter in raisinskin flavors and tannins, with a ...
description: Very, very dry, but bitter in raisinskin flavors and tannins, with a baked currant finish. Not a bad wine, but an acquired taste. Drink now.

title: Mutt Lynch 2007 Canis Major Perotti Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Basically a high-alcohol fruit bomb, with jammy flavors of raspberries and cherries. ...
description: Basically a high-alcohol fruit bomb, with jammy flavors of raspberries and cherries. The heat from 15.5% alcohol gives it a chili pepper burn. Defines that style, for those who like it.

title: Scott Harvey 2007 Mountain Selection Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Robust, but a little awkward. Shows semi-sweet, jammy raspberry and cherry flavors ...
description: Robust, but a little awkward. Shows semi-sweet, jammy raspberry and cherry flavors with big tannins and acidity. Almost like a simple Port. Ready now.

title: Goats Trail 2009 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Jammy and simple, with ripe cherry, blackberry and pepper flavors. Nothing terribly ...
description: Jammy and simple, with ripe cherry, blackberry and pepper flavors. Nothing terribly complex, but an easy everyday Zin at a decent price.

title: Fiddletown Cellars 2008 Bent Bow Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Dry and spicy, with some green peppercorn and vegetal aromas and flavors ...
description: Dry and spicy, with some green peppercorn and vegetal aromas and flavors that interfere with enjoyment. A few modest blackberry notes rescue it.

title: Mutt Lynch 2007 Portrait of a Mutt Zinfandel (Central Coast)
excerpt: Tastes dry, bitter and tannic, like press wine, with green, stemmy flavors ...
description: Tastes dry, bitter and tannic, like press wine, with green, stemmy flavors of berries and green peppercorns. Drink now.

title: Gia Domella 2007 E. Passalacqua Heritage Estate Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Burning hot in alcohol, this Zin is totally dry. It has peppery ...
description: Burning hot in alcohol, this Zin is totally dry. It has peppery flavors of shriveled grapes and currants, with a bitter mouthfeel.

title: Hunt Cellars 2004 Destiny Vineyards Reserve Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Soft and mushy in structure, with sweet, pie-filling flavors of berries that ...
description: Soft and mushy in structure, with sweet, pie-filling flavors of berries that have a baked fruit edge, this Zin tastes like it was a victim of hot overripeness.

title: Ca' Momi 2007 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Simple and jammy, with sweet flavors of cherries, currants, licorice and spices.
description: Simple and jammy, with sweet flavors of cherries, currants, licorice and spices.

title: Beaver Creek 2007 Zinfandel (Lake County)
excerpt: Soft, simple and sweet, with jellied raspberry, cherry and spice flavors. Tastes ...
description: Soft, simple and sweet, with jellied raspberry, cherry and spice flavors. Tastes like an inferior dessert wine.

title: Minassian-Young 2008 Estate Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Tastes unevenly ripened, with blackberry and vegetal flavors side by side, and ...
description: Tastes unevenly ripened, with blackberry and vegetal flavors side by side, and seems to have residual sugar. The sweetness is compounded with high alcohol.

title: Dancing Bull 2008 Winemakers Reserve Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Frankly sweet, with candied raspberry and cherry flavors. Feels soft and cloying.
description: Frankly sweet, with candied raspberry and cherry flavors. Feels soft and cloying.

title: Hunnicutt 2006 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A very good Zinfandel, rich and complex. Shows the balanced elegance of ...
description: A very good Zinfandel, rich and complex. Shows the balanced elegance of a fine Napa Cabernet, but the peppery, wild berry, leather, cola and anise flavors are pure Zinfandel. Contains a few splashes of Petite Sirah.

title: Novy 2008 Papera Ranch Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This is a very fruity-rich Zinfandel. It pushes the envelope on power ...
description: This is a very fruity-rich Zinfandel. It pushes the envelope on power and almost goes over the top, but wisely stops short in favor of balance, with acids and tannins providing needed finishing structure. The flavors are big and jammy, suggesting raspberries, cherries, blackberries, plums and chocolate, not to mention huge spiciness. Perfect with short ribs of beef.

title: Angel Vine 2008 Avery Vineyard Zinfandel (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Once again the best of the Zins from Angel Vine (formerly Three ...
description: Once again the best of the Zins from Angel Vine (formerly Three Angels), this has raspberry and cherry fruit, clean and vibrant, with good acidity and ripe tannins. There is a slight hint of green leaf and herb, just enough to add a bit of flavor interest.

title: Angel Vine 2008 Stonetree Vineyard Zinfandel (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The Stonetree bottling (one of three single-vineyard Zins from Angel Vine) offers ...
description: The Stonetree bottling (one of three single-vineyard Zins from Angel Vine) offers pure strawberry fruit flavor, with medium concentration. The 15.2% alcohol does not show that scale, but does offer some finishing power. Could it develop more density and depth with another year in the bottle? Time will tell.

title: Angel Vine 2008 Primitivo (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Stonetree and Coyote Canyon are the vineyard sources for this rare Washington ...
description: Stonetree and Coyote Canyon are the vineyard sources for this rare Washington Primitivo. Briary and brambly, it does not have the cut tobacco character of Italian Primitivo, nor the depth of color and tannin. Some leafy herbal flavors compete with the mixed red fruits.

title: Angel Vine 2008 Zinfandel (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Angel Vine (formerly Three Angels) now offers three single vineyard Zins as ...
description: Angel Vine (formerly Three Angels) now offers three single vineyard Zins as well as this blend, with includes Primitivo and Petite Sirah. Sweet, briary fruit, with a pleasing brambly character, runs through the mouth leaving a chocolaty trail. There is just a hint of leather and funk.

title: Dashe Cellars 2007 Todd Brothers Ranch Old Vines Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Something of a fruit bomb, with massive cherry, raspberry, currant, mocha and ...
description: Something of a fruit bomb, with massive cherry, raspberry, currant, mocha and granola flavors, wrapped into a lightly tannic body. Brisk acidity fortunately provides balance to the fruit. Drink now.

title: Angel Vine 2008 Les Collines Vineyard Zinfandel (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: Not quite as good as the 2007 Les Collines from this producer, ...
description: Not quite as good as the 2007 Les Collines from this producer, but perhaps it just needs more bottle age. Light spritz and flavors of berry punch, along with not-yet-integrated barrel toast. Give it another year to fill out.

title: IL Gioiello 2006 Block 2 Vineyard Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: A dry, hot, high-alcohol Zin with peppery flavors of cherry pie filling, ...
description: A dry, hot, high-alcohol Zin with peppery flavors of cherry pie filling, red currants and licorice. Fine with barbecue.

title: Rancho Zabaco 2008 Sonoma Heritage Vines Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Fruity-sweet and very full-bodied, with powerful, jammy cherry and spice flavors, edged ...
description: Fruity-sweet and very full-bodied, with powerful, jammy cherry and spice flavors, edged with baked brown sugar. A little too brawny, even for Zin.

title: Zynthesis 2008 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Soft and melted, with syrupy-sweet flavors of raspberries. A simple, rugged wine ...
description: Soft and melted, with syrupy-sweet flavors of raspberries. A simple, rugged wine for backyard picnics and such.

title: Dono dal Cielo 2007 Zinfandel (Sierra Foothills)
excerpt: Hot in alcohol, Porty-sweet in raspberry and cherry fruit, but soft in ...
description: Hot in alcohol, Porty-sweet in raspberry and cherry fruit, but soft in acidity, this is a simple wine in a good-looking bottle.

title: Brazin 2007 Monte Rosso Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Too ripe, with pruny, raisiny flavors that are Porty and hot in ...
description: Too ripe, with pruny, raisiny flavors that are Porty and hot in high-alcohol, glyceriney heaviness. Defines a certain style, but not really balanced or food-friendly.

title: Leonhardt 2007 Reserve Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Good Zinny flavors in this wine, ranging from ripe blackberries and chocolate-covered ...
description: Good Zinny flavors in this wine, ranging from ripe blackberries and chocolate-covered mint candy to black pepper. A bit too fruity-sweet and simple in structure, but a nice wine for backyard summer sipping.

title: Ridge 2008 Ponzo Vineyard Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Borderline rustic, with edgy tannins and tart, jammy cherry and blueberry flavors ...
description: Borderline rustic, with edgy tannins and tart, jammy cherry and blueberry flavors that finish in a slightly sweet swirl of black pepper. Easy to drink now with pasta, barbecue, pizza.

title: Martin Ranch 2007 J.D. Hurley Zinfandel (Santa Clara Valley)
excerpt: Too sweet by far, with sugary flavors of berry-cherry pie filling. The ...
description: Too sweet by far, with sugary flavors of berry-cherry pie filling. The sweeteness is compounded by high alcohol and glycerines.

title: Piedra Creek 2008 Benito Dusi Vineyard Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Unacceptably vegetal and moldy, not to mention being excessively sweet. Almost undrinkable, ...
description: Unacceptably vegetal and moldy, not to mention being excessively sweet. Almost undrinkable, but not quite.

title: Bella Piazza 2007 Old Vine Rio Volpe Zinfandel (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
excerpt: Shows the rustic tannins and ripe to overripe flavors you often find ...
description: Shows the rustic tannins and ripe to overripe flavors you often find in Foothills Zin, with wild berries, currants and raisins. Fine with barbecue, pizza, tacos and similar fare that calls for a lusty, dry red wine.

title: Oreana 2006 Sugar Mountain Vineyard Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Smells a little vegetal, tastes too soft and sweet, like melted red ...
description: Smells a little vegetal, tastes too soft and sweet, like melted red licorice, and turns raisiny on the finish. Basically okay, if pricey for the quality.

title: Bella Piazza 2007 Old Vine Zinfandel (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
excerpt: Tannic, soft, hot and sweet. That pretty much describes this 15.5% Zinfandel, ...
description: Tannic, soft, hot and sweet. That pretty much describes this 15.5% Zinfandel, which tastes Porty in raisins, currants and chocolate.

title: Philo Ridge 2006 Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: A hot, harsh wine. Although the official alcohol is modest, the wine ...
description: A hot, harsh wine. Although the official alcohol is modest, the wine has a chile pepper burn.

title: Claudia Springs 2007 Nate's Vineyard Zinfandel (Redwood Valley)
excerpt: Overripe and pruny-raisiny, like a cheap Port but without any sweetness, just ...
description: Overripe and pruny-raisiny, like a cheap Port but without any sweetness, just acids and raw tannins.

title: Grayson 2008 Lot 12 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Hot and sweet, with burnt cherry pie filling flavors.
description: Hot and sweet, with burnt cherry pie filling flavors.

title: Hobo 2008 Branham Rockpile Vineyard Zinfandel (Rockpile)
excerpt: A beautiful Zin, dry and spicy. Shows lush, intricate flavors of blackberries, ...
description: A beautiful Zin, dry and spicy. Shows lush, intricate flavors of blackberries, black raspberries, anise, pepper, cola and cedar. A very fine interpretation of a dusty Sonoma Zinfandel.

title: Miraflores 2007 Herbert Vineyard Zinfandel (El Dorado)
excerpt: Very aromatic, with an elusive note of violets that adds to the ...
description: Very aromatic, with an elusive note of violets that adds to the attractions of the blackberries, briary wild cherries, licorice and black pepper. Full bodied and dry, this Zin is charmingly sweet in fruit and brown butter on the finish.

title: Wilson 2007 Tori's Reserve Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A big, heavy, full-bodied and ripe Zinfandel that needs rich, greasy meats ...
description: A big, heavy, full-bodied and ripe Zinfandel that needs rich, greasy meats and cheeses to tame it. The blackberry, currant and dry chocolate flavors are huge, and the tannins are even bigger, giving this extremely dry wine an astringent finish.

title: Rock Wall 2007 Reserve Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Pushes Zinfandel to the limit of balance. The alcohol is nearly 16%. ...
description: Pushes Zinfandel to the limit of balance. The alcohol is nearly 16%. The tannins are hard. The blackberry and currant flavors wander into raisins. Yet on the plus side is extreme dryness and a certain complexity and curiosity value.

title: Truchard 2007 Zinfandel (Carneros)
excerpt: Too big and extracted for balance. Hits the mouth like an explosion ...
description: Too big and extracted for balance. Hits the mouth like an explosion in a jelly factory, smothering the palate in jammy blackberries and cherries. Pretty good, but lacks restraint, especially at this price.

title: Shannon Ridge 2008 Zinfandel (Lake County)
excerpt: A bit sharp and raw and rugged, even for Zinfandel. Has a ...
description: A bit sharp and raw and rugged, even for Zinfandel. Has a scoury, peppery mouthfeel that gives the blackberry and blueberry fruit a bite. Drink now.

title: Armida 2008 Maple Vineyards Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Awkward, with sweet, glyceriney flavors augmented with blackberry jam and toast. High ...
description: Awkward, with sweet, glyceriney flavors augmented with blackberry jam and toast. High alcohol creates some heat.

title: Armida 2008 Poizin Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Sweet and raisiny, a Zin that simply got too ripe. Shows some ...
description: Sweet and raisiny, a Zin that simply got too ripe. Shows some bitter raisin skin tannins, too.

title: Campus Oaks 2009 Single Vineyard Reserve White Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Simple and sweet, this blush wine has sugary flavors of citrus fruits ...
description: Simple and sweet, this blush wine has sugary flavors of citrus fruits and vanilla.

title: Norman 2007 The Monster Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Tastes almost as sweet as a dessert wine, with a glyceriney, sugary ...
description: Tastes almost as sweet as a dessert wine, with a glyceriney, sugary edge to the blackberries and chocolate. Too soft, too. The result is unbalanced.

title: Alderbrook 2007 Wind Machine Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A successful Zinfandel that shows its Dry Creek origins in the classic ...
description: A successful Zinfandel that shows its Dry Creek origins in the classic Zinfandel flavors and structure. Bone dry and not too high in alcohol, it offers a rich array of ripe grilled blackberries, blueberries, black pepper, Dr. Pepper cola and sweet, smoky sandalwood, wrapped into thick, fine tannins.

title: Alderbrook 2007 Estate Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A very tasty and tasteful Zinfandel, dry and balanced, that offers plenty ...
description: A very tasty and tasteful Zinfandel, dry and balanced, that offers plenty of classic Dry Creek personality. With briary, wild berry, currant and pepper flavors, its tannins are rich and complicated. A lovely wine to drink with roasts and stews.

title: Shenandoah 2008 Special Reserve Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: A good, rich, spicy Zin that shows loads of character at a ...
description: A good, rich, spicy Zin that shows loads of character at a great price. Full-bodied and bone dry, it bursts with blackberry, tobacco, dark chocolate and pepper flavors.

title: Sobon Estate 2008 Old Vines Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Very dense and layered in grilled cherry, raspberry, cocoa, spice and cola ...
description: Very dense and layered in grilled cherry, raspberry, cocoa, spice and cola flavors, this full-bodied wine needs rich barbecues and stews to tame its bigtime tannins. The fruit is so ripe, it tastes sweet, but this Zin is actually very dry.

title: Fritz 2007 Estate Grown Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Very peppery and briary, with a slightly green, minty edge to the ...
description: Very peppery and briary, with a slightly green, minty edge to the riper wild berries and tobacco. A good, gutsy Zinfandel of character and a sense of place.

title: Sobon Estate 2007 Rocky Top Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Give this young, fruity wine a few years in the cellar. The ...
description: Give this young, fruity wine a few years in the cellar. The flavors are all primary blackberry, blueberry and cherry jam. The tannins and a touch of espresso bitterness might easily help this Zin develop through 2012.

title: Stephen & Walker 2007 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: This is a robust, ripe and fruity Zinfandel that impresses for the ...
description: This is a robust, ripe and fruity Zinfandel that impresses for the sheer exuberance of its flavors. They range from black cherries and red currants to cola, chocolate, black pepper and the sweet, glyceriney taste of high alcohol.

title: Tres Sabores 2007 Estate Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is a robust wine. It has big, thick tannins, and the ...
description: This is a robust wine. It has big, thick tannins, and the dryness accentuates a slightly rustic character. The flavors are well developed and complex, with blackberries veering into currants and a touch of raisin.

title: Fritz 2007 Estate Reserve Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A little overripe, with a raisiny punch, but otherwise this is a ...
description: A little overripe, with a raisiny punch, but otherwise this is a nice, smooth and fruity wine. Show deep, chocolaty flavors of berries and pepper. Drink now.

title: Bella 2007 Big River Ranch Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Every effort seems to have been made to extract the maximum amount ...
description: Every effort seems to have been made to extract the maximum amount of richness from this wine, but the result is simply heavy, not to mention oaky and drily tannic. The tastes of are ripe mashed blackberries, anise, pepper and dark, unsweetened cocoa.

title: Dashe Cellars 2007 Florence Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Although this Zinfandel is technically dry, it tastes sweet, like a black ...
description: Although this Zinfandel is technically dry, it tastes sweet, like a black cherry tart complexed with cinnamon, brown sugar, anise, vanilla and a splash of rum. The richness is balanced by firm tannins and good acidity. Still, that sweetness reprises on the finish, with a hit of port. Ready now.

title: Seghesio 2007 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: A little sweet and oaky, with powerful blackberry jam, brown sugar, caramel ...
description: A little sweet and oaky, with powerful blackberry jam, brown sugar, caramel and cola flavors. The tannins are rich and wonderful.

title: Fritz 2007 Estate Grown Late Harvest Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Could and should be sweeter than 3.9% residual sugar to justify being ...
description: Could and should be sweeter than 3.9% residual sugar to justify being a dessert wine. Teases with somewhat sweet blackberry, chocolate and pepper flavors that pull back to a tannic, earthy finish.

title: George IV 2006 Teldeschi Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A little musty in aroma, and the flavors, of blackberries, raspberries, red ...
description: A little musty in aroma, and the flavors, of blackberries, raspberries, red currants and cola, seem tamped down. Drink now.

title: La Storia 2006 Estate Bottled Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: This bone-dry wine has rasping tannins and despite some pleasant blackberry fruit ...
description: This bone-dry wine has rasping tannins and despite some pleasant blackberry fruit has a green herb edge of sage that gives it a leafy bitterness. Seems at its best now.

title: Bella 2007 Lily Hill Estate Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Not a success. The wine is very tannic and hard in the ...
description: Not a success. The wine is very tannic and hard in the mouth, and the blackberry jam and currant flavors finish with an awkward sweetness and heat from high alcohol.

title: Vezer Family Vineyard 2006 Estate Zinfandel (Suisun Valley)
excerpt: Lots of good Zinfandel flavors of wild berries, currants and spices, and ...
description: Lots of good Zinfandel flavors of wild berries, currants and spices, and the tannins are just fine. On the downside is a certain vegetal streak that shows strongly in the finish.

title: Sobon Estate 2008 Hillside Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Hard to like for its sweetness, bitterness and harsh tannins, which combine ...
description: Hard to like for its sweetness, bitterness and harsh tannins, which combine to make it a small, rustic country wine.

title: Berryessa Gap 2006 Zinfandel (Yolo County)
excerpt: Soft and dull, although ripe enough, with sweetened blackberry and cola flavors ...
description: Soft and dull, although ripe enough, with sweetened blackberry and cola flavors and very high alcohol that gives heat. The softness makes the fruitiness

title: Villa Mt. Eden 2005 Grand Reserve Antique Vines Zinfandel (Napa-Amador)
excerpt: Despite the fancy name this is a pretty dreadful wine. It reeks ...
description: Despite the fancy name this is a pretty dreadful wine. It reeks of cheap port aromas and tastes hot and raspingly tannic. Just barely drinkable.

title: Ironstone 2007 Reserve Rous Vineyard Old Vine Zinfandel (Amador County)
