excerpt: A complicated and interesting Zinfandel with lots to recommend it, and at ...
description: A complicated and interesting Zinfandel with lots to recommend it, and at a pretty good price. The wine is dry and tannic, but gentle enough to drink now. It has appealing flavors of blackberry tart, red currants and cola, liberally dusted with black pepper, anise and vanilla, and finished with sweet, smoky sandalwood. Feels lush and elegant and classy through the long, spicy finish.

title: Mauritson 2007 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A lovely Zinfandel, classic and balanced, with an elegant tannin-acid structure. Shows ...
description: A lovely Zinfandel, classic and balanced, with an elegant tannin-acid structure. Shows typical Dry Creek Valley spices and briar, in addition to ripe blackberry, cherry, currant, Dr. Pepper cola and tobacco flavors.

title: Dogwood 2007 Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: A lush, forward Zin whose fruity sweetness is accentuated by pairing with ...
description: A lush, forward Zin whose fruity sweetness is accentuated by pairing with soft cheeses. Dry and soft, it offers flavors of briary forest berries, anise, black pepper and smoky sandalwood. A fine evocation of a cool-climate Zinfandel, although the alcohol is quite high. Drink now.

title: Christian Lazo 2007 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: A lusty, fulfilling Zinfandel, packed with fruity flavor and softly smooth in ...
description: A lusty, fulfilling Zinfandel, packed with fruity flavor and softly smooth in the Paso Robles style. Offers an avalance of blackberries, cherries, currants, cola and spices, and feels heavy, but dry, with some heat in the finish.

title: Mazzocco 2007 Stone Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Super-fruity, offering a blast of blackberries, cherries, chocolate, persimmons, red plums and ...
description: Super-fruity, offering a blast of blackberries, cherries, chocolate, persimmons, red plums and bacon, finished with enormous spices. The wine is technically dry but tastes sweet with high-alcohol glycerine and smoky oak. Drink this strong, uni-dimensional Zinfandel now.

title: Terra d'Oro 2007 Home Vineyard Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: A little too sweet, with a candied taste of sugared cherries, blackberries ...
description: A little too sweet, with a candied taste of sugared cherries, blackberries and cola, and a dash of caramel. Other than that the tannins are very fine.

title: Villa Toscano 2006 Old Vine Zinfandel (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
excerpt: Soft, simple and rather sweet, like a chewy candy bar of cherries, ...
description: Soft, simple and rather sweet, like a chewy candy bar of cherries, currants, cocoa and crunchy granola. High alcohol makes it a little hot and unbalanced, but it will stand up well beside a fabulous cheeseburger.

title: Wine Guerrilla 2008 Adel's Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Too high and hot in alcohol, with dry Port flavors of blackberries ...
description: Too high and hot in alcohol, with dry Port flavors of blackberries and dark unsweetened chocolate, and a peppery finish.

title: Barefoot NV Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Soft and dull, with cherry, mint and spice flavors.
description: Soft and dull, with cherry, mint and spice flavors.

title: Ravenswood 2007 Belloni Single Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: A terrific Zinfandel, with a polished, pretty structure and ripe, vibrantly classic ...
description: A terrific Zinfandel, with a polished, pretty structure and ripe, vibrantly classic Zinny flavors. Floods the mouth with berries, cola, licorice, mocha and dusty spices, wrapped into beautifully fine, ripe tannins. Impossible to resist sip after sip. Defines Russian River Zinfandel at its best.

title: Frank Family 2007 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Intensely fruity, showing a burst of blackberries, cherries and raspberries, with all ...
description: Intensely fruity, showing a burst of blackberries, cherries and raspberries, with all sorts of mocha, currant, anise, sandalwood and spice complexities. Fully dry, the wine shows sturdy tannins and an elegant mouthfeel. Drink now for its fruity richness.

title: Ravenswood 2007 Big River Single Vineyard Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: A little soft and lacking in structure, but otherwise a beautiful Zinfandel, ...
description: A little soft and lacking in structure, but otherwise a beautiful Zinfandel, filled with alluring flavors, and entirely dry. Offers waves of ripe blackberry and cherry tart, licorice, cola, currant and Asian spices that finish long and fruity.

title: Eric Ross 2008 Cody's Block Old Vine Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Released at one year of age, this single-vineyard Zinfandel is too young ...
description: Released at one year of age, this single-vineyard Zinfandel is too young for enjoyment. It shows hard tannins and tart, candied fruit flavors that have yet to emerge into bottle complexity. Give it until late 2010, and it should provide plenty of berry, cherry and spice enjoyment for a few more years.

title: Mazzocco 2007 Smith Orchard Reserve Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Made solidly in the Mazzocco style, this Zin is very dry, tannic ...
description: Made solidly in the Mazzocco style, this Zin is very dry, tannic and very high in alcohol. It has a peppery burn to the blackberries, plums and tobacco, with a curious, but rich, maple syrup finish.

title: Brazin 2007 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Dark, big, rich and tannic, but savory in ripe red currants and ...
description: Dark, big, rich and tannic, but savory in ripe red currants and licorice, this slightly rustic Zin will pair well with rich meats and cheeses and especially barbecue.

title: Mazzocco 2007 Warm Springs Ranch Reserve Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A good, robust Zin that defines the high alcohol, superripe style of ...
description: A good, robust Zin that defines the high alcohol, superripe style of Northern California. With more than 16% alcohol, it has a Portiness to the blackberries, coffee and anise. Drink this strongly flavored, dry wine with barbecue or beef-centered Latin fare.

title: Chateau Montelena 2006 Estate Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Dull and herbal, with modest berry and spice flavors. The structure is ...
description: Dull and herbal, with modest berry and spice flavors. The structure is soft and simple. Disappointing.

title: Leaping Lizard 2007 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: An everyday Zin, soft and candied, with blackberry, cherry, licorice and cocoa ...
description: An everyday Zin, soft and candied, with blackberry, cherry, licorice and cocoa flavors. The tannin structure is rich. Drink now.

title: McManis 2008 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Rugged, rustic and dry, with briary flavors of wild berries, raisins, cocoa, ...
description: Rugged, rustic and dry, with briary flavors of wild berries, raisins, cocoa, pepper, leather and herbs. Ready now with easy fare.

title: Adelaida 2007 Michael's Estate Vineyard Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Too soft in acidity, so the blackberry, currant, cherry liqueur and spice ...
description: Too soft in acidity, so the blackberry, currant, cherry liqueur and spice flavors have a curious jamminess. The softness and high alcohol emphasize sweetness, affecting the finish.

title: Williams Selyem 2007 Papera Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: The 2007 vintage was a fabulous one for Williams Selyem, and the ...
description: The 2007 vintage was a fabulous one for Williams Selyem, and the Zinfandels benefited from the cool, balanced growing season. The Papera is a big, rich, jammy wine, but also a drily elegant one. It offers waves of raspberry, Fig Newton, red currant and Canadian bacon flavors, with superfine tannins. An exuberant Zinfandel now and for the next six years.

title: Williams Selyem 2007 Forchini Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: A big, boldly powerful but elegant Zinfandel, full-bodied in the mouth and ...
description: A big, boldly powerful but elegant Zinfandel, full-bodied in the mouth and dry, offering waves of ripe fruits and spices. The cool 2007 vintage has kept the wine from being too ripe, resulting in balanced flavors of blackberries, currants, licorice, bacon, cocoa, black pepper and Asian spices. Just terrific. Drink over the next six years.

title: Titus 2007 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Delicious and succulent, a gigantic Zinfandel. Impresses for the powerful ripeness of ...
description: Delicious and succulent, a gigantic Zinfandel. Impresses for the powerful ripeness of the blackberry, plum and cherry fruit, accented with waves of smoky wood, cocoa and Asian spices. The tannins are rich and strong. Will age for a long time, gradually losing density and becoming softer and sweeter.

title: Z-52 2006 Truchard Vineyard Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Shows all the Zinny character you could want, with masses of wild ...
description: Shows all the Zinny character you could want, with masses of wild forest berries, sweet red currants, licorice, bacon, smoky sandalwood and peppery spices. The pedigree comes in the dryness and the fine balance of tannins, acids and oak. A first-rate, upscale Zin.

title: Rued 2006 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Very good Dry Creek Zin, robust and dry and spicy. Really gets ...
description: Very good Dry Creek Zin, robust and dry and spicy. Really gets the tastebuds watering, with its tart flavors of sour cherry candy, red currants, blueberries, tart raisins and oodles of peppery spices. Drink this lusty wine with barbecue.

title: Kokomo 2007 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: A lovely Zinfandel, soft and delicious. It has very ripe flavors of ...
description: A lovely Zinfandel, soft and delicious. It has very ripe flavors of red cherries, red currants, raspberries, cocoa, anise and peppery spices, wrapped into rich, finely ground tannins. Drink now.

title: Wilson 2007 Diane's Reserve Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A big, soft, ultrarich style of Zinfandel. It has very high alcohol, ...
description: A big, soft, ultrarich style of Zinfandel. It has very high alcohol, with flamboyant flavors of milk chocolate, oozingly ripe blackberries and blueberries, anise liqueur and black pepper. The finish is totally dry. Lusty and heady.

title: Kokomo 2007 Perotti Vineyards Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Very ripe. You can taste the sunshine in the blackberry, cherry, blueberry, ...
description: Very ripe. You can taste the sunshine in the blackberry, cherry, blueberry, mulberry and cocoa flavors. They burst in the mouth, carrying waves of spices and fruity acids through a spicy, slightly hot finish. At its best now.

title: Z-52 2006 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: A great buy at this price for its richness and overall integrity. ...
description: A great buy at this price for its richness and overall integrity. Has a medium body, with fine, fuzzy tannins and bone-dry, complex flavors of wild berries, currants, herbs, tobacco and tons of peppery spices.

title: Summers 2007 Four-Acre Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Somewhat sharp and tartly aggressive now in jammy fruit, with raspberry, cherry, ...
description: Somewhat sharp and tartly aggressive now in jammy fruit, with raspberry, cherry, wintergreen mint and cola flavors, sweetened with smoky wood notes. Doe not seem like an ager, so drink now with very rich meats, oils and cheeses to soften the hardness.

title: Montevina 2006 Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: A fresh, crisp young Zinfandel, briary and brambly, with exuberant flavors of ...
description: A fresh, crisp young Zinfandel, briary and brambly, with exuberant flavors of wild raspberries, cola, red licorice, mint and loads of peppery spices. A good, inexpensive wine for everyday fare.

title: Barra 2004 Estate Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: This is a rough and ready Zinfandel. With its briary, brambly flavors ...
description: This is a rough and ready Zinfandel. With its briary, brambly flavors of wild berries and pepper, and the strong, edgy tannins, it needs rich meats and cheeses to play against.

title: Peachy Canyon 2007 Vortex Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Somewhat musty, with a sweaty sox smell that interferes with the fruit. ...
description: Somewhat musty, with a sweaty sox smell that interferes with the fruit. The flavors are of sweet black currants, and acidity is quite soft. Drink now.

title: Smoking Loon 2007 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Smells like tobacco and pepper, and then turns tannic and dry in ...
description: Smells like tobacco and pepper, and then turns tannic and dry in the mouth, with blackberry flavors emerging after it warms up. A decent everyday Zin.

title: Oak Grove 2008 Reserve Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Soft and a bit sweet in jammy blackberries and cherries, with lots ...
description: Soft and a bit sweet in jammy blackberries and cherries, with lots of pepper. Compromised by some unripe green mint flavors.

title: Cosentino 2006 Cigar Zin Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Sweet and simple. Tastes like melted cherry and blackberry jam, mixed with ...
description: Sweet and simple. Tastes like melted cherry and blackberry jam, mixed with cola, cocoa, white sugar and spices.

title: Nine x Nine 2006 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Tastes sweet and alcoholic, with vegetal flavors that barely break into berries ...
description: Tastes sweet and alcoholic, with vegetal flavors that barely break into berries and cocoa.

title: Quivira 2007 Wine Creek Ranch Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Dry and full-bodied, with robust flavors of wild red, blue and black ...
description: Dry and full-bodied, with robust flavors of wild red, blue and black berries, currants, cola, dark chocolate and oodles of peppery spices. Feels brisk and tannic in the mouth, with a balanced, classy finish. A beautiful Dry Creek Zin for drinking now.

title: Old Ghost 2007 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Very high in alcohol but wears it well, showing a soft, lush ...
description: Very high in alcohol but wears it well, showing a soft, lush texture and lots of fruit flavors. Waves of cherries, raspberries, currants and plums wash across the palate, with a rich edge of milk chocolate. The finish is dry and wonderfully spicy.

title: Proulx 2007 Black Label Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: A first-rate, delicious Zinfandel that shows Paso at its best. It offers ...
description: A first-rate, delicious Zinfandel that shows Paso at its best. It offers a flood of blackberries and cherries that have a roasted edge, along with notes of cocoa, cassis, toasted almond, cinnamon and pepper. Very good now and for a few years.

title: Quivira 2007 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A very good, dry Zinfandel, rich in ripe fruit and smoky oak. ...
description: A very good, dry Zinfandel, rich in ripe fruit and smoky oak. With thick, furry tannins, it shows classic Zinny flavors of wild berries and dusty Asian spices. Great price for a Sonoma Zin of this quality. Drink now.

title: XYZin 2007 50 Vine Age Series Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Very ripe, soft and fruity, basically a jammy bomb, with pepper-infused grilled ...
description: Very ripe, soft and fruity, basically a jammy bomb, with pepper-infused grilled blackberry, black cherry and mulberry flavors, complexed with interesting balsam, chocolate and molasses notes. The tannins are thick and decisive. Should have a smooth transition over the next six years.

title: Andretti 2007 Zinfandel (Howell Mountain)
excerpt: Hard and astringent in tannins, this Zin needs rich, oily meats and ...
description: Hard and astringent in tannins, this Zin needs rich, oily meats and cheeses to combat its power. Shows concentrated flavors of grilled blackberries, roasted meat, black currants, cola and peppery spices, with the charred sweetness of oak barrels.

title: Mantra 2007 Old Vines Reserve Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Hot, dry and ripe, with strong flavors of grilled blackberries and cherries, ...
description: Hot, dry and ripe, with strong flavors of grilled blackberries and cherries, red and black currants, tobacco, cocoa and peppery spices. Needs rich fare, like hard cheeses, olive oil, beef and lamb, to stand up to the tannins.

title: XYZin 2007 10 Vine Age Series Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Jammy and fruity-sweet, with peppery raspberry, cherry and mocha flavors, offset by ...
description: Jammy and fruity-sweet, with peppery raspberry, cherry and mocha flavors, offset by rich, dusty tannins. A sound, everyday Zin that will love gooey cheese melted on almost anything.

title: Collier Falls 2006 Estate Primitivo (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A soft, fairly simple red wine. It has spicy, interesting flavors of ...
description: A soft, fairly simple red wine. It has spicy, interesting flavors of berries, leather, tobacco and currants, and is nicely dry, with sturdy tannins that turn a bit coarse on the finish. Drink now.

title: Meadowcroft 2007 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A soft, rather sweet Zinfandel, with granola health bar flavors of raspberries, ...
description: A soft, rather sweet Zinfandel, with granola health bar flavors of raspberries, cocoa, crunchy toasted almonds and cinnamon spice.

title: Bogle 2007 Old Vine Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Fresh and jammy, a tart young wine brimming with all sorts of ...
description: Fresh and jammy, a tart young wine brimming with all sorts of fruit- stand cherries and berries, sprinkled with pepper and cinnamon. Drink this robust Zin with everyday fare.

title: Blockheadia Ringnosii 2006 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: A bit soft and sweet, with Lifesaver candy flavors of cherries and ...
description: A bit soft and sweet, with Lifesaver candy flavors of cherries and blackberries, and a spicy finish. Okay with everyday cheeseburgers, pasta.

title: Wilson 2007 Sawyer Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Heavy and dense, with a soft texture and melted, thick tannins. Lacks ...
description: Heavy and dense, with a soft texture and melted, thick tannins. Lacks structure and vitality, although the blackberry, currant, chocolate and spice flavors are very good.

title: Klinker Brick 2007 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Aromas and flavors of fennel, black cherries, raspberries and chocolate mark this ...
description: Aromas and flavors of fennel, black cherries, raspberries and chocolate mark this soft, easy Zin. Nice with a juicy cheeseburger slathered with ketchup.

title: Lang 2007 Oakmont Vineyards Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: The alcohol is strong and hot and the taste is Porty and ...
description: The alcohol is strong and hot and the taste is Porty and raisiny, but the finish is dry and spicy on this robust, sturdy Zin. Drink it with barbecued ribs.

title: X 2008 Nova Vineyard Zinfandel (Lake County)
excerpt: Softly tannic and ripe. Offers flamboyant blackberry, raspberry, cherry and chocolate flavors, ...
description: Softly tannic and ripe. Offers flamboyant blackberry, raspberry, cherry and chocolate flavors, generously spiced, with a soft, sweet finish. A good everyday, multi-purpose Zin.

title: Mantra 2007 Primitivo (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Good and robust, but a bit too high in alcohol, offering a ...
description: Good and robust, but a bit too high in alcohol, offering a burning feeling with grilled, sweet flavors of berries, cherries and spices. Drink now.

title: Wilson 2007 Carl's Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Hot in high alcohol, with Port-like flavors of superripe currants and dark ...
description: Hot in high alcohol, with Port-like flavors of superripe currants and dark chocolate, finished with a raisinskin bitterness.

title: Collier Falls 2007 Late Harvest Primitivo (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Shows sugary flavors of sweetened blackberry tea, and also herbal, vegetal notes ...
description: Shows sugary flavors of sweetened blackberry tea, and also herbal, vegetal notes of asparagus. The end result is an awkward, clumsy wine.

title: Pianetta 2007 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Harsh in texture and hot, with sweet and sour flavors of raspberries, ...
description: Harsh in texture and hot, with sweet and sour flavors of raspberries, cherries and mint.

title: Louis M. Martini 2006 Monte Rosso Vineyard Gnarly Vine Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Classic Monte Rosso Zin, big, full-bodied and mouthfilling, showing all the spice ...
description: Classic Monte Rosso Zin, big, full-bodied and mouthfilling, showing all the spice you could want. Floods the palate with concentrated blackberry and black currant, leather, cola, bacon, sandalwood and black pepper flavors that are densely tiered and dramatically structured. Best now and over the next six years.

title: Oriel 2006 Hugo Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: A robust, friendly Zinfandel, filled with the spices and briary fruits of ...
description: A robust, friendly Zinfandel, filled with the spices and briary fruits of this variety. Floods the mouth with blackberries, cherries, raspberries and something gamier, like mulberries, with intricacies of leather, tobacco, sandalwood and pepper. Delicious.

title: Domenichelli 2006 Magnificent 7 Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: Rich and lusty, a wonderful interpretation of California Zinfandel. Shows the ripe, ...
description: Rich and lusty, a wonderful interpretation of California Zinfandel. Shows the ripe, wild character of the variety, with flavors of black, red and blue berries you find growing in the fields and hollows on a hot summer day. Finishes spicy and dry.

title: Sextant 2007 Holystone Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Very ripe and plush, you might even say sexy. Caresses the palate ...
description: Very ripe and plush, you might even say sexy. Caresses the palate with warmth and velvety softness, carrying flavors of blackberry pie, blueberry marmalade, melted milk chocolate, vanilla bean and lots of peppery spices.

title: Peachy Canyon 2007 Westside Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Rich and impressive. Shows massive flavors of ripe blackberries, black raspberries, cherries, ...
description: Rich and impressive. Shows massive flavors of ripe blackberries, black raspberries, cherries, cola, chocolate, anise, black pepper and sandalwood, with a spicy finish. Feels sweet but is fully dry, with a crisp burst of balancing acidity.

title: C.G. di Arie 2006 Block #4 Estate Grown Primitivo (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
excerpt: Very ripe and fruity, offering a flood of freshly picked blackberry, raspberry ...
description: Very ripe and fruity, offering a flood of freshly picked blackberry, raspberry and cherry flavors, totally dry. Shows a silky texture that makes for easy drinking.

title: Fritz 2006 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Spicy and briary, a lusty, exuberant Zin meant for drinking with barbecue ...
description: Spicy and briary, a lusty, exuberant Zin meant for drinking with barbecue and richly flavored roasts. Brims with flavors of grilled blackberries and blueberries, currants, chocolate, tobacco, black pepper and smoke.

title: Concannon 2007 Reserve Zinfandel (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: Lusty and full-bodied, a strongly flavored, spicy Zinfandel brimming with wild forest ...
description: Lusty and full-bodied, a strongly flavored, spicy Zinfandel brimming with wild forest berries and currants. At its best now for its exuberant personality with BBQ or classic Italian fare.

title: C.G. di Arie 2007 Zinfandel (Sierra Foothills)
excerpt: Fresh and grapey, like Beaujolais, with bright flavors of cherries, blackberries, raspberries ...
description: Fresh and grapey, like Beaujolais, with bright flavors of cherries, blackberries, raspberries and pepperspice. The texture is silky and the finish is dry.

title: Oriel 2005 Hugo Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Tastes a little tired, with the berry-cherry fruit fading and the naked ...
description: Tastes a little tired, with the berry-cherry fruit fading and the naked alcohol shining through. Must have been a very nice Zinfandel a year ago.

title: Minassian-Young 2007 Bailey Vineyard Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Soft, slightly sweet and simple, a wine with tastes of chocolate-covered cherries, ...
description: Soft, slightly sweet and simple, a wine with tastes of chocolate-covered cherries, raspberries and smoky sandalwood. Drink now.

title: Ironstone 2008 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: A typical Lodi Zin, soft in texture and ultraripe. The blackberries and ...
description: A typical Lodi Zin, soft in texture and ultraripe. The blackberries and cherries have hints of raisins, stewed prunes and chocolate. Good with hearty fare.

title: Pepperwood Grove 2007 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: A sound, useful Zin, good for casual purposes, at an everyday price. ...
description: A sound, useful Zin, good for casual purposes, at an everyday price. Dry and velvety, it shows flavors of blackberries, currants, mocha, leather, anise and pepper.

title: Minassian-Young 2007 Raison d'Etre Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: As hot and sweet as an inexpensive Port, with sugary flavors of ...
description: As hot and sweet as an inexpensive Port, with sugary flavors of blackberries, chocolate and coffee. Okay for a dessert wine, inappropriate for a table wine.

title: Cosentino 2006 Estate Ancient Vines Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Way too high in hot, unbalanced alcohol and sweet, glyceriney tastes, this ...
description: Way too high in hot, unbalanced alcohol and sweet, glyceriney tastes, this Zin is soft and simple. It has melted jam flavors of cherries and raspberries.

title: Cosentino 2006 The Zin Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Tastes like it came from a hot climate, with high alcohol, soft ...
description: Tastes like it came from a hot climate, with high alcohol, soft acidity and superripe, jammy-sweet flavors of cherries, chocolate and raisins.

title: Mission Trail 2004 Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Sugary-sweet and glyceriney, way too much so for a table wine, with ...
description: Sugary-sweet and glyceriney, way too much so for a table wine, with blackberry, cherry, orange, Dr. Pepper cola and chocolate flavors.

title: Ballentine 2007 Block 9 Reserve Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A beautiful Zin, dry and complex, showcasing perfectly ripe fruit and sweet ...
description: A beautiful Zin, dry and complex, showcasing perfectly ripe fruit and sweet Napa tannins. Just delicious, offering waves of blackberries, cherries, mocha, pepper and spice, and that elusive, distinctly Zin note of briars and brambles.

title: Peju 2006 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A little overripe and raisiny, but otherwise delicious, with sculpted Napa tannins ...
description: A little overripe and raisiny, but otherwise delicious, with sculpted Napa tannins framing luscious flavors of blackberries, cherries, chocolate and sandalwood, and a generous sprinkling of peppery spices. Drink now.

title: Newsome-Harlow 2007 Shake Ridge Shake Ridge Ranch Vineyard Select Series Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Complex, with pepper-infused flavors of black and red currants, mocha, bacon and ...
description: Complex, with pepper-infused flavors of black and red currants, mocha, bacon and smoky cedar, and a tingly dusting of Asian spices. A thoroughly enjoyable Zin for its dry, lusty softness. Drink now.

title: Leone de Castris 2007 Villa Santera  (Primitivo di Manduria)
excerpt: This is a rich and well concentrated Primitivo di Manduria from Southern ...
description: This is a rich and well concentrated Primitivo di Manduria from Southern Italy with mature notes of black cherry, blackberry pie, plum and dried prunes. The wine is rich and soft and the mouth offers a full palate of mature fruit flavors. Pair this with meat or cheesy pasta dishes.

title: Schulz 2007 Lampyridae Vineyard Zinfandel (Mount Veeder)
excerpt: This is a very big Zinfandel, exuberant and lush in fruit. It ...
description: This is a very big Zinfandel, exuberant and lush in fruit. It floods the palate with blackberries, cherries, mulberries, plums and currants, complexed with smoky oak and spices. Fine now with steak fajitas or a juicy cheeseburger.

title: Brazin Cellars 2007 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Peppery and hot, almost Porty, with rich flavors of blackberries, cherries, chocolate, ...
description: Peppery and hot, almost Porty, with rich flavors of blackberries, cherries, chocolate, bacon and sandalwood. With smooth tannins, it turns soft and spicy on the finish.

title: A-Mano 2006 Primitivo (Puglia)
excerpt: This is a simple, genuine wine that delivers concentration, power and personality ...
description: This is a simple, genuine wine that delivers concentration, power and personality without much effort. Its success is due to the sunny climatic conditions of Southern Italy and a healthy selection of fruit. In the mouth, the wine offers both sweetness and crispness.

title: Paradise Ridge 2006 The Convict Rocky Ridge Vineyard Zinfandel (Rockpile)
excerpt: A bit too soft and thus lacks structure. Shows a good array ...
description: A bit too soft and thus lacks structure. Shows a good array of wild berry and briary, brambly flavors. Dry and spicy, and ready now.

title: Newsome-Harlow 2007 Zinfandel (Calaveras County)
excerpt: A good everyday mountain Zin, dry and tannic, with blackberry, herb, cocoa ...
description: A good everyday mountain Zin, dry and tannic, with blackberry, herb, cocoa and pepper flavors. Drink now.

title: Alexander Valley Vineyards 2007 Redemption Zin Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Dry, minty and sharp, and very peppery, with tobacco, wintergreen, cherry and ...
description: Dry, minty and sharp, and very peppery, with tobacco, wintergreen, cherry and currant flavors, wrapped into sturdy tannins. Drink now.

title: Vinosia 2006 Vecchie Vigne  (Primitivo di Manduria)
excerpt: Packaged in a heavy, oversized black bottle, this brawny wine delivers power, ...
description: Packaged in a heavy, oversized black bottle, this brawny wine delivers power, bulging muscle and aromas that exaggerate in every way possible. The most noticeable feature (so noticeable, it knocks you in the face) is the wood element that comes off as fresh carpentry or wood shavings. The wine is heavy, syrupy and sweet tasting.

title: Medusa 2006 Pig Pen Vineyard Deaver Ranch Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Nice and dry, with black currant, orange rind, anise, tobacco, cocoa and ...
description: Nice and dry, with black currant, orange rind, anise, tobacco, cocoa and spice flavors. But the wine lacks vivacity and zest, and so loses a few points.

title: Bargetto 2007 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Pretty sweet for a Zin, with black cherry pie filling, cinnamon toast, ...
description: Pretty sweet for a Zin, with black cherry pie filling, cinnamon toast, pepper spice and vanilla flavors. Acidity and velvety tannins provide needed structure.

title: Gnarly Head 2007 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: A soft, approachable wine whose pleasure is in its extreme dryness. Shows ...
description: A soft, approachable wine whose pleasure is in its extreme dryness. Shows peppery flavors of tobacco, wild blackberries, bacon and anise.

title: Medusa 2006 Creekside Vineyard Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Dry, soft and earthy, with modest cherry, cocoa and cedar flavors that ...
description: Dry, soft and earthy, with modest cherry, cocoa and cedar flavors that finish in a swirl of hard tannins. Drink now.

title: Ridge 2007 Ponzo Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Way too high in alcohol, and distinctly Porty, with sweet raisin and ...
description: Way too high in alcohol, and distinctly Porty, with sweet raisin and cedar flavors, and a hot burn throughout.

title: One Hope 2006 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Sweet-and-sour cherry flavors mark this raw, slightly sweet Zinfandel.
description: Sweet-and-sour cherry flavors mark this raw, slightly sweet Zinfandel.

title: Cardinal Zin 2006 Beastly Old Vines Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Dull and vegetal. Has asparagus and blackberry flavors that finish dry and ...
description: Dull and vegetal. Has asparagus and blackberry flavors that finish dry and tannic.

title: Martin Ranch 2006 J.D. Hurley Zinfandel (Santa Clara Valley)
excerpt: Ultra-soft, lacking structure, and with some vegetal and herb notes alongside the ...
description: Ultra-soft, lacking structure, and with some vegetal and herb notes alongside the cherries. Not very satisfying, but drinkable.

title: Renwood 2006 Kelly's Block Veauta Vineyard Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Hot and peppery in high alcohol, this Zin is rich in tannins. ...
description: Hot and peppery in high alcohol, this Zin is rich in tannins. It displays tangy wild berry, briary stalk, sour cherry candy, grilled meat bone, black pepper and cedar flavors that finish absolutely dry. Really needs rich grilled meat to play against.

title: Calistoga Cellars 2006 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Oaky, with smoky sandalwood, caramel and buttered toast flavors dominating the blackberries, ...
description: Oaky, with smoky sandalwood, caramel and buttered toast flavors dominating the blackberries, mulberries, tobacco and peppery spices. The tannins are rich and acidity is fine.

title: Miraflores 2006 Zinfandel (El Dorado)
excerpt: Very ripe, with chocolatey flavors of cherries, mulberries, anise, black pepper and ...
description: Very ripe, with chocolatey flavors of cherries, mulberries, anise, black pepper and cedar. The tannins are as pure and refined as they come, but the wine could be a little crisper. Drink now.

title: Axis 2007 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: A bit too sweet and soft, but offers a wealth of flavor. ...
description: A bit too sweet and soft, but offers a wealth of flavor. Blueberries, blackberries, cherries, chocolate, oatmeal raisin cookie and vanilla mingle into a spicy finish.

title: Rosenblum 2006 Planchon Vineyard Zinfandel (Contra Costa County)
excerpt: Soft, simple and somewhat sweet, with the flavors of a Starbucks concoction ...
description: Soft, simple and somewhat sweet, with the flavors of a Starbucks concoction of chocolate, coffee, raspberries, anise and cinnamon.

title: Quackenbush 2007 Zinfandel (Lake County)
excerpt: Like a Beaujolais with its fresh, young and tart fruit, but the ...
description: Like a Beaujolais with its fresh, young and tart fruit, but the full-bodied flavors are all Zinfandel. Brims with tart cherry jam and Dr. Pepper cola.

title: Joullian 2006 Zinfandel (Carmel Valley)
excerpt: Vegetal, with a steamed broccoli edge to the blackberries and currants. But ...
description: Vegetal, with a steamed broccoli edge to the blackberries and currants. But the wine is dry, with rich tannins. Drink now.

title: Renwood 2006 Zinfandel (Sierra Foothills)
excerpt: This everyday Zinfandel is dry and spicy, with wild berry, tobacco, pepper ...
description: This everyday Zinfandel is dry and spicy, with wild berry, tobacco, pepper and teriaki beef flavors. At this price, buy it by the case for barbecue parties.

title: Stryker Sonoma 2006 Patty's Patch Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Oaky and ripe. Shows strong barrel influences of caramel and sweet, smoky ...
description: Oaky and ripe. Shows strong barrel influences of caramel and sweet, smoky vanilla that cover blackberry jam and chocolate flavors. At this price, it needs greater control and balance.

title: Renwood 2006 Crain Sleeper Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Too hot and overripe, with a raisiny edge to the chocolate and ...
description: Too hot and overripe, with a raisiny edge to the chocolate and blackberry flavors. The official alcohol is 15.5%.

title: Rosenblum 2006 Maggie's Reserve Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Tastes like a sweet-and-sour cherry candy, with the acidity of a young ...
description: Tastes like a sweet-and-sour cherry candy, with the acidity of a young ruby Port. Finishes with melted chocolate.

title: Rosenblum 2006 Rockpile Road Vineyard Zinfandel (Rockpile)
excerpt: Nice flavors, with blackberries, pepper, licorice and beef jerky, but the wine ...
description: Nice flavors, with blackberries, pepper, licorice and beef jerky, but the wine is a little sweet and way too soft for balance.

title: Rosenblum 2006 Carla's Reserve Zinfandel (Contra Costa County)
excerpt: Almost as sweet as Port, but not as good, with a hot, ...
description: Almost as sweet as Port, but not as good, with a hot, harsh mouthfeel. Shows burnt flavors of cherries and blackberries, and is deficient in balancing acidity.

title: Q 2007 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Too sweet, with sugared blackberry, blueberry and cherry jam flavors, and lacking ...
description: Too sweet, with sugared blackberry, blueberry and cherry jam flavors, and lacking balancing acidity.

title: Parkers Estate 2007 Dillon Springs Road Private Reserve Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Modest and one-dimensional, with cherry-berry and spice flavors.
description: Modest and one-dimensional, with cherry-berry and spice flavors.

title: Pietra Santa 2007 Zinfandel (Central Coast)
excerpt: Simple and tart, with some unripe, stalky green notes behind the modest ...
description: Simple and tart, with some unripe, stalky green notes behind the modest cherry flavors. Drink now.

title: Rosenblum 2006 Aparicio Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Smells and tastes like cheap Port, with burnt berry, chocolate and caramel ...
description: Smells and tastes like cheap Port, with burnt berry, chocolate and caramel notes. Yet it finishes dry and harsh.

title: Clos du Lac 2006 Reserve Blend Zinfandel (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
excerpt: Rustic, with brown sugared blackberry jam and blueberry pie flavors finished with ...
description: Rustic, with brown sugared blackberry jam and blueberry pie flavors finished with acidity.

title: Zig Zag 2006 Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: Acidic and green, with sweet-and-sour sauce flavors of mashed cherries, sugar, cilantro ...
description: Acidic and green, with sweet-and-sour sauce flavors of mashed cherries, sugar, cilantro and apple cider vinegar.

title: Bella Piazza 2006 Esola Vineyard Zinfandel (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
excerpt: This is a very dense, bone dry and full-bodied Zin with plenty ...
description: This is a very dense, bone dry and full-bodied Zin with plenty of distinctive features. It shows the wild mountain berry and enormous range of dusty Asian spice flavors you expect, but also interesting notes of dried thyme and sage that finish with sweet anise and bacon. In a word, complicated. The alcohol is high, but manageable.

title: Saucelito Canyon 2007 Estate Zinfandel (Arroyo Grande Valley)
excerpt: This Zin is grown well inland, not in Pinot Noir country, and ...
description: This Zin is grown well inland, not in Pinot Noir country, and the extra warmth has given a lusty wine rich in black and red currant, licorice and mocha flavors. It bursts throughout with spicy black pepper. Drink now.

title: Roshambo 2006 the reverend Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Roshambo has captured the essence of Dry Creek Zin with this spicy ...
description: Roshambo has captured the essence of Dry Creek Zin with this spicy wine. It shows the peppery flavors of wild mountain red and black berries, picked under the heat of the summer sun and ripe in sugary sweetness. But the wine itself is utterly dry and rich in tannins. Fine now with beef in chimichurri sauce.

title: Rodney Strong 2007 Knotty Vines Estate Vineyards Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: A fine everyday Zinfandel, with a classic structure. Dry and velvety, it ...
description: A fine everyday Zinfandel, with a classic structure. Dry and velvety, it offers peppery flavors of blackberries and cherries, with earthier notes of tobacco and carob.

title: Zinopolis 2007 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Full-bodied and juicy. Offers a wealth of blackberry, black cherry, plum, tobacco, ...
description: Full-bodied and juicy. Offers a wealth of blackberry, black cherry, plum, tobacco, bacon and pepper spice flavors that are housed in thick tannins. Production was 4,877 cases, so should be easy to find.

title: Cartlidge & Browne 2006 Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Shows the briary, brambly taste and texture of a mountain Zin, with ...
description: Shows the briary, brambly taste and texture of a mountain Zin, with rustic flavors of fresh wild berries, mocha, herbs and pepper. A solid, honest country wine, at an affordable price.

title: Renwood 2005 Old Vine Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Rugged and rustic, with a thorny, briary mouthfeel whose tannins elbow their ...
description: Rugged and rustic, with a thorny, briary mouthfeel whose tannins elbow their way into the gums. Shows flavors of wild, fresh mountain berries, coffee and peppery spices. Drink now.

title: Girard 2007 Old Vine Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Nice for its briary, wild berry flavors of cherries, blackberries and mulberries, ...
description: Nice for its briary, wild berry flavors of cherries, blackberries and mulberries, and the enormous fan of dusty Asian spices. Nice, too, for its dryness. But just a bit too soft, and could use greater structure. Drink now.

title: Fetzer 2007 Valley Oaks Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: A nice everyday Zin to drink with everything from a ham sandwich ...
description: A nice everyday Zin to drink with everything from a ham sandwich to steak fajitas. Firm in tannins, it shows spicy flavors of wild blackberries, mulberries, licorice and cocoa.

title: Sylvester 2007 Kiara Private Reserve Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Extracted and a little Porty, with flavors of cherries, raisins, sweet sandalwood, ...
description: Extracted and a little Porty, with flavors of cherries, raisins, sweet sandalwood, pepper and spices. The texture is silky and the finish is slightly sweet, in the Paso style.

title: Scott Harvey 2006 Old Vine Reserve Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Acidic and ripe, with cherry, blackberry and raspberry flavors that have a ...
description: Acidic and ripe, with cherry, blackberry and raspberry flavors that have a sweet-and-sour cough drop candy taste. Earns an extra point for the smooth tannins.

title: Villa Toscano 2006 Jake's Vineyard Old Vine Zinfandel (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
excerpt: Rustic and sweet as jam you spread on toast, this Zin shows ...
description: Rustic and sweet as jam you spread on toast, this Zin shows cherry, black raspberry and pepper flavors, wrapped into edgy, slightly green tannins. Robust and briary. Drink now.

title: Zinfandelic 2005 Old Vine Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Soft and direct, with candied flavors of raspberries, cherries and spices. Finishes ...
description: Soft and direct, with candied flavors of raspberries, cherries and spices. Finishes a little sweet.

title: Rosenblum 2006 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Hot, harsh and peppery in the mouth, and with simple blackberry and ...
description: Hot, harsh and peppery in the mouth, and with simple blackberry and cherry jam flavors, this wine is okay for drinking at backyard barbecues in a tumbler.

title: Castoro Cellars 2006 Zinfusion Reserve Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Soft and melted in structure, with simple cherry and red currant flavors ...
description: Soft and melted in structure, with simple cherry and red currant flavors tinged with herbs and steamed broccoli.

title: Barber 2007 Mr. Beast Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: As sugary sweet as cherry and raspberry pie filling. Not for fans ...
description: As sugary sweet as cherry and raspberry pie filling. Not for fans of dry table wines.

title: Gatos Locos 2007 Zinfandel (Mokelumne River)
excerpt: Heavy and semi-sweet, with syrupy berry flavors.
description: Heavy and semi-sweet, with syrupy berry flavors.

title: Cline 2006 Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Great price for a Zin of this purity and varietal truth. Dry ...
description: Great price for a Zin of this purity and varietal truth. Dry and medium-bodied, but sweet in fruit, it shows wonderful flavors of wild forest blackberries, with complications from black pepper, orange peel, anise and Asian spices. The texture is sheer velvet. Best now and through 2010.

title: Quivira 2006 Anderson Ranch Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A lovely Zinfandel, showing nice balance without too much alcohol. Dry and ...
description: A lovely Zinfandel, showing nice balance without too much alcohol. Dry and velvety in the mouth, it displays lush flavors of blackberries, cherries, pepper, teriaki beef, cola and cedar, with a crisp spine of acidity.

title: Kendall-Jackson 2006 Grand Reserve Zinfandel (Mendocino-Solano)
excerpt: A bit heady in alcohol, but dry and softly balanced, with picture-perfect ...
description: A bit heady in alcohol, but dry and softly balanced, with picture-perfect Zinfandel character. The intricate flavors are of ripe, crushed blackberries, briary mulberries, black pepper, cola, beef carpaccio, and all kinds of grilled wild forest mushrooms and bark. Drink now.

title: Patit Creek 2007 Zinfandel (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: This appealing Washington Zinfandel is spicy and bright, bringing in ripe strawberry, ...
description: This appealing Washington Zinfandel is spicy and bright, bringing in ripe strawberry, wild cherry and sweet raspberry fruit, enhanced with orange peel and made in a forward, brambly, fruit-powered style.

title: Murphy-Goode 2005 Snake Eyes Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Rich and mouth-filling, showing a bone dry, briskly tannic scour, and exuberant ...
description: Rich and mouth-filling, showing a bone dry, briskly tannic scour, and exuberant flavors of pepper, blackberries, currants, leather and smoke. Drink now.

title: Frog's Leap 2007 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A vigorous Zinfandel, with sturdy tannins and a rustic mouthfeel. Shows plenty ...
description: A vigorous Zinfandel, with sturdy tannins and a rustic mouthfeel. Shows plenty of pepper, blackberries and tobacco, and finishes totally dry.

title: Cline 2007 Bridgehead Zinfandel (Contra Costa County)
excerpt: A bit too high in alcohol, which gives it a sweet, glyceriney ...
description: A bit too high in alcohol, which gives it a sweet, glyceriney headiness, but fine with barbecue. Shows flavors of grilled blackberries, plumped raisins and tart mulberries.

title: Clavo Cellars 2006 Legacy Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Soft and appealing, this easy-drinking Zin offers flavors of freshly crushed cherries, ...
description: Soft and appealing, this easy-drinking Zin offers flavors of freshly crushed cherries, blackberries and mulberries, with a sprinkling of black pepper, cocoa and anise.

title: Cline 2007 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: A solid every Zin, dry and spicy, with flavors of blackberries, cherries, ...
description: A solid every Zin, dry and spicy, with flavors of blackberries, cherries, chocolate and loads of anise and black pepper. Good price for a nice, easy wine.

title: Cline 2007 Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: A bit hot in alcohol, but rich and peppery, with flavors of ...
description: A bit hot in alcohol, but rich and peppery, with flavors of roasted blackberries, cherry liqueur, chocolate and anise. Good with barbecue.

title: Minassian-Young 2007 Estate Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Heavy, sweet and soft, with syrupy flavors of milk chocolate, blackberries, anise ...
description: Heavy, sweet and soft, with syrupy flavors of milk chocolate, blackberries, anise and pepper. Will appeal to those who like this rustic, easy style.

title: Cline 2007 Big Break Zinfandel (Contra Costa County)
excerpt: Way too high in alcohol, and possibly residual sugar, which gives this ...
description: Way too high in alcohol, and possibly residual sugar, which gives this Zin a sweet, syrupy blackberry jelly taste.

title: Orchid Hill 2006 Primi Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Semi-sweet and simple, with raspberry and cherry cola flavors. The alcohol is ...
description: Semi-sweet and simple, with raspberry and cherry cola flavors. The alcohol is 16.7%.

title: Sextant 2007 Zinfandel (Central Coast)
excerpt: Tastes as sweet as a sugary cherry pie, with a burn of ...
description: Tastes as sweet as a sugary cherry pie, with a burn of heat from high alcohol of 15.2%.

title: Sextant 2007 Wheelhouse Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Has a nice, softly tannic structure, with rich cherry pie, chocolate and ...
description: Has a nice, softly tannic structure, with rich cherry pie, chocolate and spice flavors, but tastes way too sweet.

title: Hartford 2007 Highwire Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: The vineyard is in Fulton, a cool part of the southeastern valley ...
description: The vineyard is in Fulton, a cool part of the southeastern valley heavily influenced by fog, and the vines are about 100 years old. This is great, classic Zinfandel. It should be in a museum. Despite high alcohol, it has a silky, Pinot-esque suppleness, balanced with crisp acids, and is profoundly rich in Zinny flavor. Currants, mushu plum sauce, anise, crushed black pepper, dark chocolate and rich Asian spices last forever on the finish.

title: Ferrari-Carano 2006 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: With a little Petite Sirah and Carignane added for complexity, this is ...
description: With a little Petite Sirah and Carignane added for complexity, this is a beautiful Zinfandel meant for drinking now. It has fresh, zesty flavors of wild raspberries, cherries, blueberries and red currants, with notes of licorice, cocoa and pepper. Notable new oak adds even richer elements of vanilla and smoke.

title: Three Angels 2007 Avery Vineyard Zinfandel (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Very ripe and slightly sweet, like good fresh raspberry and pomegranate juice. ...
description: Very ripe and slightly sweet, like good fresh raspberry and pomegranate juice. Nice structure, and the alcohol does not seem hot or jammy. The flavors persist, clean and lightly spicy, with good natural acids. Fine effort.

title: Three Angels 2007 Les Collines Vineyard Zinfandel (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: Distinctly different from the Avery vineyard bottling, this has pleasing, brambly strawberry ...
description: Distinctly different from the Avery vineyard bottling, this has pleasing, brambly strawberry fruit flavors, intertwined with spice, cola and a bit of Dr. Pepper. Not a big wine, but loaded with fruit flavor.

title: Peachy Canyon 2007 Incredible Red Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Rugged and robust, with flavors of grilled blackberries, plums and a meaty ...
description: Rugged and robust, with flavors of grilled blackberries, plums and a meaty taste, like stir-fried ground beef splashed with soy sauce and dusted with black pepper. Fine with sausage-based pasta dishes.

title: Dry Creek Vineyard 2006 Somers Ranch Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A good, sound Zinfandel, although a bit too high in alcohol and ...
description: A good, sound Zinfandel, although a bit too high in alcohol and soft in structure. But it has pretty flavors of cherries, blackberry cobbler, mocha and pepper, and will happily wash down a nice steak.

title: Big Fish 2006 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Big in flavor, with blackcurrant, cherry pie and cocoa flavors that finish ...
description: Big in flavor, with blackcurrant, cherry pie and cocoa flavors that finish with a bit of raisiny Port. Yet the wine is fully dry, and appeals for its classically elegant tannic structure. Drink now.

title: Mounts 2006 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Oaky and appealing, with blackberry, currant, chocolate and oaky flavors that finish ...
description: Oaky and appealing, with blackberry, currant, chocolate and oaky flavors that finish in a swirl of peppery spice. This dry wine was blended with a bit of Syrah and Petite Sirah.

title: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi 2006 Select Vineyard Series Fish Net Creek Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Lots going on with this affordable Zin. Dry and smooth, it shows ...
description: Lots going on with this affordable Zin. Dry and smooth, it shows exuberant flavors of black pepper, red currants, teriaki beef, anise and smoke. With a richly tannic mouthfeel, it will pair well with grilled meats.

title: Plungerhead 2007 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Lodi Zin can be overly sweet and alcoholic but this one is ...
description: Lodi Zin can be overly sweet and alcoholic but this one is balanced and charming. It shows a softly complex array of red and black wild berry, blueberry, mashed cherry pulp and plum flavors, sprinkled with cocoa and cinnamon, like a savory Starbucks drink.

title: Novy 2006 Carlisle Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Very rich and opulent, if a little soft. Offers an explosion of ...
description: Very rich and opulent, if a little soft. Offers an explosion of ripe black cherries, raspberries, licorice, mocha, black pepper and cinnamon spice flavors that go on and on.

title: Dry Creek Vineyard 2007 Heritage Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Powerful in Zinny character, this blend of Dry Creek and Russian River ...
description: Powerful in Zinny character, this blend of Dry Creek and Russian River grapes bursts with brawny flavors of wild berries, chocolate-covered mint, tobacco and pepper, wrapped into sturdy tannins. Shows real class and character.

title: Bella Vetta 2006 Jack's Cabin Vineyard Zinfandel (Rockpile)
excerpt: A bit heavy and soft, like a Starbucks mocha drink infused with ...
description: A bit heavy and soft, like a Starbucks mocha drink infused with blackberry essence, then sprinkled with cocoa powder, cinnamon and pepper. High alcohol adds a chile pepper burn on the finish. Needs grilled meats and rich cheeses to balance it out.

title: Mazzocco 2006 Reserve Maple Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Very ripe and soft, a high-alcohol Zin that will appeal to those ...
description: Very ripe and soft, a high-alcohol Zin that will appeal to those who like this style. Fully dry, it shows Porty flavors of raisined blackberries, cherry pie filling, melted milk chocolate, anise liqueur and crushed black pepper. Drink now.

title: R & B Cellars 2007 Swingsville Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: A bit tough and gritty in texture, with sweetly jammy flavors of ...
description: A bit tough and gritty in texture, with sweetly jammy flavors of blackberries, cherries, chocolate and pepper. Okay with burgers, pizza and similar everyday fare.

title: Mazzocco 2006 Reserve Pony Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Made in the Mazzocco style, this Zin is enormously high in alcohol, ...
description: Made in the Mazzocco style, this Zin is enormously high in alcohol, namely 16.1%, and is fully dry. Shows a Porty headiness, with berry flavors that veer into chocolate-covered raisins and prunes.

title: R & B Cellars 2007 Bingham Ranch Zydeco Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A bit too sharp and acidic to earn a higher score, with ...
description: A bit too sharp and acidic to earn a higher score, with green mint flavors of cherries, anise and pepper.

title: Mazzocco 2006 Reserve West Dry Creek Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: As sweet as Port, with chocolate and prune flavors. Feels as hot ...
description: As sweet as Port, with chocolate and prune flavors. Feels as hot as a chile pepper, with nearly 17% alcohol.

title: Hobo 2007 Zinfandel (Rockpile)
excerpt: Rich and briary, with that exotic, hot summer afternoon fresh berry tang, ...
description: Rich and briary, with that exotic, hot summer afternoon fresh berry tang, this Zin delights for its flavors of wild blackberries, currants, cherries, mulberries, chocolate, anise and pepper. So clean. You can taste the summer sun in every sip.

title: Hobo 2007 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Strikes a nice balance of ripe berry and chocolate flavors, firmed with ...
description: Strikes a nice balance of ripe berry and chocolate flavors, firmed with softly smooth tannins, and a deep earthy-spiciness suggesting sweet tobacco, anise and sage. Turns lush and intricate toward the finish. This is a really nice Zinfandel.

title: Easton 2006 Estate Bottled Zinfandel (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
excerpt: Flirts with Portiness, but stops just short to provide a rich, exotic ...
description: Flirts with Portiness, but stops just short to provide a rich, exotic Zinfandel experience. The blackberry, currant, wild mountain berry, cola, tangerine zest and pepper flavors have an edge of raisins. Creative cooks will use the above descriptors as a recipe for a salsa to top a perfectly grilled burger or steak.

title: Brassfield 2005 Round Mountain Volcano Zinfandel (High Valley)
excerpt: This has been a good bottling for Brassfield. It shows classic mountain ...
description: This has been a good bottling for Brassfield. It shows classic mountain intensity, with explosive currant, wild berry, mocha, pine cone, anise and pepper flavors, tucked into firm, sweet tannins. Could benefit from 2 or 3 years in the cellar.

title: Wilson 2006 Carl's Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Soft and melted in the mouth, with jammy flavors of ripe mashed ...
description: Soft and melted in the mouth, with jammy flavors of ripe mashed cherries and raspberries, drizzled with milk chocolate and anisette, and finished with a sprinkle of tangerine zest and black pepper.

title: Dracula 2006 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Rich, soft and fruity, this is a classic example of a drink-me-now ...
description: Rich, soft and fruity, this is a classic example of a drink-me-now Zinfandel. It has jammy flavors of cherries, blackberries, currants, anise and spicy pepper.

title: Bonterra 2007 Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: A little on the sweet extracted side, but balanced with rich, fine ...
description: A little on the sweet extracted side, but balanced with rich, fine tannins and just-in-time acidity. The blackberry, currant, raspberry and cocoa flavors will play well against a grilled steak.

title: JC Cellars 2006 Iron Hill Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Made in the JC style, which is rather high in alcohol and ...
description: Made in the JC style, which is rather high in alcohol and strong in fruity extract. In this case, the flavors are lush in blackberry and cherry mocha-choca frappucino. All this ripeness comes at the expense of structure. The wine is a bit soft and sweet.

title: Brutocao 2006 Reserve Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: With a fruity-sugary finish, this Zin will appeal to folks who like ...
description: With a fruity-sugary finish, this Zin will appeal to folks who like their red wines a little on the sweet side. It has pleasantly ripe flavors of black cherries, raspberries, red currants, root beer, mocha and pepper.

title: Viansa 2006 Farneta Primitivo (Carneros)
excerpt: Tastes like a rustic Zinfandel, with spicy, briary flavors of cherries, blackberries, ...
description: Tastes like a rustic Zinfandel, with spicy, briary flavors of cherries, blackberries, currants and dark chocolate. The tannins are somewhat green and angular.

title: Zichichi Family Vineyard 2006 Estate Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Shows the classic briary, brambly character of Dry Creek Valley, with wild ...
description: Shows the classic briary, brambly character of Dry Creek Valley, with wild berry and pepperspice flavors. Loses a bit of luster from excessive alcohol, which gives the wine a hot sweetness, and excessive new oak.

title: Talus Collection 2005 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Break out the BBQ for this rustic, fruity Zin. It will wash ...
description: Break out the BBQ for this rustic, fruity Zin. It will wash down grilled meats and hard cheeses with its fruity-sweet blackberry and pepper flavors.

title: Perry Creek 2006 Cobra Zinfandel (El Dorado)
excerpt: Hot and chocolaty, with briary flavors of blackberry jam, plum currants, mocha ...
description: Hot and chocolaty, with briary flavors of blackberry jam, plum currants, mocha and pepper. Turns Porty and raisiny on the finish. The alcohol is 16.5%.

title: Lava Cap 2005 Rocky Draw Zinfandel (El Dorado)
excerpt: Rustic and spicy, a decent Zin to toss back with babybacks at ...
description: Rustic and spicy, a decent Zin to toss back with babybacks at a tailgate party. Shows fruity-sweet flavors of cherries, currants, tangerine zest and milk chocolate, with thick tannins.

title: Pozo Valley 2005 Zinfandel (San Luis Obispo County)
excerpt: Made country-style, this Zin is dry, medium-bodied and crisply acidic, with simple ...
description: Made country-style, this Zin is dry, medium-bodied and crisply acidic, with simple flavors of mashed cherries, raspberries and coffee. Nice with Italian fare.

title: Bradford Mountain 2005 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Too porty and tart to earn a higher score. Shows sour cherry ...
description: Too porty and tart to earn a higher score. Shows sour cherry candy flavors.

title: Castle Rock 2007 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Too soft and sweet, making it rustic, even at this price. Tastes ...
description: Too soft and sweet, making it rustic, even at this price. Tastes like jammy, sugared blackberries, cherries and spices that turn cloying on the finish.

title: Lava Cap 2006 Reserve Zinfandel (El Dorado)
excerpt: Unbalanced, with vegetal smells and tastes alongside sour cherry candies. Finishes sweet ...
description: Unbalanced, with vegetal smells and tastes alongside sour cherry candies. Finishes sweet and medicinal.

title: Summit Lake 2002 Clair Riley's Pirate Reserve Port Zinfandel (Howell Mountain)
excerpt: A fine vintage Port-style wine, rich in chocolate-infused cassis flavors. Feels softly ...
description: A fine vintage Port-style wine, rich in chocolate-infused cassis flavors. Feels softly plush and velvety, and is very sweet. Nice way to end a meal with a chocolate dessert.

title: Highlands 2006 Zinfandel (Howell Mountain)
excerpt: A little sweet and definitely tannic, which gives it a rustic edge. ...
description: A little sweet and definitely tannic, which gives it a rustic edge. Barbecue will play well, dancing with the intricate red and black currant, plum, anise, dark chocolate and pepper flavors. But this is also an ageable Zin. Drink now through 2012.

title: Leone de Castris 2005 Villa Santera  (Primitivo di Manduria)
excerpt: This is a simple and pleasant wine from southern Italy with sweet, ...
description: This is a simple and pleasant wine from southern Italy with sweet, floral tones of cherry blossom, rose hip, lavender and scented candle. The wine has a vibrant, pointed personality and some sour crispness on the close.

title: Sobon Estate 2006 Rezerve Primitivo (Amador County)
excerpt: Porty and bitter and hot. High alcohol gives a peppery burn, while ...
description: Porty and bitter and hot. High alcohol gives a peppery burn, while overripe fruit gives raisiny, pruny flavors. But some people will like it for its heady exuberance.

title: Gary Farrell 2006 Bradford Mountain Vineyards Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Shows a dramatic interpretation of Dry Creek terroir, with intense wild berry, ...
description: Shows a dramatic interpretation of Dry Creek terroir, with intense wild berry, mocha and spice flavors that are so ripe, they veer into currants and grilled blackberries. Entirely dry, the wine is marked by rich, complex tannins. Superb, a great wine, as good as Zinfandel gets. Drink now through 2012.

title: Gary Farrell 2006 Collins Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This is a really good Zinfandel. It shows the exuberant, lusty quality ...
description: This is a really good Zinfandel. It shows the exuberant, lusty quality of the variety, with wild blackberry, mulberry, tobacco and spice flavors that have a briary mouthfeel. But it brings a classic structure and elegance. Fine now, and the refined tannins suggest ageability through 2012.

title: Greenwood Ridge 2007 Scherrer Vineyards Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: So ripe, it smells and tastes almost Porty. But stays dry and ...
description: So ripe, it smells and tastes almost Porty. But stays dry and balanced, with a blast of black currant, beef jerky, cocoa and pepper flavors that are wrapped into firm tannins. A fine example of a big, lusty Sonoma Zinfandel.

title: Adelaida 2006 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: A rich, savory Zin that shows the softness and warmth of Paso ...
description: A rich, savory Zin that shows the softness and warmth of Paso Robles, with an exotic array of fruit and spice flavors. Waves of blackberries, cherries, mulberries, chocolate, licorice and peppery spices mingle into a long, interesting finish. Drink now through 2010 for youthful zest.

title: Robert Biale 2006 Old Kraft Vineyard Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: The classic Napa Zin shows a depth of flavor and a tannic ...
description: The classic Napa Zin shows a depth of flavor and a tannic structure that suggest aging. Dry and elegant, the wine, which is blended with a little Petite Sirah, has powerhouse flavors of currants, mocha, tobacco, cedar and spices. Good now and through 2012.

title: Benessere 2006 BK Collins Old Vines Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Spicy and briary, suggesting wild forest berries, nettles, chamomile, bitter greens and ...
description: Spicy and briary, suggesting wild forest berries, nettles, chamomile, bitter greens and black pepper. Drink this exotically dry, tannic wine with roast lamb prepared with garlic and rosemary.

title: JR Wine 2006 Boschetti Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Big, ripe and juicy, with some overripenes veering into raisins, but it ...
description: Big, ripe and juicy, with some overripenes veering into raisins, but it gives a rich plummy edge to the wild berries, tobacco and spice. Drink this impressive Zinfandel with roasts and beef stews.

title: Robert Biale 2006 Old Crane Vineyard Zinfandel (St. Helena)
excerpt: A solid, comforting Zin, made in an appealing style for drinking now. ...
description: A solid, comforting Zin, made in an appealing style for drinking now. Shows easy, slightly sweet flavors of black raspberries, cherries, currants, cassis and mocha. Nice with teriyaki beef, pork or chicken.

title: Edmeades 2007 Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
excerpt: Bring on the barbecue for this explosive, high-octane Zin. Ripe to the ...
description: Bring on the barbecue for this explosive, high-octane Zin. Ripe to the point of overripe, it shows flavors of blackberries, currants, cassis and raisins, liberally dusted with crushed black pepper and unsweetened cocoa. The bigtime tannins will cut through rich meats slathered in BBQ sauce.

title: Eberle 2006 Steinbeck Vineyard & Wine-Bush Vineyard Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: A big, lush, exuberant Zinfandel, stuffed with sun-ripened fruit flavors of dark ...
description: A big, lush, exuberant Zinfandel, stuffed with sun-ripened fruit flavors of dark berries, coffee, chocolate and spice. Drink this dry, warming wine now.

title: Chase 2006 Hayne Vineyard Zinfandel (St. Helena)
excerpt: Spicy and sweet, this Zin, from century-old vines, has quintessential varietal flavors ...
description: Spicy and sweet, this Zin, from century-old vines, has quintessential varietal flavors of wild red and black berries, chocolate, thyme, cedar and pepper. Drink now for its youthful charm.

title: Wilson 2006 Tori Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Shows a good tannin structure and well-ripened fruit, with rich flavors of ...
description: Shows a good tannin structure and well-ripened fruit, with rich flavors of berries, chocolate and carrot cake. But it sure is sweet. Part of that is from nearly 16% acidity.

title: XYZin 2006 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Strong and spicy, with extracted flavors of red and black berry jam, ...
description: Strong and spicy, with extracted flavors of red and black berry jam, currants, orange tea and milk chocolate. Almost sweet, but not quite, with fierce tannins and mouthwatering acidity. Now through 2012.

title: Andretti 2006 Zinfandel Primitivo (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Rich and fruity, this blend is a soft, easy wine that finishes ...
description: Rich and fruity, this blend is a soft, easy wine that finishes rather sweet in ripe blackberries and chocolate. It has interesting layers of anise, black pepper, mashed figs and olive tapenade. Drink now.

title: Artezin 2006 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Shows a rustic, briary mouthfeel, with brambly flavors of wild berries, cola, ...
description: Shows a rustic, briary mouthfeel, with brambly flavors of wild berries, cola, bacon and spices, wrapped into fine but firm tannins. Shows some superripe raisin flavors toward the finish. Drink now.

title: Sanctuary 2005 Mariah Vineyard Zinfandel (Mendocino Ridge)
excerpt: Robust and briary, this Zin is bone-dry and pretty tannic, with earthy ...
description: Robust and briary, this Zin is bone-dry and pretty tannic, with earthy flavors of blackberries, tobacco, currants and spices. Could mellow with age, but will never be particularly complex.

title: La Storia 2005 Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Tannic and hot, this Zin is massive in blackberry and cherry jam, ...
description: Tannic and hot, this Zin is massive in blackberry and cherry jam, chocolate, licorice and spice flavors. High alcohol gives a burn to the mouthfeel that barbecue sauce, slathered onto chicken and beef, will help soften.

title: Sobon Estate 2007 Old Vines Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Tastes fresh and jammy and slightly gassy, like a new Beaujolais, although ...
description: Tastes fresh and jammy and slightly gassy, like a new Beaujolais, although it should calm down and settle by mid-2009. Then it will be a fine, fruity Zin, fruit-forward and dry in blackberries, cherries, raspberries, raisins, mocha and pepper.

title: Dancing Bull 2007 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Has some overripe flavors of raisin skins, with bitter tannins, but the ...
description: Has some overripe flavors of raisin skins, with bitter tannins, but the wine is fully dry, with enough black currant, coffee, black licorice and plum flavors to satisfy. Barbecue will be a perfect partner for this affordable Zin.

title: Starry Night 2007 The Caboose Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Heavy in alcohol and overripe, but entirely dry, and the black currant, ...
description: Heavy in alcohol and overripe, but entirely dry, and the black currant, chocolate and pepper flavors will play well against richly sauced barbecue.

title: Hook & Ladder 2006 Station Ten Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: This wine is jam in a bottle. Floods the mouth with ripe, ...
description: This wine is jam in a bottle. Floods the mouth with ripe, spicy flavors of raspberries, cherries and blackberries, wrapped into a light, silky texture.

title: Shenandoah 2007 Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Dry and extracted in jammy fruit, this is a sound, easy-drinking Zin ...
description: Dry and extracted in jammy fruit, this is a sound, easy-drinking Zin at a fair price. The wild berry, tobacco, currant and spice flavors will work well with grilled meats and hard cheeses.

title: Starry Night 2007 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Dry and a bit rough in tannins, with berry, currant and pepper ...
description: Dry and a bit rough in tannins, with berry, currant and pepper spice flavors. Best now with barbecue and roasted meats.

title: Mazzocco 2006 Warm Springs Ranch Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Tastes sweet and hot, like an inexpensive Port, with sugary cherry-berry jam ...
description: Tastes sweet and hot, like an inexpensive Port, with sugary cherry-berry jam flavors. The official alcohol is 16%.

title: X 2007 Nova Vineyard Zinfandel (Lake County)
excerpt: Frankly sweet in sugary blackberry candy flavors, this wine also tastes over-acidified. ...
description: Frankly sweet in sugary blackberry candy flavors, this wine also tastes over-acidified. Just feels awkward in the mouth.

title: Mazzocco 2006 Lytton Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Sweet, soft and Porty. Defines a certain style of overripe, chocolate-covered, raisin-flavored ...
description: Sweet, soft and Porty. Defines a certain style of overripe, chocolate-covered, raisin-flavored Zinfandel.

title: Starry Night 2007 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Dry and bitter, with green, stemmy flavors and tannins alongside the cherries ...
description: Dry and bitter, with green, stemmy flavors and tannins alongside the cherries and currants. Drink now.

title: Chumeia 2006 Dante Dusi Vineyard Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Sweet smoky oak dominates everything in this dry, Porty wine. The flavors ...
description: Sweet smoky oak dominates everything in this dry, Porty wine. The flavors are overripe, of raisins, prunes and pepper spice. Drink now.

title: Starry Night 2006 Montafi Vineyard Old Vine Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Heavy and dull, this dry Zin has overripe flavors of raisins and ...
description: Heavy and dull, this dry Zin has overripe flavors of raisins and prunes, and is quite tannic. Drink now.

title: Opolo 2006 Summit Creek Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Too hot and sweet, this Zin weighs in at 16.2% of alcohol. ...
description: Too hot and sweet, this Zin weighs in at 16.2% of alcohol. It has blackberry and cocoa flavors spiced with chile peppers.

title: Estancia 2006 Keyes Canyon Ranches Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Dull and soft, with vegetal and candied berry flavors.
description: Dull and soft, with vegetal and candied berry flavors.

title: Midnight 2005 Crescent Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: With the official alcohol of 15.2%, this Zin tastes chili pepper hot ...
description: With the official alcohol of 15.2%, this Zin tastes chili pepper hot and sweet, with raspberry and pepper flavors.

title: Mazzocco 2006 Pony Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Tastes like sugared mashed cherries, with heat from excessively high alcohol, namely ...
description: Tastes like sugared mashed cherries, with heat from excessively high alcohol, namely 16.1%.

title: Bella 2006 Lily Hill Estate Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A beautiful wine that brims with rich varietal character and shows off ...
description: A beautiful wine that brims with rich varietal character and shows off how well Dry Creek Valley grows Zinfandel. Floods the mouth with soft, polished flavors of blackberries, cherries, currants, mocha and anise, but especially crushed black pepper. A worthy followup to the great 2005.

title: Titus 2006 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A beautiful Zinfandel, softly tannic and lush, and showing how Napa Valley ...
description: A beautiful Zinfandel, softly tannic and lush, and showing how Napa Valley dominates the variety when it comes to balance and elegance. The ultra-refined tannins frame flavors of berry jam, currants, mocha, licorice and pepper. This is really a superior Zinfandel.

title: Kunde 2005 Shaw Vineyard Reserve Century Vines Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Locked down by hard tannins, this nonetheless is a beautiful Zinfandel, dry ...
description: Locked down by hard tannins, this nonetheless is a beautiful Zinfandel, dry and rich in flavor. It bursts with savory wild berry, tobacco, mocha and pepper flavors, and feels elegant and refined. The tannins call for enormously rich beef, pasta, sauces and cheeses.

title: Terra d'Oro 2006 Home Vineyard Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: A beautiful Zinfandel from a winery with lots of know-how. The wine ...
description: A beautiful Zinfandel from a winery with lots of know-how. The wine is medium-bodied, with a graceful structure of finely ground tannins that makes it drinkable right away. The flavors are pure mountain Zin, intense in peppery currants, cocoa and licorice.

title: Terra d'Oro 2006 SHR Field Blend Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Ripe and peppery, this exuberant Zin was made to wash down beef ...
description: Ripe and peppery, this exuberant Zin was made to wash down beef fajitas and tacos or a cheddar cheese-covered hamburger. It floods the mouth with blackberry, cherry and currant flavors, wrapped into thick, sturdy tannins.

title: Sausal 2006 Century Vines Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Dry and intricate, with Zinny flavors of wild raspberries, nettles, thyme and ...
description: Dry and intricate, with Zinny flavors of wild raspberries, nettles, thyme and pepper. Yet there are some overripe notes of raisins that give this dry wine a Porty taste.

title: Lake Sonoma 2006 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Classic Dry Creek Zin, dry and firmly tannic and bursting with pepper, ...
description: Classic Dry Creek Zin, dry and firmly tannic and bursting with pepper, briary wild berry, tamari and chamomile flavors. Calls for a broiled steak, drizzled with garlic and rosemary-infused brown butter sauce.

title: Wine Guerrilla 2007 Goat Trek Vineyard Block 6 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Shows lots of flashy, ripe Zin character, with a blast of wild ...
description: Shows lots of flashy, ripe Zin character, with a blast of wild berry, tobacco, currant, nettle and spice flavors. The tannins are a little rough-edged, calling for big, rich fare, like barbecue.

title: Cantele 2006 Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: This mature Primitivo from the Salento area of Southern Italy offers plump ...
description: This mature Primitivo from the Salento area of Southern Italy offers plump notes of black cherry, raspberry jam and dried figs. The mouthfeel is chewy and soft with a velvety, chewy finish.

title: Sausal 2006 Private Reserve Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Soft and briary, with pepper-infused flavors of wild forest berries, currants, beef ...
description: Soft and briary, with pepper-infused flavors of wild forest berries, currants, beef jerky, leather, tobacco and sage. Enjoy this easy-drinking Zin now.

title: Wine Guerrilla 2007 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Sweet and soft, this Zin is drinkable now for its jammy black ...
description: Sweet and soft, this Zin is drinkable now for its jammy black raspberry, cherry, currant and chocolate flavors. Suggests simple fare, like burgers or spaghetti with meatballs.

title: Terra d'Oro 2006 Deaver Vineyard Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Too sugary sweet by far, which is partly the result of very ...
description: Too sugary sweet by far, which is partly the result of very high alcohol but may also be due to some residual sugar. The sweetness draws attention to the oak, and makes it taste stronger than it really is. Despite flavors of blackberries, blueberries and mocha, this wine is too Porty and unbalanced.

title: C.G. di Arie 2006 Zinfandel (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
excerpt: Sweet, soft and simple, with blackberry jam, sugared berry tea, carob and ...
description: Sweet, soft and simple, with blackberry jam, sugared berry tea, carob and spice flavors wrapped into firm tannins. Drink now.

title: Classy 2006 Zinfandel (Lake County)
excerpt: Rustic, with extra-ripe wild berry flavors that veer into dried fruits, and ...
description: Rustic, with extra-ripe wild berry flavors that veer into dried fruits, and some harsh tannins that give it a clunky mouthfeel.

title: Michael David 2006 Gluttony Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Too ripe, too soft, too Porty and too oaky, with flavors like ...
