description: Too ripe, too soft, too Porty and too oaky, with flavors like a chocolate-raspberry and cinnamon drink you get at Starbucks.

title: Bargetto 2006 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Sweet, hot and Porty, with flavors of grilled blackberries, raisins and caramelized ...
description: Sweet, hot and Porty, with flavors of grilled blackberries, raisins and caramelized brown sugar.

title: Ancient Peaks 2006 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Soft and voluptuous in blackberry, currant and chocolate flavors, very cinnamon-pepper spicy ...
description: Soft and voluptuous in blackberry, currant and chocolate flavors, very cinnamon-pepper spicy and a little sweet, this Zin brings to mind simple comfort foods, like chipped beef, corned beef hash, barbecued ribs, beef tacos and cheeseburgers.

title: Summers 2006 Villa Andriana Vineyard Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Very soft in the modern style, with flavors of melted milk chocolate, ...
description: Very soft in the modern style, with flavors of melted milk chocolate, black currants, black cherry jam and black pepper. Could use greater tannin and acid structure.

title: Cloud 9 2006 Seity Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Shows the briary, brambly character of Foothills Zin, with an array of ...
description: Shows the briary, brambly character of Foothills Zin, with an array of wild berry, tobacco, mocha and Asian spice flavors wrapped into finely ground tannins. But the wine is too sweet and candied in the finish. Drink now.

title: Dogwood 2006 Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: Very peppery and fruit-forward in jammy blackberry, cherry, raspberry and chocolate flavors, ...
description: Very peppery and fruit-forward in jammy blackberry, cherry, raspberry and chocolate flavors, this Zin tastes overtly sweet. The tannins are ripe and refined. Drink now.

title: Bridgeway 2005 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Rugged and a little sweet, this Zin shows the briary, brambly character ...
description: Rugged and a little sweet, this Zin shows the briary, brambly character of Sonoma Zin, with jammy wild black, blue and red berries liberally spiced with pepper and clove. Good with barbecued beef and chicken slathered in sauce.

title: Sebastiani 2006 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Shows a great structure, with fine acidity and crunchy tannins. But the ...
description: Shows a great structure, with fine acidity and crunchy tannins. But the feel is too sweet, giving a sugary, soda pop taste to the currant, licorice and chocolate flavors.

title: Windsor Sonoma 2006 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Soft and vegetal, with herb and asparagus flavors alongside cherry candy ones.
description: Soft and vegetal, with herb and asparagus flavors alongside cherry candy ones.

title: Mazzocco 2006 Stone Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: As in previous vintages, this wine, with an alcohol reading of 15.9%, ...
description: As in previous vintages, this wine, with an alcohol reading of 15.9%, is too hot and glyceriney-sweet for balance, despite savory flavors of blackberries and chocolate.

title: Mazzocco 2006 West Dry Creek Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: The alcohol is so high, at 16.3%, that the wine tastes overtly ...
description: The alcohol is so high, at 16.3%, that the wine tastes overtly sweet, and may even have residual sugar. The result is awkward, with a peppery, dessert pastry flavor.

title: Midlife Crisis 2006 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Shows a wealth of cherry, raspberry and chocolate flavors spiced with pepper ...
description: Shows a wealth of cherry, raspberry and chocolate flavors spiced with pepper and cinnamon, but high alcohol and possible residual sugar make it too sweet and Porty for a dry table wine.

title: Ravenswood 2006 Big River Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: A gorgeous wine, the best Big River that Ravenswood has ever produced. ...
description: A gorgeous wine, the best Big River that Ravenswood has ever produced. Has everything you want in a Zinfandel. It displays rich, peppery blackberry and currant fruit, splendid tannins, crisp acidity, fine dryness and a long, impressive finish. The high alcohol is not out of place.

title: Ravenswood 2006 Dickerson Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A powerful Zin that shows the effusively brawny, muscular character of the ...
description: A powerful Zin that shows the effusively brawny, muscular character of the variety, but keeps its poise all the way. Call it rustic-chic. Fully dry and very high in alcohol, it explodes with red and black currants, mocha, blackstrap molasses, black pepper and Asian spices.

title: Peachy Canyon 2006 Especial Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Full-bodied and robust, with explosive flavors of blackberry and cherry jam, dates, ...
description: Full-bodied and robust, with explosive flavors of blackberry and cherry jam, dates, chocolate, Tabasco and crushed red and black peppercorn. With a hint of sweetness, it will play well against grilled lamb, chicken or beef with barbecue sauce.

title: Barnard Griffin 2005 Hells Gate Canyon Vineyard Zinfandel (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This is an herbal style, not particularly Californian, with some leafy, tobacco ...
description: This is an herbal style, not particularly Californian, with some leafy, tobacco flavors, and light strawberry and candy cherry fruit. More acid than most Zins make this perfect for chilling and sipping with simple picnic foods.

title: Peachy Canyon 2006 Mustang Springs Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: This is a big Zinfandel, high in alcohol and packed with detail. ...
description: This is a big Zinfandel, high in alcohol and packed with detail. Just erupts in a burst of blackberry jam, cherry pie filling, currant, milk chocolate and anise flavors, liberally dusted with fresh cracked peppercorn.

title: Ravenswood 2006 Old Hill Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Made in the style of an old field blend, this Zin is ...
description: Made in the style of an old field blend, this Zin is at least 75% varietal, but the balance could be anything among 14 other grapes. The wine is tannic, peppery and rich in currant and chocolate flavors, with high alcohol. Seems a pace or two behind more recent vintages.

title: Ravenswood 2006 Teldeschi Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Made not just from Zinfandel, but Carignane and Petite Sirah, this old-style ...
description: Made not just from Zinfandel, but Carignane and Petite Sirah, this old-style field blend shows wildly attractive berry, dried fruit, cocoa and spice flavors that are wrapped into firm tannins. The alcohol level is very high, and the wine is dry.

title: Peachy Canyon 2006 Snow Vineyard Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Super-peppery, this full-bodied Zin also has grilled blackberry and plum, mocha, licorice, ...
description: Super-peppery, this full-bodied Zin also has grilled blackberry and plum, mocha, licorice, beef jerky and gingersnap cookie flavors. The rich tannins call for grilled steaks and chops.

title: Napa Cellars 2005 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A solid everyday Zin, dry and spicy, with a rugged texture framing ...
description: A solid everyday Zin, dry and spicy, with a rugged texture framing briary flavors of wild berries, mushu plum sauce and mocha. The sturdy tannins will play well against barbecue.

title: Peachy Canyon 2006 Old School House Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: This is a rustic, full-bodied and chewy Zin that needs grilled meat ...
description: This is a rustic, full-bodied and chewy Zin that needs grilled meat and robust cheeses to show it off. Fully dry, it has peppery flavors of blackberries, currants and anise.

title: Quivira 2006 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A very tasty, ripe Zinfandel, lush and forward with wild berry, tobacco, ...
description: A very tasty, ripe Zinfandel, lush and forward with wild berry, tobacco, cocoa, pepper flavors and something animal-rich, almost livery, like foie gras. Finishes thoroughly dry, but too soft in structure. Would benefit from greater architectural firmness.

title: MC2 2006 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: A very nice Zin that shows classic attributes at an everyday price. ...
description: A very nice Zin that shows classic attributes at an everyday price. Dry, tannic and rich, it has berry, currant, carob and spice flavors with a strong streak of black pepper. Drink now.

title: Haywood 2006 Los Chamizal Vineyard Rocky Terrace Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Shows beautifully thick, chewy tannins and ripe, intricate wild berry, currant, pepper ...
description: Shows beautifully thick, chewy tannins and ripe, intricate wild berry, currant, pepper and herb flavors. Turns a bit sweet and medicinal on the finish, though, with a taste like Lifesaver candies or cherry cough medicine.

title: Brutocao 2006 Hopland Ranches Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: A soft, easy Zin, ready to drink now. With finely ground tannins, ...
description: A soft, easy Zin, ready to drink now. With finely ground tannins, it has flavors of blackberries, orange rind, dark chocolate, black pepper and all sorts of dusty Asian spices.

title: Hayman & Hill 2006 Reserve Selection Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A little sweet and candy simple, this Zin shows blackberry, cherry and ...
description: A little sweet and candy simple, this Zin shows blackberry, cherry and raspberry flavors that have a pie-filling taste. The firm tannins call for a grilled steak.

title: Christian Lazo 2006 Lot 7 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Soft and easy, this red wine shows the peppery, briary edge and ...
description: Soft and easy, this red wine shows the peppery, briary edge and full-bodied tannins you want in a Zin. It has simple berry, cocoa and spice flavors. Drink now.

title: Midnight 2006 Estate Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Semi-sweet in jammy berry flavors, this Zin also has an acidic edge ...
description: Semi-sweet in jammy berry flavors, this Zin also has an acidic edge that makes it taste like a cherry and black raspberry sour candy.

title: Manzanita Creek 2005 Addor Vineyard Lower Block Zinfandel (Mendocino)
excerpt: A little sweet and jammy, this Zin shows blackberry, cherry, currant and ...
description: A little sweet and jammy, this Zin shows blackberry, cherry, currant and chocolate flavors that have an edge of Porty sugar.

title: Peachy Canyon 2006 The Vortex Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Porty but dry, with raisin, stewed prune and caramel flavors that feel ...
description: Porty but dry, with raisin, stewed prune and caramel flavors that feel hot and astringent. Will have its fans.

title: Jacuzzi 2006 Morine Ranch Primitivo (Lake County)
excerpt: Shows blackberry and cherry flavors that taste candied, almost medicinal. Okay with ...
description: Shows blackberry and cherry flavors that taste candied, almost medicinal. Okay with burgers and pizza.

title: Sineann 2007 Old Vine Zinfandel (Columbia Valley (OR))
excerpt: Tight, earthy, spiced up with leaf and pepper, this old vine Zin ...
description: Tight, earthy, spiced up with leaf and pepper, this old vine Zin gathers strength in the mid-palate and displays a perfect blend of sweet cherry, berry and some finishing tomato leaf. This 2007 seems a bit less ripe than previous efforts, so the fruit does not have the same sweetness, but the winemaking is exceptional and the flavors are woven beautifully. These 2007s may yet prove to be among the most ageworthy wines that Sineann has ever made.

title: Signorello 2006 Luvisi Vineyard Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A little light in body and flavor, but easy to drink, with ...
description: A little light in body and flavor, but easy to drink, with complex raspberry, cherry, blueberry, mocha, tobacco, vanilla, smoke and peppery spice flavors. At its best now. Try with sliced flank steak, stuffed into pita bread with cole slaw.

title: Sebastiani 2006 Appellation Selection Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Pastry sweet, this Zin tastes like those baked pie crust breakfast tarts ...
description: Pastry sweet, this Zin tastes like those baked pie crust breakfast tarts that contain raspberry, cherry and blackberry jam filling.

title: Mosby 2005 Primitivo (Central Coast)
excerpt: A country-style wine with big acidity and some underripe green, minty flavors ...
description: A country-style wine with big acidity and some underripe green, minty flavors alongside the cherries. Pretty rustic, but clean and dry, and the alcohol is nice and low.

title: Alexander Valley Vineyards 2006 Redemption Zin Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A dry, soft and exceptionally pure Zinfandel. With a light, silky texture, ...
description: A dry, soft and exceptionally pure Zinfandel. With a light, silky texture, it offers plenty of jammy raspberry, cherry, currant, cola, vanilla and cinnamon spice flavors.

title: Side Job 2006 Stefani Vineyard C5 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: They should put this in a time capsule as a classic example ...
description: They should put this in a time capsule as a classic example of early 20th century California Zinfandel. Lusty, soft and high in alcohol, it features superripe, slightly sweet flavors of cherries, red currants and chocolate, with all kinds of peppery spices.

title: Alexander Valley Vineyards 2006 Sin Zin Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Jammy and thick, this is a simple but lusty Zin, powerful in ...
description: Jammy and thick, this is a simple but lusty Zin, powerful in fruity cherry, blackberry and cola flavors that finish dry and spicy. Great with barbecued steak.

title: Frostwatch 2005 Zinfandel (Bennett Valley)
excerpt: Crushed peppercorn aromas mark this dry, full-bodied Zin, along with all sorts ...
description: Crushed peppercorn aromas mark this dry, full-bodied Zin, along with all sorts of other racy spices. The alcohol is moderate, and the flavors kick in midpalate, suggesting berries, currants, tobacco, leather and coffee. A very nice example of a balanced, Sonoma Zinfandel with classic elegance.

title: Campus Oaks 2006 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Marked by two things, a very great spiciness and a robust body, ...
description: Marked by two things, a very great spiciness and a robust body, this Zin comes from vines that are more than 80 years old. The crushed black pepper, anise and cinnamon notes frame soft, jammy flavors of berries and chocolate. Good price for a Zin this interesting.

title: Rancho Zabaco 2006 Heritage Vines Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Bring out the barbecue. This robust, heady Zin has upfront black currant, ...
description: Bring out the barbecue. This robust, heady Zin has upfront black currant, licorice and mocha flavors that finish with a generous dusting of pepper and other Asian spices.

title: Valley of the Moon 2006 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: A little soft and sweet, with melted raspberry, cherry and blackberry jam ...
description: A little soft and sweet, with melted raspberry, cherry and blackberry jam flavors drizzled with milk chocolate and pepper. A decent everyday red.

title: Cathedral Ridge 2006 Zinfandel (Columbia Valley (OR))
excerpt: Zinfandel is establishing a presence in the Hood River region of eastern ...
description: Zinfandel is establishing a presence in the Hood River region of eastern Oregon. This is a very approachable, somewhat rustic, tart and earthy red, with fruit flavors that mix strawberry, cherry and brambly berries. Some herbal spice comes through in the finish.

title: Dancing Bull 2006 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Front-loaded with fruit, this gentle, easy-drinking Zin offers a blast of jammy ...
description: Front-loaded with fruit, this gentle, easy-drinking Zin offers a blast of jammy blackberry and cherry flavors, with smoky, spicy nuances.

title: Kunde 2005 Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: A little heavy, thick and jammy, like melted blackberry jelly mixed with ...
description: A little heavy, thick and jammy, like melted blackberry jelly mixed with alcohol. Okay with pizza, burgers and such.

title: Gallo Family Vineyards NV Twin Valley White Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Overtly off-dry to sweet, but marked by high acidity and a bitterness ...
description: Overtly off-dry to sweet, but marked by high acidity and a bitterness that dries out the cherry-vanilla flavors, this blush will happily pair with cheeseburgers and buffalo wings.

title: Diablita 2005 zin-a Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Soft and simple, with very ripe, almost Porty flavors of caramelized blackberry ...
description: Soft and simple, with very ripe, almost Porty flavors of caramelized blackberry pie, currants and chocolate-covered raisins, with a hot finish.

title: Barefoot Cellars NV White Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Sugary sweet and simple, with watermelon and watery raspberry jam flavors.
description: Sugary sweet and simple, with watermelon and watery raspberry jam flavors.

title: McManis 2007 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Almost, but not quite, undrinkable, this Zin is vegetal and dry, with ...
description: Almost, but not quite, undrinkable, this Zin is vegetal and dry, with asparagus-tinged flavors of berries.

title: Bella Vetta 2005 Jack's Cabin Vineyard Zinfandel (Rockpile)
excerpt: A big, brawny, juicy Zin that shows the muscular style of Rockpile, ...
description: A big, brawny, juicy Zin that shows the muscular style of Rockpile, and does so with considerable appeal. With powerhouse flavors of ripe, freshly picked blackberries and currants, sprinkled with anise, cocoa, black pepper, crushed cloves, star anise and vanilla, it finishes completely dry and smooth.

title: Girard 2006 Old Vine Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: So classically structured and elegant, it might almost be a Bordeaux red ...
description: So classically structured and elegant, it might almost be a Bordeaux red variety instead of Zinfandel, except for the black pepper. Brings Napa-esque control and tannins to the blackberries, currants and chocolate, and should develop for up to 6 years.

title: Tenute Rubino 2005 Visellio Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: The wine opens with rich aromas of chocolate, leather and tobacco and ...
description: The wine opens with rich aromas of chocolate, leather and tobacco and segues to black fruit, plum and ripe cherry. Great attention had been paid here to portray the Primitivo grape in a modern key and to show the potential of the grape. 4 g/l RS.

title: Feudi di Terra d'Otranto 2007 Le Maschere Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Modern and bright, this is a gorgeous red from Puglia with lush ...
description: Modern and bright, this is a gorgeous red from Puglia with lush notes of spice, blackberry, cherry and cola. The wine has rich, chewy fruit and soft succulence backed by more berry fruit.

title: Conti Zecca 2005 Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: This Primitivo has good linearity and well-defined aromas of black fruit and ...
description: This Primitivo has good linearity and well-defined aromas of black fruit and spice. The wine is ripe and succulent, but it is also precise: pair it with grilled meats or pasta with meat ragu.

title: Casa Catelli 2005 Primitivo (Puglia)
excerpt: This hearty Primitivo is ripe and jammy with tones of black cherry ...
description: This hearty Primitivo is ripe and  jammy with tones of black cherry preserves and blackberry pie. There are gritty tannins and a chewy feel that gives this wine power and succulence.

title: Christine Andrew 2006 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Defines a certain style of Lodi Zin, which is sweet, perhaps even ...
description: Defines a certain style of Lodi Zin, which is sweet, perhaps even with some residual sugar. The flavors are of jellied blackberries, cherries, raspberries, chocolate, sweet anise tea and pepper, and the tannins are firm.

title: Napa Wine Co. 2005 Zinfandel (Oakville)
excerpt: Classic Napa Zin. Showcases deliciously ripe blackberry and currant flavors accented with ...
description: Classic Napa Zin. Showcases deliciously ripe blackberry and currant flavors accented with pepper, clove, anise, nutmeg and cinnamon, and a finish that goes on and on. The tannins are pure Oakville, ripe, sweet, thick and as fine as velvet.

title: Karly 2006 Buck's Ten Point Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: With its briary flavors of fresh-picked mountain berries and exotic clove, nutmeg ...
description: With its briary flavors of fresh-picked mountain berries and exotic clove, nutmeg and pepper spices, this Zin defines a more elegant Foothills approach to the variety. The texture is light and silky, not at all heavy, a supple, polished wine of great appeal.

title: Vigne & Vini 2004 Papale  (Primitivo di Manduria)
excerpt: Big, bold and dense, this Primitivo di Manduria delivers blockbuster notes of ...
description: Big, bold and dense, this Primitivo di Manduria delivers blockbuster notes of blackberry preserves, cola, molasses and green spice. In the mouth, it has slight astringency and tight tannins with good persistency and length overall.

title: Castello Monaci 2004 Artas Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Oak renderings of spice and toast dominate this hearty Primitivo at first ...
description: Oak renderings of spice and toast dominate this hearty Primitivo at first but eventually give way to molasses, plum cake and candied fruit. The wine is big and sticky with sour almond flavors and would pair with meat stew or aged cheese.

title: Karly 2005 Pokerville Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: A really great mountain Zinfandel that shows luscious power and fruit at ...
description: A really great mountain Zinfandel that shows luscious power and fruit at a fair price. The flavors of blackberries, cherries, currants, oranges, cloves and white pepper flood the palate and are just wonderful to experience. At this price, buy this Zin by the case.

title: Francis Berwyn 2006 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: This savory Zin screams its varietal identity with a blast of pepper, ...
description: This savory Zin screams its varietal identity with a blast of pepper, nutmeg and clove that accompanies ripe blackberries, wild cherries, mulberries and smoky oak. The wine feels very soft and lightly elegant in the mouth, but fully dry. Perfect for restaurant wine lists.

title: Tormaresca 2006 Torcicoda Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Torcicoda is a thick and deeply extracted Primitivo with mature notes of ...
description: Torcicoda is a thick and deeply extracted Primitivo with mature notes of fruit preserves, blackberry and jasmine tea. The wine is big and bulky upon first impression but then relaxes and evolves slowly with more time in the glass. It imparts sweet tannins and a long, spicy finish.

title: Castello Monaci 2006 Piluna Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: A very precise mineral quality that recalls slate roof and granite defines ...
description: A very precise mineral quality that recalls slate roof and granite defines this wine and delivers a linear and drying experience overall. The wine has charm and elegance with lingering spice notes on the finish.

title: Castello Monaci 2005 Artas Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: This hot climate Primitivo has a jammy side that is evident in ...
description: This hot climate Primitivo has a jammy side that is evident in its raw notes of strawberry and blackberry preserves. This is a powerful and intense wine with flavors of spice, tar and dried herbs with a chewy, rich mouthfeel.

title: Dutcher Crossing 2006 Maple Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: A bit on the sweet, soft side, with mashed raspberry, cherry and ...
description: A bit on the sweet, soft side, with mashed raspberry, cherry and blackberry flavors seasoned with vanilla, but the peppery taste and firm tannins uplift this Zin and give it a frisson of pleasure.

title: Mocavero 2003 Santufili Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Aromas of freshly milled clove and peppercorn are backed by mature fruit, ...
description: Aromas of freshly milled clove and peppercorn are backed by mature fruit, strawberry and raspberry. This Primitivo offers interesting texture and a gritty, raw mouthfeel with sour cherry on the close.

title: Cantine Due Palme 2005 Rocca Normanna Le Sciare Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: Here is a smoky, dense Primitivo with thick aromas of black cherry, ...
description: Here is a smoky, dense Primitivo with thick aromas of black cherry, red apples and chocolate fudge. The wine has a soft, modern edge with flavors of spice, vanilla and mature blackberry fruit. Pair it with lamb, roasted pork or stew.

title: Ironstone 2006 Old Vine Reserve Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: With a dash of Petite Sirah, this wine, made from century-old vineyards, ...
description: With a dash of Petite Sirah, this wine, made from century-old vineyards, is extraordinarily rich. It explodes with blackberry, cherry, raspberry, chocolate, anise, vanilla fudge, pepper and clove flavors. The wine is a little on the sweet side, but not too much.

title: Casa Catelli 2004 Primitivo (Puglia)
excerpt: Church incense, dried lavender, sweet spice, blackberry and cherry cola shape a ...
description: Church incense, dried lavender, sweet spice, blackberry and cherry cola shape a simple, no-fuss Primitivo that would pair well with pizza or pasta dishes. The wine ends with sweet, chewy tannins and thick extraction.

title: Leone de Castris 2006 Villa Santera  (Primitivo di Manduria)
excerpt: Villa Santera is a well-priced Primitivo di Manduria with jammy notes of ...
description: Villa Santera is a well-priced Primitivo di Manduria with jammy notes of black fruit, mature apple, root beer and spice. The wine has a dense, rich texture and a bright endnote of cherry fruit flavors.

title: Sbragia 2005 Gino's Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Salty and peppery, this is a rustic Zinfandel, powered by briary, brambly ...
description: Salty and peppery, this is a rustic Zinfandel, powered by briary, brambly notes. The flavors are of wild forest berries, with twiggy, minty nuances, and the tannins are sharp. Drink with rich fare, such as steak or lamb.

title: Vigne & Vini 2005 Tatu  (Primitivo del Tarantino)
excerpt: Here is an intense and powerful Primitivo with a burnt note of ...
description: Here is an intense and powerful Primitivo with a burnt note of popcorn and toasted nut backed by maple syrup and cooked plums. The density is not too heavy, which helps render this wine more approachable and food friendly.

title: Vigne & Vini 2004 Moi  (Primitivo di Manduria)
excerpt: Awkward notes at the beginning blow off quickly to reveal mature notes ...
description: Awkward notes at the beginning blow off quickly to reveal mature notes of plum, raisin and blackberry jam. The wine tastes thick and slightly sweet and has a chewy, dense mouthfeel.

title: Villa Vignamaggio 2005 Levanter  (Primitivo del Salento)
excerpt: Here is a ripe-smelling Primitivo (with 15% Syrah) with cooked notes of ...
description: Here is a ripe-smelling Primitivo (with 15% Syrah) with cooked notes of red cherry and blackberry backed by smoked bacon, beef jerky and leather. Dried rosemary and oregano also make an appearance and the wine closes with sour, overt tannins.

title: Valle dell'Asso 2005 Terra S. Giovanni Primitivo (Salento)
excerpt: This Primitivo has a raw nose with notes of tin can and ...
description: This Primitivo has a raw nose with notes of tin can and petroleum that take away from the natural integrity of the fruit. The wine is light and thin in appearance with a sour note on the close.

title: Dutton-Goldfield 2006 Morelli Lane Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Winemaker Steve Goldfield brings the same deft touch he displays with Pinot ...
description: Winemaker Steve Goldfield brings the same deft touch he displays with Pinot Noir to this lush, elegant wine. It has the structure of a gentle Merlot, but with the wild cherry and raspberry, date nut cake, cocoa, pepper and clove flavors that make it so distinctive and savory. This is consistently one of the best Zins from the RRV.

title: Williams Selyem 2006 Bacigalupi Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This bottling from esteemed producer Williams Selyem is a rich, concentrated wine, ...
description: This bottling from esteemed producer Williams Selyem is a rich, concentrated wine, brimming with savory flavors of wild cherries and raspberries, red currants, milk chocolate, cloves and black pepper. The extraordinary tannins are smooth and as fine as velvet.

title: Paul Dolan 2005 Zinfandel (Mendocino-Amador)
excerpt: This is really a lovely Zin. It has the weight, tannic structure ...
description: This is really a lovely Zin. It has the weight, tannic structure and complexity of a fine Napa Cabernet, but the flavors are all Zinfandel. They include black pepper, red and black cherries and raspberries, currants, sweet tobacco, gingerbread and smoky oak influences.

title: Williams Selyem 2006 Feeney Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This unusual and distinctive Zin has a silky texture and rich, finely ...
description: This unusual and distinctive Zin has a silky texture and rich, finely ground tannins. The flavors range from classic black and red currants, mulberries, cloves and pepper to pastry flavors of coconut macaroon and fig cookie. Could easily develop over a decade.

title: Mazzocco 2005 Reserve Pony Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: With over 16% alcohol and a splash of Petite Sirah, this Zin ...
description: With over 16% alcohol and a splash of Petite Sirah, this Zin can be called generous. It has a rich, creamy texture, and the black currant, cherry jam, mocha and anise flavors are fully dry.

title: Huntington 2006 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Most of the grapes in this statewide blend came from Lodi and ...
description: Most of the grapes in this statewide blend came from Lodi and Paso Robles, and it has the character of a warm-climate Zin. Soft and delicious, the flavors are of cherries, black raspberries, chocolate truffle, licorice, cloves and smoky vanilla.

title: Pietra Santa 2005 Zinfandel (Cienega Valley)
excerpt: This wine shows the rustic, wild side of Zin, with briary flavors ...
description: This wine shows the rustic, wild side of Zin, with briary flavors of freshly picked blackberries, cherries and raspberries and exotic notes of tar, licorice, cola, pepper and pine. The dry, dusty tannins will pair well with grilled meats.

title: Stacked Stone 2004 Zin Stone Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Kind of vegetal, with a bell pepper edge to the blackberries. The ...
description: Kind of vegetal, with a bell pepper edge to the blackberries. The wine is also quite tannic. The combination makes it astringent.

title: St. Francis 2005 Old Vines Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Simple and harsh in texture, with wild berry, cola and pepper flavors ...
description: Simple and harsh in texture, with wild berry, cola and pepper flavors wrapped into hard, green tannins that make the aftertaste bitter.

title: Wallace 2006 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Hard and tough in tannins and acids, this Zin has jammy berry ...
description: Hard and tough in tannins and acids, this Zin has jammy berry flavors side by side with green, peppery ones and Porty ones. Tastes like a classic case of unevenly ripened berries.

title: Greg Norman California Estates 2005 Zinfandel (Red Hills Lake County)
excerpt: Tastes very hot, with a high alcohol peppery burn. The flavors that ...
description: Tastes very hot, with a high alcohol peppery burn. The flavors that come through are of mint and bitter cherries.

title: Wallace 2005 Zinfandel (Lodi)
excerpt: Vegetal and hot, this Zin sure is rustic. The cherry-berry flavors are ...
description: Vegetal and hot, this Zin sure is rustic. The cherry-berry flavors are wrapped into green, edgy tannins.

title: Dry Creek Vineyard 2005 Beeson Ranch Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: With a splash of Petite Sirah, this Zin is dark and exceedingly ...
description: With a splash of Petite Sirah, this Zin is dark and exceedingly powerful in blackberry and cherry fruit, complexed with notes of dark chocolate, licorice, Chinese five-spice and white pepper. A dramatic wine that calls for dramatic food.

title: Dry Creek Vineyard 2005 Somers Ranch Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: When Dry Creek gets it right, few wineries anywhere can beat their ...
description: When Dry Creek gets it right, few wineries anywhere can beat their Zins. Somers Ranch is in the eastern hills, where it gets the full benefit of the afternoon sun. The wine is impressive in ripe blackberries, currants, licorice and cocoa, but maintains a beautiful structure, with soft, fine tannins and just-in-time acidity.

title: Zina Hyde Cunningham 2004 Reserve Old Vine Zinfandel (Redwood Valley)
excerpt: Big, ripe and rich with gusto, this Zin, from century vines that ...
description: Big, ripe and rich with gusto, this Zin, from century vines that probably contain other field varieties, shows a myriad of wild cherry, boysenberry, mulberry, licorice, black pepper and smoky oak flavors. Very refined and enjoyable for its depth and complexity.

title: John Tyler 2004 Bacigalupi Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Fans of big, soft, rich, high-alcohol Zins will rejoice with this epic ...
description: Fans of big, soft, rich, high-alcohol Zins will rejoice with this epic bottling. The candied, pastry-filling flavors of blackberries, cherries, raspberries, plums, chocolate and red licorice are almost sweet, although the wine is probably dry, technically speaking.

title: Napoma 2006 Todd Maus Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: A very ripe Zinfandel that shows plenty of briary, brambly aromas and ...
description: A very ripe Zinfandel that shows plenty of briary, brambly aromas and flavors and a robust mouthfeel. Packed with puckery tannins, the flavors of wild blackberries, cherries and raspberries are spiced with black pepper, nutmeg and clove.

title: Zina Hyde Cunningham 2004 Old Vine Zinfandel (Redwood Valley)
excerpt: A soft, luscious Zin, dry and firm in tannins, with forward flavors ...
description: A soft, luscious Zin, dry and firm in tannins, with forward flavors of raspberries, cherries, almond biscotti, mocha and dusty spices. Drink now.

title: De Loach 2006 Nova Vineyard Zinfandel (Lake County)
excerpt: Direct and sweet in glyceriney alcohol, this Zin tastes like a liquid ...
description: Direct and sweet in glyceriney alcohol, this Zin tastes like a liquid confection of raspberries, cherries, milk chocolate, vanilla and cinnamon spice.

title: Clos La Chance 2005 Buff-Bellied Zinfandel (Central Coast)
excerpt: Tastes simple and a bit sweet, a soft, gentle wine offering candied ...
description: Tastes simple and a bit sweet, a soft, gentle wine offering candied raspberry, currant, licorice, cocoa, pepper and sage flavors. Good with everyday fare, like pizza, burgers, meat loaf.

title: Steele 2005 Catfish Vineyard Zinfandel (Lake County)
excerpt: Tastes direct and jammy, with pie-filling flavors of raspberries, cherries, red currants ...
description: Tastes direct and jammy, with pie-filling flavors of raspberries, cherries, red currants and cola.

title: Tin Barn 2005 Gilsson Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Despite some well-ripened red and black currant, licorice and cola flavors, this ...
description: Despite some well-ripened red and black currant, licorice and cola flavors, this dry Zin has a bitterness in the finish that gives it a bit of a rustic feel. Drink now.

title: Sextant 2006 Wheelhouse Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: An awkward wine, with some delicious blackberry and cherry flavors, but also ...
description: An awkward wine, with some delicious blackberry and cherry flavors, but also some green ones that give an asparagus, minty note. The wine is structurally fine, but those unripe tastes are a turn-off.

title: Clos du Bois 2005 Sonoma Reserve Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Hot in alcohol, dry and thin in fruit, this Zin shows very ...
description: Hot in alcohol, dry and thin in fruit, this Zin shows very modest blackberry, cherry and spice flavors. Finishes with a scour of sticky tannins.

title: Peachy Canyon 2006 Incredible Red Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Yes, this is from Zin specialist Peachy Canyon, but you get what ...
description: Yes, this is from Zin specialist Peachy Canyon, but you get what you pay for. The wine is raw, thin and weedy, almost vegetal, with slight traces of raspberries and cherries.

title: Ottimino Vineyards 2004 Ottimino Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: The vineyard is in a cooler part of the valley, out near ...
description: The vineyard is in a cooler part of the valley, out near Occidental, so even in this hot vintage, you can taste the acidity coaxed out of the grapes by the chilly winds and fogs off the Pacific. Yet the wine is not unripe, but shows interesting, complex flavors of wild berries, mocha, Dr. Pepper, licorice and dusty Asian spices. Notable for its balance and elegance.

title: Toogood 2005 Herbert Zinfandel (El Dorado)
excerpt: The front label of this wine bears the name of the winemaker, ...
description: The front label of this wine bears the name of the winemaker, Marco Capelli, who achieved fame at Swanson, the Napa Valley winery. The wine has the briary, peppery, rustic nature of many Sierra Foothills Zins, but has a balance and elegance that show true coastal sensibilities. The flavors range from fresh blackberry jam and black licorice to bacon, cloves, cinnamon and smoky oak.

title: Wine Guerrilla 2006 Coffaro Vineyards Old Vine Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: This is one of those old-style field blend types of wines, with ...
description: This is one of those old-style field blend types of wines, with some other varieties besides Zin. A big, tannic, juicy, fruity wine, potent in jammy blackberry, blueberry, currant, dark unsweetened chocolate, coffee and pepper flavors that cry out for gilled beef, poultry or pork.

title: Wilson 2005 Reserve Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: The alcohol level of nearly 16% is the star, or the villain, ...
description: The alcohol level of nearly 16% is the star, or the villain, of the show. It gives this Zin a hot, peppery mouthfeel, not to mention going to your head. On the other hand, the wine is dry and richly flavored in wild berries and spices, and the tannic quality is very fine.

title: Sobon Estate 2006 Rocky Top Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: The official alcohol and residual sugar numbers suggest a dry wine, but ...
description: The official alcohol and residual sugar numbers suggest a dry wine, but the wine tastes hot and sweet, almost Porty, with baked fruit flavors of cherries, blackberries, currants and pepper. Will appeal to those who like this big, jammy style of Zinfandel.

title: Sobon Estate 2006 Old Vines Zinfandel (Amador County)
excerpt: Forward, soft and a little sweet with cherry, cola and date flavors, ...
description: Forward, soft and a little sweet with cherry, cola and date flavors, this Zin contains small amounts of Barbera, Syrah and Sangiovese.

title: Wilson 2005 Ellie's Vineyard Old Vine Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: The official alcohol is only 14.6%, not all that high, but the ...
description: The official alcohol is only 14.6%, not all that high, but the wine has a hot, Porty mouthfeel. It also tastes of overripe raisins, and finishes with a burning, chili pepper quality.

title: Bianchi 2005 Heritage Selection Zen Ranch Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Overripe, with raisined or stewed berry-cherry flavors, this wine also is deficient ...
description: Overripe, with raisined or stewed berry-cherry flavors, this wine also is deficient in acidity, which gives it a flat, syrupy feel. The high alcohol shows up in the hot finish.

title: French Hill 2006 Zinfandel (Sierra Foothills)
excerpt: Heavy and Porty, this Zin shows an old style of winemaking. If ...
description: Heavy and Porty, this Zin shows an old style of winemaking. If you like those rustic reds, this is right up your alley.

title: Ballentine 2004 Block 9 Reserve Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Better known for Cabernet, Ballentine brings a deft hand to their Block ...
description: Better known for Cabernet, Ballentine brings a deft hand to their Block 9 Zin, which has earned high scores for years. The vineyard is in Calistoga, and the warmth has coaxed out intricate flavors of wild red and black berries and cherries, mocha, herbs and spices, with a distinct black pepper note. The tannins are thick, but very fine. Among the top Napa Zins, this wine will age for a decade or longer.

title: Trinitas 2005 Old Vine Zinfandel (Contra Costa County)
excerpt: A high quality Zin, this is dry and complex, with wild berry, ...
description: A high quality Zin, this is dry and complex, with wild berry, tobacco, spice, herb and oak flavors. Trinitas has worked with this wine for years, and this is their best ever.

title: Redwood Creek 2006 White Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Sugary sweet and simple, with raspberry sorbet, red cherry marmalade and spicy ...
description: Sugary sweet and simple, with raspberry sorbet, red cherry marmalade and spicy cinnamon flavors. Really more of a dessert wine than a table wine.

title: Turning Leaf 2006 Reserve White Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Really too sweet, simple and soft to earn a better score, this ...
description: Really too sweet, simple and soft to earn a better score, this has syrupy flavors of citrus fruits and raspberries.

title: Von Strasser 2005 Monhoff Vineyard Zinfandel (Diamond Mountain District)
excerpt: Cabernet specialist von Strasser turns to the only Zinfandel vineyard on this ...
description: Cabernet specialist von Strasser turns to the only Zinfandel vineyard on this mountain to produce this dense, layered young wine. Well-oaked, it shows smoky flavors of blackberry marmalade, red and black currants and peppery spices, and has the texture of a fine Cabernet. Drink now through 2013.

title: Dashe Cellars 2005 Florence Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Ripe to the point of almost sweet, this single-vineyard Zin brims with ...
description: Ripe to the point of almost sweet, this single-vineyard Zin brims with blackberry, red currant, chocolate, licorice, cola and peppery spice flavors. With a full-bodied structure, it calls for rich, cheese-finished dishes.

title: Easton 2005 Old Vine Zinfandel (Fiddletown)
excerpt: Dark, lusty, powerful, stuffed with jammy dark berry and stone fruits, this ...
description: Dark, lusty, powerful, stuffed with jammy dark berry and stone fruits, this Zin is a natural for rich beef dishes, and should reward aging. The blackberry and mulberry flavors are incredibly spicy, while the tannins are a bit astringent now, suggesting a few years in the cellar.

title: Dashe Cellars 2005 Todd Brothers Vineyard Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Showing the typical character of old vine Alexander Valley Zin, this bottling ...
description: Showing the typical character of old vine Alexander Valley Zin, this bottling is rich and powerful in black currant, mocha, gingerbread, anise and vanilla spice flavors that are wrapped into sturdy tannins. It has a honeyed finish of cassis liqueur, and is best in its lusty youth.

title: Puccioni 2005 Old Vine Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Lots going on in this ripe, lusty Zin. It shows the spicy, ...
description: Lots going on in this ripe, lusty Zin. It shows the spicy, briary character of Dry Creek, with wild blackberry, cherry and boysenberry flavors complexed with mocha, sweet vanilla and toast.

title: Dynamite Vineyards 2005 Zinfandel (North Coast)
excerpt: A little on the sweet side, with sugary blackberry, cherry and raspberry ...
description: A little on the sweet side, with sugary blackberry, cherry and raspberry flavors, but the acidity is so crisp and the tannins so fine, it gets away with it. Enjoy this everyday wine with barbecue.

title: Dashe Cellars 2006 Late Harvest Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Semi-sweet, this wine combines cherry and chocolate flavors with a vegetal, asparagus ...
description: Semi-sweet, this wine combines cherry and chocolate flavors with a vegetal, asparagus taste that detracts from the pleasures a dessert wine ought to bring.

title: Grayson 2006 Zinfandel (Central Coast)
excerpt: Awkwardly sweet and briary, with flavors of raspberry and cherry jam, sugared ...
description: Awkwardly sweet and briary, with flavors of raspberry and cherry jam, sugared chamomile tea and milk chocolate. Will satisfy those red wine fans with a sweet tooth.

title: Louis M. Martini 2005 Monte Rosso Vineyard Gnarly Vine Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: For the past several years, this Zin has suffered from the same ...
description: For the past several years, this Zin has suffered from the same flaw, excessive alcohol. Some wines get away with it. This one, with its raisiny, baked fruit taste, harsh tannins and hot mouthfeel, does not.

title: Trinitas 2004 Bigalow Vineyard Zinfandel (Contra Costa County)
excerpt: Hot in the mouth and sweet on this finish, this blackberry, coffee ...
description: Hot in the mouth and sweet on this finish, this blackberry, coffee and spice-flavored Zin is rustic. The sugary finish might pair well with a rich barbecue sauce.

title: Castoro Cellars 2005 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
excerpt: If this Zin were drier, it would be pretty good, because the ...
description: If this Zin were drier, it would be pretty good, because the tannic-acid structure is fine. But the blackberry and pepper flavors are marred by excessive sugary sweetness, making the finish Porty.

title: Trinitas 2004 Old Vine Zinfandel (Contra Costa County)
excerpt: Definitely on the sugary, sweet side, this Zin also tastes hot and ...
description: Definitely on the sugary, sweet side, this Zin also tastes hot and peppery, despite an official alcohol reading of only 14.5%.

title: Dancing Bull 2005 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: With its vegetal smell and saccharine-sweet, medicinal fruit flavors, this is not ...
description: With its vegetal smell and saccharine-sweet, medicinal fruit flavors, this is not a successful Zinfandel.

title: Ronan 2005 Lakeview Vineyards Zinfandel (Monterey County)
excerpt: High in alcohol, excessively soft and sweet in sugar, this Zin leaves ...
description: High in alcohol, excessively soft and sweet in sugar, this Zin leaves much to be desired.

title: Sausal 2005 Century Vines Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: From 130-year-old vines, this is a densely layered, bigtime Zin. The flavor ...
description: From 130-year-old vines, this is a densely layered, bigtime Zin. The flavor concentration is just tremendous, a critical mass of briary, wild blackberries, black currants, dark chocolate, licorice and fabulous Asian spice. True, the alcohol is on the high side, but the wine finishes balanced and dry. Will take up to 10 years of cellaring.

title: Lake Sonoma 2005 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Lake Sonoma produces varietally pure wines at fair prices. This is a ...
description: Lake Sonoma produces varietally pure wines at fair prices. This is a solid Zin, rich and spicy, with cherry-berry and cocoa fruit flavors framed in brisk, fine tannins. Will hold for up to six years.

title: Collier Falls 2005 Estate Primitivo (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Pretty much like a good Dry Creek Zinfandel, maybe even spicier. This ...
description: Pretty much like a good Dry Creek Zinfandel, maybe even spicier. This red wine is medium-bodied, dry and very fruity, with flavors of wild cherries, blackberries, blueberries and chocolate. Great with a charbroiled steak or burgers.

title: Sausal 2004 Old Vine Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: A lighter style of Zin, perfect for grilled meats and poultry. The ...
description: A lighter style of Zin, perfect for grilled meats and poultry. The wine is bone dry, with gentle tannins framing flavors of blackberries, cherries, cola, cocoa, cracked black pepper and Asian spicebox.

title: Shippey 2005 Rocking Z Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: The official alcohol on this wine is 14.9%, but it has a ...
description: The official alcohol on this wine is 14.9%, but it has a syrupy concentration and heat that tastes far higher than that. Was it watered down? Tastes like cherry and blackberry wine that was reduced for a sauce, with a thick, balsamic finish.

title: Collier Falls 2004 Private Reserve Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Very high alcohol in this superripe wine shows in a hot, chili ...
description: Very high alcohol in this superripe wine shows in a hot, chili pepper feeling and in the impression of sweetness. Both combine to give the berry-cherry flavors a rustic quality.

title: Lolonis 2005 Heritage Vineyards Tryfon Zinfandel (Redwood Valley)
excerpt: This big, high alcohol wine shows a prickly heat that unbalances it, ...
description: This big, high alcohol wine shows a prickly heat that unbalances it, despite good tannins and well-developed cherry, berry, leather and spice flavors.

title: Esser Cellars 2005 Zinfandel (California)
excerpt: Too sweet by far for a table wine, with simple, medicinal cherry ...
description: Too sweet by far for a table wine, with simple, medicinal cherry and blackberry flavors and a harshly tannic mouthfeel.

title: Acorn 2005 Alegria Vineyards Heritage Vines Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Acorn has produced one of their best bottlings ever. The wine is ...
description: Acorn has produced one of their best bottlings ever. The wine is drily crisp and tannic, but rich and supple, with cassis, cherry and carob flavors that have an earthy, mushroom and tobacco grounding. The wine contains smaller amounts of at least 10 other varieties, in the manner of an old field blend.

title: Bella 2005 Belle Canyon Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Once again, this bottling delivers a big, lush, complex and succulent young ...
description: Once again, this bottling delivers a big, lush, complex and succulent young wine for Zin specialist Bella. Marked by extraordinary spices, the wine, with a little Petite Sirah, has powerful wild blackberry and raspberry, olive tapenade, cola and carob flavors that finish with a classic Zin briary, brambly character.

title: Santa Rita 2011 Casa Real Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Despite cool conditions in 2011, or quite possibly because of them, this ...
description: Despite cool conditions in 2011, or quite possibly because of them, this is thriving. Aromas of cedar, earth, spice and berry fruits are stylish and comported. The palate on this perennially superb Cabernet is focused, intense and balanced. Flavors of spicy red currant and briary berry are thorough and finish with length on a mocha note. Drink through 2026.

title: Volker Eisele Family Estate 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: From an organically farmed estate vineyard in Chiles Valley operated by the ...
description: From an organically farmed estate vineyard in Chiles Valley operated by the same family for more than 40 years, this 87% Cabernet Sauvignon-13% Merlot has soul and structure, as well a stony minerality that compels. Menthol and tobacco weave between thick layers of dark cherry and plum, complemented on the palate by exotic cardamom and clove. This is one worth cellaring through 2022 or giving an hour or two to open.

title: Castello di Amorosa 2012 Melanson Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: From a vineyard atop Pritchard Hill, this wine delivers big, bold flavors ...
description: From a vineyard atop Pritchard Hill, this wine delivers big, bold flavors and structure. Integrated tannins form around flavors of cloves, baking spices and dried herbs. Blackberry and black cherry pop in between a flinty, earthy side. Drink through 2022.

title: Beauregard 2012 Beauregard Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Ben Lomond Mountain)
excerpt: Luscious but not overbearing blueberry and boysenberry fruits power the nose on ...
description: Luscious but not overbearing blueberry and boysenberry fruits power the nose on this wine from a coastal region. It suggests blackberry pastries, chalk and pleasingly aromatic incense. The palate combines oak smoke, black fruits and a spicy, black pepper-driven acidity, providing lots of tactile action on the tongue.

title: Cono Sur 2011 Silencio Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Earthy, spicy berry aromas come with accents of tomato, oregano and other ...
description: Earthy, spicy berry aromas come with accents of tomato, oregano and other herbs. This winner of a Cabernet is edgy, lively and tannic. Spicy oak, herbal notes of tobacco and thyme, raw oak and berry fruit flavors finish toasty, oaky, tannic and drawing. Drink through 2022.

title: Smith & Hook 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
excerpt: Truly a wine that overdelivers, this packs molten fudge cake, vanilla-laced black-currant ...
description: Truly a wine that overdelivers, this packs molten fudge cake, vanilla-laced black-currant syrup and chocolate pudding with a fresh sprig of mint on the nose. The palate is soft and dynamic, with ripe black currants given complexity though licorice and butter-softened roasting herbs, all wrapped in tannins that keep the flavors steady throughout.

title: Woodinville Wine Cellars 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The aromas of coffee, chocolate and exotic spices are brooding. Flavors are ...
description: The aromas of coffee, chocolate and exotic spices are brooding. Flavors are concentrated and layered, showing a good sense of texture and a light grip of tannins. The oak needs time to fully integrate.

title: Woodward Canyon 2013 Artist Series Cabernet Sauvignon (Washington)
excerpt: The variety quickly announces itself with aromas of dark cherry and dried ...
description: The variety quickly announces itself with aromas of dark cherry and dried herbs followed by generous barrel accents. The black-fruit flavors are rich but maintain balance, with a persistence that impresses.

title: Seven Hills 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The aromas of cedar, fresh dark berries, thyme, garden herbs and flowers ...
description: The aromas of cedar, fresh dark berries, thyme, garden herbs and flowers provide instant appeal, with woodsy accents following. Lively plum and raspberry flavors back them up, with fine-grained tannins and barrel accents speckled throughout.

title: Angelo Cellars 2010 Reverence Vineyard Private Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Coombsville)
excerpt: Given plenty of time in bottle, this wine is drinking beautifully now, ...
description: Given plenty of time in bottle, this wine is drinking beautifully now, balanced and pillowy in texture. Vanilla-cherry and clove sit atop a note of graham cracker, lingering around smoky oak and a lengthy finish.

title: Co Dinn 2013 Painted Hills Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The first red release from this new winery, this wine brings aromatic ...
description: The first red release from this new winery, this wine brings aromatic suggestions of vanilla, spice, plum and herb. Balanced red and black fruit flavors are sumptuous yet sleek with a finish that lingers.

title: Chateau Rollat 2011 Edouard Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas convey cedar, savory herb, earth, black licorice and cherry. The dark ...
description: Aromas convey cedar, savory herb, earth, black licorice and cherry. The dark flavors are reserved in style but still display richness, supported by fine-grained tannins.

title: Amavi 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas of cocoa, herb, woodspice and blue and black fruit lead to ...
description: Aromas of cocoa, herb, woodspice and blue and black fruit lead to lush, palate-coating dark fruit flavors that display depth and richness, backed by a dry lick of tannins.

title: Silverado 2012 GEO Cabernet Sauvignon (Coombsville)
excerpt: This is an inaugural release of this variety from the Mount George ...
description: This is an inaugural release of this variety from the Mount George Vineyard in cool Coombsville, granted AVA status in 2011. Juicy and soft in blackberry and stone fruit, the wine is cradled by generous tannins and herbal tones. Full bodied, its sinewy structure suggests it would benefit from more time in bottle; cellar through 2022.

title: Laelaps 2013 Seven Hills Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas of cranberry, raspberry, rose hips and green herbs are all high-toned. ...
description: Aromas of cranberry, raspberry, rose hips and green herbs are all high-toned. The red-fruit flavors are elegantly styled and fresh in feel, backed by soft, plump tannins. It shows hang time on the finish. This is a very pretty wine and a unique expression of the variety and vineyard.

title: Napa Cellars 2012 V Collection Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
excerpt: This is a nicely made, full-bodied wine, richly layered in vanilla, cassis ...
description: This is a nicely made, full-bodied wine, richly layered in vanilla, cassis and cedar, a mix of savory and fruity. Dried herb, tobacco and oak provide a succulent backbone while the acidity stays firm and fresh in the glass.

title: Dumas Station 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: This generous wine pulls no punches with aromas of pencil lead, vanilla, ...
description: This generous wine pulls no punches with aromas of pencil lead, vanilla, fig and blackberry that are followed by rich dark-fruit flavors speckled with oak accents throughout. Fruit and barrel sail on the finish.

title: Castello di Amorosa 2012 Don Thomas Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: On the western edge of the appellation, this vineyard provides a juicy, ...
description: On the western edge of the appellation, this vineyard provides a juicy, dusty core of full-bodied tannins and black cherry, a generous expression of ripe fruit with a complex edge. It finishes with touches of broth and tomato leaf.

title: Brian Carter Cellars 2011 One Shaw Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: This winery has made its mark over the years exclusively with blended ...
description: This winery has made its mark over the years exclusively with blended wines, yet here is a single-varietal, single-vineyard offering. The aromas are expressive with notes of black cherry and high-toned herbs along with spice accents. The dark fruit and licorice flavors are tightly wound with a core of firm tannins and lively acids.

title: Riboli 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: Bouillon and wild streaks of spearmint and cedar highlight this soft, well-integrated ...
description: Bouillon and wild streaks of spearmint and cedar highlight this soft, well-integrated red that is full-bodied and brawny, ready pair with big slabs of meat. With sizable tannin structure, it can be enjoyed now through 2020.

title: J. Bookwalter 2013 Protagonist Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Cabernet Sauvignon makes up 95% of this wine, with the balance Syrah. ...
description: Cabernet Sauvignon makes up 95% of this wine, with the balance Syrah. It seems reductive out of the gate, making it a challenge to get at the black-cherry aromas. The dark fruit, fig and herb flavors are full in feel, seeming slightly dried out and backed by surprisingly soft tannins for the variety.

title: MontGras 2012 Intriga Maxima Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Currant aromas blend with notes of tomato, herbs and brick dust on ...
description: Currant aromas blend with notes of tomato, herbs and brick dust on this tight, grabbing Cabernet. Currant and red plum flavors meet herbal notes of mint and carob, with an oak character rising up on a gritty finish. Drink through 2020.

title: Cairdean Estate 2011 Acquaintance Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Coombsville)
excerpt: Herb and clove wrap around strong, structured tannin in this pretty wine ...
description: Herb and clove wrap around strong, structured tannin in this pretty wine from a cool region of the Napa Valley. Blackberry and cranberry play off one another, allowing for a balance of savory and fruit, while the finish is peppered in integrated oak.

title: Michael David 2013 Earthquake Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: Flavors are deep and rich in this bold, full-bodied and mouthfilling wine. ...
description: Flavors are deep and rich in this bold, full-bodied and mouthfilling wine. It smells like molasses, Bing cherries and black plums, tastes as if saturated with blackcurrants and cherries and has a layer of fine-grained tannin to add texture.

title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2013 Indian Wells Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas of barrel spice, vanilla, dill and blue-black fruit are bright and ...
description: Aromas of barrel spice, vanilla, dill and blue-black fruit are bright and focused. The plum and barrel flavors show depth and a sense of texture, with lingering flavors. This wine is not typically Cabernet but it offers much appeal.

title: Daou 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: A very high-toned, wound-up nose slowly reveals chalky aromas, concentrated purple fruit ...
description: A very high-toned, wound-up nose slowly reveals chalky aromas, concentrated purple fruit and crushed violets on this bottling by the Daou brothers. The palate is also tight and slow to release, with hints of dark chocolate chips, espresso bean and black fruit lingering behind a walls of tannins and bright acidity. This will age well, but certainly wait a little longer to open.

title: Genoa 2012 Danforth Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: The pencil lead, herb and vanilla aromas start out light and elusive. ...
description: The pencil lead, herb and vanilla aromas start out light and elusive. The black-cherry flavors, in contrast, are expressive, showing a good sense of balance and length.

title: OS Winery 2013 Sonas Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Despite coming from a warm vintage, this appealing, well-priced wine has plenty ...
description: Despite coming from a warm vintage, this appealing, well-priced wine has plenty of acid to go with its sleek yet ripe fruit. The fresh herb and cherry aromas and flavors distinctly announce it as Cabernet, with smoke on the finish.

title: Elevation Cellars 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Reserved aromas of flowers, anise, plum and barrel spice lead to compact ...
description: Reserved aromas of flowers, anise, plum and barrel spice lead to compact fruit and tannins with mouthwatering acids. Give it time to open up.

title: Full Pull & Friends 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Already six years old, this wine offers aromas of black licorice, dried ...
description: Already six years old, this wine offers aromas of black licorice, dried cherry, vanilla, clove and abundant wood spices. The flavors of black fruit, licorice and barrel spice intertwine and carry through the finish. The wood is a bit out front at times but the wine still delivers a lot of enjoyment.

title: Sineann 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas of cigar box and dried herbs are light and elusive. The ...
description: Aromas of cigar box and dried herbs are light and elusive. The palate yields plenty of tart cherry and cranberry flavors and a light grip of tannins.

title: J. Lohr 2013 Seven Oaks Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: This wine strikes a wide purple fruit note at first before centering ...
description: This wine strikes a wide purple fruit note at first before centering on plum jam, wood smoke and a licorice element. On the palate, medium tannins frame a medium and smooth mouthfeel, with flavors of tobacco leaf giving way to richer coffee and woody elderberry flavors.

title: Ross Andrew 2013 The Huntsman Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Herb and barrel spice aromas are light, with a high-toned berry top ...
description: Herb and barrel spice aromas are light, with a high-toned berry top note. The black-fruit flavors are smooth and sultry. You want more from the aromas but the flavors quickly compensate.

title: ded.reckoning 2013 Cutlass Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: The aromas of cigar box, lemon peel, woodspice and green herbs are ...
description: The aromas of cigar box, lemon peel, woodspice and green herbs are distinctive. The palate brings tart, spritely acids, sultry fruit flavors and firm, somewhat blocky tannins. It needs to be on a dinner table to show its best.

title: Bogle 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Oaky accents like nutmeg and cinnamon stand out in the aroma, and ...
description: Oaky accents like nutmeg and cinnamon stand out in the aroma, and continue in the flavors while concentrated cherry and berry flavors flood the tongue. This wine is bold, appropriately tannic, and piles on both wood and fruit flavors in profusion. It was aged in American oak for 14 months.

title: Cupcake 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
excerpt: A screaming deal, this wine shows a nice blend of strawberries, peppercorn, ...
description: A screaming deal, this wine shows a nice blend of strawberries, peppercorn, pencil lead, oregano and chaparral scrub on the nose. The palate offers plenty of mocha and herbs including oregano and thyme, alongside elderberry and boysenberry fruit. It has enough tannic structure to notice but not enough to get in the way.

title: Napa Cellars 2013 Classic Collection Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Tiny amounts of Zinfandel and Malbec are added to this wine, which ...
description: Tiny amounts of Zinfandel and Malbec are added to this wine, which otherwise delivers varietally appropriate notes of tart cranberry and black currant. From there, leather comes onto the palate, bolstering an already heady mix of tannin and oak, finishing rich in tobacco and dark chocolate.

title: One 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Yountville)
excerpt: A 100% varietal wine entirely from Yountville, this presents a touch of ...
description: A 100% varietal wine entirely from Yountville, this presents a touch of herb and cedar on the entry aromatically, followed by a thickness of tannin that softens in the glass. Big-boned, it finishes strong in tobacco and coffee.

title: Lapostolle 2013 Casa Grand Selection Cabernet Sauvignon (Rapel Valley)
excerpt: Earthy aromas of rubber and herbs meet black cherry on the nose. ...
description: Earthy aromas of rubber and herbs meet black cherry on the nose. The palate is lively, with bold acidity and grabby tannins carrying flavors of black plum, cassis and loamy earth. Drink this functional, everyday red through 2017.

title: Figge 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Ynez Valley)
excerpt: This blend of 75% Cabernet Sauvignon, 13% Cabernet Franc and 12% Merlot ...
description: This blend of 75% Cabernet Sauvignon, 13% Cabernet Franc and 12% Merlot shows very interesting aromas of cola, root beer, licorice, blackberry leather, violet and a hint of caramel. Black-cherry juice flavors are seasoned with lavender, black pepper and black tea, quite tasty, though not as intriguing as the nose.

title: Elevation Cellars 2011 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Fruit and barrel vie for attention on the aromas. The black licorice ...
description: Fruit and barrel vie for attention on the aromas. The black licorice and spice flavors seem compact, with the tannins bringing some astringency. It needs time in the cellar to come into its own.

title: Hogue 2013 Genesis Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Pleasing aromas of cocoa, bittersweet chocolate, dried herbs and plum lead to ...
description: Pleasing aromas of cocoa, bittersweet chocolate, dried herbs and plum lead to black-currant flavors that display a reserved styling. A light grip of tannins provides the frame.

title: Wild Hogge 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: A densely layered nose shows boysenberry, plum blossoms, mocha, coffee, kola nut ...
description: A densely layered nose shows boysenberry, plum blossoms, mocha, coffee, kola nut and purple flowers. More cola shows on the palate with black cherry, plum-skin tartness and uplifting purple flowers, all presented on smooth tannins.

title: Barons 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: Aromas of golden raisins, fig, licorice and vanilla lead to full-feeling dark-fruit ...
description: Aromas of golden raisins, fig, licorice and vanilla lead to full-feeling dark-fruit flavors, with the tannins bringing a sense of grittiness. Time might smooth things, but the aromas already seem a bit dried out.

title: Madrigal 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Atlas Peak)
excerpt: A ripe, easygoing wine, made in small amounts, this dances in smoky ...
description: A ripe, easygoing wine, made in small amounts, this dances in smoky blackberry jam and clove. The tannins are approachable and integrated, and the oak happy to play a supporting role.

title: Stottle 2012 Doc Stewart Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Wahluke Slope)
excerpt: Cocoa, toffee and dried-herb aromas are followed by soft-feeling cherry flavors with ...
description: Cocoa, toffee and dried-herb aromas are followed by soft-feeling cherry flavors with a tart finish, with fruit and barrel not seeming entirely meshed. The tannins have a slow attack but sneak up on the finish.

title: V. Sattui 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
excerpt: A full-bodied wine bursting in chocolate and leather, this also displays plenty ...
description: A full-bodied wine bursting in chocolate and leather, this also displays plenty of cooler vintage and cooler stylistic sensibilities, from jolts of black currant and cedar to a sanguine taste of game in the background. The finish is all about tannic power.

title: Edge 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is a great wine for a great price, a blend of ...
description: This is a great wine for a great price, a blend of Cabernet Sauvignon with smaller percentages of Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot. Never overly complicated, it delivers juicy waves of blackberry, tobacco and cedar, varietally classic in chalky tannins and a dry finish. Stock up.

title: Muscardini 2012 Cassata Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: From a site farmed by organic vineyard guru Phil Coturri, this full-bodied, ...
description: From a site farmed by organic vineyard guru Phil Coturri, this full-bodied, expansive red is robust and leathery, dotted in soft layers of black currant and black pepper.

title: Round Pond 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: Soft and spicy, this wine is a mix of full-bodied ripeness and ...
description: Soft and spicy, this wine is a mix of full-bodied ripeness and edgier undertones of dried herb, black tea and tobacco leaf. Blackberry jam is the fruitier component, while the finish is sizable in tannin.

title: Wilridge 2013 Doc Stewart Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Wahluke Slope)
excerpt: This young wine still seems to be in its shell, with a ...
description: This young wine still seems to be in its shell, with a whiff of matchstick along with herb aromas. The cherry flavors are light and tart with a supple feel. Try it with food to see it at its best.

title: J. Bookwalter 2013 Foreshadow Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: High-toned aromas of herbs, dark coffee, blue fruit and orange peel are ...
description: High-toned aromas of herbs, dark coffee, blue fruit and orange peel are followed by saturated black-fruit flavors.

title: North by Northwest 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas of dried herbs, bittersweet chocolate, coffee and cherry are varietal and ...
description: Aromas of dried herbs, bittersweet chocolate, coffee and cherry are varietal and lead to abundant woodspice accents. The palate offers lively acidity that frames the lithe yet sweet fruit flavors.

title: Ochagavia 2013 Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Stalky, lightly green aromas of tobacco and mountain herbs blend with leathery ...
description: Stalky, lightly green aromas of tobacco and mountain herbs blend with leathery plum and berry scents in front of a round, full-bodied palate. Loamy, earthy plum flavors come with an herbal covering, while this tastes oaky, herbal and like cocoa on the finish. Drink through 2018.

title: Las Positas 2012 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: Deeply flavored, full bodied and firmly tannic, this slightly rough-cut wine was ...
description: Deeply flavored, full bodied and firmly tannic, this slightly rough-cut wine was grown on the Las Positas property and has well-concentrated fruit flavors, a good, gripping texture and enough complexity to hold interest.

title: Odfjell 2013 Armador Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Herbal and savory smelling up front, this cool-vintage Cabernet also shows plum, ...
description: Herbal and savory smelling up front, this cool-vintage Cabernet also shows plum, berry and mild green aromas. A tight, tannic palate offers flavors of herbal plum and cherry, while the finish is choppy, drawing and tannic, with herbal leftovers.

title: Peachy Canyon 2012 ChillHouse Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: A juicy wine certain to please those who opt for the hip ...
description: A juicy wine certain to please those who opt for the hip label, this is quite showy on the nose, with densely packed blackberries, clove, caramel and vanilla elements. The rich palate is equally poppy and boisterous, with black cherry jam, allspice and nutmeg notes.

title: Ded.Reckoning 2008 No. 11 Klipsun Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: Aromas of dried cherry, vanilla, Red Vines, woodspice and cocoa show some ...
description: Aromas of dried cherry, vanilla, Red Vines, woodspice and cocoa show some volatility. The pit fruit and cinnamon flavors pack a punch, backed by firm, gritty tannins.

title: Andretti 2012 Montona Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Perfumy in cedar and dried herb, this austere effort is swaddled in ...
description: Perfumy in cedar and dried herb, this austere effort is swaddled in cranberry and grenadine, low in oak presence and high in minerality. It should do well at the table.

title: Mercer 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: Fruit and barrel mix on this wine, with aromas of mesquite, vanilla, ...
description: Fruit and barrel mix on this wine, with aromas of mesquite, vanilla, spice and dark berries. The cherry flavors are wrapped in vanilla accents, with gritty tannins backing it all up.

title: Bianchi 2012 Signature Selection Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Fresh-crushed red currant aromas mix with dried purple flowers and mocha on ...
description: Fresh-crushed red currant aromas mix with dried purple flowers and mocha on the nose of this bottling. The flavors are very evenly presented, ripe and round with black plum fruit and a touch of fig-laced balsamic vinegar.

title: Chilcas 2013 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Plum, cherry and cassis aromas are lightly charred but not really dark ...
description: Plum, cherry and cassis aromas are lightly charred but not really dark or dense. This shows high-toned, edgy acidity and hard tannins. Punchy, borderline sharp flavors of raspberry and herbal plum finish rough.

title: Siegel 2013 Single Vineyard Los Lingues Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Blatant green aromas of bell pepper and thyme are the dominant aromas. ...
description: Blatant green aromas of bell pepper and thyme are the dominant aromas. A raw, tannic, edgy mouthfeel and herbal, green flavors are patently Chilean and compounded by this cool vintage. Mint and leftover green flavors take up space on a bullish, tannic finish.

title: Angelo Cellars 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Tasting higher in alcohol than listed, this is a soft, somewhat jammy, ...
description: Tasting higher in alcohol than listed, this is a soft, somewhat jammy, simple wine. It offers raspberry preserves and chocolate around generous oak and sweet tannins.

title: Santa Alicia 2013 Gran Reserva de Los Andes Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Gritty, leathery aromas register as less than fully ripe. In the mouth, ...
description: Gritty, leathery aromas register as less than fully ripe. In the mouth, this Cabernet is a touch biting. Limited cherry and plum flavors come with burnt, herbal notes, while an earthy finish tastes of salt and chocolate.

title: Falcor 2007 H Block Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Reminiscent of a Peppermint Patty or Thin Mint cookie, this is a ...
description: Reminiscent of a Peppermint Patty or Thin Mint cookie, this is a soft, smooth and somewhat nondescript wine, given ample time in bottle before review. Easy to drink, the tannins are mellowed and the oak subtle.

title: Chateau Rollat 2011 Rollat Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: The fig, licorice and spice aromas seem somewhat dried out and tired. ...
description: The fig, licorice and spice aromas seem somewhat dried out and tired. The cherry and cranberry flavors are smooth, with the tannins showing some grit. Drink now.

title: Chilcas 2013 Single Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Concentrated aromas of licorice, mocha and generic black fruits are low on ...
description: Concentrated aromas of licorice, mocha and generic black fruits are low on elegance. This is grabby and strong, with herbal plum and cassis flavors that finish chunkily and deep, with good texture. Expect a saucy, herbal aftertaste.

title: Gamache 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: From a cool vintage, this wine shows aromas of bell pepper, fresh ...
description: From a cool vintage, this wine shows aromas of bell pepper, fresh and dried herbs, and raspberries. The fruit and savory flavors are light and tart, with cranberry-like acidity and a tight core of tannins that needs time to unwind.

title: Muscardini 2011 BWise Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Black licorice and dark chocolate provide a sultry backdrop to this smoky, ...
description: Black licorice and dark chocolate provide a sultry backdrop to this smoky, herbal vineyard-designated wine. Medium bodied, it offers a taste of blackberry liqueur, while an accent of coffee defines the finish.

title: Liberated 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
excerpt: This Cabernet comes in three different labels, displaying the archetypes of the ...
description: This Cabernet comes in three different labels, displaying the archetypes of the explorer, the business man and the adventurer. In taste, the wine is smoky and soft, with plum, cassis and dark cherry all making a play.

title: Albamar 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
excerpt: Earthy, scratchy, herbal aromas of cassis and raspberry lead to a punchy, ...
description: Earthy, scratchy, herbal aromas of cassis and raspberry lead to a punchy, wiry palate. Generic cherry and berry flavors are herbal and lightly green, while this is grabby and tannic on the finish.

title: Tucannon 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas are light but show oxygen exposure along with barrel spice. The ...
