description: Aromas are light but show oxygen exposure along with barrel spice. The cherry and herb flavors are simultaneously plump and elegant.

title: Jason-Stephens 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
excerpt: A bit shy on the nose, this eventually shows red currants and ...
description: A bit shy on the nose, this eventually shows red currants and sour plum-skin aromas. The palate is also reluctant at first, with purple fruit and black-pepper flavors.

title: La Merika 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
excerpt: Grapeseed, cola, concentrated plum, graphite and a touch of tar funk show ...
description: Grapeseed, cola, concentrated plum, graphite and a touch of tar funk show on the nose of this bottling. There is a tangy raspberry-plum fruit character on the palate, with shaved pencil elements and decently grippy tannins.

title: Luis Felipe Edwards 2013 Riscos de Puquillay Alto Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: With a mix of graham cracker, coffee, herb and jammy, unfocused berry ...
description: With a mix of graham cracker, coffee, herb and jammy, unfocused berry aromas, this lacks cohesion on the nose. A fat, wide palate offers no point of focus, while herbal flavors of cassis and olive finish with green notes of tobacco and oregano.

title: Siegel 2013 Special Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Chunky, meaty, saucy plum and berry aromas are green and gritty. This ...
description: Chunky, meaty, saucy plum and berry aromas are green and gritty. This is solid feeling on first blush, but then it collapses and turns clampy and tannic. Minimal berry and cassis flavors battle with herbal, green notes in front of a chubby, imprecise finish.

title: Kon Tiki 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
excerpt: Herbal cherry and cassis aromas feature a note of tobacco. This comes ...
description: Herbal cherry and cassis aromas feature a note of tobacco. This comes across short on stuffing and structure, while generic berry flavors are bolstered by high acidity that creates tartness. A wiry finish is raw in feel.

title: Santa Ema 2014 Select Terroir Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Cherry and cassis aromas are generic. This feels raw and choppy, with ...
description: Cherry and cassis aromas are generic. This feels raw and choppy, with sharp tartartic acidity. Limited, herbal flavors of mint and red fruits end in abrasive style.

title: Foyt Family 2011 No 77 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
excerpt: A fair amount of herbaceousness shows on the nose and palate, a ...
description: A fair amount of herbaceousness shows on the nose and palate, a dry combustion of tannin, gunpowder and green herb. Full bodied, it has chalky tannins that desiccate on the finish.

title: In Re 2011 You be the judge! Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is a challenging mix of substantially puckering tannins and herbaceous notes, ...
description: This is a challenging mix of substantially puckering tannins and herbaceous notes, dotted in black peppercorns. The fruit is elusive.

title: Eaglewood 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: This is a dull, tannic and robustly full bodied wine, brooding in ...
description: This is a dull, tannic and robustly full bodied wine, brooding in tobacco and tea without much in the way of fruit or acidity.

title: V. Sattui 2011 Morisoli Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Preponderant green, herbal aroma and flavor marks this wine. The mix of ...
description: Preponderant green, herbal aroma and flavor marks this wine. The mix of pencil lead and a smoky char never really make friends.

title: Bellacana 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Green olive and a weedy back note make for a green, herbal ...
description: Green olive and a weedy back note make for a green, herbal expression of the variety here. None of this is helped by the oppressive tannin structure all around the palate, a power that dissolves quickly on the finish.

title: Cucao 2013 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Aromas of sandalwood and Middle Eastern spices feed into a creamy palate ...
description: Aromas of sandalwood and Middle Eastern spices feed into a creamy palate with little to no acidic cut. Flavors of caramel and milk chocolate rest on one side of a flavor void, while herbal, green notes reside on the other side, while the finish is resiny and lactic.

title: Experience 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Perfumed in cassis and chocolate, this wine starts out with soft layers ...
description: Perfumed in cassis and chocolate, this wine starts out with soft layers of fruit, but lacks structure and definition, making for a simple, lighthearted quaff.

title: Delectus 2012 French Wedding Cabernet Sauvignon (Knights Valley)
excerpt: This bitter wine is high-octane in puckering tannin and very ripe fruit. ...
description: This bitter wine is high-octane in puckering tannin and very ripe fruit. The finish leans towards a taste of pencil shavings and tobacco.

title: Kirkland Signature 2013 Signature Series Mountain Cuvee Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This wine has artificial, plastic-like aromas that mar its opening and make ...
description: This wine has artificial, plastic-like aromas that mar its opening and make it barely acceptable to drink.

title: Leto 2012 The Hidden One Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
excerpt: From a single vineyard source, this wine offers sinewy blackberry and black ...
description: From a single vineyard source, this wine offers sinewy blackberry and black currant, as well as a pleasant note of soy, across a fine-grained background and integrated use of French oak. Clove and black pepper star between the layers of fruit, finishing harmoniously.

title: Diamond Creek 2012 Fortieth Anniversary Red Rock Terrace Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
excerpt: Soft and smooth in crisp red fruit, this block-designation has a nutty ...
description: Soft and smooth in crisp red fruit, this block-designation has a nutty component around a thickness of tannin that suggests further aging. Medium bodied and graceful, it offers pronounced minerality and an almost dusty taste of rock itself. Cellar through 2022.

title: Davies 2012 Round Pond Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: Softly approachable and delicious, this 100% varietal wine from the middle of ...
description: Softly approachable and delicious, this 100% varietal wine from the middle of Rutherford is juicy in red plum and cherry, with a trace of wild vanilla. Elegant tannin and integrated oak keep it fresh and vibrant in the glass, with just the tiniest amount of grip on the finish. Drink now through 2022.

title: Padis 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Made by Robert Foley, a sought-after winemaker in the Napa Valley, this ...
description: Made by Robert Foley, a sought-after winemaker in the Napa Valley, this older-vintage Cab evokes mocha-chocolate fudge bar in aroma and secondary flavors, accompanied by strong, full-bodied jolts of blackberry jam. Brooding, soft and lightly spicy in clove, it finishes with elusive hints of pencil and cedar.

title: William Hill Estate 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This impressive wine dances in hearty clove and cinnamon sparked by a ...
description: This impressive wine dances in hearty clove and cinnamon sparked by a floral bouquet of rose. High-toned, structured and elegant, it has subtle power and concentration but remains fresh in the glass. Drink now through 2020.

title: Psagot 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Judean Hills)
excerpt: This wine has a bouquet of raspberry, bell pepper, ground black pepper ...
description: This wine has a bouquet of raspberry, bell pepper, ground black pepper and a whiff of petrol. It fills the entire mouth with flavors of raspberry, cherry, rose petal, caramel, and flint. Offering a touch of salinity, to appeals to the entire palate, peaking with a grippy finish marked by smoke-tinged fruit flavors.

title: Lobo 2012 Wulff Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: From the Oak Knoll District and estate-grown fruit, this 100% varietal wine ...
description: From the Oak Knoll District and estate-grown fruit, this 100% varietal wine has a substantial amount of vanilla and cherry at its heart. Medium bodied, structured and soft, it retains fine-grained tannins that should mellow in the cellar, through 2022.

title: Parallel 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Dusty, silky tannins wrap themselves around dried herb, cedar and rich, dark ...
description: Dusty, silky tannins wrap themselves around dried herb, cedar and rich, dark chocolate in this powerhouse of a wine, dense and concentrated. Blackberry and currant peak on the lingering, cigar- and clove-tinged finish.

title: PreVail 2012 Back Forty Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Smoky cigar and toffee caramel hit the high notes in this soft, ...
description: Smoky cigar and toffee caramel hit the high notes in this soft, thick and rich reserve-level wine, sure to please fans of a full-bodied, generously layered style. Blackberry and blueberry jam provide the fruit to match the savory elements.

title: Louis M. Martini 2012 Lot No. 1 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Reduced and highly concentrated, this powerful wine is brooding in black peppercorn, ...
description: Reduced and highly concentrated, this powerful wine is brooding in black peppercorn, leather and a wealth of black color and black fruit. Chewy on the entry, it softens and integrates over time, getting better in the glass as it goes, a rich, rewarding mix of blackberry, clove and cigar.

title: Spring Mountain Vineyard 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This grippy Cab exhibits the power of the 10% Petit Verdot in ...
description: This grippy Cab exhibits the power of the 10% Petit Verdot in the blend, softened by 6% Merlot and 5% Cabernet Franc. Cassis and raspberry provide a fruity core around lush, tight tannins and a black pepper-seasoned finish. Full bodied, it remains elegant in the glass.

title: 1848 Winery 2012 Second Generation Cabernet Sauvignon (Judean Hills)
excerpt: Inky red violet in the glass, this wine features aromas of raspberry, ...
description: Inky red violet in the glass, this wine features aromas of raspberry, vanilla and violet. Ever-present tannins form a backdrop for flavors of blackberry, ripe summer cherry, vanilla and black pepper that are heightened by opulent floral notes. The finish offers a pleasing amalgam of rose petal and cherry pie.

title: Binyamina 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Upper Galilee)
excerpt: Dark red violet in color, this wine has aromas of cherry, lavender ...
description: Dark red violet in color, this wine has aromas of cherry, lavender and rose petal. It is a well-balanced wine with flavors of black cherry, raspberry, Turkish delight and herbes de Provence. Silky tannins coat the palate into the lasting finish, which is punctuated by a note of bright cherry.

title: Provenance Vineyards 2012 Barrel Select Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: A juiciness of cherry and vanilla spark the opening of this wine, ...
description: A juiciness of cherry and vanilla spark the opening of this wine, a celebration of the vintage, appellation and in this case, fruit-forwardness of the variety. With a backbone of oak and cedar, it has smooth tannins and medium weight, finishing in mocha chocolate. Drink now through 2022.

title: Raymond 2012 District Collection Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
excerpt: Sweetened tannins highlight a depth of chocolate and blackberry in this 100% ...
description: Sweetened tannins highlight a depth of chocolate and blackberry in this 100% varietal wine made in small amounts. Soft and juicy, it crafts a balance of richness and density around elegant spicy clove and cinnamon.

title: Eagle Glen 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: From a multiplicity of vineyards, this wine works and is a tremendous ...
description: From a multiplicity of vineyards, this wine works and is a tremendous value for the price. It mixes hot mulled-cider spices, cinnamon, clove and pine forest, conveying surprising depth. Plum, dark cherry and more clove lead to a powerful, leathery finish.

title: Bazelet HaGolan 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Golan Heights)
excerpt: Restrained aromas of black plum barely set the stage for flavors of ...
description: Restrained aromas of black plum barely set the stage for flavors of dark plum, cherry-vanilla, mint eucalyptus and ground black pepper. Fruit flavors are soft, but the minty notes never overpower brightness and acidity. Tannins are just shy of opulent, and the finish is marked by a note of tart apple crispness.

title: Michael Mondavi Family Estate 2012 Emblem Oso Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Bittersweet at first, with sizable tannins, this Cab also contains smaller amounts ...
description: Bittersweet at first, with sizable tannins, this Cab also contains smaller amounts of Syrah, Petite Sirah, Zinfandel, Petit Verdot and Merlot. Red and black berries give it a juicy palate atop dusty, chalky tannins and a richness of leather and clove on the finish.

title: Louis M. Martini 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Rich blackberry and chocolate form around chalky tannins and a juicy palate, ...
description: Rich blackberry and chocolate form around chalky tannins and a juicy palate, with a waft of cigar in the distance. Medium bodied, round and soft, the finish is brushed in cherry and pomegranate.

title: Segal's 2012 Special Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Galilee)
excerpt: This wine is dark red-violet color to the eye, offering aromas of ...
description: This wine is dark red-violet color to the eye, offering aromas of blackberry, roasted red pepper and juniper berry. It is very smooth on the palate, with flavors of black plum, blackberry, white peach, elderberry and violet. There is a slightly dominant eucalyptus flavor that backs off at the finish, replaced by a fresh cherry juice flavor.

title: Yatir 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Judean Hills)
excerpt: Dark black cherry in color, this wine offers a bouquet of cherry ...
description: Dark black cherry in color, this wine offers a bouquet of cherry preserves, matchstick and petrol. It is far livelier on the palate than on the nose, featuring flavors of cherry, pomegranate and bell pepper with a light touch of florality. Chewy tannins make their way across the gum and tongues and are all but erased by a final note of orange zest and cranberry.

title: Tabor 2013 Mt. Tabor Cabernet Sauvignon (Galilee)
excerpt: Dark garnet in the glass, this wine has a nose of strawberry, ...
description: Dark garnet in the glass, this wine has a nose of strawberry, black plum, caramel and smoked meat. It offers a good balance of acidity and tannins, with flavors of blackberry, blueberry, smoked meat, vanilla and mocha. The vanilla flavor is extended on the palate thanks to lingering silky tannins that eventually dissolve in a note of orange zest.

title: Carmel 2011 Kayoumi Single Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Galilee)
excerpt: A nose of wild blackberry and brambles lays the groundwork for a ...
description: A nose of wild blackberry and brambles lays the groundwork for a tender dance of fruit and herbal flavors, especially blackberry, pomegranate, eucalyptus and fennel bulb. Mouth-coating tannins dissipate on the finish, joined by a burst of tart pomegranate.

title: Azari 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: Cherry-berry and vanilla surround a soft, spicy core of high-toned red fruit. ...
description: Cherry-berry and vanilla surround a soft, spicy core of high-toned red fruit. Mellowed with age, the tannins linger in perceived sweetness.

title: Leto 2012 The Hidden One Exceptional Selection Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
excerpt: A minuscule amount of this wine is made, coming from 45-year-old vines. ...
description: A minuscule amount of this wine is made, coming from 45-year-old vines. Ripe, dense and dusty red and black berries combine against soft, approachable layers of integrated tannin and oak, finishing with leather and cigar.

title: Raymond 2012 Estate Collection Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Dark plum and milk chocolate are the stars of this chalky, soft ...
description: Dark plum and milk chocolate are the stars of this chalky, soft wine, almost entirely varietal, with a splash of Petit Verdot. Integrated oak helps make it approachable and fruit-forward, while the finish is subtle in fireplace smoke.

title: Gallo Estate 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Northern Sonoma)
excerpt: Sanguine in red plum, clove and dark chocolate, this bottle-aged, full-bodied wine ...
description: Sanguine in red plum, clove and dark chocolate, this bottle-aged, full-bodied wine is impressive and still quite ripe and robust. The tannins are prominent and supported by a girth of oak, with a dense, concentrated finish.

title: Laurel Glen 2013 Counterpoint Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Mountain)
excerpt: A blend of 85% Cabernet Sauvignon with 15% Merlot, this was built ...
description: A blend of 85% Cabernet Sauvignon with 15% Merlot, this was built to be approachable young. Grapes are sourced from an estate, organically farmed vineyard as well as two neighboring properties, Pickberry and Murray Ranch. Tobacco forms around a juiciness of blackberry and raspberry, giving it a sultry edge, while maintaing soft tannins throughout.

title: Mathew Bruno 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Sourced from the southeastern section of the Rutherford appellation and 100% varietal, ...
description: Sourced from the southeastern section of the Rutherford appellation and 100% varietal, this is a seamlessly made wine, luxurious in cherry pie and leather saddle. Tangy acidity meets the dusty tannins head-on, finishing with a burst of orange zest.

title: Shiloh Winery 2012 Secret Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Judean Hills)
excerpt: A red-violet color, this wine has a bouquet of blackberry, lilac and ...
description: A red-violet color, this wine has a bouquet of blackberry, lilac and pencil lead with a whiff of iodine. A network of velvety tannins and a vein of bold acidity are equally weighted, wrapped around flavors of blackberry, blueberry, black pepper, rose petal and Mediterranean herbs, with bright fruit persisting into the pleasing finish.

title: Or Haganuz 2011 Namura Single Vineyard Special Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Galilee)
excerpt: This wine has a bouquet of cassis, violet and black pepper. Well-integrated ...
description: This wine has a bouquet of cassis, violet and black pepper. Well-integrated flavors of cassis, strawberry preserves, anise, fennel bulb and lavender are set amid silky tannins that feel as if they may go on forever but are surpassed at the finish when fruit flavors pull out all the stops.

title: Raymond 2012 Reserve Selection Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Succulent in red cherry and cassis, this wine has a surprising level ...
description: Succulent in red cherry and cassis, this wine has a surprising level of depth and grip. It finds its way with integrated tannins, soft layers of caramelized oak and a brightness of fruit and acidity.

title: Forefathers 2012 Lone Tree Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Winemaker Nick Goldschmidt does wonders with this consistent vineyard source, coaxing out ...
description: Winemaker Nick Goldschmidt does wonders with this consistent vineyard source, coaxing out mocha-chocolate, black cherry and blackberry, never overpowering an earthy back note of tobacco. Medium-bodied and soft, it finishes in a swirl of smoke and is juicy and enjoyable now.

title: Flam 2011 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Galilee)
excerpt: Aromas of black currant, orange zest and lemon thyme set the scene ...
description: Aromas of black currant, orange zest and lemon thyme set the scene for a three-way balancing act of fruit, savory and cool flavors. On the palate, notes of black cherry, lingonberry, eucalyptus, mint and thyme stand out, and gentle tannins ride on through a cherry and mint finish.

title: Salvestrin 2012 Salvestrin Estate Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
excerpt: Mouthcoating, this is a full-bodied wine with small amounts of Merlot and ...
description: Mouthcoating, this is a full-bodied wine with small amounts of Merlot and Cabernet Franc. Tar, leather, cedar and black cherry stand out as characteristics, with added weight from the heavier, darker elements of chocolate and oak. Drink now through 2022.

title: Barkan 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Galil)
excerpt: This wine offers a tight nose of cherry cola and petrol. It ...
description: This wine offers a tight nose of cherry cola and petrol. It opens on the palate by featuring flavors of smoked meat, eucalyptus, cherry, and ripe peach. Lush tannins contribute a fatty umami sensation to the palate.

title: Barkan 2013 Classic Cabernet Sauvignon (Galil)
excerpt: Aromas of black cherry, smoked meat and thyme prepare the taste buds ...
description: Aromas of black cherry, smoked meat and thyme prepare the taste buds for flavors of black cherry, smoked meat, oregano, and lemon zest with notes of dark chocolate. Soft yet persistent tannins coat the palate, culminating in a delightfully bright finish.

title: Psagot 2012 M-Series Cabernet Sauvignon (Jerusalem Hills)
excerpt: Aromas of black cherry and a hint of height-of-summer farmstead prep the ...
description: Aromas of black cherry and a hint of height-of-summer farmstead prep the palate for flavors of blackberry, black cherry, roasted meat, sage, and bell pepper. There is a nice combination of fruit and savory flavors, and the persistent finish offers lingering notes of fruits of the wood and roasted meat. Mevushal.

title: The Winery SF 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (North Coast)
excerpt: This is a classic style of Cabernet that should improve with age. ...
description: This is a classic style of Cabernet that should improve with age. It smells like pencil shavings, tobacco and cedar, and tastes like dark chocolate and black cherry, while feeling very firm on the palate. It has fine-grained tannins, and a lingering dark chocolate and cherry finish. It will be best after 2018.

title: Alta Vista 2013 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Crisp minerally aromas of cherry and blackberry come with toasty spicy accents. ...
description: Crisp minerally aromas of cherry and blackberry come with toasty spicy accents. This is a tightly built full-bodied Cab with lightly herbal, moderately oaky and saucy flavors of berry and plum. A dry, spicy finish provides for a strong ending.

title: Lake and Vine Cellars 2012 Single Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Hills Lake County)
excerpt: This densely flavored and full-bodied wine has a very deep, dark color ...
description: This densely flavored and full-bodied wine has a very deep, dark color and aromas that suggest oak barrels, nutmeg and cardamom. The palate shows tension between firm tannins and acidity, and carries ripe blackberries, with spicy accents. Drink now through 2020.

title: Barkan 2011 Superieur Cabernet Sauvignon (Galilee)
excerpt: Dark garnet in the glass, this wine features aromas of black cherry, ...
description: Dark garnet in the glass, this wine features aromas of black cherry, candle wax and freshly picked oregano. Soft tannins offer a foundation for flavors of cherry, cassis, mint, espresso bean and Mediterranean herbs. Fruit and savory notes continually make way for one another on the palate, concluding in an herbal and lemon zest finish.

title: Pascual Toso 2013 Reserva Barrancas Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Crisp stony lightly herbal plum aromas are moderately smoky. This feels flush ...
description: Crisp stony lightly herbal plum aromas are moderately smoky. This feels flush and pleasant, with a full body and flavors of plum, cassis and tomato sauce. A controlled composed finish benefits from lasting acidity.

title: Bodega Catena Zapata 2013 Catena Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Floral berry and plum aromas are touched up by notes of thyme ...
description: Floral berry and plum aromas are touched up by notes of thyme and cardamom. Fresh grippy acidity keeps this lively, while flavors of berry and plum are spicy and suggestive of tomato sauce. Saucy, herbal flavors rise up on a high-acid finish.

title: Midnight 2012 Nebula Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Black cherry, blueberry jam, volcanic rocks, river stones and a mace spice ...
description: Black cherry, blueberry jam, volcanic rocks, river stones and a mace spice show on the nose of this wine. The palate is thick with black fruit and dark chocolate, the tannins showing lots of structure and flavors of purple flowers giving depth. It needs more time in the bottle to reach full potential.

title: Quinta do Arrobe 2012 Quinto Elemento Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Tejo)
excerpt: This is a big ripe wine full of juicy sweet plum flavors ...
description: This is a big ripe wine full of juicy sweet plum flavors and dark dense tannins. It is still young with a bitter edge from the toasty wood aging. The wine, with its structure and firm texture, will need more time so drink from 2017.

title: Valentin Bianchi 2012 Famiglia Bianchi Cabernet Sauvignon (San Rafael)
excerpt: Currant and spice aromas are subdued and solid. A strapping tight palate ...
description: Currant and spice aromas are subdued and solid. A strapping tight palate with strong tannins delivers roasted plum, cassis, spice and chocolate flavors prior to a dry spicy finish that holds its own.

title: Benegas 2011 Luna Benegas Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Solid dark-berry aromas are dense and deep. This has a plump forward ...
description: Solid dark-berry aromas are dense and deep. This has a plump forward fruity palate with concentrated, toasty flavors of blackberry and dark plum. On the finish, this remains fruity and compact, with more than enough body weight.

title: Lobo 2012 Wulff Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Atlas Peak)
excerpt: From 100% estate-grown fruit, this 100% varietal wine is dusty and dark ...
description: From 100% estate-grown fruit, this 100% varietal wine is dusty and dark with elements of pencil shavings, cedar and cassis. With that herbal and earthy intensity giving it defined character, it remains medium bodied and textured on the palate, with a saltiness to the finish.

title: Moniker 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendocino)
excerpt: Lots of dark-fruit aromas and fresh cherry-berry flavors keep this medium-bodied wine ...
description: Lots of dark-fruit aromas and fresh cherry-berry flavors keep this medium-bodied wine lively and easy to enjoy. Light spicy, nutty flavors and a touch of milk chocolate add interest, while the texture is smooth.

title: Mascota 2012 Gran Mascota Cabernet Sauvignon (Uco Valley)
excerpt: Inky aromas of blueberry and boysenberry are a bit collapsed and reduced. ...
description: Inky aromas of blueberry and boysenberry are a bit collapsed and reduced. Tannic and grabby in the mouth, this tastes of leathery plum and salt. And that saltiness carries onto the finish, which tastes briny and shows tannic grip.

title: Luigi Bosca 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Crisp almost scratchy aromas of herbal red fruits are a bit strained. ...
description: Crisp almost scratchy aromas of herbal red fruits are a bit strained. This feels solid, with ample volume. Earthy flavors of tomato sauce, mixed spices, stewed plum and cassis finish long and herbal, with some grace.

title: Rotta 2013 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: The fruit elements of black currant and black plum are cut by ...
description: The fruit elements of black currant and black plum are cut by rotting roses, wet earth and other dank aromas on this bottling. There is a chalky grip right away on the sip, with the flavors holding to a rocky core. The structure is quite dense and wound up right now, so the wine needs some time to open up.

title: Barkan 2009 Altitude 412 Cabernet Sauvignon (Galil)
excerpt: Faded black cherry in the glass, this wine offers an aroma of ...
description: Faded black cherry in the glass, this wine offers an aroma of pomegranate and brambles. Flavors of tart cranberry, green pepper and eucalyptus are pleasant enough, but this wine is a bit past its prime.

title: Zuccardi 2012 Q Cabernet Sauvignon (Valle de Uco)
excerpt: A direct blast of reedy cherry and cassis aromas leads to rough-charging ...
description: A direct blast of reedy cherry and cassis aromas leads to rough-charging clampy palate with high acidity and hard tannins. This tastes of rooty plum supported by bold acidity, while spice, tomato and a dusting of brown sugar are the closing flavors.

title: Decoy 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Made from a majority of Alexander Valley fruit, this is a smoky, ...
description: Made from a majority of Alexander Valley fruit, this is a smoky, chocolaty red wine, ripe in blackberry and an accent of clove. Rich, it remains fresh on the palate, with soft, supple tannins and an easygoing, lingering finish.

title: City Winery of New York 2010 Bettinelli Vineyard Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Yountville)
excerpt: Truffled earth, sage and cedar rise from thick, harsh tannins that are ...
description: Truffled earth, sage and cedar rise from thick, harsh tannins that are still tightly wound and domineering. From a single vineyard site and aged in bottle for a few years, it features a density to the blackberry fruit that plays nicely with the vanilla oak.

title: Zuccardi 2013 Serie A Cabernet Sauvignon (Valle de Uco)
excerpt: Wiry plum and raspberry aromas are jumpy and a touch candied. This ...
description: Wiry plum and raspberry aromas are jumpy and a touch candied. This feels bulky and grapy, with an obtuse body. Salty lightly herbal plum and berry flavors end with a touch of heat along with herbal leftovers.

title: Old Soul 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: Aromas of charcoal and flavors of barbecue sauce make it pretty clear ...
description: Aromas of charcoal and flavors of barbecue sauce make it pretty clear what to eat when drinking this bold, spicy and assertive wine. Moderate tannins give just enough texture to support this medium-bodied wine.

title: Tomero 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Roasted berry aromas are stalky at first but come around. This feels ...
description: Roasted berry aromas are stalky at first but come around. This feels round but only marginally structured. Creamy ripe generic flavors of berry and cherry finish solid with some heat.

title: J. Rickards 2012 Serpentine Ridge Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: This wine has a texture of softness and juiciness, with a leathery ...
description: This wine has a texture of softness and juiciness, with a leathery background. Tannic and rich in blackberry and powerful oak, it finishes lean.

title: Montevina 2013 Independence Point Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Gobs of ripe fruit flavor and a smooth texture make this medium-bodied ...
description: Gobs of ripe fruit flavor and a smooth texture make this medium-bodied wine delicious and appealing. It smells like molasses and boysenberries, tastes jammy, and has no harsh tannins.

title: Titora 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Judean Hills)
excerpt: The color of slightly faded garnet, this wine has a bouquet of ...
description: The color of slightly faded garnet, this wine has a bouquet of cassis and green pepper. Chalky tannins create a backdrop for flavors of tart cherry, lingonberry, bell pepper and petrol that make promises to the taste buds but fall short of delivering.

title: Angel's Cup 2013 Vineyard Selection Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: This wine has a slightly lighter color than usual, aromas that resemble ...
description: This wine has a slightly lighter color than usual, aromas that resemble black plums and red cherries, and similar flavors. It is medium bodied, moderately tannic in texture and a good choice for a large crowd.

title: Argento 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Saucy plum and wet-dog aromas improve ever so slightly with airing. This ...
description: Saucy plum and wet-dog aromas improve ever so slightly with airing. This feels creamy and sticky, while basic flavors of cherry and plum finish with herbal hints and sweet notes of vanilla and cream.

title: Domaine Le Billoud 2011 Barrica 29 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Herbal raspberry and strawberry aromas are raw and a bit green. This ...
description: Herbal raspberry and strawberry aromas are raw and a bit green. This feels scratchy as well, with tomatoey flavors of red currant and plum skins. A modest finish is racy in feel but mild in flavor.

title: Sivas-Sonoma 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Smoky with a heavy dose of char, this wine is a mostly ...
description: Smoky with a heavy dose of char, this wine is a mostly Cabernet Sauvignon, with smaller drops of Petit Verdot, Syrah, Petite Sirah and Merlot. Perfumed in black olive and black currant, it offers soft layers of blackberry and leather ringed in vanilla.

title: Lawer 2012 Hooker Old Boys Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: With a dusty core of black plum, cassis and clove, this is ...
description: With a dusty core of black plum, cassis and clove, this is a straightforward, softly approachable wine made to be enjoyed now. Medium bodied, it enters into a realm of creamy vanilla on the finish.

title: Kirkland Signature 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
excerpt: Chalky tannins make for a mouthcoating entry into this powerfully rich, dense ...
description: Chalky tannins make for a mouthcoating entry into this powerfully rich, dense and concentrated wine from the well-known region. All is surrounded by a trove of ripe blackberry fruit, clove and bittersweet chocolate.

title: Ricordi 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Closed aromas of red fruits, wet cement and green herbs precede a ...
description: Closed aromas of red fruits, wet cement and green herbs precede a flat fairly tannic palate. Grinding cherry and plum flavors finish with hard tannins and midland rubbery red-fruit flavors.

title: Del Rio 2013 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Rogue Valley)
excerpt: Tannic and earthy, this is dominated by the scents and flavors of ...
description: Tannic and earthy, this is dominated by the scents and flavors of dried mushrooms. There are hints of fruit leather, and not much else.

title: The Rule 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Small amounts of other grapes figure into this majority-Cabernet Sauvignon, including Merlot, ...
description: Small amounts of other grapes figure into this majority-Cabernet Sauvignon, including Merlot, Zinfandel and Petite Sirah. It begins with a reduced sensibility that translates into an undeniable aroma and taste of barrel and petrol.

title: Chimney Rock 2012 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
excerpt: Chewy tannins surround an elegant, structured wine, classic in red cassis, licorice ...
description: Chewy tannins surround an elegant, structured wine, classic in red cassis, licorice and woody herbs. Powerful, it retains balance from start to finish, exuding the warmth of the vintage with the relative coolness of the appellation, marrying the two sides expertly together.

title: Hewitt 2012 Double Plus Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: A small-production, estate-grown wine, it conveys a richness of berry cobbler, supported ...
description: A small-production, estate-grown wine, it conveys a richness of berry cobbler, supported by a tension of deep, dark chocolate. Tobacco and tea add to the complexity and leather-bound-chair feel of things, with structured, large-sized tannins adding strength before the finish lands softly.

title: D.R. Stephens 2012 Moose Valley Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
excerpt: This wine is sanguine and elegant despite its full-figured size. Dried cranberry ...
description: This wine is sanguine and elegant despite its full-figured size. Dried cranberry and cassis play on the palate, streaked by an elusive hit of white pepper. Bright and dancing in minerality, it finishes velvety and smooth, just the right amount of toasted oak showing through.

title: Sequoia Grove 2011 Tonella Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: From an estate vineyard located in the heart of Rutherford that was ...
description: From an estate vineyard located in the heart of Rutherford that was purchased by the producer in 2006, this vineyard-designate is the star of the show, a blend of mostly Cabernet Sauvignon with 9% Cabernet Franc. Thick, dense and robust in tannin and oak, it offers structured red and black fruit, dried herb, pencil lead, cedar and cigar, combining ripeness with cooler-climate characteristics. It should cellar well through 2021.

title: Sequum 2012 Four Soil Melange Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Pungent earth opens this wine, the small-production label of Napa Valley geologist ...
description: Pungent earth opens this wine, the small-production label of Napa Valley geologist and worldwide soils expert Dr. Paul Skinner, who has named it appropriately to mark its literal roots. A strip of red berry and vanilla highlight the palate of this overall bright and balanced wine.

title: Goldschmidt 2011 Plus Game Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: This is a delightfully dense, yet herbal and well-structured wine, 100% varietal, ...
description: This is a delightfully dense, yet herbal and well-structured wine, 100% varietal, with still-chewy tannins that integrate in the glass. Cassis and tea highlight the experience. The wine is sourced from a prime spot in the heart of the Napa Valley known for both its exuberance of fruit and classic elegance.

title: Pride Mountain 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa County-Sonoma County)
excerpt: Thick chocolate and tar exude on the nose before a palate of ...
description: Thick chocolate and tar exude on the nose before a palate of tar, leather and tobacco adds to the robust mix. Dry tannins aim and deliver on the lengthy finish after a medium-bodied impact of black tea, blueberry and black pepper.

title: Jamieson Ranch 2013 Double Lariat Limited Production Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A crisp bouquet of orange zest marks the opening of this wine, ...
description: A crisp bouquet of orange zest marks the opening of this wine, an unexpected twist to the narrative of dried cranberry, blackberry and cloves. On the palate, this full-bodied wine offers ample weight and richness, before a wealth of dry tannins feature on the finish.

title: Michael-Scott 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Fine-grained tannins cradle juicy blackberry and blueberry around a complex character of ...
description: Fine-grained tannins cradle juicy blackberry and blueberry around a complex character of graphite and smoke. Full bodied, the wine is nicely balanced, with acidity behind the strength, finishing with length and grace.

title: Errazuriz 2013 Max Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Aconcagua Valley)
excerpt: This is a powerful Cabernet comprised of all the key players. The ...
description: This is a powerful Cabernet comprised of all the key players. The nose is oaky, with coconut and vanilla aromas alongside fast and furious spiced berry scents. A meter-pushing palate tastes of spiced cherry, blackberry, herbs and chocolate, while the finish simmers with coffee and mocha notes. Drink through 2020.

title: Arboleda 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Aconcagua Valley)
excerpt: Briar spice, olive and asphalt aromas create a firm bouquet of black ...
description: Briar spice, olive and asphalt aromas create a firm bouquet of black plum and blackberry at the core. This feels lively and serious, with black olive, herb, licorice, chocolate and dark-berry flavors. Herbal notes, blackened toast and mocha flavors on the finish are typical for Chile. Drink through 2019.

title: Herencia 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: From the eastern-reaching Chiles Valley appellation, the vines planted in 1975, this ...
description: From the eastern-reaching Chiles Valley appellation, the vines planted in 1975, this is a soft, juicy and well-made wine, blended with 3% Merlot. Red and black berry star, complemented by a treasure trove of clove. Grippy on the finish, it should cellar well, a robust, full-bodied wine that finishes with a taste of coffee.

title: San Simeon 2011 Estate Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Dried red cherries, woody elderberry, dried oregano and smoked brisket aromas show ...
description: Dried red cherries, woody elderberry, dried oregano and smoked brisket aromas show on the nose of this wine by the Riboli family. The palate offers lavender and other purple-flower extracts along with plums, black cherries and lots of tobacco and cigar box complexity.

title: Manu Propria 2012 Ex Animo Red Willow Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: The aromas of fresh tobacco, bittersweet chocolate, thyme, dried flowers and dark ...
description: The aromas of fresh tobacco, bittersweet chocolate, thyme, dried flowers and dark fruit are brooding and distinctive. Black-fruit flavors come tightly wrapped in firm tannins. This wine needs time in the cellar to strut its stuff. It will be best after 2020.

title: Galerie 2012 Pleinair Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Concentrated in raspberry liqueur and balsamic tanginess, this is a juicy, soft ...
description: Concentrated in raspberry liqueur and balsamic tanginess, this is a juicy, soft and smooth wine, with plenty of structure and complexity. Blackberry coats the palate along with a savory tip of tobacco and black tea, components that linger on the finish.

title: Stag's Leap Wine Cellars 2012 S.L.V. Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This estate-grown wine honors the historical vineyard that brought the Napa Valley ...
description: This estate-grown wine honors the historical vineyard that brought the Napa Valley worldwide attention for Cabernet. It offers both complexity and elegance, as well as an herbal underbrush accented by tobacco. Chocolate, caramel and coffee add to the intrigue around smooth, velvety tannins.

title: William Hill Estate 2012 Bench Blend Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Rich and ripe, this has a plushness of red currant and cassis ...
description: Rich and ripe, this has a plushness of red currant and cassis counterbalanced by blackberry on the underbelly. A well-hewn texture leans leathery, with seasonings of black pepper giving it a piquant and lengthy finish.

title: Hess Collection 2013 Shirtail Ranches Cabernet Sauvignon (Lake County)
excerpt: Good ripeness and a sophisticated, complex character make this full-bodied wine interesting ...
description: Good ripeness and a sophisticated, complex character make this full-bodied wine interesting to drink. It has classic characteristics like bell pepper and black olive aromas, along with classy blackcurrant and light spicy, oaky notes. Drink now through 2020. (Available exclusively at restaurants.)

title: Cobblestone 2012 Cobblestone Vineyard Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Atlas Peak)
excerpt: Lengthy in soft tannins, clove and cinnamon, this wine has a handful ...
description: Lengthy in soft tannins, clove and cinnamon, this wine has a handful of Petit Verdot. An herbal underbrush hints at an elegant backbone, despite the huge force of power and weight. It finishes in a flourish of lavender and black licorice.

title: The Calling 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Nicely layered, this offers an intensity of black plum and chocolate around ...
description: Nicely layered, this offers an intensity of black plum and chocolate around a soft core of approachable, rounded tannins. Medium bodied, it has a mix of elegance and decadence that makes it drinkable now and impressive from start to finish.

title: Finn Hill 2012 Le Beau Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: All varietal coming from Hedges Estate Vineyard, this all-new French-oak-aged wine opens ...
description: All varietal coming from Hedges Estate Vineyard, this all-new French-oak-aged wine opens with aromas of toast, spicebox, espresso and cherry. The palate is tightly wound with dark fruit flavors and abundant oak accents throughout that linger on the finish. The wood (all new French) needs time to integrate but there is much to enjoy.

title: Market Vineyards 2011 Acquisition Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: High-toned baking spice, flower and herb aromas are backed by broad yet ...
description: High-toned baking spice, flower and herb aromas are backed by broad yet well-balanced dark-fruit flavors. The tannins are present but are polished to a fine sheen.

title: Signorello 2012 Estate Grown and Bottled Unfiltered Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This powerful wine that also holds 5% Cabernet Franc shyly packs a ...
description: This powerful wine that also holds 5% Cabernet Franc shyly packs a punch. At first it comes off as elegant, soft and highly approachable. Faint notions of blackberry and black cherry are highlighted amidst a concentrated, tannic build.

title: Sterling 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
excerpt: This wine is velvety-smooth and full bodied in cedar, black licorice and ...
description: This wine is velvety-smooth and full bodied in cedar, black licorice and blackberry jam, and is an approachable wine given its mountain beginnings. Compact and concentrated, it ends with length and plenty of toasted oak.

title: Alto Los Romeros 2013 Gran Reserva Triumpheros Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Courtesy of solid black cherry, cassis and herbal aromas, this comes across ...
description: Courtesy of solid black cherry, cassis and herbal aromas, this comes across as being well rounded. A dense palate is offset by lively acidity, while flavors of cassis, toast, herbs and spice end in a peppery swirl of drawing tannins blended with plush fruit notes. Drink through 2019.

title: Lampyridae 2012 Communication Block Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
excerpt: This 100% varietal wine is instantly compelling, ripe and juicy in all ...
description: This 100% varietal wine is instantly compelling, ripe and juicy in all the right ways, a mix of black and red fruit with an herbal underbelly and hits of peppercorn. Chalky tannins and a dry finish complete the picture, while the high amount of alcohol distracts. Drink now and beware its potency.

title: Raymond 2012 Generations Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A blend of 97% Cabernet Sauvignon and 8% Petit Verdot, this wine ...
description: A blend of 97% Cabernet Sauvignon and 8% Petit Verdot, this wine speaks to power, offering juicy, velvety texture around brawny components of leather, coffee and black plum. Concentrated and intense, it needs time to open in the glass before pairing with thick cuts of meat.

title: Sterling 2012 Platinum Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Thick like a chocolaty malt, this full-bodied, robust wine is big and ...
description: Thick like a chocolaty malt, this full-bodied, robust wine is big and rich, concentrated and layered in tobacco and jam. Despite its size, it is drinkable now, with well-integrated tannins and a complete finish.

title: Caliterra 2013 Tributo Single Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Briary, herbal berry aromas are dry, earthy, foresty and show a note ...
description: Briary, herbal berry aromas are dry, earthy, foresty and show a note of olive. This Cab is full of life on the palate, with energy and good overall balance. Spicy flavors of baked plum, olive, herbs and tobacco finish long, with amplified oak. Drink now through 2018.

title: Jason-Stephens 2007 Monte Bello Road Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: This intriguing wine shows the depth and staying power of this historic ...
description: This intriguing wine shows the depth and staying power of this historic region. Aromas of grape seed, pressed boysenberry, chaparral scrub and woody fruits show on the nose, while the palate offers a leaner Concord grape flavor and a rocky, peppery grip. It is still quite tannic despite its age, meaning it may last for years to come.

title: JCB 2012 No. 10 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is a massively dense, extracted and dry wine, entirely varietal and ...
description: This is a massively dense, extracted and dry wine, entirely varietal and brooding in style. Tobacco and leather form its core, with the fruit elusive and pushed backward. Smoky oak penetrates the thick walls of tannin, forming a combustible, lengthy finish.

title: Hewitt 2012 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: This is a smooth, dark and rich wine, made from the heart ...
description: This is a smooth, dark and rich wine, made from the heart of the appellation in an agreeable year. Balanced, it offers blackberry, cassis and a touch of silky texture, finishing with elegance.

title: Mossback 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Chalk Hill)
excerpt: This wine offers some remarkable value for the quality, from a good ...
description: This wine offers some remarkable value for the quality, from a good appellation to boot. Plum and cassis form around smoothly layered tannins and subtle oak, finishing in a seductive wave of black pepper and graphite.

title: August Briggs 2012 Monte Rosso Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: A ripe, soft and well-integrated package of mountain fruit stars in this ...
description: A ripe, soft and well-integrated package of mountain fruit stars in this vineyard-designate, from a site high atop the Mayacamas Mountains that is famous for Zin. Spicy cinnamon spins itself through husky layers of black fruit and leather.

title: Black Stallion 2011 Limited Release Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Sanguine in cranberry, red plum and dark cherry, this wine offers sizable ...
description: Sanguine in cranberry, red plum and dark cherry, this wine offers sizable tannin and oak around more savory elements of tobacco and black tea, an introduction of soy on the full-bodied finish.

title: Black Stallion 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Attractively priced, this is a concentrated wine, offering bright, soft layers of ...
description: Attractively priced, this is a concentrated wine, offering bright, soft layers of dark cherry and cassis, with a slight taste of dark chocolate. Providing everything one needs in a big red wine, it ends powerfully in dusty tannins.

title: College Cellars 2013 Summit View Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: Cocoa, herb, cranberry and cherry aromas lead to plush-feeling coffee and black-fruit ...
description: Cocoa, herb, cranberry and cherry aromas lead to plush-feeling coffee and black-fruit flavors that carry through the finish. It brings a whole lot of enjoyment and appeal.

title: Columbia Crest 2013 H3 Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: The oak (40% new French and American) is up front, with aromas ...
description: The oak (40% new French and American) is up front, with aromas of barrel spices, cocoa and generous amounts of vanilla followed by cherries and blue fruit. This wine is velvety in feel, displaying a mixture of fruit and barrel that carries through the finish. The oak influence is heavy but the appeal is impossible to ignore.

title: Santa Carolina 2013 Reserva de Familia Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Herbal berry, cassis and mint aromas open this classic Maipo Cabernet. Racy ...
description: Herbal berry, cassis and mint aromas open this classic Maipo Cabernet. Racy acidity and firm tannins make for a structured mouthfeel, while plum, currant, spice and light herbal notes finish loamy. Drink now.

title: Tin Barn 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: A musky, herbal element rises on the nose of this wine, a ...
description: A musky, herbal element rises on the nose of this wine, a majority varietal, with small additions of Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot. Dry and structured, it features soft waves of savory tobacco and tea leaf around crisp cherry and clove.

title: Hess Select 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (North Coast)
excerpt: This wine has a dark red color, bold, smoky, tobacco-like aromas, full ...
description: This wine has a dark red color, bold, smoky, tobacco-like aromas, full body, generous blackberry and dark plum flavors, firm tannins and a dry impression overall. It seems to improve and show more depth with each sip. Drink now through 2018.

title: Santa Rita 2010 Medalla Real Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Dark, smoky aromas of freshly laid pavement come with leathery berry scents ...
description: Dark, smoky aromas of freshly laid pavement come with leathery berry scents along with wood and eucalyptus notes. Bright to the point of being aggressive on the palate, this shows spicy, peppery flavors of red-berry fruits and oak. A woody, resiny finish is potent like the rest of this Cabernet. Drink through 2020.

title: Lachini 2012 La Bestia Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: Notes of dried cranberry, cherry, licorice and medicine cabinet predominate, with the ...
description: Notes of dried cranberry, cherry, licorice and medicine cabinet predominate, with the aromas seeming somewhat advanced. The flavors are full bodied and high-octane, with the tannins needing time to stretch their legs.

title: Lagar de Bezana 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Cachapoal Valley)
excerpt: A wide-based nose blends saucy, spicy notes with louder, riper aromas of ...
description: A wide-based nose blends saucy, spicy notes with louder, riper aromas of blackberry and black currant. The palate feels jammy, chunky, rubbery and tannic, while blackberry flavors are earthy, spicy and herbal prior to finishing minty, charred and tannic. Drink through 2020.

title: Victor Vineyards 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: This deeply colored and solidly built wine smells like black olives, dried ...
description: This deeply colored and solidly built wine smells like black olives, dried plums and cedar, while tasting concentrated and ripe, with a polished texture. This will pair well with a rich dish like osso buco.

title: Dunham 2012 XVIII Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The dried tobacco, vanilla, green olive and cocoa aromas seem somewhat unusual ...
description: The dried tobacco, vanilla, green olive and cocoa aromas seem somewhat unusual for the variety and vintage. The chocolate and cherry flavors are creamy in feel, displaying a good sense of balance and length.

title: J. Lohr 2012 Hilltop Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Bruised plum and pluot aromas mix with red rose petals and chipped ...
description: Bruised plum and pluot aromas mix with red rose petals and chipped black slate on the nose of this reliable bottling. The palate shows slightly sour dried cherries, more lush dried blueberries, a bit more tar and a nice twist of tobacco.

title: Full Pull & Friends 2012 Bacchus Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Barrel spice, dried herb, toast and cherry aromas lead to tart fruit ...
description: Barrel spice, dried herb, toast and cherry aromas lead to tart fruit flavors that narrow toward the finish, with tart acids livening it all up. Perhaps some more time will pull it all together.

title: Airfield Estates 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: This is 100% varietal with all of the fruit coming from 1989 ...
description: This is 100% varietal with all of the fruit coming from 1989 plantings. Bittersweet chocolate, green herb and barrel aromas are followed by cherry flavors with a chalky feel.

title: Casas del Bosque 2013 Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Aromas of olive, herbs, spice, raw oak and berry fruits give this ...
description: Aromas of olive, herbs, spice, raw oak and berry fruits give this Cabernet a classic Chilean bouquet. Dense, jammy and concentrated on the palate, this tastes of blackberry, cassis, green herbs, pepper and chocolate. This runs smooth, herbal and chocolaty on the finish. Drink through 2019.

title: Altvs 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A dense thicket of dark chocolate is prominent in this wine, alongside ...
description: A dense thicket of dark chocolate is prominent in this wine, alongside black raspberry and blackberry. Dried herb and pencil shavings also make their way through midpalate, atop a soft, approachable texture and full body.

title: Ackerman 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Coombsville)
excerpt: Made from certified organically grown grapes, this wisp of a wine is ...
description: Made from certified organically grown grapes, this wisp of a wine is made in a quiet style from a cool year and a relatively cool area of the Napa Valley. Pencil lead, peppercorn and cedar come to mind first and foremost, followed by light, juicy notes of classic cassis. Not overly oaked, the finish suggests chocolate.

title: Clos Pegase 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Seamless and soft, this medium-built expression of clove, tobacco and dark red ...
description: Seamless and soft, this medium-built expression of clove, tobacco and dark red plum offers integrated tannins and a punch of oak, before settling into a whispered finish.

title: Luke 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Wahluke Slope)
excerpt: This is the inaugural release of this Clifton Hill and Clifton Bluff ...
description: This is the inaugural release of this Clifton Hill and Clifton Bluff vineyards wine. Aromas of plum, dark berries, pencil lead and chocolate precede soft, plump fruit flavors. It goes down far too easy.

title: Terlato 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: Smooth and spicy, this wine explodes in layers of cinnamon and clove ...
description: Smooth and spicy, this wine explodes in layers of cinnamon and clove dusted in sugary plum and black cherry, a powerful weight and degree of ripeness at its core. The finish is soft and lengthy in vanilla oak.

title: Valle Hermoso 2013 Elegido Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Direct, woody aromas of cherry, raspberry and minerally crispness set up a ...
description: Direct, woody aromas of cherry, raspberry and minerally crispness set up a medium-bodied palate housing round tannins. Ripe, loamy flavors of mixed berries exhibit a touch of raisin, which carries over to a peppery, blackened finish.

title: Koyle 2013 Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: A strong blast of oak and wood shavings are up front and ...
description: A strong blast of oak and wood shavings are up front and on top of the nose on this chunky Cabernet. Baked, herbal flavors of cassis and raspberry are toasty, slightly green and minty. Flavors of herbs and carob rest heavily on a plump, warm finish.

title: Sextant 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Concentrated strawberry and plum blossom aromas are boosted with iron and a ...
description: Concentrated strawberry and plum blossom aromas are boosted with iron and a touch of oak smoke on the nose of this bottling by winemaker Steve Martell. The palate shows ripe red currant, woody elderberry brush and a shred of asphalt.

title: Vinum Cellars 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: From dry-farmed, hillside vineyards known for low yields, this is an austere, ...
description: From dry-farmed, hillside vineyards known for low yields, this is an austere, extracted wine, full bodied and yet showing cooler aspects of herb, peppercorn, tar, pencil and cedar. Chocolate, cassis and cherry come in midway on the palate, before the wine finishes savory and ripe.

title: Fulkerson 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Shrouds of leafy herbs and savory stems lend a fresh tone to ...
description: Shrouds of leafy herbs and savory stems lend a fresh tone to this brisk yet fruity, concentrated Cab. Crisp blackberry and currant flavors shine bright and pert on the palate, framed squarely by lingering strikes of tannin and acidity.

title: MontGras 2013 Antu Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Prickly aromas of nettle and green herbs are matched by spicy blackberry ...
description: Prickly aromas of nettle and green herbs are matched by spicy blackberry and lactic oak notes. A tight, tannic palate is firmly built, with spicy flavors of cherry and cassis as well as olive. A peppery, herbal, toasty finish sends this on its way. Drink through 2018.

title: Parducci 2012 Isabella Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendocino)
excerpt: This is a good, solid wine labeled to commemorate the 80th anniversary ...
description: This is a good, solid wine labeled to commemorate the 80th anniversary of the Parducci estate. It has robust flavors, full body and a rich layer of tannins to add texture. The flavors are like ripe plums and pomegranate juice. It also has good balance and develops an elegant mouth-feel.

title: Columbia Crest 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: All varietal, this wine is a blend of fruit from Beverly, Shaw ...
description: All varietal, this wine is a blend of fruit from Beverly, Shaw and Stone Tree vineyards. Aged in all-new French oak, it leads with barrel spices followed by aromas and flavors of medicine cabinet, cherry and chocolate. It offers appeal but the tannins need time to unwind.

title: Concha y Toro 2013 Casillero del Diablo Reserva Privada Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Plum and blackberry aromas are mildly grassy and horsey. On the palate, ...
description: Plum and blackberry aromas are mildly grassy and horsey. On the palate, this Cabernet is bold, fleshy and tannic in feel, with a solid structure. Blackberry and oak flavors are a touch green and spicy, while this finishes with spicy, herbal notes.

title: Agustinos 2014 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Plum, raisin and red licorice aromas are ripe and heady. This feels ...
description: Plum, raisin and red licorice aromas are ripe and heady. This feels tight and structured, with meaty tannins. Black cherry and oaky chocolate flavors end mild and chunky, with length. This should raise no complaints.

title: Domaines Barons de Rothschild (Lafite) 2014 Los Vascos Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Aromas of cherry and currant are a bit flat. On the palate, ...
description: Aromas of cherry and currant are a bit flat. On the palate, this is perfectly good but common. Blackberry, plum and a dusting of chocolate are the key flavors, while this runs long and loamy on the finish.

title: Honig 2012 Bartolucci Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
excerpt: There is much to enjoy in this vineyard-designate, from grippy tannins to ...
description: There is much to enjoy in this vineyard-designate, from grippy tannins to dark, brooding black fruit. Burly, it also tends toward barbecue smoke and cigar, a dense wine of great power and alcohol, aged entirely in new French oak.

title: La Vis 2011 Ritratti Cabernet Sauvignon (Trentino)
excerpt: Aromas of cassis, Alpine herbs and a whiff of menthol lead the ...
description: Aromas of cassis, Alpine herbs and a whiff of menthol lead the nose. The straightforward palate offers dried black cherry, redcurrant, espresso and ground black pepper alongside firm but refined tannins. Drink through 2016.

title: Stephen Vincent 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (North Coast)
excerpt: The aromas of this full-bodied, dry and sophisticated wine show black olive, ...
description: The aromas of this full-bodied, dry and sophisticated wine show black olive, light smoke and oak. The palate brings flavors of dark cherries and a touch of dark chocolate, with firm tannins offering a pleasing texture.

title: Goldschmidt 2012 Game Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: Thick and rich, this has saddle and tobacco going on, alongside leather ...
description: Thick and rich, this has saddle and tobacco going on, alongside leather and smoke. A meaty, gamy note akin to bacon also characterizes the wine, as well as jammy blackberry and clove.

title: Santa Ema 2013 Amplus Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Plum and raspberry aromas are herbal and slightly grassy. On the tongue, ...
description: Plum and raspberry aromas are herbal and slightly grassy. On the tongue, wiry acidity feels citric. Flavors of red plum, spiced cherry, tomato and herbs ride a road of choppy acidity and rough tannins to a bold finish. Drink through 2020.

title: Concha y Toro 2013 Serie Riberas Gran Reserva Ribera del Tinguiririca Cabernet Sauvignon (Marchigue)
excerpt: Light but staunch cherry and cassis aromas are infused with herb and ...
description: Light but staunch cherry and cassis aromas are infused with herb and spice notes. This is tight in feel, with bracing tartaric acidity that results in surface-level flavors of red-berry fruits. Racy, mildly green notes are present on a snappy, hot finish.

title: Michel-Schlumberger 2012 La Cime Cabernet Sauvignon (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: This wine is augmented by small percentages of Merlot, Petit Verdot and ...
description: This wine is augmented by small percentages of Merlot, Petit Verdot and Syrah, and shows flavors of candied red fruit, integrated tannins and a low presence of oak. It finishes with a taste of cherry vanilla.

title: La Playa 2013 Block Selection Tinga Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Dry, dusty blackberry aromas are restrained yet clean. This shows more density ...
description: Dry, dusty blackberry aromas are restrained yet clean. This shows more density on a palate, with jammy black-plum and berry flavors leading to a fresh and satisfying full-length finish.

title: Judd's Hill 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A tart, tight expression that is mostly varietal, with additions of Cabernet ...
description: A tart, tight expression that is mostly varietal, with additions of Cabernet Franc and Merlot, this wine was given 30 months in French oak. Soft, integrated tannins wrap around a strong sense of tangy cranberry, finishing lean.

title: Concha y Toro 2012 Casillero del Diablo Manchester United Legendary Collection Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Cherry and berry aromas are rubbery and oaky, and overall this creamy ...
description: Cherry and berry aromas are rubbery and oaky, and overall this creamy Cabernet is perfectly enjoyable. On the palate, tomato-driven acidity creates pulse, while flavors of plum and raspberry finish fresh.

title: Santa Ema 2013 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Black-fruit aromas of cassis and boysenberry are not overdone nor overoaked. Thie ...
description: Black-fruit aromas of cassis and boysenberry are not overdone nor overoaked. Thie palate feels somewhat spiky and acidic, with a tartaric bite. A flavor profile comprised of salty berry fruits finishes briny and herbal, with good weight and balance.

title: Emiliana 2014 Natura Cabernet Sauvignon (Rapel Valley)
excerpt: Briary, leathery aromas are supported by ample berry fruit on the nose ...
description: Briary, leathery aromas are supported by ample berry fruit on the nose of this slightly choppy Cabernet. Notes of char and minty are as prominent as berry-fruit flavors, while the tannic grib and peppery heat push to the finish.

title: Santa Alicia 2014 Reserva Espiritu de Los Andes Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Roasted berry aromas show notes of leather and earth. The palate is ...
description: Roasted berry aromas show notes of leather and earth. The palate is firm and tannic, with medicinal cherry and coffee flavors. A spicy finish remains after the fruit fades.

title: Swanson 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This youthful wine shows the exuberance of tannin and power of the ...
description: This youthful wine shows the exuberance of tannin and power of the vintage, finding its time to unwind. Small percentages of Merlot and Petit Verdot figure in the blend. Oak, cedar and herb jump out most, with faint layers of blackberry and black cherry.

title: Circadia 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Baking spices and almost-sweetness come out in the aroma and continue in ...
description: Baking spices and almost-sweetness come out in the aroma and continue in the flavors, making this a full-bodied and enthusiastically fruity wine. The texture is smooth and broad and includes some fine-textured tannins.

title: Del Carlo Winery 2011 Teldeschi Home Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: From the grape-growing family known for old-vine Zinfandel, this wine comes from ...
description: From the grape-growing family known for old-vine Zinfandel, this wine comes from the eastern foothills of the appellation, the vines settled into well-draining, rocky soils. Floral on the nose, it enters into a gaminess on the palate, dusted in pencil lead, blackberry and herb.

title: Miguel Torres 2012 Santa Digna Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
excerpt: Solid but flat aromas of olive and leafy berry fruits introduce a ...
description: Solid but flat aromas of olive and leafy berry fruits introduce a midland palate of moderate bounce and average body. Raspberry, plum, currant and herbal flavors finish fresh, but also woody and slightly bitter in taste.

title: Santa Rita 2014 120 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
excerpt: Dry, scratchy plum and raspberry aromas come before an energetic palate. Loud ...
description: Dry, scratchy plum and raspberry aromas come before an energetic palate. Loud berry and plum flavors run quick and bright, finishing with candy-like cherry flavors and wham-bam acidity.

title: Kuleto Estate 2012 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: While this wine is a majority varietal, it blends in Syrah, Malbec, ...
description: While this wine is a majority varietal, it blends in Syrah, Malbec, Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot, each co-fermented with the Cab. The tannin weight is pronounced, adding to the richness and concentration of blackberry jam and black pepper, the tannins leathery and lengthy.

title: EOS 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
excerpt: Brisk tobacco and red fruit aromas mesh with sanguine iron and cola ...
description: Brisk tobacco and red fruit aromas mesh with sanguine iron and cola notes on the nose of this appellation blend. The flavors are quite rusty, with fresh plum, sour cranberry and a bit of pencil lead.

title: Dubindil 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: Aromas seem advanced, with notes of cherry liqueur, leather, barrel spices and ...
description: Aromas seem advanced, with notes of cherry liqueur, leather, barrel spices and raisinated dark fruit. The dried-fruit flavors are full with chalky tannins. Drink now.

title: Robert Mondavi 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: A majority varietal, this widely distributed wine also contains Cabernet Franc, Malbec ...
description: A majority varietal, this widely distributed wine also contains Cabernet Franc, Malbec and Petit Verdot. Dense and flat on the palate, it dances in bay leaf and black cherry, finishing with more herb around a tight fist of ripeness.

title: Viu Manent 2012 Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Saucy plum and raspberry aromas are simple but enjoyable. This feels round ...
description: Saucy plum and raspberry aromas are simple but enjoyable. This feels round but also choppy and tannic. Toasty berry flavors are largely generic, while this tastes spicy and feels resiny on the finish.

title: Tres Palacios 2012 Family Vintage Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Leafy, herbal aromas of plum and raspberry show a touch of tomato, ...
description: Leafy, herbal aromas of plum and raspberry show a touch of tomato, with a dash of oregano. This is soft on the palate, without a lot of spine or structure. Earthy, herbal flavors of stewed berries, tomato and green herbs finish minty and leafy, but with good feel.

title: Paris Valley Road Cellars 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: There is a nice cherry core and exotic spice aromas on the ...
description: There is a nice cherry core and exotic spice aromas on the nose of this blend of 83% Cabernet Sauvignon, 11% Merlot, 3% Cabernet Franc and 3% Malbec, mostly from the Chalk Knoll Vineyard in San Lucas. The palate is dense and spicy, with rich vanilla-laden cherries and savory tobacco smoke.

title: Indomita 2014 Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: This is an overtly oaky Cabernet with resiny, balsamic aromas that share ...
description: This is an overtly oaky Cabernet with resiny, balsamic aromas that share space with baked black-fruit scents. The palate feels flabby and fat, with modest tannic grip. Jammy blueberry and cassis flavors end oaky, resiny and jammy.

title: Wellington 2010 Mohrhardt Ridge Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
excerpt: An earthy rusticity marks this wine, soft in black cherry, with a ...
description: An earthy rusticity marks this wine, soft in black cherry, with a rich, smooth texture and grippy, tongue-coating finish of leathery tannin.

title: Cramele Recas 2014 Dreamfish Cabernet Sauvignon (Viile Timisului)
excerpt: Tart cherry, tobacco and leather present themselves on the nose, leading the ...
description: Tart cherry, tobacco and leather present themselves on the nose, leading the way to fruit forward flavors of red plum and cherry pie backed by pleasant hints of vanilla.

title: Luis Felipe Edwards 2014 Don Feli Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
excerpt: Sawdust and wild-berry aromas are loud on the nose. Flabby in feel, ...
description: Sawdust and wild-berry aromas are loud on the nose. Flabby in feel, with a slight sense of rawness, this tastes of briar patch and wood, with candied plum and berry fruit. Rubbery tannins make for a rocky finish.

title: Longevity 2011 Vintner Select Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: Big and bold in body, earthy in aroma and showing ample fruit ...
description: Big and bold in body, earthy in aroma and showing ample fruit flavors, this assertive and high-alcohol wine packs quite a punch in texture, too. The impact of lots of tannin is apparent in the astringency.

title: Materra 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Howell Mountain)
excerpt: Sweet tannins and an extracted, concentrated sense of brambly blackberry make for ...
description: Sweet tannins and an extracted, concentrated sense of brambly blackberry make for a robust wine, puckering in weight and oak. Rustic, leathery overtones dominate the bouquet and finish.

title: Materra 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: Herbal and somewhat weedy, this is a thin wine from a coolish ...
description: Herbal and somewhat weedy, this is a thin wine from a coolish year, offering faint amounts of cassis, cranberry and milk chocolate.

title: Evoke 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa County-Sonoma County)
excerpt: From Napa and Sonoma in equal measure, this wine is herbal, slightly ...
description: From Napa and Sonoma in equal measure, this wine is herbal, slightly green, while also dense, syrupy and mouth-coating in tannins.

title: Cambridge & Sunset 2013 California Series Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Rather lean aromas and spare fruit flavors meet more lavishly rich flavors ...
description: Rather lean aromas and spare fruit flavors meet more lavishly rich flavors for dual personalities in this medium-bodied, soft-textured and slightly sweet wine.

title: Rutherford Hill 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Generic, this wine offers huge tannins and underwhelming fruit, finishing sour and ...
description: Generic, this wine offers huge tannins and underwhelming fruit, finishing sour and somewhat tart.

title: Balduzzi 2013 Reserva Oak Barrel Aged Cabernet Sauvignon (Maule Valley)
excerpt: This one-note Cabernet is overoaked and weakly constituted. A balsam wood note ...
description: This one-note Cabernet is overoaked and weakly constituted. A balsam wood note drives the notes and palate, start to finish.

title: Teillery 2014 Organic Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Strange aromas of tree bark, pool water and funky berry fruit are ...
description: Strange aromas of tree bark, pool water and funky berry fruit are not inviting. This organic Cabernet feels awkward and grabby, while flavors of jammy berry fruits finish flabby, wayward and with little charm.

title: Chono 2012 Single Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Murky in color and like pure raisin juice on the nose, this ...
description: Murky in color and like pure raisin juice on the nose, this alarmingly unbalanced, raisiny Cab holds mild enjoyment.

title: B Cellars 2012 Blend 26 Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: Sanguine, dense and thick, this offers an intriguing nose of black pepper ...
description: Sanguine, dense and thick, this offers an intriguing nose of black pepper and garrigue that conveys a sense of adventure and romance. Its leathery texture never becomes overly weighty, though the fruit and oak are plenty generous. An ideal partner for an equally beautiful steak, its structure suggests time in the cellar will only add to the experience; drink through 2022.

title: Von Strasser 2012 Agira Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
excerpt: From a three-acre vineyard, this wine accented in 2% Petit Verdot offers ...
description: From a three-acre vineyard, this wine accented in 2% Petit Verdot offers a sense of gravel underneath the dark, syrupy plum and leathery tannin structure. Midway through, it exhibits cherry, raspberry and vanilla, showing a juicy underbelly that should develop further over time. Drink now through 2022.

title: HammerSky 2010 Limited Resources Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Deep, heady aromas of black cherry, gingersnap cookies and black loam show ...
description: Deep, heady aromas of black cherry, gingersnap cookies and black loam show on the nose. Rich and penetrating flavors of blackberry and brown spice are cut with a ripe fruit freshness in this heavy-duty wine with lots of life.

title: Sol Rouge 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Hills Lake County)
excerpt: This wine is concentrated, deep and tannic, yet nicely polished around the ...
description: This wine is concentrated, deep and tannic, yet nicely polished around the edges. It shows harmony between the vivid cranberry, black cherry, dark chocolate and smoky oak flavors and the layered, fine tannins that give it a velvety texture. Drink now through 2022.

title: Trione 2010 Block Twenty One Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: While the producer holds back its heartier reds in bottle before release, ...
description: While the producer holds back its heartier reds in bottle before release, this complex, rich wine will keep going with more cellaring, giving it a chance to further hone its already-developed layers of leather, earth and backbone of black fruit. Smooth and velvety, it retains sizable tannin weight on the finish. Cellar through 2020.

title: Cenay 2012 Bluetooth Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: From a vineyard within the Oak Knoll District, this Bluetooth is musky ...
