description: From a vineyard within the Oak Knoll District, this Bluetooth is musky and chewy in all the right ways, complex and feral in crisp red fruit and red licorice. The majority Cabernet Sauvignon is softened somewhat by the addition of 5% Merlot, providing a juicy undercurrent beneath firm, generous tannins. Cellar through 2022.

title: Tobacco Road 2007 V Foundation Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A tiny-production wine made to honor the legacy of Jimmy Valvano, this ...
description: A tiny-production wine made to honor the legacy of Jimmy Valvano, this Cab is huge, leathery and possibly not for everyone. For those who do like a complexity of funk, this one delivers, with a massive mouthfeel of minerality, finished in black licorice and chocolate.

title: Obsidian Ridge 2012 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Hills Lake County)
excerpt: Bold aromas, thick layers of fruit flavor, and a supple but steely ...
description: Bold aromas, thick layers of fruit flavor, and a supple but steely texture of fine tannins and acidity add up to a powerful and complex wine that should improve with age. Pure, dark-fruit flavors are accented by smoke and cardamom while the structure is mouthpuckering with astringency but softened by the richness of body and fruit. Best after 2019.

title: Raymond 2012 DIstrict Collection Cabernet Sauvignon (Calistoga)
excerpt: Soft hints of cinnamon and clove waft upwards out of the bouquet, ...
description: Soft hints of cinnamon and clove waft upwards out of the bouquet, before a wave of warm red fruit and vanilla form around age-worthy, rounded tannins. Nicely structured and drinkable now, it should take on additional complexity and nuance through 2020.

title: Arcudi 2012 Black Sears Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Howell Mountain)
excerpt: From a 2,400-foot elevation vineyard, this wine is unexpectedly elegant and definitively ...
description: From a 2,400-foot elevation vineyard, this wine is unexpectedly elegant and definitively age-worthy. Floral and unusual, the palate brings integrated tannins wrapped around a core of ripe blackberry and cassis. Structured, it has plenty of body and length, bringing an old world sensibility to new world fruit. Drink now through 2022.

title: JCB 2012 No. 1 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This hedonistically powerful mix of 80% Cabernet Sauvignon, 16% Merlot and 4% ...
description: This hedonistically powerful mix of 80% Cabernet Sauvignon, 16% Merlot and 4% Petit Verdot traffics in blackberry and black cherry jam over a layer of soft tannins. Coffee, toffee and subtle Asian and cinnamon spice keep the proceedings lively, for this is a seriously ripe and playful wine. Cellar through 2020.

title: Stonestreet 2011 Estate Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: This wine is quite an accomplishment in flavor and complexity given the ...
description: This wine is quite an accomplishment in flavor and complexity given the vintage and the price. From high-altitude vineyards atop the Mayacamas, it delivers peppercorn, herb and fine, well-integrated tannins, with mellow oak. Graphite and cedar also figure into the mix, with a shock of black cherry and cassis weaved within. Drink now through 2019.

title: Amici 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: From the heart of Oakville, this 100% varietal wine is luxurious, silky ...
description: From the heart of Oakville, this 100% varietal wine is luxurious, silky and velvety on the palate, a masterful study of texture. Lengthy and balanced, despite its powerful fruit, it suggests dark plum and cassis, with just a tiny note of cherry, the tannins refined and chalky. Cellar through 2022.

title: Black Cordon 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Juicy blackberry, cherry and leathery tannins characterize this full-bodied, dense and complex ...
description: Juicy blackberry, cherry and leathery tannins characterize this full-bodied, dense and complex wine, which is velvety-smooth on the palate. Though the fruit is nicely developed and full figured, the tannins should continue to integrate with more time in the bottle. Cellar through 2022.

title: Firestone 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Ynez Valley)
excerpt: This wine impresses, with cedar, black cherries, dill and licorice on the ...
description: This wine impresses, with cedar, black cherries, dill and licorice on the complex nose. Sagebrush and blueberries power the palate, which also shows charred beef, asphalt and smoked meats. This is proving to be a very heavy and deep wine.

title: Cakebread 2012 Benchland Select Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Aged in barrel for close to two years, this 100% varietal wine ...
description: Aged in barrel for close to two years, this 100% varietal wine from a classic Napa Valley producer delivers a compelling mix of blackberry pie and chocolate. The flavors form around soft, silky, well-integrated oak and fine-grained tannins. Rich and robust, it discloses an elegance that suggests further cellaring, through 2022.

title: Las Vertientes 2013 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Smoky blackberry aromas introduce a blocky, ripe, chewy palate with full-force weight, ...
description: Smoky blackberry aromas introduce a blocky, ripe, chewy palate with full-force weight, extraction and tannins. Bold flavors of baking spices, clove, blackberry and plum end with chocolaty notes. This is a ripe, globular wine with definition and clarity to go with powerful, ripe flavors. Drink through 2024.

title: Vitesse 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A handful of Petit Verdot adds power and color to this wine, ...
description: A handful of Petit Verdot adds power and color to this wine, which opens in a dusty, rich bouquet of dark cherry. Compressed tannins give way to a concentration of pomegranate and cassis, the fruit grown predominantly on Spring Mountain. The finish captures mountainside minerality. Drink now through 2020.

title: Hidden Ridge 2012 55% Slope Impassable Mountain Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
excerpt: This robustly generous wine is impactful in chocolate and sweet, soft plum. ...
description: This robustly generous wine is impactful in chocolate and sweet, soft plum. A complexity of cedar, herb and blackberry marks the palate, with integrated tannins and oak. The complementary elements provide intrigue and flavor in a heavyweight package, ready for cellaring through 2022.

title: Mount Veeder 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Made in large-enough quantities to be widely available, as well as at ...
description: Made in large-enough quantities to be widely available, as well as at a rare price point for the appellation, this is a bit of a find. Juicy in red-fruit tones yet supported by drying tannins, this is pleasurably perplexing, with a hint of mint on the nose. Full bodied, it finishes with tobacco and fig. Cellar through 2020.

title: Cerro Prieto 2009 Paso Bordo Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Strong aromas of blueberry paste, cracked peppercorns and concentrated lilacs prepare the ...
description: Strong aromas of blueberry paste, cracked peppercorns and concentrated lilacs prepare the nose for a powerful sipper. The palate falls in line, proving rich and full, with flavors of stewed blackberries, plums, a bit of licorice and an herbal twist between dried mint and dill.

title: Firestone 2012 The Chairman Series Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Ynez Valley)
excerpt: Leathery aromas mix with black tobacco leaf, blackberry, blueberry and dark-chocolate chips ...
description: Leathery aromas mix with black tobacco leaf, blackberry, blueberry and dark-chocolate chips on this reserve-level bottling by the regional pioneer producer, now owned by William Foley. Woody yet ripe fruits consume the palate, which shows more blueberry as well as elderberry, wild mint and a slightly caramelized finish.

title: Finca El Origen 2013 Gran Reserva Vista Flores Single Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Earthy and ripe, this midnight-black Cab opens with ripe aromas of prune, ...
description: Earthy and ripe, this midnight-black Cab opens with ripe aromas of prune, tobacco and oak-related coconut. A tannic, resiny palate deals rich, heady flavors of mocha, blackberry and coconut, while an oak-dominated finish heaps on a final dose of coconut along with hard tannins. Drink through 2021.

title: Parducci 2013 True Grit Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendocino County)
excerpt: This is a big and brooding wine, with flavors initally restrained behind ...
description: This is a big and brooding wine, with flavors initally restrained behind a textured and massively structured body. On second and third sips, black chocolate, dark cherry and black pepper flavors start to emerge. This is tempting to drink now, but should be best from 2018 to 2023.

title: Rust en Vrede 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Stellenbosch)
excerpt: This is a ripe and dense yet well-balanced wine, offering forward aromas ...
description: This is a ripe and dense yet well-balanced wine, offering forward aromas of boysenberry and deep, juicy red plum that are accented by notes of cocoa nib, roasted espresso and char. The palate boasts a plush texture, like crushed velvet, with gripping but not overly firm tannins and concentrated fruit flavors. Notes of licorice and earthy tobacco grace the long finish. Approachable now, but should evolve well through 2021.

title: Baehner Fournier 2012 Solus Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Ynez Valley)
excerpt: Hot gravel and blackberry fruit combine for straightforward, light-on-the-feet aromas on this ...
description: Hot gravel and blackberry fruit combine for straightforward, light-on-the-feet aromas on this bottling from a small estate near Happy Canyon. Cherry and blackberry pie flavors show on the palate, with tart, fresh berries framed by a buttery crust.

title: Burrowing Owl 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Okanagan Valley)
excerpt: Outstanding fruit comes up immediately, with blue plum and ripe cherries. Tannins ...
description: Outstanding fruit comes up immediately, with blue plum and ripe cherries. Tannins are smooth and polished, while the barrel aging contributes complex, well-integrated components of toast, coffee and soy.

title: Occasio 2012 Heritage Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: A tempting, well-balanced wine from a tiny artisan winery, this is medium ...
description: A tempting, well-balanced wine from a tiny artisan winery, this is medium bodied but packs in a great array of ripe fruit and dark chocolate flavors. Firm tannins and acidity lift it and keep it lively through the finish. It tastes great now but will improve through 2020.

title: Clos du Val 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Mostly from estate vineyards, and blended with other Bordeaux varieties, this wine ...
description: Mostly from estate vineyards, and blended with other Bordeaux varieties, this wine balances dense, chewy, sizable tannins with a juicy core of blackberry, baking spices and leather. Given time, its sense of elegance should rule over its power, while for now, it finishes in bittersweet chocolate. Cellar through 2020.

title: Rowland 2012 Sleeping Lady Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Yountville)
excerpt: From a fantastic vineyard site in the heart of Yountville, this 100% ...
description: From a fantastic vineyard site in the heart of Yountville, this 100% varietal wine is from Block 2, Clone 2, which is why the label refers to it as C2B2. Brick, tar and smoke take the lead before restrained and concentrated red fruit enters the frame. Generous tannin suggests cellaring, through 2022.

title: Raymond 2012 District Collection Cabernet Sauvignon (Coombsville)
excerpt: From the cooler reaches of the Napa Valley, this Coombsville wine is ...
description: From the cooler reaches of the Napa Valley, this Coombsville wine is herbal and leathery, with a taste of bittersweet chocolate at its core. Integrated oak plays a background role behind baked plum and intense, ripe fruit, finishing in tobacco. Drink now through 2020.

title: Mendel 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: This is a supremely rich, extracted Cabernet Sauvignon. Grapy black-plum aromas are ...
description: This is a supremely rich, extracted Cabernet Sauvignon. Grapy black-plum aromas are more dense, inky and concentrated than elegant. That theme carries onto the palate, which is full and tannic. Blackened flavors of cassis, toast, chocolate and herbal black fruits finish with chewy tannins and a note of coconut. Drink through 2020.

title: Sequoia Grove 2011 Henry Brothers Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is a muted, age-worthy and densely concentrated wine, with small amounts ...
description: This is a muted, age-worthy and densely concentrated wine, with small amounts of Merlot, Syrah and Petit Verdot blended in, given almost two years in French oak, 75% of it new. The vineyard is on Howell Mountain and the imprint of mountain blackberry, black plum and dark chocolate is strong, with a touch of vanilla on the finish. Cellar through 2021.

title: Sequoia Grove 2012 Rutherford Bench Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: Concentrated in rich reserves of tobacco and tar, the fruit in this ...
description: Concentrated in rich reserves of tobacco and tar, the fruit in this blend of Cabernet Sauvignon with smaller percentages of Merlot, Cabernet Franc, Malbec and Petit Verdot is elusive at first. In the glass it develops into a nuanced expression of blackberry jam and dark chocolate, a sprinkling of cinnamon in there, too. Cellar through 2022.

title: Covenant 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Inky dark and compressed, this is a concentrated expression of juicy black ...
description: Inky dark and compressed, this is a concentrated expression of juicy black fruit and licorice. With sizable, powerful tannin, it needs time to decompress, a leathery texture requiring patience to soften. Cellar through 2020.

title: VGS 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
excerpt: Thick and concentrated, this wine needs more time to unwind, ideally through ...
description: Thick and concentrated, this wine needs more time to unwind, ideally through 2021, showing tightly sewn layers of blackberry, cassis, black olive and tar.

title: Von Strasser 2012 Vineyard 2131 Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
excerpt: A splash of Malbec is included in this otherwise varietal wine, a ...
description: A splash of Malbec is included in this otherwise varietal wine, a grippy, structured and full-bodied mountain expression of big tannins and potent black fruit. Leather and tobacco make their way into the experience, finishing soft and on the way to being resolved.

title: Bodega Catena Zapata 2011 Catena Alta Historic Rows Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Wild berry, licorice and plum aromas are solid but quiet. This Cabernet ...
description: Wild berry, licorice and plum aromas are solid but quiet. This Cabernet is built on leathery, tough tannins and roasted, savory flavors of saucy berry and plum. A spunky, savory tasting finish is tomatoey and leathery, with leftover sauciness. Drink through 2020.

title: District 7 Wines 2012 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Monterey County)
excerpt: This bottling by the Scheid family of wines is a solidly reliable ...
description: This bottling by the Scheid family of wines is a solidly reliable deal, with dried black cherries, beef jerky, leather and a bit of tar on the nose. Crushed, dried herbs show on the palate, along with roasted pork and more black cherry, proving both juicy and meaty, with a slate-driven minerality.

title: Hendry 2012 Hendry Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Muted aromatics hide beneath thick, leathery tannins and a puckering structure of ...
description: Muted aromatics hide beneath thick, leathery tannins and a puckering structure of crisp red currant and cranberry in this full-bodied wine that will benefit from time. Cellar through 2020.

title: Raymond 2012 District Collection Cabernet Sauvignon (Yountville)
excerpt: Yeasty, like baked bread, this thick, leathery and peppery wine is surrounded ...
description: Yeasty, like baked bread, this thick, leathery and peppery wine is surrounded by a wealth of burly tannins. The oak well integrated, it will nonetheless benefit from further aging to coax more of its dark raspberry and blackberry fruit. Cellar through 2020.

title: Von Strasser 2012 Post Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
excerpt: A rough-hewn wine ideal for lovers of superdark, chewy coffee, this has ...
description: A rough-hewn wine ideal for lovers of superdark, chewy coffee, this has similar thickness in the mountainous tannins supported by smoke and musk. Bittersweet on the finish, this wine finds its balance as it opens in the glass.

title: Budeguer 2011 Cuatro Mil Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Aromas of raspberry, blackberry, green herbs and tar set up a blocky, ...
description: Aromas of raspberry, blackberry, green herbs and tar set up a blocky, jammy, chunky palate. Plum, raspberry, currant, pepper and oaky flavors are grainy and spicy, while a woody finish tastes resiny, chocolaty and toasty.

title: Concannon 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Enticing aromas of blackberry, coffee and roasted fennel in a pork au ...
description: Enticing aromas of blackberry, coffee and roasted fennel in a pork au jus mark the nose. The palate shows dark purple fruits, chai spice and cinnamon latte foam.

title: Andeluna 2013 Altitud Cabernet Sauvignon (Tupungato)
excerpt: Black-fruit aromas are accented by notes of licorice, green herbs and grass. ...
description: Black-fruit aromas are accented by notes of licorice, green herbs and grass. This is full and chunky, but a bit hollow in mouthfeel. Pronounced tartaric acidity results in surface-level pop along with hollowness, while lactic oak and coconut flavors on the finish are familiar for Argentine Cabernet.

title: Donati 2012 Ezio Cabernet Sauvignon (Paicines)
excerpt: This blend of 80% Cabernet Sauvignon, 12% Merlot, 5% Cabernet Franc and ...
description: This blend of 80% Cabernet Sauvignon, 12% Merlot, 5% Cabernet Franc and 3% Petit Verdot is named after the first of the family born in the New World. It offers slightly sour, dried red fruits, compressed violets and Earl Grey tea on the nose, followed by grilled meats, black plums, red cherries and purple flowers on the relatively light and quite tasty palate.

title: Donati 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paicines)
excerpt: Dried rose petals, black cherries, cedar and a sense of darkness pervade ...
description: Dried rose petals, black cherries, cedar and a sense of darkness pervade the nose on this wine from a relatively unknown appellation about 25 miles from the Monterey Bay. Flavors of minty chocolate, plums and cherry blossoms show on the lithe palate.

title: My Essential 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Plum flesh, grapeseed and black-peppercorn aromas introduce this leaner, less-extracted style of ...
description: Plum flesh, grapeseed and black-peppercorn aromas introduce this leaner, less-extracted style of wine. The palate shows deep cherry and plum juice with lots of peppery spice and decent tannic structure, and will probably intensify with a bit of patience.

title: Lorenzi Estate 2010 Varietal Collection Cabernet Sauvignon (Temecula Valley)
excerpt: Cooked plums and cherries meet with dill, tarragon, cola and asphalt on ...
description: Cooked plums and cherries meet with dill, tarragon, cola and asphalt on the nose of this wine. Rocky flavors of tar and pencil shavings meld with Dr Pepper elements, cedar and more cooked fruit on the palate.

title: Matchbook 2013 Dunnigan Hills Cabernet Sauvignon (Lake County)
excerpt: A spicy aroma of ginger cookies meets dark, blackberry flavors on the ...
description: A spicy aroma of ginger cookies meets dark, blackberry flavors on the palate of this medium-bodied, pure-tasting wine. The gushing fruit flavors are compelling and palate-cleansing, with light tannins and acidity keep it fresh and lively.

title: Midsummer Cellars 2012 Clark-Claudon Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Smoky oak and peppercorn combine for a dense, still-puckering vineyard-designated wine, the ...
description: Smoky oak and peppercorn combine for a dense, still-puckering vineyard-designated wine, the vineyard high atop the wilds of Howell Mountain. Graphite and pencil play into its character, finishing dense and fleshy. Drink now through 2017.

title: Fiuza 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Tejo)
excerpt: This is a rich, full-bodied and generous wine. It has great red ...
description: This is a rich, full-bodied and generous wine. It has great red berry flavors that are supported by a light oak character and freshened with acidity. Although young, it is ready to drink.

title: Peter Paul Wines 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
excerpt: Juicy red fruit that flirts in cherry and vanilla opens this complex, ...
description: Juicy red fruit that flirts in cherry and vanilla opens this complex, florally aromatic wine from the Rudd Vineyard on Mount Veeder. Thick, integrated tannins support a concentrated structure, marked by herb and cedar, finishing dry and lean.

title: Peter Paul Wines 2011 Giuliani Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A taste of juicy red cherry provides a brightness of acidity to ...
description: A taste of juicy red cherry provides a brightness of acidity to this wine, a 100% varietal aged in entirely French oak. Soft, integrated tannins form a foundation around dried herbal notes and black pepper, working seamlessly together to an elegant end.

title: Putah Creek 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Solano County)
excerpt: Simultaneously sweet and smoky aromas from the use of new oak mark ...
description: Simultaneously sweet and smoky aromas from the use of new oak mark this full-bodied wine. The fruit flavors resemble blackberry, the texture is broad and grippy with tannins and the finish is powerful with more oak sensations.

title: Piattelli 2011 Grand Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Tupungato)
excerpt: Rooty, stalky, earthy aromas are spread wide and thin. This Cab has ...
description: Rooty, stalky, earthy aromas are spread wide and thin. This Cab has a gritty feel and hard tannins. Stalky flavors of coffee grinds are herbal and tough, while heat, sauciness and tomato-leaf flavors suggest cool-climate origins. Overall this is racy and cool in style; drink now.

title: Vinum 2013 The Insider Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Juicy with blackberry and cola notes on the nose, but not overly ...
description: Juicy with blackberry and cola notes on the nose, but not overly dense thanks to a black-slate minerality, this wine offers somewhat simple grape-candy flavors on the palate along with lilacs and other purple flower elements. Those make for a fairly tasty and easy-to-quaff bottle.

title: Joullian 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Carmel Valley)
excerpt: Grape fruit leather, dense violets, black slate and a hint of barnyard ...
description: Grape fruit leather, dense violets, black slate and a hint of barnyard aromas make for an interesting, purple-leaning nose on this wine. The palate is quite herbal, tinged with dried oregano as well as a berry-juice ripeness.

title: Magnolia Court 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Dried blueberries and chopped oregano show on the nose of this widely ...
description: Dried blueberries and chopped oregano show on the nose of this widely distributed brand. The palate is powered by sagebrush and other wild herbs, with plum and olallieberry fruit.

title: Cosentino 2012 The Cab Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: This full-bodied wine owes a lot to oak flavors. Aromas like maple ...
description: This full-bodied wine owes a lot to oak flavors. Aromas like maple syrup and brown sugar lead to nearly sweet flavors that resemble boysenberry jam. It is tannic, robust and rather stiff in texture.

title: Charles Krug 2012 Limited Release Cold Springs Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Howell Mountain)
excerpt: A helping of Petit Verdot adds to the strength and power of ...
description: A helping of Petit Verdot adds to the strength and power of this gigantic, full-bodied wine, which shows elements of waxy plum, dried herb and even a touch of bell pepper on the palate, not quite resolved.

title: Sand Point 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: This smells like waffles and maple syrup, and feels very generous. The ...
description: This smells like waffles and maple syrup, and feels very generous. The smooth texture shows moderate tannins, while a brown-sugar note rounds out the finish.

title: Charles Krug 2012 Vintage Selection Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Leathery and somewhat green, this wine has yet to find its balance, ...
description: Leathery and somewhat green, this wine has yet to find its balance, combining 95% Cabernet Sauvignon with 3% Malbec and 2% Petit Verdot. It veers between heavy, ripe tension and an underripe underbelly, finishing unsure.

title: Limited by Cambridge Cellars 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
excerpt: Forest berries, perfumed violets and pine needles entertain the nose on this ...
description: Forest berries, perfumed violets and pine needles entertain the nose on this widely available bottling. The palate shows dried herbs, tar and smashed blackberries.

title: Katherine Goldschmidt 2013 Crazy Creek Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: A closed, tight and grippy wine, this has a big tannic structure ...
description: A closed, tight and grippy wine, this has a big tannic structure that supports a landscape of cassis, cranberry and ripe plum, along with clove and tobacco. Fuller-bodied in style, it finishes smooth and lean.

title: Tussock Jumper 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (San Juan)
excerpt: Jumpy cherry and plum aromas are fresh and direct. This has a ...
description: Jumpy cherry and plum aromas are fresh and direct. This has a wiry, grabby palate, with raspberry and spiced plum flavors. Rubbery tannins, edgy acidity and reedy red-berry flavors create an intense but rough ending.

title: Mascota 2014 ROD Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Tight wild berry and cherry aromas come with a soapy accent. This ...
description: Tight wild berry and cherry aromas come with a soapy accent. This is blocky and fiercely tannic, with muscular, grapy flavors that hint at blackberry before turning hot and bitter on the finish.

title: Acumen 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
excerpt: The nose on this appellation blend is kind of sour, with gravel, ...
description: The nose on this appellation blend is kind of sour, with gravel, blackberry and blueberry. The palate is also a bit sour and bitter, with beet juice, juniper and eucalyptus notes.

title: Kaiken 2012 Ultra Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Stewy, muddled, herbal aromas come prior to a chunky, chewy palate. Flavors ...
description: Stewy, muddled, herbal aromas come prior to a chunky, chewy palate. Flavors of compost, nutty berry fruits and turned earth lack freshness, while a stewed finish tastes mulchy and feels tannic.

title: Angulo Innocenti 2014 Nonni Cabernet Sauvignon (La Consulta)
excerpt: Leafy aromas of tomato and green herbs pile on the pyrazines. This ...
description: Leafy aromas of tomato and green herbs pile on the pyrazines. This distinctly herbal Cabernet is full and chunky in feel, with flavors that follow the nose: bell pepper and spicy tomato lead the way. A peppery finish is herbal to the last note.

title: Lockwood 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (San Lucas)
excerpt: Sour blackberry and smoked meat aromas greet the nose on this bottling ...
description: Sour blackberry and smoked meat aromas greet the nose on this bottling from a small, relatively unknown appellation in Monterey County. The flavors are a tad flat, with some sour cherries and tar.

title: San Felipe 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Mossy, spicy blackberry aromas are more encouraging than what comes after. This ...
description: Mossy, spicy blackberry aromas are more encouraging than what comes after. This is rubbery and astringent, with blackened flavors of licorice and toasted oak.

title: 25 Lagunas 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (San Juan)
excerpt: Sharp berry and cherry aromas are like nail polish. A hard palate ...
description: Sharp berry and cherry aromas are like nail polish. A hard palate offers zero give, while plum and cherry flavors are tart before turning more sour and medicinal on the finish.

title: Darioush 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Smoky leather and cigar make for a formidable entry on the nose ...
description: Smoky leather and cigar make for a formidable entry on the nose before huge, layered tannins rise to the fore. A balance of acidity and brightness lurks beneath the weight, rounded by succulent blackberry and black cherry. Cellar through 2022.

title: Merus 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Coombsville)
excerpt: From winemakers Dave Lattin and David Ramey, this tremendous wine is sourced ...
description: From winemakers Dave Lattin and David Ramey, this tremendous wine is sourced from both Coombsville and Yountville, with small amounts of Petit Verdot, Malbec and Merlot in the blend, the latter from Soda Canyon. Smoky cigar, tar and meat direct the nose, atop concentrated, dark, brooding fruit and leathery tannins. Cellar through 2020.

title: Janzen 2012 Beckstoffer To Kalon Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Floral and soft, with a substantial foundation of leather and black licorice, ...
description: Floral and soft, with a substantial foundation of leather and black licorice, this is a tremendously seductive wine, layered and complex, with years to go in terms of structure. Already it offers velvety tannins and dreams of blackberry patches gone by, finishing with succulence and a taste of pure dark chocolate. Cellar through 2022.

title: Monticello Vineyards 2012 Jefferson Cuvee Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Extremely seductive aromas of caramel, toasted oak, beach campfire, blackberry, black cherry ...
description: Extremely seductive aromas of caramel, toasted oak, beach campfire, blackberry, black cherry and thin mint cookies welcome the nose to this bottling. The palate is equally complex and inviting, with milk chocolate, cherry pie, smoked pork and dried oregano flavors, tongue-tantalizing all around.

title: Adams Bench 2012 Red Willow Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Aromatically brooding, this wine slowly opens to reveal notes of scorched earth, ...
description: Aromatically brooding, this wine slowly opens to reveal notes of scorched earth, incense, cassis, herbs and flowers. It coats the palate with layer upon layer of cherry and plum flavors supported by chewy tannins. The finish lingers. It will be best after 2020.

title: Fielding Hills 2012 Estate Riverbend Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Wahluke Slope)
excerpt: Still in its shell, this wine has aromas of cocoa, vanilla, spice ...
description: Still in its shell, this wine has aromas of cocoa, vanilla, spice and dark cherries, showing a mixture of fruit and barrel. The flavors are dense, concentrated and opulent, revealing multiple layers and a hedonistic styling.

title: Ancient Peaks 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Coming from a vineyard first planted by Mondavi in the late 1990s, ...
description: Coming from a vineyard first planted by Mondavi in the late 1990s, this well-priced and widely available wine shows blackberry, violets, black pepper and just snapped dark chocolate on the nose. Fresh, lively black cherries and blueberries meld with fennel, tarragon and lots of herbal spice, all held together by smooth tannins.

title: Whitehall Lane 2011 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Sublime leather and a shake of black peppercorn provide a touch of ...
description: Sublime leather and a shake of black peppercorn provide a touch of intrigue to this wine that gets better in the glass as it goes. Elegant, balanced and displaying cool-vintage sparks of pencil shavings and cranberry, it is effortlessly spicy in clove, particularly on the finish.

title: Easton 2012 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
excerpt: An enticing, spicy, cedary, toasty aroma leads to generous flavors of black ...
description: An enticing, spicy, cedary, toasty aroma leads to generous flavors of black cherry, wood smoke and dried plum. The body is full, the texture is bold, firmly tannic and buoyed by acidity that provides grip on the palate and makes it a great match for rich proteins. Best after 2019.

title: Ruby Hill Winery 2011 Jewel Collection Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: Strong impressions of bold fruit flavors partner with enchanting new oak nuances. ...
description: Strong impressions of bold fruit flavors partner with enchanting new oak nuances. Aromas offer cedar, tobacco and clove, while flavors resemble black cherry, currant and dark chocolate. This is robust, packed with opulent fruit and framed by a layer of fine tannins that needs time to soften. It will be best after 2020.

title: Seven Hills 2012 Klipsun Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: Coffee, herb, cherry, cocoa and barrel-spice aromas draw you into the glass. ...
description: Coffee, herb, cherry, cocoa and barrel-spice aromas draw you into the glass. The palate brings down a velvet hammer with dense, brooding dark cherry flavors backed by tightly wound tannins. It has the stuffing to go the distance. Wait until 2021 or give it a day-long decant.

title: Meyer Family Cellars 2012 Fluffy Billows Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: A 100% varietal wine, this Cab is subtle and elegant in crisp ...
description: A 100% varietal wine, this Cab is subtle and elegant in crisp red fruit, bordering on a richness that remains at the cusp of the palate. Leather and tobacco leaf figure into the mix as well, along a well-integrated foundation of oak and tannin, finishing with a hint of brick.

title: Midsummer Cellars 2012 Katz Family Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
excerpt: Pencil lead and leather pouch partner with ripe, concentrated blackberry. Well-integrated tannins ...
description: Pencil lead and leather pouch partner with ripe, concentrated blackberry. Well-integrated tannins offer smoothness, making the wine both complex and very drinkable.

title: Mt. Brave 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
excerpt: From high-elevation vineyards, this is a lean, dusty wine driven by dried ...
description: From high-elevation vineyards, this is a lean, dusty wine driven by dried herb, blueberry and savory tobacco, with a floral flirtation on the bouquet. Integrated tannins are still sizable and structured, the midpalate touched by a gamy, meaty suggestion akin to charcuterie.

title: Tulpen 2010 Dry Land Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: This wine is at the fringes in Washington, exploring dry farming where ...
description: This wine is at the fringes in Washington, exploring dry farming where irrigation is the norm. Fresh herb, blackberry and raspberry aromas lead off. Packed with rich, elegant fruit flavors, it also has an herbal streak running from head to tail.

title: Fall Line 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Aromas of blackberry and raspberry liqueur meld with high-toned herbs and barrel ...
description: Aromas of blackberry and raspberry liqueur meld with high-toned herbs and barrel spices on this blend of Artz, Boushey and Red Willow vineyards. The flavors are rich and pack a hefty punch, with grainy tannins backing it all up.

title: Ambassador Vineyard 2012 Plenipotentiary Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: The aromas of woodspice, vanilla and cedar are primary at present on ...
description: The aromas of woodspice, vanilla and cedar are primary at present on this wine that seems initially closed on the nose. The palate is more vibrant, with cranberry and cherry flavors framed by a tart lick of acidity. Its best days in front of it. Drink after 2021.

title: S.R. Tonella 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: From a fourth-generation winemaking and grape-growing family, this Cab with 5% Merlot ...
description: From a fourth-generation winemaking and grape-growing family, this Cab with 5% Merlot conveys peppercorn, cedar and dried herb, a slice of pencil lead on the periphery. Cranberry, cherry and rhubarb dance around its smooth, substantial edges, with dense tannins and vanilla surging on the lengthy, spicy finish.

title: Tulpen 2010 Tokar Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: A rare single-vineyard bottling from this tiny site, this wine offers aromas ...
description: A rare single-vineyard bottling from this tiny site, this wine offers aromas of black licorice, herbs, cassis, dates and black cherry. The palate brings tart, vibrant acidity along with chewy tannins.

title: City Winery Chicago 2012 Obsidian Ridge Vineyard Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Hills Lake County)
excerpt: This is bold in flavor, full in body and quite firm in ...
description: This is bold in flavor, full in body and quite firm in texture. Aromas are densely fruity, like blackberry and cranberry, while flavors are ripe and deep. A strong mixture of tannin and grape acidity holds everything in rather tightly, especially on the finish. Approachable now, it will mature nicely through at least 2020.

title: Keating 2012 Encomium Cabernet Sauvignon (North Coast)
excerpt: The color is about as deep as wine gets, virtually black except ...
description: The color is about as deep as wine gets, virtually black except for a thin red-purple rim. The aromas resemble black cherries, even black olives and the flavors are as rich as blackberry jam, but without the sweetness. So this is a bold, full-bodied wine with lots of well-integrated tannins that make it astringent to drink at this young age. It will be best after 2020, when it will have softened and gained more diverse flavors.

title: Northstar 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The fruit for this 100% varietal wine comes from Cold Creek, Klipsun ...
description: The fruit for this 100% varietal wine comes from Cold Creek, Klipsun and Anna Marie vineyards. Herb, dark fruit, toast and raspberry aromas lead to tightly wound fruit flavors with a buttery top note. Its best days await. Enjoy after 2018.

title: Summit Lake 2010 Emily Kestrel Cabernet Sauvignon (Howell Mountain)
excerpt: From a small family-run operation that is 100% estate, this Cab is ...
description: From a small family-run operation that is 100% estate, this Cab is thick in blueberry and blackberry, almost syrupy rich. With a big juicy backbone, it offers a full-figured body and leathery texture, ending explosively with notes of black licorice and toffee. Cellar through 2020.

title: Garavin 2011 Linked Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Knights Valley)
excerpt: A minuscule amount of this wine was made, 95% varietal with a ...
description: A minuscule amount of this wine was made, 95% varietal with a 5% addition of Merlot. A subtle aroma of dill opens the wine, informed later by a more substantial thickness of dark cherry and plum. The tannins are on their way to integrating. Enjoy now through 2016.

title: Groth 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: This structured wine is lithe and ethereal in dried herb and cranberry, ...
description: This structured wine is lithe and ethereal in dried herb and cranberry, with a hint of pencil lead. Puckering tannins suggest aging through 2020, to draw out the more succulent layers of black cherry and plum. The wine has 12% Merlot.

title: Barrister 2012 Sagemoor Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Brooding aromas of barrel spice, black cherry, coffee bean and herb lead ...
description: Brooding aromas of barrel spice, black cherry, coffee bean and herb lead to tart, focused fruit and barrel flavors that linger.

title: Hogue 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas of cocoa, dark berries, leather and vanilla are followed by tart ...
description: Aromas of cocoa, dark berries, leather and vanilla are followed by tart cranberry and cherry flavors backed by grainy tannins. It delivers a lot of fruit intensity and enjoyment.

title: Meyer Family Cellars 2012 Spitfire Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: This 100% varietal wine was aged for two years in American oak, ...
description: This 100% varietal wine was aged for two years in American oak, half of it new. With a mouthful of clove, cinnamon and black currant, as well as leather, it remains juicy on the palate, though should take on additional complexity after cellaring. Drink now through 2020.

title: Roth 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Powerfully dark in color and strong in aromas of blackberry and chocolate, ...
description: Powerfully dark in color and strong in aromas of blackberry and chocolate, this smooth, sizable wine has big tannins that soften as they go. Black pepper, tobacco and cinnamon round out on the palate, before a lengthy finish of coconut and vanilla.

title: Whitehall Lane 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: With a healthy helping of Merlot, as well as Petit Verdot and ...
description: With a healthy helping of Merlot, as well as Petit Verdot and Malbec, this Cab is soft and well integrated, high in acidity with layers of bright, just-picked raspberry. Lurking in the underbelly of its soul are elements of cedar and dried herb.

title: Murphy-Goode 2012 Terra A Lago Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: This 100% varietal wine opens with a strong bouquet of black licorice, ...
description: This 100% varietal wine opens with a strong bouquet of black licorice, maybe even fennel, before big, boisterous tannins stomp the stage. Full bodied and exuberant in blackberry and black cherry, the oak is measured. A backbone of structure could stand up to aging.

title: Bougetz 2012 Amaryllis Cabernet Sauvignon (Spring Mountain)
excerpt: This wine needs time to open, but when it does it reveals ...
description: This wine needs time to open, but when it does it reveals smooth, thick oakiness on the palate that settles into a complementary note to the spicy clove and cherry vanilla. Medium to fuller-bodied in style, it finishes softly.

title: Louis M. Martini 2011 Monte Rosso Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Rich, thick and velvety, this has a wealth of heightened acidity to ...
description: Rich, thick and velvety, this has a wealth of heightened acidity to buoy the more intense aspects. The wine hails from the mighty vineyard overlooking Sonoma Valley, which will, going forward, be within the new Moon Mountain AVA. Coconut macaroon and dark chocolate mark it from start to full-bodied finish.

title: Pomum Cellars 2012 Shya Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Mostly Cabernet Sauvignon along with 10% each Merlot and Petit Verdot, this ...
description: Mostly Cabernet Sauvignon along with 10% each Merlot and Petit Verdot, this wine displays aromas of dried and fresh herbs, flowers, black tea, dark chocolate and cherry. The fruit and savory flavors are sweet and supple, backed by tightly coiled tannins that need time to unwind.

title: SuLei 2012 Les Collines Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: All varietal, this wine offers aromas of cocoa, fresh herbs, cassis, cranberry ...
description: All varietal, this wine offers aromas of cocoa, fresh herbs, cassis, cranberry and licorice. The flavors are sweet and high octane, with an open finish.

title: Savage Grace 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Coming from 7 Mile Vineyard in the Rattlesnake Hills, this 100% varietal ...
description: Coming from 7 Mile Vineyard in the Rattlesnake Hills, this 100% varietal wine saw only a short time in neutral French oak. That puts the focus on the strawberry preserve and spice aromas from this site. The textured, layered mouthfeel is where this wine truly shines.

title: William Church 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Vibrant aromas of black plum, cassis, dried leather, licorice and herb lead ...
description: Vibrant aromas of black plum, cassis, dried leather, licorice and herb lead to full, sweet, soft-feeling dark fruit flavors that linger.

title: Va Piano 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: This wine brings aromas of blackberry, dates and spice. The palate displays ...
description: This wine brings aromas of blackberry, dates and spice. The palate displays abundant cherry flavors with lightly chalky tannins.

title: Y Rousseau 2012 Le Roi Soleil Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
excerpt: Syrupy thick at first, decadent enough for a king, this rich red ...
description: Syrupy thick at first, decadent enough for a king, this rich red is defined by vanilla French toast and blackberry jam aromas and flavors. It finds balance midway through on the palate, veering into crisper red tones of cranberry and rhubarb. Time will help mellow things out. Cellar through 2020.

title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The aromas offer notes of boysenberry, herb and barrel spices, with the ...
description: The aromas offer notes of boysenberry, herb and barrel spices, with the Syrah blended in (11%) showing itself. The blue and black fruit flavors are lush and fruit forward, with soft tannins, a silky mouthfeel and a sustained sense of balance. It drinks best at a cool 62 degrees.

title: Den Hoed 2011 Andreas Wallula Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: This wine is still in its shell, with aromas of herbs, cherry ...
description: This wine is still in its shell, with aromas of herbs, cherry cola and medicine cabinet. Flavors are elegant with firm, chewy tannins and coffee flavors that linger. Give it time to open up.

title: Paradise Ridge 2012 Rockpile Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Rockpile)
excerpt: Ripe black cherry and vanilla swirl around notes of cedar and dusty ...
description: Ripe black cherry and vanilla swirl around notes of cedar and dusty tannins, combining seamlessly on the palate. From an appellation not known for the variety, it does justice to mountain fruit and power, finishing with substance.

title: Stags' Leap Winery 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Rounded by small amounts of Merlot, Malbec and Petit Verdot, this Cab ...
description: Rounded by small amounts of Merlot, Malbec and Petit Verdot, this Cab is earthy and lean on entry, before developing in the glass into juicy dark cherry and leathery notes. Smooth, integrated oak and tannin leave an impression in terms of texture, with a persistence of tannin on the finish.

title: The Show 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: This very attractive wine checks off each box: a seductive oak-spice aroma, ...
description: This very attractive wine checks off each box: a seductive oak-spice aroma, rich fruit flavors, good concentration, firm tannins and a lingering finish. The combination of powerful flavors and a sophisticated texture makes it delicious.

title: Cedarville Vineyard 2010 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (El Dorado)
excerpt: Fully ripe, saturated fruit aromas lead to deep, lush flavors and a ...
description: Fully ripe, saturated fruit aromas lead to deep, lush flavors and a smooth, moderately tannic texture. The wine lets dried plum flavors shine through without a lot of oak tones, so it tastes focused and pure. It keeps improving with each sip. Best now through 2019.

title: Duckhorn 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: With just a handful of Merlot, this wine is dense and juicy, ...
description: With just a handful of Merlot, this wine is dense and juicy, exhibiting warm layers of black currant and blackberry around old-school tobacco and tar. Medium bodied, the dusty tannins are well integrated and finely calibrated, giving the wine an age-worthy profile. Cellar through 2019.

title: Snoqualmie 2013 Eco Made with Organic Grapes Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Dark berry, herb and fig aromas lead to dense, full and palate-coating ...
description: Dark berry, herb and fig aromas lead to dense, full and palate-coating dark fruit flavors. It checks all the boxes for varietal correctness, concentration and value.

title: Robert Mondavi 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This value-driven wine has a touch of spearmint and bay leaf on ...
description: This value-driven wine has a touch of spearmint and bay leaf on the nose, and remains savory and herbal on the palate. A bit of heft builds around black cherry and raspberry, ending seamlessly with only the faintest taste of toasted oak.

title: Claro 2013 Justo Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Earth, licorice and spice notes are good accents for cassis and black-cherry ...
description: Earth, licorice and spice notes are good accents for cassis and black-cherry aromas. This Cab has a fresh and easy palate of lightly herbal flavors, plum and cassis. A mild, friendly finish fades away with a lasting toasty flavor.

title: Matetic 2012 Corralillo Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Rich, oaky aromas of coconut and vanilla are matched by earthy, almost ...
description: Rich, oaky aromas of coconut and vanilla are matched by earthy, almost nutty berry and cassis scents. This is tannic, grabby and slightly abrasive, while chocolate, cherry and cassis flavors end long, strong and ripe. Drink through 2018.

title: Hedges Family Estate 2013 House of Independent Producers Sagemoor Farms Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This wine is unmistakably Cabernet with its aromas of olive, herb and ...
description: This wine is unmistakably Cabernet with its aromas of olive, herb and cherry along with whiffs of game. The palate shows a mixture of fruit and savory elements with a restrained styling and a finish that lingers.

title: Casto Oaks 2012 Gardner Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Sierra Foothills)
excerpt: Hints of vanilla and caramel in the bouquet are followed by lots ...
description: Hints of vanilla and caramel in the bouquet are followed by lots of ripe berry and cherry flavors that spread out across the palate and coat it with fine-grained tannins for a firm texture. This is medium to full bodied, deep in flavor and broad but structured in mouthfeel.

title: I Vicini 2010 Laudario Cabernet Sauvignon (Cortona)
excerpt: Grilled bell pepper, black currant and cocoa aromas emerge on the nose ...
description: Grilled bell pepper, black currant and cocoa aromas emerge on the nose of this medium-bodied red. The smooth palate offers blackberry, mature plum, black pepper and a note of dried herbs alongside polished but drying tannins.

title: Emerson Brown 2012 III Michaels Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: Smoky oak and huge, dry tannins inform the personality of this full-bodied ...
description: Smoky oak and huge, dry tannins inform the personality of this full-bodied wine, a filling mix of black plum, cassis and blackberry. Sharper elements of cedar and dried herb are balanced by noteworthy drops of chocolate on the finish.

title: Milbrandt 2012 The Estates Cabernet Sauvignon (Wahluke Slope)
excerpt: With fruit mostly from Northridge Vineyard along with Katherine Leone and Clifton ...
description: With fruit mostly from Northridge Vineyard along with Katherine Leone and Clifton Hill, this wine displays aromas of herbs, vanilla, mocha and green wood. Coffee and cherry flavors are sweet and high octane with light squeeze of tannins.

title: Rutherford Grove 2010 Pestoni Family Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: Peppery, rich and low in pronounced oak, this estate-driven Cab has softened ...
description: Peppery, rich and low in pronounced oak, this estate-driven Cab has softened tannins and is most definitely drinkable now, with pungent, bright fruit and a lengthy, leathery finish.

title: Murphy-Goode 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: This 100% varietal wine opens with beautifully lush aromas of blackberry and ...
description: This 100% varietal wine opens with beautifully lush aromas of blackberry and licorice, before a seamless, soft layering of leather comes in. Soft tannins mark the midpalate, followed by a finish steeped in smoky vanilla and herb.

title: 14 Hands 2012 The Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: Aromas of cherry, vanilla and herb are reserved. The mocha and cherry ...
description: Aromas of cherry, vanilla and herb are reserved. The mocha and cherry flavors are sweet and soft with a cranberry lick on the finish.

title: Concha y Toro 2012 Terrunyo Andes Pirque Vineyard Block Las Terrazas Cabernet Sauvignon (Pirque)
excerpt: The nose is marked by notes of char and oak, with a ...
description: The nose is marked by notes of char and oak, with a strong whiff of hickory. The saturated, jammy palate is tannic and heavy, while fully ripe flavors of black fruits include pepper and herbs before turning towards prune and chocolate on the finish. Drink this full-bodied, grabby Cab now through 2019.

title: Cosentino 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This soft, jammy wine from a good vintage is medium bodied and ...
description: This soft, jammy wine from a good vintage is medium bodied and not overly oaken, offering black cherry and vanilla in equal measure. On the finish is a note of pomegranate puree.

title: Honig 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This meaty, dense wine with small percentages of Petit Verdot and Cabernet ...
description: This meaty, dense wine with small percentages of Petit Verdot and Cabernet Franc is burly in cigar smoke, bacon and oak. Thick on the palate, it softens in time, with a slight taste of black licorice.

title: Mosquito Fleet 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas of vanilla extract, cocoa and fruit leather lead to full-feeling cherry, ...
description: Aromas of vanilla extract, cocoa and fruit leather lead to full-feeling cherry, woodspice and barrel flavors. Mocha and cherry flavors show a good balance that carries through the finish.

title: Three Rivers 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This wine leans into the green side of the variety, with aromas ...
description: This wine leans into the green side of the variety, with aromas of garden herbs, green pepper, dark chocolate and cherry. The palate brings abundant savory flavors along with chewy tannins.

title: Castello di Querceto 2010 Il Sole di Alessandro Cabernet Sauvignon (Colli della Toscana Centrale)
excerpt: Made entirely with Cabernet Sauvignon, this opens with aromas of blue- and ...
description: Made entirely with Cabernet Sauvignon, this opens with aromas of blue- and black-skinned fruit, allspice, scorched soil and a whiff of new leather. The palate offers blackberry extract, grilled sage, licorice and black pepper alongside assertive tannins that leave an astringent, drying finish. The tannins are tightly wound but drink soon, before the fruit evaporates entirely.

title: Franciscan 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Smooth and oaky, this value-minded wine offers varietal notes of cassis and ...
description: Smooth and oaky, this value-minded wine offers varietal notes of cassis and cranberry, with traces of dried herb, cedar and pencil lead. A heftier midpalate strengthens in the glass before a long, clove-infused finish.

title: Koyle 2012 Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Rubber, olive, leather and inky aromas feed into a solid, steady palate. ...
description: Rubber, olive, leather and inky aromas feed into a solid, steady palate. Bold, bulky flavors of black cherry, dark plum and brown sugar finish with moderate depth and structure as well as chocolaty oak. Drink now.

title: Scroll 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: Medium-strength, this wine opens with a bouquet of black cherry and raspberry, ...
description: Medium-strength, this wine opens with a bouquet of black cherry and raspberry, unveiling an intensity of smoke and heat as it goes. Cradled in oak, it flattens on the midpalate before rising in strength and length on the finish.

title: Autoritas 2013 Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Licorice, blackberry, cassis and plum aromas are concentrated and fruity. This feels ...
description: Licorice, blackberry, cassis and plum aromas are concentrated and fruity. This feels fresh, with choppy tartaric acidity creating high tones across the mouthfeel. Baked blackberry flavors are limited but good, while a jammy, black-fruit finish is smooth, with just enough bracing acidity.

title: Wellington 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Thick and lush in red and black cherry, this wine has voluptuous ...
description: Thick and lush in red and black cherry, this wine has voluptuous tannins around a medium to full body. Structured and well balanced, it finishes in a tasty cloud of dust.

title: Girard 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa County)
excerpt: Soft and fruity in black cherry and plum, this wine offers a ...
description: Soft and fruity in black cherry and plum, this wine offers a solid foundation of cinnamon spice atop a mountain of blackberry. The acidity is well measured and the finish medium in length and breadth.

title: Barlow 2012 Unfiltered Cabernet Sauvignon (Calistoga)
excerpt: Thick and richly concentrated, this 100% varietal wine offers a taste of ...
description: Thick and richly concentrated, this 100% varietal wine offers a taste of blackberry and pie-like dark cherry, with sizable tannins. Fruity, it finishes in a flurry of vanilla oak and clove.

title: Sterling 2012 Cellar Club Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: Black in color, this is an extracted, powerful wine, with sturdy tannins ...
description: Black in color, this is an extracted, powerful wine, with sturdy tannins and a taste of black licorice. Full bodied and robust, it finishes steeped in black pepper and leather.

title: Tres Palacios 2012 Cholqui Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Hot, baked, rubbery aromas of black cherry and blackberry feed into a ...
description: Hot, baked, rubbery aromas of black cherry and blackberry feed into a racy, pinched palate with astringent tannins. Herbal plum and berry flavors finish spicy and oaky, with a note of brown sugar. Drink through 2018.

title: Estrin 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Wahluke Slope)
excerpt: Most of the fruit for this wine comes from Riverbend Vineyard. Cocoa, ...
description: Most of the fruit for this wine comes from Riverbend Vineyard. Cocoa, dark coffee, plum, tire rubber and green herb aromas are followed by black fruit flavors with lightly grainy tannins.

title: Kirkland Signature 2012 Signature Series Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: This 75% Cabernet with 20% Merlot and 5% Petit Verdot opens with ...
description: This 75% Cabernet with 20% Merlot and 5% Petit Verdot opens with spicy black pepper and smoky leather, showing full-bodied tannin and texture. Varietal characteristics of cedar play in the shadows, while the overall experience takes its time to wind down on the finish.

title: Murphy-Goode 2012 Poker Knight Cabernet Sauvignon (Knights Valley)
excerpt: Weighted in tannins and oak, this wine is also perfumed in ripe ...
description: Weighted in tannins and oak, this wine is also perfumed in ripe berry and chocolate, along with dried herb. Bittersweet tobacco marks the finish, complemented in vanilla.

title: Siegel 2013 Crucero Collection Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Black cherry and cassis aromas include notes of tree bark, rooty spices ...
description: Black cherry and cassis aromas include notes of tree bark, rooty spices and animal hide. This feels juicy and alert, while toasty black-fruit flavors are mild. Blackened, peppery notes are unchecked on the energetic finish.

title: Wise Villa 2012 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Sierra Foothills)
excerpt: Bright, crisp red cherry and blackberry flavors drive a refreshing, fruity personality. ...
description: Bright, crisp red cherry and blackberry flavors drive a refreshing, fruity personality. Touches of nutmeg and vanilla show through, but this is not an oaky wine by any means. It will please a crowd and pair well with a wide variety of foods.

title: Vigilance 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Hills Lake County)
excerpt: Light, spicy aromas like vanilla and nutmeg and ripe, full blackberry and ...
description: Light, spicy aromas like vanilla and nutmeg and ripe, full blackberry and cherry flavors come with a soft texture and almost sweet balance. This has lots of flavor with medium body and without drying tannins and acidity. The winemaker blended in 10% Syrah and 5% Petite Sirah.

title: SVI 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: Slightly sour aromas of red cherry, dark chocolate and a pinch of ...
description: Slightly sour aromas of red cherry, dark chocolate and a pinch of crushed anise show on this wine made by a Thousand Oaks family with deep Italian winemaking roots. The bell pepper and black pepper elements on the palate blend nicely with sour cherry and tart cranberry fruits, held together by rather sticky tannins.

title: Duckhorn 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This somewhat angular and lean wine holds small percentages of Merlot, Malbec, ...
description: This somewhat angular and lean wine holds small percentages of Merlot, Malbec, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot. A savory sense of cigar and tobacco lies at its heart, the fruit sourced from all across the Napa Valley. Plum and rhubarb pop their heads out before a fuller-bodied oak finish.

title: Gordon Estate 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The volatiles are quite amped up on this wine, along with aromas ...
description: The volatiles are quite amped up on this wine, along with aromas of cola, dried cherries and cranberries. The dark cherry flavors are sweet and rich showing persistence.

title: Joel Gott 2012 815 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: This offers strong oak and smoke aromas, plus ripe black cherry, chocolate ...
description: This offers strong oak and smoke aromas, plus ripe black cherry, chocolate and plum flavors. Full body and firm tannins make it assertive. Not a cocktail wine, this needs to pair with some heavy meat.

title: Santa Carolina 2013 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Briar fruit aromas show notes of moss, leather and herbs on the ...
description: Briar fruit aromas show notes of moss, leather and herbs on the nose. This is solid, chewy and tannic, with blackberry flavors that are herbal along the edges and a bit green in the middle. A spicy, dark note marks the finish, with a hint of coffee.

title: South Coast 2012 Wild Horse Peak Mountain Vineyards 4-Block Blend Cabernet Sauvignon (South Coast)
excerpt: Crushed herbs, a whiff of barrel smoke and rustic elderberry aromas arise ...
description: Crushed herbs, a whiff of barrel smoke and rustic elderberry aromas arise on this nose of this wine. There are plenty of dark elements to the palate, from bittersweet chocolate, black cherries and blackberries to charred beef and dried anise, all held together by sticky tannins.

title: Irony 2013 Small Lot Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (North Coast)
excerpt: Lots of fruit flavors and lots of tannin make this both generous ...
description: Lots of fruit flavors and lots of tannin make this both generous and a bit tight at the same time. While the ripe black cherry and blackberry aromas and flavors are tempting, the texture is firm and may need until 2018 to smooth for best drinking.

title: City Winery Chicago 2012 Haystack Peak Vineyards Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Powerful in black pepper, smoked oak and leathery tannins, this is a ...
description: Powerful in black pepper, smoked oak and leathery tannins, this is a substantial wine, its fruit concentrated and dense. Integrated oak and tannins give it a softness to cushion its sizable strength, finishing dry.

title: Valle Secreto 2012 First Edition Cabernet Sauvignon (Cachapoal Valley)
excerpt: Earthy, spicy, baked aromas of cherry and plum start off the bouquet. ...
description: Earthy, spicy, baked aromas of cherry and plum start off the bouquet. The palate is narrow and pinched, with candied, ultraripe flavors of cassis and brown sugar. Cherry and chocolate notes dominate the finish, which is low on complexity and spice. Drink now.

title: Caricature 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Clarksburg)
excerpt: Stylish oak aromas combine with rich fruit flavors in this full-bodied, velvet-textured ...
description: Stylish oak aromas combine with rich fruit flavors in this full-bodied, velvet-textured wine. It smells like ripe black cherries, vanilla and caramel, with a fruit-forward palate. Made by the Lange Twins Winery.

title: Gen5 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: A streak of sweet spices like vanilla and nutmeg dress up this ...
description: A streak of sweet spices like vanilla and nutmeg dress up this nicely fruity and firm-textured wine. While the oakiness is a bit obvious, the wine does deliver ripe and tangy cherry and blackberry flavors that are delicious.

title: Gravelly Ford 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Fresh red cherry aromas and crisp black cherry flavors carry this light-bodied, ...
description: Fresh red cherry aromas and crisp black cherry flavors carry this light-bodied, moderately tannic wine. Good acidity and those bright flavors will make it an easy pairing with different meat, fowl and pasta dishes.

title: Wattle Creek 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: A hint of deli meat marks the bouquet of this wine, before ...
description: A hint of deli meat marks the bouquet of this wine, before smoke, leather and blackberry characterize the palate, the texture soft yet tannic. The finish takes a heartier tone, as the tannins slightly pucker and stick around.

title: Inconceivable 2012 After the Floods Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Starting out reductive, this wine has aromas of wet copper penny, fresh ...
description: Starting out reductive, this wine has aromas of wet copper penny, fresh herbs, woodspice and dark fruit. The coffee and black fruit flavors are high octane, seeming out of balance.

title: Stefania Mezzetti 2012 Lucumone Cabernet Sauvignon (Cortona)
excerpt: This Tuscan red opens with aromas of red currant, cedar and espresso. ...
description: This Tuscan red opens with aromas of red currant, cedar and espresso. The aromas carry over to the low-acid palate. The fruit is already drying up and the tannins are fleeting, so drink now.

title: Carmen 2012 Gran Reserva Maipo Alto Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Berry, olive, spice and herbal aromas are typical of Chilean Cabernet. Scratchy ...
description: Berry, olive, spice and herbal aromas are typical of Chilean Cabernet. Scratchy tannins and medium overall weight make for some roughness, while raspberry and red-plum flavors finish herbal and spicy.

title: Lyeth 2011 Chronology Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Dried cherry and cranberry combine on the palate around a trunk of ...
description: Dried cherry and cranberry combine on the palate around a trunk of smoky oak, offering a dry, black-peppery sensation. With 13% Malbec, it has a suggestion of blueberry going on as well, before a mid-length finish.

title: Ty Caton 2012 Caton Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: This full-bodied, puckering wine is concentrated in black cherry and blackberry, its ...
description: This full-bodied, puckering wine is concentrated in black cherry and blackberry, its oak tart and surrounded by drying tannins. Once the bottle is open, expect the oak presence to increase along with cigar box and leather pouch.

title: Haywood 2011 Los Chamizal Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: With 17% Cabernet Franc added in, this wine is leathery, rustic and ...
description: With 17% Cabernet Franc added in, this wine is leathery, rustic and tightly tannic, with a sizable presence of oak. Soft, it finishes in a thickness of black cherry and stewy plum.

title: Coyote Creek 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: This is light-bodied and easy to drink while still having some heft ...
description: This is light-bodied and easy to drink while still having some heft of tannins and acidity. It smells like black cherries and toasted bread, and tastes quite fruity.

title: Camelot NV Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: This wine does a good job of delivering ripe cherry and plum ...
description: This wine does a good job of delivering ripe cherry and plum flavors, and has a smooth, inviting texture in spite of a firm level of tannin. The flavors are mild enough to please most anyone.

title: CK Mondavi 2013 Wildcreek Canyon Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Very focused and pure fruit aromas and flavors give this medium-bodied wine ...
description: Very focused and pure fruit aromas and flavors give this medium-bodied wine a tasty and straightforward personality. The texture is relaxed due to soft acidity and tannins, and everything tastes fresh and clean.

title: Sierra Batuco 2012 Reserva Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (Maule Valley)
excerpt: Dry, spicy, lightly leafy aromas are mildly fruity. This is grabby and ...
description: Dry, spicy, lightly leafy aromas are mildly fruity. This is grabby and rubbery in feel, with plum and cherry flavors that fall a bit flat on the finish.

title: Maryhill 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Baking spice, vanilla, dill and cherry aromas lead to a mixture of ...
description: Baking spice, vanilla, dill and cherry aromas lead to a mixture of barrel and fruit flavors, with the oak tannins bringing a sense of astringency.

title: Rutherford Grove 2009 Pestoni Family Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: The fruit has veered somewhat funky and stewy here, giving the wine ...
description: The fruit has veered somewhat funky and stewy here, giving the wine a soft, lean quality that struggles to share its quiet undertones of cherry and vanilla.

title: Barlow 2012 Barrouge Cabernet Sauvignon (Calistoga)
excerpt: This dry, puckering wine driven by 76% Cabernet Sauvignon also contains 11% ...
description: This dry, puckering wine driven by 76% Cabernet Sauvignon also contains 11% Merlot, 10% Petit Verdot and 3% Cabernet Franc. The flavors tend toward the dried cherry, cranberry side of taste, with the oak dense and overpowering.

title: Mirassou 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: This is tasty, quite ripe and bold in flavor but comfortable in ...
description: This is tasty, quite ripe and bold in flavor but comfortable in mouthfeel. Soft tannins are apparent and lend some grip to the texture while the acidity is very low and the finish short.

title: Tangley Oaks 2011 Lot #15 Cabernet Sauvignon (North Coast)
excerpt: Fresh cherry and raspberry flavors and a relaxed, soft texture make this ...
description: Fresh cherry and raspberry flavors and a relaxed, soft texture make this medium-bodied wine enjoyable. There are only touches of acidity and tannin, and the body is not very full.

title: Leese-Fitch 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: The aroma is quite smoky, like a blown-out match or charred oak ...
description: The aroma is quite smoky, like a blown-out match or charred oak staves, and flavors are meaty and smoky too. Medium body, fairly ripe cherry flavors and a sense of sweetness round it out.

title: Backhouse 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: This soft and slightly sweet wine smells like cinnamon and vanilla and ...
description: This soft and slightly sweet wine smells like cinnamon and vanilla and tastes like cherry juice. It is medium bodied and smooth in texture.

title: Rutherford Grove 2011 Pestoni Family Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: Thick and chocolaty, this wine is medium in weight, oak and texture, ...
description: Thick and chocolaty, this wine is medium in weight, oak and texture, and struggles to show its fruit.

title: Cuboid 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: This basic table wine is dry, with plummy aromas and rather neutral ...
description: This basic table wine is dry, with plummy aromas and rather neutral fruit flavors. It is light bodied but with a touch of drying tannin and dusty, slightly herbal flavors that come out on the finish.

title: Kirkland Signature 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: With a smoked char aftertaste, this wine is lacking in fruit and ...
description: With a smoked char aftertaste, this wine is lacking in fruit and fairly simple. A weediness could be interpreted as cedar or dried herb, but teeter-totters on the borderline.

title: Monticello Vineyards 2011 Tietjen Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: Hot gravel, concentrated plums, black peppercorns and dark chocolate syrup show on ...
description: Hot gravel, concentrated plums, black peppercorns and dark chocolate syrup show on the nose of this single-vineyard bottling from the Corley family. Once sipped, the palate is coated in a luxurious liquid, showing olallieberries and blueberries, lifted by aromatic woods, and framed by noticeable but smoothed out tannins.

title: Sojourn 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: This is a 100% varietal wine from a prime appellation, memorably juicy ...
description: This is a 100% varietal wine from a prime appellation, memorably juicy in raspberry, cassis and red currant with a floral, almost tropical flirtation on the nose. Edgy tannins and a depth of concentration smooth out on the lengthy finish, giving this wine a sense of satisfying completion.

title: Zuccardi 2012 Los Membrillos Cabernet Sauvignon (La Consulta)
excerpt: A lightly charred, foresty nose includes aromas of blackberry, cassis, hard spices, ...
description: A lightly charred, foresty nose includes aromas of blackberry, cassis, hard spices, licorice and leather. This is lively but balanced in terms of feel, with richness and raciness playing off each other. Flavors of baked black fruits, peppery spice and licorice finish dark, long and bright, with juicy acidity that will keep this healthy for years to come. Drink through 2024.

title: Cliff Lede 2012 Beckstoffer To Kalon Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Smoothly textured around layers of dark, ripe fruit, this wine from hallowed ...
description: Smoothly textured around layers of dark, ripe fruit, this wine from hallowed Napa Valley ground features richer undertones of cinnamon and clove. Smoky oak and chocolate flesh out the midpalate and finish, providing a spark of plushness and decadence as it fades out.

title: Bodega Catena Zapata 2012 Catena Alta Historic Rows Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Foresty, earthy aromas of leather and black fruits are rugged and a ...
description: Foresty, earthy aromas of leather and black fruits are rugged and a touch rustic. In the mouth, this is voluminous and chewy, with fresh acidity. Flavors of licorice, herbs, pepper, plum and blackberry finish with light herbal notes and bright acidity that will ensure a fairly long lifespan. Drink through 2024.

title: Duckhorn 2011 Monitor Ledge Vineyard Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Restrained, smooth and soft, this vineyard-designate is pillowy on the palate while ...
description: Restrained, smooth and soft, this vineyard-designate is pillowy on the palate while remaining satisfying and expansive in juicy red fruit. Holding 25% Merlot, it offers undercurrents of dried herb and coconut flake atop quiet oak and is a beautiful wine for the table.

title: Finca El Origen 2012 Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Uco Valley)
excerpt: Alluring, attractive aromas of tree bark, licorice, fig and blackberry feed into ...
description: Alluring, attractive aromas of tree bark, licorice, fig and blackberry feed into a layered, concentrated palate with plum, blackberry and peppery flavors. Toasty oak, mild herbal notes and a lot of dark spice drive the finish on this cellar-worthy Cabernet. Drink through 2023.

title: Patland 2011 Stagecoach Vineyard Select Barrel Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Atlas Peak)
excerpt: This powerful wine has benefited from time in bottle, offering an elegance ...
description: This powerful wine has benefited from time in bottle, offering an elegance of peppercorn, cedar and black licorice around a lushness of velvety black fruit. Full-figured, it also exhibits rocky minerality, a nod to its vineyard site, as well as spicy layers of clove on the finish.

title: Corley 2011 State Lane Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Yountville)
excerpt: Sagebrush and dark cherries meld into a clean yet rustic aroma profile, ...
description: Sagebrush and dark cherries meld into a clean yet rustic aroma profile, which also picks up bits of thyme and cedar. Blueberries, elderberries and black plums power the palate, which is framed by strong yet not overpowering tannins, and elevated by woody, wild mint stalks.

title: Watermill 2012 Anna Marie Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (OR))
excerpt: This vineyard is best known for its Merlot but this Cabernet keeps ...
description: This vineyard is best known for its Merlot but this Cabernet keeps pace. It brings a mixture of fruit and barrel aromas of vanilla, blackberry, coffee, licorice and herbs. Flavors are sweet and rich, with coffee lingering on the finish.

title: Pascual Toso 2012 Alta Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Compact, concentrated aromas of licorice, wild brush, fresh herbs, lemon peel and ...
description: Compact, concentrated aromas of licorice, wild brush, fresh herbs, lemon peel and cassis come in front of a high-acid, juicy, racy palate. Flavors of black plum, blackberry, herbs and pepper finish spicy, woody and with some unresolved heat. Drink through 2024.

title: Corley 2011 Yewell Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
excerpt: A nose of vanilla and caramel blended with cooked cherry sauce, licorice, ...
description: A nose of vanilla and caramel blended with cooked cherry sauce, licorice, chocolate chips and cigar box smells like a hedonistic dessert. The palate grows more serious, showing cooked beef, anise, red cherries, elderberries and cedar.

title: Peju 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A majority varietal, this wine also holds small amounts of Merlot, Petit ...
description: A majority varietal, this wine also holds small amounts of Merlot, Petit Verdot and Syrah. These combine well with one another to exude notes of licorice, plum and black cherry. Right now, it ends with sprinklings of dried herb. Dense and tannic, it will soften with time, through 2020.

title: Provenance Vineyards 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Howell Mountain)
excerpt: Concentrated yet balanced, this age-worthy wine is juicy in blackberry and currant, ...
