description: Concentrated yet balanced, this age-worthy wine is juicy in blackberry and currant, with a chewiness to the palate that gives it strength and power. Tar, tobacco and pencil lead shift around on the palate, before the wine finishes clean and sinewy. Cellar through 2020.

title: Amizetta 2012 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This 100% varietal wine is dark and foreboding in brambly blackberry and ...
description: This 100% varietal wine is dark and foreboding in brambly blackberry and dense, smooth layers of textured oak and vanilla. Beyond full bodied, it holds on to enough acidity to make it complex and age-worthy, finishing in a splash of toffee and caramel.

title: Conn Creek 2012 Anthology Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Combining Cabernet with Cabernet Franc, Merlot, Malbec and Petit Verdot, in that ...
description: Combining Cabernet with Cabernet Franc, Merlot, Malbec and Petit Verdot, in that order percentage-wise, this is a well-made wine. Oaky and dusty with refined tannins, its fruit brightly centers around raspberry and red currant.

title: Conn Creek 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Dusty waves of milk chocolate sway over blackberry and black currant in ...
description: Dusty waves of milk chocolate sway over blackberry and black currant in this tightly woven wine, its tannins still thick and richly layered and the oak tight. Let it open a bit in the glass to let the rougher edges soften before enjoying.

title: Chateau Burgozone 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Danube River Plains)
excerpt: Deep ruby in the glass, this wine has a bouquet of black ...
description: Deep ruby in the glass, this wine has a bouquet of black cherry, raspberry, saddle leather and vanilla. It offers flavors of blackberry, black plum and fresh forest mushroom suspended in a cloud-like structure of silky tannins.

title: K Cellars 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Thracian Valley)
excerpt: Aromas of blackberry, ripe cherry, black pepper and espresso bean delight the ...
description: Aromas of blackberry, ripe cherry, black pepper and espresso bean delight the nose. Deep ruby red, this wine has flavors of black cherry, blackberry, cinnamon and nutmeg that are supported by a soft grid of velvety tannins.

title: Steven Kent 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: Vivid aromas of tart cherry and cranberry are followed by equally vivid, ...
description: Vivid aromas of tart cherry and cranberry are followed by equally vivid, crisp and tangy flavors that echo the cherry and cranberry but add richer plum notes and nuances of cinnamon, nutmeg and cedar. This is so well balanced and bright that it tastes lip-smacking delicious now but will improve with age through at least 2020.

title: Steltzner 2012 Martini Clone Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
excerpt: A 100% Cabernet Sauvignon from one of the pioneers of the appellation, ...
description: A 100% Cabernet Sauvignon from one of the pioneers of the appellation, this wine sings in dark plum and violet aromatics. A light oak presence on the midpalate remains contained and restrained. An elegant expression with subtle power, this soft wine finishes in a plume of smoke.

title: Canyon Wind 2012 Clone 4 Cabernet Sauvignon (Grand Valley)
excerpt: Concentrated black and red berries show depth and meet tobacco, vanilla and ...
description: Concentrated black and red berries show depth and meet tobacco, vanilla and sweet cake spice on the nose. The medium- to full-bodied palate brings cocoa-dusted dark bramble berries into the mix, with streaks of graphite adding levity. The tannins offer grip but are not completely overpowering, with tart red currant lightly lingering on the finish.

title: Bulgariana 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Thracian Valley)
excerpt: Dark garnet to the eye, this wine has aromas of black cherry, ...
description: Dark garnet to the eye, this wine has aromas of black cherry, black raspberry, coffee and freshly ground black pepper. Flavors of height-of-summer cherry, raspberry and baking spice persist on the palate through a finish that is awash in silky tannins.

title: Lamadrid 2013 Single Vineyard Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Agrelo)
excerpt: Aromas of tree bark, baked sugar beet, herbs and licorice blend with ...
description: Aromas of tree bark, baked sugar beet, herbs and licorice blend with earthy black-fruit scents on this ripe, jammy, generous Cabernet. Baked blackberry, licorice, rooty spice and cassis flavors finish with herbal notes, a spicy black peppercorn flavor, a licorice hint and smooth tannins.

title: Provenance Vineyards 2012 Barrel Select Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: Another big, dense expression of the vintage, this has a softness to ...
description: Another big, dense expression of the vintage, this has a softness to the tannins that makes it accessible, though the wine will benefit from time in the cellar, through 2017. Cinnamon and clove intermingle with black cherry and currant, finishing in a hint of tobacco.

title: Stag's Leap Wine Cellars 2012 Artemis Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A rich, full-bodied wine with small amounts of Merlot and Malbec, this ...
description: A rich, full-bodied wine with small amounts of Merlot and Malbec, this offers sizable tannins that wrap themselves around dark, brooding fruit and smoky oak. Blackberry and plum intertwine around luxurious chocolate and tobacco, complementing one another on the finish.

title: Watermill 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (OR))
excerpt: This wine displays aromas of vanilla, cocoa, coffee and dark fruit. The ...
description: This wine displays aromas of vanilla, cocoa, coffee and dark fruit. The flavors are ripe and sweet with vanilla accents throughout.

title: Santa Ana 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Firm aromas of oak grain, licorice, black cherry and blackberry precede an ...
description: Firm aromas of oak grain, licorice, black cherry and blackberry precede an alert, spunky palate. Blackberry and cassis notes with juicy acidity drive the flavor profile toward a long, warm finish. This is easy to like and well made; drink through 2016.

title: Trapiche 2013 Broquel Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Dark, smoky black-fruit aromas include graphite. This is round, chewy and balanced ...
description: Dark, smoky black-fruit aromas include graphite. This is round, chewy and balanced on the palate, with ripe but standard flavors of cassis, blackberry and black pepper. Notes of burnt toast and char appear on a solid, ripe finish.

title: Erzetič 2009 Amfora Cabernet Sauvignon (Goriska Brda)
excerpt: This deep garnet colored wine offers aromas of dried cherry, black raspberry ...
description: This deep garnet colored wine offers aromas of dried cherry, black raspberry and smoked sausage. It has an interesting balance of fruity and savory characteristics among raspberry, saddle leather and spicy tobacco flavors.

title: Andeluna 2012 Altitud Cabernet Sauvignon (Tupungato)
excerpt: This shows patented bold blackberry aromas of Cabernet but also herbal, spicy, ...
description: This shows patented bold blackberry aromas of Cabernet but also herbal, spicy, leafy notes as well. A crisp but thorough palate features pointy acidity, while herbal flavors of cassis, plum, spice, pepper and chocolate finish crisp and a bit sharp. Drink through 2022.

title: Katarzyna 2013 Twins Cabernet Sauvignon (Thracian Valley)
excerpt: Vivid aromas of cherry and blackberry set the stage for flavors of ...
description: Vivid aromas of cherry and blackberry set the stage for flavors of black cherry and black raspberry with a hint of citrus zest in this garnet-colored wine. Full-on fruit flavors remain on the palate well into the persistent finish.

title: Mettler Family Vineyards 2012 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: The color is deep, the aromas thick with wood smoke, bacon and ...
description: The color is deep, the aromas thick with wood smoke, bacon and dried plums, and the flavors are ripe, like blackberry syrup but dry. This is full bodied and very firm in texture due to mouth-coating tannins that are nearly matched on the finish by persistent and bold fruit flavors. Tasty now, it should age nicely through 2020.

title: Durigutti 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Cherry, blackberry and cassis aromas are full and friendly, with notes of ...
description: Cherry, blackberry and cassis aromas are full and friendly, with notes of prune and chocolate seeping through. This feels flush, with lively acidity that keeps things cranking in the right direction. Ripe blackberry and fig flavors finish with composure.

title: Proemio 2013 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Rooty aromas of licorice, leather and blackberry improve with airing. This shows ...
description: Rooty aromas of licorice, leather and blackberry improve with airing. This shows hard tannins and a grabby palate along with rooty, herbal flavors of blackberry and dark plum that finish with blackened spice notes, licorice root flavors and lively acidity.

title: Haarth 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Earthy, slightly leathery cherry and berry aromas are nothing unusual. This is ...
description: Earthy, slightly leathery cherry and berry aromas are nothing unusual. This is aggressive in its attack, with energy to spare. Fresh blackberry and black-plum flavors finish with resiny, lactic notes that are oak based.

title: Chakana 2013 Maipe Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Spicy, herbal plum and berry aromas are a bit rubbery and offer ...
description: Spicy, herbal plum and berry aromas are a bit rubbery and offer a sweet hint of cinnamon powder. This is deep and ripe on the palate, with rooty flavors of blackberry, fig and baking spices. Lasting rooty nuances blend with cocoa notes and mild heat on the finish.

title: Sebastiani 2012 Gravel Bed Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Chewy tannins surround generous French oak, the wine densely juicy in blackberry, ...
description: Chewy tannins surround generous French oak, the wine densely juicy in blackberry, licorice and dark cherry, a back note of black olive and coffee within the mix. Juicy at its core, it offers a powerful finish.

title: V. Sattui 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A twinge of cedar and bell pepper show on the nose, before ...
description: A twinge of cedar and bell pepper show on the nose, before a taste of dusty tannin, clove spice and red currant layer themselves softly and simply around a medium-sized body. Let the wine open before enjoying.

title: Joseph Carr 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Soft blue and black fruit play on the palate in this straightforward, ...
description: Soft blue and black fruit play on the palate in this straightforward, well-made wine, which is layered and robust in tannin. A savory taste of gunpowder and tobacco pique on the finish.

title: Sebastiani 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Spicy and juicy, this majority Cabernet also contains Merlot, Petit Verdot and ...
description: Spicy and juicy, this majority Cabernet also contains Merlot, Petit Verdot and Ruby Cabernet, plus a microscopic amount of mixed reds. Aged in American oak, it has soft tannins and flavors of mocha and blackberry, suiting it for many occasions.

title: Kriselle 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rogue Valley)
excerpt: This straighforward Cab is medium-light in density, with hints of green fruit. ...
description: This straighforward Cab is medium-light in density, with hints of green fruit. Flavors touch on rhubarb and cranberry, with a light, short, charred finish. It spent 23 months in French oak, 30% new.

title: Michel Torino 2014 Cuma Made With Organic Grapes Cabernet Sauvignon (Cafayate)
excerpt: Aromas of blueberry and raspberry are floral and exotic, which is usual ...
description: Aromas of blueberry and raspberry are floral and exotic, which is usual for Cafayate wines. This has a chunky, grapy mouthfeel and fruit-cake flavors of stewed berry and plum along with spice notes. A jammy feeling finish is low on structure.

title: Terra Valentine 2012 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Spring Mountain)
excerpt: A majority Cabernet Sauvignon, with 15% Merlot and 7% Cabernet Franc, this ...
description: A majority Cabernet Sauvignon, with 15% Merlot and 7% Cabernet Franc, this wine traffics in huge upfront tannins, accented by clove and dried herb. The power relents on the finish, ending soft.

title: Tilia 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: This is a concentrated, well-oaked Cabernet with blackberry, cassis, leather and woody ...
description: This is a concentrated, well-oaked Cabernet with blackberry, cassis, leather and woody aromas. The palate is fairly tight and tannic, with good structure, while flavors of toasty, spicy plum and berry finish woody and with elasticity.

title: Bodega Privada 2012 Roble Oak Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Brandied cherry aromas are a touch stalky and hot, but overall this ...
description: Brandied cherry aromas are a touch stalky and hot, but overall this opens well. Edgy in feel, this Cab shows baked berry flavors and scratchy acidity in front of a stalky, roasted tasting finish.

title: Finca Sophenia 2013 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Tupungato)
excerpt: Nervy cranberry and grainy-oak aromas struggle to achieve cohesion on the nose. ...
description: Nervy cranberry and grainy-oak aromas struggle to achieve cohesion on the nose. Flavors of buttery oak, green herbs and berry fruits finish with herbaceous notes and a flabby feel.

title: Parducci 2012 Small Lot Blend Cabernet Sauvignon (North Coast)
excerpt: Aromas and flavors of black cherries and pomegranate juice fill this medium-bodied ...
description: Aromas and flavors of black cherries and pomegranate juice fill this medium-bodied and sturdy-textured wine. A generous helping of tannin gives it a firm mouthfeel and more than stands up to the generous fruit flavors. Drink now through 2020.

title: Weisinger 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Rogue Valley)
excerpt: The deep black color of this wine suggests that it spent a ...
description: The deep black color of this wine suggests that it spent a lot of time on the skins, and 20 months in American oak added further grip and grit to the tannins. Cherry tobacco, espresso and plenty of oak flavors lead into a chewy finish with some residual bitterness.

title: Finca Sophenia 2014 Altosur Cabernet Sauvignon (Tupungato)
excerpt: Dark, smoky, herbal aromas come with cheesy notes of oak and horse ...
description: Dark, smoky, herbal aromas come with cheesy notes of oak and horse hide. This has a wiry, high-acid mouthfeel and herbal, spicy, pinched dark-berry flavors. High acidity creates a racy sensation on an oaky, fast-paced finish.

title: Cicchitti 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Jammy, somewhat green aromas are suggestive of tomato sauce with oregano and ...
description: Jammy, somewhat green aromas are suggestive of tomato sauce with oregano and thyme. This feels full, creamy and thick, with earthy, herbal berry flavors that finish with creamy weight and chewy tannins.

title: The Divining Rod 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Made by Marc Mondavi of the Charles Krug-making Mondavis, this is a ...
description: Made by Marc Mondavi of the Charles Krug-making Mondavis, this is a majority varietal wine, with splashes of Petit Verdot, Cabernet Franc and Malbec. Juicy and thick in oak, it offers tastes of dried cherry and blackberry woven around tightly grained tannins.

title: Bulletin Place 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (South Eastern Australia)
excerpt: For an Australian Cabernet, this is surprisingly delicate on the nose and ...
description: For an Australian Cabernet, this is surprisingly delicate on the nose and medium bodied on the palate. Herbal notes intertwine with cassis and licorice, ending with finely ground baking spices. Drink now.

title: Oxford Landing 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (South Australia)
excerpt: This medium-bodied Cabernet is elegant and supple enough to offer some pleasure, ...
description: This medium-bodied Cabernet is elegant and supple enough to offer some pleasure, but also boasts some green bell pepper and eucalyptus notes. Drink now.

title: Recanati 2011 Reserve David Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Galilee)
excerpt: Inky red-violet to the eye, this wine has an intense nose of ...
description: Inky red-violet to the eye, this wine has an intense nose of blackberry, toast and chocolate. Tannins are strong yet well matched by rich flavors of strawberry, raspberry, cranberry, smoke, orange zest and violet. It is full-figured on the palate, with a smooth yet zesty finish.

title: Vine Cliff 2012 Private Stock 16 Rows Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: This small-production wine is a blend of Cabernet Sauvignon with smaller percents ...
description: This small-production wine is a blend of Cabernet Sauvignon with smaller percents of Cabernet Franc, Malbec and Petit Verdot. Pencil lead, cedar and tobacco leaf greet on entry before soft yet generous layers of tannin swirl on the palate, informed by a depth of blackberry. A mix of savory and fruity, the finish is subtle in white pepper. Cellar through 2022.

title: Mithra 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
excerpt: From an estate vineyard high atop the appellation and blended with 9% ...
description: From an estate vineyard high atop the appellation and blended with 9% Merlot, 6% Cabernet Franc and 5% Malbec, this is a bold, balanced wine made by Julien Fayard. Juicy blackberry and blueberry layer along soft, fine-grain tannins, making an impression on the palate. A creamy richness lingers on the finish, accented by black licorice. Cellar through 2022.

title: Golan Heights Winery 2011 Yarden Cabernet Sauvignon (Galilee)
excerpt: Violet-red in the glass, this wine has a nose of blackberries and ...
description: Violet-red in the glass, this wine has a nose of blackberries and gingerbread spice. It is well balanced, with equal amounts of velvety tannins and refreshing brightness cavorting on the palate. Pronounced flavors of blackberry, aniseed, smoke, flint and thyme are accentuated by notes of mint tea.

title: B Cellars 2012 Ehrlich Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: This richly concentrated, vineyard-designated wine is undeniably in balance. It has a ...
description: This richly concentrated, vineyard-designated wine is undeniably in balance. It has a cavern of blackberry and jammy cherry at its core, which simultaneously buzzes in minerality before finishing in a dusting of cocoa and black pepper. The tannins are fine and integrated, providing a generosity of texture that should mellow over time. Cellar through 2027.

title: Sojourn 2012 Vineyard Georges III Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: A 100% Cabernet Sauvignon from the heart of the appellation, this wine ...
description: A 100% Cabernet Sauvignon from the heart of the appellation, this wine expands on the palate, and is an all-around rich, round and ripe expression of health and vigor. Dried cherry and chalky, dusty tannins form the core of the palate, before a satisfying finish of dark, deep chocolate. Cellar through 2020.

title: Sculpterra 2011 Bentley Ironworks Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: This upper-end bottling from the metalworks-minded winery shows black plum, black loam ...
description: This upper-end bottling from the metalworks-minded winery shows black plum, black loam and charred pasilla chile on the nose. The palate is soft and lush, with a proper tannic presentation for the grape, showing more black cherry and a pinch of dill flavors.

title: Walla Walla Vintners 2012 Sagemoor Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This wine commands attention with aromas of coffee, milk chocolate, toast, herb ...
description: This wine commands attention with aromas of coffee, milk chocolate, toast, herb and black cherry. The palate has elegant, layered chocolate and cherry flavors, backed by a light squeeze of tannins. Just a baby now, it needs some time in the cellar to be fully appreciated. It will be best from 2018 to 2024.

title: Novelty Hill 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Appealing aromas of cocoa, vanilla and spice intermingle with dark fruit. The ...
description: Appealing aromas of cocoa, vanilla and spice intermingle with dark fruit. The palate brings plenty of the same, with pleasing richness and texture to the flavors, and lots of hang time on the finish.

title: Feather 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This 100% varietal wine comes from Wallula, Dionysus and Stone Tree vineyards. ...
description: This 100% varietal wine comes from Wallula, Dionysus and Stone Tree vineyards. It brings alluring aromas of red currant, cranberry, coffee and dried herbs. The palate is concentrated and layered, backed by chewy tannins. The textured feel adds to its appeal.

title: Pursued by Bear 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Fruit and barrel intertwine on this wine, with aromas of toffee, shaved ...
description: Fruit and barrel intertwine on this wine, with aromas of toffee, shaved coconut and spice leading to layered blackberry and cherry flavors. This wine is stylish and undeniably tasty.

title: Vine Cliff 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Brawny, with an explosive concentration of blackberry, this intense wine offers hints ...
description: Brawny, with an explosive concentration of blackberry, this intense wine offers hints of tobacco, smoked meat and black licorice elevated on the palate. Blended with small amounts of Cabernet Franc, Malbec and Petit Verdot, it finishes on a bittersweet note and with some black pepper. Cellar through 2020.

title: Jerusalem Wineries 2013 3400 Premium Cabernet Sauvignon (Judean Hills)
excerpt: Deep ruby in color, this wine has a nose of black cherry ...
description: Deep ruby in color, this wine has a nose of black cherry and green bell pepper. The well-balanced flavor profile features notes of cherry, strawberry, smoked meat, Mediterranean herbs and eucalyptus. A network of generous tannins supports a persistent sensation of brightness on the side palate and smoky notes across the center of the tongue.

title: Dalton 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Galilee)
excerpt: Red violet in color, this wine offers a bouquet of black cherry, ...
description: Red violet in color, this wine offers a bouquet of black cherry, raspberry, apple peel and nutmeg. There are flavors of black cherry, eucalyptus, flint and black tea, with a touch of tart cherry. Strong but not overpowering tannins remain on the palate, along with flavors of mint and fresh berries.

title: Dunham 2011 VXVII Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This 100% varietal wine from Lewis and Wallula vineyards beguiles with its ...
description: This 100% varietal wine from Lewis and Wallula vineyards beguiles with its aromas of vanilla bean, butterscotch, baking spice, cherry and cinnamon. Whereas many wines from this vintage put a focus on elegance, this one also displays power, with a pleasing mixture of fruit and barrel flavors that carry through the finish.

title: Vine Cliff 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: Concentrated in black currant, cedar and olive, this has subdued tannins that ...
description: Concentrated in black currant, cedar and olive, this has subdued tannins that are chalky and smooth. The aroma takes on pretty lavender and violet connotations that allure. Dried herb and black pepper mingle on the finish. This wine is lovely now, but should cellar nicely through 2020.

title: Hunnicutt 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Elegant in fine-grained tannins, this well-made, complex wine offers savory cranberry and ...
description: Elegant in fine-grained tannins, this well-made, complex wine offers savory cranberry and cassis plus brighter, spicier red fruit, alongside a layering of graphite, dried herb and chocolate. Full bodied, it remains balanced throughout, finishing with length and breadth.

title: Obelisco Estate 2012 Nefer III Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: Aromas of woodspice, cedar, cranberry and cherry are at the fore on ...
description: Aromas of woodspice, cedar, cranberry and cherry are at the fore on this 100% varietal wine. It shows concentration, finesse and polish, with dry, chewy tannins lending support.

title: Paul Dolan 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendocino County)
excerpt: This is serious and concentrated, probably built to age a few more ...
description: This is serious and concentrated, probably built to age a few more years before its peak. It smells soaked with black cherry and black currant aromas, tastes deep, ripe and compelling, and feels full bodied and firmly tannic. The flavors are powerful enough to match the big texture, so it should improve through 2020.

title: Joseph Phelps 2012 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Rich and concentrated in red cherry, cigar and plum, this demurely approachable ...
description: Rich and concentrated in red cherry, cigar and plum, this demurely approachable and enjoyable wine has the legs to age. Structured and tightly drawn, it holds a tannic overbite that eases in the glass. Cellar through 2017.

title: Alder Ridge 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: Aromas of dried herb, cherry cola and barrel spice are out in ...
description: Aromas of dried herb, cherry cola and barrel spice are out in front on this 100% varietal wine. The cherry and blackberry flavors are sweet and plump, showing concentration and depth along with dry, grippy tannins.

title: Bunchgrass 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: This wine is all varietal from up-and-coming Phinny Hill Vineyard. Aromas of ...
description: This wine is all varietal from up-and-coming Phinny Hill Vineyard. Aromas of earth, herbs, dark cherry and bittersweet chocolate lead to supple, elegant, focused cherry and herb flavors that are framed by lively acidity. Put it on the dinner table to see it shine.

title: Golan Heights Winery 2011 Gilgal Cabernet Sauvignon (Galilee)
excerpt: Aromas of black cherry, almond and espresso bean open on the palate ...
description: Aromas of black cherry, almond and espresso bean open on the palate to flavors of cassis, black cherry, strawberry, black pepper and custard. Smooth tannins linger on the palate accompanied by flavors of juicy fruit.

title: Guardian Cellars 2012 The Rookie Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: A blend of Klipsun and Obelisco vineyards, this Cabernet Sauvignon leads with ...
description: A blend of Klipsun and Obelisco vineyards, this Cabernet Sauvignon leads with aromas of blackberry jam, espresso, fresh herbs and toasty barrel spices (60% new French). The black fruit flavors are rich, ripe and sweet, with the oak playing a prominent part in the show.

title: Pepper Bridge 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: A blend of fruit from Seven Hills (75%), Octave (21%) and Pepper ...
description: A blend of fruit from Seven Hills (75%), Octave (21%) and Pepper Bridge vineyards, this wine shows intriguing aromas of anise, cassis, herb and woodspice. It still seems to be in its shell. The flavors are dense and supple, rich but restrained with the tannins combed to a fine sheen.

title: Stevens 2012 StevensXY Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: A blend of fruit from Dineen, Meek and Sheridan vineyards, this wine ...
description: A blend of fruit from Dineen, Meek and Sheridan vineyards, this wine delivers aromas of black cherry, orange peel, sweet spices and fresh herbs. The black cherry flavors convey polish and depth.

title: Forgeron 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This lightly colored wine displays high-toned aromas of dried herbs, dried flowers, ...
description: This lightly colored wine displays high-toned aromas of dried herbs, dried flowers, cranberries and cherries. The flavors show a pleasing mixture of concentration and restraint with the Petit Verdot blended in (10%) adding some heft and dryness to the tannins.

title: Januik 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: A blend of fruit from Weinbau, Ciel du Cheval, Lady Hawk, Champoux ...
description: A blend of fruit from Weinbau, Ciel du Cheval, Lady Hawk, Champoux and Obelisco vineyards, this is clearly Cabernet with its aromas of milk chocolate, herbs, vanilla, dark coffee and cherry. Flavors are rich yet supple, with a finish that lingers.

title: Amavi 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: A blend of fruit from Les Collines, Octave, Seven Hills, Summit View, ...
description: A blend of fruit from Les Collines, Octave, Seven Hills, Summit View, Pepper Bridge and Goff vineyards, this wine leads with aromas of dried herbs, violets, woodspice, coffee, plum and bittersweet chocolate. The cherry flavors combine richness and elegance, with grainy tannins and oak providing the frame.

title: Seven Falls 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Wahluke Slope)
excerpt: This wine has immediate appeal showing aromas of milk chocolate, cherry and ...
description: This wine has immediate appeal showing aromas of milk chocolate, cherry and dried herbs. The flavors are plump and rich in feel yet backed by soft tannins.

title: Inglenook 2011 Cask Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Originally made between the 1930s and early 1960s, Cask was given new ...
description: Originally made between the 1930s and early 1960s, Cask was given new life by Francis Ford Coppola in the mid-1990s. This vintage is on the money in terms of style, going for a timeless, elegantly lean wine with dense tannins and plenty of vibrancy. Cranberry, black tea and a tease of green olive mark the entry, before denser elements of coffee and tobacco feature on the finish. Cellar through 2021.

title: Januik 2012 Weinbau Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Wahluke Slope)
excerpt: Coming from a vineyard best known for its Cabernet Franc, this wine ...
description: Coming from a vineyard best known for its Cabernet Franc, this wine offers aromas of fresh herbs, coffee, cherry and bittersweet chocolate. Cherry and chocolate flavors play well off of each other, with the finish lingering. The barrel influence plays a prominent role.

title: Novelty Hill 2012 Stillwater Creek Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This is almost all varietal, with just smidgeons of Merlot and Malbec ...
description: This is almost all varietal, with just smidgeons of Merlot and Malbec (2% each) blended in. It displays an appealing mix of fruit and barrel, with aromas and flavors of coffee, spice, pencil lead, herbs and cherry, showing a sense of vibrancy and richness.

title: Vellum 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Made from a majority of Cabernet Sauvignon with a handful of Merlot ...
description: Made from a majority of Cabernet Sauvignon with a handful of Merlot and Petit Verdot, this wine is on the cooler-climate side of the sensory equation, a note of pencil and olive here, a bit of juicy cranberry there. Chalky tannins complete the picture, the wine balanced and medium to light in weight.

title: Alleromb 2011 Scarline Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: High-toned aromas of dried herbs, cocoa, licorice, woodspice and blackberry lead to ...
description: High-toned aromas of dried herbs, cocoa, licorice, woodspice and blackberry lead to full-bodied yet elegantly styled black fruit flavors, with the tannins showing some grit.

title: Abeja 2011 Heather Hill Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: All varietal, this offers aromas of coffee, cherry, chocolate, oak spices and ...
description: All varietal, this offers aromas of coffee, cherry, chocolate, oak spices and green herbs that show a touch of underripeness. The palate displays elegance, restraint and polish along with a tart finish.

title: Slingshot 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This wine is still a baby, pudgy and withdrawn, yet still it ...
description: This wine is still a baby, pudgy and withdrawn, yet still it imparts enough herbal and black cherry to be inviting and promising. It retains the girth of tannins expected in a youthful wine, but is already integrative in oak. Let it open for the full effect.

title: The Leader 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Light aromas of dark chocolate, plum, herbs, flowers and tropical fruit provide ...
description: Light aromas of dark chocolate, plum, herbs, flowers and tropical fruit provide intrigue. The dark fruit flavors are full in feel, showing depth and concentration along with a grip of tannins.

title: Clayhouse 2013 Red Cedar Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: An extremely good deal, this wine will keep both neophytes and experts ...
description: An extremely good deal, this wine will keep both neophytes and experts entertained, with aromas of black-plum jam, dark strawberries and graphite on the lively nose. The palate brings pungent blueberry and black cherry, along with crushed black-lava rocks and pencil shavings right down the middle.

title: Braveheart 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: This engages the taste buds with bright, ripe fruit flavors and balances ...
description: This engages the taste buds with bright, ripe fruit flavors and balances them with good crisp acidity and light tannins, plus spicy oak accents that resemble vanilla, allspice and nutmeg. Medium to full bodied, it feels smooth in the mouth but the lip-smacking tannins carry through on the finish.

title: Nelms Road 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Washington)
excerpt: Fresh blackberry, black currant and tar aromas lead to full-bodied dark fruit ...
description: Fresh blackberry, black currant and tar aromas lead to full-bodied dark fruit flavors backed by dry, chewy tannins.

title: Lauren Ashton Cellars 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: Aromas of coffee, tire rubber, woodspice, dried herbs and cherry tussle in ...
description: Aromas of coffee, tire rubber, woodspice, dried herbs and cherry tussle in the glass. The coffee and cherry flavors show a mixture of elegance and richness, with chalky tannins backing it all up.

title: Aviary 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Blended with smaller amounts of Merlot and Petite Sirah, this wine has ...
description: Blended with smaller amounts of Merlot and Petite Sirah, this wine has a shock of smoky leather and cigar box on the entry, before becoming soft and juicy in mulberry, cherry and vanilla on the palate midway through the glass. Midweight, it remains juicy and smooth on the finish.

title: Tamber Bey 2012 Deux Chevaux Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Yountville)
excerpt: A Cab-based wine with 20% Merlot, this has juicy blackberry and currant ...
description: A Cab-based wine with 20% Merlot, this has juicy blackberry and currant to soften the overreaching tannic profile. Blessed in cedar and tobacco, this also presents a strong showing of dried herb. The fruit leans black and blue, from blueberry to black plum, a nod to the Merlot.

title: Martin Ray 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
excerpt: Muted on the nose and entry at first, this wine develops in ...
description: Muted on the nose and entry at first, this wine develops in the glass, offering juicy blackberry and plum around sturdy, powerful tannins and a whiff of tobacco. Approachable on the palate, it finishes in a splendor of white pepper.

title: Trellis Gate 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: This 100% varietal wine is wound up tightly. Blackberry, coconut, vanilla and ...
description: This 100% varietal wine is wound up tightly. Blackberry, coconut, vanilla and high-toned green herb aromas lead to ripe, full-bodied dark fruit and baking-spice flavors. The oak plays a lead role in the show.

title: G. Reedy 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Rich and thick in blackberry and licorice, this wine is also soft ...
description: Rich and thick in blackberry and licorice, this wine is also soft and juicy on the midpalate, with big black fruit, vanilla and leather. Integrated tannins remain chewy until the finish, when a taste of bittersweet chocolate comes into play.

title: Tranche 2010 Blue Mountain Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: This wine leads with somewhat locked-up, slightly porty aromas of herb, barrel ...
description: This wine leads with somewhat locked-up, slightly porty aromas of herb, barrel spice and dark fruit. The ripe, rich dark fruit flavors show considerably more generosity, with firm, slightly gritty tannins backing them up.

title: Boudreaux Cellars 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Washington)
excerpt: This blend is largely from Bacchus, Seven Hills and Wallula vineyards. It ...
description: This blend is largely from Bacchus, Seven Hills and Wallula vineyards. It offers aromas of fresh herbs, thyme, dry chocolate, cherry and medicine cabinet. The flavors are quite sweet, with dry, chalky tannins backing them up.

title: Pugilist 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Happy Canyon of Santa Barbara)
excerpt: There is rich blackberry juice enhanced by campfire ash and a touch ...
description: There is rich blackberry juice enhanced by campfire ash and a touch of roasted game on the fruity nose of this wine. Black cherries power the palate, but in a restrained fashion, with graphite, black loam and pencil shavings adding to the mix.

title: Patel Napa Valley 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A strong marking of cedar, pencil and green tobacco exude aromatically and ...
description: A strong marking of cedar, pencil and green tobacco exude aromatically and emphatically before soft, silky waves of integrated oak and tannin play on the palate. Elegant, this wine finishes in a hurry.

title: Foundry Vineyards 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Assorted dried herbs, pink peppercorn and bell pepper aromas mix with dark ...
description: Assorted dried herbs, pink peppercorn and bell pepper aromas mix with dark cherries. The cherry and black currant flavors are sweet with dry, chalky tannins backing them up.

title: Waterbrook 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas of coffee, cocoa, green wood and fresh herbs lead to pleasing ...
description: Aromas of coffee, cocoa, green wood and fresh herbs lead to pleasing cherry, cola and chocolate flavors with abundant vanilla and wood accents, with tannins lending some grip.

title: Kennedy Shah 2012 Reserve Artz Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: Aromas of blackberry jam, dried fruit and woodspice lead to full-bodied black ...
description: Aromas of blackberry jam, dried fruit and woodspice lead to full-bodied black fruit and vanilla flavors. Despite its youth, this wine seems advanced. Drink now.

title: Rutherford Grove 2009 Pestoni Family Estate Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Howell Mountain)
excerpt: Thick, like blueberry syrup, this is a soft, layered wine with notions ...
description: Thick, like blueberry syrup, this is a soft, layered wine with notions of vanilla, toasted oak and spearmint that confound on the palate. A substantial, concentrated wine, it finishes in mocha chocolate.

title: Tortoise Creek 2012 Cherokee Lane Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: Generous flavors with a full body add up to a very likable, ...
description: Generous flavors with a full body add up to a very likable, mouthfilling wine that will love a juicy steak or grilled lamb chop. Almost-sweet spices like vanilla and nutmeg come out in the aroma and persist through the fresh black cherry flavors and finish.

title: Hill Family Estate 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A stamp of smoke and toasted oak mark the entry into this ...
description: A stamp of smoke and toasted oak mark the entry into this wine, followed by chewy tannins that wrap themselves around dark layers of chocolate and tobacco leaf, the structure at first impenetrable. The finish is relaxed and somewhat short.

title: Chateau St. Jean 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Substantially tannic and robust in tar and tobacco, this wine smells and ...
description: Substantially tannic and robust in tar and tobacco, this wine smells and tastes big and broad, a good choice for generous cuts of meat, preferably grilled. Black cherry and blackberry expand in waves around the oak and tobacco.

title: Telaya 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas of baking spices, green pepper and cherry lead to lighter-styled fruit ...
description: Aromas of baking spices, green pepper and cherry lead to lighter-styled fruit flavors that seem a bit diluted.

title: Revelry 2011 D11 Dionysus Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Vanilla and green wood aromas are at the fore, followed by cherry ...
description: Vanilla and green wood aromas are at the fore, followed by cherry and herbs. The fruit flavors are sweet and elegant, with the oak nearly completely overriding them.

title: Gravel Bar 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This is a distinctive offering of Cabernet with aromas of vanilla, sugared ...
description: This is a distinctive offering of Cabernet with aromas of vanilla, sugared plum, herb and baking spice. The sweet fruit flavors have a plush feel along with light, plump tannins.

title: Bota Box 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: This full-bodied wine has an earthy, smoky aroma, an abundance of fresh ...
description: This full-bodied wine has an earthy, smoky aroma, an abundance of fresh grapy flavors and a soft but supportive texture. The aroma is pretty strong, and then the otherwise-generous fruit characteristics take over.

title: Buried Cane 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromatic for Cabernet, this wine possesses notes of black currant, green pepper, ...
description: Aromatic for Cabernet, this wine possesses notes of black currant, green pepper, blackberry and herbs. It drinks slightly off dry, offering lighter flavors with a tangy feel and chalky tannins.

title: Barnard Griffin 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Gorge (WA))
excerpt: Despite its youth, this wine seems dried-out with aromas and flavors of ...
description: Despite its youth, this wine seems dried-out with aromas and flavors of medicine cabinet, leather and raisinated black and blue fruit. Drink now.

title: Oak and Vine 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: This easygoing wine smells mellow and plummy, tastes more like brown sugar ...
description: This easygoing wine smells mellow and plummy, tastes more like brown sugar than fruit and has a soft texture and medium body.

title: Wild Meadows 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The aromas of blueberry, milk chocolate and tire rubber are pleasant enough ...
description: The aromas of blueberry, milk chocolate and tire rubber are pleasant enough but the palate distracts with sweet, lightly spritzy blue fruit flavors backed by chalky tannins.

title: Venge 2012 Bone Ash Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Calistoga)
excerpt: From one of three estate-farmed vineyards belonging to the producer, Bone Ash ...
description: From one of three estate-farmed vineyards belonging to the producer, Bone Ash is dry-farmed and planted to old vines in volcanic soils, the minerality of which is divinely present in this wine. High-toned, balanced in acidity and softly structured, it offers a range of fruit, from sharp cranberry to jammy blackberry, changing in the glass over time. Complex and layered, it will cellar well through 2022.

title: The Bridge 2012 A Ken Forrester Wine Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: In this collaboration between Ken Forrester and Jesse Katz, Katz sources from ...
description: In this collaboration between Ken Forrester and Jesse Katz, Katz sources from the same site he favors for his Devil Proof Malbec, crafting here a creamy, decadent Cabernet stuffed in coconut macaroon, blueberry and black cherry fruit. Soft, rounded and yet entirely structured and lush, it is delicious right now and yet should be even more seductive in time, through 2020.

title: Justin 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Richly buttered Bing cherries, plums, licorice, black pepper and a loamy mud ...
description: Richly buttered Bing cherries, plums, licorice, black pepper and a loamy mud minerality show on the nose of this bottling by winemaker Scott Shirley. The palate truly shines, with flavors of chocolate syrup-covered cherries rolled in fresh mint, espresso beans, charred pine and tannins that wake up the mouth and hold its attention.

title: Hoopes 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This cellar-worthy treasure has attention-grabbing spice, leather and smoky oak aromas. Ripe ...
description: This cellar-worthy treasure has attention-grabbing spice, leather and smoky oak aromas. Ripe fruit flavors are heavily shaded with undeniably delicious accents of cedar and chocolate. It is bold in flavor, full in body and quite tannic in texture. Hold until at least 2018; the wine should improve even more after that.

title: Flora Springs 2012 Hillside Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: An estate wine from an elevated elevation, this opens in fragrant red ...
description: An estate wine from an elevated elevation, this opens in fragrant red cherry and vanilla, with a subtle trace of brambly blackberry. Soft, it features a supple mouthfeel, medium weight and a backbone of structure, earthy and enticing. Easily enjoyable now, it should take on added complexity through 2022.

title: Concha y Toro 2011 Don Melchor Puente Alto Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Puente Alto)
excerpt: As per usual, Don Melchor is singing a pretty tune. Deep, dense ...
description: As per usual, Don Melchor is singing a pretty tune. Deep, dense aromas of floral berry fruits and tarry darkness are solid and complete. Pure, elegant and confident across the palate, this delivers firm cassis, plum and cherry flavors backed by a toasty finish accented by licorice. This is rich and brawny but not heavy; drink through 2023.

title: Hoopla 2012 The Mutt Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A wonderful array of aromas wafts up from the glass, resembling pencil ...
description: A wonderful array of aromas wafts up from the glass, resembling pencil shavings (a good thing!), cigar box, touch of earthiness and cherry compote. The mouthfeel is luxurious; layered flavors of black currant, black cherry, chocolate and clove stay lively through the long finish. It drinks well now, but will improve through at least 2019.

title: Flora Springs 2012 Rennie Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
excerpt: Made from 100% Cabernet Sauvignon, this reserve comes from a three-acre block ...
description: Made from 100% Cabernet Sauvignon, this reserve comes from a three-acre block of an estate vineyard. Dark, fleshy plum and soft, supple tannins give it a fruit-tinged structure and lushness, alongside plenty of full-bodied chocolate, tobacco and a hint of mint.

title: ZD 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Peppery and high-toned, this wine offers a restrained and classical taste of ...
description: Peppery and high-toned, this wine offers a restrained and classical taste of red currant and cassis around dried herb and a fine-grained structure of tannin. Juicy, it nonetheless leans savory, making it a compelling and complex experience.

title: Domus Aurea 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Typical of this Cabernet, aromas of earth, tar, eucalyptus and spice blend ...
description: Typical of this Cabernet, aromas of earth, tar, eucalyptus and spice blend with a core of cassis and berry. This is a bit chunky and syrupy in feel, with oaky cassis and berry flavors accented by chocolate. The finish is creamy in texture, with peppery spice notes adding depth. Drink through 2022.

title: Envy 2012 Fortuna Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: A 100% varietal, this represents a tiny offering of this single-vineyard wine. ...
description: A 100% varietal, this represents a tiny offering of this single-vineyard wine. Despite its youth it is silky and supple on the palate. Rich, dense black fruit and graphite marry well and find cohesion among the toasty oak.

title: Undurraga 2012 T.H. Terroir Hunter Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Herbal blackberry, raspberry and leather aromas are solid and inviting on the ...
description: Herbal blackberry, raspberry and leather aromas are solid and inviting on the nose. The palate is juicy and lithe, with a springy, bouncy mouthfeel and lightly herbal, earthy flavors of cassis and raspberry. Drink through 2019.

title: Ventisquero 2011 Grey Glacier Single Block Trinidad Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Spicy, dry plum and berry aromas are lightly floral and complex on ...
description: Spicy, dry plum and berry aromas are lightly floral and complex on the nose. This Cab is elegant and sturdy on the palate, with plum, raspberry and chocolate flavors that finish with grip, length, complexity and a welcome freshness. Drink through 2021.

title: Laelaps 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (OR))
excerpt: This 100% varietal wine comes from The Rocks region of the valley. ...
description: This 100% varietal wine comes from The Rocks region of the valley. It offers brooding aromas of herbs, dried cherry, licorice and green tea, while the flavors are restrained with cranberry-like tartness and grainy tannins.

title: Davies 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: From vineyards on Diamond Mountain as well as Atlas Peak and Calistoga, ...
description: From vineyards on Diamond Mountain as well as Atlas Peak and Calistoga, this majority Cabernet employs 7% Petit Verdot, giving it a tad more weight and tannin. It otherwise is a high-toned and herbal wine, offering a taste of black tea amid chocolate and black cherry, finishing in fine-grained tannin and oak.

title: Jack 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A smidgen of Cabernet Franc is blended into this wine, the grapes ...
description: A smidgen of Cabernet Franc is blended into this wine, the grapes sourced from vineyards on both Diamond and Howell mountains. Ripe raspberry and cassis compote give it a juicy expansiveness on the midpalate, before finishing accented in cedar and pencil shavings within a complex wave of dry tannin.

title: Oakville Winery 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: Soft and juicy, this is a classically crafted wine, medium bodied with ...
description: Soft and juicy, this is a classically crafted wine, medium bodied with savory notes of cedar, dried herb and black olive. Structured and balanced, it finishes rich and refreshing, with a memory of red currant and cherry.

title: Domaines Barons de Rothschild (Lafite) 2012 Los Vascos Grande Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Cherry, cassis, leather and mineral aromas make for a lively bouquet. This ...
description: Cherry, cassis, leather and mineral aromas make for a lively bouquet. This is round and full on the palate, with welcome division among its layers. Ripe blackberry, fig and chocolate flavors finish lightly baked and heady, showing depth. Drink through 2018.

title: Envy 2012 Kenefick Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Despite its power, this 100% Cab offers subdued aromas of high-toned cassis ...
description: Despite its power, this 100% Cab offers subdued aromas of high-toned cassis around a layering of extracted red fruit on the palate. Soft, it has plenty of well-built structure and will show well over time, exhibiting more of its herbal cedar and subtle oak. Cellar through 2020.

title: Occasio 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: Full bodied, this is saturated with color and tannins, ripe and generous ...
description: Full bodied, this is saturated with color and tannins, ripe and generous in flavor. Aromas resemble dark chocolate, blueberries and cedar shavings, while flavors run to fresh blackberry, cinnamon and clove. The texture is astringent from tannins that will stand up to rich food, and the finish is surprisingly light.

title: JD 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
excerpt: From an estate-grown vineyard and blended with 18% Malbec, in addition to ...
description: From an estate-grown vineyard and blended with 18% Malbec, in addition to smaller percentages of Merlot and Petit Verdot, this wine is crisp and edgy in red cherry and berry, with a layering of earthy fennel. Layered in fine-grained tannins, it finishes dense and seasoned in clove and cinnamon.

title: Amici 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Floral and lush, this majority Cabernet Sauvignon contains 10% Merlot and 6% ...
description: Floral and lush, this majority Cabernet Sauvignon contains 10% Merlot and 6% Petit Verdot, combining for a structured, layered wine accented in black cherry, cedar and dried herb. From vineyards strewn across the Napa Valley, including mountainside sites, it offers power and finesse and should sit well in cellar through 2022.

title: Napa Cellars 2012 Classic Collection Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Bold juicy blackberry and cherry combine for an elegant expression of the ...
description: Bold juicy blackberry and cherry combine for an elegant expression of the variety in this soft, finessed wine, laced in classic notes of cedar. The wine finishes in a complex burst of black licorice and is a good choice for the table.

title: Cameron Hughes 2012 Lot 525 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Juicy and soft in blackberry and black cherry, this wine is nicely ...
description: Juicy and soft in blackberry and black cherry, this wine is nicely resolved in terms of tannin and oak structure,. These provide weight on the back palate, with enough heightened acidity on the finish to stay on balance. Strawberry and dried herb close things out.

title: Castellare di Castellina 2011 Coniale Cabernet Sauvignon (Toscana)
excerpt: Made with Cabernet Sauvignon, this opens with aromas of toast, coffee, black ...
description: Made with Cabernet Sauvignon, this opens with aromas of toast, coffee, black currants and a whiff of cedar. The palate delivers dried black cherries, espresso, grilled sage and a leathery note alongside assertive, astringent tannins.

title: Terre del Marchesato 2011 Il Tarabuso Cabernet Sauvignon (Toscana)
excerpt: This brooding wine opens with aromas of mature blue and black fruit, ...
description: This brooding wine opens with aromas of mature blue and black fruit, allspice, charred earth and whiff of game. The palate delivers spiced blueberry, blackberry, ground pepper, licorice and tobacco alongside assertive tannins.

title: Primus 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Solid berry and cassis aromas are a touch baked on the nose. ...
description: Solid berry and cassis aromas are a touch baked on the nose. This is firm, moderately tannic on the palate, with baked plum, blackberry, vanilla and spice flavors. A woody note of maple gains prominence on the finish.

title: Viu Manent 2012 La Capilla Single Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Brambly cassis and raspberry aromas are warm and a touch cooked. This ...
description: Brambly cassis and raspberry aromas are warm and a touch cooked. This is bullish, heavy and grabby in feel, with big tannins. Blackberry, cassis, herb and chocolate flavors finish ripe and dark. Drink through 2017.

title: Maquis 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Dense aromas of earth, berry fruits, latex and animal fur are a ...
description: Dense aromas of earth, berry fruits, latex and animal fur are a touch challenging at first but balance out with airing. This has a crisp, fresh feel despite coming from a hot year. Lightly herbal, leathery flavors of red currant and wild berry finish oaky, with more than adequate filling.

title: Petra 2012 Potenti Cabernet Sauvignon (Toscana)
excerpt: Subdued aromas of espresso, tobacco, cedar, tilled soil and mature black fruit ...
description: Subdued aromas of espresso, tobacco, cedar, tilled soil and mature black fruit waft out of the glass. Made entirely with Cabernet Sauvignon, the elegant palate offers raw red currants, dried black cherries, clove and anise alongside silky but rather fleeting tannins.

title: Tamber Bey 2012 Oakville Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: Offered in a half-bottle size, this estate Cab-based wine also contains 6% ...
description: Offered in a half-bottle size, this estate Cab-based wine also contains 6% Merlot and 6% Petit Verdot. The blend is crisp, dry and tannic in cranberry, barely ripe cherry and dried currant, swerving savory into dried herb and clove.

title: Cornerstone 2012 Black Label Stepping Stone Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Closed on the nose at first, this wine reventualy reveals black currant ...
description: Closed on the nose at first, this wine reventualy reveals black currant and cassis around wrapped tobacco leaf, the midpalate somewhat dry and puckering in tannin. Concentrated and dense, it finishes in dusty mocha.

title: Rutherford Grove 2010 Pestoni Family Estate Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Howell Mountain)
excerpt: Mocha toffee and raspberry liqueur provide an alluring entry into this wine, ...
description: Mocha toffee and raspberry liqueur provide an alluring entry into this wine, before it evolves into soft layers of blackberry and black currant. Medium to full-bodied, this has thick, dry tannins that stay prominent through the finish.

title: Dark Horse 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: A really good wine for the price, this offers a dark color ...
description: A really good wine for the price, this offers a dark color and varietal aromas of black cherry, black olive and faint dried herbs. Next it layers handsome oak on the rich and fruity flavors. The texture is quite dense without being heavy; while somewhat tannic the mouthfeel is not drying.

title: Envy 2012 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A 100% varietal wine with layers of leather and bacon at the ...
description: A 100% varietal wine with layers of leather and bacon at the core, this full-bodied bottling is otherwise soft and juicy in red and black fruit. Overlaying it all is a smoky quality that overbears at times, but will pair well with the right foods.

title: Eberle 2012 Vineyard Selection Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Deep blackberry and fresh dill aromas arise from this wine by Paso ...
description: Deep blackberry and fresh dill aromas arise from this wine by Paso pioneer Gary Eberle. The flavors are complex and wide-ranging, with milk chocolate, more dill, oregano, thyme, dried cherries and some tar.

title: Santa Luz 2013 Gran Reserva Corte Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Solid but jammy black cherry and blackberry aromas come with hints of ...
description: Solid but jammy black cherry and blackberry aromas come with hints of forest and rubber. This is flush and easygoing in feel, with a friendly, not demanding mouthfeel. Boysenberry and plum flavors finish round and fleshy, with mild tannins.

title: Arbios 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: A 100% varietal wine, this is both soft and dense, herbal and ...
description: A 100% varietal wine, this is both soft and dense, herbal and restrained in cranberry and red currant. Dry and dusty, the body is medium to full bodied, and the finish medium-long. Enjoy now.

title: Cameron Hughes 2012 Lot 515 Monte Rosso Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Densely brambly in red and black berry ripeness, this wine from a ...
description: Densely brambly in red and black berry ripeness, this wine from a superb, high-elevation vineyard site is soft through the midpalate, before revealing megawatts of power and oak on the back of the tongue. Earthy, it finishes awash in vanilla-tinged oak.

title: Indomita 2013 Zardoz Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Woody aromas of sawdust and maple take over a lightly herbal bouquet. ...
description: Woody aromas of sawdust and maple take over a lightly herbal bouquet. Plum, raspberry and chocolaty oak flavors finish herbal and resiny.

title: Atalon 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Sourced from a range of vineyards across the Napa Valley, including Atlas ...
description: Sourced from a range of vineyards across the Napa Valley, including Atlas Peak, Rutherford and Oakville, this intense wine is informed by thick-grained tannins and pronounced oak. Dark blackberry fruit and clove season it well, along with a finish steep in mocha. The blend includes a small amount of Merlot.

title: Vignerons de Buzet 2012 Oniric Cabernet Sauvignon (Buzet)
excerpt: Darkly colored, this comes from the slopes above the small town of ...
description: Darkly colored, this comes from the slopes above the small town of Buzet. It has structure and layers of black currant fruit and juicy acidity. With its firm tannins and ripe fruitiness, the wine will age. Drink from 2016.

title: Force of Nature 2013 Mossfire Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Featuring another awesomely illustrated label, this wine starts off a bit funky ...
description: Featuring another awesomely illustrated label, this wine starts off a bit funky on the nose with dewy bay leaf, oregano-crusted plum fruits and a bit of tobacco. It treads the lighter side of the grape, showing rustic elderberry and more damp herb flavors.

title: Keating 2011 Montecillo Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: A severe edge of dried herb and savoriness in this single-vineyard Cab ...
description: A severe edge of dried herb and savoriness in this single-vineyard Cab evolves into juicy black currant and cassis midway through. The tannins remain tightly wound and thick on the palate, before the wine finishes dry and concentrated.

title: Calcu 2012 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Solid blackberry aromas mark the nose. This is astringent on the palate, ...
description: Solid blackberry aromas mark the nose. This is astringent on the palate, with rock-hard tannins. Blackberry, cassis and prune flavors veer toward chocolate on a choppy, tough finish.

title: Lander-Jenkins 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Not too rich or heavy, this classic, dry wine has plenty of ...
description: Not too rich or heavy, this classic, dry wine has plenty of personality emerging from the mint, cedar and anise aromas, crisp raspberry and cranberry flavors and medium body.

title: Fortune 1621 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: From grapes grown predominantly in Oak Knoll, and blended with Petit Verdot, ...
description: From grapes grown predominantly in Oak Knoll, and blended with Petit Verdot, Cabernet Franc and Merlot, this Cab offers a richness of oak and coffee on the nose before a juicy midpalate delivers red currant and red cherry. It finishes dry in pronounced tannins.

title: Waterstone 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Big, firm tannins frame this wine, blended with small amounts of Merlot, ...
description: Big, firm tannins frame this wine, blended with small amounts of Merlot, Cabernet Franc, Syrah, Petit Verdot and Malbec. Black olive, black pepper and tar provide a savory density and complexity, softened by earthy plum and black cherry.

title: Keenan 2011 35th Anniversary Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Dry and somewhat dull in dried herb and chalky tannins, this wine ...
description: Dry and somewhat dull in dried herb and chalky tannins, this wine lacks fruit, instead taking on a tomato leaf edge.

title: Treasure 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: An earthy funk and puckeringly dry tannins mark this wine, which remains ...
description: An earthy funk and puckeringly dry tannins mark this wine, which remains dry on the palate from start to finish, characterized along the way in leather and black pepper.

title: Summers 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Calistoga)
excerpt: Muted and diluted, this wine is missing structure and fruit, leaving dullness ...
description: Muted and diluted, this wine is missing structure and fruit, leaving dullness to the palate. Black currant and blackberry do their best to shine, amid toasty oak.

title: Vino Vargas 2012 El Taxi Cabernet Sauvignon (Clements Hills)
excerpt: With light plum and strawberry aromas and almost sweet strawberry and marshmallow ...
description: With light plum and strawberry aromas and almost sweet strawberry and marshmallow flavors, this medium-bodied red may be best with semisweet food like ribs in barbecue sauce or pulled pork. The balance and texture are on the soft side.

title: White Oak 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is a largely extracted, puckering wine, rich and full-flavored in blackberry ...
description: This is a largely extracted, puckering wine, rich and full-flavored in blackberry and vanilla. The tannins make it difficult to discern beyond its density and grip. A majority of Cabernet Sauvignon, it also employs Malbec, Petit Verdot, Merlot and Cabernet Franc.

title: Mureda 2011 Oak Aged Cabernet Sauvignon (Vino de la Tierra de Castilla)
excerpt: Jammy raspberry and strawberry aromas are a touch murky. This feels wide ...
description: Jammy raspberry and strawberry aromas are a touch murky. This feels wide and broken down, with jagged tannins. Earthy, undefined, unrefined flavors of mixed berry fruits finish raw and tannic.

title: Aresti 2013 Special Release Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Rubbery, roasted berry aromas show on the nose. An astringent, tannic palate ...
description: Rubbery, roasted berry aromas show on the nose. An astringent, tannic palate shows medicinal flavors of red plum and berry fruits along with savory notes and a shot of clove. The finish brings a salty and oaky note.

title: Montes 2013 Classic Series Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Blue-fruit aromas and flavors are indistinct on the nose. Massive tannins, lemony ...
description: Blue-fruit aromas and flavors are indistinct on the nose. Massive tannins, lemony oak, plastic and graphite notes drive the palate. The finish is a forced marriage of licorice, oak, and vanilla.

title: En Garde 2009 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
excerpt: This exotic Cabernet Sauvignon, which is aged entirely in new French oak, ...
description: This exotic Cabernet Sauvignon, which is aged entirely in new French oak, needs time to develop. A savory edge of forest floor and cranberry drive the palate, while notes of pencil shavings, cedar and garrigue add depth. The palate is lifted in acidity, with tightly gripped tannins on the finish. Cellar through 2019.

title: Woodward Canyon 2012 Old Vines Cabernet Sauvignon (Washington)
excerpt: A blend of Champoux (62%), Sagemoor (26%) and Woodward Canyon (12%) estate ...
description: A blend of Champoux (62%), Sagemoor (26%) and Woodward Canyon (12%) estate vineyards, this wine is aromatically brooding at present, with notes of coffee, toffee and vanilla bean alongside high-toned cherries, dried herbs and flowers. The palate is supremely rich, dense and layered, with milk chocolate, coffee and cherry flavors. Tannins are expertly managed and the wine brings plenty of textural appeal, combining richness and elegance. The barrel notes are primary now, so give them time to integrate. Best from 2025 to 2035.

title: Cooper-Garrod 2010 Two Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: Alluringly seductive aromas of black cherry syrup, blueberry pie, blackberry preserves and ...
description: Alluringly seductive aromas of black cherry syrup, blueberry pie, blackberry preserves and fresh-cracked black pepper draw the nose into this blend of Lone Oak and Valley View vineyards, located 800 to 1,000 feet in elevation. Flavors of blackberry-chocolate liqueur, plums and black cherries are elevated by pine sap, rosemary and strong tannins that maintain perfect grip. Serve with lamb.

title: Foxen 7200 2012 7200 Vogelzang Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Happy Canyon of Santa Barbara)
excerpt: Winemaker Billy Wathen is steadily perfecting this appellation, and this wine shows ...
description: Winemaker Billy Wathen is steadily perfecting this appellation, and this wine shows blackberry, black pepper and roast beef crust on the nose. A very savory and interesting palate mixes Bing cherries and dried berries with peppered beef jerky, oregano and even roasted garlic, making for an elegant and delicious wine.

title: Ramey 2012 Annum Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A blend of 75% Cabernet Sauvignon and 25% Cabernet Franc from a ...
description: A blend of 75% Cabernet Sauvignon and 25% Cabernet Franc from a sweet vineyard spot near Dalle Valle, this is a lovely, softly textured wine. Shy on the nose yet powerful on the palate, it offers a burst of tightly wound tannin and leather at the fore. Chocolate and dried herb with a layering of black licorice give it a dark complexion and build. Be sure to mellow it in the cellar, through 2022.

title: Westerly 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Happy Canyon of Santa Barbara)
excerpt: Former Harlan Estate cellarmaster Adam Henkel presents aromas of tart Bing cherry, ...
description: Former Harlan Estate cellarmaster Adam Henkel presents aromas of tart Bing cherry, bright red berry, black slate and dried black cherry on this wine. The palate shows initial flavors of oregano, thyme and dill then pops with blackberries and black cherries, all flecked by ample coffee and cola seasonings.

title: Pear Valley 2010 Estate Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Rich and seductive aromas of black cherry, vanilla-laced fudge, rendered animal fat ...
description: Rich and seductive aromas of black cherry, vanilla-laced fudge, rendered animal fat and chopped dill entice the nose on this bottling. The palate is juicy with blackberry, black cherry and just-pulled espresso, but rather lean and quite restrained, with expert measures of acidity and tannins.

title: Flora Springs 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Fresh and fruity, this elegant Cab is supported by smaller percentages of ...
description: Fresh and fruity, this elegant Cab is supported by smaller percentages of Malbec and Petit Verdot. Firm tannins and a low imprint of oak allow the cinnamon-dusted black cherry and cassis to speak, girded by a fine structure and peppery finish.

title: Carden 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This is 100% varietal and aged in 60% new French oak, offering ...
description: This is 100% varietal and aged in 60% new French oak, offering primary aromas of blackberry, black cherry, and savory herbs accented by woodspice. The fruit flavors are ripe and focused with firm tannins and a pleasing lick of cranberry-like acidity. Best after 2020.

title: Obelisco Estate 2012 Electrum Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: Barrel aromas of cocoa, vanilla and clove play off cherry and cranberry. ...
description: Barrel aromas of cocoa, vanilla and clove play off cherry and cranberry. The flavors are focused and high octane with a creamy feel, well-integrated tannins and a tart, cranberry-filled finish.

title: Trust 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The black and red cherry, herb and licorice aromas are spot-on but ...
description: The black and red cherry, herb and licorice aromas are spot-on but the pillowy soft mouthfeel and tart, focused fruit flavors steal the show, showing elegance and intensity along with a lingering finish.

title: Saviah 2011 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: All of this 100% varietal comes from McClellan Estate Vineyard. The wine ...
description: All of this 100% varietal comes from McClellan Estate Vineyard. The wine shows aromas of dark coffee beans, char, toast and fresh herbs with the oak (50% new French) initially in the lead. The coffee and cherry flavors are silky and generous, lingering on the finish.

title: Covenant 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is a spicy, softly lush offering of Cabernet sourced from a ...
description: This is a spicy, softly lush offering of Cabernet sourced from a tiny part of the Larkmead Vineyard in northern Napa Valley. Black and red currant play off one another well, before revealing subtle layers of dried herb and tobacco leaf, the finish as cushy as the opening and midpalate of the wine.

title: Shah Estate 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Exotic in coconut macaroon on the nose, this wine offers appealing lushness ...
description: Exotic in coconut macaroon on the nose, this wine offers appealing lushness and richness, and is decidedly soft and alluring in red plum and cherry. Medium in weight with plenty of substance, it offers a lift of acidity on the long, peppery finish.

title: Goose Ridge 2012 g3 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This wine brings aromas and flavors of cherry, coffee, herbs, medicine cabinet ...
description: This wine brings aromas and flavors of cherry, coffee, herbs, medicine cabinet and oak spices. The style is reserved, with a seamless, focused feel to the tart cherry and plum flavors that keep the attention on each sip.

title: Mosquito Fleet 2011 SS Dix Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: This wine demonstrates the strength of Red Mountain, even in a cool ...
description: This wine demonstrates the strength of Red Mountain, even in a cool vintage. The aromas of cocoa, cranberry, cherry and black licorice offer pleasing nuances, while the tart cranberry flavors show elegance and restraint, with chalky tannins backing it all up. The acid balance is spot-on. Just a baby now, it has its best days in front of it.

title: Circadia 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This wine has an exotic, perfumed component to its beginning bouquet, spicy ...
description: This wine has an exotic, perfumed component to its beginning bouquet, spicy jolts of cinnamon and cardamom around the more classic clove. Juicy and creamy in texture, it offers blackberry, plum and licorice and is approachably easy to enjoy.

title: Carpineto 2009 Farnito Cabernet Sauvignon (Toscana)
excerpt: Cedar, earth, black currant and underbrush aromas lead the nose on this ...
description: Cedar, earth, black currant and underbrush aromas lead the nose on this wine made entirely with Cabernet Sauvignon. The smooth palate delivers black cherry, grilled herb and exotic spice alongside polished tannins.

title: Sparrow Hawk 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Weighty in cinnamon, this wine is soft and entirely spicy throughout, medium ...
description: Weighty in cinnamon, this wine is soft and entirely spicy throughout, medium in weight and slightly complex. Blackberry and black cherry play off the firm tannins and structured oak, providing girth but not overindulgence.

title: Bomb 2011 Washington Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The aromas of cocoa, woodspice, cassis, cherry and herbs are brooding on ...
description: The aromas of cocoa, woodspice, cassis, cherry and herbs are brooding on this 100% varietal wine that hails from Red Mountain. Palate-coating cherry flavors are supported by dry, lightly gritty tannins and tart acids.

title: Carden 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Blended with 25% Cabernet Franc, this engaging wine has aromas of herbs ...
description: Blended with 25% Cabernet Franc, this engaging wine has aromas of herbs and blackberries. The fruit shows a real sense of vibrancy and purity, laden with tart, cranberry-like acidity and firm, lightly chalky tannins. Just a baby now, it should be at its peak in 2025.

title: Carnivor 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: An extremely deep, dark color is the first thing to notice in ...
description: An extremely deep, dark color is the first thing to notice in this rich, almost thick, wine. It smells like wild blackberries and boysenberries and tastes almost that fruity, while blending in meaty, chocolaty, black peppery flavors that seem to coat the tongue. It is concentrated, bold and stands out from the pack.

title: Patland 2011 Stagecoach Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Atlas Peak)
excerpt: A bouquet of spicy cinnamon and clove opens up this tightly woven ...
description: A bouquet of spicy cinnamon and clove opens up this tightly woven wine, with perceptible tannins and rustic leather-bound elements to the nose and palate. With noticeable acidity and a crispness of cranberry, it develops an intensity on the finish, along with a taste of dried cherry.

title: Hollen Family Vineyards 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Cedar, tobacco and dried-berry aromas are mature and spicy. This shows preserving ...
description: Cedar, tobacco and dried-berry aromas are mature and spicy. This shows preserving acidity and flavors of caramel, baked berries and spice. It lasts long on the finish; drink now.

title: L'Ecole No. 41 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Hailing from 11 different vineyards located across the Columbia Valley, this appealing, ...
description: Hailing from 11 different vineyards located across the Columbia Valley, this appealing, 100% varietal wine provides aromas of toasty spices, dried herbs, cocoa and jammy dark fruit. The cranberry, coffee and blackberry flavors are sweet and focused, backed by chewy, lightly dry tannins that need time to soften.

title: DaMa 2012 Cowgirl Cab Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This shamelessly appealing wine brings aromas of black currant, black olive, herbs, ...
description: This shamelessly appealing wine brings aromas of black currant, black olive, herbs, cocoa and plum. The blackberry and cherry flavors are ripe and generous, showing a classic Cabernet profile with lightly chalky tannins rounding it out.

title: Apex 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This beguiling wine displays aromas of dried herbs, bittersweet chocolate, medicine cabinet, ...
description: This beguiling wine displays aromas of dried herbs, bittersweet chocolate, medicine cabinet, plum and cherry. Medium-bodied yet rich fruit flavors are backed by citrusy acids and chalky tannins.

title: Canoe Ridge 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: Aromas of vanilla, cocoa, cashew and dried herb start out light and ...
description: Aromas of vanilla, cocoa, cashew and dried herb start out light and elusive but open up over time. Meanwhile the cherry flavors are sweet and creamy in feel, backed by firm, somewhat dry tannins.

title: Stuhlmuller Vineyards 2012 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: A small percentage of Petit Verdot helps darken this wine, a touch ...
description: A small percentage of Petit Verdot helps darken this wine, a touch of saddle and leather at the fore of the aroma. From there, inky blackberry and plum jockey for position against the solid oak and firm-grained tannin, a call out for steak clearly heard.

title: Foxen 7200 2012 7200 Cabernet Sauvignon (Happy Canyon of Santa Barbara)
