excerpt: Tighter blackberry and blueberry fruits meet with a touch of fennel on ...
description: Tighter blackberry and blueberry fruits meet with a touch of fennel on this nose of this appellation blend by Billy Wathen and Dick Dore. Flavors range from refreshing blackberry soda to root beer and cola, achieving a measure of elegance thanks to dill, tomato leaf and a tannic grip.

title: Bomb 2012 Washington Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Blended with 25% Cabernet Franc and barrel-aged in 55% new French oak, ...
description: Blended with 25% Cabernet Franc and barrel-aged in 55% new French oak, this wine displays aromas of cocoa, dried herbs, pencil lead and dark cherries. The cherry and coffee flavors are medium bodied, backed by lightly gritty tannins that might soften with some time in the cellar.

title: Rancho Sisquoc 2012 Flood Family Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: Some may find this too cool-climate for the grape, but the green ...
description: Some may find this too cool-climate for the grape, but the green peppercorns, fresh-crushed thyme, dried parsley and papilla chile aromas prove remarkably pleasant and inviting. The herbs extend to the palate, which is leveled by red cherry and blueberry fruits, some slate and turned earth, and rustic elderberry jam. It has great density.

title: Swiftwater Cellars 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas of fresh herbs are out in front of vanilla, cocoa and ...
description: Aromas of fresh herbs are out in front of vanilla, cocoa and other barrel spices on this wine. Flavors are sweet and barrel-forward, backed by grainy tannins. There are a lot of good things going on here; perhaps more time in the bottle will marry them together.

title: Fattoria San Felo 2010 Aulus Cabernet Sauvignon (Toscana)
excerpt: Aromas of red currant, cedar, bell pepper, coffee and cut grass lead ...
description: Aromas of red currant, cedar, bell pepper, coffee and cut grass lead the nose on this structured red. The palate delivers dried black cherry, cassis, cocoa, licorice and black pepper alongside grippy tannins.

title: Carden 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This barrel-forward (60% new French oak), 100% varietal wine offers notes of ...
description: This barrel-forward (60% new French oak), 100% varietal wine offers notes of vanilla, pencil lead and wood spices along with cherry and herb accents. The smooth flavors are etched by tart acids, with grainy, dry tannins rounding it out.

title: Bridlewood 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Happy Canyon of Santa Barbara)
excerpt: Vanilla, cherry, cedar, pipe smoke and violet extracts swirl into a rather ...
description: Vanilla, cherry, cedar, pipe smoke and violet extracts swirl into a rather amazing nose on this wine from the Gallo-owned producer. The black cherry-dominated palate is lifted by baking soda minerality, and the tannins are present but not intrusive.

title: Cloudlift Cellars 2012 Halcyon Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: Aromas of toast, burnt coffee, mocha, vanilla, herbs and cherry take the ...
description: Aromas of toast, burnt coffee, mocha, vanilla, herbs and cherry take the lead on this wine. The milk chocolate and cherry flavors are elegant yet rich in style, with the oak at times seeming a little overweighted.

title: Frey 2013 Biodynamic Cabernet Sauvignon (Redwood Valley)
excerpt: This certified organic and biodynamic wine has no sulfites added. It offers ...
description: This certified organic and biodynamic wine has no sulfites added. It offers deep color plus bold black cherry and smoke aromas. Rich but dry flavors are both fruity and meaty, while a high level of fine tannins make it firm and almost chewy in texture. Not quite full bodied, it feels well balanced despite the intensity. Drink now through 2020.

title: Bodega Atamisque 2010 Atamisque Cabernet Sauvignon (Uco Valley)
excerpt: Dense berry aromas are muscular but low on complexity, meaning this is ...
description: Dense berry aromas are muscular but low on complexity, meaning this is more big and bulky up front than elegant. Chewy, wide and bullish, with drawing tannins and snappy acidity, this delivers baked plum and raisin flavors. It finishes with fig and spice notes along with chewy tannins. Drink through 2017.

title: Koi Pond 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: This is a distinctive wine for this variety and appellation, with notes ...
description: This is a distinctive wine for this variety and appellation, with notes of cranberry, raspberry jam, dried herbs, tobacco and green tea. The palate is full of layered red fruit notes backed by lightly chalky tannins.

title: Piattelli 2010 Grand Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Tupungato)
excerpt: Aromas of leather, graphite, saucy berry and tomato are good but not ...
description: Aromas of leather, graphite, saucy berry and tomato are good but not necessarily inviting. This high-elevation Cabernet is bouncy in feel and solid in structure. Flavors of briny berry fruits come with oaky notes of vanilla and caramel, while the finish is chocolaty but quickly loses its fruit character.

title: Starfield 2012 The Starbeam Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Soft in classic layers of cinnamon and clove, this wine is almost ...
description: Soft in classic layers of cinnamon and clove, this wine is almost entirely Cabernet Sauvignon, with a wealth of black plum and blackberry constituting its inner soul. The finish lingers in black pepper and more of that opening spice.

title: Brooklyn West 2011 Olive Hill Vineyard Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Spicy clove and dried wafts of thyme permeate the opening of this ...
description: Spicy clove and dried wafts of thyme permeate the opening of this wine, followed by strong currents of caramel toffee. On the palate, it is juicy in cherry and blackberry, while maintaining a medium-sized approach to its body and length.

title: Nottingham Cellars 2012 Micro-lot Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: This is a bold, showy wine with assertive oaky, smoky, spicy aromas, ...
description: This is a bold, showy wine with assertive oaky, smoky, spicy aromas, a very firm texture and equally oak-driven flavors. Plenty of tannin gives a grippy mouthfeel and full body, so it should pair well with meat and cheese.

title: Annefield Vineyards 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Virginia)
excerpt: An oaky aroma of buttered toast is elevated over ripe cherry and ...
description: An oaky aroma of buttered toast is elevated over ripe cherry and crushed black pepper. The palate shows more nuance, with tart red currant leading to juicy red fruit and granite dust. Slightly sandy tannins provide just enough grip to give this wine appropriate balance and structure.

title: Basel Cellars 2010 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Hailing from the cool 2010 vintage, this 100% varietal wine leads with ...
description: Hailing from the cool 2010 vintage, this 100% varietal wine leads with barrel aromas of vanilla and freshly hewn wood followed by medicine cabinet and dried cherry, seeming advanced for its years. The flavors are elegant in style with the concentration a bit wanting.

title: Bridlewood 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Squeezed plums and deep pomegranate extract gain some funky complexity from damp ...
description: Squeezed plums and deep pomegranate extract gain some funky complexity from damp mushrooms, sour plum skins and wet wood on the nose of this bottling. The flavors are heavy with juniper, smoked pine and exotic woods, and the dried berry fruit compensates for the herbaciousness.

title: Browne Family Vineyards 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This wine seems a bit muddled, with aromas of cranberries, dried herbs, ...
description: This wine seems a bit muddled, with aromas of cranberries, dried herbs, vanilla, cashews and barrel spices struggling to get to the surface. The palate is medium bodied with tart fruit flavors and blocky tannins, with the concentration not seeming to all be there.

title: Columbia Winery 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This wine displays aromas of green herbs, black and green olive, vanilla ...
description: This wine displays aromas of green herbs, black and green olive, vanilla and sweet plum. The black and blue fruit flavors are sweet, backed by blocky, dry tannins.

title: Twisted 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Fresh and lively, this packs in lots of fruit but is not ...
description: Fresh and lively, this packs in lots of fruit but is not heavy or overly tannic. It smells like just-picked raspberries and strawberries, tastes a bit deeper and riper than those, and may have a hint of oak aging that brings out maple syrup and cinnamon accents.

title: Wood Family Vineyards 2012 Especial Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: Very ripe fruit aromas and flavors in this wine resemble dried plums ...
description: Very ripe fruit aromas and flavors in this wine resemble dried plums and cherries. The texture feels broad and smooth, with enough firm tannins to give it some grip on the palate. It tastes full bodied and a bit exotic, with some anise and black pepper to enhance the dried-fruit notes.

title: De Novo 2011 aCure eState Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: This red offers tightly wound strawberry and cassis around spicy leather and ...
description: This red offers tightly wound strawberry and cassis around spicy leather and medium-boned weight and length.

title: Stags' Leap Winery 2012 The Leap Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
excerpt: This 100% Cabernet Sauvignon sees 20 months in 100% French oak, half ...
description: This 100% Cabernet Sauvignon sees 20 months in 100% French oak, half of it new. This wine has lovely cassis and red cranberry notes at its core, while accents of earth, leather, oak and cedar give it a classic feel. Sizable, dry tannins should integrate with the bright fruit and minerality over time, through 2020.

title: Paul Hobbs 2011 Beckstoffer Las Piedras Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
excerpt: From a warm vineyard site in a cool year, this Cab intrigues ...
description: From a warm vineyard site in a cool year, this Cab intrigues in sage and chewy black cherry, possessed of a powerful, buoyant minerality. Dark chocolate, tobacco and black tea frame the generous ripeness and velvety nature of the wine, which can withstand time in the cellar to commingle more, through 2021.

title: Barnett 2012 Cyrus Ryan Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: From a valley-floor site off of the Silverado Trail just north of ...
description: From a valley-floor site off of the Silverado Trail just north of St. Helena, this Cab is a departure for the producer, based atop Spring Mountain. The flavors are ripe and jammy in raspberry and blackberry, almost liqueur-like, before finding balance in tangerine-tart acidity. With firm, chalky tannins providing backbone, the finish is sprinkled in black cherry and caramel.

title: Amici 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Relatively affordable for its appellation and variety, this wine offers classic notes ...
description: Relatively affordable for its appellation and variety, this wine offers classic notes of cassis, currant and clove, punctuated by eccentric bursts of gun powder and espresso. The devilish characteristics are complemented by a smooth, silkiness to the texture and a measured finish of black pepper.

title: Chimney Rock 2012 Ganymede Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
excerpt: Still tight and tannic, this is a big, bold, leathery vineyard-designate, black ...
description: Still tight and tannic, this is a big, bold, leathery vineyard-designate, black as night and thick. Clove and herb intermingle with crushed red and black berries, layered in oaky anise. The flavors should find balance with one another over time, through 2020.

title: Lancaster 2011 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: A majority of estate-grown Cabernet Sauvignon is joined by Merlot and smaller ...
description: A majority of estate-grown Cabernet Sauvignon is joined by Merlot and smaller amounts of Malbec, Petit Verdot and Cabernet Franc. They make for a balanced, herbal wine, dressed in peppercorn, black currant and blackberry adornments. Elegant in dry tannins and a hint of cedar, it can withstand time in the cellar; hold through 2026.

title: Chappellet 2012 Signature Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: The historic Pritchard Hill producer swings for the fences with this Cab, ...
description: The historic Pritchard Hill producer swings for the fences with this Cab, intense in black cherry, blackberry and cedar. Hard to penetrate on first try, it demands cellaring to soften its wall of hearty tannins, the merest hint of chocolate-coffee begging to break out. Lushly powerful and complex, it can be enjoyed through 2027.

title: Clos du Val 2012 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
excerpt: Dense and briary, with black and red plum notes complemented by a ...
description: Dense and briary, with black and red plum notes complemented by a strong sense of clove, this wine is cushioned in tar, oak and cigar box, showing nicely resolved tannins. Blended with 16% Merlot, 4% Cabernet Franc and 2% Petit Verdot, it is enjoyable now and will cellar well for many years to come.

title: Renteria 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
excerpt: Toasty oak and black pepper hit first on the palate and nose, ...
description: Toasty oak and black pepper hit first on the palate and nose, followed by savory, dry tannin, black cherry and vanilla. Restrained and in balance, the Cabernet is supported by 12% Petit Verdot, which adds girth and intensity without becoming extreme.

title: Pride Mountain 2011 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County-Napa County)
excerpt: In this gorgeous wine marked by dancing acidity, dry tannins persist around ...
description: In this gorgeous wine marked by dancing acidity, dry tannins persist around dense layers of black pepper, black cherry and cedar, all of which integrate well with the oak. A nice representation of a cooler vintage, the wine possesses plenty of richness and power balanced exquisitely with a sense of brightness on the palate. Enjoy through 2021.

title: Terlato 2012 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
excerpt: Dark roasted espresso beans and tobacco leaf imprint this estate-grown offering, which ...
description: Dark roasted espresso beans and tobacco leaf imprint this estate-grown offering, which has a big, brawny presence of ripe blackberry and plum around a soft, approachable midpalate and mellow finish. The wine is given a floral lift on the aroma, akin to rose and violet.

title: Jack Nicklaus Wines 2010 Private Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Muddled blackberry and plum give this 70% Cabernet Sauvignon a warmth and ...
description: Muddled blackberry and plum give this 70% Cabernet Sauvignon a warmth and complexity, accented by clove and herb. Smaller percentages of Merlot, Syrah, Petit Verdot and Malbec add softness and structure, as well as a layering of blueberry fruit, with a bite of pepper highlighted on the finish.

title: Ilsley 2012 Single Vineyard Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
excerpt: Leather pouch and earthy cedar and forest floor make for an intriguing ...
description: Leather pouch and earthy cedar and forest floor make for an intriguing wine, powerful in big, dry tannins, especially on the finish. The strength of the wine, and the balance of citrus-like acidity, suggest cellaring, through 2020.

title: Madrigal 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Smoky pepper marks the aroma of this soft, smooth and balanced Cabernet ...
description: Smoky pepper marks the aroma of this soft, smooth and balanced Cabernet Sauvignon that conveys plenty of refined power. Clove and dried herb provide a savory edge to the experience, which remains integrated and polished in the glass, finishing with a sense of finesse.

title: Rodney Strong 2011 Brothers Ridge Single Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Dense and concentrated, this 100% Cabernet Sauvignon from a far northern section ...
description: Dense and concentrated, this 100% Cabernet Sauvignon from a far northern section of the Alexander Valley is huge and juicy. It offers black cherry and cassis around cigar box and tobacco, with a lengthy, smoky finish. Still young, it needs time for the tannins to settle.

title: Martin Ray 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
excerpt: Velvety chocolate and dark plum flavors give this wine a smooth, satisfying ...
description: Velvety chocolate and dark plum flavors give this wine a smooth, satisfying mouthfeel, assisted by well-integrated oak. Dark and brooding, it reflects its hillside provenance without succumbing entirely to an overripe or overdone style.

title: Pine & Brown 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: For this classic, restrained Cabernet Sauvignon with 11% Petit Verdot, the grapes ...
description: For this classic, restrained Cabernet Sauvignon with 11% Petit Verdot, the grapes were grown in Rutherford, Yountville and St. Helena. The wine is juicy in soft red cherry and cassis. Seamless on the palate, it offers a nice progression from explosive fruit to measured acidity and low oak, the finish balanced between all three.

title: Bodega Volcanes de Chile 2011 Tectonia Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Spicy aromas of cedar, tree bark and herbal red-berry fruits announce a ...
description: Spicy aromas of cedar, tree bark and herbal red-berry fruits announce a fruity, flush palate with flavors of raspberry and plum accented by woody chocolate. Dry, spicy, peppery flavors rest comfortably on a balanced finish.

title: Ilsley 2010 Single Vineyard Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
excerpt: Earthy, this wine offers substantial layers of dried herb and cranberry. Denser ...
description: Earthy, this wine offers substantial layers of dried herb and cranberry. Denser overtones of oak and tannin are pronounced on the midpalate, the tannins weighty and firm. A lift of acidity picks up on the finish. The wine will benefit from time in the cellar, through 2015.

title: Ghost Waltz 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Much of the fruit for this wine came from Alexander Valley and ...
description: Much of the fruit for this wine came from Alexander Valley and it represents the appellation well, combining the ability to be juicy and approachable with powerful tannins and the potential to age. Cassis, raspberry and black pepper are standout characteristics, and the wine is big, but balanced.

title: Terra Valentine 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A mix of strawberry-rhubarb compote, mocha-chocolate and chalky tannins are featured in ...
description: A mix of strawberry-rhubarb compote, mocha-chocolate and chalky tannins are featured in this 80% Cabernet with smaller amounts of other Bordeaux varieties blended in. Dense and meaty, a powerful jolt of cassis rears its head on the finish.

title: Cliff Lede 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
excerpt: Generous tannins surround a core of ripe, brawny blackberry fruit and a ...
description: Generous tannins surround a core of ripe, brawny blackberry fruit and a powerful imprint of dried herb in this wine, which is rich and concentrated. Earthy tobacco and chocolate seal the finish.

title: Stags' Leap Winery 2011 The Leap Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
excerpt: Labeled as a Cabernet Sauvignon, this wine contains a hearty 25% Petite ...
description: Labeled as a Cabernet Sauvignon, this wine contains a hearty 25% Petite Sirah, which wraps it in black pepper and savory, juicy black currant. Clove and a persistent thread of herbaceous sage and cedar dominant as well on both the nose and palate, contributing an elegance to the whole affair.

title: Enate 2006 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Somontano)
excerpt: Cool, earthy aromas of blackberry, vanilla and tobacco are encouraging. This aged ...
description: Cool, earthy aromas of blackberry, vanilla and tobacco are encouraging. This aged Cab from the base of the Pyrenees is a monster with wall-to-wall tannins. Heavy black-fruit, fig, mocha and tobacco flavors finish with exotic spice notes and a touch of oaky coconut. This is big and boisterous.

title: Kirkland Signature 2012 Signature Series Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
excerpt: This brand continues to impress in terms of quality-to-price ratio. This blend ...
description: This brand continues to impress in terms of quality-to-price ratio. This blend of 78% Cabernet Sauvignon and 22% Merlot comes from a great appellation and is ready to enjoy now. Raspberry, black cherry and cranberry serve as the finesse side of the equation, before a brawny, chewy sense of power wanders in.

title: Lujon 2012 Spofford Station Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (OR))
excerpt: This wine offers a somewhat uncomfortable mix of herb, vanilla, caramel, green ...
description: This wine offers a somewhat uncomfortable mix of herb, vanilla, caramel, green pepper and cherry notes. The mocha-filled flavors are tart, broad and supple, with good acidity and a dry lick of tannins backing it all up.

title: Jack Nicklaus Wines 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This wine is fairly austere in taste, restrained in oak on the ...
description: This wine is fairly austere in taste, restrained in oak on the front palate before offering thick tannin structure on the back palate and finish. In between, expect cranberry, raspberry and clove to compete for affection, integrating well with one another.

title: Broadside 2012 Margarita Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: This stylish and well-priced wine from Brian and Stephanie Terrizzi offers aromas ...
description: This stylish and well-priced wine from Brian and Stephanie Terrizzi offers aromas of grape juice, shattered slate, charcoal ash and a sharp, peppery spice. The blackberry juice flavors are broad, approachable and pleasantly airy on the palate, but quickly given complexity with coyote-brush woodiness, iron shavings and a solid tannic grip.

title: Peace Water 2011 Nirvana Cabernet Sauvignon (Howell Mountain)
excerpt: Cranberry and a strong herbal component contribute an earthy elegance to this ...
description: Cranberry and a strong herbal component contribute an earthy elegance to this 100% Cab which zigzags somewhat on the palate, becoming fuller bodied. Still, the oak and tannins are under control and the wine is approachable now.

title: Phifer Pavitt 2011 Date Night Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: From grapes grown in Pope Valley, the eastern part of the Napa ...
description: From grapes grown in Pope Valley, the eastern part of the Napa Valley, this is mostly Cabernet Sauvignon, with 2% Petit Verdot. Smoky bacon and thick, concentrated waves of blackberry mark the wine, which is made by Ted Osborne of Olabisi. The finish is dark and chocolaty, with more of that smoke.

title: Odfjell 2011 Armador Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Leafy, green, minty aromas blend with riper notes of cassis and a ...
description: Leafy, green, minty aromas blend with riper notes of cassis and a touch of clove on this medium-bodied Cabernet. Flavors of herbal berry and oak spice finish a little hot and raw, with herb and cinnamon notes that linger.

title: Silver Stag 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Damp earth, tar and gamy bacon combine aromatically and flavor-wise in this ...
description: Damp earth, tar and gamy bacon combine aromatically and flavor-wise in this Cabernet, which also contains smaller traces of Petit Verdot and Cabernet Franc. Black currant and cassis mingle with an herbal back beat that begins to power up midway through and on the finish.

title: Chilensis 2012 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Lightly candied cherry and raspberry aromas are fresh. This has a ripe, ...
description: Lightly candied cherry and raspberry aromas are fresh. This has a ripe, edgy mouthfeel with modest tannins. Cassis, raspberry and blackberry flavors finish soft and friendly, with enough grip to make this serious.

title: Buehler 2012 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This 100% Cabernet Sauvignon is brooding in dried sage, cedar and pencil ...
description: This 100% Cabernet Sauvignon is brooding in dried sage, cedar and pencil shavings, the fruit black and ripe. Oaky and sanguine, it has a girth to it. Sprinkles of cinnamon and clove peak on the finish.

title: Kirkland Signature 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Good value, this is a juicy Cab with smaller amounts of Petit ...
description: Good value, this is a juicy Cab with smaller amounts of Petit Verdot, Syrah, Merlot and Cabernet Franc. It delivers leathery black currant and clove around a dense, chewy middle and explosive finish rich in cocoa powder.

title: Wallis Family Estate 2011 Little Sister Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
excerpt: Tight and tannic, this 99% Cabernet Sauvignon also has 1% Petit Verdot, ...
description: Tight and tannic, this 99% Cabernet Sauvignon also has 1% Petit Verdot, which provides a faint floral note to the bouquet that is otherwise punctured by ripe swirls of cherry, vanilla and coconut, themes that repeat on the palate. Hard to penetrate fully, the wine needs time to open in the glass to reveal its charms.

title: Undurraga 2013 Aliwen Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley-Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Black cherry and blackberry aromas are subtle and feature an aromatic shot ...
description: Black cherry and blackberry aromas are subtle and feature an aromatic shot of charcoal. Jammy but simple on the palate, this smooth, clean, lightly toasted Cab offers raspberry, plum, currant and nutmeg flavors in front of a fresh, clean finish.

title: Fuse 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This Cabernet Sauvignon also blends in Merlot, Syrah, Cabernet Franc and Petit ...
description: This Cabernet Sauvignon also blends in Merlot, Syrah, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot, combining for a straightforward red wine experience offering blackberry and raspberry juiciness. Plenty of toasty character tinged by tobacco is provided by the oak.

title: Santa Rita 2011 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Briary red-fruit aromas are earthy and mellow, with notes of red-apple skin ...
description: Briary red-fruit aromas are earthy and mellow, with notes of red-apple skin and raspberry. This is medium in body, fresh and feels good on the palate. Plum, raspberry and vanilla flavors are lightly herbal, while the finish is largely smooth and mild.

title: Alto Los Romeros 2012 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Smoky, cooked berry aromas lead to a full, flabby, rubbery-feeling palate with ...
description: Smoky, cooked berry aromas lead to a full, flabby, rubbery-feeling palate with baked black-fruit flavors that suggest baking spices. A soft finish is low on verve and tastes a bit sugary and sweet.

title: McGah Family 2012 Scarlett Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: Smoky, leathery and awash in black plum, this wine conveys something slightly ...
description: Smoky, leathery and awash in black plum, this wine conveys something slightly sweet and mealy, as though its fruit has been diluted, leaving only thin layers to remain.

title: Root:1 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Plum and wild berry aromas are slightly briny and volatile. Pinched acidity ...
description: Plum and wild berry aromas are slightly briny and volatile. Pinched acidity and related sharpness result in a rough mouthfeel, while plum, raspberry and currant flavors feel wiry, with an earthy, lightly oaked finish.

title: Montes 2012 Classic Series Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Stalky berry, vanilla and shoe-polish aromas come with a note of herbal ...
description: Stalky berry, vanilla and shoe-polish aromas come with a note of herbal juniper. This is pinched and scratchy on the palate, with baked berry, mint, vanilla and carob flavors. A mix of oak and green herb flavors push the finish.

title: Buehler 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Mostly Cabernet Sauvignon, with a small amount of Merlot, this wine is ...
description: Mostly Cabernet Sauvignon, with a small amount of Merlot, this wine is from both estate hillside vineyards and outside sites. It is herbaceous, soft on the palate with a puckering finish.

title: Newton 2012 Unfiltered Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Bordeaux varieties make up the bulk of this Cabernet Sauvignon, with a ...
description: Bordeaux varieties make up the bulk of this Cabernet Sauvignon, with a tiny amount of Syrah added to the mix. The combined effort is fuzzy in leathery, bittersweet black plum and berry, the wine finishing quite sour.

title: Casas del Bosque 2012 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Rapel Valley)
excerpt: Herbal blackberry and plum aromas fall off toward gritty and stalky. This ...
description: Herbal blackberry and plum aromas fall off toward gritty and stalky. This has a jammy, soft structure without much spine or support. Prune, blueberry and herbal flavors finish mildly green.

title: Pueblo del Sol 2013 Roble Cabernet Sauvignon (Juanico)
excerpt: Leafy red-berry, spice and plastic aromas open this oaky, creamy, simple Cabernet ...
description: Leafy red-berry, spice and plastic aromas open this oaky, creamy, simple Cabernet that tastes woody, with baked berry notes. Nothing really stands out on this soft, confected, warm-climate Cab.

title: Domaines Barons de Rothschild (Lafite) 2013 Los Vascos Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Stalky berry aromas come with a note of rubber band. This feels ...
description: Stalky berry aromas come with a note of rubber band. This feels rubbery and tannic, with hollow, earthy berry flavors. The finish is modest and short on fruit.

title: Lincourt 2012 La Cuesta Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Ynez Valley)
excerpt: This wine shows the savory side of the grape, with bacon fat, ...
description: This wine shows the savory side of the grape, with bacon fat, smoked beef and strawberry-balsamic reduction sauce aromas. Campfire flavors overwhelm the palate, which is relatively light in density and cut with plum skin tartness.

title: Mulvane Wine Co. 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Grapes from Rutherford and Coombsville were used for this Cabernet, which also ...
description: Grapes from Rutherford and Coombsville were used for this Cabernet, which also contains a handful of Cabernet Franc, Merlot and Petit Verdot. Extreme in power and tobacco on the one hand, it also has a sameness that sets in midpalate and through to the end.

title: Cameron Hughes 2012 Lot 501 Cabernet Sauvignon (Howell Mountain)
excerpt: Puckering in tannins with a rubbery imprint around blackberry and black tar, ...
description: Puckering in tannins with a rubbery imprint around blackberry and black tar, this is a huge wine that may need a bit of decanting to enjoy.

title: Casa Valduga 2006 Gran Reserva Villa-Lobos Cabernet Sauvignon (Vale dos Vinhedos)
excerpt: Rusty in color and murky on the palate, this earthy, mature wine ...
description: Rusty in color and murky on the palate, this earthy, mature wine smells a bit too much like a mud puddle, with herbal, green notes mixed in. Tannic, drying and austere, this Cabernet tastes leafy, with a salty, earthy, stewy finish.

title: Rayun 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
excerpt: Raspberry and strawberry aromas are light and somewhat weedy. On the palate, ...
description: Raspberry and strawberry aromas are light and somewhat weedy. On the palate, this is bouncy and rubbery in feel. Flavors of olive, rubber and briny red plum fall off on a salty-tasting finish.

title: Montalvo Wilmot 2007 Cabernet de Familia Cabernet Sauvignon (Vino de la Tierra de Castilla)
excerpt: Rooty aromas of baking spices are initially compelling but lose steam while ...
description: Rooty aromas of baking spices are initially compelling but lose steam while feeding into a flabby, tannic palate. Soapy flavors of pencil eraser and medicinal cherry and strawberry finish creamy and clunky.

title: The Vegan Vine 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
excerpt: The nose on this organic-minded wine, from a project that has basketball ...
description: The nose on this organic-minded wine, from a project that has basketball star John Salley as a frontman, is quite lively with grape candy at first before an acetone-like aromas sets in. The flavors are all about purple florals and fruit, yet the density and mouthfeel is odd.

title: Far Niente 2012 Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: Gentle on the front palate, this gorgeously rendered Cabernet Sauvignon, with smatterings ...
description: Gentle on the front palate, this gorgeously rendered Cabernet Sauvignon, with smatterings of Petit Verdot and Cabernet Franc, develops weight and body as it goes, while retaining classic restraint. Cherry and cassis counterpoise layers of toasty oak, cedar and silky tannins, finishing balanced.

title: Lone Madrone 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: In this dynamic wine, the nose shows purple acai berries, fennel shavings, ...
description: In this dynamic wine, the nose shows purple acai berries, fennel shavings, tight graphite minerality and a hot cherry-pie warmth. Boysenberries give tart vibrancy to the fun and lively palate, which picks up richness from blackberry extract in the midpalate and dark chocolate elements on the finish.

title: Nickel & Nickel 2012 C.C. Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: Gingerbread and graham cracker provide this 100% Cabernet Sauvignon with a distinct ...
description: Gingerbread and graham cracker provide this 100% Cabernet Sauvignon with a distinct warmth of character. Elegant, light and restrained, it opens with a prominent rose aroma. It then offers cherry and raspberry delicacy around subtle French oak and vanilla on the palate, all lingering long though the finish.

title: Waters 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Washington)
excerpt: This impressive 100% varietal wine comes from Cold Creek, Candy Mountain and ...
description: This impressive 100% varietal wine comes from Cold Creek, Candy Mountain and Windrow vineyards. With the oak (40% new French) pleasantly restrained, it offers aromas of dried herbs, coffee, cherry and light barrel spices. Lithe black currant flavors are tightly focused and flavorful with taut acidity, showing exceptional length and balance. Best from 2018 to 2023.

title: Corvus 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: Despite the cool, challenging vintage this 100% varietal wine shines through with ...
description: Despite the cool, challenging vintage this 100% varietal wine shines through with notes of blackberry, cola, vanilla and cherry. The palate shows a pleasing mixture of tart fruit, grainy tannins and rich barrel flavors. It should only benefit from additional time in the bottle.

title: Owen Roe 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: A blend of Red Willow, Mercer, DuBrul, Outlook and Elerding vineyards and ...
description: A blend of Red Willow, Mercer, DuBrul, Outlook and Elerding vineyards and aged in just 35% new French oak, this wine is still quite locked up with notes of herbs, plum, high-toned barrel spices and pencil lead. It brings soft, lively blue fruit flavors with the tannins combed to a fine sheen.

title: Script Cellars 2011 Exordium Cabernet Sauvignon (Wahluke Slope)
excerpt: This 100% varietal wine from this new winery offers up notes of ...
description: This 100% varietal wine from this new winery offers up notes of vanilla, herb, cocoa, cherry and woodspice. An elegant, palate-coating mouthfeel comes along with structured, dry tannins and tart acidity. An attractive wine that can be enjoyed now or held through 2020.

title: D.R. Stephens 2012 Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Smooth and medium bodied, this offers lithe layers of licorice and meat, ...
description: Smooth and medium bodied, this offers lithe layers of licorice and meat, its tannins refined. The high-toned cassis, cranberry and cherry make themselves known, but will develop further, through 2027.

title: Efeste 2011 Big Papa Old Block Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This 100% varietal comes from older plantings at Klipsun (40%), Bacchus (29%), ...
description: This 100% varietal comes from older plantings at Klipsun (40%), Bacchus (29%), Sagemoor (24%) and Kiona vineyards. It displays notes of black and green olive, dried herbs and brooding barrel spices. Mouthwatering, supple and flavorful, it has firm tannins that need some time in the cellar to lengthen their stride. Best after 2017.

title: Monte De Oro 2011 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Temecula Valley)
excerpt: This wine, which includes 9% Cabernet Franc and some use of American ...
description: This wine, which includes 9% Cabernet Franc and some use of American and Hungarian oak, is a very strong regional showing, with complex but never confusing aromas of huckleberry pie, purple lilacs, chopped dill and lava rocks. The dark flavors are harder to pin down, from Asian-spiced plums to the berry-laced fudge finish, so the experience is more about structure than ripeness.

title: Cuda Ridge Wines 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: A combination of generous, juicy fruit flavors and a firm but velvety ...
description: A combination of generous, juicy fruit flavors and a firm but velvety texture makes this full-bodied wine stand out. It has wonderful ripe black cherry and dark plum aromas, concentrated and almost meaty flavors, plus that seductive texture. This is tasty now but should improve through 2018.

title: Nickel & Nickel 2012 Hayne Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
excerpt: From a historic vineyard in the heart of the Napa Valley, this ...
description: From a historic vineyard in the heart of the Napa Valley, this 100% Cabernet Sauvignon develops in the glass, evolving from muted aromas of earth and cinnamon spice to subtle cherry, cassis and oak. Balanced and lovely, the spice stays on the tongue throughout the long finish. It can easily be enjoyed now, but has the structure to age well through 2022.

title: Pine Ridge 2012 Fortis Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: The winery blends 84% Cabernet Sauvignon with 11% Petit Verdot and 5% ...
description: The winery blends 84% Cabernet Sauvignon with 11% Petit Verdot and 5% Malbec for this high-end red. Burly in tobacco and cedar, it also offers a floral, high-toned spirit built around juicy cranberry on the palate. With well-integrated tannins and oak, it finishes in a note of bittersweet chocolate.

title: Sanglier Cellars 2012 Left Tusque Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Serious and concentrated, this is a big and bold wine packed with ...
description: Serious and concentrated, this is a big and bold wine packed with ripe fruit flavors and firm tannins. It smells oaky and smoky, tastes rich with blackberry and dark chocolate and feels appropriately astringent, dry and full-bodied. Drinkable now, it will be best after 2017.

title: Hess Collection 2012 Allomi Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This interesting blend of 88% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Petite Sirah and 2% ...
description: This interesting blend of 88% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Petite Sirah and 2% Petit Verdot works on many levels. Floral lavender and violet open the wine before a light, rounded touch of blackberry and leather hit the palate, followed by earthy cola spice. Well-priced and easy to enjoy, it puts good winemaking on display.

title: Nickel & Nickel 2012 John C. Sullenger Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: This chocolaty, earthy 100% Cabernet Sauvignon comes from a vineyard site in ...
description: This chocolaty, earthy 100% Cabernet Sauvignon comes from a vineyard site in the middle of Oakville, farmsteaded since the 1880s. Campfire and graphite jump out, swaddled in restrained yet sizable tannins and a distinct herbal overtone. Expansive as it develops, the wine finishes strong in vanilla and more chocolate.

title: McGrail 2011 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: Extra dark in color, this has equally attention-getting dark chocolate and espresso ...
description: Extra dark in color, this has equally attention-getting dark chocolate and espresso aromas, rich black currant and blackberry flavors, and a firm, generously tannic texture. Although tempting to drink now, this will improve in complexity and smoothness through 2017.

title: Victor Vineyards 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: This brings complexity and sophistication along with bold fruit flavors, firm tannins ...
description: This brings complexity and sophistication along with bold fruit flavors, firm tannins and good concentration. Aromas suggest ripe red fruits, cinnamon, clove and vanilla. The wine tastes fruity and rich, and feels supple but moderately tannic. Creaminess in the texture and flavor helps it stand out.

title: Laurel Glen 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Mountain)
excerpt: This vintage marks the first start-to-finish effort of winemakers Randall Watkins and ...
description: This vintage marks the first start-to-finish effort of winemakers Randall Watkins and David Ramey to distinguish the historic property. The result is promising, showing an herbaceous Cab that is juicy and peppery, with cinnamon and spice notes. Medium in body, the tannins are smooth and the finish long. Enjoy through 2021.

title: Ray's Station Vineyards 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendocino)
excerpt: This tastes deep, dark and delicious, with ripe black cherry and blackberry ...
description: This tastes deep, dark and delicious, with ripe black cherry and blackberry flavors accented by dark chocolate, black pepper and cinnamon. While smooth in texture, it is supported by moderate tannins and good acidity.

title: Bodega Atamisque 2011 Catalpa Old Vines Cabernet Sauvignon (Tupungato)
excerpt: Blackberry, rubber, leather and charred aromas make for a powerful nose. On ...
description: Blackberry, rubber, leather and charred aromas make for a powerful nose. On the palate, this Uco Valley Cab is deep and chewy, with balancing acidity and controlled tannins. Baked berry, savory oak, leather and spice flavors finish dark and earthy. Overall, this shows many positives and pushes the Argentinean Cabernet field in the right direction.

title: Tamarack Cellars 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Blended with 8% Cabernet Franc and 6% Merlot, this wine suggests blackberry ...
description: Blended with 8% Cabernet Franc and 6% Merlot, this wine suggests blackberry seed, plum, cinnamon stick and anise. Abundant blue-fruit flavors show good depth and intensity backed by tannins with a lightly chalky feel.

title: Koenig Vineyards 2012 Ice Wine Cabernet Sauvignon
excerpt: This is aromatic with watermelon, strawberry, orange peel and mineral. The sugary-sweet ...
description: This is aromatic with watermelon, strawberry, orange peel and mineral. The sugary-sweet cherry flavors are rich and layered, with citrus-rind flavors on the finish.

title: Dumas Station 2011 Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: The 2011 vintage was challenging for Washington in general and for the ...
description: The 2011 vintage was challenging for Washington in general and for the Walla Walla Valley in particular. This wine puts that aside with notes of dried cranberries and cherries along with vanilla and dry chocolate accents. The tart fruit flavors are elegant, with dry, grainy tannins along with vanilla flavors that carry through on the finish.

title: Ferllen 2011 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Smoky aromas of bacon and rubber blend with cherry and plum scents ...
description: Smoky aromas of bacon and rubber blend with cherry and plum scents to form a good bouquet. This has a fair, fresh mouthfeel with tannic grip. Leafy flavors of plum and red currant are accented by spicy, dry, woody notes, while the finish is lightly green and oaky, with lasting spice.

title: Pine Ridge 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: Smooth, soft, rounded tannins envelop a taste of dried cranberry and bacon, ...
description: Smooth, soft, rounded tannins envelop a taste of dried cranberry and bacon, giving a sense of gamy goodness. Robust in weight and power, it continues the theme with leathery girth, especially on the finish.

title: Peirano 2013 The Heritage Collection Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: This is lighter in style, but nicely dry, balanced, appetizing and complete. ...
description: This is lighter in style, but nicely dry, balanced, appetizing and complete. It smells like red cherries and cranberries and tastes fresh, nicely tart and lively. At the same time it feels firmly tannic and palate-cleansing. This will be a super-versatile wine with food.

title: Hamilton 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Lighter in color than the typical Cabernet from the state, this wine ...
description: Lighter in color than the typical Cabernet from the state, this wine brings appealing notes of coffee, dusty chocolate and dark plum. The extraction is dialed back giving a very elegant feel to the fruit flavors and tannins, with vanilla lingering on the finish.

title: Sparkman 2012 Rainmaker Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: This brooding wine unfolds with bittersweet chocolate and coffee along with an ...
description: This brooding wine unfolds with bittersweet chocolate and coffee along with an herbal top note that becomes more prominent over time. The palate is broad in feel with abundant cherry and chocolate flavors that linger.

title: Longevity 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: This combines fruity and savory aromas, with a rich but tannic texture ...
description: This combines fruity and savory aromas, with a rich but tannic texture and full body. Aroma recall black olive and cedar, while flavors focus on the fruit components. Everything is in place for an enjoyable, well-structured dinner wine.

title: Ded.Reckoning 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: This wine seems disjointed at present with notes of green herbs, leather, ...
description: This wine seems disjointed at present with notes of green herbs, leather, cherry and orange peel. The cherry flavors have good density and richness along with tart acidity but the dry, scratchy tannins distract. Give it extended time in the bottle or a very long decant.

title: Page Mill Winery 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: Bright, fresh fruit and dried herb aromas combine with lively but concentrated ...
description: Bright, fresh fruit and dried herb aromas combine with lively but concentrated and tannic fruit flavors in this big but well-behaved wine. The texture balances lavishness with a bit of astringency in an attractive and appetizing way.

title: Rutini 2011 Encuentro Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: A fairly oaky bouquet with overt wood grain, vanilla and creamy aromas ...
description: A fairly oaky bouquet with overt wood grain, vanilla and creamy aromas includes cherry and plum scents. A mostly fresh, choppy palate is a bit rough, while currant and spiced-plum flavors end with woody, medicinal accents. Overall this works well.

title: Mercer 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas recall dried herbs, blueberry, dill and vanilla. The palate brings rich ...
description: Aromas recall dried herbs, blueberry, dill and vanilla. The palate brings rich blue fruit and cocoa flavors backed by firm, slightly dry tannins.

title: 3 Horse Ranch Vineyards 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon
excerpt: This wine offers notes of Red Hots, coffee, vanilla and herbs. Cherry ...
description: This wine offers notes of Red Hots, coffee, vanilla and herbs. Cherry and blackberry flavors are sweet and viscous in feel backed by dry tannins.

title: Dussek Family Cellars 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Though just four years old, this wine seems advanced with notes of ...
description: Though just four years old, this wine seems advanced with notes of dried cherry, vanilla, dried tobacco and blackberry. The dried cranberry and cherry flavors are rich and tart, backed by quite astringent tannins.

title: Michael David 2012 Freakshow Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: Heavy aromas and flavors of oak and smoke accompany ripe black cherry ...
description: Heavy aromas and flavors of oak and smoke accompany ripe black cherry and boysenberry for a rich mixture. This wine is deeply colored, full bodied and pumped up with the flavors of heavily toasted oak. A firm but not harsh texture accompanies the almost sweet taste of all that oak.

title: Villa San Juliette 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: The nose on this wine from American Idol producers Nigel Lythgoe and ...
description: The nose on this wine from American Idol producers Nigel Lythgoe and Ken Warwick is a bit reluctant to show itself at first, then lets go of rounded red and purple fruits, with freshly turned soil and dust. Ripe black cherries and tart plum skins mix on the earthy palate, and the tannins will unfurl with more time.

title: Bogle 2012 Bogle Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Generous sweet-tasting oak flavor coats the fresh plum and red cherry flavors ...
description: Generous sweet-tasting oak flavor coats the fresh plum and red cherry flavors in this medium-bodied wine. It has a broad, velvety texture, and shows good balance between ripeness, acidity and firm tannins. It finishes with a soft touch.

title: Pedroncelli 2012 Block 007 Estate Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: This affordable, estate-vineyard 100% Cabernet Sauvignon is chewy in robust tar and ...
description: This affordable, estate-vineyard 100% Cabernet Sauvignon is chewy in robust tar and leather, with companionable characteristics of cranberry and herb. The acidity is high-toned and the oak profile restrained.

title: Sevtap 2012 Zig-A-Zig-Ahh Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Ynez Valley)
excerpt: The nose on this wine by oil worker-turned-winemaker Ert Sevtap offers lifting ...
description: The nose on this wine by oil worker-turned-winemaker Ert Sevtap offers lifting aromas of blueberry and mint. The spearmint notes carry to the palate as well, which also shows blackberry fruit and roasted beef meatiness.

title: Two Mountain 2012 Copeland Vineayard Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Aromas are dominated by oak with accents of vanilla, cocoa and woodspice ...
description: Aromas are dominated by oak with accents of vanilla, cocoa and woodspice along with cranberries, rose hips, herbs and raspberries. The palate is elegant with herb and cherry flavors that lead to a tart, cranberry-filled finish.

title: Chateau Lafayette Reneau 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Swathes of fresh tarragon lend a green, herbal tone to cassis and ...
description: Swathes of fresh tarragon lend a green, herbal tone to cassis and black plum flavors in this pretty wine. Penetrating, grippy tannins are jolting on the finish, underlining a tight, brisk finish.

title: Pedroncelli 2012 Three Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: Medium in weight, this offers a richness of plum and medium acidity ...
description: Medium in weight, this offers a richness of plum and medium acidity surrounded by sizable tannin and oak. Cherry, dark currant and leather round out the characteristics, the wine aged in both French and American oak. The price is nice.

title: Stickybeak 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Sanguine in cassis, cranberry and wild strawberry, this relatively inexpensive Napa Cab ...
description: Sanguine in cassis, cranberry and wild strawberry, this relatively inexpensive Napa Cab has an herbal edge that suggests elegance and balance. The finish is stamped in oak that lingers on the palate without overwhelming.

title: Los Haroldos 2011 Reserva de Familia Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Raspberry and plum aromas are woody and narrow in scope. This Cabernet ...
description: Raspberry and plum aromas are woody and narrow in scope. This Cabernet is medium in body but also a bit sticky and resiny. Candied blackberry and black cherry flavors are slightly medicinal, while the finish is oaky, with a lactic flavor and a touch of heat.

title: Leaping Horse 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Exuberant, ripe fruit flavor energizes this medium-bodied yet smooth and fresh-textured wine. ...
description: Exuberant, ripe fruit flavor energizes this medium-bodied yet smooth and fresh-textured wine. Shadings of spicy oak add complexity.  The freshness and fruit will make a great pairing with spiced meats.

title: Ded.Reckoning 2011 The Rancher Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: This blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Petit Verdot shows an uneasy mix ...
description: This blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Petit Verdot shows an uneasy mix of green coffee bean, cherry, char and meaty notes. The cherry flavors are medium bodied backed by a wall of firm, dry tannins.

title: Damiani 2012 Barrel Select Cabernet Sauvignon (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Ripe, rich cassis and blackberry flavors are shaded with savory touches of ...
description: Ripe, rich cassis and blackberry flavors are shaded with savory touches of soy sauce and clay in this bold, lushly textured wine. Soft acidity makes this wine plush and plump on the palate, but its fruity exuberance is quite pleasant.

title: Cult NV Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Milk chocolate and pomegranate curiously mix in this mid-weight, lowly oaked nonvintage ...
description: Milk chocolate and pomegranate curiously mix in this mid-weight, lowly oaked nonvintage Cabernet, blended with 18% Merlot and 2% Petite Sirah. New American oak aged most of it, with a bit of French, too, only 25% of the whole new.

title: Cascade Ridge 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This direct and appealing wine offers notes of maple, sugared plum and ...
description: This direct and appealing wine offers notes of maple, sugared plum and woodspice. Flavors are light but plush in feel, straight down the fairway.

title: Ruca Malen 2011 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Earthy, spicy aromas of juniper, bell pepper and oak cover up slightly ...
description: Earthy, spicy aromas of juniper, bell pepper and oak cover up slightly underripe berry scents. This has an acceptable level of tannic scratch and peppery, herbal berry fruit flavors. Like the rest of this Cab, the finish is lightly herbal, green-leaning and hard.

title: Robert Hall 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: The bright red fruit on the nose of this wine is joined ...
description: The bright red fruit on the nose of this wine is joined with graphite minerality and sweetly toasted oak. The palate is quite fruity, boasting Bing cherry and strawberry reduction sauce, picking up complexity from cracked black pepper.

title: Three Thieves 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Deep in color, big in flavor and full bodied, this is a ...
description: Deep in color, big in flavor and full bodied, this is a rustic, straightforward wine. It smells like very ripe blackberry and black cherry, tastes dense and feels full, tannic and firm-textured.

title: HandCraft 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Fruity and herbal in flavor and generous in texture, this is medium ...
description: Fruity and herbal in flavor and generous in texture, this is medium to full bodied and quite smooth in mouth feel. It smells like currants, black olives and dried herbs, and tastes a bit savory and complex along with the plummy fruit flavors.

title: Line 39 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Big and brawny, this has bold, ripe fruit aromas and flavors that ...
description: Big and brawny, this has bold, ripe fruit aromas and flavors that are shaded by thyme and dill, and backed by very firm tannins and good acidity. The mouthfeel is full and astringent, and the mouth-puckering tannins last on the finish. Enjoy it now with pork ribs or flank steak.

title: Fat Gaucho 2011 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Dark, rubbery, generic berry aromas are a touch cheesy but full. This ...
description: Dark, rubbery, generic berry aromas are a touch cheesy but full. This feels tannic and roasted, while flavors of cassis and berry come across lightly herbal and baked.

title: Gnarly Head 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: An extroverted, oaky and earthy wine, this has almost pungent aromas of ...
description: An extroverted, oaky and earthy wine, this has almost pungent aromas of wet soil and wood smoke, then meaty and savory flavors backed up with plum and black cherry. There is something compelling about it for adventurous drinkers.

title: Waterbrook 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This wine offers notes of herbs, tire rubber and sweet plum. The ...
description: This wine offers notes of herbs, tire rubber and sweet plum. The fruit flavors are sweet and broad backed by grippy tannins, finishing a bit short but still bringing plenty of appeal.

title: Josh Cellars 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: This full-bodied, concentrated wine is dry, quite firm and tannic in texture. ...
description: This full-bodied, concentrated wine is dry, quite firm and tannic in texture. It smells rich and a bit earthy, and tastes like blackberries, cranberries and beef. The style will accompany rich, meaty food very well.

title: Las Positas 2011 Estate Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: This tastes and feels mellow and approachable, with gentle aromas of plums, ...
description: This tastes and feels mellow and approachable, with gentle aromas of plums, dried herbs and tomato, and medium body with moderate tannins. It is supple and easy to drink.

title: The Dancing Fox 2012 Lewis Vineyards, Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: Made in an obviously oaky style, this has spicy, smoky vanilla and ...
description: Made in an obviously oaky style, this has spicy, smoky vanilla and nutmeg aromas, plus equally high-intensity and almost sweet flavors. A relatively smooth texture accompanies the full body. Generous and ripe fruit flavors come out with each sip and add depth.

title: WildHaven 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aromas recall plummy blue fruit, mortared dried herbs and a kiss of ...
description: Aromas recall plummy blue fruit, mortared dried herbs and a kiss of vanilla. It drinks a hair off dry with abundant black currant flavors and dry, lightly astringent tannins.

title: Pietra Santa 2010 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Cienega Valley)
excerpt: This wine from a vineyard 25 miles east of the Monterey Bay ...
description: This wine from a vineyard 25 miles east of the Monterey Bay shows a slightly reductive character on the nose, with burnt rubber alongside cherry and mint. The palate shows cranberry and pomegranate fruits, with lots of leathery tannins.

title: Sharecropper's 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Washington)
excerpt: This offering conveys blueberry, herbs, olive and tire rubber. The flavors are ...
description: This offering conveys blueberry, herbs, olive and tire rubber. The flavors are lighter in style, with just a hint of sweetness, trailing toward the finish. This would make an excellent and crowd-pleasing by-the-glass selection.

title: Wallis Family Estate 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
excerpt: A 100% Cabernet Sauvignon given two years in French oak, this sanguine, ...

title: B Cellars 2011 Beckstoffer To Kalon Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A 100% Cabernet Sauvignon from a prominent site, this wine boasts bright, ...
description: A 100% Cabernet Sauvignon from a prominent site, this wine boasts bright, juicy red cassis and pomegranate fruit supported by complex layers of dried herb, coconut and pencil shavings. Ready to enjoy now and through 2021, it finishes with a taste of bittersweet chocolate.

title: Wallis Family Estate 2012 Little Sister Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
excerpt: Complex and compelling in dark plum and dusty dark chocolate, this Cabernet ...
description: Complex and compelling in dark plum and dusty dark chocolate, this Cabernet has under 3% Petit Verdot and under 3% Cabernet Franc blended in, providing the wine with elegance and concentration. Soft on the palate, it suggests vanilla oak with subtlety, bringing all the components together on the lingering finish.

title: Madmon 2012 Soreka Special Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Shomron)
excerpt: An intense bouquet of blackberry, smoked meat, flint and violet paves the ...
description: An intense bouquet of blackberry, smoked meat, flint and violet paves the way for flavors of black currant, smoked meat, coffee bean and a hint of cranberry. Rich savory notes mingle with strong fruit flavors, all marked by a pleasingly persistent strain of tartness. Smooth, soft tannins prime the palate for the elegant finish.

title: Les Belles Collines 2011 Les Sommets Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Black and dense in yeasty baked bread and olive, this is a ...
description: Black and dense in yeasty baked bread and olive, this is a Cabernet-heavy wine with small amounts of Merlot and Petit Verdot. Black licorice, plum and tobacco play against each other within the thick, concentrated texture, tied up nicely by a long, tobacco-stained finish.

title: Merryvale 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Despite the challenging harvest, this Cabernet excels in juicy blueberry and plum ...
description: Despite the challenging harvest, this Cabernet excels in juicy blueberry and plum tones. Dusted with cinnamon on the finish, it shows a level-headed use of oak, imparting a soft, expressive texture marked by acidity. Enjoy now or cellar through 2026.

title: Pine Ridge 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Howell Mountain)
excerpt: Plum and pomegranate play off each other in this monument to Howell ...
description: Plum and pomegranate play off each other in this monument to Howell Mountain, the wine dense and Rubenesque, suggesting further time in cellar, through 2022. With 1% Cabernet Franc blended in, the tannins and oak are well-integrated, spiking in tobacco and licorice.

title: Salvestrin 2011 Salvestrin Estate Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
excerpt: A meaty Cab with small percentages of Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Petit ...
description: A meaty Cab with small percentages of Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Petit Sirah, this was given two years in mostly French oak. Pencil shavings and tar dominate on the nose, opening the way for a juiciness on the palate expressing dried herb and cassis. Integrated, the finish is savory and oaky. Enjoy through 2021.

title: The Farm Winery 2011 lpf Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: A slightly reduced nose shows a bit of dank rubber, but the ...
description: A slightly reduced nose shows a bit of dank rubber, but the black cherries, dark mushrooms and soy sauce aromas soon shine through. The palate is driven by an umami character, trending toward forest floor, with red cherries and black pepper also present.

title: Deering 2011 Nelligan Road Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Juicy, fruity and approachable, this black fruit-driven Cab is yummy and enjoyable ...
description: Juicy, fruity and approachable, this black fruit-driven Cab is yummy and enjoyable now, having spent perhaps additional time in bottle before release. With a licorice edge to the finish, it offers both herbal, savory tones in addition to ripe sweetness.

title: Psagot 2011 Single Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Jerusalem Hills)
excerpt: Inky red-violet in color, this offers a bouquet of black cherry, iodine ...
description: Inky red-violet in color, this offers a bouquet of black cherry, iodine and green pepper. It has flavors of cassis, blackberry, butterscotch, orange peel and mint, with nice notes of citrus and cranberry that continue as the smooth tannins fade on the palate.

title: Aiken 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: This wine needs time to open, so give it a decant if ...
description: This wine needs time to open, so give it a decant if possible, the tannins requiring air to unpucker. The follow-up will be a soft, subdued expression of ripe red cassis and black currant with dried herb and tobacco coming slowly to the fore, as well as a streak of anise.

title: Tulip Winery 2012 Just Cabernet Sauvignon (Galilee)
excerpt: Aromas of black cherry, lavender and thyme provide a good introduction to ...
description: Aromas of black cherry, lavender and thyme provide a good introduction to flavors of cassis, lavender and thyme, with a hint of smoke and orange peel. Smooth tannins coat the mouth and are joined on the back palate by a pleasing jolt of orange zest and tart cranberry.

title: Trinchero 2011 Haystack Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Atlas Peak)
excerpt: Black and thick, a study in smoky oak and tar, this intense ...
description: Black and thick, a study in smoky oak and tar, this intense vineyard-designated Cabernet will behave better over time. Brawny tannins surround substantial layers of blackberry and coffee, the feel on the palate weighty and voluptuous. Cellar through 2026.

title: Bougetz 2011 Eminence Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This Cab-heavy blend also contains small amounts of Merlot, Petit Verdot and ...
description: This Cab-heavy blend also contains small amounts of Merlot, Petit Verdot and Malbec, combining effectively for a taste of rocky gravel and savory red fruit. Puckering tannins and oak suggest further aging or decanting, which will help to bring out the more nuanced juiciness of cassis and black tea.

title: Segal's 2009 Unfiltered Cabernet Sauvignon (Galil)
excerpt: Inky ruby in color, this wine conveys flavors of tart cherry, cassis, ...
description: Inky ruby in color, this wine conveys flavors of tart cherry, cassis, cured meat and green pepper that are fresher than its notes of black currant and bell pepper would suggest. Slightly grippy tannins are pleasantly outweighed by a vein of cleansing tart cranberry.

title: J. Davies 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
excerpt: A generous expression of mountain Cab, accompanied by 14% Malbec, also estate-grown, ...
description: A generous expression of mountain Cab, accompanied by 14% Malbec, also estate-grown, this rich, soft wine is remarkable for its texture and mouthfeel, which is velvety and smooth. Peppercorn, dried herb and chocolate pronounce themselves on the palate, provoking thoughts for a similarly accented meal. Enjoy through 2021.

title: Arrowood 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
excerpt: This is classic in herbaceous aromas and flavors, rich in juicy blackberry ...
description: This is classic in herbaceous aromas and flavors, rich in juicy blackberry and blueberry while also offering savory pencil shavings and dark chocolate. Leathered, firm tannins complete the picture, providing structure and integration to a wall of well-managed oak.

title: Psagot 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Judean Hills)
excerpt: Aromas of cassis, black cherry and summer farm stand are evident in ...
description: Aromas of cassis, black cherry and summer farm stand are evident in this dark ruby-colored wine. It is well weighted, with good play between fruit and herbal flavors. The palate is filled with notes of black cherry preserves, chocolate, coffee, eucalyptus and a touch of bell pepper. Silky tannins and a cooling feeling persist into the finish, where they are joined by a momentary splash of brightness.

title: Dalton 2012 Oak Aged Cabernet Sauvignon (Galilee)
excerpt: A bouquet of black cherry, tart cranberry and clove opens into flavors ...
description: A bouquet of black cherry, tart cranberry and clove opens into flavors of cherry, anisette, espresso bean and mint, with a hint of tart cranberry. The minty notes can almost seem overly strong for a moment, but tart tones bring the fruit flavors back to the foreground. The pleasantly gripping tannins will mellow with a few more years of aging.

title: Tulip Winery 2011 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Galilee)
excerpt: Made with 90% Cabernet Sauvignon and 5% each Cabernet Franc and Petit ...
description: Made with 90% Cabernet Sauvignon and 5% each Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot, this wine offers a bouquet of black cherry, green pepper and toast. There is a nice balance of fruit and cooling herb flavors, featuring blackberry, eucalyptus, anisette and espresso bean. Lingering, velvety tannins continue on the palate until a final burst of cranberry on the finish.

title: Darms Lane 2011 Bon Passe Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Dark, inky and smoky on the nose, this estate-grown Cab is supple ...
description: Dark, inky and smoky on the nose, this estate-grown Cab is supple and medium bodied, offering bursts of juicy dark plum and berry on the palate. The oak is well-integrated and unobtrusive.

title: Freemark Abbey 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Sourced from several prominent vineyards across the Napa Valley, planted on hillsides ...
description: Sourced from several prominent vineyards across the Napa Valley, planted on hillsides and valley floor, this Cab is buoyed by large handfuls of Merlot in addition to smaller sprinklings of Cabernet Franc, Petit Verdot and Malbec. Juicy raspberry and blackberry rise to the fore followed by faint dried herb and cedar, a dry lick of cinnamon on the finish.

title: Trinchero 2011 Central Park West Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
excerpt: This explodes in sizable red cassis and berry fruit along with darker ...
description: This explodes in sizable red cassis and berry fruit along with darker shades of blackberry and espresso. With leathery tannins that remain puckeringly huge, it can stand some time in the cellar mellowing out, through 2026.

title: Carmel 2013 Selected Cabernet Sauvignon (Shomron)
excerpt: Deep red-violet in color, this offers aromas of black cherry, vanilla and ...
description: Deep red-violet in color, this offers aromas of black cherry, vanilla and soft baking spice. Flavors of cassis, licorice, black peppercorn and a touch of green pepper stay strong amid persistent yet soft tannins. The lasting finish is marked by notes of butterscotch and orange peel.

title: Heritance 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Made by longtime Napa winemakers Bernard Portet and Bob Pepi, this Cab ...
description: Made by longtime Napa winemakers Bernard Portet and Bob Pepi, this Cab is a complex study of bittersweet chocolate, cedar and herb. Juicy, it features a well-managed use of oak and medium body and weight, finishing with a sense of elegance.

title: Oakville Winery 2011 Estate Grown and Produced Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Perfumey violet and leather mingle on the nose before a taste of ...
description: Perfumey violet and leather mingle on the nose before a taste of softened cedar, leather pouch and tobacco hit the palate. Robust tannins and oak follow, mellowing over time with air and a swirl or two. Cigar-tinged tobacco revisits on the finish.

title: Terra Valentine 2011 Yverdon Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Spring Mountain)
excerpt: A pure Cabernet from a mountainous appellation, this is distinguished in forest ...
description: A pure Cabernet from a mountainous appellation, this is distinguished in forest and caramel-toffee aromas before evolving in the glass into juicy, well-integrated bits of red cherry and cassis. Subtle tannin dances with a chewy herbal component on the finish.

title: Louis M. Martini 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Slightly reduced, this wine offers a chalky, tannic backbone to an otherwise ...
description: Slightly reduced, this wine offers a chalky, tannic backbone to an otherwise juicy explosion of rich black cherry, the whole accented throughout by firm oak and cigar box.

title: Houdini 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: Mostly Cabernet Sauvignon, this is softened by the addition of 18% Merlot. ...
description: Mostly Cabernet Sauvignon, this is softened by the addition of 18% Merlot. Austere and slightly grippy, it is marked on the palate by leather and red plum, finishing in a clash of both.

title: Aiken 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: Still young and tight, this cassis-laden wine has a softness, complemented by ...
description: Still young and tight, this cassis-laden wine has a softness, complemented by herb and dusty tannin. As it opens, more ripeness comes to the fore, almost like grenadine, with a braised meat streak to the aroma.

title: Parcel 41 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Juicy plum and pencil shavings define this straightforward, soft, approachable and fruit-forward ...
description: Juicy plum and pencil shavings define this straightforward, soft, approachable and fruit-forward wine, cradled in toasty oak and a pronounced earthiness. The lingering finish features a touch of black pepper.

title: Courtney Benham 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
excerpt: This hugely concentrated, full-style Cab is awash in generous swathes of black ...
description: This hugely concentrated, full-style Cab is awash in generous swathes of black cherry, cassis and leather. The oak presence nearly dominates but provides accents of smoke and spice, before a long finish ties up loose ends.

title: Hanna 2012 Red Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Sweet cherry and vanilla aromas are most noticeable in this soft, juicy ...
description: Sweet cherry and vanilla aromas are most noticeable in this soft, juicy Cab, with streaks of cassis playfully integrated throughout. Dry tannins and diesel oak build up steam on the finish, which is medium in length.

title: Mission Estate 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Hawke's Bay)
excerpt: This is a crisp, linear Cabernet that would be fine alongside burgers, ...
description: This is a crisp, linear Cabernet that would be fine alongside burgers, pizza and the like. Slightly smoky aromas frame cassis and cherry notes, which turn tart on the finish.

title: Kriselle 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rogue Valley)
excerpt: Tart and acidic, this does not entirely disguise its green-bean scents with ...
description: Tart and acidic, this does not entirely disguise its green-bean scents with aging in French oak, 30% new. That sweet oak sticks out, but the tannins are chalky and the fruit hard to find.

title: Shiloh Winery 2011 Secret Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Judean Hills)
excerpt: Enticing aromas of black cherry conserves on toast lead to flavors of ...
description: Enticing aromas of black cherry conserves on toast lead to flavors of stewed cherries and raspberry, with licorice and clove notes. The deep fruit flavors are overly ripe and powerful. Although the flavors work well together, the wine lacks brightness.

title: Ideology 2011 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: From grapes predominantly grown in the Oak Knoll District, this has a ...
description: From grapes predominantly grown in the Oak Knoll District, this has a dusty herbaceousness. It was given plenty of time in French oak, a sensation that is pronounced on the palate and somewhat distracting.

title: Eagle Eye 2011 Estate AlphaWOLF Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A majority of Cabernet Sauvignon spent 18 months aging in French oak ...
description: A majority of Cabernet Sauvignon spent 18 months aging in French oak with 4% Petit Verdot and 4% Cabernet Franc, the oak and power both intense and rustic. Sizable dry tannins dominate on the palate, finished with a bite of leather and cassis.

title: Krutz 2011 Magnolia Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
excerpt: A rustic tinge of barnyard-y earth marks this wine, otherwise plumed in ...
description: A rustic tinge of barnyard-y earth marks this wine, otherwise plumed in plum and tobacco. Its personality leans toward herbaceousness, with a juiciness on the midpalate. The finish is dry and abbreviated.

title: Field Stone 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Dry, sizable tannins embrace a core of dusty black plum and blackberry. ...
description: Dry, sizable tannins embrace a core of dusty black plum and blackberry. Straightforward and not overly ambitions, it finishes with a pronounced taste of oak.

title: Rutini 2012 Trumpeter Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Gritty, roasted berry aromas are rubbery and hint at Band-Aids. In the ...
description: Gritty, roasted berry aromas are rubbery and hint at Band-Aids. In the mouth, this is O.K. in feel, albeit a bit jammy and thick. Short, generic berry flavors come with minty accents and some green on the finish.

title: Viluko 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Made from certified organic grapes, this wine is both savory and tannic, ...
description: Made from certified organic grapes, this wine is both savory and tannic, a tad muted on the nose and wanting in texture. Cassis and pipe tobacco stand out most.

title: Cascada Peak 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Cinnamon and licorice gumdrop and sketchy cherry cough drop aromas make up ...
description: Cinnamon and licorice gumdrop and sketchy cherry cough drop aromas make up the nose on this cloying Cab that also shows hard tannins. Baked berry and brown sugar flavors finish with little sizzle or balance.

title: Hendry 2011 Hendry Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: An overpowering aroma of cured meat on the nose recalls walking into ...
description: An overpowering aroma of cured meat on the nose recalls walking into an Italian deli, something one associates more readily with Cal-Ital varieties. Super tannic on the palate, the wine is slightly bitter and perhaps underripe.

title: Antic 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: An 84% Cabernet Sauvignon with 12% Cabernet Franc and 4% Malbec, it ...
description: An 84% Cabernet Sauvignon with 12% Cabernet Franc and 4% Malbec, it reveals a plethora of oak nestled around dried cranberry, bittersweet chocolate and cigar. Medium bodied, it benefits from additional time in the glass.

title: Krutz 2011 Stagecoach Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: From a prime vineyard site and supported by 11% Malbec, 6% Merlot ...
description: From a prime vineyard site and supported by 11% Malbec, 6% Merlot and 4% Petit Verdot, this suffers from leathery anise-inflected flavors and aromas that border on barnyard earthiness, with a sourness to the finish.

title: EdenVale 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rogue Valley)
excerpt: Pickle barrel scents and a strong impression of green wood, along with ...
