description: Pickle barrel scents and a strong impression of green wood, along with a whiff of cedar, characterize this rough, rustic, tannic wine. The 2007 is the current release and is drying out quickly. Drink up.

title: Gardel 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Jammy, scratchy, oddly spiced aromas set up a drawing, cloying palate feel. ...
description: Jammy, scratchy, oddly spiced aromas set up a drawing, cloying palate feel. Gummy strawberry and raspberry flavors finish short and briny, with a sweet, chocolaty note.

title: Tuck Beckstoffer 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Deep and richly layered in red and black berries, this wine offers ...
description: Deep and richly layered in red and black berries, this wine offers a mouthwatering, juicy core, supported by layers of firm tannins and full-bodied oak. Concentrated, it retains enough acidity to maintain balance and is drinking lovely now.

title: Yao Ming 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Well-made and dancing in acidity, this Cabernet is juicy in notes of ...
description: Well-made and dancing in acidity, this Cabernet is juicy in notes of red currant and pomegranate, yet slightly exotic on the back palate, with hints of cardamom and cinnamon. Layered without being overly concentrated, the wine is built to age like its bigger brother (the Family Reserve), able to hold on and build nuance through 2020.

title: Castello di Amorosa 2010 Il Barone Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A reserve-level 100% Cabernet Sauvignon, this is savory in black fruit and ...
description: A reserve-level 100% Cabernet Sauvignon, this is savory in black fruit and smoky oak, the tannins soft and structured. A richness of cinnamon toast and vanilla play on the palate, followed by more depths of full-bodied blackberry.

title: Garage Wine Co. 2011 Lot #37 Maipo Alto Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: This small-lot Cab (350 cases) is classically Chilean at all check points. ...
description: This small-lot Cab (350 cases) is classically Chilean at all check points. The nose is spicy and full of cassis and berry flavors along with tobacco, olive and mild eucalyptus notes. A bright, lively palate is bolstered by acidity, while plum and red-berry flavors are oaky, spicy and peppery, with a toasty, slightly rooty finish. Drink through 2020.

title: Tobacco Road 2008 Vitality Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Given 18 months in half new French oak and half new American ...
description: Given 18 months in half new French oak and half new American oak, this wine has also spent plenty of time in bottle, providing it with a depth of dark chocolate mint around a core of juicy black fruit, structured tannin and a sumptuous touch of earth.

title: Penley Estate 2012 Phoenix Cabernet Sauvignon (Coonawarra)
excerpt: Full bodied and richly textured, this is an approachable wine that should ...
description: Full bodied and richly textured, this is an approachable wine that should nonetheless drink well through at least 2025. Toasted coconut accents cassis and blackberry fruit, folding in hints of vanilla on the long, mouthwatering finish.

title: Kenwood 2010 Artist Series Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
excerpt: With 4% Merlot, this Cab is aged just over two years in ...
description: With 4% Merlot, this Cab is aged just over two years in French oak and given almost as long in bottle before release. The result is satisfying, a swirl of savory black pepper, espresso, black cherry and tar smoothed out by dry tannins and restrained, toasty oak. The artist featured is Sonoma-based painter Keith Wicks.

title: Walla Walla Vintners 2011 Sagemoor Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Given sufficient time to open up, this cool-vintage wine brings notes of ...
description: Given sufficient time to open up, this cool-vintage wine brings notes of dried herbs, chocolate, anise, pencil lead and wood spice. The luscious chocolate and cherry flavors are soft, supple and concentrated, with enough tannins to benefit from additional time in the cellar. Drink after 2016 or give it a two-hour decant.

title: Wakefield Estate 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Clare Valley)
excerpt: This winery was originally developed as a Cabernet specialist, and the regular ...
description: This winery was originally developed as a Cabernet specialist, and the regular 2012 bottling is another fine success. Briery, herbal shadings frame blackberry fruit, while the finish features a mouthwatering combination of mocha, dark fruit and lingering tannins. Drink this medium-bodied Cabernet now through 2025.

title: Andrew Januik 2012 Stone Cairn Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: The second vintage from this winery brings roasty-toasty barrel notes along with ...
description: The second vintage from this winery brings roasty-toasty barrel notes along with coffee, butterscotch, cherry, pencil lead and an herbal grace note. The chocolate and cherry flavors are silky in feel backed by a gentle squeeze of tannins, with coffee flavors lingering on the finish.

title: Janzen 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This approachable Cab is from both estate and sourced fruit, all Cabernet ...
description: This approachable Cab is from both estate and sourced fruit, all Cabernet Sauvignon. It opens with a waft of tropical coconut before delving classically into smooth black cherry, cranberry and licorice, the tannins still monstrous and the oak packing a punch.

title: Oberon 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa County)
excerpt: Sourced from all over the Napa Valley, this wine blends 87% Cabernet ...
description: Sourced from all over the Napa Valley, this wine blends 87% Cabernet Sauvignon with 1% Syrah and other unnamed red varieties. The effort works, resulting in a glass of concentrated red cherry, herb and spice, the tannins tight yet approachable enough for the wine to remain juicy.

title: Santa Carolina 2012 Reserva de Familia Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Ripe, almost candied aromas of berry fruits are offset by creamy oak ...
description: Ripe, almost candied aromas of berry fruits are offset by creamy oak scents and a touch of olive. This is chunky, weighty and trying hard to keep its form. Flavors of roasted black fruits, chocolate and herbs finish soft and low on structure. Drink this warm-vintage, full-flavored Cab through 2017.

title: Chimney Rock 2011 Tomahawk Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
excerpt: Tightly wound in oak and smoky forest floor, this intriguing wine walks ...
description: Tightly wound in oak and smoky forest floor, this intriguing wine walks a tightrope between savory characteristics and power that somewhat over take the fruit.

title: Koyle 2012 Royale Los Lingues Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Chunky, ripe blackberry and cassis aromas come with baking spice scents. In ...
description: Chunky, ripe blackberry and cassis aromas come with baking spice scents. In the mouth, this feels broad, jammy and tannic, but under control. Ripe flavors of baked blackberry and graphite finish full and creamy but with solid tannic framework. Drink through 2019.

title: Tobacco Road 2009 Tradition Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Robust in black pepper and intense black fruit, this has a tension ...
description: Robust in black pepper and intense black fruit, this has a tension of freshness and red cherry, making for a complex and intriguing wine with noticeable structure and a refreshing finish.

title: Maquis 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Ripe black-fruit aromas get a boost from dark spice notes. Saturated, heavy ...
description: Ripe black-fruit aromas get a boost from dark spice notes. Saturated, heavy and deep in the mouth, this is a meaty wine with blackberry flavors leading herb and leathery notes. On the finish, this remains dark and driven by black fruits and firm tannins. Drink through 2018.

title: Summers 2011 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Calistoga)
excerpt: Estate-grown from a small family winery and entirely Cabernet Sauvignon, this wine ...
description: Estate-grown from a small family winery and entirely Cabernet Sauvignon, this wine is savory in earthy truffle, subdued plum, black cherry and tobacco leaf. A complex intermingling of pencil shavings and cedar round things out. On the palate the generous tannins are sure to smooth over time.

title: Goldschmidt 2009 Plus Game Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: With a nose full of rich, ripe plum and tobacco, this 100% ...
description: With a nose full of rich, ripe plum and tobacco, this 100% Cabernet Sauvignon spends 43 months in tight-grain barrel, melding together its burly layers of blackberry jam, clove and toasty oak. Leathery through the finish, the wine is soft and round, following through with easygoing tannins to the finish.

title: Castello di Amorosa 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A smidgen of Petit Verdot finds its way into this Cab, a ...
description: A smidgen of Petit Verdot finds its way into this Cab, a cellar-worthy bottling with massive bone structure, accented by savory cedar, herb and black fruit. A taste of espresso dusted in chocolate shavings shows on the finish. Age through 2020.

title: Henry Earl 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: This wine offers notes of woodspice, butterscotch, coffee and blackberry. The fruit ...
description: This wine offers notes of woodspice, butterscotch, coffee and blackberry. The fruit flavors are lighter in style with mouthwatering acids and firm, grippy tannins that need some time or perhaps a big, juicy steak to tame them.

title: Rios de Chile 2009 Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Cachapoal Valley)
excerpt: Mellow balsamic-like aromas of herbal berry fruits, tobacco and vanilla lead to ...
description: Mellow balsamic-like aromas of herbal berry fruits, tobacco and vanilla lead to a juicy, easy-flowing palate. Flavors of licorice and anise accent blackberry and currant, with tobacco and vanilla notes providing support. A lightly spiced finish is fresh and medium in length.

title: Domaines Barons de Rothschild (Lafite) 2011 Los Vascos Grande Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Spicy and stout on the nose, this delivers graphite, blackberry and cassis ...
description: Spicy and stout on the nose, this delivers graphite, blackberry and cassis aromas. The palate is young, choppy and tannic in feel, with racy, raw flavors of ripe tomato and blackberry accented by carob and chocolate. Dry tannins on the finish support lightly baked berry flavors. Drink through 2017.

title: Tara Bella 2009 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This Cab follows a similar protocol to previous vintages, with 22 months ...
description: This Cab follows a similar protocol to previous vintages, with 22 months in French oak. It comes from a single vineyard planted entirely to Clone 7 and is dry and generous in tannin, though nicely juicy in currant and pomegranate.

title: Ded.Reckoning 2012 Cutlass Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: This young wine shows notes of vanilla, herbs, cherry, barnyard, and cinnamon ...
description: This young wine shows notes of vanilla, herbs, cherry, barnyard, and cinnamon accented by brooding barrel spices. The fruit flavors are medium bodied and quite tart with the tannins tightly wound. Oak notes carry through on the warm finish. Best from 2016 on.

title: Leeuwin Estate 2009 Art Series Cabernet Sauvignon (Margaret River)
excerpt: This medium-bodied, softly tannic wine is ready to drink. Scents of vanilla, ...
description: This medium-bodied, softly tannic wine is ready to drink. Scents of vanilla, cedar and black cherry surge from the glass, while the flavors follow in a similar vein, just adding a pleasant touch of leather before finishing crisp and mouthwatering.

title: Cadaretta 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This moderately aromatic wine features notes of black cherry, clove and abundant ...
description: This moderately aromatic wine features notes of black cherry, clove and abundant high-toned herbs. A supple mouthfeel with black fruit flavors accompanies firm, dry tannins.

title: Chilcas 2011 Reserva Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (Lolol Valley)
excerpt: Dusty raspberry and plum aromas are spicy, dry and attractive, leading to ...
description: Dusty raspberry and plum aromas are spicy, dry and attractive, leading to a fresh palate with kick. Flavors of spiced plum, raspberry and red cherry are a touch briny, while the finish has length and a pleasing texture.

title: Landskroon 2011 Paul de Villiers Cabernet Sauvignon (Paarl)
excerpt: Ripe, fruity and forward, this opens with attractive, jammy scents of blackberry, ...
description: Ripe, fruity and forward, this opens with attractive, jammy scents of blackberry, cherry and boysenberry preserves, with touches of cocoa nib and licorice root character. The palate is vibrant and juicy, while an earthy spice note adds depth to the medium-length finish. Drink now.

title: Concha y Toro 2012 Marques de Casa Concha Cabernet Sauvignon (Puente Alto)
excerpt: Blackberry and cassis aromas are limited by a grassy, green element on ...
description: Blackberry and cassis aromas are limited by a grassy, green element on the nose. In the mouth, this is loud, edgy and tannic. Flavors of saucy tomato, stewed blackberry, coconut and vanilla finish ripe and full, but a little stewy. Overall this wine is strong and generous but shows some gaps in its composition.

title: Tara Bella 2008 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: Unusual for the Russian River, this 100% Cab is earthy and robust ...
description: Unusual for the Russian River, this 100% Cab is earthy and robust in chalky tannin accented by milk chocolate and juicy cassis. An edge of forest floor plays throughout, with the wine exhibiting more dry tannin on the finish.

title: Whitehall Lane 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: With small percentages of Merlot and Malbec, this Cab offers distinct herbal ...
description: With small percentages of Merlot and Malbec, this Cab offers distinct herbal notes, its body medium in weight and acidity. Clove and fig round out the profile.

title: Smith & Hook 2010 Westside Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: There are very savory aromas on this wine, with campfire smoke and ...
description: There are very savory aromas on this wine, with campfire smoke and herb-crusted game dominating the boysenberry fruit in the background. The tannins are edgy, and toasted oak flavors persist in a pleasant way, with black cherry and licorice present as well.

title: Fall Line 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Coming from Boushey (60%), Artz (33%) and Red Willow vineyards, this wine ...
description: Coming from Boushey (60%), Artz (33%) and Red Willow vineyards, this wine is fruit-forward with notes of raspberries, red currant and pencil eraser. The cranberry flavors are elegant, pure and tart with a light grip of tannins.

title: Echeverria 2012 Propuesta Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
excerpt: Roasted, balsamic aromas suggest tomato, coffee grinds and a pinch of herbal ...
description: Roasted, balsamic aromas suggest tomato, coffee grinds and a pinch of herbal green in addition to standard berry and cassis notes. Pulsing acidity creates a lively, dancing mouthfeel. Flavors of herbal plum and light cherry finish scratchy and edgy, with a mild chocolate flavor.

title: Markham 2010 The Philanthropist Yountville Estate Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: From estate-grown fruit, this 100% Cabernet Sauvignon is dark in mocha and ...
description: From estate-grown fruit, this 100% Cabernet Sauvignon is dark in mocha and generous dry tannins, softened on the midpalate by vanilla, caramel and candied cherry.

title: Harmony Cellars 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Grape candy and black cherry aromas are edged by cedar. Chewy tannins ...
description: Grape candy and black cherry aromas are edged by cedar. Chewy tannins dominate the palate, with dark chocolate and purple fruit flavors present as well.

title: Robert Craig 2011 Affinity Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: The 76% Cabernet Sauvignon takes center stage here, supported by 10% Merlot, ...
description: The 76% Cabernet Sauvignon takes center stage here, supported by 10% Merlot, 10% Petit Verdot, 3% Cabernet Franc and 1% Malbec, most of it grown on the eastern side of Napa below Mount George. Together they offer earthy clove and a brisk, brooding back palate, followed by tight tannins and anise-flecked chocolate.

title: Dealy Lane 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This wine offers quality that over-delivers on its comparatively modest price. Aromas ...
description: This wine offers quality that over-delivers on its comparatively modest price. Aromas are perfumed in rose and lavender before opening up a zingy palate of black fruit and bacon.

title: Siegel 2011 Crucero Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Blackberry, olive and a touch of juniper rank as herbal but solid. ...
description: Blackberry, olive and a touch of juniper rank as herbal but solid. In the mouth, this is round and thick, with good structure. Oak and spice flavors accent blackberry fruit, while the finish deals baked plum, fig and herbal notes.

title: San Pedro 2011 Castillo de Molina Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
excerpt: Spicy plum and olive aromas get this tannic, wiry Cab going. It ...
description: Spicy plum and olive aromas get this tannic, wiry Cab going. It also offers mild green notes on the nose along with hard tannins. Spice, plum, vanilla and herbal flavors carry the finish.

title: Trueblood 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
excerpt: This packs a punch, delivering wide swathes of vanilla, clove and chocolate-covered ...
description: This packs a punch, delivering wide swathes of vanilla, clove and chocolate-covered cherry around soft, round tannins and a slightly bitter, savory herbal finish.

title: Valle Secreto 2011 First Edition Cabernet Sauvignon (Cachapoal Valley)
excerpt: Spicy, green aromas suggest juniper bush more than clean berry fruits. This ...
description: Spicy, green aromas suggest juniper bush more than clean berry fruits. This is firm and condensed on the palate, with herbal, minty flavors of leathery, savory blackberry and eucalyptus. The finish is saucy and herbal, with staunch acidity and hard tannins.

title: Rombauer 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: The winery initially produced Cabernet, a fact fans of its white wines ...
description: The winery initially produced Cabernet, a fact fans of its white wines might not know. This vintage offers 83% Cabernet Sauvignon blended with 11% Cabernet Franc and 6% Petit Verdot. Puckering in tannin, it offers faint mint and high-toned black cherry, the finish ripe and vanilla-sweet.

title: Kirkland Signature 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: Aromas of plum, herbs and confection come along with barnyard notes that ...
description: Aromas of plum, herbs and confection come along with barnyard notes that jut out. The fruit flavors are dry and chalky with medicinal notes taking over. Drink now.

title: Rombauer 2010 Diamond Selection Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A small percentage of Petit Verdot was added to this Cab, the ...
description: A small percentage of Petit Verdot was added to this Cab, the grapes sourced from throughout the Napa Valley. Cedar, mint and chocolate cassis come foreward on the palate, the wine slightly thin though oaky.

title: Stella Bella 2008 Suckfizzle Cabernet Sauvignon (Margaret River)
excerpt: Showing some bricking at the rim, at nearly seven years of age ...
description: Showing some bricking at the rim, at nearly seven years of age this is a mature, herbal Cabernet. Vanilla notes frame tobacco, earthy and slightly vegetal flavors of bell pepper and tomato. Tannins are firm and chewy, while the fruit seems to be receding. Drink up.

title: Spring Mountain Vineyard 2011 Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This opens with a strong sense of coconut that abruptly hits pomegranate ...
description: This opens with a strong sense of coconut that abruptly hits pomegranate and cranberry on the palate. The sweetness of the coconut dissipates on the finish, which veers slightly sour.

title: EBGB 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
excerpt: Jammy raspberry aromas lack focus; the bouquet is also jammy and lacking ...
description: Jammy raspberry aromas lack focus; the bouquet is also jammy and lacking in structure and tannins. Flavors of raspberry Kool-Aid are devoid of oak and spice contributions, while the finish more like juice than wine.

title: Stone The Crows 2012 Three Twins Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Opening with a rich, luxurious nose, this wine is delightfully bright on ...
description: Opening with a rich, luxurious nose, this wine is delightfully bright on the palate before evolving into brooding notes of black cherry and smoky oak. Hints of dark chocolate and coconut shavings round out the intrigue and complexity. The wine is ready to enjoy now, but worth cellaring through 2020.

title: Blackjack 2010 Harmonie Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: A heavily spiced nose of cracked peppercorn and tobacco notes mesh with ...
description: A heavily spiced nose of cracked peppercorn and tobacco notes mesh with blackberry extract and blueberries on this top bottling from the winery. Its flavors are even darker than blue fruit, with creosote and smoked cigar elements that mellow and evolve as the bottle sits open.

title: Tobacco Road 2008 Private Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This private reserve is 93% Cabernet Sauvignon, 5% Malbec and 2% Petit ...
description: This private reserve is 93% Cabernet Sauvignon, 5% Malbec and 2% Petit Verdot, aged considerably in bottle. Rich and full-bodied, it has a vanilla-kissed nose and earthy leather pedigree, the black cherry flavor concentrated and thick.

title: Grgich Hills 2010 Yountville Selection Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: The winery makes this wine from vines planted in 1959 that it ...
description: The winery makes this wine from vines planted in 1959 that it now farms organically. In this vintage, they produced a hearty, sizable wine, ripe, soft and intense, in need of time to coax the blackberry and cassis fruit forward. Enjoy through 2025.

title: Mulvane Wine Co. 2011 Neal 3 Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This small-production Cab is at first faint in subtle fruit but slowly ...
description: This small-production Cab is at first faint in subtle fruit but slowly works its magic, offering balanced layers of black currant and blackberry around soft, toasty mocha oak, picking up nuance and complexity on the way to a lingering finish.

title: Beresan 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (OR))
excerpt: Sourced from estate vineyards, this is aged in a mix of new ...
description: Sourced from estate vineyards, this is aged in a mix of new and neutral French oak. Baking spices, gingerbread, cassis, earth, umami, soy and balsamic elements combine in a complex, distinctive and powerful wine with another decade of development ahead. Decant if drinking soon, or cellar until 2025.

title: Martin Lane Winery 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sierra Foothills)
excerpt: Richness, concentration and exotic mint and dark chocolate flavors help this darkly ...
description: Richness, concentration and exotic mint and dark chocolate flavors help this darkly colored and full-bodied Cabernet stand out. It layers mouth-coating tannins over ripe black cherry, black olive and light sage flavors. Should be a crowd pleaser for a special dinner. Best now through 2024.

title: Flora Springs 2011 Hillside Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: From a tiny hillside block in Rutherford, this 100% Cab is soft ...
description: From a tiny hillside block in Rutherford, this 100% Cab is soft in clove, black currant and olive, juicy yet restrained. It spent almost two years in 90% new French oak, but the presence of oak is subtle and the tannins well-managed, making the wine both enjoyable now and worth cellaring through 2020.

title: Brandlin 2011 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
excerpt: Solely from Mount Veeder, this Cabernet Sauvignon has small percentages of Petit ...
description: Solely from Mount Veeder, this Cabernet Sauvignon has small percentages of Petit Verdot and Cabernet Franc. The trio combine to offer currant and cranberry around a complex, woody core of oak, black tea and herbs.

title: SonVida 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Lightly baked, rooty aromas of berry fruits come with notes of charcoal ...
description: Lightly baked, rooty aromas of berry fruits come with notes of charcoal and toast. This is layered, deep and creamy in feel, with firm tannins waiting in the wings. Ripe berry and cassis flavors mixed with notes of tobacco and carob finish with nutmeg, chocolate and other flavors from the bake shop. Drink through 2020.

title: Jamieson Ranch 2012 Double Lariat Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Supple and accessible, this Cabernet is bright in acidity and soft in ...
description: Supple and accessible, this Cabernet is bright in acidity and soft in tannins, yet amply structured. The palate is layered with flavors of cherry and cranberry, with a hit of nuanced oak on the finish.

title: Bodega Norton 2012 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Baked, ripe, meaty and dark, with an herbal note, this powerful, solidly ...
description: Baked, ripe, meaty and dark, with an herbal note, this powerful, solidly built Cab has hard tannins and a firm structure. Ripe berry, cassis, herb, nutmeg and rooty sweetness vie for attention on a flavor profile that tails off oaky, chewy and ripe. Drink through 2019.

title: Obsidian Ridge 2011 Obsidian Ridge Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Hills Lake County)
excerpt: Big and rich, this needs time or a great steak to bring ...
description: Big and rich, this needs time or a great steak to bring out its best. The color is very dark to the rim. Aromas are closed but the flavors compare to tart blackberry and black cherry with smoky accents. It has density, a layered texture that is tannic but not harsh, and a reserved power that should come out with time. Best after 2018.

title: Pride Mountain 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma-Napa)
excerpt: From 62% Sonoma fruit and 38% Napa, this 92% Cabernet Sauvignon is ...
description: From 62% Sonoma fruit and 38% Napa, this 92% Cabernet Sauvignon is blended with small percentages of Merlot and Petit Verdot. A cassis-fragrant nose leads to deep, juicy layers of chocolate, black raspberry and soft tannins with a subtle suggestion of mint and restrained oak.

title: Pennywise 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Wood-fire aromas and flavors give this medium-bodied Cabernet a peppery, spicy personality, ...
description: Wood-fire aromas and flavors give this medium-bodied Cabernet a peppery, spicy personality, and suggest grilled or smoked meat as good pairings. While the smoky, oaky character is strong, the wine has generous, ripe fruit flavors, rich but not harsh tannins, vibrant acidity and a lingering finish.

title: Herzog 2012 Variations Five Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Pleasant richness and depth of fruit flavor accompany the deep color and ...
description: Pleasant richness and depth of fruit flavor accompany the deep color and nicely chewy tannins in this full-bodied Cabernet. It tastes dry and well balanced between acidity, tannins and fruitiness, and will be a great mealtime wine with all kinds of protein.

title: RouteStock Cellars 2012 Route 29 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Made by former Chandon and Louis Martini winemaker Wayne Donaldson, this well-constructed ...
description: Made by former Chandon and Louis Martini winemaker Wayne Donaldson, this well-constructed Cab offers herbal blackberry and dark raspberry fruit around a core of soft tannins. It has a touch of grip to the finish, which is accented in richly roasted coffee. The addition of 18% Merlot helps soften the overall picture.

title: Finca Decero 2012 Remolinos Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Agrelo)
excerpt: Aromas of asphalt and grilled steak accent berry and cassis scents. This ...
description: Aromas of asphalt and grilled steak accent berry and cassis scents. This hits hard on the palate, with no mercy to the tannins. Flavors of cherry and cassis come with notes of desert sage and chocolate. Drilling tannins last through the finish. Drink through 2020.

title: Pomar Junction 2012 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Minerals and earth lift the nose of this wine, with iron ore, ...
description: Minerals and earth lift the nose of this wine, with iron ore, rust and jet black soils alongside a touch of boysenberry fruit. The palate is sanguine as well, reflecting red volcanic dirts, with fruit trending toward violet and cranberry.

title: Steven Kent 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: Well-structured and medium-bodied, this has generous oak and spice aromas, rich and ...
description: Well-structured and medium-bodied, this has generous oak and spice aromas, rich and deep berry flavors, a firm and tannic texture and an almost sweet finish. This tastes well-balanced, lavishly flavored and tempting.

title: Castoro Cellars 2012 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Castoro founder Niels Udsen has been making wine since 1983. He produces ...
description: Castoro founder Niels Udsen has been making wine since 1983. He produces a very classic style in this bottling, with cherry, brown spice and cedar on the nose. The palate blends vanilla bean with black and Bing cherries, and sits on heavy tannins, ensuring a decent shelf life.

title: Dunning Vineyards 2012 Westside Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: The nose on this wine from the Willow Creek area plays between ...
description: The nose on this wine from the Willow Creek area plays between the lighter elements of bright red cherries and heavier hints of tar, with a bit of sour plum thrown in as well. The palate is loaded with chalky tannins, offering flavors of black cherries and licorice, but it could use some more time in bottle.

title: Ironstone 2011 Reserve Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Sierra Foothills)
excerpt: This full-bodied red has the classic Cabernet aromas and flavors that made ...
description: This full-bodied red has the classic Cabernet aromas and flavors that made California wine famous in the 1970s. Plenty of black cherry is shaded by black olive and hints of bell pepper, plus softly spicy tones that may come from barrel aging. It is firmly tannic and has a lingering finish.

title: Bodega Catena Zapata 2012 High Mountain Vines Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Rubbery berry and cassis aromas are a touch reduced. This is round ...
description: Rubbery berry and cassis aromas are a touch reduced. This is round in feel, with creamy oak covering hard tannins. Spicy, herbal berry and currant flavors lead to a finish that is slightly minty and green.

title: B.R. Cohn 2012 Gold Label Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa County-Sonoma County)
excerpt: A 100% Cabernet Sauvignon from both Napa County (67%) and Sonoma County ...
description: A 100% Cabernet Sauvignon from both Napa County (67%) and Sonoma County (33%), Gold Label is a new line for the winery, meant to represent its ultra-premium collection of Cabernet. Howell Mountain and Atlas Peak are represented, as is the B.R. Cohn Olive Hill estate vineyard. Minty, with traces of cedar and cranberry, it offers firm tannins and a black cherry finish.

title: Irony 2012 Small Lot Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (North Coast)
excerpt: With good balance and the classic cherry and herb flavors of Cabernet, ...
description: With good balance and the classic cherry and herb flavors of Cabernet, this is tasty and well made. It smells and tastes like ripe cherries and blackberries sprinkled with a bit of brown sugar (oak-barrel influence).

title: City Winery of New York 2011 Obsidian Ridge Vineyard Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Hills Lake County)
excerpt: A few years of aging may help this full-bodied, very structured and ...
description: A few years of aging may help this full-bodied, very structured and tannic Cabernet smooth out and gain more complexity. Alternatively, pour it now with something rich like a grilled rosemary lamb chop. It feels tight because of the dense, lip-smacking tannins, yet it does pack in considerable ripe plum, smoke and tobacco flavors. Best after 2017.

title: Pomar Junction 2010 Estate Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Deeply purple aromas of acai fruit and grape Jolly Rancher candies get ...
description: Deeply purple aromas of acai fruit and grape Jolly Rancher candies get a bit more serious with the scent of smoked cigars. The grape-juice element carries to the easy-to-drink, not overly complex palate, which will work well with food or just by itself.

title: Shannon Ridge 2012 High Elevation Cabernet Sauvignon (Lake County)
excerpt: This fragrant confection smells like caramel and toasted French bread, and tastes ...
description: This fragrant confection smells like caramel and toasted French bread, and tastes like milk chocolate and cherries without the sugar. It is medium-bodied, very smooth in texture and almost sweet on the finish.

title: Cruz Alta 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Foresty, lightly herbal berry aromas come with oaky char and toast notes. ...
description: Foresty, lightly herbal berry aromas come with oaky char and toast notes. This feels a bit wide and flat. Flavors of herbal plum and cassis finish with gritty tannins and scratchy burn.

title: Herzog 2012 Variations Three Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: A tannic intensity makes this full-bodied wine a candidate for further aging. ...
description: A tannic intensity makes this full-bodied wine a candidate for further aging. It shows spicy, oaky aromas, ripe plum and cherry flavors, and a vivid sense of tooth-drying tannins that are typical of young Cabernet Sauvignon. While it could pair well now with beef short ribs or osso buco, it should mellow after 2018.

title: Septima 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Concentrated berry aromas are basic but full and pleasing, with a hint ...
description: Concentrated berry aromas are basic but full and pleasing, with a hint of pastry popping up. A snappy, crisp, drying palate houses lightly herbal plum and currant flavors, while the finish is juicy and tastes a bit herbal and spicy.

title: Courtney Benham 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Grippy and surrounded in a thick, leathery texture and aroma, it holds ...
description: Grippy and surrounded in a thick, leathery texture and aroma, it holds bright cranberry tones underneath the thickness, making this a palatable Cabernet.

title: Mascota 2012 ROD Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Fiery oak and resiny aromas derive from the barrel. Monster tannins create ...
description: Fiery oak and resiny aromas derive from the barrel. Monster tannins create a gritty, tough mouthfeel, while flavors of blueberry, blackberry and cassis fade toward minty oak on the finish.

title: Concannon 2012 Selected Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Earthy, slightly oaky aromas, bright plum flavors and a smooth, juicy texture ...
description: Earthy, slightly oaky aromas, bright plum flavors and a smooth, juicy texture make this Cabernet a bit different and easily enjoyable. The flavors are generous, the balance is almost sweet, the tannins are soft and the body is not too full.

title: Jamieson Ranch 2012 Light Horse Three County Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: An almost sweet, ripe fruit character makes this enticing to smell and ...
description: An almost sweet, ripe fruit character makes this enticing to smell and easy to drink. Though full-bodied and packed with fine tannins, it has a soothingly rich texture. A syrupy oak and fruit flavor lingers on the finish.

title: Greystone 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: A sense of sweetness and jammy fruit flavors make this a good ...
description: A sense of sweetness and jammy fruit flavors make this a good pairing to tame spicy, meaty foods like ribs, chili or Szechuan beef. It was fashioned almost like a Zinfandel, with lots of ripeness, ample sweet and spicy oak notes and full body.

title: Salentein 2012 Portillo Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (Uco Valley)
excerpt: Black-fruit and toasty aromas are simple yet direct and fresh. This Cab ...
description: Black-fruit and toasty aromas are simple yet direct and fresh. This Cab shows crisp, lip-smacking acidity, which yields an equally crisp, medium-bodied palate with herbal berry flavors that finish lean and tight.

title: Frisson Wines 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This Cab is straightforward in stark cherry and dry tannins, the texture ...
description: This Cab is straightforward in stark cherry and dry tannins, the texture still quite grippy and generous.

title: Tapiz 2013 T Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Hard-driving plum and cherry aromas are a touch rubbery. This Cab is ...
description: Hard-driving plum and cherry aromas are a touch rubbery. This Cab is wide on the palate but not all that dense or strong in the middle. Ripe, grapy flavors of black plum and cassis finish toasty and tannic.

title: Star Lane Vineyard 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Happy Canyon of Santa Barbara)
excerpt: This is another heavily tannic wine from Star Lane, too young to ...
description: This is another heavily tannic wine from Star Lane, too young to predict exactly where it will wind up. Aromas are a bit reductively barnyard, and the flavors that peek out from behind the tannic wall are quite varied, from dark red fruit to slightly sour green olive and aged spices.

title: Avalon 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Soft and round, this 80% Cabernet Sauvignon also has 16% Merlot and ...
description: Soft and round, this 80% Cabernet Sauvignon also has 16% Merlot and 4% Cabernet Franc and was given 16 months of oak aging. Flavors lean toward red berry and cedar.

title: Ironstone 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: A powerful, almost overbearing oak influence makes this wine bombastic. Toasty, maple ...
description: A powerful, almost overbearing oak influence makes this wine bombastic. Toasty, maple sugar and smoked bacon flavors come from heavily charred new oak barrels or oak add-ins. It has a very dark color, full body, plenty of tannins and a smoky, oaky finish.

title: Tuck Beckstoffer 2012 Est. 1975 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: This would make a good everyday Cabernet due to its relatively light ...
description: This would make a good everyday Cabernet due to its relatively light color and flavor intensity, smooth texture and again relatively light body. It does offer charming raspberry and black olive aromas, plus tasty cherry flavors without a lot of drying tannin.

title: Lexicon 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Berry aromas come with an oaky, lactic whiff of plastic. A scratchy ...
description: Berry aromas come with an oaky, lactic whiff of plastic. A scratchy palate is fruity but awkward, with generic plum and dark-berry flavors. Fig cookie and chocolaty flavors control a blocky finish.

title: Entwine 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Made in a light style compared to most Cabernets, this has fresh ...
description: Made in a light style compared to most Cabernets, this has fresh strawberry aromas, a soft texture and light raspberry flavors. Without the usual body and richness of Cabernet it drinks more like a refreshing rose, and will be best chilled.

title: Schweiger 2009 Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (Spring Mountain)
excerpt: Big tannins dominate this dry, brushy expression of Cabernet Sauvignon with 5% ...
description: Big tannins dominate this dry, brushy expression of Cabernet Sauvignon with 5% Merlot that is austere in fruit.

title: Fabre Montmayou 2013 Phebus Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Simple berry and plum aromas are ripe and expand with airing. That ...
description: Simple berry and plum aromas are ripe and expand with airing. That same airing dulls down the palate, leaving basic berry flavors that finish short and rubbery, with almost no follow through.

title: Region 1 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Briny cherry and raspberry aromas offer up a note of tire rubber. ...
description: Briny cherry and raspberry aromas offer up a note of tire rubber. Muddled cherry and berry flavors finish short, and overall this wine lacks character.

title: Charles Krug 2011 Yountville Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This wine is a mix of 85% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Petit Verdot ...
description: This wine is a mix of 85% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Petit Verdot and 5% Merlot that is tight, tannic and a tad green.

title: Rutherford Ranch 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Made from a majority of Cabernet Sauvignon this wine also contains 10% ...
description: Made from a majority of Cabernet Sauvignon this wine also contains 10% Merlot and 1% Malbec. The combination shows thin on the palate and lacking somewhat in fruit.

title: Janzen 2011 Beckstoffer To Kalon Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A worthy ambassador of Beckstoffer To Kalon grapes, this finely crafted Cab ...
description: A worthy ambassador of Beckstoffer To Kalon grapes, this finely crafted Cab is lively in red fruit and tightly woven tannins, the cinnamon and clove seasoned just right. Having spent just about two years in new French oak the imprint is subtle, adding structure and an exotic, tropical air.

title: San Simeon 2010 Estate Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Elegant and attractive aromas of dark violet, red rose, cedar and a ...
description: Elegant and attractive aromas of dark violet, red rose, cedar and a touch of vanilla serve as a promising entry point to this Cabernet. A bit of char kicks in on the palate alongside dark chocolate, espresso and ripe plum skin, with roasted beet in the background.

title: Diamond Creek 2011 Red Rock Terrace Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: From a seven-acre section of the vineyard, this offers plenty of saddle ...
description: From a seven-acre section of the vineyard, this offers plenty of saddle leather and cedar amidst spicy cardamom layers, a soft, juicy core and tingling acidity. The structure and weight suggest the ability to cellar comfortably through 2020.

title: Sparkman 2011 Kingpin Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: Principally Klipsun vineyard fruit, this is a mass of black cherry and ...
description: Principally Klipsun vineyard fruit, this is a mass of black cherry and cassis, wreathed in smoke from aging in 80% new French barrels. Great balance and length carry it through into drying tannins. A perfect steakhouse Cabernet.

title: Cooper-Garrod 2009 Lone Oak Vineyard Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: Lightly toasted tobacco, blueberry pie and cedar scents lead the way on ...
description: Lightly toasted tobacco, blueberry pie and cedar scents lead the way on this single-vineyard Cab. Fresh blueberry on the palate combines with a great arc of flavors that ends in a chewed cigar finish.

title: Black Stallion 2010 Limited Release Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Rich and varietally expressive on the nose, this Cabernet Sauvignon is softened ...
description: Rich and varietally expressive on the nose, this Cabernet Sauvignon is softened by the addition of 15% Merlot, the two combining in layers of ripe plum and tobacco. With mouthwatering acidity and firm tannins, it offers a complete package of enjoyable, approachable Cabernet.

title: Brander 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Ynez Valley)
excerpt: An evenly dispersed nose of sage bark, cherry compote and lightly toasted ...
description: An evenly dispersed nose of sage bark, cherry compote and lightly toasted cedar introduces this bottling by Fred Brander, a Santa Ynez Valley winemaking pioneer now actively trying to create a new Los Olivos District appellation. The flavors are balanced between cherry fruit and oak, with smooth tannins throughout.

title: Clos du Val 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
excerpt: From 100% estate-grown Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot grown in the heart of ...
description: From 100% estate-grown Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot grown in the heart of the Stags Leap District, this earthy red offers black tea and coffee aromas and flavors, suggestions of wild sage and black pepper enveloping the nose. Medium to full-bodied, elegant and well-composed, the tannins are soft and structured, the wine able to age, drinking well now through 2020.

title: Mount Eden 2010 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: Slightly funky scents of asphalt and sweaty socks come along with graphite, ...
description: Slightly funky scents of asphalt and sweaty socks come along with graphite, pressed blackberry and New Mexico chile. The palate is led by tobacco-laced zing, opening with boysenberry flavors, and finishing with decent acidity and mouth-coating tannins.

title: Midsummer Cellars 2011 Haystack Peak Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Atlas Peak)
excerpt: Smoky and meaty, this medium-bodied Cab from rocky Atlas Peak offers sensible ...
description: Smoky and meaty, this medium-bodied Cab from rocky Atlas Peak offers sensible acidity wrapped around spicy, dusty tannins and a savory aftertaste of tobacco.

title: Paratus 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
excerpt: From an estate vineyard high atop Mount Veeder, this 100% Cabernet Sauvignon ...
description: From an estate vineyard high atop Mount Veeder, this 100% Cabernet Sauvignon is dark and inky, concentrated in color and flavor, a brambly intensity at the center of it all. Peppercorns and clove accent its larger smoky, espresso side, the body full and velvety.

title: Sextant 2011 Kamal Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Sharp anise, violet and menthol scents swirl around a core of rich ...
description: Sharp anise, violet and menthol scents swirl around a core of rich blackberry jam on this wine, hitting the palate with serious thickness. The Kamal, named after an 8th-century navigation device, also features the other four Bordeaux varietals. It delivers flavors of deep plum jelly, cherry syrup, pepper and cedar.

title: Turchi 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: Inebriating aromas of hearty tobacco, black earth, cassis and prune kick off ...
description: Inebriating aromas of hearty tobacco, black earth, cassis and prune kick off another barrel-aged monster from Dave Corey. The cherry syrup and plum liqueur flavors remain bright with strong acidity as well as sturdy tannic structure, meaning this one will last until 2020 at least.

title: Brander 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Ynez Valley)
excerpt: A lush bouquet of cooked strawberries, black cherry sauce and just a ...
description: A lush bouquet of cooked strawberries, black cherry sauce and just a touch of allspice kick off this fun, drink-me-now wine from Santa Ynez Valley pioneer Fred Brander. Good acidity and smooth tannins reminiscent of plum skin surround a fruity palate, which boasts a flavorful arc.

title: Calluna 2010 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Chalk Hill)
excerpt: Among the first vintages from a small, family-run vineyard and winery within ...
description: Among the first vintages from a small, family-run vineyard and winery within the Chalk Hill AVA, this also contains small amounts of Merlot, Cabernet Franc, Petit Verdot and Malbec, all estate-grown. The wine is soft and medium-bodied, brooding in savory leather and herb.

title: Howell Mountain Vineyards 2011 Hillside Select Cabernet Sauvignon (Howell Mountain)
excerpt: Soft and dusty, this is an herbal, elegant Cabernet from big mountain ...
description: Soft and dusty, this is an herbal, elegant Cabernet from big mountain fruit, the tannins well-managed. It starts out with an intensity of black fruit followed by sturdy structure and a finish of chocolate and coffee.

title: Jordan 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: In this vintage, the winery stays true to its reputation for making ...
description: In this vintage, the winery stays true to its reputation for making balanced, more restrained Cabernet, offering firm, structured tannins and bright cassis and blackberry around a deft sprinkling of dried herb. Built to age through 2025, it is equally enjoyable now, after a decant. Small percentages of Merlot, Petit Verdot and Malbec factor in.

title: Pride Mountain 2011 Vintner Select Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is a structured, fairly austere Cabernet fermented in stainless steel and ...
description: This is a structured, fairly austere Cabernet fermented in stainless steel and then aged in French oak. Dark and concentrated, the profile ripe in blackberry, cedar, sage and bittersweet chocolate.

title: The Leader 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This is a new, value label under the Barons umbrella, produced by ...
description: This is a new, value label under the Barons umbrella, produced by consulting winemaker Matthew Loso. Lovely raspberry fruit anchors the flavors, which are sleek and stylish and, show the craftsmanship of much more expensive vino. Dark notes of mineral and a whiff of graphite and iodine add complexity through a surprisingly long finish.

title: Mannina Cellars 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: Of all the 2012 releases from Mannina, this is the most dense, ...
description: Of all the 2012 releases from Mannina, this is the most dense, dark and substantial. Cassis and black cherry fruit is set against a stiff streak of char and coffee, backed with firm, ripe tannins. The length and balance are just right for ripe fruit from young vines.

title: Sequoia Grove 2010 Tonella Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: From a vineyard in the heart of Rutherford replanted in time to ...
description: From a vineyard in the heart of Rutherford replanted in time to make the 2010 vintage, this Tonella Cabernet is dark black and dense in black cherry, tobacco and chocolate. Ready to age until 2017 or so, the wine imparts a lift of acidity on the finish.

title: The Divining Rod 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: A project of Marc Mondavi, this wine is a blend of mostly ...
description: A project of Marc Mondavi, this wine is a blend of mostly Cabernet Sauvignon, rounded out by tiny percentages of Petit Verdot, Cabernet Franc, Malbec and Merlot. Juicy in dark cherry and blackberry fruit, it is well composed, with a smoky undercurrent.

title: Concha y Toro 2012 Serie Riberas Gran Reserva Ribera del Tinguiririca Cabernet Sauvignon (Marchigue)
excerpt: Jammy raspberry and plum aromas are primary and fresh on the nose. ...
description: Jammy raspberry and plum aromas are primary and fresh on the nose. This ripe, round wine is sure to be a party-pleaser. Solid cassis, berry and spice flavors finish pure, with ripeness and proper balance.

title: La Chanterelle 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: Young, tight and sharp-toned upon first sniff, this broadens out and opens ...
description: Young, tight and sharp-toned upon first sniff, this broadens out and opens up with an hour or two of airing. The pinpoint focus brings black raspberry, black cherry and light hints of tobacco into play. The 30% new oak seems just right, although there is some burn in the finish from the high alcohol.

title: Ehret 2010 Hillside Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Knights Valley)
excerpt: Winemaker Nick Goldschmidt is behind this wine, an aromatic study in campfire ...
description: Winemaker Nick Goldschmidt is behind this wine, an aromatic study in campfire and toasty smoke amid a palate of back-of-the-mouth tannins. Dense and soft, the wine needs more time in the bottle to settle. It aged in French oak, 70% of it new, for 20 months.

title: Krutz 2010 Stagecoach Vineyard Limited Edition Artist Series Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A Syrah-esque bit of smoke and cured meat wafts from this wine ...
description: A Syrah-esque bit of smoke and cured meat wafts from this wine aromatically, which follows through on the palate. Bright cherry and currant fruit then intermix with a restrained sense of clove spice, the Stagecoach Cab blended with Malbec and Petit Verdot, aged in 60% new French oak.

title: Casas del Bosque 2012 Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: This dark, heavily oaked Cabernet is lemony on the nose, but also ...
description: This dark, heavily oaked Cabernet is lemony on the nose, but also full of typical cassis and black fruit aromas. The palate is muscular, with firm tannins. Flavors of black fruit are matched by resiny oak, leading to additional notes of licorice on the finish. Drink through 2017.

title: Canoe Ridge 2011 Estate Grown Block 2 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: A moderately aromatic wine with notes of melted butter, vanilla, plum, herbs ...
description: A moderately aromatic wine with notes of melted butter, vanilla, plum, herbs and woodspice. The tannins are firm and tightly wound, needing some time to come together. Best after 2016.

title: Dewitt 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: This is 90% Cabernet Sauvignon and 10% Merlot, aged in American oak, ...
description: This is 90% Cabernet Sauvignon and 10% Merlot, aged in American oak, half of it new. Inviting in spicy pepper and violet perfume, the medium body is awash in black cherry and berry, with a layer of subtle smoke popping in along the long finish.

title: Muscardini 2010 Madrone Ridge Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Medium in weight and body, this offers juicy black cherry fruit around ...
description: Medium in weight and body, this offers juicy black cherry fruit around a core of dry tannins. The overall texture is soft enough to enjoy now, the finish savory in clove.

title: J. Rickards 2011 Five Sisters Blend Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: A blend of all five red Bordeaux varieties, with Cabernet Sauvignon the ...
description: A blend of all five red Bordeaux varieties, with Cabernet Sauvignon the largest percentage, this is a soft, approachable and juicy wine. The cassis and herbal components are pleasantly in balance and restrained on the palate.

title: V. Sattui 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A lush texture marks this wine that has a handful of Merlot ...
description: A lush texture marks this wine that has a handful of Merlot and Petit Verdot blended in. The bold flavors are classic cassis and black currant tones.

title: Goldschmidt 2009 Yoeman Vineyard Plus Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: This 100% Cabernet Sauvignon is aged 43 months in new French oak. ...
description: This 100% Cabernet Sauvignon is aged 43 months in new French oak. The oak is indeed dominant here, enveloping more subdued layers of savory leather, dark berry and cassis. Firm, substantial tannins hit on the back of the throat and coat the palate all the way through the long finish.

title: Ross Andrew 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Light in color with notes of dusty plum, chocolate and spice. The ...
description: Light in color with notes of dusty plum, chocolate and spice. The palate is on the lighter side of medium bodied with abundant cherry flavors and chalky, firm tannins that need time to unwind. Best after 2016.

title: Arboleda 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Aconcagua Valley)
excerpt: Blackberry and cassis aromas show earthy and herbaceous hints, with coconut and ...
description: Blackberry and cassis aromas show earthy and herbaceous hints, with coconut and vanilla tones coming on late. The acid-driven palate meets oaky flavors of coconut and vanilla, softened by plum and cherry notes on the finish.

title: Black Box 2012 Platinum Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
excerpt: Cherry, pepper, grilled meat, mint and smoke make for a great bouquet, ...
description: Cherry, pepper, grilled meat, mint and smoke make for a great bouquet, and the palate rewards as well, with plum jam and roast beef notes. There are tannins and vibrant acidity, too, washing the palate clean after each sip.

title: Bonneau 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: A 100% Cabernet Sauvignon that offers cherry, plum and earthy spice, the ...
description: A 100% Cabernet Sauvignon that offers cherry, plum and earthy spice, the tannins soft and supple. This is a wine to enjoy now, aged close to two years in French oak, 20% of it new.

title: Stag's Leap Wine Cellars 2011 Artemis Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A majority Cabernet Sauvignon with 14% Merlot blended in, Artemis is aromatically ...
description: A majority Cabernet Sauvignon with 14% Merlot blended in, Artemis is aromatically inviting in dark plum, currant and a streak of herb. Light, lean and well-balanced, the wine features soft, barely perceptible tannins. Tri-tip is a wise pairing suggestion.

title: Hunnicutt 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Calistoga)
excerpt: The winery makes a line of Cabernet Sauvignon from various AVAs of ...
description: The winery makes a line of Cabernet Sauvignon from various AVAs of the Napa Valley, highlighting each on the label. From warmer Calistoga, this mouthCab is brambly black fruit-forward with layers of coffee and mocha.

title: Santa Alicia 2012 Gran Reserva de Los Andes Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Red berry and herbal aromas are firm and focused on the nose. ...
description: Red berry and herbal aromas are firm and focused on the nose. A snappy palate deals savory and fruity flavors of red berry, olive and mint. Firm tannins and driving acidity push the finish a bit further.

title: Sequoia Grove 2010 Healy Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This offers earthy, savory leather and dark, spicy layers of cassis and ...
description: This offers earthy, savory leather and dark, spicy layers of cassis and plum fruit, with intense chocolate mocha weighing into the mix amid firm, structured tannins. Despite its brooding nature and thick skin, it has a freshness on the palate, the acidity alive and well.

title: Chateau Rollat 2010 Edouard de Rollat Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: Light and muted, with sharp, leafy and herbal flavors. It seems to ...
description: Light and muted, with sharp, leafy and herbal flavors. It seems to be drying out, leaving an impression of mushrooms rather than fruit. Drink now.

title: Michael Pozzan 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Juicy in black and red berry, this relatively inexpensive Cabernet is aged ...
description: Juicy in black and red berry, this relatively inexpensive Cabernet is aged in both French and American oak. Tannins are soft and subtle, the power building on the finish.

title: North by Northwest 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Sourced from vineyards in the Horse Heaven Hills and Walla Walla AVAs, ...
description: Sourced from vineyards in the Horse Heaven Hills and Walla Walla AVAs, this Cabernet-dominated blend includes small amounts of Merlot, Malbec and Petit Verdot. Herbal, tart, and loaded with juicy, snappy acidity, it shows primary sour raspberry and cherry. Hints of ground coffee and green herb come through in the finish.

title: William Cole 2012 Columbine Special Reserve Single Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Rubber and mineral aromas share the stage with smoky cassis and plum ...
description: Rubber and mineral aromas share the stage with smoky cassis and plum accents. This wine feels fresh and zesty with plum and red berry flavors. A fruity, focused finish is alert but low on depth and richness.

title: Broken Earth 2010 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Red clay dust meets boysenberry pie aromas on this wine. The cedar-powered ...
description: Red clay dust meets boysenberry pie aromas on this wine. The cedar-powered tannins jump on the palate quickly and last long into the finish, with red fruits of strawberry and raspberry gracing the flavor profile.

title: Sextant 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Ripe, juicy berries dominate the nose, getting some aromatic lift from hints ...
description: Ripe, juicy berries dominate the nose, getting some aromatic lift from hints of eucalyptus and menthol. The mint and red fruit of cherries consume the straight-forward palate, which is more bright and lean than rich and tannic.

title: Ross Andrew 2012 Glaze Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: An appealing wine with notes of milk chocolate, plum and dried herbs. ...
description: An appealing wine with notes of milk chocolate, plum and dried herbs. The new French oak is dialed back and the tannins are soft and plump, helping it go down easy.

title: Taplin Cellars 2009 Terra 9 Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
excerpt: Soft in black fruit, licorice and a chocolatey richness, offset by dusty ...
description: Soft in black fruit, licorice and a chocolatey richness, offset by dusty tannins, this Cabernet is also accented by subtle spice and ripe plum.

title: Indomita 2012 Zardoz Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Blackberry and cherry aromas lead over an herbaceous and earthy tone on ...
description: Blackberry and cherry aromas lead over an herbaceous and earthy tone on the nose. The rock-hard palate boasts astringent tannins which will require years in the bottle to tame. Spicy and herbal black fruit flavors finish dry, with notes of tobacco and spice.

title: Pisano 2010 RPF Cabernet Sauvignon (Progreso)
excerpt: Cassis, raisin and an oak-based note of plastic are the key aromas. ...
description: Cassis, raisin and an oak-based note of plastic are the key aromas. This Cabernet is wide and blocky on the palate, with choppy tannins. Earthy, raisin flavors are ripe and sweet tasting, while a jammy finish is full of mixed berry flavors.

title: Primus 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Blackberry and rubbery aromas are also leafy and mulchy. The syrupy mouthfeel ...
description: Blackberry and rubbery aromas are also leafy and mulchy. The syrupy mouthfeel is heavy, with baked cassis and prune flavors suggesting overripe fruit. Fig, chocolate and sawdust notes come up on a cloying finish.

title: Alto Los Romeros 2012 Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Earthy, funky aromas of leafy, baked berry fruits and cassis rank as ...
description: Earthy, funky aromas of leafy, baked berry fruits and cassis rank as strange and wild. Burnt flavors of coffee and herbal berries are gamy, while the mouthfeel is tannic and hard to plow through.

title: Daniel Gehrs 2012 Limited Selection Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
excerpt: Musty aromas of saddle leather combine with cherry soda on the nose, ...
description: Musty aromas of saddle leather combine with cherry soda on the nose, and the flavors prove a bit thin, with cherry, raspberry and blackberry present amidst tart tannins. The finish is quick.

title: Vena Cava 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Valle de Guadalupe)
excerpt: Initially this Cab smells grassy and downright green, yet berry aromas rise ...
description: Initially this Cab smells grassy and downright green, yet berry aromas rise up after time in the glass. An awkward, heavy palate is home to heavily oaked berry flavors that finish creamy and thick.

title: Edna Valley Vineyard 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
excerpt: Familiar cherry-chalk aromas lead the nose. Like the smell, the flavors feel ...
description: Familiar cherry-chalk aromas lead the nose. Like the smell, the flavors feel formulaic, but with too much acid added.

title: Rodney Strong 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
excerpt: This Cabernet is somewhat thin, the cedar and oak overpowering the fruit ...
description: This Cabernet is somewhat thin, the cedar and oak overpowering the fruit and a touch of green herb not entirely in balance.

title: Mossback 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Chalk Hill)
excerpt: A dollop of 20% Merlot adds softness to this Cabernet that is ...
description: A dollop of 20% Merlot adds softness to this Cabernet that is otherwise simple and somewhat rustic with a pronounced aroma and taste of green pepper.

title: San Pedro 2012 Epica Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
excerpt: Tomato, wood notes and soupy berry aromas announce an overripe, sticky Cabernet ...
description: Tomato, wood notes and soupy berry aromas announce an overripe, sticky Cabernet with a mix of sweet, candied berry flavors and herbal notes.

title: Porta 2013 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Gamy aromas suggest tomato and underripe berry. A harsh, acidic palate fails ...
description: Gamy aromas suggest tomato and underripe berry. A harsh, acidic palate fails to bring elegance, while flavors of beet, raspberry extract, green herb and tomato end in a hard, narrow fashion.

title: Silvan Ridge 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rogue Valley)
excerpt: Fairly aromatic, it conveys notes of red and black fruit, savory herbs, ...
description: Fairly aromatic, it conveys notes of red and black fruit, savory herbs, toffee and barrel spices. Lighter in style, it shows abundant vanilla flavors while still bringing a lovely sense of texture and overall balance.

title: Adoquin 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Dark aromas of black cherry and plum are spicy and suggestive of ...
description: Dark aromas of black cherry and plum are spicy and suggestive of crude oil. In the mouth, this everyday Cab shows juicy balance and clean lines. Standard black-fruit flavors come with spice notes and a harmonious, long finish.

title: Bodega Toneles 2011 Reserva Tonel 46 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Baked, earthy aromas of raisin, fruitcake, ink and oak require plenty of ...
description: Baked, earthy aromas of raisin, fruitcake, ink and oak require plenty of air to show their best. A jammy, creamy, oaky palate is home to resiny flavors of vanilla, spice and berry fruits. The finish is woody, resiny and pasty, with ripe yet generic flavors in reserve.

title: Fingerprints 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Spicy, heady aromas are dark and draw you in. This value CS ...
description: Spicy, heady aromas are dark and draw you in. This value CS is solid and ripe, with good mouthfeel. Loamy, oaky flavors of black fruits are standard but tasty, while blatant oak and related chocolate and peppery notes drive the finish.

title: Bodega Norton 2011 Barrel Select Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Spicy, jammy aromas of plum and blackberry are dense yet soft. This ...
description: Spicy, jammy aromas of plum and blackberry are dense yet soft. This feels syrupy and rich, almost sticky, with grabby oak and blackened flavors of berry fruits that ultimately register as nondescript. A peppery, hot finish is plump but low on detail.

title: Kaiken 2011 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Gritty, burnt, stalky aromas are shy on fruit and not that fresh. ...
description: Gritty, burnt, stalky aromas are shy on fruit and not that fresh. This is tight and rough in feel, with peppery, herbal flavors that run green and low on fruit. More oak and modest berry flavors carry the finish.

title: Daou 2011 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Black cherry, leather, tar and nose-tickling clove aromas mix with a tad ...
description: Black cherry, leather, tar and nose-tickling clove aromas mix with a tad of green pepper on the nose of this signature bottling. The wine is very elegant in structure and memorable in flavors of peppercorn and cherry pie, all while retaining an acidic tartness.

title: Venge 2011 Family Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: Aged more than two years in air-dried French oak, this is classic ...
description: Aged more than two years in air-dried French oak, this is classic Oakville Cabernet Sauvignon, velvety and plush. It boasts juicy blackberry and black cherry fruit aromas and flavors, with weighty oak and a mix of coconut flake and chocolate that linger on the finish.

title: Stevens 2010 XY Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: Here is a classic take on pure Yakima Valley Cabernet Sauvignon, concentrated ...
description: Here is a classic take on pure Yakima Valley Cabernet Sauvignon, concentrated and cropped down to 1.5 tons/acre. Three-quarters of the barrels were new, yet the deep, dark, well-structured core of black fruits is up to the challenge. Graphite and espresso highlights balance out the lengthy finish.

title: Broman 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This late-release has benefited from its time in bottle. Juicy and beguiling ...
description: This late-release has benefited from its time in bottle. Juicy and beguiling in red raspberry and black cherry fruit, it has a back layering of spicy cardamom and a sphere of acidity. Buoyant and memorable, it finishes with more spice and savory leather.

title: Ehlers Estate 2011 1886 Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
excerpt: Awash in juicy currant and black cherry fruit, it has a sophisticated ...
description: Awash in juicy currant and black cherry fruit, it has a sophisticated back-layering of cedar and maple that adds complexity. Integrated tannins are soft enough to make the wine enjoyable now, yet sturdy enough to cellar for many years.

title: Merryvale 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: From a handful of Napa Valley vineyards, this Cab is blended with ...
description: From a handful of Napa Valley vineyards, this Cab is blended with Cabernet Franc, Merlot, Malbec and Petit Verdot, producing a classically elegant wine dotted in cassis, cedar and white peppercorn. Chalky and buoyant in acidity, it drinks lean and supple, the finish darker in smoky, coffee tones.

title: Ancestry 2011 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: The AVA shines in this cool vintage, delivering robust, ripe fruit flavors ...
description: The AVA shines in this cool vintage, delivering robust, ripe fruit flavors without aggressive tannins. The acids are in place to provide good support, and the aging in two-thirds new French oak adds a nice dusting of cinnamon and mocha.

title: Shafer 2011 One Point Five Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
excerpt: A substantial and imminently structured wine from a coolish vintage, this blends ...
description: A substantial and imminently structured wine from a coolish vintage, this blends 92% Cabernet Sauvignon with 5% Petit Verdot and 3% Malbec to impressive effect. Leathery and intense it will benefit with time, its black pepper, red cassis fruit and flowery anise layers commingling in complex ways.

title: Brutocao 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendocino)
excerpt: Mendocino makes excellent big reds, such as this stand-out Cabernet. A synthesis ...
description: Mendocino makes excellent big reds, such as this stand-out Cabernet. A synthesis of vivid dark fruit flavors and light oak accents makes this deeply colored wine tasty and complex. It has firm tannins, a velvety texture and lingering ripe fruit nuances on the finish.

title: Dusted Valley 2011 VR Special Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Consistent with past versions of this reserve-level Cabernet, this new vintage is ...
description: Consistent with past versions of this reserve-level Cabernet, this new vintage is smooth and sweetly fruity, with plenty of new oak aging under its belt. The tannins are ripe and svelte, and a streak of iron and licorice runs right down the spine. Drink now through 2020.

title: Mercer 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Showing excellent concentration and structure, this sharply etched wine sets vivid fruit ...
description: Showing excellent concentration and structure, this sharply etched wine sets vivid fruit flavors of raspberries and pie cherries against buoyant acidity. The focus is excellent, right on through a crisp finish.

title: Alder Ridge 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: 100% varietal, this is a directly appealing wine. It features a nice ...
description: 100% varietal, this is a directly appealing wine. It features a nice interplay between the barrel notes of fresh brewed coffee and sweet spices (40% new French with the balance seasoned American) and the fruit flavors of cherry and herb, with a supple feel bringing it all together.

title: Wattle Creek 2010 Vintage Select Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Dark and richly colored, this juicy, mouthwatering, generously oaked wine has a ...
description: Dark and richly colored, this juicy, mouthwatering, generously oaked wine has a high quotient of blackberry and raspberry. It is as rich on the palate as it is in color, getting better in the glass.

title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2011 Ethos Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Pure Cabernet sourced principally from the Cold Creek Vineyard, this instantly accessible ...
description: Pure Cabernet sourced principally from the Cold Creek Vineyard, this instantly accessible reserve plays out broadly across the palate, with black cherry, caramel and creamy coffee flavors in abundance. Hints of graphite and chalk carry through the tannins and into the well-defined, balanced finish.

title: Columbia Crest 2011 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This reserve spent time in 100% new French oak, and shows better-than-average ...
description: This reserve spent time in 100% new French oak, and shows better-than-average ripeness for this cool vintage. Fruit flavors of berry, cherry and a streak of cassis are at the core, with pleasing aromatics as well. A generous chocolate flavor runs into the finish.

title: Kontos Cellars 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: Solid, dark and toasty, this pure Cabernet brings substantial acidity behind flavors ...
description: Solid, dark and toasty, this pure Cabernet brings substantial acidity behind flavors of cassis, cedar and smoke. It still tastes young, tough and tight, and may improve with further bottle age.

title: Hightower 2012 Murray Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The blend includes roughly equal amounts of Cab Franc, Petit Verdot and ...
description: The blend includes roughly equal amounts of Cab Franc, Petit Verdot and Malbec, nicely integrated. The structure and palate weight seem more mainstream Yakima Valley than Red Mountain, lending extra balance and herbal detail to the wine.

title: Left Bend 2011 Camel Hill Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Cruz)
excerpt: The nose is somewhat reserved on this wine from the stylish brand ...
description: The nose is somewhat reserved on this wine from the stylish brand Left Bend, named after the San Andreas Fault, though cherry liqueur, plum jam and red clay do emerge. The scents translate to vivid flavors, though, with cinnamon spice, ollallieberry and black pepper on the palate.

title: Obrien & Obrien 2011 92067 Cabernet Sauvignon (South Coast)
excerpt: Dust and blackberry aromas introduce this wine, which also includes 15% Merlot ...
description: Dust and blackberry aromas introduce this wine, which also includes 15% Merlot and 2% Cabernet Franc. The flavors are a nicely presented mix of cherry and plum fruit, pipe smoke, cigar ash and an earthy finish of savory herbs.

title: Errazuriz 2012 Max Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Aconcagua Valley)
excerpt: Rubbery, herbal initial aromas yield to black-fruit and earthy qualities as this ...
description: Rubbery, herbal initial aromas yield to black-fruit and earthy qualities as this breathes and unwinds. The palate has a healthy, forward mouthfeel and flavors of herbal berry and cassis. A dry, rooty-tasting finish is spicy in flavor and medium in length and complexity.

title: Shalestone 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Earthy notes of clay and mushroom lend a rugged complexity to aromas ...
description: Earthy notes of clay and mushroom lend a rugged complexity to aromas of roasted plums and cherries on this lush yet composed wine. The palate is densely concentrated with black cherry flavor, but anchored with bright acidity and a blanket of velvet tannins.

title: Grgich Hills 2011 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is a classic Napa Valley floor Cabernet, enhanced with handfuls of ...
description: This is a classic Napa Valley floor Cabernet, enhanced with handfuls of Petit Verdot and Merlot. Dusty in red currant and herb, it offers mellowed tannins and a peppery underbelly.

title: Balduzzi 2012 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Maule Valley)
excerpt: Ripe blackberry aromas carry notes of prune and raisin. For a ripe, ...
description: Ripe blackberry aromas carry notes of prune and raisin. For a ripe, dark wine, this is juicy and well balanced. Oaky, toasty flavors lean toward dark fruits and blackberry, and the finish keeps the dark-fruit theme going while folding in bitter coffee notes.

title: Milbrandt 2012 Traditions Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Loaded with soft, approachable flavors of black cherry, black licorice and a ...
description: Loaded with soft, approachable flavors of black cherry, black licorice and a streak of dried herb, this five-grape, Bordeaux-style blend is 85% Cabernet. It nicely expresses the generous fruit of the 2012 vintage.

title: Clos du Val 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Cranberry and currant dominate this restrained wine, wound up in tannins with ...
description: Cranberry and currant dominate this restrained wine, wound up in tannins with a streak of sage accented by black pepper. On the finish expect deeper layers of chocolate and vanilla-caramel.

title: Concha y Toro 2012 Casillero del Diablo Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
excerpt: Herbal, saucy aromas of tomato and spice accent dark-berry fruit, while the ...
description: Herbal, saucy aromas of tomato and spice accent dark-berry fruit, while the palate carries a tight, fresh, crisp feel. This brings herbal, spicy notes along with berry and cassis flavors, while the finish rolls out in loamy yet short fashion.

title: Avalon 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Very fruity, fresh and easy to enjoy, this has the smoothness of ...
description: Very fruity, fresh and easy to enjoy, this has the smoothness of barrel age but little overt oak flavor. It features bright red cherry and raspberry aromas, juicy berry flavors and a texture with just enough bite to be appetizing.

title: 6 Under 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Washington)
excerpt: Aromas of blackberry, plum, chocolate and spice are light, but the palate ...
description: Aromas of blackberry, plum, chocolate and spice are light, but the palate is fruit-filled and flavorful with a tart finish.

title: Hightower 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: This wine is roughly half estate-grown and half Shaw vineyard, all on ...
