description: This wine is roughly half estate-grown and half Shaw vineyard, all on Red Mountain. Along with tart berry fruit comes a generous dash of fresh herbs, clean earth and a bit of stem. Medium long in the finish, it carries a pleasant streak of toasty oak.

title: Columbia Crest 2012 Grand Estates Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This wine often retails for less than the listed price, which already ...
description: This wine often retails for less than the listed price, which already qualifies it as a Best Buy. Consistent whatever the vintage may bring, this is a fruit-driven, spicy Cabernet with plenty of vanilla and tobacco highlights. A splash of black cherry cola carries it through a full-bodied finish.

title: Canoe Ridge 2011 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: Aged in just one-third new French oak, this mostly shows the fruit, ...
description: Aged in just one-third new French oak, this mostly shows the fruit, along with notes of green herbs, plum and currant accented by vanilla. The palate is medium bodied, slightly viscous in feel with a tart finish and dry tannins.

title: Miro 2011 Silverwood Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Pine Mountain-Cloverdale Peak)
excerpt: This comes from a mountain-high vineyard atop a relatively new Sonoma County ...
description: This comes from a mountain-high vineyard atop a relatively new Sonoma County AVA that straddles into Mendocino County, too. Savory and herbal, the 100% Cab offers dark sour cherry and blackberry and plenty of tannin.

title: Obelisco Estate 2011 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: Tight and tart, this offers crisp and spicy flavors of raspberry fruit, ...
description: Tight and tart, this offers crisp and spicy flavors of raspberry fruit, with a sharpness to the flavors. About one-quarter of the barrels were new and deliver highlights of toast and chocolate.

title: Tommasi 2012 Poggio al Tufo Cabernet Sauvignon (Toscana)
excerpt: Black currants and green bell pepper aromas lead the nose on this ...
description: Black currants and green bell pepper aromas lead the nose on this easygoing Cabernet Sauvignon from Tuscany. The soft, straightforward palate offers plum and black cherry with a hint of licorice alongside round tannins. Not an ager so enjoy soon for the best of the juicy fruit flavors.

title: Viu Manent 2011 Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Earthy aromas include notes of animal hide and leather along with herbal ...
description: Earthy aromas include notes of animal hide and leather along with herbal berry. This offers a good, round mouthfeel and bracing acidity, while flavors of berry and cassis are mildly green and herbal. A short finish is fresh in feel.

title: Wellington 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Highlighted in Rainier cherry and cassis fruit, with a core of high ...
description: Highlighted in Rainier cherry and cassis fruit, with a core of high acidity, this is a drinkable, affordable red wine worth looking for.

title: Santa Ema 2012 Select Terroir Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Plum and raspberry aromas are fresh, clean and simple. This is a ...
description: Plum and raspberry aromas are fresh, clean and simple. This is a solid, full-bodied Cabernet with currant and plum flavors accented by notes of herbs and spices. A minty, lightly herbal finish feels fresh and healthy.

title: 14 Hands 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The 14 Hands Cabernet is more tightly wound than its companion Merlot, ...
description: The 14 Hands Cabernet is more tightly wound than its companion Merlot, but the flavors follow the same winning formula, with a heavy emphasis on coffee cream and cherry tobacco. A generous streak of kahlua runs down the spine.

title: La Playa 2012 Axel Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Early aromas of stalky, herbal berry fruits set up a palate with ...
description: Early aromas of stalky, herbal berry fruits set up a palate with peppery, herbal flavors of cassis and berry. This is earthy and a touch green on the finish, with notes of fine herbs and oak.

title: Atalon 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A Bordeaux-style blend, predominantly Cabernet Sauvignon, from vineyards throughout the Napa Valley. ...
description: A Bordeaux-style blend, predominantly Cabernet Sauvignon, from vineyards throughout the Napa Valley. This red is made in a more robust style, the tannins still a tad dry, the fruit earthy in sage and cedar with black cherry and chocolaty spice at the fore.

title: Santa Carolina 2012 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Smoky, rubbery aromas run alongside berry and plum scents. This is full, ...
description: Smoky, rubbery aromas run alongside berry and plum scents. This is full, loamy and soft in feel. Flavors of berry and cassis are short yet ripe and earthy, while the finish is mellow and easygoing.

title: G7 2011 Gran Reserva Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (Loncomilla Valley)
excerpt: Jammy plum and raspberry aromas are a bit gritty and struggle to ...
description: Jammy plum and raspberry aromas are a bit gritty and struggle to stay in line. This feels wide, with soft tannins. Flavors of herbal berry fruits are spicy and minty, while the finish is oaky, herbal and dry.

title: Maryhill 2011 Alder Ridge Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: While the brooding notes of dark cherries, herbs and barrel spices bring ...
description: While the brooding notes of dark cherries, herbs and barrel spices bring some interest, the palate comes off as quite astringent and distracts.

title: Esser 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Monterey County)
excerpt: This affordable bottling from sustainably minded vineyards is a good everyday dinner ...
description: This affordable bottling from sustainably minded vineyards is a good everyday dinner wine. It offers violet and blackberry on the nose and a lush feel in the mouth, with black cherry and soft tannins.

title: Santa Alicia 2011 Gran Reserva de Los Andes Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: This is a highly herbal Cab with strong aromas of juniper and ...
description: This is a highly herbal Cab with strong aromas of juniper and pyrazines. The palate feels full but tannic, while leafy, dry, roasted berry flavors finish with baked notes and a lasting herbal flavor.

title: Calcu 2011 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Smoky, rubbery aromas of berry and cassis are lightly herbal. This has ...
description: Smoky, rubbery aromas of berry and cassis are lightly herbal. This has a firm mouhtfeel with piercing acidity. Salty, briny plum and berry flavors lead to a finish that holds onto the saline notes and feels crisp.

title: G7 2012 Reserva Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (Loncomilla Valley)
excerpt: Briary, spicy, mildly herbal berry aromas give way to a full, bold, ...
description: Briary, spicy, mildly herbal berry aromas give way to a full, bold, wiry feeling palate with pointed acidity. Herbal, lightly green flavors of tobacco and plum finish crisp.

title: Helix by Reininger 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This wine needs to be decanted. At first the scents and flavors ...
description: This wine needs to be decanted. At first the scents and flavors of green produce abound, and the fruit is masked. After some hours, it begins to show more fruit and less of the vegetal flavors, but remains a bit sharp and short.

title: Sagelands 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: A straightforward quaffer with off-dry notes of fresh herbs, whole bell pepper ...
description: A straightforward quaffer with off-dry notes of fresh herbs, whole bell pepper and black currant.

title: Trefethen 2011 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Oak Knoll District)
excerpt: This is a meaty, brawny Cab, unexpected for a cool vintage from ...
description: This is a meaty, brawny Cab, unexpected for a cool vintage from a cool pocket of the Napa Valley. In aromas and flavors, it is dominated by smoke and meaty bacon, with a side of coffee.

title: Santa Rita 2010 Reserva Organic Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
excerpt: This is highly herbaceous on the nose, with strong pyrazines and eucalyptus ...
description: This is highly herbaceous on the nose, with strong pyrazines and eucalyptus aromas. A narrow, acidic palate is home to green, bitter flavors, and the finish is hard.

title: World's End 2010 Good Times, Bad Times Beckstoffer To Kalon Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: Brambly and spicy red and black fruit mark this mighty Cabernet, sourced ...
description: Brambly and spicy red and black fruit mark this mighty Cabernet, sourced from the famed To Kalon Vineyard in the heart of Oakville. Despite its name it offers only Good Times, a well-composed, unabashedly hedonistic taste of juicy ripe Napa fruit and overtly lush tannins.

title: Sabina Vineyards 2010 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
excerpt: A heady 100% Cabernet Sauvignon aged for two years in oak, this ...
description: A heady 100% Cabernet Sauvignon aged for two years in oak, this cassis-kissed wine also offers black olive and spicy, peppery layers. Balanced and on the lighter side of the ripeness coin, it possesses plenty of grip on the finish, suggesting that cellaring could conjure more magic. Dry after 2018.

title: Peter Paul Wines 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
excerpt: This soft, juicy Cabernet is subdued and perfumed, a waft of calming ...
description: This soft, juicy Cabernet is subdued and perfumed, a waft of calming cedar and herb on the nose. On the palate it offers structured red fruit and anise amid mellowed tannins and a finish of chocolate, a fine expression of Mount Veeder Cab.

title: Riglos 2011 Las Divas Vineyard Gran Cabernet Sauvignon (Tupungato)
excerpt: Pure berry and cassis aromas gain complexity courtesy of balsam wood, spice ...
description: Pure berry and cassis aromas gain complexity courtesy of balsam wood, spice and light herbal accents. This is full, fresh and well balanced; flavors of berry, cassis, chocolate and herbs are complex and finish with earthy fig and licorice flavors. Drink through 2019.

title: Altvs 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Lush ripe plum, licorice and toasty oak form a triangle of flavor ...
description: Lush ripe plum, licorice and toasty oak form a triangle of flavor in this blend of 89% Cabernet Sauvignon, with 6% Merlot, 3% Cabernet Franc and 2% Petit Verdot. The tannins are undoubtedly present yet soft. Much of the fruit comes from cool Coombsville, with a slight floral characteristic popping up from the midpalate through to the finish.

title: En Garde 2008 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
excerpt: A mountain of a mountain-grown Cabernet, this is hearty and generous in ...
description: A mountain of a mountain-grown Cabernet, this is hearty and generous in cherry-vanilla-laden tannins and a leathery grip on the palate. Herbal notes intermix with anise and soy sauce, a taste of black tea and ripe black, brambly fruit upfront. Give the wine time and air to soften.

title: Finca El Origen 2011 Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Uco Valley)
excerpt: Cedar, vanilla, tobacco and earthy aromas blend with mellow berry scents to ...
description: Cedar, vanilla, tobacco and earthy aromas blend with mellow berry scents to form a welcoming nose. This feels wide and blocky but healthy and balanced. Flavors of berry, herbs and spice are prototypical Cabernet flavors, while a spicy, peppery, dry finish gives a classy ending. Drink through 2018.

title: C. Beck 2010 Barlow Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is an elegant, cinnamon-spicy Cabernet from Corey Beck, the head winemaker ...
description: This is an elegant, cinnamon-spicy Cabernet from Corey Beck, the head winemaker for Francis Ford Coppola. Balanced and soft, it has a texturally pleasing mouthfeel of velvety herb and cassis and a fully realized, lingering finish.

title: Terrazas de Los Andes 2010 Single Vineyard Los Aromos Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Aromas of black fruits, herbs and floral hints are a little unfocused. ...
description: Aromas of black fruits, herbs and floral hints are a little unfocused. This Cab is big in the mouth, with chewy tannins and ample richness but also strong acidity. Black-fruit flavors include brambly berry and cassis, with prominent chocolate and spice notes. It finishes tannic, spicy and with energy. Drink through 2022.

title: Durigutti 2011 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Dry, oaky aromas suggest sawdust, hickory smoke and spice along with raspberry ...
description: Dry, oaky aromas suggest sawdust, hickory smoke and spice along with raspberry and cassis. The palate is round but a bit hollow in the center. Flavors of jammy berry fruits, black cherry and cassis get buried in waves of hickory. It finishes creamy, dense and ripe. Drink through 2017.

title: V. Sattui 2010 Preston Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Intense, this Rutherford-based Cab is marked by dark roasted coffee accented in ...
description: Intense, this Rutherford-based Cab is marked by dark roasted coffee accented in coconut and baked plum, the tannins sturdy. On the toasty oak finish, expect piquant black pepper.

title: Tapiz 2012 Alta Collection Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Stout, smoky aromas revolve around thick berry scents and minerally notes. This ...
description: Stout, smoky aromas revolve around thick berry scents and minerally notes. This is rock solid in the mouth but not too heavy. Jammy blackberry, spice and herbal flavors are generous, while the finish is lightly oaked, with modest toast, vanilla and chocolate notes along with mint.

title: TwentyFour by Charles Woodson 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Calistoga)
excerpt: As intense and strapping as a Hall of Fame cornerback, this Cabernet ...
description: As intense and strapping as a Hall of Fame cornerback, this Cabernet is ripe in dark cherry, vanilla and milk chocolate, the tannins mouthfillingly sweet. Built to last, it should stand up to even the fiercest of meats, from rib eye to ribs.

title: Ruca Malen 2009 Kinien Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Initially this smells like bell pepper and green bean more than ripe ...
description: Initially this smells like bell pepper and green bean more than ripe berry fruits, but with time in the glass it rounds into spicy, herbal form. A tight, reedy palate is bolstered by tomatoey acidity, while flavors of herbal raspberry and red currant finish with ripped tannins and plenty of residual acidity. Drink through 2024.

title: Saint Helena Winery 2009 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
excerpt: Beguiling in cedar, black cherry and black tea, this inviting Cab is ...
description: Beguiling in cedar, black cherry and black tea, this inviting Cab is made by consulting winemaker Aaron Pott with 2% Petit Verdot blended in, noticeable in its dark, inky color. The tannins are well-managed, present but softened, a taste of dark chocolate and coffee subtly hinted at through the finish.

title: V. Sattui 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
excerpt: This 100% Cabernet Sauvignon is rich and generous in wood, the toasty ...
description: This 100% Cabernet Sauvignon is rich and generous in wood, the toasty oak aggressive toward the red currant and herbal undertones lurking beneath. Mountain-grown tannins show up, too, unencumbered. Give them time or air and they should settle down.

title: Lamadrid 2011 Single Vineyard Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Agrelo)
excerpt: Immediately this smells raisiny, but with time secondary scents of cinnamon and ...
description: Immediately this smells raisiny, but with time secondary scents of cinnamon and Middle Eastern spices come into play. The body is soft and extracted, with modest acidity. Flavors of baked black fruits, fig paste, chocolate and herbs follow the nose, as does a chocolaty, rich  finish. Drink through 2016.

title: Pull 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Blackberry liqueur, violet, cola and slight dustiness form the nose of this ...
description: Blackberry liqueur, violet, cola and slight dustiness form the nose of this well-priced wine. The flavors are a bit thinner than expected, most reminiscent of ripe pomegranate.

title: Pascual Toso 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Candied red-berry aromas are pasty at first, with a twinge of green. ...
description: Candied red-berry aromas are pasty at first, with a twinge of green. In the mouth, this is wiry and jammy feeling, with juicy acids. Herbal, slightly green flavors of olive, toast and berry fruits finish minty and a bit hot.

title: Still Waters 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Licorice and blackberry scents float off the surface of this estate wine. ...
description: Licorice and blackberry scents float off the surface of this estate wine. Once sipped, a thinner juiciness takes hold, with boysenberry and cracked pepper leading the way.

title: Spann Vineyards 2008 Mayacamas Range Seven Barrels Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
excerpt: This powerful wine opens with deep flavors and aromas of mint and ...
description: This powerful wine opens with deep flavors and aromas of mint and dark chocolate. Its pleasure diminishes somewhat with an evolving taste of smoke and oak mid-sip that lasts subtly through the finish.

title: Estate 1856 2011 Barrel Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
excerpt: There is juicy blackberry at the core of this Cab, 2% Petit ...
description: There is juicy blackberry at the core of this Cab, 2% Petit Verdot blended in for concentration and color. Dusty, the accompanying flavor players include clove and herb.

title: Finca La Luz 2012 Callejon del Crimen Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Uco Valley)
excerpt: Saucy, scratchy aromas suggest road tar and compost. This wine is wide ...
description: Saucy, scratchy aromas suggest road tar and compost. This wine is wide in feel, with peppery, spicy raspberry and plum flavors. A minty, herbal tasting finish is neither overbearing nor oaky.

title: Clos de Chacras 2010 Cavas de Crianza Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: This is a more rustic, woody Cabernet than many from Mendoza. The ...
description: This is a more rustic, woody Cabernet than many from Mendoza. The nose suggests asphalt, herbs and spice more than bright fruit. A tannic yet solid body and flavors of coffee, herbs lead to a finish that tastes dry and a bit hollow, with coffee and cocoa notes.

title: Domaine Jean Bousquet 2013 Reserve Made with Organic Grapes Cabernet Sauvignon (Tupungato)
excerpt: Plum and berry aromas are mildly jammy. This is fast moving on ...
description: Plum and berry aromas are mildly jammy. This is fast moving on the palate, with racy acidity pushing berry flavors that veer toward tartness but pull back in time. An aggressive finish is also almost sour but not, while oaky coffee and bitter chocolate flavors wrap it up.

title: Michel Torino 2012 Don David Finca La Urquiza #8 Cabernet Sauvignon (Cafayate)
excerpt: Crusty and showing hard spice notes, this opens with staunch aromas. A ...
description: Crusty and showing hard spice notes, this opens with staunch aromas. A narrow, pinching palate offers herbal, green-leaning flavors of currant and briary berry. Oak-based chocolate and herbal flavors finish long and strong.

title: Cramele Halewood 2012 La Umbra Cabernet Sauvignon (Dealurile Munteniei)
excerpt: Ruby garnet in color, this has aromas of red plums, purple flowers ...
description: Ruby garnet in color, this has aromas of red plums, purple flowers and black fruit conserves. There are nice bright fruit flavors on the palate, with touches of tobacco leaf and tart cherry on the finish.

title: Salentein 2013 Portillo Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (Uco Valley)
excerpt: Firm dark-berry aromas come with cola and leafy notes that feel tannic ...
description: Firm dark-berry aromas come with cola and leafy notes that feel tannic and gripping but alive. Big berry and black plum flavors are leafy and spicy in style. It finishes tight, but should open and relax with a bit of time in the glass, and would go well with pizza and burgers.

title: Broken Earth 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Aromas of dust and stewed plums give a pleasing entry, but once ...
description: Aromas of dust and stewed plums give a pleasing entry, but once sipped the wine tastes like it needs more time to mature. The flavors approach strawberry and other red fruits, but remain quite tart and tannic.

title: 6 North 2009 Flagstone Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This muted, tannic Cabernet spent 20 months in new French oak. The ...
description: This muted, tannic Cabernet spent 20 months in new French oak. The dark black cherry and berry fruit are overwhelmed somewhat by the toast and oak.

title: Santa Julia 2013 [+] Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Tight, snappy aromas of citric red fruit and lemon peel set up ...
description: Tight, snappy aromas of citric red fruit and lemon peel set up a driving, tight palate with brambly berry, spice and herbal flavors. This shows chocolaty oak on the finish and juicy acidity that ensures freshness and long-lasting flavor.

title: Alamos 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Herbal black-fruit aromas come with a lot of oak. This is full, ...
description: Herbal black-fruit aromas come with a lot of oak. This is full, chunky and meaty in feel, with green hints and blackberry flavors appearing before a blast of hickory smoke takes over. A high-toast, slightly bitter finish confirms the strong oaky character.

title: Domaine Jean Bousquet 2013 Finca Rosa Cabernet Sauvignon (Tupungato)
excerpt: Rubbery, drawn aromas include smoky black fruits and red licorice. A firm, ...
description: Rubbery, drawn aromas include smoky black fruits and red licorice. A firm, full mouthfeel rings in racy, tangy flavors of plum and berry that turn woody, spicy and dry on the finish.

title: Joullian 2011 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Carmel Valley)
excerpt: Dust, pipe ash and pencil shavings give an Old World vibe to ...
description: Dust, pipe ash and pencil shavings give an Old World vibe to the nose. The palate offers very austere blackberry and soil flavors. Serve with pot roast or cigars.

title: Canyon Wind 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Grand Valley)
excerpt: A scent of toasted oak fully wraps the nose, with touches of ...
description: A scent of toasted oak fully wraps the nose, with touches of mint, fruitcake and blackberry underneath. Fine-grained, astringent tannins coat the tongue, and tangy acids gain steam toward the finish.

title: Michel Torino 2013 Cuma Organic Cabernet Sauvignon (Cafayate)
excerpt: Earthy, spicy, concentrated red-berry aromas give way to a full palate with ...
description: Earthy, spicy, concentrated red-berry aromas give way to a full palate with spicy, oaky lead flavors and secondary red-fruit notes. Dry spice and a dusting of chocolate rise up on a simple finish.

title: Cramele Recas 2013 Dreamfish Cabernet Sauvignon (Viile Timisului)
excerpt: This young Cabernet has aromas of black plum, vanilla and a big ...
description: This young Cabernet has aromas of black plum, vanilla and a big bowl of freshly picked blackberries. There are flavors of black fruits and freshly ground black pepper in the midpalate, with good acidity on the finish.

title: Keating 2010 Montecillo Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: This is a soft, still grippy Cabernet with an earthy, tobacco-infused character ...
description: This is a soft, still grippy Cabernet with an earthy, tobacco-infused character that somewhat overwhelms the taste of blackberry and black currant.

title: Vini 2012 Veni Vidi Vici Cabernet Sauvignon (Thracian Valley)
excerpt: This Cabernet Sauvignon has aromas of black plum, violet and vanilla that ...
description: This Cabernet Sauvignon has aromas of black plum, violet and vanilla that pave the way for bright flavors of red plum and blackberry on the palate. The tannins are a bit chewy, but the long finish is rewarding.

title: Valentin Bianchi 2013 Elsa Bianchi Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Dusty plum, prune and leafy notes appear on a plump but somewhat ...
description: Dusty plum, prune and leafy notes appear on a plump but somewhat flat nose. This is jammy and chunky in feel, with flavors of stewed berry fruits and herbal hints. Syrupy notes and a fig character add weight to an oaky finish.

title: Domaine Jean Bousquet 2013 Made With Organically Grown Grapes Cabernet Sauvignon (Tupungato)
excerpt: Dry, leafy, spicy aromas have a perfumed accent. A pushy, forward-feeling palate ...
description: Dry, leafy, spicy aromas have a perfumed accent. A pushy, forward-feeling palate houses similar oaky flavors of cherry. On the finish, it turns woody, with resiny flavors and drawing tannins.

title: Santa Julia 2013 Made with Organic Grapes Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Berry aromas come in front of a sharp, plummy palate. This tastes ...
description: Berry aromas come in front of a sharp, plummy palate. This tastes herbal, spicy and woody, with dry berry flavors that turn tangy, edgy and oaky on the finish.

title: Enate 2013 Rosado Cabernet Sauvignon (Somontano)
excerpt: Compost aromas and a clunky feeling palate get this off on the ...
description: Compost aromas and a clunky feeling palate get this off on the wrong foot. Flavors of burnt berry fruit and sweetness fail to impress. This shows hardly any snap on a cloying finish.

title: Veramar 2012 Estate Club Free Run Cabernet Sauvignon (Virginia)
excerpt: Oregano, sun-dried grass and vanilla scents veneer seemingly volatile notes of plum ...
description: Oregano, sun-dried grass and vanilla scents veneer seemingly volatile notes of plum and blackberry. Although the wine comes with a supple attack, high-strung acidity marks the midpalate, which makes the wine feel stressed and uneasy.

title: World's End 2010 If Six Was Nine Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A brooding Cabernet full of green and black olive, velvety cassis and ...
description: A brooding Cabernet full of green and black olive, velvety cassis and cinnamon spice, this is ready to enjoy now. A juicy red, it has resolved tannins and a lingering taste of tobacco. Power and finesse are here, along with smoky minerality and savory fruit.

title: Rocca 2010 Grigsby Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Yountville)
excerpt: This cellar-worthy wine is enjoyable now, rich and powerful in bright red ...
description: This cellar-worthy wine is enjoyable now, rich and powerful in bright red and blackberry fruit, spice, toast and black licorice. Concentrated and layered, the tannins are thick and interwoven, and the juicy texture offers balanced acidity. Streaks of chocolate and earthy menthol on the nose and palate give distinctiveness. Enjoy now through 2024.

title: Paul Hobbs 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Paul Hobbs coaxes beautifully classic Cab aromas and textures from this wine, ...
description: Paul Hobbs coaxes beautifully classic Cab aromas and textures from this wine, which comes from the tricky 2011 vintage. Expect black currant, olive, cassis and peppercorn to intermingle on the palate amidst soft elegance, the perfect balance between fruity and herbal. On the finish a dusting of mocha turns up the dial on deliciousness.

title: L'Ecole No. 41 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: This wine is 100% varietal, sourced from both estate and neighboring (Summit ...
description: This wine is 100% varietal, sourced from both estate and neighboring (Summit View, Loess, Yellow Jacket) vineyards. It conveys subtle complexity, mixing berry, herb and stone elements gracefully on through a long, tightly wound finish. Aging in 40% new French oak adds sophisticated elegance.

title: Va Piano 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Sourced from a half dozen vineyards, it includes small amounts of Merlot ...
description: Sourced from a half dozen vineyards, it includes small amounts of Merlot and Cab Franc. Balanced and complete, it conveys blackberry, coffee and a smooth, vivid streak of caramel, with silky, delicious tannins.

title: Dumas Station 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: Sourced entirely from the Minnick Hills vineyard, it includes 5% Cabernet Franc ...
description: Sourced entirely from the Minnick Hills vineyard, it includes 5% Cabernet Franc and 4% Petit Verdot. Strawberry, cherry and plum fruit flavors spread out broadly across the palate, making the wine especially pretty and approachable at this age. The structure and length are impressive, and it could be laid down until 2020.

title: L'Ecole No. 41 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This 100% varietal is blended from a mix of excellent vineyards, principally ...
description: This 100% varietal is blended from a mix of excellent vineyards, principally Candy Mountain. It delivers stiff, tart, elegantly proportioned red fruits, set in a frame of citrus and steel. Barrel aging in one-third new oak adds scents of cedar and spice.

title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2011 Canoe Ridge Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: This pops aromatically, with notes of dark roasted coffee beans, char and ...
description: This pops aromatically, with notes of dark roasted coffee beans, char and black cherry. The palate is approachable and soft in style, with sweet, ripe cherry flavors and abundant coffee tones throughout.

title: Suvla 2011 Grand Reserve Single Vineyard Bozokbag Cabernet Sauvignon (Thrace)
excerpt: Dark red-violet to the eye, this opens with aromas of black raspberry ...
description: Dark red-violet to the eye, this opens with aromas of black raspberry and cherry cola. It is cool at first, with flavors of clove and menthol that are punctuated by a vein of cherry cola and candied orange rind. All these flavors come together on the palate, sheathed in a layer of velvety tannins. The soft finish is brightened by a vivid note of citrus.

title: Adams Bench 2010 the V Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Aged in 100% new French oak, this dark and muscular wine has ...
description: Aged in 100% new French oak, this dark and muscular wine has lush scents of cut tobacco and dense cassis fruit. Black olive highlights bring a nice herbal element to the mix. The tannins, though quite astringent, are ripe and balanced.

title: Christine Andrew 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sierra Foothills)
excerpt: An impressive young Cabernet from a region not well known for Cabs. ...
description: An impressive young Cabernet from a region not well known for Cabs. The first impression is a complex aroma of herb, dark cherry and dark chocolate that continues through to the palate. The texture is laced well with fine, firm tannins that will make it great with rich meat and cheese dishes. Overall it is concentrated and full-bodied, big but balanced.

title: Robert John 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Rich in cassis and black peppercorn, grapes for this wine came from ...
description: Rich in cassis and black peppercorn, grapes for this wine came from Stagecoach Vineyard as well as other Napa Valley superstar sources. It delivers layers of medium-weight blackberry and currant fruit, developed tannins and a signature taste of dusty minerals and rock. Small amounts of Merlot and Petit Verdot are blended in.

title: Goose Ridge 2011 g3 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Cabernet Sauvignon is 75% of the blend, with the other four Bordeaux ...
description: Cabernet Sauvignon is 75% of the blend, with the other four Bordeaux varieties making up the rest. Scents of Bourbon barrel greet you upon opening. Then black cherry and cassis fruit emerges, with a layer of dark chocolate ripping through the ripe tannins. This is a super effort at this price, from a fine vintage, with excellent concentration.

title: Star Lane Vineyard 2009 Astral Cabernet Sauvignon (Happy Canyon of Santa Barbara)
excerpt: Black as night in the glass, this heavy duty, Cabernet-led Bordeaux blend ...
description: Black as night in the glass, this heavy duty, Cabernet-led Bordeaux blend from one of the most visually stunning properties on the Central Coast is loaded with rich, luscious fruit and tannins that are built to last. There are stewed plums on the nose with warm slices of blueberry pie on the palate. Wait until at least 2019 for full enjoyment.

title: Suvla 2011 Reserve Single Vineyard Bozokbag Cabernet Sauvignon (Thrace)
excerpt: Aromas of cherry, raspberry and buttered toast set the scene for a ...
description: Aromas of cherry, raspberry and buttered toast set the scene for a wine whose flavors of Bing cherry, custard, clove and fennel are bright on entry before pleasantly washing across the side palate. Unified fruit and spice flavors endure on the taste buds into the smooth, drawn out finish.

title: Laird 2011 Flat Rock Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Layered in ripe red fruit like cassis and currant, it offers smoothness ...
description: Layered in ripe red fruit like cassis and currant, it offers smoothness amidst grippy tannins and savory suggestions of toasty oak, black tea and soy. All need air and time to develop more fully. Pair with a classic pepper steak and garlicky mashed potatoes.

title: Rooster Hill 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Whiffs of smoke, soil and dried herb lend a dark, savory tone ...
description: Whiffs of smoke, soil and dried herb lend a dark, savory tone to ripe cherry and cassis notes on this rustic Cabernet Sauvignon. The palate is juicy with fleshy red-fruit flavors but wrap up tightly in a softly tannic finish.

title: Ancient Peaks 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Smoke, plum jelly and a touch of violet form the aromas for ...
description: Smoke, plum jelly and a touch of violet form the aromas for this offering. The tannins are nicely thick, with prominent flavor profile of unsweetened blackberry jam. This meaty wine will improve with a bit more time in the bottle, so hold off until 2016.

title: Wind Rose 2012 Harvest Moon Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: This is a bit thin, and mixes in a strong herbal dimension ...
description: This is a bit thin, and mixes in a strong herbal dimension with the tart red fruit. The acids are proportionate, and the tannins carry some bitterness into the finish.

title: Fazeli Cellars 2009 Khayyam Cabernet Sauvignon (Temecula Valley)
excerpt: Complicated, at times confusingly dank aromas of mushrooms, hops, dill and other ...
description: Complicated, at times confusingly dank aromas of mushrooms, hops, dill and other wet herbs emerge from this bottling. Those atypical varietal characters find their way onto the palate as well, with olive and stewed mushrooms leading the way.

title: McGregor 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Scents of fresh red cherries and bramble wood entice on the nose ...
description: Scents of fresh red cherries and bramble wood entice on the nose of this aromatic, spice-toned Cabernet Sauvignon. The palate, while crisp with cranberry acidity, is a bit subdued with subtle red-fruit flavor and a finish that wraps up short and tight.

title: Twin Arches 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: An easy-drinking, weekday type of red wine that is smooth and light ...
description: An easy-drinking, weekday type of red wine that is smooth and light in texture and body, and modestly flavored with notes of plum and dried herbs.

title: Silver Spoon 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: A soft, simple style of Cabernet with mild cherry and strawberry flavors, ...
description: A soft, simple style of Cabernet with mild cherry and strawberry flavors, light tannins, smooth texture and light- to medium-body. The flavors fade quickly on the finish.

title: Spin the Bottle 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Good red wine in a light, herbaceous style. Tastes fresh and clean ...
description: Good red wine in a light, herbaceous style. Tastes fresh and clean as if it was made with good quality standards. Lacks much Cabernet character, however, but adds sufficient cherry and berry flavors to make it complete.

title: DFJ Vinhos 2011 Casa do Lago Grande Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Lisboa)
excerpt: This is a powerful, solid wine from selected fruit that brings out ...
description: This is a powerful, solid wine from selected fruit that brings out ripe black currant flavors and a dense structure. The ripe Cabernet Sauvignon has plenty of acidity to give a juicy edge to the dry tannins and rich texture. Spice comes from wood aging. It needs to age, so drink from 2016.

title: Occasio 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: Juicy with ripe tannins, it tastes lovingly hand-crafted, detailed and focused in ...
description: Juicy with ripe tannins, it tastes lovingly hand-crafted, detailed and focused in black currant, berry and leather. Though rich and luxurious it retains ample natural acidity to buoy its way through a meal or through several years of aging.

title: Lucas & Lewellen 2010 Valley View Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Barbara County)
excerpt: Santa Barbara County pioneer Louis Lucas pushes the possibilities of Cabernet in ...
description: Santa Barbara County pioneer Louis Lucas pushes the possibilities of Cabernet in the Santa Ynez Valley. Earthy aromas of wet rock commingle nicely with cinnamon spice and cherry fruit. Once sipped, strong tannins show upfront, with herbs and cherry throughout. This one will get better with time, so cellar until 2018.

title: Cameron Hughes 2012 Collection Cabernet Sauvignon (Lake County)
excerpt: One heck of a value, this elegant, spicy Cabernet comes alive with ...
description: One heck of a value, this elegant, spicy Cabernet comes alive with tobacco and blackberry flavors that broaden in scope and flavor as you sip. Ample tannins and acidity round out the smooth texture. The wine is deeply colored, aromatically inviting and completely satisfying on the finish.

title: Emiliana 2011 Novas Gran Reserva Made with Organically Grown Grapes Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Berry, cassis, wood shavings and loamy earth are the main aromas. Lightly ...
description: Berry, cassis, wood shavings and loamy earth are the main aromas. Lightly baked flavors of blackberry and plum come with olive and herbal accents. This is oaky, a touch minty and generally comfortable on the finish.

title: The Girls in the Vineyard 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Hills Lake County)
excerpt: This balanced Cab represents the region and the vintage well, offering velvety ...
description: This balanced Cab represents the region and the vintage well, offering velvety soft tannins and components of herb, cassis and raspberry in a long lingering package.

title: Leyendas de Familia 2012 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Maule Valley)
excerpt: Cassis and plum aromas come with a whiff of rubber. This is ...
description: Cassis and plum aromas come with a whiff of rubber. This is clean and ripe in feel, with good body and a bit of structure. Flavors of cassis and black cherry show a chocolaty edge in front of a juicy, pure, direct finish.

title: Wente 2011 The Nth Degree Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
excerpt: Tight in elegant raspberry and cassis fruit, this small-production Cabernet is on ...
description: Tight in elegant raspberry and cassis fruit, this small-production Cabernet is on the cool-climate side of the equation, reflective of the vintage. Tastes of black and bell peppers are interspersed with cedar, and the finish is purely oak.

title: Undurraga 2012 Sibaris Reserva Especial Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Peppery, herbal lead aromas settle on lactic, chocolaty oak and berry scents. ...
description: Peppery, herbal lead aromas settle on lactic, chocolaty oak and berry scents. This feels fresh, grabby and fairly well balanced. Flavors of blackberry, cassis and spice filter down to a solid feeling finish with flavors of cassis, herbs and spice.

title: Lange Twins 2010 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: Perfumed in leathery cinnamon-cola and cedar with gobs of tannin, it will ...
description: Perfumed in leathery cinnamon-cola and cedar with gobs of tannin, it will get you through a party or midweek meals.

title: Wente 2011 Southern Hills Cabernet Sauvignon (San Francisco Bay-Livermore Valley)
excerpt: Light in savory cranberry and a subdued hint of olive, this medium-bodied ...
description: Light in savory cranberry and a subdued hint of olive, this medium-bodied Cabernet is soft and ready to drink now. With moderate tannins and more red fruit than black, it will pair easily with meals.

title: Peirano 2012 The Heritage Collection Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: Bright in acidity and soft in texture, it offers cassis, pomegranate and ...
description: Bright in acidity and soft in texture, it offers cassis, pomegranate and tart cherry before finishing with a note of chocolate, more milk than dark.

title: Undurraga 2012 U Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Rapel Valley)
excerpt: Floral soap, plum and red-berry aromas bring a pinch of spice to ...
description: Floral soap, plum and red-berry aromas bring a pinch of spice to the nose. This is lively and a bit of a grinder on the palate, with zingy acidity and some grit. Plum, berry and ripe tomato flavors finish short and simple.

title: Miguel Torres 2012 Las Mulas Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
excerpt: Spicy, peppery cherry and plum aromas precede a medium-bodied palate with grip ...
description: Spicy, peppery cherry and plum aromas precede a medium-bodied palate with grip but not much depth. This tastes warm and spicy, with driving berry flavors. A fresh, lightly woody finish fits the wine.

title: Color Block 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
excerpt: Leather, spice, latex, plum and cherry aromas hold down the fort in ...
description: Leather, spice, latex, plum and cherry aromas hold down the fort in front of a fair and balanced palate. Flavors of plum and berry are slightly medicinal, while the finish offers a clean feel and easygoing red-fruit flavors.

title: Styring 2010 Shameless Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (OR))
excerpt: This high-toned bruiser pushes ultraripe scents of figs and raisins and prunes ...
description: This high-toned bruiser pushes ultraripe scents of figs and raisins and prunes to the front, yet shows a green streak in the tannins. The wine spent 34 months in barrel, which adds more heavy-duty accents but does not mask the underlying stemminess.

title: Xavier Flouret 2011 Oscar Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
excerpt: Olive and meaty black-fruit aromas control this wine that feels tangy and ...
description: Olive and meaty black-fruit aromas control this wine that feels tangy and a bit high in acidity. Berry, plum and herbal flavors finish moderately oaky, with notes of salty brine and peppery spice.

title: Peltier Station 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: Opening with aromas of barbecued meat, this soft Cab is all about ...
description: Opening with aromas of barbecued meat, this soft Cab is all about ripe, meaty tannins and smoky oak over any suggestion of fruit, which is hidden among its cedar and tobacco-lined walls.

title: Cable Car 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: A soft, basic Cabernet, it offers meaty cinnamon and berry-plum flavors.
description: A soft, basic Cabernet, it offers meaty cinnamon and berry-plum flavors.

title: Beach Kite 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
excerpt: Scratchy, dusty plum and berry aromas come with a topping of candied, ...
description: Scratchy, dusty plum and berry aromas come with a topping of candied, chocolaty oak. This feels creamy and candied on the palate, with vanilla and cocoa powder flavors on top of generic berry. A dusting of forced, sweet oak persists on the finish.

title: Apaltagua 2012 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Apalta)
excerpt: Roasted, leafy aromas are herbal and shy on fruit content. This feels ...
description: Roasted, leafy aromas are herbal and shy on fruit content. This feels raw and downright edgy. Flavors of herbal berry fruits are generic, while the finish is alert and active in feel due to lasting acidity.

title: James Mitchell 2011 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: Mostly Cabernet Sauvignon this wine also has small percentages of Malbec, Petite ...
description: Mostly Cabernet Sauvignon this wine also has small percentages of Malbec, Petite Sirah, Tannat and Petit Verdot thrown into the mix. The result is a smoky, barrel-influenced concoction emphasizing burly, tannic black- currant fruit.

title: Quintay 2012 Clava Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Crusty, crisp aromas are herbal, spicy and not all that fruity. This ...
description: Crusty, crisp aromas are herbal, spicy and not all that fruity. This is rubbery in feel, with plenty of oak, candied berry, herb and mild green flavors. It concludes with a resiny, oaky, herbal finish.

title: Peltier Station 2011 Hybrid Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: Generous in toasty oak aromas this Cab is otherwise rich in tar ...
description: Generous in toasty oak aromas this Cab is otherwise rich in tar and black jam, its flavors muted by the overwhelming taste of wood.

title: PKNT 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Rapel Valley)
excerpt: Oaky, chemical aromas top generic berry scents. The palate is creamy and ...
description: Oaky, chemical aromas top generic berry scents. The palate is creamy and grabby, while fake-tasting, candied oak is the dominant flavor. This feels cloying and tastes like vanilla and processed milk chocolate on the finish.

title: Cooper Station 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: Light and watery, this Cab is somewhat dull and lifeless, not showing ...
description: Light and watery, this Cab is somewhat dull and lifeless, not showing much in the way of fruit or structure.

title: Herman Walters 2009 Family Vine Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: A thin Cabernet distinguished mostly by its earthy, farm-like aromas and not ...
description: A thin Cabernet distinguished mostly by its earthy, farm-like aromas and not much else. A fairly generic red wine.

title: Gorman 2010 The Bully Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: As in 2009, the 2010 Bully includes 10% Petit Verdot, and was ...
description: As in 2009, the 2010 Bully includes 10% Petit Verdot, and was aged in 100% new French oak. Muscular tannins and hints of caraway speak to the substantial addition of PV, and the wine is at first chewy and closed. Give it aerating and it shows plenty of depth, with dense raspberry fruit, notes of white pepper and crushed rock, and a lively streak of lemony acid.

title: Treasure 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Rich, complex black currant, dark chocolate, mineral and oak flavors mark this ...
description: Rich, complex black currant, dark chocolate, mineral and oak flavors mark this bone dry, extremely tannic young Cabernet. It possesses a firm structure and mouthfeel, so give it until 2020 to begin to come around.

title: Abeja 2010 Heather Hill Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: This estate-grown, single-vineyard, 100% varietal bottling is smooth, rich and forward. Scents ...
description: This estate-grown, single-vineyard, 100% varietal bottling is smooth, rich and forward. Scents of baking spices, caramel and toast introduce a full and lengthy palate loaded with black cherry and cassis fruit. A steely firmness to the wine anticipates further development in the bottle.

title: Januik 2011 Ciel du Cheval Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: A tight, metallic streak runs vertically through this Cabernet. Deep cassis fruit, ...
description: A tight, metallic streak runs vertically through this Cabernet. Deep cassis fruit, juicy acids and the mineral/metal signature of the vineyard combine in a well-structured wine with an extended finish.

title: Barnard Griffin 2009 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Drinking quite nicely at the moment, this is a generous, dense wine ...
description: Drinking quite nicely at the moment, this is a generous, dense wine with a full complement of dark fruits, cacao, smoke and hints of black tea. From the opening aromatics on through a seamless weave of fruit and barrel flavors, this is irresistibly delicious.

title: Sur de los Andes 2010 Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Layered berry and cassis aromas are a bit scratchy and gritty. This ...
description: Layered berry and cassis aromas are a bit scratchy and gritty. This Cabernet feels saturated, pure and deep; flavors of blackberry, cassis, prune and chocolate are ripe and generous, while the finish is mildly herbal in flavor, with good length and build. Drink through 2018.

title: Valley of the Moon 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
excerpt: This is dry, smooth and creamy in the mouth, with rich flavors ...
description: This is dry, smooth and creamy in the mouth, with rich flavors of black currants, Kahlua liqueur and toasty oak, as well as a stony minerality. It will continue to drink well through 2018.

title: Or Haganuz 2010 Namura Single Vineyard Special Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Galilee)
excerpt: Inky violet-red in color, this wine has aromas of raspberry, black cherry, ...
description: Inky violet-red in color, this wine has aromas of raspberry, black cherry, vanilla and mixed baking spices. Flavors of black cherry, raspberry, coffee and toffee are equally bright on entry and at the finish, with a nice mellow period in the middle. The silky finish is marked by a vivid salted toffee splash.

title: Kanonkop 2009 Estate Wine Cabernet Sauvignon (Simonsberg-Stellenbosch)
excerpt: Hints of purple flower, cocoa powder and licorice add depth to the ...
description: Hints of purple flower, cocoa powder and licorice add depth to the black cherry and berry core. The medium-weight palate is lush and fruity, with fine yet structured tannins that provide a crushed-satin texture. The nuanced finish offers delicate suggestions of black tea and bittersweet chocolate.

title: Hubert Weber 2006 Vineyard Selection Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Earthy, gritty aromas of asphalt mix with fruitier notes of cherry and ...
description: Earthy, gritty aromas of asphalt mix with fruitier notes of cherry and plum to form an attractive, harmonious nose. This Cabernet is pure and light on its feet; flavors of coffee, cola and dried red fruits finish with elegance and femininity. Drink through 2016.

title: Jardin 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Stellenbosch)
excerpt: A textbook Cabernet Sauvignon, this offers upfront aromas and flavors of black ...
description: A textbook Cabernet Sauvignon, this offers upfront aromas and flavors of black plum and cherry that are complemented by spicy accents of black-currant leaf, tobacco and dark chocolate. Medium weight, it has a peppery, lightly toasted finish and structured tannins that soften in the glass.

title: Januik 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Principally Cabernet Sauvignon, this blends in small amounts of Merlot, Cabernet Franc ...
description: Principally Cabernet Sauvignon, this blends in small amounts of Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Malbec. Broad fruit flavors range from strawberry into red plum, with some stemmy earth leading into stiff tannins. The astringent, earthy character is well-managed and balanced against the pretty fruit.

title: Forgeron 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This remains quite tight, almost shuttered, with boysenberry fruit and sharp acidity. ...
description: This remains quite tight, almost shuttered, with boysenberry fruit and sharp acidity. Hints of composted earth and somewhat tarry tannins may be attributed to the addition of 8% Malbec in the blend.

title: Chakras 2009 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Aromas of brick dust, tobacco, red flowers and cassis come with a ...
description: Aromas of brick dust, tobacco, red flowers and cassis come with a touch of herbal green scents. This feels healthy and balanced, with flavors of herbal berry and currant. Things turn a bit saucy and more herbal on the finish.

title: Carmel 2010 Single Vineyard Sumaka Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Galilee)
excerpt: Opening with a nose of pure cherry with a trace of violet, ...
description: Opening with a nose of pure cherry with a trace of violet, this wine has flavors of cherry, cranberry, fennel bulb and aniseed. Tongue-coating tannins and smooth mouthfeel culminate in a zippy finish.

title: Tabor 2010 Limited Edition Cabernet Sauvignon (Galilee)
excerpt: Inky garnet in the glass, this wine offers aromas of cherry, pomegranate, ...
description: Inky garnet in the glass, this wine offers aromas of cherry, pomegranate, and juniper berry. Enjoyable flavors of strawberry, pomegranate, and smoked meat are joined by a healthy dose of menthol. Fortunately, silky tannins and a bright finish keep the taste profile from heading too far into the cool end of the spectrum.

title: Barnard Griffin 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Here is a supple, firm, well-balanced Cabernet, with both Merlot and Syrah ...
description: Here is a supple, firm, well-balanced Cabernet, with both Merlot and Syrah in supporting roles. Berry and plum flavors, crisp tannins, and a whiff of red pepper all come into play.

title: Familia Schroeder 2009 Saurus Select Cabernet Sauvignon (Patagonia)
excerpt: Dry and medium in body, this Cab from a warm vintage is ...
description: Dry and medium in body, this Cab from a warm vintage is simple but friendly, with nice cassis and raspberry aromas. Juicy and lively on the palate, it holds red-fruit flavors accented by spice and herbs, particularly mint. A mild finish makes it an easy drinker.

title: Montalvo Wilmot 2006 Cabernet de Familia Finca Los Cerrillos Cabernet Sauvignon (Vino de la Tierra de Castilla)
excerpt: Boysenberry and blueberry aromas are accented by violet notes and cedary oak. ...
description: Boysenberry and blueberry aromas are accented by violet notes and cedary oak. The wine is snappy and slightly reduced in feel, while flavors of rooty berry, herbs, spice and tree bark finish dry, with hints of tobacco and barbecue smoke. Drink now.

title: Sottano 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Spicy, dry aromas of earth, red currant and black olive offer some ...
description: Spicy, dry aromas of earth, red currant and black olive offer some complexity and style. This is full bodied, racy and loaded with black cherry, cassis and peppery spice flavors. A touch of heat and menthol adds jolt to the finish.

title: Bodega Toneles 2012 Tonel 22 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Ripe plum and berry aromas are supported by a full dose of ...
description: Ripe plum and berry aromas are supported by a full dose of smoky, savory oak. The palate is round yet jagged, while flavors of toasty, chocolaty berry fruits are also lightly herbal and heavily oaked.

title: Finca El Origen 2012 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Uco Valley)
excerpt: Floral aromas and berry power up front, then lead to a fresh, ...
description: Floral aromas and berry power up front, then lead to a fresh, bright, almost screechy feeling palate. Toasty berry fruit flavors are moderately spicy and the finish offers a reprise of toastiness and kick. This wine contains 15% Malbec and Bonarda, which makes it more fruity.

title: Silenus 2010 Danais Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: It shows ripe, jammy raspberry and cherry fruit and oak, but it ...
description: It shows ripe, jammy raspberry and cherry fruit and oak, but it lacks structure. The flamboyant fruit and Napa elegance lend some appeal.

title: Chateau Morrisette 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Virginia)
excerpt: Delectable notes of pastry spice, blackberry and vanilla unfurl onto the medium-bodied ...
description: Delectable notes of pastry spice, blackberry and vanilla unfurl onto the medium-bodied palate, which is bolstered by sinewy tannins and finessed acids.

title: Trapiche 2012 Oak Cask Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Mellow but friendly berry aromas feed into a firm palate with tight ...
description: Mellow but friendly berry aromas feed into a firm palate with tight red-fruit tannins and then ripe flavors of blackberry and chocolate cake. The finish is toasty, with a chocolate mint-chip note and acidic snap.

title: Vicente Gandia NV Whatever It Takes Artwork Donated by George Clooney Cabernet Sauvignon (Spain)
excerpt: Dry spice, saline and generic red-berry aromas make up the nose on ...
description: Dry spice, saline and generic red-berry aromas make up the nose on this balanced yet familiar tasting Cabernet. Flavors of candied black plum and berry finish oaky, with cassis notes poking through. Overall this is fruity and fresh in style.

title: Lachini 2011 La Bestia Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: In the blend are smaller percentages of Cab Franc, Merlot and Petit ...
description: In the blend are smaller percentages of Cab Franc, Merlot and Petit Verdot. The Red Mountain AVA is noted for thick, tannic wines, with superior aging potential. Here the earthy, peppery red fruits are buttressed with vivid acids and somewhat chewy tannins. The wine was aged two years in 40% new French oak.

title: Covington 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: Sourced from Les Collines and Pepper Bridge, this is very ripe, high ...
description: Sourced from Les Collines and Pepper Bridge, this is very ripe, high in alcohol, and quite tannic. Blocky black cherry fruit is covered with charred wood flavors, after spending 22 months in 70% new oak. Drink soon.

title: Frenchman's Gulch 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Washington)
excerpt: Shows a bit more age than its vintage might indicate with notes ...
description: Shows a bit more age than its vintage might indicate with notes of dried cranberries and cherries accented by cinnamon and vanilla. The light fruit flavors are a mixture of sweet and tart with dry, chalky tannins.

title: Wild Meadows 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: A straightforward wine with notes of plum, currant and herbs. The flavors ...
description: A straightforward wine with notes of plum, currant and herbs. The flavors are lighter in style supported by firm tannins.

title: Trivento 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Ripe, almost earthy aromas of plum, Graham cracker and pastry precede a ...
description: Ripe, almost earthy aromas of plum, Graham cracker and pastry precede a rubbery palate with squeaky tannins. The palate delivers a bolt of black currant and spicy plum flavors in front of a fiery finish that loses fruit quickly.

title: Messina Hof 2010 Private Reserve Double Barrel Cabernet Sauvignon (Texas)
excerpt: Core aromas of blackberry preserves and blueberry compote are accented with touches ...
description: Core aromas of blackberry preserves and blueberry compote are accented with touches of dough and spicy oak barrel. The palate is concentrated, grapy and herbal, and it bears astringent tannins that surface on the back end of the palate.

title: Turiya 2008 Camp 4 Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Ynez Valley)
excerpt: At nearly five years of age, this wine remains impossibly tannic. It ...
description: At nearly five years of age, this wine remains impossibly tannic. It tastes like the grapes simply picked in an unripe state. There are incipient blackberry flavors, but the wine will never age properly.

title: Original House Wine 2012 Steak House Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: It brings a Northwest Cabernet profile of black currant, plum, licorice and ...
description: It brings a Northwest Cabernet profile of black currant, plum, licorice and light herbs with medium-bodied feel. A touch of sweetness rounds out the finish.

title: Ackerman 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Coombsville)
excerpt: Despite the relatively low alcohol, this wine feels curiously hot, enough to ...
description: Despite the relatively low alcohol, this wine feels curiously hot, enough to lower the score. Chili pepper notes dominate the fruit.

title: Red Theory 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: An easy-drinking quaffer with notes of olive, green herbs, vanilla and cherry ...
description: An easy-drinking quaffer with notes of olive, green herbs, vanilla and cherry with light flavors and a compact ball of tannins at the center.

title: Jones of Washington 2011 Estate Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Wahluke Slope)
excerpt: Lighter in color, it has notes of cherry, plum and braised bell ...
description: Lighter in color, it has notes of cherry, plum and braised bell peppers. The fruit flavors are elegant in style with chunky tannins and citrusy acidity.

title: Radius 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Washington)
excerpt: An off-dry red with light flavors of plum, pencil lead and leafy ...
description: An off-dry red with light flavors of plum, pencil lead and leafy herbs offset by firm tannins.

title: Von Strasser 2011 Sori Bricco Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
excerpt: A tremendous wine, dry, rich and complex. Blended from Petit Verdot, Cabernet ...
description: A tremendous wine, dry, rich and complex. Blended from Petit Verdot, Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Malbec, it shows intricate notes of black currants, violets, dark chocolate, licorice and oak, wrapped into huge tannins. Drink 2019 and beyond.

title: Levendi 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Atlas Peak)
excerpt: This is intensely packed with heady blackberry and cassis liqueur. Beautiful notes ...
description: This is intensely packed with heady blackberry and cassis liqueur. Beautiful notes of oak come along with rich yet balanced tastes of toast and vanilla bean. The tannins are thick and hard, but sweetly ripe, suggesting that all they want is some time in the cellar to evolve. Give this until 2018 to begin to come around, but that may be too early; it will be rocking in 2024.

title: Jarvis 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Jarvis has held this 100% Cabernet Sauvignon for more than four years ...
description: Jarvis has held this 100% Cabernet Sauvignon for more than four years before releasing it. In that time, it has just started a long process of aging. The blackberry fruit is beginning to pick up a dried character, and notes of chocolate, black currants, violets and sweet oak engage the palate. The overall balance is elegant and smooth. This is wonderful to drink now, and it will hold and develop in the cellar up to 2034.

title: Louer 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
excerpt: Despite the challenging 2011 vintage, the wine has a solid core of ...
description: Despite the challenging 2011 vintage, the wine has a solid core of blackberry jam and cassis liqueur flavors, with a delicious coating of smoky oak. It will even age for a couple of years. What an attractive price for such a nice wine, but only 500 cases were produced.

title: Levendi 2009 Sweetwater Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: The tannins make this wine hard and dry right now, but tucked ...
description: The tannins make this wine hard and dry right now, but tucked deep down into that astringency is an intense cassis flavor. The grapes come from the Oak Knoll District, in the cool southern part of the valley, which accounts for the brilliant acidity. Wait until 2019.

title: Martin Ray 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Cruz Mountains)
excerpt: This delicious Cabernet is dry and rich in supple, refined tannins, with ...
description: This delicious Cabernet is dry and rich in supple, refined tannins, with oak-inspired blackberry, black currant and black licorice flavors that lead to a long and spicy finish. As good as it is now, the wine needs time. Start drinkingit in 2016.

title: Communication Block 2011 Lampyridae Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
excerpt: Made from 100% Cabernet, this wine shows the intensity of fruit that ...
description: Made from 100% Cabernet, this wine shows the intensity of fruit that Mount Veeder is capable of expressing. It also has excellent acidity. But the tannins are astringently strong, giving a numbing sting to the palate. This certainly needs time. Give it until 2022 and beyond.

title: Herzog 2011 Special Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is a bone-dry, tannic, acidic and tightly wound Cabernet, with a ...
description: This is a bone-dry, tannic, acidic and tightly wound Cabernet, with a solid core of blackberry aromas and flavors. Stylistically, it plants its flag squarely in favor of elegance, it just needs a little more time to fully integrate.

title: Fiuza 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Tejo)
excerpt: This is a tannic while richly fruity wine, showing ripe warm-climate Cabernet ...
description: This is a tannic while richly fruity wine, showing ripe warm-climate Cabernet Sauvignon flavors. Blackberries and dusty tannins are to the fore, giving a firm structure, fine juiciness and a dense texture. The wine could age, so drink from 2016.

title: Napa Valley Cattle Company 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Almost instantly identifiable as a Napa Valley Cabernet for its classic black ...
description: Almost instantly identifiable as a Napa Valley Cabernet for its classic black currant and cassis flavors, wrapped into sturdy tannins, and finished with acidity. The fruit is ripe and sweet, with an edge of green olives, yet the finish is thoroughly dry, with a complex spiciness. Drink now through 2020.

title: Saddleback 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: The tannins are strong and the blackberry, currant and oak flavors have ...
description: The tannins are strong and the blackberry, currant and oak flavors have an earthy, herbaceous tug. Instead of flamboyance, it shows precision and control, but those tannins make it too astringent to enjoy now. It will age easily until 2020; 2024 is not a stretch. Another ten years is, but you never know with a wine this dry and balanced.

title: Anakena 2011 Tama Vineyard Selection Cabernet Sauvignon (Cachapoal Valley)
excerpt: Oak spice, mint, cocoa powder and berry aromas set up a medium-bodied ...
description: Oak spice, mint, cocoa powder and berry aromas set up a medium-bodied palate with pinching tannins and depth. Spicy plum and berry flavors are toasty and finish with dark aftershocks of bitter coffee, black pepper and tobacco.

title: Donati 2011 Ezio Cabernet Sauvignon (Paicines)
excerpt: Hard tannins mark this dry, young Cabernet. They give the wine an ...
description: Hard tannins mark this dry, young Cabernet. They give the wine an astringent mouthfeel, although the powerful blackberry and dark chocolate fruits break right through. Hard to predict if it will age, but give it a good, long decanting and drink it with hearty stews and roasts.

title: Baron Herzog 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: With blackberry, blueberry, currant and tobacco flavors that finish dry and smoothly ...
description: With blackberry, blueberry, currant and tobacco flavors that finish dry and smoothly tannic, this is a sound Cabernet for drinking now. For the quality and price, this is an attractive selection for entertaining.

title: Aquinas 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: With ripe, jammy blackberry and plum flavors, gently touched with smoky oak, ...
description: With ripe, jammy blackberry and plum flavors, gently touched with smoky oak, this is a nice Cab for drinking now. Smooth and silky, the tannins will work well against grilled beef.

title: Santa Ema 2011 Select Terroir Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Scratchy, spicy aromas and a touch of juniper accent red-berry scents on ...
description: Scratchy, spicy aromas and a touch of juniper accent red-berry scents on this everyday Cabernet. The mouthfeel is dry, fresh and shows tangy acidity, while racy, edgy flavors of plum, spice and green herbs finish zesty.

title: Anakena 2011 Ona Special Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Cachapoal Valley)
excerpt: Sharp aromas of prickly red fruits and barrel scents are lively, while ...
description: Sharp aromas of prickly red fruits and barrel scents are lively, while a dry palate comes with a resiny coating of oak. Flavors of earthy berry, pepper and herbs finish minty in flavor, with unresolved tomato-like acidity.

title: Michael James Wines 2010 Beatty Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Howell Mountain)
excerpt: The grapes taste too ripe, showing shriveled fruit notes of raisins and ...
description: The grapes taste too ripe, showing shriveled fruit notes of raisins and prunes, with dry, bitter tannins that will never age away. A heavy dose of new French oak does nothing except to add oaky sweetness.

title: B Side 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is a good, sound Cabernet. The blackberry and cherry fruit is ...
description: This is a good, sound Cabernet. The blackberry and cherry fruit is candy-jammy, with an oaky overlay.

title: Sequum 2009 Kidd Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: The vintage was a good one for Sequum, which is assembling an ...
description: The vintage was a good one for Sequum, which is assembling an impressive track record. The wine is dry and tannic, yet wonderfully forward in blackberries and black currants, and the oak application is perfect. Give it until 2020 or so in the cellar.

title: Cameron Hughes 2011 Lot 451 Cabernet Sauvignon (Coombsville)
excerpt: Coombsville has emerged as the hottest appellation in Napa Valley, and Cameron ...
description: Coombsville has emerged as the hottest appellation in Napa Valley, and Cameron Hughes is right there, doing his negociant thing. The Cabernet was blended with Malbec and Merlot, and the wine is fantastically satisfying. Its rich, sturdy tannins frame elaborate blackberry, blueberry, red currant and smoky oak flavors that are wonderfully complex, with an elegant, balanced finish. This is an unbelievable price for a Cabernet of this high quality.

title: Keenan 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Spring Mountain)
excerpt: The tannins are mountain tough, the acidity is just fine, and the ...
description: The tannins are mountain tough, the acidity is just fine, and the flavors, well, how can you describe their power? Massive in blackberry essence and cassis liqueur, it has a tangy, minerally lick of granite that must come from the soil. Start enjoying it in 2018.

title: Pepper Bridge 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: All five Bordeaux grapes are blended in this aromatic wine sourced from ...
description: All five Bordeaux grapes are blended in this aromatic wine sourced from the Seven Hills and Pepper Bridge vineyards. In the mouth it is compact with a dense verticality, opening with raspberry and moving on into cassis fruit. Tight and young, compact and nicely structured, this should be cellared through 2022 to 2024.

title: Cameron Hughes 2011 Lot 450 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is a seriously good Cabernet, and the price makes it a ...
description: This is a seriously good Cabernet, and the price makes it a relative bargain. Dry and tannic, it has complex flavors of blackberries, black currants, blueberries and plenty of new smoky oak. A tangy minerality lifts it above the ordinary. It will hold in the bottle until at least 2020.

title: Barrister 2010 Bacchus Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: These Bacchus Cabernet vines were planted in 1972, and add old vine ...
description: These Bacchus Cabernet vines were planted in 1972, and add old vine elegance to what is a dark, roasty-toasty wine redolent with new barrel scents and accents. Espresso, smoke and charred wood come out first, but the blueberry, black cherry and deep cassis fruit carries the wine through a long, supple finish.

title: Market Vineyards 2010 Acquisition Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: Sourced from the Hightower vineyard on Red Mountain, this 100% Cabernet Sauvignon ...
description: Sourced from the Hightower vineyard on Red Mountain, this 100% Cabernet Sauvignon is firm, full, tannic and dense. It compares favorably with wines from the iconic Klipsun vineyard just down the road. A thick mix of smoke, coffee, cassis, herb and dark chocolate swirls up from the glass and on through the palate.

title: Terra Valentine 2011 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Spring Mountain)
excerpt: The wine is thoroughly dry, yet ripe and sweet in black currants ...
description: The wine is thoroughly dry, yet ripe and sweet in black currants and dark chocolate, and the tannins are strong, but ultra-refined. The addition of several other Bordeaux varieties brings complex layers that shift and change as the wine breathes. You can drink this Cab now, after a few hours in the decanter, or age it through 2022.

title: Mercer 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Here is a well-built, Bordeaux-style blend based largely upon Cabernet Sauvignon, with ...
description: Here is a well-built, Bordeaux-style blend based largely upon Cabernet Sauvignon, with 12% Malbec and 6% Petit Verdot filling it out. Firm, dark and muscular, this mixes tart black fruit flavors with streaks of licorice and peppery herbs.

title: Mascota 2011 La Mascota Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Aromas of graphite, lavender, licorice and cocoa accent core scents of blackberry ...
description: Aromas of graphite, lavender, licorice and cocoa accent core scents of blackberry on this nicely balanced value Cabernet. The palate is ripe, well oaked and deep, while flavors of toast, chocolate, baking spices and fruitcake finish with good feel and character.

title: Mercer 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Blackberry and black cherry fruit anchor this well-built Cabernet, accented with scents ...
description: Blackberry and black cherry fruit anchor this well-built Cabernet, accented with scents of sandalwood and smoke. The acidity keeps it vibrant and brings good definition throughout.

title: Burnt Bridge 2011 Les Collines Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: Deftly displaying the herbal highlights of this Walla Walla-grown Cabernet, this nicely ...
description: Deftly displaying the herbal highlights of this Walla Walla-grown Cabernet, this nicely structured wine mixes plum and cassis fruit with a lick of chocolate from 21 months in French and American oak. The finish is tart and sappy, with a hint of espresso.

title: DaMa 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The blend includes a bit of Merlot and Cabernet Franc (10% each). ...
description: The blend includes a bit of Merlot and Cabernet Franc (10% each). Weinbau and Sagemoor fruit make for a soft, instantly enjoyable red with smooth, supple flavors. Mixed red fruits, light spices and soft tannins lead through and into a gentle finish with a hint of dark chocolate.

title: Trapiche 2011 Broquel Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Narrow berry aromas are straightforward but not complex. This is a smooth ...
description: Narrow berry aromas are straightforward but not complex. This is a smooth operator with round tannins, plenty of body and a mix of black fruits, licorice, herbs and spices on the flavor profile. Flavors turn more herbal on the finish, where oregano and thyme accent tastes of cassis and berry.

title: Langtry 2010 Tephra Ridge Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Lake County)
excerpt: From a high-elevation vineyard on the eastern edge of Lake County, this ...
description: From a high-elevation vineyard on the eastern edge of Lake County, this Cabernet offers sensuously juicy, brambly fruit and a dusty backbone. Rich and chewy, it conveys intense cranberry, black cherry and woodsy cedar.

title: Lujon 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: Consistently a fine value, the 2010 Walla Walla Valley Cabernet comes from ...
description: Consistently a fine value, the 2010 Walla Walla Valley Cabernet comes from the excellent Spofford Station and Lefore vineyards. This new vintage shows plenty of vanilla and coffee liqueur flavors around a core of black cherry fruit. The acidity balances out the oak perfectly. Drink up.

title: Robert Karl 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: This 100% Cabernet Sauvignon was sourced from Gunselman Bench, McKinley Springs and ...
description: This 100% Cabernet Sauvignon was sourced from Gunselman Bench, McKinley Springs and Phinny Hill vineyards. It brings notes of vanilla, coconut and cherry. The fruit flavors are plush in feel backed by dry, grippy tannins.

title: Godspeed 2010 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
excerpt: Plenty of ripe black currant, licorice and cedar flavors in this dry, ...
description: Plenty of ripe black currant, licorice and cedar flavors in this dry, full-bodied young Cabernet. It feels luxurious in the mouth, with a depth and spicy finish that are notable. Drink by 2017.

title: Elsom Cellars 2009 Artz Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: On the plus side are complex aromas of mixed red fruits and ...
description: On the plus side are complex aromas of mixed red fruits and fresh herbs. In the mouth the wine feels just a little flat, with a chalky, tannic finish.

title: Challenger Ridge 2010 Moss Hill Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Oaky scents are followed by oaky flavors (from two years in new ...
description: Oaky scents are followed by oaky flavors (from two years in new French oak), along with notes of stem, earth, tobacco and flint. This is definitely a showcase for the earthy/herbal style of Cabernet, but the wine keeps it interesting with layered and nuanced flavors.

title: Prizm 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: A drier, lower alcohol and more streamlined Cab, it shows elegant control. ...
description: A drier, lower alcohol and more streamlined Cab, it shows elegant control. Yet the fruit is Paso ripe, with blackberries veering into red currants, dark chocolate and raisins. The acidity is pronounced and a little uncomfortable. Drink it now, after careful decanting.

title: Lava Cap 2010 Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (El Dorado)
excerpt: This Cab has a prominent streak of eucalyptus-like menthol on the nose ...
description: This Cab has a prominent streak of eucalyptus-like menthol on the nose as well as cranberry. This continues on the palate, which is fairly juicy and soft. With dry tannins the finish is on the dusty side, a pairing quandary solved most likely by juicy red meat.

title: Adelaida 2011 Viking Estate Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Although simple, this Cab carries plenty of deliciousness. The California sun has ...
description: Although simple, this Cab carries plenty of deliciousness. The California sun has ripened the fruit to perfection, with blackberries and black currants enriched with 100% new French oak. It will show its best through 2020.

title: Michael Pozzan 2011 Annabella Special Selection Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Good, rich black currant, licorice and oak flavors provide plenty of drinking ...
