description: Good, rich black currant, licorice and oak flavors provide plenty of drinking pleasure in this dry, full-bodied Cab. Fully approachable now, it wants pairing with sturdy roasted meats and stews. You might even decant it for an hour or two.

title: Dusty Cellars 2009 DCW Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The blend here is 90% Cabernet Sauvignon and 10% Syrah, all from ...
description: The blend here is 90% Cabernet Sauvignon and 10% Syrah, all from the Crawford vineyard. It carries some Port-like aromas of very ripe if not slightly over-ripe grapes, along with leafy components and accents of orange peel. A whiff of bourbon barrel sets up the sharp finish.

title: Mercer Canyons 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This serviceable red blend includes smaller amounts of Merlot and Syrah, with ...
description: This serviceable red blend includes smaller amounts of Merlot and Syrah, with tart red fruits and drying tannins. It dries out the mouth with a chalky sensation, suggesting it would be best enjoyed with red meat.

title: Patterson 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: A scent and flavor of vitamin pill pervades this attenuated wine. The ...
description: A scent and flavor of vitamin pill pervades this attenuated wine. The fruit hovers around flavors of rhubarb and pomegranate, and the overall impression is that the wine needs more time to pull itself together.

title: Summerwood 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: This Cab, ripe as it is in cherries, black currants and dark ...
description: This Cab, ripe as it is in cherries, black currants and dark chocolate, nonetheless is too soft in structure. It has a melted mouthfeel. The finish suggests caramelized wood. Drink up.

title: Cycles Gladiator 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: Straightforward in juicy red fruit and dry tannins, it has aromas reminiscent ...
description: Straightforward in juicy red fruit and dry tannins, it has aromas reminiscent of saddle leather. This wine would work well for parties and larger gatherings, satisfying a range of palates.

title: Twisted 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: The wine is simple but satisfying, with blackberry and oak flavors. It ...
description: The wine is simple but satisfying, with blackberry and oak flavors. It would be an easy-drinking wine at parties.

title: Canoe Ridge 2012 The Expedition Canoe Ridge Estate Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: Three-quarters Cabernet Sauvignon with the rest Syrah, Merlot and Malbec, it brings ...
description: Three-quarters Cabernet Sauvignon with the rest Syrah, Merlot and Malbec, it brings notes of bell pepper, herbs, plum and black currant. The flavors are sugar sweet and plump with distinct residual sugar remaining.

title: McNab Ridge 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendocino County)
excerpt: McNab sourced some fairly ripe grapes in a cool year to produce ...
description: McNab sourced some fairly ripe grapes in a cool year to produce this Cab which is more basic red wine than Cabernet in terms of aromas and flavors. The tiniest suggestions of vanilla and oaky tobacco struggle to get through.

title: Fog Head 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Drinkable with just about anything that calls for red wine, it has ...
description: Drinkable with just about anything that calls for red wine, it has currant, licorice and oak flavors.

title: Gauchezco 2011 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Aromas are raisiny and baked to the max. Likewise, the palate seems ...
description: Aromas are raisiny and baked to the max. Likewise, the palate seems chunky and heavy. Flavors of cooked berry fruits are loamy and flat, while the finish lacks pulse.

title: Wolfgang Puck 2011 Master Lot Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Dry and full-bodied, this Cabernet gets the basic idea across, with blackberry ...
description: Dry and full-bodied, this Cabernet gets the basic idea across, with blackberry and oak flavors that are a little vegetal.

title: Dreaming Tree 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (North Coast)
excerpt: This is a dry red wine exuding bell pepper and oak that ...
description: This is a dry red wine exuding bell pepper and oak that was made in large quantities in partnership with musician Dave Matthews.

title: Black Sheep 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Calaveras County)
excerpt: This wine is puckering in tannins with a chalky quality throughout.
description: This wine is puckering in tannins with a chalky quality throughout.

title: En Garde 2007 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
excerpt: At more than six years of age, this wine is as fresh ...
description: At more than six years of age, this wine is as fresh and fruity as if it were made yesterday, with blackberry, cherry and blueberry jam, currant and mocha flavors, enriched with toasty, caramelized oak. The tannins are strong, yet smooth and refined. The wine is so gorgeous right out of the bottle, you can drink it now, but try giving it six more years to really show its stuff.

title: Venge 2011 Bone Ash Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is made from 100% Cabernet grown in the St. Helena estate ...
description: This is made from 100% Cabernet grown in the St. Helena estate vineyard. The wine is exceptionally pure and delicious, rich in black currant, chocolate, black cherry and lots of toasty new French oak. The all-important tannins are exquisitely ripe and as fine as velvet. Nowhere near ready, this wine wants a good eight years in the cellar, and will gradually evolve through the mid-2020s, at the very least.

title: Wirra Wirra 2010 Dead Ringer Cabernet Sauvignon (McLaren Vale)
excerpt: Classic Cabernet, from its mint and cassis aromas to its ample weight ...
description: Classic Cabernet, from its mint and cassis aromas to its ample weight and long, plush finish. This is full and velvety, with hints of cedar and vanilla blending easily into the whole. Approachable now, it should age well through at least 2025.

title: Hess Collection 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
excerpt: The fruity concentration on this Cabernet is amazing. It just explodes in ...
description: The fruity concentration on this Cabernet is amazing. It just explodes in blackberries, blueberries and cassis liqueur. Meanwhile, 80% new French oak, in which the wine aged for nearly two years, brings strong notes of caramel and vanilla. The tannins are ripe and strong. All indications point to the cellar. Drink it starting in 2018.

title: Trapiche 2010 Gran Medalla Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Minerally, earthy aromas of plum and blackberry are oaky and attractive. This ...
description: Minerally, earthy aromas of plum and blackberry are oaky and attractive. This is round and well balanced, with cassis, blackberry, spice and herbal flavors settling on a spicy finish led by cardamom and clove notes as well as a smooth feel. Drink through 2017.

title: Ferrari-Carano 2010 Mountain Vineyards Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: An impressive Cabernet, but one in need of cellaring. The primary fruit ...
description: An impressive Cabernet, but one in need of cellaring. The primary fruit flavors of blackberries and blueberries are delicious, as is the fancy coating of smoky oak. And the tannins are rich and sweetly ripe. Give it until 2016 or 2017 to begin to integrate.

title: Kaiken 2010 Ultra Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: This is a rich, ripe style of Cabernet that shows slightly stewed, ...
description: This is a rich, ripe style of Cabernet that shows slightly stewed, malty, earthy aromas of savory berry and grilled meat. The palate is smooth and chunky, while flavors of roasted blackberry are earthy and dense. A finish of prune and stewed berry fruits says drink this Cab soon.

title: Recanati 2010 David Vineyard Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Galilee)
excerpt: Fragances of wild berries, bramble and honeysuckle pave the way for flavors ...
description: Fragances of wild berries, bramble and honeysuckle pave the way for flavors of cherry cola, toffee and tangerine zest. This is soft and round in the mouth, with tannins that are almost imperceptible at first yet last through the finish, hand-in-hand with remarkably bright acidity.

title: Golan Heights Winery 2010 Yarden Cabernet Sauvignon (Galilee)
excerpt: There is an interesting balance of fruit and cooling herbs here, with ...
description: There is an interesting balance of fruit and cooling herbs here, with cherry and raspberry mingling seamlessly with mint and eucalyptus. Smooth tannins continue uninterrupted through the lingering finish.

title: Trapiche 2010 Finca Las Palmas Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: This is a direct, almost raw type of Cabernet. The nose deals ...
description: This is a direct, almost raw type of Cabernet. The nose deals spice, herb and dry-fruit aromas. The palate feels lively and alert, with firm acidity driving flavors of berry fruits, oak, herbs and spice. The finish is long, committed and spicy in nature, with a fair amount of oak.

title: Golan Heights Winery 2009 Gilgal Cabernet Sauvignon (Galilee)
excerpt: A nose of cooked cherry, vanilla and orange zest are a nice ...
description: A nose of cooked cherry, vanilla and orange zest are a nice introduction to flavors of cherry, allspice, violet and citrus peel. A pleasant interplay of brightness and soft tannins make for an enjoyable, easy-drinking wine.

title: Chateau Burgozone 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Danube River Plains)
excerpt: Deep garnet-purple in the glass, this opens with aromas of dried cherry, ...
description: Deep garnet-purple in the glass, this opens with aromas of dried cherry, saddle leather and forest floor. It has flavors of pomegranate, tart cherry and Portobello mushroom, and a pleasant splash of brightness in the finish.

title: Domaine Jean Bousquet 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Tupungato)
excerpt: Firm and focused berry aromas set up a full, weighty palate with ...
description: Firm and focused berry aromas set up a full, weighty palate with dry tannins. Flavors of lightly herbal plum and berry are more generic and clean than special, while on the finish this feels smooth and tastes dark and fruity.

title: Finca Lalande 2012 Made with organically grown grapes Cabernet Sauvignon (Tupungato)
excerpt: Berry, plum and cassis aromas, what many would call the usuals for ...
description: Berry, plum and cassis aromas, what many would call the usuals for CS, are present and accounted for. This offers good weight and nice tannins; flavors of red fruits are fairly oaked, while wood spice, plum and apple-skin flavors finish things off.

title: Alamos 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Berry and plum aromas are ripe and woody, with a note of ...
description: Berry and plum aromas are ripe and woody, with a note of sawdust appearing on the nose. This has zest and zing on the palate, along with creamy weight, while flavors of toast, wood resin and baked blackberries finish smoky and plump.

title: Recanati 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Galilee)
excerpt: An interplay of cherry, rose petal and eucalyptus dominates both the aroma ...
description: An interplay of cherry, rose petal and eucalyptus dominates both the aroma and flavor profile of this wine. Fruit flavors and floral aromatics vie for your attention throughout, creating a pleasing bit of tension that keeps your interest piqued.

title: Stewart 2011 Slingshot Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A solid Cabernet, it shows varietal fruit flavors of black currants and ...
description: A solid Cabernet, it shows varietal fruit flavors of black currants and red cherries, with a touch of smoky oak leading to a long, spicy finish. Drink it over the next year.

title: Brutocao 2009 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendocino)
excerpt: A taste of spearmint, black olive and leather interplay on this wine, ...
description: A taste of spearmint, black olive and leather interplay on this wine, with black licorice also prominently in the mix. Juicy with tannic grip, this reserve finishes rich in blackberry and dust.

title: Sobon Estate 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Amador County)
excerpt: Juicy and varietal, this inexpensive Sierra Foothills Cab has rich texture and ...
description: Juicy and varietal, this inexpensive Sierra Foothills Cab has rich texture and layers of dried cherry and currant. Round and well-composed, the finish veers toward flavors of vanilla and cedar.

title: McManis 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Rich on the nose, this juicy, ripe Cabernet unfurls with layers of ...
description: Rich on the nose, this juicy, ripe Cabernet unfurls with layers of black currant, blackberry and vanilla that are soft and structured. The finish offers tar and leather amid more vanilla, ending in balance and finesse. Stock up for dinner parties.

title: Icaria 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: With soft tannins framing herb-infused black cherry, cassis, green tea and oak ...
description: With soft tannins framing herb-infused black cherry, cassis, green tea and oak flavors, this is a nice Cabernet to drink now. Give it an hour or so in a decanter to let it breathe.

title: Tin Barn 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: New oak brings vanilla bean and buttered toast flavors to the raspberries, ...
description: New oak brings vanilla bean and buttered toast flavors to the raspberries, cherries and blackberries. The acidity is soft and so are the tannins, resulting in an easy Cab for drinking now.

title: Sunset Hills 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Virginia)
excerpt: Scents of spice, pastis, blackberry preserves and tobacco comprise the nose of ...
description: Scents of spice, pastis, blackberry preserves and tobacco comprise the nose of this Cabernet Sauvignon. The medium- to full-bodied palate packs tangy acids and firm, burly tannins, and the medium to long finish closes with notes of black tea and dried fruit.

title: Bodega Familia Barberis 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Malty, earthy aromas of cassis and prune are the opening. The mouthfeel ...
description: Malty, earthy aromas of cassis and prune are the opening. The mouthfeel is creamy at the edges, with vitality in the middle. Flavors of pastry, chocolate-covered malted-milk balls and raisin finish with a low pulse. Drink now.

title: Tower 15 2011 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: You can taste the warm Paso Robles sunshine in every sip of ...
description: You can taste the warm Paso Robles sunshine in every sip of this exuberant Cabernet. It brims with jammy blackberries, black cherries and chocolate, yet the finish is dry. Be aware of quite high alcohol, though, that gives it prickly heat.

title: Sutcliffe 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Colorado)
excerpt: A scent of pastry dough encases the broad notes of spiced dark ...
description: A scent of pastry dough encases the broad notes of spiced dark fruit and flower on this Cabernet Sauvignon. This is a medium- to full-bodied wine, and it bears firm tannins and bright acids that carry onto the medium to long finish.

title: Trione 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Tastes like the grapes got a little too ripe in the heat, ...
description: Tastes like the grapes got a little too ripe in the heat, resulting in a distinct raisiny taste that would be more appropriate to Port than a Cabernet Sauvignon. The alcohol is nearly 15% by volume. Hard to see this Cab aging well.

title: Fabre Montmayou 2012 Phebus Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Sweet yet simple aromas of milk chocolate, candied cherry and vanilla set ...
description: Sweet yet simple aromas of milk chocolate, candied cherry and vanilla set up a fair and balanced palate with oak, medicinal and raw red-fruit flavors. A slightly hot, semisweet finish is just good enough.

title: Hooker 2011 Old Boys Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Blackberry and cherry jam and caramelized oak flavors characterize this simple Cabernet. ...
description: Blackberry and cherry jam and caramelized oak flavors characterize this simple Cabernet. The tannins add good, dry structure, but the wine still feels simple and candied.

title: Cooper Vineyards 2010 Carter Mountain Cabernet Sauvignon (Virginia)
excerpt: A brooding note of espresso jumps from the glass and conceals any ...
description: A brooding note of espresso jumps from the glass and conceals any fruit that sits below. Formidable tannins would serve as a great complement to grilled game. Flavors of espresso, chocolate and licorice dominate the palate.

title: Lagarde 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Crisp, dry, leafy aromas come with notes of green herbs, mint in ...
description: Crisp, dry, leafy aromas come with notes of green herbs, mint in particular. Texturally, this feels good, with drying tannins supporting modest berry, chocolate and wood-spice flavors. A tight, toasty tasting finish is minty, drying and a bit high in acid.

title: Miracle Valley 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Virginia)
excerpt: Baked strawberry and raspberry aromas carry onto the medium-bodied palate. Fine chalky ...
description: Baked strawberry and raspberry aromas carry onto the medium-bodied palate. Fine chalky tannins and bright acids lend the toasted herb flavor structural support.

title: Truett Hurst 2012 California Square Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: This fruity, one-dimensional wine has flavors of blackberries, brown sugar and caramelized ...
description: This fruity, one-dimensional wine has flavors of blackberries, brown sugar and caramelized oak. The tannins are nice and thick, suggesting grilled meats for pairings.

title: Terrenal 2012 Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (Yecla)
excerpt: Gritty cherry and cranberry aromas and a bright red color announce a ...
description: Gritty cherry and cranberry aromas and a bright red color announce a spunky, simple wine with little Cabernet character. Juicy and light-bodied, it conveys basic plum and cherry flavors.

title: Canyon Wind 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Grand Valley)
excerpt: This wine shows its oak influence with a bold note of roasted ...
description: This wine shows its oak influence with a bold note of roasted wood. A flavor of wood smoke infiltrates the tannic palate, hiding any fruit tones that may linger below.

title: un4seen 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: Oaky and smoky, this Cab is perfumed and intensely tannic with a ...
description: Oaky and smoky, this Cab is perfumed and intensely tannic with a bitter coffee-like finish.

title: Espuela del Gaucho 2012 Gaucho Spur Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Aromas of geraniums, celery and grassy fruits lead the nose, while flavors ...
description: Aromas of geraniums, celery and grassy fruits lead the nose, while flavors of green, soupy red berries finish stemmy.

title: Gramercy Cellars 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This thrilling wine, sourced from the Phinny Hill vineyard in the Horse ...
description: This thrilling wine, sourced from the Phinny Hill vineyard in the Horse Heaven Hills, displays all the tense power of great Washington Cabernet Sauvignon. Deep flavors of berry, plum and cassis are threaded with gravelly streaks of tar, coffee and anise. Aged in 40% new French oak, it strikes a perfect balance through a long finish.

title: Southard 2010 Whipping Boy Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Alcohol that reaches these levels is often a complexity killer, but not ...
description: Alcohol that reaches these levels is often a complexity killer, but not here. This is a stunningly delicious wine, with ripe, powerful and concentrated black fruits. Baking spices, tar, pencil lead, even a whiff of compost all add to the complexity and the depth of flavor is magnificent. This can age at least a decade but is delicious already!

title: Hunnicutt 2010 9-3-5 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A worthy followup to the splendid 2008 and 2009 vintages, this 100% ...
description: A worthy followup to the splendid 2008 and 2009 vintages, this 100% Cabernet is a blend of grapes from St. Helena, Rutherford and Oakville. It defines Napa Cabernet with lush, intricate and complex favors of blackberry jam, cassis liqueur, milk chocolate and caramelized oak that finish dry and long. The tannins are refined, but thick. This is a wine for the cellar. Start enjoying it after 2017.

title: Ochagavia 2011 Raices Nobles Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Crisp, spicy aromas of red fruits matched against oregano, basil and olive ...
description: Crisp, spicy aromas of red fruits matched against oregano, basil and olive notes give this Cabernet a lot of character and points of interest. The palate is tight and well structured, while dark berry, spice, herb and chocolate flavors flow onto a toasty, minty, warm and tannic finish. This is a bit aggressive now; give it two years and drink through 2019.

title: Ferrari-Carano 2008 PreVail Back Forty Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Sourced from a vineyard high up in the Mayacamas, on the Sonoma ...
description: Sourced from a vineyard high up in the Mayacamas, on the Sonoma County side, this wine is intense with mountain grown fruit. The palate is full of ripe black currants, mocha and plenty of toasty oak. The tannins, while soft and pliant, are penetrating. All indications are of a wine that wants time in the cellar. Drink from 2016 till well beyond.

title: Woodward Canyon 2010 Artist Series #19 Cabernet Sauvignon (Washington)
excerpt: Liquorous and tight, this opens into a rich and full mid-palate loaded ...
description: Liquorous and tight, this opens into a rich and full mid-palate loaded with smoky cassis and tar, accented with aromas of cedar and tobacco. The taste and track record suggest at least a decade of further aging is necessary.

title: Gordon Estate 2010 Six Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This pure Cabernet Sauvignon from the estate vineyard shows focused blueberry, black ...
description: This pure Cabernet Sauvignon from the estate vineyard shows focused blueberry, black cherry and cassis fruit at its core, with underlying minerality. Dusty tannins and firm acids support a chewy, cherry-infused finish.

title: Columbia Crest 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The reserve is still tightly wound, but expressive, with firm, focused flavors ...
description: The reserve is still tightly wound, but expressive, with firm, focused flavors of cassis fruit, backed with a refreshing minerality. Chewy and stylish, its briary fruits carry through a long, sculpted finish with light accents of herb.

title: Obelisco Estate 2011 Electrum Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: A Cabernet-dominated, Bordeaux-style blend, the Electrum is tannic, dark and earthy. Its ...
description: A Cabernet-dominated, Bordeaux-style blend, the Electrum is tannic, dark and earthy. Its cassis fruit is cloaked in rich, dense layers of graphite, espresso and dark chocolate. The density is impressive and suggests that a decade or more in the cellar may prove rewarding.

title: Santa Carolina 2011 Reserva de Familia Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: This Cabernet delivers a complete package at an incredibly attractive price. Aromas ...
description: This Cabernet delivers a complete package at an incredibly attractive price. Aromas of mocha, graphite and vanilla play nicely with core berry scents. Baked berry, vanilla and pastry flavors settle softly, with mellow tannins. Drink through 2018.

title: Les Belles Collines 2010 Les Sommets Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Enormously ripe blackberry, cherry jam, cassis liqueur and oak flavors mark this ...
description: Enormously ripe blackberry, cherry jam, cassis liqueur and oak flavors mark this Cabernet. The tannins are thick, but complex, giving the impression of a young wine that still needs time in the cellar. Give it until 2017 at the earliest.

title: Le Chanceux 2007 Belle Filles Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Give this 100% Cabernet just a little more time in the cellar. ...
description: Give this 100% Cabernet just a little more time in the cellar. Even at six-plus years of age, its tannins are hard, although the primary blackberry fruit flavors are beginning to dry out and become earthy. It should approach its peak around 2015.

title: Wellington 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Wellington held back this Cab for all these years, with good results. ...
description: Wellington held back this Cab for all these years, with good results. The cherry and blackberry flavors are just beginning to develop secondary complexities. The mouthfeel is softly tannic and light. It would be a fine wine for drinking with elegant beef dishes.

title: Daviana 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This 100% Cabernet is so approachable now. The palate offers waves of ...
description: This 100% Cabernet is so approachable now. The palate offers waves of ripe blackberries, cherries, cassis and mocha, touched with oak and wrapped in firm tannins. The grapes were grown in the new Coombsville appellation of the valley.

title: Damiani 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: This is a remarkably well-composed wine full of ripe blackberry and cassis ...
description: This is a remarkably well-composed wine full of ripe blackberry and cassis flavor accented by tart cranberry acidity and a rustic, brambly note. Complex, concentrated and elegant, it finishes with layers of granite and wet-stone minerality.

title: Artesa 2010 Estate Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This Cab is about fruit and oak, sculpted together with precision and ...
description: This Cab is about fruit and oak, sculpted together with precision and lusciousness. Flavors of blackberries, cherries, licorice, toast and exotic spice flood the mouth, leading to a long finish. Drink now.

title: San Pedro 2011 1865 Single Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Gritty aromas of asphalt and black olive complement saucy berry notes. This ...
description: Gritty aromas of asphalt and black olive complement saucy berry notes. This feels full, rubbery and tannic, while the flavors are soupy and baked, with herbal elements folded in. On a long finish, herbal flavors of fennel and licorice are front and center.

title: Riebeek Cellars 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Swartland)
excerpt: Vibrant and expressive, this offers initial aromas of blackberry, cassis and boysenberry ...
description: Vibrant and expressive, this offers initial aromas of blackberry, cassis and boysenberry that are matched with spicy hints of licorice root, black pepepr and cigar-box spice. The palate is round and slightly creamy, but framed by medium tannins and a long, toasty finish.

title: Bergevin Lane 2010 Moonspell Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Though 82% Cabernet Sauvignon, this Bordeaux-style blend includes 6% each of Merlot, ...
description: Though 82% Cabernet Sauvignon, this Bordeaux-style blend includes 6% each of Merlot, Malbec and Petit Verdot. Plum and cassis fruits anchor the dark flavors, enhanced with streaks of licorice, espresso, smoke and tar. At the moment the tannins remain quite astringent and the overall wine a bit tight, but a little more time in bottle may smooth that out.

title: Excelsior 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Robertson)
excerpt: A fragrance of crushed violet adds interest to the jammy blackberry, plum ...
description: A fragrance of crushed violet adds interest to the jammy blackberry, plum and cherry fruit core of this wine. Hints of licorice root, bramble and peppery spice unfold on the creamy palate, with ripe yet gripping tannins that remain on the finish.

title: Damiani 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Finger Lakes)
excerpt: Crisp, tart blackberry and cassis notes have a green, herbaceous flair throughout ...
description: Crisp, tart blackberry and cassis notes have a green, herbaceous flair throughout this vibrant, impeccably balanced Cabernet. Lushly textured with velvety tannins and a weighty, full-bodied palate, it finishes long with delicate spice accents.

title: Waterstone 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Made in an approachable, drink-me-now style, this Cab flatters with its wealth ...
description: Made in an approachable, drink-me-now style, this Cab flatters with its wealth of blackberries, cherries, currants, licorice and oak. It has rich, luxurious tannins and is full-bodied and dry.

title: Columbia Crest 2011 Grand Estates Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The Grand Estates Cabernet is solid and consistent from vintage to vintage. ...
description: The Grand Estates Cabernet is solid and consistent from vintage to vintage. It often retails for less than the listed price, making it a particularly fine value. Here, again, the fruit shines with well-focused flavors of pomegranate and berry. The mouthfeel is fresh and flavors vividly etched with excellent length.

title: Rutherford Ranch 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is a nice buy for the price. It contains a few ...
description: This is a nice buy for the price. It contains a few drops of Merlot, and even a percentage of Zinfandel, making it dry in style and smooth on the palate with delicate tannins. The blackberry and black currant flavors are delicious, accented with a savory note of black pepper.

title: Boomtown 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Washington)
excerpt: A nice companion to the Boomtown Merlot, this shows similar balance and ...
description: A nice companion to the Boomtown Merlot, this shows similar balance and depth, albeit with an accent on tart berry fruit flavors dusted with dried herbs. There are citrusy acids and a hint of moist earth.

title: Robertson Winery 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Robertson)
excerpt: Powerful notes of tobacco leaf and curing spice lead the bouquet of ...
description: Powerful notes of tobacco leaf and curing spice lead the bouquet of this value wine, with a backbone of cassis, black cherry and plum. Medium tannins offer grip and texture to the palate, while coffee and toasted oak flavors flood the finish.

title: 14 Hands 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The 14 Hands Cabernet has more grip and authority than the Hot ...
description: The 14 Hands Cabernet has more grip and authority than the Hot To Trot Red, but perhaps less immediate appeal. Black cherry and fig fruit are swathed in chocolate malt flavors, with a wash of mocha setting up the finish. Take your pick; either of these reds is sure to please.

title: Vinum Cellars 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: One of the riper Cabs out there, this 100% varietal has flavors ...
description: One of the riper Cabs out there, this 100% varietal has flavors of crushed black pepper, milk chocolate, cassis, blueberries and oak. The heavy extract is suggested by its inky dark color. With soft tannins and acidity, it will drink well over the next four years.

title: Faust 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Lots of ripe blackberry, currant, toasty oak and spice flavors shine in ...
description: Lots of ripe blackberry, currant, toasty oak and spice flavors shine in this dry, tannic young Cabernet. Small proportions of Merlot, Petit Verdot, Malbec and Cabernet Franc add complexity to the blend. Drink it over the next few years.

title: Mannina Cellars 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: This new Cabernet Sauvignon has the raisined fruit flavors of an older, ...
description: This new Cabernet Sauvignon has the raisined fruit flavors of an older, or quickly aging wine. Barrel aging contributes additional elements of soy and maple syrup, eventually thinning out through the finish. Drink soon.

title: Two Mountain 2010 Copeland Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: This pure Cabernet spent 22 months in a mix of French and ...
description: This pure Cabernet spent 22 months in a mix of French and American oak, though what percentage was new is not stated. It enters the palate with a pleasing mix of cassis, tar and a hint of mint, then seems to hit a wall and fade.

title: African Passion 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Western Cape)
excerpt: Aromas of blackcurrant leaf, plum and pepper are apparent on the nose ...
description: Aromas of blackcurrant leaf, plum and pepper are apparent on the nose of this value-priced wine. The palate is light but firm, with flavors of red plum and cherry wrapped in astringent tannins. The finish is short, but clean.

title: Vin du Lac 2009 Barrel Select Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The fruit seems to be a bit over-ripe, already showing some signs ...
description: The fruit seems to be a bit over-ripe, already showing some signs of decay, perhaps accented further by the stemmy flavors in the tannins and the chalky mouthfeel. Drink now.

title: Soleca 2012 3 Generaciones Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
excerpt: Crisp red-fruit aromas are simple, direct and clean. This bounces along on ...
description: Crisp red-fruit aromas are simple, direct and clean. This bounces along on rubbery tannins and tastes like blackberry and toast. Mild bitterness and grabbiness get going on the finish.

title: Tapiz 2011 Alta Collection Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: This is a dark, rich, modern Cabernet. The nose oozes sweet aromas ...
description: This is a dark, rich, modern Cabernet. The nose oozes sweet aromas of coconut and vanilla along with creamy oak and blackberry. The palate is full and chunky in feel, with dark-fruit flavors accented by molasses and pepper. A chewy finish shows grip and lasting acidity.

title: Truchard 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Carneros)
excerpt: Far from a fruit bomb, this is an elegant Cabernet with modest ...
description: Far from a fruit bomb, this is an elegant Cabernet with modest but complex currant, black cherry, cola and herb flavors. The tannins are considerable, and so is the acidity. Drink now after decanting for several hours, or allow it to develop over the next eight years.

title: Valentin Bianchi 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: This is a superb value Cabernet. Black-fruit aromas come with touches of ...
description: This is a superb value Cabernet. Black-fruit aromas come with touches of licorice, herbs and marzipan. The palate has an elegance to it, while flavors of berry fruits, cassis, chocolate and fig finish smooth and long. Bianchi has always made good Cabernet, but this one is better than usual.

title: Conn Creek 2009 Saffron Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
excerpt: This 100% Cabernet is firm in tannins and concentrated with fruit. Flavors ...
description: This 100% Cabernet is firm in tannins and concentrated with fruit. Flavors of blackberries and black currants have a mineral edge, while new French oak brings sweet, toasty caramel notes. As luscious as it is now, you might want to give it six years of additional age.

title: District 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Atlas Peak)
excerpt: This classic Cabernet is dry and full bodied with blackberry jam, cassis, ...
description: This classic Cabernet is dry and full bodied with blackberry jam, cassis, dark chocolate and oak flavors. The tannins are quite powerful still so hold till 2019.

title: Judd's Hill 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This 2010 Cab is smooth and velvety with lush, complex flavors of ...
description: This 2010 Cab is smooth and velvety with lush, complex flavors of blackberries, chocolate, cassis and cedar. Your best bet is to drink it now with spicy beef dishes.

title: Kunde 2010 Drummond Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: Kunde makes Cabs to drink young for their sheer deliciousness, and this ...
description: Kunde makes Cabs to drink young for their sheer deliciousness, and this is a fine example of the house style. The wine is dry, softly tannic and balanced, with rich black cherry, currant, cola and spice flavors. A great steak wine.

title: Alta Vista 2011 Premium Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Berry and cassis aromas are mildly herbal. This is nicely structured, although ...
description: Berry and cassis aromas are mildly herbal. This is nicely structured, although the acidity is slightly spiked. Flavors of roasted berry, leafy notes and herbal shadings finish with pinched tannins as well as tobacco and fig flavors. Drink through 2016.

title: Pascual Toso 2011 Reserve Barrancas Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Aromas of red fruits, tomato, herbs, tobacco and cedar are stylish and ...
description: Aromas of red fruits, tomato, herbs, tobacco and cedar are stylish and not overpowering. This feels fresh and a touch earthy, with flavors of tobacco, cinnamon, cassis and baked berries. The finish is medium in length and intensity, with apparent but not overbearing oak. Drink through 2017.

title: Trinchero 2010 Central Park West Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
excerpt: This is a good Cabernet, dry and tannic, with classic black currant ...
description: This is a good Cabernet, dry and tannic, with classic black currant and tea flavors. Enjoy now with a good decant.

title: Arrowood 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
excerpt: With more than four years of bottle age, this Cabernet is soft, ...
description: With more than four years of bottle age, this Cabernet is soft, elegant and lovely to drink now. It has subtle but complex black currant, mocha and cedar flavors, along with rich tannins that will pair well with steak.

title: La Carraia 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Umbria)
excerpt: This Cabernet Sauvignon opens with aromas of ripe black fruit, cedar and ...
description: This Cabernet Sauvignon opens with aromas of ripe black fruit, cedar and toast. The palate delivers notes of ripe plum, black currant and spice, with smooth tannins that make this very enjoyable to drink young.

title: Conn Creek 2009 Hozhoni Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: Made from 100% Cabernet, and aged in 50% new French oak, this ...
description: Made from 100% Cabernet, and aged in 50% new French oak, this is lush and soft with flavors of ripe blackberries, currants, blueberries and cedar, all wrapped with thick, easy tannins. It should hold fine for the next five years, but is unlikely to gain complexity.

title: Cass 2010 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: This densely concentrated wine is intense with blackberry and black currant flavors. ...
description: This densely concentrated wine is intense with blackberry and black currant flavors. The tannins are strong but very finely textured, giving the wine a velvety mouthfeel. It finishes with sweet oak notes and a warmth from alcohol that barbecue will easily handle.

title: Pulenta Estate 2011 III Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Herbal scents blend with sweeter aromas of red licorice candy and red-berry ...
description: Herbal scents blend with sweeter aromas of red licorice candy and red-berry fruits. This is rich and a touch syrupy in feel, with flavors of green herbs and plum offset by oak and molasses. On the finish, varietal notes of pimiento and bell pepper enter the fray.

title: Bodega Renacer 2011 Punto Final Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Jammy aromas suggest a mix of sugar beet, reedy red fruits and ...
description: Jammy aromas suggest a mix of sugar beet, reedy red fruits and Graham cracker. The palate on this first-ever Cabernet from Punto Final is big and blocky, with oaky, herbal flavors of spiced berries. A lively, semisweet finish has a molasses hint and mild green accents.

title: Pascual Toso 2011 Alta Las Barrancas Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Immediately you know this is heavily oaked because the nose is charred ...
description: Immediately you know this is heavily oaked because the nose is charred and minty to the max. Airing pushes things toward tobacco and cedar, but it still tastes woody and resiny. Fruit notes of cassis, plum and cherry are spicy, while overall acidity is drawing.

title: Andeluna 2011 1300 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Basic, fresh, honest aromas of red-berry fruits and spice set up a ...
description: Basic, fresh, honest aromas of red-berry fruits and spice set up a wide, easygoing palate with cassis, blackberry and herbal flavors. Only on the finish does one detect some acidity and rawness. Overall this is a nice Cab for casual drinking.

title: Finca Lalande 2012 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Tupungato)
excerpt: Earthy berry and cassis aromas are more generic than particular. The mouthfeel ...
description: Earthy berry and cassis aromas are more generic than particular. The mouthfeel on this Cab is scratchy and heavy, with firm tannins that grab and bite. Plum and cassis flavors are minty, herbal and spicy, while the finish is even more minty, with scouring, hard tannins.

title: Smith & Hook 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
excerpt: This is a ripe, enjoyable wine with bright flavors of blackberries and ...
description: This is a ripe, enjoyable wine with bright flavors of blackberries and currants. Brisk acidity and thick tannins make this a great pairing with a marbled steak.

title: Alberti 154 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Leafy, spicy and dry on the nose, this is round on the ...
description: Leafy, spicy and dry on the nose, this is round on the palate and solid in feel. Flavors of gritty, baked berry fruits come across mildly hot, while the finish sizzles with berry leftovers and a pinch of cocoa flavor.

title: Santa Julia 2012 [+] Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Compact dark-fruit aromas turn more jammy with airing. This is gripping in ...
description: Compact dark-fruit aromas turn more jammy with airing. This is gripping in feel, with firm tannins. Flavors of spice, herbs and  black fruits finish with pronounced acidity, leftover tannins and a leathery accent.

title: Villa Atuel 2012 El Tractor Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Earthy aromas are a bit muddled and suggest tomato and herbs, but ...
description: Earthy aromas are a bit muddled and suggest tomato and herbs, but in the mouth, this is fresh and rigid in feel. Flavors of zesty berry come with oaky, savory notes and a touch of woody residue on the finish.

title: Casarena 2012 505 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Sweet berry, wet cement, plastic and creamy oak aromas lead to a ...
description: Sweet berry, wet cement, plastic and creamy oak aromas lead to a palate with plenty of grip. Flavors of oaky, roasted berry and vanilla finish sweet but also peppery and chocolaty, and with some heat.

title: Russo 2009 La Mandria del Pari Cabernet Sauvignon (Val di Cornia Suvereto)
excerpt: Made entirely from Cabernet Sauvignon, this Tuscan offering has aromas of grilled ...
description: Made entirely from Cabernet Sauvignon, this Tuscan offering has aromas of grilled bell pepper and cedar wood. Oak dominates the palate, which also shows red currants, chocolate and espresso along with aggressive and astringent wood tannins.

title: Tomero 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: From the beginning, this is a rough ride. Raw, almost volatile plum ...
description: From the beginning, this is a rough ride. Raw, almost volatile plum aromas precede a scouring palate. Herbal, leafy plum and cherry flavors finish tannic and rubbery along the cheeks. This is doubly dry Cabernet.

title: Vinemark 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: This is pretty pricy for a soft, simple Cabernet, but you will ...
description: This is pretty pricy for a soft, simple Cabernet, but you will find some nice blackberry and oak flavors, wrapped into firm tannins. Drink up.

title: Heibel Ranch 2010 GBH Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: The cherry, red currant, cola and oak flavors are delicious on this ...
description: The cherry, red currant, cola and oak flavors are delicious on this bone-dry Cab. Structuraly, however, the wine is so soft that the palate searches in vain for firmness and grip to complete the flavor experience.

title: The Archivist 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Cherry and mint flavors are pleasant in this Cab, but green tannins ...
description: Cherry and mint flavors are pleasant in this Cab, but green tannins give the palate a harsh feel.

title: Skinnygirl 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: This is a soft and simple party wine with jammy blackberry, cherry ...
description: This is a soft and simple party wine with jammy blackberry, cherry and oak flavors.

title: Raimat 2009 Castell de Raimat Cabernet Sauvignon (Costers del Segre)
excerpt: Green, grassy aromas lead the bouquet, which then turns charred and oaky. ...
description: Green, grassy aromas lead the bouquet, which then turns charred and oaky. In the mouth, clove and heavy oak notes are dominant, while the feel is rubbery and rough. This is rugged and oaky.

title: Amici 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Spring Mountain)
excerpt: Winemaker Joel Aiken was lucky enough to source fruit from this famous ...
description: Winemaker Joel Aiken was lucky enough to source fruit from this famous Napa Valley appellation, and its mountain origins show in both the intensity of flavors and of tannins. The fruit is remarkably concentrated in cassis, with a tangy minerality that must come from the soil. New French oak, with its tannins and sweet toast, has been perfectly applied. The wine is vital, harmonious and young. Give it 10 or 15 years to begin to come around.

title: Sleight of Hand 2010 The Illusionist Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This is mostly Cabernet Sauvignon, with Petit Verdot and Cabernet Franc making ...
description: This is mostly Cabernet Sauvignon, with Petit Verdot and Cabernet Franc making up the last 9%. Smooth, supple and satiny on the palate, this wine is bursting with scents and flavors of deep purple fruit, cassis, smoke and graphite. The polished, lightly textured tannins add a sense of muscle to the finish. This is a wine that may be gulped down immediately, or cellared for up to a decade.

title: Turnbull 2010 Pierra Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: All the individual parts of this 100% Cabernet are, in a word, ...
description: All the individual parts of this 100% Cabernet are, in a word, gargantuan. Yet somehow the wine maintains its balance. The fruit is unbelievably ripe and powerful, with black currants, plums and chocolate that veer into a slight, Port-like finish. The tannins are thick and mellow, while oak adds rich notes of caramel. The result is a stupendously lush, delicious and heady wine. Hold for up to 15 years.

title: Santa Rita 2010 Casa Real Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: After a rooty, spicy opening that includes aromas of tree bark, leather, ...
description: After a rooty, spicy opening that includes aromas of tree bark, leather, marzipan and ripe berry fruits, this perennial winner shows superb balance, mouthfeel and overall integration. Flavors of cassis, cherry, plum, dry spice and chocolate finish long, lightly herbal and with complexities. Drink through 2020.

title: Concha y Toro 2010 Terrunyo Andes Pirque Vineyard Block Las Terrazas Cabernet Sauvignon (Pirque)
excerpt: Firm berry and plum aromas come with equal amounts of spice, oak ...
description: Firm berry and plum aromas come with equal amounts of spice, oak and earthy notes. This is forward and concentrated, with chewy tannins that are obvious but not hard or mean. Loamy blackberry and blueberry flavors get a boost from tobacco, licorice and chocolate accents before finishing muscular and spicy. Drink through 2022.

title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2010 Ethos Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: The best Ethos Cabernet yet, this 100% varietal wine is sourced from ...
description: The best Ethos Cabernet yet, this 100% varietal wine is sourced from 40-year-old vines at the Cold Creek vineyards. Dark, rich, juicy and dense with black fruits, this powerhouse wine brings blackberry and cassis into focus with layers of cinnamon-dusted dark chocolate.

title: Turnbull 2010 Amoenus Cabernet Sauvignon (Calistoga)
excerpt: Tiers of dark chocolate, black currants, violets and cedar mark this wonderfully ...
description: Tiers of dark chocolate, black currants, violets and cedar mark this wonderfully rich young Cabernet, which contains a drop of Malbec that brings an animal note. The wine is almost black at the center and very tannic, suggesting ageability. With its inherent balance, it should have no problems negotiating the next 10 or 15 years.

title: Beresan 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
excerpt: This is an excellent Cabernet, sourced from estate vineyards in the highly ...
description: This is an excellent Cabernet, sourced from estate vineyards in the highly sought-after region known as The Rocks. Elegant, with firm acidity underpinning its deep veins of pomegranate and cherry, it finishes with a gentle hint of mocha and caramel.

title: Delectus 2010 Bear Crossing Cabernet Sauvignon (Knights Valley)
excerpt: Give this wine credit for sheer opulence. Cabernet gets this ripe only ...
description: Give this wine credit for sheer opulence. Cabernet gets this ripe only in a few favored places in the world, and this Sonoma County appellation, which leads over the Mayacamas Mountains to Napa Valley, is one of them. The wine is incredibly rich in black cherries, spicy plums, mocha and red currants. Your best bet is to drink it now, because it seems too soft for aging.

title: Grgich Hills 2010 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This valley-wide blend comes from Yountville, Calistoga and Rutherford. It combines the ...
description: This valley-wide blend comes from Yountville, Calistoga and Rutherford. It combines the best fruit of the appellations, resulting in a dry, full-bodied and tannic young wine, with classic Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon flavors of cassis. Beautiful now, after a few hours of decanting, and should hold in the bottle for at least eight years.

title: Viu Manent 2010 La Capilla Single Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: With integrated aromas of balsam wood, cassis, cherry and mixed spices, this ...
description: With integrated aromas of balsam wood, cassis, cherry and mixed spices, this smells elegant and inviting. A concentrated palate is slightly narrow in feel, while flavors of baked plum, cassis, black cherry and hard spices finish with toasty oak and chocolate notes. Drink through 2017.

title: Turnbull 2010 Leopoldina Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: Like a great juggler, this Cabernet balances exceptionally ripe fruit and sweet ...
description: Like a great juggler, this Cabernet balances exceptionally ripe fruit and sweet new oak with fine tannins and acids to yield a wine of exquisite poise and delight. The flavors, of black cherries and mocha, are just delicious, while fairly high alcohol brings a rich headiness. Drink now-2016.

title: Barboursville Vineyards 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Virginia)
excerpt: This Cabernet Sauvignon is subtle and restrained on first sniff, but only ...
description: This Cabernet Sauvignon is subtle and restrained on first sniff, but only takes a few swirls to unlock its expressive aromas of blackberry, cassis, brown spice and undergrowth. Medium to full bodied, the palate bears seamless acidity and refined tannins. The finish shows some warmth, but mocha notes linger, creating balance.

title: Grgich Hills 2009 Yountville Selection Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Yountville)
excerpt: This ambitious effort stars flavors so ripe and fantastic, they defy description. ...
description: This ambitious effort stars flavors so ripe and fantastic, they defy description. The wine, with a few drops of Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot, explodes in blackberries, black cherries, currants, mocha, sweet licorice, plum and new oak flavors. The tannins are magnificent, the oak integration beautiful. The chief criticism is that the alcohol level is high, and gives the wine a burn of heat.

title: Castle Rock 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Castle Rock again surpasses expectations with this Columbia Valley Cabernet Sauvignon. It ...
description: Castle Rock again surpasses expectations with this Columbia Valley Cabernet Sauvignon. It has clear Cabernet character, a soft mix of black cherry and cassis, delivered with a smooth and supple mouthfeel. There are well-integrated hints of coffee, cream and herb. Ready to drink right now, with enough heft to stand up to most grilled meats.

title: Milbrandt 2010 The Estates Cabernet Sauvignon (Wahluke Slope)
excerpt: The light flavors of cherry and herb play second fiddle to the ...
description: The light flavors of cherry and herb play second fiddle to the oak notes of toasted marshmellow, vanilla, chocolate and char (30% new French and American oak) with mouthwatering acids bringing a pleasing sense of freshness.

title: Coastline 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Lots to like in this dry, smoothly tannic Cabernet. It gets better ...
description: Lots to like in this dry, smoothly tannic Cabernet. It gets better as it warms up in the glass and breathes, revealing complex black currant, currant and sage flavors.

title: Waterbrook 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: An elegantly styled wine with notes of green herbs, bell pepper and ...
description: An elegantly styled wine with notes of green herbs, bell pepper and toast backed by tart acids and chalky tannins. May improve once the acid has some additional time to integrate.

title: Hewitt 2010 Double Plus Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: This wine has so much new French oak that the toast and ...
description: This wine has so much new French oak that the toast and caramel become integral parts of the flavor profile. Why would you do that with great fruit? It just buries it. And the fruit of this wine is indeed rich in blackberries, currants, blueberries and licorice. This wine will dazzle fans of oak, but true enthusiasts should draw the line and signal the winery that oak is a seasoning, not the main ingredient.

title: Clos La Chance 2010 Estate Whitestone Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
excerpt: Blackberries and cola are the flavors of this smooth, rather sweet Cabernet. ...
description: Blackberries and cola are the flavors of this smooth, rather sweet Cabernet. It has brisk acidity, as befits a Central Coast red wine, and makes for polished drinking now.

title: Bodega Volcanes de Chile 2011 Summit 2900 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Rapel Valley)
excerpt: Dry, spicy, leathery aromas are herbal but solid. This feels full and ...
description: Dry, spicy, leathery aromas are herbal but solid. This feels full and balanced but rudimentary, with cherry, cassis, chocolate and herbal flavors. A finish of dark-fruit flavors comes with overt oak notes, peppery spice and heat.

title: Thorny Rose 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: This wine feels a bit stripped, although the earthy tannins are still ...
description: This wine feels a bit stripped, although the earthy tannins are still quite noticeable. Herbal flavors overtake the thin red fruits, with a wash of vanilla running through the finish.

title: Domingo Molina 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Salta)
excerpt: The nose is herbaceous, with grassy berry aromas and a touch of ...
description: The nose is herbaceous, with grassy berry aromas and a touch of pencil eraser. A tannic, grabby feeling palate shows berry flavors in front of a finish defined by mint, thyme and oregano.

title: Barefoot NV Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Jammy flavors of blackberries, cherries and mocha make this taste almost of ...
description: Jammy flavors of blackberries, cherries and mocha make this taste almost of candied fruits. Despite how juicy it is, this wine finishes dry and firm in tannins.

title: Daglia Canyon 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Dry Creek Valley)
excerpt: While this Cab is a little thin, it feels nice and tasty ...
description: While this Cab is a little thin, it feels nice and tasty in the mouth. It offers ripe flavors of cherries, currants and plums that finish spicy and warm in liqueur heat.

title: Spann Vineyards 2007 Mayacamas Range Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
excerpt: At about six years of age, this Bordeaux blend is soft, fruity ...
description: At about six years of age, this Bordeaux blend is soft, fruity and ending its useful lifespan. The cherry and cola flavors are drying out. Drink up.

title: Mossback 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Chalk Hill)
excerpt: This Cab is dry and properly tannic, with good blackberry, mocha and ...
description: This Cab is dry and properly tannic, with good blackberry, mocha and herb flavors. On the downside is a strange ashiness, like the grapes were hit by smoke from a wildfire. Drink up.

title: Salentein 2011 Portillo Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Hard aromas of tire rubber and black fruits lead to a clampy ...
description: Hard aromas of tire rubber and black fruits lead to a clampy palate with raw tannins. Blackberry and rubber flavors finish on the bitter side.

title: Antucura 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Vista Flores)
excerpt: Mint, tea and light plum aromas are mild at best. Hard tannins ...
description: Mint, tea and light plum aromas are mild at best. Hard tannins make the palate grabby, then murky, stewy flavors take over. A grinding finish is not the best send-off.

title: Maipe 2011 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Compost and strong herbal aromas lead to a rubbery palate with stewed ...
description: Compost and strong herbal aromas lead to a rubbery palate with stewed tomato and leathery flavors. A salty, rubbery tasting finish fails to bring this around.

title: Cambridge & Sunset 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Feels pinched and harsh in the mouth, with simple, sweet blackberry Pop-Tart ...
description: Feels pinched and harsh in the mouth, with simple, sweet blackberry Pop-Tart flavors.

title: Conquista 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: With aromas of blueberry and Kool-Aid, this feels raw and pointy, with ...
description: With aromas of blueberry and Kool-Aid, this feels raw and pointy, with basic plum and dry red-fruit flavors. An abrupt finish is as expected.

title: Pessimist 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Soft, sweet and simple raspberry and oak flavors mark this rustic wine.
description: Soft, sweet and simple raspberry and oak flavors mark this rustic wine.

title: Diamond Creek 2010 Volcanic Hill Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
excerpt: So delicious now, you can drink it, but the hard tannins strongly ...
description: So delicious now, you can drink it, but the hard tannins strongly suggest aging this beauty. Beyond the astringency are complex flavors of blackberries and olives, with sweet toasty oak playing a starring role. Harder to describe is the overall balance, so rich and sweet, yet dry and elusive. Give it until 2020 to begin to come around.

title: Parallel 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This is a tight, dry, tannic wine, showing all the hallmarks of ...
description: This is a tight, dry, tannic wine, showing all the hallmarks of ageabiity. Winemaker Philippe Melka has done a good job of blending fruit from Yountville, Atlas Peak and St. Helena to produce a seamlessly integrated Cabernet. The mouthfeel is soft, yet with fierce tannins that frame superb blackberry, cocoa, herb, mineral and cedar flavors. This continues a string of successful Cabernets that have been modestly priced, by Napa standards. Hold until 2018, at the very least.

title: Pont de Chevalier 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Knights Valley)
excerpt: This is one of those wines that grows more attractive the more ...
description: This is one of those wines that grows more attractive the more it airs in the glass. At first, it just impresses with ripe blackberry and cassis fruit and lots of oak. As it breathes, subtler notes emerge, lending it charm and complexity. Still, it remains quite tannic. High alcohol may limit ageability, so drink it over the next few years.

title: Companhia das Quintas 2010 Quinta de Pancas Cabernet Sauvignon (Lisboa)
excerpt: Cabernet Sauvignon in the cool Lisboa region has a similarity to Bordeaux. ...
description: Cabernet Sauvignon in the cool Lisboa region has a similarity to Bordeaux. It gives a structured, black currant flavored wine, with firm tannins, a mineral texture and serious acidity. The wine is tight and should age well. Drink from 2014.

title: Pillitteri 2010 Icewine Cabernet Sauvignon (Niagara-On-The-Lake)
excerpt: A very pretty wine with a refined aroma profile of wild strawberry, ...
description: A very pretty wine with a refined aroma profile of wild strawberry, wet stone, dried cherry and peppery spice backed by rich, candied fruit flavors that manage retain deftness.

title: St. Francis 2010 Lagomarsino Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Russian River Valley)
excerpt: This is a 100% Cabernet. It has deep, ripe flavors of black ...
description: This is a 100% Cabernet. It has deep, ripe flavors of black currants, licorice and raspberries, with hints of dark chocolate and toast. The tannins and acids are a bit fierce, suggesting that a few years in the cellar are warranted.

title: Lagar de Bezana 2011 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Cachapoal Valley)
excerpt: Ripe plum and berry aromas come with floral accents as well as ...
description: Ripe plum and berry aromas come with floral accents as well as touches of horse hide and leather. The palate is firm and direct, with balanced tannins and acidity working with flavors of dark berry fruits, chocolate, pepper and spice. The finish is chocolaty, with hints of vanilla, herbs and heat.

title: Deerfield Ranch 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
excerpt: Held back all these years, this Bordeaux-style blend is just beginning to ...
description: Held back all these years, this Bordeaux-style blend is just beginning to shed its fresh, primary raspberry and cherry flavors. In their place are drier versions of the same, with hints of mushrooms and violets. The wine is a little soft, but certainly delicious, and is drinking well now.

title: Icaria 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Sweet new oak brings a jacket of buttered cinnamon toast to this ...
description: Sweet new oak brings a jacket of buttered cinnamon toast to this soft, ripe Cabernet. The fruit flavors range from blackberries and cherries to currants and mocha. Easy to drink this wine now.

title: Gualdo del Re 2008 Federico Primo Cabernet Sauvignon (Toscana)
excerpt: This Cabernet Sauvignon from Tuscany offers up aromas of bell peppers, cedar ...
description: This Cabernet Sauvignon from Tuscany offers up aromas of bell peppers, cedar wood and black currants. On the palate, this shows black cherry, raspberry and black pepper notes mingled with espresso. It finishes on a bitter note of unroasted coffee bean.

title: La Playa 2011 Block Selection Reserve Block N.6 Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Despite aromas of Band-Aid and rubber, this is predominantly smoky on the ...
description: Despite aromas of Band-Aid and rubber, this is predominantly smoky on the nose, with black-fruit scents and asphalt. The palate feels crisp and focused, while plum, berry and cassis flavors fold in herbal notes and a hint of olive. This is textbook value Chilean Cabernet to drink on any occasion.

title: Primus 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: Rubbery, gamy aromas carry a medicinal touch of latex along with cherry ...
description: Rubbery, gamy aromas carry a medicinal touch of latex along with cherry and berry. The mouthfeel is solid, with grabby tannins in support of plum, loamy berry and earthy flavors. A mild finish with standard cassis and berry flavors is perfectly good.

title: Guenoc 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Lake County)
excerpt: A Cab of light texture, well in balance, with savory red raspberry ...
description: A Cab of light texture, well in balance, with savory red raspberry jam fruit amid a touch of spicy Provencal herbs. Well priced, it makes for a nice midweek treat alongside a steak au poivre or roast chicken.

title: Veramonte 2011 El Caballero Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: Crusty berry aromas are toasty and tarry. This feels flush and solid, ...
description: Crusty berry aromas are toasty and tarry. This feels flush and solid, with good body and structure. On the palate, this tastes fresh and lightly herbal, with spiced berry as the core flavor. A minty, lightly toasted and spicy finish provides a nice ending

title: Concha y Toro 2011 Marques de Casa Concha Cabernet Sauvignon (Puente Alto)
excerpt: Pencil eraser, blueberry, olive and peppery notes are what you draw off ...
description: Pencil eraser, blueberry, olive and peppery notes are what you draw off the bouquet of this ripe yet basic Cab. In the mouth, this feels rubbery and tannic. Flavors of ultraripe black fruits taste sweet and come with licorice and espresso bitterness on the finish, which is mossy, heavy and choppy.

title: James Mitchell 2010 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: A well-made relatively large production Cabernet, fruity in black cherry with a ...
description: A well-made relatively large production Cabernet, fruity in black cherry with a smoky edge of cinnamon toast and soft vanilla. Pour at your next party.

title: Caliterra 2011 Reserva Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
excerpt: This starts out with a whiff of earth and compost that transitions ...
description: This starts out with a whiff of earth and compost that transitions to olive, tree bark and herbal berry aromas upon airing. The palate feels good, with midlevel tannic bite and light, woody flavors of mint-infused licorice and berry. As the fruit element leaves the finish, mint, toast and green notes settle in.

title: Noble Vines 2011 337 Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: Concentrated in ripe berry flavor and a cushion of soft tannins, this ...
description: Concentrated in ripe berry flavor and a cushion of soft tannins, this Cab is straightforward and unfussy, a great mid-week wine medium in weight and noble in its simplicity.

title: Loken Cellars 2010 Penn Valley Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Sierra Foothills)
excerpt: An open-book Cabernet medium in tannin structure and expressive in plum, blackberry ...
description: An open-book Cabernet medium in tannin structure and expressive in plum, blackberry and tobacco. Juicy with a rustic edge.

title: Pennywise 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Sweet black raspberry and cherry fruit marks this likeable Cab. It has ...
description: Sweet black raspberry and cherry fruit marks this likeable Cab. It has a soft mellowness that makes it easy to drink now.

title: St. Clement 2010 Oroppas Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Not a bad wine, but not particularly exciting. It has blackberry and ...
description: Not a bad wine, but not particularly exciting. It has blackberry and cherry flavors, tinged with oak, but also some green, vegetal notes that prohibit aging. The finish is soft and sweet.

title: Irony 2011 Small Lot Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Irony makes good, drinkable, affordable wines and makes no apologies for them. ...
description: Irony makes good, drinkable, affordable wines and makes no apologies for them. Nor should they. This is a fruity, rich Cabernet, deep in blackberries, currants and chocolate, and meant for enjoying now. A great example of how California does inexpensive with effortless ease.

title: Michael David 2011 Freakshow Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: A powerful Cabernet rich in black fruit, cinnamon and a backbone of ...
description: A powerful Cabernet rich in black fruit, cinnamon and a backbone of mild tannin, Freakshow is robust and grippy, the finish showy in vanilla and smoky oak.

title: L.A. Cetto 2005 Private Reserve Barrel Aged Cabernet Sauvignon (Valle de Guadalupe)
excerpt: This rusty looking, aged Cabernet Sauvignon displays mature, cooked aromas of prune, ...
description: This rusty looking, aged Cabernet Sauvignon displays mature, cooked aromas of prune, raisin and not much else. The mouthfeel is dry and astringent, while flavors of burnt brown sugar, stewed berry and turned earth finish quick, without any backup.

title: Lava Cap 2010 Stromberg Cabernet Sauvignon (El Dorado)
excerpt: Serviceable and soft, this Stromberg Cab could use a bit more heft ...
description: Serviceable and soft, this Stromberg Cab could use a bit more heft to liven its fruit.

title: L.A. Cetto 2010 Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (Valle de Guadalupe)
excerpt: Herbal, leathery aromas are horsey and sharp. This feels rugged and choppy, ...
description: Herbal, leathery aromas are horsey and sharp. This feels rugged and choppy, then tastes baked and herbal, like a mix of stewed fruits, oregano, cured meat and pepper. A grassy, herbal finish does little to bring it around.

title: William Cole 2011 Columbine Special Reserve Single Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
excerpt: The cold conditions of the 2011 vintage are evident on this hard, ...
description: The cold conditions of the 2011 vintage are evident on this hard, gritty wine with olive and tarry aromas. This feels rough and grating, with burnt, peppery flavors of olive and dried fruits. A tart finish with leaf and asphalt flavors fails to redeem the wine.

title: Turning Leaf NV Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: Flavors of brown and white sugar, blackberries, blueberries and toast give this ...
description: Flavors of brown and white sugar, blackberries, blueberries and toast give this Cab a sweet, simple profile.

title: Wild Hare 2012 Legendary Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: This is a common wine, thin and sweet in blackberry and cherry ...
description: This is a common wine, thin and sweet in blackberry and cherry jam flavors, with tannins that make your tongue stick to the gums.

title: Lapis Luna 2010 Moon Eyes Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
excerpt: A fairly flat rendering of Cabernet Sauvignon simple in style and execution.
description: A fairly flat rendering of Cabernet Sauvignon simple in style and execution.

title: Rosati Family 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendocino County)
excerpt: A grippy Cabernet lacking in fruit and personality.
description: A grippy Cabernet lacking in fruit and personality.

title: Sequoia Grove 2009 Cambium Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: This Cabernet Sauvignon-based blend contains smaller amounts of Cabernet Franc and Merlot. ...
description: This Cabernet Sauvignon-based blend contains smaller amounts of Cabernet Franc and Merlot. The grapes come from all over the valley, mountains as well as flatlands, making it a testament to the art of blending. The warmer, riper areas bring lush chocolate and blackberry jam flavors, while the cooler areas contribute structural elements of firm tannins and acidity. The result is delicious and compelling. Drink over the next four years.

title: Robert Craig 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Howell Mountain)
excerpt: An awesome Cabernet, as deep and dramatic as they come. It shows ...
description: An awesome Cabernet, as deep and dramatic as they come. It shows the incredibly concentrated blackberry and cassis fruit of Howell Mountain, along with firm tannins. Lots of new oak provides powerful notes of toast and caramel, but the wine is so big it easily handles the barrel influence. This needs time, and will begin to mellow by 2018 and glide through its changes for many years beyond.

title: Frazier 2009 Memento Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: Another successful Cab from Frazier, following on the heels of the outstanding ...
description: Another successful Cab from Frazier, following on the heels of the outstanding 2008 vintage. Like that wine, this one is elaborately ripe in blackberries, cherries, currants and toasty oak, with a long, spicy finish. The structure is impeccable, showing firm tannins and fine balancing acidity. Great to drink now, and will age for at least 10 years.

title: Sequoia Grove 2010 Rutherford Bench Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
excerpt: Ripe and forward in cherry Lifesaver candy and new oak flavors, this ...
description: Ripe and forward in cherry Lifesaver candy and new oak flavors, this is a beautiful wine to drink now. Blended with all five classic Bordeaux varieties, it has a soft complexity that makes it instantly likeable. Good as it is, it will develop bottle complexities over the next 10 years.

title: Obelisco Estate 2010 Electrum Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: This is an authoritative Red Mountain Cabernet, from a rising star with ...
description: This is an authoritative Red Mountain Cabernet, from a rising star with an excellent young vineyard. Great structure and a spine of steel support a tightly-wound core of pure cassis. The tannins are hard but fully ripe, with black olive, coffee grounds and bourbon barrel highlights.

title: Summers 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Calistoga)
excerpt: A big Cabernet, impenetrably dark in color and tannicly closed. It has ...
description: A big Cabernet, impenetrably dark in color and tannicly closed. It has ripe, juicy blackberry, cassis liqueur and dark chocolate flavors, with a jacket of sweet, toasted oak. It needs time for those tannins to resolve, so give it a good eight years in the bottle.

title: Alpha Omega 2010 Stagecoach Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Atlas Peak)
excerpt: Big, rich, soft and full-bodied, this 100% Cab impresses for the sheer ...
description: Big, rich, soft and full-bodied, this 100% Cab impresses for the sheer depth of its blackberries, currants, chocolate and minerals. The inky black color testifies to its extreme youth, as does the freshness of flavor. Nowhere near drinkable now, it wants at least six years, and could be going strong in 2022.

title: Force Majeure 2010 Collaboration Series V Ciel du Cheval Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: Chris Gorman is the winemaker for this pure, old vine Cabernet Sauvignon. ...
description: Chris Gorman is the winemaker for this pure, old vine Cabernet Sauvignon. It is a full force gale of a wine, sappy and dense, with blackberry and cassis fruit wreathed in smoke and dark accents from aging in 100% new French oak. Young, big and bold, it remains poised and balanced, with juicy acidity keeping all the flavors in proportion.

title: Alpha Omega 2010 Beckstoffer To Kalon Vineyard North Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
excerpt: Like its Tokalon South counterpart, this 100% has a funky, bacon and ...
description: Like its Tokalon South counterpart, this 100% has a funky, bacon and green olive aroma that persists through the finish. That does not detract from the blackberries and black cherries, but gives them an earthy complexity. The wine is a little on the soft side, but still should develop bottle notes after 2018.

title: Seven Hills 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: There will be no reserve Cabernet from Seven Hills in this vintage ...
description: There will be no reserve Cabernet from Seven Hills in this vintage and, as is sometimes the case, the regular bottling is all the better for it. Here the addition of fruit from Klipsun, Artz and other blocks, generally used in the Pentad bottling, adds heft and depth. Lovely aromas of raspberry and cherry, highlights of basil and other fresh herbs, and bracing natural acidity create a perfect mix of flavors that remain delicate yet penetrating.

title: Hall 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
excerpt: Classic Hall Cabernet, blended with some Merlot and ultrarich and smooth in ...
description: Classic Hall Cabernet, blended with some Merlot and ultrarich and smooth in cherries, raspberries, sweet plums and mocha. The high alcohol is balanced, and this is quite delicious and drinkable. Ready now and should hang in there for at least six years.

title: Januik 2010 Ciel du Cheval Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
excerpt: At first this seems severely curtailed, as the nose is shut down ...
description: At first this seems severely curtailed, as the nose is shut down and the flavors compact. There is a spine of steel, and the underlying flavors of metal and mineral dominate the red currant fruit. Graphite and gravel notes add to  the complexity. The suggestion: give this wine another half decade of aging at least.

title: Eponymous 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Spring Mountain)
excerpt: Rich in black cherry jam, mocha and toasty oak flavors, this wine ...
description: Rich in black cherry jam, mocha and toasty oak flavors, this wine offers the firm tannins and minerality that give a young Spring Mountain Cabernet its noticeable characteristics. Give it eight years to begin to come around.

title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2010 Canoe Ridge Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: This 95% Cabernet Sauvignon with the balance of Merlot, Syrah and Malbec, ...
description: This 95% Cabernet Sauvignon with the balance of Merlot, Syrah and Malbec, is immediately accessible with notes of char, roasted coffee bean and cherry. The palate is rich, chocolaty and seamlessly stitched together.

title: Elevation Cellars 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Another solid effort from this young winery, the Cabernet is augmented with ...
description: Another solid effort from this young winery, the Cabernet is augmented with a 12% mix of Merlot, Petit Verdot and Cab Franc. Compact and clean, it puts on a display of well-structured cranberry, cherry and cassis fruit, lightly tasting of savory earth, pencil lead and bark.

title: Sparkman 2010 Rainmaker Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: This is a bright, spicy, generous Cabernet, with 17% Malbec in the ...
description: This is a bright, spicy, generous Cabernet, with 17% Malbec in the blend. The flavors mix pretty cherry fruit with streaks of black olive and hints of Asian spices. The tannins are firm and chewy.

title: J Bell Cellars 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
excerpt: The best of a lineup of single varietal red wines, this melds ...
description: The best of a lineup of single varietal red wines, this melds raspberry and cassis fruit flavors into a wrapping of earth and licorice. The dark and roasted accents continue through the finish with earthy tannins and a hint of stem.

title: Casa L'Angel 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Valencia)
excerpt: Blueberry and blackberry aromas fold in earthy notes, herbal spice and a ...
description: Blueberry and blackberry aromas fold in earthy notes, herbal spice and a pinch of Cabernet-related green. This feels full but crisp, with level acidity and minty, oaky flavors of carob and herbal raspberry. A short finish is fresh and lively.

title: Round Pond 2011 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: With savory black currant, blackberry jam and toast flavors wrapped into firm, ...
