description: With savory black currant, blackberry jam and toast flavors wrapped into firm, complex tannins, this is a lovely Cabernet to drink now. Shows many of the qualities of far more expensive Napa Cabs, with a bit less depth.

title: Hogue 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
excerpt: Medium-bodied and lightly peppery, this wine brings cassis fruit and tongue-scraping acidity ...
description: Medium-bodied and lightly peppery, this wine brings cassis fruit and tongue-scraping acidity into play. The finishing tannins are also astringent and suggest that pairing this with a fat-laden steak would be optimal.

title: Swiftwater Cellars 2010 Zephyr Ridge Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
excerpt: Though aged in just 40% new French oak, the barrel notes of ...
description: Though aged in just 40% new French oak, the barrel notes of mocha and roasted coffee bean take up much of the stage with dark fruit and herbs fighting for attention. The flavors are ripe and lush but seem a bit clipped.

title: Greg Norman California Estates 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
excerpt: Soft, sweet and robust, with upfront cherry pie, red currant and plum ...
description: Soft, sweet and robust, with upfront cherry pie, red currant and plum flavors. Lots of spices, too, ranging from cinnamon and anise to black pepper. Easy to like this Cab with a juicy filet mignon.

title: Howell Mountain Vineyards 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Howell Mountain)
excerpt: Soft and sweet for a Howell Mountain Cabernet, with one-dimensional red currant, ...
description: Soft and sweet for a Howell Mountain Cabernet, with one-dimensional red currant, mocha, cola and new oak flavors. Hard to see it going anywhere, so drink up.

title: Stags' Leap Winery 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A tough, dry, tannic wine, with a gritty mouthfeel. The flavors are ...
description: A tough, dry, tannic wine, with a gritty mouthfeel. The flavors are ripe in black currants, plums, black cherries, sweet oak and earthy, tobacco notes. Seems best consumed over the next three years.

title: Sebastiani 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: With juicy blackberry and cherry fruit flavors, accented by an herbal touch ...
description: With juicy blackberry and cherry fruit flavors, accented by an herbal touch of nettles and chamomile tea, this Cab is easy to pair with everyday food, like tacos or an upscale pizza. It has soft acidity and gentle tannins, and is at the peak of its drinkability now.

title: Hanna 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
excerpt: Dry and tannic, this wine still has a velvety mouthfeel where the ...
description: Dry and tannic, this wine still has a velvety mouthfeel where the blackberry and cherry flavors add a brown sugary edge, like a granola bar. Drink up.

title: Lost Angel 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
excerpt: To call this wine easy for the price is no insult. For ...
description: To call this wine easy for the price is no insult. For 10 bucks, you get a soft, dry, full-bodied Cab with pleasurable cherry and currant flavors. Perfect for everyday red wine fare.

title: Lagarde 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Piercing, jabbing aromas of wood and berry fruits lead to a juicy, ...
description: Piercing, jabbing aromas of wood and berry fruits lead to a juicy, acidic, fresh feeling palate with light, oaky, generic flavors of minty berry, herbs and oak. A modest, oaky finish is undistinguished.

title: Montoya 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: The texture on this Cabernet is a little tough and tart, although ...
description: The texture on this Cabernet is a little tough and tart, although the wine does have plenty of blackberry and mocha flavors. Drink it now.

title: Alamos 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Leathery, horsey aromas suggest rubber and berry scents. This feels alive and ...
description: Leathery, horsey aromas suggest rubber and berry scents. This feels alive and a bit edgy, with a mix of resiny oak, spice, red fruits and green herbs on the flavor profile. The finish is a touch abrasive, with a minty flavor.

title: Castle Rock 2011 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
excerpt: A slight Cabernet, thin and simple, with black cherry, herb and oak ...
description: A slight Cabernet, thin and simple, with black cherry, herb and oak flavors. Drink up.

title: Casa de Campo 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
excerpt: Briny raspberry aromas are a bit murky. This smacks down hard with ...
description: Briny raspberry aromas are a bit murky. This smacks down hard with acidity, while the flavors run toward earthy, generic plum and berry. A salty finish with animal notes is firm but struggles with cleanliness.

title: EOS 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
excerpt: Light in body, with prickly acidity highlighting thin berry and oak flavors.
description: Light in body, with prickly acidity highlighting thin berry and oak flavors.
